section.name: 79. Nuntakna ii Khiatna (Meaning of Life, Purpose of Life)

index.section: Nuntakna ii Khiatna (Meaning of Life, Purpose of Life)

category.verse: Tua ciangin Faro in a mipilte leh a aisan siamte a sam hi. Egypt mitphial siamte in zong amau' siamna tawh tua bang teek mahin a bawl thei uhhi.
"Vankahte leh aisaanna lamah kihei kei un. Amaute tawh a kininsak dingin amaute zong kei un; kei pen { Topa } na Pasian uh ka hihi.
"Numei ahi a, pasal ahi zongin van a kah a, ai a saan leh kithat ding a, suang tawh amaute kidenglum ding hi. Amau' sihna amau mah ngawh ding ahi hi," a ci hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Jacob mite a kibumna ding omlo a, Israel mite' langkhatah aisaan ding omlo hi. Tu-in Israel-te tawh kisai-in, ‘Pasian' sepna en un,’ kici ding hi.

Note lakah a tanu ahi a, a tapa ahi zongin biakna-in a zang, ai a saan, khong a khai, mailam thu a gen, ai a tawi, 11 bum a zang, van a kah, sikhate tawh a kiho, sikha thu a dong kuamah na om kei ding uhhi. 12 Banghang hiam cihleh hihte a hih mi peuhmah { Topa}-a' dingin a kihhuai a hihi. Hih bang a kihhuai gamtatnate hangin note' mai panin { Topa } na Pasian un amaute hawlkhia hi. 13 Note pen { Topa } na Pasian uh mai-ah paubaang loin na om ding uhhi. 14 Banghang hiam cihleh note in na suankhiat ding uhhih minamte in khongkhaite leh aisante thu ngai uhhi. Ahih hangin note ahih leh tua bangin na gamtat ding uh { Topa } na Pasian un hong phallo hi.
Gaal pau kikin, "En in, a gam laizang panin mite hong paisuk a, aisante' Tawsaw lam panin pawlkhat hong pai hi," a ci hi.
Beor' tapa, aisanpa Balaam zong, Israel mite in adang a thahte lakah namsau tawh thatkhawm uhhi.
Minam kua leh alangte-a' dingin { Topa } in Moses a thupiak bangin amau' gamhte aisanna tawh kipia hi.
A behbeh tawh kizui-in Benjamin minamte-a' ding aisan hun hong tung a, amau' tungah a kipia gam pen Judah minam leh Joseph minamte kikalah hong kia hi.
A beh zui-in Simeon minam-a' ding aisan nihna hong tung hi. Amau' gamh in Judah minamte' gamh ngahsa pawkhat huam hi.
A beh tawh kizui-in Zebulun minam-a' dingin aisan thumna hong tung hi. Amau' luah gam in Sarid ciangdong ban hi.
A beh tawh kizui-in Issakhar minamte-a' dingin aisan lina hong tung hi.
A beh tawh kizui-in Asher minamte-a' dingin aisan ngana hong tung hi.
A beh tawh kizui-in Naftali minamte-a' dingin aisan gukna hong tung hi.
A beh tawh kizui-in Dan minamte-a' dingin aisan sagihna hong tung hi.

Hihte pen siampi Eleazar leh Nun tapa Joshua leh Israel minam beh lutangte in kikhopna bukkong, { Topa' } mai Shiloh-ah aisanna tawh a hawmkhiat uh gamh a hihi. Tua bangin amaute in leitang hawmna a zo uhhi.
Tu-in Gibeah tungah eite' hih ding thu in: Tua khua a sim dingin aisanna tawh i pai ding a,

Kohath behte-a' dingin aisan hong tung hi. Tua ahih ciangin siampi Aaron' suanlekhak ahi Levi mite in Judah, Simeon, leh Benjamin minamte tung panin aisanna tawh khuapi sawmlethum ngah uhhi. 5 Tua ciangin a omlai Kohath mite in Efraim minam, Dan minam leh Manasseh minam alangte tung panin aisanna tawh khuapi sawm ngah uhhi. 6 Gershon mite in Issakhar minam, Asher minam, Naftali minam, leh Bashan gamsunga om Manasseh minam alangte tung panin aisanna tawh khuapi sawmlethum ngah uhhi. 7 Merari mite in a beh uh tawh kizui-in Reuben minam, Gad minam, leh Zebulun minamte tung panin khuapi sawmlenih ngah uhhi. 8 { Topa } in Moses tung tawnin a thupiak bangin hih khuapite leh a lonona gamte Israel mite in aisanna tawh Levi mite tungah a pia uhhi.
Tua ciangin Filistia-te in siampite leh aisante sam uh a, "{ Topa' } Thuciamna Singkuang bang cih ding ihi hiam? Ama omna munah bang tawh kha ding ihi hiam, hong gen un," a ci uhhi.

Tua ciangin Samuel in Israel minamte khempeuh a nai-ah hong paipih a, aisanna tawh Benjamin minam kila hi. 21 Amah in Benjamin minamte a behbehin hong paipih a, aisanna tawh Matri innkuan kila hi. A tawpna-ah amah in Matri innkuan a mi malin hong paipih a, aisanna tawh Kish' tapa Saul kila hi. Ahih hangin amaute in amah a zon' uh ciangin amah kimu zolo hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh lehdona pen aisan mawhna bangmah hi a, lungkhauhna pen mawhna leh milim biakna mah a bang a hihi. Nangmah in { Topa' } thu nial khin na hih manin, amah in zong kumpi hihna pan nang hong nolh khin hi," a ci hi.
Tu-in Samuel si khin a, Israel-te khempeuh ama hangin kapin, ama khuapi Ramah-ah vui uhhi. Saul in vankahte leh aisante a gamsung panin beisak hi.

Numei in ama kiangah, "Saul' hihsa thu, gamsung panin vankahte leh aisante a suksiatna na thei taktak hi. Tua ahih ciangin banghangin keima sihna ding a piangsak dingin kei-a' dingin thangzak hong koih na hi hiam?" a ci hi.
Joram in Jehu a muh ciangin, "Jehu aw, thuhoih ahi hiam?" a ci hi. Amah in dawngin, "Na nu Jezebel' paktatnate leh aisannate tua zahin a tam laiteng bang thuhoih om thei ding ahi hiam?" a ci hi.
Amaute in biakna-in a tanute uh leh a tapate uh halin vankahna leh aisanna zang uh a, { Topa' } muhna-ah a sia a gamta dingin kipia tawmin amah hehsak uhhi.
Tua ciangin amah in biakna-in a tapa hal a, aisanna leh mailam thugen kholhnate semin, vankah theite leh aisante tawh na semkhawm hi. { Topa' } muhna-ah amah a sia tampi gamta a, amah hehsak hi.
Kohath mi a omlaite tungah aisanna tawh Manasseh minam alangte' gamsung panin khuapi sawm kipia hi.

Eleazar' suante leh Ithamar' suante lakah biakinn uliante leh Pasian' uliante om tuak uh ahih manin amaute in a kibangin aisanna tawh amaute koih uhhi. 6 Tua ciangin Levi mi Nethanel' tapa ahi lai-atpa Shemaiah in kumpipa, uliante, siampi Zadok, Abiathar' tapa Ahimelek, siampite, leh Levi mi beh lutangte' omna-ah amaute ciamteh hi. Eleazar' suante-a' dingin khat kiteelin, tua ciangin Ithamar' suante-a' dingin khat kiteel a, kilaihsak niloh uhhi. 7 Aisanna a masa pen Jehoiarib tung, a nihna Jedaiah tung,
Tua ciangin a neu a lian, sia leh a sinte a kibangin, amaute in amau' nasep ding uh ai a san uhhi.

Tua ciangin amah in Hinnom' tapa' kuamah biakna-in a tapate hal a, aisanna leh mailam thugenkholhna leh khongkhaina zang a, vankah theite leh aisante tawh na semkhawm hi. Amah in { Topa' } muhna-ah siatna tampi bawl a, amah hehsak hi.
Urim leh Thummim aisanna tawh ai a san ding siampi khat a om mateng amaute in biakna an siangpente a neklohna ding uh gam ukpa in a gen hi.
Tua hi a, Urim leh Thummim aisanna tawh ai san ding siampi khat a om matengin amaute in biakna an siangtho pente a neklohna ding uh gam ukpa in a gen hi.

Tua ciangin Jerusalem-ah mi makaite teng uhhi. Tua lo midang teng, amau' lak pan mi sawmah khat, khuapi siangtho Jerusalem-ah a teng ding aisanna tawh kiteel uh a, a omlai mi sawmah kuate ahih leh khuapi dangte-ah om uhhi.

Kumpi Ahasueras' uk a kum sawmlenihna, a kha masa pen ahi Nisan kha-a kipanin a ni ni, a kha kha-in Pur a kici aisanna tawh Haman' muhin ai kisan a, a kha sawmlenihna Adar kha a ni sawmlethum ni-in ai a pha hi.
Mite in bangbangin ai a san zongin, a piang ding thu pen { Topa' } deihna bangbek hizaw hi.
Amaute pen nisuahna lam gama om khongkhaite leh Filistia mite bangin aisante tawh kidim uh a, gamdang mite' ngeina zui uh ahih manin Jacob suanlekhak, na mite nang na nial hi.
mi vanglianpa leh galkappa, thukhenpa leh kamsangpa, aisanpa leh upapa,

Amaute in note kiangah, "Phun sausau in a pau mualmual vankah theite leh aisan theite kiangah thu dong un. Mite in amaute' pasian thu dongin mihingte thu pen misite dot ding mah hilo ahi hiam?" hong ci ding uhhi. 20 Tuaciangin note in, "Topa hong hilh thute leh teci panna thute ngai un. Aisante' thu ngaikei un. Amaute in zing khuavak neilo uh ahih manin hong gen thute a kimanna omlo hi." (HCN)

Amaute in note kiangah, "Phun suausuau-in a pau mualmual vankah theite leh aisan theite kiangah thu dong un. Mite in amau' pasian-te thu dongin, mihingte' thu pen misite dot ding mah hilo ahi hiam?" hong ci ding uhhi. 20 Tua ciangin note in, "{ Topa } in note hong hilh thute ngai un. Aisante' thu ngai kei un. Amaute' hong gen thute a kiman'na omlo hi," ci-in dawng un. (TDM)

Mite in note kiangah a phun-suausuau, a humham daldal sikha hopihte le vankahte thu dong un. Mite in a Pasian uh thu a dot mah uhhi lo hiam? A hingte tangin misi dot ding ahi hiam? 20 Thukham le tecipannate bek ngai un. Amaute in hih kammalte tawh kizui-in a pau kei uh leh amau adingin phalvak khuavak a nei lo suak uhhi. (ZIV)
Egypt mite' lungsim hawmsuak ding a, amau' geelnate ka siasak ding hi. Amaute in milimte, vankah theite leh aisan theite tungah thu dong ding uhhi.
Zuau thugente' hilhkholhna limte a siasakpa, aisante pen mihai a suaksakpa, mipilte lehhei kikin, amau' thutheihte haina a suaksakpa;
aisan siamnate leh mibum siamna vang lianpi na neih hangin ta khuaisuahna leh meigon'na, hih thu nihte thakhat thu-in ni khat sungin a kicing takin nangma tungah hong tung veve ding hi.
Na neulai-a kipan na sep na mibumna leh na aisannate-ah kiptakin om in. Phattuamna na ngah khading a, mite na lausakzo khading hi.
No, aisan numeite' tapate, numei tawh a mawh mite leh numei pangtatte' tuletate aw, hih lai-ah hong pai un.
Tua ciangin { Topa } in, "Tua kamsangte in kei' min suangin zuauthu hong gen uhhi. Amaute ka sawl kei a, thu ka pia kei a, zong ka hopih kei hi. Note kiangah hong gen uh thute a manlo
, bangmahin a kimanglo aisanna, leh amau' ngaihsuttawm thute a hihi.
Tua ahih manin Babylon kumpipa' na sem kei un, ci-a note kiangah a hong gen na kamsangte uh, na aisan theite uh, na mang man theite uh, leh na mangsan theite uh' thugennate um kei un.
Vanglian { Topa, } Israel mite' Pasian in kong genin-ah: Note' lakah a om na kamsangte uh leh na aisan theite uh' khemsa-in ta kei unla, a mangmat hong gente uh na ngai kei un.

Topa { Pasian } ahi keimah in amaute tungah ka gen thu hih bangin gen in: No numeite in gimna na thuak ding uhhi. Mi khempeuh in a khutah a bulh ding uh leh a lu tungah a khip ding uh aite na bawl uh a, tua nate in mite' lungsim uk hi. Note' phattuamna dingin sihna ding leh hin'na ding vangliatna thu, ka mihingte tungah na zang nuam uhhi.
Kumpipa in bangbang thuhaksa nono a dot hangin, hih mi lite pen ama gamsung khempeuha mitphial siamte leh aisan theite khempeuh sangin a zah sawmin a siamzawklam uh a mu hi.

Khongkhai theite in, "Kumpipa aw, na deihna bang a hong gen thei ding hih leitungah mihing khat beek omlo ding hi. Kumpi gen loh milian pen leh mi thupi pen khat beek in, a aisan theite, a mitphial siamte, leh a khongkhai theite tungah tua bang thu a dong ngei kuamah om nailo hi. Daniel in, "Kumpipa aw, tua na theihnop thu a hong gen thei ding khongkhai thei, mitphial siam, aisan siam kuamah omlo hi.
Daniel in, "Kumpipa aw, tua na theihnop thu a hong gen thei ding khongkhai thei, mitphial siam, aisan siam kuamah omlo hi.

Tua ciangin aisan theite, mitphial siamte, khongkhai theite, aksi et siamte khempeuh hong pai uh a, amaute kiangah ka mang ka gen hi. Ahih hangin a khiatna a hong gen thei kei uhhi.9Ama kiangah, aisan theite laka a lianpen Betashazzar aw, Pasian' kha na sungah om ahih manin thuthuk khempeuh na theih theihlam ka thei hi. Hih ka mang a khiatna hong gen in, ka ci hi.

Amah in mitphial siamte, aisan siamte, aksi et siamte va sam pak un, ci-in a kiko hi. Tua mite a hong tun' uh ciangin kumpipa in, "Hih lai kigelh a sim thei, a khiatna a hong gen thei peuhmah kumpi puanpi silhsakin, minphatna khamkhi a ngawngah ka oksak ding a, kumpi gamsungah a za lian a thumna-in ka koih ding hi," a ci hi.11Na gamsungah Pasian' kha a nei mi khat a om hi. Na pa kumpi ahih laitakin, tua mipa in pasian-te' pilna tawh a kibang pilna, theihna, leh lungsim navakna a nei hi. Tua hi a, kumpi ahi na pa Nebukhadnezzar in tuapa pen aisan theite, mitphial siamte, khongkhai siamte, leh aksi et siamte' ukpi dingin a koih hi.
Ai a san ngei mi tampi tak in zong a aisanna laibute uh hong paipih uh a, mi khempeuh' muhin a haltum uhhi. Tua laibu mante a gawm uh ciangin ngun peek then nga man bang a hihi.
A mi thahna, a aisanna, a paktatna, leh a guktaknate uh zong khawl tuanlo uhhi.

Na sungah meivak taang zong kimu nawnlo ding a, a kiteng nungak leh tangval a lungdamte' awging kiza nawnlo ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh na sumbawlte, leitungah a thahat pen hi a, na ai tawh leitung mi khempeuh na khem hi.
Ahi zongin a meidawite, a lehtatte, a lampialte, mi thatte, a paktatte, aisante, milim biate, leh zuaugente omna ding mun pen sihna nihna ahi kat a kikhulna meiphualpi kuang sung ahi hi," a ci hi.

Khuapi kulhkongpi sungah a luttheihna ding leh nuntakna singgah a nektheihna dingun a puan uh a siangin a sawp mite, mi hampha ahi uhhi. 15 Ahi zongin a lampial mite, aisan mite, a paktat mite, mi thatte, milim biate, leh zuaugen nuamsa-in zuau a gengen mite, khuapi pualamah a om uhhi.

Numei paktatte' kampau khuaizu bangin khum mahmahin a thugente uh a neel dakdak hangin, 4 a tawpna-ah lungkhamna leh natna simloh nangma tungah bangmah dang hong guanlo hi. 5 Amah in sihna gamah nang hong paipih ding a, ama tot lampi pen sihna mun tun'na lampi a hihi. 6 Nuntakna lampi-ah amah omlo a, nang na phawkloh hangin amah lam pialin a vakvai a hihi.
Na sih kuan uh ciangin thumin na tau ding uh a, gawngin na guhguak bekun na om ding uhhi.

Banghang hiam cihleh anlum khat tawh numei paktat khat kingahzo a, ahi zongin numei tawh mawhna in nuntakna bup siasak hi. 27 Na ang sungah meikuang pom lecin na puan kangloin om ding ahi hiam? 28 Mei-am tung tawnin pai lecin na khe kangloin om ding ahi hiam?
Ahi zongin numei tawh a mawhte pen thu ngaihsun theilo mi hi a, amau leh amau a kisusiatawm ahi uhhi.
Tua bang numei in mi tampi tak siasakin, simzawhloh ding mi tampi' sihna a piangsak hi. 27 Tua bang numei zuihna pen sihna gam zuatna hi a, sih baihna ding lampi zuatna a hihi.
Numei tawh mawhna na pelh un. Mi khat in a bawl mawhna tuamtuamte in ama pumpi sukhalo hi, a ci om hi. Ahi zongin numei tawh a mawhte, ama pumpi tungah a khial a hihi.

Pasian in, "En un, leitung maitang khempeuhah a om, tang a piangsak kungnote khempeuh leh a gah sungah tang a om singkung khempeuh note tungah kong pia khinta hi. Tuate an-in na nei ding uhhi. 30 Leitung ganhing khempeuhte tung, huih lak vasate khempeuh tung, leitungah a bokvakte khempeuh tung, nuntakna hu a neite khempeuh tungah an dingin kung hing khempeuh ka hong pia khinta hi," a ci hi. Tua mah bangin a piang pah hi.

A nungta a gamtang peuhmah, note-a' dingin an hi ding hi. Kung hing khempeuh ka hong piak bangin na khempeuh zong note ka hong pia hi. 4 A nuntakna ahi a sisan pen a sa tawh na ne khawm kei bek ding uhhi. (Halal)
Tua ciangin Jerusalem kumpipa Melkhizedek in an leh leenggahzu hong pusuah hi. Amah pen Sang Pen Pasian' siampi zong a hihi.

Egypt-ah an a omna thu Jacob in a theih ciangin a tate kiangah, "Banghangin khatlekhat ki-enen mawk na hi uhhiam? 2 Egypt-ah an om hi, ci-in ka za hi. Eite si loin i nuntakna dingin paisuk unla, ei-a' ding an va lei un," a ci hi.

Tu-in Israel mite in a min manna ci uhhi. Tua pen nannan tang tawh kibangin a meel kang a, a limna pen khuaizu tawh a kibawl mohpheng tawh kibang hi. 32 Moses in, "{ Topa' } thupiak hih bang ahi hi: ‘Egypt leitang panin note kong paikhiatpih lai-in sehnel gamah note kong vakna an na suanlekhakte un a muh theihna dingun na khang tawntungun lawhta dim khat kem un,’ ci hi," ci-in a gen hi. 33 Moses in Aaron kiangah, "Beel khat la in la, tua sungah manna lawhta dim khat koih in la, na khang tawntungun a kikem dingin { Topa' } mai-ah koih in," a ci hi. 34 { Topa } in Moses a thupiak bangin Aaron in kep dingin Thuciamna Singkuang mai-ah a koih hi. 35 Amaute a ten' theihna ding uh leitang a tun' mateng, kum sawmli sung Israel mite in manna ne uh a, Kanaan gamgi a tun' matengun manna bek a ne uh a hihi.

"Note' nek theih ding ganhing khat peuhpeuh a sih leh a sisa a lawngpa pen a nitak mateng a nin hi ding a, 40 a sisa a nepa in ama puante sawpin a nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi. A sisa a puapa in zong ama puante sawpin a nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi. 41 "Leitungah a hontat ganhing peuhmah a kihhuai hi a, tuate kinelo ding hi. 42 A awmtal peuhmah leh khe li-a a pai peuhmah, ahih kei leh khe tampi a nei, leitungah a pai a hontat ganhing khempeuh, note in na ne kei ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh tuate pen a kihhuai a hihi. 43 A hontat ganhing khat peuhpeuh tawh nomau mah a kihhuai-in na kibawltawm kei ding uh a, tuate tawh nomau na kininsak tawm kei ding uhhi. Na kinitsak tawm uh leh a nin na suak ding uhhi.

Tu-in amaute' lakah a om gamdang mite in anlim a lunggulh mahmah uhhi. Israel mite zong kap kik uh a, "Sa nek ding nei hi leeng maw! 5 Egypt-ah man pialoin i nek ngasate, tangmaite, dawnpawlte, lo-uih neute, lo-uih sante, leh lo-uih kangte i phawkphawk hi. 6 Ahih hangin tu-in i tha bei ta a, hih manna simloh bangmah dang om peuhmahlo hi," a ci uhhi. 7 Manna pen nannan tang tawh kibang a, a meel pen bedolak singnai tawh kibang hi. 8 Mite pai kawikawi-in khawm uh a, an gawina tawh gawi-in, tua ahih kei leh sum sungah su-in, beelin huan uh a, mohin a bawl uhhi. A limna pen sathau tawh a kibawl moh ki-em tawh kibang hi. 9 Zanin giahphual tungah daitui a kiat ciangin manna tawh kia khawm hi.

Mite tungah, ‘Zingcianga dingin note ki-ap pha un, sa na ne ding uhhi; banghang hiam cihleh { Topa' } zakin na kap uh a, "Sa nek ding kua in hong pia ding ahi hiam? Banghang hiam cihleh Egypt gamah nuam i sa hi," na ci uhhi. Tua ahih ciangin note' tungah { Topa } in sa hong pia ding a, note in sa na ne ding uhhi. 19 Note in ni khat sung, ahih kei leh ni nih sung, ahih kei leh ni nga sung, ahih kei leh ni sawm sung, ahih kei leh ni sawmnih sung bek neloin, 20 na ikkhiat dong uh leh na kih dong matengun kha khat sung tawntung sa na ne ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh note' lakah a om { Topa } nialin a mai-ah na kap uh a, "Banghangin Egypt panin paikhia ihi hiam?" na ci uhhi,’ ci in," a ci hi. 21 Ahih hangin Moses in, "Kei tawh a kisim khawm mi tul zaguk tak om hi. Nangmah in, ‘Kha khat sung tawntung a nek dingun amaute sa pia ning!’ na ci hi. 22 Amaute' khamzah dingin tuuhonte leh bawnghonte amau-a' dingin kigozo ding ahi hiam? Tua ahih kei leh tuipi ngasate khempeuh amau' khamzah ding kimanzo ding ahi hiam?" a ci hi. 23 { Topa } in Moses kiangah, "{ Topa' } hih theih ding zah kiciangtan sa na hi hiam? Ka thugen a manin hong tun' leh hong tun'loh tu-in na mu ding hi," a ci hi.

Mite, an bek tawh nungta loin { Topa' } kamsung panin a pusuak thu khempeuh tawh nungta hi, ci-in note hong theihsakna dingin, amah in note hong niamkhiatin hong gilkialsak a, note hita leh na pu na pate uhhita leh in a theih ngeiloh manna tawh hong vak hi.

"Note pen { Topa } na Pasian uh mite na hi uhhi. Misite hangin note ki-atkeh loin, na sam uh zong na mettol kei ding uhhi. 2 Banghang hiam cihleh note pen { Topa } na Pasian uh tungah a siangtho mite na hi uh a, leitunga om mite khempeuh sung panin ama neih dingin { Topa } in note hong teel a hihi. 3 "A kihhuai na khat peuhpeuh na ne kei ding uhhi. 4 Na nek theih ding uh ganhingte: Bawng, tuu, keel, 5 sakhital, sanang, simsakhi, sathak, saza, zosakhi, leh gamtuu a hihi. 6 Ganhingte lak panin a khecin a ka, eknel a hai ganhing peuhmah na ne thei ding uhhi. 7 Ahi zongin eknel a hai a, a khecin a ka ahi zongin na nek theihloh dingte uh: Kalaoh, bilpi, leh sakikhte in eknel a hai hangin a khecin kalo ahih manin note-a' dingin a nin a hihi. 8 Vok pen a khecin a kat hangin eknel hailo ahih manin note-a' dingin a nin a hihi. Tuate' sa neloin, a sisate zong na lawng kei ding uhhi. 9 "Tui sunga om khempeuh lak panin phe leh lip a nei peuhmah na ne thei ding uhhi. 10 Phe leh lip a neilo peuhmah na ne kei ding uh a, tuate pen no-a' dingin a nin a hihi. 11 "Vasa a siang khempeuh na ne thei ding uhhi. 12 Ahih hangin na nekloh dingte uh: Muvanlai, musane, luimu, 13 mupi, mumeika, amau nam ciat; 14 va-ak nam khempeuh; 15 vasa-kalaoh, pengpelep, vatawt, musi nam khempeuh; 16 keising leh simbu, gam vatawt 17 leh tui vatawt, samuat ne musane leh tuimu, 18 gun vapi, gun vazonei nam khempeuh; huihtun leh bak a hihi. 19 "Kha a nei insek ganhing khempeuh no-a' dingin a nin ahi hi; tuate kinelo ding hi. 20 A leng thei insek ganhing a siangte khempeuh na ne thei ding uhhi. 21 "Ama thu-a a si tawm ganhing peuhmah na ne kei ding uhhi. A nek dingun na khuasung uha om khualmite tungah na pia thei ding uh a, tua ahih kei leh zong gamdang mite tungah na zuak thei ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh note pen { Topa } na Pasian uh tungah a siangtho mi na hi uhhi. "Keelno a pi' nawizu tawh na huan kei ding uhhi. 22 "A kum kumin na lo uhah a piang, na khaici panun a piang khempeuh sawmah khat na pia ding uhhi. 23 { Topa } na Pasian uh na zahtak tawntungna ding uh na theihna dingun, ama min a ten'na dingin a teelna mun { Topa } note' Pasian' mai-ah na an uh, na leenggahzu uh, na sathau uh sawmah khat, leh na bawnghon uh leh na tuuhon tacilte uh na ne ding uhhi. 24 { Topa } na Pasian un a min koihna dingin a teelna mun pen, { Topa } na Pasian un no thupha hong piak ciangin note kiang panin gamla lua a, no-a' dingin lam a sau luat manin sawmah khat na paipih zawh kei uh leh, 25 tuate sum na suah ding uh a, a sumte tunin, { Topa } na Pasian un a teelna munah na pai ding uh a, 26 na deih peuhpeuh uh bawng ahi a, tuu ahi a, leenggahzu ahi a, khamtheihzu ahi zongin, na duh peuhpeuh uh leina-in a sum na zang ding uhhi. { Topa } na Pasian uh mai tua lai munah na ne ding uh a, note leh na innkuanpihte uh na lungdam ding uhhi. 27 "Note bangin amaute in tanh leh luah neilo ahih manin na khuasung uha om Levi mite na mangngilh kei ding uhhi. 28 "Kum thum simin tua kuma note' anpiang sawmah khat khempeuh hong paikhiatpihin na khuasung uhah na khol ding uhhi. 29 { Topa } na Pasian un na sepnate khempeuh uhah thupha hong piak theihna dingin, note tawh kibangin amaute in tanh ahi a, luah ahi zongin neilo uh ahih manin note' khua sunga om Levi mite, peemtate, pa neilote, leh meigong numeite hong pai-in tua ante ne-in a gilvah ding uhhi.
Amah in hih mun hong tun'pihin, bawngnawi leh khuaizu tui bangin a luan'na gam hih leitang ko tungah hong pia hi.

Na pu na pate uh Pasian ahi { Topa } in note tungah hong ciam mah bangin bawngnawi leh khuaizu tui bangin a luan'na leitang, { Topa } na Pasian un note hong piakna gamah a lut dingin na galkah uh ciangin tua suangte tungah hih thute na gelh ding uhhi.

Paisan Pawi khit a zingciang ni teekteekin amaute in tua gama piang silngo sawhloh moh leh ankan' a ne uhhi. 12 Tua gama piang a nek ni uh a zingciangin manna a bei ta hi. Israel mite in manna nei nawnlo uh a, ahih hangin tua kumin Kanaan leitanga piangte a ne uhhi.

Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, "Tu-in ciah un. Anlim tuilim ne-in thadim unla, a nei zolote zong va kholh un; banghang hiam cihleh i { Topa}-a' dingin tuni pen biakna ni siangtho ni ahi hi; dah kei un, banghang hiam cihleh { Topa' } hong piak lungdamna in note hong thahatsak ding hi," a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin mi khempeuh anne tuidawnin midangte a kholh ding leh lungdama om dingin a ciah uhhi; banghang hiam cihleh amaute tungah a kigen thute amaute in a theitel uhhi.
Amaute hoihtakin thu na hilh a, na manna an zong amaute kiang panin na lakik kei a, a dangtakna uh a phasak dingin tui na pia hi.

Tua hi a, amaute in kulhnei khuapite leh gam hoihte la uh a, na hoih tampi tawh a kidim innte, suang kikhuak tuibemte, leenggui lote, oliv lote, leh nek theih singgah kung tampi a luah uhhi. Amaute in tuate ne-in gilvahin thau uh a, nangma hoihna hangin nuamsa mahmah uhhi.
Ka galte omna mai-ah kei aa ding an nong lui hi. Ka lu sathau nong nilh aa, ka hai a dimlet hi. (HCN)
Keima galte' muhna munah an nong lui hi. Thupi takin nong pahtawi a, keima hai zong dimlet ta hi. (TDM)
Ka galte ompi-in ka mai ah sabuai nong lui hi. Ka lu sathau nong nilh a; ka hai a dimlet hi. (ZIV)
Kitawngtawng kawmin sameh limpen nekna sangin ki-it diamdiamin anteh meh nek hoihzaw hi.
An duhna in mi na semsak a, gilkialna in nak sepsak semsem zaw hi.
"Ne ne un," hong cih hangin a cih takpi hilo hi. Banghang hiam cihleh na dangtawng a hong sun samzang nekkhak tawh kibang ding hi.
Zu nenete tawh kikhawl kei in la, a uisante tawh kithuahkha kei in.
Eite khempeuh in an ne tui dawnin i sepna thaman tawh lungdamin i om ding kilawm a, tua pen Pasian' hong piak letsong a hihi.
An ne-in lungdam in la, zu ne-in lungnuam in. Na gamtatna peuhpeuh Pasian in hoih a sa hi.

Keivom pen tuuno tawh omkhawm ding a, kamkei gialbem pen keelno tawh lumkhawm ding hi. Bawngno leh humpinelkai leh ganhing thaute omkhawm ding uh a, naupangno khat nangawn in tuate hawlzo ding hi. 7 Bawngpi leh vompi in an nekhawm ding uh a, amau' note lumkhawm ding uhhi. Humpinelkai in bawngtal mah bangin buhkung ne ding hi. 8 Nawine naungek, gul gilo' kua vangah kimawl ding a, nawine nawnlo naupang in gul gunei' bu a sawk hangin a gul in tulo ding hi. 9 Ka mual siangtho buppi tungah amaute khatlekhat kiliamsak lo ding uh a, kisusia lo ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh tuite in tuipi omna a tuamcip mah bangin leitungah { Topa}' thu theihna kidim ding hi.

Keivom leh tuuno in an nekhawm ding uh a, humpinelkai in bawngtal bangin buhkung ne ding hi. Leivui pen gulpi' an hita ding a, mite hong tu nawnlo ding hi. Keima mual siangtho tung tengah amaute kiliamsaklo ding uh a, kisusialo ding uhhi, { Topa } in ci hi," a ci hi.
Amah in a hoihlote nialin a hoihte a teel theih hun ciangin bawngnawi thaukhal leh khuaizu ne ding hi.

Tua ahih manin { Topa } in kong cihin-ah: En in, ka hehna leh ka thangpaihna hih munah ka bua ding a, mihingte' tung leh ganhingte' tung, lo lai-a singkungte leh leilaka singgahte tungah ka sung ding hi. Ka hehna mei bangin kuang ding a, kisumitlo ding hi. 21 "Vanglian { Topa, } Israel mite' Pasian in hih bangin kong ci hi: Mei tawh haltum ding na meihal biaknate uh hal nawnloin, sa nektheih biakpiaknate tawh kibangin ne vet un. 22 Banghang hiam cihleh Egypt gam panin na pute na pate uh ka lakkhiat lai-in ka hopih kei a, meihal biakna pia ding leh biakpiakna a bawl dingin thu ka pia kei hi.
a pute a pate uh tungah piak dingin na ciamsa, bawngnawi leh khuaizu tui bangin a luan'na hih gam na pia hi.

"Tu-in mangbuh, mangbuhham, belawi, taang, leh mangbuhman pawlkhat la in la, tuate hel khawmin anlumin bawl in. Na veilam delhphahin na lup hun ni za thum leh ni sawmkua sung tua na bawl anlum na ne ding hi. 10 Nek khatin anlum shekel sawmnih gik bek na ne ding a, ni khatin khatvei bek na ne ding hi. 11 Tui zong duh zahzah hiloin, ni khatin thawl khat bek na dawn ding hi. 12 Na nek ding anlum pen mite' muhin mihing ekkeu khawmin tuate mei-in na cih khit ciangin tua sungah na em ding hi," hong ci hi. 13 Tua ciangin { Topa } in, "Israel mite, gamdangah ka thehthang hun ciangin thukham in nek dingin a kham an ninte tu-a mah bangin ne ding uhhi," a hong ci hi. 14 Ahi zongin kei zong ka dawngkik a, "Topa { Pasian } aw, cikmahin kei ka kininsak ngei kei hi. Ka neu tunga kipan tudongin ama thu-in a sitawm ganhing sa ahi a, gamsate' nekbang ahi zongin ka ne ngei kei hi. A nin-in a kiseh an khat peuhpeuh ka ne ngei nai kei hi," ka ci hi. 15 Tua ciangin amah in, "Tua ahih leh pha hi. Mihing ek tangin bawng-ek na zang ding a, tua bawng-ek am sungah na em ding hi," a hong ci hi.

Engedi khua panin Eneglaim khua ciangdong tuipi dungah ngasa bengte omin, tua dungah a ngen uh zalin phokeu ding uhhi. Mediterranean Tuipi sungah ngasa a omzah mah bangin ngasa nam tampi om ding hi. 11 Ahi zongin tuipi dunga om nawnglakte leh bualte-a om tuite sianglo ding a, cikhuk dingin a tuaci mahin omlai ding uhhi. 12 Hih gun pang tuakah a gah nek dingin singkung nam khempeuh po ding hi. A tehte pulh ngeilo ding a, a gah tawh zong kilawi ngeilo ding hi. Biakinn panin a luangkhia tui ngah ding uh ahih manin khasimin a gah thak gah tawntung ding uhhi. A singgahte an ding hi ding a, a tehte zatui-in kizang ding hi," hong ci hi.

Amah in, "Ni sawm sung hong ze-etin, anteh bek hong nesak in la, tui bek hong dawnsak in. 13 Tua ciangin kumpipa' an a ne khangnote tawh hong enkak khawm in la, nong muhna bangbangin thu khenta in," a ci hi. 14 Amah in amau' ngetna bang mangin ni sawm sung ze-et dingin a thukim hi. 15 Ni sawm a cin' khit ciangin amaute pen kumpi an nete sangin cidamzaw uh a, a ci a sa uh a hoihzaw hi. 16 Tua ciangin a cingpa in kumpi an leh leenggahzu pialoin amaute anteh an a pia hi.
Ahi zongin Zeisu in, "Laisiangtho sungah, ‘Anlum bek tawh mite nungtalo a, Pasian genkhiat thute tawh nungta zaw hi,’ ci-in kigelh hilo ahi hiam?" ci-in a dawng hi.
Tuni aa ka khamkhop ding uh an hong pia in. (HCN)
Tuni aa ka nek ding uh an hong pia in. (PuKKT)
Nisim khamkhop an hong pia in. (TDM)
Ka nisim an uh tu ni-in ko hong pia in. (ZIV)
Tuni aa ka nek ding uh an hong pia in. (ZSV)

Tua ciangin dawite in Zeisu kiangah, "Kote hong hawlkhia ding na hih leh hua vokte sungah hong lutsak in," ci-in a thum uh ciangin 32 Zeisu in, "Pai un," ci ahih manin amaute zong paikhia-in vokte sungah a lut uhhi. Tua vok honte, keen luvum panin tuaksuk gawpin tuili sung tu uh ahih manin a vekpi-in tuikia-in a si khin hi.
Kam sungah a tumsuk nate in mi ninsaklo a, kam sung panin a pusuak nate in mi a ninsak hizaw hi," a ci hi.

Kam sungah a tumsukte pen gil sung tawnin tua panin paikhiasuak hilo ahi hiam? 18 Ahi zongin kam sung panin a pusuakte pen lungsim panin hong kipankhia hi a, hihte in mi ninsakthei hi. 19 Banghang hiam cihleh lungsim panin mi thahnopna, mi zi tawh mawhnopna, nungak tawh mawhnopna, guktakna, zuau genna, mi gensiatna, leh ngaihsut hoihlo a tuamtuam hong piangkhia hi. 20 Hih bang nate in mi ninsak a, khut silloin annekna in mi ninsaklo hi," ci-in a dawng hi.

Tua ahih manin Zeisu in dawite a paina ding uh thu pia a, dawite zong mipa sung panin paikhia-in vokte sungah a lut uhhi. Tua vok honpite a vekpi-in tul nih bang pha hi. Mualtung panin taisuk henhan uh a, tuili sung kiden'na-in tuikia mangkhin uhhi.
Amaute tawh anne dingin a tut ciangin Zeisu in anlum la a, Pasian tungah lungdamna a kohkhit ciangin balnenin amaute a pia hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Keimah hong sawlpa' deihna bangin na semin, sepdingin hong piak nasep zawhna pen ka nuntakna an a hihi.

A ningthei ante ngaihsutin nei masa kei unla, nuntak tawntungna an kan masa zaw un. Pa Pasian in tua an a pia dingin kei hong sehsa ahih manin keimah in note tungah nuntak tawntungna an ka hong pia ding hi," ci-in a dawng hi.

Kei pen nuntakna an ka hihi. 49 Na pu na pate un gamsungah manna ne uh a, a vekpi-un si veve uhhi. 50 Ahi zongin vantung panin a hong pai an a ne mi peuhmah silo ding hi. 51 Kei pen vantung panin a hong paisuk nuntakna an ka hihi. Tua an a ne mi peuhmah nungta tawntung ding hi. Leitung mite a nuntakna dingin ka piakding an pen keima sa ahi hi," a ci hi.

Tui gei a tun' uh ciangin mei-am tungah ngasa leh anlum a ki-em a mu uhhi. 10 Zeisu in amaute kiangah, "Tu-a na ngasa matte uh pawlkhat hong paipih un," ci-in a gen ciangin 11 Simon Peter zong gunkuang tungah va kahin ngasa a dimin a om ngen va kai a, ngasa a vekpi-in za leh sawmnga leh thum pha-in tam mahmah napi-in a ngen uh themkhat zong kikeklo hi. 12 Tua ciangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, "Hong pai un; zing an ne ni," a ci hi. Amah pen Topa ahih lamtak thei uh ahih manin, "Nang kua na hi hiam?" ci-in a nungzuite khat beek in dong ngamlo uhhi.

Tua khit ciangin thu um mi hong tam tektek a, Jew mite leh Grik pau a zang Jew mite kikalah kiphunsanna thu hong om hi. Grik pau a zang Jew mite in, "Annek tuidawn, sumlepai hawmna-ah ka meigong numeite uh hong kipiaksak lo hi," ci-in lungkimlo uhhi. 2 Tua ahih manin sawltak sawmlenihte in thu um mi khempeuh samin kaikhawm uh a, "Kote in Pasian' thu hilh ding don manlo liangin annek tuidawn sumlepai vai-ah kong manlah ding uh kilawmlo hi.

Awging khat in ama kiangah, "Peter aw, tho in la tuate go-in ne in," a ci hi. 14 Ahi zongin Peter in, "Topa aw, tuate go-in ka ne het kei ding hi. A ninin a kingaihsun peuhmah ka ne ngei het kei hi," ci-in a dawng hi. 15 A awging in ama kiangah, "Pasian in a siangin a gensa khat peuhpeuh a ninin ngaihsun kei in," a ci leuleu hi. 16 Tu-a bangin a thumveina dong a cihkhit ciangin vantung lamah tua a peek deda a kilato kik hi. 17 Peter in tua a

bang a cihnopna hi ding ahi hiam, ci-in lamdangsa-in a om laitakin, Kornelias in a sawl mite in Simon' inn hong kan kawikawi uh a, a inn hong thei uh ahih manin a kongbiang hong tungta uhhi. 18 Amaute in, "Simon Peter a kici mi khat, hih lai-ah zin hong tung kha hiam," ci-in a hong dong uhhi. 19 Tua bangin Peter in a maang muh lungngaingai-in a om laitakin Khasiangtho in, "En in, mihing thum in nang hong zong uhhi.

Tua a peek deda tung, limtakin ka et ciangin ganhing, gamsa, a bokvak ganhing leh vasate ka mu hi. 7 Tua ciangin awging khat in kei kiangah, ‘Peter aw, tho in la tuate go-in ne in,’ hong cihna ka za hi. 8 Ahi zongin keimah in, ‘Topa aw, tuate go-in ka ne het kei ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh a ninin a kingaihsun an peuhmah ka kam ka tun' ngei kei hi,’ ka ci hi. 9 Ahi zongin van panin a awging in, ‘Pasian in a siangin a gensa khat peuhpeuh a nin na ci kei ding hi,’ hong ci kik hi. 10 Tu-a bangin a thumveina dong hong cih khit ciangin vantungah tua a peek deda kilato kik hi.

Upna neu mite pawlbawl unla, na ngaihsutna uh a kituah kei leh zong mawhsak kei un. 2 Mi pawlkhat in na khempeuh ka nektheih ding hi, ci-in ngaihsun uhhi; ahi zongin upna neute in anteh bek ne ngam uhhi. 3 Tua ahih manin a ne mite in a tang mite simmawhbawl kei hen la, a tang mite in zong a ne mite simmawhbawl kei hen. Banghang hiam cihleh a ne mite zong Pasian in a san' mite mah a hihi.

Ni khatpeuh thupi diak hi, ci-in a tang mite in Topa a pahtawina-in a tang ahi uhhi. An khempeuh a ne mi in zong Pasian' tungah lungdamna ko-in ne uh ahih manin Topa a pahtawina mahin a ne uh a hihi. Nekdingin kilawmlo hi, ci-in a nelo mite in zong Pasian tungah lungdamna mah ko ahih manin Topa a pahtawina mahin a nelo uh a hihi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian' Ukna pen nek leh dawn tawh a kisai thu hilo a, Khasiangtho hangin i ngah Pasian' deih bangin gamtatna, kilemna, lungdamna, cihte hizaw hi.

Annek huhau-in Pasian' sepsa thute susia kei ni. An khempeuh a kine thei ding ahi hi; ahi zongin tua nekna hangin mi khat peuhpeuh a pukding ahih leh a khial ihi hi. 21 Midangte in a puklawh theih annekna, zunekna, leh na khat peuhpeuh i kikep ding a man pen a hihi. 22 Hih thu-ah no' upna leh no' ngaihsutnate, Pasian tawh note' kikal thu hisak un. Amau lungsim sungah man a sak bangun a gamta zote pen a lung uh nuam mahmah hi. 23 Ahi zongin lunghimawhpipi-in a ne a om leh, a upna uh tawh kizui-in a gamta hilo uh ahih manin Pasian in tua bang mite a mawhsak ding hi. I upna bangin gamtatlohna peuhpeuh mawhna a hihi.

"An pen i gilpi-a' ding hi a, gilpi zong an-a' ding mah hilo ahi hiam?" a ci zong omkha ding hi. Ahi zongin Pasian in tuate gel a beisak hun hong tung ding hi. Pumpi pen paktatna-in zatding hilo a, Topa' na sepna-in zatding hizaw hi. Topa in pumpi-a' ding na hong sem hi.
Ahi zongin tua i nek ante in Pasian tawh i kizopna hong hoihsak tuanlo hi. I nekloh hangin siatna om tuanlo a, i nek hangin zong phatna om tuan samlo hi.
Tua ahih manin nekna in thu upna sungah ka sanggamte khat a khialsak ding ahih leh, amah a pukkhak lohna dingin milim biakna sa ka ne ngei het kei ding hi.
Thu umlo mi khat in an nekpih dingin hong samin tua an ne dingin na pai leh, na lungsimah kisuan'na a omlohna dingin bang sa ahi hiam, ci-in dong se loin ne lel in.
Tua ahih manin keimah in ka hong gennop thu in: Na hihna khempeuh uh, nekna dawnna-ah ahi zongin Pasian' minthan'na dingin na hih un.

Hih bangin na gamtat uh, anletui na nekna ding uh inn neilo na hi uhhiam? Tua ahih kei leh Pasian' pawlpi simmawh bawlin pawlpi mizawngte na maizumsak nopna uh ahi hiam? Hih thu tawh kisai-ah hong pakta ding nong sak uh leh note ka hong pakta het kei hi.

Tua ahih ciangin sanggamte aw, nekkhawm ne dingin na kikhop uh ciangin kingakkim dimdiam un. 34 Tua bangin na kikhop uh ciangin Pasian' thukhenna na thuakkhak lohna dingun a gilkial na om uh leh zong na inn uhah an ne masa un. Thu dangdangte ahih leh ka hong pai ciangin ka hong gen ding hi.
Tua ahih manin annek tuidawn, biakna pawite, Khadet Pawi, leh Sabbath ni tawh kisai-in kuamah in ngeina zuihding bawl kei un.
Ahi zongin antak i cih pen a sia leh a pha a khenthei, a lim leh a limlo a khentheita, a khangham khinsa mite-a' ding a hihi.

Tua ahih manin zakna ding bil a neite in Khasiangtho in pawlpite kiangah a gen thute na za un. A gualzo mi tungah a kiselcip manna an pawlkhat leh min thak a kigelhna suangkang khat ka pia ding hi. Tua suangkang pen a ngahte simloh kuamah dang in theilo ding hi.
khuapi sung lampi laizangah a luang hi. Tua gun pang tuakah nuntakna singkung po a, kha simin gah ahih manin kum khat sungin sawmlenih vei a gah hi. A tehte zong natna damna ding zatui-in kizang hi.

Tua ciangin Israel mite khempeuh, galkap vekpi paito-in Bethel-ah tungin a kap uhhi. Tua lai mun { Topa' } mai-ah amaute tu-in nitak dong tua ni an tang uh a, { Topa' } mai-ah meihal biakna leh thunuama biakna a pia uhhi.

Tua ahih ciangin amaute Mizpah-ah kikhawm uh a, tui tawi-in { Topa' } mai-ah sungkhia uh a, tua ni-in an tangin tua lai munah, "{ Topa' } tungah i khial khinzo hi," a ci uhhi. Samuel in Israel mite Mizpah-ah thu khen hi.
Amaute in a guhte la-in Jabesh khuasung makeng kung nuai-ah vui uh a, ni sagih sung an a tang uhhi.
Tua ahih ciangin Saul, a tapa Jonathan, leh { Topa' } mi Israel-te hangin amaute thumin kap uh a, nitak dong an a tang uhhi; banghang hiam cihleh gal sungah amaute si uhhi.

Tua ciangin Nathan a inn-ah a ciah hi. Tua ciangin Uriah' zi in David tawh a neih naungek{ Topa } in vat a, a ci hong na hi. 16 Tua ahih ciangin David in naungek-a' dingin Pasian' tungah thum hi. David in an tangin zan tawntung leilakah a lum hi. 17 Tua ciangin leilak panin a phong dingin a innsung upate ama kiangah ding uhhi. Ahih hangin amah tholo a, amaute tawh an zong ne nuamlo hi.
Tua ciangin a nasemte in ama kiangah, "Hih banga na gamtatna a bangci hiam? Naungek a hin' lai-in an tangin na kap hi; ahih hangin naungek a sih ciangin tho-in an na ne zawsop hi," a ci uhhi.

Ahab in hih thute a zak ciangin a puante balkek a, a pum tungah puanhampi silhin, an tangin puanhampi tungah lum a, maikhingin a vak kawikawi hi. 28 Tu-in Tishbe khuami Elijah tungah { Topa' } thu hong tung a, 29 "Keima mai-ah bangzahin Ahab a kiniamkhiatna na mu hiam? Keima mai-ah amah kiniamkhiat ahih manin ama hun sungin siatna ka tungsak kei ding hi. Ahih hangin a tapa' hun sungin ama innkuan tungah siatna ka tungsak ding hi," a ci hi.
a thahat mi khempeuh kithawi-in Saul leh a tapate' luanghawmte lakhia-in Jabesh-ah a paipih uhhi. Tua ciangin amaute in Jabesh-a tawsaw nuai-ah amaute' guhte vui uh a, ni sagih sung an a tang uhhi.
Tua ciangin Jehoshafat lau a, amahmah in { Topa' } lamlahna ding zong a, Judah gam khempeuhah an tan' ding thu a zasak hi.

Tua ciangin eite' Pasian' mai-ah kote kiniamkhiat thei-in, kote leh ka naupangte uh leh ka neihsa khempeuh uh nuamtakin ka khualzinna uhah ka pai theihna ding uh Pasian' tung pan ka nget theihna dingun Ahava lui-ah an tan'na ding thu ka taangko hi. 22 Banghang hiam cihleh kumpipa kiangah, "Ka Pasian un amah a zong mite khempeuh ompihin amau-a' dingin a hoih na sem a, amah a nusiate khempeuh tungah amah heh hi," ci-in gen khin ka hih manun lampi-ah kote hong kha dingin galkapte leh sakol tung tuangte kumpipa kiangah ka nget ding ka mai a zum hi. 23 Tua hi a, kote in an ka tang uhhi. Nuamtakin khual ka zin theihna ding uh i Pasian' tungah ka ngen uh a, amah in ka thungetna uh hong pia hi.
Hih thu ka zak ciangin tusukin ka kap niloh a, ni tampi sung an tangin, vantung Pasian kiangah thu ka ngen hi.
Tua kha mah a ni sawmnihleli ni-in an tang dingin Israel mite kikhawm uh a, puanhampi silhin a lu tung uhah lei kibuak uhhi.
Kumpipa' thupiakna a tun'na gam Jew mite' omna khempeuhah nakpi taka thumna leh tauna, antan'na, kahna, leh dip-humna om hi. Mi a tamzaw in puanhampi silhin vut lakah lum uhhi.

Tua ciangin Esther in Mordekai a dawn'na lai amah puasak leuleu a, 16 "Pai-in Susa khua sunga om Jew mi khempeuh khawm in la, keimah ngaihsutna-in an na tang un. A sun a zan ciloin ni thum sung an nelo, tui dawnloin na om un. Na tan' uh mah bangin kei leh ka nasem numeite in zong ka na tang ding uhhi. Tua khit ciangin ngeina ahihloh hangin kumpipa kiangah ka va pai ding hi," a ci hi.
Ahih hangin kei ahih leh, amaute a cinat uh ciangin, puanhampi silhin an tangin kei ka kigimtawm sak hi.
An ngolhna tawh ka lungsim ka kiniamkhiat a, tua pen keimah hong kikona lehsuak zawsop hi.
An ngolhna hangin ka khukte zaw a, ka pumpi silesa zong kiamgawp khinta hi.

"Kote in an tang napi-in banghangin kote hong phawklo na hi hiam? Kote kiniamkhiatin om napi-in banghangin kote hong thei khalo na hi hiam?" hong ci uhhi. Note in an na tan' uh ciangin nomau' deihna na zong uh a, na nasemte uh na nengniam uhhi. 4 Note in a kitawng ding, a kilai ding, gitloh gamtatin, khuttum tawh a kitum ding bekin an na tang uhhi. Hih bang lelin antan'na tawh na thungetna uh hong kingai ding ahi hiam? 5 Maugua kun bangin na lu uh kunsukin, puanhampi leh vut tungah lumin, nomau na kigimsak tawmnate uh kei' deih antan'na nam sa na hi uhhiam? Hih bang hihna pen antan'na man leh { Topa}' san'theih pawl hi, ci ding na hi uhhiam? 6 Kei' deih antan'na hih bang pawl ahi hi: Gitlohna khaute phelin, hakkol savun khaute phel a, a kinengniam mite khahkhia-in thumanlohna hakkol khempeuh suktan ding a hihi. 7 Na an uh a gilkialte tawh nekhawm unla, inn neilo a zawngte na innsung uhah paipihin, tangguakin a om mite puan silhsakin, na mipihte uh kiang panin bu lo ding hilo na hi uhhiam?

{ Topa } in kei kiangah, "Hih mite in thupha a ngahna dingin thu hong ngen nawn kei in. 12 An a tan' uh hangin amau' thumna ka ngai kei ding a, meihal biakna leh an tawh biaknate hong piak uh hangin ka sang kei ding hi. Amaute namsau tawh ahi zongin, kial tawh ahi zongin, pulnatna tawh ahi zongin ka sisakzaw ding hi," hong ci hi.

Josiah' tapa Judah kumpi Jehoiakim in a ukzawh kum nga a phak kum, a kha kuana kha-in Jerusalem khua-a om mi khempeuh leh Judah gam khuapite panin Jerusalem khua-ah a hong pai mi khempeuh in { Topa' } maipha ngahna dingin an a tang uhhi.
Kumpipa a inn-ah ciahkik a, tua zan tawntung an ngawlin gualnopna zong a bawl kei hi. Tua zanin a ihmu thei peuhmah kei hi.
An ngawlin, puanhampi silhin, vut lakah tu-in, Topa' kiangah deih takin thu ka ngen hi.
An tan' ding thu pia unla, a thupi biak kikhopna bawl un. Note' { Topa } Pasian' biakinn sungah makaite leh gammi khempeuh kaikhawm unla, { Topa' } tungah kiko-in thum un.

{ Topa } in hih bangin ci hi: "Tu mahmah nangawnin lungsim tak tawh kisik kikin, an tangin, kapin, thumna tawh kei kiangah hong paikik un. 13 Na dah taktakna uh lungkhamna tawh langsak unla, na puante uh a balkek bek hi kei un," hong ci hi. { Topa}, note' Pasian kiangah ciahkik un. Amah migi mahmahin hehpihna a nei hi a, a lungduai-in hong huh nuam tawntung a, gim hong pialoin hong maisak nuam tawntung hi. 14 { Topa}, eite' Pasian in a lungsim hong kheelin an hauhsakna tawh thupha hong piakha ding hi. Tua hi leh ama tungah an leh leenggahzu tawh biakna i pia thei ding hi. 15 Zion mual tungah peengkul tumin an tan'na ding thu pia unla, biak kikhopna khat nei un.
Nineveh khuamite kisikin Pasian um uh a, antan' ding thu thangsakin, a golpen pana kipan a neupen dongin puanhampi a silh uhhi.

"Gamsung mi khempeuh leh siampite tungah hih bangin gen in: Amaute in a beisa kum sawmsagih sung kha ngana leh kha sagihna sungin an tangin a kahna uh, kei hong pahtawina uhhilo hi. 6 A annek a tuidawnte uh zong, amau' duh man bek ahi hi," hong ci hi.

amah in, "Kha lina, kha ngana, kha sagihna, leh kha sawmna sunga antan'nate pen, Judah gammite-a' dingin lungdamin kipakin pawi bawlna hun suak ta ding hi. Tua ahih manin thuman leh kilemna deih pha un," hong ci hi.

Zeisu in sun sawmli leh zan sawmli sung an neloin omkhin ahih manin a gil a kial hi. 3 Tua ciangin ama kiangah Dawimangpa hong pai a, "Pasian' Tapa na hih takpi leh hih suangte anlum a suahna dingin thu pia in," a ci hi. 4 Ahi zongin Zeisu in, "Laisiangtho sungah, ‘Anlum bek tawh mite nungtalo a, Pasian genkhiat thute tawh nungta zaw hi,’ ci-in kigelh hilo ahi hiam?" ci-in a dawng hi.

"An na tan' uh ciangin a kineihkhem mite bangin maikhingin om kei un. Amaute in an a tan'lam uh mite in a theih ding uh a ut manun gilkial mai pua-in a om uhhi. Amaute in a antan' thaman uh a ngah khinta ahih lamtak limtakin thei un. 17 Ahi zongin an na tan' uh ciangin na mai uh phiatin na sam uhhiat un. 18 Tua hi leh midangte in na an tan'lam uh a theihloh hangin na muh theihloh na Pa un hong thei veve ding a, kuama theihlohin na tan'lam uh a hong thei na Pa un note' tungah thaman hong pia ding hi.

Tua ciangin Zeisu kiangah Tuiphumpa Johan' nungzuite hong pai uh a, "Banghangin kote leh Pharisee mite in an tang zelzel napi-in, na nungzuite in tanglo se ahi uhhiam?" ci-in a dong uhhi. 15 Zeisu in amaute kiangah, "Mopina pawi khatah, a zineipa a om sungin a mopawi simte dah dingin um na hi uhhiam? Dah hetlo ding uhhi. Ahi zongin amaute kiang panin zineipa a kilakkhiat ding hun hong tung ding a, tua hun ciangin amaute in an a tang ding uhhi.
Gamlakah ni sawmli sung om a, Satan in tua hun sungteng a ze-et hi. Tua lai-ah gamsa gilote zong om a, ahi zongin vantung mite hong pai-in amah huhin an a vak uhhi.

Tua hun laitakin Tuiphumpa Johan' nungzuite leh Pharisee mite in an a tang uhhi. Zeisu kiangah mi pawlkhat hong pai-in, "Banghangin Tuiphumpa Johan' nungzuite leh Pharisee mite' nungzuite in an tang uh a, nangma nungzuite in tanglo se ahi uhhiam?" ci-in a dong uhhi. 19 Zeisu in, "Mo pawi a siim mite in an nelo dingin um na hi uhhiam? Zineipa tawh a omkhawm sung uh an neloin omlo ding uhhi. 20 Ahi zongin amaute kiang panin zineipa a kipaikhiatpih hun hong tung ding a, tua hun a tun' ciangin an neloin a om ding uhhi.
kum sawmgiat leh kum li sung meigongin a om a hihi. Amah pen biakna a nusia ngeilo mi khat hi a, a sun a zanin Pasian bia-in an tangin thu a ngenngen mi khat a hihi.
Dawimangpa in ni sawmli sung a ze-et hi. Tua hun sung Zeisu in bangmah nelo a, tua ze-etna hun a bei ciangin a gil kial mahmah hi.

Tua ciangin amaute pawlkhat in Zeisu kiangah, "Johan' nungzuite in an tangin thu ngen zelzel uh a, Pharisee mite' nungzuite zong tua bangmahin gamta napi-in, banghangin nangma nungzuite in tangloin om se uh ahi hiam?" ci-in a dong uhhi. 34 Zeisu in amaute kiangah, "Mo pawi-ah zineipa leh pawisimte a omkhawm laitakin a pawisimte an tangsak thei ding na hi uhhiam? 35 Amaute kiang panin zineipa a kipaikhiatpih hun hong tung ding a, tua hun ciangin tang ding uhhi," ci-in a dawng hi.

Nipikal khatin ni nih sung an ka tang a, ka ngah khempeuh sung panin sawmah khat nang tungah kong pia hi,’ a ci hi. 13 Ahi zongin siahdongpa pen a gamla simah ding a, vantung lamah zong dak ngamloin a dip humin kuncip a, ‘Pasian aw, kei mimawh mi khialpa hong hehpih in,’ ci-in a ngen hi. 14 Ke'n kong cihin-ah, hih mipa pen Pasian tawh a kilemsa-in a inn-ah ciah a, a khatpa pen tua bangin ciahlo hi. Banghang hiam cihleh a kiliansakte pen kiniamkhiatsuk ding a, a kiniamkhiatte pen a lianin kibawl ding hi," a ci hi.

Amaute in an tangin Pasian bia-in a om laitakun Khasiangtho in amaute kiangah, "Keima na a sem dingin ka sapsa ahih manin kei-a' dingin Barnabas leh Saul hong piakhia un," a ci hi. 3 Amaute in zong an tangin, a lu tung uhah a khut uh nga-in thu a ngetsak khit uh ciangin a kuankhia sak uhhi.
Khua pawlpi simah pawlpi upa ding sehsak uh a, an tangin thungetna tawh amaute' muan' ahi Topa' khutsungah tua mite a ap uhhi.
Tua hun sungin Kain in lei pana piang gah piakna { Topa' } tungah paipih a, 4 Abel in a tuuhon tacilte leh a sa limcite paipih hi. { Topa } in Abel leh ama piakna thusim a,
{ Topa } in Moses kiangah, 2 "Keima tungah tacil khempeuh hong ap in. Israel mite' lakah, mihing hita leh ganhing hita leh, naubu a hong masa pen peuhpeuh keima-a' ahi hi," a ci hi.
"Na anlakna pan uh leh sathau leh leenggah na suknate uh panin a leetkhiate piak khiat ding na zekai kei ding uhhi. "Na tapa cilte uh keima tungah nong pia ding uhhi.
"Note in na anpalte uh lakah a tung masa pen { Topa } na Pasian uh inn-ah na paipih ding uhhi."Note in a pi' nawizu tawh keelno na huan kei ding uhhi.
"Nipikalte' pawi, mangbuh a tung masa pawi, leh kum bei ciangin an kaihkhop pawi na bawl ding uhhi.
"Note in na anpalte uh lakah a tung masa pen { Topa } na Pasian uh' inn-ah na paipih ding uhhi. "Note in keelno a pi' nawizu tawh na huan kei ding uhhi," a ci hi.

Anpal tawh biakna ahih leh { Topa' } kiangah na paipih thei ding hi. Ahih hangin a gim namtui dingin biakna tau tungah kipia lo ding hi. 13 An tawh na biaknate khempeuh ci na sawh ding hi. An tawh na biakna-ah na Pasian tawh na thuciamna ci sawhloin na om kei ding a, na biakna khempeuh ci na sawh ding hi. 14 "Anpal tawh { Topa' } tungah biakna na piak leh, anpal tawh na biakna dingin a vui thak panin kila-in a kigawivui, mei-ah a kihangkeu na pia ding hi.
"Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: Note tungah ka hong piak leitangah note tungin an na lak uh ciangin, note in an na lakna uhah anpal lom khat, siampipa kiangah na paipih ding uhhi.

Note in na ten'na uh panin vei dingin an lawh nih a kibawl anlum nih nong paipih ding uhhi. Tuate pen annel a kibawl, silngo sawhin a ki-em, { Topa' } tungah anpalin a kipia hi ding hi. 18 Note in anlum tawh, a sitbaanglo kum khat a pha tuuno sagih, leh bawngtalno khat, leh tuutal nih na pia ding uhhi. Tuate, { Topa' } tungah a gim namtui mei tawh kihal biakna dingin an tawh biakna leh leenggahzu tawh biaknate tawh { Topa' } tungah meihal biakna hi ding hi. 19 Note in khialhna hanga biakna-in keel a pa khat leh thunuama biakpiakna-in kum khat a pha tuuno a pa nih na pia ding uhhi. 20 Siampipa in { Topa' } mai-ah vei-a biakna-in anpal-anlum leh tuuno nih tawh tuate vei ding a, tuate pen siampipa-a' dingin { Topa' } mai-ah a siangtho hi ding hi.
Na anlak uh a masa pen sung panin biakna-in moh khat na pia ding uh a, an cilna pana biakna-in na piak bangun na bawl ding uhhi.

"Sathau limci pen khempeuh, leh leenggahzu leh an a limci pen khempeuh, { Topa' } tungah amau' piak anpalte, note' tungah kong pia hi.13Amaute in { Topa' } tungah a piak uh, amau' leitangah a min masa gah khempeuh nomau-a' hi ding hi. Na inn sunga om a siangtho mi peuhpeuh in ne thei ding hi.

"Na nipikal pawi hunun { Topa' } tungah an thak tawh biakna na piak hun uh anpal piak ni-in a siangtho kikhopna khat na nei ding uhhi. Tua ni-in leitung nasep na sem kei ding uh a, 27 meihal biakna, { Topa' } tungah a gim namtui na pia ding uhhi. Bawngtalno nih, tuutal khat, leh kum khat a pha tuuno a pa sagih, a vekpi-in a sitbaanglo hi ding hi.

Tua lai-ah na pai ding uh a, na meihal biaknate uh leh na biakpiaknate uh, note in na piak uh sawmah khat leh na piak thuahte uh, thuciamna biakpiakna, utthu-a na piakna, na bawnghon tacilte uh leh na tuuhon tacilte uh tua lai-ah na paipih ding uhhi. 7 { Topa } na Pasian uh mai tua lai munah na ne ding uh a, { Topa } na Pasian un note thupha hong piakna hangin na hihna khempeuh uhah note leh na innkuanpihte na lungdam ding uhhi.
Na anpal, na leenggahzu, na sathau, leh na meet masak uh na tuumul uh na pia ding uhhi.

{ Topa } na Pasian un a hong piak leitang pana piang gah khempeuh panin a gah masa pawlkhat la-in lawh khat sungah na koih ding uh a, ama min na omsakna dingun { Topa } na Pasian un a teelna munah na pai ding uhhi. 3 Tua hun laitakin na a sem siampipa kiangah pai-in ama kiangah, ‘{ Topa } in kote piak dingin ka pu ka pate uh tungah a ciam leitangah ka tun' khitna uh tuni-in { Topa } na Pasian kiangah kong ko uhhi,’ na ci ding uhhi. 4 "Tua ciangin siampipa in note' khut panin a lawh hong saang ding a, { Topa } note' Pasian biakna tau mai-ah koih ding hi.

Amah in hih mun hong tun'pihin, bawngnawi leh khuaizu tui bangin a luan'na gam hih leitang ko tungah hong pia hi. 10 Tua ahih ciangin en in, { Topa, } nangmah in kote nong piaksa leitang panin a gah a min masa kong paipih uhhi,’ na ci ding uhhi. Tua ciangin { Topa } note' Pasian' mai-ah na koihsuk ding uh a, { Topa } note' Pasian' mai-ah na bia ding uhhi.

Mi khat Baalshalishah panin hong pai-in Pasian' mipa kiangah anpal anlum, mangbuhham lum sawmnih, leh anvui a thak a van sungah hong pua hi. Tua ciangin Elisha in a nasempa kiangah, "Amaute in a nek theihna dingun kamsangte tungah pia in," a ci hi.

Tua thupiakna a kitheihthang phetin Israel mite in anpalte, leenggahzu, leh lo-a piang khempeuh tampi tak hong pia uhhi. Tua ciangin amaute in na khempeuh sung pan sawmah khat ahi tampi tak hong paipih uhhi.

I leitang panin a piang anpalte leh singgah kungte panin a gah masa khempeuh a kumkumin { Topa' } biakinn-ah puak ding ka kiciam uhhi. 36 Thukham sunga kigelh mah bangin i Pasian' biakinn-ah a om, i Pasian' biakinn sungah na a sem siampite kiangah zong tapa upa pente leh bawngte' tacilte, leh ganhonte' tacilte, leh tuuhonte' tacilte paipih ding, 37 leh annel lom meek masak pen siampite tungah puak ding, leh gahnei sing khempeuh panin a gah masa, sathau leh leenggahzu thakte khempeuh i Pasian' biakinn sung vankoihna-ah puak ding, leh lokhawhna khuaneute khempeuhah sawmah khat a kaikhawmte pen Levi mite ahih manin leitang panin sawmah khat khempeuh Levi mite kiangah puak ding ka kiciam uhhi.

Tua ciangin khuapite' kiimah lo omte panin a golna leh a neuna tawh kizui-in siampite leh Levi mite-a' dingin thukham sunga om bangin a kaihkhop ding uh a kipia nate, anpalte, leh sawmah khatte a koihna ding uh vankoihna innte a uk dingin mi kiseh hi; banghang hiam cihleh siampite leh Levi mite' nasepna hangin Judah mi khempeuh lungdam mahmah uhhi.
Tua ciangin a kiseh hunin zat dingin cih ding sing tawh biakna leh anpal tawh biakna ding ka vaihawmsak hi. Ka Pasian aw, a hoih lamin kei hong phawk in.
Bulpite kisusia khin leh midikte in bangcih thei nawn ding hiam?" nong ci thei diam?
Ham' suante' innsungah a ta upa pen teng, Egypt gamsung tacil khempeuh amah in a vatmai hi.
Amau' sung pan a piang masa Egypt tacil khempeuh a satlum hi.
Na neihsa leh na anpalte tawh { Topa } zahtak in. 10 Tua hi leh na ansalte an tawh kidim ding a, beel dimletin leenggahzu na nei ding hi.
Israel mite pen { Topa}-a' dingin a tuam om hi a, ama anlakna-ah a anpalte ahi uhhi. Amaute a ne peuhpeuh a mawh suak uh a, gimna a thuak uhhi, { Topa } in hong ci hi, ci-in va gen in," hong ci hi.

"Israel mite tungah ka piak, khang khat pan khang khatah a kiluah suksuk ding sung panin siampite' tanh pen siampi nasep za a hihi. Amaute in Israel mite lakah neihsa gamh neilo ding uhhi. Amaute' kisapna khempeuhah kei a kicing khin ka hihi.29 An tawh biakna, mawhna leh khialhna hanga biakna, leh Israel mite lak panin keima-a' dingin a kipiakhiate khempeuh amaute in ne ding uhhi.30 Anpal sung panin a limci penteng leh kei tungah hong kipia na khempeuh, amaute in tang ding uhhi. Israel mite' inn sungah ka thupha a tun'theihna dingin amaute in anlum a em simun, biakna-in siampite tungah a em masak penpen uh pia ding uhhi.
A tawmno-ah a diktatte pen a tamah zong diktat uh a, a tawmno-ah a citaklote pen a tamah zong citaklo uhhi.

Anlum a ki-em masa sung panin a themkhat Pasian biakna-in a kipiak ciangin a anlum buppi zong Pasian-a' mah hi pah a, singkung khat' zung zong Pasian a kipiak ciangin a hiang khempeuh zong Pasian-a' mah a hihi.
Ama pian'sakte khempeuh lakah eite a masa pen i suahtheihna dingin thuman thutak zangin ama utthu tawh eite a hong piangsak tawm a hihi.

Tua ciangin Israel mite in, "{ Topa}-a' ding kikhopna-ah Israel minamte khempeuh sung panin kua teng hong pailo ahi hiam?" a ci uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh amaute in { Topa } kiangah a pailo mite tawh kisai-in Mizpah-ah kiciamna lianpi khat bawl uh a, "Kithat ding hi," a ci uhhi. 6 Israel mite in a sanggam uh Benjamin mite khasiat uh a, "Tuni-in Israel-te' sung panin minam khat bei hi.

Ahih hangin tua zan mahin Nathan kiangah { Topa' } thu hong tung a, 5 "Pai in la ka nasempa David kiangah gen in. ‘{ Topa } in hih bangin ci hi: Ten'na ding biakinn khat hong lamsak ding na hi hiam? 6 Israel mite Egypt panin ka paikhiatpih toh ni-a kipan tuni dongin biakinn sungah ka om nai kei a, puanbuk sungah omin ka pai kawikawi hi. 7 Israel mite khempeuh tawh ka painasa mun khempeuhah, ka mi Israel-te a cing dingin ka piak thukhente khat peuhpeuh tungah, "Banghangin taamtak biakinn hoih hong lamsaklo na hi hiam?" ci-in kam khat beek gen ngei ka hi hiam?’ ci hi.
Siampite mi a kicingzah ding amau kisian'suah nailo uh a, mite zong Jerusalem-ah kikhawm nailo uh ahih manin a hunin bawl theilo uhhi.
Tua ciangin Israel mite, siampite, Levi mite, leh sal a suaksa a hong ciahkik mi khempeuh in lungdamna lianpi tawh Pasian' biakinn apna a bawl uhhi.

Launa tawh { Topa' } na sem unla, lin'na tawh a khe nam un; tua hi kei leh amah sinso-in lamkalah na siamang ding uhhi; Banghang hiam cihleh amah heh pakpak hi. Amah a bel khempeuh mi nuamsate a hihi.

{ Topa } aw, na biakinn sungah kua om ding ahi hiam? Na mual siangtho tungah kua teng ding ahi hiam? 2 Paubaang loin gamta-in, a manin na sem a, lungsim tak a gen mi, 3 mi gensia loin, a lawmte tungah siatna bawllo a, a vengte a mawhsaklo mi, 4 migilote thusimlo a, ahi zongin { Topa } a zahtakte a pahtawi mi, ama natna ding nangawnah a ciampello mi, 5 ama sum a meetin a khalo, thutang mite a langpan'lo, golhguk a lalo mite teng ding uhhi. Hih bangin a gamtate pen ling ngeilo ding hi.

{ Topa' } mual tungah kuate kahto ding ahi hiam? Ama mun siangtho-ah kuate ding ding ahi hiam? 4 Gamtat siangtho leh lungsim siangtho a nei, a manlo thu-ah a nuntakna pialoin, khemna tawh a kiciamlo mite a hihi.
Topa' tung panin na khat ka ngen khin a, tua ngenin ka zon' ding pen: { Topa' } inn sungah ka khan' tawntungin om ding, { Topa' } hoihna et ding leh ama biakinn sungah thu dot dingte a hihi.
{ Topa' } tungah ka thuciamnasa pen ama mite khempeuh a kikhopna munah ka pia ding hi.
Amaute in kei tungah, "{ Topa' } inn-ah pai ni," hong cih uh ciangin kei ka kipak hi.
{ Topa } in inn lampih kei leh innlamte' sepna a mawkna a hihi. { Topa } in khuapi hutpih kei leh khuapi cingte' cin'na a mawkna a hihi.
{ Topa } phat un. Ama biakinn sungah Pasian phat unla, ama vangliatna mun vantungah amah phat un.
Amah in tuucingpa bangin ama tuuhonte an vak ding a, ama tuuhonte kaikhawmin a ang sungah pua ding a, no ngeklai a neite dam takin a paipih ding hi.
"{ Topa' } biakinn kongkhakpi kiangah ding in la, hih thuteng va taangko in: { Topa } a bia dingin kongkhak sunga hong tum Judah mite aw, { Topa' } kammal ngai dih un.

Hih a kisehkhia mun sungteng pen biakna leitang siangtho hi ding a, { Topa' } biakinn sungah na a sem siampite-a' ding hi ding hi. Hih mun sungteng pen siampite' inn lamna ding mun leh biakinn lamna ding mun siangtho hi ding hi.

Tua hi a, { Topa } in Judah gam ukpa Zerubbabel, siampi lianpenpa Joshua, leh salsuahna panin a hong ciahkik mi khempeuh' sungah biakinn lamnopna lungsim a guan' hi. Vanglian { Topa}, amau' Pasian' biakinn a lam dingin hong kithawi uh a,

Minam dang khempeuh lokgawp ding ka hih manin a neihsa uh sum leh paite, hih munah hong kipuak ding a, biakinn sungah a dimin van hong om ding hi. 8 Leitunga a om ngun leh kham khempeuh keima-a' a hihi. 9 Biakinn thak pen a lui sangin hoihzaw-in thupizaw ding hi. Hih biakinn-ah cihtheihna leh nopsakna kong pia ding hi," cisak hi.

"Biakna tawh kizomin na hoih khat peuhpeuh na sep uh ciangin mite' phat ding deihna tawh a kilang theithei dingin na sepkhak lohna dingun na kingaihsun un. Tua bangin gamta le uh cin, vantungah a om na Pa uh kiang panin thaman na ngah kei ding uhhi.
Ke'n kong genin-ah: Nang pen suangneu a cihnopna Peter na hi hi. Hih suangpi tungah ka pawlpi ka lam ding a, sihna nangawn in zo zo ngeilo ding hi.

"Na sanggamte uh na tung uhah hong khialh leh pai-in note gel bek theihin a khialhna va gen un. Na thu uh a hong man' leh na sanggampa uh a ngahkik na hi uhhi. 16 Ahi zongin na thu uh a hong man'nop kei leh, Laisiangtho sungah, ‘Mi nih ahih kei leh mi thum' theihna bek tawh mawhsakna khat peuhpeuh man pan hi,’ a cih mah bangin midang khat ahi a, nih ahi zongin tonpih un. 17 Amah in tua mite' thu a man'nop kei leh pawlpite tungah a thu ko un. Pawlpite' thu nangawn a man'nop kei leh Gentail mite leh siahdongte bangin na ngaihsun un.
Banghang hiam cihleh keima minin mi nih leh thum bek nangawn a kikhopna peuhpeuhah kei ka om hi," a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Pasian biakna innpi huang sungah Zeisu lut a, tua sungah van zuak van lei-a a om mi khempeuh a hawlkhia hi. Sumkhek nasemin a om mite' sabuai leh vakhu zuakte' tutnate a lumletsak gawp hi. 13 Amaute kiangah, "Pasian in Laisiangtho sungah, ‘Ka inn pen thungetna inn kici ding hi,’ ci napi-in, note in guktakna phualpi na suaksak uhhi," a ci hi.

Biakinn panin Zeisu a paikhiat laitakin ama kiangah a nungzuite hong pai-in, tua biakinn a thupina zia a lak uhhi. 2 Ahi zongin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, "Hihte khempeuh na mu khinta uhhi. Ke'n a mantaka kong genin-ah: Hih inn lamna-a a kiciang suangte a kithuapin a om nangawn a om nawnlo zah dongin kilawnkeek mang ding hi," ci-in a dawng hi.

Tua bangin kivaikhak hi zenzen leh Laisiangtho in tu-a bangin a pian'na ding a gen pen bangci tun'theih ding ahi hiam?" a ci hi. 55 Tua ciangin Zeisu in mihonte kiangah, "Gal leh sa bangin hong ngaihsun a, keimah a man dingin namsau leh molhtum tawh hong kuan na hi uhhiam? Nisimin biakinn sungah thu ka hilh niloh a, ahi zongin kei nong man kei uhhi. 56 Ahi zongin Laisiangtho sungah kamsangte' thugente a tun'theihna dingin hih bangin a hong gamta na hi uhhi," a ci hi. Tua ciangin a nungzuite khempeuh in Zeisu nusia-in a taisan uhhi.
Ahi zongin siampite in tua ngun peekte tawm uh a, "Hih sumte pen mi thahna dingin a kipia sum ahih manin biakinn sumkholna-ah koihdingin kilawmlo hi," a ci uhhi.

Johan in, "Sia aw, nangma min zangin dawi a hawlkhia mi khat ka mu uhhi. Amah, ei' pawl hilo ahih manin ka kham uhhi," a ci hi. 39 "Amah kham kei un. Keima min zangin na lamdang a bawl mipa in keimah gensiat tawh thuahpah cih om theilo ding hi.

Kikhopna inn sungah, uliante-a' dingin a kikoihcing tutphah nuamte tungah tunuam uh a, pawi sungah zong uliante' tutna mun hoihte bekah a tunuam uhhi. 40 Meigong numeite tungah nuamtaksa-in a neihsate laksakin zangmang uh a, mite in mihoih a saktheihna ding uh a deihna hangun thu saupipi a ngen uhhi. Amau' kineihkhemna tawh kizui-in a gimthuak ding uh lianzaw ding hi," a ci hi. 41 Biakinn sumpi khiatna kuang gei-ah Zeisu tu a, mihonte in sumpi a khiat laitakun a en hi. A haute in tampipi hong khia uhhi. 42. A zawng meigong numei khat zong hong pai a, sumnen tang nih hong khia hi. 43. Tua ciangin a nungzuite sam a, "Adangte khempeuh sangin hih mizawng meigongnu in tam khia zaw hi. 44. Banghang hiam cihleh adangte in a neihval a lamval sung panun a khia uh ahi hi; ahi zongin amah zawng mahmah napi-in ama kivakna ding nangawn sitloin a neih khempeuh a khiakhin ahi hi," a ci hi.
"Limtakin kidawm un. Note hong kimanin thukhen zumah hong kipaipih ding a, kikhopna inn sungah zong hong kisat ding hi. Ukpite leh kumpite mai-ah keima thu genna ding hun na ngah ding uhhi.
Tua ciangin kawl vakhu zuakte kiangah, "Na kawl vakhute uhhih lai panin paikhiatpih un. Ka Pa' inn pen sumzuakna inn phualpi-in nei kei un," a ci hi.

Zeisu in, "Hih biakinn susia le uh cin ni thum sungin ka dingsak kik ding hi," ci-in a dawng hi. 20 Tua ciangin Jew uliante in, "Hih biakinn kum sawmli leh kum guk sung a kilam a hihi. Ni thum sungin dingsak kikzo ding na hi hiam?" a ci uhhi. 21 Ahi zongin Zeisu in biakinn a cih ciangin ama pumpi a cihna a hihi. 22 Tua ahih manin sihna panin amah a kithawhkik sak ciangin a nungzuite in Zeisu' thugen phawkkik uh a, Laisiangtho leh Zeisu' thugente a um uhhi.
Nisimin biakinn-ah kikhawm uh a, a innte uhah an nekhawmin, lungdamna leh kiniamkhiatna tawh a ne ciat uhhi.

Tua khit ciangin thu um mi hong tam tektek a, Jew mite leh Grik pau a zang Jew mite kikalah kiphunsanna thu hong om hi. Grik pau a zang Jew mite in, "Annek tuidawn, sumlepai hawmna-ah ka meigong numeite uh hong kipiaksak lo hi," ci-in lungkimlo uhhi. 2 Tua ahih manin sawltak sawmlenihte in thu um mi khempeuh samin kaikhawm uh a, "Kote in Pasian' thu hilh ding don manlo liangin annek tuidawn sumlepai vai-ah kong manlah ding uh kilawmlo hi.
Ahi zongin Saul in pawlpi suksiat ding hanciam a, inn khat pan inn khatah pai kawikawi-in, thu um numei leh pasalte kai-in thong sungah a khia hi.

Tua ahih manin Judea gam, Galilee gam, leh Samaria gamsunga om pawlpite in bawlsiatna thuak nawnloin nuamtakin om uh a, Topa zahtakna tawh gamta uh ahih manin Khasiangtho huhna tawh a mi khangin a kibehlap uhhi. 32 Peter khualzinin pai kawikawi a, khatvei Lydda khua-a teng Pasian' mite kiangah a hawh hi.
Amaute in huhna ding sum a kaihkhop khit uh ciangin pawlpi upate tungah a na piak dingun Barnabas leh Saul a puasak uhhi.

Antiok khua pawlpi sungah kamsang pawlkhat leh sia pawlkhat om uhhi. Tuate pen Barnabas, Mi Vompa zong a kici Simon, Sairin khuami Lusias, gam ukpipa khutnuai-ah gam a uksawn Herod tawh a khangkhawm Manaen, leh Saul ahi uhhi. 2 Amaute in an tangin Pasian bia-in a om laitakun Khasiangtho in amaute kiangah, "Keima na a sem dingin ka sapsa ahih manin kei-a' dingin Barnabas leh Saul hong piakhia un," a ci hi. 3 Amaute in zong an tangin, a lu tung uhah a khut uh nga-in thu a ngetsak khit uh ciangin a kuankhia sak uhhi.
Khua pawlpi simah pawlpi upa ding sehsak uh a, an tangin thungetna tawh amaute' muan' ahi Topa' khutsungah tua mite a ap uhhi.

Hih thu huhau-in Paul leh Barnabas, leh hih mite kikalah nakpi takin thu kinialna omin thu kisel uh ahih manin, Paul leh Barnabas leh Antiok khua-a a om mi pawlkhatte Jerusalem khua-ah va pai-in, hih thu tawh kisai-in tua lai-a om sawltakte leh upate tawh a kimuhna dingun a vaihawm uhhi. 3 Amaute a pai uh ciangin pawlpi mite in khuanawl ciang va kha uh a, Gentail mite zong Pasian lamah a kiheina thu, a nawkna uh Foenisia gamah gen kawikawi uh ahih manin thu um mite khempeuh a nuam mahmah uhhi. 4 Jerusalem khua a tun' uh ciangin sawltakte, upate, leh pawlpite in limtakin zin na do uh a, Pasian in na a seppihna thu, amaute kiangah a gen uhhi. 5 Ahi zongin Pharisee mite sung panin thu um mi pawlkhat in, "Amaute in Moses Thukham zui-in, a vun uh a ki-atna ding uh gen ding kisam hi," a ci uhhi. 6 Tua ahih manin hih thu a kikum dingin sawltakte leh upate a kikhawm uhhi.

Tua ciangin sawltakte, upate, leh pawlpi buppi in amau sung panin mi pawlkhat teelin Paul leh Barnabas tawh Antiok khua-ah a paikhawmsak ding uh a vaihawm uhhi. Amaute tawh a paikhawm dingin thu um mite in a zahtakbawl mahmah mi nih, Barsabbas Judas leh Silas teelkhia uh a,

Thuhilhin a paina uh khua khempeuha thu um mite kiangah Jerusalem khua-a om sawltakte leh upate in zuihdingin a khensat uh ngeinate gen kawikawi uh a, tua ngeinate a zuihna dingun a hanthawn uhhi. 5 Tua ahih manin pawlpi mite a upna uhah kip semsemin, a nini-in mi a kibehlaplap hi.

A pai ngei zel mah bangin Paul zong kikhopna inn-ah pai a, Sabbath ni thum sung Laisiangtho siksanin mite tawh thu kikum a, 3 Christ in sihna thuakin, sihna panin a thawhkik ding a kisam ahi hi, ci-in a laktel hi. Tu-a note kiangah kong pulak Christ pen Laisiangtho sunga kigen Christ ahi hi, ci-in Paul in a gen hi.

Thesaloni khuamite sangin Berea khuamite in mipi lungsim neizaw uhhi. Amaute in lawp mahmahna tawh Paul' thugente ngai uh a, Paul' thugente man taktak hiam ci-in a theihna dingun nisimin Laisiangtho a sim uhhi.
Tua Pasian pen leitung buppi leh a tunga om khempeuh a piangsak Pasian hi a, van leh lei a uk Topa ahih manin mihingte' lamsa biakinn sungah tenglo hi.
Paul in Miletas khua panin Ephesa khua-ah thu puak a, Ephesa pawlpi upate in a na dawntuahna dingin a vaikhak hi.
Khasiangtho in note' khutsungah a hong koih pawlpi mite leh nomau pumpi mahmah limtakin na kem un. Pasian in a Tapa a sihna tawh a ngah a pawlpi hoihtakin a kemte na hi ta un.

I pumpi tungah zong na tampi i nei a, tua nate' nasep a tuamtuam a hihi. 5 Tua mah bangin eite mi tampi ihih hangin pumkhat ihi a, pumpi nate bangin khatlekhat a kizom ciat ihi hi.6 Tua ahih manin Pasian in hehpihna hong piakkhongna tawh kizui-in i siamna a tuamtuamte zang ciat ni. I siamna pen Pasian' thu gentheihna ding siamna ahih leh i upna neihzah tawh kizui-in gen ni. 7 Nasepna ding siamna a nei ihih leh na sem ni. Hilhna ding siamna a nei ihih leh hilh ni. 8 Midangte hanthot theihna ding siamna a nei ihih leh midangte hanthawn ni. Midangte hoptheihna ding a nei ihih leh citna taktak tawh hawm ni. Makaih theihna ding siamna a nei ihih leh hoihtakin na sem ni. Midangte hehpih theihna ding a nei ihih leh maitaii takin hih ni.
Upna neu mite pawlbawl unla, na ngaihsutna uh a kituah kei leh zong mawhsak kei un.
Kenkhrea khua-a om pawlpite lakah na a sem, thu upna sungah i sanggamnu Foebe pen mihoih mahmah khat ahihna thu note' theih dingin ka deih hi.

Lawmte aw, note' theihsa thute gensia langpangin, mite' upna nawngkaisakin pawl a kikhensak mite kidawm un. Tua bang mite tawh kikhawl vet kei un. 18 Tua bang mite in i Topa Christ' na a sem hiloin, gilpi vai bek a sem uh a hihi. Amaute in mite phatin kamkhum nono zang uh ahih manin mihoih pawlkhat a khemzo uhhi.
Keima zintun'napa leh pawlpite' kikhopna inn neipa zong ahi Gaias in zong hong hopih hi. Ka omna khuapi sumkempa Erastas leh i Christian sanggam Kuartas in zong hong hopih uhhi.

Zeisu Christ tawh kipawlna hangin Pasian' mi suakin, Pasian' mi siangtho cihna a ngah, Corin khua-a om Pasian' pawlpi mite leh eite' Topa bek hiloin, amaute' Topa zong ahi, i Topa Zeisu Christ tungah thu a ngen, mun khempeuhah a om mite tungah lai ka hong khak uhhi.
Sanggamte aw, note khatlekhat kithutuakin, pawl kikhenna omkha loin, na lungsim, na ngaihsutna uh leh na ngimna uh na kikhatsakna dingun i Topa Zeisu Christ min tawh ka hong thum hi.

Kote pen Pasian-a' dingin na a semkhawm mite ka hi uh a, note pen Pasian' lo na hi uhhi. Note pen Pasian' inn zong na hi uhhi. 10 Pasian in kei tungah a hong piak siamna zangin, innlam siamte' nasepteng semin, a khuam thupiteng ka phut a, Apollos in tua khuam phuhsa tungah innlam a zom hi. Tua khuam tungah inn a lampa a kingaihsut mahmah ding kisam hi. 11 Keima phuhsa khuam thupiteng ahi Zeisu Christ cih simloh kuamah dang in khuam thupi dang phutthei nawnlo ding hi. 12 Ahi zongin tua khuam tungah kham, ngun, suangmanpha, sing, bi, lopa, a nam tuamtuam kilam thei hi. 13 Tua a kilam nate mei tawh a kize-et ding Ni hong tung ding a, tua nasepnate a bangci hiam, ci-in mei in ze-et ding ahih manin a lam mite' nasep ciat hong kilang ding hi. 14 Mi khat in tua khuamte tungah a lam nate bangmah a cihzawh kei leh a nasep thaman a ngah ding hi. 15 Ahi zongin mi khat in a lam nate a kattum leh amah a sum hi ding hi. Tua nate a lampa ahih leh meikatna ding panin a suakta bang keekin a suakta bek ding hi. 16 Note pen Pasian' biakinn na hihna uh leh note sungah Pasian' Khasiangtho a teng ahih lamtak na theihsa uh a hihi. 17 Mi khatpeuh in Pasian' biakinn susia leh Pasian in tua mipa susia ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian' biakinn a siangtho hi a, note zong tua biakinn siangtho na hi uhhi.
Tua bang hinapi-in hih bang thu themthem hong pian' ciangin pawlpi sungah bangmahin a kisimlo mite' mai kitun'ding na hi uhhiam?
Tua ahi manin tua bang kisiatna na neih uh leh pawlpi sunga a kineu koih mite nangawn thukhen dingin seh lel un! (ZIV)
Hih leitung nuntakna tawh kisai thute khen ding na neih uh ciangin pawlpi sung aa a kineumuh tatate seh zawsop ding na hi uhhiam? (ZSV)

Tua thu hangin note kiangah, ka it mahmah, Topa thu sungah a citak mahmah, ka tapa Timothy ka hong paisak hi. Amah in, Zeisu Christ thu sungah ka nuntakna ziate leh pawlpi a tuamtuamte kiangah ka thuhilhte khempeuh, note tungah hong hilh ding hi. 18 Note kiangah kei hong hawhlo ding, ci-in ngaihsunkha uh ahih manin mi pawlkhat a kiphasak uhhi.
Note na kikhop khawm uh ciangin i Topa Zeisu Christ vangliatna in eite hong ompih ahih manin, note tawh ka lungsimin ka hong omkhawm hi.

Note khatlekhat thu na kineih uh ciangin Pasian' mi siangthote khensakzaw loin lawki thukhente' mai na kitun' ngam uhhi. 2 Pasian' mite in leitung mite' thu a khensakzaw ding ahihlam theilo na hi uhhiam? Note pen leitung mite' thu a khensak ding na hih uh ciangin tua bang thu neute khen theilo lawmlawm na hi uhhiam? 3 Eite pen vantung mite' thu nangawn a khensak ding ihih lamtak theilo na hi uhhiam? Tua ahih manin hih leitunga no' thu neuneute leltak na khentheih zawk kan ding uh a hihi. 4 Tua bang hinapi-in hih bang thu themthem hong pian' ciangin pawlpi sungah bangmahin a kisimlo mite' mai kitun'ding na hi uhhiam? 5 Note-a' dingin zumhuai mahmah hi. Note khatlekhat na kithu-neihnate uh a khenthei ding note lakah mipil khat beek om buang ding hi. 6 Tua hinapi, khatlekhat thu kineihin zum na kitun' uh a, lawki thukhente na khensak tazen uhhi. 7 Note khatlekhat zum na kitut mahmah uh zong a gina hetlo na hihna uh hong kilangsak hi. Banghangin thuakzaw mailo a, sum ngamzaw mailo na hi uhhiam? 8 Note khatlekhat kisu-in, khatlekhat na kisut zawsop uh a, na sanggamte teekteek nangawn uh tawh thu na nei uhhi.
Na pumpi uh, Pasian in a hong piak, note' sungah a teng Khasiangtho' biakinn ahih lamtak theilo na hi uhhiam? Note' pumpi, nomau' neihsa hilo a, Pasian-a' a hihi.

Biakinn-ah nasem dingin a kicial mite in biakinn mah panin an ngah uh a, biakna tau-ah na a semte in biakna sa mah a ngahna uh theilo na hi uhhiam? 14 Tua mah bangin lungdamna thu a hilhte in tua nasepna mah panin nuntakna a ngahna ding uh Topa' thupiak a hihi.

Ahi zongin a nuai-a thu tawh kisai-in note ka hong pakta kei hi. Banghang hiam cihleh pawlpi kikhopna na neih uh ciangin phatna sangin siatna na piangsakzaw uhhi. 18 A masa penin, pawlpi na kikhop uh ciangin note lakah pawl kikhenna om hi, ci-in ka za hi. Hih ka zak thu a manna omkha dingin ka um hi. 19 Banghang hiam cihleh kuateng pawlpi mi citak ahi hiam, ci-in a kilatna dingin kikhenna a ommah ding a hihi. 20 Nekkhawmna a bawl dingin note na kikhop uh ciangin Topa' Nekkhawmna a ne dingin na pai kei uhhi. 21 Banghang hiam cihleh nekkhawmna ne dingin na pai uh ciangin pawlkhatte amau' an tawh na tung masa-in ne pah uh ahih manin, pawlkhatte a kham mahmahin na om uh hangin pawlkhatte gilkialin a om uhhi. 22 Hih bangin na gamtat uh, anletui na nekna ding uh inn neilo na hi uhhiam? Tua ahih kei leh Pasian' pawlpi simmawh bawlin pawlpi mizawngte na maizumsak nopna uh ahi hiam? Hih thu tawh kisai-ah hong pakta ding nong sak uh leh note ka hong pakta het kei hi.

Pumpi pen khat bek hinapi-in na a tuamtuam a nei hi. Pumpi in na a tuamtuam tampi a neih hangin pumpi khat bek mah ahih veve mah bangin Christ zong pumpi na a tuamtuam a nei pumpi khat a hihi. 13 Jew mi ihi a, Gentail mi ihi zongin, sila ihi a, sila a hilo ihi zongin, eite minam tuamtuam ihih hangin Khasiangtho khat bek mah in Zeisu' pumpi a suak dingin ama sungah hong phum a, eite khempeuh tungah a hong kipia pen tua a kibang Khasiangtho khat bek mah a hihi. 14 Pumpi in na khat bek neiloin nam tampi tak a nei hi.

Tua ahih manin i pumpi nate khatlekhat kithutuak lo cih omloin a vekpi-in a kilemkim uhhi. 26 Khat in natna ngah leh a vekpi-un thuakkhawm uh a, khat in pahtakna ngah leh a vekpi-un lungdam khawm uhhi. 27 Tu-in note khempeuh pen Christ pumpi na hi uh a, na vekpi-un a pumpi na khat ciat na hi uhhi. 28 Tua ahih manin Pasian in pawlpi sungah mi khempeuh ama pan'mun ciat dingah a hong bulh hi. A masa-in sawltakte, a nihna-ah kamsangte, a thumna-ah laihilhte, tua ciangin na lamdang bawltheite, cina damsak theite, midang a huhtheite, thu vaihawm a siamte, leh pau lamdang a pau theite ahi uhhi. 29 A vekpi-un sawltak hilo a, a vekpi-un kamsang zong hilo uhhi. A vekpi-un laihilh, thuhilh hilo uh a, a vekpi-un na lamdang zong bawllo uhhi. 30 A vekpi-un cina damsakna ding siamna neilo uh a, a vekpi-un pau lamdang pau theilo uh a, a vekpi-un tua pau lamdangte a khiatna gen theilo uhhi. 31 Tua ahih manin Pasian' hong piak siamna a hoihpente deih belin na nei ta un. Tu-in a hoihpen thu khat ka hong gen ding hi.

Na lungsim bek tawh Pasian tungah lungdamna na koh ciangin kikhopna sungah a om midangte in bangci-in nang' thungetna, "Amen," hong cihpih thei ding ahi hiam? Nangma thungette a theihtheihna ding uh bangmah omlo hi. 17 Pasian tungah lungdam ko-in na thungetna a hoih mahmah hangin midangte in bangmah phattuamna ngah hetlo hi.

Tua ahih ciangin sanggamte aw, ka hong gennop thu a tomin: Pasian bia dingin note na kikhop uh ciangin khat in la sak ding nei, khat in Pasian' thu a gen ding nei, khat in pau lamdang tawh thugen ding nei, khat in tua a kigente a khiatna gentheihna ding nei cih bangin na om ding uhhi. Hih a tuamtuamte khempeuh, pawlpi' phattuamna ding ahih ding kisam hi.

Pasian in eite ahi zelzul dingin a hong sam hilo a, hoihtak nuamtakin a om dingin a hong sam ahih manin Pasian' thu gen ding lawpna lungsim pen a gen dingpa a ki-ukzawh ding a kisam a hihi. Pasian' pawlpi mite khempeuh lakah a kizang ngeina ahih mah bangin, 33-34 mihon biak kikhopna sungah numeite pauloin om uh hen. Numeite a kiniamkhiatna ding thu Jew Thukham in a gen mah bangin amaute in mihon lakah thu a gen ding uh kiphallo hi.

Tu-in mihing pianzia hong kitel a, tuate pen: Numei tawh mawhna, thangtatna, lanluat mana khialhna, 20 milim biakna, mi bumna, kilangbawlna, kitotna, hazatna, hehna, huaihamna, kikhenna, pawltuam lungsim neihna, 21 en'na, zukhamna, leh biakna pawi-ah zukhamna-a kipan adangdangte a hihi. A beisa hunah ka hong hilhkholhsa bangin tu-in ka hong genkikin-ah: Hih bangin a gamta mite pen Pasian' Ukna sungah omkha hetlo ding hi.

Pasian in Christ' khenuai-ah na khempeuh koih a, thu khempeuhah pawlpi' lutang dingin Christ a bawl hi. 23 Tua pawlpi pen Christ' pumpi hi a, tua pawlpi-a' dingin amahmah kipia-in, mun khempeuha om pawlpite, thu khempeuhah a cingtaaksak hi.

Christ mahmah in Gentail mite leh Jew mite pawlkhatin hong bawl ahih manin eite tungah nopsakna a hong piapa a hihi. Hih minam nihte khenin gal a piangsak dalna pen Christ in ama pumpi tawh a satkham hi. 15 Amah tawh kipawlna hangin minam nihte pawlkhat a suahtheihna dingin minam a dei Jew Thukham leh a ngeinate khempeuh phiatin, eite pawlkhat hong suahin a hong kilemsak hi. 16 Singlamteh tungah a sihna tawh Christ in kilangneihna beisak a, tua singlamteh hangin minam nihte pawlkhat suahin Pasian kiang a tun'pih hi.

Tua ahih ciangin no Gentail mite pen a pualam mi, gamdang mite na hi nawn kei uh a, Pasian mite tawh minam khat hita-in, Pasian innkuan sung mite na hita uhhi. 20 Note zong, sawltakte leh kamsangte in a phuhsa innkhuam tungah a kilam na hi uh a, tua inn sutpi pen Zeisu mahmah a hihi. 21 Tua inn sutpi Christ pen inn-a a kilam khempeuh a puapi pen hi a, Topa-a' dingin biakinn siangtho a suah dongin tua inn a khangsak hi. 22 Note zong midangte tawh kigawmin ama tungah na kilam uh a, Khasiangtho-in Pasian a ten'na ding inn na suak uhhi.

Eite-a' dingin na a hong sepsak, eite' ngetzah val, leh i ngaihsut zawhloh zah dongin a vangliatna tawh tampi tak a hong hihsak thei 21 eite' Pasian pen, pawlpi mite khempeuh leh Christ Zeisu tawh a kipawl mi khempeuh in a khang khangin a tawntungin phat ciat ta uh hen. Amen.

Khasiangtho kimakai sakin, khatlekhat kilemin pawlkhat na hihna uh na kipsak tawntung un. 4 A kibang lametna khat bek a ngahkhawm dingin Pasian in note hong sap mah bangin eite khempeuh pumkhat bek hi-in Khasiangtho zong khat bek mah a neikhawm ihi hi. 5 Topa khat bek, upna khat bek, tuiphumna khat bek mah a zangkhawm ihi hi. 6 Mi khempeuh' Pa ahi Pasian khat bek om a, mi khempeuh' Topa hi-in, na khempeuh hih kimin, mun citengah a om hi.

Amah in mite tungah siamna a tuamtuam hong pia a, pawlkhatte sawltak nasep a semding, pawlkhatte kamsang nasep a semding, pawlkhatte thuhilh kawikawi nasep a semding, pawlkhatte pawlpi kem nasep a semding, leh pawlkhatte laihilh nasep a semdingin a hong seh hi. 12 Hih nasep a tuamtuamte khempeuh a semdingin Pasian' mi khempeuh kigingkhol sakin Christ-a' dingin na semin Christ pumpi a khan'sak theihna ding deihna a hihi.
