Tua ahih manin zuau gen nawn kei unla, Christ pumpi nate ihihna hangin pawlkhat ihih manin khatlekhat tungah thuman kigen ni.

Banghang hiam cihleh Christ pen ama pumpi ahi pawlpi a honkhiapa hi-in, pawlpi tungah ukna thu a neih mah bangin pasal in a zi tungah ukna thu a nei a hihi. 24 Pawlpi pen Christ' khutnuai ahih mah bangin zite zong thu khempeuhah a pasalte uh khutnuai hi ding uhhi. 25 Pasalte aw, Christ in pawlpi itin a pumpi a piak mah bangin na zite uh na it un. 26 Pawlpi pen paubaan'na a om hetlo, a siangtho mahmahin Christ kiangah a kipiak theihna dingin Pasian thu tawh tui-ah a silsiang khit ciangin Pasian kiangah a aptheihna dingin pawlpi-a' dingin Christ a kipia a hihi.
Eite pen ama pumpi nate ihihna hangin Christ in hong it mah bangin kuamah in ama pumpi mudah ngeilo a, hoihtakin kemin a vakzaw hi.

Note tawh a omkhawm dingin ka hong paithei a, ka hong paithei kei zongin note in lungdamna thu tawh kipawl upna thu-ah ngimna kikhatin kiptakin na omna ding uh leh deihna kikhatin na dokhawmna thu uh ka zak theihna dingin Christ hanga lungdamna thu tawh a kilawm a kituakin na nuntak ding uh a thupi pen a hihi.

Na khempeuh khat beek a om ma-in amah om khinta a, amah tawh a kipawl manin na khempeuh ama mun sansanah hoihtakin a omthei hi. 18 Na khempeuhah amah a lianpen ahih theihna dingin, amah pen pawlpi ahi ama pumpi lutang hi a, pawlpi' nuntakna a kipatna hi a, sihna panin a kithosak kik Tapa cil a hihi.
Tu-in ka pumpi-in ka thuakna tawh Christ in ama pumpi ahi pawlpi-a' dingin a thuakding a kisam laiteng a kitangcingsak suak ka hih manin note-a' dingin ka thuakna thu-ah ka lung a dam hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh note tawh ka hong omkhawm loh hangin ka lungsimin note tawh ka hong omkhawm a, Christ na upna uh hangin kiptakin na omkhawmna uh ka theih manin ka nuam mahmah hi.
lutang ahi Christ a len nawnlo uh a hihi. Lutang ahi Christ' ukna tawh pumpi na khempeuh kizom dimdiam uh ahih manin pumpi in thahatna ngah a, Pasian' deih bangin a khangto hi.

Note pumkhat suakin a lungdam khawm dingin Pasian in a hong sap ahih mah bangin Christ hong piak nopsakna in note' lungsim hong uk ta hen la, lungdamin om ta un. 16 Christ thu a cingtakin note lungsimah hong om hen la, pilna tawh khatlekhat thu kihilhin na kitai un. Pasian tungah lungdam kohna-in Thuciam Lui sunga late, la thakte, leh biakna late na sa un.

Mi khatpeuh, pawlpi sia nasep a ut leh a hoih mahmah ahi hi, a cihna thu a man a hihi. 2 Tua ahih manin siate pen paubaan'na a neilo mi, zi khat bek a nei mi, lungsim hoih hithiat mi, thu a ngaihsun thei mi, a kilawm a kituakin a gamta mi, zin leh leengla do a siam mi, thuhilh a siam mi, 3 zu a khamlo mi, a ngongtatlo mi, lungsimnem mi, kitot a uklo mi, sum a deihlualo mite hi ding uhhi. 4 A innkuan sung hoihtakin a ukzo mi, a tate thumangsak thei-in, na khempeuhah a kilawm a kituakin a gamtasak thei mi hi ding uhhi. 5 Banghang hiam cihleh mi khatpeuh in a innkuan sung ukzia ding a theih kei leh Pasian' pawlpi kem theilo ding hi. 6 Christian a suaktungte zong hilo ding hi. Tua bang mi thakte kiphasak thei a, Dawimangpa mah bangin thukhenna a thuak mite hikha thei ding hi. 7 Pawlpi mi a hilo midangte in zong a zahtak mite hi ding hi. Tua hi leh mindai khalo ding a, Dawimangpa' thangah awk khalo zawdeuh ding hi. 8 Pawlpi upa dingte zong a gamtat hoih, a lungsim citak, leenggahzu tam a nelo, sum thu-ah a huaiham mi hilo ding uhhi. 9 Lungsim kisuan'na a omlo, upna thu-ah a kip mite hi ding uhhi. 10 A masa-in kize-et phot ding a, paubaan'na a om kei leh sem thei pan ding uhhi. 11 A zite uh zong a gamtat hoih mi hi-in, mi gensiat a hatlote hi ding uh a, lungsim citak, thu khempeuhah a thuman mi hi ding uhhi. 12 Upate pen zi khat bek a nei mi, a tate leh a innkuansung hoihtakin a ukzote hi ding hi. 13 Pawlpi upa hoihtakin a semthei mite pen mite in zahtak uh a, Christ Zeisu a upna thu uh kisuan'na om hetloin hangtakin gen ngam uhhi.
Kamsangte' thugennate leh upate in na tungah a khut uh nga-in thu hong ngetsakna ahi nangma hihtheih siamnate na valkhongsak kei in.

Pawlpi sungah ukna leh makaihna siamin, thuhilh leh thugen hahkat tawh a thuah upate pen thaman a zah nih piakdingin kilawm hi. 18 Banghang hiam cihleh Laisiangtho in, "Buh a cil bawngtal muk na tuam kei in," a cih banah, "Nasempa in a thaman a ngahding a kilawm ahi hi," na ci hi.
thuman thutak zuiloin, a lungsim paizia uh a man nawnlo, biakna pen hauhtheihna ding lampi bekin a ngaihsun mite in a tawntungin kitot kiselna a piangsak uh a hihi.

Topa' na a sem mite, kitot a hatte hilo ding a, mi khempeuh tungah lungsim nemin, thugen siamin, thuakzawhna nei-in, 25 thunem tawh a langte' hoihlohna a puahtheite hi ding hi. Tua bang hi leh Pasian in amaute kisiksak thei ding a, thuman thutak hong thei-in, 26 Dawimangpa in ama deihna bangin a gamta dingin a mat khit hangin ama thang panin amaute suakta khathei ding uhhi.
biakna thu a puathamteng zui napi-in biakna hangin vangliatna thu a omte deihlo ding uhhi. Tua bangin a gamta mite na pelh in.
hunhoih hunsia cih khen tuanloin Pasian' thu hilh ding na kin ngaihsutna ding, lungduaina tawh mite' lungsim zo-in, mite taii-in, hanthawnin na hilhna dingin thu a hong pia ka hihi.

Krete Tuikulh gamsung tengah a manin puahphat ding a kisam lai a omte a semding leh khua simah pawlpi upa a koih dingin tua gamah a hong nusia ka hihi. Nang tungah ka hong gensa thute hoihtakin na phawk in: 6 Upate pen paubaan'na a omlote hi ding a, zi khat bek nei-in, a tate zong thu um mi hi-in, a thumanglo, a phengtat gawpte hilo ding uhhi. 7 Pawlpi siate pen Pasian' nasem ahih manin paubaan'na a omlo, a kiphasaklo, zukham thei mi a hilo, a ngongtatlo, a huaihamlo, 8 zinleleeng do a siam mi, thuhoih a deih mi, a pumpi a ki-ukzo mi, a thutang mi, a siangtho mi, leh a kisekzo mi hi ding uhhi. 9 Upna bulpi tawh a kituak thute limtakin lenkip ding uhhi. Tua hi leh thuhilhna man tawh midangte hanthawn thei ding uh a, thuman a nial mite' khialhna zong laktel thei ding uhhi. 10 Banghang hiam cihleh thu a manglo, thu a mawk gengen, mi a khem thei, a diakdiakin Jew ngeina bangin vun-atna ding thu a gen tampi tak a om uhhi. 11 Sum ngahtheihna ding bekin a kilawm lopi-in thu hilhin biakna innkuan buppi nawngkaisak uh ahih manin thu a gen nawnlohna dingun khaktan ding a hihi.

Kitot, kikhenna ding a piangsak mite pen khatvei nihvei bang na hilh khit ciangin kisukha nawn vet kei in. 11 Tua bang mite a kisiakhin hi a, a mawhna un a khialhna uh a kilangsak ahihna thu na thei in.
Mi pawlkhatte in kikhop a pelh bang hiloin, eite in kikhop khawmnate pelhloin om ni. Topa' hong paiding Ni hong naina thu thei ihih manin khatlekhat kihanthawn semsemzaw ni.

Na makaite uh thu na mang unla, a genna uh bangin na gamta un. Pasian kiangah amaute in a nasepnate uh a pulak ding uh ahih manin tawlnga loin note hong lunghimawh tawntung uhhi. Amaute' thu mang le uh cin a nasepna uhah lungdam mahmah ding uh a, mang kei le uh cin dahpipi-in na sem ding uhhi. Dahpipi-in a nasepna uh note-a' dingin zong phattuamna a om tuan hilo hi.
A cina na om uh leh pawlpi upate sam un. Amaute in thu hong ngetsakin Topa min tawh sathau hong zut ding uhhi.
Tu-in lungdamna thuman na zuihna hangun note kisian'suah khinin, na thu uppih mite uh lungsim tak tawh itthei khinta na hih manun na lungsim khempeuh uh tawh limtakin na ki-it un.
Note zong nuntakna a piathei suangpi mah bangin kha thu tawh kisai biakinn lamna dingin na kizang unla, Zeisu Christ hangin Pasian' san'theih biaknate a pia dingin a siangtho siampi na suak un.

Keima pumpi mahmah zong pawlpi upa hi-in, Christ thuakna zong ka mit tawh mu-in, mailam hunah a hong kilang ding minthan'na zong a ngah dingpa ka hihna tawh note lakah a om pawlpi upate kiangah ka hong thum nop thu in: 2 Pasian in note' khutsungah a hong piak tuuhonte hoihtakin na cing unla, utlopipi hiloin, Pasian' hong deih bangin utna lungsim takpi tawh na cing un. Sum ngahnopna bek tawh a sem hiloin utna lungsim tawh a semte na hi un. 3 Note' kepdingin a hong kipia tuute, aana neihna tawh a cing hiloin tuute' etteh dingin a gamtate na hi un. 4 Tuucingpipa hong pai ciangin a mual ngeilo minthan'na lukhu a hong pia ding hi.

Mi khatpeuh in khuavak gamtatna ka gamta hi, ci napi-in a Christian mipihte a muhdah leh khuamial gamtatna mah a gamta lai a hihi. 10 A Khristian mipihte a it mite pen khuavak gamtatna a gamta hi a, tua bang mite a puktheihna ding thu omlo hi. 11 Ahi zongin a Christian mipihte a mudah mite pen khuamial sungah omin khuamial gamtatna a gamta uhhi a, tua khuamial in bangmah ngaihsunsak theilo ahih manin a gamtatna ding mel uh theilo uhhi.

A Christian mipih a mudah mi peuhmah mi that hi a, mi thatte in nuntak tawntungna a neihlohna thu na thei uhhi. 16 Itna i cih bangci theihding ihi hiam cihleh: Christ in eite-a' dingin a nuntakna hong pia hi. Ei zong i Christian mipihte-a' dingin i nuntakna i piak ngam ding a hihi.

Mi khatpeuh in, "Pasian ka it hi," ci napi-in a Christian mipihte a muhdah leh a zuaupi a gen a hihi. Banghang hiam cihleh a muhtheih a Christian mipih a itlo mi in a muhtheihloh Pasian it theilo ding hi. 21 Christ in eite tungah hong thupiakna in: Pasian a it mi in a Christian mipihte zong it ding hi, cihna a hihi.
Hih mite in pawl kikhenna piangsakin, amau pumpi deihna bangin gamta uh a, Khasiangtho zong neilo uhhi.
Tua ahih manin zakna ding bil a neite in Khasiangtho in pawlpite kiangah a gen thute na za un. A gualzo mite, nihvei sihna in gimsakkha nawnlo ding hi.

Ahi zongin note ka hong mawhsakna ding thu khat om hi. Kamsang numei ka hi, ci-in thu a gen Jezebel na nial kei uhhi. Ama thuhilhna hangin ka nasemte in numei-pasal paktatna gamta-in milim biakna ante a ne uhhi. 21 Tua numei a kisikkikna ding hun ka piak hangin a paktatna panin kihei nuamlo hi. 22 Tua ahih manin tu-in tua numei tawh a paktatna uh panin a kisikkik kei uh leh tua numei leh amah tawh a paktat mi khempeuh, lupna ngaksakin nakpi takin gimna ka thuaksak ding hi. 23 Tua numei' thu a zui mi khempeuh ka that ding hi. Tua hi leh, mihingte' ngaihsutna leh lungsim a kantelpa ka hihna thu pawlpi khempeuh in thei ding uhhi. Note' gamtatna ciat tawh kizui-in ka hong thukkik ding hi.
"Keimah Zeisu in pawlpite-a' dingin hih thute nang kiangah a hong gen dingin ka vantung mi ka hong sawl hi. Kei pen David' zung leh a suan ahi, zingsol ka hi hi," a hong ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute in a biak uh keeldawite-a' dingin amau' biakpiaknate go nawnlo ding uhhi. Hih pen amau' khang tawntungin amaute' tungah ngeina kip khat hi ding hi.
Nangmah in Molek tungah meihal biakna-a piak dingin na tate khat peuhpeuh na pia kei ding a, tua bangin na Pasian' min na daisak kei ding hi; keimah pen { Topa } ka hihi.

Shittim-ah Israel mite a om laitakin Moab gam numeite tawh paktat ding kipan uhhi. 2 Hih numeite in amau' pasian biakpiakna pawi-ah Israel mite sam uh a, amaute in a pawi an nekpihin, amau' pasian-te' mai-ah kun uhhi. 3 Tua ahih ciangin Peor-a Baal tawh Israel mite va kizomtawm hi. Israel mite tungah { Topa } heh mahmah a,
Note in tua lai munah mite' khut in a bawl, khua mu theilo, khua za theilo, a ne theilo, a nam theilo sing leh suang pasian-te' na na sem ding uhhi.

na mai uhah amaute a kisuksiat khit ciangin amaute zui-in na awk khaklohna ding uh leh, ‘Kei zong amau' hih bangin ka hih theihna dingin hih minamte in a pasian-te uh bangci biak ahi uhhiam?’ ci-in a pasian-te uh thu na kanlohna dingun kingaihsun un.
Amaute in pasian a hilo dawite, amau' theih ngeiloh pasian-te, hong suak nunung pasian thakte, na pu na pate un a theih ngeiloh pasian-te' tungah biakna a pia uhhi.
Pai unla note' teel pasian-te tungah ko un. Na lungkham hunun amaute kihonkhia sak un," a ci hi.
Meetna hong pia theilo, hong hon theilo, a mawkna milimte biakna lamah pial kei un; banghang hiam cihleh tuate pen a mawkna a hihi.

Tua laitakin { Topa' } sawlna tawh Judah panin Pasian' mi khat Bethel-ah hong pai hi. Paknamtui hal dingin biakna tau gei-ah Jeroboam na ding hi. 2 Tua ciangin { Topa' } sawlna bangin biakna tau langpangin mipa kiko a, "Biakna tau, biakna tau aw, { Topa } in hih bangin ci hi: ‘En in, Josiah min nei tapa khat David' suan sung pan hong piang ding hi. Amah in nangma tungah paknamtui a hal mualtunga biakna a pia siampite nangma tungah biakna-in pia ding a, nangma tungah mihingte' guhte kihal ding hi,’ ci hi," a ci hi. 3 Tua ciangin tua ni mahin amah in lim khat pia a, "Hih pen { Topa } in thu a gen khitna lim ahi hi: ‘En in, biakna tau kitam khamin a tunga om vutte kithehthang ding hi,’ ci hi," a ci hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh amaute in amau-a' dingin mualtunga biaknate, biakna songte leh mual sang tung khempeuh leh singniim nuai khempeuhah Asherah milimte bawl uh a, 24 biakna phualte-ah numei-pasal paktat pawlte zong om uhhi. { Topa } in Israel mite' mai-ah a hawlkhiat minam dangte' gamtatna a kihhuai khempeuh bangin amaute gamta uhhi.

Tua ciangin note in na pasian tung uhah thu ngen unla, keimah in zong { Topa' } tungah thu ka ngen ding hi. Tua ciangin thungetna mei tawh hong pia pasian pen Pasian taktak ahi hi," a ci hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in dawngin, "Hih na thugen hoih hi," a ci uhhi. 25 Tua ciangin Elijah in Baal kamsangte kiangah, "Note tam na hih manun note-a' dingin bawngtal khat teel unla bawl masa un. Tua ciangin na pasian uh tungah thu ngen unla, ahih hangin a tungah mei koih kei un," a ci hi. 26 Tua ciangin amaute in amaute tungah a kipia bawngtal la-in bawl uh a, zingsang-a kipan sun dong Baal tungah thu ngenin, "Baal aw, kote hong dawng in," a ci uhhi. Ahih hangin awging omlo a, kuamah in dawnglo hi. Tua ciangin amau' bawlsa biakna tau-ah amaute diang uhhi. 27 Sun ciangin Elijah in amaute zahpihin, "Amah pen pasian ahih ciangin a gingin kiko un. Amah in thu a lungngaih laitak, ahih kei leh mun dangah paikhia, ahih kei leh khualzin, ahih kei leh amah ihmu-in phot ding kisam hikhathei ding hi," a ci hi. 28 Tua ciangin amaute a gingin kiko-in, amau' ngeina bangin namsaute leh sikzumte tawh, amaute tungah si a luan' dongin ki-atin kisun uhhi. 29 Sunkim khit ciangin biakpiak hun dong mateng amaute awngsuak uh a, ahih hangin awging omlo hi. Kuamah in dawnglo a, kuamah in donlo hi.
Amaute in biakna-in a tanute uh leh a tapate uh halin vankahna leh aisanna zang uh a, { Topa' } muhna-ah a sia a gamta dingin kipia tawmin amah hehsak uhhi.
Ka pu ka pate in a suksiat minam Gozan, Haran, Rezef, leh Telassar gam sunga Eden mite, tua minamte' pasian-te in amaute honkhiazo ahi hiam?

Tua ciangin amah in { Topa' } biakinn tual nihte sungah vantung nate khempeuh-a' dingin biakna taute lam hi. 6 Tua ciangin amah in Hinnom' tapa' kuamah biakna-in a tapate hal a, aisanna leh mailam thugenkholhna leh khongkhaina zang a, vankah theite leh aisante tawh na semkhawm hi. Amah in { Topa' } muhna-ah siatna tampi bawl a, amah hehsak hi.
A man biakpiaknate lui unla, { Topa } muang un.

Amaute in a tapate uh leh a tanute uh dawi biakna-in a nei uhhi. 38 Amaute in Kanaan gam milimte a biakna-un mawhna neilo a tanute uh leh a tapate uh that uh a, hih mi thahna hangin gamsung a nin a suak hi. 39 Tua ahih ciangin amau' sepna tawh amaute a nin suak uh a, amau' gamtatnate tawh palhngulhna a bawl uhhi.
Tuate a bawlte leh tuate a muangte khempeuh pen tuate mah tawh kibang uhhi.

Minam dangte' pasian-te pen mihingte' khut tawh a kibawl, ngun leh kham a hihi. 16 Amaute in kam nei napi, pau theilo uhhi. Amaute in mit nei napi, khua mu theilo uhhi.17 Amaute in bil nei napi, khua za theilo uhhi. Amaute' kamsungah naksuk naktoh theihna neilo uhhi.
Ka pu ka pate un a suksiat minamte, Gozan minam, Haran minam, Rezef minamte, leh Telassar khua-a om Eden mite pen amau' pasian-te in honkhiazo ahi hiam?

{ Topa } in hih bangin ci hi: "Na pute na pate uh kei kiang panin gamlapi-ah paikhia-in, bangmahin a kimanglo milim peuh bia-in, amau mahmah zong bangmahin a kimanglo a suah khitna dingun kei tungah bang mawhna hong mu uh ahi hiam?

Amaute in a it uh, a na a sepsak uh, a delh uh, a zon' uh leh a biak uh ahi ni leh kha leh vana om nate khempeuh mai-ah a kiphokhia ding hi. Tua guhte kikhawm nawnlo ding a, kiphum nawnlo ding hi. Leilaka ek kinusia bang ahi lel ding hi.

Tua ciangin Judah mite leh Jerusalem khuamite in meihal biakna tawh a biak uh a pasian-te uh' kiangah pai-in a va thum ding uhhi. Ahih hangin hih gimna hong tun' ciangin a honkhia thei tuan kei ding uhhi.
Mi in ama pasian ding bawltawm thei ahi hiam? Tuate pasian hilo hi," hong ci ding uhhi.

Jerusalem khua-a innte leh Judah kumpite' innte-a kipan, innkhum zangah vantunga aksite khempeuh tungah paknamtui hal biakna a kipiakna innte leh pasian dangte tungah dawn ding biakna a kibuakna innte khempeuh a vekin Tofeth mun bangin a nin a suak ding hi, ci hi, va ci in," hong ci hi.

Tua ciangin biakinn tual sungnungah hong paipih hi. Tua lai-ah biakinn kongkhak gei, biakna taute leh innlim kikal sanah mihing sawmnih leh nga khawng na om a, biakna tau nungngatin nisuahna lam nga-in nisuak tung na bia uhhi.

Na puan pawlkhatte, na biakna mun zepna dingin na zang a, numei paktat bangin mi citeng tungah na pumpi na pia hi. 17 Nang kong piaksa kham leh ngun kibawl kizepnate, pasal limin na bawl a, tuate tawh paktatna na gamta hi.

Tua ciangin nakpi takin taangkona khat kibawl a, "Minam tuamtuamte leh paunam tuamtuamte khempeuh aw! 5 Peengkul ging na za ding uh a, tua khit ciangin tamngaite, laia lasakna gingte, harp lasakna gingte, gawsemte, leh tumtheih a tuamtuamte a hong kitum ciangin Kumpi Nebukhadnezzar' koih kham milim mai-ah kunin na bia ding uhhi. 6 A kunlo, a bialo peuhmah thakhat thu-in mei phualpi sungah kikhul pah ding hi," a ci hi. 7 Tua mah bangin minam kimte, minam tuamtuamte leh paunam tuamtuamte khempeuh in tumtheih gingte a zak phetun kunsukin Kumpi Nebukhadnezzar' kham milim koih a bia uhhi.

Amaute in mualsangte dawna biakna munte-ah biakna pia uh a, a nuai liim hoih ahih manin mual neute tungah a po tawsaw kung, poplar kung, leh terebinth kungte nuai-ah paknamtui halin a bia uhhi. Tua thu hangin na tanute uh numei paktat suak uh a, na mote un midang tawh mawhna a bawl uhhi. 14 Na tanute uh a paktat manin gim ka pia kei ding a, na mote uh midang tawh a mawh manin zong gim ka pia tuan kei ding hi; banghang hiam cihleh note mahmah numei paktatte tawh na mawh uh a, biakinn numeite tawh nulepa mawhna biakna na bawl uhhi. Paunak-ah, "Thuhoih phawktheihna a neilo mite in siatna thuak ding hi," kici hi.
Kiman'na a neilo milim a biate in nangmah hong taisan uhhi.

"Biakna tawh kizomin na hoih khat peuhpeuh na sep uh ciangin mite' phat ding deihna tawh a kilang theithei dingin na sepkhak lohna dingun na kingaihsun un. Tua bangin gamta le uh cin, vantungah a om na Pa uh kiang panin thaman na ngah kei ding uhhi.

Mite in a lungsim khempeuh, a pilna khempeuh, leh a hatna khempeuh uh tawh Pasian itin, amau pumpi a it bangin a vengte a it ding uh a hihi. Pasian biakna dingin biakna tau tunga gan gawhnate leh biakna dang khempeuh sangin hih thukham nihte zuih ding thupizaw takpi hi," a ci hi.

Kumpipa in a thugen hun ding a ciamkholh ni a tun' ciangin a kumpi puan silhin a kumpi tokhom tungah tu a, mite tungah thu a gen hi. 22 Mite in a thugen a zak uh ciangin, "Hih thugen pen mihing hi loin pasian ahi hi," ci-in a awng uhhi. 23 Herod in mite, Pasian phatsak loin amah phatsak ahih manin thakhatin Topa' vantung mi in Herod cinasak a, a hut in amah netumin a si hi.
Eite pen Pasian' tate ihih manin, mihing khutsiamte in bawlin a zep ngunte, khamte, suang milimte tawh a kibang dingin Pasian i ngaihsun kei ding hi.

Nomau mahmah in hih Paul' thugen khempeuh za-in na thei uhhi. Amah in mihingte' bawl pasiante pen pasian hi hetlo hi, ci-in thu hilh a, hih Ephesa khua leh Asia gamsung khempeuhah mi tampi tak a umsak hi.

A hing tawntung Pasian bialoin, mi, vasa, ganhing, ahih kei leh a bokvak ganhingte tawh a kibang limte a bia zawsop uhhi. 24 Mihingte tua zahta-in hailua uh ahih manin amau ututin a gamtat theihna dingun Pasian in khahkhong vet a, a zumhuai mahmahpi-in a gamta uhhi. 25 Amaute in a man ahi Pasian' thu um nuamlo uh a, a tawntungin phat dingin a kilawm a Piangsakpa bialoin, Pasian' bawlsa nate bia-in a zui uhhi. Tu-a bangin hi takpi uhhi.
Ka cihnopna pen, lawkite in gan a gawh uh ciangin dawi a biakna uhhi a, Pasian a biakna uhhilo hi. Dawi biakna-ah note na kihel ding uh ka hong deih kei hi.

Tua bang mite pen hih leitung pasian gilote in a lungsim mit uh tawsak ahih manin umlo uh a, Pasian tawh a kibang teekteek Christ minthan'na hangin amaute tungah a hong taang lungdamna thu khuavak mu theilo uhhi.

Pasian' biakinn leh lawkite' milim bangci kilem theihding ahi hiam? Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in, "Ka mite lakah tengin amaute tawh ka omkhawm ding hi. Kei pen amaute' Pasian ka hi ding a, amaute, keima mi ahi ding uhhi.
Tua mah bangin eite zong kha thu-ah i neulai hun sungteng huihlak a uk vangneite' khutnuai-ah a om ihi hi.
A beisa hunah Pasian theilo na hih manun Pasian a hilo vangliatna a neite' sila-in na om uhhi.
Christ thu tawh a kituak lopi-in, tangthu tuanthu ahi a, huihlak a ukte' thu siksanin ahi zongin, bangmahin a kimanglo leitung pilna tawh mite' khemsa-in sila na suahkhak lohna dingun kingaihsun un.

Tua a gilopa in mite' biak pasian a kici khempeuh leh na khempeuh nialgawp ding hi. Tuate khempeuh sangin a lianzaw-in a kingaihsut banah, Pasian ka hi hi, ci-in Pasian' biakinn sung mahmahah pai-in va tu ding hi.

Phuahtawm tangthute leh min tampipi kizom deudau-a khangsimnate in upna tawh i ngahtheih Pasian' vaihawmnate tangtungsak loin, khatlekhat kitotna piangsak lel ahih manin, tua bang thute a manlahpih lohna dingun na gen in.

biakna pen a thuthuk a thulian taktak ahihna thu hih bangin i thei hi: Mihing lim pua-in amah hong kilang a, a man taktak ahihna thu Khasiangtho in kilangsak a, vantung mite in a mu uhhi. Mi khempeuh tungah ama thu kihilh a, mun khempeuhah ama thu ki-umin, vantungah amah kilato hi.
thuman thutak zuiloin, a lungsim paizia uh a man nawnlo, biakna pen hauhtheihna ding lampi bekin a ngaihsun mite in a tawntungin kitot kiselna a piangsak uh a hihi.

biakna thu a puathamteng zui napi-in biakna hangin vangliatna thu a omte deihlo ding uhhi. Tua bangin a gamta mite na pelh in. 6 Tua bang mite pawlkhat, mite inn-ah va hawh khiankhianin, deihna nam tuamtuam leh mawhna lungsim tawh a kidim numeite na thuzawh uhhi.

Mi khatpeuh in Christian ka hi hi, ci napi-in kampau a kidopzawh kei leh amahmah a kikhemtawm hi lel a, ama biakna neih a mawkna a hihi. 27 Pa Pasian in a siangtho biakna citakin a ngaihsut thu in: Tagahte leh meigong numeite a haksatna uhah hoihtakin kemin, leitung siatnate tawh kisawhkha loin siangtho takin omna a hihi.

Lai a hong gelhna sungah a thugente tu-ate mah a gennuam a hihi. A laigelhna sungah a telhak thu tampi om a, theihna kicing loin lungsim kiplo mi pawlkhatte in Laisiangtho sung thu a ututun a kawihei uh bangin Paul' thugente zong a manlopi-in khia uh ahih manin siatna a tuaklawh uhhi.

Hih gimna tawh a silo midangte pen amau' gamtatnasa panin kikheelkik nuamlo uhhi. Dawi a biaknate uh, khua a mu theilo, khua a za theilo, lam a pai theilo ngun, kham, sumngo, suang, leh sing a kibawl milim a biakte uh khawl tuanlo uhhi. 21 A mi thahna, a aisanna, a paktatna, leh a guktaknate uh zong khawl tuanlo uhhi.
Gulpi in tua ganhing tungah ama aana pia ahih manin mite in tua gulpi a bia uhhi. A ganhing zong bia uh a, "Hih ganhing tawh a kibang kua om a, kua in amah suzo ding ahi hiam?" ci uhhi.
Tua ahih manin a kigo Tuuno laibu sungah a nungta ding mite' min, leitung pian'ma pekin a kikhumna-ah a kihello leitung mi khempeuh in tua ganhing bia ding uhhi.
Abel in a tuuhon tacilte leh a sa limcite paipih hi. { Topa } in Abel leh ama piakna thusim a, 5 ahih hangin Kain leh ama piakna thusim lo hi. Tua ahih ciangin Kain heh mahmah a, a mai sia hi.
Amah in, "Na it, na tapa neihsun Isaac, la in la Moriah gamah pai in. Tua lai muna nang kiangah kong gen ding mual khat tungah meihal biakpiakna-in amah hong pia in," a ci hi.

Puanbukah Moses a tum ciangin meii khuam hong kum sukin puanbuk kongkhakah ding a, { Topa } in Moses hopih hi. 10 Puanbuk kongkhakah meii khuam a ding a muh uh ciangin a milipin a puanbuk kong ciat uhah mi khempeuh dingto-in kun uhhi.

Tu-in Aaron' tapate Nadab leh Abihu in amau' paknamtui beel tuak la-in, a sungah mei koih uh a, a tungah paknamtui koihin, { Topa } in amau' tungah tua banga thu a piak ngeiloh a sianglo mei, { Topa' } mai-ah a pia uhhi.

Ahih hangin siangtho munah Aaron hong pai ding zia in: Khialhna hanga biakna dingin bawngtalno khat leh meihal biakna dingin tuutal khat hong paipih ding hi. 4 "Amah in a siangtho saihadial puantungsilh silhin, saihadial pheituam teengin, saihadial kawnggak tawh kigakin, saihadial dialpi khim ding hi. Hihte pen a siangtho puan a hihi. Amah in tui sungah a pumpi sil ding a, tua ciangin tua puante silh ding hi.
{ Topa } note' Pasian, na lungsim khempeuh uh, na nuntakna khempeuh uh, leh na thahatna khempeuh uh tawh na it ding uhhi.

{ Topa } na Pasian un na minam khempeuh uh sung panin ama min koihna dingin teelin, ama omna dinga a bawlna mun na zong ding uhhi. 6 Tua lai-ah na pai ding uh a, na meihal biaknate uh leh na biakpiaknate uh, note in na piak uh sawmah khat leh na piak thuahte uh, thuciamna biakpiakna, utthu-a na piakna, na bawnghon tacilte uh leh na tuuhon tacilte uh tua lai-ah na paipih ding uhhi. 7 { Topa } na Pasian uh mai tua lai munah na ne ding uh a, { Topa } na Pasian un note thupha hong piakna hangin na hihna khempeuh uhah note leh na innkuanpihte na lungdam ding uhhi.

Tua ciangin Samuel in, "{ Topa } in meihal biaknate leh biakpiaknate { Topa' } thu man' ding zahin deih ahi hiam? En in, biakpiakna sangin thu man' ding hoihzaw a, tuutal thaute sangin thu ngaih ding hoihzaw hi.

Tua ciangin David leilak panin tho-in kisil a, sathau nilhin a puante khek a, { Topa' } inn-ah pai-in Pasian a bia hi. Tua ciangin ama inn-ah ciah hi. An a nget ciangin amaute in a mai-ah lui uh a, amah in a ne hi.

Tua ciangin Elijah in mi khempeuh kiangah, "Ka kiang nai-ah hong pai un," a ci hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh ama kiang nai-ah hong pai uhhi. Tua ciangin amah in { Topa' } biakna tau a kisupaisa khat puahkik hi. 31 "Israel, nangma min hi ding hi," ci-in { Topa' } thu a tun'na Jacob' tapa minam sawmlenihte tawh kizui-in Elijah in suangtum sawmlenih la hi. 32 Tua ciangin tua suangte tawh { Topa' } minin biakna tau khat lam hi. Amah in khaici lawh nih a tazo dingin a lian hawklam khat biakna tau kimkotah bawl hi. 33 Tua ciangin amah in a ngeina bangin a sing koih a, a bawngtal semnenin a sing tungah koih hi. Tua ciangin amah in, "Beel li sungah tui dim unla, meihal biakna tau tung leh a sing tungah sung un," a ci hi. 34 Tua ciangin amah in, "A nihveina hih un," a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute in a nihveina hih uhhi. Tua ciangin amah in, "A thumveina hih un," a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute in a thumveina hih leuleu uhhi. 35 Tua ciangin biakna tau kimkotah tui luang a, a hawklam zong tui tawh kidim hi. 36 Biakpiak hun ciangin kamsang Elijah a nai-ah hong pai-in, "Abraham, Isaac, leh Israel Pasian, { Topa } aw, nang pen Israel sungah Pasian na hihna, leh kei pen nangma nasem ka hihna, leh hih nate khempeuh nangma thu tawh ka hihna thu tuni-in kitheisak in. 37 { Topa } aw, nangmah Pasian na hihna leh amaute' lungsim na heikikna thu hih mite in a theihna dingin hong dawng in, { Topa } aw, hong dawng in," a ci hi. 38 Tua ciangin { Topa' } meikuang hong kia a, a meihal biakna, a sing, a suangte, leh a leivui kangtumin, hawklam sunga om tui nangawn kangcip hi. 39 Mi khempeuh in tua thu a muh uh ciangin a mai uh leilam ngatin puk uhhi. Amaute in, "{ Topa } pen Pasian ahi hi; { Topa } pen Pasian ahi hi," a ci uhhi.

Leitung mi khempeuh aw, { Topa } la sak un! A ni ni-in ama hotkhiatna thu gengen un. 24 Minam dangte lakah ama minthan'na genkhia unla, a lamdang ama septe mi khempeuh lakah gen un! 25 Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } lian mahmah a, nakpi takin phat ding ahi hi; pasian khempeuh sangin lamdang sakzawk ding a hihi. 26 Banghang hiam cihleh minam dangte' pasian-te milim hi lel a, ahih hangin { Topa } ahih leh vantungte a bawlpa a hihi. 27 Pahtawina leh minliatna in amah umcih a, thahatna leh lungdamna in amah kimkot hi. 28 Leitung mi khempeuh aw, { Topa } theitel unla, { Topa' } minthan'na leh a thahatna theitel un! 29 Amah in a ngah ding a kilawm minthan'na { Topa' } tungah pia un. Biakna puak unla, ama mai-ah pai un! Biakna puan silhin { Topa } bia un. 30 Leitung mi khempeuh aw, ama mai-ah ling un; hi hi, leitung kip mahmah a, kilok ngeilo ding hi. 31 Vantung kipak hen la, leitung lungdam ta hen; minam khempeuhte lakah, "{ Topa } maang hi!" amaute in ci ta uh hen.

Tua ahih ciangin David in nisima a kisam bangin Thuciamna Singkuang mai-ah na a sem tawntung dingin Asaf leh a Levi mipihte { Topa' } Thuciamna Singkuang mai-ah nusia a, 38 Obededom leh a behte sawmguklegiatte zong a nusia hi. Jeduthun' tapa Obededom leh Hosah-te pen kongpi cing dingte ahi uhhi. 39 Tua ciangin amah in { Topa' } thukham sungah a kigelh ama thupiak khempeuh bangin, zingsang leh nitakin meihal biakna tau tungah { Topa}-a' dingin meihal biaknate a pia tawntung dingin, Gibeon-a om mual dawna { Topa' } biakbuk mai-ah siampi Zadok leh a sanggam siampite a nusia hi. 40, 41 Tuate' banah amaute tawh Heman leh Jeduthun zong om a, ama itna kip kho tawntung ahih manin { Topa' } tungah lungdamna a ko dingin a kiteel, a minin a kilokhia midang omlai hi. 42 Heman leh Jeduthun in la aw dingin peengkulte leh daltuahte nei uh a, biakna lasakna dingin lasakna nate nei uhhi. Jeduthun' tapate kulhkongpi cing dingin kiseh hi.

Nang bek { Topa } na hi hi. Nangmah in a sang pen vantung leh vana om khempeuh, leitung leh a tunga om khempeuh, leh tuipi leh a sunga om khempeuh na bawl hi. Nangmah in tuate khempeuh na omsak a, vantung mihonpi in nang hong bia uhhi.
A man biakpiaknate lui unla, { Topa } muang un.

{ Topa' } mual tungah kuate kahto ding ahi hiam? Ama mun siangtho-ah kuate ding ding ahi hiam? 4 Gamtat siangtho leh lungsim siangtho a nei, a manlo thu-ah a nuntakna pialoin, khemna tawh a kiciamlo mite a hihi.
Ama minthan'na { Topa' } tungah pia unla, a siangtho kizepna tawh { Topa } bia un.

Gan gawh biakna leh khawhsa tawh biakna na deih kei a, khua ka zak theihna ding bil na hong guan' hi. Meihal biakna leh mawhmaina ding biakna zong na kulsak kei hi. 7 Tua ciangin keimah in, "En in, laibu sungah keima thu a kigelh khinsa bangin ka hong pai hi. 8 Nangma deih bang hihna-ah nuam ka sa hi, ka Pasian aw. Nangma thukham ka lung sungah om hi," ka ci hi.
Pasian' san' theih biakna pen lungsim kitamzan a hihi. Pasian aw, a kitamzan, a kisik lungsim na simmawh kei ding hi.
Leitung mi khempeuh in nangmah hong bia uhhi. Amaute in nangmah phatna la hong sak uh a, nangma minphatna la hong sak uhhi," ci-in gen un.
Hong pai un, amah bia-in kun ni. Eite hong Bawl { Topa' } mai-ah khukdin' ni.

Ama min in a ngah dingin a kilawm minthan'na { Topa' } tungah pia unla, biakpiakna hong kengin ama huangsungah hong pai un. 9 Puan siangtho silhin { Topa } bia un. Leitung mi khempeuh aw, ama mai-ah ling un.
I { Topa } Pasian phat unla, ama khengakna munah bia un. Amah siangtho hi.

{ Topa } in hih bangin ci hi: "Note' biakpiakna a tampite pen kei' tungah bang hi leltak ahi hiam? Tuutalte leh ganhing thaute' sathau tawh meihal biaknate ka kham ta hi. Bawngtalte, tuunote, leh keelte' si tawh kei ka lungkim kei hi. 12 Kei' mai-ah a kilaak dingin na hong pai uh ciangin hih bangin ka huangsung na tuatcil gawpna uh kua'n hong deih ding ahi hiam? 13 Bangmahin a kimanglo piaknate hong paipih nawn kei un. Paknamtui halna ka kih hi. Khadet ni, Sabbath ni, leh thupi takin na kikhopnate uh mawhna tawh kidim ahih manin ke'n ka thuakzo kei hi. 14 Note' Khadet nite leh na pawite uh ka mudah hi. Tuate pen kei-a' dingin vangikpi khat suakkhin a, tuate khempeuh ka puakna-in ka gim hi. 15 "Thungenin na khutte uh nong zaak uh ciangin note kong en kei ding a, thu tampi na nget uh hangin ke'n ka ngai tuan kei ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh sisan tawh note' khut kidim hi. 16 Note kisil tawm unla, a siangtho-in kibawl un. Keima muhna-ah na gamtat siatnate uh paikhia-in, siatna na bawlte uh khawl un. 17 Gamtat hoih ding kisin un. Thumanin gamta unla, kinetniamna kheel un. Pa neilote hu unla, meigong numei pan'pih un," ci hi.

Kei' deih antan'na hih bang pawl ahi hi: Gitlohna khaute phelin, hakkol savun khaute phel a, a kinengniam mite khahkhia-in thumanlohna hakkol khempeuh suktan ding a hihi. 7 Na an uh a gilkialte tawh nekhawm un la, inn neilo a zawngte na innsung uhah paipihin, tangguakin a om mite puan silhsakin, na mipihte uh kiang panin bu lo ding hilo na hi uhhiam? 8 Tua ciangin ka maipha pen phalvaktung hong bang ding a, note' tungah hong taangkhia ding hi. Manlang takin na liammate uh hong dam ding hi. Note hong ompih tawntungin note kong hon ding a, na nung na mai uhah ka hong dal ding hi. 9 Tua ciangin nong thungetna uh ka hong pia ding a, nong sap uh ciangin ka hong dawng ding hi. Mi bawlsiatnate khawlin, mi simmawhna leh kam gilo na paunate uh na khawl uh a, 10 gilkial mite an pia-in, kisapna a nei mite tungah a kisapnate na piak uh leh na kimkot uha khuamial pen khuavak hong suak ding a, na lungzin'na uh nitaang hong bang ding hi. 11 Tua ciangin note lam kong lak tawntung ding a, na hoihte tawh kong lungkimsak ding hi. A cidam a thahatin kong omsak ding hi. Tui tampi a ngah tawntung huan, a kang ngeilo ciktui tawh na kibang ding uhhi. 12 Tanglai-in a kisia na munte uh na lamkik ding uh a, khang tampi sung a kisia bulpite na dingtosak kik ding uhhi. Note pen a sia a puahkik, ten'na dingin mun siate a ngei a bangsak kikte hong kici ding hi. 13 Note in Sabbath siangtho sakin, keima ni siangtho ni-in na nasepna panun khawlin Sabbath ni pen deihhuai sa-in, { Topa}' ni siangtho pen pahtawihuai na cih uh a, note in pahtawi-in note' deihbang zuiloin, note' ut bang hiloin motpau loin na om uh leh, 14 keimah biakna hangin lungdamna na ngah ding uh a, leitung khempeuhah pahtawina kong ngahsak ding hi. Na pu uh Jacob tungah ka piak leitang luahin nuam na sa ding uhhi. { Topa } ahi keimah in hih thu ka gen khin hi, a ci hi.

Shadrak, Meshak, leh Abednego-te in Kumpi Nebukhadnezzar kiangah, "Kumpipa aw, hih thu kong dawng kei ding uhhi. 17 Mei phualpi sung panin a hong honkhia thei pasian a om leh ka biak ka Pasian uhhi ding a, na khutsung panin a hong honkhia ding hi. 18 Kumpipa aw, a hong hotkhiat kei zenzen leh zong, na pasian lah ka bia tuan kei ding uh a, na kham milim mai-ah zong ka kun kei ding uhhi, ci-in theita in," a ci uhhi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa in, "Shadrak, Meshak, leh Abednego-te' Pasian phat un. Amah in a vantung mite sawl a, amah a muang ama nasem hih mite a honkhia hi. Amaute in ka thupiakna mangloin, amau' Pasian longal pasian dang' mai-ah kun nuamlo, bia nuamlo uh ahih manin mei phualpi sungah khul ding a utzaw uh ahi hi," a ci hi.

Vantung Pasian, { Topa } biakna dingin bang va keng ding ka hi hiam? Amah biakna-in hal dingin bawngno thaute va paipih ding ka hi hiam? 7 { Topa } kiangah tuu a tul tulin va puakin, guntui bangin sathau va luangsak leng, tuate tawh amah lungdam ding ahi hiam? Ka mawhnate maisakna dingin ka ta upa pen tawh va bia ding ka hi hiam? 8 Mun khempeuhah a om no mihingte aw, { Topa } in a hoih nate hong gen khinzo hi. { Topa } in note tung panin hong kalh thu in: Thuman thutang sem ding a, itna kip nei tawntungin, kiniamkhiatna tawh Pasian' thu man' ding a hihi.

Note in, ‘Hihte cimtak khin hang,’ ci-in nong nap nitsan lel uhhi. Keimah biakna dingin a kigu ganhing khatpeuh ahi a, a liam a bai, ahih kei leh a cina peuh nong paipih uhhi. Tua bangte, a sang dingin hong ngaihsun na hi uhhiam?

Inn sungah amaute lut uh a, naungek leh a nu Mary a mu uhhi. Amaute khukdin'in tua naungek a biak khit uh ciangin a vanpuakte uh suahkhia uh a, kham, saledi paknamtui, leh myrrh paknamtuite, letsongin a pia uhhi.
Lungsim takpi tawh Pasian a zong mite in Pasian mu ding ahih manin thupha ngah mi ahi uhhi.

Tua ahih manin Pasian tungah biakna a pia dingin biakna tau mai-ah na om laitakin na sanggamte khat peuhpeuh na tungah a lungkimlohna thu na phawk leh, 24 Pasian na biakna ding nate, a biakna tau mai-ah nusia photin, pai-in na sanggampa tawh va kilem phot in la, tua khit ciangin hong paikikin Pasian biakna pia in.

Na tungthamun mihoih a kineihkhem mite aw, Isaiah in note' thu a genna man mahmah hi. Tua a genna-ah, 8 ‘Hih mite in a kampi bek uh tawh kei hong zahtak bawl uh a, ahi zongin a lungsim taktak uh kei tawh kigamla hi. 9 Mihingte' bawltawm thukhamte, Pasian' thukham zahin mite tungah hilh uh ahih manin kei hong biak hangun a kiman'na omlo hi,’ ci hi," ci-in a dawng hi.
Zeisu in, "Na Topa Pasian na lungsim khempeuh, na nuntakna khempeuh, leh na pilna khempeuh tawh na it ding hi, cihna a hihi.

Zeisu in amaute dawng a, "A tungthama a hoihin a kilangkhem note' thu, Isaiah in a genkholhna man mahmah hi. Ama genna-ah, ‘Pasian in hih bangin gen hi: Hih mite in a kampi bek uh tawh kei hong zahtakbawl uh a, a lungsim taktak uh kei tawh kigamla hi. 7 Mihingte' bawltawm thukhamte, Pasian' thukham zahin mite tungah hilh uh ahih manin, kei hong biak hangun a kiman'na om lo hi,’ ci hi.
Na Topa Pasian uh, na lungsim khempeuh, na nuntakna khempeuh, na pilna khempeuh, leh na thahatna khempeuh uh tawh na it un, a cihna a hihi.

Amah in, "Na Topa Pasian na lungsim khempeuh, na nuntakna khempeuh, na hatna khempeuh, leh na pilna khempeuh tawh na it in la, nangmah na ki-it bangin na vengte na it in," ci-in kigelh hi, ci-in a dawng hi.

Zeisu in, "Lawm aw, hih ka thugen ding hong um in: Mite in hih mualtung hita leh Jerusalem hita lehah Pa Pasian a biak nawnloh hun hong tung ding hi. 22 No Samaria mite in na theih taktak lohpi uh na bia uh a, ahi zongin ko Jew mite tung tawnin hotkhiatna thu hong pai ahih manin kote in ka theih uh a bia ka hi uhhi. 23 Ahi zongin Pasian a bia taktakte in Pasian' Kha' lamlahna leh thuman tak tawh a biak hun hong tung ding a, tu-in zong a hong tung khinta a hihi. Pa Pasian in tu-a bangin amah i biak ding a hong deih a hihi. 24 Pasian pen Kha ahi hi; amah a biate in tua Kha' lamlahna leh thuman taktak tawh a bia ding uhhi," a ci hi.
Amaute in an tangin Pasian bia-in a om laitakun Khasiangtho in amaute kiangah, "Keima na a sem dingin ka sapsa ahih manin kei-a' dingin Barnabas leh Saul hong piakhia un," a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin sanggamte aw, Pasian in eite tam veipi tak hong hehpih ahih manin ama lungkimna ding leh ama nasepna dingin nomau mahmah a hingtangin Pasian tungah na kipiakna dingun ka hong thum hi. Tua banga kipiakna pen Pasian biakna man taktak a hihi.

Tua ahih ciangin sanggamte aw, ka hong gennop thu a tomin: Pasian bia dingin note na kikhop uh ciangin khat in la sak ding nei, khat in Pasian' thu a gen ding nei, khat in pau lamdang tawh thugen ding nei, khat in tua a kigente a khiatna gentheihna ding nei cih bangin na om ding uhhi. Hih a tuamtuamte khempeuh, pawlpi' phattuamna ding ahih ding kisam hi.
Na khempeuh a kilawm a kituakin na hih un.

Peengkul nunung hong gin' ciangin mitphiat kikal sungin i kikheelpak ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh peengkul hong gin' ciangin misite a sithei nawnlo dingin hong tho ding a, i vekpi-in i kikheel ding hi.

Tua ahih manin tuhuna ka nuntakna zia pen kei hang hi nawnloin ka sungah a hong om Christ hang a hihi. Tua hi a, keimah hong itin, keima-a' dingin a nuntakna a hong pia Pasian' Tapa ka muan'na tawh tu laitakin a nungta ka hihi.

Thu haksa na tuah uh ciangin khatlekhat na kihuh un. Tua hi leh Christ' thukham a zui na hi uhhi. 3 Mi khatpeuh, bangmah hilo napi-in amah a kithupi ngaihsut mawkmawk leh amah leh amah a kikhem a hihi.
Khuamial gamtatna, bangmahin a kimanglo nasepnate su vet kei unla, tua bang gamtatnate a hoihlohna pholak zaw un.

Hih thu hangin Pasian in a lianpenin amah koih a, min lian dang khempeuh sangin a min lianzaw-in a koih hi. 10 Tua ahih manin vantung, leitung, leinuai-a om mi khempeuh in Zeisu pahtawi-in khukdin' ding uh a, 11 Zeisu Christ, Topa ahi hi, ci-in taangko-in Pa Pasian a min thangsak ding uhhi.

Banghang hiam cihleh eite in Khasiangtho' hong huhna tawh Pasian bia-in, Zeisu Christ tawh i kipawl manin lungdamin, a tung lama kilang vun-atna limte muan'in neilo ihih manin, amaute hiloin, eite pen vun-atna man taktak a zang mite ihi zaw hi.

Note' hong piak nate kicing piikpeek hi. Epafroditas in note' hong na khakte hong tun'pih ahih manin ka kitangsapna khempeuh kicingkim hi. Hih nate pen Pasian biakna-in na piak uh, lungdam takin a hong san', a namtui nate a hihi.

Hih bang gamtatnate pen a tungthamin i et ciangin limtakin biaknopna lungsim a piangsak ding, kiniamkhiatna a piangsak ding, pumpi ki-ukzawhna a piangsak ding tawh kibang hi. Ahi zongin a taktakin hihte khat beek in pumpi ki-ukzawhna piangsak zolo hi.
biakna lungsim neite-a' dingin a kilawm ahih mah bangin gamtat hoih a neihding uh ka deih hi.

Pasian biakna hangin a neihsateng tawh a lungkim mite pen biakna in mihau a suaksak takpi mah a hihi. 7 A taktakin ci lehang, leitungah mihingin i suah laitakin sumlepai tawh i suak kei a, i sih ciangin zong leitung panin bangmah i keng thei tuan kei hi. 8 Tua ahih manin annek tuidawn, nikten' puansilh i neih nak leh a phazo a hihi. 9 Ahi zongin a haunuam mite in ze-etna a tuamtuam thuak a, duhhopna huaihamna a haivai thute-ah awkcipin, haksatna leh siatna a tuahlawh uhhi.

Jew Thukham pen mailam hunah a taktak a hong tungding lim lahkholhna hi bek ahih manin tua Thukham tawh kizui-in a kum a kumin a kipia biakpiakna in Pasian kiang a zuan mite mi cingtaak suahzo ngeilo hi.

Tua ahih manin mawhna thu-ah kisuan'na lungsim om nawnloin, tui siangtho tawh i pumpi a kisawpsa-in muan'na leh lungsim takpi tawh Pasian kiang zuan ni. 23 Pasian in piakdingin a hong ciam thu muangngam ihih manin i lametna thu kiptakin len ni.

A upna hang mah tawh Abel in Kain' piakna sangin a san'theih huaizaw biakpiakna Pasian' tungah a na pia hi. Pasian in ama biakna na sang ahih manin a upna hangin mihoih hi, ci-in Pasian' pahtakna a na ngah hi. Abel a sihzawh a sawtpi hikhin napi-in tudong mahin upna thu a hong gengen lai a suak hi.

Tua ahih manin a kilingsak zolo Pasian' gam i ngah manin lungdamin, zahtakna leh lamdangsakna tawh Pasian' lungkimna bangin amah bia ni. 29 Banghang hiam cihleh eite' Pasian pen a kangtum thei meikuang tawh a kibang a hihi.
Tua ahih manin Zeisu tung tawnin amah i biakna-in i kam tawh ama min pulakin Pasian phat tawntung ni.
Pa Pasian in a siangtho biakna citakin a ngaihsut thu in: Tagahte leh meigong numeite a haksatna uhah hoihtakin kemin, leitung siatnate tawh kisawhkha loin siangtho takin omna a hihi.
Pasian kiang nai un. Amah in zong hong nai ding hi. Mawhneite in na khut uh silsiang unla, a kineihkhemte in na lungsim uh siangsak un.
Christ' thuhilhna zuiloin a khengvalin a pai mite pen Pasian tawh a kipawllo a hihi. Ahi zongin a thuhilhna a zuite pen Pa Pasian leh a Tapa tawh a kipawl ahi uhhi.
Amah nakpi takin kiko a, "Amah in mihingte thu a khen ding hun hong tungta ahih manin Pasian kihta unla amah phat un. Van leh lei, tuinak leh tuipite a bawlpa hong bia ta un," a ci hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Jacob mite a kibumna ding omlo a, Israel mite' langkhatah aisaan ding omlo hi. Tu-in Israel-te tawh kisai-in, ‘Pasian' sepna en un,’ kici ding hi.

Note lakah a tanu ahi a, a tapa ahi zongin biakna-in a zang, ai a saan, khong a khai, mailam thu a gen, ai a tawi, 11 bum a zang, van a kah, sikhate tawh a kiho, sikha thu a dong kuamah na om kei ding uhhi. 12 Banghang hiam cihleh hihte a hih mi peuhmah { Topa}-a' dingin a kihhuai a hihi. Hih bang a kihhuai gamtatnate hangin note' mai panin { Topa } na Pasian un amaute hawlkhia hi.
mi sawmnga a ukpa leh zalian a neipa, thu lamlakpa leh mitphial siampa, leh bum siamte a lakhia hi.

Aisan siamnate leh mibum siamna vang lianpi na neih hangin ta khuaisuahna leh meigon'na, hih thu nihte thakhat thu-in ni khat sungin a kicing takin nangma tungah hong tung veve ding hi. 10 Na gitlohna-ah nang na lungmuang a, "Kuamah in kei hong mu kei hi," na ci hi. Na pilna leh na theihnate in lam hong pialsak a, na lungsim sungah, "Keimah hi'ng, kei simloh midang om kei," na ci hi. 11 Ahih hangin nangmah in na beisak theihloh lungkhamna na tungah hong tung ding a, nangmah in maisakna na ngah theihloh gimna nang tungah hong tung ding hi. A thu na theih hetloh siatna na tungah hong tungvat ding hi. 12 Na neulai-a kipan na sep na mibumna leh na aisannate-ah kiptakin om in. Phattuamna na ngah khading a, mite na lausakzo khading hi.
Tua ahih ciangin bang mang man cih a hilh dingin mitphial siamte, mibum theite, leh khongkhai siamte a samsak hi.
Nineveh khuapi in a paktatna hangin gim thuak hi. Ngaihbaang mel pua-in bum siamna nei a, minamte zolin a khem hi.

Tu-in mihing pianzia hong kitel a, tuate pen: Numei tawh mawhna, thangtatna, lanluat mana khialhna, 20 milim biakna, mi bumna, kilangbawlna, kitotna, hazatna, hehna, huaihamna, kikhenna, pawltuam lungsim neihna, 21 en'na, zukhamna, leh biakna pawi-ah zukhamna-a kipan adangdangte a hihi. A beisa hunah ka hong hilhkholhsa bangin tu-in ka hong genkikin-ah: Hih bangin a gamta mite pen Pasian' Ukna sungah omkha hetlo ding hi.
Tua ciangin Abraham in Pasian' tungah thu ngen a, Pasian in Abimelek a damsak hi. Amaute in ta a neih theihna dingin a zi leh a sila numeite zong a damsak hi.

"Note in { Topa } na Pasian uh thu limtakin na ngaih uh a, ama mai-ah a man nate hihin, ama thupiakte don a, ama ngeina kipte khempeuh na zuih uh leh, Egypt mite' tungah ka tun'sak natnate khat beek note' tungah kong tungsak kei ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh kei pen { Topa}, note hong damsakpa ka hi hi," a ci hi.
"{ Topa } na Pasian un note hong piak leitang tungah na khan' uh a sau theihna dingin na nu leh na pa uh zahtak un.

Tua ahih ciangin tunga om vantung hita leh nuai-a om leitung hita lehah { Topa } pen Pasian ahihna thu tuni-in thei unla, na lungsim uhah ciamteh un; kuamah dang omlo hi. 40 Tua ahih ciangin note leh note' khita na tate uh tungah thu hong nuamin, { Topa } na Pasian un a tawntunga hong piak gam sungah na khan' uh na sausak theihna dingun tuni-a no kiangah kong gen ahi ama thukhamte leh a thupiakte na zui ding uhhi," a ci hi.
"‘{ Topa } note' Pasian in hong piak leitang tungah na khan' uh sau-in na nopsak theihna dingun { Topa } note' Pasian in hong thupiak bangin na nu na pa uh zahtak un.

Midangte khempeuh sangin note thupha hong kilim piakzaw ding hi. Note' lak hita leh na ganhingte uh lak hita lehah a nu ahi a, a pa ahi zongin a ciing omlo ding hi. 15 { Topa } in note' tung panin natna khempeuh lakhia ding hi. Note in na theihsa uh ahi Egypt gama natna siate note' tungah khat zong hong tunglo ding a, ahih hangin no hong mudahte khempeuh tungah tuate tungsak ding hi.

"Vasabu khat, sing tung ahi a, leilakah ahi zongin, a no ahi a, a tui ahi zongin omin, a pi in a no a ompih ahi a, a op ahi zongin na muh khak zenzen uh leh, a pi pen a no tawh na la khawm kei ding uhhi. 7 A pi na khah ding uh a, a no na la thei ding uhhi. Hih bang gamtatna pen na nopsakna ding uh, sauveipi na nuntak theihna ding uh a hihi.
Kum sawmli tawntung gamlakah amaute na vak a, amaute in bangmah tangsapna neilo uhhi. A puante uh zong sialo a, a khe uh zong bawk beeklo hi.
{ Topa } ka Pasian aw, huhna a hong ngenin nang tungah kong awng a, kei na hong damsak khin hi.
Nopna a neih theihna dingin nuntakna leh khan'sau a deih kua ahi hiam?
Thuman mi' thuakna a tam mahmah hangin tuate khempeuh panin { Topa } in amah a hon hi.

{ Topa } in amaute hu-in hingsak ding a, leitungah amaute thupha ngah mi kici ding hi. Amau' galte' khutsungah amaute pialo ding hi.3A ci uh a nat ciangin { Topa } in amaute kem ding a, a cinatna khempeuh uh damsakkik ding hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh amah in thangsiahpa' thangzak leh a lauhuai pulnatna panin nang hong honkhia ding hi. 4 Amah in a khate tawh nang hong tuam ding a, ama khate' nuai-ah bukna ding na mu ding hi. Ama thumanna in nang hong dalin hong hu ding hi.

Amah in ka mawhna khempeuh hong maisak a, ka natna khempeuh hong damsak hi. 4 Hankhuk tung ding kimlai hong suaktasak a, itna leh hehpihna tampi hong pia hi. 5 Muvanlai bangin ka tha a hat theihna dingin thupha namkim hong pia hi.
Tua ciangin amah in ngun leh kham tawh Israel-te paikhiatpih a, amaute a vekpi-in cidamin thahat kim uhhi.

Tua ciangin amaute in a lungkhamna uhah { Topa } ko uh a, amau' cihmawhna panin amah in a honkhia hi. 20 Amah in thu vaikhakin amaute damsak a, siatna ding panin amaute a honkhia hi. 21 Ama itna kip leh mihing tate tungah a lamdang a nasepnate hangin amaute in { Topa } tungah lungdamna ko ta uh hen.
Kei ka si kei ding a, ka hing ding hi. { Topa' } sepnate ka gengen ding hi.
Amah in lungsim kitamte damsak a, amau' meimate a tuamsak hi.
Ka ta aw, kong thuhilhte mangngilh kei in la, kong thugente phawk tawntung in. 2 Kong thuhilhte in na khan' hong sausak ding a, hong daupaisak ding hi.
Nangmah a pilin kingaihsun tawm kei in la, { Topa } zahtakin a sia peel in. 8 Tua hi leh nang-a' dingin damna zatui tawh kibang ding a, na meimate hong damsakin na natnate hong daisak ding hi.
Ka ta aw, ka thugente don in la, ka kammalte ngai in. 21 Na kiang panin paikhiasak kei in la, na lungsimah ciamteh in. 22 Banghang hiam cihleh tua thu a zuite in nuntakna leh cidamna-in a nei uhhi.
{ Topa } zahtakna in khan' sausak a, migilote khan'sih hi.
Midikte a khan' sau a, migilote khan'sih hi.
Kam khum pen khuaizu bang hi a, i kamah khum a, i pumpi-a' dingin zong hoih mahmah hi.
Maitaina in ci damsak a, maigum tawntungna in guhtui teepkang hi.
{ Topa } a zahtakte a khan' sau a, lungkim takin nuamsa-in om uh a, siatna bangmah tuak khalo uhhi.
Mawhnei mite engkha kei in la, { Topa } zahtakna zom paisuak in. 18 Tua bang hi lecin lametna om a, cithei-in na khan' sau ding hi.
nang hong ompih ka hih manin lau kei in. Na Pasian ka hih manin lungkia kei in. Nang hong thakhauhsakin ka hong huh ding a, nang hong huhin ka hong honkhia ding hi.

"Amah in eite' natna teng thuakin, eite' gimna teng pua khin taktak hi. Ahi zongin eite in amah pen ama mawhna hangin Pasian in a gimsak, gimna a thuak bangin i ngaihsun hi. 5 Ahih hangin eite' khialhna hangin amah kiliamsak a, eite' mawhna hangin amah kisatnim hi. Ama gim thuakna hangin nopna i ngah a, ama liamna hangin damna i ngah hi.
Nopsakna, nopsakna, a gamla leh a nai mi khempeuh tungah om ta hen. Keimah in amaute ka damsak ding hi, { Topa } in ci hi.

Tua ciangin ka maipha pen phalvaktung hong bang ding a, note' tungah hong taangkhia ding hi. Manlang takin na liammate uh hong dam ding hi. Note hong ompih tawntungin note kong hon ding a, na nung na mai uhah ka hong dal ding hi.
{ Topa } aw, hong damsak lecin ka natna teng bei ding a, hong honkhia lecin kei ka suakta ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh nang pen ka hong phatpa na hi hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } in kong cihin-ah, na galte un note, pampaih mi pawl, hong ci-in, ‘Kuama donloh Zion na hi hi,’ hong cih uh hangin note kong cidamsak kik ding a, na liammate uh ka damsak ding hi.
Ahih hangin tu-in, keimah in hih khuapi ka damsak ding a, cidamin ka omsak ding hi. A mite cidamsakin hauhna leh lungmuan'na a kicing ka lak ding hi.

Ahi zongin ka thu a hong mang note tungah dikna ni hong taang ding a, tua in nizang bangin note tungah cidamna hong tun' ding hi. Bawng khumna panin a kikhah bawngnote bangin suakta-in nuam na sa ding uhhi. 3 Keimah in na kong sep ni ciangin note in migilote nuaisiahin leivui bangin na tuancil ding uhhi.
Galilee gamsung khempeuhah Zeisu pai kawikawi a, amau' kikhopna innte-ah thu hilhin, vantung ki-ukna hangin lungdamna thute hilh a, natna tuamtuam a nei cina khempeuh a damsak hi.

Tua laitakin miphak khat hong pai-in ama mai-ah hong khukdin' a, "Topa aw, nong damsaknop nak leh nong damsak thei ding hi," a ci hi. 3 Zeisu in zong a khut zanin tua mipa lawng a, "Ka hong damsaknuam hi; dam ta in," a cih khit phetin a phakna a dampah hi.
Ahi zongin galkapbupa in, "Topa aw, keima inn-ah nangpipi nong pai dingin kilawmlo ka hih manin a damna dingin thu pia lel lecin zong ka nasempa dam ding hi.
Zeisu in hih bupa thugen a zak ciangin lamdangsa a, amah a zui mihonte kiangah, "A mantaka kong genin-ah Israel mite lak nangawnah hih bang upna a nei ka mu nai kei hi.

A nitak ciangin mite in Zeisu kiangah dawivei mi tampi tak hong paipih uhhi. Zeisu in kam khat pauna bek tawh dawite hawlkhia-in cina khempeuh a damsak hi. 17 Kamsang Isaiah in, "Amah in eite' natna teng thuakin, eite' gimna teng puakhia hi," ci-in a genna thu a tun'na dingin hih bang a piang a hihi.

Mi pawlkhat in khutlekhezaw mi khat, a lupna pheek tawh hong pua-in Zeisu kiang a hong tun'pih uhhi. Zeisu in amaute' upna a muh ciangin a cina mipa kiangah, "Ka ta aw, na lungsim kinuamsak in; na mawhna hong kimaisak khinta hi," a ci hi.
Zeisu in hih thu a zak ciangin, "Cidamte in siavuan kisamlo uh a, cina mite bek in kisam uhhi.
Zeisu zong hong kihei a, tua numei a muh ciangin, "Ka tanu aw, na lung kinuamsak in. Na upna in nang hong damsak khinta hi," a cih khit phetin tua numei a dampah hi.
Tua bangin khuapite leh khuaneute-ah Zeisu pai kawikawi a, a kikhopna uh innte-ah thu hilhin, Pasian' ukna hangin a lungdamhuai thute gen a, natna nam khempeuh a damsak hi.
Zeisu in a nungzui sawmlenihte sam a, dawite a hawlkhiat theihna ding uh leh natna nam khempeuh a damsak theihna dingun amaute tungah vangliatna a pia hi.
Cinate damsakin, misite hingsakin, miphakte damsakin, dawite va hawlkhia un. Man piak kulloin hih vangliatna na ngah uh bangin hih vangliatna na zatna uhah zong man va ngen kei un.
a mipa kiangah, "Na khut zan in," a ci hi. A mipa in zong a khut zanpah a, midangte mah bangin hoihtakin a damkik hi.
Tui gei-ah Zeisu a tun' ciangin mihon tampi a na om a mu hi. Amaute hehpihhuai sa a, a cinate a damsak hi.
Ama puanmongteep beek a lawn'khak theihna dingun Zeisu kiangah ngen uh a, a puanmongteep a lawng mi khempeuh in damna a ngah uhhi.
Mihon tampi in amah zui uh a, tua munah cinate a damsak hi.
Zeisu in amaute hehpihhuai sa ahih manin a mit uh lawn'sak a, thakhat thu-in a mit un khua a mukik pah hi. Tua ciangin amaute gel in zong Zeisu nung a zuipah uhhi.

Miphak khat Zeisu kiangah hong pai-in khukdin' a, "Topa aw, hong damsak nuam peuh lecin nong damsak thei ding hi," ci-in a thum hi. 41 Zeisu in hehpihhuaisa ahih manin a khut zanin lawng a, "Nang kong damsak nuam hi," a ci hi. 42 Thakhat thu-in a phaknatna bei-in a damsiang hi.
Zeisu in hih mite' up mahmahna thu a muh ciangin khutlekhezaw mipa kiangah, "Ka ta aw, na mawhnate hong kimaisak hi," a ci hi.

Zeisu in hehmai tawh a kiim a pam en kawikawi a, ahi zongin a khialhna uh leh a thuphawk theihlohna uh hangin mite khasiathuai a sa zel hi. Tua ciangin a mipa kiangah, "Na khut zan in," a ci hi. Amah in zong a khut zan a, damin a ngeina bangkik hi.
Zeisu in zong tuanu kiangah, "Ka tanu aw, na upna in nang hong damsakzo hi. Cidamsuak in la, lungnuam takin va ciah in," a ci hi.
Tua hi a, cina tawmkhatte tungah khut nga-in a damsak cih simloh, tua lai-ah na lamdang lian bawl theilo hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Na ciah thei ta ding hi; na upna in nang hong damsakzo hi," a cihkhit phetin amah in khua mukik theipah a, tua a paina lampi-ah Zeisu' nung a zui hi.

A um mite tungah hih vangliatna limte kipia ding hi: Keima hangin dawi hawlkhia thei ding uh a, pau dangte pau thei ding uhhi. 18 Gul a lawn' hangun bangmah cilo ding uh a, gu tui a dawn hangun zong bangmah cilo ding uhhi. Cinate tungah a khut uh nga ding uh a, cinate dam ding uhhi," a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Zechariah in vantung mi kiangah, "Hih na thugen a manna bangci theih ding ka hi hiam? Kei ka teekta a, ka zi zong lah a teek mahmah ahi hi," a cih ciangin. 19 vantung mi in dawng a, "Kei pen Pasian' na a sem Gabriel ka hihi. Nang kiangah thu hong genin, hih lungdamna thu a ko dingin a hong sawl ka hihi. 20 Ahi zongin, a hong tungding ka thugen a hun lai-in umlo na hih manin nangma tunga kong thugen a tun' matengin pau theiloin na om ding hi," a ci hi.

Khatvei, Zeisu in thu hilhin a om laitakin Galilee gam, Judea gam, leh Jerusalem khua panin a hong pai Pharisee mi pawlkhat leh Thukham hilh siate pawlkhat hong om hi. Cina damsak theihna ding Topa' vangliatna, Zeisu tungah kipia hi.

Mihing Tapa in mawhna maisak theihna ding leitungah vangliatna nei hi, ci-in na theihna dingun kong lak ding hi," a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin khutlekhezaw mipa kiangah, "Tho in la na lupna pheek pua-in na inn-ah ciah in," a ci hi. 25 Thakhat thu-in amaute khempeuh' muhin a mipa zong tho-in a lupna pheek la a, Pasian phatkawmin a inn-ah a ciah hi.
Amaute khempeuh a et kawikawi khit ciangin a mipa kiangah, "Na khut zan in," a ci hi. Amah in zong a khut zan a, a ngeina bangin a khut hong damkik hi.
Zeisu in hih thu a zak ciangin lamdangsa mahmah a, amah a zui mihonte lamah kihei-in, "Israel mite lak nangawnah hih bang upna ka mu nai kei hi," a ci hi.
Tua hun laitak mahmahin natna a tuamtuamte tampi damsakin, dawivei mite sung panin dawite hawlkhia a, mittaw mi tampi khua a musak hi.

Tua laitakin kum sawmlenih tawntung siluang natna vei-in, a neih khempeuh siavuante cialna-in a zat hangin kuamah in a damsak zawhloh numei khat, 44 mihonte lak Zeisu nungah hong pai-in Zeisu' puanmongteep lawngsim a, thakhatin a siluang a kangpah hi. 45 Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Kua in hong lawng na hi uhhiam?" a ci hi. Kuamah in, "Hong lawng ing," a cihloh ciangin Peter in, "Topa aw, mi khempeuh in nang hong umcihin hong nehcip uhhi," a ci hi. 46 Ahi zongin Zeisu in, "Ka sung panin vangliatna a paikhiat lamtak phawk ka hih manin mi khat in hong lawng hi," a ci hi. 47 Numei in amah a kiphawkna thu a theih ciangin a lingsa-in hong pai-in Zeisu mai-ah hong bok a, Zeisu a lawn'na thu leh amah a dampahna thuteng, tua lai-a om mi khempeuh' zakin Zeisu kiangah a pulak hi. 48 Tua ciangin Zeisu in numei kiangah, "Ka tanu aw, na upna in nang hong damsakzo hi; lungnuam takin na ciah in," a ci hi. 49 Tua bangin thu a gen laitakin kikhopna inn ukpa' inn panin kamtai khat hong tung a, "Na tanu si khinzo ta hi. Siapa gimsak nawn kei in," a hong ci hi. 50 Ahi zongin Zeisu in hih thu a zak ciangin, kikhopna inn ukpa kiangah, "Lunghimawh kei in; upna nei peuh lecin na tanu a hingkik ding hi," a ci hi. 51 Tua inn-ah Zeisu a tun' ciangin Peter, Johan, leh James leh numeino' nu leh pa simloh kuamah dang, innsungah zuisak lo hi. 52 Tua lai-a om mi khempeuh, tua numeino' sihna hangin kapin, thumin na om uhhi. Ahi zongin Zeisu in, "Kap nawn kei un, amah a si hilo hi; a ihmu bek ahi hi," a ci hi. 53 Amah a sihkhitna thei uh ahih manin Zeisu a nuihsan lel uhhi. 54 Ahi zongin Zeisu in numeino a khutin lenin, "Numeino aw, tho in," a ci hi. 55 Numeino zong hingkik a, thakhatin a thopah hi. Tua ciangin numeino' nekding an pia un, ci-in Zeisu in a sawl hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in nungzui sawmlenihte sam a, dawite a hawlkhiat theihna ding uh leh cinate a damsak theihna dingun vangliatna leh aana a pia hi.
Mihonte in hih thu a theih uh ciangin Zeisu nungdelh uh a, Zeisu in zong amaute na nolhloin, amaute tungah Pasian' Ukna thu na hilh a, natna a neite zong a damsak hi.

Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Na upna in nang hong damsak khinta hi," a ci hi. 43 Amah in zong thakhatin khua muthei pah a, Zeisu zui-in Pasian tungah a lungdamna a ko hi. Mihonpite in zong a muh ciangin a vekpi-un Pasian a phat uhhi.

Zeisu in ama kiangah, "Note in lim leh na lamdang lian ka bawl na muh kei uh leh Topa ka hihna thu na hong um kei ding uhhi," a cih ciangin 49 ulianpa in, "Sia aw, ka ta a sih ma-in hong pai ta peuh in," ci-in a thum hi.50 Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Va ciah in. Na tapa nungta ding hi," a ci hi. Tua ulianpa in Zeisu' thugen um ahih manin a ciah hi.51 Lampi-ah a nasemte in na dawntuah uh a, "Na tapa nungta ding hi," ci-in na ko uhhi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Tho in la, na lupna pheek pua-in pai in," a cih ciangin, 9 tua cinapa thakhatin dampah a, a lupna pheek la-in a paipah hi. Tua ni pen Sabbath ni hi citciat ahih manin,

Tua ahih manin Zeisu in Sabbath ni-in cina a damsakna hangin amaute in Zeisu bawlsiat ding a kipan uhhi. 17 Ahi zongin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, "Ka Pa in tuni dongin na sem tawntung ahih manin kei zong ka sep ding mah ahi hi," a ci hi. 18 Hih bangin ama kampauna hangin amaute in Zeisu thatnuam semsem uhhi. Amah in Sabbath thukham a palsat bek hiloin, Pasian nangawn ka Pa ci ahih manin Pasian tawh a kikimin kiseh hi, ci-in a mawhsak uhhi.

Tua khit ciangin leilakah a cil sia-in buannawi bawl a, a mipa' mitah tua buannawi a nuhkawmin, 7 "Siloam Bual-ah na mai va phiat in," ci-in a sawl hi. (Siloam a cih ciangin, Sawl, a cihna a hi hi.) Tua ahih manin mittawpa zong va pai-in a mai va phiat a, khua mutheisa-in hong paikik hi.

Nazareth khuami Zeisu tungah Pasian in Khasiangtho leh vangliatna pia a, Pasian in a ompihna hangin tua Zeisu in a paina khempeuhah na hoih semin, Dawimangpa in a gimsak mite khempeuh a damsakna thu zong na thei uhhi.
Sihna panin Zeisu a thokiksak Pasian' Khasiangtho note sungah hong om leh sihna panin Christ a hingkik sakpa mah in note sungah a om ama Khasiangtho mah tawh a sithei pumpi a hong nungtasak ding hi.

Mi khempeuh-a' dingin phattuamna a omtheihna dingin Khasiangtho' hong ompihna a nam tuamtuamin hong kilang hi. 8 Khasiangtho in mi khat tungah thuthuk pilna hong guan' a, tua Khasiangtho mah in adang khat tungah thugen siamna hong guan' hi. 9 Adang khat tungah upna hong guan' a, adang khat tungah cina damsak theihna hong guan' hi. 10 Adang khat tungah na lamdang bawl theihna, adang khat tungah Pasian' thu hilh ding siamna, adang khat tungah Khasiangtho piak siamna ahi leh a hilo khentheihna ding siamna, adang khat tungah pau lamdang pau theihna, adang khat tungah tua pau lamdang tuamtuam paunate a khiatna gentheihna hong pia hi. 11 Hih siamna a tuamtuamte a hong pia pen Khasiangtho a kibang khat bek mah hi a, mi a tuamtuamte tungah ama hoihsak bangin a hong piak a hihi.

Tu-in note khempeuh pen Christ pumpi na hi uh a, na vekpi-un a pumpi na khat ciat na hi uhhi. 28 Tua ahih manin Pasian in pawlpi sungah mi khempeuh ama pan'mun ciat dingah a hong bulh hi. A masa-in sawltakte, a nihna-ah kamsangte, a thumna-ah laihilhte, tua ciangin na lamdang bawltheite, cina damsak theite, midang a huhtheite, thu vaihawm a siamte, leh pau lamdang a pau theite ahi uhhi. 29 A vekpi-un sawltak hilo a, a vekpi-un kamsang zong hilo uhhi. A vekpi-un laihilh, thuhilh hilo uh a, a vekpi-un na lamdang zong bawllo uhhi. 30 A vekpi-un cina damsakna ding siamna neilo uh a, a vekpi-un pau lamdang pau theilo uh a, a vekpi-un tua pau lamdangte a khiatna gen theilo uhhi. 31 Tua ahih manin Pasian' hong piak siamna a hoihpente deih belin na nei ta un. Tu-in a hoihpen thu khat ka hong gen ding hi.
Tua hi a, mite-a' dingin a thumsak thei dingin amah nungta tawntung ahih manin ama tung tawnin Pasian kiang a zuante khempeuh, tu-a kipanin a tawntungin a honkhia thei a hihi.
Tua ahih ciangin a zaw nuangnuang na khutte uh leh a no dakdak na khukte uh khauhsak un. 13 Bai luangluangin a paite, na guh na taang uh a kipelhlohna dingin lampi tang zui-in na pai un.

A cina na om uh leh pawlpi upate sam un. Amaute in thu hong ngetsakin Topa min tawh sathau hong zut ding uhhi. 15 Upna tawh thu a kinget ciangin Topa in cinate noptuamsakin, damsak ding a, mawhna nei ahih leh zong a mawhna maisak ding hi. 16 Tua ahih manin na ci uh a damna dingin khatlekhat tungah na mawhna uh kipulakin thu na kingetsak ta un. Mihoihte' thungetna in vang nei a, na lianpi semzo hi.

Eite, mawhna lamah misi bangin, thuman lamah nungta-in i gamtat theihna dingin Christ mahmah in eite' mawhna ama pumpi mahmah tawh singlamteh tungah a pua hi. Ama liamna hangin note in damna na ngah uhhi.
Ka lawm it Gaias aw, nang na ci damin na vai khempeuh zong na ma pai ding hi, ci-in ka lamen hi. Kha thu tawh kisai lamsangah zong bangmah lungkhamna omlo ding hi, ci-in ka thei hi.
Amaute' mit panin khitui khempeuh nulsak ding hi. Thu luisate maimang khinta ahih manin sihna, dahna, leh na sa-a kahna cihte om nawnlo ding hi," a ci hi.
Pasian in Noah leh a tapate thupha pia a, amaute tungah, "Pung unla, tampi pha-in, leitung dim un.

Ahih hangin amaute' lup ma-in Sodom khua mite, a moi a hamin mi khempeuh in a inn umcih uhhi. 5 Amaute in Lot sam uh a, "Tu nitaka nang kiangah hong tung mite koi-ah om ahi hiam? Amau' taw ka luk theihna dingun ko kiangah amaute hong paikhiatpih in," a ci uhhi. 6 Lot, kongkhak pua-ah mite kiangah pai-in kong lehkhak a, 7 "Ka sanggamte aw, tua banga na gitloh gamtat lohna ding uh kong thum hi.
Ganhing tawh a mawh peuhmah kithat ding hi.

Numei khat tawh lupkhop bangin pasal khat tawh na lumkhawm kei ding hi; tua pen a kihhuai a hihi. 23 Ganhing khatpeuh tawh mawhin tua tawh na kininsak kei ding a, numei khatpeuh in zong ganhing khatpeuh tawh a mawh dingin kipialo ding hi; tua pen ngeina hilo hi.

Pasal khat in numei khat tawh lupkhop bangin pasal dang khat tawh a lupkhop leh, amaute gel kihhuaina a gamta khin uh ahih manin amaute kithat ding a, amau' sihna amau mah ngawh ding a hihi. 14 Pasal khat in zi nei-in, a zi' nu tawh zong a lakthuah leh, tua pen a kilawmlo a hihi. Note lakah tua bang kilawmlohna a omlohna dingin tuapa leh a nutate, mei tawh kihallum ding hi. 15 Pasal khatpeuh ganhing khat tawh a mawh leh amah leh a ganhing kithat ding hi. 16 Numei khat in ganhing khat naihin tua tawh a mawh leh, note in a numei leh a ganhing na that ding uhhi; amau' sihna amau mah ngawh ding a hihi.
"Numei in pasal puan khat peuhpeuh silhlo ding a, pasal in zong numei puan silhlo ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh hih bangin a gamta peuhmah { Topa } na Pasian uh tungah a kihhuai a hihi.

Amaute in a lung uh nuamsakin a om laitakun, tua khuapi mi, mi ginalote in tua inn kimkotah pangin a kongkhak tumgawp uhhi. Amaute in inn nei puteekpa kiangah, "Ama taw ka luk theihna dingun na inn-ah a hong tung mipa hong paikhiatpih in," a ci uhhi.
Nang kong piaksa kham leh ngun kibawl kizepnate, pasal limin na bawl a, tuate tawh paktatna na gamta hi.

Tua ahih manin amau utna bangin a zumhuaipi-in a gamtat theihna dingun Pasian in a khahkhong hi. A numeite un pasal tawh lupkhop ngeina zangloin a numeipihte mah uh lunggulhin lumkhawm uh a, 27 a pasalte uh zong numei tawh lumkhawm loin pasalte mah lunggulhin lumkhawm uh a, a zumhuaipi-in a gamta uhhi. Tua ahih manin amaute' gamtatsiatna tawh kituakin Pasian in gim a pia hi. 28 Mite in a man ahi Pasian' thu ngaihsutin nei nuamlo uh ahih manin amaute' ngaihsut hoihlo bangin a gamtat theihna dingun Pasian in a khahkhia hi. Tua ahih manin a gamtat dingun a kilawm lopipi-in a gamta uhhi.

Migilote, Pasian' Ukna sungah a lut hetlohna ding thu na thei uhhi. Note kihaibawl kei un. Numei tawh a paktatte, milim biate, mi zi ahih kei leh mi pasal tawh a mawhte, pasal leh pasal a khialte, 10 a gutate, a huaihamte, zukhamte, mi gensiate, ahih kei leh mi' na a sutte khat beek, Pasian' Ukna sungah lutthei hetlo ding hi.
Ahi zongin numei tawh paktatna tamlua ahih manin pasal in ama zi tuam nei hen la, numei in ama pasal tuam nei leh hoih hi.
Amaute in maizumna mel thei nawnlo uh a, siatna sung tungin, a ututun a kilawm lopipi-in gamta uhhi.
nulepa mawhna a gamtate, palepa mawhna a bawlte, mi a gute, zuauthu a gente, mite' siatna ding thu a gente, leh thuman tawh a kilehbulhin a gamta mite-a' dingin thukham a kibawl a hihi.

Sodom khua leh Gomorrah khua leh a kiima om khuapi mite zong tua vantung mite mah bangin gamta uh a, numei tawh mawhnopna bek thamloin pasal leh pasal kilunggulhna ciangdong nei uh ahih manin midangte' etteh dingin tawntung meikuang a thuak uhhi. 8 Tua mite mah bangin hih mite zong thumu-in kinei-in amau pumpi thanghuaisak uh a, Pasian' thu nialin tunglama om minthan'na a neite a simmawhbawl uhhi.

Note in hih kidona-ah na do ding uh kisamlo hi. Judah gam mite leh Jerusalem khuamite aw, na pan'mun uh la-in taangloin ding unla, note' tangin { Topa' } gualzawhna mu un,’ ci hi. Kihta kei unla, lungkia kei un. Zingciangin amaute a do-in pai un. { Topa } in note hong ompih ding hi," a ci hi.
{ Topa } ka Pasian aw, nangmah ka hong bel hi. Kei hong delhte' kiang panin hong dal in la hong hon in.
nangmah a hong kiphatnate phawk kikkik in la, na hong hotkhiatna hangin Jerusalem khuasungah ka nuamna ka gengen ding hi.
Ahih hangin na itna kip ka muang a, nong hotkhiatna hangin ka lungdam ding hi.
{ Topa } pen keima suangpi, ka munkip muan'huai, kei a hong honkhiapa, ka Pasian, ka suangpi, ka belhpa, ka lum, ka kihotkhiatna ki, ka munkip a hihi.
Ka gal hatpa kiang pan leh hong mudahte kiang panin kei hong honkhia hi; banghang hiam cihleh kei-a' dingin amaute hatlua uhhi.
{ Topa } hing hi. Keima suangpi in thupha ngah hen la, ka kihotkhiatna Pasian,
{ Topa, } ama mite' hatna hi a, amah pen a sathau nilhpa' bukna leh a honkhiapa a hihi. 9 Na mite hon in la, na luahte thupha pia in. Amau a cingpa hi in la, a tawntungin amaute huh in.
Nang pen kei-a' dingin ka bukna mun na hi a, haksatna pan kei hong kemin hotkhiatna kicing nong pia hi.
Keimah in { Topa } ka zong a, amah in kei hong dawngin, ka launa khempeuh panin kei hong honkhia hi.

Huhna a ngen dingin thumante a kiko ciangin { Topa } in za a, a haksatna khempeuh panun amaute a honkhia hi. 18 Lungsim kitamzante kiangah { Topa } hong om a, lungsim zangawpte a hon hi. 19 Thuman mi' thuakna a tam mahmah hangin tuate khempeuh panin { Topa } in amah a hon hi.
Tua ciangin { Topa } tungah ka lungdam mahmah ding a, ama hotkhiatna-ah nuamin ka diang ding hi.
Nangma hotkhiatna thu ka im kei a, na thumanna leh na hotkhiatna ka gen khin hi. Na itna kip leh na thumanna mihonpi tungah ka im kei hi.
{ Topa } aw, keimah hong honkhia nuam in. { Topa } aw, hong huh meng in.
Kei ahih leh zawngin ka cimawh a, ahih hangin { Topa } in kei hong mangngilhlo hi. Nang pen kei hong huhpa leh hong honkhiapa na hi hi. Zekai kei in, ka Pasian aw.
Haksat hun ciangin keima tungah hong ko un. Note kong honkhia ding a, note in keima min nong thangsak ding uhhi," a ci hi.
Kei a hong hon Pasian aw, sihna ding panin kei hong honkhia in. Nong hotkhiatna thu lungdam takin ka sa ding hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh sihna panin nong honkhia khin hi. Pasian' mai, nuntakna khuavak sungah ka pai theihna dingin ka khe a taalna ding panin na hong honkhia hi.
Eite' Pasian pen hong honkhia Pasian hi a, sihna pan a hong suaktasak Topa { Pasian } a hihi.
Ahih hangin keimah in gimna thuakin na ka sa hi. Pasian aw, kei hong kaito-in hong honkhia ta in.
Nang hong zongte khempeuh lungdam mahmahin na min hangin kipak ta hen. Na hotkhiat ding a utte in, "Pasian lian hi," cici ta hen.

Na thumanna tawh kei hong huh in la, hong honkhia in. Keima lamah na bil hong ngat in la, hong hon in. 3 Hong hon dingin ka belh suangpi, ka kulh muan'huai, hong hi ta in; banghang hiam cihleh keimah hong honpa leh ka belhpa na hi hi. 4 Ka Pasian aw, migilote' khutsung pan leh thumanlo mite leh migilote' matna panin keimah hong hon in.
Ahi zongin Pasian pen tanglai peka kipanin kumpi hi tawntung a, hih leitungah a hong honkhia zelzel ngei ka Kumpi a hihi.
Banghang hiam cihleh amaute in Pasian umlo uh a, a honkhiazo dingin muanglo uhhi.
A ginalo mite leh a cimawh mite hon unla, migilote' khutsung panin amaute honkhia un," a ci hi.

{ Topa } aw, kote tungah na itna kip hong lak in la, hong huhin hong hon in. 8 { Topa } Pasian' thugen ding hong zasak dih un. Bang hang hiam cih leh ama lamah lungsim takpi tawh a kihei ama mi siangtho, ama mite' tungah kilemna thu a gen ding hi.9 I gam sungah minthan'na a om theihna dingin amah a zahtakte-a' dingin ama hong hotkhiatna hong om takpi hi.

{ Topa' } tungah, "Ka bukna leh ka munkip muan'huai, ka muan' ka Pasian na hi hi," ci ding uhhi. 3 Banghang hiam cihleh amah in thangsiahpa' thangzak leh a lauhuai pulnatna panin nang hong honkhia ding hi.
Amah in hong sap ciangin amah ka dawng ding hi. Haksatna sungah amah ka ompih ding a, amah honkhia-in ka pahtawi ding hi. 16 Nuntak sau tawh amah ka lungkimsak ding a, amah ka honkhia ding hi.
{ Topa } tungah la sa unla, ama min phat un. Ni khat khit ni khat ama hong hotkhiatna thu gen tawntung un.

{ Topa } aw, nangma teel mite' daupaina ka muh theihna ding, nangma minamte' kipakna sungah ka lungkim theihna ding, nangma luahte tawh ka minthan' khawm theihna dingin na mite tungah maipha na lah ciangin kei hong phawk in la, amaute na hotkhiat ciangin kei zong hong huh in.
Tua ciangin amaute in a lungkhamna uhah { Topa } ko uh a, amau' cihmawhna panin amah in a honkhia hi.
Amah in thu vaikhakin amaute damsak a, siatna ding panin amaute a honkhia hi.
Amah in ama mite honkhia a, a tawntunga kimang dingin thupiakna a bawl khin hi. Ama min siangtho-in vanglian mahmah hi.
{ Topa } in kei hong hotkhiat ka lungdamna hangin, ama kiangah tuiphih biakna ka paipih ding hi.
Mawhna a om khempeuh panin amah in Israel-te a honkhia ding hi.
{ Topa } aw, ka langte' kiang panin kei hong honkhia in. Nangmah a bel dingin ka hong tai hi.

Ka khutte galdona ding ka khutmete galkapna dingin a hilh, keimah a hong hu, { Topa } in thupha ngah ta hen. 2 Amah pen ka suangpi leh ka munkip muan'huai, ka kulhpi leh hong honkhiapa, ka lum leh ka belhpa, ka nuai-ah mite a zopa a hihi.
Lungno bang ahi lel Jacob, no Israel mite aw, lau kei un! Note kong huh ding hi, { Topa } in ci hi. Note hong honpa pen Israel-te' Siangtho Pa a hihi.
Na thupalsatnate hong paihkhiatsakpa pen keimah ka hi a, kei ka hih manin na khialhnate ka ciamteh kei ding hi.
Na thupalsatnate meiipi bangin na khialhnate meiilum bangin ka phiatkhia khinzo hi. Hong honkhia khin ka hih manin kei kiangah hong ciahkik in.
A kimancip Jerusalem mite aw, leivui panin kisingkhia unla dingto un. A kiman Zion mite aw, na ngawng panun hong kihenna khaute sutkhia un.

Migilo in ama gitlohna nusia hen la, thumanlo mi in ama ngaihsutna nusia hen. Amah in a hehpih theihna dingin { Topa } eite' Pasian' kiangah amah paisak un. Banghang hiam cihleh a mawhna maisiangsak ding hi.

"Amau' mawh gamtatnate a vekin ka mu khin a, ahih hangin amaute ka damsak ding hi. Amaute makaihin ka hehnem ding a, a dah a kapte hehnemin ka lungdamsak ding hi. 19 Nopsakna, nopsakna, a gamla leh a nai mi khempeuh tungah om ta hen. Keimah in amaute ka damsak ding hi, { Topa } in ci hi.

Gimna a thuak mite tungah thuhoih a puak dingin { Topa } in kei hong teelin hong sawl ahih manin keima sungah Topa { Pasian}' kha hong om hi. Lungsim kitamzante a damsak ding, salin a kimante tungah suahtakna thu a gen ding, a kikhum mite-a' dingin thong kong a hong ding, 2 { Topa } in a mite honkhia-in, a galte a guallelhsak ding hun a tun'na thu a gen ding, a thum mi khempeuh a hehnem ding, 3 amaute pen a thuman mite kici-in, amah a kiminthan'sak theihna dingin { Topa } in a mite kem hi, a kicih theihna dingin Zion-ah a om a dah mite a lungdamna ding, a lungkham mite in phatna la a saktheihna ding, a lunggim mite in Pasian a phattheihna dingin amah in kei hong sawlzo hi.

Ahi zongin { Topa' } tungah huhna a ngen khempeuh in hotkhiatna a ngah ding uhhi. { Topa' } gensa bangmahin Zion Mual leh Jerusalem khuasungah a suakta mi om ding uhhi. { Topa } in a teel mite, suakta ding uhhi.

Vantung mi in ama sawltak van midangte kiangah, "Hih mipa' silh a puan ninte suahkhiatsak un," ci-in thu a pia hi. Tua ciangin vantung mi in Joshua kiangah, "Na mawhna teng kong paihkhiatsak khin a, tu-in na silh dingin puan thak ka hong pia ding hi," a ci hi.
Sisan tawh a kikipsak, note tawh ka thuciamna hangin na salsuahna uh keugaw gam panin note ka hong suaktasak ding hi.
Amah in tapa khat hong nei ding a, tua tapa in ama mite a mawhna uh panin honkhia ding ahih manin ama min dingin Zeisu na phuak ding hi," ci-in thu a gen hi.
A nitak ciangin mite in Zeisu kiangah dawivei mi tampi tak hong paipih uhhi. Zeisu in kam khat pauna bek tawh dawite hawlkhia-in cina khempeuh a damsak hi.
Zeisu in a nungzui sawmlenihte sam a, dawite a hawlkhiat theihna ding uh leh natna nam khempeuh a damsak theihna dingun amaute tungah vangliatna a pia hi.
Cinate damsakin, misite hingsakin, miphakte damsakin, dawite va hawlkhia un. Man piak kulloin hih vangliatna na ngah uh bangin hih vangliatna na zatna uhah zong man va ngen kei un.
Ahi zongin Pharisee mite in hih thu a zak uh ciangin, "Dawimangpa Beelzebul min tawh dawi a hawlkhia hi lel hi," a ci uhhi.
Note' ngaihsut bang hiloin, Pasian' Kha in dawi hawlkhiatna ding vangliatna kei tungah hong pia ahih manin note lakah Pasian' ukna hun hong kipan khin ahihna hong kilang hi.

Zeisu in tua naupang' sung panin dawi a paikhiatna dingin thu pia a, a naupang thakhatin a dampah hi. 19 Tua ciangin amau guak a om laitakun nungzuite in Zeisu kiangah, "Banghangin kote in tua dawi hawlkhia theilo ka hi uhhiam?" ci-in a dot uh ciangin 20 Zeisu in, "Na upna uh a cingtaak lohna hang a hihi. Ahi taktakin note kiangah kong genin-ah: Ankam tang cia bang upna na neih nak uh leh, hih mual kiangah, ‘Hih lai panin hua lai-ah kin in,’ ci le uh cin kinkhia ding hi. Na hih theihloh uh khat zong omlo ding hi.
Zeisu in, "Pau kei in; hih mipa sung panin paikhia in," ci-in tua dawi tungah thu a pia hi.

Tua nitak lam, ni a tum khit ciangin mite in Zeisu kiangah cina khempeuh leh dawivei khempeuh a hong paipih uhhi. 33 Tua khuami khempeuh a inntualah hong kikhawm uhhi. 34 Zeisu in natna namkim a vei mi tampi damsak a, dawi tampi tak zong a hawlkhia hi. Dawite in Zeisu thei uh ahih manin, Zeisu in dawite thu gensaklo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Galilee gamsung khempeuhah amah zin a, a kikhopna uh innte-ah thu hilhin dawite a hawlkhia hi.

(Hih bangin a cihna pen, Zeisu in, "Dawi aw, hih mipa sung panin paikhia in," a cihna hang a hihi.) 9 Zeisu in, "Na min bang ahi hiam?" ci-in a dong hi. Mipa in, "Kote tampi pha ka hih manun ka min pen A Honpi ahi hi," ci-in a dawng hi. 10 Tua gam panin mundangah dawite a hawlkhiat lohna dingin tua mipa in a thum lailai hi. 11 Tua laitakin tua nai-a om mualpangah vok hon tampi gamta-in a om hi. 12 Dawite in, "Hua vokte kiang beekah hong paisak in la, a sungah hong tumsak in," ci-in a thum uhhi. 13 Tua ahih manin Zeisu in dawite a paina ding uh thu pia a, dawite zong mipa sung panin paikhia-in vokte sungah a lut uhhi. Tua vok honpite a vekpi-in tul nih bang pha hi. Mualtung panin taisuk henhan uh a, tuili sung kiden'na-in tuikia mangkhin uhhi.

Inn sungah Zeisu a tumkhit ciangin a nungzuite in, "Banghangin kote in dawi hawlkhia theilo ka hi uhhiam?" ci-in a dongsim uhhi. 29 "Thungetna simloh a dang in hih bangte hawlkhia theilo hi," ci-in Zeisu in a dawng hi.
Johan in, "Sia aw, nangma min zangin dawi a hawlkhia mi khat ka mu uhhi. Amah, ei' pawl hilo ahih manin ka kham uhhi," a ci hi.
Sihna panin Zeisu a thawhkik khit ciangin ama sung pan dawi sagih a hawlkhiatna, Magdala khuami Mary tungah Nipi ni zingsang tungin kilang masa hi.
A um mite tungah hih vangliatna limte kipia ding hi: Keima hangin dawi hawlkhia thei ding uh a, pau dangte pau thei ding uhhi.
i galte kiang panin hong hotkhiatna ding leh hong mudahte' khutsung panin hong hotkhiatna ding thu a hong ciam hi.

"Gimna a thuak mite tungah Lungdamna Thu a hilh dingin Topa in kei hong sehkhin ahih manin keima sungah Topa' kha hong om hi. Salin a kimante tungah suahtakna thu a gen ding, mittawte in khua a muhkik theihna ding, a kinengniamte a suaktasak ding leh

Kikhopna innsungah dawivei mi khat om a, nakpi takin kiko-in, 34 "Nazareth khuami Zeisu aw, kote tawh bang kisai ihi hiam? Kote a susia dingin hong pai na hi hiam? Pasian' mi siangtho na hih lamtak ka hong thei uhhi," a ci hi. 35 Zeisu in tua dawi taii a, "Pau kei in la, ama sung panin paikhia in," ci-in thu a pia hi. Dawi in a mipa mihon lakah a puksak khit ciangin ama sung panin paikhia a, ahi zongin liamsaklo hi.
Tua hun laitak mahmahin natna a tuamtuamte tampi damsakin, dawivei mite sung panin dawite hawlkhia a, mittaw mi tampi khua a musak hi.

Nang in ka lu sathau nong nilhsak kei a, ahi zongin amah in ka khe nangawn sathau namtui hong nuhsak hi. 47 Tua ahih ciangin nang kiangah kong genin-ah, ama mawhna tampi tak a omte kimaisak khin ahih manin amah in a itna nakpi takin a lak hi.
