Ahi zongin tawmno bek a kimaisakte in a itna uh tawmno bek mahin a lak uhhi," a ci hi. 48 Tua ciangin Zeisu in numei kiangah, "Na mawhnate hong kimaisak khin hi," a ci hi. 49 Tua ciangin Zeisu tawh sabuai-ah an a nekhawm midangte in a lungsim sung uhah, "Mawhna nangawn a maisak hih mipa kua ahi hiam?" a ci uhhi. 50 Tua ciangin Zeisu in numei kiangah, "Na upna in nang hong damsak khinta hi; lungnuam takin va ciah in," a ci hi.

Tuazawh tawlkhat khit ciangin khuapite leh khuaneute-ah a ban banin Zeisu pai a, Pasian' Ukna hangin Lungdamna Thu hilhin a vak kawikawi hi. Tua a vak kawikawina-ah nungzui sawmlenihte, 2 leh a sungpan dawi a hawlkhiatsakte leh natna tuamtuam pan a damsak numei pawlkhat in zong a zui uhhi. Tua numeite: A sung panin dawi sagih a kihawlkhiatna Mary (Magdala khuami Mary a kicinu),

Gunkuang tung panin leilakah Zeisu hong paisuk laitakin tua khuasunga om dawivei mi khat in a na dawn hi. Tua dawiveipa pen sauveipi sung puan silhloin omkhin a, inn-ah zong omloin han lak khawngah om tawntung hi. 28 Zeisu a muh ciangin nakpi takin awngin a mai-ah khukdin' a, "A Lian Pasian' Tapa Zeisu aw, kei bang hong nuammawh na hi hiam? Kei, gim nong piaklohna dingin ka hong thum hi," ci-in nakpi takin a kiko hi. 29 Hih bangin a cihna pen, ama sung panin dawi a paikhiatna dingin Zeisu in thu a piakna hang a hihi. Dawi in tua mipa tamveipi tak man a, a khut leh a khete sikkhau tawh khihin a kikepcip hangin a sikkhaute peksat a, dawi in gamlakah a paikhiatpih hi. 30 Zeisu in ama kiangah, "Na min bang ahi hiam?" ci-in a dot ciangin, ama sungah dawi tampi lut ahih manin, "A Honpi," ci-in a dawng hi. 31 Leihawm thukpi sungah amaute a khiatlohna dingin Zeisu kiangah a thum uhhi. 32 Tua laitakin tua kiim mualpang to-ah vok honpi khat gamta-in a om hi. Tua vokte sungah a luttheihna dingun dawite in Zeisu kiangah thum uh a, Zeisu in zong amau' ngetna bangin a pia hi. 33 Tua ahih manin dawite zong mipa sung panin paikhia-in vokte sungah lut uh a, vokte zong tui gei keen tung khawngah tuaksuk gawpin a vekpi-in tui a kia hi. 34 Vokcingte in hih thupiang a muh uh ciangin amaute tai-in khuasung leh gamsung tengah a zasak uhhi. 35 Hih thupiang a en dingin mite hong pai uh a, Zeisu kiang a tun' uh ciangin dawi a paikhiatna mipa Zeisu kiangah omin, puan silhin, a pilkikna thu a muh uh ciangin a vekpi-un lamdangsa-in a lau uhhi. 36 Tua thupiang a mu masa mite in dawiveipa a damnazia thute, amaute tungah a na gen uhhi. 37 Tua ciangin Gadara gam kiima om khempeuh lau mahmah uh ahih manin Zeisu a paikhiatna dingin a sawl uhhi. Zeisu zong gunkuang tungah tuangin a ciah hi. 38 Dawi a paikhiatna mipa in Zeisu kiangah, "Kei zong hong zuisak in," ci-in a thum hi; ahi zongin Zeisu in, 39 "Na inn-ah ciah in la, Pasian in nang-a' dingin bangzah takin na hong sepsak hiam, cihna thu va gen in," ci-in a sawlkhia hi. A mipa zong ciah a, ama-a' dingin Zeisu' sepsakna thu khempeuh, khuasung tengah a gengen hi
Tua ciangin Zeisu in nungzui sawmlenihte sam a, dawite a hawlkhiat theihna ding uh leh cinate a damsak theihna dingun vangliatna leh aana a pia hi.

Sawmsagihte lungdam mahmahin hong ciahkik uh a, "Topa aw, nangma min tawh dawite nangawn ka hawlkhiazo uhhi," a hong ci uhhi. 18 Zeisu in amaute kiangah, "Vantung panin keekkia bangin Satan a kiatna ka mu hi. 19 Tu-in thei un. Gulpi leh momaite na sikgawpna ding uh leh na galte uh na zawhna dingun note tungah vangliatna ka hong piazo a, amaute in note bangmah hong cih zolo ding uhhi. 20 Ahi zongin dawite in na thu uh hong man'na hangin lungdam kei unla, vantungah na min uh a kigelh manin lungdamzaw un," a ci hi.
Zeisu in a pau theilo mi khat sung panin dawi hawlkhia a, dawi a paikhiat khit ciangin a mipa pauthei a, mite in lamdang a sa mahmah uhhi.
Dawivei numei khat tua lai-ah om a, tua dawi in kum sawmlegiat sung tua numei cina sakin a nung kulsak a, dingtang thei hetloin a om hi.
Tua mah bangin Satan in Abraham' suante khat ahi hih numei pen kum sawmlegiat sung hencip hi. Hih a kihencipna panin Sabbath ni-in hih numei khahkhiat ding kilawm hilo ahi hiam?" a ci hi.
Zeisu in amah a lehhek dingpa theikhin ahih manin, "Note sung panin khat simloh na siangkhin uhhi," a ci a hihi.
Jerusalem khua kiima om khuapite panin mite hong pai-in, cinate leh dawivei mite hong paipih uh a, a vekpi-in damna a ngah uhhi.
Mi tampite sung panin dawite nakpi takin kiko-in paikhia uh a, khutzaw khezaw mite zong kidamsak hi.

Nazareth khuami Zeisu tungah Pasian in Khasiangtho leh vangliatna pia a, Pasian in a ompihna hangin tua Zeisu in a paina khempeuhah na hoih semin, Dawimangpa in a gimsak mite khempeuh a damsakna thu zong na thei uhhi.

Nikhat, thungetna mun a zuan dingin ka pai laitakun mailam thu a genthei dawivei nasem numei khat in kote hong dawntuah hi. Tua numei in mailam thu a genna tawh a tote-a' dingin sum tampi a ngahsak hi. 17 Tua numei in Paul leh kote hong zui-in, "Hih mite, A Lianpen Pasian' nasemte ahi uhhi. Note a hong kihotkhiat theihna ding thu a hong gen uh ahi hi," ci-in a kiko hi. 18 Tua bangin ni tampi sung awng ngitnget ahih manin a sawtna ciangin Paul in nawngkaisa ahih manin kihei-in a dawi kiangah, "Hih numei sung panin na paikhiatna dingin Zeisu Christ min tawh thu kong pia hi," a cihkhit phetin, tua numei sung panin dawi a paikhia pah hi. 19 Tua numei' tote in a sumngahna ding uh beita hi, ci-in a phawk uh ciangin Paul leh Silas man uh a, Thukhente omna sumbuk tualah a kai uhhi.

Pasian in Paul' tung tawnin na lamdang lianpipi a bawl hi. 12 Ama zat mainul ahi a, a puante ahi zongin cinate kiangah a kipaipih ciangin a natnate uh damin, a sunga om dawite zong a taikhia uhhi. 13 Dawi hawlkhia-in a vak kawikawi Jew mi aitawi pawlkhat in zong Topa Zeisu' min zangin dawi hawlkhiat ding a sawm uhhi. Amaute in dawite kiangah, "Paul in a gengen Zeisu' min tawh thu kong pia uhhi," a ci uhhi.
Laisiangtho in zong, "Topa tungah huhna a ngen khempeuhte in hotkhiatna a ngah ding uhhi," ci hi.
Christ in eite hong khahkhiat khitna hangin mi suaktate hi khinta ihih manin tua suahtakna thu-ah kipin om unla, sila va suakkik nawn kei un.
Tua hi a, mite-a' dingin a thumsak thei dingin amah nungta tawntung ahih manin ama tung tawnin Pasian kiang a zuante khempeuh, tu-a kipanin a tawntungin a honkhia thei a hihi.
Tua ahih manin Pasian' thu na mang un. Dawimangpa na nial un. Nial le uh cin no kiang panin taikhia ding hi.
Tua ciangin amaute a gingin kiko-in, amau' ngeina bangin namsaute leh sikzumte tawh, amaute tungah si a luan' dongin ki-atin kisun uhhi.

Bawngtal sawmlenihte tungah tua tuikuangpi kinga a, thum leilu lam nga a, thum nitumna lam nga-in, thum leitaw lam nga a, thum nisuahna lam nga hi. Tuate tungah a tuikuangpi kinga a, a nunglam uh a sunglamah om hi.
Migilote' khutsungah leitung kipia a, amah in thukhen mangte' mit a tuncipsak hi — amah hi kei leh kua hi ding ahi hiam?
Migilo in thumanpa sawm a, a ha a gawisan hi.

Ama hauhna-ah mi kipsuak theilo a, a sithei ganhingte tawh a kibang lel a hihi. 13 Hih pen a kihai muan'te' ngah hi a, amau' ngahsa tawh a lungkimte' thumong a hihi. 14 Tua bangin amaute Leinuai-a dingin kiseh hi. Sihna pen amau a cingpa hi ding hi. Hankhuk sungah amaute tuaksuksuak ding uh a, a meel uh sia ding a, Leinuai, amau' inn hi ding hi. 15 Ahih hangin Pasian in Leinuai' vangliatna panin kei hong honkhia ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in kei hong sang ding hi.16 Mi khatpeuh a hauh ciang ahi a, a innkuan minthan'na a khan' ciang ahi zongin lau-in lunghihmawh dingin ngaihsun tuan kei in. 17 Bang hang hiam cih leh a sih ciangin bangmah kenglo ding a, a minthan'na in amah zuisuklo ding hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh migilote' daupaina ka muh ciangin mi kihisakte ka eng hi. 4 Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in nat velvalna bangmah thuaklo uh a, a pumpi uh cidamin zol hilhial hi. 5 Amaute in midangte bangin haksatna thuaklo uh a, amaute in midangte bangin gimna ngahlo uhhi.6Tua ahih ciangin amaute in khainiang bangin kiphatsakna ok uh a, puan bangin ngongtatna silh uhhi. 7 A lungsim panun gitlohna pusuaksak uh a, a ngaihsutna uh gitlohna tawh a dimlet hi. 8 Amaute in mi thusim loin el pau uh a, kiliatsakna tawh a sucip dingin mi a tawng uhhi. 9 Amaute' gensiatna in vantung dong banto a, kiliatsakna tawh leitungah thu gen kawikawi uhhi. 10 Tua ahih ciangin mite in amaute phat uh a, amau' mawhna zonglo uhhi. 11 Amaute in, "Pasian in bangci theih ding ahi hiam? Sangpenpa in phawk ding ahi hiam?" ci uhhi. 12 Amaute migilo ahi uhhi. A tawntungin nuamtakin om hithiat uh a, amaute a hauhna uh khang semsem zaw lai hi.
"Hih mite' vaihawmna pawlpih kei un. Amau' kihtakte kihta kei un.

Nangmah dona dingin a kibawl hiam peuhmah mavang lo ding a, thukhenna sungah na langah a pang mi khempeuh na nialgawpzo ding hi. Hih thu pen { Topa}' nasemte' gamhluah leh keima kiang panin amaute' dikna a kilahna ahi hi, { Topa } in ci hi," a ci hi.

Kei zong a sungah tumin ka khuadak hi. Kawm tung khempeuhah gul lim, adang ganhing ninte lim, leh Israel mite' biak ganhing khempeuh a kisuai ziazua ka mu hi. 11 Tua lai-ah Israel minam makai sawmsagih na om a, tuate' lakah Shafan' tapa Jaazaniah zong na om hi. Amaute in paknamtui halna kuang khat ciat tawi uh a, paknamtui a kihalna khute van lamah kahto biaibuai hi. 12 Tua ciangin amah in, "Mihing ahi Ezekiel aw, Israel mite a kimulo munah a gamtatnate uh tu-in na mu hiam? Amaute in milim a dimna innsungah biakna a bawl uhhi. Amaute in, ‘{ Topa } in hong mulo hi. { Topa } in hih gam nusia khinta hi,’ ci-in paulap zong uhhi," hong ci hi.

Tua ciangin biakinn tual sungnungah hong paipih hi. Tua lai-ah biakinn kongkhak gei, biakna taute leh innlim kikal sanah mihing sawmnih leh nga khawng na om a, biakna tau nungngatin nisuahna lam nga-in nisuak tung na bia uhhi.

"Ki sawmte pen tua kumpi gamsung panin a hong piang ding kumpi sawmte ahi uhhi. Tua ciangin kumpi dang khat hong piang leuleu ding a, amah in a omsate tawh a kilamdang mahmahin kumpi thum a nuaisiah ding hi.

Kumpipa in a pu a pate' biak pasian leh numeite in a it pasian a thusim kei ding hi. Pasian a kici peuhmah khat beek a thusim kei ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh tuate sangin amah a lianzaw-in a kingaihsun hi.

Hauhna pen zuaupi hi a, a huaiham mite kiphasakin omkhong theilo uh a, hankhuk mah bangin, phazo, cih omsak theilo uh a, lungkim hun cih nei theilo uhhi. Tua ahih manin minam dangte a ban banin simin a uk uhhi.

Tua ciangin Dawimangpa in mual sang mahmah khatah Zeisu paipihto a, leitung kumpi gam khempeuh leh a hoihna teng a lah khit ciangin, 9 "Ka mai-ah kunin kei hong bia lecin hihte khempeuh nangma tungah kong pia ding hi," a ci hi. 10 Zeisu in, "Satan aw, taikhia in. Laisiangtho in, ‘Na Topa Pasian bek bia in la, ama na bek sem in,’ ci hilo ahi hiam?" ci-in a dawng hi.
"Kei kiangah, ‘Topa, Topa aw,’ hong ci mi khempeuh, vantung ki-ukna sungah lutthei kimlo ding uh a, vantungah a om ka Pa' deihna bangin a gamtateng bek lutthei ding uhhi.
Pumpi a thah khit ciangin kha a that theilote na kihta kei un. Hell khuk sungah pumpi leh kha a nihin a susia theipa na kihtazaw un.
Banghang hiam cihleh Christ a kineihkhemte leh kamsang a kineihkhemte hong piang ding a, ahih zawh leh a teelsa mite nangawn a khemna dingun lim leh na lamdang lianpipi hong bawl ding uhhi.
Mihingte' bawltawm thukhamte, Pasian' thukham zahin mite tungah hilh uh ahih manin, kei hong biak hangun a kiman'na om lo hi,’ ci hi.
Mi khatpeuh in hih leitung khempeuh a ngah hangin a nuntakna bulpi suplawh leh bang phattuamna om ahi hiam? 37 Ama nuntakna bang tawh leikik thei nawn ding ahi hiam?
Banghang hiam cihleh Christ kineihkhemte leh kamsang kineihkhemte hong piang ding a, ahihzawh leh, a teelsa mite nangawn a khemna dingun lim leh na lamdangte hong bawl ding uhhi.
"Banghangin, ‘Topa aw, Topa aw,’ hong ci napi-in ka hong gente zuilo na hi uhhiam?
Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Note na sawmlenih mahun ka hong teel hinapi-in khat pen dawi na suakmawk uhhi," a ci hi.
Tua khuasungah Simon a kici mi khat om a, amah mitphial bawl siampi hi a, Samaria mite in lamdangsa mahmah uhhi. Amah milian mahmah khatin kigen a,

Tua bang mite pen hih leitung pasian gilote in a lungsim mit uh tawsak ahih manin umlo uh a, Pasian tawh a kibang teekteek Christ minthan'na hangin amaute tungah a hong taang lungdamna thu khuavak mu theilo uhhi.

Amaute pen sawltak taktak hiloin, sawltak a kineihkhemte hi uh a, a nasepna uhah zong zuau-in, Christ' sawltak taktak a battheihna dingun a meel kiseel ahi uhhi. 14 Tua pen lamdang sak ding hilo hi. Satan nangawn Pasian' vantung mi tawh a kibangin kibawltawm thei hi. 15 Tua ahih manin Satan' sawltakte pen thuman nasem bangin a kibawl manin lamdang sak ding hilo hi. Hun bei ni ciangin amau gamtatna bangun thuak ngawn ding uhhi.
Tua bang pilnate vantung panin a hong pai hilo a, leitung pilna, kha thu tawh a kisailo, a dawivai a hihi.

Hihbang mite pen a kangcip khinsa ciktui, huih in a mutkhiat meiipi tawh kibang uh a, Pasian in amaute' omna dingin khuamial sahpi omna mun a koih kholhsak hi. 18 Amaute kiphasakin haipau uh a, a khial gamtat mite sung panin a suakta khin liailiai zo mite, leitung pumpi deih bangin a gamtatna dingun a zol uhhi. 19 Amaute pen siatna a piangsak thei zongsatna lelin sila hinapi-un mite tungah suahtakna ding thu a gen uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh mite pen, a hong zo peuhpeuhte' sila ihi hi.
Leitung midang khempeuh Dawimangpa' khutsungah a om ahi zongin eite pen Pasian' mi ihihna thu i thei hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian' thu a ngaihsunlo mi pawlkhat, eite lakah kuama phawklohin hong lutsim uh a, amaute' mawh gamtat ngamnate a seelna-un Pasian' hehpihna thupha a lehlamin hei-in, eite in khat bek i neih i Mangpa leh i Topa ahi Zeisu Christ a nial uhhi. Hihbang mite' gimthuak ding thu tanglai pekin Laisiangtho in a gensa thu a hihi.
Tua mah bangin Nicolas pawlte' thuhilhna a um mi pawlkhat zong note lak mahah a om hi.
Tuate pen dawite' kha hi a, na lamdang a bawl uhhi. A Vanglian Pasian' Ni hong tun' ciangin gal a do dingin leitung gam khempeuhah a om kumpite a kaikhawm dingin a kuankhia uhhi.
Hih mi sawmte in ngimna khat nei uh a, vangliatna leh aana a neihteng uh a ganhing tungah a pia uhhi.

Amah nakpi takin kiko a, "A Lian Babylon khuapi kicim, kicim! Tu-in dawite' kua suak khinta-in, kha gilote' omna suak khinta a, a kihhuai, a muhdahhuai vasa namkim in omna-in neita uhhi. 3 Banghang hiam cihleh ama hukna leenggahzu mi khempeuh dawnsak a, leitung kumpite tawh paktat a, ama hukna hangin leitung sumbawlte in a hauhlawh uhhi," a ci hi. 4 Tua ciangin vantung panin aw dang khat ka za a, "Keima mite aw, a mawh gamtatna-ah kihel kha-in a gimthuakna thuakpih khading na hih manun hong paikhia un.

Leitung khempeuhah amaute pai uh a, Pasian' mi siangtho omna mun leh Pasian in a it khuapi umcih uhhi. Ahi zongin vantung panin meikuang hong paisukin amaute a kangtum hi. 10 Amaute a khem Satan pen ganhing leh kamsang zuaupa a omna mun, kat a kikhulna meiphualpi sungah kilawn a, a sun a zanin tua lai munah amaute in gimna a thuak tawntung ding uh a hihi.
Ahi zongin a lampial mite, aisan mite, a paktat mite, mi thatte, milim biate, leh zuaugen nuamsa-in zuau a gengen mite, khuapi pualamah a om uhhi.

Tu-in gulpi pen, { Topa } Pasian' bawlsa gamlak ganhing dangte khempeuh sangin ngiansiam zaw hi. Amah in numei kiangah, "Pasian in, ‘Huan sung singgah khat peuhpeuh ne lo ding,’ hong ci ahi hiam?" ci hi.

Ahih hangin gulpi in numei kiangah, "Na si kei ding uhhi. 5 Banghang hiam cihleh tua singgah na nek ciangun na mitte uh hong vak ding a, a pha leh a sia thei-in, Pasian tawh na kibat ding lamtak uh Pasian in thei hi," a ci hi.
Nang leh numei kikal na suanlekhakte leh ama suanlekhakte kikalah kilangneihna ka omsak ding hi. Amah in na lutang hong sunim ding a, nang in ama khetul na sunim ding hi," a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Faro in a mipilte leh a aisan siamte a sam hi. Egypt mitphial siamte in zong amau' siamna tawh tua bang teek mahin a bawl thei uhhi. 12 Banghang hiam cihleh a milip in a ciangkhut uh khia suk ciat uh a, tuate gulpi vive a suak hi. Ahih hangin Aaron' ciangkhut in amau' ciangkhutte a valhtum hi.
"Vankahte leh aisaanna lamah kihei kei un. Amaute tawh a kininsak dingin amaute zong kei un; kei pen { Topa } na Pasian uh ka hihi.
Tu-in Saul' tung panin { Topa' } kha paikhia a, { Topa } in kha gilo sawlin tua kha gilo in amah gimsak hi.
Satan in Israel mite gimsak nuam ahih manin Israel mi phazah a sim dingin David hanthawn hi.

Ni khat ni-in { Topa' } omna-ah vantung mite hong pai uh a, tuate lakah Satan zong hong kihel hi. 7 { Topa } in Satan kiangah, "Koi pana hong pai na hi hiam?" a ci hi. Satan in { Topa } dawngin, "Leitung khempeuh a lu pan a taw dong vak kawikawi-in ka va phehlehna mun panin ka hong pai hi," a ci hi.

Tua ciangin { Topa } in Satan kiangah, "En in, ama neihsa khempeuh na khutsungah kong ap hi; ahi zongin amah taktak ahih leh na su kei ding hi," a ci hi. Tua ciangin { Topa' } omna panin Satan a paikhia hi.

Tua ciangin Satan in { Topa } dawngin, "Vun bek in vun mah leizo bek, ci-in paunak a om mah bangin mi khat in ama nuntakna a hutna-in a neih khempeuh pia ngam ding hi. 5 Tu-in na khut zan in la, ama sa leh a guh suksak lecin nangma maitang mahah pelloin nang hong samsia ding hi," a ci hi. 6 Tua ciangin { Topa } in Satan kiangah, "En in, na khutsungah amah kong ap hi; ahi zongin amah sisak kei in," a ci hi. 7 Tua ahih ciangin { Topa' } omna panin Satan paikhia a, Job a khetul pan a luzang dongin a kihhuai meima a veisak hi.

A lungsim daplan lua ahih manin zuauphuah siamna tawh a hih khempeuh a tangtun' ding hi. Amah kiliansak lua-in theihkholh lohin mi tampi susia-in, a lianpen kumpite' kumpipa nangawn a langpan' ding hi. Ahih hangin mihing thahatna kizang loin amah a kisusia ding hi.

{ Topa } in maang hong musak a, { Topa' } vantung mi mai-ah siampi lianpenpa Joshua' mawhna a zong dingin a kiangah Satan zong a om ka mu hi. 2 { Topa' } vantung mi in Satan kiangah, "Satan aw, { Topa } in nang hong mawhsak hi. Jerusalem a it { Topa } in nang hong mawhsak hi. Hih Joshua pen meikhuk sung panin a kiteenkhia singkhuah tawh kibang hi," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin ama kiangah Dawimangpa hong pai a, "Pasian' Tapa na hih takpi leh hih suangte anlum a suahna dingin thu pia in," a ci hi.

"Pasian' Tapa taktak na hih leh Laisiangtho sungah, ‘Pasian in nang a hong kem dingin a vantung mite hong sawl ding hi. Na khete leh suang a kitahkhak lohna dingin vantung mite in a khut uh tawh nang hong dom ding hi,’ ci-in kigelh ahih manin, hih lai panin tuaksuk in," a ci hi.

Mi pawlkhat in Pasian' hong ukna tawh kisai a lungdamhuai thu za napi-in a thu theitello uh ahih manin Dawimangpa hong pai-in amau lungsim sunga a kivawh thu a lakkhiatsak hi. Hih bangte pen lolai lampi dung a tu khaicite tawh kibang hi.
Ahi zongin Christ kihei-in Peter kiangah, "Satan aw, ka nungah om in. Hih na ngaihsutnate Pasian' ngaihsutna hiloin mihingte' ngaihsutna ahih manin ka lam a hong khaktan ding a suak hi," a ci hi.
Khatveivei lamdung a tu khaici bang a, mite in a thu za napi-in, a zakkhit phetun Satan hong pai-in amaute sunga a kivawh thute lakkhiatsak hi.

Jerusalem khua pan a hong pai Thukham hilh siate pawlkhat in, "Hihpa sungah Beelzebul lut hi. Dawimangpa in ama tungah dawi hawlkhiat theihna ding vangliatna pia hi," a ci uhhi. 23 Tua ahih ciangin Christ in ama kiangah mite samin thugentehna tawh thu hilh a, "Satan in Satan bangci hawlkhiat theih ding ahi hiam? 24 Gam khat peuhpeuh phelnih kisuahin kido le uh tua gam kiplo ding hi. 25 Innkuan khat peuhpeuh phelnih kisuahin kido le uh tua innkuan kipzolo ding hi. 26 Satan leh Satan kikhenin kido le uh kipzolo ding uh a, a bei ding uhhita uhhi.

Christ in amaute kiangah, "Vantung panin keekkia bangin Satan a kiatna ka mu hi. 19 Tu-in thei un. Gulpi leh momaite na sikgawpna ding uh leh na galte uh na zawhna dingun note tungah vangliatna ka hong piazo a, amaute in note bangmah hong cih zolo ding uhhi.
Tua mah bangin Satan ukna sunga om mite zong khatlekhat kido le uh a ukna bangci kip ding ahi hiam? Kei pen, Beelzebul' vangliatna tawh dawi hawlkhia hi, nong ci uhhi.
Tua mah bangin Satan in Abraham' suante khat ahi hih numei pen kum sawmlegiat sung hencip hi. Hih a kihencipna panin Sabbath ni-in hih numei khahkhiat ding kilawm hilo ahi hiam?" a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Christ in, "Simon, Simon aw, lokhopa in buhhum a haih bangin note khempeuh hong ze-etna dingin Satan in thu a ngah khitna thu phawk in.

Note pen na pa uh Dawimangpa' tate na hi uh a, na pa uh deihna bangin a gamta nuam na hi uhhi. A kipata kipanin na pa uh mi that hi a, thuman gen ngeilo ahih manin thuman tawh kipawl theilo hi. Amah pen zuauna khempeuh a pian'na a zuaugenpa ahih manin zuau a gen ciangin ama ngeina hi lel hi.
Gutate pen a gu ding, a that ding, leh a siasak ding bekin hong pai hi. Kei ka hih leh tuute a nungta maimai bek hiloin nuntakna cingtaak a neihtheihna dingun a hong pai ka hihi.
Tu-in leitung thukhen ding hun hong tungta a, hih leitung a ukpa kilawnkhia ding hi.
Judas in tua an a nek khit phetin ama sungah Satan hong lutpah hi. Tua ahih manin Christ in ama kiangah, "Na hih ding peuhpeuh hihpak in," a ci hi.
Tu-in hih leitung a ukpa hong tungta ahih manin note kiangah thu kong gen man nawn kei ding hi. Amah in keima tungah aana neilo hi.
hih leitung a ukpa pen thukhenna a thuakkhin ahihna thu zong lak ding hi.
Peter in, "Ananias aw, banghangin Satan' thu-in gamta a, na lo zuak man sumte pawlkhat kem simin, Khasiangtho khem na hi hiam?

Pasian' teel mite' omna muna amau omna ding mun sanah hong om theihna dingun keimah hong upna uh tawh a mawhna uh a kimaisak theihna dingin Satan' khutsung panin Pasian' khutsungah a heikhia ding leh khuamial panin khuavak lamah hei-in a mit uh khua a musak dingpa na hi hi,’ a hong ci hi.
Tua hi leh eite tungah nopsakna a hong pia thei Pasian in Satan tuancilin note' khenuai mi hong hisak baih ding hi. I Topa Zeisu Christ hong hehpihna thupha, note tungah om ta hen.
Topa' Ni hong tun' ciangin tua bang mite' kha in hotkhiatna a ngahtheihna dingin Satan in amau pumpi a gimsak dingin na piakhia ta un.

Thungetna-in hun na zattheihna dingun tawlkhat sung tuam om ding thukim khawm masa lopi-in lupkhop ding kinialkha kei un. Tua bangin tawlkhat sung na tuam om khit uh ciangin note' pumpi' deihna hangin Satan' ze-etna sungah na pukkhak lohna dingun a ngeina bangin lupkhawm ding kipan kik un.
Mawhna maisak kei lehang Satan in nuamtaksa-in eite tungah hong gualzo khading ahih manin mawhna a maisak ihi hi. Satan' nasepna zia a theilo ihi kei hi.

Amaute pen sawltak taktak hiloin, sawltak a kineihkhemte hi uh a, a nasepna uhah zong zuau-in, Christ' sawltak taktak a battheihna dingun a meel kiseel ahi uhhi. 14 Tua pen lamdang sak ding hilo hi. Satan nangawn Pasian' vantung mi tawh a kibangin kibawltawm thei hi. 15 Tua ahih manin Satan' sawltakte pen thuman nasem bangin a kibawl manin lamdang sak ding hilo hi. Hun bei ni ciangin amau gamtatna bangun thuak ngawn ding uhhi.

Ahi zongin hih a lamdang na tampite ka muhna hangin kisialin ka kisaktheih khaklohna dingin Satan' sawltak bangin na a sem, keima pumpi sungah natna khat hong kipia ahih manin ka kisaktheih luatlohna dingin a hong kham hi.
Na heh uh ciangin, tua hehna hangin khialkha kei unla, a tawntungin heh paisuak kei un. 27 Dawimangpa in hong suksiat theihna ding hun omsak kei un.

Tu-a kipanin Topa tawh na kipawlna uh leh ama vangliatna hangin na tha uh khauhsak ta un. 11 Dawimangpa' hong hihna ding khempeuh na dalzawhna dingun Pasian' galvan namkim na zang un. 12 Eite' do pen leitung mite hilo a, vantung huihlakah a om ukna, aana a neite, hih leitung khuamial a uk a tuamtuamte a hihi.
Note kiangah hong hawhkik nuam ka hih manun note kiangah hawhkik ding ka hanciam zelzel hangun kong pai ding uh Satan in hong khaktan hi.

Tua ahih manin ka thuakzawh nawnloh ciangin note' upna zia a thei dingin Hebrews ka hong sawl hi. Dawimangpa' ze-etna in note hong puksakkha-in, kote' nasepna a mawkna suakkha ding hi, ci-in ka lunghimawh uhhi.

Satan' vangliatna tawh a gilopa hong pai-in, lim leh na lamdang a tuamtuamte hong bawl ding a, 10 gitloh khemna a nam tuamtuam zangin, siatna a thuakding mite a khem ding hi. Tua bang mite in a suahtakna dingun thuman sang nuamlo, deihlo uh ahih manin siatna a tuak uh a hihi.
Tua bang mite lakah Hymenaias leh Alexander kihel uh a, Pasian gensiat nawnlohna ding thu a phawktheihna dingun Satan' khutsungah amaute ka ap hi.

Tua ahih manin a khangno lai meigong numeite in pasal nei-in, ta nei-in, amau innkuansung ukin, i langte' hong gensiatna ding a omlohna ding ka deihzaw hi. 15 Banghang hiam cihleh meigong numei pawlkhat, Satan' nung a zui dingin kipan khinta uhhi.
Pasian khat bek om hi, ci-in na um hi. Tua pen hoih mahmah hi. Dawite nangawn in zong tua bangin umin lau-in ling deldel uhhi.
Tua ahih manin Pasian' thu na mang un. Dawimangpa na nial un. Nial le uh cin no kiang panin taikhia ding hi.
Note pilvangin khua phawk un. Na gal uh ahi Dawimangpa, humpinelkai bangin a nektheih ding zongin vak kawikawi hi.
A kipat cila kipanin Dawimangpa in mawhna bawl tawntung ahih manin mawhna a bawl mi khempeuhte zong Dawimangpa' mi a hihi. Hih Dawimangpa' nasepna a beisak dingin Pasian' Tapa a hong pai hi.
Leitung midang khempeuh Dawimangpa' khutsungah a om ahi zongin eite pen Pasian' mi ihihna thu i thei hi.

Vantung milianpa Michael nangawn tua bangin gamta ngamlo hi. Moses' luanghawm kituhin Dawimangpa tawh a kitot laitakin Michael in Dawimangpa zahkona kammal zang ngamloin, "Topa in nang hong taii ta hen," ci bek hi.

Na lungkhamnate uh leh na zawn'nate uh ka thei hi. A taktakin note a hau na hi uhhi. Jew mi hilo napi-in Jew mi ka hi uhhi, ci-in note a hong gensiatnate uh ka thei hi. Tua bang mite pen Satan' pawlte ahi uhhi. 10 Na thuakding uh haksatnate kihta kei un. Dawimangpa in note pawlkhat thong sungah hong khia-in hong ze-et ding hi. Gimna na thuak hun ding uh ni sawm sung bek hi ding hi. Na sih dongun kei tungah hong citak un. Tua hi leh nuntakna lukhu ka hong pia ding hi.

Satan in a kumpi tokhom a phuhna munah a om na hih lamtak uh ka thei hi. Keima thu citakin teci a pang cinten Antipas, Satan' omna munah a kithah hun laitak nangawnin kei na hong upna uh na khahsuah kei uhhi.

Ahi zongin Thiatira khua-a om note pawlkhat in tua numei' thuhilhna hoihlote na zui kei uh a, mite in, ‘Satan' thu thukpite hi,’ a cih thute na sukha kei uhhi. Note tungah vangik bangmah ka hong suan kei ding hi.
Jew mi hilo napi-in Jew mi hi ung, ci-in zuau a gen Satan' pawlte, note' mai-ah hong paisakin na khephung uhah ka boksak ding a, note ka hong itna thu amaute ka theisak ding hi.

Tua ciangin lim lamdang adang khat mah vanah hong kilang leuleu hi. Gulpi san a lian mahmah khat om a, lutang sagih leh ki sawm nei a, a lutang sagihte-ah lukhu mah nei ciat hi. 4 A mei tawh vanah a om aksi sehsawmsuah sehkhat vatkhia-in leilak a den'na hi. A nau a suah phetin a ne pah dingin nausuak dingin a kithawi tua numei' mai-ah a ding hi.

Tu-in vantungah galkidona hong om a, Michael leh a vantung mite in gulpi leh a vantung mite a do uhhi. 8 Ahi zongin tua gulpi guallel ahih manin tua gulpi leh a vantung mite, vantungah kiom sak nawnlo hi. 9 Tua ciangin tua tanglai gulpi, Dawimangpa ahih kei leh Satan a kici, leitung mi khempeuh a khempa pen a vantung mite tawh leitungah kilawnsuk hi. 10 Tua ciangin vantungah nakpi takin awging khat ka za a, "Tu-in Pasian in hong honkhia khinta a, kumpi vangliatna a neihna hong lakkhia khinta a, ama Christ in aana a neihna thu lakkhia khinta hi. Banghang hiam cihleh a sun a zanin eite' Pasian' mai-ah dingin i sanggamte mawhsakna a gen tawntungpa, tu-in vantung panin kilawnkhia khinta hi.

Tua ciangin vantung panin vantung mi khat hong paisukin, kuahawm thukpi hon'na tawhtang leh sikkhau khainiang golpi khat a tawi ka mu hi. 2 Amah in tanglai gulpi, Dawimangpa ahih kei leh Satan zong a kicipa manin kum tul khat sung a hencip hi. 3 Tua ciangin kuahawm thukpi sungah khiasuk a, kum tul khat a cin'mateng minam tuamtuamte a khemtheih nawnlohna dingin a tawh kalhin a ciamteh hi. Kum tul khat a cin'khit ciangin tawlkhat sung a kikhah ding a hihi.

Kum tul khat a cin' ciangin a thongkiatna panin Satan kikhah ding a, 8 Gog leh Magog a kici leitung gam khempeuhah a om minam khempeuh a khem dingin kuankhia ding hi. Satan in a galsimpih dingin tuipi gei-a sehnel zahin a tam mihonpi kaikhawm ding hi. 9 Leitung khempeuhah amaute pai uh a, Pasian' mi siangtho omna mun leh Pasian in a it khuapi umcih uhhi. Ahi zongin vantung panin meikuang hong paisukin amaute a kangtum hi. 10 Amaute a khem Satan pen ganhing leh kamsang zuaupa a omna mun, kat a kikhulna meiphualpi sungah kilawn a, a sun a zanin tua lai munah amaute in gimna a thuak tawntung ding uh a hihi.
Tua ahih ciangin singkung a hoihna, mi a pilsak dingin tua a gah a deihhuaina a muh ciangin, a singgah lo-in a ne hi. Amah in singgah kimkhat a pasal pia a, a pasal in zong a ne hi.
Satan in Israel mite gimsak nuam ahih manin Israel mi phazah a sim dingin David hanthawn hi.
Amah in a kihtakhuai ganhing a kihisak pente nangawn nuai-et lai a, amah pen gamsa khempeuh' kumpi ahi hi," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin note in, "{ Topa } in note hong hilh thute ngai un. Aisante' thu ngai kei un. Amaute' hong gen thute a kiman'na omlo hi," ci-in dawng un.
"Nang Khuavak' ta, Zingsol, Babylon kumpipa aw, vantung panin nang bangci kiat na hi hiam? Minamte a niam koihpa ahi nangmah leilak dongah hong bangci kiphukpai ahi hiam?

"Syria kumpipa a ut bangbangin a gamta ding hi. Amah in, pasian-te sangin ka lianzaw a, a Lianpen Pasian sangin zong ka thupizaw lai hi, ci-in a kisathei ding hi. Pasian in amah gim a piak mateng tua bangin a om ding hi. 37 Kumpipa in a pu a pate' biak pasian leh numeite in a it pasian a thusim kei ding hi. Pasian a kici peuhmah khat beek a thusim kei ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh tuate sangin amah a lianzaw-in a kingaihsun hi. 38 Tua pasian-te sangin kulhpi a dal pasian a thupisim zaw ding hi. Amah in kham, ngun, suangmanpha, leh a thupi letsongte, a pu a pate' biak ngeiloh pasian kiangah a pia ding hi. 39 Amah in a kulhpi a ciang dingin pasian dang a biate a sawl ding hi. Amah in amah kumpi-in a sang mite minphatna, zaliatna pia-in, leitang nangawn letsongin a pia ding hi.

Mi pawlkhat in Pasian' hong ukna tawh kisai a lungdamhuai thu za napi-in a thu theitello uh ahih manin Dawimangpa hong pai-in amau lungsim sunga a kivawh thu a lakkhiatsak hi. Hih bangte pen lolai lampi dung a tu khaicite tawh kibang hi.

Lolai pen leitung hi a, taangci hoih i cih pen Pasian' ukna sungah a om mite ahi uhhi. Tahumte pen Gilopa tawh a kipawl mite hi a, 39 tahum tang a vawh galpa pen Dawimangpa a hihi. Anlak hun pen leitung beina ding hun hi a, anla nasemte pen vantung mite a hihi.
"Tua ciangin a veilamah a om mite kiangah, ‘Pasian in a samsiat mite aw, keima kiang panin paikhia unla, Dawimangpa leh a nungzuite-a' dingin a kibawl meikuang tawntung sungah pai un.
Tua mah bangin Satan ukna sunga om mite zong khatlekhat kido le uh a ukna bangci kip ding ahi hiam? Kei pen, Beelzebul' vangliatna tawh dawi hawlkhia hi, nong ci uhhi.
Tua mah bangin Satan in Abraham' suante khat ahi hih numei pen kum sawmlegiat sung hencip hi. Hih a kihencipna panin Sabbath ni-in hih numei khahkhiat ding kilawm hilo ahi hiam?" a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Note na sawmlenih mahun ka hong teel hinapi-in khat pen dawi na suakmawk uhhi," a ci hi.
Note pen na pa uh gamtat bangin a gamta na hi uhhi," a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute in, "Kote pen zawlta ka hi kei uh a, ka Pa uh Pasian ahi hi," a cih uh ciangin

Note pen na pa uh Dawimangpa' tate na hi uh a, na pa uh deihna bangin a gamta nuam na hi uhhi. A kipata kipanin na pa uh mi that hi a, thuman gen ngeilo ahih manin thuman tawh kipawl theilo hi. Amah pen zuauna khempeuh a pian'na a zuaugenpa ahih manin zuau a gen ciangin ama ngeina hi lel hi.
Zeisu leh a nungzuite nitak an ne-in a tukhawm uhhi. Tua hun laitakin dawimangpa in Simon Iskariot' tapa Judas' lungsim sungah Zeisu lehhekna ding ngaihsutna koih khinzo hi.
Peter in, "Ananias aw, banghangin Satan' thu-in gamta a, na lo zuak man sumte pawlkhat kem simin, Khasiangtho khem na hi hiam?

Nazareth khuami Zeisu tungah Pasian in Khasiangtho leh vangliatna pia a, Pasian in a ompihna hangin tua Zeisu in a paina khempeuhah na hoih semin, Dawimangpa in a gimsak mite khempeuh a damsakna thu zong na thei uhhi.
"Dawimangpa tawh a kibang mipa aw, thuhoih khempeuh nialin, gitlohna ngian tuamtuam na nei a, Topa' thuman pen zuau suahsak ding na hanciam tawntung hi.

Pasian' teel mite' omna muna amau omna ding mun sanah hong om theihna dingun keimah hong upna uh tawh a mawhna uh a kimaisak theihna dingin Satan' khutsung panin Pasian' khutsungah a heikhia ding leh khuamial panin khuavak lamah hei-in a mit uh khua a musak dingpa na hi hi,’ a hong ci hi.
Mawhna khutnuai-ah eite i om nawnlohna dingin mawhnopna lungsim i neihnateng i sucip a, singlamteh tungah Christ a sih laitak mahin i ngeina luiteng a sisak khawm ihihna thu i thei hi.

Mi khatpeuh' thu a mang dingin ama khutsungah na kipiak uh ciangin a thu na mante uh' sila na hi uhhi. Mawhna na bawl uh leh sihna a thuak ding na hi uh a, thumangin na om uh leh Pasian tawh pawlkhat a suak ding na hi uhhi.
Mawhna maisak kei lehang Satan in nuamtaksa-in eite tungah hong gualzo khading ahih manin mawhna a maisak ihi hi. Satan' nasepna zia a theilo ihi kei hi.

Tua bang mite pen hih leitung pasian gilote in a lungsim mit uh tawsak ahih manin umlo uh a, Pasian tawh a kibang teekteek Christ minthan'na hangin amaute tungah a hong taang lungdamna thu khuavak mu theilo uhhi.
Ahi zongin gulpi in ama zuau ngian tawh Eve a khemzawh bangin na lungsim uh kihei-in Christ tungah na kipiaknate uh na nusiatkhak ding uh ka lunghimawh hi.

A beisa hunah na thuman'lohna uh leh na mawhna uh hangin kha thu tawh kisai-ah a si na hi uhhi. 2 Tuahun lai-in leitung gitloh gamtatnate na zui uh a, Pasian thu a umlo mite sungah tu laitakin na a sem, huihlak a ukte' thu na mang uhhi. 3 A taktakin eite khempeuh zong amaute mah i bang ngei a, i pian'pih lungsim zui-in nungta-in, i pumpi leh i lungsim deihna bangin i gamta hi. Tua ahih manin eite khempeuh zong Pasian' hehna hangin gim a thuak dingte ihi hi.

Tua ahih manin ka thuakzawh nawnloh ciangin note' upna zia a thei dingin Timothy ka hong sawl hi. Dawimangpa' ze-etna in note hong puksakkha-in, kote' nasepna a mawkna suakkha ding hi, ci-in ka lunghimawh uhhi.
Ahi zongin kuama khemsa-in ta kei un. Banghang hiam cihleh nakpi takin Pasian langpan'na lianpi leh hell khuksung a tungding ahi A Gilopa hong kilat matengin tua Ni hong tunglo ding hi.

Tua ahih manin a khangno lai meigong numeite in pasal nei-in, ta nei-in, amau innkuansung ukin, i langte' hong gensiatna ding a omlohna ding ka deihzaw hi. 15 Banghang hiam cihleh meigong numei pawlkhat, Satan' nung a zui dingin kipan khinta uhhi.
Dawimangpa in ama deihna bangin a gamta dingin a mat khit hangin ama thang panin amaute suakta khathei ding uhhi.
Mi khatpeuh in ama deihna zui-in a gamtat ciangin mawhna a piangsak a hihi. 15 Lungsim utna a gol semsem ciangin mawhna hong piang a, mawhna hong cingtaak ciangin sihna hong piang hi.

Mite lakah kamsang manlo a omngei mah bangin note lakah sia manlo hong om ding hi. Siatna a piangsak thei thuhilhna a manlo hong lutpih simin, amaute mahmah a tankhia Topa nangawn nial ding uhhi. Tua ahih manin thakhat thu-in siatna thuaklawh ding uhhi.

A kipat cila kipanin Dawimangpa in mawhna bawl tawntung ahih manin mawhna a bawl mi khempeuhte zong Dawimangpa' mi a hihi. Hih Dawimangpa' nasepna a beisak dingin Pasian' Tapa a hong pai hi. 9 Pasian' tate in mawhna bawlbawllo uhhi. Pasian' tate hi a, Pasian' lungsim paii uh ahih manin mawhna zong bawl nuamlo uhhi. 10 Hih pen Pasian tate leh Dawimangpa' tate a kilamdan'na a hihi. A manin gamta loin, a Christian mipihte a itlo mi peuhmah, Pasian' tate hilo uhhi. 11 A kipat cila kipanin na zak tawntung uh thu pen khatlekhat i ki-itna ding thu a hihi. 12 Dawimangpa' mi ahi, a naupa mahmah a that Kain bang kei ni. Kain a gamtatna manlo a, a naupa' gamtatna man ahih manin Kain in a naupa a that a hihi.
Ka it tate aw, note, Pasian' mite na hi uh a, tua bang kamsang kineihkhemte a zokhin na hi uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh leitung mite a pan'pih dawimangpa sangin note hong ompih Pasian vanglian zaw hi.
Leitung midang khempeuh Dawimangpa' khutsungah a om ahi zongin eite pen Pasian' mi ihihna thu i thei hi.

Jew mi hilo napi-in Jew mi hi ung, ci-in zuau a gen Satan' pawlte, note' mai-ah hong paisakin na khephung uhah ka boksak ding a, note ka hong itna thu amaute ka theisak ding hi. 10 Note in lungduai takin na thuakna ding uh ka hong thupiakna zui na hih manun leitunga a om mi khempeuh ze-etna dingin leitung bupah a hong tungding lungkhamna panin kei zong note ka hong suaktasak ding hi.

Tua ahih manin vantungte leh tuate sungah a teng mi khempeuh aw, lungdam un! Ahi zongin vantung panin Dawimangpa hong kilawnkhia suk a, hun tomno bek a neilai ahihlam thei ahih manin leitung leh tui tungah a omte-a' dingin lauhuai mahmah ding hi," hong ci hi.
Ahi zongin a meidawite, a lehtatte, a lampialte, mi thatte, a paktatte, aisante, milim biate, leh zuaugente omna ding mun pen sihna nihna ahi kat a kikhulna meiphualpi kuang sung ahi hi," a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Pasian in, "Eima lim, eimah hong sunin mihing bawl ni. Tuipi ngasate tung, huihlak vasate tung, ganhingte tung, leh leitunga a bokvakte khempeuh tungah ukna neisak ni," a ci hi. 27 Tua ahih ciangin Pasian in ama lim bangin mihing piangsakin, Pasian' lim bangin amah a piangsak hi. Amah in pasal leh numei a piangsak hi.

Egypt gam a tum ding ciangin amah in a zi Sarai' kiangah, "Nang pen nupi melhoih khat na hihna ka thei hi. 12 Egypt mite in nang hong muh ciangin amaute in, ‘Hih nu ama zi hi,’ ci ding uhhi. Tua ciangin amaute in kei hong that ding uh a, ahi zongin amaute in nang hong nungtasak ding uhhi.
{ Topa } in ama kiangah, "Na gil sungah mi nam nih om a, nang' sung pan a suak mihing nihte kikhen ding hi. Khat pen a khat sangin hat zaw ding a, a uzaw in a nauzaw' na sem ding hi," a ci hi.
Isaac in Esau' sa matsa nene ahih manin Esau mah itzaw a, ahi zongin Rebekah in Jacob itzaw hi.

Rebekah in a tapa Jacob kiangah, "Na sanggampa Esau' tungah na pa' thugen ka za a, 7 ‘Ka sih ma-in { Topa' } mai-ah nang thupha kong piak theihna dingin ka nek dingin na sa matsa hong paipih in la, kei-a' dingin an lim hong bawl in,’ ci hi. 8 Tua ahih ciangin tu-in ka ta aw, kong thupiak bangin gamta in. 9 Ama duh bangin na pa-a' dingin an lim ka bawl theihna dingin keelhon lakah va pai in la keelno a hoih nih hong paipih in. 10 Na pa in a sih ma-in nang thupha hong piak theihna dingin a nek dingin na pa kiangah na va paipih ding hi," a ci hi.

Tu-in Israel in a ta dangte khat peuhpeuh sangin Joseph itzaw hi. Banghang hiam cihleh a teek khitin a neih a tapa a hihi. Amah in ama-a' dingin puantualpi bansau khat a bawlsak hi. 4 Ahih hangin a pa un a sanggamte khempeuh sangin amah a itzawkna a sanggamte in a muh uh ciangin, amaute in Joseph mudah uh a, nuamtakin amah hopih theilo uhhi.

Kote in ka topa uh kiangah, ‘Kote in a teek pa khat leh a teek zawhin a neih sanggam pasal moilai khat ka nei uhhi. Ama sanggampa si a, a nu' tate sung pan amah bek omlai hi. A pa in amah it mahmah hi,’ kong ci uhhi.

Amah in a mipihte kiangah, "En un, Israel mite eite-a' dingin tam lua-in thahat lua uhhi. 10 Amaute hong tam khading uh ahih manin ngaihsut siamna tawh amaute hih ni. Eite tungah gal hong om leh amaute in i galte pawlin eite hong do-in hih gam panin taikhia khading uhhi," a ci hi.
"Khualmi khatpeuh na bawlsia kei ding uh a, na nengniam kei ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh note zong Egypt leitangah khual mite na hi ngei uhhi.
Ama thu neihna-ah mizawngpa na langneih kei ding uhhi.

Note in bilngongte phuisam loin, mittawte' mai-ah a puk theihna ding na na koih kei ding uh a, note in na Pasian uh na zahtak ding uhhi; kei pen { Topa } ka hihi. 15 "Note in thukhenna-ah thu a tangloin na khen kei ding uhhi. Mizawngte langgen loin, a liante' thu zuiloin, thumanna tawh na vengte uh thu na khen ding uhhi.

"Na gamsung uhah note lakah khualmi khat hong peem leh, ama tungah a manloin na gamta kei ding uhhi. 34 Note lakah a hong peem khualmite tualsung mi mah bangin na ngaihsun ding uh a, nomau mah bangin amaute na it ding uhhi; banghang hiam cihleh note pen Egypt gam sungah khualmi na hi ngei uhhi; kei pen { Topa } na Pasian uh ka hihi.
"Na gei-a om na sanggampa zawngin, nangma tungah amahmah hong kizuak leh, sila bangin na na semsak kei ding hi.

Moses in Kush numei khat ten'pih ahih manin, ama ten'pih Kush numei' hangin Miriam leh Aaron in amah gensia-in, 2 "{ Topa } in Moses' tung bek tawnin thu gen ahi hiam? Eite' tung zong tawnin hong gen hilo ahi hiam?" a ci uhhi. { Topa } in tua thu a za hi.

"Tua hun laitakin na thukhente uh ka thuhilh a, ‘Na sanggamte uh thu neihte za unla, mi khat leh a sanggampa ahi a, amah tawh a om khualmipa tawh ahi zongin thu a mantakin khen un. 17 Thukhenna-ah angvan na nei kei ding uhhi. A neu leh a liante a kibangin a thu na ngai ding uh a, maitang zahtak tuam na nei kei ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh thukhenna pen Pasian-a' a hihi. Note-a' dingin a haksa lua thute kei kiangah nong paipih ding uh a, keimah in tua thu ka za ding hi,’ ka ci hi.
Thutang na heikhia kei ding uh a, angvan tuam na nei kei ding uhhi. Sumgolh in mipilte' mit tawsakin thumante' thu heikhia ahih manin sumgolh na la kei ding uhhi.

"Mi khat in zi nih nei a, khat itin a khat mudah a, a it leh a muhdah a zite gel in ta nei tuakin, tapa a neih cil pen a muhdahnu tawh a neih ahih leh, 16 a tapate tungah gamhluah dingin ama neihsa a hawm ciangin, a mudahnu' tapa cil sangin deihzawkna hangin a itnu' tapa pen a ta cilin bawl theilo ding hi.
"Mi khat in Israel mi a sanggamte khat gu-in, amah in sila bangin a bawl ahi a, a zuak ahi zongin a kimuh leh, tua gutapa kithat ding hi. Tua bangin note' lak panin siatna na siangsak ding uhhi.

Amah in Hannah a it hangin { Topa } in amah ta neisaklo ahih manin Hannah tungah tanh khat bek a pia hi. 6 { Topa } in amah ta neisaklo ahih manin amah a el a zipih in amah nakpi takin phin zel, hehsak zel hi.

Ahih hangin bangmah a manlo mi pawlkhat in, "Hih mipa in eite hong bangci hotkhiat zawh ding ahi hiam?" a ci uhhi. Amaute in amah simmawhin ama kiangah letsong puaklo uhhi. Ahih hangin amah in tua mite bangmah cihlo hi.

Saul heh mahmah a, hih thugenna in amah lungkimlo sak hi. Amah in, "Amaute in David tungah a tul sawmin pia-in, kei tungah a tulin hong pia bek uhhi. Kumpi min puak cih simloh bang dang nei nawn ka hi hiam?" a ci hi. 9 Tua ni-a kipan Saul in David encik hi.

Tua ciangin Nabal in David' nasemte dawngin, "David kua ahi hiam? Jessi' tapa kua ahi hiam? Tulai-in a tote kiang panin a taikhia nasem tampi om hi. 11 Ka anlum leh ka tui leh ka gan mul meette-a' dingin ka gawh ka sate la-in koilai panin hong pai cih ka theihloh mite tungah pia ding ka hi hiam?" a ci hi.

Thukhente tungah, "Note in mi-a' ding hiloin { Topa}-a' dingin a khen na hih manun na hih dingte uh limtakin ngaihsun un; thukhenna na piak laitakun note kiangah amah hong om hi. 7 Tu-in note in { Topa } zahtak unla, na hihnate uhah kingaihsun un. Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } i Pasian in thuman heikhiatna, mi deidanna, leh sumgolh laknate deihlo hi," a ci hi.
Mite in hih thukham a zak uh ciangin Israel mite lak panin gamdang suan peuhmah khenkhia uhhi.
Thukhen zumah amah samin hong pai hita mah leh zong ka thumna hong ngai dingin ka um tuan kei hi.

Ka khialh phetin gim nong pia pah a, ka gamtat hoih ciangin zong nong pakta tuan kei hi. Mindaina leh maizumna tawh kei ka kidim hi. 16 Mavan'na khatpeuh neisun leng zong, humpinelkai bangin ka siatna ding na zong a, kei' gimtheihna dingin na lamdang tuamtuam nangawn na bawl liang hi. 17 Kei a hong langpang dingin teci na nei tawntung a, keima tungah na hehna hong khang semsem a, kei nong sukna ding thuthak na mu tawntung hi.
Pasian pen mi khempeuh a hong piangsakpa hi a, amah in uliante pan'pih tuan neilo a, mizawngte sangin mihaute thupi ngaihsutzaw tuanlo hi.
"Note in bang tanvei a manloin thu khenin, migilote tungah angvanna zang ding na hi uhhiam?
A hau a zawng a kilamdan'na omlo a, a nih tuakun { Topa' } bawlsa ahi uhhi.

Mipil dangte in zong hih bangin thu gen uhhi: Mi lang muhin thukhenna hoihlo hi. 24 Mimawh kimlai a diksak thukhenpa leitunga mi khempeuh in mudahin phuisam ding hi. 25 A mawh mi gim a pia thukhenpa ahih leh thupha kipia-in daupai ding hi.
Mi langbawlna hoihlo a, ahi zongin letsong neucik khat hangin thukhente gamta khial thei zel hi.
Mizawngpa leh mi bawlsiapa a kibatna uh khat om hi. { Topa } in a nih tuakun mittang guan' hi.
Ka vom manin hong en neu kei un. Nisa ka thuakna hang a hihi. Ka ute in kei hong gawtbawl uh a, lo hong kuansaksak uh a, ka pumpi ka don man kei hi.
Gamtat hoih ding kisin un. Thumanin gamta unla, kinetniamna kheel un. Pa neilote hu unla, meigong numei pan'pih un," ci hi.

ka mual siangtho-ah paipihin keima thungetna innsungah ka lungdamsak ding a, amaute' meihal biakna leh a biakpiaknate uh ka biakna tau tungah kisang ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh ka inn pen mi khempeuh-a' dingin thungetna inn kici ding hi.

"Note kiang panin kote hong kituamkoih ahih manin kihemkhia unla, ko kiangah hong pai kei un," ci-in midangte tungah a gen mite — hih bang mite khempeuh a sang dingin a beisa hun sungah ka kiging tawntung hi. Hih bang mite ka thuakzo nawn kei hi. Amaute tungah ka hehna pen a mit ngeilo meikuang tawh kibang hi.
Tua ciangin Babylon mite pawlkhat pai-in Jew mite a heksim uhhi.
Gam ukpi dangte leh vaihawmpi dangte sangin Daniel nasep siamzaw diak se hi. Tua bangin siamzaw diak se ahih manin kumpipa in gam buppi ukin koih ding a ngaihsun hi.

Mun khempeuhah a om no mihingte aw, { Topa } in a hoih nate hong gen khinzo hi. { Topa } in note tung panin hong kalh thu in: Thuman thutang sem ding a, itna kip nei tawntungin, kiniamkhiatna tawh Pasian' thu man' ding a hihi.

"Note in thu a tangin khenin, khatlekhat tungah itna leh hehpihna kilakin, 10 note lakah a om meigong, tagah, gamdang mite, ahih kei leh mizawngte gim pialoin, khatlekhat kiliatsakna ding na ngaihsut lohna ding uh thu ka hong piazo hi," a ci hi.

Tua ahih manin, note in ka thuhilhna zuiloin, keima thu na hilh uh ciangin zong a kibangin hilhloin mi na deidan mah uh bangin, kei zong mi khempeuh mai-ah simmawhna leh niamkhiatna kong ngahsak ding hi," a ci hi.
Na lawmte bek uh hopihin thupha na piak uh leh mi mawkmawkte sangin na hoihzawkna uh bang om ahi hiam? Gentail mite nangawn in tua bang ciang lel hih thei uhhi.

Banghang hiam cihleh midangte' thu na khenzia uh tawh kizui-in note tungah hong khen ding a, midangte tungah na zat uh ngeina mah note tungah hong zang ding hi. 3 Banghangin na lawmte' mit sunga ninthem tang muhsak thei napi-in nangma mit sunga singluang tang phawk theilo na hi hiam? 4 Nangma mit sungah singluang a tang kimlai, bangci-in na lawmte kiangah, ‘Na mit sunga ninthem tang hong lakkhiatsak ning,’ ci thei ding na hi hiam? 5 No a kineihkhem mite aw, note' mit sunga singluang tang lakhia masa le uh cin, na lawmte uh mit sunga ninthem tang na lakkhiat theihna dingun hoihtakin khua na mu thei pan ding uhhi.
Tua ahih manin note tungah hong kibawl ding na deih bangun midangte tungah na bawl un. Moses Thukhamte leh kamsangte' thuhilhnate pen hih mah a deihna a hihi.
Zeisu in hih mi sawmlenihte sawl a, "Gentail mite gamsung ahi a, Samaria mite khuasungah ahi zongin lut kei un. 6 Tuu bangin a mangthang Israel mite lakah va paizaw un.

Tua gamah a teng Kanaan nupi khat hong pai-in hong kiko a, "David' suan, Topa aw, kei hong hehpih in. Ka tanu in dawi vei a, nasia mahmah hi," ci-in a hong thum hi. 23 Ahi zongin Zeisu in kam khat beek paupihlo hi. Tua ciangin a nungzuite in Zeisu kiangah, "Hih nupi i nung zui-in kikoko ahih manin a ciahna dingin sawl in," ci-in a thum uhhi. 24 Zeisu in, "Tuu bangin a mangthang Israel mite lak bekah kei hong kisawl hi," ci-in a dawng hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh note kiangah Tuiphumpa Johan hong pai-in thuman lampi hong lak napi-in na um kei uh a, ahi zongin siahdongte leh numei paktatte in a um uhhi. Hih thu na theih khit uh ciang nangawnin na lungsim uh na kheel nuam tuan kei uh a, na um kei veve uhhi.

Pawi sungah a om uh ciangin uliante' tutna dinga a kibawl munah tunuam se uh a, kikhopna innsungah zong uliante tutna tutphah nuampente tungah a tunuam diak uhhi. 7 Mihon lakah mite in hopihin, ‘Sia aw,’ a cihding uh a ut uhhi. 8 Ahi zongin note pen, ‘Sia,’ na kicihding uhhilo hi. Sia khat bek na nei uh a, no adangte khempeuh unau khat na hi uhhi.

"Mihoih a kineihkhem, no Thukham hilh siate leh Pharisee mite in gimna na thuak ding uhhi. Meigong numeite tungah nuamtak sa-in a neihsa teng uh laksakin na zangmang uh a, mite in mihoih hong saktheihna ding na deihna-un thu saupipi na ngen uhhi. Hih bangin na gamtatna uh hangin na gim thuak ding uh nasiazaw kan lai ding hi.

A Sabbath ni ciangin kikhopna inn-ah thu a hilh hi. Ama thuhilh a za mi tampite in lamdangsa-in, "Hihpa in hih thute koi panin a ngah ahi hiam? Hihpa tungah a kipia pilna a bang pilna ahi hiam? Bangci-in na lamdang hici bawltheih ahi hiam? 3 Amah khutsiampa hilel a, Mary' tapa hilo ahi hiam? James, Joseph, Judas, leh Simon-te' u hilo ahi hiam? A nau numeite zong hih lai mah-a om hilo ahi uhhiam?" a ci uhhi. Tua hi a, amah sangzolo uhhi.

"No hong itte bek it le uh cin banghangin thupha ngah ding na hi uhhiam? Mawhnei mite nangawn in amau a itte a it uhhi. 33 No tungah a hoihin a hong gamtate tung bekah a hoihin gamta le uh cin banghangin thupha ngah ding na hi uhhiam? Mawhneite nangawn tua bangmahin gamta uhhi. 34 Ngahkik ding na lametna uh mite tung bekah leitawi na piak uh leh banghangin thupha ngah ding na hi uhhiam? Mawhneite nangawn in zong a piakzah mah uh a ngahkik dingin khatlekhat kileitawi uhhi.
Tua mah bangin Satan ukna sunga om mite zong khatlekhat kido le uh a ukna bangci kip ding ahi hiam? Kei pen, Beelzebul' vangliatna tawh dawi hawlkhia hi, nong ci uhhi.
Ahi zongin Abraham in, ‘Amaute in Moses leh kamsangte' thu a man'nop kei uh leh, mi khat hong hingkikin amaute kiangah a va gen hangin umsakzo tuanlo ding hi,’ ci-in a dawng hi," a ci hi.

Pharisee mipa dingin thu ngen a, ‘Pasian aw, kei pen midangte bangin a huaiham, a thumanlo, numei tungah a mawh mi ka hi kei hi; hua lai-a siahdongpa bang hilo ka hih manin nangma tungah ka nuamna kong pulak hi.

Ahi zongin note lakah tua bang hilo ding hi; a lianpenpa a neupen bangin om ding a, a makai penpa a nungzui nunungpen bangin om ding hi. 27 Anne dingin sabuai-ah a tupa leh an a piapa kua lianzaw ahi hiam? Anne dingin a tupa lianzaw mah hi. Ahi zongin kei pen note lakah anpia-in na a sempa bangin ka hong om hi.
Jew mite in buah tang uh a, Samaria mite' na zatte zanglo uh ahih manin, Samaria numei in Zeisu kiangah, "Banghangin nang Jew mi in kei Samaria numei kiangah tui hong ngen na hi hiam?" a ci hi.
A tungthama kimu nate siksanin thu khen kei unla, thu taktak siksanin thu khenzaw un," a ci hi.
pawlkhat in, "Hihpa, Christ ahi hi," a ci uhhi. Ahi zongin pawlkhat in, "Galilee gam panin Christ hong piang ding ahi hiam?
Tua ciangin amaute in, "Nang zong Galilee gammi na hi hiam? Laisiangtho sung sim lecin Galilee gamsung panin kamsang khat beek a pian' ngeilohna thu na thei ding hi," a ci uhhi.

Zeisu in amaute' khe a silsak khit ciangin a puan silhkik a, annek sabuai-ah a tutnasa mun hong zuanin, "Tu-a note tungah ka hong gamtatna thu na thei uhhiam? 13 Note in kei pen Siapa, leh Topa, na hong ci uhhi. Na hong cih uh mah bangin a man ka hihi. 14 Note' Topa leh Siapa in na khe uh hong silsak ka hih leh note khatlekhat na kisilsak kan ding uh kilawm hi. 15 Note tungah ka hong gamtat bangin note na gamtat theihna dingun a lim a hong lak ka hihi. 16 A mantakin ci lehang, sila pen a topa sangin lianzaw ngeilo a, a kisawlpa zong a sawlpa sangin lianzaw ngeilo hi. 17 Hih thu thei-in na zuih uh leh na lung uh nuam mahmah ding hi.
Note tungah ka hong piak thak thu in: Note khatlekhat na ki-it ding uh a hihi. Note ka hong it mah bangin note khatlekhat na ki-it un.

Pa aw, amaute khempeuh pumkhat a suahtheihna dingun ka hong ngetsak hi. Nangmah in kei na hong sawlna thu leitung mite in a uptheihna dingun eite gel pawlkhat ihih mah bangin amaute zong eite tawh pawlkhat hong hi ta hen.

Tua khit ciangin thu um mi hong tam tektek a, Jew mite leh Grik pau a zang Jew mite kikalah kiphunsanna thu hong om hi. Grik pau a zang Jew mite in, "Annek tuidawn, sumlepai hawmna-ah ka meigong numeite uh hong kipiaksak lo hi," ci-in lungkimlo uhhi.

I pu i pate in kamsang a bawlsiatloh khat beek omlo hi. Pasian' deihna bangin a gamta a Nasempa a hong paina ding thu a genkhol Pasian' kamtaite na that uh a, tu-in note in tua nasempa lehhekin na that leuleu uhhi.

Ahi zongin Peter in amah kaito a, "Ding in; kei zong mihing mah ka hi lel hi," a ci hi. 27 Tua bangin a kiho kawmin Peter zong innsungah tum a, mi tampi tak a na om a muh ciangin 28 amaute kiangah, "Note mahmah in zong limtakin na theih ciat uh mah bangin Jew mite pen minam dangte kiangah hawhin a kikholh ding a ngeina hilo hi. Ahi zongin mi khat peuhpeuh a nin hi, ci-in ka ngaihsutlohna dingin Pasian in kei tungah a thu hong lakkhin zo hi.
Tua ciangin Peter a kam ka-in thu hilh ding kipan a, "Pasian in kuamah angvan' tuam neiloin, 35 kua mi kua mi hita leh amah zahtakin a manin a gamta mi khempeuh a san'na thu teltakin ka thei hi.
Gentail mite tungah zong Pasian in a Khasiangtho a piakkhongna thu a muh uh ciangin Joppa khua panin Peter tawh a hong paikhawm Jew mi thu umte in lamdang a sa mahmah uhhi.
"Banghangin vun a ki-atlo Gentail mite' inn-ah tung a, amaute tawh an nangawn nekhawm na hi hiam?" a ci uhhi.

Sauveipi a kisel khit uh ciangin Peter hong ding a, "Lawmte aw, Gentail mite in Pasian' thu za-in a uptheihna dingun amaute tungah Lungdamna Thu a hilh dingin sawtpi lai pekin note lak panin Pasian in kei hong teelkhiatna thu na thei uhhi. 8 Mihingte' lungsim sungthu a thei Pasian in Gentail mite in zong thu a uptheih ding mah hi, cih a lahna-in eite tungah a hong piak mah bangin amaute tungah zong Khasiangtho a pia hi. 9 Pasian in eite leh Gentail mite deidanna hong neilo a, amaute in zong a up manun mi siangtho-in a bawl hi.

Mihing khat tung panin leitung minam khempeuh hong piangsakin, leitung khempeuhah a omsak hi. Amah in mihingte a pian'sakma pekin, mihingte' nuntak tanvei ding leh a ten'na ding uh mun a sehsa a hihi.
Lungdamna Thu ka muang mahmah hi. Tua thu pen a masa-in Jew mi, tua zomin minam dangte, thu um mi khempeuh a honkhiazo Pasian' vangliatna a hihi.

Jew mi-a kipan Gentail mi dongin a gamtat sia mi khempeuh in gimna leh lungkhamna thuak ding uhhi. 10 Tua mah bangin Jew mi-a kipanin Gentail mi dongin a gamtat hoih mi khempeuh in minthan'na, pahtawina, leh nopsakna ngah ding uhhi. 11 Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian in kuamah deidan loin mi khempeuh tungah a kibangin thu a khen hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Jew mi leh Gentail mi a kideidanna omlo ahih manin Topa pen mi khempeuh' Topa hi kim a, ama kiangah a ngen khempeuh tungah thupha tampi tak a pia hi.

Pasian in kei tungah hehpihna hong piakkhongna hangin note tungah kong gennop thu in: Note tawh a kituakzah valin kilian ngaihsutzaw kha kei un. Pasian in note tungah upna hong piakzah tawh kizui-in kingaihsun bek zaw unla, a kilawm ciang khat bekin kingaihsun un.
Mi deidan loin a kibangin en un. Kiphasak loin mineute tawh kikhawlthei unla, kipilsak se kei un.
Upna neu mite pawlbawl unla, na ngaihsutna uh a kituah kei leh zong mawhsak kei un.
Lawmte aw, note' theihsa thute gensia langpangin, mite' upna nawngkaisakin pawl a kikhensak mite kidawm un. Tua bang mite tawh kikhawl vet kei un.

Jew mi ihi a, Gentail mi ihi zongin, sila ihi a, sila a hilo ihi zongin, eite minam tuamtuam ihih hangin Khasiangtho khat bek mah in Zeisu' pumpi a suak dingin ama sungah hong phum a, eite khempeuh tungah a hong kipia pen tua a kibang Khasiangtho khat bek mah a hihi.
Leitungah pau nam tampi om a, ahi zongin khiatna a neilo khat beek omlo hi.

mihon biak kikhopna sungah numeite pauloin om uh hen. Numeite a kiniamkhiatna ding thu Jew Thukham in a gen mah bangin amaute in mihon lakah thu a gen ding uh kiphallo hi. 35 Amaute in a theihnop uh thu a om leh, inn panin a pasalte uh dong ta uh hen. Banghang hiam cihleh mihon lakah numeite kam a pau ding zumhuai hi.
Jerusalem khua-a om makai liana kinei mite in kei' nasepna tawh kisai thu-ah bangmah genthuah ding neilo uhhi. (Pasian in maitang zahtak tuam nei tuanlo ahih manin hih bangin thu a gen ngam ka hihi.)

James in a hong sawl mi pawlkhatte, tua khua-ah a hong tun'ma-in Peter in thu um Gentail mite tawh an nekhawm napi-in, Gentail mite vun at ding hi, a ci mite a kihtakna hangin tua mite hong tun' ciangin Gentail mite tawh an nekhawm ngam nawnloin hong kihemkhia hi.

Christ sungah a kiphum note in Christ' pianzia a nei khinta na hi uhhi. 28 Tua ahih manin Jew mi leh Gentail mi, sila leh sila a hilo, numei leh pasal cih bangin kideidanna om nawnlo a, note khempeuh Christ tawh na kipawlna hangun pawlkhat hi-in, a kibangkim na hi uhhi. 29 Christ tawh na kipawl nak uh leh Abraham' suante na hita uh a, Pasian' hong khap thute a ngah ding na hi uhhi.

milim biakna, mi bumna, kilangbawlna, kitotna, hazatna, hehna, huaihamna, kikhenna, pawltuam lungsim neihna, 21 en'na, zukhamna, leh biakna pawi-ah zukhamna-a kipan adangdangte a hihi. A beisa hunah ka hong hilhkholhsa bangin tu-in ka hong genkikin-ah: Hih bangin a gamta mite pen Pasian' Ukna sungah omkha hetlo ding hi.

Amau mahmah in amau pumpi tungah a hihna uh tawh vun a ki-at mite ka hi uh a ci Jew mite in, vun a ki-atlo mite a hong cih uh, na pian' na patun Gentail mi ahi note in nidanga na omzia uh phawkkik dih un.

Christ mahmah in Gentail mite leh Jew mite pawlkhatin hong bawl ahih manin eite tungah nopsakna a hong piapa a hihi. Hih minam nihte khenin gal a piangsak dalna pen Christ in ama pumpi tawh a satkham hi. 15 Amah tawh kipawlna hangin minam nihte pawlkhat a suahtheihna dingin minam a dei Jew Thukham leh a ngeinate khempeuh phiatin, eite pawlkhat hong suahin a hong kilemsak hi. 16 Singlamteh tungah a sihna tawh Christ in kilangneihna beisak a, tua singlamteh hangin minam nihte pawlkhat suahin Pasian kiang a tun'pih hi. 17 Tua hi a, Christ in Pasian tawh a kigamla no Gentail mite tung leh Pasian tawh a kinai Jew mite tungah kilemna ding Lungdamna Thuhoih a hong hilh hi. 18 Christ hangin Jew mi leh Gentail mi ahi eite khempeuh, Khasiangtho huhna tawh Pa Pasian kiangah i paithei hi. 19 Tua ahih ciangin no Gentail mite pen a pualam mi, gamdang mite na hi nawn kei uh a, Pasian mite tawh minam khat hita-in, Pasian innkuan sung mite na hita uhhi.

Salte ahi a, sal ahilote ahi zongin na hoih a sem mi khempeuh, Topa in thaman a piakding lamtak na thei un. 9 Tote aw, silate in note hong bawl mah bangin note in zong amaute limbawl unla, tawn' gawpgawpnate zang nawn kei un. Note leh na silate uh vantung panin To khat khutnuai-ah a om na hihna uh leh tua Topa in kuamah maitang zahtak tuam neiloin a kibangin mi khempeuh thu a khen ahihna thu na phawk ta un.

Huaihamna lungsim leh kisialh nopna lungsim tawh bangmah gamta kei un. Kiniamkhiat ciat unla, midangte thupi ngaihsutzaw un. 4 Note' phattuamna ding bek ngaihsun kei unla, midangte' phattuamna ding ngaihsutsak zaw un.

ngeina thak tawh kituakin gamta un. Eite a hong piangsak Pasian a kicing takin i theih semsemna dingin amah a sun dingin a hong thakbawl tawntung a hihi. 11 Tua ahih manin Gentail mi leh Jew mi, vun-at mi leh vun-atloh mi, khuapi mi leh khuaneu mi, sila leh sila a hilo, cih bangin a kilamdan'na omlo a, Christ pen mi khempeuh-a' ding hi thei a, thu khempeuh-a' ding hi thei a, thu khempeuhah amah bek a hihi.
A manloin a gamtate in ahih leh a gamtatna bangun thuak ding uhhi. Pasian in kuamah deidan loin amau' gamtatna bang ciatin thu a khen a hihi.
Mi khempeuh in hotkhiatna ngahin, thuman a theihkim ding Pasian in deih hi.
Hih ka hong gen thute na zatna-ah kuamah guptuam paihtuam nei hetloin hoihtakin hong mangin na zatna dingin Pasian, Christ Zeisu, leh a siangtho vantung mite' muhna-ah limtakin a hong gen ka hihi.

Kitot, kikhenna ding a piangsak mite pen khatvei nihvei bang na hilh khit ciangin kisukha nawn vet kei in. 11 Tua bang mite a kisiakhin hi a, a mawhna un a khialhna uh a kilangsak ahihna thu na thei in.
Pa Pasian in a siangtho biakna citakin a ngaihsut thu in: Tagahte leh meigong numeite a haksatna uhah hoihtakin kemin, leitung siatnate tawh kisawhkha loin siangtho takin omna a hihi.

Sanggamte aw, minthan'na vang tawh a kidim i Topa Zeisu Christ umin na om laitakun a pualama kilang pianziate siksanin mi na deidan kei un. 2 Gentehna-in, kham zungbuh bulhin puan manpha a silh mihau khat leh puan siasa a silh mizawng khat, note' kikhopna-ah hong paikhawm leh, 3 limtakin a kizem mipa zahtakbawl zaw-in, "Hih lai-ah tutna nuamah hong tu in," ci le uh cin a, ahi zongin mizawngpa kiangah, "Tua lai-ah na ding phot in," cihna ahi a, "Sual tung hih ka khe kiang khawngah hong tu in," cihna ahi zongin kam na zat uh leh, 4 mi a deidan na hi uh a, ngaihsutna hoihlo nei-in a gamta na hi uhhi. 5 Sanggamte aw, hoihtakin na ngai un. Pasian a it mite tungah piakdingin a ciam vantung gam a ngahding leh upna thu-ah mihau a suak dingin Pasian in leitung mizawngte a teel hinapi-in, 6 note in mizawngte na simmawhbawl uhhi. Note hong bawlsia-in thukhen zum hong tun' pahpahte, mihaute hizaw uhhi. 7 Pasian in note a hong phuah min hoih a gensiate, mihaute mah ahi uhhi. 8 Laisiangtho sungah, "Nangmah na ki-it bangin na vengte na it in," ci-in a genna Topa' Thukham zui le uh cin a hoih hi pah hi. 9 Ahi zongin mi na deidan uh leh note a khial na hi uh a, Thukham a palsat na hi veve uhhi.
Mi khempeuh amau gamtatna tawh kizui-in a kibang kimin thu a khen Pasian kiangah thu na nget uh ciangin, "Pa aw," ci na hih manun hih leitungah na om laiteng uh amah zahtakin om un.
Hih mite in pawl kikhenna piangsakin, amau pumpi deihna bangin gamta uh a, Khasiangtho zong neilo uhhi.

Tua khit ciangin ka khuadak leh mi namkim, pau namkim panin kuama sim zawhloh dingin a tam mahmah mihonpite, tokhom mai leh Tuuno mai-ah ding uh a, puanpak silhin a khut uhah nisuh hiang a tawi uh ka mu hi.
Tua ciangin leitungah a teng mi namkim, pau namkim a zang mite tungah a tawntungin Lungdamna ding Thu gen ding a nei vantung mi khat vankim lai-ah a leeng ka mu hi.

Khasiangtho leh Mothak in Zeisu kiangah, "Hong pai in," a ci uhhi. Hih thu a za mi khempeuh in zong Zeisu aw, "Hong pai in," ci ta uh hen. A dangtak mi khempeuh hong pai uh hen la, a deih khempeuh in nuntakna tui a khongin hong la ta uh hen.

{ Topa } Pasian in nisuahna lamah Eden huan khat bawl hi. Tua lai munah ama bawlsa mipa koih hi. 9 A deihhuai, nek dinga a hoih singkung nam khempeuh, huan laizangah nuntakna singkung zong, leh a pha leh a sia theihna singkung, lei sung panin { Topa } Pasian in posak hi. 10 Huan sung a kawtsak dingin Eden nawkin gun khat hong luang a, tua mun panin gun hong kikhenin li hong pha hi. 11 A masa pen gun a min Pishon hi a, kham a omna, Havilah gambup kimkotah a luang pen a hihi. 12 Tua gama khamte hoih hi. Tua munah bedolak singnai leh onik suang om hi. 13 A nihna gun min Gihon hi a, Kush gam kimkotah a luang pen a hihi. 14 Assiria gam nisuahna lamah a luang a thumna gun min Hiddekel a hihi. A lina gun pen Eufratis gun a hihi. 15 { Topa } Pasian in mipa la-in, Eden huan kho-in a kem dingin a koih hi. 16 { Topa } Pasian in mipa thu pia a, "Na ut utin huan sung singkung gah khempeuh na ne thei ding hi. 17 Ahih hangin a pha leh a sia theihna singkung gah pen na ne kei ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh tua na nek ni-in na si ding hi," a ci hi.
Mipa leh a zi a guaktangin om uh a, maizum lo uhhi.

Tua ahih ciangin { Topa } Pasian in, amah a kipiansakna leitang a kho dingin eden Huan panin mipa a sawlkhia hi.24Amah in mipa hawlkhia hi. Kherub-te leh mun khempeuh a nga thei meikuang namsau pen eden Huan nisuahna lamah nuntakna singkung lampi a cing dingin a koih hi.
Tua ciangin { Topa' } omna panin Kain paikhia-in eden nisuahna lam Nod gam sungah a teng hi.

Lot zong khuadak a, Jordan gun kuam mun khempeuh in limtakin tui ngahin { Topa' } huan hita leh, Zoar lama Egypt gam tawh hita leh kibang hi, ci-in mu hi. Hih pen { Topa } in Sodom leh Gomorrah a suksiat hun ma a hihi.
Ka pu ka pate in a suksiat minam Gozan, Haran, Rezef, leh Telassar gam sunga eden mite, tua minamte' pasian-te in amaute honkhiazo ahi hiam?

Tua ciangin Levi mite, Kohath' beh sung panin Amasai' tapa Mahath, leh Azariah' tapa Joel; Merari' beh sung panin Abdi' tapa Kish, leh Jehallelel' tapa Azariah; Gershon beh sung panin Zimmah' tapa Joah, leh Joah' tapa eden;

Eden, Miniamin, Jeshua, Shemaiah, Amariah, leh Shekaniah-te in siampite' khuapi sungah a moi a ham a kibangin a khen khenin, a ngah ding ciat a sanggamte uh tungah a hawm dingin cihtakna tawh amah huh uhhi.
Ka pu ka pate un a suksiat minamte, Gozan minam, Haran minam, Rezef minamte, leh Telassar khua-a om eden mite pen amau' pasian-te in honkhiazo ahi hiam?

"Tu-in Zion ka hehnem ding hi. A kisia ama munte khempeuh puahpha-in, ama gamlakte eden huansung ka bangsak ding a, ama sehnel gamte { Topa}' huan ka bangsak ding hi. Ama sungah lungdamna leh kipahna, lungdam kohna leh lasakna awging om ding hi.

Tua ciangin note lam kong lak tawntung ding a, na hoihte tawh kong lungkimsak ding hi. A cidam a thahatin kong omsak ding hi. Tui tampi a ngah tawntung huan, a kang ngeilo ciktui tawh na kibang ding uhhi.
Zuauthu tawh thu hilh a, a phuahtawm uh thu a hilh kamsangte' lungsim sungah zuauthu bang tanvei tenglai ding ahi hiam?

Amaute hong pai-in Zion mual tungah ngaihtakin la sa ding uh a, { Topa' } hehpihna ahi, buh, leenggahzu, sathau leh tuuno, bawngnote' hangin amaute a lungdam mahmah ding uhhi. A nuntakna uh, tui a kibuak huan bang ding a, lungkham nawnlo ding uhhi.
Haran, Kanneh, eden, Asshur, leh Khilmad khuapite in zong nang tawh sumlei sumzuakna-ah kizopna hong nei uhhi.

Pasian' Eden huansungah nang na teng a, suangmanpha nam khempeuh tawh na kizem hi. Karnelian, topaz, leh jasper, khrisolait, beryl, leh onik, sapfaia, karbankel, leh emerald suangmanphate, nangma kizepna hi a, kham tawh kibawl kizepna tampi tak zong na nei lai hi. Hihte khempeuh nangma-a' dingin na suah ni-in a hong kibawlsak a hihi. 14 Sathau a kinilh kherub-te nang ka hong cingsak a, ka mual siangtho tungah nang na teng a, a te zaizai suangmanphate lakah na vak kawikawi hi.
A melhoihin ka bawl a, a hiang ka zausak hi. Pasian' huan sunga a po singkung khempeuhte' en'in ka bawl hi.

Misite' omna Leinuai khua-ah tua singkung ka khiatsuk ciangin, a kiatna ging in minam khempeuh lokgawp ding hi. Tua singkung a kiat manin eden singkung khempeuh, leh a hoihpen, limtakin tui a ngah Lebanon singkungte khempeuh in zong Leinuai-ah nuamtuam na sa ding uhhi. 17 Bang hang hiam cih leh a sisate a zuan dingin misite' omna Leinuai-ah amah tawh a paikhawm ding uhhi. Ama limnuai a belte khempeuh, minam dangte' lakah kithehthang khin uhhi. 18 "Tua singkung pen Egypt kumpipa Faro leh ama mite a hihi. eden huana singkungte nangawn tua zahin lianin hoih zolo hi. Ahi zongin, eden huana singkungte mah bangin, Pasian' thu a ngaihsunlo, gasunga a site' omna a zuan dingin, misite' omna Leinuai a manawh ta a hihi. Topa { Pasian } in hih thu ka gen khin hi," hong ci hi.

Hih leitang pen gammang tulak a bang ngei hinapi-in tu-in eden Huan a batna leh a kisusia, a kiluhgawp, a kinusiacip khuapite pen tu-in a muan'huai kulh tawh ki-umin a sungah mi a ten'na thu mi khempeuh in gen belin nei ding uhhi.

A madawkte, a haltum thei meikuang bang a, a nungdalte, mei-am alh tawh kibang hi. Amau hong tun' ma-in gamsung teng khempeuh eden huan a bang hi a, amau' khit ciangin a kinusiacip keugaw gam tawh kibang hi. Amaute kiang pan a suakta bangmah omlo hi.
Tua ahih manin zakna ding bil a neite in Khasiangtho in pawlpite kiangah a gen thute na za un. A gualzo mite tungah, Pasian' Huan sunga om nuntakna singgahte a nektheihna dingun thu ka pia ding hi.

Tua ciangin vantung mi in Pasian leh Tuuno tokhom panin a hong luangkhia, kristal suangmanpha bangin a te selsel gun tui hong lak a,2 khuapi sung lampi laizangah a luang hi. Tua gun pang tuakah nuntakna singkung po a, kha simin gah ahih manin kum khat sungin sawmlenih vei a gah hi. A tehte zong natna damna ding zatui-in kizang hi.3 Pasian' samsiatna a ngah peuhpeuh tua khuasungah omlo hi. Tua khuapi sungah Pasian leh Tuuno' tokhom om ding a, ama nasemte in amah a bia ding uhhi.
{ Topa } in note-a' dingin hong dosak ding a, note ahih leh na om hithiat ding uhhi bek hi," a ci hi.

"Na langneih mite' bawngtal ahi a, a la ahi zongin a gammang na tuah uh leh ama kiangah na hawlkik ding uhhi. 5 Nangmah a hong mudahpa' la a van tawh a puk na muh leh a la tawh amah na nusia kei ding a, tua la phot toh ding na huh ding hi.
"Ahih hangin note in ama aw limtakin ngai-in keima gen bangin na gamtat uh leh na galte uh' tungah gal ka hi ding a, na langte uh' tungah lang ka hi ding hi.

"Keimah in gam sungah nopsakna hong pia-in, note lungnuam takin na lum ding uh a, bangmah in note hong lausaklo ding hi. Keimah in gamsung panin ganhing gilote ka hawlkhia ding a, galkidona in na gam uh hong nawklo ding hi.

Na lungsim uhah, ‘Hih minamte ei sangin tamzaw hi. Amaute bangci suankhiat zawh ding ihi hiam?’ na cih khak uh leh, 18 amaute na kihta kei ding uhhi. { Topa } na Pasian un Faro leh Egypt mite khempeuh tungah a hih,

"Na langte uh a do dingin pai-in a sakolte, a leengte, leh a galkapte uh nomau-a' sangin a tamzaw-in na muh uh hangin amaute na kihta tuan kei ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh Egypt gam panin note a hong paikhiatpih { Topa } na Pasian uh note tawh hong om hi.
"{ Topa } in, note' langah hong pang na galte uh na mai uhah lelhna thuaksak ding hi. Amaute lampi khat tawnin hong kuan ding uh a, note' mai panin lam sagih tawnin taikeek ding uhhi.
Tawntung Pasian pen nangma omna hi a, nangmah huh dingin tawntung khutte a om hi. Amah in na mai-ah galte nawtkhia-in, ‘Susia un,’ ci hi.
Tua ciangin { Topa } in Jerubbaal, Barak, Jefthah, leh Samuel hong sawl a, na kiim khempeuh uha na galte uh khutsung panin note hong honkhia a, note lungmuang takin na om uhhi.

Banghang hiam cihleh nangmah in nang hong mudahte it-in nang hong itte na mudah hi. Banghang hiam cihleh a ukte leh nasemte nang-a' dingin bangmah ahihlohna tuni-in na kitelsak hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Absalom hing-in kote khempeuh tuni-in si le ung na nuam ding ka thei hi.

Tua ciangin { Topa } in ama galte khempeuh' khutsung, leh Saul' khutsung panin amah a hotkhiat hunin David in hih la kammalte { Topa' } tungah a gen hi. 2 Amah in, "{ Topa }, kei hong hupa, ka kulhpi, kei hong honkhiapa, 3 ka Pasian, ka kihutna, ka buknapa, lum bangin kei a hong dal, ka munmuan'huai leh ka belh, keimah hong honkhiapa hi a, ngong hihna panin hong hon hi.
"Ka galte'n gim a thuak teh ka kipak ngei kei a, haksatna a tuah uh teh ka lungdam ngei kei hi. 30 A sih ding uh deihna tawh ka samsia ngei kei hi.
Amau' galte' kiang panin nang hong belte a honpa aw, na itna kip lamdang takin hong lak in.
ka galte kiang panin keimah a hong honkhiapa minthangin vanglian ta hen. Ka langte tungah keimah nong liansak a, mi ngongtatte kiang panin na hong honkhia hi.
Ka galte omna mai-ah kei aa ding an nong lui hi. Ka lu sathau nong nilh aa, ka hai a dimlet hi. (HCN)
Keima galte' muhna munah an nong lui hi. Thupi takin nong pahtawi a, keima hai zong dimlet ta hi. (TDM)
Ka galte ompi-in ka mai ah sabuai nong lui hi. Ka lu sathau nong nilh a; ka hai a dimlet hi. (ZIV)

{ Topa } aw, kei hong langpangte langpang in la, kei hong dote do in. 2 Lum lian leh lum neu la in la, keimah hong huh in! 3 Teipi leh teitangzang dok in la, kei hong delhte' lam ngat in! Keima tungah, "Nang a hong honpa ka hi," hong ci in. 4 Kei hong sawmte mai zumin mindaisak ta in! Keima siatna ding a bawlte nungkik sakin sisak in! 5 { Topa' } vantung mi' hawlna tawh huih letkhiat ansite tawh amaute kibangsak in.
Migilote' hangin kilungsosak kei in la, a manloin a gamta mite en' dingin ngaihsun kei in. 2 Banghang hiam cihleh lopa bangin amaute vulpak ding uh a, lokung hingte bangin keutum ding uhhi.

{ Topa } aw, keimah hong honkhia nuam in. { Topa } aw, hong huh meng in. 14 Kei a hong that nuamte zahhuaisak in la, maisiasak in. Keima siatna ding a deihte nungkiksak in la minsiasak in. 15 Keima tungah, "Ha ha!" hong ci vialte zahhuaina tawh maikhingsak in.
Pasian aw, ka dikna hong langsak in la, migilote tawh ka thu-ah kei hong pan'pih in. Mi khemte leh thutanglote kiang panin kei hong honkhia in.
Amaute in ka vai siatsak ding sunthapai-in hanciam uh a, amau' ngaihsutnate khempeuh keima siatna ding a hihi.

Huaihamna tawh mihing a netum, humpinelkai tawh a kibang mite' lakah ka om hithiat hi. Amau' hate, namsau hiam tawh kibang hi. 5 Pasian aw, vantungah na liatna kilangsak in. Leitung khempeuhah na minthan'na omsak in. 6 Amaute in keima khe, thang hong siah uh a, lungkhamin hong koih uhhi. Ka paina ding munah gum khat to uh a, ahih hangin tua gum sungah amaute mah kia uhhi.

Ka Pasian aw, ka galte' kiang panin keimah hong honkhia in. Kei a hong langpangte panin kei hong dal in. 2 Siatna a bawlte' kiang panin hong suaktasak in la, mi that nuamte' kiang panin keimah hong hon in.
Pasian tawh khauhtakin i hih ding hi. Amah pen i galte hong sikcipsak dingpa a hihi.
Thu omlopi-in kei a hong mudah mi, ka lu tunga samzangte sangin tamzaw uhhi. Kei a hong susia ding, zuauthu tawh a hong dote hat mahmah uhhi. Kei' guk lohpi ke'n loh ding ka hi hiam?

{ Topa } aw, nang kong bel hi. Kei hong zahhuaisak kei in. 2 Na thumanna tawh kei hong huh in la, hong honkhia in. Keima lamah na bil hong ngat in la, hong hon in. 3 Hong hon dingin ka belh suangpi, ka kulh muan'huai, hong hi ta in; banghang hiam cihleh keimah hong honpa leh ka belhpa na hi hi. 4 Ka Pasian aw, migilote' khutsung pan leh thumanlo mite leh migilote' matna panin keimah hong hon in.
Banghang hiam cihleh ka galte kihoho-in, keimah hong thahnopna thu kikumkum uhhi.

Israel mite bangin a lungsim a siangtho a thutang mite tungah Pasian hoih takpi hi. 2 Ahih hangin kei ka hih leh ka khe kisuipuk dektak a, ka khe taal dektak hi. 3 Banghang hiam cihleh migilote' daupaina ka muh ciangin mi kihisakte ka eng hi. 4 Banghang hiam cihleh amaute in nat velvalna bangmah thuaklo uh a, a pumpi uh cidamin zol hilhial hi. 5 Amaute in midangte bangin haksatna thuaklo uh a, amaute in midangte bangin gimna ngahlo uhhi. 6 Tua ahih ciangin amaute in khainiang bangin kiphatsakna ok uh a, puan bangin ngongtatna silh uhhi. 7 A lungsim panun gitlohna pusuaksak uh a, a ngaihsutna uh gitlohna tawh a dimlet hi. 8 Amaute in mi thusim loin el pau uh a, kiliatsakna tawh a sucip dingin mi a tawng uhhi. 9 Amaute' gensiatna in vantung dong banto a, kiliatsakna tawh leitungah thu gen kawikawi uhhi.
Pasian aw, mi kihisakte, kei langpangin hong kipan hi. Thu-helhawt mi pawlkhat in kei, thah hong sawm uh a, amaute in nang hong thudonlo uhhi.
Amaute in tuikhang bangin sun tawntungin kei hong umcih uh a, kei hong tuamcip uhhi.

Sangpenpa' liahna sung, Vanglianpa' liim sungah a om mi khempeuh in 2 { Topa' } tungah, "Ka bukna leh ka munkip muan'huai, ka muan' ka Pasian na hi hi," ci ding uhhi. 3 Banghang hiam cihleh amah in thangsiahpa' thangzak leh a lauhuai pulnatna panin nang hong honkhia ding hi. 4 Amah in a khate tawh nang hong tuam ding a, ama khate' nuai-ah bukna ding na mu ding hi. Ama thumanna in nang hong dalin hong hu ding hi.
Sun nilohin ka galte in kei hong zahko uh a, kei hong simmawhte in ciamsiatna-in ka min a zang uhhi.

Banghang hiam cihleh migilote leh zuauthu gente keima langah hong pang uh a, keimah hong gensia-in, zuauthu bekbek genin nei uhhi. 3 Amaute in muhdah kamte pau-in kei hong gensia uh a, thu omlopi-in kei hong langpang uhhi. 4 Amaute ka itna, amaute-a' dingin thu ka ngetsakna nangawn amaute in hong thukna-in kei hong mawhsak uhhi. 5 Tua ahih ciangin amaute in hoihna-a' dingin siatna itna-a' dingin muhdahna tawh kei hong thuk uhhi.
{ Topa } in sihna panin kei hong honkhia hi. Ka khituite hong kangsak a, kei hong guallelsak lo hi.
Nangma thuhilhte ka zuih theihna dingin hong nengniamte' kiang pan kei hong honkhia in.

"Ka neu lai-a kipanin nakpi takin amaute in kei hong gimsak uhhi," Israel in tu-in ci ta hen. 2 "Ka neu lai-a kipanin nakpi takin amaute in kei hong gimsak uh a, ahih hangin amaute in kei hong zo nailo uhhi. 3 Lo khote in lei a kuih bangin ka nungzang hong kuikek uh a, tu-ma-kuakte tawh kibangsak uhhi.
I galte' kiang pan eite hong honkhiapa tungah, banghang hiam cihleh ama itna kip tawntung hi.
Haksatna tuamtuamte ka thuak ciangin kei nong kem hi. A heh ka galte, kei' tangin nong dosak a, na thahatna tawh kei na hong honkhia hi.
{ Topa } aw, migilote kiang panin kei hong honkhia in la, mi ngongtatte kiang panin kei hong kem in. 2 Amaute in a lung sung uhah thusia geelgeel uh a, gal phuang ngitnget uhhi.
{ Topa } aw, ka langte' kiang panin kei hong honkhia in. Nangmah a bel dingin ka hong tai hi.
A gilo galte kiang panin kei hong hon in la, a kam uh tawh zuauthu a gen limtakin kiciamna a bawl khit ciang nangawnin zuau a gen lai veve gamdang mite' khutsung pan kei hong honkhia in.
{ Topa' } deih bangin gamtatna pen galte nangawn lawma kaihzawhna a hihi.
Migilote in gitlohna thu bek mah ngaihin nei uh a, zuautheite in zuauthu mah ngaihin nei hi.
Na galte a gil a kial leh an pia in la, a dang a tak leh tui pia in. 22 Tua hi leh amau' maizumna dingin a bawl na hi a, { Topa } in nang tungah thaman hong pia ding hi.
Mihoih khat in mihoih lote' gamtatna a zuihkhak ciangin hawktui nin, ahih kei leh tui uih tawh kibang hi.

Nangmah dona dingin a kibawl hiam peuhmah mavang lo ding a, thukhenna sungah na langah a pang mi khempeuh na nialgawpzo ding hi. Hih thu pen { Topa}' nasemte' gamhluah leh keima kiang panin amaute' dikna a kilahna ahi hi, { Topa } in ci hi," a ci hi.
Amaute in nang' langkhatah hong do ding uhhi. Ahih hangin a hong zo kei ding uhhi; banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } in kong cihin-ah, nangmah a hong hu dingin ka hong ompih ding hi," a hong ci hi.

Na vengte' thu upin nei kei in la, na lawmte zong muan'in nei kei in. Na ang-a lum na zi kiang nangawnah thu na gending kidawm in. 6 Tuhun ciangin tapate in a pate haibawl a, tanute in a nute langpan' uh a, mote in a teeknu uh langneih uhhi. Mi khat-a' dingin ama innkuanpihte mah a gal a suak mawk hi.

"Note in, ‘Mittang khat tangding mittang khat, ha khat tangding ha khat,’ ci-in a kigenna na zaksa uh a hihi. 39 Ahi zongin note kiangah ke'n kong genin-ah: A gilote na thukkik kei un. Mi khatpeuh in na paang taklam hong bet leh a langkhat zong na dawh lai zaw in.

"Note in, ‘Na vengte uh na it unla, na galte uh na mudah un,’ ci-in a kigenna thu na zaksa uh a hihi. 44 Ahi zongin ke'n note kiangah kong genin-ah: Na galte uh na it unla, no hong bawlsiate-a' dingin thu na ngetsak un. 45 Tua hi leh vantungah a om na Pa uh tate na hi thei ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh amah in mihoihte leh misiate tungah a kibangin ni taangsak khawm a, a gamtat phate leh a gamtat siate tungah zong a kibang mahin guah zusak khawm hi.
Kote tungah a hong mawhte mawh maisakna ka neih bangun ko' mawhna zong hong maisak in.
Banghangin na lawmte' mit sunga ninthem tang muhsak thei napi-in nangma mit sunga singluang tang phawk theilo na hi hiam?

Unau leh unau, pa in a ta, tate in a nu a pate langpangin sihna a thuak dingin khatlekhat kiheek ding uhhi. 22 Keima hangin Gentail mi khempeuh in note hong mudah ding uhhi. Ahi zongin a tawpdongin a thuakzo mite in hotkhiatna a ngah ding uhhi.
Pumpi a thah khit ciangin kha a that theilote na kihta kei un. Hell khuk sungah pumpi leh kha a nihin a susia theipa na kihtazaw un.

"Leitungah kilemna a omsak dingin hong pai hi, ci-in hong ngaihsun kei un. Kilemna a omsak dingin a hong pai ka hi kei a, kidona ding namsau a khah dingin a hong pai ka hizaw hi. 35 Tate leh pate a kidosak ding, tanute leh nute a kidosak ding, monute leh teeknute a kidosak dingin a hong pai ka hihi. 36 Mi khat-a' dingin a gal lianpenpen ama innkuanpih mite mah hong hi ding hi.
