Kei hong pawlpihlo peuhmah keima lang hi uh a, kei hong kaihkhoppih lo peuhmah a thehthang ahi uhhi.

"Ahi zongin ka thugen a za note kiangah kong cihin-ah: Na galte uh na it unla, no hong mudah mite tungah a pha na bawl un. 28 No hong phuisamte thupha na pia unla, no hong bawlsiate-a' ding thu na ngetsak un. 29 Na paang langkhat a hong bengte, a langkhat zong na dawhlai un. Na puantungsilh uh a hong sutte tungah, na puansungsilh uh zong na piathuah lai un. 30 A hong ngente peuhmah na pia unla, na na uh a hong laksakte tung panin lakik kei un.

Tua bang lelin note na gamta kei ding uhhi. Na galte uh itin amaute tungah thupha bawl unla, lohkik ding lamen loin leitawi pia un. Tua hi leh na thaman uh lian ding a, a Lianpen Pasian' tate na hi ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh lungdamna mel a thei theilo mite leh a huaiham mite tungah amah migi hi. 36 Tua ahih manin na Pa un hehpihna a neih bangin note in zong hehpihna lungsim nei ta un.
Tu-in thei un. Gulpi leh momaite na sikgawpna ding uh leh na galte uh na zawhna dingun note tungah vangliatna ka hong piazo a, amaute in note bangmah hong cih zolo ding uhhi.

Zeisu a ze-et dingin Thukham hilh siate khat hong ding a, "Sia aw, nuntak tawntungna ka ngahtheihna dingin bang sem ding ka hi hiam?" ci-in a dong hi. 26 Zeisu in, "Thukham sungah bang kigelh a, bang sim na hi hiam?" a ci hi. 27 Amah in, "Na Topa Pasian na lungsim khempeuh, na nuntakna khempeuh, na hatna khempeuh, leh na pilna khempeuh tawh na it in la, nangmah na ki-it bangin na vengte na it in," ci-in kigelh hi, ci-in a dawng hi. 28 Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Na dawn'na man mahmah hi. Tua bangin gamta lecin nuntak tawntungna na ngah ding hi," a ci hi.

Leitungah kilemna a omsak dingin a hong pai hong sa na hi uhhiam? Hilo hi. Ke'n kong cihin-ah, kikhenna a omsak dingin a hong pai ka hizaw hi. 52 Tu-a kipanin innkuan sungah mihing nga a phate, a langah thum, a langah nihin kikhenin kido ding uhhi. 53 A pa in a tapa do-in, a tapa in a pa do ding a, a nu in a tanu do-in, a tanu in a nu do ding a, a teeknu in a monu do-in, a monu in a teeknu do ding hi," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in a nungzuite kiangah, "Mite a puktheihna ding ze-etna hong piang hamtang ding hi. Ahi zongin tua pukna ding a piangsak mipa in gimna ngah ding hi.
Tu-in, kumpi dingin kei a hong deihlo ka galte pen hih lai-ah hong paipih unla, keima muhna-ah that un,’ ci hi," a ci hi.

"Leitung mite in note hong muhdah leh kei a hong mudah masa ahihna thu na thei un. 19 Hih leitung mite tawh a kipawl hi le uh cin leitung mite in amau pawlte hong it ding hi. Ahi zongin hih leitung mite lak panin note ka hong teelkhia a, amaute tawh kipawl nawnlo na hih manun a hong mudah ahi uhhi.

Amaute tungah na thu ka gen khin hi. Ahi zongin keimah bangin amaute zong hih leitung mite tawh kipawllo uh ahih manin leitung mite in a mudah uhhi. 15 Leitung panin amaute na lakkhiat ding a hong ngetsak ka hi kei a, a Gilopa' bawlsiatna ding panin na kep ding a hong ngen ka hihi.
No a hong bawlsia mite, Pasian in thupha a piakna dingin thu ngetsak unla, tua bang mite samsia loin thupha piazaw un.

Tua ahih ciangin Laisiangtho sungah, "Na galte uh a gil a kial leh an na pia un. A dang a taak leh tui na pia un. Tua bangin na gamtat uh leh amaute' maizumna dingin a bawl na hi uhhi," ci-in a kigelh bangin gamtazaw un. 21 Tua ahih manin gitlohna kizosak kei unla, a pha gamtatna tawh gitlohnate a zo na hi ta un.
A tawpna-ah suksiat ding a gal nunung pen in sihna a hihi.

Hong bawlsiate siatna tawh thukkik loin hong samsia mite samsia kik kei unla, Pasian in note a hong sap lai-in thupha a hong piak dingin hong ciamsa ahih manin, hong siat bawlte thupha tawh na thukzaw un.
"Khualmi khatpeuh na bawlsia kei ding uh a, na nengniam kei ding uhhi. Cihleh hiam cihleh note zong Egypt leitangah khual mite na hi ngei uhhi.

Note in na leenggui lo uh hawkmai loin, leenggah a kiate zong na leenggui lo panun na tawm kei ding uhhi. Note in mizawngte leh peemtate-a' dingin tuate na nusia ding uhhi; kei pen { Topa } na Pasian uh ka hihi.

"Na gamsung uhah note lakah khualmi khat hong peem leh, ama tungah a manloin na gamta kei ding uhhi. 34 Note lakah a hong peem khualmite tualsung mi mah bangin na ngaihsun ding uh a, nomau mah bangin amaute na it ding uhhi; cihleh hiam cihleh note pen Egypt gam sungah khualmi na hi ngei uhhi; kei pen { Topa } na Pasian uh ka hihi.

"Note in na leitang panun an na lak uh ciangin, na lonawl dongun la loin, an na lak khit uh ciangin a sangte zong na khawm kei ding uh a, mizawngte leh khualmi-a' dingin tuate na nusia ding uhhi; kei pen { Topa } na Pasian uh ka hi hi," a ci hi.
Note in peemta leh tualsung mi-a' dingin ngeina a kibang khat na nei ding uhhi; cihleh hiam cihleh kei pen { Topa } na Pasian uh ka hi hi," a ci hi.
"Na sanggampa uh zawngin, note bangin amah a kivak zawh kei leh, note in amah na vak ding uhhi. Khualmi leh peemta bangin amah pen note tawh hong om ding hi.
Mihonpi-a' dingin ngeina khat om ding a, note leh note' lakah hong peem mi-a' dingin tawntung ngeina khat na khang tawntungun om ding hi. { Topa' } mai-ah note leh peemta mite na kibang ding uhhi.
"Tua hun laitakin na thukhente uh ka thuhilh a, ‘Na sanggamte uh thu neihte za unla, mi khat leh a sanggampa ahi a, amah tawh a om khualmipa tawh ahi zongin thu a mantakin khen un.
Amah in pa neilote leh meigong numeite-a' dingin thutang semin, peemtate itin an leh puan a pia hi. 19 Tua ahih ciangin peemtate it un; cihleh hiam cihleh note zong Egypt gamah peemta na hi uhhi.
"Edom mite khatpeuh na mudah kei ding uhhi. Cihleh hiam cihleh amaute na sanggam uh a hihi. Egypt mi khatpeuh na mudah kei ding uhhi. Cihleh hiam cihleh amau' gamah peemta na hi ngei uhhi.
"A zawng a cimawh a kicial nasempa, na sanggamte khat ahi a, na gamsung na khuapite sunga om peemta khat peuhpeuh ahi zongin, na nengniam kei ding uhhi.

"Peemta' thu ahi a, pa neilo mi' thu ahi zongin tuate-a' ding thutang na heisak kei ding uh a, meigong numei' puan zong khapna-in na laksak kei ding uhhi. 18 Egypt-ah sila na hihna uh leh { Topa } note' Pasian in tua lai panin hong hotkhiatna na phawk ding uhhi. Tua ahih manin hih banga na gamtatna ding uh thu kong pia hi. 19 "Na lo-ah an la-in lo lai-ah anlom na mangngilh uh ciangin a tawm dingin na paikik kei ding uhhi. Tuate pen peemta, pa neilo, leh meigong numeite-a' ding a hihi. Hih pen { Topa } note' Pasian in na khut uh tawh na sepna khempeuh uhah note thupha hong piak theihna ding a hihi. 20 Na oliv kungte uh na sat uh ciangin a hiangte na sat kikkik kei ding uhhi. Tuate pen peemta, pa neilo, leh meigong numeite-a' ding a hihi. 21 Na leenggui lo panun leenggah na kaihkhop uh ciangin a sang na nung khop kik kei ding uhhi. Tuate pen peemta, pa neilo, leh meigong numeite-a' ding a hihi. 22 Egypt gamah sila na hihna uh na phawk ding uhhi. Tua ahih manin hih bangin na gamtatna dingun thu kong pia hi.
"‘Peemta, pa neilo, leh meigong numeite-a' ding thutang a heikhiatsak mipa in gimna ngah ta hen,’ ci ding uhhi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in, ‘Amen,’ ci ding uhhi.

{ Topa } in peemtate kem a, meigong numeite leh pa neilote a huh hi. Ahih hangin amah in migilote' vaihawmna a suksiatsak hi. 10 Zion aw, nangma Pasian { Topa } in khang tawntungin uk ding hi. { Topa } phat un.
Gam khempeuh leh minam khempeuhte lak panin note hong kaikhawm kikin na gam uhah kong tun'pih kik ding hi.

"Note in thu a tangin khenin, khatlekhat tungah itna leh hehpihna kilakin, 10 note lakah a om meigong, tagah, gamdang mite, ahih kei leh mizawngte gim pialoin, khatlekhat kiliatsakna ding na ngaihsut lohna ding uh thu ka hong piazo hi," a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin tu-in Faro in thu ngaihsun siam mipil khat tengkhia in la, Egypt gamsung a uk dingin amah koih in. 34 Faro in gam sungah vaihawm ulian seh in la, a kihauh kum sagih sungin Egypt gam leitang pana piang sung panin nga-ah khat la in. 35 Hong tung ding kum hoih sunga an khempeuh amaute khawmsak in la, khuapite sungah an nek dingin Faro' ukna nuai-ah antangte kholin, amaute kemsak in. 36 Kialpi hangin gamsung a siatlohna dingin Egypt gam sungah a hong tung ding kum sagih kialpi dalna dingin a kikoihcing an hi ding hi," a ci hi.

20:18-19 Israel mite dingin Bethel-ah paito uh a, "Benjamin mite a sim dingin kua pai masa ding ka hi uhhiam?" ci-in Pasian a dong uhhi. { Topa } in, "Judah minamte paito masa ding hi," a ci hi. 19 Tua ciangin Israel mite zingsangin tho-in Gibeah khua a sim dingin giahphual a sat uhhi.

Tua ciangin Benjamin mite in, "A masa-a mah bangin i mai-ah amaute tai uhhi," a ci uhhi. Ahih hangin Israel mite in, "Eite tai-in, khuapi panin lam lianpi-ah amaute paikhiasak ni," a kici uh a hihi. 33 Israel mite khempeuh amau' omna mun panin dingin Baaltamar-ah a gualin pang uhhi. A pangsim Israel mite Gibeah nitumna lam amau omna panin hong dingkhia uhhi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa kiangah, "Kumpipa na thukim leh, Judah gam ka tun' dong amaute in hong paisuaksak theihna dingun Eufratis Gungal gamsung a uksawn mite ka piak ding laikhakte, 8 leh biakinn hutna ding munmuan'huai kongpi ding, khuapi kulh ding, leh ka omna ding inn lamna dingin sing hong piaktheihna dingin kumpipa' tulak a kem Asaf' tungah piak ding laikhak zong, kei tungah hong pia in," ka ci hi. A dik ka Pasian in kei hong ompih ahih manin kumpipa in ka ngette hong pia hi. 9 Tua ahih ciangin Eufratis Gungal gam a uksawn mite kiang ka tung a, kumpipa' laikhakte amaute tungah ka pia hi. Kumpipa in galkapmangte leh sakol galkapte kei hong khasak hi. 10 Ahi zongin Israel mite' phattuamna ding a sem dingin mi khat a paina thu Horonaim khuami Sanballat leh Ammon mi sal ahi Tobiah in a zak uh ciangin nakpi takin lungkimlo uhhi. 11 Jerusalem khua ka tun' ciangin ni thum sung ka tawlnga hi. 12 Tua ciangin zanin vakkhia-in mi tawmkhat ka tonpih hi. Ahi zongin Jerusalem-a' dingin ka bawlsak ding ka Pasian in ka lungsimah hong suahsak thu kuama kiangah ka gen kei hi. Keima tuan'na simloh ganhing dang ka kizuisak kei hi. 13 Kuam Kongpi tawnin Gulpi Tuikhuk leh Nin Kongpi lamah ka pai a, a kicimsa Jerusalem kulhpi leh mei in a kattumsa a kongpite ka en hi. 14 Tua ciangin Tuinak Kongpi leh Kumpipa' Bual-ah ka paisuak hi. Ahi zongin ka tuan'na ganhing a paisuak theihna ding mun omlo hi. 15 Tua hi a, a zanpi mahin kuam lampi-ah pai-in khuapi kulh ka vel hi. Tua ciangin Kuam Kongpi mah tawnin khuapi sungah ka lutkik hi. 16 Tua hi a, khuasung upate in ka paina mun ahi a, ka sep ahi zongin theilo uhhi; banghang hiam cihleh hih nasep tavuan a la ding Judah mite, siampite, uliante, khuasung upate, leh a dangte tungah ka gen nai kei hi. 17 Tua ciangin amaute kiangah, "I lungkhamna thu na thei uhhi. Jerusalem a siasa-in omin, a kongpite mei in kangtum hi. Hong pai un, zahkona i ngah nawnlohna dingin Jerusalem kulh ciangpha ni," ka ci hi. 18 Tua ciangin a dik ka Pasian in kei hong ompihna leh kumpipa in kei tungah hong gen thute zong amaute tungah ka gen hi. Tua ciangin amaute in, "Tu-in nasep kipan pah ni," hong ci uhhi. Tua ahih ciangin lawp mahmahna leh ngimna hoih tawh nasep a kipan uhhi.
Na lungsim' deihna amah in hong pia hen la, na geelna khempeuh hong tangtungsak ta hen!
{ Topa } in minamte' thungaihsutna a mawkna suahin, mite' geelna a khaktan hi.
{ Topa } in inn lampih kei leh innlamte' sepna a mawkna a hihi. { Topa } in khuapi hutpih kei leh khuapi cingte' cin'na a mawkna a hihi.
Nang hong muang ka hih manin zingsang simin na itna kip kei hong phawksak in. Nangma tungah thu hong ngen ka hih manin ka paina ding lampi hong hilh ta in.
Na lungsim khempeuh tawh { Topa } muang in la, nang' theihna suang kei in. 6 Na hihna khempeuhah amah phawk in. Tua hi leh lampi man amah in hong lak ding hi.
Thadahpa aw, miksite kiangah pai in la, amau' nuntakzia va en in. 7 Amaute in a uk ding leh a makai ding kuamah neilo napi-in, 8 khuakhal sungin a nek ding uh, tuk hun sungin kaikhawm khol uhhi.
Lim ngaihsut loin sepna tawh bangmah piang zolo a, limtakin geelna tawh ma kitun'zo bek hi.
Na geelnate khempeuh { Topa } ap in; tua hi leh na geelna bangin tangtung ding hi.
Mihing in thu geel a, ahi zongin { Topa' } deihna bangin kisemkhia hi.
Mihing' ngaihsutna-ah thu tampi om a, ahi zongin { Topa' } deihna tawh a kituakte bek kimang ding hi.
Limtakin ngaihsunin geelgeelna pen hauhna lampi hi a, nawhsa-in lopthop hihna pen zawn'na lampi a hihi.
Pilna tawh inn kilam a, ngaihsut siamna tawh inn kip hi. 4 Thungaihsut theihna inn sungah a hoih a manpha nate a dimtakin om hi.
Geel siamna tawh galte kizo a, ngaihsut siamna tawh gualzawhna kingah hi.
Na nuntakna ding zong masa in la, na an nek ding a kicin' ciang bekin na inn ding lamin zi leh ta nei pan in.
Na tuuhonte hoihtakin thei in la, na bawnghonte hoihtakin kem in.
Hih leitungah a piang thu khempeuh, Pasian in ama pian' hun dinga a sehsa hunin a pian'sak a hihi.
Amah in na khempeuh amau' hun ciat tawh a kituak dingin a bawl hi. Amah in mailam thu theihnopna lungsim eite tungah hong guan' a, ahi zongin ama sepnate a cing-a theihzawhna ding hong guan'lo hi.
"I leengguite pak ta ahih manin ngiano hon in a suksiat ma-in tua ngiano honte man ni," hong ci hi.
Ahih hangin mipi lungsim a nei mi in na a hoihte geel a, thuhoih nate-ah a pang hi.
{ Topa } aw, mihing' omdan ama uk theih ahih lohna ka theita a, ama kalsuanna ding ama geeltheih hilo hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } in kong cihin-ah, mailamah lametna note kong piakkik ding, na siatna ding uhhiloin na phattuamna ding uh geelna ka neihte kei bek in ka thei hi.
Bethlehem Efrathah khua aw, nang pen Judah gamah khua neupen khat na hi a, ahi zongin nang sung panin Israel-te a uk ding khat ka piangsak ding hi. Ama gui pen tangtawng pek tawh kizom hi.

Hih thu a tun'na ding hun hi pah nailo ahih manin lai-in ciamteh in. Ahi zongin hong tung baihta ding a, kong lah khempeuh a manin hong tung ding hi. A tung hak tawh a kibangkha ahi zongin ngak keikai in. Ka seh hun a cin' ciangin hong tung takpi ding a, zekai lua nawnlo ding hi.
Ahi zongin Zeisu in, "Pasian in hih dingin kisam a sak khempeuh i hih ding a kilawm thu ahih manin tu-in hong phum hoh in," a cih ciangin Johan in zong a mang hi.

"Tua ahih ciangin note kiangah kong genin-ah: Na nuntakna dingun bang ne-in bang dawn ding cih ahi a, na pumpi uh-a' dingin bang silh ding cih ahi zongin lunghimawh lua kei un. Nuntakna pen an sangin thupizaw a, pumpi pen puan sangin thupizaw hilo ahi hiam?

Tua ahih manin bang ne ding a, bang dawn ding a, bang silh ding ihi hiam, ci-in lunghimawh lua kei un. 32 (Gentail mite in lunghihmawh penin a neihte uhhih bangte a hihi.) Hih nate khempeuh na kisap lamtak uh vantungah a om na Pa un a thei hi.

Mi khatpeuh in mi thahat khatpa' innsungah lutin a neihsate a laksak theihna dingin tua inn nei a thahatpa a hencip masak phot ding kisam hi. A hencip zawh khit ciang bekin a inn-ah lutin a neihsate lathei pan hi.
Tua khit ciangin Zeisu in ama paina ding khua leh mun khempeuhah nih nihin a na pai dingin mi sawmsagih seh a, ama mai-ah a mapaisak hi.
"Mi thahat khat in a hiam neih khempeuh tawh ama inn a cin' ciangin a neihsa khempeuh suakta hi.
Mi khatpeuh in inn lianpi khat lamding a sawm leh, ka zo zo ding hiam cih a theihna dingin a bei dingzah tuat masa hi.

Galkap tul sawm a nei kumpi khat in galkap tul sawm nih tawh a hong kuan kumpi khat do dingin a kithawi leh, tua kumpipa a dozo ding mahin i hat takpi hiam ci-in ngaihsun masa ding hi. 32 A zo zo ding ahih vet kei leh, tua kumpipa a hong tun' ma, a gamla-ah a om lai-in, ama kiangah kamtaite sawl ding a, kilemna ding thu gensak ding hi.
Tu'n ka gamtatna ding ka theita hi. Tua ka ngaihsut bangin gamta leng, ka nasepna panin ka tawp ciangin lawm nei-in, amaute in a inn-ah kei hong tungsak ding uhhi,’ ci hi.
Mi pawlkhat, namsau tawh kithat ding a, pawlkhat, galmatin gamdangah kiciahpih ding hi. Tua ciangin Gentail mite' uk hun a bei matengin Jerusalem khuapi a siacipin om ding hi.

Tua ahih manin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, "A mantakin gen lehang: Tapa in ama thu bek tawh bangmah semlo a, a Pa in a sep a muhteng bek a sem a hihi. Tua hi a, a Pa in a septeng mah a Tapa in zong a sem a hihi.

Note' omna ding mun a bawlkhol dingin a pai ding ka hihi. Ka Pa' innsungah omna ding mun tampi om hi. A omlo ding hi leh hih bangin thu ka hong gen kei ding hi. 3 Kei va pai-in note' omna ding mun ka va bawlkholh khit ciangin keima omna munah note na hong om theihna dingun note a hong la dingin ka hong paikik ding hi.
"Ahi zongin Thuman a hong lak ding Huhpa ahi Khasiangtho ka Pa kiang panin ka hong sawl ding hi. Amah hong tun' ciangin keima thu hong gen ding hi.

Tua ahih manin thuman hong lak ding Khasiangtho hong tun' ciangin thu khempeuh a manin hong hilh ding hi. Ama ngaihsuttawm thu hong gen ding hilo a, ama tungah a kigen thute leh a hong tungding thute a hong gen ding a hihi.

Sauveipi a kisel khit uh ciangin Peter hong ding a, "Lawmte aw, Gentail mite in Pasian' thu za-in a uptheihna dingun amaute tungah Lungdamna Thu a hilh dingin sawtpi lai pekin note lak panin Pasian in kei hong teelkhiatna thu na thei uhhi.

Mihing khat tung panin leitung minam khempeuh hong piangsakin, leitung khempeuhah a omsak hi. Amah in mihingte a pian'sakma pekin, mihingte' nuntak tanvei ding leh a ten'na ding uh mun a sehsa a hihi.
Sani nitakin an nekhawm dingin ka kikhawm uh a, a zingciangin a dingkhia ding ahih manin Paul in a thuhilh zankim ciangdong a zomsuak hi.

Christ sungah sanggamte aw, Gentail midangte lakah thu um mi ka ngah mah bangin note lakah zong ngahding lametna tawh note kiangah pai ding tam veipi ka geel zel hangin ka hong pai theihlohna thu nong theih ding uh ka ut hi.

Ama deihna bang a sem dingin Pasian in a hong sap, amah a it eite-a' dingin na khempeuh a hoihlamin piangsak hi, ci-in i thei hi. 29 Pasian' Tapa mi khempeuh lakah a upa pen a suahtheihna dingin Pasian in a teelkholhsa mite, a Tapa tawh a kibang dingin a sehsa a hihi.
Keima nasep pen khaici vawh hi a, Apollos' nasep pen tuibuah hi a, ahi zongin a khangsakpa ahih leh Pasian a hihi.
Tua ahih manin na patsa uh thu a bei dongin zomsuak unla, na gelsa uh na tangtun'sak theihna dingun na neihsa uh tawh lawptakin na sem un.
Pasian in Zeisu Christ hangin ama mite ahi dingin eite a hong bawl ding a sehkholhsa hi a, tua bangin a hong bawlding pen ama tupna leh a utna a hihi.

Pasian in a pilna leh a thumuhnate zangin ama geelsa bangin hong sem a, Christ zangin a sepnop thusimteng eite tungah hong kilangsak hi. 10 Tua a geel thu pen, a hunhoih a tun' ciangin Christ khutnuai-ah, vantung leh leitungah a om khempeuh gawm ding a hihi. 11 Na khempeuh, Pasian' ngaihsutna leh a geelsa bangin a piang hi. A cil peka kipanin a ngaihsutsa thu tawh kizui-in Christ tawh i kipawlna hangin Pasian' tate ihihna dingin Pasian mah in a hong sehsa ihi hi. 12 Tua ahih manin Christ a muang masa eite in Pasian phatin a minthan'na vang kilangsak ni.

Tua ahih ciangin ka hong it sanggamte aw, note tawh ka hong omkhawm lai-in ka thu na hong man' tawntung uh mah bangin, tu-in note tawh ka hong omkhawm loh hun ciangin zong ka thu na hong man' ding uh thupizaw lai hi. Pasian kihtakna leh zahtakna tawh na ma uh nawt unla, amah in note hong hotkhiatna thu a cingtaak suaksak un. 13 Banghang hiam cihleh note in utna lungsim na neihna ding uh leh ama deihna na zuihzawhna dingun note sungah Pasian in a tawntungin na a hong sem a hihi.
Pasian' thu tawh a kituaklo, a haihuai tangthu phuahtawmte ngaihsutin na nei vet kei in. Pasian' deihna tawh a kituakin na nuntak zawhna dingin na kisin in.

Mi khat in a sih khit ciangin a gamhluah dingin a deihpa lai-in ciamtehin a koih leh a laibawlpa a sih phot ding kisam hi. 17 A laibawlpa a hin' laiteng tua lai kizang theilo a, a sih khit ciangin kizang thei bek hi.

Tuni ahih kei leh zingciangin tua khua tua khua-ah va pai-in, kum khat bang va omin, sumbawlin a meet tampi va ngah ni, a ci mite aw, ka thugen hong ngai dih un. 14 Zingciangin na nuntakna uh bangci ding cih nangawn na thei kei uhhi. Meiilum tawlkhat sung kaii-in a mangthang pak tawh a kibang lel na hi uhhi. 15 Note in, "Topa in hong thukimpih nak leh nungta-in tua bang tua bang i sem ding hi," na cihding uhhi bek hi.

Sodom kumpipa in Abram' kiangah, "A mite hong pia in la, ahih hangin a nate nang-a' dingin la in," a ci hi. 22 Ahih hangin Abram in Sodom kumpipa kiangah, "Vantung leh leitung a bawl Sang Pen { Topa } Pasian tungah ka kiciam khinzo hi. 23 Nangmah in, ‘Abram ka hausak hi,’ ci khading na hih manin mimkhau ahi a, khedap khau ahi a, nangma-a' ahi na khat peuhpeuh ahi zongin ka la kei ding hi. 24 Tangvalte' neksate leh kei tawh hong kuan mite' tahn dingte lobuang bangmah ka la kei ding hi. Aner, Eshkol, leh Mamre-te amau' tanh ding pia in," a ci hi.

Tua thamloin, mi khempeuh lak panin Pasian a zahtak mi, a muan'huai mi leh sumgolh a mudah mi, mi siamte na teelkhia ding hi. Tua bang mite pen a tul, a za, a sawmnga, a sawmte tungah a uk dingin na koih ding hi.
Sumgolh na la kei ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh sumgolh in uliante' mit tawsak a, thuman mite' thu heikhiatsak hi.
"Note in thukhenna-ah thu a tangloin na khen kei ding uhhi. Mizawngte langgen loin, a liante' thu zuiloin, thumanna tawh na vengte uh thu na khen ding uhhi.

banghang hiam cihleh minphatna lianpi nang kong pia ding a, kei' tunga nong gen peuhpeuh ka hih ding hi. Hong pai in la, hih mite hong samsiatsak in,’ ci hi," ci-in a gen uhhi. 18 Ahih hangin Balaam in Balak' nasemte kiangah, "Balak in kham leh ngun tawh a kidim ama inn hong pia ding hita leh zong, { Topa } ka Pasian' thupiakna banah a tamzaw hita leh a tawmzaw hita leh bangmah ka hih thei kei hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } na Pasian uh a lian, a vanglian, a kihtakhuai Pasian, angvan neiloin, sumgolh a lalo, pasian-te' Pasian, topate' Topa a hihi.
Thutang na heikhia kei ding uh a, angvan tuam na nei kei ding uhhi. Sumgolh in mipilte' mit tawsakin thumante' thu heikhia ahih manin sumgolh na la kei ding uhhi.
"‘Mawhna neilopa thahna dingin sumgolh a la mipa in gimna ngah ta hen,’ ci ding uhhi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in, ‘Amen,’ ci ding uhhi.

Banghang hiam cihleh ka sih khit ciangin note sia gamtatin, note kong sawlna lampi panin na pial taktak ding lam uh ka thei hi. Note' sepna tawh amah hehsakin, { Topa' } muhna-ah a sia gamta ding na hih manun, hong pai ding hunte-ah, note' tungah gimna hong tung ding hi," a ci hi.

Tua khit ciangin Samson in Sorek kuamah Delilah a kici numei khat ngai hi. 5 Tua ciangin Filistia mi uliante tuanu kiangah hong pai-in, "Amah hong zol in la, ama hatna koi-ah om hiam cihna leh amah i nuaisiah zawhna dingin amah i hen theihna ding, amah i zawh theihna ding zia hong thei in. Na theihzawh leh ngun pek tul leh za khat ciat nang kong pia ding uhhi," a ci uhhi.

Samuel a teek ciangin amah in Israel-te' tungah thukhenin a tapate a koih hi. 2 A ta upa' min Joel hi a, a nihna' min Abijah a hihi. Amaute pen Beersheba-ah thukhente ahi uhhi. 3 Ahih hangin a tapate amah bangin gamtalo uh a, sum ngah ding lam bek kin uh ahih manin sumgolh la-in thuman heikhia uhhi.

Ahih hangin bangmah a manlo mi pawlkhat in, "Hih mipa in eite hong bangci hotkhiat zawh ding ahi hiam?" a ci uhhi. Amaute in amah simmawhin ama kiangah letsong puaklo uhhi. Ahih hangin amah in tua mite bangmah cihlo hi.

Hih lai-ah ka om hi; ka mawhna a om leh { Topa' } mai leh a sathau nilhpa' mai-ah ka mawhna hong pulak un. Kua' bawngtal ka laksak hiam? Ahih kei leh kua' la ka laksak hiam? Ahih kei leh kua khem ka hi hiam? Kua nengniam ka hi hiam? Ahih kei leh keima mit a tawsak dingin kua' tung panin sumgolh la ngei ka hi hiam? Ka mawhna nong lah theih uh leh kong dinkik ding hi," a ci hi.

Israel mite khatlekhat kiho-in, "Hih hong paikhia mipa na mu ngei uhhiam? Israel-te a to dingin hong paito takpi hi. Amah a that mipa tungah kumpipa in sum tampi pia-in, ama tanu zong pia ding a, a pa' innkuante, Israel sungah aana nasep leh siah khempeuh kipengsak ding hi," a ci uhhi.

Tua ciangin Asa in { Topa' } biakinn sung vankoihna leh kumpipa inn vankoihna sungah a omlai ngun leh kham khempeuh la-in ama nasemte' khutsungah tuate a pia hi. Tua ciangin kumpi Asa in Damaskas-ah a teng, Syria kumpi, Hezion' tapa Tabrimmon, a tapa Benhadad kiangah tuate puak a, 19 "Ka pa leh na pa mah bangin kei leh nang kikalah kipawlna khat omsak ni. Ngun leh kham letsong nangma tungah kong puak hi. Keima kiang panin amah a nungkik theihna dingin Israel kumpi Baasha tawh na kipawlna va sutat in," a ci hi.
19:7 Tu-in note in { Topa } zahtak unla, na hihnate uhah kingaihsun un. Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } i Pasian in thuman heikhiatna, mi deidanna, leh sumgolh laknate deihlo hi," a ci hi.
Amau' ngimna a tangtun' theihlohna dingin amaute in a langpang dingin zum nasemte golhguk pia uhhi. Persia kumpipa Sairas' huna kipan kumpi Darias hun dong hih bangin hih ngitnget uhhi.

Mehetabel' tapa Delaiah, a tapa Shemaiah a inn-ah omcip ahih manin ni khat ama kiangah ka pai leh amah in, "Pasian' inn sung, siangtho munah kituahin biakinn kong kikhaknelh ni; banghang hiam cihleh nang hong that dingin amaute hong pai uh a, zanin amaute in nang hong that ding uhhi," hong ci hi. 11 Ahih hangin keimah in, "Mi kei bangte tai ding ahi hiam? Mi kei bangte a suahtakna dingin biakinn sungah bu ding ahi hiam? Ka pai peuhmah kei ding hi," ka ci hi. 12 Tua ciangin a thusim ka phawkkhia hi. Pasian in tua bang thu a gen dingin amah a sawl hilo a, Tobiah leh Sanballat in tua bangin thugen dingin golhguk a na pia na hi a, ama thugenna pen keimah suksiat nopna a hihi. 13 Ama thugen bangin gamta-in mawhna ka bawl theihna dingin keimah hong lausakna dingin a kicial a hihi. Tua bangin zuikha leng kei hong minsia sakin hong simmawh ding uhhi.

Tua ciangin Haman in Kumpipa Ahasueras' kiangah, "Na ukna gam tuamtuam sunga om mite lakah a om kawikawi, amau a tuam om mi pawlkhat om hi. Amau' ngeinate pen midangte-a' tawh kibanglo a, amaute in nangma thukhamte zuilo uhhi. Tua ahih manin hih mite na hici khahkhong ding kilawmlo hi.
Uz gamah Job kici min nei mi khat a om hi. Tua mipa a paubaanglo, a thutang, Pasian a zahtak mi khat hi a, amah in gamtat hoihlo peuhmah pel hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian a ngaihsun lote mi cimang suak a, sumgolh tawh a kilam innte mei in kangtum hi.
Sumgolh' khemsa-in gamta kei in la, leitung nate' bawlin lam kipialsak kei in.
ama sum a meetin a khalo, thutang mite a langpan'lo, golhguk a lalo mite teng ding uhhi. Hih bangin a gamtate pen ling ngeilo ding hi.
Mimawhte, mi that nuamte, siatna a bawl mite, leh golhguk a la nuamte tawh kei hong susia khawm kei in.
Ka ta aw, mi hoihlote in nang hong zol ciangin, amau' zolna zui kei in.
Thuman loin ngahna-ah phattuamna omlo a, thumanna in sihna ding pan hong hon hi.
Tawikhaina manlo a zangte { Topa } in mudah a, tawikhaina man a zangte tungah { Topa } lungkim hi.
Mizawngte bawlsiatna pen a piangsak Pasian simmawhna hi a, mizawngte tungah citna pen Pasian zahtakna a hihi.
A manloin sum ngahna in innsung lungkhamsak a, sumgolh a deihlote a nuntak sauvei nuam hi.
Sumgolh a zangte in ai bangin ngaihsun uh a, a deih khempeuh uh a ngahsak dingin ngaihsun uhhi.
A ginalo thukhente in sumgolh sangsim uh a, a thukhenna uhah thuman om nawnlo hi.
Letsong in a piapa-a' dingin lampi hon'sak a, miliante tawh kimusak thei hi.
A manloin a kingah an pen lim zungzung a, ahi zongin a nung ciangin suangtang haikhak tawh a kibang a hihi.
A simthamin letsong piakna in hehna damsak a, puannuai tawi in sinsona daisak hi.
Mi langbawlna hoihlo a, ahi zongin letsong neucik khat hangin thukhente gamta khial thei zel hi.
Thumanin a gamta kumpi in a gam kipsak a, sum bek a ngaihsun kumpi in a gam siasak hi.
Kumpipa in mizawngte' thu a manin khensak leh a ukna kip tawntung ding hi.
Mipil khat in midangte a khem ciangin mihai bangin a gamta a hihi. Sumgolh lakna in a lapa' gamtat hoihna siasak hi.

Ah, a khial minam, mawhna in a nencip mite, siatna a bawlte' suanlekhakte, a gamtatsia tapate! Amaute in { Topa } nusia khin uh a, amaute in Israel-te' Siangtho Pasian simmawh khin uhhi. Amaute in lam khial khin taktak uhhi.
Gamtat hoih ding kisin un. Thumanin gamta unla, kinetniamna kheel un. Pa neilote hu unla, meigong numei pan'pih un," ci hi.

Na uliante, mi lehdote hi a, gutate tawh a kikhawlte a hihi. Mi khempeuh in sumgolh leh letsong a deih uhhi. Amaute in pa neilote pan'pihlo uh a, meigongnu' thu amaute in sanglo uhhi. 24 Tua ahih ciangin, Topa, Vanglian { Topa}, Israel-te' Vanglian Pasian in hih bangin ci hi: "Ah, ka lang ahi note' tungah ka hehna kong khahkhia ding a, ka gal ahi note tungah keimah in kong thuk ding hi.
A phate sia ci-in, a siate pha ci a, khuavak dingin khuamial koihin, khuamial dingin khuavak koih a, a khum dingin a kha koihin, a kha dingin a khum a koihte in gimna ngah ta hen.
Leenggahzu tampi a dawnte, khamtheih zunek a hatte, 23 mimawhte sumgolh tawh khah a, midikte a mawhsakte in gimna ngah ta hen!

A cimawhte' thutang kimlai hei khiatsakin, keima mite sungah a zawngte' thuman sutkhia-in, meigong numeite' neihsa amau-a' ding a suahtheihna ding leh pa neilote' neihsa amau' nek dingin a bawl theihna dingun a manlo thukhensatna pia a, nenniamna thu a gelhte in gimna ngah ta uh hen! 2, 3 Gimpiak ni hun, gamlapi panin huihpi hong nun' ciangin note in bangcih ding na hi uhhiam? Huhna ngenin kua kiangah tai ding a, na neihsa uh koi lai-ah koih ding na hi uhhiam?

Thumanin gamta-in thutang na gen uh leh na suakta ding uhhi. Na vangliatna uh mizawngte khemna-in zang kei unla, sumgolh deih kei un. Mi thah ding leh siatna gamtat ding a vaihawmte tawh kipawl kei un.
Bang deihna tawh Sheba gam panin paknamtuite hong pai a, gamlapi panin sing namtuite hong tung ahi hiam? Na meihal biaknate uh ka sang thei kei a, nong biaknate uh deihhuai ka sa kei hi.

"Tua ahih ciangin Topa { Pasian } ahi keimah a nungta ka hih mah bangin, note in siatna nam khempeuh leh a muhdahhuai gamtatna tawh ka biakinn ninsak na hih manun cikze hetloin note kong sukmang taak kei leh, ci-in ka kiciam hi.

Mangbuhham khut khat dim leh anlum them tawmkhat na ngah theihna dingun ka mite' mai-ah kei nong minsiasak uhhi. A si dingin a kilawm lopite na that nuam uh a, a hing dingin a kilawm lopite na hingsak nuam uhhi. Tua bangin ka mite tungah zuauthu genin, amaute in note' thugen hong um uhhi.
Na sanggamnu' mawhna pen: Amah leh a tanute in nek ding tampi nei-in nuamsa mahmahin, daitakin om uh ahih manin amaute kiphasak uh a, a zawng a cimawhte donlo uhhi.

Pawlkhat in sum deih manin mi that uhhi. Pawlkhatte in a Israel mipih sum leitawi a late tungah nuamtak sa-in a meet lakna tawh hauhlawh uhhi. Amaute in kei hong mangngilh uhhi, Topa { Pasian } in ci hi. 13 "A manloin mi' na na suhna leh mi na thahna hangin ka khuttum ka zial ding hi.

{ Topa } in hih bangin ci hi: Israel mite thumvei a khialh khit, a liveina hangin pelloin amaute gim ka pia ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh amaute in leiba a loh zawhloh man bekun midik kimlai zuak uh a, khedap bu khat man a loh zawhloh man bekun mi cimawhte sila-in a zuak uhhi.
Banghang hiam cihleh na khialhna tampite uh leh na mawhna tampite uh a vekin ka thei khin hi. Thuman mite gimsakin, sumgolh na la uh a, thukhenna zumah mizawngte' thu a manin na khen kei uhhi.

Khuapi ukte in sumgolh ngahtheihna ding ngaihsutna bek tawh thu khen a, siampite in sum ngahtheihna ding ngaihsutna bek tawh thu gen a, kamsangte in zong sum ngahtheihna ding ngaihsutna bek mah tawh mailam thu genkhol uhhi. Tua bang hinapi-in amaute in { Topa}, muan'in nei uh a, "{ Topa } in eite hong ompih a, eite tungah siatna hong tunglo ding hi," a ci uhhi.
A sia lama gamtat ding siam mahmah uh a, uliante leh thukhente in sumgolh ngenin, miliante in amau' deihteng pulak uh a, kipawlin vaihawm khawm uhhi.
"Kei kiangah, ‘Topa, Topa aw,’ hong ci mi khempeuh, vantung ki-ukna sungah lutthei kimlo ding uh a, vantungah a om ka Pa' deihna bangin a gamtateng bek lutthei ding uhhi.
"Note' khutsungah amah hong pia leng, note in kei bang tawh hong guai ding na hi uhhiam?" a cih ciangin ngun peek sawmthum a pia uhhi.

A lehhekpa Judas in Zeisu a si dingin thu a kikhenna a muh ciangin kisikkik ahih manin siampi liante leh upate kiangah a ngun peek sawmthumte va paipih kik a, 4 "Mawhna a neilo mipa a si dingin lehhekkha ka hih manin ka mawh hi," a va ci hi. Ahi zongin amaute in, "Kote tawh bang kisai nawn ding ahi hiam? Nangma tavuan ahi hi," a na cihsan uhhi.

Siampi liante in upate tawh thu kikupna khat nei-in vai a hawm khit uh ciangin sum tampi tawh galkapte golhguk uh a, 13 "Mite kiangah, ‘A nungzuite, zanin ka ihmut kalun hong pai-in a luang a gukhia uhhi,’ ci-in gen un. 14 Gam ukpa Pilat in hih thu a zak ciangin ama lungkim zawhna ding dongin ka na genpih ding uh a, note-a' dingin bangmah lunghihmawhna omlo ding hi," a ci uhhi. 15 Tua ahih manin galkapte in a sum sang uh a, a kisawl bangin a gamta uhhi. Tua ahih manin tuni dongin Jew mite lakah tu-a bangin hih thu a kigengen lai a hihi.
Siampi liante in a thu a zak uh ciangin lungdam mahmah uh a, sum tawh kong guai ding uhhi, ci-in thu a ciam uhhi. Tua ahih manin Judas in Zeisu a lehhek theihna ding a hunhoih a zong hi.
Amaute na nuam mahmah uh a, sum tawh guaih dingin thuciam a na pia uhhi.
Tua ciangin amaute in mi cialin sumgolh pia uh a, "Moses leh Pasian langpangin thu a genna ka za uhhi," cisak uhhi.

Sawltakte in amaute tungah a khut uh a ngak ciangin Khasiangtho a ngahna uh mu ahih manin Simon in Peter leh Johan kiangah sum pia a, 19 "Kei zong ka khut ka ngakna mi peuhpeuh in Khasiangtho a ngahtheihna dingin hih bang vangliatna kei zong hong pia un," a ci hi. 20 Ahi zongin Peter in, "Pasian' piakkhong na pen sum tawh lei theih dingin ngaihsun na hih manin na sumteng tawh sikhawm in.

Ahi zongin Paul in thu gengenin, a hoihin a gamtatna ding, pumpi ki-uk zawhna ding, leh hong tungding Thukhenna Hunte a gen tohtoh ciangin, Feliks hong lau a, "Va paikik phot in. Hun ka ngah ciangin kong samkik ding hi," ci-in a gen hi. 26 Paul in sumgolh zong hong pia thei leh ci-in ngaihsunkawm ahih manin Paul kiangah va pai zelin a kiho zelzel uh a hihi.
Sum deihluatna in siatna namkim piangsak hi. Mi pawlkhat in sum deihlua liang uh ahih manin a upna panun pialkhia-in gimna lungkhamna tampi a thuaklawh uhhi.

Nitawp ni hun pen a lauhuai hun ahih ding lamtak phawk in. 2 Tuahun ciangin mite in amau angsung ding bek ngaihsunin, huaihamin, kisialin, kihisakin, mi zahko-in, nu leh pate' thu mangloin, lungdam theihna mel neiloin, biakna lungsim neiloin, 3 mi khualloin, hehpihna neiloin, mi gensia-in, ngongtatin, kihtakhuai-in, thuhoih deihloin, 4 ciampelin, thu khualloin, kiphasak gawpin, Pasian donloin pumpi nopsakna bek deihin, 5 biakna thu a puathamteng zui napi-in biakna hangin vangliatna thu a omte deihlo ding uhhi. Tua bangin a gamta mite na pelh in.
Sum deihluatna tawh na kipelhna dingun na nuntakna uhah kikem unla, na neihzah uh tawh lungkim un. Pasian in, "Note ka hong nusia ngei kei ding a, ka hong tamasak ngei kei ding hi," hong ci hi.
Tua bangin na upna hong hong kize-etna na thuakzawh uh ciangin na kipna uh hong kilangsak ahihna thu na thei uhhi.
Pa Pasian in a siangtho biakna citakin a ngaihsut thu in: Tagahte leh meigong numeite a haksatna uhah hoihtakin kemin, leitung siatnate tawh kisawhkha loin siangtho takin omna a hihi.
note in mizawngte na simmawhbawl uhhi. Note hong bawlsia-in thukhen zum hong tun' pahpahte, mihaute hizaw uhhi. 7 Pasian in note a hong phuah min hoih a gensiate, mihaute mah ahi uhhi.
En'na leh huaihamna a om nak leh buaina leh siatna nam khempeuh tawh kizom pahpah hi.
Nong hotkhiatna hangin hong lungdamsak kik in la, utna lungsim tawh keimah hong huh ta in.
Ahi zongin dawite in na thu uh hong man'na hangin lungdam kei unla, vantungah na min uh a kigelh manin lungdamzaw un," a ci hi.
Zeisu in ama kiangah, "Keimah in Lampi ka hi a, Thuman, leh Nuntakna zong ka hihi. Kei hong suangloin Pa kiangah kuamah tung theilo ding hi.
Nang bek a man Pasian na hihna thu leh nangmah in na hong sawl Zeisu Christ hong theihna pen amaute-a' dingin nuntak tawntung ngahna ding lampi a hihi.

Zeisu in, "A mantakin kong genin-ah, mi khatpeuh a suahkik kei leh Pasian' Ukna sungah lut theilo ding hi," a ci hi. 4 Tua ciangin Nikodemas in, "Mi khat a teek khit ciangin bangci suahkik thei ding ahi hiam? A nu' sungah lutkikin suakkik thei ding ahi hiam?" ci-in a dot ciangin 5 Zeisu in, "A mantakin kong genin-ah, mi khatpeuh tui leh Khasiangtho tawh a suahkik kei leh Pasian' Ukna sungah lut theilo ding hi. 6 Mihing sung panin a suakte mihing mah hi bek a, Kha tawh a suakte pen kha mi a hihi. 7 Tua ahih manin, ‘Na suahkik ding ahi hi,’ ka hong cihna hangin lamdangsa kei in. 8 Huih zong a utna peuhpeuhah nung a, a huging na zaktheih hangin koi lam panin hong nung a, koi lamah nung ahi hiam, cih na mu thei kei hi. Kha tawh a suak mite zong tua mah bang ahi hi," ci-in a dawng hi.

Pasian in leitung mite hong it mahmah ahih manin ama Tapa a um mi khempeuh si nawnloin a hin' tawntung theihna dingun a Tapa neihsun a hong piak dongin a hong itna a hong lak hi. 17 Pasian in leitungah a Tapa hong sawlna pen mawhsakna thukhen dingin a hong paisak hiloin, leitung mite a honkhia dingin a hong paisak hizaw hi. 18 Amah a um mite in mawhsak thukhenna thuaklo ding uhhi. Amah a umlote pen Pasian' Tapa neihsun umlo uh ahih manin mawhsak thukhenna a thuak khinta uh a hihi.
Tua ahih manin Tapa a um mi peuhmah nungta tawntung ding a, Tapa' thu a manglote in nuntak mulo ding a, amaute tungah Pasian heh tawntung ding hi," a ci hi.
ahi zongin keima piakding tui a dawn khempeuh dangtak kik nawnlo ding uhhi. Tua ka piak tui a dawnte sungah nuntakna tuinak piang ding a, a nungtasak paisuak ding hi," a ci hi.

A mantakin kong genin-ah, kei hong umte bek in nuntak tawntungna ngah hi. 48 Kei pen nuntakna an ka hihi. 49 Na pu na pate un gamsungah manna ne uh a, a vekpi-un si veve uhhi. 50 Ahi zongin vantung panin a hong pai an a ne mi peuhmah silo ding hi.
Tua ciangin thuman na thei ding uh a, tua thuman in note hong suaktasak ding hi," a cihleh
Tua ahih manin Tapa in note hong khah leh a suakta takpi na hi uhhi.
Pasian phat uh a, khatlekhat thupha kideihsakin a om uhhi. Pasian in nisimin hotkhiatna a ngah mi kibehlapsak tawntung hi.
Ama hang bek tawh hotkhiatna kingah thei ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh eite in hotkhiatna i ngahtheihna dingin leitung khempeuhah Pasian in hong piak min dang khat zong omlo hi," ci-in a gen hi.
Amaute in, "Topa Zeisu um in. Tua hi leh nang leh na innkuanpihte in hotkhiatna na ngah ding uhhi," ci-in a dawng uhhi.

Mi khat bek' mawhna hangin sihna in hong uk ahih leh mi khat mah ahi Zeisu Christ hangin nakpi takin a lian Pasian' hehpihna leh mihoih-a san'na a ngah mite nungta-in thahatzaw kan ding uhhi. 18 Tua hi a, khialhna khat in mi khempeuh tungah thukhenna tungsak ahih mah bangin gamtatna hoih khat mah in mi khempeuh khahin nungtasak hi. 19 Mi khat in thu a man'loh manin mi tampi mimawh a suahsak mah bangin mi khat in thu a man'na hangin mi tampi in Pasian tawh kipawl theihna a ngah ding uh a hihi.
Banghang hiam cihleh mawhna in thaman hong piak pen sihna hi a, ahi zongin i Topa Zeisu tawh i kipawl manin Pasian' hong piakkhong pen nuntak tawntungna a hihi.

Zeisu pen Topa hi, ci-in mite kiangah genin, Pasian in sihna panin amah hingkiksak zo hi, ci-in na lungsim sung uhah na up taktak uh leh hotkhiatna na ngah ding uhhi. 10 Banghang hiam cihleh i lungsimah i up taktakna hangin Pasian tawh kipawl theihna kingah a, i kamin i genna hangin hotkhiatna a kingah a hihi. 11 Laisiangtho in, "Amah a um mi peuhmah tavailo ding hi," ci hi. 12 Banghang hiam cihleh Jew mi leh Gentail mi a kideidanna omlo ahih manin Topa pen mi khempeuh' Topa hi kim a, ama kiangah a ngen khempeuh tungah thupha tampi tak a pia hi. 13 Laisiangtho in zong, "Topa tungah huhna a ngen khempeuhte in hotkhiatna a ngah ding uhhi," ci hi.

Lungdamna thu ka hilhte uh kitello ahih leh zong siatna a thuak mite-a' ding bekin a kitello hi ding hi. 4 Tua bang mite pen hih leitung pasian gilote in a lungsim mit uh tawsak ahih manin umlo uh a, Pasian tawh a kibang teekteek Christ minthan'na hangin amaute tungah a hong taang lungdamna thu khuavak mu theilo uhhi.
Tua ahih manin mi khatpeuh, Christ tawh a kipawl ciangin mi thak suak a, a mi lui ngeina bei-in a mi thak ngeina a neita a hihi.

Note' upna hangin Pasian' hong hehpihna tawh hotkhiatna a ngah na hi uhhi. Note' thalawhna hangin a ngah hiloin Pasian' hong piakkhong a hihi. 9 Note' hanciamna tawh a ngah hilo na hih manun na kisialhna ding uh a thu omlo hi.
Amah in khuamial vangliatna panin eite hong honkhia-in, a lungmuan'huaina mun, a it a Tapa' ukna sungah hong koih a,
Eite-a' dingin a hoihlo, i mawhna a kiciamtehna khempeuh, hong phiatsak a, tuate khempeuh singlamteh tungah kilhcipin a beisak ta hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh mi khempeuh in hotkhiatna a ngahtheihna dingun Pasian in ama hehpihna hong lak khinzo hi. 12 Eite in i lamet, a lian Pasian leh eite hong Hon Zeisu Christ a vangliatna hong kilatkik ding hun ngakin i om laitakin i biakna tawh a kituaklo thute leh leitung nate deihna phiatin, lungsim hi hithiatin omin, thutangin, hih leitungah Pasian' deihna bangin i nuntakna dingin tua hehpihna thu in eite hong hilh hi.

Note' upna hangin nitawp ni ciangin na ngahding uh hotkhiatna nomau-a' ahihna a kilatsakna dingin Pasian in ama vangliatna tawh a hong kepsak a hihi. 6 Tua ahih manin tu laitakin mite' bawlsiatna a tuamtuam na thuak manun tawlkhat na lungkham uh ahi zongin hihbang thuakna hangin lungdamzaw un. 7 Hihbang thuaknate in a um takpi mah na hihna uh hong kilangsak hi. A siathei khamte nangawn, a hoih taktak mah ahi hiam, ci-in mite in mei tawh sin uh ahih manin, kham sangin a manphazaw note' upna zong a kiptak mah ahi hiam, ci-in Pasian in hong sin ding mah a hihi. Tua bangin na thuakzawh uh leh Christ hong kilat Ni ciangin phatna, minthan'na, leh pahtawina na ngah ding uhhi. 8 Amah mu ngeilo napi-in na it uh a, amah mu ngeilo napi-in a thu umin kama genzawhloh zah dongin nakpi takin na lungdam uhhi. 9 Tua bangin na upna uh hangin kha thu-ah hotkhiatna a ngah na hi uhhi.
A sithei nulepate sung pan hiloin a sitheilo nulepate sung panin a nungta tawntung Pasian' thu tawh naungek bangin a suakkik na hi uhhi.
Pa Pasian in leitung mite a honkhia dingin a Tapa a hong paisakna thu kote in thei-in midang kiangah genbelin ka nei uhhi.

Tu-in Pasian' teci pan'na in: Pasian in ama Tapa tung tawnin eite tungah nuntak tawntungna a hong pia hi. 12 Pasian' Tapa tawh a kipawl peuhmah in nuntak tawntungna nei a, Pasian' Tapa tawh a kipawllote in nuntak tawntungna neilo uhhi, cihna a hihi. 13 Pasian' Tapa a um mite in nuntak tawntungna a nei na hih lamtak uh na theihna dingun hih lai a hong gelh ka hihi.
{ Topa } Pasian in leitungah guah zusak nailo a, leitang a kho ding mi omlo ahih manin gamsung kungnote lei sungah om nailo a, lo sung ankungte pokhia lo hi.
{ Topa } Pasian in mipa la-in, Eden huan kho-in a kem dingin a koih hi.

Jacob in Rachel ngai hi. Amah in, "Na tanu a nauzaw Rachel thalawhna dingin nangma na kum sagih kong sem ding hi," a ci hi. 19 Laban in, "Midang tungah amah ka piak ding sangin nang' tungah amah kong piak ding hoihzaw hi; kei kiangah om in," a ci hi. 20 Tua ahih ciangin Jacob in Rachel a ngahna dingin kum sagih sung na sem a, amah a itna hangin tua hunte ni tawmno khat tawh kibang a sa hi. 21 Tua ciangin Jacob in Laban kiangah, "Ka hun cingta ahih ciangin amah tawh ka lupkhawm theihna dingin ka zi hong pia in," a ci hi.
Ni guk sung nomau' na semin na nasep ding khempeuh uh na hih ding uhhi.
"Bawng in an a cil laitakin a muk na tuam kei ding uhhi.

A kum lina, Ziv kha-in { Topa' } biakinn a bulpi kipan hi. 38 A kum sawmlekhatna, a kha giatna ahi Bul kha-in a na khempeuh leh a kigen khempeuh bangin a kizo hi. Amah in tua a lamna-in kum sagih sung hun a bei hi.

a minin a kilo hih mite pen amau' beh ciatah ulian hi uh a, amau' beh ciat nakpi takin a khang hi. 39 A tuuhonte uh-a' dingin lonona a zong dingin kuam nisuahna lampang, Gedor lutna lamah khualzin uh a, 40 lei hoih, lonona, leh gam zai-in, gam dai-in, a nopna mun mu uhhi; banghang hiam cihleh tua lai-ah a teng masate pen Ham mite ahi uhhi. 41 A minin a kiciamteh hih mite, Judah kumpi Hezekiah' hun sungin hong pai uh a, tua lai-ah a om Meunim mite leh amau' puanbukte susia-in tuni dongin amaute beisak uh a, amau' tuuhonte-a' dingin tua lai-ah lonona om ahih manin amau' munah amaute a teng uhhi.
Ahih hangin nang, hang in! Na nasepna thaman hong kipia ding ahih manin na khut zawsak kei in," a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amah in gamlakah tausangte lam a, Shefelah leh zanglei-ah ganhon tampi nei ahih manin tuikhuk tampi to a, lei nasep uuk ahih manin mualtung leh lei hoihna gamte-ah lokhote leh leenggui puahte a nei hi.
Amah leh a innkuan leh a neihsate khempeuh na hutna-in a kimkotah dai khan hilo na hi hiam? Ama hihna khempeuhah thupha na pia a, genzawh lohin ama neihsa pung hi.
Kote' { Topa } Pasian aw, kote tungah na thupha hong tungsak in la, kote' nasepna khempeuh hong tangtungsak in.

{ Topa } in inn lampih kei leh innlamte' sepna a mawkna a hihi. { Topa } in khuapi hutpih kei leh khuapi cingte' cin'na a mawkna a hihi. 2 Zingsangin tho baihin, gimpi-a nangma sepsa an na nek hakna zong a mawkna mah a hihi. Banghang hiam cihleh amah in ama itte tungah a ihmut sung nangawnun a pia hi.
Na khut tawh na sep thaman na ne ding a, na lung damin na mavang ding hi.

Ihmumu kei in la, om mawkmawk kei in. 5 Sabengpa' kiang panin a suahtakna dingin sakhi a tai bangin, thangah a awk vasa a kitom bangin na suahtakna dingin hanciam in. 6 Thadahpa aw, miksite kiangah pai in la, amau' nuntakzia va en in. 7 Amaute in a uk ding leh a makai ding kuamah neilo napi-in, 8 khuakhal sungin a nek ding uh, tuk hun sungin kaikhawm khol uhhi. 9 Thadahpa aw, bang tanvei lumlum ding a, cik ciangin thokhia ding na hi hiam? 10 Tawmkhat sung mengme lai ning, na cih kikalin 11 zawn'na leh cihmawhna in migilo gutate bangin nang hong sugawp pak ding hi. 12 Miginalo, a ginlo pa, thuzuau genin vak kawikawi a,
Thadahna in zawn'na hi a, thanuamna in hauhna hi. 5 A hunin an a lapa mipil hi a, anlak hunin a ihmupa in maizumna a ngah hi.
Nakpi takin lo khote in an hau a, man neilopi-in hun beisakna in haina a hihi.
Mi thanuamte vanglian a, mi thadahte sila suak hi.
Thadah mi in a deih ngahzo lo a, nasep hahkat mi in a deih khempeuh ngahzo hi.
Ol takin hauhpakna oltak mahin kiamkik pah a, haksapi-in hauhtohna khangto semsem hi.
Gimpi-a nasepna pen hauhna hi a, kam bek pau-in tutmawkna pen zawn'na a hihi. 24 Pilna pen mipilte' minthan'na lukhu hi a, haina pen mihaite' kizepna bulpi a hihi.
Na geelnate khempeuh { Topa } ap in; tua hi leh na geelna bangin tangtung ding hi.
A man tawikhaina leh tawi tehnate { Topa}-a' hi a, a tawisuang khempeuh ama bawlsa a hihi.
An duhna in mi na semsak a, gilkialna in nak sepsak semsem zaw hi.
Na a susia mite a hoihloh zah mahin a thadahte zong mihoihlo a hihi.
A thadahte lumlum a, a mawk omte a gil kial hi.
A thadah mi in a khut tawh ankuang sawksukin a kam sungah a tuttohkik ding nangawn utlo liang hi.
Lo khawh hunin a kho nuamlo thadahpa in tuk anlak hun ciangin bangmah neilo ding hi.
Lumlum lecin na zawng ding a, semsem lecin na hau ding hi.
A nasepna-ah a siam mahmah mi na theikha uhhiam? Amah in mi mawkmawkte' na semlo ding a, kumpite' na sem ding hi.
Hauhnop man bekin sum' sila suak kei unla, a manloin gamtakha kei un.

Tua bang ka muh ciangin thu ka lungngaingai a, thu manpha khat ka mukhia hi. 33 Tawmkhat ihmutna, tawmkhat lusukna, tawmkhat sung na seplohna, khutzepin ommawkna hangin 34 i tungah zawn'na hong tung a, cihmawhna in hong khuhcip hi.
Nakpi takin lo a khopa hau mahmah a, bangmahin a kimang tumlo na a sempa zawng mahmah hi. 20 A citak mipa in thupha tampi ngah ding a, a hau baih nuam mipa in gim tuak pelmawh ding hi.

Phalvak tungin zingtho a, annek ding teng limtakin bawlin a nasem numeite' sep dingteng a vaihawmsak hi. 16 Amah in leitang hoih penpen zong a, a thalawhsa sum tawh a leenggui lo ding a lei hi. 17 A nik singten'in a puanban zial a, thalawp takin na a sem hi. 18 Amah in a nasepte a manphatna thei a, zankim zankhang dongin nakpi takin na a sem hi. 19 Amah in khau kheekin a puan ding gantawm hi.
Thugen Siampa in hih bangin ci hi: A mawknapi, a mawknapi, na khempeuh a mawknapi. 3 Gimpi-a nisa thuakin nasepna-ah mihing in bang noptuam ngah ahi hiam?
Mihing khat in a nasepna thamanin an ne tui dawnin nuamsa-in a om sangin a hoihzaw bangmah dang omlo hi. Ahi zongin tua nangawn zong, Pasian' hang ahihna ka phawk hi.

Tua ahih ciangin mihingte in a sep thaman uh ne-in nuamsa-in a om ding uh a hoihpen ahihna ka phawk hi. Tualo a hih theih ding uh bangmah dang omlo hi. I sih khit ciangin bang piang ding cih theihtheihna bangmah omlo hi.
Mi khat sangin mi nih hoihzaw hi; amau' sepna thaman a tamzaw ngah uhhi.
Na mai-ah sep ding a om khempeuh, na tha neihzah tawh sem in. Banghang hiam cihleh na zuat ding sihna gamsungah nasepna leh thungaihsutna, pilna leh theihna cihte omlo hi.
Amaute tungah thu hoih ding hi, ci-in thuman mite kiangah hih thu gen un. Banghang hiam cihleh amaute in amau' gamtat hoih thaman ngah ding uhhi.
Inn lam unla, a sungah teng un. Huan bawl unla, a sungah na cin'te uh ne un.
Tu-in note kuamah lungkia kei un. Note tawh hong omkhawm ka hih manin nasep kipan un.
Pasian' deihteng sepding a hanciamte Pasian in lungkimna ngahsak ding ahih manin thupha ngah mi ahi uhhi.
Nasemte in a thaman a ngahding a kilawm ahih mah bangin na zintun'na inn mah uhah omsuak unla, a hong piak peuhpeuh uh na ne un. Na zintun'na inn uh kheel themthum kei un.
Martha bek in na semin manlah mahmah ahih manin a heh suak a, "Topa aw, ka naunu in kei bek na hong sepsak niloh phamawh salo na hi hiam? Kei hong huhna dingin hong sawl in," a ci hi.

Ahi zongin a topa' deihna a theihlohna hangin satthuakna ding a gamtakha nasempa pen kidamsatzaw deuh ding hi. Tampi a kipiaknapa tung pan tampi kikal ding a, a tamzaw a ki-apnapa tung pan a tamzaw kikal ding hi," ci-in a dawng hi.
Ahi zongin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, "Ka Pa in tuni dongin na sem tawntung ahih manin kei zong ka sep ding mah ahi hi," a ci hi.

Kuama neihsa, ngun, kham, leh puante en' dingin ka ngaihsun ngei kei hi. 34 Kei leh ka kithuahpihte' kisapna khempeuh ka ngahtheihna dingin keima khut mahmah tawh na ka sepna thu note in na thei uhhi. 35 Topa Zeisu mahmah in, ‘Ngahna sangin piak khiatna-ah lungdamna lianzaw hi,’ a cihna phawkkawmin nakpi takin nasepna tawh na khempeuhah a zawngkhalte huh ding hi hang, ci-in note kiangah kong lak khinzo hi," ci-in a vaikhak hi.
A thu omzia taktak hih bang a hihi. Israel mi a tamzaw in a hanciamciam uh ngahlo uhhi. Pasian' teel mi tawmkhat bek in ngah uh a, adangte in Pasian' sapna thudonlo uhhi.
Thadah kei unla, nakpi takin na sem un. Lawp mahmahna lungsim tawh Topa' na sem un.
Tua ahih ciangin mi tawh kilem theihna ding, leh kha thu-ah khatlekhat thahatna i kipiak theihna ding thute hanciam ciat ni.
Khaici vawhpa leh tuibuakpa a kizakim a hihi. Pasian in komau sepna tuak tawh kizui-in thaman hong pia ding hi.
Nasem i cih mite pen a topa uh tungah citakin a thuman ding uh kisam hi.
Tua ahih manin keimah in ka hong gennop thu in: Na hihna khempeuh uh, nekna dawnna-ah ahi zongin Pasian' minthan'na dingin na hih un.

Tua ahih ciangin ka hong it sanggamte aw, Topa' hangin na nasepnate uh a mawkna hi ngei hetlo hi, ci-in na theih uh mah bangin Topa-a' dingin a tawntungin na sem unla, ling hetloin lungsim kiptakin na om ta un.
Tua ahih manin na patsa uh thu a bei dongin zomsuak unla, na gelsa uh na tangtun'sak theihna dingun na neihsa uh tawh lawptakin na sem un.
Tua ahih manin na hoih sepding cimtak kei ni. Lungkia loin i sep nak leh a hun ciangin thaman i ngah ding hi.
Guta ngeite in gu nawnloin, ama nuntakna ding thuman takin thalawhin, mizawngte zong a huhtheih laina dingin thatang tawh nasep ding kipan ta uh hen.

Tua ahih ciangin hoihtakin kingaihsunin gamta unla, mihaite bang hiloin mipilte bangin gamta un. 16 Tuhun pen hun hoihlo hun ahih manin na hun neih khempeuh uh a hoih lamin zang un. 17 Tua ahih manin hai ommawk kei unla, Topa in bang a semdingin hong deih ahi hiam, ci-in kan un.

A hong pahtak ding uh deihna tawh amaute' muhsung bekin tuaci gamtat kei unla, Christ' sila na hihna hangun Pasian' hong deih bangin lungsim takpi tawh na sem un. 7 Mihingte' na a sem bang lelin kingaihsun loin Topa' na a sem bangin kingaihsun unla, thanopna tawh sem un. 8 Salte ahi a, sal ahilote ahi zongin na hoih a sem mi khempeuh, Topa in thaman a piakding lamtak na thei un.

Banghang hiam cihleh note in utna lungsim na neihna ding uh leh ama deihna na zuihzawhna dingun note sungah Pasian in a tawntungin na a hong sem a hihi. 14 Na khempeuh phunlo, thu nialloin sem un. 15 Tua hi leh a lungsim kawi, a hoihlo leitung mite lakah paubaan'na a neilo a siangtho, Pasian' tate na hi ding uh a, nuntakna thu na genna uh hangin leitung mite lakah khuavak bangin na hoihna uh a kilang mite na hi ding uhhi.
Ahi zongin ka utna tungkhin ing, cingtaak khinta ing, a ci ka hi kei hi. Christ Zeisu in kei-a' dingin a hong sepsak hamphatnate kimtakin ka ngahtheihna dingin a hanciam lai ka hihi.
Note-a kipan Laodisia khuamite leh kei a hong thei ngei nailo mi khempeuhte-a' ding nangawnin hahkat takin na ka sem hi.
Mite' nasem bangin kingaihsun loin, Pasian' nasem bangin kingaihsun unla, na sep peuhpeuh uh lungsim takpi tawh lawpin sem un.

Tu ma-a ka hong gensa uh mah bangin kamtam nuam se loin hoihtakin om hithiatna, no tawh a kisai thu bek ngaihsutna, leh note' nuntakna ding na na sepna ding uh hanciamin nei un. 12 Tua bangin gamta le uh cin thu umlo mite in note hong zahtak ding uh a, mite' neihsa na duhgawh kei ding uhhi.
Sanggamte aw, a thadah mite hilh unla, a meidawite hanthawnin, a zawngkhal mite huh unla, hihbang mite ngongbawl kei un.

Note tawh ka hong omkhawm lai-un, "Na a sem nuamlo mi peuhmah an nesak kei un," ci-in ka hong gen uhhi. 11 Hih bangin thu ka hong genna uh pen note lakah mi pawlkhatte thadahin na sem nuamlo uh a, midangte' nasepna va nawngkaisak zawsop hi, ci-in ka zakna hang uh a hihi. 12 Tu-in tua bang mite in kuamah nawngkaisak nawnloin man manin na sem hiathiatin amau' nuntakna dingun na a sepna dingun Topa Zeisu Christ min tawh hanthawnin thu ka hong pia uhhi.
A diakdiakin ei thu umte in mi khempeuh a Honkhia, a nungta Pasian muangin lamen ihih manin nakpi takin hanciamin na a sem ihi hi.
Mi khempeuh in na khan'tohna hong muhtheihna dingin hih thute limtakin ngaihsun in la, hahkatin na sem in.
Mi khatpeuh in a beh a phung, a diakdiakin a innkuansung mite a vak nop kei leh a upna a nusia hita a, thu umlo mite sangin siazaw lai hi.
Hahkat takin lo a khopa in anlak hun ciangin a tampen a ngah dingin a kilawm a hihi.
Pasian' thuman a mantakin hilhin, na nasepna-ah maizumna thuakloin, Pasian' pahtakna na ngahtheihna dingin na siam tawpin hanciam in.
Kidemna-ah ka hat tawpin ka hih khin a, a mong dongin ka tai khin a, upna thu khotakin lenin ka zokhin hi.
Tua ahih ciangin a zaw nuangnuang na khutte uh leh a no dakdak na khukte uh khauhsak un. 13 Bai luangluangin a paite, na guh na taang uh a kipelhlohna dingin lampi tang zui-in na pai un.

"Note' nasepna, na gimna uh leh lungduai takin na thuakna uh, leh migilote koihmawk loin, sawltak hilo napi-in sawltak hi ung, a ci mite dongtelin sawltak ahihlohna uh na muhkhiatnate uh ka thei hi. 3 Note in lungduai takin thuakin, keima min hangin thuakzo-in, lungkia hetloin na omna uh ka thei hi.

{ Topa } in Kain tungah, "Banghangin nang heh a, Banghangin na mai sia ahi hiam? 7 Limtakin hih lecin, nang hong kisanglo ding ahi hiam? Limtakin na hih kei leh nang hong hih nuamin mawhna in hong buk a, nang hong uk nuam hi. Ahih hangin nang in tua mawhna na zawh ding ahi hi," a ci hi.

"Note in na lungsim sung uhah na sanggampa uh na mudah kei ding uh a, na vengte uh tawh thu na kituahlohna uh kikum khawmin na siangsak ding uhhi; tua hi kei leh ama hangin khialhna na pua ding uhhi. 18 Note in nomau' mipihte tungah phu la loin, amau na lungsim neih kei ding uh a, nomau na ki-it uh bangin na vengte uh na it ding uhhi; kei pen { Topa } ka hihi.
Amah in, ‘Pha hi!’ a cihleh na nasempa-a' dingin a hoih hi ding hi; ahih hangin amah a heh leh amah in siatna a ngaihsutna thei in.
Tua ahih ciangin Israel mite tungah { Topa } heh a, ama muhna panin amaute hemkhia hi. Kuamah dang om nawnloin Judah gammi bek omlai hi.
Pasian, thu a tangin a khenpa hi a, migilote tungah a heh denpa a hihi.

Hehna panin kikham in la, sinsona nusia in. Nangmah kilungso tawmsak ke'n; tua in siatna bekah a hong paipih hi. 9 Banghang hiam cihleh migilote kipuaseh ding a, ahih hangin { Topa } a ngakte in leitung luah ding uhhi.
{ Topa } dikin hehpihna nei a, heh hak mahmahin itna kip lianpi a nei hi.
Mihaite in a hehna uh langsakpah uh a, mipilte in a hehna uh ipzo hi.
A lungtom mite hai gamtat a, mipilte lungduai hi.
A lungduaite mipil hi a, lungtomna pen haina kilatna a hihi.
Kam nemin dawn'na in hehna damsak a, kam khauh in hehna piangsak hi.
Lungtomna in kitotna piangsak a, lungduaina in kilemna piangsak hi.
Pilna in mi lungduaisak a, mi' hong hehsaknate kiphawkmawh bawlna in minthan'na a hihi.
Migilopa ama thuak ding gimna mah thuaksak zaw in. Honkhia lecin na hotkhiatkik zelzel kul ding hi.
Thutangin na a kisep ciangin midik khempeuh lungdam a, ahi zongin migilote lungkham hi.
A phun hat zi gilo tawh ten'khop sangin gam simthamah khat guak tangten' hoihzaw hi.
A hehbaih mite tawh kipawl kei unla, a lungtom mite tawh kikhawl kei un.
Hehna leh sinsona siahuai a, ahi zongin hazatna siahuaizaw lai hi.
Mihaipa a hehna bangin kam pau-in gamta gawp a, mipilpa ahih leh ki-ipin a hehna damsak hi.
A heh pahpahte in kitotna piangsak a, a heh baihte khial thei tawntung hi.
It hun om a, muhdah hun om hi. Kido hun om a, kilem hun om hi.
Heh pahpah kei in; hehna a haihuai a hihi.
{ Topa } in zong, "Na heh ding kilawm sa na hi hiam?" a ci hi.

Tua ahih manin Pasian tungah biakna a pia dingin biakna tau mai-ah na om laitakin na sanggamte khat peuhpeuh na tungah a lungkimlohna thu na phawk leh, 24 Pasian na biakna ding nate, a biakna tau mai-ah nusia photin, pai-in na sanggampa tawh va kilem phot in la, tua khit ciangin hong paikikin Pasian biakna pia in.

"Pasian in note hong mawhsak lohna dingin midangte va mawhsaksak nawn kei un. 2 Banghang hiam cihleh midangte' thu na khenzia uh tawh kizui-in note tungah hong khen ding a, midangte tungah na zat uh ngeina mah note tungah hong zang ding hi.

Biakinn huangsung a lut ciangin bawng, tuu, leh kawl vakhu zuakte mu a, sumkhekte zong a sumkhekna sabuai-ah a tu mu hi. 15 Amah in zong khauteep bawlin biakinn huangsung panin tuu leh bawng-a kipan ganhing khempeuh hawlkhia a, sumkhekte' sabuai zong sawnpaih sakin a sum khempeuh a thehthang sak hi. 16 Tua ciangin kawl vakhu zuakte kiangah, "Na kawl vakhute uhhih lai panin paikhiatpih un. Ka Pa' inn pen sumzuakna inn phualpi-in nei kei un," a ci hi.
Mihingte in a mawhna leh a gitlohna hangun Pasian' thuman selcip uh ahih manin van panin a hehna hong kilang sakin a gimpiakna dingzia hong kilangsak hi.

Lawmte aw, na hehna uh kuama tungah thukkik kei unla, Pasian' thukkik dingin koih lel un. Banghang hiam cihleh Laisiangtho sungah, "Keimah in amaute tungah ka thuk ding a, midangte a gimsak bangun ka gimsak ding hi, Topa in ci hi," ci-in kigelh hi. 20 Tua ahih ciangin Laisiangtho sungah, "Na galte uh a gil a kial leh an na pia un. A dang a taak leh tui na pia un. Tua bangin na gamtat uh leh amaute' maizumna dingin a bawl na hi uhhi," ci-in a kigelh bangin gamtazaw un. 21 Tua ahih manin gitlohna kizosak kei unla, a pha gamtatna tawh gitlohnate a zo na hi ta un.

milim biakna, mi bumna, kilangbawlna, kitotna, hazatna, hehna, huaihamna, kikhenna, pawltuam lungsim neihna, 21 en'na, zukhamna, leh biakna pawi-ah zukhamna-a kipan adangdangte a hihi. A beisa hunah ka hong hilhkholhsa bangin tu-in ka hong genkikin-ah: Hih bangin a gamta mite pen Pasian' Ukna sungah omkha hetlo ding hi.

A taktakin eite khempeuh zong amaute mah i bang ngei a, i pian'pih lungsim zui-in nungta-in, i pumpi leh i lungsim deihna bangin i gamta hi. Tua ahih manin eite khempeuh zong Pasian' hehna hangin gim a thuak dingte ihi hi. 4 Tua bang hinapi-in Pasian' hong hehpihna leh eite hong itna lian mahmah ahih manin, 5 i mawhna hangin kha thu tawh kisai-in misi ihih laitakin Christ tawh eite hong nungtasak hi. Pasian' hehpihna hangin hotkhiatna a ngah thei ihi hi.
a ngaihsutnate uh khuamial tawh kibang hi. Amaute' lungsim khauhin bangmah thei hetlo uh ahih manin Pasian' hong piak nuntakna neikha hetlo uhhi.
Na heh uh ciangin, tua hehna hangin khialkha kei unla, a tawntungin heh paisuak kei un. 27 Dawimangpa in hong suksiat theihna ding hun omsak kei un.

Kimuhdahna, hehna, thangpaihna, kitotna, kikona, kilungsim neihna khempeuh beisak unla, 32 khatlekhat kihehpihin, lungsim neem tawh na kihozaw unla, Christ' hangin Pasian in note' mawhna hong maisak mah bangin khatlekhat na mawhna uh na kimaisak ta un.

Note pen hihbangin gamta-in a nungta ngeite na hi uhhi. 8 Ahi zongin tu-in hehna, thangpaihna, muhdahna, gensiatna, kam hoihlo pauna cihte nei nawn kei un. 9 Ngeina lui leh gamtatna lui khempeuh a beisakkhin na hihna uh kithei-in khatlekhat tungah zuauthu kigen nawn kei unla,

Note lakah khatlekhat a kilungkimlo na om uh ciangin khatlekhat na mawhna uh kimaisakin na kihuh ciat un. Topa in note' mawhna hong maisak bangin note zong khatlekhat na mawhna uh na kimaisak ding uhhi.
Pate aw, na tate un a thuak zawhloh zah dong dingin thuhilhin taii niloh kei un.

Thu kihai selna, theilopi-a thu kinialnate na pelh in. Tua bangte in kitotna a pian'sak lamtak na theihsa a hihi. 24 Topa' na a sem mite, kitot a hatte hilo ding a, mi khempeuh tungah lungsim nemin, thugen siamin, thuakzawhna nei-in,

Pasal khanghamte a kilawm a kituakin a omtheihna ding, thu ngaihsun thei mi ahihna ding, a kikemzo mite ahih theihna ding, upna man a neihtheihna ding, itna man a neihtheihna ding uh leh a manin lungkipin a thuakzawhna dingun na gen in.
Moses pen kumpipa' hehding lau hetloin Egypt gam panin paikhia a, a kimu theilo Pasian a mu bang keekin a nungkik hetlohna zong a upna hang mah a hihi.
Mihingte' hehna in Pasian' sepding thuhoihte khaktan hi.

Note lakah a om kitotna leh kilaina koi panin hong piang ahi hiam? Deihluatna lungsim na neih manun note' pumsung a kitoktok niloh a hihi. 2 Na na deih uh a, ahi zongin neilo na hih manun mi na thatnuam uhhi. Nate deihna lungsim na nei uh a, ahi zongin ngah zolo na hih manun kitawngin na kilailawh uhhi. Pasian kiangah na deih uh ngenlo na hih manun a ngahlo na hi uhhi.

Sanggamte aw, khatlekhat kigensia kei un. A mipihte gensia-in thu a khente in Thukham gensia-in thu a khen a hihi. Thukham na gensiat uh leh Thukham a zui hiloin thu a khen na hi uhhi. 12 Thukham a piapa leh thu a khenpa pen Pasian bek hi a, amah bek in hong honkhiazo a, hong susiazo hi. Tua ahih manin Banghangin na mipihte uh gensia-in thu a khenthei dingin kingaihsun zenzen na hi uhhiam?
Amah in, "Keima hoihna khempeuh na mai-ah ka paisak ding a, na mai-ah keima min, ‘{ Topa},’ cihna ka pulak ding hi. Ka diknopna mite tungah ka dik ding a, ka hehpihnop mite ka hehpih ding hi.
Hoihna leh Hehpihna in ka khan tawntungin hong zui taktak ding aa, Topa' inn sungah ka om tawntung ding hi. (HCN)
Na hoihna leh nong itna in ka khan'tawnin a hong zuih ding tel takin-ah ka thei ta a, a tawntungin na inn sungah ka om ding hi. (TDM)
Ka nuntak sung tawntung hoihna le itna in hong zui taktak dinga tuateh TOPA’ inn ah ka teng denta ding hi. (ZIV)

{ Topa } dikin hehpihna tawh kidim a, heh hakin, a lian mahmah itna kip tawh a kidim hi. 9 Amah in a tawntungin hong taii ngitngetlo ding a, amah heh paisuaklo ding hi. 10 Amah in eite' khialhna tawh a kituakin eite tungah hong bawllo a, eite' mawhna tawh a kituakin hong thukkiklo hi. 11 Vantung pen leitung panin a san' mah bangin amah a zahtakte' tungah ama itna kip lianin sang mahmah hi. 12 Nisuahna pen nitumna panin a gamlat mah bangin i mawhna hangin gimnate eite' kiang panin gamlapi-ah a nilkhia hi. 13 Pa in tate a hehpih bangin { Topa } in amah a zahtakte hong hehpih hi.

{ Topa } in hong genin-ah: "Namsau tawh thahna a thuaklote in gamlakah hehpihna a mu ding uhhi. Israel mite in tawldamna ding a zon' laitakun, 3 gamlapi pek panin { Topa } ka kilang hi. Keimah in nang kong it tawntung a, tua ahih manin nang' tungah kong thuman tawntung hi.
A bei theilo { Topa }' hong itna leh a hehpihna a kizom paisuak hi a,

Vanglian { Topa } in hih bangin ci hi: "Tua a kiciamteh mite pen keima mite hi ding uhhi. Keimah in na ka sep ni ciangin amaute pen keima neihtuam taktak mite hi ding uhhi. Pa in ama thu a mang a tapa a hehpih mah bangin kei zong amaute ka hehpih ding hi.

Tua hi leh vantungah a om na Pa uh tate na hi thei ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh amah in mihoihte leh misiate tungah a kibangin ni taangsak khawm a, a gamtat phate leh a gamtat siate tungah zong a kibang mahin guah zusak khawm hi.

A kuan masa pente, ni tha sang dingin hong pai uh ciangin adangte sangin tam ngahzaw ding ci-in amau kilamen napi-in amaute zong ngun peek khat ciat mah kipia veve hi. 11 A sum a san' uh ciangin lo neipa tungah phun uh a, 12 ‘A nunungte in nai khat sung bek sem napi-in, sunthapai-in nisa thuakin na a sem kote tawh na kikimsak hi,’ a ci uhhi. 13 Tua ciangin lo neipa in amaute khat kiangah, ‘Lawm aw, nang ka hong khem het kei hi. Ni khat sung nasep thaman dingin ngun peek khat piak dingin na thukimsa hilo ahi hiam? 14 Hih na thalawhsa sum la in la ciah in. Nang ka hong piakzah mah, hih a kicial nunungte tungah zong ka pia nuam hi. 15 Keima sum pen keima ut bangin ka zattheih ding hilo ahi hiam? Tua ahih kei leh kei ka cit manin na heh suak ahi hiam?’ a ci hi.
A kicing ama hong itna hangin eite khempeuh tungah thupha a banbanin hong pia hi. 17 Pasian in Moses tung tawnin Thukham hong pia a, ahi zongin Zeisu Christ hangin itna leh cihtakna thu hong pai hi.

Pasian in leitung mite hong it mahmah ahih manin ama Tapa a um mi khempeuh si nawnloin a hin' tawntung theihna dingun a Tapa neihsun a hong piak dongin a hong itna a hong lak hi. 17 Pasian in leitungah a Tapa hong sawlna pen mawhsakna thukhen dingin a hong paisak hiloin, leitung mite a honkhia dingin a hong paisak hizaw hi.
"A mantakin kong genin-ah: Ka thugennate za-in kei hong sawlpa a um khempeuh a nungta paisuak ding hita hi. Mawhsak thukhenna ngah nawnloin, sihna panin a hingkik ta a hihi.
Nuntakna a piathei pen Pasian' Kha hi a, mihingte' hihtheih bangmah omlo hi. Keima hong gen thute pen nuntakna a hong piathei tua Kha thu a hihi.

Tua ciangin Christ in, "A mantakin ci lehang mawhna a bawl mi peuhmah mawhna' sila ahi uhhi. 35 Silate pen innkuan mite tawh omkhawm paisuak lo a, tapa ahih leh om paisuak hi. 36 Tua ahih manin Tapa in note hong khah leh a suakta takpi na hi uhhi.

Note in kei na hong teel kei uh a, ahi zongin keimah in note ka hong teel a, note va pai-in a kimang tawntung ding gah a gah dingin ka hong seh hi. Tua ahih manin keima min suangin Pa kiangah na nget peuhpeuh uh hong pia ding hi.

Nang bek a man Pasian na hihna thu leh nangmah in na hong sawl Zeisu Christ hong theihna pen amaute-a' dingin nuntak tawntung ngahna ding lampi a hihi. 4 Nangmah in sepdingin na hong piak nasep khempeuh sem khinta ka hih manin leitungah na min a thangsak ka hihi.
Ama hang bek tawh hotkhiatna kingah thei ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh eite in hotkhiatna i ngahtheihna dingin leitung khempeuhah Pasian in hong piak min dang khat zong omlo hi," ci-in a gen hi.
Lungdamna Thu ka muang mahmah hi. Tua thu pen a masa-in Jew mi, tua zomin minam dangte, thu um mi khempeuh a honkhiazo Pasian' vangliatna a hihi.
Mi khempeuh mawh ciat uh a, a hong honkhia Pasian tawh kigamla uhhi. 24 Ahi zongin Pasian in a hong hehpihna hangin Zeisu Christ tawh hong tatkhiat manin amah tawh i kipawlthei kik hi.

Tua ahih manin Abraham' suanlekhakte khempeuh tungah Pasian' hehpihna piakkhong a suahtheihna dingin Thukham a zuite bek in ngah loin, Abraham' up bangin a umte in zong a ngahtheihna dingun upna bulphuhin thuciamna kipia hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Abraham pen kha thu lamah eite khempeuh' pupi a hihi.

Tu-in upna hangin Pasian tawh kipawl khinta ihih manin i Topa Zeisu Christ hangin Pasian tawh a kilemkik ta ihi hi. 2 Ama hangin upna tawh tu-a i omna Pasian hehpihna sungah a tung ihi a, Pasian tawh minthan'na ngahkhawm ding, ci-in lamen ihih manin i lung a dam hi.

Eite cimawhin i om laitakin Pasian' hoihsak hunin ei mi gilote-a' dingin Christ hong si hi. 7 Mihoih khat-a' dingin a si ngam a omkha ahi zongin thukham zuizo mipa-a' dingin sih ngamna ding a thu haksa mahmah khat a hihi. 8 Ahi zongin eite mawhna nei ihih laitakin eite-a' dingin Christ hong si ahih manin Pasian in eite hong it mahmahna thu hong lak khin hi.

Ahi zongin Pasian' hong piak letsong pen Adam' mawhna tawh kibang lo ahih manin tuate gel tehkak theihding hilo hi. Tua mi khat a khialhna hangin mi tampi a sihna pen a man mah a hihi. Ahi zongin Pasian' hong itna leh hong hehpihna nakpi takin lianzaw lai a, mi khat ahi tua Zeisu Christ' hehpihna hangin mi tampi tak tungah hong kipia letsong lian mahmah hi. 16 Pasian' letsong leh mi khat' mawhna a hatna zia kilamdang hi. Khialhna khat a om khit ciangin, "Mawh hi," ci-in thukhenna kipia a, ahi zongin khialhna tampi tak a om khit ciangin a kilawm lopi mahin, "Dik hi," cihna piakkhong thupha a om hi. 17 Mi khat bek' mawhna hangin sihna in hong uk ahih leh mi khat mah ahi Zeisu Christ hangin nakpi takin a lian Pasian' hehpihna leh mihoih-a san'na a ngah mite nungta-in thahatzaw kan ding uhhi. 18 Tua hi a, khialhna khat in mi khempeuh tungah thukhenna tungsak ahih mah bangin gamtatna hoih khat mah in mi khempeuh khahin nungtasak hi. 19 Mi khat in thu a man'loh manin mi tampi mimawh a suahsak mah bangin mi khat in thu a man'na hangin mi tampi in Pasian tawh kipawl theihna a ngah ding uh a hihi. 20 Khialhna a tam semsemna dingin thukham hong kipia hi. Ahi zongin khialhna a tamna munah Pasian' hehpihna hong lianzaw zel hi. 21 Tua ahih manin mawhna thahatin hong sihsak mah bangin, i Topa Zeisu Christ hangin Pasian' hehpihna thahat zaw lai a, mihoihin hong sangin nuntak tawntungna sung a hong tun'pih hi.

Tua ahih leh Pasian' hehpihna a liattheihna dingin mawhna bawlbawl ding ihi hiam? 2 Tua bang hi deklo ding hi. Mawhna thu-ah a si eite in bangci-in mawhna bawl thei nawn ding ihi hiam? 3 Zeisu Christ tawh i kipawl theihna dingin ama sungah a kiphum eite pen ama sihna mahah zong a sikhawm ihihlam theilo na hi uhhiam? 4 I Pa' vangliatna tawh sihna panin Christ a kithawhsak kik mah bangin eite zong nuntakna thak i nuntak theihna dingin tui i kiphum ciangin amah tawh kiphum khawmin a sikhawm ihi hi.

Note pen thukham' sawlna hangin nasem hiloin Pasian' hong lah thuhoihte' hangin nasem na hih uh manin mawhna' sawlna mangin na gamta nawn kei un. 15 Eite pen thukham' uk hiloin Pasian' hehpihna in hong uk ahih manin mawhna i gamta kei ding hi. 16 Mi khatpeuh' thu a mang dingin ama khutsungah na kipiak uh ciangin a thu na mante uh' sila na hi uhhi. Mawhna na bawl uh leh sihna a thuak ding na hi uh a, thumangin na om uh leh Pasian tawh pawlkhat a suak ding na hi uhhi.

Ahi zongin tu-in mawhna bawlnopna panin suakta-in Pasian' khutsung mi na hita uhhi. Tua thu hangin na ngah uh na pen Pasian-a' dingin a kipia khin nuntakna hi a, a tawntung nuntakna tawh a kizom a hihi. 23 Banghang hiam cihleh mawhna in thaman hong piak pen sihna hi a, ahi zongin i Topa Christ tawh i kipawl manin Pasian' hong piakkhong pen nuntak tawntungna a hihi.

Ahi zongin tu-in ahih leh Zeisu Christ tawh kipawlin a nungta mite pen mawhna thukhenna tawh kipelh hi. 2 Banghang hiam cihleh Zeisu Christ tawh a hong kipawlsak Khasiangtho in mawhna leh sihna a piangsak thukham panin kei hong suaktasak khinta hi. 3 Mihingte thahatlo ihih manin Thukham in a hih zawhloh thute Pasian in a hihzo hi. Mawhna a beisak theihna dingin mihingte sunga om mawhna tungah thu a khenna-in ama Tapa hong sawl a, amah pen mihingte' mawhna lungsim mah a nei-in a hong pai hi. 4 Eite' deihna bangin nungta loin Pasian' Khasiangtho' deihna bangin a nungta eite sungah Thukham' deihna teng a kicin' theihna dingin Pasian in a Tapa a hong sawl a hihi.
Sihna panin Christ a thokiksak Pasian' Khasiangtho note sungah hong om leh sihna panin Christ a hingkik sakpa mah in note sungah a om ama Khasiangtho mah tawh a sithei pumpi a hong nungtasak ding hi.

Note tungah Pasian in a hong piak a Khasiangtho in note na launa dingun sila-in a hong bawl hilo a, Khasiangtho in Pasian' tate a hong suaksak ahi zaw hi. Tua Khasiangtho mah in Pasian pen, "Pa aw, Pa aw," hong ci theisak hi. 16 Eite, Pasian' tate ihihna thu eima lungsim bek in a gen hiloin Pasian' Khasiangtho in zong hong genpih hi.
Pasian in mawhlo hi, ci-in a gen khitsa ahih manin, Pasian' teelsa mite tungah kua in mawhna guan'thei nawnding ahi hiam?

Tua bang ahih leh Pasian thutanglo hi, a kici thei ding hiam? Kici theilo ding hi. 15 Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in Moses kiangah, "Ka hehpih nopte ka hehpih ding a, ka khasiat nopte ka khasiat ding hi," ci hi. 16 Tua ahih ciangin mite' utna leh sepna tawh kisailo a, Pasian' hehpihna bek tawh kisaizaw hi.
Christ pen Topa hi, ci-in mite kiangah genin, Pasian in sihna panin amah hingkiksak zo hi, ci-in na lungsim sung uhah na up taktak uh leh hotkhiatna na ngah ding uhhi.

Tua mah bangin tuhunin zong Pasian in ama hehpihna tawh a teelsa mi tawmkhat omlai hi. 6 A teelna-ah mite' nasepna bulphuhin a teel hiloin ama dikna hangin a teel hizaw hi. Pasian in mihingte' nasepna bulphuhin a teel hi leh Pasian' dikna pen dikna kici theilo ding hi.

Tua ahih ciangin sanggamte aw, Pasian in eite tam veipi tak hong hehpih ahih manin ama lungkimna ding leh ama nasepna dingin nomau mahmah a hingtangin Pasian tungah na kipiakna dingun ka hong thum hi. Tua banga kipiakna pen Pasian biakna man taktak a hihi. 2 Leitung mihingte' gamtat bangin gamta kei unla, na lungsim uh kikheelin Pasian kipuahpha sak un. Tua hi leh a hoih nate bang hi a, bangte in amah lungkim sakin, bangte a kicing hiam ci-in thei-in Pasian' deihna na phawk thei ding uhhi. 3 Pasian in kei tungah hehpihna hong piakkhongna hangin note tungah kong gennop thu in: Note tawh a kituakzah valin kilian ngaihsutzaw kha kei un. Pasian in note tungah upna hong piakzah tawh kizui-in kingaihsun bek zaw unla, a kilawm ciang khat bekin kingaihsun un.
Tua ahih manin Pasian in hehpihna hong piakkhongna tawh kizui-in i siamna a tuamtuamte zang ciat ni. I siamna pen Pasian' thu gentheihna ding siamna ahih leh i upna neihzah tawh kizui-in gen ni.

Tua bang hita se leh Pasian' hehpihna tawh tu-a ciangah ka om a, kei tungah a hong piak ama hehpihna a mawkna suaklo hi. Sawltak dangte khempeuh sangin na nakpi takin ka sem zawsop hi. Tua ka sepzawhna pen keima hatna hang hiloin Pasian' hong hehpihna hang a hihi.

Tua ahih manin mi khatpeuh, Christ tawh a kipawl ciangin mi thak suak a, a mi lui ngeina bei-in a mi thak ngeina a neita a hihi. 18 Hih thu khempeuh Pasian' vaihawm hi a, eite pen Pasian' gal hinapi-in Christ hangin amah tawh a kilem mi hong hisak a, kote tungah tua kilemna ding nasep hong pia hi. 19 Tua ahih manin kote' thugen bulpi in: Pasian in mite' mawhnate ngaihsun nawnloin, Christ hangin leitung mi khempeuh leh amah a kilemin hong bawl a, tua kilemna thu a gen dingin kote hong seh hi.

Tua natna tawh ka kipelh theihna dingin Topa kiangah thumvei tak thu ka ngen hi. 9 Ahi zongin Topa in kei kiangah, "Na tha a nem ciangin keima vangliatna hat mahmah ahih manin nangma kisap na pen keima hehpihna hi bek hi," ci-in hong dawng hi. Tua ahih manin keima sungah Christ vangliatna hong omtheihna dingin lungdam takin ka thaneemna ka kisialhpih semsem hi. 10 Kei ka thaneem mahmah laitakin a thahat mahmah suak ka hih manin Christ hangin ka thaneemna, simmawh ka thuakna, haksatna leh bawlsiatna leh lungkhamna ka thuaknate tawh ka lung a kim mahmah hi.

Ahi zongin Pasian in a hong hehpihna tawh ka suahma pekin kei hong teelin ama na a sem dingin hong sam khin hi. Keimah in ama Tapa hanga lungdamna thu, Gentail mite lakah ka hilhtheihna dingin kei tungah a Tapa hong kilatsak hun laitakin kuama kiangah thudongin ka pai kei a,

Ahi zongin Zeisu Christ upna hang bek tawh Pasian tawh kipawl theihna kingahin, Thukham zuihna hang tawh kingah ngeilo hi, ci-in ka thei uhhi. Kote mahmah in zong, Christ hangin Pasian tawh ka kipawl theihna dingun Zeisu Christ ka um uh a, Thukham deihna ka zuihna hang uh tawh hilo hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Thukham zuihna hang tawh kuamah in Pasian tawh kipawl theihna ngah zolo hi.

Thukham tawh kisai-in ahih leh Pasian-a' dingin ka nuntak theihna dingin tua Thukham mah in kei hong thatkhin ahih manin Thukham tawh kisai thu-ah misi bang ka hihi. Singlamteh tungah Christ a kithah lai-in kei zong amah tawh a sikhawm ka hihi. 20 Tua ahih manin tuhuna ka nuntakna zia pen kei hang hi nawnloin ka sungah a hong om Christ hang a hihi. Tua hi a, keimah hong itin, keima-a' dingin a nuntakna a hong pia Pasian' Tapa ka muan'na tawh tu laitakin a nungta ka hihi. 21 Hih bang ka gen ciangin Pasian' hehpihna thupha ka deihlohna ahi kei a, Thukham zuihzawhna hangin Pasian tawh kipawl theihna om hi leh, singlamteh tungah Christ sihna a mawkna hi lel ding hi, a cinuam ka hizaw hi.

Tu-in ka hong gennop thu in: Pasian in Abraham tawh thuciamna bawl a, tua a thuciamna peksat sawmlo hi. Tua ahih manin tua thuciamna a kibawlzawh kum zali leh kum sawmthum khit ciangin a kinung piak Thukham in tua thuciamna peksatin phiat theilo ding hi. 18 Pasian' hong piakkhong pen Thukham zuihna hang tawh a kingah hi mawk leh piakding hong ciamna hangin a kingah hi nawnlo ding hi. Ahi zongin Pasian in Abraham tungah letsong a piakna pen a thuciamnasa tawh kizui-in a piak a hihi.
Thukham zuihna hangin Pasian tawh kipawl theihna ding a hanciamte pen Christ tawh a kikhen na hi uh a, Pasian' hehpihna in note hong huam theilo hi.
Christ hong sihna hangin eite in suahtakna ngahin, i mawhnate hong kimaisak a hihi. Tuazah dongin Pasian' hong hehpihna thu bangzah takin lian ahi hiam?

Tua bang hinapi-in Pasian' hong hehpihna leh eite hong itna lian mahmah ahih manin, 5 i mawhna hangin kha thu tawh kisai-in misi ihih laitakin Christ tawh eite hong nungtasak hi. Pasian' hehpihna hangin hotkhiatna a ngah thei ihi hi. 6 Zeisu Christ tawh eite i kipawlna hangin vantungah amah tawh i ukkhawm theihna dingin sihna panin Pasian in a hong thokhawmsak hi. 7 Zeisu Christ tung tawnin a hong lah ama hehpihna leh a hong itna bangzah takin lianin lamdang ahi hiam, ci-in a hong tungding hunah a hong lah tawntung theihna dingin hih bangin a hong thokhawmsak a hihi. 8 Note' upna hangin Pasian' hong hehpihna tawh hotkhiatna a ngah na hi uhhi. Note' thalawhna hangin a ngah hiloin Pasian' hong piakkhong a hihi. 9 Note' hanciamna tawh a ngah hilo na hih manun na kisialhna ding uh a thu omlo hi.
Note' phattuamna dingin Pasian in hong hehpihna tawh hih nasep a sem dingin a hong sawlna thu na theihsa uh a hihi.
Ama it Tapa hangin hih bangin letsong hong pia ahih manin ama hong hehpihna hangin Pasian phat ni.

Zeisu Christ tung tawnin a hong lah ama hehpihna leh a hong itna bangzah takin lianin lamdang ahi hiam, ci-in a hong tungding hunah a hong lah tawntung theihna dingin hih bangin a hong thokhawmsak a hihi. 8 Note' upna hangin Pasian' hong hehpihna tawh hotkhiatna a ngah na hi uhhi. Note' thalawhna hangin a ngah hiloin Pasian' hong piakkhong a hihi.
Topa Zeisu Christ hehpihna thupha, note khempeuh tungah hong tung ta hen.
Amah in khuamial vangliatna panin eite hong honkhia-in, a lungmuan'huaina mun, a it a Tapa' ukna sungah hong koih a, 14 tua a Tapa in eite hong khahkhia a, i mawhna hong kimaisak khinta hi.

A beisa hunah na mawhna uh hangin kha thu tawh kisai-in misi na hi uh a, Gentail mi na hih manun Thukham neilote na hi uhhi. Ahi zongin Christ hangin Pasian in note hong hingsak a, i mawhna khempeuh hong maisak khinta hi. 14 Eite-a' dingin a hoihlo, i mawhna a kiciamtehna khempeuh, hong phiatsak a, tuate khempeuh singlamteh tungah kilhcipin a beisak ta hi. 15 Amah in huihlak a ukte leh vangliatna a nei khempeuh, singlamteh tungah zogawp khin a, galzote in a sal matte a kaih uh bangin mi khempeuh muhin a gualzawhna a lak hi.
