I Topa Zeisu Christ mahmah leh, eite hong itin, a hong hehpihna tawh thakhauhna leh lametna a hong pia tawntung eite' Pa Pasian in

Zeisu Christ, mawhneite a honkhia dingin leitungah hong pai hi, cihna thu a man hi a, a uphuai a san'huai thu a hihi. Keimah zong tua mawhnei mite lakah a mawhpha bel ka hihi. 16 A mawhneipha bel ka hihna thu hang mahin, nidang ciangin amah umin nuntak tawntungna a ngahding mite' etteh theihdingin Zeisu Christ in a lungduaina cingtakin kei tungah hong lahtheihna dingin Pasian in kei a hong hehpih a hihi.

Eite' sepzawhna hang hiloin ama ngimnasa bang leh a dikna hangin Pasian in eite hong honkhia-in ama mi dingin a hong sam hi. Pasian in leitung a pian'ma pekin Zeisu Christ tung tawnin tua dikna a hong piak hi a,
Ka ta aw, nang na hih leh Zeisu Christ tawh i kipawl manin i ngah hehpihna hangin thahatin om in.
Topa in nangmah hong ompih ta hen. Note khempeuh tungah Pasian' hehpihna thupha hong tung ta hen.

Banghang hiam cihleh mi khempeuh in hotkhiatna a ngahtheihna dingun Pasian in ama hehpihna hong lak khinzo hi. 12 Eite in i lamet, a lian Pasian leh eite hong Hon Zeisu Christ a vangliatna hong kilatkik ding hun ngakin i om laitakin i biakna tawh a kituaklo thute leh leitung nate deihna phiatin, lungsim hi hithiatin omin, thutangin, hih leitungah Pasian' deihna bangin i nuntakna dingin tua hehpihna thu in eite hong hilh hi.

Ahi zongin eite hong Honpa ahi Pasian' itna leh a migitna thu hong kilat ciangin, 5 amah in eite hong honkhia hi. Eite in na hoih i sepzawhna hangin hong honkhia hiloin eite tungah suahtakna leh nuntakna thak a hong pia Khasiangtho in hong sawpsiangna hangin a hong hehpihna tawh a hong honkhia a hihi. 6 Pasian in eite hong Hon Zeisu Christ hangin eite tungah a kicing takin Khasiangtho hong pia ahih manin, 7 ama hong hehpihna hangin Pasian tawh kilemin i lamet nuntak tawntungna a ngah thei ihi hi.

Ahi zongin Pasian' hehpihna hangin mi khempeuh-a' dingin Christ a sih theihna dingin tawlkhat sung vantung mite sangin a neuzaw-in a kibawlna i mu a, sihna a thuakna hangin minthan'na leh pahtawina a ngahna thu i thei hi.

Ama lunghihmawh pen vantung mite hilo a, Abraham' suanlekhakte a lunghimawh ahihna thu hong kitel hi. 17 Tua ahih manin mihingte' mawhna a kimaisak theihna dingin Pasian' na a sepna-ah mite-a' dingin hehpihna leh cihtakna tawh Siampi Lianpen a suahtheihna dingin a sanggamte tawh a kibangin mihing lim a hong puakding a kisam a hihi.
Tua ahih manin a kisap hunin, eite a hong huhdingin hehpihna leh dikna thupha i ngahtheihna dingin, kimuan'na lungsim tawh hehpihna tokhom va zuan ciat ni.
Mawhna panin a sian'thosak mite, khatvei bek biakpiakna a bawlna tawh siangtho paisuak sak hi.
Pasian' hehpihna a ngahlah na hihkhak lohna dingun na kidawm un. Zungkha a nei singkung hong khangin mi tampi gimsakin a siatsak bangin mite a siasak na hihkhak lohna dingun na kidawm un.

Thuhilhna lamdang a tuamtuamte zui-in lam man panin pialkha kei un. A zui mite tungah bangmah phattuamna a piangsak theilo annek tuidawn tawh kisai ngeina zuihna in thahatna hong pia theilo a, Pasian' hehpihna bek in i lungsim hong thahatsak thei hi.

Pa Pasian in ama ngimnasa bangin note hong teel a, note in Zeisu Christ' thu mangin, ama sisan tawh siangthona a ngahdingin a Khasiangtho tawh note mi siangtho-in a hong bawl hi. Note tungah hehpihna leh nopsakna thupha hong tam tun' semsem ta hen. 3 I Topa Zeisu Christ' Pa Pasian tungah lungdam ni. Ama hong hehpih mahmahna hangin sihna panin Zeisu Christ a thawhkik sakna tawh eite tungah nuntakna thak a hong pia hi. Tua ahih manin i lametna kiam ngeilo a, 4 Pasian in ama mite-a' dingin a koih thuphate i ngahna dingin lamenin i om hi. Tua thuphate sia ngeilo, nin ngeilo, mual ngeiloin a om tawntungna vantungah note-a' dingin a hong koihsak hi.

Ahi zongin note pen Pasian in a hong teelkhiat minam, Kumpi siampi pawl, a siangtho minam, Pasian' mite na hi uh a, khuamial sung panin a lamdang mahmah ama khuavak sungah a hong samkhiapa' nasepna a lamdangte a genkhia dingin Pasian in a hong teel mite na hi uhhi. 10 Nidangin Pasian' mi na hihloh uh hangin tu-in ama mi na hi uh a, nidangin Pasian' hehpihna na theihloh uh hangin tu-in ama hehpihna na ngah uhhi.

Tawlkhat na thuak khit uh ciangin, Christ tawh na kipawlna hangun tawntung minthan'na a ngah dingin note a hong sam, hehpihna kicingin a nei Pasian in note a cingtaakin hong bawl ding a, kipna, thahatna, bulkip kician hong pia ding hi.
Pasian leh i Topa Christ na theihna uh hangin hehpihna leh nopsakna thupha note tungah tampi tak hong tung ta hen.
Hehpihna thu leh i Topa leh Honpa Zeisu Christ theihna thu-ah na khangto semsem zaw un. Tuhuna kipanin a tawntungin amah in minthan'na ngah paisuak ta hen. Amen.
Hih ka gen itna pen eite in Pasian i itna thu hilo a, Pasian in eite hong itin, i mawhna a maitheihna dingin a Tapa a hong paisakna thu a hihi.

Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian' thu a ngaihsunlo mi pawlkhat, eite lakah kuama phawklohin hong lutsim uh a, amaute' mawh gamtat ngamnate a seelna-un Pasian' hehpihna thupha a lehlamin hei-in, eite in khat bek i neih i Mangpa leh i Topa ahi Zeisu Christ a nial uhhi. Hihbang mite' gimthuak ding thu tanglai pekin Laisiangtho in a gensa thu a hihi.
Amaute nakpi takin awngin, "Tokhom tungah a tu i Pasian leh Tuuno pen eite a hong honkhia ahi uhhi," a ci uhhi.
Banghang hiam cihleh ka hehna in mei tawhkuang a, Leinuaite' gamdong a kuang hi. Leitung leh a tunga piangte kangtum a, mualte' bulpite kuangsak hi.
Leinuai khaute in kei hong kancip a, sihna thangte in kei hong dawntuah hi.
Vantung sangin Pasian sangzaw a, ahi zongin tua vantung nangawn na banzo kei hi. Pasian in leinuai thu thei a, ahi zongin nangmah in tua thu na thei kei hi.
Pasian' muhna-ah misite' gam kilang sinsen a, a muh theihlohna dingin a liah bangmah omlo hi.
Pasian a mangngilh minam khempeuh sung panin migilote, Leinuai-ah pai ding uhhi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Leinuai nong zuansak kei a, na mihoihpa Leihawmpi na musak kei hi.
Leinuai sihna khaute in kei hong kancip a, sihna thangte in kei hong dawntuah hi.
Amau' tungah sihna tungsak in. Leinuai-ah a hingtangin amaute paisuk sak in la, amaute launa lianpi tawh a han uhah paisak in.
Banghang hiam cihleh keimah na hong itna kip lian mahmah a, Leinuai thuk sung panin kei nong honkhia khin hi.
Sihna khau in kei hong gakcip hi. Leinuai sihna in kei hong mancip a, natna leh lungkhamna ka thuak hi.
Vantungah kahto leng tua lai-ah nang na om ding a, Leinuai misite' gamah lupna bawlta leng zong tua lai-ah zong nang na om veve ding hi.
Amah in sihna gamah nang hong paipih ding a, ama tot lampi pen sihna mun tun'na lampi a hihi.
Tua bang numei zuihna pen sihna gam zuatna hi a, sih baihna ding lampi zuatna a hihi.
Tua lai-ah a paite a sihna thu tua lai-ah a lutsate sihna gam thuk sungah a om khitna thu, a khemzawh mite in phawkkhalo uhhi.
Sihna gamsungah a omte nangawn Pasian in mu ahih leh, mihingte' ngaihsutna tel muhzaw kan ding hilo ahi hiam?
Mipilte in nuntakna lampi zuito uh a, sihna lampi zuisuk lo uhhi.
Mihingte' lungsim pen misite' gam tawh kibang a, tamlua cih hun nei theilo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Leinuai in a duhna khangsakin bangmah tawh a kiteh theilo zahin a kam ka beba a, Jerusalem' hoihna teng, a mipite, a mihonte, ama sunga a lungdam mite, a nawmvalh hi.

"Nang na paisuk ciangin a hong dawntuah dingin Leinuai-a misite kihanthawn a, nangmah a hong hopih dingin leitungah a lian ngei misi uliante kipusuak sak hi. A minamte' kumpite khempeuh amau' kumpi tokhom panin hong ding uhhi.
Ahih hangin nang pen Leinuai thuk penna Leihawm sungah hong kikoih suk ding hi.

"Eite in sihna tawh thuciamna khat i bawl khin a, Leinuai tawh thukimna khat i neizo hi. A tuumcip ding tuiciin hong tun' ciangin eite hong banlo ding hi; banghang hiam cihleh zuauthu i bel a, zuauna-ah i bu hi," na ci uhhi.
Tua ciangin sihna tawh na thuciamna uh kiphiat ding a, Leinuai tawh na thukimna uh kiplo ding hi. A tumcip ding tuiciin in a hong nawk ciangin note hong sugawp ding hi.

Zion-a a om mawhnei mite lau uh a, Pasian' thu a ngaihsunlo mite lau-in lingcip uhhi. Amaute in, "Pasian' thukhenna pen a kuang tawntung mei tawh kibang hi. Tua bang meikuang kua in thuakzo ding ahi hiam?" ci uhhi.
Molek pasian kiangah a pai dingin sathau tawh khual na zin a, na paknamtuite tawh na siam tawpin na kipuah hi. Nang in gamlapi-ah na tangmite na sawl a, Leinuai dong nangawnah na paisak hi.

Amaute a ciah uh ciangin kei hong lehdo mite' luanghawmte en ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh amau a ne thante si ngeiloin, amau a kihalna mei mit ngeilo ding a, amaute pen mi khempeuh' kih hi ding hi, a ci hi.

a si dingpa pen a mawh mipa a hihi. Ta in pa' mawhna thuaklo ding a, tua mah bangin pa in ta' mawhna thuaklo ding hi. Mihoihpa in a hoihna thaman ngah ding a, migilopa in a gitlohna thaman thuak ding hi.

Misite' omna Leinuai khua-ah tua singkung ka khiatsuk ciangin, a kiatna ging in minam khempeuh lokgawp ding hi. Tua singkung a kiat manin Eden singkung khempeuh, leh a hoihpen, limtakin tui a ngah Lebanon singkungte khempeuh in zong Leinuai-ah nuamtuam na sa ding uhhi. 17 Banghang hiam cihleh a sisate a zuan dingin misite' omna Leinuai-ah amah tawh a paikhawm ding uhhi. Ama limnuai a belte khempeuh, minam dangte' lakah kithehthang khin uhhi.
Egypt mite a pan'pih galhang pente in misite' gam Leinuai panin amaute na dawn ding uh a, ‘Pasian a theilo, galsunga si mite hong paisuk uh a, hih lai-ah lumta uhhi,’ ci-in kiko ding uhhi.

Hih mite pen misite' omna Leinuai-ah a galvanteng uh tawh pai-in, a namsau uh kilukham sakin, a lum uh a awm tung uhah a kikoihsak kawmin limtakin a kivui tanglai galkapte bangin pahtawi-a vuina ngahlo uhhi. Ahi zongin hih mite pen midang a lausakzo dingin a vanglian ngeite ahi uhhi.
A sisa mi tampite in nuntakna a ngahkik ding uhhi. Pawlkhatte nungta tawntung ding uh a, pawlkhatte in a tawntung zumna leh minsiatna a ngah ding uhhi.

Leinuai-a misite' omna-ah a paina ding uh panin honin, sihna ding panin suaktasak ding ka hi hiam? Sihna aw, gimna na piakna-ah amaute ka hehpih kei hi. Leinuai-a misite' gam aw, na suksiatna-ah amaute ka khasiat kei hi.
Lei tosukin misite' omna Leinuai-ah a va tun' uh hangin tua lai-ah amaute ka su ding a, vantungah a kahtoh uh hangin zong, tua lai mahah amaute ka su veve ding hi.
"Ka cihmawhna panin { Topa } ka sam a, amah in kei hong dawng hi. Sihna gam Sheol panin kong kiko a, nangmah in ka aw nong za hi.
Amah in a khutah anzapna tawi-in a ante zap a, a taksate khawmin a ansal sungah koih ding a, a ansite ahih leh a mit ngeilo mei sungah a khul ding hi," ci-in thu a hilh hi.

"Tanglai mite tungah, ‘Mi that kei un. Mi that peuhmah in sihna thuak ding hi,’ ci-in a kigenna thu na zaksa uh a hihi. 22 Ahi zongin ke'n note kiangah kong genin-ah: A sanggampa tungah a heh mi in thukhenna thuakkha thei ding hi. A sanggampa kiangah, ‘Bangmah-a kimang lo,’ ci-in a ko bawl mi in uliante mai-ah thusitna thuak thei ding a, a sanggampa kiangah, ‘Mi hai,’ ci-in a simmawh mi in hell meikuang sungah khulna thuak thei ding hi.

Tua ahih manin na mit taklam in na mawhna ding hong pian'sak leh khelkhia in la paai in. Na pumpi bupin hell khuk sungah hong kikhul sangin na pumpi na khat pelem leh nang-a' dingin hoihzaw lai hi. 30 Na taklam khut in na mawhna ding hong pian'sak leh sattan in la paai in. Na pumpi bupin hell khuk sungah hong kikhul sangin na pumpi na khat pelem leh nang-a' dingin hoihzaw lai hi.

"Kong kawcik bek tawnin lut un. Hell khuk tun'na ding kongvang pen lianin a lampi baih a, mi tampi in a zui uhhi. 14 Ahi zongin nuntak tawntungna tun'na ding kong kawcikin a lampi haksa a, mi tawmno bek in a zuizo uhhi.

Nisuahna leh nitumna panin mi tampi tak hong pai-in vantung ki-ukna sungah Abraham, Isaac, leh Jacob-te tawh an ne-in sabuai-ah tukhawm ding uhhi. 12 Ahi zongin vantung ki-ukna sungah a om dingin a kingaihsun Israel mite ahih leh pualam khuamialna-ah kilawnkhia ding a, tua lai-ah kapin a hagawi ding uhhi," a ci hi.
Pumpi a thah khit ciangin kha a that theilote na kihta kei un. Hell khuk sungah pumpi leh kha a nihin a susia theipa na kihtazaw un.

Kapernaum khuapi mite aw, van a sangna munah hong kipahtawi ding sa na hi uhhiam? Hell khuk sungah hong kilawnsuk ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh note' khuasunga hong kibawl na lamdangte, Sodom khuasungah kibawl hi leh tuni dongin tua khua kip lai ding hi.

Mihing Tapa in a vantung mite hong sawl ding a, ama ukna sungah a om migilote leh mi a mawhna dingin a bawl mi khempeuh kaikhawmin 42 meikhukpi sungah tua bang mite lawn ding uh a, tua lai-ah amaute kapin a hagawi ding uhhi.

Leitung hun bei ciangin zong tua bangmah hi ding hi. Vantung mite hong pai-in mihoihte lak panin migilote lakhia-in, 50 meikhukpi sungah tua migilote a khul ding uhhi. Tua lai-ah kapin a hagawi ding uhhi.

Ke'n kong genin-ah: Nang pen suangneu a cihnopna Peter na hi hi. Hih suangpi tungah ka pawlpi ka lam ding a, sihna nangawn in zo zo ngeilo ding hi. 19 Vantung ki-ukna sung lutna ding tawhtangte, nangma tungah ka hong pia ding a, hih leitungah hoihlo na cihte, vantungah zong a hoihlo hi ding a, hih leitungah hoih hi na cihte, vantungah zong a hoih hi ding hi," a ci hi.

"Na khut ahi a, na khe in ahi zongin hong khialhsak leh sattan in la paikhia in. Meikuang tawntung sungah khut kim khe kimin hong kikhiat sangin nuntakna sungah khut sam khe samin lut lecin nang-a' dingin hoihzaw ding hi. 9 Na mit in hong khialhsak leh khelkhia in la paikhia in. Mit kim nei-in hell khuk sungah hong kikhul sangin mit langkhat bek tawh nuntakna sungah lut lecin nang-a' dingin hoihzaw ding hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in a nasemte kiangah, ‘A khut a khe hen unla, pualam khuamialna lakah lawnkhia un; tua lai-ah kapin a hagawi ding hi,’ a ci hi.

"Mihoih a kineihkhem, no Thukham hilh siate leh Pharisee mite in gimna na thuak ding uhhi. Note in mi khat bek nangawn na ngah zawhna ding uh na hanciamna-un leitung tuitung lumletin khual na zin uh a, na ngahsunte uh zong note zah nihin a siahuai, hell khuk tungding mi na suah uhhi.
Gul a bang mite' suanlekhak mite aw, hell khuk tun'nading thukhenna panin a suakta dingin bangci-in kilamen thei na hi uhhiam?
"Tua ciangin a veilamah a om mite kiangah, ‘Pasian in a samsiat mite aw, keima kiang panin paikhia unla, Dawimangpa leh a nungzuite-a' dingin a kibawl meikuang tawntung sungah pai un.
Tua ahih ciangin tawntung gimthuakna sungah amaute pai ding uh a, mihoihte ahih leh nuntak tawntungna sungah lut ding uhhi," a ci hi.
Ahi zongin Khasiangtho langpangin thu a gente in mawhna kip sukha uh ahih manin a mawhna uh kimaisak ngeilo ding hi," a ci hi.

Tua ahih manin na khut in hong khialhsak leh sattan in. Mei a mih ngeilohna hell khuk sungah khut kim tawh na lut sangin khut langkhat bui-in nuntakna sungah lut lecin nang-a' dingin hoihzaw hi. 44 (Tua lai-ah thante si ngeilo a, a mei zong mit ngeilo hi.) 45 Na khe in hong khialhsak leh sattan in. Khe kim nei-in hell sungah hong kikhiat sangin khe langkhat bui-in nuntakna sungah lut lecin nang-a' dingin hoihzaw hi. 46 (Tua lai-ah thante si ngeilo a, a mei zong mit ngeilo hi.) 47 Na mit in hong khialhsak leh khelkhia in. Mit kim tawh hell khuk sungah hong kikhiat sangin mit langkhat taw-in Pasian' Ukna sungah om lecin nang-a' dingin hoihzaw hi. 48 Tua hell khuk sungah thante si ngeilo a, a mei zong mit ngeilo hi.
No Kapernaum khuapi mite aw, van a sangna munah hong kipahtawi ding sa na hi uhhiam? Hell khuk sungah hong kilawnsuk ding hi," a ci hi.

Pasian' Ukna sungah Abraham, Isaac, Jacob, leh kamsangte khempeuh a omna mu napi-in, note a pualamah hong kihawlkhiat ciangin tua huna na kahna uh leh na ha gawina uh bangzah takin nasia ding ahi hiam?

Ahi zongin hell khuk sungah gimna thuakin a om hi. A khuadak leh, gamlapi mun khatah Abraham leh Lazaras a omkhawm a galmuh hi. 24 Tua ahih manin nakpi takin kiko a, ‘Pa Abraham aw, kei hong hehpih in. Meiphual sungah omin nakpi takin gimna thuak ka hih manin Lazaras in a khutme dawn tui diahin ka leii hong votsakna dingin hong sawl in,’ a ci hi. 25 Ahi zongin Abraham in, ‘Ka ta aw, leitungah na nuntak laitakun nang nopsakna namkim na ngah laitakin Lazaras in haksatna namkim a thuak hi. Ahi zongin tu-in amah in hih lai-ah nopsakna a ngah laitakin nangmah in haksatna a thuak na hi hi.
Inn-ah nau pasal nga ka nei lai a, ke'n gim ka thuakna hih lai munah hong tun'khakloh teiteina dingun kei' gamtat bangin a gamtatlohna dingun hong hilhsak hen,’ a ci hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh misite' gamah kei nong nusiacip kei ding a, na nasem keimah muatna nong thuaksak kei ding hi.
Pasian in a sep ding thu David in mukhol ahih manin, ‘Mi site gamsungah amah kinusia lo a, a sa a muat kei hi,’ ci-in a gen ciangin, Christ' thawhkikna ding thu a gengen a hihi.
Banghang hiam cihleh mawhna in thaman hong piak pen sihna hi a, ahi zongin i Topa Zeisu tawh i kipawl manin Pasian' hong piakkhong pen nuntak tawntungna a hihi.

Note tungah ka hong hilhsa uh lungdamna thu tawh a kilehngatin, kote-a kipan vantung mi dongin thudang a hong hilh a om leh tua a hong hilh mipa hell khuk sungah tung ta hen! 9 Ka hong gen ngeisa mah bangin ka hong gen kikin-ah: Note' san'sa lungdamna thu tawh a kilehngatin thudang a hong hilh mi peuhpeuh hell khuksung tung ta hen!

Singlamteh tungah Christ a sihna thu tawh a kilehngatin a nungta mi tampi tak a omna thu, a beisa hunah tamveipi ka hong genkhin a, tu-in zong khitui tawh ka hong genpha kikkik hi. 19 Amaute in amau pumpi deihnate Pasian zahin ngaihsun uh a, a maizumna ding uh thute-ah kisial zawsopin, leitung nate bek ngaihsutin nei uh ahih manin Hell khuksung a tung ding uh a hihi.

Ama mite khempeuh leh thu um mite khempeuh hangin minthan'na leh pahtawina a ngah dingin Topa hong pai Ni ciangin a noptuak mahmah Topa' minthan'na huamsung panin amaute kihawlkhia ding a, tawntung suksiatna dan a thuak ding uhhi. Ahi zongin note in ka hong gen uh thute um na hih manun tua nopna sungah na om ding uhhi.

Thuman thutak i theih khit ciangin mawhna i bawl hamtang lai leh i mawhna a kimaisakna dingin biakpiakna dang om nawnlo a, 27 a kihtakhuai thukhenna leh Pasian' thu a nial mite a kangtum ding meikuangpi bek omlai hi. 28 Moses Thukham a zuilote pen mi nih leh thum in mawh mah hi, ci-in teci a pan' khit nak leh kihehpih hetloin sihna kithuaksak hi. 29 Tua bang ahih leh Pasian' Tapa a simmawh, mawhna a hong maisak Pasian' thuciamna sisan a thudonlo, Pasian' hehpihna a hong puak Khasiangtho a hehsakte' thuakding bangzah takin lianzaw kan ding ahi hiam? 30 Banghang hiam cihleh, "Phulakna keima-a' hi a, ka thukkik ding hi," a cipa leh, "Topa in ama mite thu a khen ding," a cipa i theih a hihi. 31 A nungta Pasian' khutsungah thumang loin i tun'khak ding a lauhuai mahmah a hihi.
Leii pen mei tawh kibang hi. I pumpi na sung panin a neuno khat hinapi-in i pumpi buppi a sia suahthei a, hell khuk sung panin a hong piang mei tawh i nuntakna buppi hong kangtumsak thei hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh vantung mite nangawn in khialhna a neih ciangin Pasian in khahkhong loin hell khuk sungah khia a, Thukhen Ni hun dong ngakin khuamial sungah kol bulhsa-in a omsak hi.
Hihbang mite pen a kangcip khinsa ciktui, huih in a mutkhiat meiipi tawh kibang uh a, Pasian in amaute' omna dingin khuamial sahpi omna mun a koih kholhsak hi.

Sodom khua leh Gomorrah khua leh a kiima om khuapi mite zong tua vantung mite mah bangin gamta uh a, numei tawh mawhnopna bek thamloin pasal leh pasal kilunggulhna ciangdong nei uh ahih manin midangte' etteh dingin tawntung meikuang a thuak uhhi.
a sepna uh tawh amau mah' maizumna ding a piangsak tuipi hualte, leh Pasian in amaute' omna dingin leisung khuamial thukpi a koihsak tawntung, a lampial aksite tawh kibang bek uhhi.
a nungta mipa zong ka hihi. Kei ka si ngei hi. Ahi zongin tu-in hong en in, a nungta tawntung ka hihi. Sihna leh misite omna gam keima khutnuai ahi uhhi.

Ka khuadak leh sakol puang khat ka mu a, a tungah a tuangpa' min pen Sihna hi a, a nungah Hell in a zui hi. Amaute in namsau, kialpi, pulnatna, leh gamsate tawh leitung mi sehlisuah sehkhat a thahtheihna dingun thu a kipia hi.

Tua ciangin a ngana vantung mi in a peengkul hong tum a, vantung panin leitungah aksi khat a leengsuk ka mu hi. Tua aksi tungah kuahawm thukpi hon'na tawhtang a kipia hi. 2 Amah in tua kuahawm thukpi a hon' ciangin meiphualpi panin meikhu bangin meikhu tampi hong pusuak a, tua meikhu hangin ni mialin khim a zing hi.

Pasian' leenggahzu zong dawn ding uhhi. Pasian in ama hehna ahi leenggahzu khauh pen ama hehna hai sungah a dimtakin sung khinzo ta hi. Tua bang mite pen a siangtho vantung mite leh Tuuno mai-ah meikuang leh kat khu tawh gimna kipia ding hi. 11 Amaute a kibawlsiatna mei, khu tawntung a, ganhing leh a lim bia-in, a min kigelhna a nei mi peuhmah in a sun a zanin tatsat loin gimna thuak paisuak uhhi," a ci hi.

Tua ciangin a ganhing leh tua ganhing omna-ah na lamdang a bawl kamsang zuaupa kiman khawm hi. Ganhing ciamtehna a neite leh ganhing lim a biate pen tua na lamdangte tawh a kikhem a hihi. Ganhing leh kamsang zuaupa, a nihun kat kikhulna meiphualpi sungah a hingtangun kilawn hi.

Kum tul khat a cin' ciangin a thongkiatna panin Satan kikhah ding a, 8 Gog leh Magog a kici leitung gam khempeuhah a om minam khempeuh a khem dingin kuankhia ding hi. Satan in a galsimpih dingin tuipi gei-a sehnel zahin a tam mihonpi kaikhawm ding hi. 9 Leitung khempeuhah amaute pai uh a, Pasian' mi siangtho omna mun leh Pasian in a it khuapi umcih uhhi. Ahi zongin vantung panin meikuang hong paisukin amaute a kangtum hi. 10 Amaute a khem Satan pen ganhing leh kamsang zuaupa a omna mun, kat a kikhulna meiphualpi sungah kilawn a, a sun a zanin tua lai munah amaute in gimna a thuak tawntung ding uh a hihi. 11 Tua ciangin tokhom kang a lian khat leh a tungah a tupa ka mu hi. Ama omna panin lei leh van lengkhiamang a, a tun'na mel uh kitheilo hi. 12 A lian a neu misite tua tokhom mai-ah dingin laibute a kilem ka mu hi. Tua ciangin a nungta mite a kigelhna laibu a dang khat zong a kilem ka mu hi. Amaute' gamtatna tua laibute sungah a kigelhna tawh kizui-in misite tungah thu a kikhen hi. 13 Tuipi sungah a om misite, tuipi in hong pusuah a, Sihna leh Misite' Gam in zong amau sungah a om misite hong pusuah uhhi. Tua ciangin a vekpi-in amaute' gamtatnasa tawh kizui-in thu a kikhen hi. 14 Tua ciangin Sihna leh Misite' Gam, meiphualpi sungah a kilawn hi. Hih meiphualpi pen sihna nihna a hihi. 15 A nungta mite a kigelhna laibu sungah a min a omlo peuhmah meiphualpi sungah kilawn hi.
Ahi zongin a meidawite, a lehtatte, a lampialte, mi thatte, a paktatte, aisante, milim biate, leh zuaugente omna ding mun pen sihna nihna ahi kat a kikhulna meiphualpi kuang sung ahi hi," a ci hi.

Amah in, "Vanglian Pasian, { Topa}-a' dingin ka huaiham mahmah hi; banghang hiam cihleh Israel mite in na thuciamna nusia-in, na biakna taute lawnkhia uh a, namsau tawh na kamsangte that hi; kei, kei bekbek ka omlai hi. Amaute in kei nangawn thah dingin hong zong lai uhhi," a ci hi.
"A huaihamna bei ngeilo a, a duh khempeuh sit neilo hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh migilo in a lungsim deihna kisaktheihpih a, ngahna dingah a huaihampa in { Topa } phuisamin a taisan hi.
huaihamna tawh mihing a netum, humpinelkai tawh a kibang mite' lakah ka om hithiat hi. Amau' hate, namsau hiam tawh kibang hi.
Thumanna in midikte honkhia a, thumanlo mite in amau' huaihamna mah awkpih uhhi.
Duhhopna pen mindaina hi a, zuau genpa hihna sangin mizawng hihna hoihzaw lai hi.
A huaiham mi in a hauhna dingin huai mengmeng a, a tawpna-ah a zawn' ding lamtak phawkkhalo hi.
A huaiham mi in kitotna piangsak a, { Topa } a muang mite mihau hi ding hi.
Amau' huaiham-mawhna hangin ka heh mahmah a, ka hehna lungsim tawh amaute gim pia-in ka nusia hi. Ahih hangin amaute a lungsim uh khauhin, a gamtat ngei bangun gamta lai veve uhhi.
Banghang hiam cihleh a neupen pan a lianpen dongin, thumanlopi tawh sum zongin a huaiham uhhi. Kamsangte-a kipan siampite dongin thumanlo khin uhhi.

Tua ahih manin a zite uh midangte ka piaksak ding a, a lote uh zong midangte ka luahsak ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh a neupen pan a lianpen dongin thumanlopi tawh sum zongin a huaiham uhhi. Kamsangte-a kipan siampite dongin thumanlo khin uhhi.

{ Topa } in hih bangin ci hi: Ammon mite thumvei a khialh khit, a liveina hangin pelloin amaute gim ka pia ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh amaute in huaihamin gam a deihthuah manun Gilead gam simgawp uhhi.

Hauhna pen zuaupi hi a, a huaiham mite kiphasakin omkhong theilo uh a, hankhuk mah bangin, phazo, cih omsak theilo uh a, lungkim hun cih nei theilo uhhi. Tua ahih manin minam dangte a ban banin simin a uk uhhi.
A uliante, humpinelkai gilkial bang a, a thukhente, keivom gilkial bang uhhi. Zingsang khuavak mateng a saguh nek a nusia nuamlo, a huaiham gamsate tawh kibang uhhi.

"Mihoih a kineihkhem, no Thukham hilh siate leh Pharisee mite in gimna na thuak ding uhhi. Note in hai leh kuangte a pualam na siangsak uh a, ahi zongin tuate sungah, thatanghat thu leh huaihamna tawh mi-a' na suh uh nate a om hi.
huaihamna, gitlohna, khemna, gamtat hoihlohna, en'na, mi gensiatna, kisialhna, leh haitatna a piangsakthei ngaihsutna hoihlote khempeuh,

Tua bang lelin note na gamta kei ding uhhi. Na galte uh itin amaute tungah thupha bawl unla, lohkik ding lamen loin leitawi pia un. Tua hi leh na thaman uh lian ding a, a Lianpen Pasian' tate na hi ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh lungdamna mel a thei theilo mite leh a huaiham mite tungah amah migi hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in ama kiangah, "No Pharisee mite in hai leh kuangte a pualam na siangsak uh a, ahi zongin note na lungsim sung uhah huaihamin na gi kei uhhi.

Tua ciangin Zeisu in amaute khempeuh kiangah, "Hoihtakin kidawm unla, na huaiham lohna dingun kikem un. Banghang hiam cihleh bangzahta-in mi khat a hauh hangin a neihsa tawh a nuntakna taktak kicing zolo hi," a ci hi.

Pharisee mipa dingin thu ngen a, ‘Pasian aw, kei pen midangte bangin a huaiham, a thumanlo, numei tungah a mawh mi ka hi kei hi; hua lai-a siahdongpa bang hilo ka hih manin nangma tungah ka nuamna kong pulak hi.
Siatna nam khempeuh ahi, hoihlohna, huaihamna, khatlekhat kisiatsak nopna, hazatna, mi thahna, kitotna, khemna, a sialam bekbek ngaihsutna, zuau genna,

Tua bang ka hong cih ciangin numei tawh a paktat, a huaiham, a guta, milim a bia lawkite tawh na kikhawl kei un, ka cihnopna hilo hi. Tuate tawh kikhawllo ding ci lehang, leitung panin paikhia un, cihna suak ding hi.11Tua ka hong laigelhna sungah ka cihnopna pen, thu upna sungah unau khat hi hang, ci napi-in numei tawh a paktat, a huaiham, milim a bia, mi gensia, zukham, ahih kei leh a guta theite tawh kikhawl kei un, cihnopna a hihi. Tua bang mite tawh an ne ding nangawnin zong na tukhawm kei un.
a gutate, a huaihamte, zukhamte, mi gensiate, ahih kei leh mi' na a sutte khat beek, Pasian' Ukna sungah lutthei hetlo ding hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh note kiangah ka hong tun' ciangin note' omzia ding ka deih bangin na omloh khakding uh leh note in keima maisuah na muhnopzia bangun na hong muhloh khakding uh ka lunghimawh hi. Note lakah kitotna, hazatna, hehna, huaihamna, mi zahpihna, mi gensiatna, kiphatsakna, leh buaina a omkhak ding ka lunghimawh hi.

milim biakna, mi bumna, kilangbawlna, kitotna, hazatna, hehna, huaihamna, kikhenna, pawltuam lungsim neihna, 21 en'na, zukhamna, leh biakna pawi-ah zukhamna-a kipan adangdangte a hihi. A beisa hunah ka hong hilhkholhsa bangin tu-in ka hong genkikin-ah: Hih bangin a gamta mite pen Pasian' Ukna sungah omkha hetlo ding hi.

Note pen Pasian' mi na hih manun note lakah nulepa khialhna, a kilawmlo-a gamtatna, huaihamna cihte genin zong na nei vet kei un.5Nulepa khialhna a gamta mi, a kilawmlo-a a gamta mi, leh a huaiham (huaihamna zong milim biakna zahin sia hi) mite in Christ Ukna leh Pasian Ukna sungah bangmah ngah nei hetlo ding ahihna uh teltakin thei ta un.
Huaihamna lungsim leh kisialh nopna lungsim tawh bangmah gamta kei un. Kiniamkhiat ciat unla, midangte thupi ngaihsutzaw un.
Tua ahih manin nulepa mawhna, a kilawmlo gamtatna, hukna lanna, a hoihlo lunggulhna, leh milim biakna nam khat ahih manin huaihamna ahi note sungah a om leitung lungsimte na sisak un.
Pawlpi upa dingte zong a gamtat hoih, a lungsim citak, leenggahzu tam a nelo, sum thu-ah a huaiham mi hilo ding uhhi.
Ahi zongin a haunuam mite in ze-etna a tuamtuam thuak a, duhhopna huaihamna a haivai thute-ah awkcipin, haksatna leh siatna a tuahlawh uhhi.

Tuahun ciangin mite in amau angsung ding bek ngaihsunin, huaihamin, kisialin, kihisakin, mi zahko-in, nu leh pate' thu mangloin, lungdam theihna mel neiloin, biakna lungsim neiloin, 3 mi khualloin, hehpihna neiloin, mi gensia-in, ngongtatin, kihtakhuai-in, thuhoih deihloin, 4 ciampelin, thu khualloin, kiphasak gawpin, Pasian donloin pumpi nopsakna bek deihin, 5 biakna thu a puathamteng zui napi-in biakna hangin vangliatna thu a omte deihlo ding uhhi. Tua bangin a gamta mite na pelh in.
Pawlpi siate pen Pasian' nasem ahih manin paubaan'na a omlo, a kiphasaklo, zukham thei mi a hilo, a ngongtatlo, a huaihamlo,
Ahi zongin na lungsim uhah en'na, gitlohna, leh huaihamna a om leh a zuaugen na hi uh a, pil ing, ci-in kisialhna ding bangmah omlo hi.
En'na leh huaihamna a om nak leh buaina leh siatna nam khempeuh tawh kizom pahpah hi.
Note lakah a om kitotna leh kilaina koi panin hong piang ahi hiam? Deihluatna lungsim na neih manun note' pumsung a kitoktok niloh a hihi.
Tua ahih manin gitlohna, zuauna, kineihkhemna, huaihamna, leh kigensiatnate na omsak nawn kei un.

Hih sia manlote in a huaiham manun note kiang panin sum a ngahtheihna dingun phuahtawm thu hong gen ding uhhi. Ahi zongin sawtpeka kipanin amaute' thu a Khen dingpa a kigingsa-in om niloh a, amaute a Susia dingpa in en gige hi.
Numei bekbek etnopin nei uh a, a mawhnopna lungsim uh kam theilo hi. Upna cingtaaklo mite zol belin nei uh a, huaihamna lungsim bekbek a nei uhhi. Tua bang mite, Pasian' samsiat mite ahi uhhi.
Banghang hiam cihleh nangma muhna-ah kum tul khat a bei ciangin zanni ahi a, zan ihmut laitakin khan'lawh khat sung tawh ahi zongin a kibang bek hi.

Topa' vantung mi khat in Philip kiangah, "Kithawi in la, Jerusalem khua panin Gaza khua paina lampi zuan dingin leitaw lam manawhin pai in," a ci hi. (Tua lampi tu-in kizang pha nawnlo hi.) 27 Philip zong kithawi-in a pai hi. Lampi-ah Ethiopia mi mang lian khat tawh kituak hi. Tua mangpa pen Ethiopia kumpinu Kandeis khutnuai-a mang lian khat hi a, kumpinu neihsa khempeuh a ukpa a hihi. Jerusalem khua-ah Pasian bia dingin a va pai hi a, 28 inn zuan dingin leeng sungah a tuan' kawmin kamsang Isaiah laibu a sim hi. 29 Tua laitakin Khasiangtho in Philip kiangah, "Pai in la tua leeng mai-ah va om in," ci-in a sawl hi. 30 Philip zong ama kiangah va tai a, kamsang Isaiah laibu a simna za ahih manin, "Na laisim a khiatna na thei hiam?" ci-in a dong hi. 31 Amah in, "Mi khatpeuh in hong hilhtel lohpi-in bangci theih ding ka hi hiam?" ci-in dawng a, ama leeng tungah Philip a tuang dingin a sam hi.

Philip in, "Na lungsim takpi tawh na up nak leh tui na kiphum thei ding hi," a cih ciangin, "Zeisu Christ pen Pasian' Tapa hi, ci-in ka um hi," ci-in a dawng hi. 38 Tua ciangin a leeng a khawlsakna dingin mangpa in thu pia a, Philip tawh a nihun tui phualah pai-in Philip in amah a tuiphum hi. 39 Tui sung panin a paikhiat khit uh ciangin Topa' Khasiangtho in Philip paikhiatpih hi. Mangpa in Philip mu nawnlo hi; ahi zongin lungdam takin a lampai a zom hi. 40 Tua ciangin Philip pen Azotas khua-ah a om ahih lamtak amah kiphawk a, tua khua-a kipanin Sisaria khua a tun'dongin khua khempeuhah Lungdamna Thu a hilh hi.
Ahi zongin ka itte aw, na mangngilh lohding uh ka deih thu in: Topa-a' dingin ni khat leh kum khat, kum tul khat leh ni khat a kilamdan' luatna omlo hi.

Nidang ciangin { Topa}' inn a omna mual pen mual liante lakah a sangpenin kikipsak ding a, mual neute tungah kisangsak ding hi. Tua lai-ah minam khempeuh pai muamua ding uh a, 3 mi tampite hong pai-in, "Hong pai un, amah in ama zialetongte hong hilh theihna ding leh ama lampite i zuih theihna dingin Jacob' Pasian' inn, { Topa}' mualah paito ni," a ci ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } in Zion panin thu hong gen ding a, Jerusalem khua panin { Topa}' thuhilhna hong paikhia ding hi. 4 Amah in minamte khatlekhat kikalah thu khenin, mi tampite' thu khensak ding hi. Amaute in a namsaute uh lokhawhna tu, a teipite uh singhiang heuhna temkawi-in a seek ding uhhi. Minam khat leh minam khat kido nawnlo ding uh a, galdo dingin kithawi nawnlo ding uhhi.

{ Topa}' kha in ama tungah ama mite a ukna ding pilna, thutheihna, leh siamna pia ding hi. Amah in { Topa}' deihna thei-in { Topa } zahtak ding hi. 3 Amah in { Topa}' nasep nuamsa ding hi. Amah in a tungtham bek muhna tawh thu khenlo ding a, kam lengsawn bek zakna tawh thu khentatlo ding hi. 4 Thumanna tawh mizawngte' thu khenin, lungsim neem mite' thu ahi bangin khensak ding hi. Ama kam panin a thupiakna tawh leitung mite gim kipia ding a, a muk panin a thugenna tawh migilote si ding uhhi. 5 Amah in thuman leh thutak tawh ama mite uk ding hi.

Tua ni ciangin Topa in Assiria gam, Egypt gam, Pathros gam, Ethiopia gam, Elam gam, Shinar gam, Hamath gam, leh tuipi gei-a gamte panin ama mi a omlaite a ngahkikna dingin a vangliatna zang kik ding hi.
Zion-a teng mite aw, nomau' lakah Israel-te' Siangtho Pa lianin om ahih manin lungdamin awng unla, lungdamin la sa un," a cih hun uh hong tung ding hi.

Hong nawk sialin note hong ban ding hi; banghang hiam cihleh zingsang khat khit zingsang khat, sun leh zanin hong nawk tawntung ding hi. { Topa}' tung panin na zak uh thute a banbanin launa lianpi vive hi ding hi. 20 Banghang hiam cihleh puanbuk sungah khe khuan'na dingin lupna tom lua a, silh dingin puanza neu lua hi, a cih tawh na kibang ding uhhi. 21 Banghang hiam cihleh a lamdang ama bawlte a bawl ding leh a lamdang ama nasep a sem dingin Perazim Mual tungah a sep bangin { Topa } in hong sem ding a, Gibeon kuama a heh bangin amah hong heh ding hi.
En un, { Topa}' vangliatna leh a minthan'na vang, gamlapi panin kimu thei hi. Meikuang leh meikhu in ama hehna hong kilangsak a, ama kampaunate, mei bangin a kuang hi.

En un, galhangte huhna ngenin kiko uh a, kilemna ding palai semte nakpi takin kap uhhi. 8 Lam lianpite gambulak suak a, kuamah khualzinin pai ngam nawnlo uhhi. Thuciamnate kipeksatin, thukimnasate kipalsat a, khatlekhat kizahtakna om nawnlo hi. 9 Leitang kinusiacipin om mawk hi. Lebanon muala tulak singte vulgawp a, Sharon gam lei hoihpen sehnel gam bang ta hi. Bashan leh Karmel muala singtehte pulhmang khinta hi. 10 { Topa } in minam dangte kiangah, "Tu-in ka gamtang ding a, ka vangliatna ka lak ding hi. Tu-in kei hong kipahtawi ta ding hi. 11 Na geelnate uh a kiman'na omlo a, na nasepnate uh a mawkna a hihi. No leh no a kisusia na hi uhhi. 12 Leikang ngahna dingin suangkang a kihal bangin na vui suak ding uh a, meikhuk sunga a kihaltum lingkungte na bang ding uhhi," a ci hi. 13 Gamlapi-a a om mite aw, ka sepna thu za un. A nai-a a om mite aw, ka vangliatna thei un. 14 Zion-a a om mawhnei mite lau uh a, Pasian' thu a ngaihsunlo mite lau-in lingcip uhhi. Amaute in, "Pasian' thukhenna pen a kuang tawntung mei tawh kibang hi. Tua bang meikuang kua in thuakzo ding ahi hiam?" ci uhhi.

Awging khat in, "Gamlakah { Topa}' lampi sial un la, sehnel gamsungah i Pasian-a' ding lam lianpi khat a tangin bawl un. 4 Kuam khempeuh kivuk dim ding a, mual liante leh mual neute kitotam ding hi. A tamkimlo munte kitamkim sak ding a, suanghum omna munte kizalhtam ding hi. 5 { Topa}' kam in gen khin ahih manin, { Topa}' minthan'na vang hong kilang ding a, mi khempeuh in mukhawm ding uhhi," a ci hi.

Thuman omlo lua ahih manin siatna a pelh mipa pen mihai-in kingaihsun zawsop hi. { Topa } in hih thu mu a, thutang omlo ahih manin amah lungkimlo hi. 16 Amah in nenniamna a thuakte a huh ding mi khat beek a omlohna a mu hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute a honkhia ding leh a gualzawhna dingin ama vangliatna a zang ding hi. 17 Amah in thumanna pen awmdal lum bangin silh ding a, gualzawhna pen sik lukhu bangin khu ding hi. Na khempeuh a manin bawlkik nopna, gimna a piangsakte gim pia-in thukkik nopna lungsim puan bangin a silh ding hi. 18 Amau' gamtatna bangin amah in thukkik ding a, amah a langpangte gim pia ding hi. Ama galte a thukkik ding hi. A gamla pekah a om tuipi gei-a gamte zong a thukkik ding hi. 19 Tua ahih ciangin nisuahna leh nitumna kikalah a om mi khempeuh in amah zahtakin, a vangliatna kihta ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh huihpi nung bang, tuipi khang bangin amah hong pai ding hi. 20 { Topa } in ama mite tungah, "Note a hong hu dingin Jerusalem-ah kong pai ding a, mawhna panin a kiheikhia mi peuhmah ka hong honkhia ding hi.

A tuaci bang kua'n za ngei na hi uhhiam? A tuaci bang kua'n mu ngei na hi uhhiam? Ni khat thu-in gam khat piang ngei ahi hiam? Tomnokhat sungin minam khat piangkhia ngei ahi hiam? Banghang hiam cihleh Zion in nausuak gimna a thuak phetin a minamte suakkhia pah hi.

A dipkuathuai, a patauhhuai thu khat gamsungah a piang khinzo hi. 31 Kamsangte in thuman genlo uh a, siampite in zong amau' ut bangun a uk uhhi. Ka mite in phamawh salo sawnsawn uhhi. A tawpna hun hong tun' ciangin bang cih ding uh ahi hiam, { Topa } in ci hi, ci-in gen in," hong ci hi.

Gamsung khempeuh kisia-in, gam simtham suak ding a, hih mite khempeuh kum sawmsagih sung Babylon kumpipa' salin a om ding uhhi. 12 Kum sawmsagih a cin' khit ciangin { Topa } in kong cihin-ah, Babylon kumpipa leh a gam amau' mawhna hangin gim ka pia ding a, tua gam a tawntungin gam simtham ka suaksak ding hi. 13 Tua gam a siatna ding ka gensa thute khempeuh hih laibu sungah kigelh a, Jeremiah in gam khempeuhte' kiangah a gen hi. Tuate khempeuh ka tungsak ding hi. 14 Banghang hiam cihleh gam tampi leh kumpi liante in amaute salin man ding uh a, amau' gamtatna amau' tungah ka thukkik ding hi," a ci hi.

"En un, { Topa } in kong cihin-ah, Israel minamte leh Judah minamte tawh thuciamna thak khat ka bawl ni hun hong tung ding hi. 32 Tua pen, a pu a pate uh, Egypt gam panin ka lakkhiatna dingin a khut uh tawh ka kaihkhiat huna ka bawl uh thuciamna tawh kibanglo ding hi. Tua hun lai-in kei amaute' pasal hinapi-in ka thuciamna a hong palsat uhhi, { Topa } in kong ci hi. 33 Ahih hangin { Topa } in kong cihin-ah, tua hun hong tun' ciangin Israel minamte tawh hih bangin thuciamna ka bawl ding hi: Amaute' sungah ka thukham ka koih ding a, amaute' lungtang tungah ka gelh ding hi. Kei pen amaute' Pasian ka hi ding a, amaute pen keima mite ahi ding uhhi. 34 Kuamah in midangte leh a sanggamte uh kiangah, ‘{ Topa } thei in,’ ci-in a kihilh nawn kei ding uhhi; banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } in kong cihin-ah, amaute in a neupen panin a lianpen dongin, a vekpi-un kei a hong thei ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh amau' khialhnate ka maisak ding a, amaute' mawhnate zong phawkin ka nei nawn kei ding hi," a ci hi.
"Amaute in gal peengkul tum uh a, a vekpi-un kiging uhhi. Ahi zongin mi khempeuh tungah ka hehna tungkim ding ahih manin galsim dingin kuamah kuankhia zolo ding hi.

Na pu na pate uh tungah piak dingin ka ciam Israel gamsungah note kong tun'pih ciangin { Topa } ka hihna thu na hong thei ding uhhi. 43 Tua hun ciangin, a kilawmloin na gamtatnate khempeuh uh leh nomau mah na kinitsak tawmna thute uh na phawk ding uh a, na gamtat siatnasate uh hangin nomau mah na kimudahtawm ding uhhi. 44 Na gitlohna, na gamtatsiatna uh tawh kizui-in note tungah hong bawlloin, ka min a daikhak ding khualna tawh note tungah hong gamta ka hih manin kei pen { Topa } ka hihna thu no Israel mite in na hong thei ding uhhi, Topa { Pasian } in ci hi," a hong ci hi.

{ Topa } in kei kiangah thu hong gen a, 2 "Mihing ahi Ezekiel aw, Magog gama om Gog kumpipa mawhsakna thu gen in. Amah pen Meshek minamte leh Tubal minamte a ukpa a hihi. Amah mawhsakna thu gen in la, 3 Topa { Pasian } in hih bangin ci hi, ci-in gen in: Meshek leh Tubal minamte a ukpipa Gog aw, kei pen nangma langah ka pang hi. 4 Nang hong lehhei-in, na khaguh-ah sikkawi kong bulh ding a, na galkap honpite khempeuh tawh kong kaikhia ding hi. Na galkap honpite pen a sakolte uh leh a sakol tung tuangte uh tawh tam mahmah a, na galkap khempeuh in lum leh namsau nei kim uhhi. 5 Persia gam, Kush gam, leh Put gammite in zong nang hong pan'pih uh a, amaute in lum leh siklukhu nei kim uhhi. 6 Leilu lam gam peka om Gomer gama galkapte khempeuh leh Bethtogarmah gama galkapte khempeuh in nang hong pan'pih uh a, minam dang tampite in zong nang hong pawlpih uhhi. 7 Tua ahih manin tu-in nang leh na pawlte khempeuh a kigalging sa-in om unla, na thupiakna bangin a gamtang pah lian dingin na galkapte khempeuh omsak in. 8 Minam tuamtuamte lak panin kikaikhawm kikin a gam uh a kitutkik zawh gallauna neiloin a om Israel mite' gam a sim dingin kum tampi khit ciangin kong sawl ding hi. Sauveipi sung kinusia-in gamkhing a suak ngei hinapi-in, tu-in a mite khempeuh lungmuang takin a omna Israel mualtung gamte a sim ding na hi hi. 9 Nang leh na galkap honpite leh nang hong pawlpih minam tampite in khuapi huih bangin na simgawp ding uh a, meiipi bangin a gamsung khempeuh na tuamcip ding uhhi.

Tua kumpite a maan laitakun vantung Pasian in a bei thei ngeilo ding kumpi gam a hong phut ding hi. Tua kumpi gam kuamah in zo zolo ding a, tua gam in gamdang khempeuhte zogawpin a kip tawntung ding hi.

Ka et lai leh sapi lina ka mu hi. Tua sapi kihtakhuai mahmah a, lipkhaphuai-in a thupi mahmah hi. Amah in a gol mahmah sik-ha a nei hi. Amah in nene-in a nek valteng a khe tawh a tuancilgawp hi. Sapi dangte tawh kibang loin amah in ki sawm a nei hi. 8 Tua kite ka et laitakin tuate' lakah adang ki neu khat hong po a, a omsa sung pan ki thumte a botkhia hi. Tua ki' tungah mihing mittang tawh a kibang mittang leh kam om a, kiphatsakna kam tampi a pau hi.
Tua ciangin a nungta tawntung mipa hong pai a, a Lianpen Pasian' mite-a' ding a hoih thukhenna a hong gen hi. Pasian' mite in kumpi za a ngahna ding uh hun a hong tung hi.

"Hih leitung kumpi gam, vangliat-na, leh liatna khempeuh a Lianpen Pasian' mite tungah a kipia ding hi. Amau' kumpi za cikmah hunin bei ngeilo ding a, leitung ukna za a nei khempeuhte in a thu uh mangin amaute' na a sem ding uhhi," hong ci hi.

"Na mite leh khuapi siangtho, a mawhna leh a gamtat khialhnate a beina ding hun kum sawmsagih mun sagih sung a kisehzo hi. Tua ciangin mawhna kimaisak ding a, a tawntung thutang thu a hong tung ding hi. Genkholhna leh mangmuhna thu a mantakin hong tangtung ding a, a Siangthopen Mun biakinnpi kisian'suah ding hi. 25 Hih thu ciamteh in la thei in: Jerusalem lamkikna ding thu a kipiak huna kipan sathau kinilhpa hong pai dong kum sagih mun sagih sung hi ding hi. Jerusalem kongzing lampi nei leh kulhpi nei-in kilamkik ding a, kum sawmguklenih mun sagih sung kip ding a, ahih hangin buai hun sung ahi ding hi. 26 Tua hun a bei khit ciangin sathau kinilhpa thuman lopi-in a kithat ding hi. Galsim dingin a hong pai galkapmang lianpa in khuapi leh biakinnpi a susia ding hi. A beina pen tuiciin tun' bang hi ding a, a tawp dongin galdona leh kisiatna vive ahi dingin Pasian in thu a khenzo hi. 27 Tua makaipa in mi tampite tawh kum sagih sung thuciamna kip bawl ding uhhi. Gangawh biakna leh biakpiakna, hih hunlang sung a khawlsak ding hi. Biakinn dawn sangpen munah a Lipkhaphuai na kikoih ding hi; ahi zongin Pasian in tua a koihpa' thuak dingin a geelsa thu a koihpa in a thuak hun ciangdong, a Lipkhaphuai na pen a koihna mun mahah omlai phot ding hi," hong ci hi.
Tu-in Daniel aw, beina hun a tun' mateng laibu khupcip in la, a tungah ciamtehna koih in. A kallakah mi tampite in bang thu piang hiam cih theitel nuamin a hanciam ding uhhi," a hong ci hi.
Amaute in nisim biakpiakna a khawlsak, a Lipkhaphuai na a hong pian' ciangin ni tul khat zanih sawmkua sung a sawt ding hi.

"Tua khit ciangin mi khempeuh tungah ka kha ka sung ding a, na puteekte un mang manin na tangvalte un maang mu ding uhhi. 29 Tua hun ciangin nasem numei leh nasem pasalte tung nangawnah ka kha ka sung ding hi. 30 "Tua ciangin vantung leh leitungah hilhkholhna lim ahi, sisan kiluan'sakna, meikatna leh meikhu lompi hong om ding hi. 31 { Topa' } ni, tua a lauhuai hun a hong tun' ma-in ni hong mialin, kha, sisan hong bang ding hi. 32 Ahi zongin { Topa' } tungah huhna a ngen khempeuh in hotkhiatna a ngah ding uhhi. { Topa' } gensa bangmahin Zion Mual leh Jerusalem khuasungah a suakta mi om ding uhhi. { Topa } in a teel mite, suakta ding uhhi.

Mailam hunah { Topa' } biakinn a omna mual, a sangpen mual hong suak ding a, minam tampi in hong zuan ding uhhi. 2 Minam tampite hong pai-in, "Israel mite' Pasian' biakinn, { Topa' } mualah va paito ni. Tua lai-ah ama deihna hong hilh ding a, ama deihna bangin i gamta ding hi," ci ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh Zion panin thuhilhna hong gingkhia a, Jerusalem panin { Topa' } thu hong paikhia hi. 3 Amah in minam tampite' thu khensak ding a, Israel gam panin a gamla pekah a om, minam vangliante' thu khensak ding hi. Amaute in a namsaute uh lokhawhna tu-in seek ding uh a, a teipite uh singhiang heuhna temkawi-in seek ding uhhi. Minam khatlekhat kido nawnlo ding uh a, galkidona theikha nawnlo ding uhhi. 4 A kuamah peuh lungnuamin a leenggui phung leh a theikung nuai-ah tu hithiat ding a, kuamah in patausak nawnlo ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Vanglian { Topa } mahmah in hih thu hong gen khinta hi. 5 Banghang hiam cihleh midangte in amau' pasian ciat bia-in a thu mang ding uh a, ahi zongin eite in ahih leh eima { Topa } Pasian mah a tawntungin bia-in ama thu i mang ding hi. 6 { Topa } in hih bangin ci hi: Keimah in gim ka piak ahi, sala om gimna a thuak mite, ka kaihkhop kik hun hong tung ding hi. 7 Amaute, a cimawhin gamlapi-ah om uh a, ahi zongin keimah in amaute pansa kikin, minam vanglian khatin ka bawlkik ding hi. Tua huna kipan a tawntungin Zion mual panin amaute ka uk paisuak ding hi.

Vanglian { Topa } in kei tungah thu hong genin 2 amah in, "Jerusalem mite ka itluatna hangin Jerusalem khuapi ka huh nuam mahmah a, hih banga ka itluatna in a galte tungah ka heh hong suaksak hi. 3 Ka khuapi siangtho Jerusalem-ah ciahkikin ka teng ding hi. A citak khuapi, ci-in minthang ding a, Vanglian { Topa' } mual pen mual siangtho kici ding hi. 4 Jerusalem khuapi kongzing leh lamkabomte-ah a tu dingin puteekte omkik ding a, teeklua kisa-in ciangkhut khunin pai ding uhhi. 5 Kongzing khempeuhah numei naupang kimawlin phezaizai ding uhhi. 6 "Tu-a a omlai note-a' dingin hih thu ahi theilo ding tawh a kibat hangin kei-a' dingin ahi mawh ding thu hilo hi.
A vanglian a thahat minamte zong Vanglian { Topa } a bia ding leh ama tung panin thupha a ngen dingin Jerusalem-ah hong pai ding uhhi.

"David' suanlekhakte leh Jerusalem khuamite' tungah hehpihna lungsim leh thungetna lungsim ka guan' ding hi. Amaute in a sutlup uh mipa enin, ta khat neihsun a sihsuah mite bangin kap ding uh a, tacil a khuaisuahte bangin nakpi takin kapin thum ding uhhi.

{ Topa } in na hong sep hun hong tung ding hi. Jerusalem khuapi kiluh gawpin, note' muh mahmahin a na lakte uh hawm ding uhhi. 2 Jerusalem khuapi a sim dingin { Topa } in minam khempeuh kaikhawm ding hi. A khuapi kila-in, a innte kiluh gawpin, a numeite zong kibuan gawp ding hi. Mi alang bang salin kipaikhiatpih ding a, adangte ahih leh kipaikhiatpih lo ding hi. 3 Tua ciangin { Topa } hong kuankhia ding a, a beisa hunah a sim ngei bangin hih minam dangte hong sim ding hi. 4 Tua ciangin Jerusalem nisuahna lamah a om Oliv Mual tungah { Topa } a ding ding hi. Tua ciangin nisuahna lam pan nitumna lamah Oliv Mual kitamin phel nih suak ding a, a kikalah kuampi om ding hi. A mual kimkhat leilu lamah kikhinin, kimkhat leitaw lamah kikhin ding hi. 5 Hinnom kuam sung kivukcip ding a, Judah kumpi Uzzah' hun lai-in zinlin'na-a a kivukcip mah bang ding hi. Tua ciangin { Topa } ka Pasian hong pai ding a, a mi siangthote khempeuh hong tonpih ding hi.

Tua ni hong tun' ciangin Jerusalem khua panin tuicim hong luangkhia ding a, kimkhat, nisuahna lamah a om Si Tuipi-ah luang ding a, kimkhat, nitumna lamah a om Mediterranean Tuipi-ah luang ding hi. Tua tui in kan' hun cih neiloin luang tawntung ding hi. 9 Tua ciangin { Topa } pen leitung khempeuh' kumpi suak ding a, mi khempeuh in amah bek thei-in bia ding uhhi.

Tua bangin galte a kizawhgawp khit ciangin, galte sung panin a nungtalai mite in Vanglian { Topa, } kumpi ahihna hangin a bia ding leh ama gualzawhna pawi a bawl dingin kumsimin Jerusalem-ah pai tawntung ding uhhi.

"Kong kawcik bek tawnin lut un. Hell khuk tun'na ding kongvang pen lianin a lampi baih a, mi tampi in a zui uhhi. 14 Ahi zongin nuntak tawntungna tun'na ding kong kawcikin a lampi haksa a, mi tawmno bek in a zuizo uhhi.

Leitung hun bei ciangin zong tua bangmah hi ding hi. Vantung mite hong pai-in mihoihte lak panin migilote lakhia-in, 50 meikhukpi sungah tua migilote a khul ding uhhi. Tua lai-ah kapin a hagawi ding uhhi.

Ahi zongin Zeisu in, "Ni a tum khit nitak ciangin, ‘Van san ahih manin khua pha ding hi,’ na ci uhhi. 3 Zingsang hun ciangin, ‘Van sanin khua niim ahih manin guah zu ding hi,’ na ci thei uhhi. Note in van maitang na et uh ciangin khua pha ding leh khua sia ding khenthei napi-in tuhun thute na thei thei kei uhhi.

Oliv Mual tungah Zeisu tu-in a om laitakin a nungzuite guak a tuamin hong pai uh a, "Hih thute cik ciangin hong piangding a, nang na hong paiding hun leh hun beina ding bang lim hong om ding ahi hiam, hong gen in," a ci uhhi. 4 Zeisu in amaute kiangah, "Kidawm unla, mite' khemsa-in ta kei un. 5 Banghang hiam cihleh keimah a kineih mi tampi hong pai ding a, ‘Kei, Christ ka hi hi,’ ci-in mi tampi tak umkhialsak ding uhhi. 6 A nai, a gamla-ah galkidona thu na za ding uhhi. Hihte a piang mah ding hi a, ahi zongin a beina ding hi nailo ahih manin patau kei un. 7 Gam khat leh gam khat, kumpi khat leh kumpi khat hong kido ding a, mun tuamtuamah kialpi hong tungin, zin hong ling ding hi. 8 Hihte khempeuh pen gimna kipatna ding hi pan hi. 9 "Tua ciangin note hong kibawlsia-in hong kithat ding a, keima hangin Gentail mi khempeuh in note hong mudah ding uhhi. 10 Tua hun ciangin mi tampi in a upna uh khahsuah ding a, khatlekhat kimudahin khatlekhat kilehhek ding uhhi. 11 Kamsang kineihkhem mi tampi hong piang ding a, mi tampi tak umkhialsak ding uhhi. 12 Gitlohna khang mahmah ding ahih manin ki-itna hong kiam ding hi. 13 Ahi zongin a bei dongin a thuakzote in hotkhiatna ngah ding uhhi. 14 Tua ciangin mi khempeuh tungah teci ahi dingin Pasian' hong ukna hangin a lungdamhuai thu, leitung khempeuhah kihilh ding hi. Tua khit ciangin beina hong tung ding hi. 15 "Tua ciangin kamsang Daniel in, ‘A lipkhaphuai zehphitna,’ ci-in a gen pen a siangtho munah hong om ciangin (hih lai a simte in Zeisu' cihnopna thei ta un),

"Sapul omna peuhah musane kikaikhawm ding hi." 29 "Tua gimna hun a tun'khit phetin ni hong mialin kha hong taang nawnlo ding a, vantung panin aksite hong kia ding a, vantunga om nate a pai ngei-in pai theiloin lampialgawp ding hi. 30 Tua ciangin Mihing Tapa' lim vantungah hong kilang ding hi. Tua ciangin leitung minam khempeuh dahin kap ding uh a, vangliatna leh minthan'na tawh meii lakah Mihing Tapa a hong pai a mu ding uhhi. 31 Nakpi takin peengkul hong ging ding a, leitung mun khempeuhah a vantung mite hong paisakin, leimong khat pan mong khatdongin, a teelsa mite a kaikhawmsak ding hi. 32 Thei kung tung panin thu phawk un. Thei a hiang hong meengin a teh hong no ciangin khuakhal hun hong naita hi, ci-in na thei uhhi. 33 Tua mah bangin hih ka thugente khempeuh na muh uh ciangin Mihing Tapa hong tun'ding hun hong nai mahmah ta hi, ci-in na thei un. 34 A mantaka kong genin-ah: Hih lai-a a om mite a sihkhit ma-in hih ka thugen khempeuh hong tung ding hi. 35 Van leh lei a maimang zongin ka thugente maimang ngeilo ding hi. 36 Ahi zongin a ni leh a nai hun ding pen kuamah in theilo hi. Vantungah a om vantung mite ahi a, Tapa nangawn in ahi zongin theilo a, Pa Pasian bek in thei hi. 37 Noah hun lai-in up hunlohpi khatin tuiciin a tun' bangin Mihing Tapa zong up hunlohpi khatin hong pai ding hi.

Tua ahih ciangin bang hunin na Topa uh hong pai ding cih theilo na hih manun na pilvang un. 43 Ahi zongin na phawk ding uh thu in: Inn neipa in zan laitakin gutapa a pai ding hun theikhol leh amah in na pangin a inn luhsaklo ding hi. 44 Tua ahih manin Mihing Tapa zong, note' upmawhloh hun laitakin hong pai ding ahih manin note zong na kiging tawntung ta un. 45 "A pil a citak nasem i cih a bangcite ahi hiam? A naseppih dangte ukin a hun manmanin amaute' nekzah ding ciat an a pia dingin a topa in a seh a nasempa a hihi. 46 A topa hong ciah ciangin ama sawl bangin na semin a om a muhpa pen mi hampha mahmah khat a hihi. 47 Ke'n kong genin-ah, ama neihsa khempeuh a uk dingin a topa in tua nasempa a koih ding hi. 48 Ahi zongin tua nasempa nasem hoihlo hi hen la, a lungsim sungah, ‘Ka topa hong ciahhak ding hi,’ ci-in, 49 a naseppih a lawmte satgawp hen la, zukham thei mite tawh anne zune-in na om leh, 50 a topa tung dingin a uploh ni hun khatpeuhin a topa hong tung ding a, 51 a topa in nakpi takin gim pia-in, mihoih a kineihkhemte' gimthuak dingteng thuaksak ding a, amah kapin a hagawi ding hi.

"Mihing Tapa a vantung mite tawh Kumpi-in hong paikhawm uh ciangin a kumpi tokhom tungah hong tu ding hi. 32 Ama mai-ah leitung minam khempeuh hong kikhawm ding hi. Gancingpa in tuu leh keelte a khen mah bangin mi khempeuh khen nihin hong koih ding hi. 33 Tuu a bang mite a taklamah koihin, keel a bang mite a veilamah koih ding hi. 34 Tua ciangin Kumpipa in a taklamah a om mite kiangah, ‘Ka Pa in thupha a piak mite aw, hong pai ta un. Leitung piancil a kipanin note-a' dingin a kibawlkholsa gamnuam hong luah un.
Tua ciangin note tungah ka hong gen thute khempeuh a zuihna dingun na hilh un. Hun bei dongin note a hong ompih tawntung ding ka hihna thu phawk ta un," a ci hi.

Unau khatlekhat a sihna dingun kikhia ding uh a, pa in a ta khia-in, ta in a nu leh a pate khia-in a thatsak ding uhhi. 13 Keima hangin Gentail mi khempeuh in note hong mudah ding uh a, ahi zongin a sih dongun a thuakzote in hotkhiatna a ngah ding uhhi.

Tua hun ding theilo na hih manun kikemin pilvang un. 34 Mi khat khualzin dingin paikhia a, a din'khiat ding ciangin amau' sep ding ciat a nasemte tungah tavuan pia a, kongcingpa in limtakin a cin' ding a sawl mipa tawh kibang hi. 35 Inn neipa, nitak ahi a, zankim ahi a, zingsang ak khuan'kuan ahi a, zingsang khuavak khit ahi zongin a bang hunin hong tungding cih theilo na hih manun ngakin na pilvang un. 36 Tua hi kei leh amah thakhatin hong tungin na ihmut laitakun hong tuakkha ding hi. 37 Note tungah kong gen mah bangin mi khempeuh tungah zong, ‘Ngakin na pilvang un,’ ka ci hi," a ci hi.
Ke'n kong cihin-ah, amaute' thu a manin manlang takin khensak ding hi. Ahi zongin Mihing Tapa hong pai ciangin leitungah amah a um mi a mu ding hiam?" ci-in a genthuah hi.
Mun khempeuhah nakpi takin zin hong lingin, kialpi leh pulnatna zong hong tung ding hi. A kihtakhuai a tuamtuamte leh lim lianpipi vanah hong kilang ding hi.

Tua ciangin Judea gamsunga omte mualtungah tai un. Jerusalem khuasunga omte zong taikhia unla, gamsung khuaneu-a om mite, Jerusalem khua sungah lut nawn kei un. 22 Banghang hiam cihleh Laisiangtho sungah a kigelh mah bangin, ‘Gim Piak Ni,’ a hihi. 23 Tua huna naupaiite leh naungek neite-a' dingin haksa mahmah ding hi. Hih leitungah gimna lianpi hong tung ding a, Pasian in hih mite gim a pia ding hi. 24 Mi pawlkhat, namsau tawh kithat ding a, pawlkhat, galmatin gamdangah kiciahpih ding hi. Tua ciangin Gentail mite' uk hun a bei matengin Jerusalem khuapi a siacipin om ding hi. 25 "Ni, kha, leh aksite tungah lim hong om ding hi. Tuipi ging leh tuihual liante kihtakna hangin leitung mi khempeuh lau-in lunggim ding uhhi. 26 Leitungah tu-in bang hong piangding, ci-in a ngaihsut kawmun mite lau-in sibup ding uhhi. Vantunga om nate a pai ngei bangin pai nawnloin lampial mangkhin ding uhhi.
Hih thupiang khempeuh thuakzawhna ding thahatna na neihna ding uh, leh Mihing Tapa mai-ah na din'theihna dingun a tawntungin thu ngenin vil niloh un," a ci hi.
Amaute in a kikhopna uh innte panin note hong hawlkhia ding uhhi. Note hong that mite pen Pasian' nasemin a kingaihsut ding uh hun hong tung ding hi.

‘Pasian in hih bangin gen hi: Nitawp ni ciangin, mi khempeuh tungah ka Kha ka sung ding a, na tanute uh leh na tapate un keima thu taangko ding uhhi; na tangvalte un maang mu ding uh a, na puteekte un mang man ding uhhi. 18 Tua ni ciangin ka nasem numeite leh ka nasem pasalte' tung nangawnah ka Kha ka sung ding a, amaute in keima thu gen ding uhhi. 19 Tua ciangin vantung leh leitungah hilhkholhna lim leh na lamdang ka bawl ding hi. Sisan kiluan'sakna, meikatna leh meikhu sahpi hong om ding hi. 20 Topa' ni, a lian thupi ni, hong tun'ma-in ni hong mialin, kha, sisan hong bang ding hi. 21 Ahi zongin Topa tungah huhna a ngen khempeuh in hotkhiatna ngah ding uhhi,’ ci-in a kigelh hi.

Pasian in mihingte' theihloh hun lai-a a gamtatnate uh phamawh a sakloh hangin, tu-in mun khempeuha om mi khempeuhte a gamtat siatna panun a kiheina dingun thu a hong pia khinzo hi. 31 Amah in leitung mi khempeuh thu a mantakin ama teel mipa a hong khensakna ding ni a sehkhol khinzo hi. Tua a ngaihsutna a man taktak hi, ci-in mi khempeuh tungah a hong lahna dingin a teel mipa, sihna panin a hingkiksak zo hi," ci-in thu a hilh hi.

Sanggamte aw, note in na theih dingun ka deih thusim khat om hi. Thei le uh cin, "A pil mahmah hi hang," na kici nawn kei pah ding uhhi. Tua thu in: Israel mite in a up noplohna pen a tawntung ding thu hilo hi. Pasian kiangah Gentail mite a pai dingzah in Pasian a zuat hun ciangdong ding bek a hihi. 26 Tua hi a, Lai Siangtho sungah a kigelh mah bangin Israel mite khempeuh in hotkhiatna ngah ding uhhi. Lai Siangtho in, "Zion panin Honpa hong pai ding a, Jacob' suanlekhakte sunga om gitlohna khempeuh maisak ding hi.

Tuhun pen bang hun hita ahi hiam, ci-in theita na hih manun tu-a bangin na gamtat ding uh a hihi. Tu-in note in khua phawkin na khan'lawh ding uh hun hita hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Zeisu Christ i up cil lai hun sangin tu-in Pasian in leitung haksatna panin eite hong hotkhiat ding hun hong naizaw hi. 12 Zan khuamial bei dektak a, sun khuavak hong tung dektak ta hi. Khuamial sunga gamtatnate khawlin khuavak sunga nazatte zam ta ni. 13 Sun khuavak sunga om mite bangin a kilawmin gamta ni. Gualnopna leh zukhamna, mawhna leh thangtatna, kitotna leh kihazatnate-in i hun beisak kei ni. 14 Kidalna dingin, Topa Zeisu Christ' hong piak galhiamte zang unla, na pumpi uh deihna bangin gamtatna ding hun omsak nawn kei un.

Tua ahih manin tuhuna mipilte, miteite, leh thusel a siamte, bangin kimang ahi hiam? Hih leitung pilna pen haina a suahsak khitna kilang khinzo hi. 21 Pasian in ama pilna hong zang a, mihingte in amau' pilna tawh pasian a theih zawhlohna dingun a bawl hi. Tua ahih manin mite in, "A haihuai thu," ci-in a ngaihsut uh i thuhilhna a umte, Pasian in hotkhiatna a piazaw hi. 22 A uptheihna dingun Jew mite in na lamdang kal uh a, Grik mite in pilna a thupisak uhhi. 23 Ahi zongin kote in singlamteh tungah a kikhai Christ' thu ka hilh uh a, tua thu pen Jew mite-a' dingin a hehhuai thu hi a, Gentail mite-a' dingin a haihuai thu a hihi. 24 Ahi zongin Pasian in a hong sap ei Jew mite leh Gentail mite-a' dingin Christ pen Pasian' vangliatna leh Pasian' pilna a hihi. 25 Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian' haina pen mite' pilna sangin sangzaw lai a, Pasian' thaneemna pen mite' hatna sangin hatzaw lai hi. 26 Sanggamte aw, Pasian in note hong sap laitakin na omzia uh ngaihsun un. Leitung mite' hong muhna panin note a tamzaw, mipil na hi kei uh a, mi vanglian zong na hi kei uh a, mi thupi zong na hi kei uhhi. 27 Ahi zongin Pasian in mipilte a maizumsakna dingin mihaite hong teel a, mi thahatte a maizumsakna dingin mi thaneemte a hong teel hi. 28 Leitung mite in thupi a sakte uh a suksiat theihna dingin Pasian in leitung mite' simmawh a niamte, bangmahin a ngaihsutloh uh mite a teel hi. 29 Tua ahih manin Pasian' mai-ah mite a kisaktheihna ding thu omlo hi.
Leitung beikuan hun sungah a om eite-a' dingin hih thupiangte i etteh ding thu hi a, eite hilhkholhna dingin lai sungah a kiciamteh a hihi.

Ahi zongin a thuman taktak ci lehang, a sisa mite zong hingkik takpi ding hi cih a kitel theihna dingin sihna panin Christ kihingkik sak khinzo hi. 21 Banghang hiam cihleh mi khat hangin sihna a ommah bangin mi khat hang mahin misite zong hin'kikna om hi. 22 Banghang hiam cihleh Adam tawh a kizop manin mi khempeuh si a, tua mah bangin Christ tawh a kizom khempeuh zong kihingsak kik ding hi. 23 Ahi zongin tua hin'kikna pen ama hun tawh kizui-in a banbanin hi ding hi. A masa penin Christ hi a, Christ hong paikik ciangin ama pawlte khempeuh hingkik ding hi. 24 Tua ciangin Christ in ukna, vangliatna, aana a nei ama galte khempeuh a zawhgawp khit ciangin Pa Pasian tungah ukna aana ap ding a, tua ciangin hih leitung hun beina hong tung ding hi. 25 Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in a galte khempeuh zo-in a khenuai-ah a koihkhit hundong mateng Christ in uk ding hi. 26 A tawpna-ah suksiat ding a gal nunung pen in sihna a hihi.

Peengkul nunung hong gin' ciangin mitphiat kikal sungin i kikheelpak ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh peengkul hong gin' ciangin misite a sithei nawnlo dingin hong tho ding a, i vekpi-in i kikheel ding hi.

Amaute pen sawltak taktak hiloin, sawltak a kineihkhemte hi uh a, a nasepna uhah zong zuau-in, Christ' sawltak taktak a battheihna dingun a meel kiseel ahi uhhi. 14 Tua pen lamdang sak ding hilo hi. Satan nangawn Pasian' vantung mi tawh a kibangin kibawltawm thei hi. 15 Tua ahih manin Satan' sawltakte pen thuman nasem bangin a kibawl manin lamdang sak ding hilo hi. Hun bei ni ciangin amau gamtatna bangun thuak ngawn ding uhhi.
Vantungah ukna, aana, vangliatna a neite khempeuh tungah Christ in ukna aana nei lai a, hih leitung bekah hiloin a hong tungding leitungah zong amah a lianpen a hihi.
Mi khempeuh tungah na dik un. Topa hong pai baih ta ding hi.

Sanggamte aw, lametna a neilo mite bangin na dahluat lohna dingun a sisa mite' omzia ding thu na theih ding uh ka deih hi. 14 Zeisu si-in thokik hi, ci-in i up mah bangin Pasian in Zeisu hong paipih kik ciangin amah umin a si mite zong hong tonpih ding hi, ci-in i um hi. 15 Topa' thugen note kiangah ka hong gen uh thu in: Topa hong paikik ni ciangin a nungta lai eite pen a sisa mite tawh a kimuh ma-in Topa tawh i kimu kei ding hi. 16 Pasian' thupiakna awging lianpi, vantung mi mangpa' thugenna, leh Pasian' peengkul hong ging ding a, vantung panin Topa mahmah hong paisuk ding hi. 17 Tua ciangin tua hun laitakin a nungta lai eite pen vankim lai-ah Topa a dawn dingin amah a um a sisa mite tawh hong kilakhawm ding a, Topa tawh i omkhawm tawntung ding hi, cihna a hihi. 18 Tua ahih ciangin note khatlekhat hih thu tawh na kihehnem un.

Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa hong pai ding Ni pen zan-a gutate bangin theihkholh lohin hong tung ding hi, ci-in note in teltakin na theihsa uh a hihi. 3 Mite in, "Thu khempeuh a hoih laitak hi a, bangmah patauhna ding omlo hi," a cih laitakin thakhatthu-in amaute tungah siatna hong tungvat ding hi. Nausuah natna bangin gimna thuak ding uh a, kuamah suaktalo ding uhhi.

Ahi zongin kuama khemsa-in ta kei un. Banghang hiam cihleh nakpi takin Pasian langpan'na lianpi leh hell khuksung a tungding ahi A Gilopa hong kilat matengin tua Ni hong tunglo ding hi. 4 Tua A Gilopa in mite' biak pasian a kici khempeuh leh na khempeuh nialgawp ding hi. Tuate khempeuh sangin a lianzaw-in a kingaihsut banah, Pasian ka hi hi, ci-in Pasian' biakinn sung mahmahah pai-in va tu ding hi.
Kuamah kim in a phawkloh gitloh gamtatna kigamta khinta a, ahi zongin hih thu a pian'ding a khamcippa a kilakkhiat khit matengin a hong piang ding thu hong piang nailo ding hi.

Nidang ciangin a upna panun mi pawlkhat pialin, zuauthu gente leh dawi thu a kigente a zuihna ding uh Khasiangtho in teltakin a gen hi. 2 Tua bang zuau thuhilhnate pen zuau genin mi a khem, sik emsa tawh tatgawp bangin a lungsim un a hoih leh a hoihlo a khenthei nawnlote' kam panin hong gingkhia ding hi.

Nitawp ni hun pen a lauhuai hun ahih ding lamtak phawk in. 2 Tuahun ciangin mite in amau angsung ding bek ngaihsunin, huaihamin, kisialin, kihisakin, mi zahko-in, nu leh pate' thu mangloin, lungdam theihna mel neiloin, biakna lungsim neiloin, 3 mi khualloin, hehpihna neiloin, mi gensia-in, ngongtatin, kihtakhuai-in, thuhoih deihloin, 4 ciampelin, thu khualloin, kiphasak gawpin, Pasian donloin pumpi nopsakna bek deihin, 5 biakna thu a puathamteng zui napi-in biakna hangin vangliatna thu a omte deihlo ding uhhi. Tua bangin a gamta mite na pelh in. 6 Tua bang mite pawlkhat, mite inn-ah va hawh khiankhianin, deihna nam tuamtuam leh mawhna lungsim tawh a kidim numeite na thuzawh uhhi. 7 Tua bang numeite in thu a zakzak uh hangin a man leh a manlo khen theilo uh ahih manin thuman thutak thei zolo uhhi.

Mite in thuman a ngaih noploh hun, amaute' deihna bek a zuihnop hun, amaute' zaknop thute bek a gen ding sia a cial thuahthuah hun hong tung ding hi. 4 Amaute in thuman thutak ngainuam nawnloin tangthu phuahtawm peuh ngaihsutpi-in nei ding uhhi.
Eite-a' dingin hih leitungah a kip khuapi omlo ahih manin a hong piang lai ding khuapi a zong ihi hi.
Na khempeuh a beina ding hun hong naita hi. Nomau pumpi ki-uktawm thei-in pilvang unla, hoihtakin thu a ngen thei-in om ta un.

Mi pawlkhatte' ngaihsut bangin Topa in a kamciamna a hong tungsak hak hi zenzen lo hi. Note khat beek in siatna na thuakkhak ding uh deihloin na vekpi-un na kisik ding uh deih ahih manin hong pai nailohna pen note hong khualna hizaw hi. 10 Ahi zongin theihkholh lohpi-in guta bangin Topa hong paiding Ni hong tung ding hi. Tua Ni ciangin nakpi takin a ging in vantungte maimang sakin, vantung nate mei in kangtumin maimang ding a, leitung leh a tunga om na khempeuh a mangthang ding hi. 11 Hih nate khempeuh hih bangin kisusia mangkhin ding ahih manin note a bangci mi dingin kilawm cih limtakin na ngaihsun un. A siangtho nuntakna nei-in Pasian' deihna bangin na gamta unla, 12 vantungte mei in kangtumin, vantung nate sa lua-in a tuimang ding hun Pasian' Ni hong tun'baih theihna dingin na hihtheih zahun hanciam unla, na ngak un.13Eite in Pasian' hong ciamsa, thuman bekbek a kizatna ding mun van thak leh lei thak a ngak ihi hi.

Leitung nate leh leitung deihnate a beibei ding hita a, ahi zongin Pasian' deihna bangin a gamta mite pen kip tawntung ding hi. 18 Tate aw, tu-in huntawpna hong naita hi. Christ' Gal hong paiding hi, ci-in na zaksa uh mah bangin tu-in Christ' gal tampi tak hong tung khinta hi. Tua ahih ciangin beina ding nai taktakta hi, ci-in i thei hi. 19 Christ' gal ahi hih mite pen ei' pawl hi ngei napi-in hong taisan uhhi. Ei' pawl taktak hi leh eite tawh omkhawm paisuak ding uh ahih manin, tu-in amaute paikhia uh ahih ciangin ei' pawl taktak ahihlohna uh hong kilang hi.

Amaute in note kiangah, "Hun nunung lam ciangin Pasian' deihna tawh a kituaklo amau pumpi deihna zui-in note a hong simmawhbawl mi pawlkhat hong piang ding hi," hong ci uhhi. 19 Hih mite in pawl kikhenna piangsakin, amau pumpi deihna bangin gamta uh a, Khasiangtho zong neilo uhhi.
Hih laibu a sim mite mi hampha hi a, hih thu kigente ngai-in, hih laibu sungah a kigelh thu a zuite zong mi hampha mah ahi uhhi. Bang hang hiam cih leh hih thu kigente a tun'ding hun hong naita hi.

"Sardis khua pawlpi vantung mi kiangah lai gelh in la, Pasian Khasiangtho sagih leh aksi sagih a neipa' thugen in: Note' gamtatnate ka thei a, note a si hinapi-in a hing min na pua uhhi. 2 Tua ahih manin khua phawk unla, na neihlai sunte uh a beimang ma-in thasanpha kik un. Banghang hiam cihleh na nasepnate uh Pasian' muhna-ah a cingtaak nai hetlo ahihna thu ka thei hi. 3 Tua ahih manin note a hong kihilh na zaksa uh thute phawkkik unla, tua thute zui-in na mawhna panun kisik kik un. Khua na phawk kei uh leh note kiangah guta bangin ka hong pai ding a, ka hong tun'lam nangawn na thei kei ding uhhi. 4 Ahi zongin Sardis khuasunga om note lakah a puan a ninsak nailo tawmkhat na om uhhi. Tua bang mite kilawm uh ahih manin kei tawh puanpak silhin ka tonkhawm ding uhhi.

Amaute nakpi takin kiko uh a, "A thuman, a siangtho, a Vanglian Topa aw, leitungah a omlai, kote a hong that mite tungah cik ciangin thu khenin, kote hong thahna hangin cik ciangin phu la ding na hi hiam?" a ci uhhi. 11 Tua ciangin amaute tungah puantualpi a kang khat ciat kipia a, amaute a kithah mah bangin a kithat lai ding a naseppihte uh leh a sanggamte uh a kim matengin tawlkhat sung a tawlngak laina ding uh kigen hi. 12 Ciamtehna gukna a hon' ciangin ka khuadak leh nakpi takin zin hong ling a, ni pen puanvom bangin hong vomin, kha pen sisan bangin a hong san hi. 13 Aksite ahih leh huihpi in theipuam a mutkhiat bangin van panin kia zaizai uhhi. 14 Laidal a kizial bangin vanpi kizialin maimang a, mual leh tuikulhte khempeuh a omna uh panin maimangta hi.

Tua khit ciangin leitung kiu li-ah vantung mi li, kiu khatah khat ciat dingin leitung, tuipi tung, leh singkung khat peuhpeuh a mutkhak lohna dingin leitung huih lite lencipin a om uh ka mu hi. 2 Tua ciangin a nungta Pasian' ciamtehna a tawi vantung mi khat, nisuahna lam panin hong paito ka mu hi. Leitung leh tuipi suksiat theihna ding vangliatna a kipia vantung mi lite kiangah amah in nakpi takin gen a, 3 "I Pasian' nasemte, a taltang uhah ciamtehna i bawl khit matengin leitung, tuipi, leh singkungte susia nai kei in," a ci hi.

"Ka thei kei hi, topa aw. Nangmah in na theizaw ding hi," ka ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in keima kiangah, "Hih mite pen bawlsiatna lianpi thuakin a hong suakta mite ahi uhhi. Amaute in a puan uh sawpsiangin Tuuno sisan tawh a paksak uh a hihi.

Ahi zongin biakinn pualam tualte teh kei in. Minam dangte' khutsungah kipia khin a, amaute in kha sawmlilenih sung Khuapi Siangtho tuancilgawp ding uh ahih manin tua a tualte tehloin nusia lel in. 3 Ka teci nihte puanhampi silhin ka paisak ding a, amaute in ni tul khat za nih sawmguk sung Pasian' thu a gen ding uhhi," hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin tua tanglai gulpi, Dawimangpa ahih kei leh Satan a kici, leitung mi khempeuh a khempa pen a vantung mite tawh leitungah kilawnsuk hi.

Tua laitakin tuipi sung panin ganhing khat a hong pusuak ka mu hi. Tua ganhing in ki sawm leh lutang sagih nei a, a ki sawmte tungah lukhu khat ciat om a, a lutang sagihte tungah min hoihlo khat ciat a kigelh hi.

Tua ganhing nihna in ganhing masa lim dingin a kibawl milim sungah a hu a muap ciangin hong pauthei a, tua milim a bialo khempeuh a thahtheihna dingin thu a ngah hi. 16 Tua ganhing in a lian a neu, a hau a zawng, sila leh sila a hilo, mi khempeuh in a taklam khut tung uh ahih kei leh a taltang uhah ciamtehna a neihna dingun thu a pia hi. 17 Tua ahih manin tua ganhing min ahih kei leh a min tangin a nambat ciamtehna a tungah a neilo mi peuhmah, vanlei vanzuakin paikhia theilo uhhi.

Tua ciangin ka khuadak leh meiipi a bang a kang biakbuak om a, tua meiipi tungah mihing tawh a kibang khat tu-in, kham lukhu khu-in, a khutah phiaukawi hiam khat a tawi ka mu hi. 15 Biakinn sung panin vantung mi khat hong paikhia a, meiipi tungah a tu mipa nakpi takin samin, "Leitung mite lak dingin min mahmah a, a lak hun hong tungta ahih manin na phiaukawi tawh at in," a ci hi. 16 Tua ahih manin meii tungah a tupa in leitungah a phiaukawi hong van a, leitung mite a at hi. 17 Tua ciangin vantung biakinn panin vantung mi adang khat hong paikhia leuleu a, amah in zong phiaukawi hiam khat mah a tawi hi. 18 Tua ciangin biakna tau panin vantung mi adang khat hong paikhia leuleu hi. Tua vantung mi pen mei a ukpa hi a, phiaukawi hiam a tawipa kiangah nakpi takin, "Leitung mite leenggah bangin minta ahih manin leitung mite na phiaukawi tawh atin a lom lomin kaikhawm in," a ci hi. 19 Tua ahih manin vantung mi in zong leitungah a phiaukawi hong van a, leitung mite kaikhawmin Pasian' hehna lian leenggah cilna phualah a kaikhawm hi. 20 Khuapi pualamah kicil a, a cilna panin sisan vive luangkhia-in, pi nga bang thukin, tai zanih ciang bangah tuikhang bangin a luang hi.
A thumna vantung mi in gunte leh tuinakte tungah a hai hong bung a, a tui khempeuh sisan a hong suak hi.
Tua ciangin gulpi kamsung, ganhing kamsung, leh a manlo kamsangpa' kamsung panin uiphuk tawh a kibang kha gilo thum a hong pusuak ka mu hi.
Gial golpipi, khat ciangin tawi sawmthum val a gik, van panin mite tungah hong kia hi. Tua gimna nasialua ahih manin tua gialte hangin mite in Pasian a samsia uhhi.
Tua khit ciangin vantungah mihonpi a kikona awging tawh a kibang khat ka za a, "Pasian phat un! Hotkhiatna, minthan'na leh vangliatna pen eite' Pasian-a' a hihi.

Tua ciangin vantung a kihong ka mu a, sakol kang khat a om hi. A tungah a tuangpa pen a Citak a Thumanpa kici hi. Amah in thumanin thu khenin gal a do hi. 12 A mittangte meikuang tawh kibang a, lukhu tampi a khu hi. Amah simloh kuamah dang in a theihloh min khat ama tungah a kigelh hi. 13 Sisan sungah a kidiah puantualpi khat silh a, amah pen, "Pasian' Thu," cihna min tawh a kisam hi. 14 Vantung galkapte a siangtho puanpak hoih tawh kizem uh a, sakol kangte tungah tuangin amah a zui uhhi. 15 Minam dangte a zawhgawpna ding namsau hiam khat a kam sung panin a pusuak hi. Amah in sik ciangkhut tawh minam dangte ukin, a Vanglian Pasian' heh mahmahna tawh leenggah cilna-ah leengtui a sukkhia ding hi. 16 A puan tung leh a phei tungah, "Kumpite' Kumpi, topate' Topa," ci-in a min kigelh hi. 17 Tua ciangin ni sungah vantung mi khat a ding ka mu a, amah in vankim lai-ah a leeng vasa khempeuh nakpi takin samin, "Pasian' pawi lianpi-ah a kikhawm dingin hong pai un. 18 Hong pai unla, kumpite' sa, galkapmangte leh galkapte' sa, sakolte leh a tungah a tuangte' sa, a lian a neu, silate leh sila a hilo mi khempeuhte' sa hong ne un," a ci hi.

Tua ciangin vantung panin vantung mi khat hong paisukin, kuahawm thukpi hon'na tawhtang leh sikkhau khainiang golpi khat a tawi ka mu hi. 2 Amah in tanglai gulpi, Dawimangpa ahih kei leh Satan zong a kicipa manin kum tul khat sung a hencip hi. 3 Tua ciangin kuahawm thukpi sungah khiasuk a, kum tul khat a cin'mateng minam tuamtuamte a khemtheih nawnlohna dingin a tawh kalhin a ciamteh hi. Kum tul khat a cin'khit ciangin tawlkhat sung a kikhah ding a hihi.

Kum tul khat a cin' ciangin a thongkiatna panin Satan kikhah ding a, 8 Gog leh Magog a kici leitung gam khempeuhah a om minam khempeuh a khem dingin kuankhia ding hi. Satan in a galsimpih dingin tuipi gei-a sehnel zahin a tam mihonpi kaikhawm ding hi. 9 Leitung khempeuhah amaute pai uh a, Pasian' mi siangtho omna mun leh Pasian in a it khuapi umcih uhhi. Ahi zongin vantung panin meikuang hong paisukin amaute a kangtum hi. 10 Amaute a khem Satan pen ganhing leh kamsang zuaupa a omna mun, kat a kikhulna meiphualpi sungah kilawn a, a sun a zanin tua lai munah amaute in gimna a thuak tawntung ding uh a hihi. 11 Tua ciangin tokhom kang a lian khat leh a tungah a tupa ka mu hi. Ama omna panin lei leh van lengkhiamang a, a tun'na mel uh kitheilo hi. 12 A lian a neu misite tua tokhom mai-ah dingin laibute a kilem ka mu hi. Tua ciangin a nungta mite a kigelhna laibu a dang khat zong a kilem ka mu hi. Amaute' gamtatna tua laibute sungah a kigelhna tawh kizui-in misite tungah thu a kikhen hi. 13 Tuipi sungah a om misite, tuipi in hong pusuah a, Sihna leh Misite' Gam in zong amau sungah a om misite hong pusuah uhhi. Tua ciangin a vekpi-in amaute' gamtatnasa tawh kizui-in thu a kikhen hi. 14 Tua ciangin Sihna leh Misite' Gam, meiphualpi sungah a kilawn hi. Hih meiphualpi pen sihna nihna a hihi. 15 A nungta mite a kigelhna laibu sungah a min a omlo peuhmah meiphualpi sungah kilawn hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Kei ka hong pai baihta ding a, mi khempeuh a gamtatna uh tawh kizui-in a thaman ding uh ka hong puak ding hi.

Jacob in Faro kiangah, "Tawlkhat sung ka nuntak hun pen kum za leh kum sawmthum a hihi. Ka nuntak hun tom sungah siatna bekbek om a, ka pate tawlkhat a omsung uh a nuntak hunte ban nailo hi," a ci hi.

Eite khempeuh i si ding a, a kikhawm kik theilo leilakah a bua tui tawh i kibang hi. Ahih hangin a hawlkhiatpa a kipuasehin a kikoih lohna dingin lampi a zong mipa' nuntakna Pasian in lakhia lo ding hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh ka pu ka pate khempeuh uh mah bangin kote pen nangma mai-ah khualmite leh pemtate ka hi uhhi. Ka hunte uh leitungah nilim bang hi a, sih ding ka pelh thei kei uhhi.

Tua laitakin Seba mite hong pai-in ganhingte hong sut a, namsau tawh gancingte thatkhin uhhi. Hih thu a hong zasak thei dingin kei bek kong suakta hi," a ci hi. 16 Amah in a thugen a khit ma-in kamtai dang khat hong tungin, "Vantung panin keek hong kia a, tuute leh tuucingte kha-in kangtum uhhi. Hih thu nang kiangah a hong ko thei dingin kei bek kong suakta hi," a ci hi. 17 Tuapa in a thugen a khit ma-in kamtai dang khat hong tung leuleu-in, "Khaldea mite hon thum in kalaohte hong sut a, namsau tawh kalaoh tung tuangte khempeuh that hi. Hih thu nang kiangah a hong ko thei dingin kei bek kong suakta hi," a ci hi. 18 Amah in a thugen a khit ma-in kamtai dang khat hong tung leuleu a, "Na tapate leh na tanute a u pen uh inn-ah an ne zu ne-in om uhhi. 19 Tua laitakin sehnel gam panin huihpi pingpei hong nungin a inn mutpai-in na tate denglum hi. Nang kiangah hih thu a hong ko thei dingin kei bek kong suakta hi," a ci hi.

Ka hunte siamgante' siam ciangtang sangin manlang zaw a, lametna omloin a mong tung pak hi. 7 "Pasian aw, ka nuntakna husan' bang bek ahihna hong phawk in. Ka mit in hun nuam mukik ngei nawnlo ding hi.
Eite pen zan mah mi ihi a, bangmah i thei kei hi. Leitunga i nuntakna pen niliim bang lel a hihi.
"Laitaite sangin ka hun nawhtai zaw a, beipak ahih manin nopna ngah khalo hi.
"Mihingte a nuntak hun tom mahmah a, lungkhamna tawh kidim hi. 2 Amaute paak bangin khangin keu pak uh a, niliim bangin pai hanhanin, mangthang uhhi.
Mi khat a mawhna hangin tai-in na sat ciangin, nget in a nektum bangin ama na manpha na beisak hi. Mihing khempeuh husan' khat bang bek hi takpi hi.
Amaute pen zana mangmat tawh kibang lel a, na khan'lawh ciangin amaute a bangci pian hiam, ci-in na phawk nawn kei hi.
Amah in, amaute pen mihing hi lel a, a hong paikik nawnlo huihnung bang ahihna uh a phawk hi.
{ Topa } aw, nuntak hun a tom mahmahlam hong phawk in. Mihingte a mawkna dingin bawl na hi hiam?

Banghang hiam cihleh ka hun khempeuh uh na hehna-in bei a, ka nuntak hun uh husan' khat bangin a bei hi. 10 Kote' nuntak sung kum sawmsagih bang hi a, cidam le-ung kum sawmgiat bang hithei hi. Ahih hangin tua hunsung nangawn gimna leh haksatna hi a, tua hunte bei pakin kote ka maimang uhhi. 11 Nang hong kizahtakna dingin na sinsona' vangliatna kua in thei a, na hehna' husiatna kua in thei ahi hiam? 12 Tua ahih ciangin pilna lungsim ka ngah theihna dingun ka nuntak hun uh a tomlam ka theihna dingun hong hilh in.
Minamte a thuhilhpa in mi thuhilhlo ding ahi hiam? Mihingte tungah theihtheihna a hilh { Topa } in mihingte' ngaihsutna thei a, amaute pen husan' bang bek ahihna teltakin a thei hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh ka nuntakna, meikhu bangin beimang a, ka pumpi meikuang bangin a sa hi.
Keima nuntakna pen nitak lama a om nilim tawh kibang lel a, lopa bangin ka vulgawp hi.
Eite ihih leh i nuntakna pen lopa tawh kibang a, lolai-ah a po pakte bangin a palh hi. 16 Banghang hiam cihleh huih in amah semin beimang a, tua mun in amah thei nawnlo hi.
Kei pen hih leitungah peemta ka hi hi; kei' kiang panin na thuphate seel kei in.
Mi pen husan' khat tawh kibang a, ama hunte pen a tai dandan nilim tawh kibang hi.
Ama hehna tomno sung bek hi a, ama hong deihsakna pen khang tawntung-a ding a hihi. Zan hun sungteng kahna omkha mah ding a, ahih hangin zing khuavak tawh nuamna hong tung hi.

"{ Topa } aw, ka mong leh ka hun a kisehzah hong theisak in la, ka nuntakna a beipak hun ding hong theisak in!" ka ci hi. 5 Ka nuntakna hun khutme tan bang bekin na bawl a, ka nuntakna hun nangma muhna-ah bangmah genthamlo hi. Mihing khempeuh, husan' bang bek hi takpi hi. 6 Niliim bangin mihing pai kawikawi takpi hi. A mawkna-in amau lungkham takpi uh a, kua' ngah ding cih theilopi-in mite in na a khol uhhi.
Zingciang hun-a ding kima-sialh kei in. Tuhun leh tua hun kikalah a piang ding thu bangmah na thei kei hi.
