Khang khat bei-in khang khat hong tung a, ahi zongin leitung kibangbang niloh hi.
Pasian in lungdamin omsak ahih manin a nuntak tomlam phawkin nei khalo ding hi.
Nilim bangin a pai hanhan, a mawknapi hih nuntak tom sungah mihing-a' ding a hoihpen kua in thei ding ahi hiam? Ama sih khit ciangin leitungah bang piang ding cih kua in gen thei ahi hiam?
A hing laite in a si ding ahihlam uh thei a, a sisate in bangmah thei nawnlo uhhi. A sisate in thaman bangmah nei nawnlo uh a, amaute kiphawkkha nawnlo hi.
Na mai-ah sep ding a om khempeuh, na tha neihzah tawh sem in. Banghang hiam cihleh na zuat ding sihna gamsungah nasepna leh thungaihsutna, pilna leh theihna cihte omlo hi.

Tuucingpa' puanbuk bangin ka omna inn kibotkhia-in kei kiang panin kilakhia hi. Siamgante in a hial bangin ka nuntakna kihial khin a, amah in siambu panin kei hong atkhia hi. Sun leh zan tawntung gimna hong kithuaksak a,

Awging khat in, "Kiko in!" hong ci hi. Tua ciangin keimah in, "Bang thu kiko ding ka hi hiam?" ka ci hi. "Mi khempeuh, lopa bang hi a, ama hoihnate khempeuh gamlakah a om pak tawh kibang lel hi. 7 { Topa}' hu in a mut ciangin lopa vulin, pak a pulh hi. Mihingte lopa bang lel hi taktak hi. 8 Lopa vul a, pak a pulh hi. Ahih hangin Pasian' thu kho tawntung ding hi," hong ci hi.
{ Topa } in, "Kei, keimah pen note hong hehnempa ka hihi. Lopa sangin sauvei a nungta zaw tuanlo, mihing lellelte, banghangin kihta na hi uhhiam?

Tomno sung nang kong nusia pak a, ahih hangin hehpihna lianpi tawh nang kong lakik ding hi. 8 Hehluatna hangin tomno sung nang kiang panin ka maitang ka seel a, ahih hangin tawntung itna tawh nang kong hehpih kik ding hi, nangmah a hong honkhia { Topa } in ci hi.
Hoihtakin na phawk ding uh thu panin: Van leh lei a bei mateng, hih thukhamte a neupen khat nangawn' deihna tangtung lopi-in mawkmailo ding hi.
Van leh lei a maimang zongin ka thugente maimang ngeilo ding hi.
Van leh lei mangthang ding a, ahi zongin ka thugente mangthang ngeilo ding hi.

Van leh lei a mangthang zongin ka thugente maimang ngeilo ding hi. 34 "Limtakin kidawm un. Thakhat thu-in tua Ni hong tung khading ahih manin zune anne leh leitung nuntakna lunghimawhin thamang kei un. 35 Theihkholh lohin thang kisai bangin leitung mi khempeuh tungah hih thu hong piangvat ding hi.
A taktakin ka hong genin-ah, note dahin na kap ding uh a, ahi zongin leitung mite lungdam ding uhhi. Note na dah ding uh a, ahi zongin na dahna uh lungdamna hong suak ding hi.
leitung na nuamtakin a zangte pen a zanglo mah bangin kingaihsun ta uh hen. Banghang hiam cihleh hih leitung pen sauveipi kip nawnlo ding hi.

Tua thu hangin ka lungkia tuankei uhhi. Kote' leitung pumpi in damdamin muatlam ding a manawh ahi zongin ka kha nuntakna uh a nini-in thaksuak semsem hi. 17 Tuhun laitakin tomno sung lungkhamna ka thuakte uh in ka thuakna uh sangin nakpi takin a lianzaw tawntung minthan'na sung hong tun'pih ding hi. 18 Banghang hiam cihleh a kimuthei nate a mitsuan' ka hi kei uh a, a kimu theilo nate a mitsuan' ka hi uhhi. A kimuthei nate tomno sung bek kimang a, a kimu theilo nate a tawntungin a kip a hihi.

Tua ahih ciangin hoihtakin kingaihsunin gamta unla, mihaite bang hiloin mipilte bangin gamta un. 16 Tuhun pen hun hoihlo hun ahih manin na hun neih khempeuh uh a hoih lamin zang un. 17 Tua ahih manin hai ommawk kei unla, Topa in bang a semdingin hong deih ahi hiam, ci-in kan un.

Tua banah, "Topa ahi nangmah in a kipat cilin leitung na piangsak a, na khut tawh vantungte na bawl hi. 11 Tua nate khempeuh mangthang ding a, nang na hih leh na om paisuak ding hi. Tua nate puan bangin luisuak thei ding a, 12 puan khep bangin na khep ding a, tua nate khempeuh kikheelkheel ding uhhi. Ahi zongin nang na kibang tawntung ding a, teek hun cih na nei ngei kei ding hi," na ci lai hi.
Mi khempeuh khatvei si-in, tua khit ciangin Pasian' thukhenna a thuakding ahih mah bangin,

Tuahun lai-in thu a gen ciangin leitung kiling a, ahi zongin tu-in amah in thu hong ciam a, "Leitung bek lingsak loin vantung tawh zong khatvei ka lingsak lai ding hi," hong ci hi. 27 "Khat vei lingsak kik lai ding," a cih ciangin a kipiangsak nate kilingsakin kipaikhia ding a, a kilingsaklo nate kip lai ding ahihna thu hong kilangsak hi.
Eite-a' dingin hih leitungah a kip khuapi omlo ahih manin a hong piang lai ding khuapi a zong ihi hi.

Mihaute zong a niam uh ciangin lungdam veve uh hen. Lopa pak bangin a mangthang veve ding ahi uhhi. 11 Ni hong suakin a sat ciangin lopate vul a, a pakte pulhin a hoihnateng a bei mah bangin a haute zong manlahin a om laitakun siatna a thuak ding uh a hihi.

Tuni ahih kei leh zingciangin tua khua tua khua-ah va pai-in, kum khat bang va omin, sumbawlin a meet tampi va ngah ni, a ci mite aw, ka thugen hong ngai dih un. 14 Zingciangin na nuntakna uh bangci ding cih nangawn na thei kei uhhi. Meiilum tawlkhat sung kaii-in a mangthang pak tawh a kibang lel na hi uhhi.
Tua ahih manin Laisiangtho sungah, "Mihingte, lopa tawh kibang a, a minthan'nate uh lopa pak tawh kibang hi. Lopate vulin pakte pulh a,
Ka itte aw, hih leitungah gamdang mi, a peempak bangin kingaihsun unla, na kha nuntakna uh tawh a kilehngat pumpi' deihnate na kikham un.

Tawlkhat na thuak khit uh ciangin, Christ tawh na kipawlna hangun tawntung minthan'na a ngah dingin note a hong sam, hehpihna kicingin a nei Pasian in note a cingtaakin hong bawl ding a, kipna, thahatna, bulkip kician hong pia ding hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Pasian in ama lim bangin mihing piangsakin, Pasian' lim bangin amah a piangsak hi. Amah in pasal leh numei a piangsak hi. 28 Pasian in amaute thupha pia a, Pasian in amaute tungah, "Ci pha-in tampi pha unla, leitung dimin zo un. Tuipi ngasate tung, leitungah a gamtang, a nungtate khempeuh tungah ukna nei ta un," a ci hi.

Na suanlekhakte leilak leivui zah pha ding a, nitumna lam leh nisuahna lam, leilu lam leh leitaw lamah na kizelthang ding uhhi. Nang leh na suanlekhakte thupha kong piak bangin leitung minam khempeuh in thupha a ngahna dingun hong ngen ding uhhi.
Esau khuadak to-in nupite leh naupangte a muh ciangin amah in, "Nang tawh a om hihte kua ahi hiam?" a ci hi. Jacob in, "Pasian in hehpihna tawh na nasempa a piak tate ahi hi," a ci hi.
"{ Topa } na Pasian un note hong piak leitang tungah na khan' uh a sau theihna dingin na nu leh na pa uh zahtak un.

Ka thukhamte zui unla, tuate sem un; note a hong siangthosak { Topa } pen keimah ka hihi. 9 "Banghang hiam cihleh a nu ahih kei leh a pa a samsia mi peuhmah kithat ding hi. Amah in a nu ahih kei leh a pa samsia khin a, ama sihna amahmah ngawh ding a hihi.
"‘{ Topa } note' Pasian in hong piak leitang tungah na khan' uh sau-in na nopsak theihna dingun { Topa } note' Pasian in hong thupiak bangin na nu na pa uh zahtak un.
Na tate uh tungah limtakin na hilh ding uh a, na innsung uhah na tut uh ciang, lampi-ah na pai uh ciang, na lup ciang uh leh na thawh ciangun tua thute na gengen ding uhhi.
Midangte khempeuh sangin note thupha hong kilim piakzaw ding hi. Note' lak hita leh na ganhingte uh lak hita lehah a nu ahi a, a pa ahi zongin a ciing omlo ding hi.

"Mi khat in a lungkhauh, a langpang thei, a nu' thu ahi a, a pa' thu ahi zongin a manglo, a tai hangun amau' thu a ngailo tapa khat a neih leh, 19 a nu leh a pa in tua mipa manin ama khuapi upate kiang, a ten'na mun kongpi-ah paipihin, 20 amaute in a khuapi upate kiangah, ‘Hih ka tapa uh lungkhauhin hong langpang thei a, amah in ka thu uh hong manglo a, an hai, zu hai bek ahi hi,’ ci ding uhhi.
{ Topa } note' Pasian in note leh na innkuanpihte uh tungah hong piak na a hoih khempeuhte hangin note leh Levi mite leh note lakah a om peemtate na lungdam khawm ding uhhi.
"‘A nu ahi a, a pa ahi zongin a zahtaklo mipa in gimna ngah ta hen,’ ci ding uhhi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in, ‘Amen,’ ci ding uhhi.

{ Topa' } na na sepnop kei uh leh, Gun galkhata a na na sepsak uh na pu na pate uh pasian ahi a, note' ten'na gam Amor mite' pasian ahi zongin, a na na sepsak ding peuhpeuh uh tuni-in teel un. Ahih hangin kei leh ka innkuanpihte in ahih leh { Topa' } na ka sem ding uhhi," a ci hi.

Ahih hangin Ruth in, "Nang kong nusiatna ding ahi a, nang zuihna panin ka ciahkikna ding ahi zongin hong cici nawn kei in; banghang hiam cihleh na paina-ah ka pai ding a, na giahna-ah ka giak ding hi. Na mite keima mite hi ding a, na Pasian keima Pasian hi ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin { Topa' } tungah amah ka kawm hi. A nuntak laiteng { Topa' } tungah amah a kikawm ahi hi," a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute in tua lai-ah{ Topa } a bia uhhi.
Tua laitakin { Topa' } mai-ah Judah mi khempeuh a taneute, a zite, leh a naupangte uh tawh a ding uhhi.

Amah in a thugen a khit ma-in kamtai dang khat hong tung leuleu a, "Na tapate leh na tanute a u pen uh inn-ah an ne zu ne-in om uhhi. 19 Tua laitakin sehnel gam panin huihpi pingpei hong nungin a inn mutpai-in na tate denglum hi. Nang kiangah hih thu a hong ko thei dingin kei bek kong suakta hi," a ci hi.20 Hih thu a zak ciangin Job dahlua-in a puan balkek a, a sam met khia-in leilakah bok sukin Pasian a bia hi.
Pa neilote leh netniamna a thuakte tungah nang na thutang a, leitung mite in launa tuakkha nawnlo ding uhhi.
Amah in { Topa } a zahtakte a lian a neu-in thupha hong pia ding hi. 14 { Topa } in note leh na tate uh hong pungsak ta hen.

En un, tate pen { Topa' } tung pana letsong hi a, tapate pen ama hong piak thupha a hihi. 4 Mi khat in a khangno lai-in a neih tate pen galhangpa' khutsunga a om a thaltangte tawh kibang hi. 5 A thallawng dimin tua bang thaltang a neipa mi lungdam a hihi. Amah guallel ngeilo ding a, zahhuai ngeilo ding hi.
Nangma inn sungah na zi, a gah pha mahmah leenggui tawh kibang ding a, na sabuai kiimah a tu na tate, oliv no dawng hilhhelh tawh kibang ding uhhi.
Ka ta aw, na pa' hong thuhilhna hoihtakin zui in la, na nu' hong thugente ngai in. 9 Tua thuhilhnate in na gamtat hong hoihsak ding a, kizepna lukhu leh kizepna khi bangin hong etlawmsak ding hi.
Ka ta aw, { Topa' } thuhilhna limtakin ngai-in, hong tainate thudon in. 12 Banghang hiam cihleh pa in a pahtak a tapa a thuhilh bangin { Topa } in a it mite a thuhilh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin na zi tawh lungkim in la, na ten'pih numei tawh lungdam in. 19 A ithuai a ngaihbaangin ngaihsun tawntung in la, ama ngaihbaan'na tawh lungdamin, ama hong itna tawh lungkim in.
Ka ta aw, na pa' hong gen bangin gamta in la, na nu' hong thuhilhnate mangngilh kei in.
A innkuan sung a ukkhial mite hawmsuak ding a, a haite pen mipilte' sila suak tawntung ding hi.
A ta a tai nuamlote a ta mudah hi a, a ta a itte in limtakin thuhilhin a tai hi.
Numei pilte in innsung nuntakna khangsak a, numei haite in innsung susia hi.
A manloin sum ngahna in innsung lungkhamsak a, sumgolh a deihlote a nuntak sauvei nuam hi.
Tute pen puteekte-a' dingin minthan'na lukhu hi a, tate pen pate' minthan'na a hihi.
Lawm citak in a tawntungin hong it a, i sanggamte pen i lungkhamna a hong thuakpih dingin a piang a hihi.
Sanggamte na huhna in khuapi muan'huai bangin hong hu a, sanggam tawh kitotna in kidonlohna piangsak hi.
Lawm pawlkhatte sauvei kimanglo a, lawm pawlkhatte sanggam sangin kipzaw hi.
Mi khempeuh in a sanggam zawngpa uh mudah ciat ahih manin a lawmte in a taisatna a thu lamdang hilo hi.
Thu hong man'theih lai-in na ta thuhilh in; na hilh kei leh a siatna ding a deih na hi hi.
Naupang khat a neulai-in lampi man tawnsak lecin a teek dongin lampial nawnlo ding hi.
Naupangte a hai gamtat a ngeina hi a, deihtakin pangbetna in mihoih suaksak thei hi.
Naupangte sat ding lunghiang kei un; satna hangin silo ding hi. 14 Ciangduai tawh sat le uh cin nuntaklawh zaw ding uhhi.
Nangma pian'na na pa' thu ngai in la, na nu a teek ciangin simmawh bawl kei in.
Ta hoih a nei pa a lung dam ding a, ta pil a nei pa a ta' tungah lungkim ding hi.
A nu a pa' neihsa laksakin, "Khialhna hi kei," a cipa pen guta mah hi veve hi.
A pa a simmawh mipa, a nu' thu a mang nuamlo mipa, va-ak in a mittang khelkhiat sakin musanete in a sa ne ding uhhi.

Phalvak tungin zingtho a, annek ding teng limtakin bawlin a nasem numeite' sep dingteng a vaihawmsak hi. 16 Amah in leitang hoih penpen zong a, a thalawhsa sum tawh a leenggui lo ding a lei hi. 17 A nik singten'in a puanban zial a, thalawp takin na a sem hi.
A tate in amah it mahmah uh a, a pasal in zong pakta mahmah a, 29 "Zi hoih tampi a om tei hangin nang kan-a hoih kuamah om kei," ci-in a phat hi.

Ahih hangin { Topa } in, "Ama sung panin a suak a tapa a hehpihlo ding zahin nupi khat in ama nawi a teep naungek mangngilh thei ding ahi hiam? Hihte nangawn in mangngilhkha thei ding a, ahi zongin keimah in kong mangngilh kei ding hi.
"{ Topa } in na tapate khempeuh hoihtakin hilh ding a, na tapate daupai mahmah ding uhhi.

Ahi zongin ke'n note kiangah kong genin-ah: A sanggampa tungah a heh mi in thukhenna thuakkha thei ding hi. A sanggampa kiangah, ‘Bangmah-a kimang lo,’ ci-in a ko bawl mi in uliante mai-ah thusitna thuak thei ding a, a sanggampa kiangah, ‘Mi hai,’ ci-in a simmawh mi in hell meikuang sungah khulna thuak thei ding hi. 23 Tua ahih manin Pasian tungah biakna a pia dingin biakna tau mai-ah na om laitakin na sanggamte khat peuhpeuh na tungah a lungkimlohna thu na phawk leh, 24 Pasian na biakna ding nate, a biakna tau mai-ah nusia photin, pai-in na sanggampa tawh va kilem phot in la, tua khit ciangin hong paikikin Pasian biakna pia in.

Na vengte' thu upin nei kei in la, na lawmte zong muan'in nei kei in. Na ang-a lum na zi kiang nangawnah thu na gending kidawm in. 6 Tuhun ciangin tapate in a pate haibawl a, tanute in a nute langpan' uh a, mote in a teeknu uh langneih uhhi. Mi khat-a' dingin ama innkuanpihte mah a gal a suak mawk hi.

Abraham' suan David, David' suan Zeisu Christian' khang ciamtehna hih bang a hihi. 2 Abraham ta Isaac, Isaac ta Jacob, Jacob ta Judah, leh a sanggamte ahi uhhi. 3 Judah ta Perez leh Zerah hi a, Tamar tawh a neih a ta ahi uhhi. Perez ta Hezron, Hezron ta Ram, 4 Ram ta Amminadab, Amminadab ta Nahshon, Nahshon ta Salmon, 5 Salmon ta Boaz, Rahab tawh a neih a ta a hihi. Boaz ta Obed, Ruth tawh a neih a ta a hihi. Obed ta Jessi, 6 Jessi ta kumpi David a hihi. David ta Solomon, Uriah' zi Bathsheba tawh a neih pen a hihi. 7 Solomon ta Rehoboam, Rehoboam ta Abijah, Abijah ta Asa, 8 Asa ta Jehoshafat, Jehoshafat ta Joram, Joram ta Uzziah, 9 Uzziah ta Jotham, Jotham ta Ahaz, Ahaz ta Hezekiah, 10 Hezekiah ta Manasseh, Manasseh ta Amon, Amon ta Josiah, 11 Josiah ta Jekhoniah leh a sanggamte hi a, Babylon gamah Israel mite salin a kipaipih hun pawlin a suak ahi uhhi. 12 Jekhoniah ta Shealtiel, Shealtiel ta Zerubbabel, 13 Zerubbabel ta Abiud, Abiud ta Eliakim, Eliakim ta Azor, 14 Azor ta Zadok, Zadok ta Akhim, Akhim ta Eliud, 15 Eliud ta Eleazer, Eleazer ta Matthan, Matthan ta Jacob, 16 Jacob ta Joseph hi a, Joseph pen Christian a kici Zeisu' nu Mary' pasal a hihi. 17 Hih bang ahih manin Abraham panin David ciangdong khang sawmleli pha a, David panin Babylon gamah salin a kipaikhiatpih dong khang sawmleli mah pha a, Babylon gamah salin a kipaikhiatpih-a kipanin Christian a suah hun ciangdong khang sawmleli mah a pha hi.
Pasian in, ‘Na nu leh na pa na zahtak in,’ ci a, tua banah, ‘A nu ahi a, a pa ahi zongin a gensiate in thahna thuak ding hi,’ ci lai hi.
"Na sanggamte uh na tung uhah hong khialh leh pai-in note gel bek theihin a khialhna va gen un. Na thu uh a hong man' leh na sanggampa uh a ngahkik na hi uhhi.
Note kiangah kong genin-ah: Mi khatpeuh in midang tawh a zi a mawhna lobuang, a zi a mak a, numei dang tawh a ten' leh numei tunga mawh ahi hi," ci-in a dawng hi.
Innkuan khat peuhpeuh phelnih kisuahin kido le uh tua innkuan kipzolo ding hi.

Ahi zongin pian'cil lai-in, ‘Pasian in numei leh pasal a bawl hi. 7 Tua ahih manin pasal in a nu leh a pa nusia-in a zi tawh kigawm ding a,8 amau nihte pen pumkhat bang ahi ding uhhi,’ na kici hi. Tua ahih manin amaute nih hi nawnloin khat hita uhhi. 9 Tua ahih manin Pasian' gawmsa mite, kuamah in khen kei ta hen," a ci hi. 10 Innsungah a tumkhit uh ciangin nungzuite in hih thu tawh kisai Zeisu kiangah a dongkik uhhi. 11 Amah in, "A zi ma-a numei dang tawh a teng mi peuhmah a zi a palhngulh a hihi.

A nih tuakun Pasian' muhna-ah a manin gamta uh a, Topa' thukhamte leh a ngeina khempeuh a zui uhhi. 7 Ahi zongin Elizabeth ciing ahih manin amau nupa in ta neilo uh a, a nih tuakun zong a teekta uh a hihi.
Note mihoihlo hinapi-in na tate uh tungah a hoih piakding theithei na hih uh leh, vantunga om na Pa un a ngente tungah Khasiangtho piazaw kan ding hilo ahi hiam?" a ci hi.
Na nu na pate, na sanggamte, na behte, leh na lawmte mahmah un note hong khia ding a, note pawlkhat in thahna na thuak ding uhhi.
Amah biakna a hahkat mahmah mi khat hi a, a innkuan bupun Pasian bia uhhi. Amah in Jew mizawngte huhna dingin nakpi takin na sem a, Pasian kiangah thu a ngen tawntung mi khat a hihi.

Amaute in, "Topa Zeisu um in. Tua hi leh nang leh na innkuanpihte in hotkhiatna na ngah ding uhhi," ci-in a dawng uhhi. 32 Tua ciangin amaute in amah leh a innsunga om mi khempeuh tungah Topa' thu a hilh uhhi.
Kikhopna inn ukpa Krispas leh a innsunga om mi khempeuh in Topa thu um uh a, Corin khua-a om midang tampite in zong thuhilhna ngai-in um uh a, tui a kiphum uhhi.

Note tungah Pasian in a hong piak a Khasiangtho in note na launa dingun sila-in a hong bawl hilo a, Khasiangtho in Pasian' tate a hong suaksak ahi zaw hi. Tua Khasiangtho mah in Pasian pen, "Pa aw, Pa aw," hong ci theisak hi. 16 Eite, Pasian' tate ihihna thu eima lungsim bek in a gen hiloin Pasian' Khasiangtho in zong hong genpih hi. 17 Eite pen ama ta ihih manin mite-a' dingin a koih thuphate i ngah banah Christian-a' dingin a koihte zong i ngahkhawm lai ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Christian in a thuak mah bangin i thuak nak leh amah a minthan' mah bangin ei zong i minthang ding hi.
Tuhun ciangdong Pasian' bawlsa khempeuh nupi nausuak ding bangin na sa-in a tauna uh i thei hi.
Amaute pen Pasian' teel Israel mite hi a, Pasian in ama ta-in bawlin a minthan'na a hopte, amaute tungah thuciamna bawlin Thukham a piakte, a man taktakin biaktheihna nei-in thuciamna a ngahte,
Tua mah bangin eite mi tampi ihih hangin pumkhat ihi a, pumpi nate bangin khatlekhat a kizom ciat ihi hi.

A neisate tungah, kei' ngaihsutna hilo, Topa' ngaihsutna ka gennop thu in: Zi in a pasal ciahsan kei ta hen. 11 A ciahsan leh zong pasal neiloin om paisuak hen. A om paisuakzawh kei leh a pasal ngei mah zuankik hen. Pasal in a zi ma kei ta hen. 12 Adangte tungah, Topa' cih hilo, keima ngaihsutna ka gennop thu in: Mi khatpeuh in thu umlo mi khat zi-in a neih leh, pasal mahin neihding a zi a lungkim ahih nak leh ma kei ta hen. 13 Numei khat in thu umlo mi khat pasalin a neih leh, zi mahin neihding a pasal a lungkim ahih nak leh ma tuan kei ta hen. 14 Banghang hiam cihleh thu umlo pasal pen a zi' hangin thu um mi suakthei ding a, thu umlo zi pen a pasal' hangin thu um mi suakthei ding hi. Tua bang hi leh a tate uh thu um mi suakthei ding uhhi. Ahi zongin tua bang hi kei le uh a tate uh thu um mi suaktheilo ding uhhi. 15 Ahi zongin thu umlo zi in ahi a, thu umlo pasal in ahi zongin kikhen ding a ut leh kikhen ta uh hen. Tua bang thute-ah thu um zi ahi a, thu um pasal ahi zongin a awkna ding thu omlo hi. Pasian in nuamtakin a nungta dingin a hong sap a hihi. 16 Thu um zi in, "Ka pasal honkhiazo kei ning," bangci-in cithei ding a, thu um pasal in, "Ka zi honkhiazo kei ning," bangci-in cithei zenzen ding ahi hiam?

Tu-in kong hawhna ding pen a thumveina ding hita a, note' gimna dingin bangmah ka hong ngen het kei ding hi. Keima deih pen note' sumlepaite hiloin note mahmah na hi uhhi. A taktakin ci lehang, tate in nulepate a huhding hilo a, nulepate in tate a huhding hizaw hi.

Ahi zongin a hun a cin ciangin eite khempeuh Pasian' tate i suahtheihna dingin Thukham nuai-ah a om mite a hong tankhia dingin Pasian in a Tapa hong paisak a, tua Tapa pen leitung ngeina bangin numei sung panin hong suakin, Jew Thukham sungah hong nungta hi. 5 6 Note pen ama tate na hihna uh a hong lahna dingin Pasian in ama Tapa' Khasiangtho, eite sungah hong tumsak a, tua Khasiangtho in Pasian pen, "Pa aw, pa aw," hong cisak hi. 7 Tua ahih manin note pen sila hi nawnloin Pasian' tate na hih manun Pasian in ama tate-a' dingin a koih khempeuh, note tungah hong pia ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin no Gentail mite pen a pualam mi, gamdang mite na hi nawn kei uh a, Pasian mite tawh minam khat hita-in, Pasian innkuan sung mite na hita uhhi.

Christian na zahtakna uh hangin na thu uh na kimang tuak un. 22 Zite aw, Topa' thu na man' uh mah bangin na pasalte uh thu na mang un. 23 Banghang hiam cihleh Christian pen ama pumpi ahi pawlpi a honkhiapa hi-in, pawlpi tungah ukna thu a neih mah bangin pasal in a zi tungah ukna thu a nei a hihi. 24 Pawlpi pen Christian' khutnuai ahih mah bangin zite zong thu khempeuhah a pasalte uh khutnuai hi ding uhhi. 25 Pasalte aw, Christian in pawlpi itin a pumpi a piak mah bangin na zite uh na it un.
Tua mah bangin pasalte in zong amau pumpi zah mah bangin a zite uh a it ding uh a hihi. A zi a it mi pen amah a ki-it mi a hihi.

Pasalte in amau pumpi zahin a zite uh itin, zite in zong amau pumpi zah mahin a pasalte uh a it ding uh ahih mah bangin, Laisiangtho in hih bangin a gen ciangin a thukzaw khat, Christian leh pawlpi a ki-itna a gennopna ahi hi, ci-in ka ngaihsun hi.

Tate aw, na nu na pate uh thu na man'ding uh Christian ngeina hi a, ahi ding mah a hihi. 2 Thupiakna a lian khat in, "Na nu leh na pa zahtak in," cihna hi a, khapna thu tawh kizom pahin, "Zahtak lecin nang-a' dingin thu hong hoihin, leitungah na khan' a sau ding hi," na ci pah hi. 3-4 Pate aw, na tate uh a hehtheihna dingin bawl kei unla, Christiante ngeina tawh kituakin taii-in hilhin pantah un.

Zite aw, Christiante gamtat dingin a kilawm ahih mah bangin na pasalte uh thu na mang un. 19 Pasalte aw, na zite uh it unla, amaute tungah ngongtat kei un. 20 Tate aw, na nu na pate uh thu man' tawntung ding pen na Christian nasep uh a hihi. Tua bang thuman'na in Pasian lungdamsak hi. 21 Pate aw, na tate un a thuak zawhloh zah dong dingin thuhilhin taii niloh kei un.

Numeite in pasalte tungah aana nei-in thu a hilh ding ka phalkei hi. Gamdai takin a om 13 Banghang hiam cihleh a masa-in Adam kipiangsak a, tua ciangin Eve kipiangsak pan hi. 14 Adam in khemna thuak masalo a, numei in thuakin a khial masa a suak hi. 15 Ahi zongin numei in a kilawm a kituakin upna, itna leh siangthona thu-ah kiptakin a om nak leh nausuah gimna sihpihlo ding hi.

Tua ahih manin siate pen paubaan'na a neilo mi, zi khat bek a nei mi, lungsim hoih hithiat mi, thu a ngaihsun thei mi, a kilawm a kituakin a gamta mi, zin leh leengla do a siam mi, thuhilh a siam mi, 3 zu a khamlo mi, a ngongtatlo mi, lungsimnem mi, kitot a uklo mi, sum a deihlualo mite hi ding uhhi. 4 A innkuan sung hoihtakin a ukzo mi, a tate thumangsak thei-in, na khempeuhah a kilawm a kituakin a gamtasak thei mi hi ding uhhi. 5 Banghang hiam cihleh mi khatpeuh in a innkuan sung ukzia ding a theih kei leh Pasian' pawlpi kem theilo ding hi.

Meigong numei khatpeuh in tate ahi a, tute ahi zongin a neih leh innkuan sungah biakna tawh kisai-in tavuan a neihna uhhilh in la, a nu a pa, a pu a pite a huhna dingun gen in. Hih bang gamtatna pen Pasian' muhna-ah a hoih thu a hihi.
Mi khatpeuh in a beh a phung, a diakdiakin a innkuansung mite a vak nop kei leh a upna a nusia hita a, thu umlo mite sangin siazaw lai hi.

amaute sangin a nauzaw nupite in a pasalte uh leh a tate uh a itna dingun a hilh ding, 5 thu ngaihsun thei, a gamtat siangtho, inn nasep a kizen, a migi, leh a pasalte uh thu a mang thei mi ahihna dingun na gen in.
Tua mah bangin zite aw, na pasalte uh Pasian thu umlo ahihkhak leh na gamtatna hangun Pasian thu a uptheihna dingun na pasalte uh thu na mang un. Kampau kul sese loin,

Pate aw, note tungah lai ka hong gelhna pen a kipat cila kipanin a na ompa na theihna hang uh a hihi. Tangvalte aw, note tungah lai ka hong gelhna pen note na lungsim uh thahatin, Pasian' thu zui-in, Dawimangpa zokhin na hihna hang uh a hihi.

Jacob in Rachel ngai hi. Amah in, "Na tanu a nauzaw Rachel thalawhna dingin nangma na kum sagih kong sem ding hi," a ci hi. 19 Laban in, "Midang tungah amah ka piak ding sangin nang' tungah amah kong piak ding hoihzaw hi; kei kiangah om in," a ci hi. 20 Tua ahih ciangin Jacob in Rachel a ngahna dingin kum sagih sung na sem a, amah a itna hangin tua hunte ni tawmno khat tawh kibang a sa hi.

Tua ciangin Abner in Hebron-a David kiangah kamtaite sawlin, "Hih gam kua in uk ding ahi hiam? Kei tawh thuciamna hong bawl in. Israel-te khempeuh nang kiangah a paipih dingin keimah kong pang ding hi," a ci hi. 13 Amah in, "Pha hi; nang tawh thuciamna khat ka bawl ding hi. Ahih hangin nang' tung panin na khat ka kisam hi. Tua pen, kei tawh a kimu dingin nong pai ciangin Saul' tanu Mikhal nong paipih masak kei leh ka mai na mu kei ding hi," a ci hi. 14 Tua ciangin David in Saul' tapa Ishbosheth kiangah kamtaite sawlin, "Filistia-te' vundawn za khatin ka leisa ka zi Mikhal hong pia in," a ci hi. 15 Tua ciangin Ishbosheth in mi sawlin ama pasal, Laish tapa Paltiel kiang panin amah a la hi. 16 Ahih hangin a pasal in amah zui-in, Bahurim paina lam tawntung ama nungah a kap hi. Tua ciangin Abner in ama kiangah, "Pai in; ciahkik in," a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah ciahkik hi.
Ka thahatna ahi { Topa } aw, nangmah ka hong it hi.
Na nasempa tungah na mai hong taangsak in la, na itna kip tawh kei hong hon in!

Ahih hangin keimah in na vangliatna la ka sa ding a, zingsangin na itna kip phatna la nakpi takin ka sa ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh nang, ka munkip muan'huai na hi a, ka gentheih hunin keima belh na hi hi.
Nuntakna sangin nangma itna kip hoihzaw ahih manin nangmah ka hong phat ding hi.
Pa in tate a hehpih bangin { Topa } in amah a zahtakte hong hehpih hi. 14 Banghang hiam cihleh amah in eite' pian'na hong thei a, eite pen leivui ihihna a phawk hi.
{ Topa } ka it hi; banghang hiam cihleh amah in ka aw hong za-in ka thumnate hong ngai hi.
A ithuai a ngaihbaangin ngaihsun tawntung in la, ama ngaihbaan'na tawh lungdamin, ama hong itna tawh lungkim in.
Kei hong itte ka it a, kei hong zong peuhmahte in hong mu uhhi.
Muhdahna in kitotna piangsak a, itna in mawhna khempeuh maisak hi.
Kitawngtawng kawmin sameh limpen nekna sangin ki-it diamdiamin anteh meh nek hoihzaw hi.
Kitawng kawmkawmin pawipi sungah an nekna sangin lungnuam takin mohkeu themkhat nekna hoihzaw hi.
Mi' khialhna a maisakte midangte in itin lawm hau uh a, mi' khialhna ciamtehna pen lawm taanna a hihi.
Lawm citak in a tawntungin hong it a, i sanggamte pen i lungkhamna a hong thuakpih dingin a piang a hihi.
Tua bang hilo a, ka ngaihno pen numei khempeuh lak panin ling laka a om unok pak tawh kibang hi.
nitak huih vot mateng nitak nitum mateng a cing hi. Sanang bangin mualtunga sakhitalno bangin itluat aw, hong paikik in.

Itluat aw na ngaihbaang a, na mel kong muh nuam zungzung hi. 7 Tuum kung bangin na etlawm a, na nawite pen, nisuh gah a bawk pha mahmah tawh a kibang hi. 8 Tuum kung tungah kahto-in a gah ka lo ding hi. Na nawite kei-a' dingin leenggah bawk tawh kibang a, na gimnam epel min bangin namtui hi. 9 Na kam, leenggahzu bangin khum zungzung hi. Ka ngaihno tungah leenggahzu khum luang hen la, a muk a ha tawk kim hen. 10 Ka ngaihno-a' ka hi a, amah in kei hong deih hi. 11 Ngaihno aw, gamlakah paikhia-in leenggui lo-ah va giak ni. 12 Zingsangin tho baihin leengguite a sel nai hiam, leengguite a pak nai hiam, mang kawlsing kungte a pak nai hiam, i en ding hi. Tua lai munah kong itna letsong ka hong pia ding hi.

Kei simloh kuamah ngai kei in la, kei simloh kuamah kawi kei in. Itna zong sihna zahin thahat a, ngaihna zong sihna zahin khauh hi. Itna, mei bangin kuangkhia a, meikuang lianpen a suak hi. 7 Tui tampi nangawn tawh kisumit zolo a, tui sungah i phumcip hangin mitzo tuanlo hi. Mi khat in a neihsa sum khempeuh tawh itna a lei dingin hong kithawi leh kinuihsan lel ding hi.

{ Topa } ka Pasian' kiangah thu ngenin ka mite' mawhna ka pulak hi. Keimah in, "Topa Pasian aw, nang na lian a, ka hong zahtak uhhi.Nang na thuman a, na thuciamna leh na thupiakna a mangte leh a hong itte a tawntungin na it hi.

Mun khempeuhah a om no mihingte aw, { Topa } in a hoih nate hong gen khinzo hi. { Topa } in note tung panin hong kalh thu in: Thuman thutang sem ding a, itna kip nei tawntungin, kiniamkhiatna tawh Pasian' thu man' ding a hihi.

{ Topa } na Pasian un note hong ompih a, ama vangliatna in hong gualzosak hi. Note tungah { Topa } lungkim ding a, ama hong itna tawh hong thakbawl ding hi. Note' hangin { Topa } lungdamin la sa ding a,

"Note in, ‘Na vengte uh na it unla, na galte uh na mudah un,’ ci-in a kigenna thu na zaksa uh a hihi. 44 Ahi zongin ke'n note kiangah kong genin-ah: Na galte uh na it unla, no hong bawlsiate-a' dingin thu na ngetsak un. 45 Tua hi leh vantungah a om na Pa uh tate na hi thei ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh amah in mihoihte leh misiate tungah a kibangin ni taangsak khawm a, a gamtat phate leh a gamtat siate tungah zong a kibang mahin guah zusak khawm hi. 46 Tua ahih manin no hong itte bek na it uh leh Pasian in bang thaman hong pia zenzen ding ahi hiam? Siahdongte nangawn in amau a itte it thei uhhi. 47 Na lawmte bek uh hopihin thupha na piak uh leh mi mawkmawkte sangin na hoihzawkna uh bang om ahi hiam? Gentail mite nangawn in tua bang ciang lel hih thei uhhi.
"Kei sangin a nu a pa a itzawte kei tawh kilawmlo a, kei sangin a tapa a tanu a itzawte kei tawh kilawmlo hi.
na nu na pa zahtak in; nang na ki-it bangin na vengte na it in, cihnate ahi hi," a ci hi.

"Sia aw, thukham khempeuh sung panin bang thukham lianpen ahi hiam?" ci-in a dong hi. 37 Zeisu in, "Na Topa Pasian na lungsim khempeuh, na nuntakna khempeuh, leh na pilna khempeuh tawh na it ding hi, cihna a hihi. 38 Hih pen a masapen, a lianpen thukham a hihi. 39 A nihna pen a masa mah tawh kibang a, nangma pumpi na it bangin na vengte na it in, cihna a hihi. 40 Hih thukham nihte tung panin thukham dang khempeuh leh kamsangte' thuhilhna khempeuh a hong mengkhia ahi hi," ci-in a dawng hi.
Gitlohna khang mahmah ding ahih manin ki-itna hong kiam ding hi.

Zeisu in, "Thukham a lianpen in: Israel mite aw, ngai un: I Topa Pasian bek mah Topa a hihi. 30 Na Topa Pasian uh, na lungsim khempeuh, na nuntakna khempeuh, na pilna khempeuh, leh na thahatna khempeuh uh tawh na it un, a cihna a hihi. 31 A nihna in: Nangma pumpi na it bangin na vengte na it in, cihna a hihi. Hihte gel sangin thukham a lianzaw a dang om nawnlo hi," ci-in a dawng hi.
Note tungah a hong kibawl ding na deih uh bangin midangte tungah na bawl un.

Tua bang lelin note na gamta kei ding uhhi. Na galte uh itin amaute tungah thupha bawl unla, lohkik ding lamen loin leitawi pia un. Tua hi leh na thaman uh lian ding a, a Lianpen Pasian' tate na hi ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh lungdamna mel a thei theilo mite leh a huaiham mite tungah amah migi hi.

Amah in, "Na Topa Pasian na lungsim khempeuh, na nuntakna khempeuh, na hatna khempeuh, leh na pilna khempeuh tawh na it in la, nangmah na ki-it bangin na vengte na it in," ci-in kigelh hi, ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua Thu mihing hong suakin kote lakah hong om a, itna nei-in citak mahmah ahih manin Pasian' pianzia a neihna ka mu cian uhhi. Hih pianzia pen Pasian' Tapa khat bek hihna tawh a neih pianzia a hihi.
Pasian in leitung mite hong it mahmah ahih manin ama Tapa a um mi khempeuh si nawnloin a hin' tawntung theihna dingun a Tapa neihsun a hong piak dongin a hong itna a hong lak hi.

Note tungah ka hong piak thak thu in: Note khatlekhat na ki-it ding uh a hihi. Note ka hong it mah bangin note khatlekhat na ki-it un. 35 Note khatlekhat ki-it le uh cin keima nungzuite na hihna uh mi khempeuh in hong thei ding uhhi," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Kei na hong it uh leh ka thupiakte zong na zui ding uhhi.

Keima thupiakte sangin a zuite in keimah hong it ahi uhhi. Kei hong it mite pen ka Pa in zong it ding a, keimah in zong itin amaute tungah ka kilang ding hi," a ci hi. 22 Tua ciangin Judas Iskariot a hilo Judas dang khat in, "Topa aw, leitung mite tungah kilang loin kote tungah bangci-in hong kilangtuam thei ding na hi hiam?" ci-in a dot ciangin 23 Zeisu in, "Kei hong itte in ka thu zui ding uhhi. Ka Pa in zong it ding a, ka nihun tua mite kiangah pai-in amaute tawh ka omkhawm ding uhhi. 24 Kei hong itlote in ka thugente zuilo ding uhhi. Tu-a na zak uh thute pen keima thu hilo a, kei hong sawl Pa Pasian kiang panin a hong pai thu a hihi.

Ka Pa in kei hong it zahin note hong it ka hih manin keima hong itna sungah om un. 10 Ka Pa' hong thupiakte zui-in ama itna sungah ka om mah bangin note in zong ka thupiaknate na hong zuih uh leh ka itna sungah a om na hi ding uhhi. 11 Note hangin kei ka lungdam theihna ding leh note' lungdamna a cingtaak a suahtheihna dingin hih thute a hong gen ka hihi. 12 "Note tungah ka hong piak thu in: Note ka hong it zahin note khatlekhat na ki-it un. 13 Lawmte' tangding sih ngamna sangin lawmte itna a lianzaw om nawnlo hi.
Kei na hong itna zah itna mah amaute sungah omin, amaute tawh kei ka omkhawm theihna dingin amaute tungah nangma min ka gen khin a, mai lamah zong ka gen lailai ding hi," ci-in thu a ngen hi.

An a nekkhit uh ciangin Zeisu in Simon Peter kiangah, "Johan' tapa Simon aw, hih adang khempeuhte' hong it sangin kei na hong nak itzaw hiam?" ci-in a dot ciangin amah in, "Topa aw, ka hong itzaw hi. Nang ka hong itna na thei hi," ci-in a dawng hi. 16 Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Ka tuunote na kem in," a ci hi. Tua ciangin Zeisu in a nihveina dong leuleu a, "Johan' tapa Simon aw, kei na hong it hiam?" ci-in a dot ciangin, "Topa aw, nang ka hong it a, ka hong itna thu na thei hi," a cih ciangin, "Ka tuute na kem in," a ci leuleu hi. 17 Zeisu in a thumveina dong leuleu a, "Johan' tapa Simon aw, kei na hong it hiam?" a cih ciangin, "Kei na hong it hiam?" ci-in thumvei tak a dotna hangin Peter zong a dah suak hi. Tua ahih manin, "Topa aw, nangmah in na khempeuh na thei a, nangmah ka hong itna thu zong na thei hi," ci-in a dawn' ciangin Zeisu in, "Ka tuute na kem in.
Pasian in eite tungah a hong piak a Khasiangtho tawh eite sungah ama itna hong guang ahih manin hih lametna in eite hong lungkiasak ngeilo hi.
Ahi zongin eite mawhna nei ihih laitakin eite-a' dingin Christ hong si ahih manin Pasian in eite hong it mahmahna thu hong lak khin hi.
Ama deihna bang a sem dingin Pasian in a hong sap, amah a it eite-a' dingin na khempeuh a hoihlamin piangsak hi, ci-in i thei hi.

Eite a hong itpa' hangin hih thu khempeuhah a gualzo pente ihi hi. 38 Bangmah in ama hong itna tawh hong kikhensakzo hetlo ding hi, ci-in ka thei hi. Sihna, nuntakna, vantung mite, vantung vangliatnate, tuhun nate leh a hong tungding nate, 39 leitunga om nate, leinuai-a om nate, Pasian' bawlsa nate khat peuhpeuh in i Topa Christ Zeisu hangin Pasian in eite hong itna tawh hong khenzo hetlo ding hi.
Na ki-itnate uh lungsim takpi tawh hi sak unla, a siate mudahin a hoihte lenkip un. 10 Unau ki-itna lungsim nei unla, khatlekhat kizahtak bawl ding lamsang kidem un.
No a hong bawlsia mite, Pasian in thupha a piakna dingin thu ngetsak unla, tua bang mite samsia loin thupha piazaw un.

Khatlekhat ki-it ding cih lohbuang, kuama tungah leiba nei kei un. Midang a itte in Thukham deihna teng a zuikhin a hihi. 9 Thukham sungah, "Nulepa mawhna bawl kei in, mi that kei in, guta kei in, hazatna lungsim nei kei in," cihna leh adang khempeuhte pen, "Nang na ki-it bangin na vengte na it in," cihna thu in huam khinmang hi. 10 Midangte a it mi peuhmah in amaute tungah siatna bawl hetlo ahih manin itna i neih ciangin Thukham buppi a zui khinta ihi hi.

Tu-in milim biakna sa tawh kisai thu panin: Amaute in, "Ka thei uhhi," a cih mah bangin eite khempeuh in theihna i neih ciatna thu i thei hi. Tua bang theihna in mite kisatheisak a, ahi zongin itna in mite kipsak hi.

Ka neih khempeuh midangte tungah pia-in, Pasian' nasepna hangin kihaltumna ka thuak ahi zongin itna ka neih kei leh ka phattuamna bangmah omlo hi. 4 Itna neite a lungduai-in migi hi. Itna neite in hazatna lungsim neiloin, zong kisathei lo hi. 5 Itna neite a kilawm loin gamtalo, heh pakpaklo, mite' mawhna ciamtehlo hi. 6 Thuman lote-ah lungdam ngeilo uh a, thumante bekah lungdam uhhi. 7 Itna neite lungkia cih om ngeilo hi; a upna, a lametna, lungduai takin a ngaknate uh a mawkna cih om ngeilo hi. 8 Itna pen a tawntungin a kip a hihi. Thuhilh siamna a om tei hangin tawlkhat sung bek kimangin, pau lamdang pautheih siamnate a om hangin bei ding a, thutheih siamna a om hangin maimang ding hi.
Tu laitakin a omlai thu thumte pen upna, lametna, leh itna hi a, tua thumte sung panin itna mah a thu lianpen a hihi.
Na sepna khempeuh uhah ki-itna tawh na gamta un.
Mi khempeuh-a' dingin mi khat si khin ahih manin mi khempeuh zong a ngeina lui uhah si khinta hi, ci-in ka theihna hangun tua Christ' itna in kote' nuntakna hong uk hi.

Tua ahih manin tuhuna ka nuntakna zia pen kei hang hi nawnloin ka sungah a hong om Christ hang a hihi. Tua hi a, keimah hong itin, keima-a' dingin a nuntakna a hong pia Pasian' Tapa ka muan'na tawh tu laitakin a nungta ka hihi.

Sanggamte aw, note ahih leh a suakta mi ahi dingin Pasian in a hong sap a hihi. Ahi zongin tua suahtakna pen na pumpi uh ut bangbangin gamtat theihna dingin paulam zon'na-in nei kei unla, itna tawh khatlekhat kikhualna-in zangzaw un. 14 Banghang hiam cihleh Thukham khempeuh thu khatin kigawm thei a, "Nangmah na ki-it bangin na vengte na it in," cihna tawh kilomlak thei hi.

Ahi zongin Khasiangtho' sawlna bangin gamtatnate pen: Itna, lungdamna, lungnopna, lungduaina, migitna, hoihna, cihtakna, 23 dikna, leh pumpi ki-ukzawhna hi a, hih bangin a gamta mite, Thukham in bangmah cih theilo hi.
Kiniamkhiatin, thunemin, lungduai-in om tawntung un. Khatlekhat kihuhna tawh na ki-itna uh kilangsak un.
khatlekhat kihehpihin, lungsim neem tawh na kihozaw unla, Christ' hangin Pasian in note' mawhna hong maisak mah bangin khatlekhat na mawhna uh na kimaisak ta un.

Note pen Pasian in a hong it a tate na hih manun amah tawh na kibatna dingun hanciam un. 2 Christ in eite a hong it manin Pasian in eite' mawhna hong maisak theihna dingin a namtui biakna-in Pasian kiangah a kipiak mah bangin note zong itna tawh na gamta un.
Pasalte aw, Christ in pawlpi itin a pumpi a piak mah bangin na zite uh na it un.

Pasalte in amau pumpi zahin a zite uh itin, zite in zong amau pumpi zah mahin a pasalte uh a it ding uh ahih mah bangin, Laisiangtho in hih bangin a gen ciangin a thukzaw khat, Christ leh pawlpi a ki-itna a gennopna ahi hi, ci-in ka ngaihsun hi.
Tatsat loin i Topa Zeisu Christ a it tawntung mi khempeuh tungah hehpihna thupha hong tung ta hen.
Note-a' ding deihsakna tawh thu ka hong ngetsak thu in: Note' lungsimah itna khang semsemin, a sia leh a pha a mantakin khenthei-in a hoihpen na teeltheihna ding uh a hihi.
Tua ahih manin kei tawh ngaihsutna kibangin note khatlekhat ki-itin, khatlekhat lungsim kituakin na omna uh tawh keima lungdamna na hong cingtaaksakna dingun ka hong kun hi.

Pasian in note hong itin, hong teelin, ama mi siangthote hikhin na hih manun note pen hehpihna nei-in, migi-in, kiniamkhiatin, dikin, na lungduai ding uh a hihi. 13 Note lakah khatlekhat a kilungkimlo na om uh ciangin khatlekhat na mawhna uh kimaisakin na kihuh ciat un. Topa in note' mawhna hong maisak bangin note zong khatlekhat na mawhna uh na kimaisak ding uhhi. 14 Hihte khempeuh banah, mi khempeuh kilem takin a hong om khawmsak thei ahi ki-itna na bulphuh un.
Ahi zongin thu uppih mite it ding tawh kisai-in bangmah gelh ding na kisam nawn kei uhhi. Khatlekhat na ki-itna ding uh Pasian in note tungah hong hilh khinzo hi.
Hih bangin thupiakna pen, upna taktak leh kisuan'na om hetloin lungsim siangtho taktak tawh ngaihsutna panin a hong piangkhia ki-itna a khan'theihna ding deihna a hihi.
Pasian in genzawh lohin kei hong hehpih a, Christ Zeisu tawh kipawlna hangin i ngahtheih upna leh itna a hong guan' hi.
Sanggam aw, nangma hangin Pasian' mite in lungnopna ngah uh ahih manin tua bang itna na neihna hangin ka lungdamin ka tha a nuam mahmah hi.

Pasian, a manloin gamta ngeilo ahih manin na Christianpihte uh a beisa hunah na huhna uh leh tudongin na huh laina uh tawh ama-a' dingin na nasepna uh leh amah na itna uh na lahnate uh hong mangngilh hetlo ding hi.
Khatlekhat ki-itin a hoih nate i sepna dingin kihanthawn ciat ni.
Christ sungah unau bangin na ki-itna uh na zomsuak un.
Sanggamte aw, hoihtakin na ngai un. Pasian a it mite tungah piakdingin a ciam vantung gam a ngahding leh upna thu-ah mihau a suak dingin Pasian in leitung mizawngte a teel hinapi-in,
Laisiangtho sungah, "Nangmah na ki-it bangin na vengte na it in," ci-in a genna Topa' Thukham zui le uh cin a hoih hi pah hi.
Amah mu ngeilo napi-in na it uh a, amah mu ngeilo napi-in a thu umin kama genzawhloh zah dongin nakpi takin na lungdam uhhi.
Tu-in lungdamna thuman na zuihna hangun note kisian'suah khinin, na thu uppih mite uh lungsim tak tawh itthei khinta na hih manun na lungsim khempeuh uh tawh limtakin na ki-it un.
A tawpna-ah kong gennop thu in: Lungsim leh ngaihsutna kikhat nei-in unau ki-itna lungsim nei unla, migi-in kiniamkhiat un.
Itna in mawhna tampi khuhcip thei ahih manin lungsim takpi tawh khatlekhat ki-it ding thupi ngaihsut pha pen un.

Hih thu hangin na upna ban uhah gamtat hoihna na behlap unla, na gamtat hoihna uh thutheihna tawh na behlap un; 6 na thutheihna uh pumpi ki-ukzawhna tawh na behlap unla, na pumpi ki-ukzawhna uh thuakzawhna tawh na behlap un; na thuakzawhna uh Pasian' deih bangin gamtatna tawh na behlap unla, 7 Pasian' deih bangin na gamtatna uh sanggam ki-itna tawh na behlap un; na sanggam ki-itna uh itna thukpi tawh na behlapzawhna dingun na hanciam un.
Ahi zongin ama thu a zui mite pen Pasian a itna a kicingtaak taktak mi a hihi. Hihbangin i gamtat leh Pasian tawh a kipawl taktak ihihna i thei hi.

a Pasian in eite bangzah takin hong itna thu thei un. Ama hong itna lian mahmah ahih manin eite pen Pasian' tate hong kici a, hong kicih mah bang ihi takpi hi. Leitung mite in tuhun ciangdong Pasian theilo uh ahih manin eite zong a hong theilo uh a hihi.
A kipat cila kipanin na zak tawntung uh thu pen khatlekhat i ki-itna ding thu a hihi.

Itna i cih bangci theihding ihi hiam cihleh: Christ in eite-a' dingin a nuntakna hong pia hi. Ei zong i Christian mipihte-a' dingin i nuntakna i piak ngam ding a hihi. 17 Mi khat hau mahmah hen la, a Christian mipih a cimawhte mu napi-in huhna bangmah pianuam hetkei leh, banghangin amah in Pasian ka it hi, ci thei ding ahi hiam? 18 Ka it tate aw, i kampi bek tawh ki-it loin, lungsim takpi tawh ki-itin i gamtatna tawh kilangsak ni.
Ama hong thupiakna in: A Tapa Zeisu Christ umin zui-in, Christ' hong sawl bangin eite khatlekhat i ki-it ding a hihi.

Ka it lawmte aw, Pasian pen itna hong pian'khiatna bulpi ahih manin eite khatlekhat ki-it ni. Itna a nei mi peuhmah, Pasian' tate hi a, Pasian a thei uhhi. 8 Pasian pen ki-itna ahih manin itna a neilo mite in Pasian theilo uhhi.

Hih ka gen itna pen eite in Pasian i itna thu hilo a, Pasian in eite hong itin, i mawhna a maitheihna dingin a Tapa a hong paisakna thu a hihi. 11 Ka it lawmte aw, Pasian in tua zahta-in eite hong it ahih leh eite zong khatlekhat i ki-it ding a kilawm a hihi. 12 Kuamah in Pasian mu ngeilo hi. Ahi zongin eite khatlekhat i ki-it leh eite tawh Pasian hong omkhawm a, ama itna eite lakah a cingtaakin a om a hihi.

Tua hi a, Pasian in eite a hong itna thu, eite mahmah in thei-in i um hi. Pasian pen ki-itna hi a, itna a nei mite pen Pasian tawh omkhawm uh a, Pasian zong amaute tawh a omkhawm hi. 17 Thukhen Ni ciangin kisuan'na nei hetloin i omtheihna dingin eite in a cingtaak itna a nei ihi hi. Christ mah bangin hih leitung i nuntakna-ah nungta-in gamta ihih manin tua bang kisuan'na a neilo ding ihi hi. 18 Itna nei lehang launa omlo a, itna cingtaak nei peuh lehang launa beimangta hi. Banghang hiam cihleh launa i cih pen gimthuak ding kihtakna hi a, gimthuak ding a laute pen itna cingtaak a neilote a hihi. 19 Pasian in eite hong it masa ahih manin eite in itna i nei thei hi. 20 Mi khatpeuh in, "Pasian ka it hi," ci napi-in a Christian mipihte a muhdah leh a zuaupi a gen a hihi. Banghang hiam cihleh a muhtheih a Christian mipih a itlo mi in a muhtheihloh Pasian it theilo ding hi. 21 Christ in eite tungah hong thupiakna in: Pasian a it mi in a Christian mipihte zong it ding hi, cihna a hihi.
Itna thu ka hong gen ciangin Pasian' thupiakte zuiding cihna a hihi. A kipat cila kipan na zaksa uh ahi hih thupiakna pen na khan' tawntungun zui-in itna na nei ta un.
Ahi zongin note ka hong mawhsakna khat om a, tua in: A masa lai-a kei na hong it bangun tu-in na hong it nawn kei uhhi.

Ahih hangin a kum sagihna ciangin, nomau' mi a zawngte in a nek theihna dingin leitang tawlnga sakin, lokhulin na omsak ding uh a, gamlak ganhingte in mizawngte' nekloh teng ne thei ding uhhi. Na leenggui lote uh leh na oliv lote uh zong tua bangmahin na hih ding uhhi.

Note in a kum sawmngana siangtho sakin, gamsunga a teng mi khempeuh tungah suahtakna thu na zasak ding uhhi. Note in nomau' neihsa ciat ngahkikin, sila-in a kizuak mite nomau' innkuanpihte ciat kiangah na ciahkik uh ciangin note-a' dingin jubilee hi ding hi. 11 Tua a kum sawmngana pen note-a' dingin jubilee hi ding hi. Tua kum sungin note in lo pawiloin, a li pote zong laloin, a kihahlo leengguite panin zong leenggah na khawm kei ding uhhi. 12 Banghang hiam cihleh tua pen jubilee a hihi. Tua pen note-a' dingin siangtho ding a, note in lo panin a piang tawmte na ne ding uhhi. 13 "Hih jubilee kum sungin note khempeuh in nomau' neihsa ciat na ngahkik ding uhhi. 14 Note in na vengte' tungah na zuak uh ahi zongin na vengte' kiang panin na lei uh ahi zongin note khatlekhat na kikhem kei ding uhhi. 15 Jubilee khit ciangin a jubilee kik dong a kum phazah tawh kituakin note in na vengte uh kiang panin lei-in, a an piang ding kum zah tawh kituakin amau in note tungah hong zuak ding uhhi.

Ahih hangin amah in ama-a' dingin ngahkik zawhna ding lampi a neih kei leh, tua ama zuak leitang pen jubilee kum mateng a leipa' khutsungah om ding hi. Jubilee kum ciangin tua leitang kipiakhia ding a, amah in a neihsa ngahkik ding hi.

Tua pen kum khat bit sungin a kitatkik kei leh, khuapikulh sunga om tua inn pen a leipa in khang tawntungin a neih dingin kibawlsak ding a, jubilee kum ciangin zong kipiakhia kik tuan nawnlo ding hi. 31 Ahih hangin a kimkotah kulh a neilo khua neu-a innte pen gamsung lote tawh a kibangin kingaihsun ding hi. Tuate kitanhkik thei ding a, jubilee kum ciangin tuate kipiakhia ding hi. 32 Ahi zongin Levi mite' khuapite, amau' neihsa khuapite-a innte ahih leh, Levi mite in khatvei peuh ciangin tanh thei ding uhhi. 33 Levi mi khatpeuh in ama tatkik theih ding hinapi a tatkikzawh kei leh, amau' neihsa khuapi sunga tua inn pen jubilee kum ciangin kipiakik ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Levi mite' khuapi sunga innte pen Israel mite' lakah amau' neihsa a hihi.
Amah pen a kicial nasem leh peemta bangin nang kiangah om ding hi. Amah in jubilee kum mateng nangma na hong sem ding a,

Midang tungah amahmah a kizuak-a kipan jubilee kum dong amah a leipa tawh tuat ding a, ama suahtakna ding sum pen a kum phazah tawh kituak hi ding hi. A topa tawh a omkhawm hun sungteng pen a kicial nasem khat thaman zahin seh ding hi. 51 Kum tampi in a sap lai leh, amah in tuate tawh a kituakin ama thaman ding a kipiakna sung panin ama kitatkhiatna dingin pia kik ding hi. 52 Ahih hangin jubilee kum ding kum tawmkhat bek in a sap leh amah in a topa tawh tuatna khat nei ding hi. Ama sepsak ding kum a omlai tawh kituakin ama kitatkhiatna dingin sum piakik ding hi. 53 Amah pen a topa tungah a kum kumin a kicial nasempa tawh kibang ding hi. A topa in note' muhna-ah hih gawpgawpna tawh amah uklo ding hi. 54 Hih bang danin amah a kitatkhiat kei leh, jubilee kum ciangin amah leh amah tawh a om a tate kikhahkhia ding hi. 55 Banghang hiam cihleh Israel mite pen kei-a' dingin nasemte ahi uhhi. Amaute pen Egypt gam panin keimah in ka paikhiatpih keima nasemte ahi uhhi; kei pen { Topa } na Pasian uh ka hihi.

"Mi khat in a luah ama leitang phelkhat { Topa' } tungah a ap leh, nangma sehna pen khaici vawh zah ding tawh kizui ding hi. Mangbuhham beem khat dim a pawina leitang pen ngun shekel sawmnga-in kiseh ding hi. 17 Amah in jubilee kum-a kipanin a lo a ap leh, nangma sehna zahzah bit ding hi. 18 Ahih hangin jubilee kum khit ciangin amah in a lo a ap leh, siampipa in jubilee kumkik dong a omlai kumte tawh kizui-in a manzah sum seh ding a, nangma sehna zah panin kikhiam ding hi. 19 Lo a appa in a tatkik nop leh, a kisehna banah nga-ah khat sum tawh behlap ding a, tua lo ama-a' hisuak ding hi. 20 Ahih hangin amah in a lo a tanh nuamlo ahi a, amah in midang khat tungah a zuak ahi zongin ahih leh, tua pen amah in tanhkik thei nawnlo ding hi. 21 A lo pen, jubilee huna piak khiat ciangin, a ki-apsa lo mah bangin { Topa' } tungah a siangtho hi ding a, siampipa in tua lo tang ding hi. 22 "Amah in luahna tawh a neih a hilo, a leisa lo pen { Topa' } tungah a ap leh, 23 siampipa in jubilee kum ciangdong ding tua man seh ding a, tua ni-in a mipa in a kiseh zah, { Topa' } tungah a siangtho-in pia ding hi. 24 Jubilee kum ciangin a lo pen a kileinapa, gamhluahna tawh tua leitang a nei mipa tungah tungkik ding hi.
Israel mite' Jubilee hong tun' ciangin amau-a'te pen a manawh minamte' tungah kipia beh ding hi. Ka pa uh namte' gamhluah panin amau-a' kikhenkhia ding hi," a ci uhhi.

"Na sanggampa, Hebrews pasal khat ahi a, Hebrews numei khat ahi zongin nang tungah hong kizuak leh, amah in nangma na kum guk sung hong sem ding a, a kum sagihna ciangin nang kiang panin a suakta-in na paikhiasak ding hi. 13 Na kiang panin a suakta-in na paikhiatsak ciangin khuthawm guakin na paisak kei ding hi. 14 Na tuuhon lak, na ancilna leh na leenggah sukna panin citna tawh tampi na pia ding a, { Topa } na Pasian in nang thupha hong piak zahin amah na pia ding hi. 15 Egypt gamah sila na hihna uh leh { Topa } na Pasian un note hong suahtaksakna na phawk ding uhhi. Tua ahih manin hih thu tuni-in kong pia hi.
Israel mite aw, gamlakah kum sawmli na om sungun gan go-a biakna leh keima tungah piakna bangmah nong bawl kei uhhi.
Nang leh numei kikal na suanlekhakte leh ama suanlekhakte kikalah kilangneihna ka omsak ding hi. Amah in na lutang hong sunim ding a, nang in ama khetul na sunim ding hi," a ci hi.

Leitungah mite tam dingin hong kipanin, amau' sung panin tanute hong suah ciangin, 2 vana om mite in leitung mite' tanute hoihsa uh ahih manin a deih bangun amaute zi-in a la uhhi. 3 Tua ciangin { Topa } in, "Mihingte sungah ka Kha om paisuak nawnlo ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh mihingte a mawh hi khinta a, kum za leh kum sawmnih sung kisikna ding hun kipia lai bek ding hi," a ci hi. 4 Vana om mite in leitung mihing tanute luppihin, amaute in ta a neih hun laitak hita leh tua khit hita leh, amau' suanlekhak Nefilim a kici mite leitungah om hi. Hih mite pen tang lai-a mi thahat, mi minthangte ahi uhhi. 5 Leitungah mihing a gitlohna a liatna leh mihing lungsim ngaihsutna peuhmah a sia ahih ngitngetna thu { Topa } in mu hi.

Tua ciangin Saul in David kiangah, "Hih lai-ah ka tanu uzaw Merab om hi. Nang tungah zi dingin kong pia ding hi. Kei-a' dingin hang peuh in la, { Topa' } gal do in," a ci hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Saul in, "Keima khutsungah amah siloin Filistia-te' khutsungah si hen," ci-in ngaihsun hi.

Tua ciangin Akhish in David samin ama kiangah, "{ Topa } a nungta ahih mah bangin, nang na thuman a, hih vai-ah kei tawh hong kuankhia-in na ciah ding man ka sa hi. Banghang hiam cihleh kei kiangah nong pai-a kipan tuni dong nang tungah khialhna bangmah ka mu kei hi. Ahih hangin uliante in nang hong thukimlo uhhi.
A lai sungah, "Galsim a haksatna penah a madawkin Uriah koih in la, amah kivat tukin a sihtheihna dingin ama kiang panin nungkik un," ci-in a gelh hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa' inn sungah Joab hong pai-in, "Tuni-in nangma nuntakna, na tanute leh na tapate' nuntakna, na zite leh na zineute' nuntakna a hong honkhia na nasemte khempeuh na maizumsak hi.

Amah in dawngin, "Ka topa! Aw Kumpipa, ka nasempa in kei hong khem hi; Banghang hiam cihleh na nasempa in ama kiangah, ‘Kei a tungah tuangin kumpipa ka zuih theihna dingin kei-a' dingin la khat tutphah vawh in,’ ka ci hi. Banghang hiam cihleh na nasempa a khe bai hi. 27 Amah in ka to kumpipa kiangah na nasempa hong gensia hi. Ahih hangin ka to kumpipa pen Pasian' vantung mi tawh kibang hi. Tua ahih ciangin hoih na sak bangin hong hih in.
Ahab a sih khit ciangin Moab gam in Israel lehdo hi.
Ka muan', ka lawm itpa, keima an a nepa nangawn in a khetul tawh kei hong peek vial hi.

Kei hong phin galte hilo hi. Hi leh ka thuakzo ding hi. Kiphatsakna tawh kei hong bawlte, langpang mi hilo hi. Hi leh ama kiang panin ka bu thei ding hi. 13 Ahih hangin ka kikimpih, ka kikholhpih, ka lawm theih mahmah, nangmah na hi hi. 14 Kam khum tawh i kihoho ngei a, Pasian' inn sungah i kikhawl khawm ngei hi.
Nangma inn ka deihluatna mei bangin ka sungah sa a, nangmah hong kote' konate keima tung hong tu hi.
Amaute ka itna, amaute-a' dingin thu ka ngetsakna nangawn amaute in hong thukna-in kei hong mawhsak uhhi.

Judah gam kumpi ahi Uzziah, Jotham, Ahaz, leh Hezekiah-te' hun lai-in Amoz' tapa Isaiah in Judah gam leh Jerusalem khua tawh kisai a mangmuhnate: 2 Vantungte aw, na za un; leitung aw, na ngai in; Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } in thu hong gen khinzo a, "Ka pattahsa ka tate in kei hong lehdo uhhi. 3 Bawng in amah a neipa thei a, la in zong a topa' an piakna mun thei buang hi. Ahih hangin Israel in bangmah theilo a, keima mite in thei theilo uhhi," a ci hi. .

En in, hih gambup langah a ding ding, Judah kumpite, uliante, siampite leh hih gammi khempeuh langah a pang dingin tuni-in nang, khuapi muan'huai khat bang ahi zongin, sikkhuampi khat bangin ahi zongin, sumngo kulhpi khat bangin ahi zongin ka hong bawl hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh ka mite in mawhna nam nih a bawlzo uhhi. Nuntakna ciktui ahi keimah a hong taisanzo uhhi. Tuikhuk totawm uh a, a tuikhuk tawh uh keu-in, tui a vung thei kei hi.

Na mawhna na phawk ding bek kisam hi. { Topa } na Pasian na langpan'na, singlim nuai khempeuhah gamdang pasian-te tawh na khialh kawikawina leh ka thu nong man'lohnate pulak in, { Topa } in kong ci hi.

Israel minamte leh Judah minamte, { Topa } in ka cihin-ah, kei' tungah hong thuman nawn hetlo uhhi. 12 "Amaute in { Topa } hong nial uh a, ‘Amah in bangmah hihlo ding hi. Eite tungah siatna hong tunglo ding a, gal ahi zongin kial ahi zongin i thuak kei ding hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh na sanggamte leh na innkuanpihte nangawn in nang hong zuak uh a, nang a hong do ding mihonpi a kaikhawm uhhi. Kam khum tawh nang a hong zol uh hangin um kei in," ci-in hong dawngkik hi.

Na vengte' thu upin nei kei in la, na lawmte zong muan'in nei kei in. Na ang-a lum na zi kiang nangawnah thu na gending kidawm in. 6 Tuhun ciangin tapate in a pate haibawl a, tanute in a nute langpan' uh a, mote in a teeknu uh langneih uhhi. Mi khat-a' dingin ama innkuanpihte mah a gal a suak mawk hi. 7 Ahi zongin ke'n ahih leh { Topa } mah ka en ding a, kei hong suaktasak Pasian ka ngak ding hi. Ka Pasian in ka thu hong ngai ding hi.

Nisuahna lam panin a hong pai mipilte in amah a khem lamtak Herod in a theih ciangin a heh suak mahmah hi. Tua mipilte tung panin aksi a kilat hun a dotna tawh kizui-in, Bethlehem khua leh a kiima om naungek kum nih ciang leh a nuaisiah khempeuh a that dingin a galkapte a sawl hi.

"Tua ciangin note hong kibawlsia-in hong kithat ding a, keima hangin Gentail mi khempeuh in note hong mudah ding uhhi. 10 Tua hun ciangin mi tampi in a upna uh khahsuah ding a, khatlekhat kimudahin khatlekhat kilehhek ding uhhi. 11 Kamsang kineihkhem mi tampi hong piang ding a, mi tampi tak umkhialsak ding uhhi.

Tua ciangin sawmlenihte sung panin Iskariot' tapa Judas a kici mipa siampi liante kiangah va pai a, 15 "Note' khutsungah amah hong pia leng, note in kei bang tawh hong guai ding na hi uhhiam?" a cih ciangin ngun peek sawmthum a pia uhhi. 16 Tua huna kipanin amah a lehhek theihna ding hunhoih a zongpah hi.
Judas zong Zeisu kiangah hong paipahin, "Topa aw, thupha ngah ta in," ci-in hopihin limnap mahmah hi.
Tua ciangin Peter kiciam a, "Hua mipa ka thei kei hi. Zuauthu ka gen taak leh Pasian in kei hong dawm kei ta hen!" a ci hi. Tua khitzawh phetin ak hong khuangta hi.

A lehhekpa Judas in Zeisu a si dingin thu a kikhenna a muh ciangin kisikkik ahih manin siampi liante leh upate kiangah a ngun peek sawmthumte va paipih kik a, 4 "Mawhna a neilo mipa a si dingin lehhekkha ka hih manin ka mawh hi," a va ci hi. Ahi zongin amaute in, "Kote tawh bang kisai nawn ding ahi hiam? Nangma tavuan ahi hi," a na cihsan uhhi.

Tua laitakin sawmlenihte sungpan Iskariot' tapa Judas in amaute tungah Zeisu a piaktheihna dingin siampi liante kiangah a va pai hi. 11 Siampi liante in a thu a zak uh ciangin lungdam mahmah uh a, sum tawh kong guai ding uhhi, ci-in thu a ciam uhhi. Tua ahih manin Judas in Zeisu a lehhek theihna ding a hunhoih a zong hi.

Tu-a kipanin innkuan sungah mihing nga a phate, a langah thum, a langah nihin kikhenin kido ding uhhi. 53 A pa in a tapa do-in, a tapa in a pa do ding a, a nu in a tanu do-in, a tanu in a nu do ding a, a teeknu in a monu do-in, a monu in a teeknu do ding hi," a ci hi.

Tua ciangin sawmlenihte sung panin Iskariot tapa Judas sungah Satan hong lut hi. 4 Tua ahih manin Judas va paikhia a, siampi liante leh biakinncing palikmangte tawh va kiho uh a, amaute' khutsungah Zeisu a piaktheihna dingzia a kikum uhhi. 5 Amaute na nuam mahmah uh a, sum tawh guaih dingin thuciam a na pia uhhi. 6 Judas zong thukim a, mihonte' theihlohin amaute' khutsungah Zeisu a piaktheihna ding lampi zon'ding a kipan pah hi.

Tua bangin thu a gen laitakin mihonpi khat hong pai a, sawmlenihte sung panin Judas a kici mipa hong makai-in Zeisu a nam dingin hong naih hi. 48 Ahi zongin Zeisu in ama kiangah, "Judas aw, napna tawh Mihing Tapa lehhek na hi hiam?" a na ci hi.
Zeisu in hih thuteng a genkhit ciangin lungkham mahmah ahih manin, "A mantakin ci lehang, note khat in kei nong lehhek ding uhhi," ci-in a kilangin a genkhia hi.

Zeisu in tu-a bangin thu a nget khit ciangin a nungzuite tawh Kidron lui kantanin a pai hi. Tua lai-ah huan khat om a, tua huan sungah a nungzuite tawh a lut hi. 2 Zeisu leh a nungzuite tua munah pai zelzel uh ahih manin Zeisu a lehhek Judas in zong tua mun a thei hi. 3 Tua ahih manin Judas zong, siampi liante leh Pharisee mite in a sawl galkap honkhat leh biakinncing palik pawlkhat tawh hiam tawi-in lalcin leh meilah de-in tua huanah a hong pai uhhi. 4 Zeisu in zong ama tungah a piangding thu khempeuh theikhin ahih manin hong paikhia-in amaute kiangah, "Kua zong na hi uhhiam?" ci-in a dong hi. 5 Amaute in, "Nazareth khuami Zeisu a zong ka hi uhhi," a ci hi. Zeisu a lehhek Judas zong tua mihonte tawh hong dingkhawm hi. 6 Zeisu in, "Keimah ka hi hi," a cih ciangin amaute nungkinin a puk uhhi.

Banghang hiam cihleh note kiangah ka hong gen thu pen Topa kiang panin ka ngah thu hi a, tua thu in: Topa Zeisu a kilehhek ding nitakin anlum la-in, 24 Pasian tungah lungdamna a kohkhit ciangin balnen a, "Hih pen note-a' dingin a hong kipia keima pumpi a hihi. Kei na hong phawkna dingun na ne un," ci hi.
Tuahun lai-in leitung gitloh gamtatnate na zui uh a, Pasian thu a umlo mite sungah tu laitakin na a sem, huihlak a ukte' thu na mang uhhi.

Tua hi a, eite in i kiim i pamah hih zahin a tam teci nei ihih ciangin eite a hong dongtangsak thei nate khempeuh leh eite a hong gakcip mawhna leh khialhnate khempeuh paikhia-in, i mai-ah a om taina ding lampi a mong dongin lungsim kiptakin tai ni. 2 Eite hong makai-in i upna a hong cingtaaksak Zeisu mitsuan'in nei ni. Mailamah a ngahding lungdamna hangin maizumna kihta loin singlamteh tungah sihna hong thuak a, tu-in Pasian tokhom taklamah a tu hi. 3 Tua zahta-in mawhnei mite' langbawlna a thuaknate ngaihsun unla, note lungkia loin khauhtakin om un. 4 Tu ciangdong mawhna tawh na kidona uhah sihna zah ciangdongin na dona uh om nailo hi.
Sanggamte aw, mite' khemsa-in om kei un.

Tua ciangin David in ama kiangah, "Nangma mawhna nangma lu tungah tung ta hen; banghang hiam cihleh nangma kampau in nang' langkhatah teci pangin, ‘{ Topa' } sathau nilhpa ka that khin hi,’ na ci hi," a ci hi.

{ Topa } aw, na biakinn sungah kua om ding ahi hiam? Na mual siangtho tungah kua teng ding ahi hiam? 2 Paubaang loin gamta-in, a manin na sem a, lungsim tak a gen mi, 3 mi gensia loin, a lawmte tungah siatna bawllo a, a vengte a mawhsaklo mi, 4 migilote thusimlo a, ahi zongin { Topa } a zahtakte a pahtawi mi, ama natna ding nangawnah a ciampello mi,
{ Topa, } ka belh suangpi leh keimah hong tankhiapa aw, ka kammal leh ka lungsim ngaihsutnate nangma muhna-ah a san'huai suaksak ta in!
{ Topa' } kampauna tawh vantung piang a, a kam pana husan'na tawh vantung nate a piang hi.
Siat nading panin na leii kem in la, zuau genna panin na muk kem in. 14 Siatna panin kihemkhia in la, a hoih bawl in. Kilemna ding hanciam in la, na phak mateng delh in.
Thuman mi' kam in pilna gen a, a leii in thutang gen hi.
"Ka leii tawh ka khialhlohna dingin ka gamtatna ka kikem ding a, ka omna-ah migilote a omlaiteng ka kam ka kham ding hi," ka ci hi.
{ Topa } aw, keima kam a cing ding khat koih in la, ka mukte' kongkhak a vil ding khat koih in.
A manlo thu gen ngei kei in la, zuauthu leh a kiza khial thei ding kammalte zang het kei in.
Mipilte in thuhilhna mang a, a hai paute in lungkhamna tuak hi.
Thungaihsun theite' kamsungah pilna om a, mihaite' nungzangah ciangduai kinga hi.
Ngaihsun lo-a kampauna in tem hiam bangin mi liamsak thei a, mipilte' kampauna in tua bang liamna damsak thei hi.
Lunghihmawhna in lungkhamna piangsak a, kampau hoih in mi lungdamsak hi.
Thungaihsun theite pilna tawh gamta a, mihaite in a haina taangko hi.
Kam nemin dawn'na in hehna damsak a, kam khauh in hehna piangsak hi.
Maitaina in lung nuamsak a, thuhoih zakna in lung damsak hi.
Mihoihlote in kitotna piangsak a, mi gensiate in lawmta ki-it kimlai kimudahsak hi. 29 A ngongtat mite in a lawmte zol a, lungkhamna sung tun'pih hi.
Miliante in zuauthu gen ngeilo a, mihaite in na-a kimang kam pau ngeilo hi.

Thu a thei taktakte in gengen khollo a, a paupau khollote thumu taktak hizaw hi. 28 Mihaite pauloin om leh a pil mahin kingaihsun hi. Thungaihsun thei na hihna a kilatna dingin pauloin om khinkhian in.
Mihaite in thu a teltheih zawhna ding uh kinlo uh a, pil si, a kicih theihna ding deihna bek tawh thu gen uhhi.
Mihingte' kampau pen pilna kipatna suak thei a, tuipi bangin thuk-in luitui bangin a siang hi.
Mi a gensia kawikawite in thu im theilo hi. Tua banga mi haipaute tawh kikhawl kei in.
A phun hat zi gilo tawh ten'khop sangin gam simthamah khat guak tangten' hoihzaw hi.
Kampau a ki-ipzote lungkhamna tawh kipelh hi.
Pil kampauna pen mihaite' theihzawh dingin thuk lua mahmah a, mihaite in mihon lakah thu gen ngamlo uhhi.
A kilawm hunin kammal khat paukhiatna pen ngun pek tunga kham pek khat a kisuang tawh kibang hi.
A dangtak mipa in tuivot lim a sak bangin gamlapi-a om lawmte' kiang panin thuzak nuam kisa hi.
Khuaizu a tam lua nek ding a hoihloh bangin phat ding deihluatna a hoihlo a hihi.
Mihaite in paunak thuhilhnate a paukhiat ciangin zukhampa in a khut-a ling om a khei dingin a kipan tawh kibang lel hi.
Mihaipa a hehna bangin kam pau-in gamta gawp a, mipilpa ahih leh ki-ipin a hehna damsak hi.
Amah in a pilna tawh thu gen a, kam khum takin pau hiathiat hi.

Thu ngaihsun masa-in pau in la, Pasian' tungah thu mawk ciampak kei in. Vantungah Pasian om a, leitungah nang om na hih manin na pau ding-a kilawm zahval pau kei in. 3 Lunghimawh semsem lecin na mang sia semsem ding a, tam pau semsem lecin na haina kilang semsem ding hi.
"Banghangin nidang lai-in hih sangin hoihzaw tham ahi hiam?" ci-in dong kei in. Tua bangte pil thudotna hilo hi.
Mi' gen khempeuh thudon kei in. Na nasempa' hong samsiatna na zakha ding hi.

Na gen peuhmah ahi ahih leh, ‘Hi,’ ci in la, a hilo ahih leh, ‘Hilo,’ cihna tawh kicingsak in. Tua bang hiloin kiciamna kam na zat ciangin Dawimangpa tawh kizomin thumanlo na hih lamtak hong kilang hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh nomau kampauna tawh kizui-in thu hong kikhen ding a, dik hi, cihna ahi a, mawh hi, cihna ahi zongin na ngahna dingun nomau kampau mah hong kibulphuh ding hi," a ci hi.
"Mi khempeuh in note hong pahtakbawl ciangin gimna a thuakding na hi uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh a pu a pate un zong tua bangmahin kamsang zuaute a pahtakbawl uhhi.

Tua ahih manin Zeisu in Sabbath ni-in cina a damsakna hangin amaute in Zeisu bawlsiat ding a kipan uhhi. 17 Ahi zongin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, "Ka Pa in tuni dongin na sem tawntung ahih manin kei zong ka sep ding mah ahi hi," a ci hi. 18 Hih bangin ama kampauna hangin amaute in Zeisu thatnuam semsem uhhi. Amah in Sabbath thukham a palsat bek hiloin, Pasian nangawn ka Pa ci ahih manin Pasian tawh a kikimin kiseh hi, ci-in a mawhsak uhhi.
A kam uh tawh mi that uh a, a kam uh tawh zuauthu gen uh a, a kampaute uh gulgu tawh kibang hi.

Lawmte aw, note' theihsa thute gensia langpangin, mite' upna nawngkaisakin pawl a kikhensak mite kidawm un. Tua bang mite tawh kikhawl vet kei un. 18 Tua bang mite in i Topa Christ' na a sem hiloin, gilpi vai bek a sem uh a hihi. Amaute in mite phatin kamkhum nono zang uh ahih manin mihoih pawlkhat a khemzo uhhi.

Sanggamte aw, Pasian' thu hilhin note kiangah kong pai lai-in, mipilte' zat kam thukpipi leh pilna kamte ka zang kei hi. 2 Banghang hiam cihleh note kiangah ka om laitakin singlamteh tungah Zeisu Christ a sihna thu simloh thudang peuhmah ngaihsutloh dingin ka ngaihsutsa a hihi.
Zahpihna kam tawh hong kihopih ciangin kamkhum tawh ka dawng uhhi. Mite' muhna-ah tuni ciangdong ninbulom leh leivuithem bang bek ka hi uhhi.
Na kiho uh ciangin kamguh zang kei unla, na pauna uh a za mite in phattuamna a ngahtheihna dingin na-in a kimang kam hoihte bek na pau un.
Ahi zongin tu-in hehna, thangpaihna, muhdahna, gensiatna, kam hoihlo pauna cihte nei nawn kei un.
Na kampauna, na gamtatnate khempeuh uhah, Topa Zeisu hangin Pa Pasian tungah lungdam kohna-in Zeisu min paulamin na hih ding uhhi.
Kam na pau uh ciangin mi' zaknop, mi' ngaihnop dingin na pau un. Tua hi leh na kihopih uh mite khempeuh-a' dingin phattuamna a nei kam a pau na hi ding uhhi.

Tu ma-a ka hong gensa uh mah bangin kamtam nuam se loin hoihtakin om hithiatna, no tawh a kisai thu bek ngaihsutna, leh note' nuntakna ding na na sepna ding uh hanciamin nei un. 12 Tua bangin gamta le uh cin thu umlo mite in note hong zahtak ding uh a, mite' neihsa na duhgawh kei ding uhhi.
Thu uppih mi khempeuh khatlekhat a siangtho ki-itna lungsim tawh kinamin na kihopih un.
Khangno lai na hihna thu hangin mite' simmawh dingin na om kei in la, kampauna, gamtatna, itna, upna leh siangthona-ah thu um mite' etteh dingin na om in.
Pasian tawh mite a kigamlasak semsem thei thu ginalo, a haihuai thu kikup thu kiselnate na pelh in.

Tuahun ciangin mite in amau angsung ding bek ngaihsunin, huaihamin, kisialin, kihisakin, mi zahko-in, nu leh pate' thu mangloin, lungdam theihna mel neiloin, biakna lungsim neiloin, 3 mi khualloin, hehpihna neiloin, mi gensia-in, ngongtatin, kihtakhuai-in, thuhoih deihloin, 4 ciampelin, thu khualloin, kiphasak gawpin, Pasian donloin pumpi nopsakna bek deihin, 5 biakna thu a puathamteng zui napi-in biakna hangin vangliatna thu a omte deihlo ding uhhi. Tua bangin a gamta mite na pelh in.

Nangma pumpi mahmah gamtat hoihna-a kipan thu khempeuhah etteh hoih dingin na om in. Lungsim takpi tawh mite' zahtaktheih dingin thu na hilh in la, 8 mite' mawhmat theihloh ding kamhoihte na zang in. Tua hi leh i langte in hong gensiat theihna ding muloin a mai uh zum lel ding hi.
Pasian' kampauna tawh leitung leh vantung piang a, tu-a i muhtheih nate a om nailopi panin hong piang hi, ci-in i upna bek mah tawh a thei ihi hi.
Sanggamte aw, note in na theihding uh ka deih thu in: Thu kigen khempeuh hoihtakin ngai pahpah un. Ahi zongin pau pahpah kei unla, heh pakpak kei un.
Mi khatpeuh in Christian ka hi hi, ci napi-in kampau a kidopzawh kei leh amahmah a kikhemtawm hi lel a, ama biakna neih a mawkna a hihi.
Tua ahih manin mi a khahkhia thei thukham tawh kizui-in thukhenna a thuakding mi bangin kampau-in na gamta un.
Eite khempeuh a khialthei zelzelte vive ihi hi. Kampauna-ah a khial ngeilo mi a om leh a cingtaak mahmah hi a, a pumpi zong a ukzo mi a hihi.
Tua mah bangin lei zong i pumpi na sung panin a neu mahmah khat hinapi-in thusia lianpipi piangsak zo hi. Gam khempeuh zong mei-ek neuno khat pan kipanin a kangtum thei hi.

Sanggamte aw, khatlekhat kigensia kei un. A mipihte gensia-in thu a khente in Thukham gensia-in thu a khen a hihi. Thukham na gensiat uh leh Thukham a zui hiloin thu a khen na hi uhhi. 12 Thukham a piapa leh thu a khenpa pen Pasian bek hi a, amah bek in hong honkhiazo a, hong susiazo hi. Tua ahih manin banghangin na mipihte uh gensia-in thu a khenthei dingin kingaihsun zenzen na hi uhhiam? 13 Tuni ahih kei leh zingciangin tua khua tua khua-ah va pai-in, kum khat bang va omin, sumbawlin a meet tampi va ngah ni, a ci mite aw, ka thugen hong ngai dih un. 14 Zingciangin na nuntakna uh bangci ding cih nangawn na thei kei uhhi. Meiilum tawlkhat sung kaii-in a mangthang pak tawh a kibang lel na hi uhhi. 15 Note in, "Topa in hong thukimpih nak leh nungta-in tua bang tua bang i sem ding hi," na cihding uhhi bek hi.
Sanggamte aw, Pasian in note tungah thu hong khenkhak lohna dingin khatlekhat na kiphunsan kei un. Thukhen dingpa hong nai mahmah ta a, hong tung dektak ta hi.

Hih thute khempeuh banah, sanggamte aw, thu khat peuhpeuh na gen uh ciangin kiciam se kei un. Vantung ahi a, na khat peuhpeuh tawh ahi zongin kiciam kei un. Pasian' thukhenna na thuakkhak lohna dingun a hite, "Hi," ci lel unla, a hilote, "Hilo," na ci lel un.
Sanggamte aw, Pasian in note tungah thu hong khenkhak lohna dingin khatlekhat na kiphunsan kei un. Thukhen dingpa hong nai mahmah ta a, hong tung dektak ta hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh thu theiloin a mot paupau mihaite, na gamtat hoihna un a daihsak ding, Pasian' deihna a hihi.

kiniamkhiat un. 9 Hong bawlsiate siatna tawh thukkik loin hong samsia mite samsia kik kei unla, Pasian in note a hong sap lai-in thupha a hong piak dingin hong ciamsa ahih manin, hong siat bawlte thupha tawh na thukzaw un. 10 Banghang hiam cihleh Laisiangtho in, "Nuntak nuam deihin, hunhoih a zang nuamte in kamsia pau kei uh hen la, zuauthu gen kei ta uh hen.

Ama kiang panin za-in note tungah ka hong gen uh thu in: Pasian, khuavak hi a, khuamial tawh kizopna themkhat zong nei hetlo hi. 6 Tua ahih manin Pasian tawh ka kipawl hi, ci napi-in khuamial tawh kisai gamtatnate i gamtat leh i kampauna leh i gamtatna tawh zuauthu a gen ihi hi.
Ka it tate aw, i kampi bek tawh ki-it loin, lungsim takpi tawh ki-itin i gamtatna tawh kilangsak ni.
{ Topa } in, "Ka thu za un: Note' lakah kamsang a om leh { Topa } keimah in ama tungah mangmuhna tawh ka kilak a, amah tawh mang sungah ka kiho hi.

"{ Topa } na Pasian un note lak ahi na sanggamte uh lak panin note-a' dingin kei tawh a kibang kamsang khat hong khangsak ding hi. Note in ama thu na ngai ding uhhi. 16 "Note in, ‘Si khading ka hih manun { Topa } kote' Pasian' aw hong zasak kik kei in. Hih a lian mei zong hong musak nawn kei in,’ ci-in na kikhop ni-un Horeb-ah { Topa } na Pasian uh tung pan na deih bang uhhi ding hi. 17 { Topa } in kei kiangah, ‘Amaute' hong ngetna thuman taktak hi. 18 Amau sanggamte lak panin nang tawh a kibang kamsang khat amaute-a' dingin ka khangsak ding hi. Ama gen dingte ka hilh ding a, amah ka thupiak khempeuh amaute tungah a gen ding hi. 19 Amah in keima min tawh a gen ka thute a donlo mi peuhmahte keimahmah in ka thuk ding hi. 20 Ahih hangin keimah in thugen dingin thu pialo napi-in keima min tawh thu a gen ngam kamsangpa hita leh pasian dangte' min tawh thu a genpa hita leh, tua bang mite si ding hi,’ hong ci hi. 21 "Na lungsim sung uhah, ‘{ Topa' } gen a hilo thu bangci theih ding ihi hiam?’ na cih uh leh, 22 kamsang khat in { Topa' } min tawh thu genin, tua thu pen hong tunglo ahi a, a manlo ahi zongin hong hih leh, tua thu pen { Topa' } genloh thu a hihi. Kamsangpa in ama utthu a gen hi a, amah na kihtak ding uh kullo hi.
Tua hun lai-in Lappidoth' zi kamsang numei Deborah in Israel-te thu khen hi.
Samuel in a nuntak sung tawntung Israel-te thu khen hi.

Ahih hangin amaute in, "Kote hong uk dingin kumpi khat hong pia in," a cih uh ciangin hih thu in Samuel lungkimlo sak hi. Samuel in { Topa' } kiangah thu ngen hi. 7 Tua ciangin { Topa } in Samuel kiangah, "Amaute in nang kiangah hong gen thu khempeuh ngai in; banghang hiam cihleh amaute in nang hong nial hilo a, amaute tungah kumpi hihna panin kei hong nial ahi uhhi.

Samuel in mite' thugen khempeuh a zak khit ciangin { Topa' } kiangah tua thute a genkik hi. 22 Tua ciangin { Topa } in Samuel kiangah, "Amaute' thu ngai in la, amaute-a' dingin kumpi khat koih in," a ci hi. Tua ciangin Samuel in Israel mite kiangah, "Mi khempeuh na khuapi ciat uhah ciah un," a ci hi.

David in hih thu a zak ciangin Nathan kiangah, "{ Topa' } tungah ka khial khin hi," a ci hi. Tua ciangin Nathan in David kiangah, "{ Topa } in zong na khialhna hong maisak khinzo hi; nang na si kei ding hi. 14 Ahi zongin, hih bangin gamtatna tawh { Topa } thusim peuhmahlo na hih manin nang' sung panin a hong piang naungek si ding hi," a ci hi.

Zingsangin David a thawh ciangin David' thumupa ahi kamsang Gad tungah { Topa' } thu hong tung a, 12 "Pai in la, David kiangah hih bangin gen in. ‘{ Topa } in hih bangin ci hi: Nangma tungah thu thum kong pia hi; nang tungah kong hih theihna dingin tuate khat teel in,’ ci hi," a ci hi.

Tua hun sungin Jerusalem panin Jeroboam a paikhiat ciangin Shiloh khuami kamsang Ahijah in lampi-ah amah na dawn hi. Ahijah in puan thak khat na silhtawm a, amau nihte gel bek gamlakah om uhhi. 30 Tua ciangin Ahijah in ama tungah a silh a puan thak lenin seh sawmlenih suahin a balkek hi. 31 Tua ciangin amah in Jeroboam kiangah, "Nang-a' dingin bek sawm la in; banghang hiam cihleh Israel Pasian, { Topa } in hih bangin ci hi, ‘En in, Solomon' khut panin kumpi gam a balkhia ding ka hi a, nangma tungah minam sawm kong pia ding hi.

Tua thamloin Jeroboam innkuan bangin ama nasepna tawh hehsakin { Topa' } muhna-ah a sia a gamtatna khempeuh hang leh amah in Jeroboam leh a innkuan a suksiatna hangin Hanani' tapa kamsang Jehu' tung tawnin Baasha leh a innkuan langpangin { Topa' } thu hong tung hi.

Tua ciangin { Topa } in Elijah' aw ngai hi; naupang hong nak kikin a hingkik hi. 23 Tua ciangin Elijah in naupang la-in innkhumzang panin inn sungah paipihsuk a, a nu kiangah a pia hi. Tua ciangin Elijah in, "En in, na tapa nungta hi," a ci hi. 24 Numei in Elijah kiangah, "Nang, Pasian' mi na hihna leh { Topa } in nang tung tawnin thu a gen takpi ahihna tu-in ka thei hi," a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Israel kumpi Ahab kiang nai-ah kamsang khat hong pai-in, "{ Topa } in hih bangin ci hi: Hih mihon tampi khempeuh na mu hiam? En in, tuni-in nangma khutsungah kong pia ding hi. Tua ciangin keimah, { Topa } ka hihna na thei ding hi, ci hi," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amaute a pai kawmkawm a kiho laitakun, mei leeng khat leh mei sakolte in amaute nih a khen hi. Tua ciangin vantungah Elijah pingpei-in paito hi.

Tua ciangin amah in, "A pua-ah paikhia in la, beel hawm a tawm lualo, na vengte khempeuh' beel va kawm in. 4 Tua ciangin sungtumin, nang leh na tapate kong kikhaknelh unla, hih beelte khempeuh sungah sung in. Beel khat a dim simin tuamkoih pahpah in," a ci hi. 5 Tua ahih ciangin ama kiang panin tua numei paikhia-in amah leh a tapate kong kikhaknelh uhhi. Amah in a sun' laitakin a tapate in ama kiangah a beelte paipih uhhi. 6 Beelte a dim ciangin amah in a tapa khat kiangah, "Beel dang khat hong paipih in," a ci hi. Tua ciangin a tapa in, "Beel adang om nawnlo hi," a ci hi. Tua ciangin sathau a luan' a khawl hi.

Tua gam sungah kialpi a tun' laitakin Gilgal-ah Elisha hong paikik hi. Kamsangte ama mai-ah tu-in thu a ngaih laitakin amah in a nasemte kiangah, "Beelpi suang unla kamsangte-a' ding meh huan un," a ci hi.
Amah in a tonu kiangah, "Samaria-ah a om kamsangpa tawh ka topa kimu thei leh! Amah in a phakna damsak ding hi," a ci hi.

Ahih hangin khat in singluang a tan laitakin a heitang lengin tui sungah kia hi. Amah kiko-in, "Ala, ka topa! A kikawm hi ve'n," a ci hi. 6 Tua ciangin Pasian' mipa in, "Koi lai-ah kia ahi hiam?" a ci hi. Amah in a kiatna mun ama kiangah a lah ciangin amah in ciangkang khat khiakin tua munah lawn a, a heitang laamtosak hi.

Ahi zongin { Topa } in kamsangte khempeuh leh thumute khempeuh tung tawnin Israel leh Judah mite hilhkhol a, "Na pu na pate uh ka thupiak thukhamte khempeuh, leh kamsangte ahi ka nasemte' tung tawnin note kiangah thu kong puak bangin na gamtat siate panun kihei-in ka thupiaknate leh ka thukhamte zui un," a ci hi.

Tua hun laitakin Hezekiah cina-in si dektak hi. Tua ciangin Amoz' tapa kamsang Isaiah hong pai-in ama kiangah, "{ Topa } in hih bangin ci hi: ‘Na innkuan vai ding hawm in; banghang hiam cihleh nang na si ding hi; na damkikzo kei ding hi,’ ci hi," a ci hi.

Tua ciangin zingsangin amaute tho baihin Tekoa gamlakah a paikhia uhhi. Amaute a paikhiat laitakin Jehoshafat dingin, "Judah gam leh Jerusalem-a a tengte aw, ka thugen za un! { Topa } na Pasian uh um un; tua hi leh note na kip ding uhhi. Ama kamsangte um un; tua hi leh na mavang ding uhhi," a ci hi.
Ahi zongin { Topa' } lamah amaute a paipih kik dingin amah in amaute lakah kamsangte a puak hi. Hihte in amau' langkhatah teci pang a, ahih hangin amaute in donlo uhhi.

Tua ahih ciangin Hilkiah leh kumpipa in a sawl mite, Hasrah, a tapa Tokhath, a tapa Shallum, biakinn puante a kempa' zi ahi kamsangnu Huldah kiangah pai-in (tu-in tuanu Jerusalem sung a Veng Nihna-ah teng hi) tua thu tawh kisai ama kiangah va gen uhhi.

Tua hun laitakin Hezekiah a ci na-in si dektak hi. Amoz' tapa, kamsang Isaiah ama kiangah hong pai-in, "{ Topa } in hih bangin ci hi: Na innsung thu ding vaihawm in; banghang hiam cihleh nang na damkikzo kei ding a, na si ding hi, hong ci hi," ci-in a gen hi.
"Amah in eite' natna teng thuakin, eite' gimna teng pua khin taktak hi. Ahi zongin eite in amah pen ama mawhna hangin Pasian in a gimsak, gimna a thuak bangin i ngaihsun hi.
"Gil sungah kong bawl ma-in nang kong thei khinzo hi. Na suah ma-in nang kong teelkhia khinzo a, minam dangte tungah kamsang dingin kong koih khinzo hi," hong ci hi.

Pai in la leilu lam Israel gamah hih bangin va taangko in: ‘Hong kilehkik in, a zulhzau Israel aw, { Topa } in kong ci hi. Hehna tawh nang kong en kei ding hi; banghang hiam cihleh a hehpih theipa ka hi hi, { Topa } in kong ci hi. Ka heh tawntung kei ding hi. 13 Na mawhna na phawk ding bek kisam hi. { Topa } na Pasian na langpan'na, singlim nuai khempeuhah gamdang pasian-te tawh na khialh kawikawina leh ka thu nong man'lohnate pulak in, { Topa } in kong ci hi.

Tua ahih manin { Topa, } Vanglian Pasian in hong hopih a, "Amaute, tu-a bangin kampau uh ahih manin na kam sungah mei bangin ka kuan'sak ka thute in sing tawh kibang hih minamte kangtum gawp ding hi. 15 "En un, Israel minamte aw, { Topa } in kong cihin-ah, gamlapi panin note a hong sim dingin gam khat kong kuansak ding hi. Tua gam pen tanglai pekin a om khinsa, a hat mahmah, amaute' pau na theihloh uh gam khat a hihi. 16 Thal tawh a kap uh teh kaplum lianlian uh a, a vekpi-un galhang kim uhhi. 17 Amaute in lo-a na ante uh leh na an huante uh hong gaihsak ding uh a, na tapate uh leh na tanute uh hong thahsak ding uhhi. Na tuuhon, na bawnghonte uh hong gaihsak ding uh a, na leenggah, na theigahte uh hong nek mangsak ding uhhi. Na muan' mahmah uh kulhpi tawh a ki-um na khuapite uh namsau tawh hong suksiatsak ding uhhi.

A dipkuathuai, a patauhhuai thu khat gamsungah a piang khinzo hi. 31 Kamsangte in thuman genlo uh a, siampite in zong amau' ut bangun a uk uhhi. Ka mite in phamawh salo sawnsawn uhhi. A tawpna hun hong tun' ciangin bang cih ding uh ahi hiam, { Topa } in ci hi, ci-in gen in," hong ci hi.
