Ahih hangin Jerusalem khuasunga om kamsangte' sungah a mulkimhuaizaw na khat ke'n ka mu hi. Angkawmin zuauthu gen uh a, mite a gitlohna uh pan a kikhellohna dingin mi hoihlote a hanthawn zawlai uhhi. A vekpi-un kei' muhna-ah Sodom khuamite tawh kibang khin ka sa a, Gomorrah khuamite tawh zong kilamdanglo uhhi.

Vanglian { Topa } in, "Note kiangah thu hong hilh a, a hong lamen khialsak kamsangte' thugennate na ngai kei un. Amaute in a lungsim uhah a geeltawm uh thu hong gen uhhi a, keima kiang pana hong pai thu ahi kei hi.
Zuauthu tawh thu hilh a, a phuahtawm uh thu a hilh kamsangte' lungsim sungah zuauthu bang tanvei tenglai ding ahi hiam?
Ahi zongin, nopna hong tung ding hi, ci-in a gen kamsangpa pen { Topa' } hong sawl kamsangpa hi taktak hiam, cih kamsangpa' gen bang hong tun' ciangin a kithei pan ding ahi hi," ka ci hi.
Jerusalem khua panin Nebukhad- nezzar in Babylon khua-ah salin a paikhiatpih uliante, siampite, kamsangte, leh mi khempeuhte' tungah lai khat ka khak hi.

Ka nasem ahi kamsangte khempeuh note kiangah hong sawl tawntungin, ‘Tu-in note khempeuh na hoihlohna uh panin kihei unla, na gamtat hoihlote uh kipuahpha un. Pasian dangte nung delh loin a na na sep kei nak uh leh note leh na pu na pate uh kiangah ka piak gam sungah na teng ding uhhi,’ ci-in note tungah hong gen uhhi. Ahih hangin note in na bil uh nong ngat kei uh a, ka thu nong ngai kei uhhi.
Ahih hangin note kiangah ka nasem kamsangte khempeuh kong sawl a, ‘Ka muhdah hih a kihhuai na na gamta nawn kei un,’ ci-in kong gensak tawntung hi.

Na kamsangte un zuauthu longal thudang gen ding neilo uh a, a thuhilhna uh khemna thu bek ahih manin, a khial na hihlam uh a hong hilhtel kei uhhi. Amaute in lam hong lakkhial uh a, kisikkik theihna ding hun a hong pia kei uhhi.

Lungkhamna khat khit khat a banbanin na tuak ding uh a, thusia bekbek na zaza ding uhhi. Kamsangte kiangah thu na dong ding uhhi. Siampite in mite tungah hong hilh ding thu theilo ding uh a, upate in hong gen ding mel theilo ding uhhi.
Topa { Pasian' } thugen hih bang ahi hi: Hih kamsang haite in gimna thuak ding uhhi. Amaute in amau' lungsim bangin thu gentawmin, maang mu kineih uhhi.

Amaute' mangmuhnate zuaupi hi a, a thugen kholhnate uh zong zuauthu a hihi. Keimah in amaute sawllo napi-in amaute in, ‘{ Topa } in hih bangin ci hi,’ ci khem uhhi. Tua bang hinapi-in amaute' thugente ka tun'sak ding a lamen lai uhhi. 7 Tua ahih manin amaute kiangah ka gen thu in: ‘Na

te uh zuaupi hi a, na thugen kholhnate uh zuauthu a hihi. Note kiangah keimah in thu hong genlo napi-in keima gen bangin na gen uhhi,’ ka ci hi," a hong ci hi. 8 Tua ahih ciangin Topa { Pasian } in amaute kiangah, "Na thugente uh zuaupi hi a, na

te uh zuaupi a hihi. Tua ahih manin note kong langpan' hi. 9 Zuauthu tawh maang mu kineihin, mite a khialh theihna dingin zuauthu a genkhol no kamsangte gim a hong pia ding ka hita hi. Ka mite a kikhop uh ciangin tuate lakah na kihel kei ding uh a, Israel mite' min a kigelhna lakah note' min kigelhlo ding hi. Na gam uhah na ciahkik ngei nawn kei ding uhhi. Tua ciangin Topa { Pasian } ka hihna thu na hong thei ding uhhi. 10 Banghang hiam cihleh thu hoihlo napi-in hoih hi, ci khemin ka mite lam na kaikhial uhhi. Ka mite in kulh dingin suang a cian uh ciangin no kamsangte in a tungtham buan tawh na zut uhhi.

"Kei pen a nungta Topa { Pasian } ka hih mah bangin, kumpi tokhom tungah a tusak, Babylon kumpipa tawh a thuciamna palsat ahih manin Babylon gamah hih kumpipa si ding hi. 17 Babylon mite in mi tampi a thah theihna dingun kan bawlin dum a tawh uh ciangin a thahat Faro' galkap honpite nangawn in amah huh zolo ding uhhi. 18 Amah in a kiciamna leh a thuciamna palsatin hih bangin gamta khin ahih manin, amah suakta ngeilo ding hi. 19 "Tua ahih ciangin kei pen a nungta Topa { Pasian } ka hih mah bangin a zuih dingin keima min tawh a kiciam thukimna palsat ahih manin gim ka pia ding hi. 20 Amah a awk theihna dingin ngenthang ka zak ding a, amah ka awksak ding hi. Kei tungah amah hong thutaklo ahih manin Babylon-ah paipihin tua lai-ah gim ka pia ding hi. 21 A galkap muan'huai pente, galsungah si ding a, a suakta sunte zong mun citengah kithehthang ding hi. Tua ciangin { Topa } ahi keimah in thu a gen ka hihlam na phawk ding hi," a hong ci hi.
"Mihing ahi Ezekiel aw, Ammon mite' lam nga in la, amaute mawhsakna thu gen in.

Topa { Pasian } in kei kiangah thu hong gen a, "Moab mite in a thugenna uhah, Judah gammite pen minam dangte bangmah hi lel uhhi, ci se uhhi. 9 Tua ahih manin Moab gam hutna-in a kiphut a kiima om khuapite leh a khuapi minthang pente ahi Bethjeshimoth, Baalmeon, leh Kiriathaim khuapite, midangte ka simsak ding hi. 10 Ammon mite a zawhgawp mah bangin, Moab mite zong, nisuahna lam mite ka zogawpsak ding a, Moab mite pen minamin dingzo nawnlo ding uhhi. 11 Tua bangin Moab mite gim ka pia ding a, tua ciangin { Topa } ka hihna thu hong thei ding uhhi," a hong ci hi.
"Mihing ahi Ezekiel aw, Egypt kumpipa Faro' lam nga in la, amah leh Egypt gam khempeuh gim a kipiakna ding thu genkhol in.

Ni khat ni ciangin Israel mite a sim dingin mi khat ka sawl ding hi, ci-in keima nasem Israel kamsangte tung tawnin, sawtpek lai-in ka gengen niloh mipa pen nang na hi hi. Hih thu Topa { Pasian } in gen khinzo hi.
Amah kumpi a suah a kum masa kumin keimah Daniel in, { Topa } in kamsang Jeremiah tungah Jerusalem kum sawmsagih sung kisia ding hi, ci-in a genna thu ngaihsunin biakna laibute ka sim hi.
Kamsangte tungah thu ka gen hi. Mangmuhna a banbanin pia-in, kamsangte tungah thugentehna tawh thu a genpa zong keimah ka hihi.

{ Topa } in hih bangin ci hi: Damaskas khuamite thumvei a khialh khit, a liveina hangin pelloin amaute gim ka pia ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh amaute in an gawina suang tawh gawizan bangin, Gilead gammite gawigawp uhhi.

{ Topa } in hih bangin ci hi: Taia khuamite thumvei a khialh khit, a liveina hangin pelloin amaute gim ka pia ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh amaute in minambup khat Edom mite tungah ap uh a, lawmta dinga a thuciamna uh zuilo uhhi.

{ Topa } in hih bangin ci hi: Moab mite thumvei a khialh khit, a liveina hangin pelloin amaute gim ka pia ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh leiseek cian'na-ah a kizang leikanga zat dingin Edom kumpipa' guhte a hal uhhi.
Topa { Pasian } in ama nasem kamsangte tungah ama geelna theisak masa lopi-in bangmah hih hetlo hi.

Amos in Amaziah dawng a, "Kei pen kamsang ka hi kei a, kamsangte' ta zong ka hi beek kei hi. Kei pen tuucing ka hi a, theithek huan puah tawh a thuahkhawm ka hihi. 15 Ka tuucin'na panin { Topa } in kei hong samkhia a, ama mi Israel-te tungah thugen dingin a hong sawl hi.
Jonah zong khuasung lam manawhin kipan a, ni khat sung lam a pai khit ciangin, "Ni sawmli khit ciangin hih Nineveh khuapi kisusia ding hi," ci-in a kiko hi.

Ahi zongin tu-in kei kiangah hong ciahkik le uh cin, kei zong note kiangah kong paikik ding hi. 4 Na pu na pate uh bang nawn kei un. Nidanga kamsangte in amaute kiangah ka thu gen uh a, gamtatsia gamta loin, a mawh nawnlohna ding hilh uhhi. Ahi zongin amaute in ka thu ngainuam loin, ka thu hong manglo uhhi. 5 Tu-in na pu na pate uh koi-ah om ahi hiam? Tua kamsangte nungtalai sa na hi uhhiam? 6 Ahi zongin ka nasem ahi kamsangte' tung tawnin ka hilhkholhna leh ka thupiaknate in note dongin hong sukhalo ding sa na hi uhhiam, ka ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin a tawpna-ah amaute kisik uh a, hih dinga ka lungsimah ka geelsa bangin amau' gamtatna tawh kizui-in gim a pia ka hihna thu a phawk uhhi,’ ci in," a ci hi.
Herod a sih hun ciangdong tua gamah a va om uhhi. Kamsangpa tung tawnin Topa in, "Egypt gam panin ka Tapa ka samkhia hi," ci-in a genna thu a tun'na dingin hih bangin a piang a hihi.

Hih bangin thu hong pian' ciangin kamsangpa Jeremiah in, 18 "Nakpi taka kahna awging Ramah gamsungah kiza hi. Rachel in a tate kah a, a tate khempeuh si khin ahih manin a kah a tawpna dingin kikhem zolo hi," ci-in a genna thu a tun'na ding a hihi.

"Midangte in keima hangin a manlopi-in hong simmawhin hong bawlsia a, a nam tuamtuamin hong gensiat uh ciangin thupha ngah mi na hi uhhi. 12 Note-a' dingin vantungah thaman lianpi hong kikoih kholhsak ahih manin tua bang na tuah uh ciangin nuamin na lungdam un. Note' hun ma-a kamsangte zong tua bangmahin a na kibawlsia ngei a hihi.

"Kamsang taktak a hilote na muh uh ciangin limtakin kikem un. Amaute in a tungthamah tuu lim hong pua-in, ahi zongin a sungtawng taktak uh ngia hangsan bang ahi uhhi. 16 Amaute' gamtatna tawh amau' pianzia na thei ding uhhi. Lingvom kung panin leenggah kilo ngeilo a, sialtalling kung panin theigah kilo ngei ahi hiam? 17 Tua ahih manin singkung cidamte in gah limci gah a, singkung ginalote in gah ginalo gah uhhi. 18 Singkung cidamte in gah ginalo gah ngeilo a, singkung ginalote in gah limci gah ngeilo hi. 19 Gah limci a gahlo singkungte kiphukin meikhuk sungah kikhul hi. 20 Tua ahih manin amau' gamtatna tawh amau' pianzia na thei ding uhhi.
Kamsang Isaiah in, "Amah in eite' natna teng thuakin, eite' gimna teng puakhia hi," ci-in a genna thu a tun'na dingin hih bang a piang a hihi.
Kamsang kineihkhem mi tampi hong piang ding a, mi tampi tak umkhialsak ding uhhi.

Banghang hiam cihleh Christ a kineihkhemte leh kamsang a kineihkhemte hong piang ding a, ahih zawh leh a teelsa mite nangawn a khemna dingun lim leh na lamdang lianpipi hong bawl ding uhhi. 25 A hun ma-in hong genkholkhin ka hih manin limtakin kidawm un.

Banghang hiam cihleh Christ kineihkhemte leh kamsang kineihkhemte hong piang ding a, ahihzawh leh, a teelsa mite nangawn a khemna dingun lim leh na lamdangte hong bawl ding uhhi. 23 Tua ahih manin kidawm un! A hun ma-in kong genkhin hi.

Amah pen kamsang Elijah mah bangin thahatna leh vangliatna tawh Pasian mai-ah hong mapai ding hi. Pate leh tate kilemsak kikin, mihoihte' lungsim bang a neihna dingun thumanglo mite' lungsim heisak ding a, Topa-a' dingin a kilawm dingin mite a bawlkhol ding hi," a ci hi.

Tua laitakin Asher minamte sung panin Fanuel' tanu Anna minnei kamsang numei khat a om hi. Amah a khangham mahmah khat hi a, a nungak laitakin a neih a pasal tawh kum sagih sung a ten'khop khit ciangin,
Tua ciangin Zeisu in a thugen zomlai a, "Ke'n kong cihin-ah, kamsang a kuamah peuh ama khua-ah kipakta ngeilo hi
"Mi khempeuh in note hong pahtakbawl ciangin gimna a thuakding na hi uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh a pu a pate un zong tua bangmahin kamsang zuaute a pahtakbawl uhhi.

Pasian in hih bangin gen hi: Nitawp ni ciangin, mi khempeuh tungah ka Kha ka sung ding a, na tanute uh leh na tapate un keima thu taangko ding uhhi; na tangvalte un maang mu ding uh a, na puteekte un mang man ding uhhi. 18 Tua ni ciangin ka nasem numeite leh ka nasem pasalte' tung nangawnah ka Kha ka sung ding a, amaute in keima thu gen ding uhhi.
Ama Christ in a thuakna ding thu, Pasian in tanglai pekin kamsangte khempeuh tung tawnin genkhol a, tu-in hih bangin a thugen kholhna a hong tungsak a hihi.

Tua hun pawl laitakin Jerusalem khua panin Antiok khua-ah kamsang pawlkhat paisuk uhhi. 28 Amaute sung panin Agabas a kici kamsangpa hong ding a, leitung khempeuhah kialpi hong tung ding hi, ci-in Khasiangtho sawlna tawh a genkhol hi. (Tua kialpi pen Klaudias in Gam uk Kumpi a sep laitakin a tung hi.) 29 Tua lai-a om thu um mite in amau hihzawh zah ciat hanciamin Judea gama om thu um mite kiangah huhna a puakna ding uh a vaihawm uhhi.

Amah in Pasian thu a hilh tanu-ngak li nei hi. 10 Tua lai-ah tawlkhat ka taam khit uh ciangin Judea gam panin Agabas min nei kamsang khat hong tung hi. 11 Kote' kiangah amah hong pai-in Paul' kawnggak hong laksak a, tua kawnggak tawh ama khut leh a khete a gakcip khit ciangin, "Khasiangtho in, ‘Jerusalem khuasungah hih bangin Jew mite in hih kawnggak neipa hencip ding a, Gentail mite' khutsungah pia ding hi,’ ci hi," a hong ci hi.
Tua bang mite in i Topa Christ' na a sem hiloin, gilpi vai bek a sem uh a hihi. Amaute in mite phatin kamkhum nono zang uh ahih manin mihoih pawlkhat a khemzo uhhi.

Maang a muhna hangun a thupi diakin kingaihsunin, a kilawmlo zah dongin kiniamkhiatna ding leh vantung mite biakding a hong hanthawn mite' khemsa-in ta kei un. Tua bang mite pen amau' ngaihsut tawmna tawh a kihisak mawk hi a,
Khasiangtho nasepna dongtangsak kei unla, 20 Thuhilhnate simmawhbawl kei un. 21 Thu khempeuh entel pha unla, a hoihte kemin,
Kamsangte' thugennate leh upate in na tungah a khut uh nga-in thu hong ngetsakna ahi nangma hihtheih siamnate na valkhongsak kei in.

A beisa hunah Pasian in kamsangte zangin i pupite tungah a lam tuamtuam tawh a khen khenin thu na gen ngeizo hi. 2 Ahi zongin tuhun nunung ciangin leitung vantung na khempeuh a bawlin a zat, a tawpna-ah na khempeuh a luah dingin a seh a Tapa zangin eite tungah thu hong gen hi.

Tua ahih manin kamsangte' gen thute a man taktak ahihna thu ka teltheih uhhi. Note' lungsimah Zingsol hong suakin khua a hong vak matengin khuamial laka mei taang bangin hih thute ngaihsun le uh cin hoih mahmah ding hi. 20 Na phawkding uh a thupi mahmah khat in: Laisiangtho sunga om thugen kholhnate, kuamah in ama pilna tawh a khiatna gen theilo hi. 21 Banghang hiam cihleh mihingte in a deih manin mailam thugenkholh theihna a kingah hilo a, Khasiangtho' sawlna tawh Pasian' kiang panin a hong pai thute a kigen ahi zaw hi.

Mite lakah kamsang manlo a omngei mah bangin note lakah sia manlo hong om ding hi. Siatna a piangsak thei thuhilhna a manlo hong lutpih simin, amaute mahmah a tankhia Topa nangawn nial ding uhhi. Tua ahih manin thakhat thu-in siatna thuaklawh ding uhhi. 2 Tua bang hinapi-in mi tampi tak in amau' gamtat hoihlohna zui ding uh a, tua bangin amau gamtatna hangin mite in thuman lampi gensia ding uhhi. 3 Hih sia manlote in a huaiham manun note kiang panin sum a ngahtheihna dingun phuahtawm thu hong gen ding uhhi. Ahi zongin sawtpeka kipanin amaute' thu a Khen dingpa a kigingsa-in om niloh a, amaute a Susia dingpa in en gige hi. 4 Banghang hiam cihleh vantung mite nangawn in khialhna a neih ciangin Pasian in khahkhong loin hell khuk sungah khia a, Thukhen Ni hun dong ngakin khuamial sungah kol bulhsa-in a omsak hi.

Tanglai peka kamsang siangthote' thugen kholhte leh note lakah sawltak na a semte in Topa leh Honpa' thupiakte a hong gensawn uh thute na phawkkik ding uh ka deih hi. 3 A masa penin na theihding uh panin: Hun nunung lam ciangin amau pumpi deihna zui-in a gamta mi pawlkhat hong om ding a, amaute in note hong zahpih bawlin, 4 "Amah a hong paikikna ding a thuciamna a bangci ahi hiam? I pu i pate zong si khinta uh a, leitung piancil a kipanin tudong na khempeuh a kibang mahin omom lai hi," hong ci ding uhhi.

Ka it lawmte aw, kha ka nei a ci mi khempeuh' thugen um kei unla, tua thute Pasian kiang pan mah ahi hiam, ci-in kantel un. Banghang hiam cihleh leitungah kamsang a kineihkhem tampi hong om khinta hi. 2 Pasian' Kha sawlna tawh thugente leh adangte bangci khentheih ding na hi uhhiam cihleh: Zeisu Christ pen mihing bangin hong pai hi, ci-in a gente khempeuh Pasian Kha' lamlahna tawh thugen a hihi. 3 Ahi zongin hih thu a nial mi peuhmah, Pasian Kha' sawlna tawh thugen hilo uhhi. Hih bang mite pen Christ' Gal hi a, hong paiding hi, ci-in na zaksa uh mah bangin tu-in leitungah a hong om khinta ahi uhhi. 4 Ka it tate aw, note, Pasian' mite na hi uh a, tua bang kamsang kineihkhemte a zokhin na hi uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh leitung mite a pan'pih dawimangpa sangin note hong ompih Pasian vanglian zaw hi.

Ahi zongin note ka hong mawhsakna ding thu khat om hi. Kamsang numei ka hi, ci-in thu a gen Jezebel na nial kei uhhi. Ama thuhilhna hangin ka nasemte in numei-pasal paktatna gamta-in milim biakna ante a ne uhhi.
Tua ciangin gulpi kamsung, ganhing kamsung, leh a manlo kamsangpa' kamsung panin uiphuk tawh a kibang kha gilo thum a hong pusuak ka mu hi.

Tua ciangin a ganhing leh tua ganhing omna-ah na lamdang a bawl kamsang zuaupa kiman khawm hi. Ganhing ciamtehna a neite leh ganhing lim a biate pen tua na lamdangte tawh a kikhem a hihi. Ganhing leh kamsang zuaupa, a nihun kat kikhulna meiphualpi sungah a hingtangun kilawn hi.
Amaute a khem Satan pen ganhing leh kamsang zuaupa a omna mun, kat a kikhulna meiphualpi sungah kilawn a, a sun a zanin tua lai munah amaute in gimna a thuak tawntung ding uh a hihi.
A mantakin, note in ka thugen na ngaih kei uh leh { Topa } in a pau na theihloh uh gamdang mite, note tungah thu hong hilhsak ding hi.
A um mite tungah hih vangliatna limte kipia ding hi: Keima hangin dawi hawlkhia thei ding uh a, pau dangte pau thei ding uhhi.

Amaute khempeuh Khasiangtho tawh kidim uh a, tua Kha in minam dangte' pau tawh amaute a pau theisak hi. 5 Tua laitakin biakna pawi siim dingin gam tuamtuam panin a hong pai Jew mi biakna hahkat mi tampi tak, Jerusalem khuasungah a om uhhi. 6 Hih huging a zak uh ciangin mihon tampi tak hong kikhawm uh a, hih Zeisu a um mite' thugen pen amau' pau ciatin za uh ahih manin lamdang a sa mahmah uhhi.

Tua bangin Peter in thu a hilh laitakin tua thuhilhna a ngai mite khempeuh tungah Khasiangtho hong tungsuk hi. 45 Gentail mite tungah zong Pasian in a Khasiangtho a piakkhongna thu a muh uh ciangin Joppa khua panin Peter tawh a hong paikhawm Jew mi thu umte in lamdang a sa mahmah uhhi. 46 Banghang hiam cihleh amaute in pau lamdang pau-in Pasian' liatna a phatnate uh amau bil mahmah tawh a za uhhi. Tua ciangin Peter in,
Paul in amaute tungah a khut a ngakkhit ciangin amaute tungah Khasiangtho hong tung hi. Amaute in pau lamdang hong paupah uh a, Pasian' thu zong a gen uhhi.

Tua ahih manin eite bangzahin ginalo hita lehang eite a hong huh dingin Khasiangtho a hong pai hi. Eite in a kilawm bangin thunget ding nangawn i thei kei a, ahi zongin Khasiangtho mah in tauna tawh eite-a' dingin a hong thumsak hi.

Tu-in note khempeuh pen Christ pumpi na hi uh a, na vekpi-un a pumpi na khat ciat na hi uhhi. 28 Tua ahih manin Pasian in pawlpi sungah mi khempeuh ama pan'mun ciat dingah a hong bulh hi. A masa-in sawltakte, a nihna-ah kamsangte, a thumna-ah laihilhte, tua ciangin na lamdang bawltheite, cina damsak theite, midang a huhtheite, thu vaihawm a siamte, leh pau lamdang a pau theite ahi uhhi. 29 A vekpi-un sawltak hilo a, a vekpi-un kamsang zong hilo uhhi. A vekpi-un laihilh, thuhilh hilo uh a, a vekpi-un na lamdang zong bawllo uhhi. 30 A vekpi-un cina damsakna ding siamna neilo uh a, a vekpi-un pau lamdang pau theilo uh a, a vekpi-un tua pau lamdangte a khiatna gen theilo uhhi. 31 Tua ahih manin Pasian' hong piak siamna a hoihpente deih belin na nei ta un. Tu-in a hoihpen thu khat ka hong gen ding hi.
Itna pen a tawntungin a kip a hihi. Thuhilh siamna a om tei hangin tawlkhat sung bek kimangin, pau lamdang pautheih siamnate a om hangin bei ding a, thutheih siamna a om hangin maimang ding hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh pau lamdang a paute pen mite' tungah thugen hiloin Pasian' tungah thugen a hihi. Amaute' pau kuamah in theilo a, Khasiangtho' vangliatna tawh Pasian' thusimte a gengen ahi uhhi.
Tua ahih manin pau lamdang a paute in, amau paute a khiatna a gen theihna ding uh siamna a neihna dingun thu ngen ta uh hen.
Ahi ta zongin pawlpite' biak kikhopna sungah pau lamdang kam tul sawm bang ka pau sangin midangte' phattuamna dingin a theihding uh kammal nga bek ka pauzaw ding hi.

Tua ahih manin pau lamdang pen thu um mite-a' ding hiloin, thu umlo mite in a uptheihna ding uh lim a hihi. Tua mah bangin Pasian' thuhilhna pen thu um mite-a' ding hi a, thu umlo mite-a' ding hilo hi. 23 Tua ahih manin pawlpi mi khempeuh na kikhopna uhah na vekpi-un pau lamdangin pau-in, mi mawkmawkte ahih kei leh thu umlo mite in hong mu zenzen leh, note pen mihai hontang hi, hong ci ding hilo ahi uhhiam?

Pau lamdang tawh thugen nuam a om leh zong, nih bang, ahih kei leh a tam penin thum bang in gen bek ding a, tua bangin a gen uh ciangin zong khat a man khit ciangin khat in a banbanin gen ding uhhi. 28 Ahi zongin a khiatna a genthei ding a om kei leh zong, kikhopna sungah pau lamdangin a pau nuampa gamdai takin om ding a, amah leh Pasian tawh kikal bekah kigen ding uhhi.
Ahi zongin ka it note ahih leh a siangtho na upna uhah na kip semsem unla, Khasiangtho vangliatna tawh thu na ngen un.
"{ Topa' } kha in kei tung tawnin thu hong gen a, ka kam sungah ama thugente om hi.
Thu a gen dingin kha in kei hong sawl a, tu taktak ciangin ka kam ka ki-ipzo nawn het kei hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh a sang, a lian, a nungta tawntung Pa, ama min Siangtho ahipa in hih bangin ci hi: "Kei pen a sangna mun leh a siangtho munah ka om a, a kiniamkhiat mite' lungsim leh a kisik mite' lungsim a thakhauhsak kik dingin kisikna leh kiniamkhiatna lungsim a neite tawh zong kei ka omkhawm hi.

Hih nate khempeuh keima bawlsa ahih manin hih nate khempeuh keima-a' ahi hi, { Topa } in ci hi. Ahih hangin kiniamkhiatin, lungsim a kitamzan mipa, keima thu-ah lau-in a ling kelkelpa, keima deih mipa a hihi.
Pasian' kha in hong paikhiatpih laitakin lungkim hetloin ka heh suak mahmah hi. Ahi zongin { Topa' } vangliatna in kei hong zozaw hi.

Tua ciangin Daniel (a min ding Betashazzar, ka pasian' min tamin a kiphuakpa) a hong pai hi. Pasian' kha ama sungah om ahih ciangin ama kiangah ka mangmat ka gen hi. 9 Ama kiangah, aisan theite laka a lianpen Betashazzar aw, Pasian' kha na sungah om ahih manin thuthuk khempeuh na theih theihlam ka thei hi. Hih ka mang a khiatna hong gen in, ka ci hi.
"Tua khit ciangin mi khempeuh tungah ka kha ka sung ding a, na puteekte un mang manin na tangvalte un maang mu ding uhhi.
{ Topa } in mang hong musak a, { Topa' } vantung mi mai-ah siampi lianpenpa Joshua' mawhna a zong dingin a kiangah Satan zong a om ka mu hi.
"Kha thu lamah zawngkhal a kisate sungah vantung ki-ukna thu om ahih manin thupha ngah mi ahi uhhi.
Pumpi a thah khit ciangin kha a that theilote na kihta kei un. Hell khuk sungah pumpi leh kha a nihin a susia theipa na kihtazaw un.
Tua ciangin amaute kiangah, "Ze-etna-ah na pukkhak lohna dingun pilvangin thu ngen un. Lungsim in ze-etna nangnuam napi, pumpi in nang zolo hi," a ci hi.
Nuntakna a piathei pen Pasian' Kha hi a, mihingte' hihtheih bangmah omlo hi. Keima hong gen thute pen nuntakna a hong piathei tua Kha thu a hihi.
Ahi zongin note sungah Christ hong om leh mawhna hangin na pumpi uh a si veve ding ahi zongin, note pen Pasian tawh kipawlkhin na hih manun note-a' dingin Khasiangtho pen nuntakna a hihi.
Eite, Pasian' tate ihihna thu eima lungsim bek in a gen hiloin Pasian' Khasiangtho in zong hong genpih hi.

Pasian' bawlsa nate bek hilo a, Pasian' hong piakkhong Khasiangtho maleep a ngah eite mahmah nangawn in zong, Pasian in ama tate-in hong bawlin i buppi-in a hong suahtaksak ding i ngakkawmin thumin tau-in i om hi.
Mihing khat' ngaihsutna pen ama lungsim bek mah in a theih mah bangin Pasian' Khasiangtho bek mah in Pasian' thu a cingin a thei hi.

Note tawh ka pumpi-in ka hong omkhop loh hangin note tawh ka lungsim hong omkhawm a, ka pumpi-in note tawh a hong omkhawm zah mah bangin tua bang a gamta mite tungah i Topa Zeisu' min tawh mawhsakna thu ka khen khinzo hi. 4 Note na kikhop khawm uh ciangin i Topa Zeisu Christ vangliatna in eite hong ompih ahih manin, note tawh ka lungsimin ka hong omkhawm hi. 5 Topa' Ni hong tun' ciangin tua bang mite' kha in hotkhiatna a ngahtheihna dingin Satan in amau pumpi a gimsak dingin na piakhia ta un.
Tua ahih manin Laisiangtho in, "A masa Adam pen leitung nuntakna a nei mihing hong suak hi," na ci hi. Ahi zongin a nunung Adam pen nuntakna a pia thei Kha a hihi.
Tua mah bangin eite zong kha thu-ah i neulai hun sungteng huihlak a uk vangneite' khutnuai-ah a om ihi hi.
Tuahun lai-in leitung gitloh gamtatnate na zui uh a, Pasian thu a umlo mite sungah tu laitakin na a sem, huihlak a ukte' thu na mang uhhi.

Dawimangpa' hong hihna ding khempeuh na dalzawhna dingun Pasian' galvan namkim na zang un. 12 Eite' do pen leitung mite hilo a, vantung huihlakah a om ukna, aana a neite, hih leitung khuamial a uk a tuamtuamte a hihi. 13 Tua ahih manin hun haksat hun hong tun' ciangin galte' hong suknateng khempeuh nangzo-in, a tawpna-ah a gualzo na hih theihna dingun Pasian' galvan namkim na zang un. 14 Tua ahih ciangin kawnggak gak bangin thutak zang unla, awmdal bulh bangin thuman zang unla, 15 kithawi-a khedap bulh bangin Lungdamna Thu a hilhkhia dingin kiging un. 16 Tua banah, dawimangpa' hong kapna thaltang kuangte na sukmitna dingun lum puak bangin upna na nei tawntung un. 17 Siklukhu khuk bangin hotkhiatna nei unla, Khasiangtho in a hong piak Pasian' thu pen namsau zat bangin na zang un. 18 Khasiangtho tawh kopin a tawntungin Pasian kiangah na kisapna khempeuh uh ngenin na thum unla, tatsat loin Pasian mi khempeuh-a' dingin thu na ngetsak un.
Vantung mite pen Pasian' na a sem, a kimu theilo khate hi uh a, hotkhiatna a ngahding mite a huh dingin Pasian in a hong sawl a hihi.

Laisiangtho sungah, "Eite sungah a hong guat kha pen Pasian in ngai mahmah hi," ci-in a kigelhna a mawkna-in a kigelh sa na hi uhhiam? 6 Lai Siangtho in, "Pasian in a kihisakte nial a, a kiniamkhiatte a hehpih hi," a cih mah bangin Pasian' hong hehpihna lianzaw hi. 7 Tua ahih manin Pasian' thu na mang un. Dawimangpa na nial un. Nial le uh cin no kiang panin taikhia ding hi.
Naungek suakcilte na bang unla, note khangto-in hotkhiatna na ngahtheihna dingun kha thu tawh kisai nawizu siangtho duh belin na nei tawntung un.
Tua kha nuntakna tawh va pai-in thongkia-in a om khate kiangah thu a va hilh hi.

Note pilvangin khua phawk un. Na gal uh ahi Dawimangpa, humpinelkai bangin a nektheih ding zongin vak kawikawi hi. 9 Leitungah thu um dang khempeuh in zong note' thuak mah bangin a thuak ahihna thu thei unla, na upna uhah kipin Dawimangpa na nial un.

Ka it lawmte aw, kha ka nei a ci mi khempeuh' thugen um kei unla, tua thute Pasian kiang pan mah ahi hiam, ci-in kantel un. Banghang hiam cihleh leitungah kamsang a kineihkhem tampi hong om khinta hi. 2 Pasian' Kha sawlna tawh thugente leh adangte bangci khentheih ding na hi uhhiam cihleh: Zeisu Christ pen mihing bangin hong pai hi, ci-in a gente khempeuh Pasian Kha' lamlahna tawh thugen a hihi. 3 Ahi zongin hih thu a nial mi peuhmah, Pasian Kha' sawlna tawh thugen hilo uhhi. Hih bang mite pen Christ' Gal hi a, hong paiding hi, ci-in na zaksa uh mah bangin tu-in leitungah a hong om khinta ahi uhhi.
Amau' aana neih huamsung bekah omloin a omna panun a paikhia vantung mite zong leinuai khuamial sungah sikkol kibulhin amau' thu a kikhen ding Ni lianpi ngakin Pasian in a koihcip hi.

{ Topa } in a namtui gimnam a zak ciangin, a lungsim sungah, "Mihing' gamtatna hangin leitang ka samsia kik ngei nawn kei ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh mihing' lungsim ngaihsutna pen a tangval lai panin a gilo hi mawk hi. Tu-a ka hih bangin nuntakna a nei khempeuh zong ka susia ngei nawn kei ding hi.
"{ Topa } na Pasian un note hong piak leitang tungah na khan' uh a sau theihna dingin na nu leh na pa uh zahtak un.
Note a kuamah peuh in na nu leh na pa uh zahtakin, note in ka Sabbath-te na tang ding uhhi; kei pen { Topa } na Pasian uh ka hihi.
Note in mi site' hangin dahna limin na ci tung uh liamsak loin note' tungah ciamtehna khat peuhpeuh zong na sun kei ding uhhi; kei pen { Topa } ka hihi.
"Note, sam kangte' mai-ah na kun ding uh a, puteekte' maitang zahtakin, na Pasian uh na kihta ding uhhi; kei pen { Topa } ka hihi.
‘{ Topa } note' Pasian in hong piak leitang tungah na khan' uh sau-in na nopsak theihna dingun { Topa } note' Pasian in hong thupiak bangin na nu na pa uh zahtak un.

Ahih hangin Ruth in, "Nang kong nusiatna ding ahi a, nang zuihna panin ka ciahkikna ding ahi zongin hong cici nawn kei in; banghang hiam cihleh na paina-ah ka pai ding a, na giahna-ah ka giak ding hi. Na mite keima mite hi ding a, na Pasian keima Pasian hi ding hi.
Saul in David kiangah, "Hih Filistia-pa tawh a kido dingin ama langkhatah na kuanzo kei ding hi. Nang pen tangval na hi pan a, amah pen a tangval-a kipan galkap mi ahi hi," a ci hi.

Nang kiang panin kei ka paikhiat phetin ka theihlohna munah { Topa' } kha in nang hong pua ding hi. Kei va pai-in Ahab kiangah genin amah in nang hong muhloh ciangin, ka khangno lai-a kipanin keimah na nasempa in { Topa } a zahtak hinapi-in, amah in kei hong that ding hi.

Josiah in uk ding a kipatin kum giat pha a, amah in Jerusalem-ah kum sawmthumlekhat sung uk hi. Ama nu' min Jedidah hi a, Bozkath khuami Adaiah' tanu a hihi. 2 { Topa' } mitah amah a manin gamta-in, a pu David' khekhap khempeuh zui cinten a, themkhat zong piallo hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh David in, "Ka tapa Solomon khangno-in pumpi tawh sinna om nailo a, { Topa}-a' ding a kilam biakinn pen gam khempeuhah minthan'na leh pahtawina-ah a lian mahmah ding a hihi. Tua ahih ciangin tua biakinn dingin keimah ka kigingkhol ding hi," a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin David in a sih ma-in na tampi tak koihkhol hi.

Tua ciangin Kumpi David in a kikhawm khempeuhte kiangah, "Pasian in amah bek a teelsa ka tapa Solomon pen khangno-in pumpi tawh sinna om nailo a, nasep ding pen lian mahmah hi. Banghang hiam cihleh hih biakinn lianpi pen mihing-a' ding hilo a, { Topa } Pasian-a' ding a hihi.
Rehoboam khangno lai a, thu khentat thei nailoin, amaute a nial zawh nailoh hun laitakin mi ginalo honkhat Solomon' tapa Rehoboam' kiimah kikhawmin amah dem uhhi.

Joash in uk ding a kipatin kum sagih pha a, Jerusalem-ah kum sawmli sung uk hi. Ama nu' min Zibiah hi a, Beersheba khuami a hihi. 2 Siampi Jehoiada' hunsung khempeuh { Topa' } mitah Joash a manin gamta hi.
Josiah in uk ding a kipatin kum giat pha a, amah in Jerusalem-ah kum sawmthumlekhat sung uk hi. 2 { Topa' } mitah a man gamta a, a pu David' khekhap zui-in themkhat zong lampial lo hi.
A pumpi moi suahin a thatang a hat mahmah hangin a sawtloin leivui a suakpak ding a hihi.
kei hong muh phetun khangnote in tutna hong awn uh a, kei hong zahtakna limun papite na ding uhhi.
"Lunggulhna tawh nungak khatpeuh ka et ngeilohna ding, kiciamna ka bawlkhin hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Buz-te beh Barakhel' tapa Elihu in thu gen ding hong kipan a, "Kei a khangno lai hi-in, note a khangham na hih manun, ka ngaihsutna note lakah kong gen ngam kei hi.
Tua ciangin ama pumpi khangnosuak kikin, a thahat pen hun laitak a bangkik ding hi.
Amaute khan'sih uh a, a zumhuaipi-in a bei uhhi.

{ Topa } aw, tanglai peka kipan a omsa ahih manin, na hehpihna leh na itna kip hong phawkkik in. 7 { Topa } aw, ka khangno lai-a ka mawhna leh ka khialhnate ciamteh kei in la, na hoihna na ngaihsutna leh na itna kip tawh kizui-in kei hong phawk in!
Banghang hiam cihleh Topa { Pasian } aw, ka neu lai-a kipanin ka hong lamet, ka hong muan' na hi hi, { Topa } aw.
Pasian aw, ka khangno lai-a kipanin nong thuhilh a, a lamdang na nasepnate ka gengen lai hi.
Mei in a tangvalte kanglum a, a nungakte' pasal ding kuamah om nawnlo hi.
Nangmah in a teek hun nailopi-in amah na teeksak a, maizumna tawh na kidimsak hi.
Muvanlai bangin ka tha a hat theihna dingin thupha namkim hong pia hi.
Nangma mihonte mual siangtho tungah na makaih ciangin, utna lungsim tawh na mite hong kipia ding uhhi. Daitui bangin zingsangin na khangnona nangma tungah hong tung ding hi.
Tangval khat in ama gamtatna a siangtho mahmah dingin bangci kep ding ahi hiam? Nangma thu zuihna tawh ama gamtatna siangthosak thei ding hi.
Ka tapate uh a tangval lai-in khang cingin a khauh mahmah singkungte bang ta hen la, ka tanute uh a nungak lai-in kumpi inn lamna dinga a kisui innkiu khuampite bang ta hen.
Ka ta aw, na pa' hong thuhilhna hoihtakin zui in la, na nu' hong thugente ngai in. 9 Tua thuhilhnate in na gamtat hong hoihsak ding a, kizepna lukhu leh kizepna khi bangin hong etlawmsak ding hi.
Na lungsim khempeuh tawh { Topa } muang in la, nang' theihna suang kei in. 6 Na hihna khempeuhah amah phawk in. Tua hi leh lampi man amah in hong lak ding hi.
Ka ta aw, ka thugente don in la, ka kammalte ngai in. 21 Na kiang panin paikhiasak kei in la, na lungsimah ciamteh in. 22 Banghang hiam cihleh tua thu a zuite in nuntakna leh cidamna-in a nei uhhi.

Tua ahih ciangin na zi tawh lungkim in la, na ten'pih numei tawh lungdam in. 19 A ithuai a ngaihbaangin ngaihsun tawntung in la, ama ngaihbaan'na tawh lungdamin, ama hong itna tawh lungkim in. 20 Ka ta aw, banghangin numei dang lunggulh ding a, numei dangte' ngaihbaan'na iplah ding na hi hiam? 21 Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in na gamtatna khempeuh hong mu a, na paina khempeuhah nang hong en kawikawi hi.
Ka ta aw, na pa' hong gen bangin gamta in la, na nu' hong thuhilhnate mangngilh kei in. 21 Amau' hong thugente phawk tawntung in la, na lungsimah ciamteh niloh in.
bangmah a phawk nailo tangval honkhat lakah, tangval thu theilo khat, ka lim muhkha hi.
Khangnote' thahatna pen amau' minthan'na hi a, khanghamte' sam kan'na pen amau' thupina lim a hihi.
Nangma pian'na na pa' thu ngai in la, na nu a teek ciangin simmawh bawl kei in.
Ka ta aw, ka thugente ciamteh in la, keima gamtat bangin nang zong gamta in
Na nuntakna ding zong masa in la, na an nek ding a kicin' ciang bekin na inn ding lamin zi leh ta nei pan in.

Kumpipa Lemuel, a nu in a thuhilhna: 2 Kong it mahmah ka ta aw, thu ngenngenin kong neih ka tapa na hi hi. Nangma tungah bang teng hong gen ding ka hi hiam? 3 Na thatang teng numei tungah beisak kei in la, na sum khempeuh numei tungah zang kei in. Numei in kumpipa siasak thei hi. 4 Lemuel aw, ka thugen hong ngai in. Kumpite in zu nek huailo a, mi ukte in khamtheihzu a duh ding hilo hi.

Khangnote aw, na khangnona uh nuamsa unla, na khangno lai-un lungdam un. Na hihnop peuhpeuh uhhih unla, na ut bangbangun gamta un. Ahi zongin na gamtatna uh tawh kizui-in Pasian in thu hong khen ding phawk gige un. 10 Note kilunggimsak kei unla, na pumpi uh gentheisak kei un. Banghang hiam cihleh na khangno hunsung uh sauveilo ding hi.
Na lungkham hun ding a hong tun' ma, "Nuntak nuamsa kei ing," na cih ma hun, na khangno lai-in nang hong Piangsakpa phawk in.
Mihingte pen kham hoihte sangin a hoihzaw, minam pen Ofir gam khamte sangin a hoihzaw-in ka bawl ding hi.

Khangnote nangawn gimin tawl ding a, khanglai mite a tha uh bei ding hi. 31 Ahih hangin { Topa } a muang mite a tha uh dimkik ding a, muvanlai bangin kha tawh leengto-in, amaute tai napi-un tawllo ding uh a, amaute lam pai napi-un gimlo ding uhhi.

Lau kei in, maizumna na thuak kei ding hi. Cihna ding theiloin om kei in; maizumin nang hong kikoihlo ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh na khangno lai-in na zulhtatna leh na meigon'na hangin hong kikonate na phawkkha nawn kei ding hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh tangval in nungak khat a ten'pih mah bangin nang hong lampa in nang hong ten'pih ding a, zipipa mothaknu tungah a lungdam mah bangin nang tungah na Pasian lungdam ding hi.

"Pai in la, Jerusalem khuamite' zak dingin va taangko in. { Topa } in kong cihin-ah: Na khangno lai-a nong kipiakna, na mothak lai-a nong itna, a kikho nailo gamlakah kei' nung nong zuih lai hun ka phawk hi.
Vanglian { Topa } in, "En un, amaute gim ka pia ding hi. A tangvalte uh namsau-in si ding uh a, a tapate leh a tanute uh kialin a puksi ding uhhi.
Na khangno lai-in thuakzawh hat ding kisin leteh hoihpen hi.

Ahi zongin kei zong ka dawngkik a, "Topa { Pasian } aw, cikmahin kei ka kininsak ngei kei hi. Ka neu tunga kipan tudongin ama thu-in a sitawm ganhing sa ahi a, gamsate' nekbang ahi zongin ka ne ngei kei hi. A nin-in a kiseh an khat peuhpeuh ka ne ngei nai kei hi," ka ci hi.
Hih bangin numei paktat nuntakna tawh a mindaihuai-in na om laitakin na neulai thu, guaktangin na omlai, sisan naisan lakah na kitomtom lai thu na phawkkha kei hi.
Ahi zongin na neu lai-a nang tawh i thuciamna lenkipin, a kimang tawntung ding thuciamna nang tawh ka bawl ding hi.

Daniel in kumpi innsunga an leh leenggahzu tawh a pumpi a thanghuaisak lohna dingin a lungsim a khensat hi. Amah in innsungmang lianpen Ashpenaz kiangah tua bang an a kipiaklohna dingin a ngen zaw hi.

Pasian in tua khangno lite laitheih siamna leh pilna thukte a pia hi. Daniel pen mangmuhna leh mangkhiat siamna a pia hi. 18 Kumpipa' sehsa kum thum a cin' khit ciangin Ashpenaz in khangnote khempeuh kumpipa kiangah a paipih hi. 19 Kumpipa in amaute khempeuh hopih a, Daniel, Hananiah, Mishael, leh Azariah-te adangteng khempeuh sangin a hoihzawk tuanlam uh a mu hi. Tua ahih ciangin kumpi inn-a vaihawm ulian pawl a suak uhhi. 20 Kumpipa in bangbang thuhaksa nono a dot hangin, hih mi lite pen ama gamsung khempeuha mitphial siamte leh aisan theite khempeuh sangin a zah sawmin a siamzawklam uh a mu hi. 21 Sairas, Babylon kumpi a suah hun dong, kumpi inn-ah Daniel omto paisuak hi

Ngattakin zuih ding thukham khat kumpipa in na bawl ding, gamsung nasem ko vaihawmpite, gam ukpite, gam ukpi huhte, leh kumpipa' thudot mite khempeuh ka thukim uhhi. Tuzawh ni sawmthum sungin nang kumpipa kiang longal, pasian kiang ahi a, midang khat peuhpeuh kiangah ahi zongin thungen om theilo ding hi, ci-in na kham ding hi. Hih na thupiakna a manglo peuhmah humpinelkai kikhumna sungah kikhia ding hi.
Tua ciangin amah a encik mite in Daniel in Pasian kiangah thu a nget a mu uhhi.

"Keimah in leitungah kialpi kong tun'sak hun hong tung ding hi. Tua kialpi pen an leh tui duhna kialpi hilo ding a, { Topa' } thu zaknop mahmahna kialpi hi ding hi. Topa { Pasian } ahi keimah in hih thu kong gen khin hi. 12 Mihingte, leilu pan leitaw dong, { Topa' } thu kanin vak kawikawi ding uh a, ahi zongin mu zolo ding uhhi. 13 Tua ni ciangin nungakte leh tangvalte dangtakin puk ding uhhi.

Banghangin hong sanglo hiam, na ci uhhi. Na khangnolai uha na ten'pih na zite uh tungah na cihtaklohna uh amah in hong thei a, na zite uh tungah na cihtak tawntungna ding uh Pasian tungah thu ciamin, na zite uh zong na lawmnu mah uhhinapi-in amaute tawh na thuciamna uh na pelhna hang uh a hihi. 15 Pasian in na zite uh tawh pumkhat, lungsim khat ahi dingin hong bawl hilo ahi hiam? Hih bangin a hong bawlna pen bang a deihna ahi hiam? Pasian' mi taktak ahi ding tate i neih theihna ding a hihi. Tua ahih manin na khangno lai-un na ten'pih na zi uh tawh na thuciamna uh na palsatkhak lohna dingun kidawm un.
Zeisu a pumpi leh a pilna khang a, ama gamtatna in Pasian leh mite a lungkimsak semsem hi.

‘Pasian in hih bangin gen hi: Nitawp ni ciangin, mi khempeuh tungah ka Kha ka sung ding a, na tanute uh leh na tapate un keima thu taangko ding uhhi; na tangvalte un maang mu ding uh a, na puteekte un mang man ding uhhi.

A zingciangin ding leuleu-in Sisaria khua ka tung uh a, Pasian thu a hilh Philip' inn-ah tungin tua lai-ah ka taam uhhi. Tuapa pen Jerusalem khua-a a kiteel mi sagihte sungah a kihel a hihi. 9 Amah in Pasian thu a hilh tanu-ngak li nei hi.
Na pumpi uh deihna zui-in na gamtat uh leh na si ding uh a, ahi zongin Khasiangtho huhna tawh na mawh gamtatnate uh na sihsak uh leh na nungta ding uhhi.

Na tuah uh ze-etnate khempeuh pen mite' tuah ngeingeite mah a hihi. Pasian in citakin a thuciamna lenkip ahih manin note' thuak zawhloh ding ze-etna hong tuaksaklo ding hi. Ze-etna na tuah hun uh ciangin zong na thuakzawhna ding uh thahatna hong guan'ding ahih manin na suahtak zawhna ding uh lampi hong hon'sak ding hi.
Naupang ka hih hun lai-in naupang mah bangin kampau-in, thu ngaihsunin, ka gamta hi. Ahi zongin tu-in khangham ka hih manin naupang vaite ka zang nawn kei hi.
Tuahun ciangin thu upna lamah naupang ihi nawn kei ding a, mite khemin a khialsak theite' mutna hangin i suk hoi i to hoi nawn kei ding a,

Tate aw, na nu na pate uh thu na man'ding uh Christian ngeina hi a, ahi ding mah a hihi. 2 Thupiakna a lian khat in, "Na nu leh na pa zahtak in," cihna hi a, khapna thu tawh kizom pahin, "Zahtak lecin nang-a' dingin thu hong hoihin, leitungah na khan' a sau ding hi," na ci pah hi.
Tate aw, na nu na pate uh thu man' tawntung ding pen na Christian nasep uh a hihi. Tua bang thuman'na in Pasian lungdamsak hi.
Khangno lai na hihna thu hangin mite' simmawh dingin na om kei in la, kampauna, gamtatna, itna, upna leh siangthona-ah thu um mite' etteh dingin na om in.
Nang sangin a uzaw mite taiibawl kei in la, na pa bangin ngaihsunin hanthawn in. Nang sangin a nauzawte na nau bangin bawl in.

Meigong numei khatpeuh in tate ahi a, tute ahi zongin a neih leh innkuan sungah biakna tawh kisai-in tavuan a neihna uhhilh in la, a nu a pa, a pu a pite a huhna dingun gen in. Hih bang gamtatna pen Pasian' muhna-ah a hoih thu a hihi.
Na pi Lois leh na nu Eunis in a neih upna bangte pawl mah, lungsim takpi tawh na upna thu ka phawk a, tu-in zong nang sungah tua bang upna om hi, ci-in ka ngaihsun hi.
Tua ahih manin khangno lunggulhna hoihlote pelh in la, lungsim takpi tawh Topa tungah huhna a ngen mite tawh thuman thutak, upna, itna, kilemna na neihtheihna dingun hanciam khawm un.
Tua mah bangin khangnote zong amau pumpi a ki-ukzawhna dingun na hanthawn pha in.

Tua mah bangin no khangnozaw deuhte in zong a khanghamte' thu na mang un. Laisiangtho in, "Pasian in a kiphasak mite nial a, a kiniamkhiat mite a hehpih hi," a cih mah bangin na vekpi-un kiniamkhiatna puan bangin silhin, khatlekhat na na kisepsak un.

Pate aw, note tungah lai ka hong gelhna pen a kipat cila kipanin a na ompa na theihna hang uh a hihi. Tangvalte aw, note tungah lai ka hong gelhna pen note na lungsim uh thahatin, Pasian' thu zui-in, Dawimangpa zokhin na hihna hang uh a hihi.
Tu-in Saul' tung panin { Topa' } kha paikhia a, { Topa } in kha gilo sawlin tua kha gilo in amah gimsak hi.

Amaute in note kiangah, "Phun suausuau-in a pau mualmual vankah theite leh aisan theite kiangah thu dong un. Mite in amau' pasian-te thu dongin, mihingte' thu pen misite dot ding mah hilo ahi hiam?" hong ci ding uhhi. 20 Tua ciangin note in, "{ Topa } in note hong hilh thute ngai un. Aisante' thu ngai kei un. Amaute' hong gen thute a kiman'na omlo hi," ci-in dawng un.

Tuili galkhat, Gadara gam a tun' ciangin han panin dawivei mi nih hong paikhia-in Zeisu a na dawn uhhi. Tua mi nihte kihtakhuai mahmah ahih manin amaute omna lam tawnin kuamah pai ngamlo uhhi. 29 Amaute nakpi takin hong kiko uh a, "Pasian' Tapa aw, kote bang hong nuammawh na hi hiam? A hun tung nailopi-in kote gim a pia dingin hong pai na hi hiam?" a ci uhhi. 30 Tua laitakin tua san panin a gamlalo mun khatah vok honpi gamta-in a om hi. 31 Tua ciangin dawite in Zeisu kiangah, "Kote hong hawlkhia ding na hih leh hua vokte sungah hong lutsak in," ci-in a thum uh ciangin 32 Zeisu in, "Pai un," ci ahih manin amaute zong paikhia-in vokte sungah a lut uhhi. Tua vok honte, keen luvum panin tuaksuk gawpin tuili sung tu uh ahih manin a vekpi-in tuikia-in a si khin hi.
Zeisu in a nungzui sawmlenihte sam a, dawite a hawlkhiat theihna ding uh leh natna nam khempeuh a damsak theihna dingun amaute tungah vangliatna a pia hi.
Tua ciangin mi pawlkhat in Zeisu kiangah mittawt leh pau theihloh a thuah dawivei mi khat hong paipih uhhi. Zeisu in amah damsak ahih manin amah hong pauthei-in khua zong hong muthei hi.

"Mi khatpeuh sung panin dawi a kihawlkhiat khit ciangin a ten'na ding mun keuna zongin a vak kawikawi hi. Ahi zongin a ten'na ding mun a muh zawhloh ciangin, 44 ‘Ka paikhiatnasa inn mahah ciahkik ning,’ ci hi. A hong paikik ciangin tua inn na awnglai a, kipuah siangin hoihtakin a om a mu hi. 45 Tua ciangin va paikik a, amah sangin a siahuaizaw dawi sagih hong tun'pihin tua mipa sungah a teng uhhi. Tua ahih manin tua mipa pianzia pen a masa huna sangin a siazaw hi. Tua ahih ciangin tuhuna migilote zong hih mipa' pianzia mah tawh kibang ding uhhi," a ci hi.

Tua laitakin kikhopna inn sungah dawivei mi khat hong lut a, 24 "Nazareth khuami Zeisu aw, kote tawh nang bang kisai ihi hiam? Kote a susia dingin hih lai-ah hong om na hi hiam? Pasian' mi siangtho na hihlam kong thei hi," ci-in a kiko hi.
Tua laitakin mite' sunga lut dawite in Zeisu a muh uh ciangin a mai-ah pukin kiko uh a, "Nang pen Pasian' Tapa na hi hi," a ci uhhi.

Gunkuang tung panin Zeisu a kumsuk khit phetin, han lak panin a hong pai mi khat in na dawntuah hi. 3 Hih mipa dawivei hi a, han lakah a teng hi. Kuamah in hih mipa, sikkhau tawh henzo nawnlo uhhi. 4 Tamveipi tak, a khut leh a khe, sikkhau tawh kihen khin ngei a, ahi zongin a kihen simin a sikkhaute botsatin, a khe-a kibulh kolte a sukham gawp hi. Amah hatlua ahih manin kuamah in hih zolo hi. 5 Sun leh zanin han lak leh mualtung tengah vak kawikawi a, awng gawpin, suang hiamte tawh amah a kikuiliam hi. 6 Hih mipa in Zeisu a gal muh ciangin hong delhin ama mai-ah khukdin' a, 7 nakpi takin kiko-in, "A Lianpen Pasian' Tapa Zeisu aw, kei bang hong nuammawh na hi hiam? Kei, gim hong pia kei in, ci-in Pasian' min tawh kong thum hi," a ci hi.

Zeisu in amaute kiangah, "Upna neilo mite aw, note bang tanvei hong ompih ding a, bang tanvei hong kikholhpih ding ka hi hiam? A naupang hong paipih un," a ci hi. 20 Amaute in zong Zeisu kiangah a naupang hong paipih uhhi. Dawi in Zeisu a muh phetin naupang kongkawsak ahih manin leilakah pukin kikhuk a, a cilphuan a bua hi. 21 Zeisu in, "A natzawh bang tanvei sawtta ahi hiam?" ci-in a pa kiangah a dong hi. "A neutunga kipan a hihi.
A dawi nakpi takin kiko-in naupang a kongkawtsak khit ciangin a taikhia hi. Naupang pen misi tawh kibangin omcip ahih manin mi khempeuh in, "Si ta hi," a ci uhhi.

Kikhopna innsungah dawivei mi khat om a, nakpi takin kiko-in, 34 "Nazareth khuami Zeisu aw, kote tawh bang kisai ihi hiam? Kote a susia dingin hong pai na hi hiam? Pasian' mi siangtho na hih lamtak ka hong thei uhhi," a ci hi. 35 Zeisu in tua dawi taii a, "Pau kei in la, ama sung panin paikhia in," ci-in thu a pia hi. Dawi in a mipa mihon lakah a puksak khit ciangin ama sung panin paikhia a, ahi zongin liamsaklo hi.

Tuazawh tawlkhat khit ciangin khuapite leh khuaneute-ah a ban banin Zeisu pai a, Pasian' Ukna hangin Lungdamna Thu hilhin a vak kawikawi hi. Tua a vak kawikawina-ah nungzui sawmlenihte, 2 leh a sungpan dawi a hawlkhiatsakte leh natna tuamtuam pan a damsak numei pawlkhat in zong a zui uh hi. Tua numeite: A sung panin dawi sagih a kihawlkhiatna Mary (Magdala khuami Mary a kicinu), 3 Herod' khutnuai-a ulian Khuza' zi Joanna, Susanna, leh numei dang tampite hi uh a, amau' neihsa tawh Zeisu leh a nungzuite a huh uh hi.
Lamdungah khaici a tukna munte pen Pasian' thu a zate a cihnopna a hihi. Tuate in Pasian' thu a zak hangun a thu umloin, hotkhiatna a ngahlohna dingun Dawimangpa hong pai-in a lakkhiatsak hi.
Zeisu in ama kiangah, "Na min bang ahi hiam?" ci-in a dot ciangin, ama sungah dawi tampi lut ahih manin, "A Honpi," ci-in a dawng hi.
Ahi zongin dawite in na thu uh hong man'na hangin lungdam kei unla, vantungah na min uh a kigelh manin lungdamzaw un," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah paikhia kikin, amah sangin a siazaw dawi sagih hong paipih a, a sungah lutin a teng uhhi. Tua mipa' pianzia pen a masa sangin hong siazaw hi," a ci hi.
Zeisu leh a nungzuite nitak an ne-in a tukhawm uhhi. Tua hun laitakin dawimangpa in Simon Iskariot' tapa Judas' lungsim sungah Zeisu lehhekna ding ngaihsutna koih khinzo hi.
"Dawimangpa tawh a kibang mipa aw, thuhoih khempeuh nialin, gitlohna ngian tuamtuam na nei a, Topa' thuman pen zuau suahsak ding na hanciam tawntung hi.

Nikhat, thungetna mun a zuan dingin ka pai laitakun mailam thu a genthei dawivei nasem numei khat in kote hong dawntuah hi. Tua numei in mailam thu a genna tawh a tote-a' dingin sum tampi a ngahsak hi. 17 Tua numei in Paul leh kote hong zui-in, "Hih mite, A Lianpen Pasian' nasemte ahi uhhi. Note a hong kihotkhiat theihna ding thu a hong gen uh ahi hi," ci-in a kiko hi.18 Tua bangin ni tampi sung awng ngitnget ahih manin a sawtna ciangin Paul in nawngkaisa ahih manin kihei-in a dawi kiangah, "Hih numei sung panin na paikhiatna dingin Zeisu Christ min tawh thu kong pia hi," a cihkhit phetin, tua numei sung panin dawi a paikhia pah hi.

Pasian in Paul' tung tawnin na lamdang lianpipi a bawl hi. 12 Ama zat mainul ahi a, a puante ahi zongin cinate kiangah a kipaipih ciangin a natnate uh damin, a sunga om dawite zong a taikhia uhhi. 13 Dawi hawlkhia-in a vak kawikawi Jew mi aitawi pawlkhat in zong Topa Zeisu' min zangin dawi hawlkhiat ding a sawm uhhi. Amaute in dawite kiangah, "Paul in a gengen Zeisu' min tawh thu kong pia uhhi," a ci uhhi.
dawilutna mipa in amaute buan gawpin zogawp ahih manin, a liam a bai, puan keksa-in tua mipa' inn panin a taikhia uhhi.

Tua bang mite pen hih leitung pasian gilote in a lungsim mit uh tawsak ahih manin umlo uh a, Pasian tawh a kibang teekteek Christ minthan'na hangin amaute tungah a hong taang lungdamna thu khuavak mu theilo uhhi.
Tua ahih manin ka hong it lawmte aw, pumpi leh lungsim a ninsak theite khempeuh panin kisian'suahin, Pasian zahtakna tawh nungta-in siangtho sinsenin om ni.
Ahi zongin gulpi in ama zuau ngian tawh Eve a khemzawh bangin na lungsim uh kihei-in Christ tungah na kipiaknate uh na nusiatkhak ding uh ka lunghimawh hi.

Tua ciangin lim lamdang adang khat mah vanah hong kilang leuleu hi. Gulpi san a lian mahmah khat om a, lutang sagih leh ki sawm nei a, a lutang sagihte-ah lukhu mah nei ciat hi. 4 A mei tawh vanah a om aksi sehsawmsuah sehkhat vatkhia-in leilak a den'na hi. A nau a suah phetin a ne pah dingin nausuak dingin a kithawi tua numei' mai-ah a ding hi.

Tua ganhing nihna in na lamdang lianpipi bawl a, mi khempeuhte' muhin van panin leitungah meikuang nangawn a kiasak thei hi. 14 Ganhing masa omna-ah na lamdang bawltheihna ding thu ngah ahih manin a na lamdang bawlna tawh leitungah a om mi khempeuh khem a, namsau tawh a si ding zahin a kisat liamsa hinapi a nungta lai ganhing pahtawina ding milim khat a bawlna dingun a gen hi.

Tua ciangin gulpi kamsung, ganhing kamsung, leh a manlo kamsangpa' kamsung panin uiphuk tawh a kibang kha gilo thum a hong pusuak ka mu hi. 14 Tuate pen dawite' kha hi a, na lamdang a bawl uhhi. A Vanglian Pasian' Ni hong tun' ciangin gal a do dingin leitung gam khempeuhah a om kumpite a kaikhawm dingin a kuankhia uhhi.
Leitung in limlemeel neiloin a awngthawlpi a hihi. Tuipi tung tengah khua mial bikbek a, tua tui tungah Pasian' Kha in na a sem hi.

Tua ciangin { Topa } in, "Mihingte sungah ka Kha om paisuak nawnlo ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh mihingte a mawh hi khinta a, kum za leh kum sawmnih sung kisikna ding hun kipia lai bek ding hi," a ci hi.

Giahphualah mi nih om uh a, khat Eldad kici-in, a khat Medad kici a, amaute' sungah tua kha a lut hi. Amaute pen a kiciamtehte lakah a kihelte hi uh a, ahih hangin Puanbukah pailoin, giahphualah kamsangte bangin thu genin a kiko uhhi.
{ Topa' } Kha ama tungah tung a, amah, Israel mite' thukhen a suak hi. Galsim dingin kuankhia a, { Topa } in ama khutsungah Mesopotamia kumpipa Kushanrishathaim a pia hi.
A hu a san' ciangin vantung teng siang pah a, ama khut in a taikhia gulpi thatlum hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian' kha in kei hong sawl a, Vanglianpa in kei tungah nuntakna hu hong pia hi.
Nangma omna panin kei hong paiikhia kei in la, keima kiang panin na Khasiangtho lakhia kei in.
Na hu na san'khiat ciangin amaute a kipiangsak hi a, nangmah in leitung na bawlthak hi.
{ Topa}' kha in ama tungah ama mite a ukna ding pilna, thutheihna, leh siamna pia ding hi. Amah in { Topa}' deihna thei-in { Topa } zahtak ding hi.
Taklamah na kihei ciang uh ahi a, veilamah na kihei ciang uh ahi zongin, "Hih pen lampi hi, hih tawn un," cihna aw, na nunglam panun na bil un a za ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin nisuahna leh nitumna kikalah a om mi khempeuh in amah zahtakin, a vangliatna kihta ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh huihpi nung bang, tuipi khang bangin amah hong pai ding hi.
Ahih hangin amaute in lehdo uh a, ama Khasiangtho a dahsak uhhi. Tua ahih ciangin amah pen amaute' gal suak a, amahmah in amaute a do hi.

Note sungah lungtang thak leh lungsim thak kong guan' ding a, na suang lungtang uh hong lakkhiatsakin mihing lungtang kong guan' ding hi. 27 Note sungah keima kha kong guang ding a, note tungah kong piak ka thukhamte leh ka thupiakte limtakin kong zuisak ding hi.

Ahi zongin kei ahih leh, Israel mite tungah a mawhna uh a genkhia dingin { Topa' } kha leh a vang tawh ka kidim a, thutang gen ngamna ding lungsim ka nei hi. 9 Ngai un! Israel a uk makaite aw. Note in thutang deihloin, thuman kimlai a khialin na hei uhhi.

Tua ciangin vantung mi in kei kiangah, "{ Topa } in Zerubbabel tungah hih bangin thu gen hi: Galkap tam neihna hang hilo, nangma vangliatna hang zong hilo, keima tung panin na ngah vangliatna bek tawh na ma na tun'zo ding hi.

Na kisikkik khitna uh a kilatna dingin tui sungah note ka hong phum a, ahi zongin kei nungah a hong paipa in Khasiangtho leh mei sungah note hong phum ding hi. Tua a hong pai dingpa pen kei sangin nakpi takin lianzaw a, ama khedap a tawisak ding nangawnin ka kilawmzo nai kei hi.
Thu na gen uh ciangin note' gen hiloin, na Pa uh' Khasiangtho in note tung tawnin thu a gen ding a hihi.
"Keimah in ka teelsa ka nasempa, ka it mahmah, ka lungkimnapa en un. Keima Kha ama tungah ka pia ding a, Gentail mite tungah upna man a pulak ding hi.

Tua ahih manin note kiangah kong genin-ah: Mihingte' kampau khialhna leh gamtat khialhnate kimaisak thei ding a, ahi zongin Khasiangtho langpangin a gensiate kimaisak lo ding hi. 32 Mihing Tapa langpangin a gensiate a mawhna uh kimaisak thei ding a, ahi zongin Khasiangtho langpangin a gensiate pen tuhuna kipan a tawntungin a mawhna uh kimaisaklo ding hi. 33 "Singgah limci a gahtheihna dingin a kung a cidam phot ding kisam a, a kung gina kei leh a gah limcilo hi. Tua ahih manin singkung khat a pianzia pen a gahin hong kithei hi.
Ahi zongin Khasiangtho langpangin thu a gente in mawhna kip sukha uh ahih manin a mawhna uh kimaisak ngeilo ding hi," a ci hi.
Vantung mi in, "Nangma tungah Khasiangtho hong tung ding a, nangma tungah Pasian' vangliatna hong om ding hi. Tua ahih manin a hong suakding a siangtho naungek pen Pasian' Tapa kici ding hi.

Jerusalem khuasungah Simeon a kici mi khat na om hi. Amah a thuman, a biakna mi mahmah khat hi a, Israel mite a kihotkhiat hun ding a ngakngak mi khat a hihi. Khasiangtho in a ompih mi khat hi a, 26 Topa' hong ciamsa Christ a muh matengin a sihlohna ding thu zong ama tungah Khasiangtho in na genkhin hi. 27 Khasiangtho' makaihna tawh biakinn sungah Simeon a pai hi. A nu leh a pate in thukham sunga om ngeina bangin Topa tungah naungek a ap dingin biakinn-ah a hong paipih uh ciangin, 28 Simeon in naungek la-in a ang-ah tawi-in Pasian' tungah lungdamna ko a, 29 "Topa aw, na thuciamna tu-in nong tungsak a, na nasempa keima lungsim nong nuamsak hi.
Khasiangtho tawh a kidimin Jordan gun panin Zeisu hong ciahkik a, Khasiangtho in gamlakah paipihin,

"Gimna a thuak mite tungah Lungdamna Thu a hilh dingin Topa in kei hong sehkhin ahih manin keima sungah Topa' kha hong om hi. Salin a kimante tungah suahtakna thu a gen ding, mittawte in khua a muhkik theihna ding, a kinengniamte a suaktasak ding leh
Note mihoihlo hinapi-in na tate uh tungah a hoih piakding theithei na hih uh leh, vantunga om na Pa un a ngente tungah Khasiangtho piazaw kan ding hilo ahi hiam?" a ci hi.

Jerusalem khua-a kipan minam khempeuh tungah a mawhna uh kisikin a kimaisakna ding thu, ama min tawh kihilh ding hi, ci-in kigelh hi. 48 Note pen hih thu khempeuh a thei teci na hi uhhi. 49 Ka Pa' hong ciamsa thu, note tungah ka hong pia ding hi. Ahi zongin vantung panin tua vangliatna na ngah mateng uhhih Jerusalem khuapi-ah na ngak un," a ci hi.

Zeisu in, "A mantakin kong genin-ah, mi khatpeuh tui leh Khasiangtho tawh a suahkik kei leh Pasian' Ukna sungah lut theilo ding hi. 6 Mihing sung panin a suakte mihing mah hi bek a, Kha tawh a suakte pen kha mi a hihi. 7 Tua ahih manin, ‘Na suahkik ding ahi hi,’ ka hong cihna hangin lamdangsa kei in. 8 Huih zong a utna peuhpeuhah nung a, a huging na zaktheih hangin koi lam panin hong nung a, koi lamah nung ahi hiam, cih na mu thei kei hi. Kha tawh a suak mite zong tua mah bang ahi hi," ci-in a dawng hi.

Ahi zongin Pasian a bia taktakte in Pasian' Kha' lamlahna leh thuman tak tawh a biak hun hong tung ding a, tu-in zong a hong tung khinta a hihi. Pa Pasian in tu-a bangin amah i biak ding a hong deih a hihi. 24 Pasian pen Kha ahi hi; amah a biate in tua Kha' lamlahna leh thuman taktak tawh a bia ding uhhi," a ci hi.

Laisiangtho sungah, ‘Kei hong um mite sung panin nuntakna tui luangkhia ding hi,’ a cih mah bangin kei hong um mite ka kiangah hong pai-in hong dawn ta un," a ci hi. 39 Zeisu in hih bang a gen ciangin amah a umte in a ngahding Khasiangtho thu a genna hi a, tua hun laitakin Pasian' pianzia nei-in sihna panin Zeisu kithosak kik nailo ahih manin Khasiangtho kipiakhia nailo hi.

Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Kei na hong it uh leh ka thupiakte zong na zui ding uhhi. 16 Keimah in Pa kiangah ka ngen ding a, note tawh a omkhawm tawntung dingin Thuman a hong lak Khasiangtho, note hong Huhpa ding a hong pia ding hi. 17 Leitung mite in tua Khasiangtho mu theilo, thei theilo uh ahih manin sang theilo ding uhhi. Ahi zongin note sungah tua Khasiangtho hong omding ahih manin note in na thei ding uhhi.
Ahi zongin Pa in keima tangin a hong sawl ding Huhpa Khasiangtho a hong tun' ciangin note tungah thu khempeuh hong hilh ding a, note tungah ka hong gensa thu khempeuh zong hong phawksakkik ding hi.
"Ahi zongin Thuman a hong lak ding Huhpa ahi Khasiangtho ka Pa kiang panin ka hong sawl ding hi. Amah hong tun' ciangin keima thu hong gen ding hi.

A taktakin ci lehang, kei paikhia kei leng note hong Huh dingpa hong pailo ding a, kei paikhia leng note hong Huh dingpa hong sawl ding ka hih manin kei va paikhia leng note-a' dingin hoihzaw tham hi. 8 Amah hong tun' ciangin leitung mite tungah mawhna thu, thuman thu leh thukhenna thu laktel ding hi.

"Ka hong gen ding tampi tak omlai hi; ahi zongin hong gen lai leng note-a' dingin tamlua ding hi. 13 Tua ahih manin thuman hong lak ding Khasiangtho hong tun' ciangin thu khempeuh a manin hong hilh ding hi. Ama ngaihsuttawm thu hong gen ding hilo a, ama tungah a kigen thute leh a hong tungding thute a hong gen ding a hihi. 14 Amah in keima gen ding thute note tungah hong gen ding ahih manin Pasian' pianzia ka neihna hong kilangsak ding hi. 15 Ka Pa' neihsa khempeuh keima-a' suakkhin ahih manin keima gen ding thute leh a gen dingin ka sawlteng Khasiangtho in note kiangah hong gen ding hi," a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, "Note in nopna ngah ta un. Pa in kei a hong sawl bangin note zong ka hong sawl hi," ci-in a vaikhak leuleu hi. 22 Tua khit ciangin amaute lamah a hu sang a, "Khasiangtho na sang un. 23 Mite' mawhna na maisak uh leh amaute' mawhna a mai hi ding a, na maisak kei uh leh amaute' mawhna a mailo hi ding hi," a ci hi.
Johan in tui sungah mite phum a, ahi zongin a sawtloin Pasian in Khasiangtho tawh note hong kidimsak ding hi," ci-in thu a pia hi.

Ahi zongin note tungah Khasiangtho hong tun' ciangin vangliatna tawh na kidim ding uh a, Jerusalem khuasung, Judea gamsung, Samaria gamsung, leh leimong dongin note in keima thu na gen ding uhhi," ci-in a dawng hi.

Pentecost ni hong tun' ciangin Zeisu a um mi khempeuh mun khatah kikhawm uhhi. 2 Tua laitakin huihpi nung bangin huging khat hong tungvat a, amaute' kikhopna innsung khempeuh hong dim hi. 3 Tua ciangin leii tawh a kibang meikuang bang pian amaute lakah hong kithehthang a, tuate in mi khempeuh sukha kim hi. 4 Amaute khempeuh Khasiangtho tawh kidim uh a, tua Kha in minam dangte' pau tawh amaute a pau theisak hi.

‘Pasian in hih bangin gen hi: Nitawp ni ciangin, mi khempeuh tungah ka Kha ka sung ding a, na tanute uh leh na tapate un keima thu taangko ding uhhi; na tangvalte un maang mu ding uh a, na puteekte un mang man ding uhhi. 18 Tua ni ciangin ka nasem numeite leh ka nasem pasalte' tung nangawnah ka Kha ka sung ding a, amaute in keima thu gen ding uhhi.
Amah in Pasian' taklamah omna dongin liatna ngah a, ama tungah Pasian in a ciamsa Khasiangtho zong a ngahkhin hi. Tu laitaka na muh na zak uh nate pen kote tungah a hong piak tua Khasiangtho a hihi.

Amaute in hih thu a zak uh ciangin a lungsim uh nakpi takin sukha a, Peter leh sawltak dangte kiangah, "Sanggamte aw, bangci gamtat ding ka hi uhhiam?" ci-in a dong uhhi. 38 Tua ciangin Peter in amaute kiangah, "Na mawhna uh kisik unla, na mawhna uh hong kimaisak theihna dingin Zeisu Christ min tawh tui kiphum ciat un. Tua hi leh Pasian' piakkhong Khasiangtho na ngah ding uhhi.

Tua ahih ciangin Topa aw, amaute in kote hong tawn'nate thei in la, nangma nasem kote in lungsim han' mahmahna tawh nangma thu ka gentheihna dingun hong huh in. 30 Cinate damsak theihna ding vangliatna hong pia in la, a siangtho na Nasempa Zeisu' min tawh na lamdang kibawl ta hen," a ci uhhi. 31 Tua bangin thu a nget khit uh ciangin amaute' kikhopna mun hong kilinggawp hi. Amaute khempeuh Khasiangtho tawh kidim uh a, hang takin Pasian' thu gen ding a kipan uhhi.
Hih thute thei-in teci a pangte pen ko sawltakte bek hiloin Khasiangtho tawh zong ka hi uh a, tua Khasiangtho pen amah a um mite tungah Pasian in a khongin a piak ahi hi," ci-in a dawngkik uhhi.
"Na lungsim uh khauh mahmah a, lawki lungsim paii-in, Pasian' thu-ah bilngong na bang uhhi. I pu i pate mah bangin Khasiangtho thu na mang nuam kei uhhi.

Nazareth khuami Zeisu tungah Pasian in Khasiangtho leh vangliatna pia a, Pasian in a ompihna hangin tua Zeisu in a paina khempeuhah na hoih semin, Dawimangpa in a gimsak mite khempeuh a damsakna thu zong na thei uhhi.

Tua bangin Peter in thu a hilh laitakin tua thuhilhna a ngai mite khempeuh tungah Khasiangtho hong tungsuk hi. 45 Gentail mite tungah zong Pasian in a Khasiangtho a piakkhongna thu a muh uh ciangin Joppa khua panin Peter tawh a hong paikhawm Jew mi thu umte in lamdang a sa mahmah uhhi. 46 Banghang hiam cihleh amaute in pau lamdang pau-in Pasian' liatna a phatnate uh amau bil mahmah tawh a za uhhi. Tua ciangin Peter in,

Asia gamsungah thu a hilhding uh Khasiangtho in phallo ahih manin Frigia leh Galatia gamsung tengah a zin uhhi. 7 Mysia gamgi a tun' uh ciangin Bithynia gamsungah lutdingin kithawi uh a, ahi zongin tua gamah a pai ding uh Zeisu' Khasiangtho in phallo hi.

Corin khua-ah Apollos a om laitakin Paul khual hong zinin Ephesa khua hong tung hi. Tua khua-ah thu um mi pawlkhat tawh kimu a, 2 "Thu na up uh ciangin Khasiangtho na ngah uhhiam?" ci-in a dot leh, "Khasiangtho a omlam nangawn ka za nai kei uhhi," ci-in a dawng uhhi. 3 Tua ciangin Paul in, "Tua ahih leh na kituiphumna dan uh bangci bang ahi hiam?" ci-in a dot ciangin, "Tuiphumpa Johan' thugen bang pawl ahi hi," ci-in a dawng uhhi. 4 Tua ciangin Paul in, "Johan' hilh tuiphumna pen mawhna a kisik mite-a' ding a hihi. Amah in Israel mite kiangah, ‘Keima nunga hong pai dingpa Zeisu um un,’ ci-in gen hi," a ci hi. 5 Amaute in hih thu a zak uh ciangin Topa Zeisu' minin tui a kiphum uhhi. 6 Paul in amaute tungah a khut a ngakkhit ciangin amaute tungah Khasiangtho hong tung hi. Amaute in pau lamdang hong paupah uh a, Pasian' thu zong a gen uhhi.

Tua ahih manin Abraham' suanlekhakte khempeuh tungah Pasian' hehpihna piakkhong a suahtheihna dingin Thukham a zuite bek in ngah loin, Abraham' up bangin a umte in zong a ngahtheihna dingun upna bulphuhin thuciamna kipia hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Abraham pen kha thu lamah eite khempeuh' pupi a hihi.
Pasian in eite tungah a hong piak a Khasiangtho tawh eite sungah ama itna hong guang ahih manin hih lametna in eite hong lungkiasak ngeilo hi.

Ahi zongin tu-in ahih leh Christ Zeisu tawh kipawlin a nungta mite pen mawhna thukhenna tawh kipelh hi. 2 Banghang hiam cihleh Christ Zeisu tawh a hong kipawlsak Khasiangtho in mawhna leh sihna a piangsak thukham panin kei hong suaktasak khinta hi.

Eite' deihna bangin nungta loin Pasian' Khasiangtho' deihna bangin a nungta eite sungah Thukham' deihna teng a kicin' theihna dingin Pasian in a Tapa a hong sawl a hihi. 5 Amau pumpi deihna bangin a nungtate, amau pumpi deihna in a lungsim uh a uk hi; Khasiangtho deihna bangin a nungtate, Khasiangtho in amau lungsim a uk hi. 6 I ngaihsutna, i pumpi deihna uksak lehang sihna tawh kizom hi; i ngaihsutna, Khasiangtho uksak lehang nuntakna leh nopsakna tawh a kizom hi.
Note sungah Pasian' Khasiangtho hong om nak leh nomau pumpi deihna bangin gamta loin Khasiangtho deihna bangin na gamta ding uhhi. Christ lungsim a neilote Christ tawh kipawllo hi.

Na pumpi uh deihna zui-in na gamtat uh leh na si ding uh a, ahi zongin Khasiangtho huhna tawh na mawh gamtatnate uh na sihsak uh leh na nungta ding uhhi. 14 Pasian' Khasiangtho in a makaih mite, Pasian' tate ahi uhhi. 15 Note tungah Pasian in a hong piak a Khasiangtho in note na launa dingun sila-in a hong bawl hilo a, Khasiangtho in Pasian' tate a hong suaksak ahi zaw hi. Tua Khasiangtho mah in Pasian pen, "Pa aw, Pa aw," hong ci theisak hi. 16 Eite, Pasian' tate ihihna thu eima lungsim bek in a gen hiloin Pasian' Khasiangtho in zong hong genpih hi.

Tua ahih manin eite bangzahin ginalo hita lehang eite a hong huh dingin Khasiangtho a hong pai hi. Eite in a kilawm bangin thunget ding nangawn i thei kei a, ahi zongin Khasiangtho mah in tauna tawh eite-a' dingin a hong thumsak hi. 27 Khasiangtho in Pasian' deihna tawh kizui-in Pasian' mite-a' dingin hong thumsak ahih manin mihingte' lungsimtawng thu a thei Pasian in Khasiangtho' ngaihsutna a thei hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian' Ukna pen nek leh dawn tawh a kisai thu hilo a, Khasiangtho hangin i ngah Pasian' deih bangin gamtatna, kilemna, lungdamna, cihte hizaw hi.
Khasiangtho' huhna tawh note' lametna a khan' semsem theihna dingin, lametna a hong piathei Pasian in, amah na upna uh hangin lungdamna leh nopsakna tawh note hong kidimsak ta hen.

Mihing khat' ngaihsutna pen ama lungsim bek mah in a theih mah bangin Pasian' Khasiangtho bek mah in Pasian' thu a cingin a thei hi. 12 Eite' ngah lungsim pen leitung mite' lungsim hilo a, Pasian in eite tungah a hong piak na khempeuh i theihna dingin Pasian' hong piak Khasiangtho lungsim a hihi. 13 Tua ahih manin hih bangin thu ka hong gen uh ciangin zong, mihingte' hong hilh pilna kamte a zang hiloin, Khasiangtho a nei mite tungah kha tawh kisai thu ka gen uh ciangin Khasiangtho in a hong hilh kammalte zangin a gen ka hi uhhi. 14 Ahi zongin Kha Siangtho a neilo mite in Pasian' Kha Siangtho in a hong piak nate sang theilo uhhi. Kha Siangtho a nei mite bek in theithei uh ahih manin amaute in tel theilo uh a, amau-a' dingin a haihuai thu khat ahi lel hi. 15 Khasiangtho a nei mite in na khempeuh theithei uh a, ahi zongin leitung mite in bangmah theilo uh ahih manin a lungmang uhhi.
Note pen Pasian' biakinn na hihna uh leh note sungah Pasian' Khasiangtho a teng ahih lamtak na theihsa uh a hihi.

Note pawlkhat, tua bangin na gamta uhhi. Ahi zongin note pen i Topa Zeisu Christ leh i Pasian' Khasiangtho hangin mawhna panin a hong kisiangsak khinsa, Pasian' tungah a kipiasa, Pasian tawh a kipawlsa mite na hi uhhi.
Na pumpi uh, Pasian in a hong piak, note' sungah a teng Khasiangtho' biakinn ahih lamtak theilo na hi uhhiam? Note' pumpi, nomau' neihsa hilo a, Pasian-a' a hihi.

Sanggamte aw, Khasiangtho' hong piak siamna a tuamtuamte tawh kisai thu na theihloh khak ding uh ka deih kei hi. 2 Lawki na hih lai-un a pau theilo milimte' thu-in na gamta uh a, na lungsim uh tua milimte in hong zo mahmah hi. 3 Tua ahih manin Khasiangtho in lam a lah mite in, "Zeisu in samsiatna ngah ta hen," a cihlohna, leh Khasiangtho in lam lak kei leh kuamah in, "Zeisu pen Topa hi," a cih theihlohna ding thu na theihding uh a hihi.4 Tu-in siamna a nam tuamtuam om a, ahi zongin a hong pia Khasiangtho a kibang a hihi. 5 Nasepna a nam tuamtuam om a, ahi zongin a na i sepsak Topa a kibang a hihi. 6 Nasepna ding siamna a nam tuamtuam om a, ahi zongin septheihna ding siamna a hong pia Pasian a kibang a hihi. 7 Mi khempeuh-a' dingin phattuamna a omtheihna dingin Khasiangtho' hong ompihna a nam tuamtuamin hong kilang hi. 8 Khasiangtho in mi khat tungah thuthuk pilna hong guan' a, tua Khasiangtho mah in adang khat tungah thugen siamna hong guan' hi. 9 Adang khat tungah upna hong guan' a, adang khat tungah cina damsak theihna hong guan' hi. 10 Adang khat tungah na lamdang bawl theihna, adang khat tungah Pasian' thu hilh ding siamna, adang khat tungah Khasiangtho piak siamna ahi leh a hilo khentheihna ding siamna, adang khat tungah pau lamdang pau theihna, adang khat tungah tua pau lamdang tuamtuam paunate a khiatna gentheihna hong pia hi. 11 Hih siamna a tuamtuamte a hong pia pen Khasiangtho a kibang khat bek mah hi a, mi a tuamtuamte tungah ama hoihsak bangin a hong piak a hihi. 12 Pumpi pen khat bek hinapi-in na a tuamtuam a nei hi. Pumpi in na a tuamtuam tampi a neih hangin pumpi khat bek mah ahih veve mah bangin Christ zong pumpi na a tuamtuam a nei pumpi khat a hihi. 13 Jew mi ihi a, Gentail mi ihi zongin, sila ihi a, sila a hilo ihi zongin, eite minam tuamtuam ihih hangin Khasiangtho khat bek mah in Zeisu' pumpi a suak dingin ama sungah hong phum a, eite khempeuh tungah a hong kipia pen tua a kibang Khasiangtho khat bek mah a hihi. 14 Ahi zongin Khasiangtho a neilo mite in Pasian' Khasiangtho in a hong piak nate sang theilo uhhi. Khasiangtho a nei mite bek in theithei uh ahih manin amaute in tel theilo uh a, amau-a' dingin a haihuai thu khat ahi lel hi.

Hih lai pen Christ mahmah in gelhin kote a hong puasak ahihna thu kitel mahmah hi. Laidal leh suangpek tungah laitui leh laikung tawh a kigelh hilo a, mihing lungtang tungah a nungta Pasian Khasiangtho tawh a kigelh a hihi.

Thuciamna thak nasem thei dingin kote tungah siamna a hong pia hi. Tua hong piakna pen lai-a kigelh thukham tawh hiloin Khasiangtho tawh a hihi. Banghang hiam cihleh lai-a kigelh thukham in sihna piangsak a, ahi zongin Khasiangtho in nuntakna hong pia hi.

Hih lai munah Topa a cih pen Khasiangtho hi a, Topa' Khasiangtho a omna mun peuhpeuhah suahtakna om hi. 18 Tua ahih manin eite khempeuh i maitang hong kiliah nawnloin Topa' minthan'na vangtaang i kilangsak hi. Topa kiang panin a hong pai Khasiangtho ahi tua minthan'na vang in amah tawh a kibang dingin eite hong bawlpha a, minthan'na khat panin minthan'na sangzaw-ah hong omsak hi.
Hih kikheelna ding a hong vaihawmsakpa pen Pasian hi a, kote a hong piakdingte khempeuh hong pia taktak ding cih a lahna-in kote tungah ama Khasiangtho a hong pia hi.

Galati mihaite aw, singlamteh tungah Zeisu Christ a sihna thu teltakin na theihsa uh ahih manin kua' khemsa-in hici thei mawk na hi uhhiam? 2 Thukham na zuihna hangun Pasian' Khasiangtho ngah na hi uhhiam, ahih kei leh lungdamna thu za-in na upna hang uhhizaw ahi hiam? 3 Pasian' Khasiangtho tawh na patkhit uh ciangin nomau' thatanghat thu tawh khup a sawm ding zahin hici hai lawmlawm na hi uhhiam?
Note pen ama tate na hihna uh a hong lahna dingin Pasian in ama Tapa' Khasiangtho, eite sungah hong tumsak a, tua Khasiangtho in Pasian pen, "Pa aw, pa aw," hong cisak hi.

Note kiangah ka hong gen thu in: Khasiangtho' hong sawlna bangin gamta unla, na pumpi uh utna bangin gamta kei un. 17 Banghang hiam cihleh ei' pumpi ut bangin gamta lehang Khasiangtho' deihna tawh na kituaklo a, Khasiangtho' deihna bangin gamta lehang ei' pumpi deihna tawh na kituaklo zel ahih manin hih nihte gel a kilangpang niloh na hi a, note' ut bangin a gamta theilo na hi uhhi. 18 Khasiangtho' deihna bangin na gamtat uh leh Thukham khutnuai-ah na om nawn kei uhhi.

Ahi zongin Khasiangtho' sawlna bangin gamtatnate pen: Itna, lungdamna, lungnopna, lungduaina, migitna, hoihna, cihtakna, 23 dikna, leh pumpi ki-ukzawhna hi a, hih bangin a gamta mite, Thukham in bangmah cih theilo hi. 24 Tua hi a, Zeisu Christ a zui mite in a leitung lungsim pianzia uh leh a leitung lungsim deihna khempeuh uh a phiat khitsa a hihi. 25 Khasiangtho in eite hong nungtasak khinta ahih manin ama hong sawlna bangin eite a nungta ding ihi hi. 26 Kuamah kiphasak loin, khatlekhat kiphin loin, kuamah i kihaza kei ding hi.

Sanggamte aw, mi khatpeuh a gamta khial a om ciangin, Khasiangtho' deihna bangin a nungta note in tua a khialpa a manin a gamtatkik theihna dingin thunem zangin na huh un. Note in zong amah bangin ze-etna na tuahkhak lohna dingun na kikem un.

Note in zong hotkhiatna a hong ngahsakthei Lungdamna Thu a man za-in Christ na up uh ciangin, Pasian in a hong ciamsa bangin ama mi na hihna uh a kilatna dingin note tungah Khasiangtho hong piakna tawh a hong ciamteh hi. 14 Tua Khasiangtho pen, Pasian in piakdingin a hong ciamsa thu eite khempeuh in i ngah taktak ding a kician ahihna thu a hong lahna hi a, ama mi ahi taktak eite khempeuh pen a suakta takpi mite ihihna a kilatna ding a hihi. Tua ahih manin a kuamah peuh in Pasian phat ciat ni.
note' lungsim a thahatna dingin Pasian in a kicing ama vangliatna sung panin a Khasiangtho tawh note hong thakhauh sakin,

Khasiangtho kimakai sakin, khatlekhat kilemin pawlkhat na hihna uh na kipsak tawntung un. 4 A kibang lametna khat bek a ngahkhawm dingin Pasian in note hong sap mah bangin eite khempeuh pumkhat bek hi-in Khasiangtho zong khat bek mah a neikhawm ihi hi.

Ni khat ni ciangin Pasian in note hong tatkhiat taktakna ding thu a ciantakin hong lahna leh Pasian' neihsa na hihna uh hong ciamtehna-in Khasiangtho hong pia ahih manin, tua Pasian' Khasiangtho na dahsak kei un.
Zu in mi siasak thei ahih manin zu ne kei unla, Khasiangtho tawh a kidimin omzaw un.
Eite' do pen leitung mite hilo a, vantung huihlakah a om ukna, aana a neite, hih leitung khuamial a uk a tuamtuamte a hihi.
Siklukhu khuk bangin hotkhiatna nei unla, Khasiangtho in a hong piak Pasian' thu pen namsau zat bangin na zang un.
Kote leh Topa' gamtat bangin note na gamta uh a, note in gimna nakpi takin thuaklawh napi-in Khasiangtho' huhna tawh lungdam takin thu umin na om uhhi.
Nidang ciangin a upna panun mi pawlkhat pialin, zuauthu gente leh dawi thu a kigente a zuihna ding uh Khasiangtho in teltakin a gen hi.

Ahi zongin eite hong Honpa ahi Pasian' itna leh a migitna thu hong kilat ciangin, 5 amah in eite hong honkhia hi. Eite in na hoih i sepzawhna hangin hong honkhia hiloin eite tungah suahtakna leh nuntakna thak a hong pia Khasiangtho in hong sawpsiangna hangin a hong hehpihna tawh a hong honkhia a hihi. 6 Pasian in eite hong Hon Zeisu Christ hangin eite tungah a kicing takin Khasiangtho hong pia ahih manin,

tawntung Khasiangtho hangin Pasian tungah a cingtaak biakpiakna dingin Christ in a piak ama sisan in na tam semkhia zozaw ding a, a nungta Pasian' na i septheihna dingin bangmahin a kimanglo nasepna panin ama sisan in i lungsim hong siangsak ding hi.

Tua bang ahih leh Pasian' Tapa a simmawh, mawhna a hong maisak Pasian' thuciamna sisan a thudonlo, Pasian' hehpihna a hong puak Khasiangtho a hehsakte' thuakding bangzah takin lianzaw kan ding ahi hiam?

Christ in gimna thuakin, tua khit ciangin minthan'na a ngahna ding thu Khasiangtho in a gen ciangin, amaute sungah a om tua Christ' Khasiangtho in kua a cihna hi a, bang hun ciang hi ding hiam, ci-in a kankan uh pen tuhun thu a gen a hihi.
Ka itte aw, hih leitungah gamdang mi, a peempak bangin kingaihsun unla, na kha nuntakna uh tawh a kilehngat pumpi' deihnate na kikham un.
Christ nungzui hihna hangin mite' kosiatna na thuak uh leh note sungah a minthang Khasiangtho ahi Pasian' Khasiangtho hong om ahihna lim ahih manin a hampha mahmah na hi uhhi.
Banghang hiam cihleh mihingte in a deih manin mailam thugenkholh theihna a kingah hilo a, Khasiangtho' sawlna tawh Pasian' kiang panin a hong pai thute a kigen ahi zaw hi.

Christ' gal ahi hih mite pen ei' pawl hi ngei napi-in hong taisan uhhi. Ei' pawl taktak hi leh eite tawh omkhawm paisuak ding uh ahih manin, tu-in amaute paikhia uh ahih ciangin ei' pawl taktak ahihlohna uh hong kilang hi. 20 Ahi zongin Christ in note tungah Khasiangtho hong piakhin ahih manin note khempeuh in a man na thei uhhi.

Christ in note tungah ama Khasiangtho hong piakhin a, tua Khasiangtho na neih laiteng uh kuamah in note hong hilhding kisam nawnlo hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Khasiangtho in note tungah thu khempeuh hong hilh a, tua a hong hilh thute a man vive hi a, zuauthu khat zong omlo hi. Tua ahih manin Khasiangtho' hilhnate zui unla, Christ sungah kiptakin om un.

Ka it lawmte aw, kha ka nei a ci mi khempeuh' thugen um kei unla, tua thute Pasian kiang pan mah ahi hiam, ci-in kantel un. Banghang hiam cihleh leitungah kamsang a kineihkhem tampi hong om khinta hi.
Hih mite in pawl kikhenna piangsakin, amau pumpi deihna bangin gamta uh a, Khasiangtho zong neilo uhhi.

Mi khatpeuh in hong thah leh ama tungah sihna dan ka pia ding hi. A hong that ganhing peuhmah ka that ding a, a mipihte a that mi peuhmah gim ka pia ding hi. 6 Mi a that peuhmahte pen, midangte in amah that ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in ama lim bangin mi bawl hi.

Noah pen lo kho masapa hi a, amah in leenggui lo khat a bawl hi. 21 Amah in leenggahzu ne-in kham a, a puanbuk sungah bangmah silh loin a lum hi. 22 Kanaan' pa Ham in a pa guaktangin a omna mu a, a pualama om a sanggam nihte kiangah a gen hi. 23 Tua ciangin Shem leh Jafeth in puan khat la-in amaute gel' liangko tuakah baang uh a, a nung leh lamun pai-in a pa uh' guaktang omna a khuh uhhi. Amaute in maingat lo uh ahih manin a pa uh guaktang omna mulo uhhi.

Tua ciangin Faro' thupiaksa bangin Joseph in leitang a hoihpen, Rameses leitang, Egypt gam sungah neihsa pia-in a pa leh a sanggamte a tengsak hi. 12 Joseph in a pa, a sanggamte, leh a pa' innkuante khempeuh a ne ding zah tawh kizui-in an a pia hi.
"{ Topa } na Pasian un note hong piak leitang tungah na khan' uh a sau theihna dingin na nu leh na pa uh zahtak un. 13 "Mi na that kei ding uhhi.
"Ama pa hita leh ama nu hita leh a samsia mi peuhmah kithat ding hi.

"Mite kitawngin numei naupaii khat liamsak a, tatolhin; ahi zongin siatna in a zuihbeh kei nak leh, tuanu' pasal in ama tunga a cihzah tawh kituakin tua numei a liamsak mi kigam ding a, thukhente' khenna bangin amah liau ding hi. 23 Siatna khatpeuh in a zuihbeh leh, tua ciangin nuntakna tangding nuntakna, 24 mit tangding mit, ha tangding ha, khut tangding khut, khe tangding khe, 25 meikang tangding meikang, liamna tangding liamna, siatna tangding siatna pia ding hi.
Siatna a bawl dingin mihon na zui kei ding uhhi. Thutang a hei khia dingin mihonpi nung zui-in thu neihna-ah teci na pang kei ding uhhi. 3 Ama thu neihna-ah mizawngpa na langneih kei ding uhhi.
Note a kuamah peuh in na nu leh na pa uh zahtakin, note in ka Sabbath-te na tang ding uhhi; kei pen { Topa } na Pasian uh ka hihi.
"Note in thukhenna-ah thu a tangloin na khen kei ding uhhi. Mizawngte langgen loin, a liante' thu zuiloin, thumanna tawh na vengte uh thu na khen ding uhhi.
Banghang hiam cihleh a nu ahih kei leh a pa a samsia mi peuhmah kithat ding hi. Amah in a nu ahih kei leh a pa samsia khin a, ama sihna amahmah ngawh ding a hihi.

"Tua hun laitakin na thukhente uh ka thuhilh a, ‘Na sanggamte uh thu neihte za unla, mi khat leh a sanggampa ahi a, amah tawh a om khualmipa tawh ahi zongin thu a mantakin khen un. 17 Thukhenna-ah angvan na nei kei ding uhhi. A neu leh a liante a kibangin a thu na ngai ding uh a, maitang zahtak tuam na nei kei ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh thukhenna pen Pasian-a' a hihi. Note-a' dingin a haksa lua thute kei kiangah nong paipih ding uh a, keimah in tua thu ka za ding hi,’ ka ci hi.
"‘{ Topa } note' Pasian in hong piak leitang tungah na khan' uh sau-in na nopsak theihna dingun { Topa } note' Pasian in hong thupiak bangin na nu na pa uh zahtak un. 17 "‘Mi na that kei ding uhhi.
{ Topa } na Pasian uh nung zui-in, amah na zahtak ding uh a, a thupiaknate zui-in a thu na ngai ding uh a, amah bia-in amah na beel ding uhhi.

"Na minam uh tawh kizui-in { Topa } na Pasian un note hong piakna khuate-ah thukhente leh uliante na koih ding uh a, amaute in a manin mite tungah thu khen ding uhhi. 19 Thutang na heikhia kei ding uh a, angvan tuam na nei kei ding uhhi. Sumgolh in mipilte' mit tawsakin thumante' thu heikhia ahih manin sumgolh na la kei ding uhhi.
"‘A nu ahi a, a pa ahi zongin a zahtaklo mipa in gimna ngah ta hen,’ ci ding uhhi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in, ‘Amen,’ ci ding uhhi.
"Tua ahih ciangin tu-in { Topa } zahtak unla, lungsim tak leh thumanna tawh ama na sem un. Na pu na pate un Gun gal leh Egypt gamsungah a biak uh pasian-te koihkhia unla, { Topa' } na sem un.

Tua lai mun panin Moab gam Mizpah-ah David a pai hi. Amah in Moab kumpipa kiangah, "Pasian in kei-a' dingin hong sepsak ding ka theih matengin ka nu leh ka pa na kiangah hong omsak in, ci-in kong thum hi," a ci hi.
