David in ama kiangah, "{ Topa' } sathau nilhpa a that dingin na khut na liik khiat ding na lauloh a bangci thu ahi hiam?" a ci hi. 15 Tua ciangin David in tangvalte khat samin, "Pai in; amah thatlum in," a ci hi. Amah in tua thupuakpa sat a, amah a si hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Adonijah tangin ama tungah thu a gen dingin Kumpi Solomon kiangah Bathsheba va pai hi. Tua ciangin tuanu a dawn dingin kumpipa dingin tuanu mai-ah a kun hi. Tua ciangin ama tokhom tungah tu-in kumpipa' nu-a' dingin tutna khat lasak hi. Tuanu ama taklamah a tu hi.

Kumpipa in amah dawngkikin, "Ama cihsa bangin hih in; amah satlum in la phum in. Joab in thu omlopi-in mi a thahna hangin mawhna pen keima tung leh ka suanlekhakte' tung panin tua bangin na siangsak ding hi. 32 { Topa } in ama mawhna ama lu tung mahah tungsak kik ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh ka pa David' theihloh kalin amah in Israel galkapte a uk Ner' tapa Abner leh Judah galkapte a uk Jether' tapa Amasa, amah sangin thuman zaw-in a hoihzaw ahi mihing nih do-in namsau tawh a that hi. 33 Tua ahih ciangin mi thahna hangin gimna pen Joab' lu tung leh ama suanlekhakte' lu tungah a tawntungin hong tungkik ding hi. Ahih hangin David' tung, ama suanlekhakte' tung, ama innkuan tung, leh ama kumpi tokhom tungah { Topa' } kiang panin a tawntung nopna om ding hi," a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amah in a bawngtalte nusia-in Elijah' nungah tai a, "Ka nu leh ka pa kam vaikhakin hong namsak phot in; tua ciangin nang kong zui ding hi," a ci hi. Amah in Elisha kiangah, "Paikik in; nang hong khaktan ka hi hiam?" a ci hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh ka pumpi na khempeuh na hong piangsak a, ka nu' gil sungah keimah nong khuituah hi. 14 Kihtak dingin a kilawm na hih manin nang ka hong phat hi. Na nasepnate lamdang mahmah! Nangmah in kei nong lim theih mahmah hi. 15 A thukna sung mun simthamah kei hong kikhuituahin hong kibawl laitakin, ka guh ka taang, na mai-ah kiliahlo hi. 16 A kipiangsak nailo keima pumpi nate na mit in a mu hi. Ka pumpi nate khat beek a om ma, ka ni zah ding a kiciangtan laitakin, tuate khempeuh na laibu sungah kigelh khin hi.
Ka ta aw, na pa' hong thuhilhna hoihtakin zui in la, na nu' hong thugente ngai in.
Mizawngte bawlsiatna pen a piangsak Pasian simmawhna hi a, mizawngte tungah citna pen Pasian zahtakna a hihi.
A zawngte a simmawhpa in amah a Piangsakpa a simmawh hi a, midangte' tuahsiatna-ah a lungdam mipa in gim thuak hamtang ding hi.

Mipil dangte in zong hih bangin thu gen uhhi: Mi lang muhin thukhenna hoihlo hi. 24 Mimawh kimlai a diksak thukhenpa leitunga mi khempeuh in mudahin phuisam ding hi. 25 A mawh mi gim a pia thukhenpa ahih leh thupha kipia-in daupai ding hi.
Mi langbawlna hoihlo a, ahi zongin letsong neucik khat hangin thukhente gamta khial thei zel hi.
A pa a simmawh mipa, a nu' thu a mang nuamlo mipa, va-ak in a mittang khelkhiat sakin musanete in a sa ne ding uhhi.
A pa kiangah, "Nangmah in kua piangsak na hi hiam?" a cipa hita leh, a nu kiangah, "Nang in nausuak dingin kua gimpih na hi hiam?" a cipa in gimna ngah ta hen!

Vanglian { Topa } in siampite tungah hih bangin hong ci hi: "Tapa in a pa zahtak a, nasempa in a topa kihta hi. Kei pen na pa uhhinapi, banghangin hong zahtaklo a, na topa uhhinapi, banghangin hong kihtalo na hi uhhiam? No siampite in kei hong simmawh napi-in, ‘Bang hong ci simmawh ka hi uhhiam?’ na cilai uhhi.

Pasian in, ‘Na nu leh na pa na zahtak in,’ ci a, tua banah, ‘A nu ahi a, a pa ahi zongin a gensiate in thahna thuak ding hi,’ ci lai hi. 5 Ahi zongin note in, ‘Mi khatpeuh in a nu ahi a, a pa ahi zongin a huh theihna ding na khat peuhpeuh a neih leh, tua na pen Pasian-a' ding hi, ci peuh leh, a nu leh a pa piak kul nawnlo hi,’ ci-in thu na hilh uhhi. 6 Tua ahih manin na pupa ngeina uh na zuihna uh hangin Pasian' thu na palsat uhhi.
na nu na pa zahtak in; nang na ki-it bangin na vengte na it in, cihnate ahi hi," a ci hi.

Moses in, ‘Na nu leh na pa zahtak un. A nu a pa a samsiate kithat hen,’ ci hi. 11 Ahi zongin note in, ‘Mi khatpeuh in a nu a pa a piaktheih ding na khat peuhpeuh a neih hangin, hih pen ‹ korban › (Pasian-a' ding) hi, ci peuh leh, 12 a nu leh a pa a huhna ding panin suakta thei hi,’ ci-in thu na hilh uhhi. 13 Hih bang danin mite thu na hilhna uh tawh Pasian' thu na pampaih uhhi. Hih bangzia-in na gamtatna uh adang tampi zong omlai hi," a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin a nu leh a pa zui-in Nazareth khua-ah ciahkik a, amaute' thu mangin tua lai-ah hoihtakin a om hi. A nu in hih thu khempeuh a lungsim sungah ngaihsunsun hi.
Numei tungah mawh kei in; mi that kei in; mi' neihsa gu kei in; zuauthu gen kei in; na nu na pa zahtak in, cihna thukhamte theilo na hi hiam?" a ci hi.

Zeisu in ama nu leh a it a nungzuipa a dingkhawm a muh ciangin a nu kiangah, "Nu aw, tua lai-ah na tapa om hi," a ci hi. 27 Tua ciangin a nungzuipa kiangah, "Na nu tua lai-ah om hi," a ci leuleu hi. Tua ahih manin tua huna kipanin nungzuipa in ama inn-ah Zeisu' nu Mary a kem hi.

A zingciangin Sisaria khua a tung uhhi. Kornelias in zong amaute' tun'ding lamen ahih manin, a beh a phungte leh a lawm itteng a inn-ah a na samkhol hi. 25 Peter hong tun' ciangin Kornelias in na dawn a, a khe kiangah bokin a bia hi. 26 Ahi zongin Peter in amah kaito a, "Ding in; kei zong mihing mah ka hi lel hi," a ci hi. 27 Tua bangin a kiho kawmin Peter zong innsungah tum a, mi tampi tak a na om a muh ciangin 28 amaute kiangah, "Note mahmah in zong limtakin na theih ciat uh mah bangin Jew mite pen minam dangte kiangah hawhin a kikholh ding a ngeina hilo hi. Ahi zongin mi khat peuhpeuh a nin hi, ci-in ka ngaihsutlohna dingin Pasian in kei tungah a thu hong lakkhin zo hi.
Unau ki-itna lungsim nei unla, khatlekhat kizahtak bawl ding lamsang kidem un.
Kuamah kiphasak loin, khatlekhat kiphin loin, kuamah i kihaza kei ding hi.
khatlekhat kihehpihin, lungsim neem tawh na kihozaw unla, Christ' hangin Pasian in note' mawhna hong maisak mah bangin khatlekhat na mawhna uh na kimaisak ta un.

Christ na zahtakna uh hangin na thu uh na kimang tuak un. 22 Zite aw, Topa' thu na man' uh mah bangin na pasalte uh thu na mang un. 23 Banghang hiam cihleh Christ pen ama pumpi ahi pawlpi a honkhiapa hi-in, pawlpi tungah ukna thu a neih mah bangin pasal in a zi tungah ukna thu a nei a hihi. 24 Pawlpi pen Christ' khutnuai ahih mah bangin zite zong thu khempeuhah a pasalte uh khutnuai hi ding uhhi. 25 Pasalte aw, Christ in pawlpi itin a pumpi a piak mah bangin na zite uh na it un.

Pasalte in amau pumpi zahin a zite uh itin, zite in zong amau pumpi zah mahin a pasalte uh a it ding uh ahih mah bangin, Laisiangtho in hih bangin a gen ciangin a thukzaw khat, Christ leh pawlpi a ki-itna a gennopna ahi hi, ci-in ka ngaihsun hi.

Tate aw, na nu na pate uh thu na man'ding uh Christian ngeina hi a, ahi ding mah a hihi. 2 Thupiakna a lian khat in, "Na nu leh na pa zahtak in," cihna hi a, khapna thu tawh kizom pahin, "Zahtak lecin nang-a' dingin thu hong hoihin, leitungah na khan' a sau ding hi," na ci pah hi.

Huaihamna lungsim leh kisialh nopna lungsim tawh bangmah gamta kei un. Kiniamkhiat ciat unla, midangte thupi ngaihsutzaw un. 4 Note' phattuamna ding bek ngaihsun kei unla, midangte' phattuamna ding ngaihsutsak zaw un.

Ngeina lui leh gamtatna lui khempeuh a beisakkhin na hihna uh kithei-in khatlekhat tungah zuauthu kigen nawn kei unla, 10 ngeina thak tawh kituakin gamta un. Eite a hong piangsak Pasian a kicing takin i theih semsemna dingin amah a sun dingin a hong thakbawl tawntung a hihi. 11 Tua ahih manin Gentail mi leh Jew mi, vun-at mi leh vun-atloh mi, khuapi mi leh khuaneu mi, sila leh sila a hilo, cih bangin a kilamdan'na omlo a, Christ pen mi khempeuh-a' ding hi thei a, thu khempeuh-a' ding hi thei a, thu khempeuhah amah bek a hihi.

Zite aw, Christiante gamtat dingin a kilawm ahih mah bangin na pasalte uh thu na mang un. 19 Pasalte aw, na zite uh it unla, amaute tungah ngongtat kei un. 20 Tate aw, na nu na pate uh thu man' tawntung ding pen na Christian nasep uh a hihi. Tua bang thuman'na in Pasian lungdamsak hi.
Thu uppih mi khempeuh khatlekhat a siangtho ki-itna lungsim tawh kinamin na kihopih un.

Nitawp ni hun pen a lauhuai hun ahih ding lamtak phawk in. 2 Tuahun ciangin mite in amau angsung ding bek ngaihsunin, huaihamin, kisialin, kihisakin, mi zahko-in, nu leh pate' thu mangloin, lungdam theihna mel neiloin, biakna lungsim neiloin,
Tua banah, i leitung pate in gim hong pia a, zong i zahtak lai hi. Tua ahih leh kha thu tawh kisai-ah i Pa' thu mang phazaw-in i nuntak ding kisam hi.

Sanggamte aw, minthan'na vang tawh a kidim i Topa Zeisu Christ umin na om laitakun a pualama kilang pianziate siksanin mi na deidan kei un. 2 Gentehna-in, kham zungbuh bulhin puan manpha a silh mihau khat leh puan siasa a silh mizawng khat, note' kikhopna-ah hong paikhawm leh, 3 limtakin a kizem mipa zahtakbawl zaw-in, "Hih lai-ah tutna nuamah hong tu in," ci le uh cin a, ahi zongin mizawngpa kiangah, "Tua lai-ah na ding phot in," cihna ahi a, "Sual tung hih ka khe kiang khawngah hong tu in," cihna ahi zongin kam na zat uh leh, 4 mi a deidan na hi uh a, ngaihsutna hoihlo nei-in a gamta na hi uhhi. 5 Sanggamte aw, hoihtakin na ngai un. Pasian a it mite tungah piakdingin a ciam vantung gam a ngahding leh upna thu-ah mihau a suak dingin Pasian in leitung mizawngte a teel hinapi-in, 6 note in mizawngte na simmawhbawl uhhi. Note hong bawlsia-in thukhen zum hong tun' pahpahte, mihaute hizaw uhhi. 7 Pasian in note a hong phuah min hoih a gensiate, mihaute mah ahi uhhi. 8 Laisiangtho sungah, "Nangmah na ki-it bangin na vengte na it in," ci-in a genna Topa' Thukham zui le uh cin a hoih hi pah hi. 9 Ahi zongin mi na deidan uh leh note a khial na hi uh a, Thukham a palsat na hi veve uhhi.

I leii tawh eite' pa ahi Topa i phat thei a, Pasian tawh a kisunin a kibawl i mipihte zong tua i leii mah tawh i samsia thei hi. 10 Kam khat sung panin thupha leh thusia pusuak khawm hi. Sanggamte aw, hih bang ahi ding hi hetlo hi.
Mi khempeuh zahtak bawlin thu uppih mite na it unla, Pasian zahtak bawlin kumpipa zong na zahtak un.

A zingciangin mite' thu a khen dingin Moses tu a, zingsanga kipan nitak dongin Moses' kiimah mite a ding uhhi. 14 Mite-a' dingin ama hihte khempeuh Moses' sungpa in a muh ciangin amah in, "Mite-a' dinga nang' sep hih pen a bangci ahi hiam? Banghangin nang bek tu a, zingsanga kipan nitak dongin na kiimah mite khempeuh ding ahi uhhiam?" a ci hi. 15 Moses in a sungpa kiangah, "Pasian' thu a kan dingin kei' kiangah mite hong pai uhhi. 16 Amaute in thu a neih uh ciangin kei kiangah hong pai uh a, mi khat leh a vengpa' kikalah thu ka khen a, Pasian' ngeina kipte leh ama thukhennate amaute ka theisak hi," a ci hi.

"Ama thu neihna-ah mizawngpa a thutang kimlai na lelsak kei ding uhhi. 7 A manlopi-a mi mawhsak ding panin kikem unla, a dikpa leh thumanpa that kei un. Banghang hiam cihleh a gilo mi ka khah kei ding hi.
"Note in thukhenna-ah thu a tangloin na khen kei ding uhhi. Mizawngte langgen loin, a liante' thu zuiloin, thumanna tawh na vengte uh thu na khen ding uhhi.

"Tua hun laitakin na thukhente uh ka thuhilh a, ‘Na sanggamte uh thu neihte za unla, mi khat leh a sanggampa ahi a, amah tawh a om khualmipa tawh ahi zongin thu a mantakin khen un. 17 Thukhenna-ah angvan na nei kei ding uhhi. A neu leh a liante a kibangin a thu na ngai ding uh a, maitang zahtak tuam na nei kei ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh thukhenna pen Pasian-a' a hihi. Note-a' dingin a haksa lua thute kei kiangah nong paipih ding uh a, keimah in tua thu ka za ding hi,’ ka ci hi.

"Na minam uh tawh kizui-in { Topa } na Pasian un note hong piakna khuate-ah thukhente leh uliante na koih ding uh a, amaute in a manin mite tungah thu khen ding uhhi. 19 Thutang na heikhia kei ding uh a, angvan tuam na nei kei ding uhhi. Sumgolh in mipilte' mit tawsakin thumante' thu heikhia ahih manin sumgolh na la kei ding uhhi. 20 Note nungta-in { Topa } na Pasian un hong piak leitang na luah theihna dingun a thuman bekbekin na gamta ding uhhi.

"Mi khat in a hihkhak mawhna lian ahi a, khialhna khat peuhpeuh a gamtatna-ah ahi zongin tua mipa' langah tecikhat guak kicinglo ding a, teci nih ahih kei leh teci thum bang thugenna tawh mawhsakna kikipsak bek ding hi. 16 Elna lungsim a nei teci khat in mi khat gamta khial hi, ci-in a mawhsak leh, 17 thuneite a langnih tuakin, tuahun laitaka siampite leh thukhente' mai, { Topa' } mai-ah pai ding uhhi. 18 Thukhente in limtakin kan ding uh a, tecipa pen zuau teci hi-in, a manlopi-in a sanggampa a mawhsak ahih leh,
Samuel in a nuntak sung tawntung Israel-te thu khen hi.

Hih lai-ah ka om hi; ka mawhna a om leh { Topa' } mai leh a sathau nilhpa' mai-ah ka mawhna hong pulak un. Kua' bawngtal ka laksak hiam? Ahih kei leh kua' la ka laksak hiam? Ahih kei leh kua khem ka hi hiam? Kua nengniam ka hi hiam? Ahih kei leh keima mit a tawsak dingin kua' tung panin sumgolh la ngei ka hi hiam? Ka mawhna nong lah theih uh leh kong dinkik ding hi," a ci hi. 4 Tua ciangin amaute in, "Nangmah in kote nong khem kei a, zong nong nengniam kei a, mi khat peuhpeuh tung panin zong bangmah na la kei hi," a ci uhhi.

Ahih hangin { Topa } in Samuel kiangah, "A tungtham hita leh a tun' san'na hita leh en kei in. Banghang hiam cihleh amah ka nolh hi. { Topa } in mihingte' muh bangin mulo hi. Mihingte in a pualam a kilangte en a, ahih hangin { Topa } in a lungsim en hi," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Israel mi khempeuh in kumpipa' piak thukhenna za uhhi. Thutang a sem dingin ama tungah Pasian in pilna pia hi, ci-in phawk uh ahih manin amaute in kumpipa lamdangsa-in a om uhhi.
thukhente tungah, "Note in mi-a' ding hiloin { Topa}-a' dingin a khen na hih manun na hih dingte uh limtakin ngaihsun un; thukhenna na piak laitakun note kiangah amah hong om hi.

Tua ahih ciangin migilote in thukhenna thuak zolo ding uh a, mimawhte pen midikte' pawl sungah kihel theilo ding uhhi; 6 Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } in midikte lam lakin hu tawntung a, migilote ahih leh sia maimang ding uhhi.
A ginalo thukhente in sumgolh sangsim uh a, a thukhenna uhah thuman om nawnlo hi.
Mihaite a nop lua-in a nuntak ding kilawmlo a, silate in miliante a uk ding kilawmlo zaw lai hi.
Tapa hai pen a pa' lungkhamna hi a, zi phunphun pen a theu theilo guahciin tawh kibang hi.
Migilopa ama thuak ding gimna mah thuaksak zaw in. Honkhia lecin na hotkhiatkik zelzel kul ding hi.
Mi a thusimlote in ciangduai thuak uh a, mihaite in satna thuak uhhi.
Thutangin na a kisep ciangin midik khempeuh lungdam a, ahi zongin migilote lungkham hi.
Mipil dangte in zong hih bangin thu gen uhhi: Mi lang muhin thukhenna hoihlo hi.
Mipil dangte in zong hih bangin thu gen uhhi: Mi lang muhin thukhenna hoihlo hi.
Mi langbawlna hoihlo a, ahi zongin letsong neucik khat hangin thukhente gamta khial thei zel hi.
Amau-a' ding thu genin thu a tangin khen in la, a zawng a cimawh mite amau-a' dingin a kilawm hamphatna ngahsak in.

Amah in { Topa}' nasep nuamsa ding hi. Amah in a tungtham bek muhna tawh thu khenlo ding a, kam lengsawn bek zakna tawh thu khentatlo ding hi. 4 Thumanna tawh mizawngte' thu khenin, lungsim neem mite' thu ahi bangin khensak ding hi. Ama kam panin a thupiakna tawh leitung mite gim kipia ding a, a muk panin a thugenna tawh migilote si ding uhhi.
Mite in Pasian thusim loin, i hamphatnate hong paihkhiat sakin, 36 zum thukhenna-ah a manin thu a kikhen loh ciangin, amah in a hong thei veve hi.

Note in midangte' hong mawhna na maisak uh leh vantungah a om na Pa un zong note' mawhna hong maisak ding hi. 15 Ahi zongin note in midangte' hong mawhna na maisak kei uh leh vantungah a om na Pa un zong note' mawhna hong maisaklo ding hi.

"Pasian in note hong mawhsak lohna dingin midangte va mawhsaksak nawn kei un. 2 Banghang hiam cihleh midangte' thu na khenzia uh tawh kizui-in note tungah hong khen ding a, midangte tungah na zat uh ngeina mah note tungah hong zang ding hi. 3 Banghangin na lawmte' mit sunga ninthem tang muhsak thei napi-in nangma mit sunga singluang tang phawk theilo na hi hiam? 4 Nangma mit sungah singluang a tang kimlai, bangci-in na lawmte kiangah, ‘Na mit sunga ninthem tang hong lakkhiatsak ning,’ ci thei ding na hi hiam?
Tua ahih manin note tungah hong kibawl ding na deih bangun midangte tungah na bawl un. Moses Thukhamte leh kamsangte' thuhilhnate pen hih mah a deihna a hihi.
Ahi zongin kei a hong um hih naupangnote khatpeuh a khialsak mi pen a ngawngah an gawina suang lianpi khat kikhihin tuipi thuk sungah kikhiasuk leh ama-a' dingin hoihzaw thampek ding hi.

"Na sanggamte uh na tung uhah hong khialh leh pai-in note gel bek theihin a khialhna va gen un. Na thu uh a hong man' leh na sanggampa uh a ngahkik na hi uhhi. 16 Ahi zongin na thu uh a hong man'nop kei leh, Laisiangtho sungah, ‘Mi nih ahih kei leh mi thum' theihna bek tawh mawhsakna khat peuhpeuh man pan hi,’ a cih mah bangin midang khat ahi a, nih ahi zongin tonpih un. 17 Amah in tua mite' thu a man'nop kei leh pawlpite tungah a thu ko un. Pawlpite' thu nangawn a man'nop kei leh Gentail mite leh siahdongte bangin na ngaihsun un.

Tua laitakin mihon lak panin mi khat in Zeisu kiangah, "Sia aw, ka pa un a hong sihsan gamh pawlkhat tawh ka u in kei hong inntuanna dingin hong gensak in," a ci hi. 14 Ahi zongin Zeisu in a mipa kiangah, "No unau' gamh a hawm dingin kua in kei hong seh ahi hiam?" ci-in a dawng hi.

"Midangte' thu khen kei un. Tua hi leh no tungah zong Pasian in thu hong khenlo ding hi. Midangte mawhsak kei un. Tua hi leh Pasian in note zong hong mawhsaklo ding hi. Midangte' mawhna maisak un. Tua hi leh Pasian in note' mawhna zong hong maisak ding hi.

Thu a theilopi-in kei na hong mawhsak uhhi; ahi zongin ke'n kuamah ka mawhsak kei hi. 16 Mi mawhsakin thu a khen hita mah leng zong, a thukhen pen kei bek hiloin kei a hong sawl Pa Pasian leh keimah in a khenkhawm ka hih manun ka thukhennate a man taktak a hihi.

Tua ahih ciangin midangte' thu a khen note pen kuakua hita le uh cin na suakta tuan kei ding uhhi. Midangte na mawhsakna uh thute mah note zong gamta veve na hih manun no zong a mawh mah na hi uhhi. 2 Tua bang mawhna a gamtate, Pasian in gim a piak pen a man mah ahihna i thei ciat hi. 3 Midangte a mawhna hangin thu khenin, no zong tua amau mawhnate mah na bawl veve uh ciangin Pasian' thukhenna tawh kipelh tuan dingin ki-um peuhmah na hi uhhiam?

Mi khat' nasemte tungah kua in thu khen thei ding na hi uhhiam? A gina leh a ginalo a khen dingpa pen amau' Topa a hihi. A Topa un hoih hi, a cihleh a kipsak zawhna ding vangliatna nei ahih manin a kip hi lel ding uhhi.
Tua ahih leh Banghangin na Christian pihte uh tungah thu khen a, Banghangin simmawhbawl thei na hi uhhiam? Thukhenna a thuak dingin Pasian' mai-ah eite khempeuh a ding ciat ding ihi hi.

Tua ahih manin a kuamah peuh in i gamtatna ciat Pasian' mai-ah a va kigentel ciat ding ihi hi. 13 Tua ahih manin khatlekhat kimawhsakin thu kikhen kei unla, i Christianpihte i puksakkhak lohna ding, a dongtangsak ihihkhak lohna dingin ngaihsun ciat ni.

Tua ahih manin a hun a tun'ma-in kuamah mawhsakin thu khen kei un. Topa hong pai ciangin a tawpna thukhenna hong om ding a, amah in thusimte hong pholakin, mihingte in a lungsim sung uhah a ipcip uh thute hong telkheh ding hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in amau' ngahdingin a kilawm phatna, Pasian' kiang panin a ngah ciat ding uhhi.

Note lakah numei tawh paktatna nasia mahmahin, lawkite nangawn a gamtatlohte na gamtatna uh hong kigen a, mi khat in ama nukik nangawn a luppihna thu ka za hi. 2 Tua bang kimlai bangci kisaktheih ding na hi uhhiam? Note na dah mahmah ding uhhizaw a, tua bang mite pen note lak panin na hepkhiat ding uh a hihi. 3 Note tawh ka pumpi-in ka hong omkhop loh hangin note tawh ka lungsim hong omkhawm a, ka pumpi-in note tawh a hong omkhawm zah mah bangin tua bang a gamta mite tungah i Topa Zeisu' min tawh mawhsakna thu ka khen khinzo hi.

Tua bang a pualam mite mawhsakin thu ka khen ding kei' nasep hilo hi. Pasian in amaute' thu khen ngawn ding hi. Ahi zongin note in na pawlpih uh mite tungah thu na khen ding uh a hihi. Laisiangtho in, "Note lak panin migilopa na lakhia un," na ci hi.

Note khatlekhat thu na kineih uh ciangin Pasian' mi siangthote khensakzaw loin lawki thukhente' mai na kitun' ngam uhhi. 2 Pasian' mite in leitung mite' thu a khensakzaw ding ahihlam theilo na hi uhhiam? Note pen leitung mite' thu a khensak ding na hih uh ciangin tua bang thu neute khen theilo lawmlawm na hi uhhiam? 3 Eite pen vantung mite' thu nangawn a khensak ding ihih lamtak theilo na hi uhhiam? Tua ahih manin hih leitunga no' thu neuneute leltak na khentheih zawk kan ding uh a hihi. 4 Tua bang hinapi-in hih bang thu themthem hong pian' ciangin pawlpi sungah bangmahin a kisimlo mite' mai kitun'ding na hi uhhiam? 5 Note-a' dingin zumhuai mahmah hi. Note khatlekhat na kithu-neihnate uh a khenthei ding note lakah mipil khat beek om buang ding hi. 6 Tua hinapi, khatlekhat thu kineihin zum na kitun' uh a, lawki thukhente na khensak tazen uhhi.
Tua ahi manin tua bang kisiatna na neih uh leh pawlpi sunga a kineu koih mite nangawn thukhen dingin seh lel un! (ZIV)
Hih leitung nuntakna tawh kisai thute khen ding na neih uh ciangin pawlpi sung aa a kineumuh tatate seh zawsop ding na hi uhhiam? (ZSV)
Muhna hang tawh lungmuangin a om hiloin upna hang tawh lungmuang takin a om ka hi uhhi.

Sanggamte aw, mi khatpeuh a gamta khial a om ciangin, Khasiangtho' deihna bangin a nungta note in tua a khialpa a manin a gamtatkik theihna dingin thunem zangin na huh un. Note in zong amah bangin ze-etna na tuahkhak lohna dingun na kikem un.
Sanggamte aw, note in na theihding uh ka deih thu in: Thu kigen khempeuh hoihtakin ngai pahpah un. Ahi zongin pau pahpah kei unla, heh pakpak kei un.

Sanggamte aw, khatlekhat kigensia kei un. A mipihte gensia-in thu a khente in Thukham gensia-in thu a khen a hihi. Thukham na gensiat uh leh Thukham a zui hiloin thu a khen na hi uhhi. 12 Thukham a piapa leh thu a khenpa pen Pasian bek hi a, amah bek in hong honkhiazo a, hong susiazo hi. Tua ahih manin Banghangin na mipihte uh gensia-in thu a khenthei dingin kingaihsun zenzen na hi uhhiam?

Vantung milianpa Michael nangawn tua bangin gamta ngamlo hi. Moses' luanghawm kituhin Dawimangpa tawh a kitot laitakin Michael in Dawimangpa zahkona kammal zang ngamloin, "Topa in nang hong taii ta hen," ci bek hi.

"Note in { Topa } na Pasian uh thu mangin, tuni-a kong gen ama thupiakna khempeuh limtakin na zuih uh leh { Topa } na Pasian un leitung minam dangte khempeuh sangin a lianzaw-in note hong bawl ding hi.

Amaute gualnuamin numeite khatlekhat in, "Saul in a tulin that, David in a tul sawmin that," kici uhhi. 8 Saul heh mahmah a, hih thugenna in amah lungkimlo sak hi. Amah in, "Amaute in David tungah a tul sawmin pia-in, kei tungah a tulin hong pia bek uhhi. Kumpi min puak cih simloh bang dang nei nawn ka hi hiam?" a ci hi. 9 Tua ni-a kipan Saul in David encik hi.

Amah in matutzawhna lianpi a neihlam Saul in a muh ciangin amah lamdang sa-in om hi. 16 Ahih hangin Israel-te khempeuh leh Judah-te khempeuh in David it uhhi; banghang hiam cihleh amaute makaihin amah kuankhia-in hong ciah hi.
Pasian tawh khauhtakin i hih ding hi. Amah pen i galte hong sikcipsak dingpa a hihi.
{ Topa } in kei hong ompih hi. Bangmah ka kihta kei ding hi. Mihingte in kei, bang hong cihzo ding ahi uhhiam?
Sik in sik mah hiamsak thei a, mi in midang pilsak thei hi.
Leitang tungah amau guak a teng ding dong zahin midangte-a' dingin mun khempeuh a bei matengin inn khatlekhat, lo khatlekhat gawmin a la thuah tawntung mite in gimna ngah ta hen.

"Nang Khuavak' ta, Zingsol, Babylon kumpipa aw, vantung panin nang bangci kiat na hi hiam? Minamte a niam koihpa ahi nangmah leilak dongah hong bangci kiphukpai ahi hiam? 13 Nang in na lungsim sungah, ‘Vantungah ka kahto ding hi. A sangna mun, Pasian' aksite' tung pekah ka kumpi tokhom ka koih ding a, leilu lam peka kikhopna mualtungah ka tu ding hi. 14 Meiite' tung pekah ka kahto ding a, Sang Penpa bangin ka kibawl ding hi,’ na ci hi.
Ahih hangin { Topa } a muang mite a tha uh dimkik ding a, muvanlai bangin kha tawh leengto-in, amaute tai napi-un tawllo ding uh a, amaute lam pai napi-un gimlo ding uhhi.
Thudang khempeuh sangin Pasian' ukna leh ama deihna na zuih theihna ding uh thupi ngaihsut masazaw un. Tua hi leh hih na kisapna dangte khempeuh uh zong hong piathuah veve ding hi.
Ahi zongin tuhun laitakin a lian mi tampite tua hun ciangin a neu suak ding a, tuhun laitakin a neu tampite tua hun ciangin a lian hi ding uhhi.

Kua lianpen ding ihi hiam, ci-in nungzuite lakah kiselna khat hong om hi. 47 Zeisu in amaute' lungsim ngaihsutna a phawk ciangin naupang khat la-in a gei-ah omsak a, 48 a nungzuite kiangah, "Keima hangin hih naupang a limbawl mi peuhmah in kei hong limbawl hi a, kei hong limbawl mi peuhmah in kei hong sawlpa zong a limbawl a hihi. Note khempeuh lakah a neupenpa a lianpenpa ahi hi," a ci hi.
Lawmte' tangding sih ngamna sangin lawmte itna a lianzaw om nawnlo hi.
Unau ki-itna lungsim nei unla, khatlekhat kizahtak bawl ding lamsang kidem un.

Tai kidemna-ah mi khat bek in thaman a ngahding hinapi-in a vekpi-un tai veve uhhi. Tua ahih manin thaman na ngahzawhna dingun na tai un. 25 Kimawlna sungah a kihel mi khempeuh in thu khempeuhah a pumpi uh uk ciat uhhi. Amaute pen a kisiathei pak a ngahna dingun a hanciam uhhi a, eite pen a kisia theilo i ngahna dingin a hanciam ihi hi.
Kote ahih leh tua bangin a kiliansak mahmah mite tawh a kikimin ka kingaihsun ngam buang kei ding uhhi. Amaute khatlekhat ki-en kakin thupi kisa mahmah uh ahih manin mihai taktak ahi uhhi.
A kuamah peuh in ama gamtatna ciat entel hen la, kisialhna ding a om leh ama gamtatna siksanin kisial hen la, midangte tawh ki-ettehin kisial kei hen.

Tua hi a, Zeisu Christ a zui mite in a leitung lungsim pianzia uh leh a leitung lungsim deihna khempeuh uh a phiat khitsa a hihi. 25 Khasiangtho in eite hong nungtasak khinta ahih manin ama hong sawlna bangin eite a nungta ding ihi hi. 26 Kuamah kiphasak loin, khatlekhat kiphin loin, kuamah i kihaza kei ding hi.
Kimawl kidemna-ah a kihel mi khatpeuh in kimawlna ngeina zui lopi-in gualzawh pahtawina ngah theilo hi.

Kidemna-ah ka hat tawpin ka hih khin a, a mong dongin ka tai khin a, upna thu khotakin lenin ka zokhin hi. 8 Thu a manin a khen Topa in tua Ni ciangin kei a hong piakding thuman lukhu ahi gualzawhna thaman in tu-in kei hong ngak gige hi. Kei tung bekah a hong piading hilo a, ama hong paikik ding itna tawh a ngakte khempeuh tungah zong a piading a hihi.

Tua hi a, eite in i kiim i pamah hih zahin a tam teci nei ihih ciangin eite a hong dongtangsak thei nate khempeuh leh eite a hong gakcip mawhna leh khialhnate khempeuh paikhia-in, i mai-ah a om taina ding lampi a mong dongin lungsim kiptakin tai ni. 2 Eite hong makai-in i upna a hong cingtaaksak Zeisu mitsuan'in nei ni. Mailamah a ngahding lungdamna hangin maizumna kihta loin singlamteh tungah sihna hong thuak a, tu-in Pasian tokhom taklamah a tu hi. 3 Tua zahta-in mawhnei mite' langbawlna a thuaknate ngaihsun unla, note lungkia loin khauhtakin om un.
Amah in note hong khal theihna dingin vantung panin ama aw note hong zasak hi. A mei lianpi leitungah note hong musak a, mei sung panin ama aw na za uhhi.
Tua ahih manin mi khat in a tapa a khal bangin { Topa } na Pasian un note hong khalna thu na lungsim uhah thei un.
Solomon in Jerusalem-ah { Topa' } Biakinn a lam ciangdong amaute in kikhopna puanbuk ahi biakbuk mai-ah lasak na sem uh a, amaute in a nasep uh a hunhun a banbanin sem uhhi.
{ Topa } aw, zingsang simin ka aw nong za a, zingsang simin nangma-a' dingin biakna bawlin kong ngak hi.
{ Topa } in mi a lam paina ding lak a, ama lungkim bangin a gamtapa amah in a kipsak hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh ka thupalsatnate ka thei a, ka mawhnate khempeuh ka phawk ngitnget hi. 4 Nangma tungah khialin, nangma muhna-ah a sia ka gamta khin hi. Tua ahih ciangin na thugenna-ah nang na thutang a, thu na hong khenna-ah pauna ding bangmah omlo hi.
Tangval khat in ama gamtatna a siangtho mahmah dingin bangci kep ding ahi hiam? Nangma thu zuihna tawh ama gamtatna siangthosak thei ding hi.
Nangma thute kemin ka lungsim khempeuh tawh ka zuih theihna dingin thu theihtelna hong pia in.
A hoihin a pil gamtat theihna ding, thuman, thutang, a kilawmin a gamtat theihna ding.
Tua ciangin, "Banghangin thu thei hoh lo a, hong kihilhna mang hoh lo ka hi hiam?
Ama pumpi ki-uk zolo ahih manin amah in sihlawh a, ama hailuatna in hankhuk sung a tun' hi.
Thahatna sangin lungduaina hoihzaw a, khuapi khat ukzawhna sangin eimah ki-ukzawhna hoihzaw hi.
Lo khawh hunin a kho nuamlo thadahpa in tuk anlak hun ciangin bangmah neilo ding hi.
{ Topa } in mite' gamtatna zia ding uk hi. Koici gamtat ding cih mihing in bangci theih ding ahi hiam?
Ciangduai tawh sat le uh cin nuntaklawh zaw ding uhhi.
Ama lungsim a ki-uk zolo mipa pen dalna kulhpi a neilo khuapi tawh kibang hi.
Ciangduai leh tai-na in pilna guan' a, a kikhahkhong ta in a nu maizumsak hi.
Na ta thuhilhin tai lecin ama hangin na kipak ding a, na lung hong kimsak ding hi.
Phalvak tungin zingtho a, annek ding teng limtakin bawlin a nasem numeite' sep dingteng a vaihawmsak hi.
Hih leitungah a piang thu khempeuh, Pasian in ama pian' hun dinga a sehsa hunin a pian'sak a hihi.
Na tate uh thuhilhin ka sat hangin a mawkna suakzo ta hi. Amaute kibawlpha tuanlo uhhi. Humpinelkai hawk bangin na namsaute un na kamsangte uh a that khinzo uhhi.
Ahih hangin na pu na pate un ka thu hong ngailo uh a, a bil uh hong ngatlo uhhi. Ka thu hong manglo uh a, ka hilhna a theihlohna dingun a lungsim uh a khauhsak uhhi.

Daniel in kumpi innsunga an leh leenggahzu tawh a pumpi a thanghuaisak lohna dingin a lungsim a khensat hi. Amah in innsungmang lianpen Ashpenaz kiangah tua bang an a kipiaklohna dingin a ngen zaw hi.
Midangte in na gamtatna hoihte uh a muh ciangin vantungah a om na Pa uh min a phat theihna dingun mite mai-ah na gamtat hoihna uh khuavak bangin na kilangsak un.
Tua ahih manin na mit taklam in na mawhna ding hong pian'sak leh khelkhia in la paai in. Na pumpi bupin hell khuk sungah hong kikhul sangin na pumpi na khat pelem leh nang-a' dingin hoihzaw lai hi.
Tua ahih manin vantungah a om na Pa uh a cingtaak mah bangin note zong lungsim citakin na cingtaakna ding uh na hanciam un.

"Mittang pen pumpi-a' dingin meivak tawh kibang hi. Na mit uh cim leh na pumpi un hoihtakin khua mu thei hi. 23 Ahi zongin na mit uh maang leh na pumpi uh-a' dingin khua a mial hi. Tua ahih manin note' sunga a om khuavak pen a mial hi leh tua mialna pen nasia mahmah ding hi.

"Na khut ahi a, na khe in ahi zongin hong khialhsak leh sattan in la paikhia in. Meikuang tawntung sungah khut kim khe kimin hong kikhiat sangin nuntakna sungah khut sam khe samin lut lecin nang-a' dingin hoihzaw ding hi. 9 Na mit in hong khialhsak leh khelkhia in la paikhia in. Mit kim nei-in hell khuk sungah hong kikhul sangin mit langkhat bek tawh nuntakna sungah lut lecin nang-a' dingin hoihzaw ding hi. 10 "Hih naupangnote khatpeuh na simmawhkhak lohna dingun kidawm un. Note kiangah kong genin-ah: Amaute a kem vantung mite pen vantungah ka Pa kiangah om tawntung uhhi.
Tua ahih ciangin note kiangah kong genin-ah: Note pen Pasian hong ki-uksak nawnlo ding a, a kilawmin a gamta ding mite bek Pasian in uk ding hi.
"A pil a citak nasem i cih a bangcite ahi hiam? A naseppih dangte ukin a hun manmanin amaute' nekzah ding ciat an a pia dingin a topa in a seh a nasempa a hihi.

Tua ahih manin na khut in hong khialhsak leh sattan in. Mei a mih ngeilohna hell khuk sungah khut kim tawh na lut sangin khut langkhat bui-in nuntakna sungah lut lecin nang-a' dingin hoihzaw hi. 44 (Tua lai-ah thante si ngeilo a, a mei zong mit ngeilo hi.) 45 Na khe in hong khialhsak leh sattan in. Khe kim nei-in hell sungah hong kikhiat sangin khe langkhat bui-in nuntakna sungah lut lecin nang-a' dingin hoihzaw hi. 46 (Tua lai-ah thante si ngeilo a, a mei zong mit ngeilo hi.) 47 Na mit in hong khialhsak leh khelkhia in. Mit kim tawh hell khuk sungah hong kikhiat sangin mit langkhat taw-in Pasian' Ukna sungah om lecin nang-a' dingin hoihzaw hi.
Topa in, "A pil a citak nasempa i cih a bangcite ahi hiam? A naseppih dangte ukin a hun manmanin amaute' nekzah ding ciat a pia dingin a topa in a seh nasempa a hihi.
Tua ahih manin Pasian mai leh mite mai-ah lungsim kisuan'na a om hetlo dingin a tawntungin ka gamta hi.

Ahi zongin Paul in thu gengenin, a hoihin a gamtatna ding, pumpi ki-uk zawhna ding, leh hong tungding Thukhenna Hunte a gen tohtoh ciangin, Feliks hong lau a, "Va paikik phot in. Hun ka ngah ciangin kong samkik ding hi," ci-in a gen hi.

Tua ahih ciangin na pumpi uh deihna na zuihlohna dingun na pumpi uh, mawhna na uksak nawn kei ding uhhi. 13 Mawhna gamtatna dingin na pumpi nate uh khat beek na zang nawn kei ding uhhi. Note pen misi hinapi-in a kihingkik sak mite bang na hih manun, a hoihin a hong zattheihna dingin na pumpi bup uh Pasian' tungah na piazaw ding uhhi.

Thukham pen i kha thu tawh kisai hi, ci-in i thei hi. Ahi zongin kei pen leitung pumpi tawh a nungta mi ka hi a, mawhna thu mangin a sal a suak ka hihi. 15 Ka hihnopteng hihkha loin ka hih noplohteng keek mah hih zawsop ka hih manin keima gamtatna mahmah zong ka tel thei kei hi. 16 Ka hih noplohteng ka hih veve ciangin Thukham a deihhuai khat hi, ci-in ka ngaihsutna hong langsak hi. 17 Tua ahih manin tua bangin a gamta taktak pen kei hiloin ka sunga om mawhna hizaw hi. 18 Ka leitung pumpi sungah a hoih na khat beek omlo hi, ci-in ka thei hi. Ka sungah a hoih gamtatnopna lungsim a om hangin ka hihzo kei hi. 19 A hoih ka gamtatnop teng gamta loin, ka hihnoploh siatnate ka gamta zawsop hi. 20 Ka gamtat noplohteng ka gamtat veve ciangin tua a gamta pen kei hi nawnloin ka sunga om mawhna a gamta ahihna a hong kilang hi.

Amau pumpi deihna bangin a nungtate, amau pumpi deihna in a lungsim uh a uk hi; Khasiangtho deihna bangin a nungtate, Khasiangtho in amau lungsim a uk hi. 6 I ngaihsutna, i pumpi deihna uksak lehang sihna tawh kizom hi; i ngaihsutna, Khasiangtho uksak lehang nuntakna leh nopsakna tawh a kizom hi. 7 Mi khatpeuh in ama pumpi deihna a ki-uksak ciangin Pasian' thukhamte zuilo ahih manin Pasian' gal suak a, a zuihnop hangin zong zui theilo hi. 8 Amau pumpi deihna bangin a gamtate in Pasian lungdamsak theilo uhhi.

Tua ahih ciangin lawmte aw, i pumpi deihna bang zui-in gamtat ding a kiphamawh hilo hi. 13 Na pumpi uh deihna zui-in na gamtat uh leh na si ding uh a, ahi zongin Khasiangtho huhna tawh na mawh gamtatnate uh na sihsak uh leh na nungta ding uhhi.

Leitung mihingte' gamtat bangin gamta kei unla, na lungsim uh kikheelin Pasian kipuahpha sak un. Tua hi leh a hoih nate bang hi a, bangte in amah lungkim sakin, bangte a kicing hiam ci-in thei-in Pasian' deihna na phawk thei ding uhhi.

Sun khuavak sunga om mite bangin a kilawmin gamta ni. Gualnopna leh zukhamna, mawhna leh thangtatna, kitotna leh kihazatnate-in i hun beisak kei ni. 14 Kidalna dingin, Topa Zeisu Christ' hong piak galhiamte zang unla, na pumpi uh deihna bangin gamtatna ding hun omsak nawn kei un.
Tua ciangin note in hoih na sak uh thute, midangte in a sia-in a genkhak loh theihna dingun na gamta un.
Upna lamah a thahat eite in upna zawngkhalte' ginatlohna i thuakpih ding kilawm hi; eima ut bangin i gamta kei ding hi.

Note pen Pasian' biakinn na hihna uh leh note sungah Pasian' Khasiangtho a teng ahih lamtak na theihsa uh a hihi. 17 Mi khatpeuh in Pasian' biakinn susia leh Pasian in tua mipa susia ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian' biakinn a siangtho hi a, note zong tua biakinn siangtho na hi uhhi.

"Ka ut peuhpeuh ka hihtheihna ding thu om hi," a ci omkha ding hi. Ahi zongin na khempeuh hihding kilawmlo hi. Kei zong ka ut khempeuh ka hih theih hangin tua bang gamtatna khat peuhpeuh' sila ka suak nuam kei hi. 13 "An pen i gilpi-a' ding hi a, gilpi zong an-a' ding mah hilo ahi hiam?" a ci zong omkha ding hi. Ahi zongin Pasian in tuate gel a beisak hun hong tung ding hi. Pumpi pen paktatna-in zatding hilo a, Topa' na sepna-in zatding hizaw hi. Topa in pumpi-a' ding na hong sem hi.

Na pumpi uh, Pasian in a hong piak, note' sungah a teng Khasiangtho' biakinn ahih lamtak theilo na hi uhhiam? Note' pumpi, nomau' neihsa hilo a, Pasian-a' a hihi. 20 Note pen Pasian in a hong leisa na hih manun na pumpi uh Pasian' minthan'na dingin na zang un.

Tua ahih manin ngimna neilopi-in a mawktai ka hi kei a, huihlak khawng a mawktuptup ka hi kei hi. 27 Kimawlna sungah midangte a kihel dingin a sam hinapi-in tua kimawlna-ah a kihel zolo mi ka suahkhak lohna dingin ka pumpi sekin hoihtakin ka ki-uk hi.
Tua ahih manin keimah in ka hong gennop thu in: Na hihna khempeuh uh, nekna dawnna-ah ahi zongin Pasian' minthan'na dingin na hih un.

Pasian in eite ahi zelzul dingin a hong sam hilo a, hoihtak nuamtakin a om dingin a hong sam ahih manin Pasian' thu gen ding lawpna lungsim pen a gen dingpa a ki-ukzawh ding a kisam a hihi. Pasian' pawlpi mite khempeuh lakah a kizang ngeina ahih mah bangin,
Na khempeuh a kilawm a kituakin na hih un.
Tua ahih manin ka hong it lawmte aw, pumpi leh lungsim a ninsak theite khempeuh panin kisian'suahin, Pasian zahtakna tawh nungta-in siangtho sinsenin om ni.
Note kiangah ka hong gen thu in: Khasiangtho' hong sawlna bangin gamta unla, na pumpi uh utna bangin gamta kei un.

Ahi zongin Khasiangtho' sawlna bangin gamtatnate pen: Itna, lungdamna, lungnopna, lungduaina, migitna, hoihna, cihtakna, 23 dikna, leh pumpi ki-ukzawhna hi a, hih bangin a gamta mite, Thukham in bangmah cih theilo hi.

Sanggamte aw, mi khatpeuh a gamta khial a om ciangin, Khasiangtho' deihna bangin a nungta note in tua a khialpa a manin a gamtatkik theihna dingin thunem zangin na huh un. Note in zong amah bangin ze-etna na tuahkhak lohna dingun na kikem un.
Hih ka thugenna a zui mite-a kipanin Pasian' mite khempeuh tungah Pasian in nopsakna leh hehpihna thupha hong pia ta hen.
Eite a hong bawlpa pen Pasian hi a, Zeisu Christ tawh i kipawl ciangin i nuntakna-ah gamtat hoih a nei dingin a hong bawl ihi hi. Hih pen eite' omzia dingin a na ngaihsut kholhsa a hihi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa' na ka sepna hangin thong a kia keimah in note' nuntakzia dingin a hong deihna tawh a kilawm a kituakin na nuntakna dingun ka hong hanthawn hi.

na lungsim uh leh na ngaihsutna uh thaksuak sak un. 24 A thutang a siangtho ahihna thu, nuntakna mahmah panin a kilangsak, Pasian' pian'zia tawh kibangin a kibawl na ngeina thak uh bangin na nungta un.

Dawimangpa in hong suksiat theihna ding hun omsak kei un. 28 Guta ngeite in gu nawnloin, ama nuntakna ding thuman takin thalawhin, mizawngte zong a huhtheih laina dingin thatang tawh nasep ding kipan ta uh hen.
Tuhun pen hun hoihlo hun ahih manin na hun neih khempeuh uh a hoih lamin zang un.
Note, Christ tawh kipawlin na nuntakna uh in note hong thahatsak hi. Khasiangtho tawh kikhawlin, khatlekhat kihehpihin, dikna na kibawl uhhi.
Keima genna leh ka gamtatna panin thei-in na san' uh thute, nomau pumpi mahmah tawh na zui un. Tua hi leh nopsakna a hong piathei Pasian in note hong ompih ding hi.

Hih bang gamtatnate pen a tungthamin i et ciangin limtakin biaknopna lungsim a piangsak ding, kiniamkhiatna a piangsak ding, pumpi ki-ukzawhna a piangsak ding tawh kibang hi. Ahi zongin a taktakin hihte khat beek in pumpi ki-ukzawhna piangsak zolo hi.
Tua ahih manin siate pen paubaan'na a neilo mi, zi khat bek a nei mi, lungsim hoih hithiat mi, thu a ngaihsun thei mi, a kilawm a kituakin a gamta mi, zin leh leengla do a siam mi, thuhilh a siam mi,

Pasian' thu tawh a kituaklo, a haihuai tangthu phuahtawmte ngaihsutin na nei vet kei in. Pasian' deihna tawh a kituakin na nuntak zawhna dingin na kisin in. 8 Pumpi kisekin kisinna manpha hi. Ahi zongin kha thu-ah kisekin kisinna pen tuhun laitak leh a hong tungding hunah nuntakna hong piathei ahih manin manphazaw lai hi, 9 ci-a kigen pen a man taktak thu hi a, umin sin dingin a kilawm thu a hihi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in eite tungah meidawina lungsim hong guan'lo a, thahatna, ki-itna, pumpi ki-ukzawhna lungsim hong guan' hizaw hi.
Kimawl kidemna-ah a kihel mi khatpeuh in kimawlna ngeina zui lopi-in gualzawh pahtawina ngah theilo hi.

Mi khatpeuh a hoihlo na khempeuh panin kikemin a siangtho takin a om nak leh na hoih nam khempeuh a sem dingin a Topa tungah ki-apin, a Topa tungah a manpha suak ahih manin a thupi diakte-ah amah kizang ding hi.
zinleleeng do a siam mi, thuhoih a deih mi, a pumpi a ki-ukzo mi, a thutang mi, a siangtho mi, leh a kisekzo mi hi ding uhhi.
Tua mah bangin khangnote zong amau pumpi a ki-ukzawhna dingun na hanthawn pha in.

Eite in i lamet, a lian Pasian leh eite hong Hon Zeisu Christ a vangliatna hong kilatkik ding hun ngakin i om laitakin i biakna tawh a kituaklo thute leh leitung nate deihna phiatin, lungsim hi hithiatin omin, thutangin, hih leitungah Pasian' deihna bangin i nuntakna dingin tua hehpihna thu in eite hong hilh hi.
I mawhna khempeuh panin hong honkhia ding leh ama neihtuam i suahtheihna dingin Zeisu amahmah hong kipumpiak a, eite pen gamtat hoih gamtat ding a lawp mahmah ihi hi.

Pasian in note, tate, hong ci-in hong hanthotna thu mangngilh khinta na hi uhhiam? Pasian in note kiangah, "Ka ta aw, Topa' hong thuhilhna zangkhai ngaihsut kei in la, gim a hong piak ciangin lungkia kei in. 6 Banghang hiam cihleh Topa in a it mite thuhilh a, ta taktakin a ngaihsut mite a taii hi," hong ci hi.
Eite khempeuh a khialthei zelzelte vive ihi hi. Kampauna-ah a khial ngeilo mi a om leh a cingtaak mahmah hi a, a pumpi zong a ukzo mi a hihi.
A hoih a manin gamtat ding thei napi-in a gamta lote a khial a hihi.
Note a hong sampa a siangtho ahih mah bangin note zong na gamtatna khempeuh uhah na siangtho un.
Na khempeuh a beina ding hun hong naita hi. Nomau pumpi ki-uktawm thei-in pilvang unla, hoihtakin thu a ngen thei-in om ta un.

Hih thu hangin na upna ban uhah gamtat hoihna na behlap unla, na gamtat hoihna uh thutheihna tawh na behlap un; 6 na thutheihna uh pumpi ki-ukzawhna tawh na behlap unla, na pumpi ki-ukzawhna uh thuakzawhna tawh na behlap un; na thuakzawhna uh Pasian' deih bangin gamtatna tawh na behlap unla, 7 Pasian' deih bangin na gamtatna uh sanggam ki-itna tawh na behlap un; na sanggam ki-itna uh itna thukpi tawh na behlapzawhna dingun na hanciam un.
Tua ahih manin Pasian tawh ka kipawl hi, ci napi-in khuamial tawh kisai gamtatnate i gamtat leh i kampauna leh i gamtatna tawh zuauthu a gen ihi hi.
Pasian tawh ka kipawl hi, a ci mi khempeuh, Zeisu Christ a gamtat bangin a gamtat ding a hihi.
Pasian' tate in mawhna bawbawllo uhhi. Pasian' Tapa in amaute kem a, Dawimangpa in amaute susia zolo hi.
Hih mite in pawl kikhenna piangsakin, amau pumpi deihna bangin gamta uh a, Khasiangtho zong neilo uhhi.
Ka it mite thuhilhin ka taii hi. Tua ahih manin lungsim tak tawh na mawhna panun kisik kik un.

"Na vengte uh inn na deihgawh kei ding uhhi. Na vengte uh zi hita leh, ama nasempa hita leh, ama nasemnu hita leh, ama bawngtal hita leh, ama la hita leh, na vengte-a' ahi na khat peuhpeuh na deihgawh kei ding uhhi," a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Samson in amaute kiangah, "Note' mai-ah thuhaksa khat hong gen ning. Hih pawi ni sagih sungin a thu mukhia-in bang hiam cih nong gentheih uh leh saihadial puan silh sawmthum leh pawipuan silh sawmthum note kong pia ding hi. 13 Ahih hangin bang hiam cih nong gentheih kei uh leh saihadial puan silh sawmthum leh pawipuan silh sawmthum kei nong pia ding uhhi," a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute in ama kiangah, "Na thuhaksa hong gen in, za dih ni," a ci uhhi.
Leitung leh a tunga omte, leitung leh a tunga tengte { Topa}-a' a hihi.
Na lungsim khempeuh tawh { Topa } muang in la, nang' theihna suang kei in.
Nangmah a pilin kingaihsun tawm kei in la, { Topa } zahtakin a sia peel in.
Thadahna in zawn'na hi a, thanuamna in hauhna hi.
Ol takin hauhpakna oltak mahin kiamkik pah a, haksapi-in hauhtohna khangto semsem hi.
A manloin sum ngahna in innsung lungkhamsak a, sumgolh a deihlote a nuntak sauvei nuam hi.
Mite in bangbangin ai a san zongin, a piang ding thu pen { Topa' } deihna bangbek hizaw hi.
Limtakin ngaihsunin geelgeelna pen hauhna lampi hi a, nawhsa-in lopthop hihna pen zawn'na lampi a hihi.
Mi thadahpa in na sem nuamlo ahih manin amahmah a kithattawm a hihi. 26 Mihoihlote in lungkim hun neiloin deih thuah tawntung uh a, mihoihte cingh-in piakhia tawntung uhhi.
Hauhnop man bekin sum' sila suak kei unla, a manloin gamtakha kei un.
Nakpi takin lo a khopa hau mahmah a, bangmahin a kimang tumlo na a sempa zawng mahmah hi. 20 A citak mipa in thupha tampi ngah ding a, a hau baih nuam mipa in gim tuak pelmawh ding hi.
A huaiham mi in a hauhna dingin huai mengmeng a, a tawpna-ah a zawn' ding lamtak phawkkhalo hi.
Sum deihna lungsim na neih leh lungkim hun cih na thei ngei kei ding hi. Na hauhnop hangin na deih khempeuh na ngah ngei kei ding hi. Hih pen a mawknapi a hihi.
Leitunga a om ngun leh kham khempeuh keima-a' a hihi.

Tua ciangin Zeisu in amaute khempeuh kiangah, "Hoihtakin kidawm unla, na huaiham lohna dingun kikem un. Banghang hiam cihleh bangzahta-in mi khat a hauh hangin a neihsa tawh a nuntakna taktak kicing zolo hi," a ci hi.
"To nih' na a semkhawmzo nasem kuamah omlo hi. A to khat mudahin khat it ding a, khat beelin khat a simmawh ding hi. Pasian' na leh leitung sum na na semkhawmzo kei ding uhhi," a ci hi.

Biakinn huangsung a lut ciangin bawng, tuu, leh kawl vakhu zuakte mu a, sumkhekte zong a sumkhekna sabuai-ah a tu mu hi. 15 Amah in zong khauteep bawlin biakinn huangsung panin tuu leh bawng-a kipan ganhing khempeuh hawlkhia a, sumkhekte' sabuai zong sawnpaih sakin a sum khempeuh a thehthang sak hi. 16 Tua ciangin kawl vakhu zuakte kiangah, "Na kawl vakhute uhhih lai panin paikhiatpih un. Ka Pa' inn pen sumzuakna inn phualpi-in nei kei un," a ci hi.

Kuama neihsa, ngun, kham, leh puante en' dingin ka ngaihsun ngei kei hi. 34 Kei leh ka kithuahpihte' kisapna khempeuh ka ngahtheihna dingin keima khut mahmah tawh na ka sepna thu note in na thei uhhi. 35 Topa Zeisu mahmah in, ‘Ngahna sangin piak khiatna-ah lungdamna lianzaw hi,’ a cihna phawkkawmin nakpi takin nasepna tawh na khempeuhah a zawngkhalte huh ding hi hang, ci-in note kiangah kong lak khinzo hi," ci-in a vaikhak hi.

Siatna nam khempeuh ahi, hoihlohna, huaihamna, khatlekhat kisiatsak nopna, hazatna, mi thahna, kitotna, khemna, a sialam bekbek ngaihsutna, zuau genna, 30 mi gensiatna, Pasian muhdahna, midangte a heh theih a maizum theihna dingin gamtatna, kiphatsakna, kisialhna, thusia bawlna, nu leh pate' thu man'lohna, 31 gamtatsiatna, ciampelna, midangte khuallo, hehpihna neiloin, a sia namkim a gamta uhhi. 32 Tua bangin a gamtate in sihna thuak ding hi, ci-in Pasian' thukhenna thei napi-in, tua bangin amaute a gamtat uh banah, tua bangin a gamtate pakta-in a awi zawsop lai uhhi.

Leitung mihingte' gamtat bangin gamta kei unla, na lungsim uh kikheelin Pasian kipuahpha sak un. Tua hi leh a hoih nate bang hi a, bangte in amah lungkim sakin, bangte a kicing hiam ci-in thei-in Pasian' deihna na phawk thei ding uhhi.
Nasem i cih mite pen a topa uh tungah citakin a thuman ding uh kisam hi.
a gutate, a huaihamte, zukhamte, mi gensiate, ahih kei leh mi' na a sutte khat beek, Pasian' Ukna sungah lutthei hetlo ding hi.

"Ka ut peuhpeuh ka hihtheihna ding thu om hi," a ci omkha ding hi. Ahi zongin na khempeuh hihding kilawmlo hi. Kei zong ka ut khempeuh ka hih theih hangin tua bang gamtatna khat peuhpeuh' sila ka suak nuam kei hi.
Guta ngeite in gu nawnloin, ama nuntakna ding thuman takin thalawhin, mizawngte zong a huhtheih laina dingin thatang tawh nasep ding kipan ta uh hen.
Note pen Pasian' mi na hih manun note lakah nulepa khialhna, a kilawmlo-a gamtatna, huaihamna cihte genin zong na nei vet kei un.

Nulepa khialhna a gamta mi, a kilawmlo-a a gamta mi, leh a huaiham (huaihamna zong milim biakna zahin sia hi) mite in Christ Ukna leh Pasian Ukna sungah bangmah ngah nei hetlo ding ahihna uh teltakin thei ta un.
Note' phattuamna ding bek ngaihsun kei unla, midangte' phattuamna ding ngaihsutsak zaw un.
Sanggamte aw, a tawpna-ah ka hong gennop thu in, a hoih leh a phattaak thute tawh na lungsim uh na kidimsak un. Tuate in: A man, a dik, a tang, a siangtho, a deihhuai, leh a pahtakhuai thute a hihi.
Ama thu a manglo mite tungah hihbang gamtatna hangin Pasian' hehna hong tung ding hi.
Tu ma-a ka hong gensa uh mah bangin kamtam nuam se loin hoihtakin om hithiatna, no tawh a kisai thu bek ngaihsutna, leh note' nuntakna ding na na sepna ding uh hanciamin nei un
a sia lamsang peuhmah pelh un.
Note tawh ka hong omkhawm lai-un, "Na a sem nuamlo mi peuhmah an nesak kei un," ci-in ka hong gen uhhi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Laisiangtho in, "Buh a cil bawngtal muk na tuam kei in," a cih banah, "Nasempa in a thaman a ngahding a kilawm ahi hi," na ci hi.

Ahi zongin a haunuam mite in ze-etna a tuamtuam thuak a, duhhopna huaihamna a haivai thute-ah awkcipin, haksatna leh siatna a tuahlawh uhhi. 10 Sum deihluatna in siatna namkim piangsak hi. Mi pawlkhat in sum deihlua liang uh ahih manin a upna panun pialkhia-in gimna lungkhamna tampi a thuaklawh uhhi.
Sum deihluatna tawh na kipelhna dingun na nuntakna uhah kikem unla, na neihzah uh tawh lungkim un. Pasian in, "Note ka hong nusia ngei kei ding a, ka hong tamasak ngei kei ding hi," hong ci hi.
Mi khatpeuh in ama deihna zui-in a gamtat ciangin mawhna a piangsak a hihi. 15 Lungsim utna a gol semsem ciangin mawhna hong piang a, mawhna hong cingtaak ciangin sihna hong piang hi.
Pasian' piak na a zatsiamte bangin Pasian' kiang panin na ngah uh nate, midangte' phattuamna dingin na zang un.
Amaute pen siatna a piangsak thei zongsatna lelin sila hinapi-un mite tungah suahtakna ding thu a gen uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh mite pen, a hong zo peuhpeuhte' sila ihi hi.
Tua ciangin amau' mai-ah Joshua leh Israel-te khempeuh kilelsak khem uh a, gamlak lamah a tai uhhi.

Ka upate uh leh ka gamsung uha a teng mite khempeuh in kote kiangah, ‘Na khualzinna ding uh lam-an bawl unla, amaute a dawntuah dingin pai-in amaute kiangah, "Kote, na nasem ka hi uhhi. Tua ahih ciangin kote tawh thuciamna hong bawl un," va ci un,’ hong ci uhhi. 12 Hih lai-ah ka anlum uh om hi. No kiangah a hong pai dingin kong din'khiat ni uh, khualzin lam-an dingin ka inn panun ka guan' laitakun lum lai hi. Ahih hangin tu-in en un, keu-in ap hi. 13 Hih leenggahzu umte ka thun laitakun a thak a hihi. Tu-in en un, puakgawp ta hi. Hih ka puante uh leh ka khedapte uh khual gamlapi zinna-in paatgawpta hi," a ci uhhi.
Joshua in amaute samin amaute kiangah, "Banghangin kote' nai hih lai-ah a teng hinapi-in, ‘Note' kiang panin gamla mahmah ung,’ cihna tawh kote hong khem na hi uhhiam?

Ahih hangin { Topa } in Samuel kiangah, "A tungtham hita leh a tun' san'na hita leh en kei in. Banghang hiam cihleh amah ka nolh hi. { Topa } in mihingte' muh bangin mulo hi. Mihingte in a pualam a kilangte en a, ahih hangin { Topa } in a lungsim en hi," a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute' mai-ah a gamtat kheelin, amaute' muhna-ah a hai-in kibawl a, kulhkongkhakte tung kui gawpin, a khamul tungah a cilphuan kaisuksak hi.

Jonadab in ama kiangah, "Na lupna tungah lum in la, a cina kineih in. Nangmah a veh dingin na pa hong pai ciangin ama kiangah, ‘Keimah in mu-in ama khut panin an ka nek theihna dingin ka sanggamnu Tamar hong paisakin annek ding hong piasak in la, ka muhna-ah an hong bawl sak in,’ ci in," a ci hi. 6 Tua ahih ciangin Ammon lumin a cina kineih hi. Amah a en dingin kumpipa a pai ciangin Ammon in kumpipa kiangah, "Ama khut panin ka nek theihna dingin ka sanggamnu Tamar hong paisakin mohpheng nih khawng na bawlsakna ding kong thum hi," a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Joab in Tekoa-ah mi sawlin tua panin numei pil khat la-in ama kiangah, "Dahin a kap kineih in la, dahna lim puante silh in. Sathau nilh kei in la, misi hangin ni tampi a thum khin numei bangin gamta in.
Keimah mai-etin gamdang mite ka kiangah hong pai uhhi. Amaute in ka thu a zak phetun, ka thu hong mang uhhi.

Tua ciangin { Topa } in Ahijah kiangah, "En in, a tapa tawh kisai nangma kiangah thu a dong dingin Jeroboam' zi hong pai hi. Banghang hiam cihleh a tapa a ci na hi. Tua bang tua bangin tuanu tungah na gen ding hi," a ci hi. Amah hong pai ciangin numei dang khatin kineih hi. 6 Ahih hangin Ahijah in amah kongkhak hong tun' a kheging a zak ciangin, "Hong tum in Jeroboam' zi aw, banghangin midang khat kineih na hi hiam? Nang-a' dingin thugik khat kei tungah hong kipia hi.
Ka thu a zak phetun amaute in hong mang pah uh a, gamdang mite in kei hong mai-et uhhi.
Mikhialte tawh tukhawm loin, thusim neite tawh ka kipawl kei hi.
Amah a zaliatna panin sukniam ding bekbek amaute in a sawm uhhi. Amaute in thuman lo-ah nuamsa mahmah uhhi. Amaute in a kampi uh tawh phat khem uh a, ahih hangin a sungtawng uhah samsiat uhhi.
Nektawm ding neilopi-in milian bangin omna sangin nuntakna ding na semin mi mawkmawk hihna hoihzaw hi.
Mi pawlkhatte, zawng napi-in kihausak uh a, mi pawlkhatte, hau napi-in kizawngsak uhhi.
Lawm pawlkhatte sauvei kimanglo a, lawm pawlkhatte sanggam sangin kipzaw hi.

Thah dinga a kikaikhia mipa honkhia in la, sihna ding mun a zuan mipa lehkaih kik in. 12 Ke'n theikha kei ing, na cihnop hangin lungsim a thei Pasian in theitel veve hi; nang hong encik Pasian in hong teltheihna phawk in. Mi khempeuh a gamtatna bangin a thukkik ding hi.
Ahi zongin ke'n kong genin-ah: Mawhpih nopna lungsim tawh numei khat a en mi peuhmah in a lungsimah tua numei tawh a mawh a hihi.
"Kuamah, to nih' sila hikhawm theilo hi. Khat mudahin khat it ding a, khat tungah thumanin khat simmawhbawl ding hi. Note in Pasian' na leh leitung sum na na semkhawm zo kei ding uhhi.
"Kamsang taktak a hilote na muh uh ciangin limtakin kikem un. Amaute in a tungthamah tuu lim hong pua-in, ahi zongin a sungtawng taktak uh ngia hangsan bang ahi uhhi.

Na tungthamun mihoih a kineihkhem mite aw, Isaiah in note' thu a genna man mahmah hi. Tua a genna-ah, 8 ‘Hih mite in a kampi bek uh tawh kei hong zahtak bawl uh a, ahi zongin a lungsim taktak uh kei tawh kigamla hi. 9 Mihingte' bawltawm thukhamte, Pasian' thukham zahin mite tungah hilh uh ahih manin kei hong biak hangun a kiman'na omlo hi,’ ci hi," ci-in a dawng hi.
Ahi zongin Zeisu in amau' gitloh geelna thei ahih manin, "Mihoih a kineihkhem mite aw, banghangin kei hong thangsiah se na hi uhhiam?

"Mihoih a kineihkhem, no Thukham hilh siate leh Pharisee mite in gimna na thuak ding uhhi. Note in vantung ki-ukna sungah mite a lut theihlohna dingin kong na khakcip uhhi. Note lah na lutnuam kei uh a, a lutnuamte lah na lutsak kei uhhi. 14 "Mihoih a kineihkhem, no Thukham hilh siate leh Pharisee mite in gimna na thuak ding uhhi. Meigong numeite tungah nuamtak sa-in a neihsa teng uh laksakin na zangmang uh a, mite in mihoih hong saktheihna ding na deihna-un thu saupipi na ngen uhhi. Hih bangin na gamtatna uh hangin na gim thuak ding uh nasiazaw kan lai ding hi. 15 "Mihoih a kineihkhem, no Thukham hilh siate leh Pharisee mite in gimna na thuak ding uhhi. Note in mi khat bek nangawn na ngah zawhna ding uh na hanciamna-un leitung tuitung lumletin khual na zin uh a, na ngahsunte uh zong note zah nihin a siahuai, hell khuk tungding mi na suah uhhi.

Mihoih a kineihkhem, no Thukham hilh siate leh Pharisee mite in gimna na thuak ding uhhi. Note in Pasian tungah lengmasel, masala, leh kummin sing namtui-a kipanin meh namtui nam khempeuh, sawmah khat pia napi-in, thukham sungah a thupizaw ahi thutang, hehpihna, leh thumante na don kei uhhi. Adangte nusia tuanloin hih thute na zuihding uh a hihi. 24 A makai ding hinapi-in, mittaw bangin bangmah tumloteng thupi ngaihsutin, a thupiteng na nusiakha uh a, tui tawh na dawnkhop khaklohna dingun thovai khaih napi-in kalaoh a nawmvalhkha tawh na kibang uhhi. 25 "Mihoih a kineihkhem, no Thukham hilh siate leh Pharisee mite in gimna na thuak ding uhhi. Note in hai leh kuangte a pualam na siangsak uh a, ahi zongin tuate sungah, thatanghat thu leh huaihamna tawh mi-a' na suh uh nate a om hi. 26 A mittaw Pharisee mite aw, a pualam zong a siangtho a suahtheihna dingin hai leh kuang sunga a om nate a siangtho hisak phot un. 27 "Mihoih a kineihkhem, no Thukham hilh siate leh Pharisee mite in gimna na thuak ding uhhi. Note pen leikang tawh a kizut manin a pualam a hoih mahmah tawh kibang napi-in a sungah misi guh leh a kihhuai nin nam khempeuh a omna hankhuk tawh na kibang uhhi. 28 Tua mah bangin note zong mite' muhin mihoih mahmah bang napi-in na sung tawng taktak uhah mawhna leh kineihkhemna bek a om hi.
a topa in nakpi takin gim pia-in, mihoih a kineihkhemte' gimthuak dingteng thuaksak ding a, amah kapin a hagawi ding hi

Zeisu in amaute dawng a, "A tungthama a hoihin a kilangkhem note' thu, Isaiah in a genkholhna man mahmah hi. Ama genna-ah, ‘Pasian in hih bangin gen hi: Hih mite in a kampi bek uh tawh kei hong zahtakbawl uh a, a lungsim taktak uh kei tawh kigamla hi. 7 Mihingte' bawltawm thukhamte, Pasian' thukham zahin mite tungah hilh uh ahih manin, kei hong biak hangun a kiman'na om lo hi,’ ci hi.

Meigong numeite tungah nuamtaksa-in a neihsate laksakin zangmang uh a, mite in mihoih a saktheihna ding uh a deihna hangun thu saupipi a ngen uhhi. Amau' kineihkhemna tawh kizui-in a gimthuak ding uh lianzaw ding hi," a ci hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Christ kineihkhemte leh kamsang kineihkhemte hong piang ding a, ahihzawh leh, a teelsa mite nangawn a khemna dingun lim leh na lamdangte hong bawl ding uhhi.
"Mi khempeuh in note hong pahtakbawl ciangin gimna a thuakding na hi uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh a pu a pate un zong tua bangmahin kamsang zuaute a pahtakbawl uhhi.

Tua ahih manin a hunhoih ngakin vil gige uh a, ukna aana a neite' khutsungah Zeisu a aptheihna dingun ama kampau tawh a mat nopna-un, lungsim takpi tawh thudong a va kineihkhem dingin mi pawlkhat thukan dingin a cial uhhi.

Meigong numeite tungah nuamtaksa-in, khemin a neihsateng uh laksak uh a, mite in mihoih a sakna ding uh a deihna-un thu saupipi a ngen uhhi. Amau' kineihkhemna tawh kizui-in a gimthuak ding uh lianzaw ding hi," a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Va ciahin na pasal va sam in la, hih lai-ah hong paikik un," a ci hi. 17 Numei in, "Pasal ka nei kei hi," a cih ciangin Zeisu in, " ‘Pasal ka nei kei hi,’ na cih pen man mahmah hi. 18 Pasal nga na nei khin ngei a, tu-a na ompih zong na pasal hilo hi. Tua ahih manin na thugen man mahmah hi," a ci hi.
Teembaw panin teembaw hawlte taikhiat sawm uh ahih manin teembaw tung panin gunkuang khiasuk uh a, teembaw mailam panin a khawlna ding sikkawipi a khiasuk ding kineih uhhi.
Na ki-itnate uh lungsim takpi tawh hi sak unla, a siate mudahin a hoihte lenkip un.
Thuhilh siamna nei-in, thusim khempeuh thei-in, na khempeuh thei-in, mualte kinsak zawhna ding upna ka neih hangin itna ka neih kei leh ka kiman'na bangmah omlo hi.

Note in na hong thupi ngaihsut theihna dingun koleko a hong kiphattawm zel ka hi kei uh a, lungsimtawng hoihlo napi-in a puatham siamna hangin a kisial mite nial thei-in, kote' hangin note na kisaktheihna ding uh deihna hizaw hi.

Amaute pen sawltak taktak hiloin, sawltak a kineihkhemte hi uh a, a nasepna uhah zong zuau-in, Christ' sawltak taktak a battheihna dingun a meel kiseel ahi uhhi. 14 Tua pen lamdang sak ding hilo hi. Satan nangawn Pasian' vantung mi tawh a kibangin kibawltawm thei hi.
Mi khatpeuh in a beh a phung, a diakdiakin a innkuansung mite a vak nop kei leh a upna a nusia hita a, thu umlo mite sangin siazaw lai hi.
Mi pawlkhatte' khialhnate kimu pahpahin mawhsakna thuakpah uh a, pawlkhatte' khialhna pen damdamin hong kinung theih hi.

biakna thu a puathamteng zui napi-in biakna hangin vangliatna thu a omte deihlo ding uhhi. Tua bangin a gamta mite na pelh in. 6 Tua bang mite pawlkhat, mite inn-ah va hawh khiankhianin, deihna nam tuamtuam leh mawhna lungsim tawh a kidim numeite na thuzawh uhhi.
migilote leh thuthei kineihin mi khem theite zong sia tat semsemin, amaute in mi khemkhemin, amaute mah in zong khemna a thuak ding mah uh a hihi.
Nomau kikhem tawmin thu zak bek tawh maisak kei unla, na zak bangun zui-in semzaw un.
Tua ahih manin hu a diiklo, hu a sanglo pumpi pen a si ahih mah bangin sepna tawh a kizomlo upna zong a si a hihi.
Ahi zongin tunglam panin a kingah pilna a siangtho a hihi. Mi tawh kilem thei-in dik a, mi tawh kikhawl thei a, hehpihna lungsim nei-in gamtat hoih a, mi lang-etlo a, kineihkhem cihte omlo hi.
Pasian kiang nai un. Amah in zong hong nai ding hi. Mawhneite in na khut uh silsiang unla, a kineihkhemte in na lungsim uh siangsak un.
Itna in mawhna tampi khuhcip thei ahih manin lungsim takpi tawh khatlekhat ki-it ding thupi ngaihsut pha pen un.

Mawhna ka nei kei hi, i cihleh eite a kineihkhem ihi a, eite a thutaklo ihi hi. 9 Ahi zongin Pasian kiangah i mawhnate va pulak lehang, amah citakin thuman ahih manin, i mawhnate hong maisakin i hoihlohnate khempeuh hong siangsak ding hi.

Ka it lawmte aw, kha ka nei a ci mi khempeuh' thugen um kei unla, tua thute Pasian kiang pan mah ahi hiam, ci-in kantel un. Banghang hiam cihleh leitungah kamsang a kineihkhem tampi hong om khinta hi.
Ka it tate aw, note, Pasian' mite na hi uh a, tua bang kamsang kineihkhemte a zokhin na hi uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh leitung mite a pan'pih dawimangpa sangin note hong ompih Pasian vanglian zaw hi.

Tua ahih manin mun khatah a tengkhawm dingin leitang in amaute gel vak zolo hi. Banghang hiam cihleh amau' gan neihsate tam mahmah ahih manin amaute gel tengkhawm theilo uh a, 7 Abram' gancingte leh Lot' gancingte kitawng thei zel hi. Tua hun laitakin Kanaan mite leh Perez mite tua gamah teng lai uhhi. 8 Tua ciangin Abram in Lot' kiangah, "Nang leh kei' kikal, nang' gancingte leh kei' gancingte' kikalah kitotna omsak kei ni. Banghang hiam cihleh eite beh khat ihi hi.

"Tua hun laitakin na thukhente uh ka thuhilh a, ‘Na sanggamte uh thu neihte za unla, mi khat leh a sanggampa ahi a, amah tawh a om khualmipa tawh ahi zongin thu a mantakin khen un. 17 Thukhenna-ah angvan na nei kei ding uhhi. A neu leh a liante a kibangin a thu na ngai ding uh a, maitang zahtak tuam na nei kei ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh thukhenna pen Pasian-a' a hihi. Note-a' dingin a haksa lua thute kei kiangah nong paipih ding uh a, keimah in tua thu ka za ding hi,’ ka ci hi.
Tua bangin kiphatsakna tawh pau nawn kei in la, na kamsung pan kihihsakna gingkhiasak kei in. Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } pen a thei Pasian hi a, amah in gamtatnate a tawi khai hi.
Mihaipa in a hehna sihlawh a, muhdahna in sihna piangsak hi.
Ahi zongin note tawh kam a kinial hiloin, Pasian tawh a kinial ka hihi. Pasian tawh hih ka thu ka kinial nuam hi.
bangmaha kimanglo kampaute paulo a, phattuamna omlo dingpi-in thu seello uhhi.
Lau-in ling unla, mawhna pel un. Na lupna tung uhah lungngai phapha unla, om khikhe un.
Pasian pen thu a tangin a khenpa hi a, migilote tungah a heh denpa a hihi.
Nangma tungah siatna bangmah a hong bawllo, mi khatpeuh tawh thu omlopi-in kimawk tot kei in.

Mihaite thuhilh lecin hong maizumsak ding a, migilote thuhilh lecin hong sugawp ding hi. 8 Mihaite thuhilh kei in; hong mudah ding uhhi. Mipilte thuhilh in; hong it ding uhhi. 9 Mipilte thuhilh lecin pil semsemna-in nei ding a, thuman mite thuhilh lecin a thutheihna uh khang semsem ding hi.
Mipilte in thuhilhna mang a, a hai paute in lungkhamna tuak hi.
Mipilte in a pilna uh behlapin, mihaite a pau ciangin thusia tawh kizom pahpah hi.
Mihaite pen amau mah thuman kisa tawntung a, mipilte in mi' thugenna ngai nuam uhhi. 16 Mihaite in a hehna uh langsakpah uh a, mipilte in a hehna uh ipzo hi.
Hilh ding utlo, kihihsakna in kitotna bek piangsak thei a, hong kithuhilh ding utna pen a hoihzaw a hihi.
Kam nemin dawn'na in hehna damsak a, kam khauh in hehna piangsak hi.
Lungtomna in kitotna piangsak a, lungduaina in kilemna piangsak hi.
Mihoihte in a kampau ding ngaihsun phot a, migilote' paupakna pen thusia tawh kizom hi.
{ Topa' } deih bangin gamtatna pen galte nangawn lawma kaihzawhna a hihi.
Kisaktheihna in siatna hong tuaksak a, kiphatsakna in pukna hong piangsak hi.
Thahatna sangin lungduaina hoihzaw a, khuapi khat ukzawhna sangin eimah ki-ukzawhna hoihzaw hi.
Kitot i kipat ciangin tui lipi cin'na phung kehsakkhak tawh kibang hi. Tua ahih manin a nasiat ma-in kitot khawlpak in.

Thu a thei taktakte in gengen khollo a, a paupau khollote thumu taktak hizaw hi. 28 Mihaite pauloin om leh a pil mahin kingaihsun hi. Thungaihsun thei na hihna a kilatna dingin pauloin om khinkhian in.

Midangte tawh a kipawlthei phalote amah bek thupi a kisate hi a, midangte' cih khempeuh man a sak khat beek omlo hi. 2 Mihaite in thu a teltheih zawhna ding uh kinlo uh a, pil si, a kicih theihna ding deihna bek tawh thu gen uhhi.
thu za khin nailopi-in dawn'kikna pen haina leh maizumna a hihi.

Pilna in mi lungduaisak a, mi' hong hehsaknate kiphawkmawh bawlna in minthan'na a hihi. 12 Kumpipa' hehna humpinelkai hawk bangin lauhuai a, ama pahtakna lopa tunga daitui taak bangin deihhuai hi. 13 Tapa hai pen a pa' lungkhamna hi a, zi phunphun pen a theu theilo guahciin tawh kibang hi.
Kitot khak ding pelhna in pahtak ngahna hi a, mihaite bek kitot ding ut uhhi.
Phun bek a thei zi tawh innsungah ten'khop sangin innkhumzang kiu khatah tangten' hoihzaw tham hi.
A phun hat zi gilo tawh ten'khop sangin gam simthamah khat guak tangten' hoihzaw hi.
Kampau a ki-ipzote lungkhamna tawh kipelh hi.
Mi kiphasakte hawlkhia lecin kitotna leh kisimmawhna bei pah ding hi.
Mihaite pil hopih kei un; amaute in a manphatna phawk theilo uhhi.
Phun bek a thei zi tawh innsungah ten'khop sangin innkhumzang kiu khatah tangten' hoihzaw tham hi.
Eite tawh a kisailo kitotna sunga kiphumna pen ui ommuang khat a bil-in i kaihsak tawh kibang hi.
Meihol in mei-am ding piangsak a, sing in mei kuangsak a, migilo in kitotna piangsak hi.
Mihaite' thudotna dawngdawng lecin nang zong amau mah bangin a hai na hi hi. 5 Mihaite a pilin a kingaihsut khaklohna dingin amau' haina tawh kizui-in dawng zaw in.
Phun bekbek a thei zi pen theu hun mel a neilo guahciin tawh kibang hi.
Mihaipa a hehna bangin kam pau-in gamta gawp a, mipilpa ahih leh ki-ipin a hehna damsak hi.
A heh pahpahte in kitotna piangsak a, a heh baihte khial thei tawntung hi.
Midangte kihtakna in hong lunghimawhsak a, { Topa } muan'na in hong lungmuangsak hi.
A pa a simmawh mipa, a nu' thu a mang nuamlo mipa, va-ak in a mittang khelkhiat sakin musanete in a sa ne ding uhhi.
Bawngnawi toktok lehang thawhbat hong suak a, mi khat' nak tupsak lehang si hong luang a, mi phin lehang kitotna hong piang hi.

Mi khat sangin mi nih hoihzaw hi; amau' sepna thaman a tamzaw ngah uhhi. 10 Banghang hiam cihleh khat cimawh leh a khat in huh a, mi khat guak pen cimawh zenzen leh a huh ding omlo ahih manin a dahhuai pha mahmah a hihi.

Thu ngaihsun masa-in pau in la, Pasian' tungah thu mawk ciampak kei in. Vantungah Pasian om a, leitungah nang om na hih manin na pau ding-a kilawm zahval pau kei in. 3 Lunghimawh semsem lecin na mang sia semsem ding a, tam pau semsem lecin na haina kilang semsem ding hi.
Heh pahpah kei in; hehna a haihuai a hihi.
Mi' gen khempeuh thudon kei in. Na nasempa' hong samsiatna na zakha ding hi. 22 Nang zong midang na samsiat zelzelna teltakin na kithei hi.

Amah a Bawlpa tawh a kido mipa, beelsekpa tawh a kilehdo lei beel in gimna ngah ta hen! Tungman in amah a sekpa kiangah, "Nang in bang bawl na hi hiam, na na bawl in khutlet neilo hi," ci-in a thu sel ngam ahi hiam?
Note in a kitawng ding, a kilai ding, gitloh gamtatin, khuttum tawh a kitum ding bekin an na tang uhhi. Hih bang lelin antan'na tawh na thungetna uh hong kingai ding ahi hiam?
gamlapi pek panin { Topa } ka kilang hi. Keimah in nang kong it tawntung a, tua ahih manin nang' tungah kong thuman tawntung hi.
Mi nih, thukimna om masa lopi-in lampi-ah tonkhawm thei uh ahi hiam?
Zeisu in, "Laisiangtho mahah, ‘Na Topa Pasian na ze-et kei in,’ ci-in gen hilo ahi hiam?" ci-in a dawng hi.

"Kha thu lamah zawngkhal a kisate sungah vantung ki-ukna thu om ahih manin thupha ngah mi ahi uhhi. 4 Dahin a thum a tau mite Pasian in amaute hehnem ding ahih manin thupha ngah mi ahi uhhi. 5 A lungnem mite in Pasian' ciamsa leitang ngah ding uh ahih manin thupha ngah mi ahi uhhi. 6 Pasian' deihteng sepding a hanciamte Pasian in lungkimna ngahsak ding ahih manin thupha ngah mi ahi uhhi. 7 Midang a hehpih mite tungah Pasian in hehpihna pia ding ahih manin thupha ngah mi ahi uhhi.

Tua ahih manin Pasian tungah biakna a pia dingin biakna tau mai-ah na om laitakin na sanggamte khat peuhpeuh na tungah a lungkimlohna thu na phawk leh, 24 Pasian na biakna ding nate, a biakna tau mai-ah nusia photin, pai-in na sanggampa tawh va kilem phot in la, tua khit ciangin hong paikikin Pasian biakna pia in.

Na gen peuhmah ahi ahih leh, ‘Hi,’ ci in la, a hilo ahih leh, ‘Hilo,’ cihna tawh kicingsak in. Tua bang hiloin kiciamna kam na zat ciangin Dawimangpa tawh kizomin thumanlo na hih lamtak hong kilang hi.

"Tua ahih ciangin note kiangah kong genin-ah: Na nuntakna dingun bang ne-in bang dawn ding cih ahi a, na pumpi uh-a' dingin bang silh ding cih ahi zongin lunghimawh lua kei un. Nuntakna pen an sangin thupizaw a, pumpi pen puan sangin thupizaw hilo ahi hiam?
Banghangin na lawmte' mit sunga ninthem tang muhsak thei napi-in nangma mit sunga singluang tang phawk theilo na hi hiam?
Banghang hiam cihleh nomau kampauna tawh kizui-in thu hong kikhen ding a, dik hi, cihna ahi a, mawh hi, cihna ahi zongin na ngahna dingun nomau kampau mah hong kibulphuh ding hi," a ci hi.

"Na sanggamte uh na tung uhah hong khialh leh pai-in note gel bek theihin a khialhna va gen un. Na thu uh a hong man' leh na sanggampa uh a ngahkik na hi uhhi. 16 Ahi zongin na thu uh a hong man'nop kei leh, Laisiangtho sungah, ‘Mi nih ahih kei leh mi thum' theihna bek tawh mawhsakna khat peuhpeuh man pan hi,’ a cih mah bangin midang khat ahi a, nih ahi zongin tonpih un. 17 Amah in tua mite' thu a man'nop kei leh pawlpite tungah a thu ko un. Pawlpite' thu nangawn a man'nop kei leh Gentail mite leh siahdongte bangin na ngaihsun un. 18 "Note kiangah a taktakin kong genin-ah: Leitungah na kham peuhmah uh vantungah zong kikham ding a, leitungah na phal peuhmah uh vantungah zong kiphal ding hi. 19 Leitungah note nih thukimin na nget uh na khat peuhpeuh, vantungah a om ka Pa in hong pia ding hi.
Nungzui dangte' omna-ah a tun'kik uh ciangin tua lai-ah mi tampi tak na om uhhi. Thukham hilh sia pawlkhatte leh nungzuite thu na kisel uhhi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in a nungzuite kiangah, "Mite a puktheihna ding ze-etna hong piang hamtang ding hi. Ahi zongin tua pukna ding a piangsak mipa in gimna ngah ding hi.

A nungzuite nangawn un hih thu a zak ciangun, "Hih thugen haksa lua hi. Kua in zuizo ding ahi hiam?" a ci uhhi. 61 Ahi zongin Zeisu in hih thu-ah a nungzuite' phunna thei ahih manin, "Hih ka thugenna in note hong lungkiasak ahi hiam? 62 Mihing Tapa ama omna ngei-ah a ciahto kik a mu hi le uh cin bang na ci ding uhhiam? 63 Nuntakna a piathei pen Pasian' Kha hi a, mihingte' hihtheih bangmah omlo hi. Keima hong gen thute pen nuntakna a hong piathei tua Kha thu a hihi. 64 Tua hinapi-in note pawlkhat in na um kei uhhi," a ci hi. (Zeisu in a kipat cil peka kipanin kuateng in ama thu um ding a, kuateng in amah lehpei ding cih thu thei khinzo hi.) 65 Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Ka Pa in ahi thei dingin bawl kei leh ka kiangah kuamah hong pai theilo ding hi, ka cihna thu pen hih thu hang mah ahi hi," ci-in a genthuah lai hi. 66 Hih bangin a thugenna hangin a nung a zui a thungai mi tampi kileh kikin Zeisu zui nawnlo uhhi. 67 Tua ahih manin Zeisu in a nungzui sawmlenihte kiangah, "Note zong na ciahkik nuam mai uhhiam?" a cih ciangin 68 Simon Peter in, "Topa aw, ciah le ung kua kiang zuan mawk ding ka hi uhhiam? Nangmah in nuntak tawntungna ding thu na nei hi. 69 Tu-in nang ka hong um uh a, Pasian kiang panin a hong pai a Siangtho Pa na hihna thu ka hong thei uhhi," ci-in a dawng hi. 70 Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Note na sawmlenih mahun ka hong teel hinapi-in khat pen dawi na suakmawk uhhi," a ci hi. 71 Sawmlenihte sung panin amah a lehpei ding ahih manin Simon Iskariot' tapa Judas thu a genna a hihi.

Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Keima ukna pen hih leitung gam hilo hi. Keima ukna hih leitung gam hi leh Jerusalem khua-a Jew mi uliante' khutsungah hong kipiak lohna dingin ka nungzuite in a do ding uhhi. Tua ahih manin keima ukna pen hih leitung tawh kizomlo hi," a ci hi.

Thesaloni khuamite sangin Berea khuamite in mipi lungsim neizaw uhhi. Amaute in lawp mahmahna tawh Paul' thugente ngai uh a, Paul' thugente man taktak hiam ci-in a theihna dingun nisimin Laisiangtho a sim uhhi.
Tua ahih ciangin midangte' thu a khen note pen kuakua hita le uh cin na suakta tuan kei ding uhhi. Midangte na mawhsakna uh thute mah note zong gamta veve na hih manun no zong a mawh mah na hi uhhi.
Tua ahih leh Jew mite in Gentail mite sangin bang hamphatna neizaw a, vun ki-atna in bang phattuamna nei ahi hiam?
Note sungah Pasian' Khasiangtho hong om nak leh nomau pumpi deihna bangin gamta loin Khasiangtho deihna bangin na gamta ding uhhi. Christ lungsim a neilote Christ tawh kipawllo hi.

Tua ahih ciangin sanggamte aw, Pasian in eite tam veipi tak hong hehpih ahih manin ama lungkimna ding leh ama nasepna dingin nomau mahmah a hingtangin Pasian tungah na kipiakna dingun ka hong thum hi. Tua banga kipiakna pen Pasian biakna man taktak a hihi. 2 Leitung mihingte' gamtat bangin gamta kei unla, na lungsim uh kikheelin Pasian kipuahpha sak un. Tua hi leh a hoih nate bang hi a, bangte in amah lungkim sakin, bangte a kicing hiam ci-in thei-in Pasian' deihna na phawk thei ding uhhi.
Tua mah bangin eite mi tampi ihih hangin pumkhat ihi a, pumpi nate bangin khatlekhat a kizom ciat ihi hi.

Midangte' gitlohnate thukkik kei unla, mi khempeuh in hoih hi, ci-in a ngaihsut ding bangin gamta un. 18 Ahih theih laiteng mi khempeuh tawh na kilemna dingun hanciam un. 19 Lawmte aw, na hehna uh kuama tungah thukkik kei unla, Pasian' thukkik dingin koih lel un. Banghang hiam cihleh Laisiangtho sungah, "Keimah in amaute tungah ka thuk ding a, midangte a gimsak bangun ka gimsak ding hi, Topa in ci hi," ci-in kigelh hi.
Upna neu mite pawlbawl unla, na ngaihsutna uh a kituah kei leh zong mawhsak kei un.
Tua ahih ciangin mi tawh kilem theihna ding, leh kha thu-ah khatlekhat thahatna i kipiak theihna ding thute hanciam ciat ni.

Note in lungsim kikhatin i Topa Zeisu Christ' Pa ahi Pasian na phatkhawm theihna dingun Pasian in thuakzawhna leh thahatna hong pia hen la, Zeisu Christ deihna bangin gamta-in khatlekhat kithutuak takin hong omsak ta hen.
Banghang hiam cihleh sanggamte aw, note lakah kitot kiselna a omna thu, Khloe' innkuanpih mite in kei kiangah hong gen uhhi.

Ahi zongin Khasiangtho a neilo mite in Pasian' Khasiangtho in a hong piak nate sang theilo uhhi. Khasiangtho a nei mite bek in theithei uh ahih manin amaute in tel theilo uh a, amau-a' dingin a haihuai thu khat ahi lel hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian' deihna bangin gamta loin, leitung lungsim deihna bangin gamta lai na hih manun upna sungah naungek bang ahi lai na hi uhhi. Note khatlekhat kihaza-in kitawng kiselin na om uh ciangin hih leitung mite mah a bang lel na hihna uh hong kilang hi.
Note khatlekhat zum na kitut mahmah uh zong a gina hetlo na hihna uh hong kilangsak hi. Banghangin thuakzaw mailo a, sum ngamzaw mailo na hi uhhiam?
Itna pen a tawntungin a kip a hihi. Thuhilh siamna a om tei hangin tawlkhat sung bek kimangin, pau lamdang pautheih siamnate a om hangin bei ding a, thutheih siamna a om hangin maimang ding hi.

Tua ahih ciangin sanggamte aw, ka hong gennop thu a tomin: Pasian bia dingin note na kikhop uh ciangin khat in la sak ding nei, khat in Pasian' thu a gen ding nei, khat in pau lamdang tawh thugen ding nei, khat in tua a kigente a khiatna gentheihna ding nei cih bangin na om ding uhhi. Hih a tuamtuamte khempeuh, pawlpi' phattuamna ding ahih ding kisam hi.

Kote pen leitungah a teng mi ka hi mah uhhi; ahi zongin leitung lungsim ngimna tawh galdo ka hi kei uhhi. 4 Kote' zat galdona hiam pen leitung galhiam lelte hilo a, galte' pan'mun phualpi a susiazo ding Pasian' galhiam khauhte a hihi. 5 Mite' ngaihsutna a manlote ka thalnial gawpzo uh a, Pasian' thu theihna ding a khaktan thei nate ka susiagawp uh a, mi khempeuh' ngaihsutna zo gawpin Christ' thu a mang dingin ka bawl uhhi.

Banghang hiam cihleh note kiangah ka hong tun' ciangin note' omzia ding ka deih bangin na omloh khakding uh leh note in keima maisuah na muhnopzia bangun na hong muhloh khakding uh ka lunghimawh hi. Note lakah kitotna, hazatna, hehna, huaihamna, mi zahpihna, mi gensiatna, kiphatsakna, leh buaina a omkhak ding ka lunghimawh hi.

Ahi zongin Khasiangtho' sawlna bangin gamtatnate pen: Itna, lungdamna, lungnopna, lungduaina, migitna, hoihna, cihtakna, 23 dikna, leh pumpi ki-ukzawhna hi a, hih bangin a gamta mite, Thukham in bangmah cih theilo hi.

Pasian a kikhemzo dingin ngaihsunkha kei un. Mi khempeuh in ama vawh nam khaici mah ngahkik ding hi. 8 Mi khatpeuh in ama leitung pumpi deihna khaici a vawh leh sihna ngahding a, Khasiangtho deihna khaici a vawh leh Khasiangtho tung panin nuntak tawntungna ngahding hi.

itna lungsim tawh thutak genin, lutang ahi Christ tawh i kibat dongin i khangto ding hi. 16 Ama ukna mangin pumpi na a tuamtuamte a kituak takin kizom a, amaute limtakin a kizop dimdiamna hangin pumpi pen pumkhat a suak thei hi. Pumpi na a tuamtuamte in amau' sepding ciat hoihtakin a sep uh ciangin itna hangin pumpi khangin a cingtaak a suak thei hi.

Na heh uh ciangin, tua hehna hangin khialkha kei unla, a tawntungin heh paisuak kei un. 27 Dawimangpa in hong suksiat theihna ding hun omsak kei un. 28 Guta ngeite in gu nawnloin, ama nuntakna ding thuman takin thalawhin, mizawngte zong a huhtheih laina dingin thatang tawh nasep ding kipan ta uh hen. 29 Na kiho uh ciangin kamguh zang kei unla, na pauna uh a za mite in phattuamna a ngahtheihna dingin na-in a kimang kam hoihte bek na pau un.
khatlekhat kihehpihin, lungsim neem tawh na kihozaw unla, Christ' hangin Pasian in note' mawhna hong maisak mah bangin khatlekhat na mawhna uh na kimaisak ta un.
Hih bang mawhnate i bawl hangin phamawh kei, ci-in a mawk gen mite' khemsa-in ta kei un. Pasian thu mangloin hih bangin a gamta mite in Pasian' hehna a thuak ding uh a hihi.

Huaihamna lungsim leh kisialh nopna lungsim tawh bangmah gamta kei un. Kiniamkhiat ciat unla, midangte thupi ngaihsutzaw un. 4 Note' phattuamna ding bek ngaihsun kei unla, midangte' phattuamna ding ngaihsutsak zaw un.

Na khempeuh phunlo, thu nialloin sem un. 15 Tua hi leh a lungsim kawi, a hoihlo leitung mite lakah paubaan'na a neilo a siangtho, Pasian' tate na hi ding uh a, nuntakna thu na genna uh hangin leitung mite lakah khuavak bangin na hoihna uh a kilang mite na hi ding uhhi. 16 Tua hi leh a beisa hunah ka sepna leh ka hanciamnate a mawkna suaklo ding ahih manin Christ hong paikik ni ciangin kei ka kisial thei ding hi.
Euodia leh Sintikhe, Topa' hangin a kilemkik ding uh ka thum nuam hi.

Note pen hihbangin gamta-in a nungta ngeite na hi uhhi. 8 Ahi zongin tu-in hehna, thangpaihna, muhdahna, gensiatna, kam hoihlo pauna cihte nei nawn kei un. 9 Ngeina lui leh gamtatna lui khempeuh a beisakkhin na hihna uh kithei-in khatlekhat tungah zuauthu kigen nawn kei unla,
Christ thu a cingtakin note lungsimah hong om hen la, pilna tawh khatlekhat thu kihilhin na kitai un. Pasian tungah lungdam kohna-in Thuciam Lui sunga late, la thakte, leh biakna late na sa un.
Tu ma-a ka hong gensa uh mah bangin kamtam nuam se loin hoihtakin om hithiatna, no tawh a kisai thu bek ngaihsutna, leh note' nuntakna ding na na sepna ding uh hanciamin nei un

Tua ahih manin siate pen paubaan'na a neilo mi, zi khat bek a nei mi, lungsim hoih hithiat mi, thu a ngaihsun thei mi, a kilawm a kituakin a gamta mi, zin leh leengla do a siam mi, thuhilh a siam mi, 3 zu a khamlo mi, a ngongtatlo mi, lungsimnem mi, kitot a uklo mi, sum a deihlualo mite hi ding uhhi.

Topa Zeisu Christ thu tawh a kituaklo, i biakna paizia tawh a kilehngatin thu tuamdang a hilh mite pen, 4 a kiphasak mawkmawk hi uh a, bangmah a thei hetlo ahi uhhi. Tua bang mite in thu kisel thu kinial cihte ut belin nei uh a, hazatna, lungsim kituahlohna, kizahkona, a sialamin ki-upmawhnate piangsak uh a, 5 thuman thutak zuiloin, a lungsim paizia uh a man nawnlo, biakna pen hauhtheihna ding lampi bekin a ngaihsun mite in a tawntungin kitot kiselna a piangsak uh a hihi.
