Timothy aw, nang tungah a hong kipia thute hoihtakin na zui in. Mi pawlkhatte in, "Thu theihna," ci-in a ngaihsutkhak uh, Pasian' thu tawh a kituaklo, thu kihai selnate na pelh in. 21 Mi pawlkhatte in tua bang pilna a nei-in kingaihsun uh a, upna thu bulpi khahsuahna-in a nei uhhi. Note khempeuh tungah Pasian' dikna thupha hong tung ta hen.

Na mite thu kinialin a kitotlohna dingun Pasian' mai-ah thupi takin na hilhkhol in. Tua bang thu kinialna in a za mite phattuamna ngahsak loin a siasak bek a hihi. 15 Pasian' thuman a mantakin hilhin, na nasepna-ah maizumna thuakloin, Pasian' pahtakna na ngahtheihna dingin na siam tawpin hanciam in. 16 Pasian tawh mite a kigamlasak semsem thei thu ginalo, a haihuai thu kikup thu kiselnate na pelh in.

Thu kihai selna, theilopi-a thu kinialnate na pelh in. Tua bangte in kitotna a pian'sak lamtak na theihsa a hihi. 24 Topa' na a sem mite, kitot a hatte hilo ding a, mi khempeuh tungah lungsim nemin, thugen siamin, thuakzawhna nei-in, 25 thunem tawh a langte' hoihlohna a puahtheite hi ding hi. Tua bang hi leh Pasian in amaute kisiksak thei ding a, thuman thutak hong thei-in,

Pasian' na a sem mite mi cingtaak hi-in, na hoih namkim a septheihna dingun Laisiangtho pen Pasian' lamlahna tawh a hong kipia hi a, thuman thutak hilhna ding, a khialte taiina ding, a manlote a manin puahna ding, a manin nuntak theihna ding thuhilhna dingin a manpha mahmah a hihi.
hunhoih hunsia cih khen tuanloin Pasian' thu hilh ding na kin ngaihsutna ding, lungduaina tawh mite' lungsim zo-in, mite taii-in, hanthawnin na hilhna dingin thu a hong pia ka hihi.

Nangma pumpi mahmah gamtat hoihna-a kipan thu khempeuhah etteh hoih dingin na om in. Lungsim takpi tawh mite' zahtaktheih dingin thu na hilh in la, 8 mite' mawhmat theihloh ding kamhoihte na zang in. Tua hi leh i langte in hong gensiat theihna ding muloin a mai uh zum lel ding hi.

Na mite in hong uk kumpite leh aana neite' thu mangin, thuhoih khempeuh a sem dingin a kigingsa-in a om ding uh phawksak in la, 2 kuamah gensia loin, mite tawh kilemin kikhawl thei-in, lungsim nemin, mi khempeuh tungah a dikna ding uh na gen in.
Ahi zongin a haihuai thu kiselna, min kigual deudau khangsimna, kitotna, thukham kitotlawhna cihte na pelh in. Tuate a kiman'na a omlo, a mawkna thu hi lel hi.

Sanggamte aw, note in na theihding uh ka deih thu in: Thu kigen khempeuh hoihtakin ngai pahpah un. Ahi zongin pau pahpah kei unla, heh pakpak kei un. 20 Mihingte' hehna in Pasian' sepding thuhoihte khaktan hi.

Tua mah bangin leii zong i pumpi na sung panin a neu mahmah khat hinapi-in thusia lianpipi piangsak zo hi. Gam khempeuh zong mei-ek neuno khat pan kipanin a kangtum thei hi. 6 Leii pen mei tawh kibang hi. I pumpi na sung panin a neuno khat hinapi-in i pumpi buppi a sia suahthei a, hell khuk sung panin a hong piang mei tawh i nuntakna buppi hong kangtumsak thei hi. 7 Mihingte in gamsa, vasa, a bokvak ganhing leh tui sunga om ngasate-a kipan ganhing khempeuh zualsakin ukzo uhhi. 8 Ahi zongin siattheihna ding gukhal tawh a kidim, a omkhong theilo leii pen zualsakin a ukzo kuamah omlo hi. 9 I leii tawh eite' pa ahi Topa i phat thei a, Pasian tawh a kisunin a kibawl i mipihte zong tua i leii mah tawh i samsia thei hi. 10 Kam khat sung panin thupha leh thusia pusuak khawm hi. Sanggamte aw, hih bang ahi ding hi hetlo hi. 11 Tuinak khat panin tui lim leh tui limlo hong luangkhia khawm thei ahi hiam?
Ahi zongin tunglam panin a kingah pilna a siangtho a hihi. Mi tawh kilem thei-in dik a, mi tawh kikhawl thei a, hehpihna lungsim nei-in gamtat hoih a, mi lang-etlo a, kineihkhem cihte omlo hi.

Note lakah a om kitotna leh kilaina koi panin hong piang ahi hiam? Deihluatna lungsim na neih manun note' pumsung a kitoktok niloh a hihi. 2 Na na deih uh a, ahi zongin neilo na hih manun mi na thatnuam uhhi. Nate deihna lungsim na nei uh a, ahi zongin ngah zolo na hih manun kitawngin na kilailawh uhhi. Pasian kiangah na deih uh ngenlo na hih manun a ngahlo na hi uhhi. 3 Pasian kiangah na nget sun uh ciangin zong note' nopsakna ding bek ngenin, na ngaihsutna uh manlo ahih manin a ngahlo na hi uhhi.
Laisiangtho in, "Pasian in a kihisakte nial a, a kiniamkhiatte a hehpih hi," a cih mah bangin Pasian' hong hehpihna lianzaw hi.
A hoih a manin gamtat ding thei napi-in a gamta lote a khial a hihi.
Sanggamte aw, Pasian in note tungah thu hong khenkhak lohna dingin khatlekhat na kiphunsan kei un. Thukhen dingpa hong nai mahmah ta a, hong tung dektak ta hi.

Na lungsim sung uhah Christ zahtakbawl unla, amah Topa-in nei un. Note' lametna thu a hong dong a omkhak leh hoihtakin a genthei dingin kiging tawntung unla, ahi zongin lungnemna leh zahtakna lim tawh gen un.
Christ nungzui hihna hangin mite' kosiatna na thuak uh leh note sungah a minthang Khasiangtho ahi Pasian' Khasiangtho hong om ahihna lim ahih manin a hampha mahmah na hi uhhi.
Ka it tate aw, i kampi bek tawh ki-it loin, lungsim takpi tawh ki-itin i gamtatna tawh kilangsak ni.

A thupiakte na zui uhhiam, na zui kei uhhiam cih a theihna dingin note hong niamkhiatin, na lungsim uhah bang om hiam cih a theihna dingin { Topa } na Pasian un sehnel gamah hih kum sawmli sung note hong paipihna lampi khempeuh na ciamteh ding uhhi.

"Keima mai-ah bangzahin Ahab a kiniamkhiatna na mu hiam? Keima mai-ah amah kiniamkhiat ahih manin ama hun sungin siatna ka tungsak kei ding hi. Ahih hangin a tapa' hun sungin ama innkuan tungah siatna ka tungsak ding hi," a ci hi.

Keima minin a kisam ka mite amau mahmah kiniamkhiatin, thu ngenin ka mai hong zong a, amau' gitlohnate panin a kihei uh leh, keimah in vantung panin ka za ding a, amaute' khialhna maisakin a leitang uh ka hoihsak kik ding hi.

Amaute a kiniamkhiatna thu { Topa } in a muh ciangin Shemaiah' tungah { Topa' } thu hong tung hi: "Amaute kiniamkhiat ahih manin ka susia kei ding hi. Amaute ka suaktasak liailiai tei ding a, Shishak' khut tawh Jerusalem tungah ka hehna a cingin ka tungsak kei ding hi.
{ Topa } zahtakna pen pilna mah hi pah a, kiniamkhiatna in pahtawina hong ngahsak hi.
Pilna in mi lungduaisak a, mi' hong hehsaknate kiphawkmawh bawlna in minthan'na a hihi.
Hong satte, ka nung ka dawh a, ka khamulin a hong kai mite, ka paang ka dawh hi. Maizumna leh cilphihna panin ka maitang ka hei kei hi.

Hih nate khempeuh keima bawlsa ahih manin hih nate khempeuh keima-a' ahi hi, { Topa } in ci hi. Ahih hangin kiniamkhiatin, lungsim a kitamzan mipa, keima thu-ah lau-in a ling kelkelpa, keima deih mipa a hihi.

Tua ciangin amah in, "Daniel aw, lau kei in. Kiniamkhiat dingin na lungsim na khensat masak pen ni-a kipan, tua thu na theihtheihna dingin Pasian in na thungetna a hong zazo hi. Na thungetna bang a hong pia dingin ka hong pai hi.

Mun khempeuhah a om no mihingte aw, { Topa } in a hoih nate hong gen khinzo hi. { Topa } in note tung panin hong kalh thu in: Thuman thutang sem ding a, itna kip nei tawntungin, kiniamkhiatna tawh Pasian' thu man' ding a hihi.

Kiniamkhiatin, { Topa' } thupiakna a mang Judah gammi khempeuh aw, { Topa' } kiang zuan un. A manin gamta unla, kiniamkhiat un. Tua hi leh { Topa' } hehna hong kilat ciangin, tua hehna hangin gimna panin na peng khathei ding uhhi.

"Kha thu lamah zawngkhal a kisate sungah vantung ki-ukna thu om ahih manin thupha ngah mi ahi uhhi. 4 Dahin a thum a tau mite Pasian in amaute hehnem ding ahih manin thupha ngah mi ahi uhhi. 5 A lungnem mite in Pasian' ciamsa leitang ngah ding uh ahih manin thupha ngah mi ahi uhhi

"Na semin vangik pua-in a gim mite khempeuh aw, ka kiangah hong pai ta un. Note tungah lungsim tawldamna ka hong pia ding hi. 29 Keima hakkol zangin kisuan unla, kei kiangah hong kisin dih un. Kei pen kiniamkhiatin neem hithiat ka hih manin ka kiangah na tawl uh a dam ding hi.
Keima hakkol kisuan unla kei kiangah kisin ta un. Ahang in, keimah lungsim nem leh lungsim ki niamkhiat mi ka hihi, na hinna un tawldamna a ngah ding hi. (ZIV)

"A man mahmahin note kiangah kong genin-ah: Note kikheelin naupang na bat kei uh leh vantung ki-ukna sungah na lut ngei kei ding uhhi. 4 Hih naupang bangin a kiniamkhiat mite, vantung ki-ukna sungah a lianpen hi ding hi.
A kiliansakte khempeuh in niamkhiatna thuak ding uh a, a kiniamkhiatte khempeuh a lianin kibawl ding hi.

Kua lianpen ihi hiam, ci-in lampi-ah amau khatlekhat kisel uh ahih manin kuamah in dawng ngamlo uhhi. 35 Tua ciangin Zeisu tu a, a kiangah nungzui sawmlenihte samin, "Mi khat peuhpeuh a lianpen a suahnop leh a neupen suak photin mi khempeuh' nasem hi masa ding hi," a ci hi.
hong Hon Pasian' hangin ka nuam mahmah hi. 48 Banghang hiam cihleh a neu mahmah a nasemnu, keimah a hong phawk hi. Tu-a kipanin a khangkhangin mi khempeuh in thupha ngahnu hong ci ding uhhi.
Banghang hiam cihleh a kiliansakte khempeuh in niamkhiatna thuak ding uh a, a kiniamkhiatte khempeuh a lianin kibawl ding hi," a ci hi.

Nipikal khatin ni nih sung an ka tang a, ka ngah khempeuh sung panin sawmah khat nang tungah kong pia hi,’ a ci hi. 13 Ahi zongin siahdongpa pen a gamla simah ding a, vantung lamah zong dak ngamloin a dip humin kuncip a, ‘Pasian aw, kei mimawh mi khialpa hong hehpih in,’ ci-in a ngen hi. 14 Ke'n kong cihin-ah, hih mipa pen Pasian tawh a kilemsa-in a inn-ah ciah a, a khatpa pen tua bangin ciahlo hi. Banghang hiam cihleh a kiliansakte pen kiniamkhiatsuk ding a, a kiniamkhiatte pen a lianin kibawl ding hi," a ci hi.

Ahi zongin note lakah tua bang hilo ding hi; a lianpenpa a neupen bangin om ding a, a makai penpa a nungzui nunungpen bangin om ding hi. 27 Anne dingin sabuai-ah a tupa leh an a piapa kua lianzaw ahi hiam? Anne dingin a tupa lianzaw mah hi. Ahi zongin kei pen note lakah anpia-in na a sempa bangin ka hong om hi.
Amah lian semsem ding a, kei ahih leh ka neu semsem ding hi.
Pasian migi-in thu a diah hithiatna pen na kisikkik theihna ding uh a deihna ahih lamtak phawkkha loin, a migitna, a lungduaina, a hong thuaknate neu ngaihsutkha na hi uhhiam?
I muhlohte i lamet ciangin lungduai takin i ngak thei hi.
Note khatpeuh hih leitung ngeina-ah a pilin na kingaihsut uh leh a pil taktak na hih theihna dingun a hai na suak phot un.

Itna neite a lungduai-in migi hi. Itna neite in hazatna lungsim neiloin, zong kisathei lo hi. 5 Itna neite a kilawm loin gamtalo, heh pakpaklo, mite' mawhna ciamtehlo hi. 6 Thuman lote-ah lungdam ngeilo uh a, thumante bekah lungdam uhhi. 7 Itna neite lungkia cih om ngeilo hi; a upna, a lametna, lungduai takin a ngaknate uh a mawkna cih om ngeilo hi. 8 Itna pen a tawntungin a kip a hihi. Thuhilh siamna a om tei hangin tawlkhat sung bek kimangin, pau lamdang pautheih siamnate a om hangin bei ding a, thutheih siamna a om hangin maimang ding hi.

Note in kei a hong pakta ding hinapi-in hong paktalo na hih manun note' bawlin mihai bangin kisialin ka gamta hi. Banghang hiam cihleh kei pen bangmahpi ka hihloh hangin sawltak thupi mahmahin na ngaihsutte uh sangin themkhat zong ka neuzaw tuan het kei hi. 12 Sawltak man taktak ka hihna lim a kilangsak nate, note lakah lungduai takin hong kisem a, lim, na lamdang, leh na a tuamtuamte note lakah hong kibawl hi.

Ahi zongin Khasiangtho' sawlna bangin gamtatnate pen: Itna, lungdamna, lungnopna, lungduaina, migitna, hoihna, cihtakna, 23 dikna, leh pumpi ki-ukzawhna hi a, hih bangin a gamta mite, Thukham in bangmah cih theilo hi.
Kiniamkhiatin, thunemin, lungduai-in om tawntung un. Khatlekhat kihuhna tawh na ki-itna uh kilangsak un.

Huaihamna lungsim leh kisialh nopna lungsim tawh bangmah gamta kei un. Kiniamkhiat ciat unla, midangte thupi ngaihsutzaw un. 4 Note' phattuamna ding bek ngaihsun kei unla, midangte' phattuamna ding ngaihsutsak zaw un. 5 Note in Zeisu Christ lungsim puakzia na nei un. Tua lungsim puak zia in: 6 Zeisu Christ in Pasian' pianzia nei napi-in, Pasian tawh a kizakim theihna dingin thathanghat thu a suang kei hi. 7 Amah kiniamkhiat tawm zaw a, nasem lim a hong puazaw hi. Mihing bangin amah hong kibawl a, mihing teekteek mah a hong sun hi. 8 Amah hong kiniamkhiat tawm a, singlamteh tung nangawnah sihding a ut hi. 9 Hih thu hangin Pasian in a lianpenin amah koih a, min lian dang khempeuh sangin a min lianzaw-in a koih hi. 10 Tua ahih manin vantung, leitung, leinuai-a om mi khempeuh in Zeisu pahtawi-in khukdin' ding uh a, 11 Zeisu Christ, Topa ahi hi, ci-in taangko-in Pa Pasian a min thangsak ding uhhi.
Pasian in note hong itin, hong teelin, ama mi siangthote hikhin na hih manun note pen hehpihna nei-in, migi-in, kiniamkhiatin, dikin, na lungduai ding uh a hihi.
Numeite in gamdai takin kiniamkhiatna tawh thu ngai-in a sin ding uh a hihi.
Pasian' deihna bangin gamta-in, ama thuciam na ngahtheihna dingun lungduai-in thuakzawhna na kisam uhhi.
Laisiangtho in, "Pasian in a kihisakte nial a, a kiniamkhiatte a hehpih hi," a cih mah bangin Pasian' hong hehpihna lianzaw hi.
Topa mai-ah kiniamkhiat un. Tua hi leh amah in hong lian bawl ding hi.

Hihbang thuaknate in a um takpi mah na hihna uh hong kilangsak hi. A siathei khamte nangawn, a hoih taktak mah ahi hiam, ci-in mite in mei tawh sin uh ahih manin, kham sangin a manphazaw note' upna zong a kiptak mah ahi hiam, ci-in Pasian in hong sin ding mah a hihi. Tua bangin na thuakzawh uh leh Christ hong kilat Ni ciangin phatna, minthan'na, leh pahtawina na ngah ding uhhi.
A tawpna-ah kong gennop thu in: Lungsim leh ngaihsutna kikhat nei-in unau ki-itna lungsim nei unla, migi-in kiniamkhiat un.

Christ mahmah zong note-a' dingin si a, Pasian' kiangah hong tun'pih theihna dingin mihoih khat pen mihoihlote' mawhna hangin khatvei a si hi. Mite in ama leitung pumpi that a, ahi zongin Pasian in kha nuntakna a pia hi. 19 Tua kha nuntakna tawh va pai-in thongkia-in a om khate kiangah thu a va hilh hi. 20 Noah in teembaw a bawl hun laitakin Pasian in lungduai takin ngak hinapi-in hih kha a nei mite pawlkhat in Pasian' thu manglo uhhi. Teembaw sungah a om mi giat bek, tui in a suaktasak hi. 21 Tui pen note a hong honkhia tuiphumna lim hi a, pumpi panin nin sawpkhiatna lim hiloin, Zeisu Christ thawhkikna hangin lungsim siangthona dingin Pasian' tungah kamciamna lim a hihi. Tua Zeisu thawhkikna in note hong honkhia a hihi. 22 Tu-in vantungah tua Christ pai khin a, Pasian' taklamah omin, vantung mite leh ukna aana a neite khempeuh tungah a ukin a om hi.

Tua mah bangin no khangnozaw deuhte in zong a khanghamte' thu na mang un. Laisiangtho in, "Pasian in a kiphasak mite nial a, a kiniamkhiat mite a hehpih hi," a cih mah bangin na vekpi-un kiniamkhiatna puan bangin silhin, khatlekhat na na kisepsak un. 6 Pasian in ama hoihsak hun ciangin note hong laptoh theihna dingin a thahat Pasian' khutnuai-ah kiniamkhiatin na om un.
Tua ahih manin Topa in tua bang mihoihte a gimna uh panin suakta sakin, tua bang migilote Thukhen Ni hun dongin gimna pia-in a koihcip theihna ding siamna a nei hi.

Tua ahih ciangin, Kanaan leitangah Abram kum sawm a ten' khit ciangin Abram' zi Sarai in Egypt mi a sila numei Hagar la-in a pasal Abram' tungah zi-in a pia hi. 4 Amah in Hagar luppih a, Hagar gai hi. Amah a gai lam a kitheih ciangin kiphasakin a tonu simmawh bawl hi.
Nangmah in mi niamte na honkhia a, ahih hangin a kiphasakte na niamkhiat hi.

Benhadad in ama kiangah mi sawlin, "Samaria leitang pen kei hong zui khempeuh' khutkuak a dimzawh taak leh, pasian-te in kei hong dawm kei ta hen," a ci hi. 11 Tua ciangin Israel kumpipa in dawngin, "Ama kiangah gen un: ‘Gal a zawh khit ciangin galhiam a suahkhiapa bangin galsim dingin galhiam a kuah laipa kiphasak kei hen,’ ci un," a ci hi. 12 Bukte sungah kumpite tawh zu ne-in Benhadad a om laitakin hih thu a zak ciangin amah in a mite kiangah, "Pan'mun la un," a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute in khuapi a simgawp dingin pan'mun a la uh hi.

Ahih hangin a lungsim kiphasak ahih manin ama tungah phattuamna a kibawl zahin { Topa' } tungah Hezekiah in lungdam ko nuamlo hi. Tua ahih manin amah leh Judah leh Jerusalem tungah { Topa' } hehna hong tung hi.
Pasian in mi kiphasakte niamkhiat a, mi niamte a hon hi.
Mite in khialhna a bawl nawnlohna ding, mi kiphasakte a suahkhak lohna ding, Pasian in a deihna hangin mite kiangah thu a gen hi.
A kiphasak mite en in la, na hehna tawh amaute niamkhiat gawp in. 12 Mi kiphasakte en in la, amaute niamkhiat gawp in. Migilote khempeuh a omna mun munah tuancil in.
Bang hang hiam cih leh mi niamte na honkhia a, ahih hangin mi kiphasakte na niamsak hi.
Hi hi, a kiphasak mi khempeuh ama mai-ah kunsuk ding uh a, a sithei mihing khempeuh ama mai-ah kun ding uh hi.

Lebanon taamtak sing bangin a sang pha mahmah migilo kiphasak khat keimah in ka mu hi. 36 Ama kiangah ka paikik a, amah na om nawnlo hi. Amah ka zonzon hangin kimuzo nawnlo hi. 37 Paubaanglo mi ciamteh in la, thutang mi en in; bang hang hiam cih leh gal a phuanglo mi-a' dingin nopna a om hi. 38 Ahih hangin thupalsatte kisusiamang khin ding a, migilote' suanlekhakte kipuaseh ding hi.
{ Topa } a muang a, mi kiphasakte lamah a kiheilo, pasian manlote lamah a pialkhialo mi thupha ngah ahi hi.

Pasian aw, ka thungetna hong za in la, ka kampaute hong ngai in. 3 Bang hang hiam cih leh mi kiphasakte in kei hong langpang uh a, mi helhhawtte in thah dingin hong zong uh hi. Amaute in Pasian thudonlo uh hi. 4 Pasian, kei hong huhpa hi a, { Topa, } kei hong hupa ahi hi.

A kiphasakte tungah, "Kiphasak kei un," a gilote tungah, "Kihisak kei un. 5 Kihisak kei unla, kiphatsakna tawh kampau kei un," ka ci hi. 6 Banghang hiam cihleh vangliatna pen nisuahna lam ahi a, nitumna lam ahi a, gamlak pan ahi zongin a hong pai hilo hi. 7 Mihing khat a sangsak, mihing khat a niamsak thukhenpa pen Pasian a hihi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh na galte in gamlumna piangsak uh a, nang hong mudahte kiphasak mahmah uh hi. 3 Amaute in khem siamna tawh na mite thangsiah uh a, amaute in na it mite langpangin thu kikum uh hi.
Tho in, leitung thukhenpa aw, a kiphasak mite tungah amau' ngah ding a kilawm gimna pia ta in.
Nangmah in na thupiaknate panin a pialkhia, a kisamsiat, a kiphasakte na thuhilh hi.
Mi kiphasakte in kei hong zahko gawp uh a, ahih hangin nangma thupiakna panin kei ka pial kei hi.
Mi kiphasakte in kei' thu, zuau vive gengen uh a, ahih hangin keimah in ka lungsim khempeuh tawh na thuhilhte ka zui hi.
Mi kiphasakte zahhuaisak in. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in khemna tawh kei hong lumlet uh hi. Ke'n ahih leh na thuhilhte ka lungngaingai ding hi.
Nangma thu a zuilo, mi kiphasakte in keimah hong siahna-in gum a to uh hi. 86 Nangma thupiakte khempeuh man taktak hi. Amaute in thuman lopi-in kei hong bawlsia uh hi. Kei hong huh in.
Na nasempa-a' dingin nangmah hong kikham in la, mi kiphasakte hong nengniamsak kei in.

Kote hong hehpih in. { Topa } aw, kote hong hehpih in. Bang hang hiam cih leh kote in ka thuak zawhloh uh simmawhna ka thuak uh hi. 4 A ut-utin a gamta mite in kote a hong zahkona, a kiphasak mite in hong simmawh bawlna hangin ka gimthuakna uh sauvei lua khinta hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh { Topa } lian mahmah napi-in amah in a neute don a, a kiphasakte ahih leh amah in gamlapi panin mu thei veve hi.

{ Topa } aw, migilote' khutsung panin kei hong cing in la, kei, sukpaih ding a hong sawm mi ngongtatte kiang panin kei hong kem in. 5 Mi kiphasakte in keimah hong siahna-in tehlop tung sim uh a, amaute in ngenthang zakin lam gei-ah thangzak tawh kei hong siah uh hi. 6 { Topa' } tungah hih bangin ka ci hi: Nang pen keima Pasian na hi hi; ka thumna awte hong ngai in, { Topa}!
{ Topa } zahtakna pen thusia muhdahna hi a, kiphatsakna leh kihihsakna, gamtatsia leh thuzuau ka mudah hi.

Mi kiphasakte in minsiatna ngahpak ding ahih manin a hoihbekin om ding hoihzaw tham hi. 3 Midikte thumanin gamta uh a, migilote amau' hoihlohna in susia hi. 4 Hauhna in sihna ding panin hong hu theilo a, thumanna in na sih ding hong hu thei hi.
Hilh ding utlo, kihihsakna in kitotna bek piangsak thei a, hong kithuhilh ding utna pen a hoihzaw a hihi.
Pau a ki-ipzo mi in a nuntakna a hu hi a, a mawk paupau mi pen amah a kisiasak tawm a hihi.
{ Topa } in mi kiphasakte' inn phelkhiatsak a, meigongte' neihsa hutpih hi.
Kisaktheihna in siatna hong tuaksak a, kiphatsakna in pukna hong piangsak hi.
Mi kiphasakte gim a kipiak ciangin mi mawkmawkte in pillawh uh a, mipilte a kihilh ciangin thutheihna-in nei uhhi.
Mi kihisak i cihte pen kilian sakin a kiphasak mite ahi hi.
Mi kiphasakte hawlkhia lecin kitotna leh kisimmawhna bei pah ding hi.
A kiphasakte in niamkhiatna thuak ding a, a kiniamkhiatte in pahtawina ngah ding hi.
kiphasakin na hai pau ngei a, thusia bawl ding na ngaihsut ngei khak leh limtakin thu ngaihsun pha in.

Mite' kiliatsakna pen kiniam koih ding a, mihingte' kiphatsakna pen kiniamkhiat ding hi. Tua ni ciangin { Topa } bek a lianin kikoih ding hi. 12 Bang hang hiam cih leh Vanglian { Topa } in a kiphasak leh a kiliansak khempeuh, a kisangsak leh a sangte khempeuh; 13 a sang, a kilaamto, Lebanon mual taamtak kung khempeuh, Bashan mual tawsaw kung khempeuh; 14 a lian mual sang khempeuh leh a sang mualneu khempeuh; 15 tausang khempeuh leh a muan'huai kulhte khempeuh; 16 Tarshish teembaw khempeuh leh teembaw hoih khempeuh a niamkoih hun ding ni khat a nei hi.
Mite khatlekhat, mi khempeuh in a lawmte ciat, mi khempeuh in a vengte ciat, hihgawp ding uh hi. Khangnote pen uhamte tungah, mi ginalote pen miliante tungah kiphasak ding uh hi.

{ Topa } in hih bangin ci hi: Jerusalem numeite kiphasakin ngawng doksa-in lam pai uh a, kiphatsakna tawh a mit uh hei pampamin hi tuihtuihin lam pai uh a, a khe uh gingsak sualsual ahih ciangun 17 Topa in Jerusalem numeite' lutang meima sakin { Topa } in amau' lutang kolhsak ding hi.
Mi khempeuh a niamin kikoih suk hi. A kiphasak mite kiniamkhiat suk hi.
Topa in Zion Mual leh Jerusalem khua-ah ama nasep dingteng a zawh khit ciangin Assiria kumpipa kiphasakin a kisialhna leh a kiphatsakna hangin gim a pia ding hi.
Tua ciangin Judah mite in, "Moab' kiphatsakna thu i za khinta hi. Amah kiphasak mahmah hi. A kiliatsakna, a kiphatsakna, a kihihsakna, ama kisialhnate khempeuh a mawkna ahi hi," a ci uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh nang in khuapi ninbulomtang na suah a, a muan'huai khuapi a sia na suaksak hi. Mi kiphasakte' kumpi inn pen khua bang nawnlo a, cikmah hunin kilamkik nawnlo ding hi.
mun keuna-ah nisa mahmah tawh kibang hi. Nang in mi kiphasakte' gamlumna na daisak hi. Meii liim in nisa a votsak bangin thukhuallo mite' lasakna kitawpsak ta hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in a kiphasak mite niamkhiat suk hi. Amau' ten'na khuapi muan'huai suksiatsak a, a kulhpite den'khap sakin leivui a suah hi.
Tua a kiphasak zukham makaite' minthan'na pen tuk tun' ma-in a om theipal min tawh kibang ding a, mi khat in tua theigah a muh ciangin lo-in a nekpah bangin maimang lel ding hi.
Nang in kua zahko-in kua a simmawh na hi hiam? Nang in kua' tungah na aw sangsakin kiphasak na hi hiam? Israel-te' Siangtho Pa, kei' tungah a hong tuaci na hi hi.

Moab' kiphatsakna ka za khinzo a, kiphasak pha mahmah hi. Kiliansakin kisathei a, kuamah thusim loin mite a neu-et hi. 30 Ama hehna ka thei a, a kisialhna teng zuaupi hi-in, a sepna teng zong zuaupi mah ahi hi, { Topa } in kong ci hi.
Na sanggamnu' mawhna pen: Amah leh a tanute in nek ding tampi nei-in nuamsa mahmahin, daitakin om uh ahih manin amaute kiphasak uh a, a zawng a cimawhte donlo uh hi.

"Tua ahih ciangin Topa { Pasian } keimah in hih bangin ka ci hi. Tua sing in meiipi a bat dongin khangto a, ahi zongin a san' semsemna tawh kizui-in kiphasak semsem hi. 11 Tua ahih manin tua singkung ka deih nawn kei hi. Gamdang kumpi khat' khutsungah ka pia ding a, ama thuak dingin a kilawm bangin tua kumpipa in a bawl ding hi.
Ahih hangin amah a lung khauhin kiphasak a, gilo lua ahih manin a kumpi tokhom panin kilakhia a, a minthan'na a taan hi.
Tu-in keimah Nebukhadnezzar in Vantung Kumpipa phatin, zahtakin a min ka thangsak hi. Ama bawlna khempeuh a man hi. Amah a tawntungin thuman a, a kiphasakin a gamtate a neusak hi," a ci hi.

Tua tuutal in a ki tawh nitumna lam, saklam, leh khanglam a si kawikawi ka mu hi. Ama ut bangin kiphasakin gamta ahih manin amah a khozo ding leh a thahatna pan a suaktazo ding ganhing khat beek a om kei hi.
Ahi zongin gam hoihna mun tungin na gil uh a vah ciangin na lungsim uh kiphasakin kei nong mangngilh uh hi.

Hauhna pen zuaupi hi a, a huaiham mite kiphasakin omkhong theilo uh a, hankhuk mah bangin, phazo, cih omsak theilo uh a, lungkim hun cih nei theilo uh hi. Tua ahih manin minam dangte a ban banin simin a uk uh hi.

{ Topa } in hih bangin thu gen a, "A kiphasak mite ka nilkhia a, a gal pan'munte uh ka susia hi. A kongzing lampite uh ka kinusiacipsak a, tua lampi kuamah in tawn nawnlo hi. A khuapi uh kisia gawpin kinusia a, a sungah kuamah om nawnlo hi.

Tua hun ciangin ka mite in kei nong lehdona hangun maizumna ding bangmah om nawnlo ding hi. Note lak panin a kiphasak, a kihisak mite ka hawlkhia ding a, Jerusalem khua-a ka mual siangtho tungah kei nong lehdo nawn kei ding uh hi.
Ashdod khuapi-ah minam dangte zong teng ding a, a kiphasak Filistia mite ka beisak ding hi.

I muhna bang leh, mi kiphasakteng mah in thupha ngahin nuamsa uh hi. Mi gamtatsiate ahih leh citheibek loin, a gamtatsiatnate uh tawh Pasian ze-et napi-un bangmah tuak selo uh hi,’ na ci uh hi," a ci hi. 16 { Topa } a zahtak mite khatlekhat tua bangin thu kigen uh a, amaute' thugennate, { Topa } in ngai-in za hi. { Topa } in laibu khat nei a, amah zahtakin a thupi ngaihsut mite khempeuh tua sungah kiciamteh hi.

Vanglian { Topa } in hih bangin ci hi: "En un, mi kiphasak khempeuh leh migilo khempeuh, a zung a hiang cih omloin buhtu bangin a kattum ding hun hong tung ding hi. Tua ni ciangin khat zong suakta loin a vekpi-in kangtum khin ding uh hi.

Pawi sungah a om uh ciangin uliante' tutna dinga a kibawl munah tunuam se uh a, kikhopna innsungah zong uliante tutna tutphah nuampente tungah a tunuam diak uhhi. 7 Mihon lakah mite in hopihin, ‘Sia aw,’ a cihding uh a ut uhhi. 8 Ahi zongin note pen, ‘Sia,’ na kicihding uhhilo hi. Sia khat bek na nei uh a, no adangte khempeuh unau khat na hi uhhi.
A kiliansakte khempeuh in niamkhiatna thuak ding uh a, a kiniamkhiatte khempeuh a lianin kibawl ding hi.
Kikhopna inn sungah, uliante-a' dingin a kikoihcing tutphah nuamte tungah tunuam uh a, pawi sungah zong uliante' tutna mun hoihte bekah a tunuam uhhi.

Kumpipa in a thugen hun ding a ciamkholh ni a tun' ciangin a kumpi puan silhin a kumpi tokhom tungah tu a, mite tungah thu a gen hi. 22 Mite in a thugen a zak uh ciangin, "Hih thugen pen mihing hi loin pasian ahi hi," ci-in a awng uhhi. 23 Herod in mite, Pasian phatsak loin amah phatsak ahih manin thakhatin Topa' vantung mi in Herod cinasak a, a hut in amah netumin a si hi.

Pasian in kei tungah hehpihna hong piakkhongna hangin note tungah kong gennop thu in: Note tawh a kituakzah valin kilian ngaihsutzaw kha kei un. Pasian in note tungah upna hong piakzah tawh kizui-in kingaihsun bek zaw unla, a kilawm ciang khat bekin kingaihsun un. 4 I pumpi tungah zong na tampi i nei a, tua nate' nasep a tuamtuam a hihi. 5 Tua mah bangin eite mi tampi ihih hangin pumkhat ihi a, pumpi nate bangin khatlekhat a kizom ciat ihi hi.
Mi deidan loin a kibangin en un. kiphasak loin mineute tawh kikhawlthei un la, kipilsak se kei un.

Sanggamte aw, Pasian in note hong sap laitakin na omzia uh ngaihsun un. Leitung mite' hong muhna panin note a tamzaw, mipil na hi kei uh a, mi vanglian zong na hi kei uh a, mi thupi zong na hi kei uhhi. 27 Ahi zongin Pasian in mipilte a maizumsakna dingin mihaite hong teel a, mi thahatte a maizumsakna dingin mi thaneemte a hong teel hi. 28 Leitung mite in thupi a sakte uh a suksiat theihna dingin Pasian in leitung mite' simmawh a niamte, bangmahin a ngaihsutloh uh mite a teel hi. 29 Tua ahih manin Pasian' mai-ah mite a kisaktheihna ding thu omlo hi.

Ahi zongin hih a lamdang na tampite ka muhna hangin kisialin ka kisaktheih khaklohna dingin Satan' sawltak bangin na a sem, keima pumpi sungah natna khat hong kipia ahih manin ka kisaktheih luatlohna dingin a hong kham hi.
Kuamah kiphasak loin, khatlekhat kiphin loin, kuamah i kihaza kei ding hi.
Mi khatpeuh, bangmah hilo napi-in amah a kithupi ngaihsut mawkmawk leh amah leh amah a kikhem a hihi.
Christian a suaktungte zong hilo ding hi. Tua bang mi thakte kiphasak thei a, Dawimangpa mah bangin thukhenna a thuak mite hikha thei ding hi.

a kiphasak mawkmawk hi uh a, bangmah a thei hetlo ahi uh hi. Tua bang mite in thu kisel thu kinial cihte ut belin nei uh a, hazatna, lungsim kituahlohna, kizahkona, a sialamin ki-upmawhnate piangsak uh a, 5 thuman thutak zuiloin, a lungsim paizia uh a man nawnlo, biakna pen hauhtheihna ding lampi bekin a ngaihsun mite in a tawntungin kitot kiselna a piangsak uh ahi hi.

Tuahun ciangin mite in amau angsung ding bek ngaihsunin, huaihamin, kisialin, kihisakin, mi zahko-in, nu leh pate' thu mangloin, lungdam theihna mel neiloin, biakna lungsim neiloin, 3 mi khualloin, hehpihna neiloin, mi gensia-in, ngongtatin, kihtakhuai-in, thuhoih deihloin, 4 ciampelin, thu khualloin, kiphasak gawpin, Pasian donloin pumpi nopsakna bek deihin, 5 biakna thu a puathamteng zui napi-in biakna hangin vangliatna thu a omte deihlo ding uhhi. Tua bangin a gamta mite na pelh in.
Pawlpi siate pen Pasian' nasem ahih manin paubaan'na a omlo, a kiphasaklo, zukham thei mi a hilo, a ngongtatlo, a huaihamlo,
Laisiangtho in, "Tuni-in Pasian' aw na zak uh leh Pasian na lehdo lai uh hun bangin na lungsim uh khauhsak nawn kei un," na ci hi.
Laisiangtho in, "Pasian in a kihisakte nial a, a kiniamkhiatte a hehpih hi," a cih mah bangin Pasian' hong hehpihna lianzaw hi.

Tua mah bangin no khangnozaw deuhte in zong a khanghamte' thu na mang un. Laisiangtho in, "Pasian in a kiphasak mite nial a, a kiniamkhiat mite a hehpih hi," a cih mah bangin na vekpi-un kiniamkhiatna puan bangin silhin, khatlekhat na na kisepsak un.

Pasian' thu nialin amau pumpi deihna zui-in a gamta mite gim pia phadiak hi. Hih sia manlote kiphasakin hangsan mahmah uh a, minthan'na a nei vantunga omte zahtak hetloin gensia ngam uh hi. 11 Hih sia manlote sangin hatzaw-in a vanglianzaw vantung mite nangawn in Topa' mai-ah minthan'na a nei vantung mite gensia ngamlo, mawhsak ngamlo uh hi.

Amaute kiphasakin haipau uh a, a khial gamtat mite sung panin a suakta khin liailiai zo mite, leitung pumpi deih bangin a gamtatna dingun a zol uh hi. 19 Amaute pen siatna a piangsak thei zongsatna lelin sila hinapi-un mite tungah suahtakna ding thu a gen uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh mite pen, a hong zo peuhpeuhte' sila ihi hi.
Hih mite a tawntungin phunin khatlekhat mawhna kizong uh a, amau pumpi deihna bangun gamta-in kiphasak uh a, phattuamna a ngah theihna dingun midangte a phat uh hi.

Amah kisialin a kiphatsakna zah tawh a kizui-in dahna leh lungkhamna thuaksak un. Amah in, ‘Kei kumpinu ka hi a, meigong numei lah ka hi kei a, dahna ka thuak ngei kei ding hi,’ ci ahih manin, 8 gimna in ni khatthu-in ban ding a, pulnatna, kahna, leh kialpi in vatgawp ding hi. Ama tungah thu a khen Topa Pasian vanglian ahih manin mei tawh kihaltum ding hi," a ci hi. 9 Amah tawh paktatin a kiphasak khawm leitung kumpite in tua khuapi a katna meikhu a muh uh ciangin dahin a kap ding uh hi. 10 Ama thuakna kihta-in a gamlapi-ah om ding uh a, "Hih a vanglian Babylon khuapi in a thuakna, bangzah takin lauhuai-in, bangzah takin nasia! Nai khat sung bekin hih zah gimna thuak!" ci ding uh hi.
Pasian in, "Khuavak om hen," ci hi; tua ciangin khuavak om pah hi.

Pasian in, "Tuite' laizangah van kuumpi om hen la, tua van kuumpi in tui leh tui kikhensak hen," ci hi. 7 Pasian in van kuumpi bawl a, van kuumpi tunga om tuite leh van kuumpi nuai-a om tuite a khen hi. Tua mah bangin a piang pah hi.
Pasian in, "Vantungte nuai-a om tuite mun khatah kikhawm hen la, lei keu kidawk hen," ci hi. Tua mah bangin a piang pah hi.
Pasian in, "Leitung in kung tuamtuamte piangsak hen la, tang a nei kungnote, a gah sungah tang a om singgah kungte, amau' nam ciatin leitungah piangsak hen," ci hi. Tua mah bangin a piang pah hi.
leitung khua a vaksak dingin vantungah khuavak hi uh hen," ci hi. Tua mah bangin a piang pah hi.

Pasian in, "Tuite in a nungta ganhing honpite piangsak hen la, vantung kantanin leitungah vasate leeng ta hen," ci hi. 21 Tua ahih ciangin Pasian in tuipi ganhing golpite leh amau nam ciatin tuipi sungah tampi a pha, nuntakna a nei a gamtang thei ganhing namkim leh kha a nei vasa khempeuh amau nam ciatin a piangsak hi. Pasian in tua pen hoih hi, ci-in a mu hi.
Pasian in, "Nuntakna a nei ganhingte amau nam ciatin leitung in piangsak hen: Innsa, gamsa, leh a bokvak ganhingte amau nam ciatin piang ta hen," a ci hi. Tua mah bangin a piang pah hi.

Tua ahih ciangin { Topa } Pasian in gamsung ganhing khempeuh leh huih lak vasa khempeuh lei tawh bawl a, mipa in tuate bang a ci hiam ci-in a theihna dingin mipa kiangah tuate a paipih hi. Nuntakna a nei khempeuhte pen mipa' cih bangbang a min hi pahpah hi. 20 Mipa in ganhing namte khempeuh, huihlak vasate khempeuh leh gamsung ganhing khempeuh min a vawh hi. Ahih hangin mipa-a' dinga a kilawm, amah a huh ding khat zong omlo hi.

"Ahih hangin kei tungah khemna tawh hong gamtatnasa uh leh kei hong demna uh hangin amaute gawt bawlin, amau' galte' leitangah amaute ka paipihna hangin, amau' mawhna leh a pu a pate uh mawhna pulakin a lungsim uh niamkhiatin, amaute in a mawhna a kipuahphat uh leh, 41 42 keimah in Jacob tawh ka thuciamna, Isaac tawh ka thuciamna, leh Abraham tawh ka thuciamna ka phawk ding a, leitang zong ka phawk ding hi.

Tua ciangin Saul in, "Ka gamta khial hi; hong ciahkik in, ka tapa David aw; banghang hiam cihleh tuni-in kei hong suaktasak na hih manin na tungah siatna kong bawl nawn kei ding hi. Ka hai gamtatkha a, nakpi takin ka khial khin hi," a ci hi.
"Ka biak Pasian aw, ka mawhnate un ka lu dawn dong uh hong vuknelhin vantung dong banto ahih manin nangma lam kong et ding maizumin ka mai a san hi, ka Pasian aw.

Ezra in tu-a bangin thu ngenin mawhna pulakin khitui naptui tawh Pasian' biakinn mai-ah kunin a om laitakin Israel mi numei, pasal, naupang, mi tampi tak ama kiimah hong kikhawmin amaute khempeuh zong nakpi takin a kap uhhi. 2 Tua ciangin Elam-te beh sung panin Jehiel' tapa Shekaniah hong pau-in Ezra kiangah, "Hih gama teng gamdang numeite ten'pihna tawh i Pasian tungah i khial hi. Ahi ta zongin Israel mite-a' dingin lametna omlai hi.

Tua ahih ciangin tu-in na pu na pate uh Pasian ahi { Topa' } tungah na mawhna uh pulak unla, ama deihna bangin gamta-in hih gama teng gamdang mite leh gamdang mi ahi na zite uh tawh kikhenin tuam om un," a ci hi.

Ka thungetna-ah, "Aw vantung Pasian, { Topa}, nang hong itin na thupiakna a zuite tungah thuciamna limtakin a zui, a lian a kihtakhuai Pasian aw, 6 Israel mi ahi na nasemte' tangin sun leh zanin kong thunget nilohna a ngai dingin na bil hong ngat in la, na mit hong hak in. Nangma tungah ko Israel mite ka khialhna uh, keimah leh ka pu ka pate zong ka khialhna uh ahi ka mawhnate uh kong pulak uhhi. 7 Nangma tungah kong khialkhin uh a, na nasempa Moses tungah na piak ahi thupiaknate, thukhamte, leh ngeina kipte ka zui kei uhhi.
"Hong hilh thei le uh cin, pauloin ka ompah ding hi. Ka khialhna hong theitelsak dih un.

{ Topa } in mawhna a khuksakloh mi, a lungsim sungah khemna a omlo mi, thupha ngah a hihi. 3 Ka mawhna ka pulak loh ciangin, sunthapai ka tautauna hangin ka pumpi a thaneem hi. 4 Sun leh zan tawntung gim nong piakna ka thuak a, khuakhal nisa' kat bangin ka thahatna a keucip hi. 5 Keima khialhnate nangma tungah kong pulak a, ka mawhna ka im kei hi. "Ka khialhnate khempeuh { Topa' } tungah ka pulak ding hi," ka ci hi. Tua ciangin ka mawhna nin nong maisak hi.

Pasian aw, nangma itna kip om bangin kei hong hehpih in la, na hehpihna lian om bangin ka thu palsatnate hong phiatkhiatsak in. 2 Ka khialhna panin hong silsiang kiuhkeuh in la, ka mawhna panin kei hong siangsak in. 3 Banghang hiam cihleh ka thupalsatnate ka thei a, ka mawhnate khempeuh ka phawk ngitnget hi. 4 Nangma tungah khialin, nangma muhna-ah a sia ka gamta khin hi. Tua ahih ciangin na thugenna-ah nang na thutang a, thu na hong khenna-ah pauna ding bangmah omlo hi. 5 A khialsa mahin kei ka suak a, ka nu in a gil sungah hong paii tunga kipan a mawhsa ka hihi.
A khialhna a im mite a dau pailo ding a, a mawhna pulakin a kikhel mite in hehpihna ngah ding uhhi.

Na mawhna na phawk ding bek kisam hi. { Topa } na Pasian na langpan'na, singlim nuai khempeuhah gamdang pasian-te tawh na khialh kawikawina leh ka thu nong man'lohnate pulak in, { Topa } in kong ci hi.

{ Topa } ka Pasian' kiangah thu ngenin ka mite' mawhna ka pulak hi. Keimah in, "Topa Pasian aw, nang na lian a, ka hong zahtak uhhi.Nang na thuman a, na thuciamna leh na thupiakna a mangte leh a hong itte a tawntungin na it hi. 5 "Kote ka hih uh leh ka gilo uh a, mawh khinin ka khial khin uhhi. Na hong sawlna bang ka mang kei uh a, na thupiakna leh na thukhamte ka taisan khin uhhi.

Israel-te aw, note' { Topa } Pasian' lamah kihei kik un. Na mawhna hangun note na puk khin uhhi. 2 { Topa' } lamah kihei unla, "Ka mawhna khempeuh uh hong maisak in la, kong thumna uh hong ngai in. Ka kampauna bangun kong gamta ding uhhi.

Ahi zongin Mihing Tapa in leitungah mawhmaisak theihna ding thu nei hi, ci-in na theihna dingun kong lak ding hi," a cih khit ciangin khutlekhezaw mipa kiangah, "Tho in; na lupna pheek pua in la na inn-ah ciah in," a ci hi. 7 Amah zong tho-in a inn-ah a ciahpah hi.

Vantung ki-ukna sung lutna ding tawhtangte, nangma tungah ka hong pia ding a, hih leitungah hoihlo na cihte, vantungah zong a hoihlo hi ding a, hih leitungah hoih hi na cihte, vantungah zong a hoih hi ding hi," a ci hi.

Zeisu in, "Note kiangah a mantaka kong genin-ah: Note in uplahna nei hetloin, upna taktak na neih nak uh leh hih theikung tungah a piang bang na hih theih uh banah, hih mual kiang nangawnah, ‘Na omna pan paikhia-in tuipi sung kiden'na in,’ ci le uh cin na cih bangun piang ding hi.

Gamsungah mi khat kiko a, ‘Topa' paina ding lampi bawl unla, a tot ding lampi tangsak un,’ ci hi," ci-in a kigelhna tawh hong kipankhia hi. 4 Tua mah bangin gamsungah Johan hong vak a, mawhna kisikin tui kiphum un; tua hi leh na mawhna uh Pasian in hong maisak ding hi, ci-in thu a hilh hi.
Simon Peter in hih thu a muh ciangin Zeisu' mai-ah khukdin' a, "Topa aw, kei mawhnei mi ka hih manin ka kiang panin paikhia in," a ci hi.

Amah tawh a kikhai khawm mi thatpa khat in zong Zeisu zahko a, "Nang Christ hilo na hi hiam? Nangmah kihonkhia in la, tua ciangin kote zong hong honkhia in," a ci hi. 40 Ahi zongin a khatpa in a lawmpa taii a, "Pasian nangawn kihta lo na hi hiam? I vekpi-in gim hong kipiakna kibangkim hi. 41 Eite gel pen i gamtatna tawh kizui-in thu hong kikhen ahih manin ahi ding mah a hihi. Ahi zongin amah in khialhna bangmah neilo hi," a cih khit ciangin 42 Zeisu kiangah, "Zeisu aw, Kumpi-in nong pai ciangin kei zong hong phawk in," a ci hi. 43 Zeisu in ama kiangah, "A mantakin ke'n kong cihin-ah: Tuni-in Paradais-ah kei tawh na omkhawm ding hi," a ci hi.
Pasian in mihingte' theihloh hun lai-a a gamtatnate uh phamawh a sakloh hangin, tu-in mun khempeuha om mi khempeuhte a gamtat siatna panun a kiheina dingun thu a hong pia khinzo hi.
Thu a um midang tampi tak zong hong pai uh a, mipi' zakin a gamtatnasate khempeuh uh hong pulak uhhi.

Zeisu pen Topa hi, ci-in mite kiangah genin, Pasian in sihna panin amah hingkiksak zo hi, ci-in na lungsim sung uhah na up taktak uh leh hotkhiatna na ngah ding uhhi. 10 Banghang hiam cihleh i lungsimah i up taktakna hangin Pasian tawh kipawl theihna kingah a, i kamin i genna hangin hotkhiatna a kingah a hihi.
Tua ahih manin a kuamah peuh in i gamtatna ciat Pasian' mai-ah a va kigentel ciat ding ihi hi.

Keimah in Christ gamtatzia ka zuih mah bangin note in zong keima gamtatzia hong zui ta un. 2 Note in kei hong phawk tawntungin ka hong hilh thu khempeuh zui na hih manun ka hong phat mahmah hi. 3 Ahi zongin na theihding uh ka deih thu in: Mi khempeuh' lutang pen Christ hi a, numei' lutang pen pasal hi a, Christ' lutang pen Pasian ahihna thu a hihi. 4 Pasal khatpeuh in mihon biakna sungah a lukhu lakhia lopi-in thungen ahi a, Pasian' thugen ahi zongin a om leh Christ' min a daisak a hihi. 5 Tua mah bangin mihon biakna sungah numei khatpeuh in a lu khuh lopi-in thungen ahi a, Pasian' thugen ahi zongin a om leh a pasal' min a daisak hi a, a lu a met numei mah tawh a kilamdan'na a omlo a hihi. 6 Numeite in a lu a khuh kei ding uh leh a sam uh met vet uh hen. Tua ahih manin numeite in a sam uh a metding a zumhuai mahmah khat ahih mah bangin a lu uh khuh ta uh hen. 7 Pasalte pen Pasian' lim leh a minthan'na a kilangsak ahih manin a lu uh a khuhding uh kilawmlo hi. Ahi zongin numeite pen pasalte' minthan'na a kilangsak a hihi. 8 Banghang hiam cihleh numei tung panin pasal kipiangsak lo a, pasal tung panin numei kipiangsak zaw hi. 9 Numei hangin pasal a kipiangsak hilo a, pasal hangin numei a kipiangsak hizaw hi. 10 Tua ahih ciangin a pasalte uh ukna nuai-ah a om ahihna a lahna dingun vantung mite' muhna-ah numeite in a lu uh a khuhding uh kilawm hi. 11 Ahi zongin Topa thu sunga i nuntakna-ah numeite pen pasal tawh loin a tangdin'zo hilo a, pasalte zong numei tawh koploin a tangdin'zo hi tuanlo hi. 12 Banghang hiam cihleh numei pen pasal tung panin a kipiangsak hi a, pasal pen numei sung panin a suak a hihi. Tua hi a, na khempeuh, Pasian kiang panin a hong pai a hihi.

Tua ahih manin tuhuna ka nuntakna zia pen kei hang hi nawnloin ka sungah a hong om Christ hang a hihi. Tua hi a, keimah hong itin, keima-a' dingin a nuntakna a hong pia Pasian' Tapa ka muan'na tawh tu laitakin a nungta ka hihi.

tawlnga loin note' tangin Pasian' tungah lungdamna ka na pulak tawntung hi. Ka thungetna-ah zong note ka hong phawk tawntung a, 17 i Topa Zeisu Christ' Pasian ahi, a minthang Pa Pasian in note tungah Khasiangtho hong pia-in, tua Khasiangtho in note tungah lungpilna hong pia-in, note in Pasian na theihna dingun note tungah Pasian hong kilatsakna dingin thu ka hong ngetsak niloh hi.
Pasian' kampauna tawh leitung leh vantung piang a, tu-a i muhtheih nate a om nailopi panin hong piang hi, ci-in i upna bek mah tawh a thei ihi hi.
Tua ahih manin kimuan'na lungsim tawh hangtakin, "Topa, kei hong huhpa hi a, ka lau kei ding hi. Kua in bang hong cihzo ding ahi hiam?" ci ngam ni.
Tua ahih manin Pasian' thu na mang un. Dawimangpa na nial un. Nial le uh cin no kiang panin taikhia ding hi.
Tua ahih manin na ci uh a damna dingin khatlekhat tungah na mawhna uh kipulakin thu na kingetsak ta un. Mihoihte' thungetna in vang nei a, na lianpi semzo hi.

Mawhna ka nei kei hi, i cihleh eite a kineihkhem ihi a, eite a thutaklo ihi hi. 9 Ahi zongin Pasian kiangah i mawhnate va pulak lehang, amah citakin thuman ahih manin, i mawhnate hong maisakin i hoihlohnate khempeuh hong siangsak ding hi. 10 Pasian in a mawh hi, hong ci ahih manin eite in ka mawh ngei kei hi, i cihleh Pasian pen zuaugen a suaksak ihi a, i sungah ama thu a om hetlo a hihi.

Tua ciangin Moses tungah { Topa } heh a, amah in, "Levi mi na sanggampa Aaron om hilo ahi hiam? Amah in hoihtakin thu a gen theihna ka cian theih hi. En in, nangmah a dawn dingin amah hong paikhia a, amah in nang hong muh ciangin a lungsim sungah amah kipak ding hi. 15 Nangmah in ama kiangah thu na gen ding a, thute amah na theisak ding hi. Keimah in na thugenna uhah kong huh ding a, na hih ding uh kong hilh ding hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Moses in a sungpa' thu ngai-in ama gen khempeuh a hih hi. 25 Israel mi khempeuh sung panin Moses in mipil mi siamte teel a, mite a tul, a za, a sawmnga, a sawmte tungah a ukin mite' lutangin amaute a bawl hi.
Note nga in za khat zo-in, note za khat in tul sawm na zo ding uhhi. Note' mai-ah namsau in na galte uh puksak ding hi.

Kei guak in hih mite khempeuh ka sizo kei a, kei-a' dingin tavuan lianlua hi. 15 Hih bangin kei hong bawl ding na hih leh, ka gentheihna ka kimuh lohna dingin nong hehpih zawh leh, thakhatin hong thatzaw in," a ci hi. 16 { Topa } in Moses kiangah, "Mite' upa leh ulian hi ci-in na theih, Israel upate' sung panin mi sawmsagih hong khopsakin, kikhopna bukah amaute paipih in la, tua lai-ah nang tawh dingkhawm sak in. 17 Keimah hong paisukin tua munah nang tawh i kiho ding a, keimah in nang' sunga om kha pawlkhat la-in amaute' sungah ka guang ding hi. Nang guak in na puaklohna dingin amaute in mite' tavuan hong puakpih ding uhhi.

Tua ciangin amah in, "En in, na sanggamnu a mipihte leh a pasian-te kiangah ciahkik khin hi. Na sanggamnu' nungah nang zong ciah in," a ci hi. 16 Ahih hangin Ruth in, "Nang kong nusiatna ding ahi a, nang zuihna panin ka ciahkikna ding ahi zongin hong cici nawn kei in; bang hang hiam cih leh na paina-ah ka pai ding a, na giahna-ah ka giak ding hi. Na mite keima mite hi ding a, na Pasian keima Pasian hi ding hi. 17 Na sihna-ah si-in ka kivui ding hi. Sihna cih lohbuang thudang hangin kong nusiat taak leh { Topa } in kei hong dawm kei ta hen," a ci hi. 18 Tua ciangin Naomi in amah a zuih ding a lungsim a khentatna a muh ciangin bangmah ci nawnlo hi.

Jeshua a tapate leh a behte tawh, leh Hodaviah-te beh Kadmiel leh a tate in Henadad' tapate leh Levi mi a tapate uh leh a behte uh tawh Pasian' biakinn-ah nasemte tungah ukna tavuan a lakhawm uhhi. 10 Innlamte in { Topa' } biakinn a bul a phuh uh ciangin, Israel kumpipa David in a geelkholhsa bangin { Topa } a phat dingin siampite in a puan uh silhin peengkul tawh, Asaf' tapa Levi mite daltuah tawh a pan'mun ding uhah hong pang uhhi.
Tua ahih ciangin kulh ka ciang uh a, nasep a kimciang bang kizo hi. Mite in utna lungsim tawh sem uhhi.

En un, sanggamte pumkhat suakin a tut khawm uh ciangin bangzahin hoihin nuam ahi hiam? 2 Tua pen a puan ngawng tungah Aaron' khamul kaisuk zui-in a lu tung panin a taaksuk, sathau manpha tawh kibang hi. 3 Tua pen Zion mualte tungah a kia, Hermon mual pana hong piang daitui tawh kibang hi. Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } in nuntak tawntungna thupha tua munah a pia hi.

Mi khat sangin mi nih hoihzaw hi; amau' sepna thaman a tamzaw ngah uhhi. 10 Banghang hiam cihleh khat cimawh leh a khat in huh a, mi khat guak pen cimawh zenzen leh a huh ding omlo ahih manin a dahhuai pha mahmah a hihi. 11 Khua a dam ciangin mi nih lumkhawm leh khua lum hi; khat guak bangci khualum theih ding ahi hiam? 12 Mi khat bek hi leh zawhnop kisa a, nih pha leh kizo zolo hi. Zang thum-a kiheek khauhual bawhsat hak hi.
Mi nih, thukimna om masa lopi-in lampi-ah tonkhawm thei uh ahi hiam?
Kilemna ding deihin a hanciam mite in Pasian' tate cihna ngah ding uh ahih manin thupha ngah mi ahi uhhi.

"Banghang hiam cihleh vantung ki-ukna sung omzia pen a leenggah lo-ah na a sem ding a cial dingin zing tungin a kuankhia leenggah lo neipa tawh kibang hi. 2 Ni tha ngeina ngun peek khat piak dingin a kithukim khit uh ciangin a leenggah lo-ah na a sem dingin pawlkhat a kuansak hi. 3 Zingsang nai kua hun ciangin mihon omna sumbukah pai leuleu a, mi pawlkhat bangmah semloin a mawk om a muh ciangin, 4 ‘No zong leenggah lo-ah va kuan un; a kilawm zah khat ka hong pia ding hi,’ a cih ciangin pawlkhat a kuan uhhi. 5 Tua ciangin sun sawmlenih ciangin pawlkhat cial leuleu a, nitak nai thum ciangin pawlkhat a cial lai hi.

mihing li in Zeisu kiangah khutlekhezaw mi khat a paipih dingin hong pua uhhi. 4 Ahi zongin mihonpi kinehlua ahih manin Zeisu kiangah paipih theilo uhhi. Tua ahih manin Zeisu' omna san inn tungkhum hongletin, a lupna pheek tawh a mipa a khaisuk uhhi.
Zeisu in sawmlenihte sam a, amaute tungah dawi hawlkhiatna ding vangliatna pia-in, amaute nih nihin a sawlkhia hi.
Tua khit ciangin Zeisu in ama paina ding khua leh mun khempeuhah nih nihin a na pai dingin mi sawmsagih seh a, ama mai-ah a mapaisak hi.

Note tungah ka hong piak thak thu in: Note khatlekhat na ki-it ding uh a hihi. Note ka hong it mah bangin note khatlekhat na ki-it un. 35 Note khatlekhat ki-it le uh cin keima nungzuite na hihna uh mi khempeuh in hong thei ding uhhi," a ci hi.

Pa aw, amaute khempeuh pumkhat a suahtheihna dingun ka hong ngetsak hi. Nangmah in kei na hong sawlna thu leitung mite in a uptheihna dingun eite gel pawlkhat ihih mah bangin amaute zong eite tawh pawlkhat hong hi ta hen.
Pentecost ni hong tun' ciangin Zeisu a um mi khempeuh mun khatah kikhawm uhhi.

Amaute in sawltakte tung panin thu sinin amaute tawh kikhawl uh a, amaute tawh an nekhawmin, thu zong a ngenkhawm uhhi. 43 Sawltakte in lim leh na lamdang tampi bawl uh a, mi khempeuh in lamdang sa mahmah uhhi. 44 Thu um khempeuh kikhawlin omkhawm uh a, a neihsate uh zong a neikhawm uhhi. 45 Amaute in a neih a lamteng uh zuak uh a, a sumte pen amau kisapna tawh kizui-in amaute lakah a hawm uhhi. 46 Nisimin biakinn-ah kikhawm uh a, a innte uhah an nekhawmin, lungdamna leh kiniamkhiatna tawh a ne ciat uhhi. 47 Pasian phat uh a, khatlekhat thupha kideihsakin a om uhhi. Pasian in nisimin hotkhiatna a ngah mi kibehlapsak tawntung hi.
A lawmte un hih thu a zak uh ciangin a vekpi-un lungsim kikhatin Pasian' kiangah thu ngen uh a, "Van leh lei, tuipi tuineu leh a sunga om khempeuh a piangsak Topa aw,

Pasian in kei tungah hehpihna hong piakkhongna hangin note tungah kong gennop thu in: Note tawh a kituakzah valin kilian ngaihsutzaw kha kei un. Pasian in note tungah upna hong piakzah tawh kizui-in kingaihsun bek zaw unla, a kilawm ciang khat bekin kingaihsun un. 4 I pumpi tungah zong na tampi i nei a, tua nate' nasep a tuamtuam a hihi. 5 Tua mah bangin eite mi tampi ihih hangin pumkhat ihi a, pumpi nate bangin khatlekhat a kizom ciat ihi hi. 6 Tua ahih manin Pasian in hehpihna hong piakkhongna tawh kizui-in i siamna a tuamtuamte zang ciat ni. I siamna pen Pasian' thu gentheihna ding siamna ahih leh i upna neihzah tawh kizui-in gen ni. 7 Nasepna ding siamna a nei ihih leh na sem ni. Hilhna ding siamna a nei ihih leh hilh ni. 8 Midangte hanthot theihna ding siamna a nei ihih leh midangte hanthawn ni. Midangte hoptheihna ding a nei ihih leh citna taktak tawh hawm ni. Makaih theihna ding siamna a nei ihih leh hoihtakin na sem ni. Midangte hehpih theihna ding a nei ihih leh maitaii takin hih ni. 9 Na ki-itnate uh lungsim takpi tawh hi sak unla, a siate mudahin a hoihte lenkip un. 10 Unau ki-itna lungsim nei unla, khatlekhat kizahtak bawl ding lamsang kidem un.

Note in lungsim kikhatin i Topa Zeisu Christ' Pa ahi Pasian na phatkhawm theihna dingun Pasian in thuakzawhna leh thahatna hong pia hen la, Zeisu Christ deihna bangin gamta-in khatlekhat kithutuak takin hong omsak ta hen.
Sanggamte aw, note khatlekhat kithutuakin, pawl kikhenna omkha loin, na lungsim, na ngaihsutna uh leh na ngimna uh na kikhatsakna dingun i Topa Zeisu Christ min tawh ka hong thum hi.

Keima nasep pen khaici vawh hi a, Apollos' nasep pen tuibuah hi a, ahi zongin a khangsakpa ahih leh Pasian a hihi. 7 Khaici vawhpa leh tuibuakpa a thupi hilo a, a khangsak Pasian a thupi hi bek hi. 8 Khaici vawhpa leh tuibuakpa a kizakim a hihi. Pasian in komau sepna tuak tawh kizui-in thaman hong pia ding hi. 9 Kote pen Pasian-a' dingin na a semkhawm mite ka hi uh a, note pen Pasian' lo na hi uhhi. Note pen Pasian' inn zong na hi uhhi.

Mi khempeuh-a' dingin phattuamna a omtheihna dingin Khasiangtho' hong ompihna a nam tuamtuamin hong kilang hi. 8 Khasiangtho in mi khat tungah thuthuk pilna hong guan' a, tua Khasiangtho mah in adang khat tungah thugen siamna hong guan' hi.

Pumpi pen khat bek hinapi-in na a tuamtuam a nei hi. Pumpi in na a tuamtuam tampi a neih hangin pumpi khat bek mah ahih veve mah bangin Christ zong pumpi na a tuamtuam a nei pumpi khat a hihi. 13 Jew mi ihi a, Gentail mi ihi zongin, sila ihi a, sila a hilo ihi zongin, eite minam tuamtuam ihih hangin Kha Siangtho khat bek mah in Zeisu' pumpi a suak dingin ama sungah hong phum a, eite khempeuh tungah a hong kipia pen tua a kibang Kha Siangtho khat bek mah a hihi. 14 Pumpi in na khat bek neiloin nam tampi tak a nei hi. 15 Khe in, "Kei, khut hilo ka hih manin pumpi tawh ka kizom kei hi," a cihmawk hangin pumpi na khat ahihna a bei hi tuanlo hi. 16 Bil in, "Kei, mit hilo ka hih manin pumpi tawh ka kizom kei hi," a cihmawk hangin pumpi na ahihna a bei hi tuanlo hi. 17 Pumpi khempeuh mit suakkhin leh bang tawh khua za ding ahi hiam? Pumpi khempeuh bil suakkhin leh bang tawh a gimnam thei ding ahi hiam? 18 Ahi zongin tu-a i neih bang tektekin, Pasian in ama deih bangin pumpi na a tuamtuam a hong bawlsak hi. 19 A vekpi-in pumpi na nam khat bek hi khin leh a pumpi ding koi-ah om nawn ding ahi hiam? 20 Ahi zongin tu-a i neih bangin pumpi khat bek om a, na tampi a nei hi. 21 Tua ahih manin mit in khut kiangah, "Nang ka hong kisam kei hi," ci theilo a, lutang in zong khe kiangah, "Nang ka hong kisapna omlo hi," ci theilo hi. 22 Pumpi na a ginalo tawh a kibangte a kiman'na lian mahmah zawsop a, 23 pumpi na bangmah gentaaklo i sakte pawl limtakin kep kul zawsop hi. I pumpi na hoih i sak khollohte pen, 24 pumpi na hoih i sakte i lim et ding a kisap kholloh bang hiloin, limkep diak peuh kulzaw se hi. Ahi zongin i pumpi na thupi i sak khollohte limtakin i kepdiak ding a kisamin i pumpi a na bawl se hi. 25 Tua ahih manin i pumpi nate khatlekhat kithutuak lo cih omloin a vekpi-in a kilemkim uhhi.
Hih bangin um un, ci-in thatanghat thu tawh a hong gen ding ka hi kei uhhi. Note na upna uhah kipkhin na hih manun note' lungdamna dingin note tawh na a semkhawm ka hi uhhi.

Thu umlo mite tawh na na semkhawm kei un. Midik leh mimawh bangci-in kipawlthei ding a, khuavak leh khuamial bangci-in omkhawm theiding ahi hiam? 15 Christ leh Dawimangpa bangci-in kithutuak theiding a, thu um mi leh thu umlo mi bangci-in a ngaihsutna uh kibang theiding ahi hiam? 16 Pasian' biakinn leh lawkite' milim bangci kilem theihding ahi hiam? Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in, "Ka mite lakah tengin amaute tawh ka omkhawm ding hi. Kei pen amaute' Pasian ka hi ding a, amaute, keima mi ahi ding uhhi. 17 Tua ahih manin Vanglian Topa keimah in kong genin-ah: Amaute tawh kikhenin amaute kiang panin paikhia unla, a sianglo peuhmah sukha kei un. Tua hi leh note ka hong ngai ding hi.
Tua ahih manin Jew mi leh Gentail mi, sila leh sila a hilo, numei leh pasal cih bangin kideidanna om nawnlo a, note khempeuh Christ tawh na kipawlna hangun pawlkhat hi-in, a kibangkim na hi uhhi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Thukham khempeuh thu khatin kigawm thei a, "Nangmah na ki-it bangin na vengte na it in," cihna tawh kilomlak thei hi.
Thu haksa na tuah uh ciangin khatlekhat na kihuh un. Tua hi leh Christ' thukham a zui na hi uhhi.
Thu haksa na tuah uh ciangin khatlekhat na kihuh un. Tua hi leh Christ' thukham a zui na hi uhhi.

Christ mahmah in Gentail mite leh Jew mite pawlkhatin hong bawl ahih manin eite tungah nopsakna a hong piapa a hihi. Hih minam nihte khenin gal a piangsak dalna pen Christ in ama pumpi tawh a satkham hi. 15 Amah tawh kipawlna hangin minam nihte pawlkhat a suahtheihna dingin minam a dei Jew Thukham leh a ngeinate khempeuh phiatin, eite pawlkhat hong suahin a hong kilemsak hi.

Khasiangtho kimakai sakin, khatlekhat kilemin pawlkhat na hihna uh na kipsak tawntung un. 4 A kibang lametna khat bek a ngahkhawm dingin Pasian in note hong sap mah bangin eite khempeuh pumkhat bek hi-in Khasiangtho zong khat bek mah a neikhawm ihi hi. 5 Topa khat bek, upna khat bek, tuiphumna khat bek mah a zangkhawm ihi hi. 6 Mi khempeuh' Pa ahi Pasian khat bek om a, mi khempeuh' Topa hi-in, na khempeuh hih kimin, mun citengah a om hi.

Ama ukna mangin pumpi na a tuamtuamte a kituak takin kizom a, amaute limtakin a kizop dimdiamna hangin pumpi pen pumkhat a suak thei hi. Pumpi na a tuamtuamte in amau' sepding ciat hoihtakin a sep uh ciangin itna hangin pumpi khangin a cingtaak a suak thei hi.

Amah in mite tungah siamna a tuamtuam hong pia a, pawlkhatte sawltak nasep a semding, pawlkhatte kamsang nasep a semding, pawlkhatte thuhilh kawikawi nasep a semding, pawlkhatte pawlpi kem nasep a semding, leh pawlkhatte laihilh nasep a semdingin a hong seh hi. 12 Hih nasep a tuamtuamte khempeuh a semdingin Pasian' mi khempeuh kigingkhol sakin Christ-a' dingin na semin Christ pumpi a khan'sak theihna ding deihna a hihi.
khatlekhat kihehpihin, lungsim neem tawh na kihozaw unla, Christ' hangin Pasian in note' mawhna hong maisak mah bangin khatlekhat na mawhna uh na kimaisak ta un.

Note, Christ tawh kipawlin na nuntakna uh in note hong thahatsak hi. Khasiangtho tawh kikhawlin, khatlekhat kihehpihin, dikna na kibawl uhhi. 2 Tua ahih manin kei tawh ngaihsutna kibangin note khatlekhat ki-itin, khatlekhat lungsim kituakin na omna uh tawh keima lungdamna na hong cingtaaksakna dingun ka hong kun hi. 3 Huaihamna lungsim leh kisialh nopna lungsim tawh bangmah gamta kei un. Kiniamkhiat ciat unla, midangte thupi ngaihsutzaw un. 4 Note' phattuamna ding bek ngaihsun kei unla, midangte' phattuamna ding ngaihsutsak zaw un.

Euodia leh Sintikhe, Topa' hangin a kilemkik ding uh ka thum nuam hi. 3 Hih numei nihte in Klement leh a nungta mite a kikhumna Pasian' laibu sungah a kikhum, ka naseppih dangte khempeuh tawh, lungdamna thu a kizelhna dingin nakpi takin kei tawh na hong semkhawm uh ahih manin, citakin kei tawh na a semkhawm note in zong amaute gel na huhna dingun ka hong thum hi.
Tua ahih manin tu laitakin na omzia uh mah bangin khatlekhat kihanthawnin na kihuh ciat ta un.

Khatlekhat ki-itin a hoih nate i sepna dingin kihanthawn ciat ni. 25 Mi pawlkhatte in kikhop a pelh bang hiloin, eite in kikhop khawmnate pelhloin om ni. Topa' hong paiding Ni hong naina thu thei ihih manin khatlekhat kihanthawn semsemzaw ni.
Gitlohna pelhin hoih gamtat uh hen la, mi tawh kilem ding hanciamin kilem theihna dingin hahkat ta uh hen.

Itna in mawhna tampi khuhcip thei ahih manin lungsim takpi tawh khatlekhat ki-it ding thupi ngaihsut pha pen un. 9 Khatlekhat maitaii takin zinleleeng na kido un. 10 Pasian' piak na a zatsiamte bangin Pasian' kiang panin na ngah uh nate, midangte' phattuamna dingin na zang un.
Ahi zongin amah, khuavak ahih mah bangin eite in zong khuavak gamtatnate i gamtat takpi leh eite pawlkhat ihi a, ama Tapa Zeisu' sisan in i mawhna khempeuh panin eite hong siangsak hi.
Tua ahih manin Pasian thuman nasepna-ah nasem khawm mite ihih theihna dingin ei Christian-te in hihbang mite i huh ding a hihi.

Tua ciangin Filistia-pa in David kiangah, "Ui hong sa a, ciangkang tawh sat hong sawm na hi hiam?" a ci hi. Filistia-pa in a pasian-te' min tawh David samsia hi. 44 Filistia-pa in David kiangah, "Ka kiangah hong pai in. Huih lak vasate leh gamlak gamsate tungah na sa ka pia ding hi," a ci hi.
A kisathei mite nangma mit tawh kituaklo a, siatna a bawlte khempeuh nangmah in na mudah hi.

Migilote in kiphatsakna tawh mizawngte uuk delh uhhi. Amau ngaihsut vaihawmna mahah amaute awksak in. 3 Banghang hiam cihleh migilo in a lungsim deihna kisaktheihpih a, ngahna dingah a huaihampa in { Topa } phuisamin a taisan hi. 4 Migilo in kiphatsakna lungsim nei a, { Topa } zonglo hi. Ama ngaihsutna khempeuhah, "Pasian om kei," a ci hi.
"I Leii tawh gualzo ding, i mukte eima neihsa; i to kua hiam?" a ci vial, kiphatsakna a piangsak leii, phat khemna muk khempeuh, { Topa } in atkhia ta hen.

Mite in a hauhna uh muangin, tampi a neihna uh a kisaktheihpih hangun, 7 amah leh amah a kitankhia tawmzo taktak, a nuntakna man ding Pasian' tungah a piazo mi kuamah omlo hi. 8 Banghang hiam cihleh a nuntakna tatna ding a man tam mahmah a, Leihawmpi mu ngeilo zah ding a hing tawntung dingin kitankhiazo ngeilo hi.
Mi thahatpa aw, banghangin miphate suksiatna-ah kisial na hi hiam? Sunthapai-in, suksiatna na ngaihsunsun hi.
A kiphasakte tungah, "Kiphasak kei un," a gilote tungah, "Kihisak kei un. 5 Kihisak kei unla, kiphatsakna tawh kampau kei un," ka ci hi.

{ Topa } aw, migilote bang tanvei lungdam ding uh a, migilote bang tanvei lungnuamin omom lai ding ahi uhhiam? 4 Gamtatsiate bang tanvei kihisak lai ding uh a, a siat gamtatna uh bang tanvei kisialhpih lai ding ahi uhhiam?

Kong thuhilhna hong ngai un; ka ngaihsutna kong gen ding a, ka theihna kong zasak ding hi. 24 Keimah in note hong samsam napi-in nong ngai nuam kei uh a, ka khut hong vanvan napi-in kuamah in nong thudon kei uhhi. 25 Ka thugente khempeuh hong thudon loin, kong tainate khempeuh hong mang nuamlo na hih manun, 26 lungkhamna na tuah uh ciangin kong nuihsan lel ding a, launa na tuah uh ciangin kong thusim kei ding hi.

Ka thugente na deih kei uh a, kong thuhilhna ngai nuamlo na hih manun, 31 na gamtatna bangun na thuak ding uh a, nomau' gamtatna mah in note hong gimsak ding hi. 32 Banghang hiam cihleh thu theilote in pilna a donloh manun sihlawh uh a, mihaite in lunghihmawhna a neihloh manun siatlawh uhhi. 33 Ahi zongin ka thugenna a ngaite in lungnopna ngah ding uh a, launa neilo-in nuamtakin om hithiat ding uhhi," a ci hi.
Mi kiphasakte in minsiatna ngahpak ding ahih manin a hoihbekin om ding hoihzaw tham hi.
Pau a ki-ipzo mi in a nuntakna a hu hi a, a mawk paupau mi pen amah a kisiasak tawm a hihi. 4 Thadah mi in a deih ngahzo lo a, nasep hahkat mi in a deih khempeuh ngahzo hi.
Mi pawlkhatte, zawng napi-in kihausak uh a, mi pawlkhatte, hau napi-in kizawngsak uhhi.
Hilh ding utlo, kihihsakna in kitotna bek piangsak thei a, hong kithuhilh ding utna pen a hoihzaw a hihi.
Van leipa in van zuakpa kiangah, "Kiman kei, kiman kei," cici khem a, a paikhiat khit ciangin sumdek siam mahmah ing, ci-in mi kiangah kisial hi.
Bangmah a piak lohpi a kisialhpihpa pen guah a zusak tuanlo meiipi leh huihpi nung tawh kibang lel hi.
Khuaizu a tam lua nek ding a hoihloh bangin phat ding deihluatna a hoihlo a hihi.

Zingciang hun-a ding kima-sialh kei in. Tuhun leh tua hun kikalah a piang ding thu bangmah na thei kei hi. 2 Midangte in hong phat lohbuang nangmah kiphattawm kei in. Khual mite in hong phat lohbuang nangma kamin kiphattawm kei in.
Topa in Zion Mual leh Jerusalem khua-ah ama nasep dingteng a zawh khit ciangin Assiria kumpipa kiphasakin a kisialhna leh a kiphatsakna hangin gim a pia ding hi.

Kote khempeuh mawhnei mi ka hi khin uh a, ka gamtat hoih khempeuh uh zong puannin tawh kibanglai veve hi. Kote khempeuh singteh bangin ka vul uh a, ka mawhna hangun huih letkhiat nahthel keu ka bang uhhi.

Tua ciangin { Topa } in, "Mipilte in a pilna uh kisaktheihpih kei uh hen la, mi hatte in a hatna uh kisaktheihpih kei uh hen. Mihaute in zong a hauhna uh kisaktheihpih kei uh hen. 24 A kisatheite in, keimah, leitungah migitna, thuman leh thutang a zang ka hihna leh tuate sungah nuam a sapa ka hihna thu hong theihna uhah kisathei uh hen. { Topa } in hih thu kong gen khin hi," a ci hi.

"Biakna tawh kizomin na hoih khat peuhpeuh na sep uh ciangin mite' phat ding deihna tawh a kilang theithei dingin na sepkhak lohna dingun na kingaihsun un. Tua bangin gamta le uh cin, vantungah a om na Pa uh kiang panin thaman na ngah kei ding uhhi. 2 "Tua ahih manin mi cimawhte tungah huhna na piak uh ciangin, mite in a phat ding uh a deihna tawh a kineihkhem mite in kikhopna innsung leh kongzing lakah a kilang theithei-in a hih uh bangin na hih kei un. Tua bangin a hih mite in thaman a ngah khinta ahihna thu limtakin na phawk un.
Amaute in a sepna khempeuh uh mite' muhtheih dingin a hih se uhhi.

Ke'n kong cihin-ah, hih mipa pen Pasian tawh a kilemsa-in a inn-ah ciah a, a khatpa pen tua bangin ciahlo hi. Banghang hiam cihleh a kiliansakte pen kiniamkhiatsuk ding a, a kiniamkhiatte pen a lianin kibawl ding hi," a ci hi.
mi gensiatna, Pasian muhdahna, midangte a heh theih a maizum theihna dingin gamtatna, kiphatsakna, kisialhna, thusia bawlna, nu leh pate' thu man'lohna,
Tua ahih leh mihingte in i kisialhpih ding bang om ahi hiam? Bangmah omlo hi. Bang bulphuh ding ihi hiam? Thukham zuihna bulphuh ding ihi hiam? Hilo hi. I upna a bulphuh ding ihi hi.

Pasian in kei tungah hehpihna hong piakkhongna hangin note tungah kong gennop thu in: Note tawh a kituakzah valin kilian ngaihsutzaw kha kei un. Pasian in note tungah upna hong piakzah tawh kizui-in kingaihsun bek zaw unla, a kilawm ciang khat bekin kingaihsun un.

Sanggamte aw, Pasian in note hong sap laitakin na omzia uh ngaihsun un. Leitung mite' hong muhna panin note a tamzaw, mipil na hi kei uh a, mi vanglian zong na hi kei uh a, mi thupi zong na hi kei uhhi. 27 Ahi zongin Pasian in mipilte a maizumsakna dingin mihaite hong teel a, mi thahatte a maizumsakna dingin mi thaneemte a hong teel hi. 28 Leitung mite in thupi a sakte uh a suksiat theihna dingin Pasian in leitung mite' simmawh a niamte, bangmahin a ngaihsutloh uh mite a teel hi. 29 Tua ahih manin Pasian' mai-ah mite a kisaktheihna ding thu omlo hi. 30 Ahi zongin Pasian in Zeisu Christ hangin note tungah nuntakna hong pia a, tua Zeisu Christ pen eite' pilna, Pasian tawh i kipawl theihna, Pasian' mi siangtho suakin, hotkhiatna i ngah theihna a hihi. 31 Tua ahih ciangin Laisiangtho sungah, "A kisathei mite, Topa' hang bekin kisathei ta hen," ci-in na kigelh hi.
Note in bang kisaktheihpih na hi uhhiam? Tu-a na neih khempeuh uh Pasian' hong piak hilo ahi hiam? Tua ahih leh hong kipiasa bek ahih manin a bang kisaktheihpih na hi uhhiam?

Keimah in mihingte pau a tuamtuamte leh vantung mite' pau nangawn ka pautheih hangin itna ka neih kei leh a bil-aphuai zam leh daltuah kitum tawh a kibang lel ka hihi. 2 Thuhilh siamna nei-in, thusim khempeuh thei-in, na khempeuh thei-in, mualte kinsak zawhna ding upna ka neih hangin itna ka neih kei leh ka kiman'na bangmah omlo hi. 3 Ka neih khempeuh midangte tungah pia-in, Pasian' nasepna hangin kihaltumna ka thuak ahi zongin itna ka neih kei leh ka phattuamna bangmah omlo hi. 4 Itna neite a lungduai-in migi hi. Itna neite in hazatna lungsim neiloin, zong kisathei lo hi. 5 Itna neite a kilawm loin gamtalo, heh pakpaklo, mite' mawhna ciamtehlo hi.
Hih bang sepzawhna dingin kote in siamna nei ung a ci hiloin, sepzawhna ding siamna pen Pasian hong piak a hihi.

Note in na hong thupi ngaihsut theihna dingun koleko a hong kiphattawm zel ka hi kei uh a, lungsimtawng hoihlo napi-in a puatham siamna hangin a kisial mite nial thei-in, kote' hangin note na kisaktheihna ding uh deihna hizaw hi.

Titus mai-ah note ka hong kisialhpih ngei a, note in ka kisialhna thu-ah kei na hong zahhuaisak kei uhhi. Note tungah thuman bekbek a hong gen ka hih mah bangun Titus tungah ka kisialhna uh zong a kisial khial ka hihlohna uh hong kilang hi.
Ahi zongin kote ka kisialhna ding uh kiciangtan a, note lakah na ka hong sepna dingun Pasian in a hong sehsaksa thu sung ciang bekah ka kisial thei uhhi.
Laisiangtho in, "Mi khat peuhpeuh a kisialh nop leh Topa' nasepnate bek kisialhpih hen," na ci hi.

Tua sawltak dangte in, "Kote in zong amau' sepzia mah bangin ka sem uhhi," ci-in a kisialh theihlohna dingun tuhunin nasep thaman bangmah ka hong lakloh mah bangin mailamah zong ka hong la kei ding hi.
Ka kisialh leh zong ka ginatlohna hong kilangsak nate hangin ka kisial bek hi.

Mite kiangah genkhiatsawn dingin a kiphallo a lamdang mahmah thu a za hi. 5 Tua bang thu pen a kisialh taak mahmah thu hinapi-in ka kisialhpih kei hi. Kei a ginalo hinapi ama minthan'na dingin Pasian in hong zang ahih manin tua thu pen a kisialh taak mahmah thu hinapi-in ka kisialhpih kei hi. Kei a ginalo hinapi ama minthan'na dingin Pasian in hong zang ahih manin tua thu ka kisialhpih bek hi. 6 Hih ka muh thu pen thuman ahih manin a kisialhpih hi ta leng zong mihai ka hi kei hi. Ahi zongin mite in keima sepna leh keima genna a muh a zak banah a valin hong thupi ngaihsutkhak ding uh utlo ka hih manin hih thu ka kisialhpih nuam kei hi. 7 Ahi zongin hih a lamdang na tampite ka muhna hangin kisialin ka kisaktheih khaklohna dingin Satan' sawltak bangin na a sem, keima pumpi sungah natna khat hong kipia ahih manin ka kisaktheih luatlohna dingin a hong kham hi. 8 Tua natna tawh ka kipelh theihna dingin Topa kiangah thumvei tak thu ka ngen hi. 9 Ahi zongin Topa in kei kiangah, "Na tha a nem ciangin keima vangliatna hat mahmah ahih manin nangma kisap na pen keima hehpihna hi bek hi," ci-in hong dawng hi. Tua ahih manin keima sungah Christ vangliatna hong omtheihna dingin lungdam takin ka thaneemna ka kisialhpih semsem hi.
A kuamah peuh in ama gamtatna ciat entel hen la, kisialhna ding a om leh ama gamtatna siksanin kisial hen la, midangte tawh ki-ettehin kisial kei hen.

Ahi zongin keimah in ahih leh, singlamteh tungah i Topa Zeisu a sihna thu bek ka kisialhpih ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh singlamteh tungah ama sihna hangin kei-a' dingin leitung thute misi bang a, kei zong, leitung thu-ah misi mah ka bang hi.

Note' upna hangin Pasian' hong hehpihna tawh hotkhiatna a ngah na hi uhhi. Note' thalawhna hangin a ngah hiloin Pasian' hong piakkhong a hihi. 9 Note' hanciamna tawh a ngah hilo na hih manun na kisialhna ding uh a thu omlo hi.
Na kiho uh ciangin kamguh zang kei unla, na pauna uh a za mite in phattuamna a ngahtheihna dingin na-in a kimang kam hoihte bek na pau un.

Huaihamna lungsim leh kisialh nopna lungsim tawh bangmah gamta kei un. Kiniamkhiat ciat unla, midangte thupi ngaihsutzaw un. 4 Note' phattuamna ding bek ngaihsun kei unla, midangte' phattuamna ding ngaihsutsak zaw un.

Bawlsiatna leh gimna na thuakna khempeuh uhah na upna uh khahsuah loin thuakzo paisuak na hih manun midangte kiangah Pasian' pawlpi ka na kisialhpih uhhi. 5 Tu-a na thuaknate uh hangin Pasian' Ukna sungah a om dingin a kilawm mi suak na hih manun Pasian' thukhenna a man ahihna hong kilangsak hi.

Tuhuna a hau mite kisatheikha loin, a kiplo hauhnate muan' leh suan'in neikha loin, eite in nuamtakin i zat theihdingin citna tawh a hong pia Pasian a muan' a suan'na dingun na hilh in. 18 A hoih nate semin, gamtat pha-in, citna lungsim nei-in midangte a hopnopna dingun na hilh in. 19 Tua hi leh mailamah amaute' nuntakna ding bulpi taktak ahi neihsate, amau-a' dingin a khol mite ahi ding uhhi.

Nitawp ni hun pen a lauhuai hun ahih ding lamtak phawk in. 2 Tuahun ciangin mite in amau angsung ding bek ngaihsunin, huaihamin, kisialin, kihisakin, mi zahko-in, nu leh pate' thu mangloin, lungdam theihna mel neiloin, biakna lungsim neiloin, 3 mi khualloin, hehpihna neiloin, mi gensia-in, ngongtatin, kihtakhuai-in, thuhoih deihloin, 4 ciampelin, thu khualloin, kiphasak gawpin, Pasian donloin pumpi nopsakna bek deihin, 5 biakna thu a puathamteng zui napi-in biakna hangin vangliatna thu a omte deihlo ding uhhi. Tua bangin a gamta mite na pelh in.

Pasian' thu nungta-in a gamtang hi a, langnih a hiam namsau sangin hiamzaw lai hi. Kha leh lungsim, guh leh taang kituahna, guh leh guhngek dongin khenkhia thei hi. Mihingte' lungsim ngimna leh a ngaihsutnate zong theithei hi.
Tua mah bangin leii zong i pumpi na sung panin a neu mahmah khat hinapi-in thusia lianpipi piangsak zo hi. Gam khempeuh zong mei-ek neuno khat pan kipanin a kangtum thei hi.
Ahi zongin na lungsim uhah en'na, gitlohna, leh huaihamna a om leh a zuaugen na hi uh a, pil ing, ci-in kisialhna ding bangmah omlo hi.

Tuni ahih kei leh zingciangin tua khua tua khua-ah va pai-in, kum khat bang va omin, sumbawlin a meet tampi va ngah ni, a ci mite aw, ka thugen hong ngai dih un. 14 Zingciangin na nuntakna uh bangci ding cih nangawn na thei kei uhhi. Meiilum tawlkhat sung kaii-in a mangthang pak tawh a kibang lel na hi uhhi. 15 Note in, "Topa in hong thukimpih nak leh nungta-in tua bang tua bang i sem ding hi," na cihding uhhi bek hi. 16 Ahi zongin note kihisakin na kisial uhhi. Tua bangte hoih hetlo hi.

Amaute kiphasakin haipau uh a, a khial gamtat mite sung panin a suakta khin liailiai zo mite, leitung pumpi deih bangin a gamtatna dingun a zol uhhi. 19 Amaute pen siatna a piangsak thei zongsatna lelin sila hinapi-un mite tungah suahtakna ding thu a gen uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh mite pen, a hong zo peuhpeuhte' sila ihi hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh pumpi deihna, mit tawh mu-in i deihte, leh mite' kisaktheihpih nate ahi leitung nate khempeuh pen Pa Pasian tawh a kizom thu hilo a, leitung tawh a kizom thu a hihi.
Hih mite a tawntungin phunin khatlekhat mawhna kizong uh a, amau pumpi deihna bangun gamta-in kiphasak uh a, phattuamna a ngah theihna dingun midangte a phat uhhi.

Amah kisialin a kiphatsakna zah tawh a kizui-in dahna leh lungkhamna thuaksak un. Amah in, ‘Kei kumpinu ka hi a, meigong numei lah ka hi kei a, dahna ka thuak ngei kei ding hi,’ ci ahih manin, 8 gimna in ni khatthu-in ban ding a, pulnatna, kahna, leh kialpi in vatgawp ding hi. Ama tungah thu a khen Topa Pasian vanglian ahih manin mei tawh kihaltum ding hi," a ci hi. 9 Amah tawh paktatin a kiphasak khawm leitung kumpite in tua khuapi a katna meikhu a muh uh ciangin dahin a kap ding uhhi.

keima minin a kisam ka mite amau mahmah kiniamkhiatin, thu ngenin ka mai hong zong a, amau' gitlohnate panin a kihei uh leh, keimah in vantung panin ka za ding a, amaute' khialhna maisakin a leitang uh ka hoihsak kik ding hi.
A khialhna a im mite a dau pailo ding a, a mawhna pulakin a kikhel mite in hehpihna ngah ding uhhi.

Banghang hiam cihleh Israel-te' Siangtho Pa, Topa { Pasian } in, "Kihei kikna leh khawlna bek tawh note in suahtakna na ngah ding uhhi. Daitakin omna leh muan'na pen nomau' thahatna hi ding hi," a ci hi. Ahih hangin note na tuaci kei uh a,

A honkhia zolo dingin { Topa } zawngkhallo a, khua a za theilo dingin a bil ngonglo hi. 2 Ahih hangin note' mawhnate in note leh na Pasian uh kikhenna hong piangsak a, amah in note' aw hong zak theihlohna dingin na khialhnate un ama maitang liah hi.
Nangma kiang panin ka paikhiat khit phetin ka kisikkik a, nong thuhilh khit ciangin dahin ka kun hi. Ka neu laitaka ka minsiatna teng pua niloh ka hih manin maizumin ka lung-am hi,’ a ci hi.

"Migilo khat in a mawh bawlna khawlin ka thukham zui hen la, a hoih a manin gamta leh, tua mipa silo ding a, pelloin nungta ding hi. 22 Ama mawhnasa khempeuh kimaisak ding a, amah a manin a gamtat manin nungta ding hi. 23 Migilo khat a si ka muh ciangin a lungdam dingin hong ngaihsun na hi uhhiam? Ka lung dam hetlo hi. Amah hong kisikin a nuntak ding pen keima deih ahi zaw hi.
Na kisik kikna uh a kilangsak ding gamtatna gamta unla,

Na kisikkik khitna uh a kilatna dingin tui sungah note ka hong phum a, ahi zongin kei nungah a hong paipa in Khasiangtho leh mei sungah note hong phum ding hi. Tua a hong pai dingpa pen kei sangin nakpi takin lianzaw a, ama khedap a tawisak ding nangawnin ka kilawmzo nai kei hi.
Tua huna kipan Zeisu in thuhilh ding kipan a, "Vantung ki-ukna hong naita ahih manin kisikin na omzia uh kheel un," ci-in thu a hilh hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh note kiangah Tuiphumpa Johan hong pai-in thuman lampi hong lak napi-in na um kei uh a, ahi zongin siahdongte leh numei paktatte in a um uhhi. Hih thu na theih khit uh ciang nangawnin na lungsim uh na kheel nuam tuan kei uh a, na um kei veve uhhi.
"A hunhoih hong tungta a, Pasian' Uk ding hun hong kipanta hi. Na mawhna uh kisikkik unla, hih Lungdamna Thuthak um un," ci-in a hilh hi.

Na kisikna uh a kilatna dingin gamta un. Note khatlekhat in, ‘Abraham' suante ihi ngawn hi,’ mawkcih kei un. Ke'n kong cihin-ah, Pasian in hih suangte nangawn Abraham' suanlekhakte-in bawl thei lel hi.

Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Cidamte in siavuan kisamlo uh a, cina mite bek in kisam uhhi. 32 Mite in a zahtak mihoihte a kisikna dingun a sam dingin hong pai ka hi kei a, mite in a pampaih mite a kisikna dingun a sam dingin a hong pai ka hi hi," ci-in a dawng hi.
Hilo hi. Ke'n kong cihin-ah, na mawhna panun na kisik kei uh leh amaute mah bangin note zong na si ding uhhi.
Hilo hi. Ke'n kong cihin-ah, na mawhna panun na kisikkik kei uh leh note zong amaute mah bangin na si ding uhhi," a ci hi.

Note hoihtakin kingaihsun un. Na sanggampa uh no tungah hong khialh leh amah taii unla, a kisik leh a mawhna maisak un. 4 Nikhat sungin sagihvei ciangdong hong khialh hangin zong, a sagihvei mahin no kiangah hong pai-in, ‘Ka kisik hi,’ hong cih nak leh na maisak khin ding uhhi," a ci hi.

amaute kiangah, "Christ in sihna thuakin, a ni thum ni-in sihna panin hingkik ding a, 47 Jerusalem khua-a kipan minam khempeuh tungah a mawhna uh kisikin a kimaisakna ding thu, ama min tawh kihilh ding hi, ci-in kigelh hi. 48 Note pen hih thu khempeuh a thei teci na hi uhhi.

Amaute in hih thu a zak uh ciangin a lungsim uh nakpi takin sukha a, Peter leh sawltak dangte kiangah, "Sanggamte aw, bangci gamtat ding ka hi uhhiam?" ci-in a dong uhhi. 38 Tua ciangin Peter in amaute kiangah, "Na mawhna uh kisik unla, na mawhna uh hong kimaisak theihna dingin Zeisu Christ min tawh tui kiphum ciat un. Tua hi leh Pasian' piakkhong Khasiangtho na ngah ding uhhi.

Ama Christ in a thuakna ding thu, Pasian in tanglai pekin kamsangte khempeuh tung tawnin genkhol a, tu-in hih bangin a thugen kholhna a hong tungsak a hihi. 19 Tua ahih ciangin na mawhnate uh hong sawpsiangsak theihna ding, Topa kiang panin a hong pai lungsim nopna hun na ngah theihna ding uh leh note-a' dingin a sehsa Zeisu Christ a hong sawltheihna dingin na mawhna uh kisik unla, Pasian kiang zuan un.
Israel mite kisik kikin Pasian in a mawhna uh a maisak theihna dingin Ukpi leh Honpa-in tua Zeisu bawlin ama taklamah a tusak hi.
Amaute in hih thu a zak uh ciangin mawhsakna thu gen nawnlo uh a, "Gentail mite zong kisikin a nuntak theihna dingun Pasian in hunhoih pia hi," ci-in Pasian a phat uhhi.

Pasian in mihingte' theihloh hun lai-a a gamtatnate uh phamawh a sakloh hangin, tu-in mun khempeuha om mi khempeuhte a gamtat siatna panun a kiheina dingun thu a hong pia khinzo hi. 31 Amah in leitung mi khempeuh thu a mantakin ama teel mipa a hong khensakna ding ni a sehkhol khinzo hi. Tua a ngaihsutna a man taktak hi, ci-in mi khempeuh tungah a hong lahna dingin a teel mipa, sihna panin a hingkiksak zo hi," ci-in thu a hilh hi.
Jew mi leh Gentail mite a mawhna panun Pasian' lamah kihei-in i Topa Zeisu a upna dingun thu ka gen khinzo hi.

Pasian migi-in thu a diah hithiatna pen na kisikkik theihna ding uh a deihna ahih lamtak phawkkha loin, a migitna, a lungduaina, a hong thuaknate neu ngaihsutkha na hi uhhiam? 5 Lungsim khauhin na kisik noplohna hangun Pasian' hehna leh a manin a thukhenna a hong kilat Ni ding ciangin na gimthuak ding uh a nasia semsem dingin a bawl na hi uhhi.

Banghang hiam cihleh tu-in ka lung a dam hi. Note ka hong dahsak khakna hangin a lungdam hiloin note na dahna hangun na ngaihsutna uh kheel thei na hih manun a nuam ka hihi. Tua na dahna uh Pasian in a hoihlamin hong zang ahih manin note-a' dingin siatna a hong piangsak ka hi kei zaw uhhi.

Note kiangah ka hong tun' ciangin a beisa hunah note tampi tak thangtatin, numei tawh mawhna, hukna, lannate hangin na khialhnate uh na kisikloh manun keimah dahin kapin, note' muhna-ah ka Pasian in kei hong maizumsak khakding ka lunghimawh mahmah hi.

Mi pawlkhatte' ngaihsut bangin Topa in a kamciamna a hong tungsak hak hi zenzen lo hi. Note khat beek in siatna na thuakkhak ding uh deihloin na vekpi-un na kisik ding uh deih ahih manin hong pai nailohna pen note hong khualna hizaw hi.
Ahi zongin Pasian kiangah i mawhnate va pulak lehang, amah citakin thuman ahih manin, i mawhnate hong maisakin i hoihlohnate khempeuh hong siangsak ding hi.

Tua ahih manin na lampialna uh phawkin, na mawhna uh panin kihei unla, na gamtat ngeisa bangun gamta kik un. Na mawhna panun kihei-in na kisikkik kei uh leh note kiangah hong pai-in na meivakna uh ka hong lakkhiatsak ding hi.

Ahi zongin note ka hong mawhsakna ding thu tawmkhat a om hi. Milim biakna ante nesakin, nulepa paktatna piangsak a, Israel mite mawhna a gamtasak Balak tungah thu a hilh Balaam' thuhilhnate a um mi pawlkhat note lakah a om hi. 15 Tua mah bangin Nicolas pawlte' thuhilhna a um mi pawlkhat zong note lak mahah a om hi. 16 Tua ahih manin na mawhna panun kisikkik un. Na kisik kei uh leh note kiangah kei hong pai baihin, ka kam panin a pusuak namsau tawh amaute ka do ding hi.

Tua ahih manin note a hong kihilh na zaksa uh thute phawkkik unla, tua thute zui-in na mawhna panun kisik kik un. Khua na phawk kei uh leh note kiangah guta bangin ka hong pai ding a, ka hong tun'lam nangawn na thei kei ding uhhi.

Tua ahih ciangin Pasian in ama lim bangin mihing piangsakin, Pasian' lim bangin amah a piangsak hi. Amah in pasal leh numei a piangsak hi. 28 Pasian in amaute thupha pia a, Pasian in amaute tungah, "Ci pha-in tampi pha unla, leitung dimin zo un. Tuipi ngasate tung, leitungah a gamtang, a nungtate khempeuh tungah ukna nei ta un," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin { Topa } Pasian in, "Mipa amah guak a om ding hoihlo hi. Ama-a' ding a kituak a huh ding ka bawlsak ding hi," ci hi.
