Tua ahih ciangin { Topa } Pasian in mipa ihmut suak mahmah sak a, ama ihmut kalin a nakguhte khat la-in tua mun pen satak tawh a dimsak hi. 22 { Topa } Pasian in mipa' tung panin a lakkhiat nakguh pen numei khatin bawl a, mipa kiangah tuanu a paipih hi. 23 Tua ciangin mipa in, "Tu petpetin hih pen keima guhte leh keima sate a hihi. Amah pen mipa sung panin a kilakhia ahih manin ‘Numei’ kici ding hi," a ci hi.
Tua thu hangin pasal in a nu leh a pa nusia-in a zi tawh kigawm a, amaute gel pum khat a bang uhhi.
Tua ahih ciangin singkung a hoihna, mi a pilsak dingin tua a gah a deihhuaina a muh ciangin, a singgah lo-in a ne hi. Amah in singgah kimkhat a pasal pia a, a pasal in zong a ne hi.
Ganhing siangthote, a sianglo ganhingte, vasate, leitunga a bokvak peuhmah, 9 a nupa kopin Pasian in Noah a thupiaksa bangin teembaw sungah Noah tawh pai uhhi.
Pasian in Noah leh a tapate thupha pia a, amaute tungah, "Pung unla, tampi pha-in, leitung dim un.
Ahih hangin zanin mang sungah Abimelek kiangah Pasian pai a, ama kiangah, "En in, na laksa numei' hangin nang a si ding na hi hi. Banghang hiam cihleh amah, mi khat' zi ahi hi," a ci hi.

Nangmah in amau' lakah ka ten'na Kanaan mite' tanute lak panin ka tapa' zi ding laloin, keima gam leh ka behte kiangah va pai-in ka tapa Isaac' zi ding na lakna dingin vantung leh leitung Pasian ahi { Topa } tawh nang kong kiciamsak ding hi," a ci hi.
Kithawi in la, na nu' pa Bethuel' inn, Paddanaram-ah pai in. Tua lai munah na nu' sanggampa Laban' tanute khat na zi dingin la in.
Kei kiang panin moman leh letsong tampi hong ngen un. Kei' tunga nong nget zahzah uh kong pia ding hi. Zi dingin a numei hong pia hoh un," ci thuah lai hi.
Tua ciangin Judah in Onan kiangah, "Na sanggampa' zi tawh lumkhawm in la, tuanu' tungah pasal' sanggamte' tavuan sem in la, na sanggampa-a' dingin ta nei in," a ci hi.
Amah in zi dang khat a lakthuah leh, a zi masa' annek, a puansilh, ahih kei leh lupkhopna ding thuneihna khiamlo ding hi.

"Mi khat in a kidong nailo nungak khat zolin amah tawh a lupkhop leh, amah in tuanu' man ding moman letsong pia ding a, ama zi suak ding hi. 17 A numei' pa in ama tungah tuanu a piak nop kei leh zong, tua mipa in nungak moman letsong zah numei' pa' tungah sum pia veve ding hi.
note in amau' tanute na tapate uh-a' dingin la-in, amau' pasian-te tawh paktatna a bawl a tanute in amau' pasian-te tawh na tapate uh paktatsak khading uhhi.
"Note kuamah in na kinaipih na behte uh mawhpih dingin na naih kei ding uhhi. Kei pen { Topa } ka hihi.
Pasal khat in zi nei-in, a zi' nu tawh zong a lakthuah leh, tua pen a kilawmlo a hihi. Note lakah tua bang kilawmlohna a omlohna dingin tuapa leh a nutate, mei tawh kihallum ding hi.

"Note pen na nu' sanggamnu ahih kei leh na pa' sanggamnu tawh na mawh kei ding uhhi. Tua pen a nai behte tawh mawhna ahih manin amaute in amau' mawhna pua ding uhhi. 20 Pasal khat, a pa' sanggampa' zi tawh a lupkhop leh, amah in a pa' sanggampa a mindaisak a hihi. Amaute in amau' khialhna thuak ding uh a, ta neiloin si ding uhhi. 21 Pasal khat in a sanggampa' zi a lak leh, tua pen nitna hi a, amah in a sanggampa a mindaisak a hihi. Amaute in ta neilo ding uhhi.
Amaute in numei paktat ahih kei leh a kininsaksa numei ten'pihlo ding uh a, a pasal in a maksa numei zong ten'pihlo ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh siampipa pen ama Pasian-a' dingin siangtho hi.

Amah in a zi dingin nungak la ding hi. 14 Meigong numei, a kimasa numei, a kininsaksa numei, numei paktat, hih bangte pawl ten'pihlo ding a, amah in ama mite lak panin nungak khat zi-in la ding hi. 15 Tua pen ama mite lakah a tate a daisak lohna ding a hihi. Banghang hiam cihleh amah a siangthosakpa pen keimah { Topa } ka hi hi, ci in," a ci hi.
Midangte khempeuh sangin note thupha hong kilim piakzaw ding hi. Note' lak hita leh na ganhingte uh lak hita lehah a nu ahi a, a pa ahi zongin a ciing omlo ding hi.

"Mi khat in zi nih nei a, khat itin a khat mudah a, a it leh a muhdah a zite gel in ta nei tuakin, tapa a neih cil pen a muhdahnu tawh a neih ahih leh, 16 a tapate tungah gamhluah dingin ama neihsa a hawm ciangin, a mudahnu' tapa cil sangin deihzawkna hangin a itnu' tapa pen a ta cilin bawl theilo ding hi. 17 Ama neihsa khempeuh tanh nih piakna tawh a muhdahnu' tapa a tacil mahin sang ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh tuapa pen ama sung panin a piang masa pen ahih manin tacil hihna za pen ama-a' a hihi.

"Mi khat in zi la-in, amah a luppih khit ciangin amah mudahin, 14 a zumhuai gamtatna tawh tuanu mawhsakin, ‘Keimah in hih numei ka la a, amah tawh ka lupkhop ciangin ama sungah nungakna lim ka mu kei hi,’ cihna tawh tuanu tungah minsia a tut leh, 15 tua numei' nu leh a pa in a tanu uh' nungakna lim a kilatna puan lakhia-in upate kiang kongpi-ah paipih ding uhhi. 16 Numei' pa in upate kiangah, ‘Hih mipa tungah a zi dingin ka tanu ka pia a, amah in deih nawnlo a, 17 "Na tanu' sungah nungakna lim ka mu kei hi," cihna tawh a zumhuai-in amah mawhsak hi. Ahi zongin hihte pen ka tanu' nungakna a kilatna limte ahi hi,’ ci-in a puan lak ding hi. Amaute in khua upate mai-ah a puan phah ding uhhi. 18 Tua ciangin tua khua upate in tua mipa la-in sat ding uhhi. 19 Amaute in ngun shekel za khat liausak ding uh a, a numei' pa' tungah tuate pia ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh amah in Israel nungak tungah minsia tun' hi. Tua ciangin a numei pen ama zi mah hi ding a, a nuntak laiteng tuanu ma theilo ding hi. 20 "Ahih hangin a mawhsakna thumanin, numei sungah nungakna lim a kimuh kei takpi leh, 21 amaute in a pa' inn kongah a numei paipih ding uh a, ama khuapi pasalte in suang tawh amah denglum ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh amah in a pa' inn sungah paktat gamtatna tawh Israel sungah haina tun' hi. Tua bangin note' lak panin siatna na siangsak ding uhhi.

"Ahih hangin mi khat in a kidongsa nungak khat gamlakah tuakin, mipa in tuanu buanin a luppih leh, tua numei tawh a lum mipa bek kithat ding hi. 26 A numei' tungah bangmah na hih kei ding uhhi. Numei' tungah sihna ding mawhna omlo hi. Banghang hiam cihleh hih thu pen mi khat in a vengpa do-in a thah tawh kibang hi. 27 Hih mipa in gamlakah numei hih ahih manin, a kidongsa numei in huhna ngen dingin a kiko hangin amah a hon ding kuamah omlo hi. 28 "Mi khat in a kidong nailo nungak khat tuakin, tua numei buanin luppih a, amaute gel a kimuh leh, 29 numei tawh a lumpa in nungak' pa tungah ngun shekel sawmnga pia ding a, tua numei ama zi hi ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh amah in a numei va su khin hi. A nuntak laiteng tua numei ma theilo ding hi. 30 "Mi khat in a pa' zidangte ten'pihlo ding a, a pa-a' ahi numei tawh mawhlo ding hi.
"Mi khat in zi a neih tungin galkapte tawh kuankhialo ding a, nasep khat peuhpeuh zong kisawllo ding hi. A laksa a zi tawh a lungdam khawm dingin inn-ah kum khat sung maang ding hi.
Tua ciangin Kaleb in, "Kiriathsefer simin a lazopa tungah a zi dingin ka tanu Aksah ka pia ding hi," a ci hi.

vil un. Laamna-ah Shiloh nungakte a laam dingin hong pai uh leh, leenggui lote panin note in delhin mi khempeuh in na zi ding ciat uh Shiloh nungakte man unla, Benjamin gamah ciahpih un. 22 Amau' pate ahi a, a sanggampate uh ahi zongin a lungkimlohna uh kote' kiangah a gen dingin hong pai uh ciangin kote in amaute kiangah, ‘Kote tungah hehpihna tawh amaute hong pia un; banghang hiam cihleh mi khempeuh zi ding galsimna sungah ka ngahsakzo kei uh a, note zong a mawh na suahlohna dingun note in amaute tungah utna tawh na piaktawm uh ahi kei hi,’ ka ci ding uhhi," a ci uhhi. 23 Benjamin mite zong tua bangmahin gamta uh a, amau mi a phazah tawh kituakin a laamte lak panin a zi dingun a la uhhi. Tua ciangin amaute pai-in a gamhluahna uhah ciahkik uh a, khuapite lamkikin a sungah a teng uhhi.

Tua ciangin amah in, "En in, na sanggamnu a mipihte leh a pasian-te kiangah ciahkik khin hi. Na sanggamnu' nungah nang zong ciah in," a ci hi. 16 Ahih hangin Ruth in, "Nang kong nusiatna ding ahi a, nang zuihna panin ka ciahkikna ding ahi zongin hong cici nawn kei in; banghang hiam cihleh na paina-ah ka pai ding a, na giahna-ah ka giak ding hi. Na mite keima mite hi ding a, na Pasian keima Pasian hi ding hi. 17 Na sihna-ah si-in ka kivui ding hi. Sihna cih lohbuang thudang hangin kong nusiat taak leh { Topa } in kei hong dawm kei ta hen," a ci hi. 18 Tua ciangin Naomi in amah a zuih ding a lungsim a khentatna a muh ciangin bangmah ci nawnlo hi.
Tua ciangin Boaz in, "Naomi' tung panin a lo na lei ni-a kipanin, a site' gamh a site' beh sungah a kiptheihna dingin a sipa' zi Moab numei Ruth zong a lei na hi hi," a ci hi.

A site' min ama sanggamte leh a pian'na a khuasung panin a maiman'lohna dingin ama gamhluahna-ah a site' min a kizop theihna dingin a si khin Mahlon' zi, Moab numei Ruth zong ka zi dingin ka lei khin hi; note pen tuni-in teci na hi uhhi," a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Boaz in Ruth la-in ama zi a suak hi. Amah in a zi luppih a, { Topa } in tuanu gaisakin amah in tapa khat nei hi.

Israel mite khatlekhat kiho-in, "Hih hong paikhia mipa na mu ngei uhhiam? Israel-te a to dingin hong paito takpi hi. Amah a that mipa tungah kumpipa in sum tampi pia-in, ama tanu zong pia ding a, a pa' innkuante, Israel sungah aana nasep leh siah khempeuh kipengsak ding hi," a ci uhhi.

Tua ciangin Saul in David kiangah, "Hih lai-ah ka tanu uzaw Merab om hi. Nang tungah zi dingin kong pia ding hi. Kei-a' dingin hang peuh in la, { Topa' } gal do in," a ci hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Saul in, "Keima khutsungah amah siloin Filistia-te' khutsungah si hen," ci-in ngaihsun hi.

David' nasemte Karmel-a Abigail' kiang a tun' ciangin amaute in tuanu kiangah, "David in ama zi dingin a la dingin kote nang kiangah hong sawl hi," a ci uhhi. 41 Tua ciangin amah dingin lei-ah maikun a, "En un, na nasemnu uh ka topa' nasemte' khe a silsak ding nasem ahi hi," a ci hi. 42 Tua ciangin Abigail kinawhin dingin la tungah tuang a, ama nasem numei nga in amah a kem hi. David' kamtaite' nung zui-in pai a, tua ciangin ama zi a suak hi.
Tua ciangin David in Saul' tapa Ishbosheth kiangah kamtaite sawlin, "Filistia-te' vundawn za khatin ka leisa ka zi Mikhal hong pia in," a ci hi.

Tu-in Kumpi Solomon in gamdang numei tampi ngai hi. Faro' tanu, leh Moab mi, Ammon mi, Edom mi, Sidon mi, leh Hit numeite, 2 { Topa } in Israel mite tungah, "Amaute tawh na kiteng kei ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh amaute in amau' pasian' lamah na lungsim uh hong heikhia taktak ding uhhi," a cih minamte' lak pan lawm ngai a, Solomon in hih mite ngai-in pom hi. 3 Amah in kumpite' tanu vive zi za sagih, leh zineu za thum nei hi. A zite in ama lungsim heikhia uhhi. 4 Banghang hiam cihleh Solomon a teek ciangin a zite in pasian dangte' lamah ama lungsim heikhia uh a, ama pa David' lungsim bangin ama lungsim { Topa' } tungah thuman bup taktak zolo hi. 5 Banghang hiam cihleh Sidon mite' nusian Ashtoreth, leh Ammon mite-a' ahi a kihhuai Milkom, Solomon in bia hi. 6 Tua ahih ciangin { Topa' } muhna-ah Solomon a sia gamta a, a pa David bangin { Topa } zuibup lo hi.
Siampi Jehoiada' hunsung khempeuh { Topa' } mitah Joash a manin gamta hi. 3 Jehoiada in ama-a' dingin zi nih laksak a, amah in tapate leh tanute a nei hi.
Tua ciangin siampi Ezra dingto-in amaute kiangah, "Note in gamdang numeite zi-in la-in Israel mite' mawhna na behlap uhhi.
Tua ahih ciangin Solomon aw, nangma gamtatnate hong zui-in, gamdang numeite ten'pihna tawh hih siatna lian khempeuh gamta-in i Pasian tungah hong zuautat ding ka hi uhhiam?" ka cisak hi.

Tua ahih ciangin kumpipa' nasemte in ama kiangah, "Kumpipa-a' dingin a melhoih nungak khangnote zongsak in. 3 Kumpi khua ahi Susa khuapi-a numeite' omna-ah a melhoih nungak khangno khempeuh hong paipihna dingun na ukna gam tuamtuam khempeuhah uliante sawl in. Tua numeite pen numeite a uk, kumpipa' innsungmang Hegai' kep dingin ki-ap hen. Tua ciangin tua numeite tungah paknamtui tuamtuam kiguan' hen. 4 Tua sung panin kumpipa' deih bel nungak pen Vashti' tangin kumpinu suak hen," a ci uhhi. Kumpipa in hih ngaihsutna hoihsa a, tua bangin a gamta hi.

Ama uk a kum sagihna, kha sawmna ahi Tebeth kha sungin kumpi innsung Kumpi Ahasueras' kiangah Esther a kipaipih ciangin, 17 kumpipa in ama numei dangte khempeuh sangin itzaw a, a nungak dangte khempeuh sangin limbawl zaw hi. Tua hi a, kumpi lukhu amah khusakin Vashti' tangin kumpinu a suaksak hi. 18 Tua ciangin kumpipa in Esther pahtawina-in ama uliante leh a nasem khempeuh-a' dingin pawi lianpi khat a bawl hi. Amah in ama ukna gam khempeuhah tua ni nasep khawlin zum a khakna ding uh zong thu zasak kim a, kumpipa min tawh a kilawm a kituak letsongte zong a hawmkhia hi.

Na zi' tungah citak in la, amah bek itin nei in. 16 Pasal dang tawh va vakzau-in kongzing lakah va mawhkha ding hi. 17 Na zi pen nangma-a' ding bek hi a, midangte tawh na neihkhawm ding hilo hi. 18 Tua ahih ciangin na zi tawh lungkim in la, na ten'pih numei tawh lungdam in. 19 A ithuai a ngaihbaangin ngaihsun tawntung in la, ama ngaihbaan'na tawh lungdamin, ama hong itna tawh lungkim in.

mi' zi tawh na mawhlohna dingin nang hong kemin, kam khum zangin a hong zol numei ginalote kiang panin nang hong hu ding hi. 25 Amau' melhoihna iplahkha kei in la, amau' hong zawlmitna khenglahkha kei in. 26 Banghang hiam cihleh anlum khat tawh numei paktat khat kingahzo a, ahi zongin numei tawh mawhna in nuntakna bup siasak hi.
Zi hoih pen a pasal' minthan'na leh lungdamna hi a, a pasal a maizumsak zi pen a pasal-a' dingin a dam theilo guhnatna tawh kibang hi.
Zi a muzote na hoih a mu hi a, { Topa' } maipha a ngah a hihi.
Inn leh neihsate pen pate' tung panin a kiluah hi a, zi pil ahih leh { Topa } bek in hong pia thei hi.
A phun hat zi gilo tawh ten'khop sangin gam simthamah khat guak tangten' hoihzaw hi.
A hehbaih mite tawh kipawl kei unla, a lungtom mite tawh kikhawl kei un.
Na nuntakna ding zong masa in la, na an nek ding a kicin' ciang bekin na inn ding lamin zi leh ta nei pan in.
Phun bek a thei zi tawh innsungah ten'khop sangin innkhumzang kiu khatah tangten' hoihzaw tham hi.
A citaklo zi hih bangin gamta hi: Midang tawh khialin tua ciangin kisilsiang a, "Khialhna bangmah gamta kei ing," ci khem hi.
Zi hoih pen suangmanpha sangin manphazaw pek a, ahi zongin zi hoih ngah ding haksa mahmah hi.

Ngaihbaan'na pen zuaupi hithei a, melhoihna zong maimang thei hi. Ahi zongin { Topa } a zahtak numei a phattaak a hihi. 31 A sepna khempeuh hangin amah phat un. Mi khempeuh in a zahtak dingin a kilawm a hihi.
Pasian in hih leitungah nang a hong piak, tomkha sung na nuntak laiteng, na it na zi tawh a nuam theithei-in om in. Leitung lungkhamna sungah na lawhtak, tua bek mah hi khading hi.

Jerusalem nungakte aw, ko' kingaihna nong suknawi lohna dingun kei tungah hong kiciam un. 5 Gamlak panin a lawmpa tawh khut kilensa-in a hong paikhia kua ahi hiam? Nangmah na pian'na mun, na nu in hong neihna mun, epel kung nuai panin nang kong phong hi. 6 Kei simloh kuamah ngai kei in la, kei simloh kuamah kawi kei in. Itna zong sihna zahin thahat a, ngaihna zong sihna zahin khauh hi. Itna, mei bangin kuangkhia a, meikuang lianpen a suak hi. 7 Tui tampi nangawn tawh kisumit zolo a, tui sungah i phumcip hangin mitzo tuanlo hi. Mi khat in a neihsa sum khempeuh tawh itna a lei dingin hong kithawi leh kinuihsan lel ding hi. 8 Sanggam numeino khat ka nei uh a, a nawite neu mahmah hi. Tangval khat in hong hel zenzen leh ka sanggamnu uh bangci huh ding ka hi uhhiam?

Tua ni ciangin nupi sagih in papi khat neikhawm ding uh a, "Kote in komau' an ciat ne-in, komau' puan ciat mah ka silh ding uhhi. Kote pen, nangma zi cih min bek hong puasak in; ka minsiatna teng uh hong hum in," ci ding uhhi.

Banghang hiam cihleh nangmah hong Bawlpa pen nang-a' dingin na pasal bang hi ding a, ama min pen Vanglian { Topa } a hihi. Israel-te' Siangtho Pa pen nang hong honkhiapa hi a, amah pen leitung buppi' Pasian a kici hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh tangval in nungak khat a ten'pih mah bangin nang hong lampa in nang hong ten'pih ding a, zipipa mothaknu tungah a lungdam mah bangin nang tungah na Pasian lungdam ding hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh Vanglian { Topa, } Israel mite' Pasian in hih bangin kong ci hi: En un, hih mun panin note' muh teekteekin, note' theih hunsung mahin gualnopna, lungdamna awte leh zinei thakte, pasalnei thakte' awte ka gingsak nawn kei ding hi.
Zi pi unla tanu tapa nei un. Na tapate-a' ding mo la unla, na tanute uh mo kha un; tua hi leh amau in zong tanu tapa hong nei ding uhhi. Kiam kei unla, pungzaw un.

"Nang kong muhkhak kik ciangin pasal nei thei ding hun na hita hi. Na pum guakin a om kimlai, ka puan tawh kong khuh a, na zumhuainateng hong seelsakin, ten'pih dingin kam kong ciam hi. Kong kamciamna tangtung sakin nang pen keima-a' nong suak hi, Topa { Pasian } in ci hi.

{ Topa } in Hosea tung tawnin Israel-te tungah thu a na gencil lai-in, amah in Hosea kiangah, "Hih gammite kei tungah citakloin pasian dangte bia uh ahih manin, nang zong hong tulpihlo ding numei paktat khat ten'pih in la, tuanu tawh ta nei in," a ci hi.

Israel aw, nang, zi-in kong neikik ding a, nang tungah thuman thutangin kong gamta kik ding hi. Nang hong itin kong hehpih tawntung ding a, keima-a' na hi tawntung ding hi. 20 Kei-a' ahi tawntung dingin nang kong la ding hi. Tua ciangin { Topa } ka hih lamtak nong thei ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin ngun shekel sawmlenga leh mangbuhham seu sawmlenga tawh zi lei-in

Judah mite citakloin, Pasian tungah a thuciamna uh palsat uh a, Israel mite' lak leh Jerusalem khuasungah siatna tampi gamta uhhi. { Topa } in a it mahmah biakinn ninsak uhhi. { Topa } a hilo, pasian dang a bia numeite, zi-in la-in a ten'pih uhhi. 12 Hih bangin a gamta mi peuhmah, a kua a kua hita leh, { Topa } in sugawp hen la, Vanglian { Topa } tungah biakna a paipih ei minamte tawh hong kigawmsak nawn kei hen. 13 Note' gamtatna adang khat omlai hi. Tua pen, note' paipih biaknate hong sang nawnlo ahih manin { Topa' } biakna tau, khitui tawh na kawtsak uh a, kapin thumin na om uhhi. 14 Banghangin hong sanglo hiam, na ci uhhi. Na khangnolai uha na ten'pih na zite uh tungah na cihtaklohna uh amah in hong thei a, na zite uh tungah na cihtak tawntungna ding uh Pasian tungah thu ciamin, na zite uh zong na lawmnu mah uhhinapi-in amaute tawh na thuciamna uh na pelhna hang uh a hihi. 15 Pasian in na zite uh tawh pumkhat, lungsim khat ahi dingin hong bawl hilo ahi hiam? Hih bangin a hong bawlna pen bang a deihna ahi hiam? Pasian' mi taktak ahi ding tate i neih theihna ding a hihi. Tua ahih manin na khangno lai-un na ten'pih na zi uh tawh na thuciamna uh na palsatkhak lohna dingun kidawm un. 16 Vanglian { Topa } in hih bangin ci hi: "Zi makna ka deih kei a, mi khatpeuh in a khangno lai-a a ten'pih a zi tungah tua bang gitlohna a gamtatna ka mudah hi. Tua ahih ciangin hoihtakin kidawm unla, a citak dingin na zite uh tungah na thuciamna uh palsat kei un," ci hi, a ci hi.

Ahi zongin ke'n note kiangah kong genin-ah: Mi khat peuhmah in pasal dang tawh a mawhna hang lobuang, a zi a mak peuhmah a, a zi in pasal a neihkik leh mi tawh a mawh dingin a bawl a suak hi. Tua a kima numei a ten'pihte, numei tawh a mawh mah a hihi.

Zeisu in, "Laisiangtho sungah, ‘A kipat cilin a Piangsakpa in numei leh pasal a bawl hi,’ ci hi. 5 Tua ciangin, ‘Hih thu hangin pasal in a nu leh a pa nusia-in a zi tawh kigawm ding a, amaute gel pumkhat a bang ding uhhi,’ ci-in na kigelh hi. 6 Tua ahih manin amaute nih hi nawnloin khat ahi ta uhhi. Tua ahih manin Pasian in a gawmsa mite, kuamah in khen kei ta hen," ci-in a dawng hi.
Note kiangah kong genin-ah: Mi khatpeuh in midang tawh a zi a mawhna lobuang, a zi a mak a, numei dang tawh a ten' leh numei tunga mawh ahi hi," ci-in a dawng hi.
Ama kiangah, ‘Lawm aw, mo pawi siimna puan silhlopi-in hih lai-ah hong bangci luttheih na hi hiam?’ a cih ciangin tua mipa in a cihna ding a thei kei hi.
"Sia aw, Moses in, ‘Mi khat ta neiloin a sih leh tua a si mipa' khang a kizop theihna dingin a naupa in a u' zi luah ta hen,’ ci hi.

Tua unau pasal sagihte a sih khit ciangin a numei zong a si hi. 28 Tua ahih manin tua unau pasal sagihte in tuanu ten'pihkim uh ahih manin, thawhkik hun ciangin a koi pen' zi hi ding ahi hiam?" ci-in a dong uhhi. 29 Ahi zongin Zeisu in, "Note in Laisiangtho thu ahi a, Pasian' vangliatna ahi zongin theilo na hih manun na ngaihsunkhial uhhi. 30 Banghang hiam cihleh misite a thawhkik uh ciangin vantungah a om vantung mite tawh kibang ding uh a, zinei pasalnei cih omlo ding hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh Herod in a nau Philip' zi Herodias a ten'pihna hangin Johan in Herod kiangah, "Na naupa' zi na ten'pih ding ngeina hilo hi," ci-in gen zelzel ahih manin Herodias a heh suak a, galkapte in Johan manin thong sungah a khiatna dingin Herod a vaihawmsak hi.

Ahi zongin pian'cil lai-in, ‘Pasian in numei leh pasal a bawl hi. 7 Tua ahih manin pasal in a nu leh a pa nusia-in a zi tawh kigawm ding a, 8 amau nihte pen pumkhat bang ahi ding uhhi,’ na kici hi. Tua ahih manin amaute nih hi nawnloin khat hita uhhi. 9 Tua ahih manin Pasian' gawmsa mite, kuamah in khen kei ta hen," a ci hi. 10 Innsungah a tumkhit uh ciangin nungzuite in hih thu tawh kisai Zeisu kiangah a dongkik uhhi. 11 Amah in, "A zi ma-a numei dang tawh a teng mi peuhmah a zi a palhngulh a hihi. 12 A pasal ma-a pasal dang tawh a teng mi peuhmah in zong a pasal a palhngulh ahi hi," a ci hi.

A nau in a upa' zi luah hi; amah zong ta neiloin si leuleu hi. A thumnapa, 22 leh adangte khempeuh, a sagihna dong in tuanu ten'pih uh a, ta neilo vive mahin a si uhhi. A tawpna ciangin tua numei zong a si hi. 23 Tua ahih leh, hih unau pasal sagihte in hihnu ten'pih kim ciat uh ahih manin, mi khempeuh a thawhkik ni ciangin a kua pen' zi hi ding ahi hiam?" ci-in a dong uhhi. 24 Zeisu in, "Na khial mahmah uhhi. Laisiangtho ahi a, Pasian' vangliatna ahi zongin na theihlohna hang uh a hihi. 25 Sihna panin mite a thawhkik ciangin vantungah a om vantung mite mah bangin zinei pasalnei cih omlo ding uhhi.

Joseph zong David' suante khat ahih manin Galilee gamsung Nazareth khua panin David' suahna khua ahi Judea gam Bethlehem khua-ah a pai hi. 5 Tua bangin min sazian kikhumsak dingin a pai ciangin ten'pih dingin zuthawl a piaksa a lawmnu Mary tawh a paikhawm uhhi. A lawmnu naupaii hi a,
"Pasal khat in a zi ma-in numei dang a ten'pih leh tua numei tawh a mawh hi a, a kima numei a ten'pih pasal zong numei tawh a mawh mah a hihi.
"Sia aw, Moses in eite-a' dingin ngeina khat hong koihsak a, ‘Mi khat in ta neiloin a zi a sihsan leh, tua a sipa' khang a kizop theihna dingin a naupa in tua meigongnu ten'pih ta hen,’ ci hi.

Gentehna-in, pasal nei numei khat pen a pasal a nuntak sungteng bek, tua thukham in a pasal tawh lencip hi. Ahi zongin a pasal a sih ciangin tua a pasal tawh a lencip thukham panin a suakta hi. 3 Tua ahih manin a pasal a nuntak hun sungin pasal dang tawh a lupkhawm leh mi tawh a mawh kici hi. Ahi zongin a pasal a si hi leh thukham tawh kisai-in a suakta hi a, pasal dang a ten'pih hangin mi tawh a mawh hilo hi.
Na ki-itnate uh lungsim takpi tawh hi sak unla, a siate mudahin a hoihte lenkip un.

Numei paktat tawh a pumpi a kizomsakpa pen tua numei tawh pumkhat sakhat a suak ahih lamtak theilo na hi uhhiam? Banghang hiam cihleh Laisiangtho in, "Tua mi nihte pumkhat a suak ding uhhi," na ci hi.

Tu-in nong laigelhna uh thu tawh kisai-in: Pasal in zi nei kei leh hoihzaw loding ahi hiam, na ci uhhi. 2 Ahi zongin numei tawh paktatna tamlua ahih manin pasal in ama zi tuam nei hen la, numei in ama pasal tuam nei leh hoih hi. 3 Pasal in a zi a luppih dingin a kilawm zahin luppih ding a, a zi in zong a pasal a luppih dingin a kilawm zahin a luppih ding a hihi. 4 Zi in ama pumpi a ut bangin zangthei nawnloin a pasal' zat ding hi a, tua mah bangin a pasal in zong ama pumpi a ut bangin zangthei nawnloin a zi' zat ding a hihi. 5 Thungetna-in hun na zattheihna dingun tawlkhat sung tuam om ding thukim khawm masa lopi-in lupkhop ding kinialkha kei un. Tua bangin tawlkhat sung na tuam om khit uh ciangin note' pumpi' deihna hangin Satan' ze-etna sungah na pukkhak lohna dingun a ngeina bangin lupkhawm ding kipan kik un.
Pasal nei nailote leh meigongte pen keimah bangin tanggawl om paisuak le uh hoih ka sa hi.

A neisate tungah, kei' ngaihsutna hilo, Topa' ngaihsutna ka gennop thu in: Zi in a pasal ciahsan kei ta hen. 11 A ciahsan leh zong pasal neiloin om paisuak hen. A om paisuakzawh kei leh a pasal ngei mah zuankik hen. Pasal in a zi ma kei ta hen. 12 Adangte tungah, Topa' cih hilo, keima ngaihsutna ka gennop thu in: Mi khatpeuh in thu umlo mi khat zi-in a neih leh, pasal mahin neihding a zi a lungkim ahih nak leh ma kei ta hen. 13 Numei khat in thu umlo mi khat pasalin a neih leh, zi mahin neihding a pasal a lungkim ahih nak leh ma tuan kei ta hen. 14 Banghang hiam cihleh thu umlo pasal pen a zi' hangin thu um mi suakthei ding a, thu umlo zi pen a pasal' hangin thu um mi suakthei ding hi. Tua bang hi leh a tate uh thu um mi suakthei ding uhhi. Ahi zongin tua bang hi kei le uh a tate uh thu um mi suaktheilo ding uhhi. 15 Ahi zongin thu umlo zi in ahi a, thu umlo pasal in ahi zongin kikhen ding a ut leh kikhen ta uh hen. Tua bang thute-ah thu um zi ahi a, thu um pasal ahi zongin a awkna ding thu omlo hi. Pasian in nuamtakin a nungta dingin a hong sap a hihi. 16 Thu um zi in, "Ka pasal honkhiazo kei ning," bangci-in cithei ding a, thu um pasal in, "Ka zi honkhiazo kei ning," bangci-in cithei zenzen ding ahi hiam?

Tu-in a nungak lai a tangval laite thu tawh kisai-in: Topa kiang panin thu ngahna ka neihloh hangin Topa' hehpihna tawh a muan'taak ahi keima ngaihsutna ka hong gen ding hi. 26 Tu laitakin a om bangun om paisuak leh hoihzaw ding hi, cihna thu tawh kisai-in, tu laitak a lungkhamhuai thu ka ngaihsut ciangin tu laitakin a om bangun om paisuak leh hoihzaw mah dingin ka ngaihsun hi. 27 Ahi zongin zineite in kikhen ding ngaihsutin nei kei ta hen. Nungak lai tangval laite in lawm zong kei ta hen. 28 Ahi zongin pasal in zi a neih hangin a khial hilo a, numei in zong pasal a neih hangin a khial hilo hi. Ahi zongin zinei, pasalneite in leitung lungkhamna tampi thuak uh ahih manin tuate tawh kipelhzaw le uh hoih ka sa hi. 29 Sanggamte aw, tua bang ka cih ciangin a kiseh hun hong nai mahmah ta hi, ka cihnopna a hihi. Tua ahih manin zineite pen zineilo mah bangin kingaihsun uh hen la, 30 a dahte pen a dahlo mah bangin kingaihsun uh hen la, a lungdamte pen a lungdamlo mah bangin kingaihsun uh hen la, na a leite pen bangmah a neilo mah bangin kingaihsun uh hen la, 31 leitung na nuamtakin a zangte pen a zanglo mah bangin kingaihsun ta uh hen. Banghang hiam cihleh hih leitung pen sauveipi kip nawnlo ding hi. 32 Note, lunghihmawhna tawh na kipelhding uh ka hong deihsak hi. Zi a neilote in Topa a lungdamsak theihna dingun Topa' thu bek kinin nei uhhi. 33 Ahi zongin zineite in a zi a lungdamsak theihna dingun hih leitung vai kinin nei uh a, 34 a ngaihsutna uh khen nih pha hi. Pasal a neilo numeite in a lungsim leh a pumpi uh Topa-a' dingin zangnuam uh ahih manin Topa' nasep bek kinin nei uhhi. Ahi zongin pasal a nei numeite in a pasal uh a lungdamsak theihna dingun hih leitung vai kinin nei uhhi. 35 Hih bangin ka hong gen ciangin note' haksatna ding deihna hiloin note' hoihna ding ka deihna a hihi. Note a kilawm a kituakin gamta-in, lungsim leh thatang siit neiloin Topa' na na septheihna ding uh ka hong deihsakna a hihi. 36 Ten'pih dingin lawm dongkhin napi-in kiten' nawnlohding a ngaihsunte' thu panin: Ten'pih kei leng a numei tungah a thumanlo hi ding cihna ahi a, zi a deihna lungsim a lianlua ahi a, ten'pihding mah hoih hi, ci-in ngaihsutna ahi zongin a neih leh a lungkimna bangun gamta-in ten'pih uh hen. Tua thu-ah bangmah khialhna omlo hi. 37 Ahi zongin kuama sawl hiloin zi neilo dingin a lungsimah khauhtakin khentatin, a lungsim ki-ukzo taktakin a ngaihsutsa ahih nak leh a neihloh hangin phamawhlo hi. 38 Tua ahih manin a neite zong hoih a, a neiloin a kikem zote hoihzaw lai hi. 39 Pasal nei numei pen a pasal a nuntak laiteng suaktalo hi. A pasal a sih leh a deih peuhpeuh tawh kitengthei ding a, ahi zongin thu um mi bek ten'pih ding hi. 40 Ahi zongin keima ngaihsutna-ah pasal a neihse sangin tuaci om leh lungdamzaw dingin ka um a, Pasian' Khasiangtho' ngaihsutna mah zong hi-in ka um hi.
Sawltak dangte, Topa' naute, leh Peter mah bangin ka khualzinna-ah thu um mi ka zi a tonpih theiding ka hihi.
Ahi zongin na theihding uh ka deih thu in: Mi khempeuh' lutang pen Christ hi a, numei' lutang pen pasal hi a, Christ' lutang pen Pasian ahihna thu a hihi.

Numei hangin pasal a kipiangsak hilo a, pasal hangin numei a kipiangsak hizaw hi. 10 Tua ahih ciangin a pasalte uh ukna nuai-ah a om ahihna a lahna dingun vantung mite' muhna-ah numeite in a lu uh a khuhding uh kilawm hi. 11 Ahi zongin Topa thu sunga i nuntakna-ah numeite pen pasal tawh loin a tangdin'zo hilo a, pasalte zong numei tawh koploin a tangdin'zo hi tuanlo hi. 12 Banghang hiam cihleh numei pen pasal tung panin a kipiangsak hi a, pasal pen numei sung panin a suak a hihi. Tua hi a, na khempeuh, Pasian kiang panin a hong pai a hihi.
Pasian in hong aam mahmah bangin note ka hong aam mahmah hi. Nungak leh tangval nupa dingin a kigawm mah bangin khat bek ahi Christ tawh a kigawm dingin nungak siangtho bang na hi uhhi.

Zite aw, Topa' thu na man' uh mah bangin na pasalte uh thu na mang un. 23 Banghang hiam cihleh Christ pen ama pumpi ahi pawlpi a honkhiapa hi-in, pawlpi tungah ukna thu a neih mah bangin pasal in a zi tungah ukna thu a nei a hihi. 24 Pawlpi pen Christ' khutnuai ahih mah bangin zite zong thu khempeuhah a pasalte uh khutnuai hi ding uhhi. 25 Pasalte aw, Christ in pawlpi itin a pumpi a piak mah bangin na zite uh na it un.
Tua mah bangin pasalte in zong amau pumpi zah mah bangin a zite uh a it ding uh a hihi. A zi a it mi pen amah a ki-it mi a hihi.

Tua ahih manin Laisiangtho in, "Hih thu hangin pasal in a nu leh a pa nusia-in a zi tawh kigawm ding a, amaute gel khat a suak ding uhhi," na ci hi. 32 Pasalte in amau pumpi zahin a zite uh itin, zite in zong amau pumpi zah mahin a pasalte uh a it ding uh ahih mah bangin, Laisiangtho in hih bangin a gen ciangin a thukzaw khat, Christ leh pawlpi a ki-itna a gennopna ahi hi, ci-in ka ngaihsun hi.
Zite aw, Christian te gamtat dingin a kilawm ahih mah bangin na pasalte uh thu na mang un. 19 Pasalte aw, na zite uh it unla, amaute tungah ngongtat kei un.
Ahi zongin numei in a kilawm a kituakin upna, itna leh siangthona thu-ah kiptakin a om nak leh nausuah gimna sihpihlo ding hi.
Tua ahih manin siate pen paubaan'na a neilo mi, zi khat bek a nei mi, lungsim hoih hithiat mi, thu a ngaihsun thei mi, a kilawm a kituakin a gamta mi, zin leh leengla do a siam mi, thuhilh a siam mi,
Upate pen zi khat bek a nei mi, a tate leh a innkuansung hoihtakin a ukzote hi ding hi.

Tua bang mite in zi neih leh pasal neih ding, leh an pawlkhat nek ding hoihlo hi, ci uhhi. Ahi zongin thu umin, thuman thutak a thei mite in lungdamna ko-in a nek dingin Pasian in tua ante a bawl a hihi.
Mi khatpeuh in a beh a phung, a diakdiakin a innkuansung mite a vak nop kei leh a upna a nusia hita a, thu umlo mite sangin siazaw lai hi.
Tua ahih manin a khangno lai meigong numeite in pasal nei-in, ta nei-in, amau innkuansung ukin, i langte' hong gensiatna ding a omlohna ding ka deihzaw hi.

amaute sangin a nauzaw nupite in a pasalte uh leh a tate uh a itna dingun a hilh ding, 5 thu ngaihsun thei, a gamtat siangtho, inn nasep a kizen, a migi, leh a pasalte uh thu a mang thei mi ahihna dingun na gen in.

Sarah a ta neihtheih ding hun beikhin napi-in ama tungah thuciampa zuaulo ding, ci-in Abraham in upna a neihna hang mahin Sarah gai-in ta a nei a hihi. 12 A cimang khinin a kingaihsun hih mi khat' suanlekhakte pen vana aksi zah leh tuipi gei-a sehnel zahin a tam hi.

Mi khempeuh in nupa thu thupi ngaihsut uh hen la, zite pen pasalte tungah citakin, pasalte zong a zite uh tungah citak uh hen. Pasian in a thangtat mite leh nulepa mawhna a gamta mite tungah thu khen ding hi.

Tua mah bangin zite aw, na pasalte uh Pasian thu umlo ahihkhak leh na gamtatna hangun Pasian thu a uptheihna dingun na pasalte uh thu na mang un. Kampau kul sese loin, 2 na gamtat hoihna uh a muh uh ciangin Pasian thu hong um ding uhhi. 3 Na hoihna dingun puatham kizepna ahi sambawlna, kham leh suangmanpha tawh kizepna, puan hoihnono silhnate na bulphuh kei unla, 4 Pasian' muhna-ah a manpha mahmah ahi lungsim puakzia, a tul theilo sunglam hoihna na bulphuh zaw un. 5 A beisa hunah Pasian muangin thu um numeite in a pasalte uh thu mangin, tu-a bang danin a hoihna dingun a kibawl uhhi. 6 Sarah zong tu-a bangmahin gamta a, a pasal Abraham' thu mangin, "Topa aw," a ci hi. Note zong a hoihin gamta-in, bangmah launa neiloin na om nak uh leh tu-in Sarah' tanute na hita uhhi. 7 Tua mah bangin pasalte aw, note sangin na zite uh a thahatlo zawdeuh ahihna thu na phawk un. Note mah bangin Pasian' piak nuntakna a ngahte ahih uh manin na zite uh zahtak bawl un. Tua hi leh na thungetna uh bangmah in hong nawngkaisak lo ding hi.

Tuuno' zineih ding hun hong tungta a, a Lawmnu a kithawisa-in omkhin ahih manin lungdam kipakin amah phat ni. 8 Puan hoih mahmah, siangin a pak mahmahte, ama silh dingin kipia hi," a ci uhhi. Tua puan hoih pen Pasian' mi siangthote' gamtatna mante a hihi. 9 Tua ciangin vantung mi in keima kiangah, "Hih thu gelh in: Tuuno' zineihna pawi-ah a kisam mite a hampha mahmah ahi hi," hong cihkhit ciangin, "Hihte pen Pasian' gen taktak kammal ahi hi," hong cithuah lai hi.

Tua ciangin gimna nunung sagihte a dimin a om hai sagih a tawi vantung mi sagihte sung panin khat kei kiangah hong pai-in thu hong gen a, "Hong pai in; Tuuno zi, a Mothak ka hong lak ding hi," hong ci hi.
vil un. Laamna-ah Shiloh nungakte a laam dingin hong pai uh leh, leenggui lote panin note in delhin mi khempeuh in na zi ding ciat uh Shiloh nungakte man unla, Benjamin gamah ciahpih un.
Kumpipa' inn-ah a tun' ciangun lungdamna leh nuamna tawh amaute kitumpih hi.
"Biakpiakna tawh, kei tungah thuciamna a bawlte, ka mi citakte ka kiangah hong khawm un," a ci hi.
Theite zong min ta a, leenggah pak gim namtui zong kiza ta hi. Hong pai in, ngaihno aw, hong zui in, itluat aw.

Tua ciangin khapi mial ding a, ni taang nawnlo ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Vanglian { Topa } in Zion Mual tung leh Jerusalem khuasungah uk ding a, ama upate' mai-ah ama minthan'na vang kilangsak ding hi.

Thuman mipa si a, kuamah in tua thu ngaihsutin nei nawnlo hi. Kuamah in a theihloh kalin thutak mite si uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh tuahsiatna panin thuman mipa kilakhia a, nopsakna sungah amah tum hi.
Tua huna kipan Zeisu in thuhilh ding kipan a, "Vantung ki-ukna hong naita ahih manin kisikin na omzia uh kheel un," ci-in thu a hilh hi.
Khua khatah note hong kibawlsiat leh khuadang khatah tai un. Note kiangah kong genin-ah: Israel khua khempeuh na khit ma-un Mihing Tapa hong pai ding hi.

Anlak hun mateng a nam nihin tuaci om phot hen. Anlak hun ciangin an late kiangah, "Tahumte bot masa unla, meikhukah khul dingin lomhen un. Ahi zongin taangte la-in ka ansalah hong sung un," ka ci ding hi,’ ci hi," a ci hi.
tahum tang a vawh galpa pen Dawimangpa a hihi. Anlak hun pen leitung beina ding hun hi a, anla nasemte pen vantung mite a hihi.
Ahi zongin a ni leh a nai hun ding pen kuamah in theilo hi. Vantungah a om vantung mite ahi a, Tapa nangawn in ahi zongin theilo a, Pa Pasian bek in thei hi.

Tua hun laitakin lo a kuankhawm mi nih, khat kila-in khat kinusia ding hi. 41 An a sukhawm numei nih, khat kila-in khat kinusia ding hi. 42 Tua ahih ciangin bang hunin na Topa uh hong pai ding cih theilo na hih manun na pilvang un.

"Tua hun ciangin vantung ki-ukna zia pen zinei thakpa a uap dingin a meivak uh tawh a pai nungak sawmte tawh kibang ding hi. 2 Nungak sawmte sung panin nga pil uh a, nga hai uhhi. 3 Tua a haite in a meivak sung uhah a tui thunthuah lopi-in pai uh a, 4 ahi zongin a pil nungak ngate in a dimtakin thunin a pai uhhi. 5 Zineipa hong tunghak ahih manin a vekpi-un lusu-in a ihmu uhhi.
"Ahi zongin tua ni leh tua nai hun ding kuamah in theilo hi. Vantunga om vantung mite ahi a, Tapa ahi keimah in ahi zongin ka thei kei a, ka Pa bek in a thei hi.

Ahi zongin na phawk ding uh thu khat om hi. Mi khat in gutapa' hong paiding hun theikhol leh a inn luhsaklo ding hi. 40 Tua mah bangin Mihing Tapa zong na upmawhloh uh hun laitakin hong pai ding ahih manin note zong a kigingsa-in om tawntung un," a ci hi.
Noah hunin uplohpi-in tuiciin a tun' bangin Mihing Tapa zong uploh hun khatin hong tung ding hi.

Ke'n kong cihin-ah, tuahun laitakin zanin lupna tungah a lumkhawm mi nih sung panin khat kila-in khat kinusia ding hi. 35 An a sukhawm numei nih, khat kila-in khat kinusia ding hi. 36 Lo a kuankhawm mi nih, khat kila-in khat kinusia ding hi," a ci hi. 37 Tua ciangin a nungzuite in Zeisu kiangah, "Topa aw, koi laitakah tua thute hong piang ding ahi hiam?" ci-in a dot uh ciangin Zeisu in, "Sapul omna peuhah musane a om mah bangin mi omna peuhah hong piang ding hi," ci-in a dawng hi.

A sun a zanin ama tungah a thumthum ama mite' thu a manin Pasian in khensaklo ding ahi hiam? Amaute a huhding kizekaisak ding ahi hiam? 8 Ke'n kong cihin-ah, amaute' thu a manin manlang takin khensak ding hi. Ahi zongin Mihing Tapa hong pai ciangin leitungah amah a um mi a mu ding hiam?" ci-in a genthuah hi.

"Limtakin kidawm un. Thakhat thu-in tua Ni hong tung khading ahih manin zune anne leh leitung nuntakna lunghimawhin thamang kei un. 35 Theihkholh lohin thang kisai bangin leitung mi khempeuh tungah hih thu hong piangvat ding hi. 36 Hih thupiang khempeuh thuakzawhna ding thahatna na neihna ding uh, leh Mihing Tapa mai-ah na din'theihna dingun a tawntungin thu ngenin vil niloh un," a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, "Tu-a thupiang khempeuh pen note tawh kong omkhawm lai-a ka gengen thute mah a hihi. Moses Thukham laibu sung, kamsangte laibu sung, leh late sungah a kigelh thu khempeuh a tung ding ahi hi," a ci hi. 45 Tua ciangin Laisiangtho sung thu a theihna dingun a lungsim uh hon'sak a,

Tua ciangin Zeisu in a nungzuite kiangah, "Note lunghimawh kei un. Pasian um unla, kei zong hong um un. 2 Note' omna ding mun a bawlkhol dingin a pai ding ka hihi. Ka Pa' innsungah omna ding mun tampi om hi. A omlo ding hi leh hih bangin thu ka hong gen kei ding hi. 3 Kei va pai-in note' omna ding mun ka va bawlkholh khit ciangin keima omna munah note na hong om theihna dingun note a hong la dingin ka hong paikik ding hi.
Zeisu in, "Ka Pa in ama thu tawh a sehsa hun leh nite, cik ciangin hong tungding cih thu note' theihding thu hilo hi.

Hih thu a genkhit ciangin amaute' muhtangpi mahin vanah Zeisu kilato a, meiipi in liah ahih manin amah mu thei nawnlo uhhi. 10 Tua bangin Zeisu a kilaktoh ciangin amaute in vantung lam enenin a om laitakun amaute kiangah puanpak a silh mi nih hong dingvat a, 11 "Galilee mite aw, Banghangin vantung lam enin ding niloh na hi uhhiam? Note kiang panin vantungah a kilato hih Zeisu pen, vantungah a paitoh na muh uh bang teekteek mahin khatvei hong paisuk kik ding hi," a ci uhhi.

Tua ahih ciangin ka hong it sanggamte aw, note tawh ka hong omkhawm lai-in ka thu na hong man' tawntung uh mah bangin, tu-in note tawh ka hong omkhawm loh hun ciangin zong ka thu na hong man' ding uh thupizaw lai hi. Pasian kihtakna leh zahtakna tawh na ma uh nawt unla, amah in note hong hotkhiatna thu a cingtaak suaksak un.

Ahi zongin eite ihih leh vantung gam mite ihi a, vantung panin a hong pai ding Topa Zeisu Christ, eite' Honpa, lawptakin a ngakte ihi hi. 21 Amah in na khempeuh ama khutnuai-ah koihna-in a zat vangliatna mah tawh a ginalo i leitung pumpi pen ama-a' mah bangin a minthang pumpi tawh hong kheelsak ding hi.

Note kiangah ka hong pai lai-un kote na hong limbawlna thu uh, leh a nungta a man Pasian' thu zui-in a bia ding,10leh a hong tungding Pasian' hehna panin eite a hong honkhia, sihna panin Pasian in a thawhsakkik a Tapa Zeisu, van panin a hong paiding ngak dingin milim paisanin Pasian' lamah na kiheina uh thute mi khempeuh in gen belin a nei uhhi.
Tua hi leh i Topa Zeisu a mi siangthote khempeuh tawh hong pai ciangin eite' Pa ahi Pasian' mai-ah kisuan'na om hetloin lungsim siangtho takin na om thei ding uhhi.

Ahi zongin sanggamte aw, hih thu hong pian'ding hun tawh kisai kong gelh ding uh kisamlo hi. 2 Banghang hiam cihleh Topa hong pai ding Ni pen zan-a gutate bangin theihkholh lohin hong tung ding hi, ci-in note in teltakin na theihsa uh a hihi. 3 Mite in, "Thu khempeuh a hoih laitak hi a, bangmah patauhna ding omlo hi," a cih laitakin thakhatthu-in amaute tungah siatna hong tungvat ding hi. Nausuah natna bangin gimna thuak ding uh a, kuamah suaktalo ding uhhi.

Nopsakna a hong pia Pasian in na khempeuhah siangthona leh kicin'na hong pia hen la, na kha uh, na nuntakna uh, leh na pumpi uh hoihtakin hong kem hen la, i Topa Zeisu Christ hong pai ciangin mawhna khat zong a nei hetlo dingin hong bawl ta hen.

Sanggamte aw, i Topa Zeisu Christ hong paina ding thu leh amah a dawn dingin eite i kikhopna ding thu tawh kisai-in note kiangah kong thum nopna uh panin: 2 Topa' hong paiding ni hong tung khinta hi, ci-a thu kigenna hangin lunghimawhin lungmangin om kei un. Thuhilh khat peuhpeuh in hih bang thu hong genkha thei ding a, tua thu pen kote' gen leh gelh hi, ci-in zong genkha ding uhhi. 3 Ahi zongin kuama khemsa-in ta kei un. Banghang hiam cihleh nakpi takin Pasian langpan'na lianpi leh hell khuksung a tungding ahi A Gilopa hong kilat matengin tua Ni hong tunglo ding hi.
I Topa Zeisu hong kilatkik Ni dongin paubaan'na leh mawhsakna om hetloin nang hong kipia thute na zui in.

Kidemna-ah ka hat tawpin ka hih khin a, a mong dongin ka tai khin a, upna thu khotakin lenin ka zokhin hi. 8 Thu a manin a khen Topa in tua Ni ciangin kei a hong piakding thuman lukhu ahi gualzawhna thaman in tu-in kei hong ngak gige hi. Kei tung bekah a hong piading hilo a, ama hong paikik ding itna tawh a ngakte khempeuh tungah zong a piading a hihi.

Tua ahih ciangin sanggamte aw, Topa hong pai matengin lungduai takin om un. Lo khote in zong a lo panun an a ngahtheihna dingun lungduai takin khuapi guah leh tuk guah a ngakna thu thei un. 8 Note zong na lungduai un. Topa hong paiding hun naita ahih manin na lungsim uh na thahatsak un. 9 Sanggamte aw, Pasian in note tungah thu hong khenkhak lohna dingin khatlekhat na kiphunsan kei un. Thukhen dingpa hong nai mahmah ta a, hong tung dektak ta hi.
Note' upna hangin nitawp ni ciangin na ngahding uh hotkhiatna nomau-a' ahihna a kilatsakna dingin Pasian in ama vangliatna tawh a hong kepsak a hihi.
Na khempeuh a beina ding hun hong naita hi. Nomau pumpi ki-uktawm thei-in pilvang unla, hoihtakin thu a ngen thei-in om ta un.
Tuucingpipa hong pai ciangin a mual ngeilo minthan'na lukhu a hong pia ding hi.

Ahi zongin ka itte aw, na mangngilh lohding uh ka deih thu in: Topa-a' dingin ni khat leh kum khat, kum tul khat leh ni khat a kilamdan' luatna omlo hi. 9 Mi pawlkhatte' ngaihsut bangin Topa in a kamciamna a hong tungsak hak hi zenzen lo hi. Note khat beek in siatna na thuakkhak ding uh deihloin na vekpi-un na kisik ding uh deih ahih manin hong pai nailohna pen note hong khualna hizaw hi. 10 Ahi zongin theihkholh lohpi-in guta bangin Topa hong paiding Ni hong tung ding hi. Tua Ni ciangin nakpi takin a ging in vantungte maimang sakin, vantung nate mei in kangtumin maimang ding a, leitung leh a tunga om na khempeuh a mangthang ding hi.
Ahi zongin Pasian kiangah i mawhnate va pulak lehang, amah citakin thuman ahih manin, i mawhnate hong maisakin i hoihlohnate khempeuh hong siangsak ding hi.
Ka itte aw, Christ hong kilatkik ciangin lungmuang takin i omtheihna ding leh ama hong pai Ni ciangin i bukbuk lohna dingin amah tawh kiptakin kipawl ni.

Ka lawm itte aw, eite' pianzia ding taktak a telin hong kilat nailoh hangin tu-in Pasian' tate ihi hi. Ahi zongin Christ hong kilat ciangin ama pianzia ahi bang teekteekin mu ding ihih manin amah i batna ding thu teltakin i thei hi. 3 Christ a siangtho mah bangin amah tawh kibat ding a lamen khempeuh in zong a nuntakna uh siangthosak ding hi.
Keimah ka hong pai baih ding hi. Kuamah in, na ngahding uh gualzawhna lukhu hong tuhkhak lohna dingun na neihsate uh hoihtakin na lenkip un.

("Na ngai un! Guta bangin kei ka hong pai hi. Mihon lakah guaktangin pai-in maizumna a ngahkhak lohna dingun a puante uh kemin, pilvang khuaphawkin a om mite a hampha ahi uhhi.") 16 Tua khate in Hebrews pau-in ‹ Armageddon › a kici munah kumpite a kaikhawm uhhi. 17 A sagihna vantung mi in huihlakah a hai hong bung a, biakinn sung tokhom panin nakpi takin aw khat hong gingin, "Man khinta hi," a ci hi. 18 Tua ciangin khua hong phia-in, a ging lianpi hong om a, van hong gingin nakpi takin zin hong ling hi. Zinling khempeuh lakah a husia pen ahih manin mihing a pian'zawh hihbang zinling omngei nailo hi. 19 Khuapi phelthum kisuah a, gamsunga om khuapi dang khempeuh kisia hi. Pasian in Babylon khuapi mangngilhlo a, ama hehna ahi leenggahzu a hai sung panin Babylon khuapi a dawnsak hi. 20 Tuikulh khempeuh mangthang a, mual khempeuh maimang hi. 21 Gial golpipi, khat ciangin tawi sawmthum val a gik, van panin mite tungah hong kia hi. Tua gimna nasialua ahih manin tua gialte hangin mite in Pasian a samsia uhhi.
Zeisu in, "Kei a hong pai baihta ding ka hihi. Hih laibu sunga kigelh thu a zui mite mi hampha ahi hi," a hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Kei ka hong pai baihta ding a, mi khempeuh a gamtatna uh tawh kizui-in a thaman ding uh ka hong puak ding hi.
Hih thu khempeuh hong genin teci a pang mipa in, "Ka hong pai baih taktak ding hi," hong ci hi. Na cih bangin hi ta peuh hen. Topa Zeisu aw, hong pai ta in!
Nangma thu pen lam hong lak ding meivak hi a, ka paina lampi-ah khuavak a hihi.
Ka kammal pen mei tawh ahi a, suangtum a satnenzo sek tawh ahi zongin kibang hilo ahi hiam, { Topa } in kong ci hi.
Ahi zongin Zeisu in, "Laisiangtho sungah, ‘Anlum bek tawh mite nungtalo a, Pasian genkhiat thute tawh nungta zaw hi,’ ci-in kigelh hilo ahi hiam?" ci-in a dawng hi.

"Pasian' Tapa taktak na hih leh Laisiangtho sungah, ‘Pasian in nang a hong kem dingin a vantung mite hong sawl ding hi. Na khete leh suang a kitahkhak lohna dingin vantung mite in a khut uh tawh nang hong dom ding hi,’ ci-in kigelh ahih manin, hih lai panin tuaksuk in," a ci hi. 7 Zeisu in, "Laisiangtho mahah, ‘Na Topa Pasian na ze-et kei in,’ ci-in gen hilo ahi hiam?" ci-in a dawng hi.
Zeisu in, "Satan aw, taikhia in. Laisiangtho in, ‘Na Topa Pasian bek bia in la, ama na bek sem in,’ ci hilo ahi hiam?" ci-in a dawng hi.

Laisiangtho sungah, ‘Ganhing tawh biak ding ka deih kei a, migitna ka deihzaw hi,’ ci-in a genna pen bang a cihnopna ahi hiam, va kan un. Mite in a zahtak mihoihte a sam dingin a hong pai ka hi kei a, mite in a pampaih mite a sam dingin a hong pai ka hi hi," a ci hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Laisiangtho in Johan' thu a genna-ah, ‘Na paina ding lampi a hongkhol dingin nangma mai-ah ka kamtaipa ka sawl hi,’ ci-in Pasian in gen hi, ci-in kigelh hi.
Laisiangtho sungah, ‘Ganhing tawh biak ding ka deih kei a, migitna ka deihzaw hi,’ a cihnopna thu teltakin thei le uh cin a mawhlopi kimlai na mawhsak kei ding uhhi.

Ahi zongin na thu uh a hong man'nop kei leh, Laisiangtho sungah, ‘Mi nih ahih kei leh mi thum' theihna bek tawh mawhsakna khat peuhpeuh man pan hi,’ a cih mah bangin midang khat ahi a, nih ahi zongin tonpih un.
Zeisu in, "Laisiangtho sungah, ‘A kipat cilin a Piangsakpa in numei leh pasal a bawl hi,’ ci hi.
Amaute kiangah, "Pasian in Laisiangtho sungah, ‘Ka inn pen thungetna inn kici ding hi,’ ci napi-in, note in guktakna phualpi na suaksak uhhi," a ci hi.

Zeisu kiangah, "Hih naupangte' otna na za hiam?" ci-in a dong uhhi. Zeisu in, "Ka za hi. Laisiangtho sungah, ‘Naungekte leh naupangte' kam tawh a cingtaak phatna na gen sak hi,’ a cihna thu sim ngeilo na hi uhhiam?" ci-in a dawng hi.

Zeisu in amaute kiangah, "Laisiangtho sungah, ‘Innlamte in a nilkhiat suang pen innkiu suang bulpi suak khinta hi. Hih pen Topa' bawl hi a, i muh ciangin lamdang i sa hi,’ ci-in a kigelhna sim ngeilo na hi uhhiam?

Tua unau pasal sagihte a sih khit ciangin a numei zong a si hi. 28 Tua ahih manin tua unau pasal sagihte in tuanu ten'pihkim uh ahih manin, thawhkik hun ciangin a koi pen' zi hi ding ahi hiam?" ci-in a dong uhhi. 29 Ahi zongin Zeisu in, "Note in Laisiangtho thu ahi a, Pasian' vangliatna ahi zongin theilo na hih manun na ngaihsunkhial uhhi.

Mihing Tapa ahih leh Laisiangtho sungah a kigelhsa mah bangin a si ding ahi hi; ahi zongin Mihing Tapa a lehhekpa in gimna thuakding hi. Tua mipa pen a piang vetlo hi leh ama-a' dingin hoihzaw ding hi," a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, "Laisiangtho sungah, ‘Tuucingpa ka satlum ding a, a tuute kithehthang ding hi,’ ci-in a kigelh mah bangin note khempeuh in tu nitakin kei na hong taisanmang khin ding uhhi.
Tua bangin kivaikhak hi zenzen leh Laisiangtho in tu-a bangin a pian'na ding a gen pen bangci tun'theih ding ahi hiam?" a ci hi.
Ahi zongin Laisiangtho sungah kamsangte' thugente a tun'theihna dingin hih bangin a hong gamta na hi uhhi," a ci hi. Tua ciangin a nungzuite khempeuh in Zeisu nusia-in a taisan uhhi.
Kamsang Isaiah Laisiangtho sungah, "Nangma mai-ah ka kamtaipa ka sawl a, amah in na paina ding lampi a bawlkhol ding hi.
Zeisu in, "Na khempeuh a bawlkhol dingin Elijah hong pai masa takpi hi. Mihing Tapa in gimna tampi thuakin simmawhna ngah ding hi, ci-in Laisiangtho in gen hilo ahi hiam?

Tua ciangin mite kiangah thu hilh a, "Ka inn pen mi khempeuh-a' dingin thungetna inn kici ding hi," ci-in Pasian in a genna thu Laisiangtho sungah kigelh hilo ahi hiam? Ahi zongin note in guta buluhte' bukna mun na suaksak uhhi, ci-in thu a hilh hi.
Hih thu Topa' bawl hi a, i muh ciangin lamdang i sa hi,’ ci-in Laisiangtho sungah a kigelh sim ngeilo na hi uhhiam?" a ci hi.
Zeisu in, "Na khial mahmah uhhi. Laisiangtho ahi a, Pasian' vangliatna ahi zongin na theihlohna hang uh a hihi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, ‘Tuucingpa ka satlum ding a, tuute a kithehthang ding hi,’ ci-in Laisiangtho sungah a kigelh mah bangin note in kei nong taisan ding uhhi.
Nisim nisimin biakinn sungah thuhilhin note tawh ka omkhawm a, ahi zongin nong man kei uhhi. Ahi zongin hih thu pen Laisiangtho sunga a kigelh thu a tun'na ding ahi hi," a ci hi.
Hih bangin a hihna uh tawh, "Khialhna a nei mite tawh kisim khawm hi," ci-in Laisiangtho sungah a kigelh thu a tung a hihi.

Tua ahih ciangin Jordan Gun kiim gam khempeuhah Johan pai kawikawi a, kamsang Isaiah in Laisiangtho sungah a gelh mah bangin, "Na mawhna panun kisik unla tui kiphum un. Tua hi leh Pasian in na mawhnate uh hong maisak ding hi," ci-in thu a hilh hi.
Zeisu in, "Laisiangtho sungah, ‘Anlum bek tawh mite nungta zolo hi,’ ci-in kigelh hilo ahi hiam?" ci-in a dawng hi.
Zeisu in, "Laisiangtho in, ‘Topa Pasian na bia in la, ama na bek sem in,’ ci hilo ahi hiam?" ci-in a dawng hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Laisiangtho in, ‘Pasian in nang a hong kem dingin a vantung mite hong sawl ding hi,’ ci-in a gen banah,
Zeisu in, "Laisiangtho in, ‘Topa na Pasian na ze-et kei in,’ ci hi," ci-in a dawng hi.

Tua ciangin ama khan'na Nazareth khua-ah Zeisu pai a, Sabbath ni ciangin a paingei bangin kikhopna inn-ah a pai hi. Laisiangtho a sim dingin amah ding a, 17 a nget bangin a sim dingin kamsang Isaiah Laisiangtho bu a kipia hi. A laibu lemin a simnopna mun a zon' ciangin a nuai-a bangin a kigelhna mun mu-in a sim hi. Tua munah,
Tua ciangin amaute tungah thugen ding kipan a, "Note' zakin a hong kisim Laisiangtho thu, tuni-in a hong tung hi," a ci hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Laisiangtho in Johan thu a genna-ah, ‘Hih lai-ah ka kamtaipa om hi. Nangma lampi a hong dingin na mai-ah ka mapaisak ding hi, ci-in Pasian in gen hi,’ ci-in kigelh hi.
Lingbulsum omna a tukna munte pen Pasian' thu za napi-in a nuntakna sung uhah leitung lunghihmawhna, hauhna, leh nopsaknate in depgawp ahih manin bangmah a suakkhia zolote a cihnopna a hihi.
‘Ka inn pen thungetna inn kici ding hi,’ ci-in Pasian in a genna thu Laisiangtho sungah kigelh hi. Ahi zongin note in gutate' bukna phualpi na suaksak uhhi," ci-in amaute kiangah a gen hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in amaute enin, ‘Innlamte in a nilkhiat suang pen innkiu suang bulpi suak khinta hi,’ ci-in Laisiangtho in a gen pen bang a cihnopna ahi hiam?
Banghang hiam cihleh Laisiangtho sungah a kigelh mah bangin, ‘Gim Piak Ni,’ a hihi.
Banghangin hih bangin hong gen ka hi hiam cihleh, Laisiangtho in, ‘Mawhneite lakah amah kihelsak hi,’ ci-in keima thu a genna pen hong tung ding hi," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in Laisiangtho sungah ama thu a kigennate khempeuh, Moses laibu-a kipanin kamsangte' laibu khempeuh a khiatna a gen hi.

Amaute gel in, "Lampi-ah i paikawmin Laisiangtho khiatna hong gen laitakin i lungsim hong lawpsak mahmah hi mah lo ahi hiam?" a kici uhhi.45Tua ciangin Laisiangtho sung thu a theihna dingun a lungsim uh hon'sak a,
A kipat cilin Thu na om a, tua Thu, Pasian tawh na omkhawm a, tua Thu, Pasian a hihi.
Nuntakna a nei khempeuh in tua Thu tung panin a nuntakna uh ngah a, tua nuntakna in mi khempeuh tungah khuavak hong tun'pih hi.
Tua Thu mihing hong suakin kote lakah hong om a, itna nei-in citak mahmah ahih manin Pasian' pianzia a neihna ka mu cian uhhi. Hih pianzia pen Pasian' Tapa khat bek hihna tawh a neih pianzia a hihi.
Hih bangin a gamtatna hangin, "Nangma inn ka deihluatna in ka lungsim hong uklah sak hi," ci-in Laisiangtho sungah a kigelhna thu, a nungzuite in a phawk uhhi.
Tua ahih manin sihna panin amah a kithawhkik sak ciangin a nungzuite in Zeisu' thugen phawkkik uh a, Laisiangtho leh Zeisu' thugente a um uhhi.
Nuntak tawntung ngahtheihna ding lametna tawh Laisiangtho sung na lim sim mahmah uh a, tua na sim uh Laisiangtho in keima thu mah genin teci pang napi-in,
Laisiangtho sungah, ‘Amaute' nek dingin van panin an a pia hi,’ ci-in a kigelh mah bangin ka pu ka pate un gamsungah manna an ne uhhi," a cih uh ciangin
Laisiangtho sungah, ‘Kei hong um mite sung panin nuntakna tui luangkhia ding hi,’ a cih mah bangin kei hong um mite ka kiangah hong pai-in hong dawn ta un," a ci hi.
Christ i cih pen David' suan hi ding a, David' suahna Bethlehem khua-ah suak ding hi, ci-in Laisiangtho sungah kigelh hilo ahi hiam?" a ci uhhi.
Tua ciangin amaute in, "Nang zong Galilee gammi na hi hiam? Laisiangtho sung sim lecin Galilee gamsung panin kamsang khat beek a pian' ngeilohna thu na thei ding hi," a ci uhhi.
Laisiangtho sungah a kigelh thute a tawntungin a thuman hi a, Pasian' thu a ngah mite pen Pasian in, ‘pasian-te,’ na ci hi.
Laisiangtho sungah, "Zion khua mite aw, lau kei un. En un, na kumpipa uh hong pai a, lano tungah hong tuang hi," ci-in a kigelh mah bangin Zeisu in lano khat mu ahih manin tua lano tungah a tuang hi.

Tua hun laitakin a nungzuite in hih thu a khiatna theilo uhhi. Ahi zongin Pasian' pianzia nei-in Zeisu a thawhkik khit ciangin Laisiangtho in amah a gen ahihna leh ama-a' dingin hih bangin a piang ahihna thu a nungphawk uhhi.
"Hih bangin ka hong genna in note khempeuh hong huam kimlo hi. Ka teelsa mite ka thei hi. Laisiangtho in, ‘Ka an a nepa in kei hong langpang hi,’ a cihna thu a tun'ding kisam hi.

Amaute tawh ka omkhawm hun lai-in nangma hong piak na min vangliatna tawh amaute ka kem hi. Amaute ka hu a, a maimang dingpa simloh khat zong ka kisamsak kei hi. Tua a maimangpa lah Laisiangtho sung thu a tun'na ding a hihi.

Ahi zongin amaute in, "Hih puan balkek kei ni. A ngah ding i theihna dingin ai san ni," a kici uhhi. Laisiangtho sungah, "Amaute in ka puante hawm uh a, ka puantualpi ngahna dingin ai a san uhhi," ci-in a kigelhna a tun'na dingin hih bangin galkapte a gamta ahi uhhi.
Tua hun ciangin Zeisu in na khempeuh kicingta hi, ci-in thei ahih manin Laisiangtho sungah a kigelh thu a tun'theihna dingin, "Ka dangtak hi," a ci hi.

Laisiangtho sungah, "Ama guhte khat zong kitanlo ding hi," ci-in a genna thu a tun'theihna dingin hih bangin a piang a hihi. 37. Tua banah Laisiangtho mundang khatah, "Teipi tawh a sutpa uh a en ding uhhi," na kici lai hi.
Sihna panin thokik ding hi, ci-in Laisiangtho in a genna thu a theithei nailo uh a hihi.
Hih laibu sungah a kigelh thute pen Zeisu, Pasian' Tapa, Christ ahihna thu na uptheihna ding uh leh ama min hangin tua upna tawh nuntakna na ngahtheihna ding uh deihna tawh a kigelh a hihi.
Zeisu in a sep thute tampi tak omlai hi. A sep khempeuh a ban banin laibu sungah a kigelh hi leh a laibute pen leitungah ta zolo ding hi, ci-in ka um hi.
"Lawmte aw, Zeisu a mante lam a lak Judas thu, Khasiangtho in David' kam panin a genkholhna Laisiangtho sung thu a tun'ding kisam hi.
Laisiangtho in, ‘No innlamte in na nilkhiat uh suangtum pen innkiu suang bulpi a suak hi,’ ci-in a gen pen hih Zeisu a hihi.
Tua a sim Laisiangtho mun pen, "A kigo dingin a kikai tuuno hamlo a, a mul a kimeetsak tuuno a hamloh mah bangin, amah kam khat beek paulo hi.
Philip zong a kam ka-in thugen ding kipan a, tua a Laisiangtho simna mun-a kipanin Zeisu thu ciangdong a gen hi.
Laisiangtho in Zeisu' thu a gen bang teekteekin a bawlkhit uh ciangin singlamteh tung panin lakhia sukin han sungah a koih uhhi.
Kamsangte' thugente zong tu-a tawh kituak mahmah hi. Laisiangtho sungah,

A pai ngei zel mah bangin Paul zong kikhopna inn-ah pai a, Sabbath ni thum sung Laisiangtho siksanin mite tawh thu kikum a, 3. Christ in sihna thuakin, sihna panin a thawhkik ding a kisam ahi hi, ci-in a laktel hi. Tu-a note kiangah kong pulak Christ pen Laisiangtho sunga kigen Christ ahi hi, ci-in Paul in a gen hi.

Thesaloni khuamite sangin Berea khuamite in mipi lungsim neizaw uhhi. Amaute in lawp mahmahna tawh Paul' thugente ngai uh a, Paul' thugente man taktak hiam ci-in a theihna dingun nisimin Laisiangtho a sim uhhi.
Alexandria khuami Apollos a kici Jew mi khat, Ephesa khua-ah hong pai hi. Amah thugen siam mahmah a, Laisiangtho zong a thei mahmah khat a hihi.
Banghang hiam cihleh amah in Laisiangtho sung siksanin Zeisu pen Christ ahi hi, ci-in mihon lakah Jew mite tawh thu kiselin a zogawp hi.
Paul in, "Lawmte aw, siampi lianpenpa ahihlam ka thei kei hi. Laisiangtho in, ‘Na mite uh a ukpa na gensia kei ding uhhi,’ ci hi," ci-in a dawng hi.
Pasian in kamsangte tung tawnin hih Lungdamna Thu a gensa hi a, Laisiangtho sungah a omsa thu a hihi.

Laisiangtho sungah, "Pasian a upna hangin amah tawh pawlkhat ahi mite nungta ding hi," ci-in a kigelh mah bangin Pasian in amah tawh a kipawl theihna dingin mite a bawlna zia, lungdamna thu in hong kilangsak hi. Tua pen, a patna panin a tawp dongin upna hang bek tawh ahihna thu hong laktel hi.
Tua ahih manin Laisiangtho sungah, "No Jew mite' hangin Gentail mite lakah Pasian kigensia hi," ci-in kigelh hi.

Tua bang hi hetlo hi. Laisiangtho sungah, "Thu na gen peuhmah ciangin a man na genna thu mite in hong thei ding uh a, mite in nang hong mawhsakna na genkik ciangin na kiphellah ding khat beek omlo ding hi," ci-in a kigelh mah bangin mi khempeuh in zuau a gen zongin Pasian in thuman gen veve ding hi.
Laisiangtho sungah zong, "Pasian' muhna-ah mi man kuamah omlo a,
Banghang hiam cihleh Laisiangtho sungah, "Abraham in Pasian um a, tua a upna hangin Pasian in mihoihin a sang hi," ci-in kigelh hi.

David in a gen hih thupha pen vun ki-atte bek in ngahthei ahi hiam? Hilo hi; vun ki-atlote in zong ngahthei uhhi. Laisiangtho in, "Abraham in Pasian um a, tua a upna hangin Pasian in mihoihin a sang hi," ci hi, ci-in i gen khinzo hi.

Laisiangtho sungah zong, "Minam tampite' pupi dingin ka hong bawl khin hi," ci-in a kigelh hi. Tua hi a, bangmah a om nailopi a thupiakna tawh a omsak thei, a site a hingsak thei, Abraham in a up Pasian' muhna-ah hih thuciamna kipin a kizang a hihi. 18. Laisiangtho sungah, "Na suanlekhakte aksi zahin tam ding hi," ci-in a kigelh mah bangin tua bang a pian'theihna ding lametna a om nailopi mahin Abraham in umin lamen ahih manin minam tampite' pupi a suak hi.
Laisiangtho sungah zong, "Note hangin sunthapai-in siatna ding lauhuaina ka thuak uh a, gawhding tuu bangin a hong kibawl hi," ci-in a kigelh hi.
Tua mah bangin Laisiangtho sungah, "Jacob ka it a, Esau ka mudah hi," ci-in kigelh hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Laisiangtho sungah Pasian in Faro kiangah, "Ka vangliatna lahna ding leh leitung khempeuhah ka min a kitheihna dingin kong zatnop manin kumpi a hong suaksak ka hi hi," ci hi.
Hosea Laisiangtho sungah, "Keima mi a hilote, ‘Keima mi,’ ka ci ding a, ka itloh mite, ‘Ka itte,’ ka ci ding hi.

Amaute in upna suangloin nasepna a suan' hang uh a hihi. Amaute pen Laisiangtho in a gen mah bangin, "Pukna ding suang," a kici tungah a pukkha uh a hihi. 33. Laisiangtho in, "En un, keimah in Zion-ah mite a muktuk theihna ding, mite a puktheihna ding suang khat ka koih hi. Ahi zongin amah a muang mite khempeuh tavai cih om ngeilo ding hi," ci hi.
Laisiangtho in, "Amah a um mi peuhmah tavailo ding hi," ci hi.
Laisiangtho in zong, "Topa tungah huhna a ngen khempeuhte in hotkhiatna a ngah ding uhhi," ci hi.
A gen dingin kisawl kei leh kua in a thu gen thei ding ahi hiam? Tua ahih manin Laisiangtho sungah, "Lungdamna thu a hilh dingin a hong pai mite hangin kinuam mahmah hi," ci-in kigelh hi.

Tua ahih leh amaute in thu zalo uh ahi hiam? Laisiangtho sungah, "Amau' awgingte leitung khempeuhah kizel a, a thugente uh in mun khempeuh a ban hi," ci-in a kigelh mah bangin amaute in thu za khinzo uhhi.
Pasian in tanglai panin a teelsa mite nusialo hi. Elijah in Israel mite mawhsakin Pasian kiangah nakpi takin thu a genna Laisiangtho sungah a kigelh theilo na hi uhhiam?
Tua ahih manin Laisiangtho sungah, "Pasian in thu a ngaihsun theilo, khua a phawk theiloin amaute bawl a, amaute in tuni dongin khua mu theilo, khua za theiloin a om uhhi," ci-in a kigelh hi.

Tua hi a, Laisiangtho sungah a kigelh mah bangin Israel mite khempeuh in hotkhiatna ngah ding uhhi. Laisiangtho in, "Zion panin Honpa hong pai ding a, Jacob' suanlekhakte sunga om gitlohna khempeuh maisak ding hi.
Tua ahih manin Laisiangtho in, "Kua in Topa' lungsim thei ding a, kua in ngaihsutna va pia thei ding ahi hiam?

Lawmte aw, na hehna uh kuama tungah thukkik kei unla, Pasian' thukkik dingin koih lel un. Banghang hiam cihleh Laisiangtho sungah, "Keimah in amaute tungah ka thuk ding a, midangte a gimsak bangun ka gimsak ding hi, Topa in ci hi," ci-in kigelh hi. 20 Tua ahih ciangin Laisiangtho sungah, "Na galte uh a gil a kial leh an na pia un. A dang a taak leh tui na pia un. Tua bangin na gamtat uh leh amaute' maizumna dingin a bawl na hi uhhi," ci-in a kigelh bangin gamtazaw un.
Laisiangtho sungah, "Kei pen a nungta ka hih mah bangin ka mai-ah mi khempeuh hong kun ding a, Pasian ka hihna thu mi khempeuh in pulak taktak ding uhhi, Topa in ci hi," ci-in a kigelh hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh Christ zong ama nopsak theihna dingin gamtalo zaw hi. Laisiangtho sungah, "Note hong kisimmawhna thute kei tungah hong tu hi," ci-in a kigelh hi. 4. Laisiangtho sungah a om thu khempeuh pen eite hilhna ding, eite in lametna nei-in i thuakzawhna ding, leh i thahat theihna dingin a kigelh a hihi.

Gentail mite in zong ama hehpihna hangin Pasian a phattheihna dingun Christ a hong paina hang a hihi. Banghang hiam cihleh Laisiangtho sungah, "Tua ahih ciangin Gentail mite lakah ka lungdamna nang tungah ka hong ko ding a, nangma min phatna late ka sa ding hi," cihna leh
Laisiangtho sungah zong, "Ama thu a kigen ngei nailohna mite in mu ding uh a, ama thu a za ngei nailote in teltheih ding uhhi," na kici hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Laisiangtho sungah, "Mipilte' pilna ka susia ding a, miteite' teina ka heikhiatsak ding hi," ci-in kigelh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Laisiangtho sungah, "A kisathei mite, Topa' hang bekin kisathei ta hen," ci-in na kigelh hi.

Tua ahih manin Laisiangtho sungah, "Kuamah in a muh ngeiloh, a zak ngeiloh, piangthei dingin zong a ngaihsutloh uh thu pen Pasian in amah a it mite-a' dingin a bawlkholh saksa ahi hi," ci-in na kigelh hi.
Tua ahih manin Laisiangtho in, "Kua in Topa' lungsim thei a, ama gamtatna ding lam lak thei ahi hiam?" na ci hi. Ahi zongin eite in Christ lungsim i nei hi.
Hih leitung mite in pilna hi, ci-in a ngaihsutte, Pasian-a' dingin a haihuai thu a hihi. Banghang hiam cihleh Laisiangtho in, "Mipilte amau' ngian mahah awksak hi," a na ci hi.

Tua bang a pualam mite mawhsakin thu ka khen ding kei' nasep hilo hi. Pasian in amaute' thu khen ngawn ding hi. Ahi zongin note in na pawlpih uh mite tungah thu na khen ding uh a hihi. Laisiangtho in, "Note lak panin migilopa na lakhia un," na ci hi.

Numei paktat tawh a pumpi a kizomsakpa pen tua numei tawh pumkhat sakhat a suak ahih lamtak theilo na hi uhhiam? Banghang hiam cihleh Laisiangtho in, "Tua mi nihte pumkhat a suak ding uhhi," na ci hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Laisiangtho in, "Leitung leh a sungah a om khempeuh pen Topa-a' ahi hi," na ci hi.

Laisiangtho sungah, "A lamdang kampau tawh amaute hopihin, minam dangte' pau tawh thu ka gen ding a, tua bang nangawnin hih mite in keima thugen hong ngailo ding uhhi, ci-in Topa in a gen hi," ci-in na kigelh hi.

Kei tungah a hong kihilh a thupi pen note tungah ka hong gensawn a, tua in: Laisiangtho sungah a kigelh mah bangin eite' mawhna tangdingin Christ hong si-in4kivui a, Laisiangtho sungah a kigelh mah bangin a ni thum ni-in Pasian in hingkiksak hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh Laisiangtho in, "Pasian in na khempeuh ama khenuai-ah koih hi," na ci hi. "Na khempeuh," a cih ciangin Christ' khutnuai-ah na khempeuh a koih Pasian mahmah simloh a vekpi-in a huamkhin ahihna kitel hi.
Tua ahih manin Laisiangtho in, "A masa Adam pen leitung nuntakna a nei mihing hong suak hi," na ci hi. Ahi zongin a nunung Adam pen nuntakna a pia thei Kha a hihi.
A muatthei pen a muattheilo hong suakin, a sithei pen a sitheilo hong suah ciangin Laisiangtho thu hong tung taktak ding hi. Laisiangtho in, "Sihna maimangin gualzawhna in khuplet hi.
Ahi zongin Laisiangtho in, "Topa' mai-ah Moses a pai ciangin a kiliahna puan a lakhia hi," a cih mah bangin Topa lamah mi khatpeuh a kihei ciangin a liah puan kilakhia hi.
Laisiangtho in, "Um ka hih manin ka gen hi," a cih mah bangin kote in zong um ka hih uh manin a gen ka hi uhhi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Laisiangtho in zong, "An tampi a lapa in an haulua tuanlo a, tawmno a lapa zong zawnglua tuanlo hi," na ci hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Laisiangtho in, "Amah in citna tawh mizawngte pia zuahzuah a, ama migitna kip tawntung hi," na ci hi.
Laisiangtho in, "Mi khat peuhpeuh a kisialh nop leh Topa' nasepnate bek kisialhpih hen," na ci hi.

Tu-a ka hong paina ding pen a thumveina hita hi. Laisiangtho sungah, "Mawhna a bawl khat peuhpeuh a thei mi nih leh thum a om ciang bekin a mawh hi, ci-in kingaihsun pan ding hi," ci-in a kigelh mah bangin tua bangin ka hong sem ding hi.
Abraham tunga thupiang ngaihsun dih un. Laisiangtho in, "Abraham in Pasian um a, tua a upna hangin Pasian in amah tawh a kipawlthei dingin mihoihin a sang hi," na ci hi.

Jew mite mah bangin Gentail mite in zong a upna uh hangin amah tawh a kipawlthei dingin Pasian in a bawlna ding thu, Laisiangtho in na ma theih hi. Tua ahih manin Laisiangtho in Abraham tungah Lungdamna Thuthak na ma hilhkhol a, "Pasian in leitung mi khempeuh thupha a piakna dingin nangmah hong zang ding hi," na ci hi.

Hih thu tawh kisai-in Laisiangtho in, "Thukham laibu sunga kigelh khempeuh a vekpi-in a zuikhin tawntung lote in Pasian' samsiatna thuak hi," ci ahih manin Thukham a suangte pen samsiatna a ngah mite ahi uhhi. 11. Tu-in Laisiangtho in, "Upna hangin Pasian tawh a kipawlthei mite bek nungta ding hi," na ci ahih manin Thukham hangin kuamah in Pasian tawh kipawl theihna a ngahlohna thu teltakin hong kilang hi. 12. Laisiangtho in, "Thukham' deih bangin a gamta zote nungta ding hi," na ci ahih manin Thukham zuihna leh upna thu na kimemat khalo hi. 13. Laisiangtho in, "Sing tungah a kikhai mi peuhmah Pasian' samsiat mi ahi hi," na ci ahih manin eite-a' dingin Christ in samsiatna a thuak manin Thukham zuihlahna hangin samsiatna panin eite a hong tankhia a hihi.

Tu-in Pasian in Abraham leh ama suanpa tungah thuciamna nei hi. Laisiangtho sungah a kigelhna-ah, mi tampi a cihnopna ahi, "Na suan leh na khakte," cih kammal na zanglo a, mi khat bek ahi Christ a cihnopna-in, "Na suanpa," ci-in na gen hi.
Ahi zongin Zeisu Christ a um mite tungah a upna hangun Pasian' thuciam a kipiak theihna dingin Laisiangtho in, "Mawhna khutnuai-ah leitung mi khempeuh a om hi," na ci hi.
Tua ahih manin Laisiangtho sungah, "A sangna munah a paitoh ciangin matsa salte tampi paipih a, mite tungah letsong a pia hi," ci-in na kigelh hi.
Laisiangtho sungah hih bangin na kigelh hi: Abraham in tapa nih nei a, khat pen a zi' silanu tawh a neih a tapa hi a, a khat pen a zi tawh a neih a tapa a hihi.

Banghang hiam cihleh Laisiangtho sungah, "A ciing nupi aw, lungdam in. Nausuah natna a thei ngeilo nupi aw, nuamin kiko in. Banghang hiam cihleh a pasal in a nusiat nupi in a pasal tawh a om tawntung nupi sangin ta hauzaw ding hi," ci-in na kigelh hi.
Ahi zongin Laisiangtho sungah,"Sila numei' tapa in sila a hilo numei' tapa tawh gamh luahkhawm theilo ding ahih manin, sila numei leh a tapa hawlkhia in," na kici hi.

Tua ahih manin Laisiangtho in, "Hih thu hangin pasal in a nu leh a pa nusia-in a zi tawh kigawm ding a, amaute gel khat a suak ding uhhi," na ci hi. 32. Pasalte in amau pumpi zahin a zite uh itin, zite in zong amau pumpi zah mahin a pasalte uh a it ding uh ahih mah bangin, Laisiangtho in hih bangin a gen ciangin a thukzaw khat, Christ leh pawlpi a ki-itna a gennopna ahi hi, ci-in ka ngaihsun hi.
Christ thu a cingtakin note lungsimah hong om hen la, pilna tawh khatlekhat thu kihilhin na kitai un. Pasian tungah lungdam kohna-in Thuciam Lui sunga late, la thakte, leh biakna late na sa un.
Kei ka hong pai matengin mipi mai-ah Laisiangtho simna, a khiatna genna, leh hanthotnate-ah tavuan na la in.
Banghang hiam cihleh Laisiangtho in, "Buh a cil bawngtal muk na tuam kei in," a cih banah, "Nasempa in a thaman a ngahding a kilawm ahi hi," na ci hi.

Christ Zeisu upna hangin hotkhiatna a hong ngahsak thei ding pilna a hong pia Laisiangtho pen na neutunga kipanin a theisa na hihna thu zong na theihsa thu mah a hihi. 16-17 Pasian' na a sem mite mi cingtaak hi-in, na hoih namkim a septheihna dingun Laisiangtho pen Pasian' lamlahna tawh a hong kipia hi a, thuman thutak hilhna ding, a khialte taiina ding, a manlote a manin puahna ding, a manin nuntak theihna ding thuhilhna dingin a manpha mahmah a hihi.
Laisiangtho mun khatah a kigenna-ah, "Pasian aw, nangma ngaihsut tham dingin mi pen bang hi a, na phawk tham dingin mihing' ta bang hi lel ahi hiam?
Tua ahih ciangin Laisiangtho sungah, "Tu ni-in Pasian' aw na zak uh leh
Laisiangtho in, "Tu ni," a cih pen eite tungah zong hong cihna hi lai ahih manin mawhna' khemsa-in ta-in na lungsim uh na khauhsakkhak lohna dingun khatlekhat kihanthawnin na kihuhzaw un.
Laisiangtho in, "Tuni-in Pasian' aw na zak uh leh Pasian na lehdo lai uh hun bangin na lungsim uh khauhsak nawn kei un," na ci hi.
Laisiangtho mun khatah, "A ni sagih ni-in a nasepna khempeuh panin Pasian tawlnga hi," ci-in ni sagihna thu tawh kisai na gen hi.

"Tuni," cihna kammal na omlai ahih manin Pasian in nidang khat seh lai ahihna thu hong kilang hi. Laisiangtho sungah, "Tuni-in Pasian' aw na zak uh leh na lungsim uh khauhsak nawn kei un," a cihna mun i mat khitsa mah bangin tuazawh kum tampi khit ciangin David tung tawnin thu hong genkik hi.

Pasian' thu nungta-in a gamtang hi a, langnih a hiam namsau sangin hiamzaw lai hi. Kha leh lungsim, guh leh taang kituahna, guh leh guhngek dongin khenkhia thei hi. Mihingte' lungsim ngimna leh a ngaihsutnate zong theithei hi.

Siampite' lakna tawh kisai-in ahih leh a sithei mi mah ahi siampite in mite tung panin sawmah khat a la uhhi. Ahi zongin Melkhizedek' lakna tawh kisai-in ahih leh Laisiangtho in a gen mah bangin a nungta tawntung mipa in sawmah khat a la a hihi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Laisiangtho in,"Melkhizedek nam bangin tawntung siampi na hi hi," na ci hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Laisiangtho sungah, "A sawt loin, a hong pai dingpa hong tung ding a, hong zekai nawnlo ding hi.

A upna hang mahin Enok zong sihna tawh kipelh hi. Pasian in ama kiangah lato ahih manin kuamah in Enok mu nawnlo hi. Amah a kilaktoh ma-in Enok in Pasian' lungkimna ngah hi, ci-in Laisiangtho in a na gen hi.
Laisiangtho sungah, "Nangmah na ki-it bangin na vengte na it in," ci-in a genna Topa' Thukham zui le uh cin a hoih hi pah hi.
Laisiangtho in, "Abraham in Pasian um a, a upna hangin Pasian in mihoihin a sang hi," ci-in a genna thumanin tung takpi a, Abraham pen Pasian' lawmpa kici hi.

Laisiangtho sungah, "Eite sungah a hong guat kha pen Pasian in ngai mahmah hi," ci-in a kigelhna a mawkna-in a kigelh sa na hi uhhiam? 6. Laisiangtho in, "Pasian in a kihisakte nial a, a kiniamkhiatte a hehpih hi," a cih mah bangin Pasian' hong hehpihna lianzaw hi.
Laisiangtho sungah zong, "Keimah siangtho ka hih manin note zong na siangtho un," na kici hi.
Tua ahih manin Laisiangtho sungah, "Mihingte, lopa tawh kibang a, a minthan'nate uh lopa pak tawh kibang hi. Lopate vulin pakte pulh a,
Banghang hiam cihleh Laisiangtho sungah, "A manpha suang khat ka teelkhia a, innkiu suang dingin Zion-ah ka koih hi. Amah a umte, zahhuai ngeilo ding hi," ci-in na kigen hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Laisiangtho in, "Nuntak nuam deihin, hunhoih a zang nuamte in kamsia pau kei uh hen la, zuauthu gen kei ta uh hen.
Laisiangtho in, "Mi hoihte kihonkhia zo liailiai bek ahih leh Pasian a umlo mawhnei mite bang suak ding ahi hiam?" na ci hi.

Tua mah bangin no khangnozaw deuhte in zong a khanghamte' thu na mang un. Laisiangtho in, "Pasian in a kiphasak mite nial a, a kiniamkhiat mite a hehpih hi," a cih mah bangin na vekpi-un kiniamkhiatna puan bangin silhin, khatlekhat na na kisepsak un.
Na phawkding uh a thupi mahmah khat in: Laisiangtho sunga om thugen kholhnate, kuamah in ama pilna tawh a khiatna gen theilo hi.

Lai a hong gelhna sungah a thugente tu-ate mah a gennuam a hihi. A laigelhna sungah a telhak thu tampi om a, theihna kicing loin lungsim kiplo mi pawlkhatte in Laisiangtho sung thu a ututun a kawihei uh bangin Paul' thugente zong a manlopi-in khia uh ahih manin siatna a tuaklawh uhhi.

Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian' thu a ngaihsunlo mi pawlkhat, eite lakah kuama phawklohin hong lutsim uh a, amaute' mawh gamtat ngamnate a seelna-un Pasian' hehpihna thupha a lehlamin hei-in, eite in khat bek i neih i Mangpa leh i Topa ahi Zeisu Christ a nial uhhi. Hihbang mite' gimthuak ding thu tanglai pekin Laisiangtho in a gensa thu a hihi.
Hih laibu a sim mite mi hampha hi a, hih thu kigente ngai-in, hih laibu sungah a kigelh thu a zuite zong mi hampha mah ahi uhhi. Bang hang hiam cih leh hih thu kigente a tun'ding hun hong naita hi.

Amaute in lungsim takpi tawh kei tungah huhna hong ngenlo uh a, dawibia mite bang lelin a gamta uhhi. An leh leenggahzu a nget uh ciangin zong lawkite bangin a ngen uhhi. Amaute in kei hong lehdo uhhi.

Amaziah aw, tua bangin kampau na hih manin { Topa } in nang kiangah, ‘Na zi pen khuasungah numei paktat suak ding a, galsungah na tate si ding uhhi. Na gam kiphelkhamin midang tungah kipia ding a, lawkite' gamsungah nang na si ding hi. Israel mite, galmatin kipaipih ding hi,’ ci hi," a ci hi.
lawki mite bangin biakinn sungah a lamte, khemna leh thahna tawh a ngah uh vante tawh, a topa uh' inn a dimsakte khempeuh, tua ni mahin gim ka pia ding hi," a ci hi.
"Na lungsim uh khauh mahmah a, lawki lungsim paii-in, Pasian' thu-ah bilngong na bang uhhi. I pu i pate mah bangin Khasiangtho thu na mang nuam kei uhhi.
Note lakah numei tawh paktatna nasia mahmahin, lawkite nangawn a gamtatlohte na gamtatna uh hong kigen a, mi khat in ama nukik nangawn a luppihna thu ka za hi.

Tua bang ka hong cih ciangin numei tawh a paktat, a huaiham, a guta, milim a bia lawkite tawh na kikhawl kei un, ka cihnopna hilo hi. Tuate tawh kikhawllo ding ci lehang, leitung panin paikhia un, cihna suak ding hi.
Note khatlekhat thu na kineih uh ciangin Pasian' mi siangthote khensakzaw loin lawki thukhente' mai na kitun' ngam uhhi.
Tua hinapi, khatlekhat thu kineihin zum na kitun' uh a, lawki thukhente na khensak tazen uhhi.
Ka cihnopna pen, lawkite in gan a gawh uh ciangin dawi a biakna uhhi a, Pasian a biakna uhhilo hi. Dawi biakna-ah note na kihel ding uh ka hong deih kei hi.
lawki na hih lai-un a pau theilo milimte' thu-in na gamta uh a, na lungsim uh tua milimte in hong zo mahmah hi.

Pasian' biakinn leh lawkite' milim bangci kilem theihding ahi hiam? Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in, "Ka mite lakah tengin amaute tawh ka omkhawm ding hi. Kei pen amaute' Pasian ka hi ding a, amaute, keima mi ahi ding uhhi.
Note in na mipihte lak uhah mi gensia-in vaksuk vakto loin, na vengpa uh a sihna dingin na langpang kei ding uhhi; kei pen { Topa } ka hihi.
Samuel in ama sih ni dong Saul mukiklo a, ahih hangin Saul' hangin Samuel a dah hi. Israel-te tungah kumpi-in Saul a koih manin { Topa } kisik hi.

{ Topa } in Samuel kiangah, "Israel-te tungah kumpi hihna panin amah ka nolhkhitna mu napi-in Saul' hangin bang tanvei dah ding na hi hiam? Na sathau biingah sathau thun in la, pai in; Bethlehem mi Jessi kiangah kong sawl ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh ama tapate lak panin keima-a' ding kumpi khat ka la khin hi," a ci hi.

David leh Saul a kiho khita kipanin Saul' tapa Jonathan in ama pumpi zahin David a it hi. 2 Saul in tua ni-a kipanin ama kiangah David omsak a, a pa' inn-ah ciahsaklo hi. 3 Jonathan in ama pumpi zahin David it ahih manin amah tawh thuciamna khat a bawl hi. 4 Jonathan in ama silhlai a puantualpi suahin David pia a, a galkidalna leh a namsau nangawn leh a thal leh a kawnggak zong a pia hi.

Tua ciangin Saul' tapa Jonathan dingin David kiang Horesh-ah pai a, Pasian in hong huh ding hi, ci-in amah a hanthawn hi. 17 Amah in David kiangah, "Lau kei in; Banghang hiam cihleh ka pa Saul in nang hong sukhalo ding hi. Nang pen Israel-te tungah kumpi na hi ding a, kei pen nangma zom ka hi ding hi; ka pa Saul in zong hih thu thei hi," a ci hi. 18 Tua ciangin amaute gel in { Topa' } mai-ah thuciamna bawl uhhi. Horesh-ah David om lai-in, Jonathan a inn-ah a ciah hi.
Tua ciangin Saul leh a tapa Jonathan' hangin kah la phuakin David kap a, 18 amah in Judah mite tungah hih kah la a kihilhna ding thu a pia hi. Tua la pen ‹ Jashar Laibu › sungah kigelh hi. Amah in:

Tua ciangin Saul' tapa Jonathan, a ta Mefibosheth David kiangah hong pai a, maipukin zahtakna a bawl hi. Tua ciangin David in, "Mefibosheth!" a ci hi. Amah in dawngin, "En in, na nasempa," a ci hi. 7 Tua ciangin David in ama kiangah, "Lau kei in; Banghang hiam cihleh na pa Jonathan' hangin nangma tungah migitna kong lak ding a, na pu Saul' leitang khempeuh nangma tungah kong piakik ding hi. Tua ciangin nangmah in ka sabuai-ah an na ne tawntung ding hi," a ci hi. 8 Tua ciangin amah in zahtakna bawlin, "A sisa ui tawh a kibang kei bang lel, nong hici bawlna dingin na nasempa bang ka hi hiam?" a ci hi. 9 Tua ciangin kumpipa in Saul' nasempa Ziba samin ama kiangah, "Saul leh a innkuan tawh a kizom khempeuh na topa' tupa' tungah ka pia khin hi. 10 Nang leh na tapate leh na nasemte in ama-a' dingin lo na kho ding uh a, na topa' tupa in annek ding a neihtheihna dingin a piangte na tun'pih ding uhhi. Ahih hangin na topa' tupa Mefibosheth in keima sabuai-ah an ne tawntung ding hi," a ci hi. Ziba in tapa sawmlenga leh nasem sawmnih nei hi. 11 Tua ciangin Ziba in kumpipa kiangah, "Ka to kumpipa in nong thupiak khempeuh tawh kizui-in na nasempa in hih ding hi," a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin kumpipa' tapate khat bangin Mefibosheth in David' sabuai-ah an a ne hi.

Tua ciangin David in, "Keima tungah a pa thuman takin hong gamtat bangin Nahash' tapa Hanun' tungah thuman takin ka gamta ding hi," a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin David in a pa' hangin amah a hehnem dingin a nasemte a sawl hi. David' nasemte Ammon mite' gamah va tung uhhi.

Nang pen zan mah beka hong pai na hi hi. Koi lai munah kei pai ding cih theilopi-in kote tawh a kawivak dingin nang hong bawl ding ka hi hiam? Ciahkik in, na sanggamte ciahpih in. { Topa } in itna kip leh thumanna nang' tungah hong lak ta hen," a ci hi. 21 Ahih hangin Ittai in kumpipa dawngin, "{ Topa } nungta-in, ka to kumpipa zong nungta ahih mah bangin, sihna ding ahi a, hin'na ding ahi zongin ka to kumpipa a omna peuhpeuhah na nasempa om ding hi," a ci hi.
