En in, amau' tapate gel, Zadok' tapa Ahimaaz leh Abiathar' tapa Jonathan, amaute tawh omkhawm hi. Na zak peuhpeuh amaute' tung tawnin kei tungah nong puak ding hi," a ci hi. 37 Tua ahih ciangin Jerusalem-ah Absalom a lut laitakin David' lawmpa Hushai zong khuapi sungah a pai hi.

Elijah in Elisha kiangah, "Hih lai-ah khawl in, kong thum hi; Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } in Bethel ciangdong kei hong sawl hi," a ci hi. Ahih hangin Elisha in, "{ Topa } nungta a, nangmahmah na nuntak mah bangin, nang kong nusia ngei kei ding hi," a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute Bethel dongah paisuak uhhi.

Job' lawmte thum, Teman khuami Elifaz, Shuah gammi Bildad, leh Naamah gammi Zofar-te in Job in a thuak gimna thu teng a zak uh ciangin a inn ciat panun amah a hehnem ding leh a hanthawn dingin kituahin hong paikhawm uhhi. 12 Amaute in a gamla sim mun panin Job a muh tungun amah thei pahlo uhhi. Tua ciangin amaute a gingin kapkhia uh a, a puan uh balkekin a lu tung uh a tukik dingin leivui lawnto uhhi. 13 Tua ciangin leilakah sun sagih leh zan sagih sung amah tawh tukhawm uh a, ama thuakna a nasiat mahmah lamtak mu uh ahih manin kuamah in kam khat beek a paupih ngam kei uhhi.
"Pasian ka nusia a, ka nusia kei zongin, hih bang lungkham hunin lawm citak ka kisam hi. 15 No ka lawmte pen, lui tuikhang bang, a mangthang pak tui let bang,
Mi khat in a lawmpa-a' ding a thumsak mah bangin mi khatpeuh in Pasian' kiangah kei-a' dingin hong thuumsak leh ka ut hi.

"Pasian in ka sanggamte hong taisansak a, kei hong theisate kiangah khualmi ka suak hi. 14 Ka behte leh ka lawmte beimang khinta uhhi. 15 Ka inn-ah a hong tung ngei keima zinte in hong mangngilh ta a, ka na a sem numeite in khualmi bangin hong bawl uh a, amaute' mai-ah midangpi khat ka suak hi. 16 Ka nasemte khatpeuh ka sap ciangin hong dawng nuamlo uh a, hong huhna ding uh ka thum ciang nangawnin hong thudonlo uhhi. 17 Ka zi nangawn in ka gimnam thuak zolo a, ka sanggamte mahmah in zong hong naih nuamlo uhhi. 18 Naupang melmawl nangawn in kei hong simmawh uh a, kei hong muh uh ciangin hong nuihsan uhhi. 19 Ka lawm it pente nangawn in kei hong muhdah et uh a, ka it pente nangawn in kei hong langbawl uhhi. 20 Ka guh tungah ka vun kol dihdiahin om a, a nungta liailiai bekin kei a om ka hihi. 21 Hong hehpih un! Hong hehpih un! Keima lawmte hilo na hi uhhiam? Pasian in kei hong satpai ta hi. 22 Pasian' hong bawlsiat bangin Banghangin no zong kei hong bawlsia ding na hi uhhiam? Nong gimsakna uh kicing ta hoh hilo ahi hiam?
Mikhialte tawh tukhawm loin, thusim neite tawh ka kipawl kei hi.
Amau' lungsim sungah siatna a om hinapi a vengte tawh kilemna thu a gen khem, siatna bawlte, migilote tawh kei hong lakhiakhawm kei in.
Ka vengte khempeuh' nuihsat ka suak a, ka vengte tungah a cikzethuai ka hi a, ka meltheih khempeuhte' gimneih mi ka suak hi. Konglakah hong mute in kei hong peelin hong taisan uhhi.
Ka gim thuakna-ah ka lawmte leh ka kithuahpihte kidang koih uh a, keima behte nangawn kei kiang pan gamla om uhhi.
Keimah a en dingin mi hong pai ciangin, kam mawkna a pau uhhi. A lungsim uhah siatna kaikhawm uh a, a paikhiat uh ciangin a genthang uhhi.
Ka muan', ka lawm itpa, keima an a nepa nangawn in a khetul tawh kei hong peek vial hi.

Kei hong phin galte hilo hi. Hi leh ka thuakzo ding hi. Kiphatsakna tawh kei hong bawlte, langpang mi hilo hi. Hi leh ama kiang panin ka bu thei ding hi. 13 Ahih hangin ka kikimpih, ka kikholhpih, ka lawm theih mahmah, nangmah na hi hi. 14 Kam khum tawh i kihoho ngei a, Pasian' inn sungah i kikhawl khawm ngei hi.
Ama kampau, thawhbat sangin nelzaw a, ahi zongin a lung sungah muhdahna om hi. A kammalte sathau sangin nipzaw a, ahi zongin tuate pen namsau hiam mahmah tawh kibang hi.
Kei hong itte leh ka lawmte keimah nong pelhsak khin a, khuamial bekbek, keima kikholhpih a hihi.
En un, sanggamte pumkhat suakin a tut khawm uh ciangin bangzahin hoihin nuam ahi hiam?
Mawh bawlnopna lungsim hong neisak kei in la, a gilo mite tawh hong kikhawlsak kei in. Amau' anlimte hong duhgawh sak kei ta in.
Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } in a sia-in a gamtate mudah a, thuman mite bek a pawlpih dingin a la hi.
Migilote tawh kikhawl kei in la, amau' gamtatnate zui kei in. 15 Amau' gamtat bangin gamta peuhmah ke'n! Gitlohna peel in! Paisan in la, na maban sem in.
Mi a gensiasiate tungah thusim kigen ngamlo a, a muan'huai mite' tung bekah thusim kigen ngam hi.
Midikte in a gamtatna uh tel et a, migilote a gamtatna unlam pialsak hi.
Mipil tawh kikhawl lecin na pil ding a, mihai tawh kikhawl lecin gimna na thuak ding hi.
{ Topa' } deih bangin gamtatna pen galte nangawn lawma kaihzawhna a hihi.
Mihoihlote in kitotna piangsak a, mi gensiate in lawmta ki-it kimlai kimudahsak hi. 29 A ngongtat mite in a lawmte zol a, lungkhamna sung tun'pih hi.
Mi' khialhna a maisakte midangte in itin lawm hau uh a, mi' khialhna ciamtehna pen lawm taanna a hihi.
Lawm citak in a tawntungin hong it a, i sanggamte pen i lungkhamna a hong thuakpih dingin a piang a hihi.
Lawm pawlkhatte sauvei kimanglo a, lawm pawlkhatte sanggam sangin kipzaw hi.
Mihaute in lawm mu thuahthuah a, mizawngte in a neihsun teng nangawn khahsuahsuah uhhi.
A cingh mihaupa' maipha ngah ding ki-ut ciat a, na a piak mi khempeuh ama lawm a hihi. 7 Mi khempeuh in a sanggam zawngpa uh mudah ciat ahih manin a lawmte in a taisatna a thu lamdang hilo hi.
Mi a gensia kawikawite in thu im theilo hi. Tua banga mi haipaute tawh kikhawl kei in.
Kamsiamna in kumpipa' lawm hong suaksak a, ahi zongin { Topa } in lungsim takpi a deih hi.
A hehbaih mite tawh kipawl kei unla, a lungtom mite tawh kikhawl kei un. 25 Amau' hoihlohnate na zuihkhak lohna dingun na kidop kei uh leh note in zong na awklawh khading uhhi.
Migilote eng kei in la, amaute tawh kikhawl kei in.
Na vengte' inn-ah hawh mun lua kei in. Hong cimtakin hong mudah khading hi.
Haksat hunin a zuautat mi muan'in neihkhakna pen ha-na, ahih kei leh khebai tawh kibang hi.
Mihoih khat in mihoih lote' gamtatna a zuihkhak ciangin hawktui nin, ahih kei leh tui uih tawh kibang hi.

Tungtham beka kam khum pauna pen cimbeng kizut leibeel tawh kibang hi. 24 A simtat mi in a kampi bek tawh thuhoih gen a, a lungsimah zuauthu bek om hi. 25 A lungsimah a deihhuailo thu sagih tak om ahih manin kam khum takin a pau manin umkha kei in.
Itna i seel bawl sangin a langtangin taina hoihzaw hi. 6 I lawmte in hong liamsak hangin i hoihna ding a hong deihsakna hizaw hi. I galte in hong ngawng kawina pen hong lehbawlna a hihi.

Sathau namtui leh paknamtui in lung nuamsak a, lawmte' limbawlna in tha hatsak hi. 10 Na lawmte daangkoih kei in la, na pa' lawmte dong nangawn lawm bawl in. Na lungkham ciangin na sanggampa va ko kei in. A gamla-ah a om i sanggampa sangin a nai-ah a om i vengpa kimangzaw hi.
Pilna a deih mi in a pa lungdamsak a, numei paktat tawh a kikhawl mi in a neihsa teng lawnmang hi.

Mi khat sangin mi nih hoihzaw hi; amau' sepna thaman a tamzaw ngah uhhi. 10 Banghang hiam cihleh khat cimawh leh a khat in huh a, mi khat guak pen cimawh zenzen leh a huh ding omlo ahih manin a dahhuai pha mahmah a hihi. 11 Khua a dam ciangin mi nih lumkhawm leh khua lum hi; khat guak bangci khualum theih ding ahi hiam? 12 Mi khat bek hi leh zawhnop kisa a, nih pha leh kizo zolo hi. Zang thum-a kiheek khauhual bawhsat hak hi.
Mi khempeuh a inn vengte uh kidawm uh hen la, a sanggamte uh muang kei uh hen. Banghang hiam cihleh sanggamte khem hat ciat uh a, inn vengte khempeuh zong gensiat hat ciat uhhi.
Mi nih, thukimna om masa lopi-in lampi-ah tonkhawm thei uh ahi hiam?
Na vengte' thu upin nei kei in la, na lawmte zong muan'in nei kei in. Na ang-a lum na zi kiang nangawnah thu na gending kidawm in.

Tua ahih manin na mit taklam in na mawhna ding hong pian'sak leh khelkhia in la paai in. Na pumpi bupin hell khuk sungah hong kikhul sangin na pumpi na khat pelem leh nang-a' dingin hoihzaw lai hi. 30 Na taklam khut in na mawhna ding hong pian'sak leh sattan in la paai in. Na pumpi bupin hell khuk sungah hong kikhul sangin na pumpi na khat pelem leh nang-a' dingin hoihzaw lai hi.
Amaute' gamtatna tawh amau' pianzia na thei ding uhhi. Lingvom kung panin leenggah kilo ngeilo a, sialtalling kung panin theigah kilo ngei ahi hiam?
Banghang hiam cihleh keima minin mi nih leh thum bek nangawn a kikhopna peuhpeuhah kei ka om hi," a ci hi.
"Keima hangin hih bang naupangno khat a limbawl mi in kei hong limbawl hi a, kei hong limbawl mi in kei hong limbawl hiloin kei hong sawlpa a limbawl ahi hi," a ci hi.
Note tungah a hong kibawl ding na deih uh bangin midangte tungah na bawl un.
Ahi zongin Zeisu in ama kiangah, "Judas aw, napna tawh Mihing Tapa lehhek na hi hiam?" a na ci hi.
Zeisu in Martha-te unau leh Lazaras it mahmah hi. 6 Tua hinapi-in a cinat a zakkhit ciangin tua lai-ah ni nih taam lai veve hi.
Unau ki-itna lungsim nei unla, khatlekhat kizahtak bawl ding lamsang kidem un.

Note tungah ka hong piak thak thu in: Note khatlekhat na ki-it ding uh a hihi. Note ka hong it mah bangin note khatlekhat na ki-it un. 35 Note khatlekhat ki-it le uh cin keima nungzuite na hihna uh mi khempeuh in hong thei ding uhhi," a ci hi.
Upna neu mite pawlbawl unla, na ngaihsutna uh a kituah kei leh zong mawhsak kei un.

"Note tungah ka hong piak thu in: Note ka hong it zahin note khatlekhat na ki-it un. 13 Lawmte' tangding sih ngamna sangin lawmte itna a lianzaw om nawnlo hi. 14 Ka hong thupiak bangin na gamtat uh leh ka lawmte na hi uhhi. 15 Nasemte in a tote' nasepna bangmah theilo ahih manin note pen nasemte ka hong ci nawn kei ding hi. Ka Pa' tung panin ka zak thu khempeuh note kiangah hong genkhin ka hih manin note, lawm, ka hong ci zaw ding hi.
Amaute pen kei-a' dingin a si ngam uh a hihi. Amaute tungah a lungdam kei guak bek zong hiloin, Gentail pawlpi mi khempeuh zong a lungdam a hihi.
Lawmte aw, note' theihsa thute gensia langpangin, mite' upna nawngkaisakin pawl a kikhensak mite kidawm un. Tua bang mite tawh kikhawl vet kei un.

Lai ka hong gelhna sungah, numei tawh a paktat mite tawh na kikholhlohna ding uh ka hong gen hi. 10 Tua bang ka hong cih ciangin numei tawh a paktat, a huaiham, a guta, milim a bia lawkite tawh na kikhawl kei un, ka cihnopna hilo hi. Tuate tawh kikhawllo ding ci lehang, leitung panin paikhia un, cihna suak ding hi. 11 Tua ka hong laigelhna sungah ka cihnopna pen, thu upna sungah unau khat hi hang, ci napi-in numei tawh a paktat, a huaiham, milim a bia, mi gensia, zukham, ahih kei leh a guta theite tawh kikhawl kei un, cihnopna a hihi. Tua bang mite tawh an ne ding nangawnin zong na tukhawm kei un.

Thu umlo mite tawh na na semkhawm kei un. Midik leh mimawh bangci-in kipawlthei ding a, khuavak leh khuamial bangci-in omkhawm theiding ahi hiam? 15 Christ leh Dawimangpa bangci-in kithutuak theiding a, thu um mi leh thu umlo mi bangci-in a ngaihsutna uh kibang theiding ahi hiam?
A kuamah peuh in note' angsung ding bek zong kei unla, midangte' phattuamna ding zongzaw un.
Sanggamte aw, mi' khemsa-in ta kei un. Kikholhpih hoihlote in mi siasak thei hi.

Sanggamte aw, mi khatpeuh a gamta khial a om ciangin, Khasiangtho' deihna bangin a nungta note in tua a khialpa a manin a gamtatkik theihna dingin thunem zangin na huh un. Note in zong amah bangin ze-etna na tuahkhak lohna dingun na kikem un. 2 Thu haksa na tuah uh ciangin khatlekhat na kihuh un. Tua hi leh Christ' thukham a zui na hi uhhi.

Tua ahih ciangin Topa' na ka sepna hangin thong a kia keimah in note' nuntakzia dingin a hong deihna tawh a kilawm a kituakin na nuntakna dingun ka hong hanthawn hi. 2 Kiniamkhiatin, thunemin, lungduai-in om tawntung un. Khatlekhat kihuhna tawh na ki-itna uh kilangsak un. 3 Khasiangtho kimakai sakin, khatlekhat kilemin pawlkhat na hihna uh na kipsak tawntung un. 4 A kibang lametna khat bek a ngahkhawm dingin Pasian in note hong sap mah bangin eite khempeuh pumkhat bek hi-in Khasiangtho zong khat bek mah a neikhawm ihi hi. 5 Topa khat bek, upna khat bek, tuiphumna khat bek mah a zangkhawm ihi hi.

Hih bang mawhnate i bawl hangin phamawh kei, ci-in a mawk gen mite' khemsa-in ta kei un. Pasian thu mangloin hih bangin a gamta mite in Pasian' hehna a thuak ding uh a hihi. 7 Tua ahih manin tua bangin a gamta mite tawh kisukha vet kei un.
Note ka hong phawk simin ka biak Pasian tungah ka lungdamna ka ko hi.

Note kiang panin thu ka zakna hangin ka lung a noptheihna dingin note kiangah Timothy ka hong paisak baihna dingin Topa Zeisu in hong huh ding hi, ci-in ka lamen hi. 20 Note ka hong lunghihmawh zahin amah bek mah in note hong lunghihmawhpih hi.

Note lakah khatlekhat a kilungkimlo na om uh ciangin khatlekhat na mawhna uh kimaisakin na kihuh ciat un. Topa in note' mawhna hong maisak bangin note zong khatlekhat na mawhna uh na kimaisak ding uhhi. 14 Hihte khempeuh banah, mi khempeuh kilem takin a hong om khawmsak thei ahi ki-itna na bulphuh un.
Tua ahih manin tu laitakin na omzia uh mah bangin khatlekhat kihanthawnin na kihuh ciat ta un.
Sanggamte aw, i Topa Zeisu Christ min tawh kong sawlnop uh thu panin: Note tungah ka hong hilhsa uh thute a zuilo, a thadah gamtat thu uppih mite tawh na kikhawl kei un.
biakna thu a puathamteng zui napi-in biakna hangin vangliatna thu a omte deihlo ding uhhi. Tua bangin a gamta mite na pelh in.
Keimah kihutna ding thu ka gen masak ni-in kuamah in hong koppih loin hong taisanmang uhhi. Tua thu hangin mawhsakna thuak kei beek uh hen!
Khatlekhat ki-itin a hoih nate i sepna dingin kihanthawn ciat ni.
Laisiangtho in, "Abraham in Pasian um a, a upna hangin Pasian in mihoihin a sang hi," ci-in a genna thumanin tung takpi a, Abraham pen Pasian' lawmpa kici hi.
Ka it lawmte aw, Pasian pen itna hong pian'khiatna bulpi ahih manin eite khatlekhat ki-it ni. Itna a nei mi peuhmah, Pasian' tate hi a, Pasian a thei uhhi.
Christ in eite tungah hong thupiakna in: Pasian a it mi in a Christian mipihte zong it ding hi, cihna a hihi.
Ka lawm it Gaias aw, nang na ci damin na vai khempeuh zong na ma pai ding hi, ci-in ka lamen hi. Kha thu tawh kisai lamsangah zong bangmah lungkhamna omlo ding hi, ci-in ka thei hi.
"Mi khat in a vengte' gan khat peuhpeuh kawm a, a neipa omloin a liam a, a si zongin, amah in a kicingin loh ding hi.

"Note tawh a om, a zawng keima mite khat peuhpeuh tungah sum leitawi na piak uh leh, ama tungah sum leitawi a piapa bangin na om kei ding uh a, ama tung panin a meet na dok kei ding uhhi. 26 Khapna ahi na vengpa' puan silh lai na lak ngei khak leh nitum ma-in ama tungah na pia kik ding hi.
"Note na guta kei ding uhhi. A manloin na gamta kei ding uh a, khatlekhat tungah zuau na kigen kei ding uhhi.

Na sanggampa uh no kiangah hong ten' theihna dingin ama tung panin a meet a khang la kei unla, na Pasian uh zahtak un. 37 Note in ama tungah a meetin sum leitawi pialoin, ama tungah a meetin na an uh zong na pia kei ding uhhi.

"Kum sagih a cin' simin leiba maisakna na nei ding uhhi. 2 Maisakna ding zia in: Leitawi a pia mi khempeuh in a vengte tungah leitawi-a a piaksate maisak ding hi. { Topa' } maisakna thu kigen khin ahih manin a vengpa, a sanggampa' tung pan kuamah in leiba siik nawnlo ding hi. 3 Gamdang mite' tung pan na siik thei ding uh a, ahih hangin na sanggamte uh tung panin no-a' hong bat peuhmah na maisak ding uhhi. 4 "Ahih hangin tuni-a kong gen hih thupiakna khempeuh zui-in { Topa } note' Pasian' aw na ngaih nak uh leh note' lakah a zawng omlo ding hi (Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } na Pasian un na neih dingun gamhluahin hong piak leitang tungah { Topa } in note thupha hong pia ding hi). 5-6 Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } na Pasian un hong ciamsa bangin note thupha hong pia ding a, minam tampi tungah leitawi na pia ding uh a, ahih hangin note in lei na tawi kei ding uhhi. Minam tampite na uk ding uh a, ahih hangin amaute in note hong uklo ding uhhi. 7 "{ Topa } na Pasian un note hong piak gam sunga na khuate uh khat peuhpeuh sungah na sanggam khat uh note lakah a zawng a om leh na lungsim uh khauhsak loin, na sanggam zawngpa uh huhloin na om kei ding uhhi. 8 Ama tungah na cingh gamtat ding uh a, bangbang hita leh ama kisap zah na leitawi ding uhhi.

Banghang hiam cihleh leitang tungah mizawng bei ngeilo ding hi. Tua ahih ciangin, ‘Gam sungah a om na sanggampa, na a kisam mite leh mizawngte tungah na cingh mahmah ding uhhi,’ ci-in thu kong pia hi.

"Na sanggampa tungah sumgum hita leh, ankhing hita leh, a meet ngaihsutna-in na khat peuhpeuh leitawi na pia kei ding uhhi. 20 Gamdang mi tungah a meetin leitawi na pia thei ding uh a, ahih hangin na sanggampa tungah a meetin leitawi na pia kei ding uhhi. Hihte pen a luah dingin na tumna uh gam sungah { Topa } na Pasian un na sepna khempeuh uhah thupha hong piak theihna ding a hihi.

Note' leitangah ama hunin guah a zusak ding leh na sepna khempeuh uh thupha a pia dingin { Topa } in a na hoih kholna vantung note hong hon' ding hi. Note in minam tampite tungah leitawi na pia ding uh a, ahih hangin note in leitawi na la kei ding uhhi. 13 Note in tuni-a kong thugente limtakin zuihna tawh { Topa } na Pasian uh thupiaknate mangin, tuni-a no kong thupiakna kammalte panin, pasian dangte' na semin a bia dingin na pial kei nak uh leh, { Topa } in a makai-in note hong bawl ding a, mi' nung zui-in hong bawllo ding hi. Tunglam bekah na kah ding uh a, na nuaikiat ngei kei ding uhhi.

"Note lakah a om peemtate lian semsem ding uh a, note na neu semsem ding uhhi. 44 Amaute in note' tungah leitawi hong pia ding uh a, note in amaute tungah leitawi na pia kei ding uhhi. Amaute a makai hi-in, note a nungzui na hi ding uhhi.
Ahih hangin khat in singluang a tan laitakin a heitang lengin tui sungah kia hi. Amah kiko-in, "Ala, ka topa! A kikawm hi ve'n," a ci hi.
ama sum a meetin a khalo, thutang mite a langpan'lo, golhguk a lalo mite teng ding uhhi. Hih bangin a gamtate pen ling ngeilo ding hi.
Leitung leh a tunga omte, leitung leh a tunga tengte { Topa}-a' a hihi.

Huhna a ngen dingin thumante a kiko ciangin { Topa } in za a, a haksatna khempeuh panun amaute a honkhia hi. 18 Lungsim kitamzante kiangah { Topa } hong om a, lungsim zangawpte a hon hi. 19 Thuman mi' thuakna a tam mahmah hangin tuate khempeuh panin { Topa } in amah a hon hi. 20 Amah in thuman mipa kem a, a guh khat zong kitanlo hi.
Migilo in leitawi la a, lohkikzo nawnlo hi. Thuman mi ahih leh cingh-in mi a pia hi.

Thuman mi a kinusiacip, a suanlekhakte ngen tawmin a kivak, ka neu lai-a kipanin tu-a ka teek hun ciangdong ka mu ngei nai kei hi. 26 Amah in mi citpiak ngitngetin, mi tungah leitawi piakhia a, a suanlekhakte zong thupha ngah mi a suak hi.
Cingh gamtatin mite tungah leitawi pia a, thutangin a gamta mite tungah thu a hoih hi.
Na hihna khempeuhah amah phawk in. Tua hi leh lampi man amah in hong lak ding hi.
Na neihsa leh na anpalte tawh { Topa } zahtak in.
Na hihzawh ding ahih nak leh midangte' kitangsapna huh tawntung in. 28 Na vaihawmsak theihpah ding thute ahih nak leh, zingciangin hong paikik in, ci-in a hun sotto kei in.

Ka ta aw, na lawmte khatpeuh in sum leitawi a lak ciangin a lohzawh kei leh ama tangin a lohsak dingin kam na ciamkha hiam? 2 Na kampauna hangin nang hong kimanin, na thuciamna hangin na awkkha hiam? 3 Ka ta aw, tua bang na hih khak leh, tua mipa' khutsungah a om na hi hi. Na suahtak theihna dingin manlangin a kiangah pai in la, hong khahna dingin ama kiangah thum in. 4 Ihmumu kei in la, om mawkmawk kei in. 5 Sabengpa' kiang panin a suahtakna dingin sakhi a tai bangin, thangah a awk vasa a kitom bangin na suahtakna dingin hanciam in. 6 Thadahpa aw, miksite kiangah pai in la, amau' nuntakzia va en in. 7 Amaute in a uk ding leh a makai ding kuamah neilo napi-in, 8 khuakhal sungin a nek ding uh, tuk hun sungin kaikhawm khol uhhi.
Midang khat' leiba lohsak ding na kiciam leh na kisik ding hi. Tua bang thu-ah kihel kei lecin nang-a' dingin hoihzaw hi.
Mi pawlkhat in sum zang ziahziah napi-in hau semsem uh a, mi pawlkhat cil mahmah napi, zawng semsem hi.
Ol takin hauhpakna oltak mahin kiamkik pah a, haksapi-in hauhtohna khangto semsem hi.
Thu a ngaihsun theilo mihaite bek midang' leiba lohsak dingin kipia ngam hi.
Mihaute in mizawngte uk a, leitawi a late pen a piate' sila a suak hi.
Midangte' leiba lohsak dingin kamciamin leiba tavuan lakha kei un. 27 A leiba lohsakzo kei le uh cin na lupna nangawn uh hong kidawhkhiatsak ding hi.
Mi khat in gamdang mi khat' leiba a lohsak dingin kam a ciam leh a ciam bangin ama neihsa kilaksak takpi ding hi.
Na tuuhonte hoihtakin thei in la, na bawnghonte hoihtakin kem in.
A meet a pung lakna tawh a hau mipa pen mizawngte a hehpih mipa-a' dingin sum a zon'sak hi lel hi.
Na thuciamna bangin na tun'sak kei ding leh thu ciam vet kei zaw in.
Sum deihna lungsim na neih leh lungkim hun cih na thei ngei kei ding hi. Na hauhnop hangin na deih khempeuh na ngah ngei kei ding hi. Hih pen a mawknapi a hihi.

Kuamah khemlo a, kuama na zong sutlo hi. Sum leitawi a lapa in khapna van a apte zong piakik hi. Gilkialte an vakin, puan neilote puan guan hi. 8 A meet bekbek lunggulhna-in sum leitawi pialo hi. Gamtatsiat ding utlo a, mite' thu a manin khensak hi. 9 Amah in ka thupiakte mangin, ka thukhamte hoihtakin zui hi. Tua bang mi pen mihoih ahih manin nungta ding hi, Topa { Pasian } in ci hi.
Leitunga a om ngun leh kham khempeuh keima-a' a hihi.
Midang a hehpih mite tungah Pasian in hehpihna pia ding ahih manin thupha ngah mi ahi uhhi.
sumkholna-ah ka sum na koihsak lecin hoih ding hi. Tua hi leh tu-a ka hong tun'kik ciangin a bulpi leh a meet ka ngahkhawm ding hi.
A mantakin kong genin-ah: Na liau sum na piak khit dong matengin thong sung panin na suakta ngei kei ding hi.
Mi khat peuhpeuh in na khat peuhpeuh hong nget leh na pia in la, nang kiang panin na a hong leitawi mite na pia in.
"Kuamah, to nih' sila hikhawm theilo hi. Khat mudahin khat it ding a, khat tungah thumanin khat simmawhbawl ding hi. Note in Pasian' na leh leitung sum na na semkhawm zo kei ding uhhi.

Tua ahih manin bang ne ding a, bang dawn ding a, bang silh ding ihi hiam, ci-in lunghimawh lua kei un. 32 (Gentail mite in lunghihmawh penin a neihte uhhih bangte a hihi.) Hih nate khempeuh na kisap lamtak uh vantungah a om na Pa un a thei hi. 33 Thudang khempeuh sangin Pasian' ukna leh ama deihna na zuih theihna ding uh thupi ngaihsut masazaw un. Tua hi leh hih na kisapna dangte khempeuh uh zong hong piathuah veve ding hi.
Kumpipa zong a heh suak ahih manin a leiba khempeuh a lohkhit matengin thong sungah a kikhumna dingin thu a pia hi.

Ngahkik ding na lametna uh mite tung bekah leitawi na piak uh leh Banghangin thupha ngah ding na hi uhhiam? Mawhneite nangawn in zong a piakzah mah uh a ngahkik dingin khatlekhat kileitawi uhhi. 35 Tua bang lelin note na gamta kei ding uhhi. Na galte uh itin amaute tungah thupha bawl unla, lohkik ding lamen loin leitawi pia un. Tua hi leh na thaman uh lian ding a, a Lianpen Pasian' tate na hi ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh lungdamna mel a thei theilo mite leh a huaiham mite tungah amah migi hi. 36 Tua ahih manin na Pa un hehpihna a neih bangin note in zong hehpihna lungsim nei ta un.
Mi khatpeuh in inn lianpi khat lamding a sawm leh, ka zo zo ding hiam cih a theihna dingin a bei dingzah tuat masa hi.
Hih leitung sumte-ah na cihtak kei uh leh kua in no tungah vantung sum hong ap ngam ding ahi hiam?
Pasian in mihingte' theihloh hun lai-a a gamtatnate uh phamawh a sakloh hangin, tu-in mun khempeuha om mi khempeuhte a gamtat siatna panun a kiheina dingun thu a hong pia khinzo hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh mawhna in thaman hong piak pen sihna hi a, ahi zongin i Topa Zeisu tawh i kipawl manin Pasian' hong piakkhong pen nuntak tawntungna a hihi.

Tua ahih manin phiangsiah piak dingte tungah pia-in, mangmu piak dingte tungah pia-in, zahtak dingte zahtak bawlin, pahtawi dingte pahtawi ta un. 8 Khatlekhat ki-it ding cih lohbuang, kuama tungah leiba nei kei un. Midang a itte in Thukham deihna teng a zuikhin a hihi.

Na pumpi uh, Pasian in a hong piak, note' sungah a teng Khasiangtho' biakinn ahih lamtak theilo na hi uhhiam? Note' pumpi, nomau' neihsa hilo a, Pasian-a' a hihi. 20 Note pen Pasian in a hong leisa na hih manun na pumpi uh Pasian' minthan'na dingin na zang un.
Note pen Pasian' hong leisa na hih manun mite' sila suak kei un.
Ka neih khempeuh midangte tungah pia-in, Pasian' nasepna hangin kihaltumna ka thuak ahi zongin itna ka neih kei leh ka phattuamna bangmah omlo hi.
Kei ka hong pai ciangin sumpi kaihkhop tawm a omlohna dingin na ngahna uh tawh kizui-in Nipi simin na tuamkoih unla, na na khol un.
Piaknopna lungsim na neih nak uh leh na neihlohnate uh siksan hiloin na neihna uh tawh kizui-in na piak uh Pasian in hong sang ding hi.
Pasian in piaknopna lungsim tawh a pia mite bek deih ahih manin, a kuamah peuh in na lungsim sung uhah na ngaihsutsa zah ciat uh na pia unla, pia nuamlopipi leh sawlzawh thu bek tawh na pia kei un.
Huaihamna lungsim leh kisialh nopna lungsim tawh bangmah gamta kei un. Kiniamkhiat ciat unla, midangte thupi ngaihsutzaw un.
A na ka sep i Topa Pasian in ama hauhna tawh kizui-in Christ Zeisu hangin note' kitangsapna khempeuh hong pia ding hi.
Mi khatpeuh in a beh a phung, a diakdiakin a innkuansung mite a vak nop kei leh a upna a nusia hita a, thu umlo mite sangin siazaw lai hi.
Sum deihluatna in siatna namkim piangsak hi. Mi pawlkhat in sum deihlua liang uh ahih manin a upna panun pialkhia-in gimna lungkhamna tampi a thuaklawh uhhi.
Sum deihluatna tawh na kipelhna dingun na nuntakna uhah kikem unla, na neihzah uh tawh lungkim un. Pasian in, "Note ka hong nusia ngei kei ding a, ka hong tamasak ngei kei ding hi," hong ci hi.

Tuni ahih kei leh zingciangin tua khua tua khua-ah va pai-in, kum khat bang va omin, sumbawlin a meet tampi va ngah ni, a ci mite aw, ka thugen hong ngai dih un. 14 Zingciangin na nuntakna uh bangci ding cih nangawn na thei kei uhhi. Meiilum tawlkhat sung kaii-in a mangthang pak tawh a kibang lel na hi uhhi.

Banghang hiam cihleh leitang tungah mizawng bei ngeilo ding hi. Tua ahih ciangin, ‘Gam sungah a om na sanggampa, na a kisam mite leh mizawngte tungah na cingh mahmah ding uhhi,’ ci-in thu kong pia hi.
"{ Topa } na Pasian un note hong piak leitangah na tun' uh ciangin, tua minamte' gamtatna a kihhuaite zuih ding na kisin kei ding uhhi.

Ahih hangin amaute in, "Kote hong uk dingin kumpi khat hong pia in," a cih uh ciangin hih thu in Samuel lungkimlo sak hi. Samuel in { Topa' } kiangah thu ngen hi. 7 Tua ciangin { Topa } in Samuel kiangah, "Amaute in nang kiangah hong gen thu khempeuh ngai in; Banghang hiam cihleh amaute in nang hong nial hilo a, amaute tungah kumpi hihna panin kei hong nial ahi uhhi. 8 Egypt panin amaute ka paikhiatpih-a kipan tuni dongin amaute in kei hong nusia-in pasian dangte' na semin, kei' tungah hong bawlnate khempeuh mah bangin amaute in nang tungah zong hong bawl ahi uhhi. 9 Tua ahih ciangin tu-in amaute' thu ngai in. Amaute limtakin hilhkholin, amaute' tungah a uk ding kumpipa' hih zia ding lak bek in," a ci hi.

keima minin a kisam ka mite amau mahmah kiniamkhiatin, thu ngenin ka mai hong zong a, amau' gitlohnate panin a kihei uh leh, keimah in vantung panin ka za ding a, amaute' khialhna maisakin a leitang uh ka hoihsak kik ding hi.

{ Topa } in Satan kiangah, "Koi pana hong pai na hi hiam?" a ci hi. Satan in { Topa } dawngin, "Leitung khempeuh a lu pan a taw dong vak kawikawi-in ka va phehlehna mun panin ka hong pai hi," a ci hi.

Vantung in Pasian' minthan'na gen a, vanpi in ama nasepna taangko hi. 2 Nisimin thu gengen a, zan simin theihtelna pulaklak hi. 3 Pauna leh kammal omlo a, amau' aw kizalo hi. 4 Ahih hangin a aw uh leitung khempeuhah kizel a, a kammal uh leimong dongah a tung hi. Amau' sungah ni-a' ding omna khat bawl khin a,
Banghang hiam cihleh migilote kipuaseh ding a, ahih hangin { Topa } a ngakte in leitung luah ding uhhi.
Amah pen { Topa, } eite' Pasian hi a, ama thupiaknate leitung khempeuh in a zuih ding a hihi.
Kei pen hih leitungah peemta ka hi hi; kei' kiang panin na thuphate seel kei in.

Hih leitungah ka phawk dang thu khat in: A taihat mite in tai kidemna-ah zo tawntunglo a, galhang thahatte in gal zo tawntunglo hi. A pilte in an a kham ngah tawntunglo a, a pilte hau tawntunglo hi. Hih theih siamna a neite milian suak tawntunglo hi. Mi khempeuh tungah kamsiatna vive tung hi.
Vantungte aw, na za un; leitung aw, na ngai in; bang hang hiam cih leh { Topa } in thu hong gen khinzo a, "Ka pattahsa ka tate in kei hong lehdo uhhi.

Leitung a lingsakgawp dingin { Topa } a kipat ciangin amah kihtakna leh a lian ama minthan'na panin suanghawm sung leh leihawm sungah mite bu ding uhhi. 20 Amah pen leitung a lingsakgawp dingin a hong kipat hun ciangin { Topa } kihtakna leh a lian ama minthan'na vang panin suanghawmpite sung leh keenhawmte sungah a buk theihna dingun amau' bawltawm ngun leh kham milimte, buite leh bakte a paih ding uhhi.

"Thuman a thei, na lungsim sung uhah keima thu a vom mite aw, ka thu ngai un. Mihingte' kosiatna kihta kei unla, amaute' hong simmawhna hangin lungkia kei un. 8 Banghang hiam cihleh nget in puan a nektum bangin amaute beimang ding a, lungno in samul puan a pehtum bangin amaute maimang ding uhhi. Ahih hangin keima khahkhiatna om tawntung ding a, khang tawntungin ka hotkhiatna kip ding hi," a ci hi.

"Note pen leitung mite-a' dingin ci tawh na kibang uhhi. Ahi zongin ci a alna bei leh i alsakkik theihna ding lampi om nawnlo hi. A kizatna ding bangmah om nawnlo a, mite' tuatcilgawp dingin kipaai lel hi.
Midangte in na gamtatna hoihte uh a muh ciangin vantungah a om na Pa uh min a phat theihna dingun mite mai-ah na gamtat hoihna uh khuavak bangin na kilangsak un.
"Nget in ne-in a kekseu theihna, gutate in luhin a guktheihna hih leitungah na sum uh khol kei un.
"Kuamah, to nih' sila hikhawm theilo hi. Khat mudahin khat it ding a, khat tungah thumanin khat simmawhbawl ding hi. Note in Pasian' na leh leitung sum na na semkhawm zo kei ding uhhi.
"Ngiahon lakah tuu a kikhah bangin note hong sawlkhia ka hih manin gul bangin pilvang unla, vakhu bangin migi un.
Hih leitung nuntakna a hon nuamte in a nuntakna taktak taanlawh ding a, keima hangin a nuntakna a taanlawhte in a nuntakna taktak a ngah ding uhhi.
Mi khatpeuh in hih leitung khempeuh a ngah hangin a nuntakna bulpi suplawh leh bang phattuamna om ahi hiam? A nuntakna bang tawh leikik thei nawn ding ahi hiam?
Tua ciangin Zeisu in ama kiangah, "Na namsau a paai-ah siatkik in. Namsau a zangte namsau mah tawh si ding hi.
Mi khat in leitung khempeuh a ngah hangin a nuntakna bulpi suplawh leh bang phattuamna om ding ahi hiam?

"Note kiangah kong genin-ah, hih na leitung sum uh a bei ciangin tawntung nuntakna inn-ah hong kilutsak theihna dingin lawm zon'na-in hih leitung sumte na zang un. 10 "A tawmno-ah a diktatte pen a tamah zong diktat uh a, a tawmno-ah a citaklote pen a tamah zong citaklo uhhi. 11 Hih leitung sumte-ah na cihtak kei uh leh kua in no tungah vantung sum hong ap ngam ding ahi hiam?
A kipat cilin Thu na om a, tua Thu, Pasian tawh na omkhawm a, tua Thu, Pasian a hihi.
Ama gen khuavak taktak pen zong leitungah hong tung khin a, mi khempeuh a taan' khin hi. 10 Amah, leitungah om a, amah tawh leitung a kibawl hinapi-in leitung mite in amah na thei khalo uhhi.
Pasian in leitung mite hong it mahmah ahih manin ama Tapa a um mi khempeuh si nawnloin a hin' tawntung theihna dingun a Tapa neihsun a hong piak dongin a hong itna a hong lak hi.
Tua khit ciangin Zeisu in mihonte kiangah a thugenna khatah, "Kei pen leitung khuavak ka hihi. Kei hong zuite in khuavak nuntakna nei ding uh a, khuamial gamtatna neilo ding uhhi," a ci hi.
Tu-in leitung thukhen ding hun hong tungta a, hih leitung a ukpa kilawnkhia ding hi.
Kei hong um mi khempeuh, khuamial sungah a om nawnlohna dingun leitung khuavak bangin ka hong pai hi.
Tu-in hih leitung a ukpa hong tungta ahih manin note kiangah thu kong gen man nawn kei ding hi. Amah in keima tungah aana neilo hi.

"Leitung mite in note hong muhdah leh kei a hong mudah masa ahihna thu na thei un. 19 Hih leitung mite tawh a kipawl hi le uh cin leitung mite in amau pawlte hong it ding hi. Ahi zongin hih leitung mite lak panin note ka hong teelkhia a, amaute tawh kipawl nawnlo na hih manun a hong mudah ahi uhhi. 20 ‘Sila pen a topa sangin lianzaw lo hi,’ ci-in ka hong thugenna phawk un. Amaute in kei hong bawlsiat uh leh note zong hong bawlsia ding hi. Ka thugente hong zuih uh leh note' thugente zong hong zui ding hi. 21 Ahi zongin amaute in kei hong sawlpa theilo uh ahih manin keima mi na hihna uh hangin amaute in hih bangin hong bawl ding uh a hihi.
hih leitung a ukpa pen thukhenna a thuakkhin ahihna thu zong lak ding hi.

Note khempeuh kithehthangin na inn ciat uh zuanin kei bek na hong nusiat ding uh hun a hong tung ding hi bek loin tu-in a hong tung hita hi. Ahi zongin kei guak a hong kinusia hilo a, Pa in kei hong ompih hi. 33 Keimah tawh na hong kipawlna uh hangin lungnopna na neihtheihna dingun hih thu a hong gen ka hihi. Leitung gimna na thuak ding uhhi. Ahi zongin keimah in leitung nate zo khinta ka hih manin lungnuamin om un," a ci hi.
Amaute tungah na thu ka gen khin hi. Ahi zongin keimah bangin amaute zong hih leitung mite tawh kipawllo uh ahih manin leitung mite in a mudah uhhi.

Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Keima ukna pen hih leitung gam hilo hi. Keima ukna hih leitung gam hi leh Jerusalem khua-a Jew mi uliante' khutsungah hong kipiak lohna dingin ka nungzuite in a do ding uhhi. Tua ahih manin keima ukna pen hih leitung tawh kizomlo hi," a ci hi.

Pasian in leitung a pian'sak cila kipanin a kimu theilo ama pianzia ahi tawntung vanglianpa leh Pasian ahihna thute ama bawlsa nate tung panin teltakin hong kilang hi. Tua ahih manin, "Thei kei ing," ci-in paulap a zon'theihna ding uh omlo hi.

Mi khat hangin leitungah mawhna hong om a, tua mawhna hangin sihna hong piang hi. Mi khempeuh mawh uh ahih manin tu-a bangzia-in mi khempeuh tungah sihna hong tung hi. 13 Thukham a omma pekin leitungah mawhna na omkhin a, thukham a omlohna munah Pasian in mawhna a ciamtehna laibu neilo hi.
I leitung lungsim tawh i nuntak laiteng, thukham hangin i hihnop semsem mawhnopnate i gamta a, tuate khempeuh sihna tawh a kizom a hihi.
Tuhuna i thuaknate pen Pasian in a hong piakding minthan'na tawh ka ngaihsut khawm ciangin, tuhuna i thuaknate gentham ka sa het kei hi.
Tua ahih manin leitung ngeina tawh a suak tate pen Pasian' ta hilo a, Pasian' thuciamna tawh kizui-a a suakte bek suanlekhak taktakin a kisim pan hizaw hi.

Leitung mihingte' gamtat bangin gamta kei unla, na lungsim uh kikheelin Pasian kipuahpha sak un. Tua hi leh a hoih nate bang hi a, bangte in amah lungkim sakin, bangte a kicing hiam ci-in thei-in Pasian' deihna na phawk thei ding uhhi.

Ahi zongin Khasiangtho a neilo mite in Pasian' Khasiangtho in a hong piak nate sang theilo uhhi. Khasiangtho a nei mite bek in theithei uh ahih manin amaute in tel theilo uh a, amau-a' dingin a haihuai thu khat ahi lel hi.
Ahi zongin eite in hih leitung mite tawh mawhsakna i thuakkhawm lohna dingin Topa in eite hong thuhilhin gim hong pia hi.

Leitung tawh a kipawl mite pen lei tawh a kibawl mite tawh a kibang hi a, vantung tawh a kipawl mite pen vantung panin a hong pai mipa tawh a kibang a hihi. 49 Eite in lei tawh a kibawl mite' lim i puak mah bangin vantung panin a hong pai Mipa' lim zong a pua ding ihi hi.

Tua bang mite pen hih leitung pasian gilote in a lungsim mit uh tawsak ahih manin umlo uh a, Pasian tawh a kibang teekteek Christ minthan'na hangin amaute tungah a hong taang lungdamna thu khuavak mu theilo uhhi.

Kote' pum tung panin Zeisu' nuntakna a kilat theihna dingin hih ka leitung pumpi nuntakna mahmah uhah zong Zeisu' sihna bangmah ka thuak zelzel uhhi. 11 Tua ahih manin kote' leitung pumpi-ah Zeisu Christ nuntakna a kilatna dingin Zeisu hangin ka leitung nuntak sungun sihna ding lauhuaina ka phukha tawntung uhhi.
Tua thu hangin ka lungkia tuankei uhhi. Kote' leitung pumpi in damdamin muatlam ding a manawh ahi zongin ka kha nuntakna uh a nini-in thaksuak semsem hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh a kimuthei nate a mitsuan' ka hi kei uh a, a kimu theilo nate a mitsuan' ka hi uhhi. A kimuthei nate tomno sung bek kimang a, a kimu theilo nate a tawntungin a kip a hihi.

Kote pen leitungah a teng mi ka hi mah uhhi; ahi zongin leitung lungsim ngimna tawh galdo ka hi kei uhhi. 4 Kote' zat galdona hiam pen leitung galhiam lelte hilo a, galte' pan'mun phualpi a susiazo ding Pasian' galhiam khauhte a hihi. 5 Mite' ngaihsutna a manlote ka thalnial gawpzo uh a, Pasian' thu theihna ding a khaktan thei nate ka susiagawp uh a, mi khempeuh' ngaihsutna zo gawpin Christ' thu a mang dingin ka bawl uhhi.
A siahuai tuhun sung panin eite a hong suahtaksakna dingin eite' Pa Pasian' deihna tawh kizui-in i mawhna hangin tua Zeisu Christ amahmah a hong kipiatawm a hihi.

Banghang hiam cihleh ei' pumpi ut bangin gamta lehang Khasiangtho' deihna tawh na kituaklo a, Khasiangtho' deihna bangin gamta lehang ei' pumpi deihna tawh na kituaklo zel ahih manin hih nihte gel a kilangpang niloh na hi a, note' ut bangin a gamta theilo na hi uhhi.
Tua hi a, Zeisu Christ a zui mite in a leitung lungsim pianzia uh leh a leitung lungsim deihna khempeuh uh a phiat khitsa a hihi.

Ahi zongin keimah in ahih leh, singlamteh tungah i Topa Zeisu a sihna thu bek ka kisialhpih ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh singlamteh tungah ama sihna hangin kei-a' dingin leitung thute misi bang a, kei zong, leitung thu-ah misi mah ka bang hi.
Tuahun lai-in leitung gitloh gamtatnate na zui uh a, Pasian thu a umlo mite sungah tu laitakin na a sem, huihlak a ukte' thu na mang uhhi.

Tu-a kipanin Topa tawh na kipawlna uh leh ama vangliatna hangin na tha uh khauhsak ta un. 11 Dawimangpa' hong hihna ding khempeuh na dalzawhna dingun Pasian' galvan namkim na zang un. 12 Eite' do pen leitung mite hilo a, vantung huihlakah a om ukna, aana a neite, hih leitung khuamial a uk a tuamtuamte a hihi. 13 Tua ahih manin hun haksat hun hong tun' ciangin galte' hong suknateng khempeuh nangzo-in, a tawpna-ah a gualzo na hih theihna dingun Pasian' galvan namkim na zang un.
Tua ahih manin vantung, leitung, leinuai-a om mi khempeuh in Zeisu pahtawi-in khukdin' ding uh a,
Ahi zongin eite ihih leh vantung gam mite ihi a, vantung panin a hong pai ding Topa Zeisu Christ, eite' Honpa, lawptakin a ngakte ihi hi.
Christ thu tawh a kituak lopi-in, tangthu tuanthu ahi a, huihlak a ukte' thu siksanin ahi zongin, bangmahin a kimanglo leitung pilna tawh mite' khemsa-in sila na suahkhak lohna dingun kingaihsun un.

Note pen Christ tawh a thokik khinte na hih manun, Pasian' taklam a kumpi tokhom tungah Christ a tutna mun vantung thute ngaihsutin nei un. 2 Vantungah a om thute ngaihsutin nei unla, leitungah a om thute ngaihsutin nei kei un.

Eite in i lamet, a lian Pasian leh eite hong Hon Zeisu Christ a vangliatna hong kilatkik ding hun ngakin i om laitakin i biakna tawh a kituaklo thute leh leitung nate deihna phiatin, lungsim hi hithiatin omin, thutangin, hih leitungah Pasian' deihna bangin i nuntakna dingin tua hehpihna thu in eite hong hilh hi.

Hih mite khempeuh in amaute tungah piak dingin Pasian' ciam thute ngah nailo uh a, gamlapi-ah a omlai galmuhin hopih thei bek uh a, hih leitungah khualmi peemta hi lel hang, ci-in kitheihna tawh omin a upna mah uh tawh a si uhhi.

Ahi zongin amaute' lunggulh pen leitung sangin a hoihzaw vantung gam a hihi. Pasian in amaute-a' dingin khuapi khat na vaihawmsak ahih manin, tua bang mite in amah pen ka Pasian uhhi, ci-in a gen ding uh Pasian in maizumna-in na ngaihsunlo hi.

Tua hi a, eite in i kiim i pamah hih zahin a tam teci nei ihih ciangin eite a hong dongtangsak thei nate khempeuh leh eite a hong gakcip mawhna leh khialhnate khempeuh paikhia-in, i mai-ah a om taina ding lampi a mong dongin lungsim kiptakin tai ni.
Tua bang pilnate vantung panin a hong pai hilo a, leitung pilna, kha thu tawh a kisailo, a dawivai a hihi.
A citaklo mite aw, leitung tawh kipawlna pen Pasian tawh kigalneihna ahih lamtak theilo na hi uhhiam? Leitung tawh a kipawl mite pen Pasian tawh a kigalneih dingin a kibawlbawl ahi uhhi.
Ka itte aw, hih leitungah gamdang mi, a peempak bangin kingaihsun unla, na kha nuntakna uh tawh a kilehngat pumpi' deihnate na kikham un.
I Topa leh Honpa Zeisu Christ theihna hangin leitung siatna sung panin suakta khin napi-un, leitung siatna-ah awk kikin a lelte pen, a masa a pianzia uh sangin a nunung a pianzia uh siahuaizaw hi.

Hih leitung nate leh Pasian tawh a kizomlo thute deihluatin nei kei un. Mi khatpeuh in hih leitung nate a deihluat leh amah in Pa Pasian it taktak theilo hi. 16 Banghang hiam cihleh pumpi deihna, mit tawh mu-in i deihte, leh mite' kisaktheihpih nate ahi leitung nate khempeuh pen Pa Pasian tawh a kizom thu hilo a, leitung tawh a kizom thu a hihi. 17 Leitung nate leh leitung deihnate a beibei ding hita a, ahi zongin Pasian' deihna bangin a gamta mite pen kip tawntung ding hi.
Tua ahih manin lawmte aw, leitung mite in hong muhdah leh lamdang sa kei un.
Ka it tate aw, note, Pasian' mite na hi uh a, tua bang kamsang kineihkhemte a zokhin na hi uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh leitung mite a pan'pih dawimangpa sangin note hong ompih Pasian vanglian zaw hi.

Pasian' ta ahite peuhmah in leitung nate zo uh a, i upna tawh leitung nate tungah a gualzo ihi hi. 5 Kuate in leitung nate zo ding ahi hiam i cihleh, Zeisu pen Pasian' Tapa hi, ci-in a umte bek in zo ding uhhi.

Gamtat khialhna khempeuh mawhna hi a, ahi zongin mawhna khempeuh in sihna ciangdong piangsak khinlo hi. 18 Pasian' tate in mawhna bawbawllo uhhi. Pasian' Tapa in amaute kem a, Dawimangpa in amaute susia zolo hi. 19 Leitung midang khempeuh Dawimangpa' khutsungah a om ahi zongin eite pen Pasian' mi ihihna thu i thei hi.

Na thuakding uh haksatnate kihta kei un. Dawimangpa in note pawlkhat thong sungah hong khia-in hong ze-et ding hi. Gimna na thuak hun ding uh ni sawm sung bek hi ding hi. Na sih dongun kei tungah hong citak un. Tua hi leh nuntakna lukhu ka hong pia ding hi.

A gualzo, a tawp dongin keima deihna bangin a gamtazo mite tungah, keimah in ka Pa tung panin ka ngah vangliatnate mah ka pia ding hi. Minam dangte tungah ukna a neihna ding uh aana ka pia ding a, leibeel satkhap bangin sik ciangkhut tawh minam dangte satgawp ding uhhi.
Tua ciangin van thak khat leh lei thak khat ka mu hi. Van masa leh lei masa maimang khin a, tuipi zong om nawnlo hi.

Note' gamtatnate ka thei a, vot lah vot vetlo, sa lah sa vetloin na omna uh zong ka thei hi. A vot na hih kei uh leh a sa hi vet le uh cin ka ut hi. 16 Ahi zongin note pen vot lah vot vetlo, sa lah sa vetloin a laklawhin om na hih manun ka kam sung panin ka hong siakhia ding hi.

Pasian in, "Leitung in kung tuamtuamte piangsak hen la, tang a nei kungnote, a gah sungah tang a om singgah kungte, amau' nam ciatin leitungah piangsak hen," ci hi. Tua mah bangin a piang pah hi. 12 Leitung in kung tuamtuamte piangkhiasak a, kungnote in amau' nam ciatin tang piangsakin, singkung in a sungah tang a om gahte piangsakin, amau' nam ciatciatin piangsak hi. Pasian in tua pen hoih hi, ci-in a mu hi.
Pasian in, "En un, leitung maitang khempeuhah a om, tang a piangsak kungnote khempeuh leh a gah sungah tang a om singkung khempeuh note tungah kong pia khinta hi. Tuate an-in na nei ding uhhi.
Tua ciangin a sanggampa Abel nei leuleu hi. Tu-in Abel, tuu kempa hi a, Kain, lo khopa a hihi.
Leitung a omlai tengin, lo pawi hun leh anlak hun, a vot leh a sa, khuakhal leh phalbi, sun leh zan beilo ding hi," a ci hi.
Noah pen lo kho masapa hi a, amah in leenggui lo khat a bawl hi.
Pasian in na tungah vantung daitui hong pia hen la, na lote hoihsak ta hen. An leh leenggahzu tampi hong pia ta hen.
Eite in lo lai-ah buhlom i hen a, keima buhlom tho-in ding tang hi. Tua kiimah note' buhlom kikhawm a, keima buhlom mai-ah kun uhhi," a ci hi.
"Mei kuangin gam kang a, a kikhol an ahi a, a ding lai an ahi a, lo ahi zongin a kat leh, mei a kangsakpa in a cing takin loh ding hi.

"Note in na leitang uhah kum guk sung khai tuhin a piangte na kaikhawm ding uhhi. 11 Ahih hangin a kum sagihna ciangin, nomau' mi a zawngte in a nek theihna dingin leitang tawlnga sakin, lokhulin na omsak ding uh a, gamlak ganhingte in mizawngte' nekloh teng ne thei ding uhhi. Na leenggui lote uh leh na oliv lote uh zong tua bangmahin na hih ding uhhi.

{ Topa } in Moses leh Aaron tungah, 2 "Israel mite kiangah hih bangin gen un: Hihte pen leitunga om ganhing khempeuh lak panin na nek theih ding uh a nungta ganhing a hihi. 3 Ganhingte lak panin a khecin a ka, eknel a hai peuhmah na ne thei ding uhhi. 4 Ahi zongin eknel haite lak pan hita leh khecin kate lak pan hita leh, note in na nek theihloh dingte uh: Kalaoh in eknel a hai hangin a khecin ka lo ahih ciangin note-a' dingin a nin a hihi. 5 Sakikh ganhing in eknel a hai hangin a khecin ka lo ahih ciangin note-a' dingin a nin a hihi. 6 Bilpi in eknel a hai hangin a khecin ka lo ahih ciangin note-a' dingin a nin a hihi. 7 Vok pen khecin ka ahih hangin eknel hailo ahih ciangin note-a' dingin a nin a hihi.

"Note in ka thukhamte na zui ding uhhi. Note in na ganhingte uh a namdang tawh ta na neisak kei ding uhhi. Note in na lo uhah khaici nam nih na pawikhawm kei ding uh a, khau nam nih a kigan puan zong na silh kei ding uhhi.

"Note, Kanaan gamah tungin nek dingin kung nam khempeuh na suan uh ciangin, note in amau' gahte kum thum sung na ne kei ding uhhi. 24 A kum lina ciangin amau' gah khempeuh siangtho-in, { Topa' } tungah phatna biakna hi ding hi. 25 Ahih hangin a kum ngana ciangin tuate pen note-a' dingin hong gah semsemna dingin tuate' gah na ne thei ding uhhi; kei pen { Topa } na Pasian uh ka hihi.

"Note in na leitang panun an na lak uh ciangin, na lonawl dongun la loin, an na lak khit uh ciangin a sangte zong na khawm kei ding uh a, mizawngte leh khualmi-a' dingin tuate na nusia ding uhhi; kei pen { Topa } na Pasian uh ka hi hi," a ci hi.

Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: Note kong piak leitangah na tun' uh ciangin, { Topa } pahtawina-in leitang tawlngak hun na omsak ding uhhi. 3 Kum guk sung note in na lo uh na pawi ding uh a, kum guk sung na leenggui lo uh hahin a gahte na kaikhawm ding uhhi. 4 Ahih hangin a kum sagihna-ah leitang-a' ding a thupi tawlngakna sabbath, { Topa } pahtawina sabbath om ding hi. Note in na lo uh na pawi kei ding uh a, na leenggui lo uh na hah kei ding uhhi. 5 A li pote note in na kaikhawm kei ding uh a, a kipuahlo leenggui gahte na khawm kei ding uhhi. Leitang-a' dingin a thupi tawlngakna hi ding hi.
Amaute in Moses kiangah, "Kote nong sawlna leitangah ka va tung uhhi. Tua lai-ah bawngnawi leh khuaizu tui bangin luang a, hih pen tua gama gah a hihi.
Note in ne-in na gil uh vah ding a, note tungah gam hoih hong piakna hangin Topa na Pasian uh na phat ding uhhi.

"Topa na Pasian uh itin, na lungsim khempeuh uh leh na nuntakna khempeuh uh tawh ama na na sepna dingun tuni-a kong gen ama thupiaknate na zuih uh leh, 14 na an uh leh na leenggahzu uh leh na sathau uh na kaihkhop theihna dingun amah in guah masa leh guah nunung, a hunin na leitang uh-a' dingin hong zusak ding hi. 15 Amah in na ganhingte uh-a' dingin na gamsung uhah lopa hong posak ding a, note in zong an ne-in na gil uh vah ding hi.

"Na leenggui lo uhah khaici nam nih na vawh kei ding uhhi. Vawh le-uh cin na vawh uh an leh na leenggui lo uhah a piang khempeuh a nin suak ding hi. 10 "Bawngtal khat leh la khat tawh lo na khokhawm kei ding uhhi. 11 "Samul leh khau a kigankhawm puan na silh kei ding uhhi.

"Na lo-ah an la-in lo lai-ah anlom na mangngilh uh ciangin a tawm dingin na paikik kei ding uhhi. Tuate pen peemta, pa neilo, leh meigong numeite-a' ding a hihi. Hih pen { Topa } note' Pasian in na khut uh tawh na sepna khempeuh uhah note thupha hong piak theihna ding a hihi. 20 Na oliv kungte uh na sat uh ciangin a hiangte na sat kikkik kei ding uhhi. Tuate pen peemta, pa neilo, leh meigong numeite-a' ding a hihi. 21 Na leenggui lo panun leenggah na kaihkhop uh ciangin a sang na nung khop kik kei ding uhhi. Tuate pen peemta, pa neilo, leh meigong numeite-a' ding a hihi.
"Topa in note' ansal tung leh na hihna khempeuh uhah thupha hong puak ding hi. { Topa } na Pasian un note hong piakna leitangah amah in note tungah thupha hong pia ding hi.

Note' leitangah ama hunin guah a zusak ding leh na sepna khempeuh uh thupha a pia dingin Topa in a na hoih kholna vantung note hong hon' ding hi. Note in minam tampite tungah leitawi na pia ding uh a, ahih hangin note in leitawi na la kei ding uhhi.

Tua ciangin Ofrah khua-ah Topa' vantung mi hong pai a, Abiezer mi Joash neihsa tawsaw nuai-ah hong tu hi. Tua laitakin Joash' tapa Gideon in Midian mite' muhloh dingin leenggah sukna-ah mangbuh cil simin na om hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amah kuankhia-in pai a, an late' nung lo sungah ansangte a tawm hi. Elimelek-te innkuan Boaz' lo-ah va kuankha hi.
A numeite tawh na nasepna Boaz pen i tanau hilo ahi hiam? Thei in, amah in tu nitakin ancilna-ah mangbuhham haih hi.

Tua ahih ciangin tua lai panin amah paikhia a, ama neihsa a bawngtal kap sawmlenih tawh lo a kho Shafat' tapa Elisha mu a, amah a sawmlenihna tawh a kho a hihi. Elijah in ama gei nawkin ama tungah a puan lawn hi.

Tua ahih ciangin tu-in note in hih leitang hoih nei-in note' khit na tate uh tungah gamh-in na nusiat tawntung theihna dingun Topa' mai-ah kikhopna ahi Israel khempeuh' muhna, leh i Pasian' zakna-ah Topa na Pasian uh thupiaknate khempeuh zui-in zong un.

Tua hun lai-in Judah gamsungah mite in Sabbath ni-in leenggah sukin, a khawhsate uh khawmin late tungah suanin, leenggah, thei, leh van namkim, Sabbath ni-in Jerusalem-ah hong puakna ka mu hi. Tua ni-in na a zuakna uh hangin ka lungkimlohna amaute tungah ka gen hi.
Kamtai khat Job kiangah hong tungin, "Bawngtalte in lo kho-in, tuate gei-ah late gamta uhhi.
Topa in a hoih nate eite tungah hong pia ding a, i leitang in hauhna piangsak ding hi.
Nangmah in ganhingte-a' dingin lopa, mihing in leilak panin an a ngah theihna dingin a khawh ding ankungte,

Na tuuhonte hoihtakin thei in la, na bawnghonte hoihtakin kem in. 24 Banghang hiam cihleh neihsa kip tawntunglo a, hauhna pen a khangkhangin kizom suaklo hi. 25 Lopate ki-atmang khin a, ahi zongin a no hong selkik hi. Mualtungah a po lopa hing khempeuh ki-atin inn-ah kipua a, 26 tuute in na puan ding hong guan' a, na keeltal mante lo ciing khat man tawh kikim hi. 27 Na keelnawite ahih leh na innkuan annek ding, leh na nasem numeite' nuntakna dingin kicing ding hi.
Nakpi takin lo a khopa hau mahmah a, bangmahin a kimang tumlo na a sempa zawng mahmah hi.
Amah in leitang hoih penpen zong a, a thalawhsa sum tawh a leenggui lo ding a lei hi.

Huih leh guah ngakin khuahun hoih dong a ngak mi in khaici tuh ngeilo ding a, an zong la ngeilo ding hi. 5 Nupi gai khat sungah nuntakna thak bangci kipat hiam, ci-in na theihzawhloh mah bangin na khempeuh a bawl Pasian' nasepna na theizo ngei kei ding hi. 6 Zingsanga kipan khaici tuh in la, nitak dong mateng khawl kei in. A vekpi-in a po kim ding ahi a, a khat sia-in, a khat a po ding ahi zongin na theihkholh bangmah omlo hi.
"I leengguite pak ta ahih manin ngiano hon in a suksiat ma-in tua ngiano honte man ni," hong ci hi.

Amah in lei to-in a suangte paikhia a, leenggui hoihte a suan hi. A laizangah tausang khat lam a, tua lo sungah leenggahsukna khuk khat a to hi. Amah in leenggah hoih a hong gah ding lamen a, ahih hangin gam leenggah hong gah mawk hi.
Lokhulin ka bawl ding hi. Kipuah loin, kikholo ding a, tua lo sungah lingkung leh lingte a khang ding hi. Ama tungah meiite in zong guah a zuksak lohna dingin thu ka pia ding hi.

An a la mi in ankung ding laite kaikhawmin ante a kilak khit ciangin leitang a hawm guakin a om tawh kibang ding a, mi khat in Refaim Kuam sungah ansang a kaihkhop khit ciangin lolai a hawm guakin a om tawh zong kibang ding hi.

Nomau hong honkhia Pasian note in mangngilhin, nomau' belh Suangpi phawklo na hih manun note in biakna huan bawlin kung hoihte suan a, kung namdangte tawh pehin, 11 tuate na suan' ni mahun thakhatin khang a, na tuh ni uh a zingciang mahin a hong pak hangin note in a gah na lokha kei ding uhhi. Gimna leh lungkhamna hong tun' ni-in tuate maimang ding hi.

Lokhopa in khaici tuhna ding a lo kho niloh ahi hiam? Amah in lei kalkhamin git niloh ahi hiam? 25 Amah in lei a zalhtam khit ciangin masala tang vawhin, kummin tang tuh a, mangbuhte a gualgualin tuhin, mangbuhham a omna ding sanah tuh a, mangbuhhamte a nawl hui-ah tuh hilo ahi hiam? 26 Banghang hiam cihleh amah a manin kihilh a, ama Pasian in amah hilh hi. 27 Masa late buhcilna tawh kicil lo a, kummin tangte tungah buhcilna pei kihual lo hi. Ahih hangin masa late ciangkang tawh kisatkhia a, kumminte molhtum tawh kisat hi. 28 Mi khatpeuh in antang cilvui ahi hiam? Hilo hi; amah in cil paisuak ngitnget lo hi. A sakol tawh buhcilna pei a kihualsak ciangin amah in kitamvuisak lo hi. 29 Hih zong Vanglian { Topa}' kiang pan a hong pai thu a hihi. Amah pen thu lamlahna-ah lamdang mahmah a, pilna-ah lian mahmah hi.
Khaici na tuhna dingun amah in guah hong zusak ding a, lei panin a piang an hoih tampi tak hong pia ding hi. Tua ni ciangin gankhahna, mun zaina-ah na ganhingte un lopa ne ding uhhi.

"Nang Hezekiah-a' dingin hih in lim hong hi ding hi: Tu kumin anli pote na ne ding uh a, a kum nihna ciangin tua bangmahin a pote na ne leuleu ding uhhi. A kum thumna ciangin khai tuhin an na la ding uh a, leenggui suanin a gah na ne ding uhhi.

Banghang hiam cihleh vantung panin guahtui leh vuk hong pai-in, amaute ciahkik loin leitung kawtsakin, kungnote mengin selkhiasak a, khai vawhpa khaici pia-in a nepa tungah an a piak mah bangin, 11 keima kam panin a paikhia ka thu zong tua mah bang ding hi. A hawmpi-in kei kiangah hong tungkiklo ding a, keima ngimnasa bangin tangtung sakin, amah ka sawlna thu tangtun' ding hi.
Judah gammite leh Jerusalem khuamite tungah { Topa } in hih bangin ci hi: "Na lote uh kal unla, ling lakah khai vawh kei un.

Khai tuh bangin thuman tuhin, kei nong itna hangun a piang thuphate at un. Note' { Topa } keima lamah nong kihei ding uh a hun hita ahih manin lo thak lei kalkham un. Tua hi leh kei hong pai-in note tungah thupha kong pia ding hi, ka ci hi.
Guahtui omlo ahih manin khai kituhte khempeuh leisungah keucip a, an khol ding bangmah om nawnlo ahih manin ansalte khempeuh a vekin kisia khinta hi.
"Zion mite aw, kipak unla, { Topa } na Pasian uh tungah lungdam ta un. Note in an na hauh theihna dingun nidanga bangin khuapi guah, tuk guah leh phalbi guah, a hoihbekzah hong zusak hi.
Topa { Pasian } in hih bangin hong musak hi: Kumpipa' gan an ding lopa a ki-at khit phet, selkik dingin a kisak laitakin { Topa } in kauphe honpi a piangsak hi.

Amah in minam tampite' thu khensak ding a, Israel gam panin a gamla pekah a om, minam vangliante' thu khensak ding hi. Amaute in a namsaute uh lokhawhna tu-in seek ding uh a, a teipite uh singhiang heuhna temkawi-in seek ding uhhi. Minam khatlekhat kido nawnlo ding uh a, galkidona theikha nawnlo ding uhhi. 4 A kuamah peuh lungnuamin a leenggui phung leh a theikung nuai-ah tu hithiat ding a, kuamah in patausak nawnlo ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Vanglian { Topa } mahmah in hih thu hong gen khinta hi.
Singkung cidamte in gah ginalo gah ngeilo a, singkung ginalote in gah limci gah ngeilo hi.

Theigahte a hut khin a, leengguite a gah kei zongin, oliv kungte gahlo a, lo-ah an a piang kei zongin, tuu khempeuh a si khin a, ganbuk khempeuh a hawm khin zongin, 18 { Topa } Pasian pen hong honkhiapa ahih manin lungdamin ka kipak lai veve ding hi. 19 { Topa } Pasian, keima thahatna ahi hi; sakhi khe bangin ka khe hong zaptelsak a, mun sangna-ah lungmuang takin kei hong paisak hi.
"Singgah limci a gahtheihna dingin a kung a cidam phot ding kisam a, a kung gina kei leh a gah limcilo hi. Tua ahih manin singkung khat a pianzia pen a gahin hong kithei hi.

Amah in thugentehna a tuamtuam zangin thu tampi hilhin a genin-ah: "Khaici vawhpa khaici vawh dingin a kuankhia hi. 4 Khaici a vawh ciangin pawlkhatte lolai lamdungah tu a, vasate hong leengin a ne uhhi. 5 Pawlkhatte, suang a kitawphahna leidaina mun a tu hi. Lei thukloin lum ahih manin a khaici popah hi. 6 Ahi zongin ni hong sat ciangin ankungte in zung thuk kha zolo uh ahih manin tua ankungnote vulin a keu hi. 7 Pawlkhatte, lingbulsum a omna mun leilak tu a, lingbulsumte hong selin hong khang ahih manin ankungte a deepgawp hi. 8 Ahi zongin pawlkhatte, lei hoihna mun tu-in hong khang hi. Pawlkhatte in a zah za khat, pawlkhatte in a zah sawmguk, adangte in a zah sawmthum a gah hi," ci-in a gen khit ciangin,
Tu mahmahin sing a bulphuk dingin hei tawh kingimzo hi. Gah hoih a gahlo singkung khempeuh kiphukin meikhuk sungah kikhul ding hi," a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah thugentehna khat gen a, "Mi khat in a lolai-ah theikung khat a suansak hi. Theigah a lo dingin a pai ciangin bangmah na gahlo hi. 7 Tua ahih manin amah in a lokhopa kiangah, ‘A beisa kum thum sung theigah lo dingin ka pai zelzel a, ahi zongin gahlo hi. Tua ahih manin phuk in. Banghangin lo sung mawk nawngkaisak ding ahi hiam?’ ci hi. 8 Tua ciangin lokhopa in, ‘Topa aw, tu kum sung zong hih bangmahin omsaklai phot in. A phung kimkot to-in eklei ka sung ding hi. 9 Kum kik ciangin hong gah leh a hoih hi pah ding hi. Ahi zongin hong gah kei veve leh i phuk ding hi,’ ci-in a dawng hi," a ci hi.

Tua ahih manin tuukong cingpa in a kong hon' a, a tuute a min ciatin a sap ciangin a tuute in a thu mang a, amah in tuukulh panin a tuute a pusuah khiatpih hi. 4 A tuute khempeuh a pusuah khiat khit ciangin tuate mai-ah a cingpa pai a, a cingpa' aw thei uh ahih manin tuute in amah a zui uhhi.

A kicing oliv kung a hiangte kisatkhia-in gamlak oliv hiangte tawh kipeh hi. No Gentailte pen tua gamlak oliv hiangte tawh a kibang na hi uh a, Jew mite' hamphatna teng a ngahkhawm na hi uhhi. 18 Tua ahih manin oliv hiang a kisatkhia tawh a kibang Jew mite simmawhbawl kha kei un. Note na kiphatsak theihna ding uh a thu omlo hi. Note pen a hiang tawh a kibang lel na hi uh a, note in a zungpi a hingsak hiloin, a zungpi in note a hong hingsak ahi zaw hi.

Keima nasep pen khaici vawh hi a, Apollos' nasep pen tuibuah hi a, ahi zongin a khangsakpa ahih leh Pasian a hihi. 7 Khaici vawhpa leh tuibuakpa a thupi hilo a, a khangsak Pasian a thupi hi bek hi. 8 Khaici vawhpa leh tuibuakpa a kizakim a hihi. Pasian in komau sepna tuak tawh kizui-in thaman hong pia ding hi. 9 Kote pen Pasian-a' dingin na a semkhawm mite ka hi uh a, note pen Pasian' lo na hi uhhi. Note pen Pasian' inn zong na hi uhhi.
Hih bang a gen ciangin ei mihingte hong cihnopna hi a, eite-a' dingin a kigelh thu a hihi. Lo a khopa leh an a lapa in amau' ngahdingin a kilawm an a ngahdingin lametna tawh nasem ahi uhhi.

Ahi zongin Pasian in ama hoihsak bangin a kung ding na pia a, khaici nam tuamtuamte-a' ding kung nam tuamtuam a guan' hi. 39 Tua mah bangin sa a nei nuntakna nam khempeuh zong a sa kibang kimlo hi. Mihing sa, ganhing sa, vasa sa, ngasa sa, cih bangin a nam tuamtuam a om hi.
Note in na phawk ding uh thu panin: Khaici tawm a vawhte in tawm mah la ding a, tampi a vawhte in tampi mah la ding uhhi.
Hahkat takin lo a khopa in anlak hun ciangin a tampen a ngah dingin a kilawm a hihi.
A tungah a kia guahtuite hupin, a kikhawhsak mite-a' dingin a kimang thei kungte a khangsak leitang pen Pasian in thupha a pia hi.
Khatlekhat tungah thuhoih kibawlin na kihuh ding uh mangngilh kei un. Hihbang gamtatnate pen Pasian a lungkimsak thei biakna a hihi.
Tua ahih ciangin sanggamte aw, Topa hong pai matengin lungduai takin om un. Lo khote in zong a lo panun an a ngahtheihna dingun lungduai takin khuapi guah leh tuk guah a ngakna thu thei un.
Tua thamloin amah in { Topa' } Thuciamna Singkuang mai-ah na semin thu a ngen ding, lungdamna a ko ding, leh Israel Pasian, { Topa } a phat dingin Levi mite pawlkhat a seh hi.
{ Topa' } tungah lungdamna ko-in, ama min lo unla, ama septe khempeuh mite' lakah kitheisak un!

Amah hoih ahih manin { Topa' } tungah lungdamna ko un; Banghang hiam cihleh ama itna kip a tawntungin a kho hi! 35 "Kote hong khahkhia in, kote hong honkhia Pasian aw, minam dangte lak panin kote hong kaikhawm in. Na min siangtho tungah lungdam kong koh theihna ding uh leh, nangmah phatna-ah ka minthan'na dingun kote hong hon in.

Nangmah in lungsim entelin thumanna-ah na lungkimna ka thei hi, ka Pasian aw. Lungsim thumanna leh citna tawh hih nate khempeuh kong pia khin a, tu-in nang tungah citna leh lungdamna tawh a hong pia, hih lai-ah a om na mite ka muzo hi. 18 Ka pute uh Abraham, Isaac, leh Israel Pasian, { Topa } aw, na mite' lungsim sungah tua bang ngimnate leh ngaihsutnate omsak tawntung in la, amaute' lungsim nangma lamah kai in.

Israel mite khempeuh in meikuang hong paisukin { Topa' } minthan'na vang biakinn tungah a om a muh uh ciangin suangphah tungah leilam maingatin kun uh a, Pasian bia-in { Topa' } tungah lungdamna ko-in, "{ Topa' } tungah lungdam koh ding hoih hi; Banghang hiam cihleh ama itna kip tawntung hi," a ci uhhi.

Pasian in nakpi takin amaute lungdamsak ahih manin amaute in tua ni-in biakpiakna lian tampi pia-in lungdam uh a, numei naupangte zong lungdam uhhi. Tua hi a, Jerusalem khuasunga lungdamna awging gamlapi pek pan nangawnin kiza hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh David' hun lai-in lasate a ukpi leh phatna leh lungdam kohna a makai-in Asaf om hi.
Ke'n ahih leh, ama dikna om bangin { Topa' } tungah lungdamna ka lak ding a, a Sangpen { Topa' } min phatna la ka sak ding hi.
Ka lungsim khempeuh tawh { Topa } tungah lungdamna kong ko ding a, na bawl a lamdangte khempeuh ka gen ding hi. 2 Nangma hangin nuamin ka diang ding a, na min phatna ka sa ding hi, Sangpenpa aw.
{ Topa, } ka hatna leh ka lum hi a, amah ka muang hi. Tua ahih manin kei hong kihuh a, lungdamin ka diang a, ka lasakna tawh ama tungah lungdamna ka ko hi.

{ Topa } ka Pasian aw, nangma tungah lungdamna ka hong koh tawntung theihna ding, ka lungsim in nang hong phat theihna ding, a dai om mawklohna dingin ka thumna leh ka taunate lamna tawh nong heisak a, dahna lim ahi ka puanhampi hong suahkhiat sakin nuamna na hong guan hi.
{ Topa } sungah lungkim in; amah in na deihna hong pia ding hi.
Biakpiakna dingin lungdam piakna hong paipih mi in kei a hong pahtawi a hihi. Ka thu a mang mite khempeuh ka honkhia ding hi," a ci hi.
Lasakna tawh Pasian' min ka phat ding a, lungdamna tawh amah ka pahtawi ding hi.

Sangpenpa aw, { Topa } tungah lungdamna lah ding, nangma min phatna la sak dingin kilawm a, zangsawm khausai lasakna leh harp lasakna, laia lasaknate tumin, zingsangin nangma itna kip, zanin na thumanna genkhiat dingin a kilawm a hihi.

Hong pai un, { Topa } phat ni. Eite a hong hu, a hong honkhiapa tungah lungdamna la sa ni. 2 Ama omna-ah lungdamna ko-in pai ni. Phatna late, ama tungah lungdam takin sa ni. 3 Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa, } a lian Pasian hi a, pasian khempeuh tungah Kumpi lianpa a hihi. 4 Amah in leitung khempeuh uk a, guam thuk pen panin mual sang pen dawn dongin amah in a uk hi. 5 Ama bawlsa tuipite uk a, ama bawlsa leitung zong amah in a uk hi. 6 Hong pai un, amah bia-in kun ni. Eite hong Bawl { Topa' } mai-ah khukdin' ni.

Gam khempeuh aw, { Topa' } tungah lungdamna aw gingsak un. 2 Lungdamna tawh { Topa' } na sem un. Ama omna-ah la sa kawmin hong pai un. 3 { Topa, } Pasian ahihna thei un. Eite hong bawlpa amah hi a, eite ama-a' ihi hi. Eite ama mi ihi a, ama gankhahna sunga om a tuute ihi hi. 4 Lungdam kohna tawh ama kongpi-ah lut unla, amah phatna tawh ama huang sungah tum un. Ama tungah lungdam ko unla, ama min phat un. 5 Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } hoih hi. Ama itna kipin kho tawntung a, ama thumanna a khang khangin kip hi.
{ Topa } ka phat ding a, ka lungsim khempeuh tawh ama min siangtho ka phat ding hi. 2 { Topa } ka phat ding a, ama migitna ka mangngilh kei ding hi.
{ Topa } tungah lungdamna ko-in, ama min phat unla, ama sepnate khempeuh mite lakah kitheisak un.
{ Topa } phat un. { Topa' } tungah lungdam ko un; Banghang hiam cihleh amah hoih a, ama itna kip tawntung hi.
"{ Topa } tungah lungdam ko un; Banghang hiam cihleh amah hoih a, ama itna kip tawntung!"
Lungdam koh piaknate pia-in ama nasepnate lungdam la tawh amaute gensak un.

Amah in huihpi daisak a, tuipi hualte a bei hi. 30 Tua ciangin, tua tuihualte a khawl manin amaute a lungdam uhhi. Amah in amaute' utna khua-ah a paipih hi. 31 Ama itna kip leh mihing tate tungah a lamdang a sepnate hangin amaute in { Topa } tungah lungdamna ko ta uh hen. 32 Amaute in mihon kikhopna sungah amah pahtawi-in, upate' kikhopna sungah amah phat ta uh hen.
Lungdam koh biakpiakna nang tungah kong pia ding a, { Topa' } tungah thu kong ngen ding hi.

{ Topa' } tungah lungdamna ko un. Banghang hiam cihleh amah hoih a, ama itna kip tawntung hi. 2 "Ama itna kip tawntung hi," Israel-te in ci ta uh hen. 3 "Ama itna kip tawntung hi," Aaron innkuante in ci ta uh hen. 4 "Ama itna kip tawntung hi," amah a zahtakte in ci ta uh hen. 5 Ka cihmawhna-ah { Topa } ka sam a, { Topa } in hong dawngin mun tanzau-ah hong koih hi.
Nangmah in kei hong dawngin, hong honkhia na hih manin nangma tungah ka lungdam hi.

Amah hoih ahih manin { Topa } tungah lungdamna ko un; Banghang hiam cihleh ama itna kip tawntung hi. 2 Lungdamna pen pasian-te' Pasian' tungah ko un; Banghang hiam cihleh ama itna kip tawntung hi. 3 Lungdamna pen topate' Topa' tungah ko un; Banghang hiam cihleh ama itna kip tawntung hi.
{ Topa } aw, ka lungsim khempeuh tawh nangma tungah lungdamna kong ko a, pasian-te' mai-ah nangmah phatna ka sa hi.

Ka Pasian leh ka Kumpipa aw, nangmah hong pahtawi-in a tawntungin nangma min kong phatphat ding hi. 2 Nisimin hong pahtawi-in a tawntungin nangma min kong phatphat ding hi. 3 { Topa } lian hi; nakpi takin phat ding hi a, ama liatna ngaihsutzawh ding hilo hi. 4 A khang a khangin nangma nasepnate kiphatphat ding a, a vanglian na bawlnate kigengen ding hi. 5 Na liatna leh na minthan'na a lamdang nangma sepnate ka lungngaingai ding hi.
{ Topa } tungah lungdam kohna la sa unla, laia lasakna tawh eite' Pasian' tungah la ngaih sa un.
Ngaihbaan'na pen zuaupi hithei a, melhoihna zong maimang thei hi. Ahi zongin { Topa } a zahtak numei a phattaak a hihi.
Ni khat ni ciangin mite in, "{ Topa } aw, kei tungah na heh hangin na hehna damta a, kei hong hehnem na hih manin nang tungah lungdamna kong ko ding hi.
Ni khat ni ciangin mite in, "{ Topa}' tungah lungdam ko unla, ama hong huh ding ngen un. Minam khempeuh lakah ama septe kitheisak unla, ama min kiliansak hi, ci-in gen un.
Tuate sung panin lungdamna la kisa ding a, gualnopna aw kiza ding hi. Amaute ka pungsak ding a, tawmkha bek hilo ding uhhi. Amaute ka kipahtawisak ding a, ka neusak kei ding hi.

Ahih hangin lungdamna aw leh kipahna awte, zinei thakte leh mothakte' awte kiza kik ding hi. { Topa' } biakinn-ah mite hong pai-in lungdam kohna-in: ‘Vanglian { Topa' } tungah lungdamna ko un. Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } hoih a, ama itna kip tawntung hi,’ ci-in a lasakna awte uh a kiza kik ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } in kong cihin-ah, a masa-a mah bangin hih gam ka hausak kik ding hi.
Lungdam kohna-in silngo sawh anlum va pia unla, utthu-a biakpiaknate va pia-in va kisial un. Hihte pawl pen note' hihnop pawl ahi hi, { Topa } in ci hi.
Ahih hangin ke'n ahih leh lungdamna aw tawh biakna kong pia ding a, ka ciamsa thu ka tangtungsak ding hi. { Topa' } kiang pan hotkhiatna hong pai hi," a ci hi.

Haksatna i thuak laitak nangawnin i lungdam veve hi. Banghang hiam cihleh haksatna in thuakzawh hatna piangsak a, 4 thuakzawh hatna in Pasian' pahtakna hong ngahsak a, ama hong pahtakna in lametna lianpi hong neisak ahihna thu i thei hi.
Lamet na neihna hangun lungdamin om tawntung unla, lungkhamna na thuak uh ciangin lungduai-in thu na ngen tawntung un.

Zeisu Christ hangin note tungah Pasian in hehpihna thupha hong pia ahih manin ka lungdamna thu, Pasian tungah ka ko tawntung hi. 5 Banghang hiam cihleh Christ tawh na kipawlna hangun, thugen siamna leh thu theihtel siamna-a kipan siamna nam khempeuh na neikim uhhi.
Hih thute khempeuh note-a' ding a kikhualna hi a, Pasian' hehpihna in mi tam ban semsem leh mi a tam semsem mah in Pasian' minthan'na dingin lungdam ko-in thu ngen ding uhhi.

Kote tung tawnin note' huhna sumte a ngahna uh hangin mi tampi in Pasian a phattheihna dingin note na cit gamtatzawh tawntungna dingun Pasian in hong hausak tawntung ding hi. 12 Banghang hiam cihleh note' huhna sumte in Pasian' mi a cimawhte' dong a hu bek hiloin, Pasian' tungah lungdam kohna ding zong a piangsak a hihi.
A manphatna a kigen zolo Pasian' hong piak hih thupha hangin Pasian tungah i lungdamna ko ciat ni.

Note in Topa Zeisu na muan'na thu uh leh thu umte khempeuh na itna thu uh ka zak huna kipanin, 16 tawlnga loin note' tangin Pasian' tungah lungdamna ka na pulak tawntung hi. Ka thungetna-ah zong note ka hong phawk tawntung a,

Note pen Pasian' mi na hih manun note lakah nulepa khialhna, a kilawmlo-a gamtatna, huaihamna cihte genin zong na nei vet kei un. 4 A kilawmlo-a kampauna, leh ciamnuih hoihlo cihte zong na zang kei unla, Pasian tungah lungdam kohna kam na pauzaw un.
I Topa Zeisu Christ hangin thu khempeuhah Pa Pasian tungah lungdamna ko ta un.

Note ka hong phawk simin ka biak Pasian tungah ka lungdamna ka ko hi. 4 Note in lungdamna thu na zak ni uha kipanin tuni ciangdong, lungdamna thuhilh nasepna-ah kei na hong huhna uh hangin ka nuam mahmah a, note-a' dingin thu ka nget simin lungdam mahmahna tawh ka ngen tawntung hi.

Topa sungah lungdam tawntung un, ka hong cihsa bangin tu-in zong lungdam un, ka hong ci kik hi. 5 Mi khempeuh tungah na dik un. Topa hong pai baih ta ding hi. 6 Thu khat peuhpeuhah lunghimawh lua kei unla, na kisap bangbang uh, lungdamna tawh Pasian kiangah na ngen un.

Bangbangin om ta leng a lungkim thei dingin a kisinsa ka hih manin hihbang ka hong gen ciangin ka kitangsapna a hong pulak nuam ka hi kei hi. 12 Cihmawhna leh cihtheihna a sinsa ka hihi. Tua ahih manin ka hau a ka zawng zongin, ka vah a ka kial zongin, koi mun koi mun hita lehah a lungkimthei dingin a kisinsa ka hihi.

Note in lungduai maitaii takin thuakzo-in, khuavak gamsungah a om Pasian' mite tawh nopsakna a ngahkhawm thei dingin a hong bawl i Pa tungah lungdamna na koh theihna dingun a minthang ama vangliatna in note tungah thahatna hong guan' ta hen.

Note hong honpa dingin Topa Christ na sansa uh ahih mah bangin amah tawh hoihtakin kipawlin nungta un. 7 Note tungah a hong kihilhsa bangin ama sungah zungthuk kha unla, ama deihna bangin nungta-in, na upna uhah khauh semsemin, lungdam takin om un.

Note pumkhat suakin a lungdam khawm dingin Pasian in a hong sap ahih mah bangin Christ hong piak nopsakna in note' lungsim hong uk ta hen la, lungdamin om ta un. 16 Christ thu a cingtakin note lungsimah hong om hen la, pilna tawh khatlekhat thu kihilhin na kitai un. Pasian tungah lungdam kohna-in Thuciam Lui sunga late, la thakte, leh biakna late na sa un. 17 Na kampauna, na gamtatnate khempeuh uhah, Topa Zeisu hangin Pa Pasian tungah lungdam kohna-in Zeisu min paulamin na hih ding uhhi.
Lungsim takpi tawh thu ngen tawntung unla, kidawm kawmin lungdamna tawh thu ngen un.

Lungdam tawntungin, 17 thu ngen niloh unla, 18 bangbang hong piang ta leh na lungdamna uh Pasian tungah ko tawntung un. Christ Zeisu tawh kipawlin na nuntakna sung uhah hih bangzia-in na om ding uh Pasian in a hong deih a hihi.
A masa penin kong gennop thu in: Mi khempeuh-a' dingin Pasian tungah ngetna, thungetna, thumna leh lungdam kohna na neih ding uh a hihi.
Pasian' bawlsa na khempeuh a hoih hi a, nialloin, lungdamna pulakin san' ding a hihi. 5 Pasian' thu leh thungetna hang tawh tuate a hoih a suak a hihi.
Pasian' mite khempeuh na itna thu leh Topa Zeisu na upna thu na zakhin ka hih manin Pasian kiangah thu ka nget simin nangmah hong phawkin Pasian tungah lungdamna thu ka ko tawntung hi.

I Topa Zeisu Christ' Pa Pasian tungah lungdam ni. Ama hong hehpih mahmahna hangin sihna panin Zeisu Christ a thawhkik sakna tawh eite tungah nuntakna thak a hong pia hi. Tua ahih manin i lametna kiam ngeilo a,
"Amen! Eite' Pasian in phatna, minthan'na, pilna, lungdam kohna, pahtawina, vangliatna, leh hatna a tawntungin nei ta hen! Amen," a ci uhhi.
"A beisa hun leh tu hunah a om tawntung a Vanglian Topa Pasian aw, tu-in na vangliatna zangin ukding hong kipan khin na hih manin nangma tungah ka nuamna uh ka hong ko uhhi.

"Nang leh nang' khit cianga na suanlekhakte tungah Pasian hihna ding tawntung thuciamna dingin kei leh nang' khit cianga na suanlekhakte' tungah amau' khang tawntungin ka thuciamna ka kipsak ding hi. 8 Nangma tung leh nang' khit cianga na suanlekhakte tungah tawlkhat na omna Kanaan leitang khempeuh na neih tawntung dingun kong pia ding a, kei pen amaute' Pasian ka hi ding hi," a ci hi.

Pasian in, "Hilo hi. Na zi Sarah in nang-a' dingin tapa khat nei ding a, ama min Isaac na phuak ding hi. Ama khit cianga a suanlekhakte-a' dingin tawntung thuciamna dingin ka thuciamna amah tawh ka kipsak ding hi.

Na suanlekhakte leilak leivui zah pha ding a, nitumna lam leh nisuahna lam, leilu lam leh leitaw lamah na kizelthang ding uhhi. Nang leh na suanlekhakte thupha kong piak bangin leitung minam khempeuh in thupha a ngahna dingun hong ngen ding uhhi.

"Judah aw, na sanggamte in nang hong phat ding hi. Na galte' gawl na mek ding a, na sanggamte na mai-ah hong kun ding uhhi. 9 Judah pen humpinelkai tawh kibang a, a sa matsa a nek khit ciangin a kua-ah a ciahkik tawh kibang hi. Humpinelkai bangin kizia-in a lumsuk hi. Kua in amah phawng ngam ding hiam? 10 Judah in kumpi ciangkhut len tawntung ding a, a suan a khakte in zong ukna aana nei tawntung ding hi. Minam dangte in ama tungah siah puak ding a, zahtakna tawh ama mai-ah kun ding uhhi.
Israel-te-a' ding hotkhiatna Zion panin hong tun'na ding thu ka ngenngen hi. { Topa } in ama mite tungah nopsakna a piakkik ciangin, ama mi Israel-te kipak mahmah ding uhhi.

Tarshish kumpite leh tuikulh neu-a kumpite in ama tungah siah pia uh hen la, Sheba leh Seba kumpite in letsong puak ta uh hen. 11 Kumpi khempeuh ama mai-ah bok uh hen la, minam khempeuh in ama na sem ta uh hen.
"{ Topa } tungah lungdam ko un; Banghang hiam cihleh amah hoih a, ama itna kip tawntung!"
Tua ahih ciangin Topa mahmah in note tungah lim khat hong pia ding hi. En un, nungak khat gai-in tapa khat nei ding a, ama min Immanuel kici ding hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh eite-a' dingin naungek khat hong suak a, eite' tungah tapa khat hong kipia hi. Amah pen eite hong ukpa hi ding a, ama min pen "Lamdang Thulakpa, Vanglian Pasian, Tawntung Pa, Nopsakna Kumpi," kici ding hi. 7 Tuhuna kipanin a tawntungin David kumpi tokhom tung leh ama gamsungah thutang leh thuman phutin, a lian semsem ama ukna leh nopsakna in mong neilo ding hi. Vanglian { Topa}' deih luatna in hih thu hong tungsak ding hi.
Jessi' phung sung panin a sel khat hong khangkhia ding a, a zungte panin a no khat hong khang ding hi.

Israel mite aw, note hong hopihna { Topa' } kammal ngai dih un. 2 { Topa } in hih bangin ci hi: "Gamdangte' omdan ciing kei unla, vantunga lim lamdangte lunghihmawhna-in ngaihsun kei un. Banghang hiam cihleh gamdang mite in tuate a lunghihmawhpih uhhi. 3 Hih mite' ngeinate a kiman'na omlo hi. Gamlakah sing khat kiphuk a, khutsiampa in a hei tawh milimin a bawl hi. 4 Mite in tua pen kham leh ngun tawh zem uh a, a kilakkhiat theihlohna dingin sik tawh a kilh uhhi. 5 A milimte uh, tangmai huanah vasate' launa dingin a kikhai milimte tawh kibangin pau theilo uh a, lam pai theilo uh ahih manin puak a kul hi. Tuate kihta kei un; siatna bawl theilo uh a, phatna zong bangmah bawl theilo uhhi," a ci hi. 6 { Topa } aw, nang tawh a kibang kuamah omlo hi. Nang na lian a, na min vanglian mahmah hi.

"En un, { Topa } in kong cihin-ah, keimah in David' suan lak panin kumpi dingin a diktat mi khat ka khan'khiatsak ni hong tung ding hi. Amah gam uk siam mahmah ding a, gamsungah thuman thutang tawh thu hong khen ding hi. 6 Ama hun hong tun' ciangin Judah mite kihonkhia ding a, Israel mite lungmuang takin a teng ding uhhi. Amah a kilawhna dingin a min, ‘{ Topa, } Eite' Diktan'na,’ ci-in a kiphuak ding hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } in kong cihin-ah, mailamah lametna note kong piakkik ding, na siatna ding uhhiloin na phattuamna ding uh geelna ka neihte kei bek in ka thei hi.
{Topa } in kong cihin-ah: "Ramah khua-ah aw khat kiza a, tauna leh kah ngutngutna awging a hihi. Rachel, a tate-a' dingin a kap hi. A tate om nawnlo ahih manin kinem zolo hi," a ci hi.
Israel a neu lai-in ka it mahmah a, Egypt gam panin ka tapa ka samkhia hi.
Bethlehem Efrathah khua aw, nang pen Judah gamah khua neupen khat na hi a, ahi zongin nang sung panin Israel-te a uk ding khat ka piangsak ding hi. Ama gui pen tangtawng pek tawh kizom hi.

Zion mite aw, nakpi takin lungdam un. Jerusalem mite aw, lungdamin awng un. En un, na kumpipa uh hong pai hi. Amah, gualzawhna tawh hong pai hi. Ahi zongin kiniamkhiatna tawh hong pai a, sin nailoh lano tungah hong tuang hi.

Abraham' suan David, David' suan Zeisu Christ' khang ciamtehna hih bang a hihi. 2 Abraham ta Isaac, Isaac ta Jacob, Jacob ta Judah, leh a sanggamte ahi uhhi. 3 Judah ta Perez leh Zerah hi a, Tamar tawh a neih a ta ahi uhhi. Perez ta Hezron, Hezron ta Ram, …

Zeisu Christ a hong suahna zia hih bang a hihi. Mary pen Joseph-a' dingin zuthawl piaksa hi a, ahi zongin a kiten' taktak ma-un Khasiangtho in amah a gaisakna thu Mary in a thei hi. 19 A lawmpa Joseph pen a manin a gamta nuam mi khat ahih manin a lawmnu maizumsak nuamlo a, kuama theihlohin maksim dingin a ngaihsun hi. 20 Ahi zongin hih bangin thu a ngaihsut laitakin a mang sungah Topa' vantung mi khat hong kilang a, "David suan Joseph aw, Mary sunga nau pen Khasiangtho in a gaisak ahih manin amah ten'pih ngamlah kei in. 21 Amah in tapa khat hong nei ding a, tua tapa in ama mite a mawhna uh panin honkhia ding ahih manin ama min dingin Zeisu na phuak ding hi," ci-in thu a gen hi. 22 Topa in kamsangpa tung tawnin a gensa thu a tun' theihna dingin hih thute a piang a hihi. Tua a genna-ah, 23 "Nungak khat gai-in tapa khat nei ding a, ama min dingin Emmanuel kiphuak ding hi," ci hi. Emmanuel a khiatna in, eite tawh Pasian hong omkhawm hi, a cihna a hihi. 24 Joseph zong a khan'lawh ciangin Topa' vantung mi' sawl bangin a zi a la hi. 25 Ahi zongin tua tapa a suah hun dongin a zi luppihlo a, a suah ciangin a min dingin Zeisu a phuak hi.

Herod in Judea gamah kumpi a sep hun laitakin tua gamsung Bethlehem khua-ah Zeisu a suak hi. A suah khit phetin aksi thu lamsang a siam mi pawlkhat, nisuahna lam panin Jerusalem-ah hong tung uh a, 2 "Jew mite' kumpi ding ahi naungek a hong suak pen koi lai-ah om ahi hiam? Nisuahna lam pan ama aksi hong suah ciangin ka mu uh a, amah a bia dingin a hong pai ka hi uhhi," hong ci uhhi.

Amaute in, "Kamsangpa in a lai gelhna sungah, ‘Judah gamah a om Bethlehem khua aw, ka mi Israel-te a uk dingin nangma sung panin ukpa khat hong piang ding ahih manin Judah gam a uk khuate lakah a neu na hi het kei hi,’ ci ahih manin Judea gamsung Bethlehem khua-ah suak ding hi," ci-in a dawng uhhi.

Tua aksi a muh uh ciangin a lungdamna uh kigen theilo hi. 11 Inn sungah amaute lut uh a, naungek leh a nu Mary a mu uhhi. Amaute khukdin'in tua naungek a biak khit uh ciangin a vanpuakte uh suahkhia uh a, kham, saledi paknamtui, leh myrrh paknamtuite, letsongin a pia uhhi. 12 Herod kiangah a kihilkik lohna dingun a mang sung uhah Pasian in hilh ahih manin, lampi dang tawnin a gam uhah a ciahkik uhhi. 13 Tua mipilte a ciah khit uh ciangin Joseph' mang sungah Topa' vantung mi khat hong kilang a, "Kithawi-in naungek leh a nu, Egypt gamah taipih in. Pai khia un, ci-in kong genkik matengin tua gamah va om un. Herod in naungek thah dingin hong zong ding hi," a ci hi. 14 Joseph zong kithawi pah a, Egypt gam a zuan dingin naungek leh a nu tawh zanpi mahin dingkhia uh a, 15 Herod a sih hun ciangdong tua gamah a va om uhhi. Kamsangpa tung tawnin Topa in, "Egypt gam panin ka Tapa ka samkhia hi," ci-in a genna thu a tun'na dingin hih bangin a piang a hihi. 16 Nisuahna lam panin a hong pai mipilte in amah a khem lamtak Herod in a theih ciangin a heh suak mahmah hi. Tua mipilte tung panin aksi a kilat hun a dotna tawh kizui-in, Bethlehem khua leh a kiima om naungek kum nih ciang leh a nuaisiah khempeuh a that dingin a galkapte a sawl hi. 17 Hih bangin thu hong pian' ciangin kamsangpa Jeremiah in, 18 "Nakpi taka kahna awging Ramah gamsungah kiza hi.
