Rachel in a tate kah a, a tate khempeuh si khin ahih manin a kah a tawpna dingin kikhem zolo hi," ci-in a genna thu a tun'na ding a hihi.

Ahi zongin Zeisu in amaute sam a, "Mi a uk Gentail-te in mite tungah aana nei uh a, mi a makai Gentail-te in thuneihna tawh a ukna thu na thei uhhi. 26 Ahi zongin note lakah tua bang hilo ding hi. Note lakah a lian ahi dingte note' nasem hi ding a, 27 note' lakah a lianpen ahi dingte note' sila hi ding hi. 28 Mihing Tapa zong nasem nei dingin hong pai hiloin mi dangte-a' ding na semin, mi tampi tatna ding a si dingin a hong pai ahih mah bangin note zong a tuaci ding na hi uhhi," a ci hi.
Amah hong suah ciangin nang na lungdam mahmah ding a, midang tampite in zong hong lungdampih ding uhhi.

Elizabeth a gaizawh kha guk a cin' ciangin Pasian in Galilee gam Nazareth khua-ah vantung mi Gabriel a paisak hi. 27 Kumpi David' suan Joseph in zuthawl a piaksa Mary tungah thu a gen dingin a sawl a hihi. 28 Vantung mi in Mary kiangah, "Na lungdam mahmah ding a hihi. Topa in nang hong ompih a, thupha lianpi hong piazo hi," a ci hi. 29 Mary in vantung mi' thugen a zak ciangin, bang a cihnopna hi ding ahi hiam, ci-in lamdang a sa mahmah hi. 30 Tua ciangin vantung mi in, "Mary aw, lamdangsa-in lunghimawh kei in. Pasian' maipha a ngah na hi hi. 31 Nang gai-in tapa khat na nei ding a, a min dingin Zeisu na phuak ding hi. 32 Amah milian hi ding a, A Lianpen Pasian' Tapa kici ding hi. Topa Pasian in ama pu David mah bangin kumpi-in bawl ding a, 33 Jacob suanlekhakte' kumpi hi paisuak ding a, ama ukna bei hun cih om ngeilo ding hi," a ci hi. 34 Tua ciangin Mary in vantung mi kiangah, "Kei, pasal tawh a lumkhawm ngei nailopi, hih thu bangci pian'theih ding ahi hiam?" a ci hi. 35 Vantung mi in, "Nangma tungah Khasiangtho hong tung ding a, nangma tungah Pasian' vangliatna hong om ding hi. Tua ahih manin a hong suakding a siangtho naungek pen Pasian' Tapa kici ding hi.

Tua khit a sawtloin Mary kithawi a, Judea mualtung gama khua khatah a va paipah hi. 40 Zechariah' inn-ah lutin Elizabeth a hopih hi. 41 Elizabeth in Mary' hopihna awging a zak ciangin a sunga a naupaii a hong diang hi. Elizabeth zong Khasiangtho tawh hong kidim a, 42 nakpi takin kiko-in, "Numei khempeuh lakah thupha ngahpennu na hi a, na neih ding naungek in thupha ngah ding hi. 43 Ka Topa' nu kei kiangah hong hawhna dingin, Banghangin hih bang thu lian kei tungah hong tung ahi hiam? 44 Banghang hiam cihleh nong hopihna awging ka zak phetin ka sunga naungek nuamin a diang hi. 45 Topa in nang tungah a hong gen thute hong tung taktak ding hi, ci-a upna pen nang-a' dingin a lungdamhuai mahmah ahi hi," a ci hi. 46 Tua ciangin Mary in, "Ka lungsim in Topa phat a, 47 hong Hon Pasian' hangin ka nuam mahmah hi.

Zintun'na ding mun dang khempeuh mi dim khinta ahih manin ganbukah tung uh a, a tacil ahi ta pasal khat nei-in, puan tawh tunin gan annekna kuang sungah a sial hi. 8 Tua hun laitakin gamlakah a tuuhonte a giahpih tuucing pawlkhat a om uhhi. 9 Amaute kiangah Topa' vantung mi khat hong kilang a, Topa' minthan'na vang in amaute hong taan' ahih manin a lau mahmah uhhi. 10 Ahi zongin vantung mi in, "Lau kei un. Mi khempeuh a lungdamsak ding thuthak hoih khat note-a' ding ka hong puak hi. 11 Tuni-in David khuapi sungah, note a hong honkhia ding Christ Topa a suak hi. 12 Amah na theihna ding uh a lim hih bang hi ding hi: Puan tawh kitun naungek khat, gan annekna kuang sungah a kisial na mu ding uhhi," a ci hi. 13 Tua khit phetin tua vantung mi tawh vantung mihonpite thakhatin hong omin Pasian phatna la sa uh a, 14 "Van a sang belna-ah a om Pasian' min thang hen la, ama pahtak leitung mite tungah nopna om ta hen," a ci uhhi. 15 Vantung mite vantungah a ciahkik khit uh ciangin tuucingte in, "Bethlehem khua-ah pai-in, Topa' hong gen hih thupiang va en ni," a kici uhhi. 16 Amaute nawhpai mahmah uh a, Mary leh Joseph leh gan annekna kuang sungah a kisial naungek a mupah uhhi.
Tua Thu mihing hong suakin kote lakah hong om a, itna nei-in citak mahmah ahih manin Pasian' pianzia a neihna ka mu cian uhhi. Hih pianzia pen Pasian' Tapa khat bek hihna tawh a neih pianzia a hihi.
Pasian in leitung mite hong it mahmah ahih manin ama Tapa a um mi khempeuh si nawnloin a hin' tawntung theihna dingun a Tapa neihsun a hong piak dongin a hong itna a hong lak hi.
A Pa in ama khutsungah vangliatna khempeuh a piakna leh Pasian in amah a sawl mah bangin tu-in Pasian kiangah a paikik ding ahihna thu zong a thei hi.

Note tungah keima neih bang lungnopna ka hong pia ding hi. Tua ka hong piakding lungnopna pen leitung mite in a piaktheih a kiplo lungnopnate pawl hilo hi. Tua ahih manin lau kei unla, zong lungkham kei un.

Keimah tawh na hong kipawlna uh hangin lungnopna na neihtheihna dingun hih thu a hong gen ka hihi. Leitung gimna na thuak ding uhhi. Ahi zongin keimah in leitung nate zo khinta ka hih manin lungnuamin om un," a ci hi.
Israel mite kisik kikin Pasian in a mawhna uh a maisak theihna dingin Ukpi leh Honpa-in tua Zeisu bawlin ama taklamah a tusak hi.

Topa Zeisu mahmah in, ‘Ngahna sangin piak khiatna-ah lungdamna lianzaw hi,’ a cihna phawkkawmin nakpi takin nasepna tawh na khempeuhah a zawngkhalte huh ding hi hang, ci-in note kiangah kong lak khinzo hi," ci-in a vaikhak hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh mawhna in thaman hong piak pen sihna hi a, ahi zongin i Topa Zeisu tawh i kipawl manin Pasian' hong piakkhong pen nuntak tawntungna a hihi.
Pasian in piaknopna lungsim tawh a pia mite bek deih ahih manin, a kuamah peuh in na lungsim sung uhah na ngaihsutsa zah ciat uh na pia unla, pia nuamlopipi leh sawlzawh thu bek tawh na pia kei un.
A manphatna a kigen zolo Pasian' hong piak hih thupha hangin Pasian tungah i lungdamna ko ciat ni.

Ahi zongin a hun a cin ciangin eite khempeuh Pasian' tate i suahtheihna dingin Thukham nuai-ah a om mite a hong tankhia dingin Pasian in a Tapa hong paisak a, tua Tapa pen leitung ngeina bangin numei sung panin hong suakin, Jew Thukham sungah hong nungta hi.

Amah hong kiniamkhiat tawm a, singlamteh tung nangawnah sihding a ut hi. 9 Hih thu hangin Pasian in a lianpenin amah koih a, min lian dang khempeuh sangin a min lianzaw-in a koih hi. 10 Tua ahih manin vantung, leitung, leinuai-a om mi khempeuh in Zeisu pahtawi-in khukdin' ding uh a,
Tua ahih manin annek tuidawn, biakna pawite, Khadet Pawi, leh Sabbath ni tawh kisai-in kuamah in ngeina zuihding bawl kei un.
I Topa pen Judah suan sung panin a piang ahih manin Moses in siampi thu a na gen ciangin hih Judah minam genin na neilo hi.
Tu-in Pasian' teci pan'na in: Pasian in ama Tapa tung tawnin eite tungah nuntak tawntungna a hong pia hi.

Laban in, "A u' ma-in a nauzaw piak ding ko' gamah ngeina hilo hi. 27 Hih nu-a' dingin nipikal khat sung pawi beisak phot in la, adang kum sagih ka na nong sepsak thamanin a khat pen zong kong pia ding hi," a ci hi. 28 Jacob zong tua bangmahin gamta a, tuanu' pawi hun sung beisak phot hi. Tua ciangin Laban in a tanu Rachel zong a zi dingin a pia hi.

Moses in, "Ama tungah na phunnate uh { Topa } in a zakna hangin, { Topa } in note' tungah nitak an nek ding sa, zingsangin na kham tak uha na nek ding uh an hong piak ciangin — kote pen a bang hi mawk ka hi uhhiam? Note' phunnate pen kote' tung hiloin { Topa' } tung ahi hi," a ci hi.
Ama mai-ah { Topa } pai-in, { "Topa}, { Topa}, hehpihna nei-in a dik Pasian; lungduai-in itna kip leh thutakna tawh a dim;
"Hih a gilo mihonte in bang tanvei kei hong phunsan ding uh ahi hiam? Israel mite in kei hong phunsanna ka za khin hi.

Amah in Samuel' seh hun, ni sagih sung a ngak hi. Ahih hangin Gilgal-ah Samuel hong pailo a, ama kiang panin mite kithehthang hi. 9 Tua ahih ciangin Saul in, "Meihal biakna leh thunuama biakna hih lai kei kiangah hong paipih un," a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in meihal biakna a pia hi. 10 Meihal biakna a piak a man khit phetin Samuel hong tung a, amah a dawn ding leh a hopih dingin Saul paikhia hi. 11 Samuel in, "Bang hih na hi hiam?" a ci hi. Saul in, "Kei kiang panin mite kithehthangin, a ni kiseh sungin nang lah hong tunglo a, Mikmash-ah Filistia-te a kikhopna ka muh ciangin 12 keimah in, ‘Tu-in Filistia-te keimah hong hih dingin Gilgal-ah hong paisuk ding uh a, keimah in { Topa' } maipha ka ngen nai kei hi,’ ka ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin keimahmah kisawl tawmin meihal biakna ka pia hi," a ci hi. 13 Tua ciangin Samuel in Saul kiangah, "Na hai gamtat hi; { Topa } na Pasian' hong thupiakna na zui kei hi; Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } in Israel-te tungah kumpi dingin nang leh na suanlekhakte a kipsaksuak ding a hihi. 14 Ahih hangin tu-in na ukna kizomsuak lo ding a, { Topa } in ama lungsim bangin mi khat zong khin hi. { Topa } in nang hong thupiak zuilo na hih manin ama mite tungah ulian dingin { Topa } in amah seh khin hi," a ci hi.

Kum tampi sung lungduaina tawh amaute na thuak a, na kamsangte tung tawnin amaute na hilh hi. Ahi zongin amaute in ngai nuamlo uhhi. Tua ahih ciangin gamdang mite' khutsungah amaute na pia hi. 31 Ahi ta zongin na hehpihna lian hangin amaute beisak loin, zong na nusia kei hi; Banghang hiam cihleh dikna leh hehpihna a nei na hi hi.
Ama hehna tomno sung bek hi a, ama hong deihsakna pen khang tawntung-a ding a hihi. Zan hun sungteng kahna omkha mah ding a, ahih hangin zing khuavak tawh nuamna hong tung hi.

{ Topa' } mai-ah khawl dide in la, lungduai takin ngak in. A hihna a daupaipa tung leh siatna a bawlpa tungah kilungso tawmsak ke'n! 8 Hehna panin kikham in la, sinsona nusia in. Nangmah kilungso tawmsak ke'n; tua in siatna bekah a hong paipih hi. 9 Banghang hiam cihleh migilote kipuaseh ding a, ahih hangin { Topa } a ngakte in leitung luah ding uhhi. 10 Ahih hangin tawlkhat sungin migilopa om nawnlo ding a, ama omna mun na lim zon' mahmah hangin tua lai-ah amah na omlo ding hi. 11 Ahih hangin lungnemte in leitung luahin, genzawh lohin amaute nuamsa ding uhhi.
{ Topa } lamenin ka ngak ngiungeu a, amah kei lam hong nga-in ka kikona aw hong za hi.
"Om hithiat unla, Pasian ka hihna thei un. Minamte lakah keimah hong kisangsak a, leitung khempeuhah ka min hong kithangsak hi," a ci hi.
A hun ka sehsa ni ciangin thu a manin ka khen ding hi.
Ahi zongin amah in hehpihna lungsim nei ahih manin amau' khialhnate maisakin, amaute susialo hi. Amah in a hehna ip zelzel a, a hehna khempeuh phongkhialo hi.
Ahih hangin Topa aw, nang pen a hehpih thei, a dik Pasian na hi a, heh hak mahmahin, itna kip leh thumanna tawh a kidim na hi hi.
{ Topa } dikin hehpihna tawh kidim a, heh hakin, a lian mahmah itna kip tawh a kidim hi.
{ Topa' } hong huh ding lawpna tawh ka ngak a, ama thugen ka muang hi. 6 Galvilte in zingsang hun ding a ngaklah sangin galvilte in phalvak hun ding a ngaklah sangin, { Topa } ka ngaklah zaw hi.
{ Topa } dikin hehpihna nei a, heh hak mahmahin itna kip lianpi a nei hi.
A lungtom mite hai gamtat a, mipilte lungduai hi.
A lungduaite mipil hi a, lungtomna pen haina kilatna a hihi.
Lungtomna in kitotna piangsak a, lungduaina in kilemna piangsak hi.
Thahatna sangin lungduaina hoihzaw a, khuapi khat ukzawhna sangin eimah ki-ukzawhna hoihzaw hi.
Pilna in mi lungduaisak a, mi' hong hehsaknate kiphawkmawh bawlna in minthan'na a hihi.
Lungduai-a zolzolna tawh gam ukte kizo thei a, kam nemin pauna tawh aana neite kizo thei hi.
Thu khatpeuh a kipatna sangin a tawpna hoihzaw a, kiphatsakna sangin lungduaina hoihzaw hi. 9 Heh pahpah kei in; hehna a haihuai a hihi.

Tua ahih ciangin note hong hehpih nuamin { Topa } in hong ngak a, note tungah hehpihna hong lah ding amah kipakta hi. Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } pen a thutang Pasian hi a, amah a muangte khempeuh thupha ngah a hihi.

Pasian in hih bangin ci hi: "Sauveipi sung bangmah hihloin ka om a, keimah leh keimah kikhamcipin ka om hithiat hi. Tu-in ahih leh numei nausuak ding bangin ka kikokhia ding a, ka kam ka-in ka tungnak ding hi.
Note khempeuh kong suksiat khaklohna dingin ka min ka ngaihsutna tawh ka hehna diahin, keimah hong kiphatna ka ngaihsutna-in note tungah ka ki-ip hi.

Tua ciangin keimah in: { Topa } aw, nang na thei hi. Hong phawk in la hong veh in. Kei a hong bawlsiate tungah phu hong laksak in. Ka galte tungah na lungduaina hangin kei' sihna ding piangsak kei in. Nangma hangin minsiatna a thuak ka hihlam hong thei in.

{ Topa } in na hoihlohnate uh leh na bawl uh kihhuainate hangin note hong thuakzo nawnlo hi. Tua ahih manin tuni mahmahin zong na gam uh gamlak suakkhin a, mite' kihamsiatna suakin kuamah teng nawnlo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin thuakzawhna tawh ngak kenkanzo lehang a hoihpen a hihi. A hong hotkhiat ding amah ngak ni. 27 Na khangno lai-in thuakzawh hat ding kisin leteh hoihpen hi.
"Ahi zongin amaute ka khasiat a, gamlakah amaute ka susia kei a, ka maimangsak kei hi.

Na dah taktakna uh lungkhamna tawh langsak unla, na puante uh a balkek bek hi kei un," hong ci hi. { Topa}, note' Pasian kiangah ciahkik un. Amah migi mahmahin hehpihna a nei hi a, a lungduai-in hong huh nuam tawntung a, gim hong pialoin hong maisak nuam tawntung hi.

{ Topa' } kiangah thu ngen a, "Kong thum hi, { Topa } aw; ka gamsungah ka omlai pekin hici mah in teh, ci hilo ka hi hiam? Hanciamin Tarshish khua-ah ka taisimna zong tua hang mah ahi hi; Banghang hiam cihleh nang pen a hehpih thei Pasian, a hehhak, a migi mahmah, siatna tun'sak ding a kisiknuam Pasian na hihna kong thei hi.
Kote nong khasiat kik ding a, ka mawhnate uh hong sawpkhiat sakin, tuipi taw-ah nong paihsak ding hi.

{ Topa } lungduai mahmah a, a vang zong lian mahmah a, ahih hangin mimawhte khahkhong ngeilo hi. A paina peuhpeuhah huihpi nungin pingpei kipei a, ama paina hanga leivui leeng meiipi kai tawh kibang hi.

Hih thu a tun'na ding hun hi pah nailo ahih manin lai-in ciamteh in. Ahi zongin hong tung baihta ding a, kong lah khempeuh a manin hong tung ding hi. A tung hak tawh a kibangkha ahi zongin ngak keikai in. Ka seh hun a cin' ciangin hong tung takpi ding a, zekai lua nawnlo ding hi.

Thu na gengenna uh tawh { Topa } na gimsak uhhi. Note in, "Bangci gimsak ka hi uhhiam?" na ci uhhi. "{ Topa } in a sia-in a gamtate a hoihin ngaihsun a, zong itin amaute tungah lungkim takpi hi," na cihna khawng uh leh, "Thutang a gen Pasian koi lai-ah om ahi hiam?" ci-in na dotnate uh tawh na gimsak uhhi.
A lungnem mite in Pasian' ciamsa leitang ngah ding uh ahih manin thupha ngah mi ahi uhhi.

"Note in, ‘Mittang khat tangding mittang khat, ha khat tangding ha khat,’ ci-in a kigenna na zaksa uh a hihi. 39 Ahi zongin note kiangah ke'n kong genin-ah: A gilote na thukkik kei un. Mi khatpeuh in na paang taklam hong bet leh a langkhat zong na dawh lai zaw in.

Tua ahih manin a nasempa zong a mai-ah hong bokin thum a, ‘Topa aw, hong ngak lai in; a vekpi-in ka hong loh ding hi,’ ci-in a thum hi. 27 Kumpipa in khasiathuai sa ahih manin a leiba teng maisakin a khah hi. 28 "Ahi zongin tua nasempa a paikhiat ciangin ama sum ngun peek za khat khawng a ba a naseppih dang khat tawh a kituak hi. Tuapa a gawlin manin, ‘Na leiba hong loh in,’ a ci hi. 29 A naseppihpa zong a mai-ah bokin hong thum a, ‘Hong ngak lai in; ka hong loh ding hi,’ a ci hi.

"Mihoih a kineihkhem, no Thukham hilh siate leh Pharisee mite in gimna na thuak ding uhhi. Note in vantung ki-ukna sungah mite a lut theihlohna dingin kong na khakcip uhhi. Note lah na lutnuam kei uh a, a lutnuamte lah na lutsak kei uhhi.
Tua ahih ciangin bang hunin na Topa uh hong pai ding cih theilo na hih manun na pilvang un.
Amaute tawh a omkhawm laitakin amah in amaute kiangah, "Jerusalem khua panin paikhia kei unla, note kiangah ka hong gensa ka Pa' hong kamciam thu na ngak un.

Midangte a mawhna hangin thu khenin, no zong tua amau mawhnate mah na bawl veve uh ciangin Pasian' thukhenna tawh kipelh tuan dingin ki-um peuhmah na hi uhhiam? 4 Pasian migi-in thu a diah hithiatna pen na kisikkik theihna ding uh a deihna ahih lamtak phawkkha loin, a migitna, a lungduaina, a hong thuaknate neu ngaihsutkha na hi uhhiam? 5 Lungsim khauhin na kisik noplohna hangun Pasian' hehna leh a manin a thukhenna a hong kilat Ni ding ciangin na gimthuak ding uh a nasia semsem dingin a bawl na hi uhhi. 6 Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in mi khempeuh a gamtatna uh tawh kizui-in thukkik ding hi.

Haksatna i thuak laitak nangawnin i lungdam veve hi. Banghang hiam cihleh haksatna in thuakzawh hatna piangsak a, 4 thuakzawh hatna in Pasian' pahtakna hong ngahsak a, ama hong pahtakna in lametna lianpi hong neisak ahihna thu i thei hi.

Hih bangin lamenin i upna in eite hong honkhia khin hi. Ahi zongin i lamet pen i muh ciangin tua pen lamet hi nawnlo hi. Kua in a muhsa nate lamen nawn ahi hiam? 25 I muhlohte i lamet ciangin lungduai takin i ngak thei hi. 26 Tua ahih manin eite bangzahin ginalo hita lehang eite a hong huh dingin Khasiangtho a hong pai hi. Eite in a kilawm bangin thunget ding nangawn i thei kei a, ahi zongin Khasiangtho mah in tauna tawh eite-a' dingin a hong thumsak hi.

Tua mah bangin Pasian in zong a beisa hunah siatna a thuakdingin a kilawm mite susia loin a ki-ipipna mite tungah a hehna leh a vangliatna a lahtheihna ding thu a neih mah bangin, 23 ama minthan'na a lahtheihna dingin ama minthan'na a ngahdingin a hong sehsa eite tungah zong ama hehpihna a hong piaktheihna ding thu a nei hi.
Lamet na neihna hangun lungdamin om tawntung unla, lungkhamna na thuak uh ciangin lungduai-in thu na ngen tawntung un.

Laisiangtho sungah a om thu khempeuh pen eite hilhna ding, eite in lametna nei-in i thuakzawhna ding, leh i thahat theihna dingin a kigelh a hihi. 5 Note in lungsim kikhatin i Topa Zeisu Christ' Pa ahi Pasian na phatkhawm theihna dingun Pasian in thuakzawhna leh thahatna hong pia hen la, Zeisu Christ deihna bangin gamta-in khatlekhat kithutuak takin hong omsak ta hen.

Tua ahih manin a hun a tun'ma-in kuamah mawhsakin thu khen kei un. Topa hong pai ciangin a tawpna thukhenna hong om ding a, amah in thusimte hong pholakin, mihingte in a lungsim sung uhah a ipcip uh thute hong telkheh ding hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in amau' ngahdingin a kilawm phatna, Pasian' kiang panin a ngah ciat ding uhhi.

Itna neite a lungduai-in migi hi. Itna neite in hazatna lungsim neiloin, zong kisathei lo hi. 5 Itna neite a kilawm loin gamtalo, heh pakpaklo, mite' mawhna ciamtehlo hi. 6 Thuman lote-ah lungdam ngeilo uh a, thumante bekah lungdam uhhi. 7 Itna neite lungkia cih om ngeilo hi; a upna, a lametna, lungduai takin a ngaknate uh a mawkna cih om ngeilo hi.

Tua ahih manin ka sepna khempeuh uhah Pasian' nasemte ka hihna uh ka kilangsak uh a, lungduai takin gimna, haksatna, lungkhamnate ka thuak uhhi. 5 Kote hong kisatin, thongah hong kikhia-in, mihonpi in hong hihgawp uhhi; nakpi takin na semin, an nelo, ihmulo liangin ka om uhhi. 6 Siangtho takin nuntakna, thu theihna, lungduaina, migitna, Khasiangtho' huhna, itna taktak neihna,

Ahi zongin Khasiangtho' sawlna bangin gamtatnate pen: Itna, lungdamna, lungnopna, lungduaina, migitna, hoihna, cihtakna, 23 dikna, leh pumpi ki-ukzawhna hi a, hih bangin a gamta mite, Thukham in bangmah cih theilo hi.
Tua ahih manin na hoih sepding cimtak kei ni. Lungkia loin i sep nak leh a hun ciangin thaman i ngah ding hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Topa' na ka sepna hangin thong a kia keimah in note' nuntakzia dingin a hong deihna tawh a kilawm a kituakin na nuntakna dingun ka hong hanthawn hi. 2 Kiniamkhiatin, thunemin, lungduai-in om tawntung un. Khatlekhat kihuhna tawh na ki-itna uh kilangsak un.

Note in lungduai maitaii takin thuakzo-in, khuavak gamsungah a om Pasian' mite tawh nopsakna a ngahkhawm thei dingin a hong bawl i Pa tungah lungdamna na koh theihna dingun a minthang ama vangliatna in note tungah thahatna hong guan' ta hen.
Pasian in note hong itin, hong teelin, ama mi siangthote hikhin na hih manun note pen hehpihna nei-in, migi-in, kiniamkhiatin, dikin, na lungduai ding uh a hihi.

Banghang hiam cihleh i Pa Pasian kiangah thu ka nget simun note' upna hangin na nuntakziate uh, itna na neih manun nakpi takin na nasepnate uh leh i Topa Zeisu Christ hong paikik ding lametna na neih manun kiptakin na omnate uh ka phawk tawntung uhhi.

Bawlsiatna leh gimna na thuakna khempeuh uhah na upna uh khahsuah loin thuakzo paisuak na hih manun midangte kiangah Pasian' pawlpi ka na kisialhpih uhhi. 5 Tu-a na thuaknate uh hangin Pasian' Ukna sungah a om dingin a kilawm mi suak na hih manun Pasian' thukhenna a man ahihna hong kilangsak hi.
Pasian bangin itna nei-in Christ thuak bangin na thuakzawhna dingun Topa in note lungsim hong bawlsak ta hen.

A mawhneipha bel ka hihna thu hang mahin, nidang ciangin amah umin nuntak tawntungna a ngahding mite' etteh theihdingin Christ Zeisu in a lungduaina cingtakin kei tungah hong lahtheihna dingin Pasian in kei a hong hehpih a hihi.

Sum deihluatna in siatna namkim piangsak hi. Mi pawlkhat in sum deihlua liang uh ahih manin a upna panun pialkhia-in gimna lungkhamna tampi a thuaklawh uhhi. 11 Ahi zongin Pasian' mi ahi nangmah in tua thute khempeuh pelh in la, thuman thutak, Pasian' deih bangin nuntakna, upna, itna, kipna, leh lungnemna na neihzawhna dingin hanciam in.

Topa' na a sem mite, kitot a hatte hilo ding a, mi khempeuh tungah lungsim nemin, thugen siamin, thuakzawhna nei-in, 25 thunem tawh a langte' hoihlohna a puahtheite hi ding hi. Tua bang hi leh Pasian in amaute kisiksak thei ding a, thuman thutak hong thei-in, 26 Dawimangpa in ama deihna bangin a gamta dingin a mat khit hangin ama thang panin amaute suakta khathei ding uhhi.
Ahi zongin nangmah in ahih leh ka thuhilhna, ka gamtatna, leh ka nuntakna-ah ka ngim ka tup thute na hong zui hi. Ka upna, ka lungduaina, itna ka neihna, ka lungkipna,

Pasal khanghamte a kilawm a kituakin a omtheihna ding, thu ngaihsun thei mi ahihna ding, a kikemzo mite ahih theihna ding, upna man a neihtheihna ding, itna man a neihtheihna ding uh leh a manin lungkipin a thuakzawhna dingun na gen in.

Note thadah loin upna leh lungduaina a nei mite bangin, Pasian' hong ciamsa thu na ngahna dingun ka hong deihsak uhhi. 13 Pasian in Abraham' tungah thu a ciam ciangin a tun'sak takpi ding bek thu a ciam hi. Thu a ciam ciangin zong amah sangin a lianzaw kuamah om nawnlo ahih manin ama min tawh thu ciam a, 14 "Nang thupha hong pia-in suanlekhak tampi a nei dingin ka hong ciam hi," a ci hi. 15 Abraham in lungduai takin na ngak ahih manin Pasian' thuciam a ngah hi.
Pasian' deihna bangin gamta-in, ama thuciam na ngahtheihna dingun lungduai-in thuakzawhna na kisam uhhi.

Tua bangin na upna hong hong kize-etna na thuakzawh uh ciangin na kipna uh hong kilangsak ahihna thu na thei uhhi. 4 A kisam bangmah omloin a cingtaak na suahtheihna dingun na thuakna uh hangin a tawntungin na kip paisuakna dingun na ngaihsun un.

Sanggamte aw, note in na theihding uh ka deih thu in: Thu kigen khempeuh hoihtakin ngai pahpah un. Ahi zongin pau pahpah kei unla, heh pakpak kei un. 20 Mihingte' hehna in Pasian' sepding thuhoihte khaktan hi.

A thuman mite mawhsakin na that uh a, amaute in na thu uh hong nial zolo uhhi. 7 Tua ahih ciangin sanggamte aw, Topa hong pai matengin lungduai takin om un. Lo khote in zong a lo panun an a ngahtheihna dingun lungduai takin khuapi guah leh tuk guah a ngakna thu thei un. 8 Note zong na lungduai un. Topa hong paiding hun naita ahih manin na lungsim uh na thahatsak un. 9 Sanggamte aw, Pasian in note tungah thu hong khenkhak lohna dingin khatlekhat na kiphunsan kei un. Thukhen dingpa hong nai mahmah ta a, hong tung dektak ta hi. 10 Sanggamte aw, Topa' min tawh thu a gen kamsangte na phawk un. Gimna a thuak laitakun lungduai-in a thuaknate uh na etteh un. 11 Tua bangin a thuak mite a hampha mahmah hi, i ci hi. Job in a thuakna-ah a lungduaina na thei uh a, Topa in dikna leh hehpihna nei ahih manin a tawpna-ah Job tungah a piak thuphate na thei uhhi.

Note na gamtat khialhna uh hangin hong kisat ciangin lungduai takin na thuak manun bangmah phattuamna omlo hi. Ahi zongin a manin gamta napi-in gimna na thuak uh ciangin lungduai takin na thuak uh leh Pasian in thupha hong pia ding hi. 21 Christ mahmah in zong note-a' dingin thuakin, ama khekhap na zuihtheihna dingun etteh ding lim hong nusiat ahih manin hih bangin a thuakding mahin Pasian in note a hong sam a hihi.
Noah in teembaw a bawl hun laitakin Pasian in lungduai takin ngak hinapi-in hih kha a nei mite pawlkhat in Pasian' thu manglo uhhi. Teembaw sungah a om mi giat bek, tui in a suaktasak hi.

Mi pawlkhatte' ngaihsut bangin Topa in a kamciamna a hong tungsak hak hi zenzen lo hi. Note khat beek in siatna na thuakkhak ding uh deihloin na vekpi-un na kisik ding uh deih ahih manin hong pai nailohna pen note hong khualna hizaw hi.

Note' sanggam keimah Johan in Zeisu tawh kipawlna hangin note mah bangin bawlsiatna thuakin, Pasian' Ukna sungah omin, lungduai takin a thuak mipa ka hihi. Pasian' thu leh Zeisu' hong gen thumante ka genna hangin Patmos a kici tuikulhah kei hong kikoih hi.

"Note' nasepna, na gimna uh leh lungduai takin na thuakna uh, leh migilote koihmawk loin, sawltak hilo napi-in sawltak hi ung, a ci mite dongtelin sawltak ahihlohna uh na muhkhiatnate uh ka thei hi. 3 Note in lungduai takin thuakin, keima min hangin thuakzo-in, lungkia hetloin na omna uh ka thei hi.
Note' gamtatna, itna na neihna, upna na neihna, na nasepna, lungduai takin na thuakna uh, leh a kipatcil lai sangin a nunung lamah na hoihzawknate uh ka thei hi.

Jew mi hilo napi-in Jew mi hi ung, ci-in zuau a gen Satan' pawlte, note' mai-ah hong paisakin na khephung uhah ka boksak ding a, note ka hong itna thu amaute ka theisak ding hi. 10 Note in lungduai takin na thuakna ding uh ka hong thupiakna zui na hih manun leitunga a om mi khempeuh ze-etna dingin leitung bupah a hong tungding lungkhamna panin kei zong note ka hong suaktasak ding hi.
{ Topa } in note-a' dingin hong dosak ding a, note ahih leh na om hithiat ding uhhi bek hi," a ci hi.
A manlopi-a mi mawhsak ding panin kikem unla, a dikpa leh thumanpa that kei un. Banghang hiam cihleh a gilo mi ka khah kei ding hi.
{ Topa } in Moses kiangah, "Nang tawh kong pai ding a, lungsim tawlngakna hun nang kong pia ding hi," a ci hi.
Ahih hangin { Topa } in ama kiangah, "Nopna na tungah hong om ta hen; lau kei in, na si kei ding hi," a ci hi.
Nuamtakin lumin ka ihmu ta ding hi; Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } aw, nangmah bek in lungmuan'na munah na hong omsak hi.
{ Topa } ka maingat tawntung a, ka taklamah amah om ahih manin ka kiling kei ding hi.
Nangmah in nuntakna lampi keimah nong lak hi. Nangma omna munah lungdamna lianpi om a, nangma taklamah nop tawntungnate a om hi.
{ Topa } pen keima suangpi, ka munkip muan'huai, kei a hong honkhiapa, ka Pasian, ka suangpi, ka belhpa, ka lum, ka kihotkhiatna ki, ka munkip a hihi.

Topa in tuu bang aa kei hong cing Pa hi aa, bangmah ka kisamkei ding hi. 2 Lonona-ah kei hong lumsak aa, tui kiangah kei hong paipih hi. 3 Ka nuntakna tha hong dimsak aa, ama Min aa dingin thuman lampi-ah kei hong kha hi. 4 Sihna lim guam sung nangawn ka nawk hangin siatna ka kihtakei hi. Banghang hiam cihleh kei tawh nang nong omkhawm hi. Na molhtum leh na ciangkhut in kei hong lungmuang sak hi. 5 Ka galte omna mai-ah kei aa ding an nong lui hi. Ka lu sathau nong nilh aa, ka hai a dimlet hi. 6 Hoihna leh Hehpihna in ka khan tawntungin hong zui taktak ding aa, Topa' inn sungah ka om tawntung ding hi. (HCN)

{ Topa } pen tuucin' bangin hong cing hi a, kisapna teng kicing ta hi. 2 Lo nona-ah hong lumsak a, tuidam kiangah hong paipih hi. 3 Thahatna thak kei hong guan' hi. A hong ciamsa mah bangin-ah lampi manah kei hong kha hi. 4 { Topa } aw, kei hong ompih na hih manin khuamial thukpi ka nawk hangin ka lau kei hi. Na molhtum leh na ciangkhut in kei hong hu hi. 5 Keima galte' muhna munah an nong lui hi. Thupi takin nong pahtawi a, keima hai zong dimlet ta hi. 6 Na hoihna leh nong itna in ka khan'tawnin a hong zuih ding tel takin-ah ka thei ta a, a tawntungin na inn sungah ka om ding hi. (TDM)

TOPA in tuucin-a hong cingpa hi-a, bangmah ka kisam kei ding hi. 2 Lonona ah kei hong lumsak a, tuidam kiangah kei hong pi-in 3 ka hinna tha hong dim kik hi. Ama min hangin thumaanna lampite ah kei hong makaih hi. 4 Sihna e liim guam sung nangawn ka tawn zongin kei tawh omkhawm na hi manin siatna peuhmah ka kihta kei ding hi; na khetbuk le na ciangkhut in kei hong khamuangsak hi. 5 Ka galte ompi-in ka mai ah sabuai nong lui hi. Ka lu sathau nong nilh a; ka hai a dimlet hi. 6 Ka nuntak sung tawntung hoihna le itna in hong zui taktak dinga tuateh TOPA’ inn ah ka teng denta ding hi. (ZIV)
{ Topa, } ka khuavak leh hong honpa a hihi. Kua kihta ding ka hi hiam? { Topa, } kei-a' dingin munmuan'huai a hihi. Bang laupih ding ka hi hiam?

{ Topa } i ngak hi; amah pen eite hong huhpa leh i lum a hihi. 21 Ama min siangtho eite in muang ihih manin ama sungah i lungdam hi. 22 { Topa } aw, nang kong lamet uh mah bangin kote' tungah na itna kip hong omsak in.
Keimah in { Topa } ka zong a, amah in kei hong dawngin, ka launa khempeuh panin kei hong honkhia hi.

{ Topa } muang in la, gamtat hoih in. Gam nuamah teng in la, thumanin om in. 4 { Topa } sungah lungkim in; amah in na deihna hong pia ding hi. 5 { Topa } tungah na vai teng ap in. Amah muang in; amah in hong sem ding hi. 6 Amah in nangma dikna khuavak bangin, nangma thumanna nitaang bangin hong langsak ding hi. 7 { Topa' } mai-ah khawl dide in la, lungduai takin ngak in. A hihna a daupaipa tung leh siatna a bawlpa tungah kilungso tawmsak ke'n!
Banghangin khakunkun a, lunghimawh niloh ka hi hiam? Pasian' sungah lametna nei ning; Banghang hiam cihleh kei a hong huh ka Pasian ka phatkik ngawn ding hi.

Pasian, i belh leh i thahatna hi a, haksat hunin a hong huh pahpahpa a hihi. 2-3 Tua ahih ciangin, leitung kikhinin, mualte tuipi sung a kiden'na zongin, a tuite ging zuazua-in phuan zuazua a, hih gin'na hangin mual liante a ling zongin, i lau kei ding hi.
"Om hithiat unla, Pasian ka hihna thei un. Minamte lakah keimah hong kisangsak a, leitung khempeuhah ka min hong kithangsak hi," a ci hi.
{ Topa } tungah na vangik nga in, amah in hong huh ding hi. Amah in mi thumante kilingsak ngeilo ding hi.
Kei ka lau ciangin nangmah ka hong muang hi.
lunghihmawhna khat zong nei hetloin Pasian ka muang hi. Mihing lellelte in kei, bang hong cihzo ding ahi uhhiam?
Dai dide-in Pasian bek ka ngak a, ama hong hotkhiat ding muangin ka om hi.
Amah bek ka muan' ahih manin, daitakin Pasian bek ka ngak hi.
Tuipi gamla pente leh leimong khempeuhte' lamet, kote a hong honkhia Pasian, 6 a thahatna tawh mualte a bawl, vangliatna tawh a kidim, 7 tuipi gingte, tuihualte, mi gamlumte a daisakpa aw,
Vanglian { Topa } Pasian aw, na khempeuhah na thutak a, nangmah bangin a vanglian kua om ahi hiam, { Topa } aw. 9 Nang in tuipi khang na uk a, a tuihualte a san' ciangin na daiisak hi.

Sangpenpa' liahna sung, Vanglianpa' liim sungah a om mi khempeuh in 2 { Topa' } tungah, "Ka bukna leh ka munkip muan'huai, ka muan' ka Pasian na hi hi," ci ding uhhi. 3 Banghang hiam cihleh amah in thangsiahpa' thangzak leh a lauhuai pulnatna panin nang hong honkhia ding hi. 4 Amah in a khate tawh nang hong tuam ding a, ama khate' nuai-ah bukna ding na mu ding hi. Ama thumanna in nang hong dalin hong hu ding hi. 5 Nangmah in zana lauhuaina, sun-a thaltang leengte, khuamial lakah a vak khiankhian pulnatna, sun nitaang-a suksiatnate na kihta kei ding hi. 6-7 Na kiangah mi tul khat, na kimkotah mi tul sawm, hong tukin a sih hangin bangmah na ci kei ding hi.
{ Topa } aw, "Ka khe taal," ci-in ka ngaihsut ciangin na itna kip in kei hong kaito hi. 19 Ka lungsim ngaihsutna a tam mahmah ciangin kei na hong hehnem a, na hong lungdamsak hi.

Tua ciangin amaute in a lungkhamna uhah { Topa } ko uh a, amau' cihmawhna panin amah in a honkhia hi. 14 Amah in khuamial sung leh a zing sung panin amaute lakhia a, amau a kihennate a botsat hi. 15 Ama itna kip leh mihing tate tungah a lamdang a nasepnate hangin amaute in { Topa } tungah lungdamna ko ta uh hen.
Amah in huihpi daisak a, tuipi hualte a bei hi. 30 Tua ciangin, tua tuihualte a khawl manin amaute a lungdam uhhi. Amah in amaute' utna khua-ah a paipih hi.
Dahna in kei hong vukcip hi. Nangma thu omsa bangin kei hong thakhauhsak in.

Keimah in mualtung lam ka ento hi. Keimah huhna koi lai pan hong pai ding ahi hiam? 2 Van leh lei a bawl { Topa' } kiang panin keimah huhna hong pai hi. 3 Amah in ka khe taalsaklo ding a, kei hong kempa lusulo ding hi. 4 En un, Israel a kempa lusulo a, zong ihmulo hi. 5 { Topa } in nang hong cing ding a, nangmah a hong hu dingin na kiangah hong om hi. 6 Sunin ni in nang hong gimsaklo ding a, zanin kha in zong nang hong sukhalo ding hi. 7 { Topa } in siatna khempeuh panin nang hong hu ding a, amah in a muan'huai-in nang hong kem ding hi. 8 { Topa } in tu-a kipan a tawntungin na vaksuk na vaktohna-ah nang hong kem ding hi.
A nu' nawi tawh a kikhenta naupang bangin daitakin ka om dide zota hi. A dai hithiat-a om naupang tawh ka kibangta hi.
{ Topa } aw, nangmah in kei na hong entel a, nong thei khin hi.
Ahi zongin ka thugenna a ngaite in lungnopna ngah ding uh a, launa neilo-in nuamtakin om hithiat ding uhhi," a ci hi.
Na lungsim khempeuh tawh { Topa } muang in la, nang' theihna suang kei in. 6 Na hihna khempeuhah amah phawk in. Tua hi leh lampi man amah in hong lak ding hi.
Lunghihmawhna in lungkhamna piangsak a, kampau hoih in mi lungdamsak hi.
{ Topa' } min pen tausang muan'huai tawh kibang a, thuman mite in belin lungmuangin om thei uhhi.
Midangte kihtakna in hong lunghimawhsak a, { Topa } muan'na in hong lungmuangsak hi.
Nang tungah gam ukpa a heh leh na nasep za taisan pah kei in. Dai tak-a om hithiatna in khialhna lianpi maisak thei hi.
ama tungah, ‘Kidawm in la, om khinkhian in. Lau kei in. Syria kumpipa Rezin leh Remaliah' tapa' hehna pen, sing tumbang nih a khute tawh kibang lel ahih manin na lung gimsak kei in.

Ka mual siangtho buppi tungah amaute khatlekhat kiliamsak lo ding uh a, kisusia lo ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh tuite in tuipi omna a tuamcip mah bangin leitungah { Topa}' thu theihna kidim ding hi.
{ Topa } aw, nang hong muang a, nangma tungah a lungsim khempeuh a koih mipa lungnopna kicing pia ta in.

Banghang hiam cihleh Israel-te' Siangtho Pa, Topa { Pasian } in, "Kihei kikna leh khawlna bek tawh note in suahtakna na ngah ding uhhi. Daitakin omna leh muan'na pen nomau' thahatna hi ding hi," a ci hi. Ahih hangin note na tuaci kei uh a, 16 "Hilo! Sakol tung tuangin manlang takin i tai ding hi," ci na hih uh ciangin note na taikhia ding uhhi. "Sakol zaptel tungah i tuang ding hi," ci na hih uh ciangin note hong delh mite zong zaptel ding hi.

Tua ahih ciangin note hong hehpih nuamin { Topa } in hong ngak a, note tungah hehpihna hong lah ding amah kipakta hi. Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } pen a thutang Pasian hi a, amah a muangte khempeuh thupha ngah a hihi.
Thei nailo a, za nailo na hi hiam? { Topa } pen tawntung Pasian hi a, leitung mong khempeuh dong a Piangsakpa a hihi. Amah gimlo a, zong tawllo hi. Ama thu theihtelna kigen zolo hi.

Ahih hangin Jacob aw, nangmah hong piangsakpa, Israel aw, nangmah hong bawlpa, { Topa } in tu-in hih bang ci hi: "Hong honkhia khin ka hih manin lau kei in. Na min tawh kong sam khinzo a, nang pen kei-a' na hi hi. 2 Tuite na kantan ciangin nang kong ompih ding a, gunte na kantan ciangin tui in hong tuumlo ding hi. Mei kantanin na pai ciangin na kang kei ding a, meikuangte in nang hong kangtumlo ding hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh mual liante kihemin, mual neute a kikhin zongin nang kiang panin ka itna kip paikhia ngeilo ding a, na nopsakna ding ka thuciamna kinlo ding hi, nang a hong hehpih { Topa } in ci hi.
Na hong dawng a, a laulo dingin thu nong pia hi.

{ Topa } na Pasian un note hong ompih a, ama vangliatna in hong gualzosak hi. Note tungah { Topa } lungkim ding a, ama hong itna tawh hong thakbawl ding hi. Note' hangin { Topa } lungdamin la sa ding a,
Amaute in lungkhamna tuipi a phutkhak uh ciangin keimah in tuihualte ka vatmai ding a, Nail gun tuithukte kangcip ding hi. Assiria mite ka niamkhiat ding a, Egypt in a vangliatna taan ding hi.

"Tua ahih ciangin note kiangah kong genin-ah: Na nuntakna dingun bang ne-in bang dawn ding cih ahi a, na pumpi uh-a' dingin bang silh ding cih ahi zongin lunghimawh lua kei un. Nuntakna pen an sangin thupizaw a, pumpi pen puan sangin thupizaw hilo ahi hiam? 26 "Vanah a leeng vasate ngaihsun dih un: Amaute in khai tuhlo, an zong lalo, sal sungah zong khollo napi-in vantungah a om na Pa un tuate a nek ding uh tasamsak lo hi. Tua vasate sangin note manphazaw thampek hilo na hi uhhiam? 27 Na lunghihmawh manun kua in na khan' uh kum bangzah sotto thei na hi uhhiam?

Tua ahih manin bang ne ding a, bang dawn ding a, bang silh ding ihi hiam, ci-in lunghimawh lua kei un. 32 (Gentail mite in lunghihmawh penin a neihte uhhih bangte a hihi.) Hih nate khempeuh na kisap lamtak uh vantungah a om na Pa un a thei hi. 33 Thudang khempeuh sangin Pasian' ukna leh ama deihna na zuih theihna ding uh thupi ngaihsut masazaw un. Tua hi leh hih na kisapna dangte khempeuh uh zong hong piathuah veve ding hi. 34 "Tua ahih manin zingciang huna ding ma lungkham masa kei un. Zingciang thu ding ama thu-in omsak lel un. Tuni thu pen tuni thu mah tawh beisak unla, lungkham ding behlap se kei un.

Thakhat thu-in huihpi hong nung ahih manin tuihualte in gunkuang tum dekdek a, ahi zongin Zeisu a ihmu hi. 25 Nungzuite in Zeisu va phong uh a, "Topa aw, ka si dektak uhhi; hong hon in," a va ci uhhi. 26 Zeisu in, "Banghangin tuaci lau na hi uhhiam? Na upna uh neu mahmah hi," a cih khit ciangin tho-in huihpi leh tuihualte thu pia a, a dai dide pah hi. 27 A nungzuite in lamdangsa mahmah uh a, "Huihpi leh tuihualte nangawn in ama thu mang ahih manin hih mipa a bangci mi hi ding ahi hiam?" a ci uhhi.

Vangik pua aa a gim mi khempeuhte aw, ka kiangah hong pai ta un. Tawldamna ka hong pia ding hi. 29 Keima hakkol na kisuan unla, kei kiangah kisin ta un. Banghang hiam na cih uhleh, keimah in lungsimniam mi ka hihi. Note in lungsim noptuamna zongh na ngah ding uhhi. 30 Banghang hiam na cih uhleh, ka hakkol puak nopaa ka van zongh a zang hi." ci-in Zeisu in a gen hi. (HCN)

"Na semin vangik pua-in a gim mite khempeuh aw, ka kiangah hong pai ta un. Note tungah lungsim tawldamna ka hong pia ding hi. 29 Keima hakkol zangin kisuan unla, kei kiangah hong kisin dih un. Kei pen kiniamkhiatin neem hithiat ka hih manin ka kiangah na tawl uh a dam ding hi. 30 Banghang hiam cihleh note kong suat ding ka hakkol nuam a, na puak ding uh van zong a zang mah ahi hi," ci-in a genkhia hi. (TDM)

"Vangik pua a gim mite khempeuh aw, ka kiangah hong pai ta un; tawldamna kong pia ding hi. 29 Keima hakkol kisuan unla kei kiangah kisin ta un. Ahang in, keimah lungsim nem le lungsim ki niamkhiat mi ka hi hi, na hinna un tawldamna a ngah ding hi. 30 Ahang in, ka hakkol nuam in ka van zong a zang hi. (ZIV)

Zeisu zong tho-in, "Nung nawn kei in," ci-in huihpi thu pia a, tuihualte kiangah, "Kilok nawn kei un," a ci hi. Tua ciangin huihnung khawlin dai khipkhep pah hi. 40 Tua ciangin Zeisu in a nungzuite kiangah, "Banghangin lau na hi uhhiam? Tu ciangdong upna nei nailo na hi uhhiam?" a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Zeisu in a nungzuite kiangah, "Note lunghimawh kei un. Pasian um unla, kei zong hong um un. 2 Note' omna ding mun a bawlkhol dingin a pai ding ka hihi. Ka Pa' innsungah omna ding mun tampi om hi. A omlo ding hi leh hih bangin thu ka hong gen kei ding hi. 3 Kei va pai-in note' omna ding mun ka va bawlkholh khit ciangin keima omna munah note na hong om theihna dingun note a hong la dingin ka hong paikik ding hi.

Note tungah keima neih bang lungnopna ka hong pia ding hi. Tua ka hong piakding lungnopna pen leitung mite in a piaktheih a kiplo lungnopnate pawl hilo hi. Tua ahih manin lau kei unla, zong lungkham kei un.

Keimah tawh na hong kipawlna uh hangin lungnopna na neihtheihna dingun hih thu a hong gen ka hihi. Leitung gimna na thuak ding uhhi. Ahi zongin keimah in leitung nate zo khinta ka hih manin lungnuamin om un," a ci hi.

Tua zawh nipikal khat ciangin nungzuite zong innsung khatah kikhawm leuleu uh a, tua hunin Thomas zong a om hi. Amaute kong kikhaknelh uhhinapi-in Zeisu hong pai-in amaute lakah hong ding a, "Nopna ngah ta un," ci-in a hopih khit ciangin

Tua ciangin Peter in amaute kiangah, "Na mawhna uh kisik unla, na mawhna uh hong kimaisak theihna dingin Zeisu Christ min tawh tui kiphum ciat un. Tua hi leh Pasian' piakkhong Khasiangtho na ngah ding uhhi.
Ama deihna bang a sem dingin Pasian in a hong sap, amah a it eite-a' dingin na khempeuh a hoihlamin piangsak hi, ci-in i thei hi.
Hihteng bang ahih khit ciangin bang gen ding om nawn ahi hiam? Pasian in eite hong koppih peuh leh kua in eite hong zo zo ding ahi hiam?
Tua hi leh eite tungah nopsakna a hong pia thei Pasian in Satan tuancilin note' khenuai mi hong hisak baih ding hi. I Topa Zeisu Christ hong hehpihna thupha, note tungah om ta hen.
Note, lunghihmawhna tawh na kipelhding uh ka hong deihsak hi. Zi a neilote in Topa a lungdamsak theihna dingun Topa' thu bek kinin nei uhhi.

Ahi zongin Khasiangtho' sawlna bangin gamtatnate pen: Itna, lungdamna, lungnopna, lungduaina, migitna, hoihna, cihtakna, 23 dikna, leh pumpi ki-ukzawhna hi a, hih bangin a gamta mite, Thukham in bangmah cih theilo hi.
Amah tawh i kipawlna leh amah i muan'na hangin kimuang takin Pasian kiangah paitheihna ding hun i nei hi.

Topa sungah lungdam tawntung un, ka hong cihsa bangin tu-in zong lungdam un, ka hong ci kik hi. 5 Mi khempeuh tungah na dik un. Topa hong pai baih ta ding hi. 6 Thu khat peuhpeuhah lunghimawh lua kei unla, na kisap bangbang uh, lungdamna tawh Pasian kiangah na ngen un. 7 Mihingte in a theihtel zawhloh Pasian' hong piak lungsim nopna in, Christ Zeisu tawh na kipawlna uh hangin note hong lungnuamsak ding hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in eite tungah meidawina lungsim hong guan'lo a, thahatna, ki-itna, pumpi ki-ukzawhna lungsim hong guan' hizaw hi.
Tua ahih manin kimuan'na lungsim tawh hangtakin, "Topa, kei hong huhpa hi a, ka lau kei ding hi. Kua in bang hong cihzo ding ahi hiam?" ci ngam ni.
A hoihin na gamtat manun gimna na thuak uh leh zong Pasian in thupha hong pia ding hi. Mite kihta kei unla, lunghihmawh ngaihsut kei un.
Pasian in note hong kem ding ahih manin na lungkhamnate khempeuh uh ama kiang tun'pih un.
Ka itte aw, Christ hong kilatkik ciangin lungmuang takin i omtheihna ding leh ama hong pai Ni ciangin i bukbuk lohna dingin amah tawh kiptakin kipawl ni.
Tua khit ciangin leitung kiu li-ah vantung mi li, kiu khatah khat ciat dingin leitung, tuipi tung, leh singkung khat peuhpeuh a mutkhak lohna dingin leitung huih lite lencipin a om uh ka mu hi.
Amaute' mit panin khitui khempeuh nulsak ding hi. Thu luisate maimang khinta ahih manin sihna, dahna, leh na sa-a kahna cihte om nawnlo ding hi," a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Noah in { Topa' } maipha mu hi.
"Ka tote aw, nong hehpihna-un na sempa hong kheng kei un.

en un, note' muhna-ah na nasempa in maipha muzo a, ka nuntakna nong hutna uhah migitna lianpi kei tungah nong lak khin uhhi. Ahih hangin mualtung gamla ahih manin ka tun' ma-in siatna in kei hong pha-in ka si ding hi. 20 En un, gal-a om khuapi, taina dingin nai a, khuapi neu khat a hihi. Tua lai-ah hong taisak un — khuapi neu khat hilo ahi hiam? — tua hi leh ka suakta ding hi," a ci hi. 21Amah in ama kiangah, "En in, na gensa khuapi ka lumlet lohna ding, hih maipha zong nang kong pia hi.
Leah' mit-hah neem a, ahih hangin Rachel melhoihin ngaihbaang hi.
Ahih hangin Laban in ama kiangah, "Kei, thu hong gen sak dih in. { Topa } in nangma hangin kei thupha hong piakna ka thei hi.
Laban in nidang bangin maipha tawh amah a donlohna Jacob in mu hi.
amaute kiangah, "Na pa un nidang bangin maipha tawh kei hong donlohna ka mu hi. Ahih hangin ka pa' Pasian in kei hong ompih hi.
Keimah in bawngtal, la, tuuhon, nasem pasal, leh nasem numeite ka nei hi. Na mai-ah maipha ka muh theihna dingin ka topa tungah a gen dingin kong sawl hi, ci hi’, ci un," a ci hi.

Note in, ‘Tua thamloin na nasempa Jacob ka nung uhah om hi,’ na ci ding uhhi," a ci hi. Banghang hiam cihleh amah in, "Ka mai-ah a pai letsong tawh amah ka lungdamsak zo khading a, tua khit ciangin ama maipha ka mu ding hi. Amah in kei hong sang khading hi," ci-in a ngaihsun hi.

Esau in, "Ka kituahpih hih a honte khempeuh bang na cihnopna ahi hiam?" a ci hi. Jacob in dawngin, "Ka topa' maipha zon'na ding," na ci hi. 9 Ahih hangin Esau in, "A kicing nei ing, sanggam aw; nang' neihte nangma-a' dingin kem in," a ci hi. 10 Jacob in, "Hilo hi, nang' tungah hong thum ing. Na muhna-ah maipha ngah ka hih leh ka khutsung panin ka letsongte hong sang in. Banghang hiam cihleh hih banga maipha tawh kei nong san'na, na maitang ka muh ding pen Pasian' maitang muh tawh kibang taktak hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Esau in, "Kei tawh a om mite pawlkhat, nang' kiangah hong nusia ning," a ci hi. Ahih hangin amah in, "A kisapna bang om ahi hiam? Ka topa' muhna-ah kei maipha hong ngahsak in," a ci hi.
Shekhem in a numei' pa leh a numei' sanggamte' kiangah, "Note' mai-ah maipha hong musak unla, kei' tunga nong cih peuhpeuh uh kong pia ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Joseph in ama mai-ah maipha ngahin ama na sem a, amah in a innsung ukpa-in bawlin a neih khempeuh a uk dingin a koih hi.

Tua ahih ciangin amah in a neih khempeuh Joseph' khutsungah ap hi. Joseph nei khin ahih manin amau nupa sungthu lobuang thudangte lunghihmawh dingin ngaihsunlo hi. Tu-in Joseph ngaih baangin a mel hoih hi.
Ahih hangin { Topa } in Joseph ompihin ama tungah itna kip lak a, thong kempa' muhna-ah amah maipha a pia hi.

Israel a sih ding hun a nai ciangin, amah in a tapa Joseph samin ama kiangah, "Tu-in na muhna-ah maipha ka ngah leh, ka phei nuai-ah na khut hong koih in la, thumantak leh citakin kei nong bawl ding thu hong ciam in. Egypt-ah kei hong vui kei in la,
Ama hangin kahna hun a bei ciangin Joseph in Faro' innkuante kiangah, "Tu-in note' mai-ah maipha ka ngah leh Faro' kiangah thu nong va gensak ding uh kong thum hi.
"Keimah in Egypt mite' muhna-ah hih mihingte maipha ka pia ding hi. Note na paikhiat uh ciangin, a hawm guakin na pai kei ding uhhi.
{ Topa } in Egypt mite' muhna-ah mite maipha pia hi. Tua thamloin, mipa Moses pen Egypt leitang tung, Faro' nasemte' muhna, leh mite' muhna-ah lian mahmah hi.
Amau' ngette a piakna dingun { Topa } in Egypt mite' muhna-ah Israel mite maipha a pia hi. Tua bangin amaute in Egypt mite' na a sut uhhi.

Moses in { Topa' } kiangah, "Thei in; nangmah in keima kiangah, ‘Hih mite paipihto in,’ nong ci hi. Ahih hangin kei tawh nong sawlkhop ding mi kei nong theisak nai kei hi. Ahi zongin nangmah in, ‘Na minin nang kong thei a, ka mai-ah maipha zong na mu khin hi,’ nong ci khin hi. 13 Tua ahih ciangin tu-in nang tungah kong thum hi; na muhna-ah maipha ka ngah leh keimah in nang hong thei-in, na muhna-ah maipha ka ngah theihna dingin tu-in nangma geelnate kei hong lak in. Hih minam pen nangma mite ahihna zong ngaihsun in," a ci hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh keimah leh nangma mite in nangma muhna-ah maipha ka ngahna uh bang ci-in kithei ding ahi hiam? Leitunga om mi khempeuh tungah keimah leh nangma mite ka tungnun'na uh pen kote tawh nang nong paikhopna hilo ahi hiam?" a ci hi. 17 { Topa } in Moses kiangah, "Nangma gensa hih thu mahmah keimah in ka hih ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh ka muhna-ah nang in maipha na ngahzo a, na minin nang kong thei hi," a ci hi.

Amah in, "Tu-in na muhna-ah maipha ka muh leh, { Topa } aw, kong thum hi; lungkhauh mite ka hita uh zongin kote' kiangah { Topa } hong pai in. Kote' mawhna leh kote' khialhna hong maisak in la, nangma mi dingin kote hong sang in," a ci hi.
{ Topa } in note tungah a maipha hong pia hen la, note tungah nopsakna hong pia ta hen,’ ci-in thupha pia uh hen.
Moses in { Topa' } kiangah, "Banghangin na nasempa hong hici bawlsiat na hi hiam? Banghangin na maipha hong musak loin, hih mi khempeuhte' tavuan kei' tungah hong suan na hi hiam?

"Mi khat in zi la-in a ten'pih ciangin, tuanu tungah kilawm lohna a om manin numei in a pasal' mitah maipha mulo a, amah in makna lai gelhin ama tungah pia-in ama inn panin sawlkhia a, a pasal' inn panin amah kihem khia-in,

{ Topa } in a gamlapi leimong panin muvanlai leeng bangin a manlang, amau' pau na theihloh uh minam, thukhualna a neilo minam, khangham mite a zahtaklo, khangno mite tungah maipha zong a lak tuanlo minam khat, note' langkhatah hong paipih ding a,

leitung leh a tunga om letsong hoihpente leh sawlbawk lakah a tengpa' maipha tawh thupha pia ta hen. Hihte khempeuh, Joseph tungah tung hen la, a sanggamte lakah ulian ahi mipa' lu tungah tung ta hen.
Naftali minamte thu genin, "O Naftali, maipha tawh nuam a sa, { Topa' } thupha tawh a kidim, bualtuite leh leitaw lam a neipa," a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Moab mi Ruth in Naomi kiangah, "Lo-ah hong kuansak in la, maipha ka muhna peuhpeuhpa' nungah anvuite lakah a sang hong tawmsak in," a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in, "Pai in, ka tanu aw," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah a mai-in lei-ah puk a, leilakah kunin ama kiangah, "Kei gamdang mi khat hinapi, hih banga kei nong phawkna dingin Banghangin na mai-ah maipha ngah thei ka hi hiam?" a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Ruth in, "Ka topa aw, kei tungah nong dik mahmah hi; Banghang hiam cihleh kei pen na nasem numeite hilo napi-in na nasemnu' tungah migitna kam nong pau hi," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin numei in, "Nangma mitah na nasemnu maipha hong musak in," a ci hi. Tua ciangin tua numei pai-in an ne a, dahmai pua nawnlo hi.
Tu-in naupang Samuel a pumpi khangin { Topa } leh mite' maipha a ngahtoto hi.

keimah in, ‘Tu-in Filistia-te keimah hong hih dingin Gilgal-ah hong paisuk ding uh a, keimah in { Topa' } maipha ka ngen nai kei hi,’ ka ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin keimahmah kisawl tawmin meihal biakna ka pia hi," a ci hi.
Saul in Jessi kiangah mi sawlin, "Keima nasepna-ah David hong omsak in. Amah ka pahtak mahmah mi khat ahi hi," cisak hi.

Na tangvalte uh dong lecin amaute in nang kiangah hong genthei ding uhhi. Tua ahih ciangin ka tangvalte maipha na musak in; Banghang hiam cihleh pawi ni-in kong pai uhhi. Na neih sung pan nong piak theih peuhpeuh na nasemte leh na tapa David tungah pia in,’ ci un," a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Akhish in David samin ama kiangah, "{ Topa } a nungta ahih mah bangin, nang na thuman a, hih vai-ah kei tawh hong kuankhia-in na ciah ding man ka sa hi. Banghang hiam cihleh kei kiangah nong pai-a kipan tuni dong nang tungah khialhna bangmah ka mu kei hi. Ahih hangin uliante in nang hong thukimlo uhhi.

Tua ciangin Joab lei-ah maipuksuk a, zahtakna bawlin kumpipa thupha a pia hi. Tua ciangin Joab in, "Kumpipa in a nasempa' ngetna a piakna-ah, tuni-in ka to kumpipa nangma muhna-ah maipha ka muhna na nasempa in ka thei hi," a ci hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa in Zadok kiangah, "Pasian' Thuciamna Singkuang khuapi sungah puakik in. { Topa' } maipha ka muh nak leh, amah in kei hong paipih kikin Thuciamna Singkuang leh a omna mun hong musak kik ding hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa in Ziba kiangah, "En in, Mefibosheth' neihsa khempeuh tu-in nangma-a' ahi hi," a ci hi. Tua ciangin Ziba in, "Kei, nangma nasempa ka hi hi; ka to kumpipa' muhna-ah maipha hong musak tawntung in," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Joab' mite khat Amasa' kiangah dingin, "Joab a gum peuhmah, leh David-a' ahi mi peuhmah in Joab zui un," a ci hi.
Na nasempa' hong thumna leh na mi Israel-te' hong thumna-ah maipha tawh hong en tawntung in la, nang hong sap peuhmah uh ciangin amaute na bil na ngat in.
Hadad in Faro' mai-ah maipha lianpi mu a, amah in ama zi Tahpenes' sanggamnu tawh kitengsak hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa in Pasian' mipa kiangah, "Tu-in { Topa } na Pasian' maipha kunh in la, ka khut a ngei a batna dingin thu hong ngetsak in," a ci hi. Tua ciangin Pasian' mipa in { Topa' } tungah kunh hi. Tua ciangin kumpipa' khut a ngei bangkik a, a nidanga mah hong bang hi.

Syria kumpipa' galkap a uk Naaman pen kumpipa' maipha a ngah ulianpi khat a hihi. Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } in ama hangin Syria mite gualzawhna pia hi. Amah a thahat a vanglian khat hi a, ahih hangin amah a phak a hihi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa kiangah, "Kumpipa na thukim leh, Judah gam ka tun' dong amaute in hong paisuaksak theihna dingun Eufratis Gungal gamsung a uksawn mite ka piak ding laikhakte, 8 leh biakinn hutna ding munmuan'huai kongpi ding, khuapi kulh ding, leh ka omna ding inn lamna dingin sing hong piaktheihna dingin kumpipa' tulak a kem Asaf' tungah piak ding laikhak zong, kei tungah hong pia in," ka ci hi. A dik ka Pasian in kei hong ompih ahih manin kumpipa in ka ngette hong pia hi.

Mordekai in ama tanu dingin a lak a innlak pa Abihail' tanu Esther pen kumpipa kiangah a pai ding hun a tun' ciangin, numeite a uk kumpipa' innsungmangpa Hegai' gen teng lobuang kizepna ding puan dang bangmah ngenthuah lo hi. Tu-in Esther a mu mi peuhmah in hoihsa kim uhhi. 16 Ama uk a kum sagihna, kha sawmna ahi Tebeth kha sungin kumpi innsung Kumpi Ahasueras' kiangah Esther a kipaipih ciangin, 17 kumpipa in ama numei dangte khempeuh sangin itzaw a, a nungak dangte khempeuh sangin limbawl zaw hi. Tua hi a, kumpi lukhu amah khusakin Vashti' tangin kumpinu a suaksak hi.

Inntualah Kumpinu Esther dinga a om kumpipa in a muh ciangin Esther in kumpipa' maipha ngah a, kumpipa in a khuta a tawi kumpi ciangkhut pen Esther' lamah a zan hi. Tua ciangin Esther in hong naihin tua ciangkhut dawn va lawng hi.

Topa aw, nong hehpih zawh a, na lung a kim a, kong nget thu nong piakzawh ding leh, note gel-a' dingin ka na bawl an a ne dingin zingciangin kumpipa leh Haman hong pai un. Zingciangin nong cih bangin ka deihna kong gen ding hi," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Kumpinu Esther in dawngin, "Kumpipa in nong hehpih-zawh a, kumpipa in hoih na sak leh, kong nget kong thumnop thu pen keimah leh ka mipihte sihna tawh nong kipelhsakna ding a hihi.

tua ciangin Esther thoto-in kumpipa mai-ah dingin, "Kei nong hehpihzawh a, hih ka ngaihsutna man na sak a, hoih na sak leh, na ukna gamsung khempeuhah a om Jew mite thahna ding a sawmna-in Agag-te beh Hammedatha' tapa Haman in a laigelhte dawhkikna dingin lai khat gelhsak in.
Kuamah kihtak neiloin nuamtakin na om ding a, mi tampi in nangma maipha hong zong ding uhhi.
Tua ciangin Pasian in ama thungetna pia ding a, amah in lungdamna tawh Pasian bia ding a, Pasian in ama-a' dingin thu a hoihlamin a heisakkik ding hi.
{ Topa } aw, thuman mi thupha na pia a, lum tawh dal bangin deihsakna tawh na dal hi.
Keima galte' muhna munah an nong lui hi. Thupi takin nong pahtawi a, keima hai zong dimlet ta hi.
{ Topa } aw, nong deihsakna tawh mual kip bangin kei nong phut khin hi. Ahi zongin tu-in na maitang na seel a, kei ka khasia hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh amaute in namsau tawh leitang ngahlo uh a, amau' khut in amaute' tungah gualzawhna pialo hi. Na khut taklam leh na baan, na hehpihna maipha hizaw hi. Banghang hiam cihleh amaute tungah nang na lungkim hi.
Ka galte in keimah hong zolo ding a, keima tungah nong lungkimna ka thei ding hi.
Mi haupen ahi Taia mite in na manpha namkim letsong tawh nang hong maivil ding uhhi.
"Topa in hong nial paisuakin, kei tungah maipha hong piakiklo ding hiam?
Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } Pasian pen eite a hong hupa a minthang i kumpi hi a, maipha leh pahtawina a hong piapa a hihi. Thumanin a gamta mite tungah { Topa } in na hoih bangmah sitlo hi.
{ Topa } aw, nangma leitang na hehpih a, Jacob' nopsaknate a ngeina na bangsakkik hi.
{ Topa } nangmah in kei hong huhin, nong thahatsakna hangin, kei hong mudahte in mu-in a zahhuaina dingun keima tungah na maipha hong lak in.
Banghang hiam cihleh nangmah in nakpi takin kote na hong gualzosak a, kote hong angvanin na hong gualzosak hi.
Leitungah a thuman mite kei tawh a om theihna dingin maipha ka pia ding a, paubaan'na omloin a gamta mi in keima na hong sem ding hi.
{ Topa } leh ama huh ding zon' belin nei unla, a tawntungin ama maipha zong niloh un.

{ Topa } aw, nangma teel mite' daupaina ka muh theihna ding, nangma minamte' kipakna sungah ka lungkim theihna ding, nangma luahte tawh ka minthan' khawm theihna dingin na mite tungah maipha na lah ciangin kei hong phawk in la, amaute na hotkhiat ciangin kei zong hong huh in.
Cingh gamtatin mite tungah leitawi pia a, thutangin a gamta mite tungah thu a hoih hi.
Ka lungsim khempeuh tawh na maipha kong ngen hi. Na thuciamna omsa bangin kei hong hehpih in.
Tua hi leh, Pasian' mai leh mite' mai-ah maipha ngahin na ma vang ding hi.34Amah in mi kihisakte bangmahin simlo a, a kiniamkhiatte tungah maipha a pia hi.
Kei hong mu mi in nuntakna a mu hi a, { Topa' } mai-ah maipha ngah a hihi.
Thuhoih a hanciamte in pahtakna ngah a, siatna a hanciamte in siatna mah ngah hi.
Mihoihte in { Topa' } maipha ngah a, siatna a gamtate amah in a mawhsak hi.
Thungaihsut theihna maipha ngahna hi a, zuautatna in lungkhamna bek piangsak hi.
Mihaite in a khialh hangun phamawh salo uh a, mipilte a khialh ciangun mawhmaisak ding deih uhhi.
Migilote in mihoihte mai-et uh a, maipha a piak ding uh a thum uhhi.
A hoihin a gamta a mite tungah kumpipa lungdam a, a gina-in a gamta lote gim a pia hi.
Kumpipa maitai leh nuntakna hi a, ama pahtakna pen tuk hunin guah a zusak meiipi tawh kibang hi.
Zi a muzote na hoih a mu hi a, { Topa' } maipha a ngah a hihi.
A cingh mihaupa' maipha ngah ding ki-ut ciat a, na a piak mi khempeuh ama lawm a hihi.
Kumpipa' hehna humpinelkai hawk bangin lauhuai a, ama pahtakna lopa tunga daitui taak bangin deihhuai hi.
Migilote in thusia bekbek deih uh a, a lawmte nangawn zah tuanlo uhhi.
Hauhna sangin min hoihna deihhuai zaw a, kham leh ngun sangin mi' hong thusimna deihhuai zaw hi.
Mi khat tai-in thuhilh lecin tungthama phatna sangin a tawpna-ah lungdamzaw ding hi.
Mi khempeuh in gam ukte' maipha ngah ding hanciam ciat uh a, ahi zongin { Topa' } kiang pan bekin thutang kingah hi.
Ngaihbaan'na pen zuaupi hithei a, melhoihna zong maimang thei hi. Ahi zongin { Topa } a zahtak numei a phattaak a hihi.

A hiangte a keu ciangin kitan hi. Nupite hong pai-in mei-in cih uhhi. Hih mite in khentel theihna neilo ahih ciangin amaute a bawlpa in amaute hehpihlo ding a, amaute a piangsakpa in amaute tungah maipha laklo ding hi.

{ Topa } in ama mite kiangah, "Note hotkhiat ding hun a hong tun' ciangin maipha kong pia ding a, huhna nong ngetna uh ka hong pia ding hi. Note hong kemin ka hong hu ding a, note' tung tawnin mi khempeuh tawh thuciamna ka bawl ding hi. A kinusia na gamsung uhah note kong tengsakkik ding hi.

Tua ciangin ka maipha pen phalvaktung hong bang ding a, note' tungah hong taangkhia ding hi. Manlang takin na liammate uh hong dam ding hi. Note hong ompih tawntungin note kong hon ding a, na nung na mai uhah ka hong dal ding hi.

Gamdang mite in na kulhte ciangkik ding uh a, amau' kumpite in nangma na hong sem ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh ka hehna tawh nang kong vatgawp khin a, ahih hangin tu-in keima maipha tawh nang tungah hehpihna kong nei khin hi.

Josiah' tapa Judah kumpi Jehoiakim in a ukzawh kum nga a phak kum, a kha kuana kha-in Jerusalem khua-a om mi khempeuh leh Judah gam khuapite panin Jerusalem khua-ah a hong pai mi khempeuh in { Topa' } maipha ngahna dingin an a tang uhhi.
Na nek dingin a limci pen annel, oliv thau, leh khuaizu kong pia a, ahi zongin milim maipha zon'na dingin biakna-in tuate na zang hi.
Tua ciangin Pasian in Daniel tungah Ashpenaz in ngaihsut siamna a neih theihna dingin a bawlsak hi.
Vantung mi in Mary kiangah, "Na lungdam mahmah ding a hihi. Topa in nang hong ompih a, thupha lianpi hong piazo hi," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin vantung mi in, "Mary aw, lamdangsa-in lunghimawh kei in. Pasian' maipha a ngah na hi hi.
Zeisu a pumpi leh a pilna khang a, ama gamtatna in Pasian leh mite a lungkimsak semsem hi.
Pasian phat uh a, khatlekhat thupha kideihsakin a om uhhi. Pasian in nisimin hotkhiatna a ngah mi kibehlapsak tawntung hi.

a thuakna khempeuh panin na honkhia hi. Egypt kumpipa Faro' mai-ah Joseph a tun' ciangin Pasian in ama tungah pilna leh a deihhuai gamtat hoih na guan' hi. Tua ahih manin Faro in ama khutnuai-ah a gam a uksawn ding leh a kumpi innsung khempeuh a van dingin a koih hi.
David in Pasian' maipha ngah ahih manin, Jacob Pasian-a' dingin biakinn khat a vaihawm sakna dingin Pasian kiangah a ngen hi.

Ahi zongin Pasian' maipha ngahna dingin nasepna suangloin upna a suang mipa pen Pasian in mimawh kimlai midik hi, ci-in sang ahih manin, amah tawh a kipawl theihna dingin Pasian in tua mipa' upna thupi san' hi.

A lian nangma itna kip tawh a kizui leh Egypt panin tuhun dong hih mite na maisaksa tawh kizui-in hih mite' mawhna maisak in, kong thum hi," a ci hi. 20 Tua ciangin { Topa } in, "Nangma gen bangin ka maisak hi.
Ahih hangin kua in ama khialhnate mukhia theitawm ahi hiam? Theihloh manin khialhna panin kei hong siangsak hi.
Keima khialhnate nangma tungah kong pulak a, ka mawhna ka im kei hi. "Ka khialhnate khempeuh { Topa' } tungah ka pulak ding hi," ka ci hi. Tua ciangin ka mawhna nin nong maisak hi.
Kote a hong honkhia Pasian aw, nangma min a than'na dingin kote hong huhin, nangma min hangin kote hong khahkhia-in, ka mawhnate uh hong maisak ta in.
Banghang hiam cihleh Topa aw, nangmah hoihin mawhna na maisak a, hong ngente khempeuh tungah itna kip tampi na nei hi.
Amah in ka mawhna khempeuh hong maisak a, ka natna khempeuh hong damsak hi.
Nisuahna pen nitumna panin a gamlat mah bangin i mawhna hangin gimnate eite' kiang panin gamlapi-ah a nilkhia hi.
Ahih hangin nangmah hong kizahtak theihna dingin nangmah in mawhna na maisak hi.
Muhdahna in kitotna piangsak a, itna in mawhna khempeuh maisak hi.
Mihaite in a khialh hangun phamawh salo uh a, mipilte a khialh ciangun mawhmaisak ding deih uhhi.
Mi' khialhna a maisakte midangte in itin lawm hau uh a, mi' khialhna ciamtehna pen lawm taanna a hihi.

{ Topa } in hih bangin ci hi: "Tu-in hong pai unla, thu kikumkhawm ni. Na mawhnate uh puansan a bat hangin vuk bangin hong ngo ding hi. Na mawhnate uh si bangin a san hangin tuumul bangin hong kang ding hi.

Na thupalsatnate hong paihkhiatsakpa pen keimah ka hi a, kei ka hih manin na khialhnate ka ciamteh kei ding hi. 26 "Thuman na hihna hong laktel in la, thu kikum khawm ni. Na dikna a kilatna dingin na thu hong sungkhia in.

Migilo in ama gitlohna nusia hen la, thumanlo mi in ama ngaihsutna nusia hen. Amah in a hehpih theihna dingin { Topa } eite' Pasian' kiangah amah paisak un. Banghang hiam cihleh a mawhna maisiangsak ding hi.
Nang pen hehpihna tawh kidimin mawhna na maisak a, ahih hangin kote in nang ka hong langpan' uhhi.
Tua ciangin { Topa } in, "Ka mite tungah heh nawnlo ka hih manin ka kiangah ka mite ka samkik ding a, lungsim takpi tawh amaute ka it ding hi.

{ Topa } aw, nang tawh a kibang Pasian dang omlo a, a omlai na mite' mawhna nangmah in na maisak hi. Nang na heh paisuak kei a, na itna kip nong lak hi. 19 Kote nong khasiat kik ding a, ka mawhnate uh hong sawpkhiat sakin, tuipi taw-ah nong paihsak ding hi.

Tua ahih manin Pasian tungah biakna a pia dingin biakna tau mai-ah na om laitakin na sanggamte khat peuhpeuh na tungah a lungkimlohna thu na phawk leh, 24 Pasian na biakna ding nate, a biakna tau mai-ah nusia photin, pai-in na sanggampa tawh va kilem phot in la, tua khit ciangin hong paikikin Pasian biakna pia in.
Kote tungah hong mawhte ka maisak uh bangin, kote' mawhna zongh hong maisak ta in. (HCN)
Mi dangte’ hong mawhna ka maisak uh mah bangin kote’ mawhna zongh hong maisak ta in. (PuKKT)
Kote tungah a hong mawhte mawh maisakna ka neih bangun ko' mawhna zong hong maisak in. (TDM)
Ko tunga hong bate ka maisak uh bangin, kote leibate hong maisak ta in. (ZIV)
Ko tung aa hong khialte ka maisak uh bangin, kote’ khialhna zongh hong maisak ta in. (ZSV)

Note in midangte' hong mawhna na maisak uh leh vantungah a om na Pa un zong note' mawhna hong maisak ding hi. 15 Ahi zongin note in midangte' hong mawhna na maisak kei uh leh vantungah a om na Pa un zong note' mawhna hong maisaklo ding hi.

Mi pawlkhat in khutlekhezaw mi khat, a lupna pheek tawh hong pua-in Zeisu kiang a hong tun'pih uhhi. Zeisu in amaute' upna a muh ciangin a cina mipa kiangah, "Ka ta aw, na lungsim kinuamsak in; na mawhna hong kimaisak khinta hi," a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Peter in Zeisu va naih a, "Topa aw, ka sanggamte khatpeuh ka tungah hong khialh ciangin bangzah vei maisak ding ka hi hiam? Sagihvei dongtak maisak ding ka hi hiam?" ci-in a dot ciangin 22 Zeisu in, "Sagihvei ciangbek maisak in kong ci kei hi. Sawm sagih mun sagihvei maisak in kong ci hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa in tua nasempa sam a, ‘A gilo nasempa aw, kei kiangah hong thum na hih manin na leiba khempeuh ka hong maisak hi. 33 Nang ka hong hehpih mah bangin na naseppihpa zong na hehpih ding kilawm hilo ahi hiam?’ a ci hi. 34 Kumpipa zong a heh suak ahih manin a leiba khempeuh a lohkhit matengin thong sungah a kikhumna dingin thu a pia hi. 35 "Tua mah bangin note in zong na lungsim uhah na sanggamte uh mawhna na maisaknop kei uh leh vantungah a om ka Pa in note tungah zong tua bangmahin a hong bawl ding ahi hi," a ci hi.
Mi tampite' mawhna a maina dingin a luangkhia, Pasian' thuciamna a kipsak, ka sisan a hihi.
Zeisu in hih mite' up mahmahna thu a muh ciangin khutlekhezaw mipa kiangah, "Ka ta aw, na mawhnate hong kimaisak hi," a ci hi.
Thungen dingin na din' uh ciangin midang tungah na hehna uh a om khat peuhpeuh maisak un; tua hi leh vantungah a om na Pa un note' mawhna hong maisak ding hi.
Zeisu in amaute' upna a muh ciangin a mipa kiangah, "Lawm aw, na mawhnate hong kimaisak khinta hi," a ci hi.

"Midangte' thu khen kei un. Tua hi leh no tungah zong Pasian in thu hong khenlo ding hi. Midangte mawhsak kei un. Tua hi leh Pasian in note zong hong mawhsaklo ding hi. Midangte' mawhna maisak un. Tua hi leh Pasian in note' mawhna zong hong maisak ding hi.

Tua ahih ciangin nang kiangah kong genin-ah, ama mawhna tampi tak a omte kimaisak khin ahih manin amah in a itna nakpi takin a lak hi. Ahi zongin tawmno bek a kimaisakte in a itna uh tawmno bek mahin a lak uhhi," a ci hi.
Kote tungah a hong mawhte mawh maisakna ka neih bangun ko' mawhna zong hong maisak in. Ze-etna lian hong thuaksak ke'n,’ ci-in na ngen ding uhhi," a ci hi.

Note hoihtakin kingaihsun un. Na sanggampa uh no tungah hong khialh leh amah taii unla, a kisik leh a mawhna maisak un. 4 Nikhat sungin sagihvei ciangdong hong khialh hangin zong, a sagihvei mahin no kiangah hong pai-in, ‘Ka kisik hi,’ hong cih nak leh na maisak khin ding uhhi," a ci hi.

"Lutang Guh," a kicihna mun a tun' uh ciangin singlamteh tungah Zeisu kilhcip uh a, tua mi that mi nihte zong, Zeisu' taklamah khat, a veilamah khat kilhcip uhhi. 34 Ahi zongin Zeisu in, "Pa aw, amaute in bang hih ihi hiam cih theilo uh ahih manin a mawhna uh na maisak in," a ci hi. Tua ciangin amau' ngah ding ciat a theihna dingun ai sanin a puante a hawm uhhi.
Amaute in Zeisu kiangah dong teitei uh ahih manin amah zong dingin amaute kiangah, "Note lakah mawhna a nei hetlopa in deng masa un," a cih khit ciangin,
Tua khit ciangin amaute lamah a hu sang a, "Khasiangtho na sang un. 23 Mite' mawhna na maisak uh leh amaute' mawhna a mai hi ding a, na maisak kei uh leh amaute' mawhna a mailo hi ding hi," a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Peter in amaute kiangah, "Na mawhna uh kisik unla, na mawhna uh hong kimaisak theihna dingin Zeisu Christ min tawh tui kiphum ciat un. Tua hi leh Pasian' piakkhong Khasiangtho na ngah ding uhhi.

Tua ahih ciangin na mawhnate uh hong sawpsiangsak theihna ding, Topa kiang panin a hong pai lungsim nopna hun na ngah theihna ding uh leh note-a' dingin a sehsa Zeisu Christ a hong sawltheihna dingin na mawhna uh kisik unla, Pasian kiang zuan un.

"En un! Vantung kihong a, Pasian' taklamah Mihing Tapa a ding ka mu hi," a ci hi. 57 Ahi zongin amaute in a bil uh humsanin nakpi takin kiko-in Stephen bawhhuan uh a, 58 khua pualamah kaikhia-in suang golpipi a khiat uhhi. Hih thu-ah teci pangin Stephen a deng mite in a puantungsilh uh suahin Saul a kici tangval khat kiangah lawnin a kemsak uhhi. 59 Tua bangin suang a khiat thuahthuah laitakun Stephen in thu ngen a, "Topa Zeisu aw, ka kha hong la in," a ci hi. 60 Tua ciangin amah kunin nakpi takin kiko a, "Topa aw, hih mite' mawhna na maisak in," a cih khit ciangin a si ta hi.
Amah a um mite khempeuh in ama min hangin a mawhna uh a maina ding thu, kamsangte khempeuh in zong gen belin a neih khat uh ahi hi," a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin sanggamte aw, hih Zeisu hangin mawhmaisakna thu note tungah hong kihilh ahihna teltakin na theih ding uh a hihi. 39 Tua thamlohin Zeisu a um mite khempeuh pen Moses Thukham in a suahtaksak zawhloh mawhna khempeuh panin a suakta ahihna thu na theih ding uh a hihi.

Tua ahih ciangin Laisiangtho sungah, "Na galte uh a gil a kial leh an na pia un. A dang a taak leh tui na pia un. Tua bangin na gamtat uh leh amaute' maizumna dingin a bawl na hi uhhi," ci-in a kigelh bangin gamtazaw un.

Itna neite a lungduai-in migi hi. Itna neite in hazatna lungsim neiloin, zong kisathei lo hi. 5 Itna neite a kilawm loin gamtalo, heh pakpaklo, mite' mawhna ciamtehlo hi. 6 Thuman lote-ah lungdam ngeilo uh a, thumante bekah lungdam uhhi.

Mi khatpeuh in hehna ding a pian'sak ciangin kei bek a hong hehsak hiloin note khempeuh zong a hong hehsak a hihi. Tua ahih manin tua bang mi tungah khauhtat lua nawn kei un. 6 Note' gimpiaknasa pen kicing khinzo ka sa hi. 7 Tua ahih manin a mawhna maisak ta unla hehnemzaw un. Tua hi kei leh dahlua-in siatlawh khading hi. 8 Amah na itkik ding uh ka hong thumna thu zong amah na theisak un.
Mawhna maisak kei lehang Satan in nuamtaksa-in eite tungah hong gualzo khading ahih manin mawhna a maisak ihi hi. Satan' nasepna zia a theilo ihi kei hi.
Christ hong sihna hangin eite in suahtakna ngahin, i mawhnate hong kimaisak a hihi. Tuazah dongin Pasian' hong hehpihna thu bangzah takin lian ahi hiam?
Na heh uh ciangin, tua hehna hangin khialkha kei unla, a tawntungin heh paisuak kei un.

Kimuhdahna, hehna, thangpaihna, kitotna, kikona, kilungsim neihna khempeuh beisak unla, 32 khatlekhat kihehpihin, lungsim neem tawh na kihozaw unla, Christ' hangin Pasian in note' mawhna hong maisak mah bangin khatlekhat na mawhna uh na kimaisak ta un.
tua a Tapa in eite hong khahkhia a, i mawhna hong kimaisak khinta hi.

A beisa hunah na mawhna uh hangin kha thu tawh kisai-in misi na hi uh a, Gentail mi na hih manun Thukham neilote na hi uhhi. Ahi zongin Christ hangin Pasian in note hong hingsak a, i mawhna khempeuh hong maisak khinta hi.

Note lakah khatlekhat a kilungkimlo na om uh ciangin khatlekhat na mawhna uh kimaisakin na kihuh ciat un. Topa in note' mawhna hong maisak bangin note zong khatlekhat na mawhna uh na kimaisak ding uhhi. 14 Hihte khempeuh banah, mi khempeuh kilem takin a hong om khawmsak thei ahi ki-itna na bulphuh un.
A mawhna a khialhna uhah amaute ka hehpih ding a, tua bangte phawkin ka nei nawn kei ding hi," na ci hi.
"Amaute' mawhna leh a gitloh gamtatnate uh ka ciamteh nawn kei ding hi," ci hi, ci-in a na gen hi.

Hong bawlsiate siatna tawh thukkik loin hong samsia mite samsia kik kei unla, Pasian in note a hong sap lai-in thupha a hong piak dingin hong ciamsa ahih manin, hong siat bawlte thupha tawh na thukzaw un.
Ahi zongin Pasian kiangah i mawhnate va pulak lehang, amah citakin thuman ahih manin, i mawhnate hong maisakin i hoihlohnate khempeuh hong siangsak ding hi.

Ka itte aw, note na khialhkhak lohna ding uh ka deihna-in hih lai a hong gelh ka hihi. Ahi zongin mi khatpeuh a khialh ciangin eite-a' dingin Pa Pasian kiangah a hong thumsak dingin a thuman Zeisu Christ i nei hi. 2 Tua Zeisu hangin eite' mawhna hong kimaisak a, eite-a' ding bek hiloin leitung mi khempeuh' mawhna zong a maina ding a hihi.
Ka tate aw, Christ hangin note' mawhna hong kimaisak ahih manin lai a hong gelh ka hihi.

Mi khatpeuh in hong thah leh ama tungah sihna dan ka pia ding hi. A hong that ganhing peuhmah ka that ding a, a mipihte a that mi peuhmah gim ka pia ding hi. 6 Mi a that peuhmahte pen, midangte in amah that ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in ama lim bangin mi bawl hi.

Nang leh na kianga om mite in na zawngkhal lawh ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh tua nasep nang-a' dingin gik lua hi. Nang bek in na sem khinzo kei hi. 19 Tu-in ka thu hong ngai in; thu kong lak ding hi. Pasian in nang hong ompih ta hen. Nang pen Pasian' mai-ah mite' tangin pai-in, amau' thute Pasian' kiangah na gen ding hi. 20 Nangmah in ngeina kipte leh thukhennate amaute na hilh ding a, amau' lam paina ding leh amau' sep dingte amaute na theisak ding hi. 21 Tua thamloin, mi khempeuh lak panin Pasian a zahtak mi, a muan'huai mi leh sumgolh a mudah mi, mi siamte na teelkhia ding hi. Tua bang mite pen a tul, a za, a sawmnga, a sawmte tungah a uk dingin na koih ding hi. 22 Mite' thu amaute khensak tawntung in. Amaute in thu liante bek nang kiangah hong puak ding uh a, ahi zongin thu neute amau mah in khen tawm ding uhhi. Tua hi leh nang-a' dingin baih zaw ding a, amaute in na vangik hong puakpih ding uhhi. 23 Hih bangin hih lecin Pasian in thahatna hong pia ding a, nangmah in na sem paisuakzo ding hi. Tua thamloin hih ite khempeuh zong amau' omna-ah lungnuam takin ciah thei ding uhhi," a ci hi. 24Tua ahih ciangin Moses in a sungpa' thu ngai-in ama gen khempeuh a hih hi. 25 Israel mi khempeuh sung panin Moses in mipil mi siamte teel a, mite a tul, a za, a sawmnga, a sawmte tungah a ukin mite' lutangin amaute a bawl hi. 26 Amaute in mite tungah a tawntungin thu khen uhhi. Amaute in thu haksate bek Moses tungah puak uh a, ahi zongin thuneute amaute in khen tawm uhhi.
Tua ahih ciangin Moses hong pai-in upate sam a, { Topa } in amah a thupiak hih thute khempeuh amaute' mai-ah a sung hi.
"Note in thukhenna-ah thu a tangloin na khen kei ding uhhi. Mizawngte langgen loin, a liante' thu zuiloin, thumanna tawh na vengte uh thu na khen ding uhhi.
Na minam uh tawh a kizui-in a pil, thuthei, thuphawksa mite teel unla, note' lutangin amaute ka koih ding hi,’ kong ci hi.

Thukhenna-ah angvan na nei kei ding uhhi. A neu leh a liante a kibangin a thu na ngai ding uh a, maitang zahtak tuam na nei kei ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh thukhenna pen Pasian-a' a hihi. Note-a' dingin a haksa lua thute kei kiangah nong paipih ding uh a, keimah in tua thu ka za ding hi,’ ka ci hi.

"Na minam uh tawh kizui-in { Topa } na Pasian un note hong piakna khuate-ah thukhente leh uliante na koih ding uh a, amaute in a manin mite tungah thu khen ding uhhi. 19 Thutang na heikhia kei ding uh a, angvan tuam na nei kei ding uhhi. Sumgolh in mipilte' mit tawsakin thumante' thu heikhia ahih manin sumgolh na la kei ding uhhi. 20 Note nungta-in { Topa } na Pasian un hong piak leitang na luah theihna dingun a thuman bekbekin na gamta ding uhhi.

"{ Topa } na Pasian un note hong piak leitangah tungin, note in tua leitang nei-in a tungah na ten' uh ciangin, ‘Eite' kimkota om minamte khempeuh mah bangin eite' tungah kumpi khat i koih ding hi,’ na ci nuam khading uhhi. 15 { Topa } note' Pasian in a teel mipa note' tungah kumpi-in na koih thei takpi ding uhhi. Ahi zongin na mipihte bek uh lak panin kumpi-in mi khat na koih ding uh a, na sanggam uh a hilo gamdang mi khat no' tungah na koih thei kei ding uhhi.

Ama kumpi tokhom tungah a tut ciangin Levi siampite' kep hih thukhamte ama-a' dingin laibu khat sungah gelh ding hi. 19 Hih thukham sunga thute leh hih ngeinate kemin zuihna tawh { Topa } a Pasian zahtak ding a theihna ding, a mipihte tungah ama lungsim a kiliatsak lohna ding, thupiaknate them khat zong a pelhlohna ding, leh Israel-te sung ahi ama kumpi gam sungah amah leh a tate saupi a om theihna dingin amah in a nuntak sung tawntung tua sunga thute sim ding hi.
"Peemta' thu ahi a, pa neilo mi' thu ahi zongin tuate-a' ding thutang na heisak kei ding uh a, meigong numei' puan zong khapna-in na laksak kei ding uhhi.
Gideon in amaute kiangah, "Note kong uk kei ding a, ka tapa in zong note hong uklo ding hi. { Topa } in note hong uk ding hi," a ci hi.

Ahih hangin amaute in, "Kote hong uk dingin kumpi khat hong pia in," a cih uh ciangin hih thu in Samuel lungkimlo sak hi. Samuel in { Topa' } kiangah thu ngen hi. 7 Tua ciangin { Topa } in Samuel kiangah, "Amaute in nang kiangah hong gen thu khempeuh ngai in; Banghang hiam cihleh amaute in nang hong nial hilo a, amaute tungah kumpi hihna panin kei hong nial ahi uhhi.

Samuel in mite' thugen khempeuh a zak khit ciangin { Topa' } kiangah tua thute a genkik hi. 22 Tua ciangin { Topa } in Samuel kiangah, "Amaute' thu ngai in la, amaute-a' dingin kumpi khat koih in," a ci hi. Tua ciangin Samuel in Israel mite kiangah, "Mi khempeuh na khuapi ciat uhah ciah un," a ci hi.

Ahih hangin bangmah a manlo mi pawlkhat in, "Hih mipa in eite hong bangci hotkhiat zawh ding ahi hiam?" a ci uhhi. Amaute in amah simmawhin ama kiangah letsong puaklo uhhi. Ahih hangin amah in tua mite bangmah cihlo hi.

Tua ciangin note a sim dingin Ammon kumpipa Nahash hong kuanna na muh uh ciangin, { Topa } na Pasian uh na kumpi uhhi napi-in note in kei kiangah, ‘Kumpi khat in kote hong uk ding hi,’ na ci uhhi. 13 "Tu-in note' teelsa, note' nget kumpipa en un; { Topa } in note' tungah kumpi khat koih khinta hi. 14 Note in { Topa } zahtakin ama na sem a, ama aw ngai-in { Topa' } thupiakna na langpan' kei uh a, note a hong uk kumpipa leh na Pasian uh na zuih uh leh thu hong nuam ding hi. 15 Ahih hangin note in { Topa' } aw ngailoin { Topa' } thupiakna na langpan' uh leh { Topa } in note leh na kumpipa uh hong langpan' ding hi.

Tua ciangin Samuel in Saul kiangah, "Na hai gamtat hi; { Topa } na Pasian' hong thupiakna na zui kei hi; Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } in Israel-te tungah kumpi dingin nang leh na suanlekhakte a kipsaksuak ding a hihi. 14 Ahih hangin tu-in na ukna kizomsuak lo ding a, { Topa } in ama lungsim bangin mi khat zong khin hi. { Topa } in nang hong thupiak zuilo na hih manin ama mite tungah ulian dingin { Topa } in amah seh khin hi," a ci hi.
"Kumpi-in Saul ka koih ka kisik hi. Banghang hiam cihleh amah pen keimah zuihna panin kihei kik a, ka thupiaknate semlo hi," a ci hi. Tua ciangin Samuel heh hi; zan tawntung { Topa' } tungah kiko hi.
Tua ciangin Samuel in, "Nang na kineu ngaihsut hun a om hangin, tu-in nang pen Israel minamte' lutang hilo na hi hiam? { Topa } in Israel-te tungah kumpi-in nang sathau hong nilh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin David in Israel-te khempeuh uk a, a mite khempeuh tungah thutang leh thuman a zang hi.
Tua ciangin Israel mi khempeuh in kumpipa' piak thukhenna za uhhi. Thutang a sem dingin ama tungah Pasian in pilna pia hi, ci-in phawk uh ahih manin amaute in kumpipa lamdangsa-in a om uhhi.

Nang tungah lungdamin Israel kumpi tokhom tungah nang a hong koih { Topa } na Pasian in thupha ngah ta hen! { Topa } in Israel it tawntung ahih manin nangmah in thutang leh thuman na sepkhiat theihna dingin amah in kumpi-in nang hong bawl hi," a ci hi.
Siampi Jehoiada in amah thuhilh ahih manin Joash in ama uk hun sung tawntung { Topa' } muhna-ah a man gamta hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Israel upate khempeuh kumpipa kiang Hebron-ah hong pai uhhi. Tua ciangin David in { Topa' } mai Hebron-ah amaute tawh thuciamna khat bawl a, Samuel' tung tawnin { Topa' } thugen bangin amaute in Israel kumpi-in David sathau a nilh uhhi.
Tua ciangin { Topa } in Israel mi khempeuh muhna-ah Solomon tungah minthan'na lianpi pia a, Israel sungah ama ma-in kumpi khat peuhpeuh tungah a kipia ngei nailo kumpi minliatna a guan' hi.

"{ Topa}, ka pu ka pate uh Pasian aw, nang, vantungah Pasian hilo na hi hiam? Minamte' kumpi gam khempeuh tungah nang a uk hilo na hi hiam? Na khutsungah vangliatna leh thahatna om a, kuamah in nang hong nang zolo hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in upadi siam a mipilte thu dong hi. Banghang hiam cihleh upadi leh biakna lam thutheite khempeuh thu dot pen kumpipa' zat ngei khat a hihi.
{ Topa } ahih leh kumpi za-ah tu ngitnget a, thukhenna dingin a tokhom a bawl hi. 8 Leitung mite' thu a mantakin khen a, a kilawm bangin mite' thu a khen hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh ukna pen { Topa}-a' hi a, minamte tungah amah in a uk hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa, } a Sangpenpa, dipkuathuai a, leitung khempeuh a uk kumpi lian khat a hihi.
No gam ukte aw, a manin thu na khen uhhiam? Note in mi khempeuh' thu a tangin na khen uhhiam?
Ama thahatna tawh a uk ngitngetpa, ama mit tawh minamte a encik ngitngetpa, mi lehdote in langpan' kei uh hen.
Mite' thu a manin khenin, leitung minamte khempeuh lamlakin makai na hih manin, minamte nuamin lungdamna la hong sak ta uh hen.
Sihna ding ngeina a bawl, a gilo gam ukte, nang tawh kipawl ding ahi hiam?
