Kumpite in a gammite a ukna ding, mi ukte in ngeina man a zat theihna dingin keimah in ka huh hi. 16 Leitunga om mi ukte khempeuh in keima huhna bek tawh ukzo uh a, milian mi thupite in keima huhna bek tawh vaihawmzo uhhi.
Thumanin gamtatna bek in kumpi kipsak ahih manin a sia-a gamtat ding kumpite utlo uhhi.
Kumpipa' hehna pen a lauhuai mahmah humpinelkai hawk bang hi a, kumpipa a hehsak khate in sihlawh uhhi.
{ Topa' } khutsungah kumpipa om a, lo sunga tuilak bangin a deihna peuhah hei kawikawi thei hi.
A nasepna-ah a siam mahmah mi na theikha uhhiam? Amah in mi mawkmawkte' na semlo ding a, kumpite' na sem ding hi.
Pasian in thu a ip manin a min thang a, kumpite in thu a genkhiat manin minthang uhhi.
Kumpipa kiang pan migilote nilkhia lehang thumanin ama ukna kip thei bek hi.
Gamsung mite a hoihloh ciangin a banbanin gam uk kumpi tampi nei uh a, ahi zongin mipil thungaihsun theite in gamsung thahatsakin kipsak uhhi.
Migilote a liat ciangin midangte bucip uh a, amaute a zakiat ciangin midikte in ukkik ding hi.
Midikte in gam a uk ciangin gammite lungdam uh a, migilote in a uk ciangin a gammite thum uhhi.
Thumanin a gamta kumpi in a gam kipsak a, sum bek a ngaihsun kumpi in a gam siasak hi.
Kumpipa in mizawngte' thu a manin khensak leh a ukna kip tawntung ding hi.
Pasian' lamlahna a kizuih lohna gamah gamsung mite pheengtat gawp uhhi. Pasian' thukham a zui mite ahih leh a lungdam uhhi.
Lemuel aw, ka thugen hong ngai in. Kumpite in zu nek huailo a, mi ukte in khamtheihzu a duh ding hilo hi. 5 Zu ne le uh, thukham mangngilh uh a, thukham hei-in mizawngte gim pia khathei uhhi.
Khuapi a uk mihing sawm sangin pilna in mi khat hatsak zaw hi.

{ Topa}' kha in ama tungah ama mite a ukna ding pilna, thutheihna, leh siamna pia ding hi. Amah in { Topa}' deihna thei-in { Topa } zahtak ding hi. 3 Amah in { Topa}' nasep nuamsa ding hi. Amah in a tungtham bek muhna tawh thu khenlo ding a, kam lengsawn bek zakna tawh thu khentatlo ding hi. 4 Thumanna tawh mizawngte' thu khenin, lungsim neem mite' thu ahi bangin khensak ding hi. Ama kam panin a thupiakna tawh leitung mite gim kipia ding a, a muk panin a thugenna tawh migilote si ding uhhi. 5 Amah in thuman leh thutak tawh ama mite uk ding hi.
En un, ni khat ni ciangin thuman takin kumpi khat in hong uk ding a, uliante in thutang tawh hong uk ding uhhi.
Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } pen eite' thukhen, { Topa } pen eite hong ukpa, { Topa } pen eite' kumpi a hihi. Amah in eite hong honkhia ding hi.
"‘Ka thu a hong mang makaite ka hong pia ding a, amaute in pilna leh siamna tawh note hong uk ding uhhi.

"A gilo, a siangtholo, Israel gam uk migilopa aw, nang' hun zong hong tungta a, gim na tuah ding ni hita hi. 26 Topa { Pasian } in hih bangin ci hi: Na kumpi lukhu leh na dialkhip lakhia in. Nidang bang nawnlo ding hi. Mineute hong lian ding a, miliante hong neuta ding hi.
"Pasian' min kiphat tawntung ta hen; amah pilin a vanglian hi. 21 Amah in hun leh khuahunte kheel a, kumpite koihin lah a lakhia hi. Amah in mite tungah pilna leh theihna a pia hi.

Kumpipa aw, kumpi khempeuh lak pan nang a lianpen na hi hi. Vantung Pasian in kumpi-in nang hong koih a, vangliatna, thahatna, leh zahtakna a hong pia hi. 38 Amah in mi' ten'na leitungteng, ganhingteng leh vasate a uk dingin nang a hong koih hi. Tua kham lutang pen nangmah na hi hi.

Tua kumpite a maan laitakun vantung Pasian in a bei thei ngeilo ding kumpi gam a hong phut ding hi. Tua kumpi gam kuamah in zo zolo ding a, tua gam in gamdang khempeuhte zogawpin a kip tawntung ding hi.

Hih pen a vil, a patau vantung mi' thukhenna a hihi. Tua ahih ciangin mun khempeuhah a om mi khempeuhte in, a Lian Pasian in mite' kumpi gamah vai a hawm hi, cih a thei ding uhhi. Amah in a teel peuhpeuh a neupente nangawn kumpi a suaksak thei ding hi,’ a ci hi.

Mite lak pan hong kihawlkhia ding a, gamsate tawh na tengkhawm ding hi. Bawngtal bangin kum sagih sung lopa na ne ding hi. Tua ciangin, Pasian in mihingte' kumpi gam uk a, a teel mi peuhpeuh kumpi a suaksak thei hi, na ci ding hi," a ci hi.

A Lianpen Pasian in na pa Nebukhadnezzar kumpi lianin koih a, zahtakna leh vangliatna a pia hi. 19 Amah lianlua mahmah ahih manin gam khempeuh, nam khempeuh, pau khempeuhte in kihta-in a ling uhhi. Mi khatpeuh a thahnop leh that a, a nuntaksaknop leh a nungtasak hi. A ut leh mi khatpeuh pahtawi-in, a ut leh a daisak thei hi. 20 Ahih hangin amah a lung khauhin kiphasak a, gilo lua ahih manin a kumpi tokhom panin kilakhia a, a minthan'na a taan hi. 21 Mihingte lak panin amah kihawlkhia a, ganhing lungsim a nei hi. Gam sakolte tawh tengkhawmin, bawngtal bangin lopa ne a, daitui dal ding neiloin a pualamah a lum hi. A tawpkhakna-ah a Lianpen Pasian in mihingte' kumpi gamte uk a, a teel peuhpeuh kumpi suak hi, ci-in a phawk thei hi.

Darias in gamsung khempeuh a uksawn dingin gam ukpi za leh sawmnih dingin a ngaihsun hi. 2 Tua ahih ciangin amah in tua gam ukpite tungah a vaihawmpi ding leh kumpi deih bang a sem dingin Daniel leh adang mi nih a teel hi. 3 Gam ukpi dangte leh vaihawmpi dangte sangin Daniel nasep siamzaw diak se hi. Tua bangin siamzaw diak se ahih manin kumpipa in gam buppi ukin koih ding a ngaihsun hi.
Ahih hangin a Lianpen Pasian' mite in kumpi za ngah ding uh a, a tawntungin a nei paisuak ding uhhi," hong ci hi.

"Hih leitung kumpi gam, vangliat-na, leh liatna khempeuh a Lianpen Pasian' mite tungah a kipia ding hi. Amau' kumpi za cikmah hunin bei ngeilo ding a, leitung ukna za a nei khempeuhte in a thu uh mangin amaute' na a sem ding uhhi," hong ci hi.
Keimah in hih a khial Israel kumpi gam ka encik a, hih leitung panin amaute ka susia ding hi. Ahi zongin a vekpi-un susiamang loin pawlkhat ka sitlai ding hi.

Israel a uk makaite aw, hih thu ngai un: Note in thutang thuman a deih dingin a kilawm hinapi-in, 2 thuhoih deihloin thusia na deih zawsop uhhi. Note in mite' vun na hing hawkkhiat uh a, a guh uh na hing kheuh uhhi. 3 Ka mite' sa na netum uhhi. A vun uh hawkin, a guh uh na satkham uh a, beel-a meh huan ding bangin na satnen gawp uhhi. 4 { Topa' } tungah huhna ngenin na kiko hun uh hong tung ding a, ahi zongin amah in note hong dawnglo ding hi. Note gamtatsia na hih manun, na ngetna uh hong ngailo ding hi.

Amah pen { Topa' } biakinn a lam dingpa hi a, kumpite' ngah theih minliatna ngahin, ama mite uk ding hi. Ama kumpi tokhom gei-ah siampi khat om ding a, kithutuakin, kilemin na semkhawm ding uhhi," ci hi,’ va ci in.

Galkidona leengte Israel gam pan beisakin, sakol galkapte, Judah gam pan ka lakhia ding a, galdona-a kizang thalte kisusia ding hi. Na kumpipa un minam dangte lakah kilemna thu gen ding a, amah in tuipi mong khat pan tuipi mong khat dong, Eufratis Gunpi panin leimong dongin a uk ding hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Rom kumpipa Sisar tungah siah i piak ding kilawm hiam, na ngaihsutna nong genna dingin ka deih uhhi," a ci uhhi. 18 Ahi zongin Zeisu in amau' gitloh geelna thei ahih manin, "Mihoih a kineihkhem mite aw, Banghangin kei hong thangsiah se na hi uhhiam? 19 Siahin na piakding uh sum hong lak dih un," a cih ciangin sumtang peek khat hong paipih uhhi. 20 Tua ciangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, "Hih sum tungah kua lim leh kua min om ahi hiam?" ci-in a dot ciangin 21 amaute in, "Sisar' lim leh a min kigelh hi," a ci uhhi. Tua ciangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, "Sisar' nate Sisar' tungah na pia unla, Pasian' nate Pasian' tungah na pia un," a ci hi.

A gengen hangin bangmah phattuamna omloin buaina piangzaw khading, ci-in Pilat in a theih ciangin, tui la-in mihonpi' muhin a khut sil a, "Hih mipa a sihna thu-ah kei ka kihel kei hi. Note in thei ta un," a ci hi.
Gam khat peuhpeuh phelnih kisuahin kido le uh tua gam kiplo ding hi.

Ahi zongin Zeisu in amaute samin, "Leitung mi a ukte in mite tungah aana nei-in, mi a makaite in thuneihna tawh a ukna thu na thei uhhi. 43 Ahi zongin note lakah tua bangin hilo ding hi. Note lakah a lian nuam khat peuhpeuh, adangte khempeuh' nasem hi ding a, 44 a makai ahi nuam khat peuhpeuh, adangte khempeuh' sila hi ding hi.
A hong tungding i pu David' ukna, Pasian in thupha pia ta hen! Pasian phat un!" ci-in a awng uhhi.

Galkap pawlkhatte in zong ama kiangah, "Kote, bangci gamtat ding ka hi uhhiam?" ci-in a dot uh ciangin, "Zawhthawh thu tawh ahi a, a manlopi-in mawhsakna tawh ahi zongin kuama sum sut kei unla, na khasum ngahzah uh tawh lungkim un," ci-in a dawng hi.

Ke'n kong cihin-ah, a neihsa khempeuh a uk dingin a topa in tua nasempa koih takpi ding hi. 45 Ahi zongin tua nasempa in a lungsim sungah, ‘Ka topa hong ciahkik hak ding hi,’ ci-in ngaihsunin a naseppih numei leh pasalte satgawp hen la, zukham ankhamin ommawk leh, 46 tua nasempa' topa pen ama upmawhloh ni, a theihkholh loh hunin hong tung ding hi. A topa in nakpi takin amah gim pia ding a, a thumanglo mite tawh a kibangin a thuaksak khawm ding hi.
Tu-in, kumpi dingin kei a hong deihlo ka galte pen hih lai-ah hong paipih unla, keima muhna-ah that un,’ ci hi," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Tua ahih leh, Kumpipa-a' teng Kumpipa tungah na pia unla, Pasian-a' teng Pasian' tungah na pia un," a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Keima ukna pen hih leitung gam hilo hi. Keima ukna hih leitung gam hi leh Jerusalem khua-a Jew mi uliante' khutsungah hong kipiak lohna dingin ka nungzuite in a do ding uhhi. Tua ahih manin keima ukna pen hih leitung tawh kizomlo hi," a ci hi.

Topa leh ama Christ a do dingin leitung kumpite kithawi uh a, gam ukte kikaikhawm uhhi,’ ci hi. 27 A cih mah bangin Herod leh Pontias Pilat in hih khuapi sung teek mahah Gentail mite leh Israel mite tawh kikupna nei uh a, nangmah in Christ dingin na bawl, a siangtho na Nasempa Zeisu thahdingin a vaihawm uhhi.
Ahi zongin Peter leh sawltak dangte in, "Mite' thu sangin Pasian' thu ka mangzaw ding uhhi.

"Pasian in Abraham tungah a thuciamna a tun'sak ding a nai kuan ciangin Egypt gamah ei mite tampi tak na pha ta uhhi. 18 A tawpna-ah Joseph a theilo kumpi dang khat, Egypt gamsung a uk dingin hong kipan hi. 19 I mipihte na khemgawpin na khelbawl a, a ta ngekte uh a sihna dingin inn panin mun dangah a koihkhia sak hi.

Pasian in kumpi dingin Saul a zat nawnloh ciangin amaute' kumpi dingin David a semsak hi. Pasian in David' thu genin, ‘Ka sawl khempeuh a sem ding, ka deih bang mi khat, Jessi' tapa David ka mukhin hi,’ a cihsa thu a hihi.

Thukham palsatin sihna thuakna ding thu khat peuhpeuh a gamta hi leng, suahtakna ding thu ka gen het kei ding hi. Hih amaute' hong mawhzon'nate a manlo ahih leh zong kuamah in amaute' khutsungah hong ap zolo ding uhhi. Gam uk kumpipa tungah a zu ka khan hi," ci-in a dawng hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Laisiangtho sungah Pasian in Faro kiangah, "Ka vangliatna lahna ding leh leitung khempeuhah ka min a kitheihna dingin kong zatnop manin kumpi a hong suaksak ka hi hi," ci hi.

A kuamah peuh in hong ukte' thu na mang ciat un. Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian' thukimpih lohin kuamah in ukna thu neilo hi; ukna thu nei i cih mite pen Pasian' koih mite a hihi. 2 Tua ahih manin ukna thunei a nialte pen Pasian' koihsa mite a nial suak a, tua bang mite in thukhenna a thuak ding uh a hihi. 3 Banghang hiam cihleh gam uk mite pen a gamtat hoih mite' kihtak ding hilo a, mi tatsiate' kihtak ding hi bek hi. Ukna thu a neite kihta loin na omnop uh leh a hoihin gamta un. Tua hi leh amaute in note hong pakta-in hong phat ding uhhi. 4 Ukna thuneite pen note' hoihna dingin Pasian' nasemte ahi uhhi. Ahi zongin a sia-in na gamtat uh leh gim hong pia taktak ding uh ahih manin na lau ding uh a hihi. Banghang hiam cihleh amaute pen Pasian' nasemte hi a, a sia-in a gamta mite tungah Pasian' hehna bangin gim a pia dingte ahi uhhi. 5 Tua ahih manin Pasian' gimpiak ding kihtakna hang bek hiloin, ahi ding thu mah hi, ci-a theihna tawh ukna thu a neite' thu na man' ding uh a hihi. 6 Ukna thu a neite in amau' sep dingteng a kimtakin a sep uh ciangin Pasian-a' dingin na a semte hi uh ahih manin tua thu hang mahin zong mangmu a pia na hi uhhi. 7 Tua ahih manin phiangsiah piak dingte tungah pia-in, mangmu piak dingte tungah pia-in, zahtak dingte zahtak bawlin, pahtawi dingte pahtawi ta un.

Note khatlekhat thu na kineih uh ciangin Pasian' mi siangthote khensakzaw loin lawki thukhente' mai na kitun' ngam uhhi. 2 Pasian' mite in leitung mite' thu a khensakzaw ding ahihlam theilo na hi uhhiam? Note pen leitung mite' thu a khensak ding na hih uh ciangin tua bang thu neute khen theilo lawmlawm na hi uhhiam? 3 Eite pen vantung mite' thu nangawn a khensak ding ihih lamtak theilo na hi uhhiam? Tua ahih manin hih leitunga no' thu neuneute leltak na khentheih zawk kan ding uh a hihi.

Sanggamte aw, Topa in note lam a hong lak ding leh a hong makai dingin a seh, note lakah na a hong sem mite, a kilawm a kituakin zahtakbawl un. 13 Amau' nasepna hangin amaute nakpi takin itbawlin zahtak un. Note khatlekhat kilem takin na om un.

A masa penin kong gennop thu in: Mi khempeuh-a' dingin Pasian tungah ngetna, thungetna, thumna leh lungdam kohna na neih ding uh a hihi. 2 Eite nuamtakin omthei-in, biakna lungsim nei-in a kilawm takin i nuntak theihna dingin kumpite leh uliante-a' dingin thu na ngetsak un.
Na mite in hong uk kumpite leh aana neite' thu mangin, thuhoih khempeuh a sem dingin a kigingsa-in a om ding uh phawksak in la,

Na makaite uh thu na mang unla, a genna uh bangin na gamta un. Pasian kiangah amaute in a nasepnate uh a pulak ding uh ahih manin tawlnga loin note hong lunghimawh tawntung uhhi. Amaute' thu mang le uh cin a nasepna uhah lungdam mahmah ding uh a, mang kei le uh cin dahpipi-in na sem ding uhhi. Dahpipi-in a nasepna uh note-a' dingin zong phattuamna a om tuan hilo hi.

Topa' hangin leitung ukna aana neite' thu na mang un. Kumpipa' thu ahi a, 14 a gamtat siate gim pia-in, a gamtat hoihte a pahtawi dingin kumpipa in a sawl thuneite khempeuh' thu ahi zongin na mang un. 15 Banghang hiam cihleh thu theiloin a mot paupau mihaite, na gamtat hoihna un a daihsak ding, Pasian' deihna a hihi.
Mi khempeuh zahtak bawlin thu uppih mite na it unla, Pasian zahtak bawlin kumpipa zong na zahtak un.

thuman takin teci a pang, sihna panin a kithosak kik Tapa upa, leitung kumpite tungah ukna aana a nei Zeisu Christ kiang panin note tungah hehpihna leh nopsakna thupha hong tung ta hen.Tua Zeisu Christ in eite hong it a, ama sihna tawh i mawhna panin eite hong suaktasak a, 6 ama Pa Pasian' na a sem dingin siampi leh kumpi za-ah a hong koih hi. Tua Zeisu in minthan'na leh vangliatna nei tawntung ta hen. Amen.
Pasian' na a sem dingin siampi za leh kumpi za na pia a, amaute in leitung ukin a om ding uhhi," a ci uhhi.
Tua ciangin tua numei in leitung minam khempeuh sik ciangkhut tawh a uk ding ta pasal khat hong nei hi. Ahi zongin tua naungek pen thakhatin kilakhia-in Pasian a tutna a tokhomah a kipaipih hi.

Tua laitakin tuipi sung panin ganhing khat a hong pusuak ka mu hi. Tua ganhing in ki sawm leh lutang sagih nei a, a ki sawmte tungah lukhu khat ciat om a, a lutang sagihte tungah min hoihlo khat ciat a kigelh hi. 2 Tua ka muh ganhing pen kamkei tawh kibang a, a khete vom khe tawh kibang a, a kam pen humpinelkai kam tawh a kibang hi. Gulpi in tua ganhing tungah ama vangliatna, ama tokhom, leh aana lianpi a pia hi.

Ki sawmte pen gam uk dingin a hong kipan nailo kumpi sawm hi a, ahi zongin a ganhing tawh kumpi aana a neikhawm dingin nai khat sung bek a hun kipia ding hi. 13 Hih mi sawmte in ngimna khat nei uh a, vangliatna leh aana a neihteng uh a ganhing tungah a pia uhhi. 14 Amaute in Tuuno a sim ding uhhi. Ahi zongin Tuuno pen kumpite' Kumpi, topate' Topa ahih manin, amah leh ama sap, a teel, citakin amah a zuite in tua kumpi sawmte a zogawp ding uhhi," hong ci hi.

Minam dangte a zawhgawpna ding namsau hiam khat a kam sung panin a pusuak hi. Amah in sik ciangkhut tawh minam dangte ukin, a Vanglian Pasian' heh mahmahna tawh leenggah cilna-ah leengtui a sukkhia ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Pasian in ama lim bangin mihing piangsakin, Pasian' lim bangin amah a piangsak hi. Amah in pasal leh numei a piangsak hi.

Leitungah mihing a gitlohna a liatna leh mihing lungsim ngaihsutna peuhmah a sia ahih ngitngetna thu { Topa } in mu hi. 6 Leitungah mihing a bawl pen { Topa } khial kisa a, tua thu in ama lungsim dahsak hi. 7 Tua ahih ciangin { Topa } in, "Ka pian'saksa mihing, ganhing, a bokvak ganhingte leh huih lak vasate, leitung panin ka phiatkhia ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh amaute ka bawl ka khial hi," a ci hi. 8 Ahih hangin Noah in { Topa' } maipha mu hi. 9 Noah' tangthu hih bang a hihi. Noah a thuman mi khat hi a, ama khangah paubaanglo hi. Noah pen Pasian tawh kikhawl hi.

Ahih hangin { Topa } in Samuel kiangah, "A tungtham hita leh a tun' san'na hita leh en kei in. Banghang hiam cihleh amah ka nolh hi. { Topa } in mihingte' muh bangin mulo hi. Mihingte in a pualam a kilangte en a, ahih hangin { Topa } in a lungsim en hi," a ci hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa in, "A nungta naupang khen nih suah unla, khat tungah alang pia-in, adang khat tungah alang pia un," a ci hi. 26 Tua ciangin a tapa a nungta numei in a lungsimah a tapa khasiat ahih manin kumpipa kiangah, "Aw ka topa aw, a nungta naupang amah piazaw in; bangbang hita leh amah that kei in," a ci hi. Ahih hangin a khat in, "Hih pen kei ka hi a, amah in ahi zongin tang theilo ding hi; hong hawmsak un," a ci hi. 27 Tua ciangin kumpipa in dawngin, "A masa numei tungah naupang hing pia un; bangbang hita leh that kei un; amah pen a nu ahi hi," a ci hi.
"Migilote a hehin nitum uh a, gimna a thuak ciang nangawnun ama huh ding ngenlo uhhi.
A khialsa mahin kei ka suak a, ka nu in a gil sungah hong paii tunga kipan a mawhsa ka hihi.

Pasian aw, keima sungah lungsim siangtho hong piangsak in la, a thak a man ngaihsutna ka sungah hong guan' in.11 Nangma omna panin kei hong paiikhia kei in la, keima kiang panin na Khasiangtho lakhia kei in.12 Nong hotkhiatna hangin hong lungdamsak kik in la, utna lungsim tawh keimah hong huh ta in.
Kote' nuntak sung kum sawmsagih bang hi a, cidam le-ung kum sawmgiat bang hithei hi. Ahih hangin tua hunsung nangawn gimna leh haksatna hi a, tua hunte bei pakin kote ka maimang uhhi.
Ka galdona uhah kote hong huh in. Banghang hiam cihleh mihing' huhna a mawkna hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh ka pumpi na khempeuh na hong piangsak a, ka nu' gil sungah keimah nong khuituah hi. 14 Kihtak dingin a kilawm na hih manin nang ka hong phat hi. Na nasepnate lamdang mahmah! Nangmah in kei nong lim theih mahmah hi. 15 A thukna sung mun simthamah kei hong kikhuituahin hong kibawl laitakin, ka guh ka taang, na mai-ah kiliahlo hi. 16 A kipiangsak nailo keima pumpi nate na mit in a mu hi. Ka pumpi nate khat beek a om ma, ka ni zah ding a kiciangtan laitakin, tuate khempeuh na laibu sungah kigelh khin hi.
Kei sungah siattheihna a omkha hiam hong en in la, tawntung lampi-ah kei hong kha in.
Huhna a hong pia theilo uliante ahi a, mi mawkmawkte ahi zongin muang kei un. 4 A husan'na a bei ciangin lei-ah ciahkik uh a, tua ni mahmahin a ngaihsutnate uh beita hi.
Mi a mudahte bek in zuauthu gen a, mi a gensiate mihai a hihi.
Mihaite pen amau mah thuman kisa tawntung a, mipilte in mi' thugenna ngai nuam uhhi. 16 Mihaite in a hehna uh langsakpah uh a, mipilte in a hehna uh ipzo hi.
Kam nemin dawn'na in hehna damsak a, kam khauh in hehna piangsak hi.
Mi pawlkhat in amau' haitatna hangin gimna a ngah hinapi-in { Topa } ngawhin mawk heh uhhi.
Mi khempeuh in a sanggam zawngpa uh mudah ciat ahih manin a lawmte in a taisatna a thu lamdang hilo hi.

Mihingte' ngaihsutna pen a thuk sunga om tui tawh kibang a, thuthuk mu theite bek in suahkhia thei hi. 6 Mi khempeuh pen mi citakin kigen kim uhhi; ahi zongin a citak takpi ding mi kimuzo ding ahi hiam? 7 Mi khat thumanin a hoihin a nuntak leh ama suanlekhakte mi hampha ahi uhhi.
"Ka lungsim siangtho hi; mawhna ka nei het kei hi," a ci thei ding mi kua om ahi hiam?
Naupangte nangawn mi citak mihoih ahihna a gamtatna panun kimukhia thei hi.
Mi a gensia kawikawite in thu im theilo hi. Tua banga mi haipaute tawh kikhawl kei in.

A cil tentan mite' an neksak kei unla, a anlimte uh duhgawhkha kei un. 7 "Ne ne un," hong cih hangin a cih takpi hilo hi. Banghang hiam cihleh na dangtawng a hong sun samzang nekkhak tawh kibang ding hi.
Thusia lamsang a deih mite thusia bawl mi kici hi. 9 Mihaite' vaihawmna in khialhna bek piangsak lel a, mi a simmawh theite midangte in mudah uhhi.
Mi khat in a kituak lopi-in midang khat limbawl lualiang leh amah in a sia lamin na ngaihsun zaw hi.
Sik in sik mah hiamsak thei a, mi in midang pilsak thei hi.
Tui sung en leeng eima maitang i muh bangin i lungsim en leeng eima pian'zia kilang hi.

Zuauna leh khemna ka zat lohna dingin hong huh in la, a haulualo, a zawnglua loin hong bawl in la, ka khamkhop zah lian bek an hong pia in. 9 Haulua leng nang hong nialin, "{ Topa } i cih kua ahi hiam?" kong ci khading a, zawnglua leuleu leng mi' na guksakin ka Pasian' min kong daisak khazel ding hi. 10 Sila khat a topa kiangah gensia kei in; amah in nang hong gensia-in gimna na thuakkha ding hi. 11 A pate samsia-in a min a daisak, a nute a phatlo mi pawlkhat om hi.
A citaklo zi hih bangin gamta hi: Midang tawh khialin tua ciangin kisilsiang a, "Khialhna bangmah gamta kei ing," ci khem hi.

Mi khat in hih leitungah lunghimawhin thatang sanin na a sepna-ah bang phattuamna ngah ahi hiam? 23 Sepna bawlna khempeuhah lungkhamna leh sinkhamna bekbek hi a, zan nangawnin a ihmut mawhpih hi. Hih pen a mawknapi taktak a hihi. 24 Mihing khat in a nasepna thamanin an ne tui dawnin nuamsa-in a om sangin a hoihzaw bangmah dang omlo hi. Ahi zongin tua nangawn zong, Pasian' hang ahihna ka phawk hi. 25 Pasian kihel loin kua in an ne-in nuamsa thei ding ahi hiam? 26 Pasian in amah a lungdamsakte tungah pilna, theihna, leh lungdamna pia a, ahi zongin a hehpihhuai mimawhte ahih leh a sep bek sisakin, amau' thalawhsa khempeuh amah a lungdamsakte tungah a piaksak hi. Hih pen a mawknapi taktak, huihpi nungdelh bang bek a hihi.
Amah in na khempeuh amau' hun ciat tawh a kituak dingin a bawl hi. Amah in mailam thu theihnopna lungsim eite tungah hong guan' a, ahi zongin ama sepnate a cing-a theihzawhna ding hong guan'lo hi.

Tua ciangin leitungah thuman loin a kigamtatnate khempeuh ka ngaihsun kik leuleu hi. Nenniamna a thuak mite kap uh a, ahi zongin kuamah in amaute hehnemlo uhhi. A nengniam mite thahat lua uh ahih manin kuamah in thuk ngamlo hi. 2 A hinglai mite sangin a si khinsa mite hamphazaw ka sa hi. 3 Mihinga hong piang nailo, hih leitung gitlohna teng a mu nailote hamphazaw lai sawnsawn uhhi. 4 Mi khatlekhat, hauhnop mana kidemna hangin nakpi taka na kisem ahihna ka mu hi. Hih zong a mawknapi hi a, huihpi nungdelh mah tawh kibang bek hi. 5 Mihaite in na sem loin a khut zepin om uh a, a tawpna-ah gilkialin sihlawh uhhi. 6 Nakpi takin na sem a, a mawknapi ahi ding, khut nih dim sangin lungsim nuamin khut khat dim neihna hoihzaw hi. 7 Nuntakna sungah a mawknapi ahi thudang khat ka mu leuleu hi.
Sum deihna lungsim na neih leh lungkim hun cih na thei ngei kei ding hi. Na hauhnop hangin na deih khempeuh na ngah ngei kei ding hi. Hih pen a mawknapi a hihi.

A manpha paknamtui sangin minpha hoihzaw a, i suah ni sangin i sih ni hoihzaw hi. 2 Pawisimna sangin sigalna hoihzaw hi. Sih ding bek a ngak ahihna mihing khempeuh in a phawk ding uh kilawm hi. 3 Nuihna sangin dahna hoihzaw hi; na mai hong gumsak zahin na thu theihna hong khangsak hi. 4 Mipilte dahna lakah omtual a, mihaite nopna lakah omtual hi. 5 Mihaite in pahtawina la hong sak sangin mipilte' hong taina hoihzaw hi. 6 Mihaite' nuihna pen meikuang sunga selkeu kikhul a puak zaizai tawh kibang a, khiatna neilo, a mawknapi a hihi. 7 Mipil khat in midangte a khem ciangin mihai bangin a gamta a hihi. Sumgolh lakna in a lapa' gamtat hoihna siasak hi. 8 Thu khatpeuh a kipatna sangin a tawpna hoihzaw a, kiphatsakna sangin lungduaina hoihzaw hi. 9 Heh pahpah kei in; hehna a haihuai a hihi. 10 "Banghangin nidang lai-in hih sangin hoihzaw tham ahi hiam?" ci-in dong kei in. Tua bangte pil thudotna hilo hi. 11 Pilna pen hauhna zahin hoih a, mihingte-a' dingin phattuamna a hihi. 12 Sum in hong lungmuan'sak bangin pilna in zong hong lungmuangsak hi. Pilna a manphatna, a pilte a nuntaksak theihna a hihi. 13 Pasian' sepsate ngaihsun dih in. Pasian in a kawi-a a bawlsate kua in mamsakkik thei ahi hiam? 14 Nopna na ngah laitakin lungdam in; haksatna na tuah ciangin hih thu ngaihsun in: Lungdamna leh lungkhamna hong piapa pen Pasian hi a, mailamah bang piang ding cih kuamah in theilo hi. 15 Ka nuntakna a mawknapi hi a, ahi zongin ka nuntak sungin thu khempeuh ka thei hi. Mi khat hoih napi-in si a, mi khat siahuai napi-in a khan' sau hi. 16 Tua ahih ciangin hoihlua kei in la, lah sia lua kei in. Banghangin nang kisiasak tawm ding na hi hiam? 17 Gilo lua, hau lua kei in. Banghangin khan'sih laizang ding na hi hiam? 18 A nih tuakin lenkip in. Pasian na zahtak nak leh khat peuhpeuh na zuihna-ah na ma vang ding hi. 19 Khuapi a uk mihing sawm sangin pilna in mi khat hatsak zaw hi. 20 A manin a gamta, a khial ngei hetlo, leitungah mi khat zong om hetlo hi. 21 Mi' gen khempeuh thudon kei in. Na nasempa' hong samsiatna na zakha ding hi. 22 Nang zong midang na samsiat zelzelna teltakin na kithei hi. 23 Hihte khempeuh ka pilna tawh ka ze-et a, pil ding ka hahkat hangin kei' batzawh ding hilo hi. 24 Mihing nuntakna kua in theikhia zo ding ahi hiam? Eite-a' dingin thuk lua a, telhak lua hi. 25 Keimah in pilna siamna ka theihna ding, pilna mu-in thupiangte a hang ka theihna dingin nakpi takin hanciamin ka lungsim ka pia a, haina a hoihlohna leh a haihuaina ka theikhia hi. 26 Sihna sangin numei a siahuai zawkna ka theikhia hi. Ama hong piak itna in thang bangin hong tepcip a, ama hong kawina khut in sikkhau bangin hong hencip hi. Pasian' deihna bangin a gamtate in tua bang numei pelhthei a, ahi zongin a mawh nuamte a thang-ah a awk uhhi. 27 Thugen siampa in hih bangin ci hi: Thu ka kan ciangin, a banbanin thu ka phawkkhia hi. 28 A thudang ka zon'zon' hangin bangmah ka muzo nawnkei hi. Pasal tul khat sung pan khat bang bek a pil a omkhak theihna, ahi zongin numei lakah a pil cih bang a omlohna keimah in ka phawkkhia hi. 29 Keima theihkhiat thu in: Pasian in eite a thuman dingin hong bawl hinapi-in, eite in paulap tuamtuam zongin, i kikai-awksak hi.
A hing laite in a si ding ahihlam uh thei a, a sisate in bangmah thei nawnlo uhhi. A sisate in thaman bangmah nei nawnlo uh a, amaute kiphawkkha nawnlo hi.

Hih leitungah ka phawk dang thu khat in: A taihat mite in tai kidemna-ah zo tawntunglo a, galhang thahatte in gal zo tawntunglo hi. A pilte in an a kham ngah tawntunglo a, a pilte hau tawntunglo hi. Hih theih siamna a neite milian suak tawntunglo hi. Mi khempeuh tungah kamsiatna vive tung hi.
Hih thute khempeuh banah gen ding thu khat bek om hi. Mihing hong kipian'sakna a thu bulpi pen in: Pasian zahtakna leh a thupiakte man'na a hihi.
Banghang hiam cihleh keima ngaihsutnate nomau' ngaihsutna bang hilo a, keima paiziate nomau' paizia bang hilo hi, { Topa } in ci hi.
Thuman omlo lua ahih manin siatna a pelh mipa pen mihai-in kingaihsun zawsop hi

Kote khempeuh mawhnei mi ka hi khin uh a, ka gamtat hoih khempeuh uh zong puannin tawh kibanglai veve hi. Kote khempeuh singteh bangin ka vul uh a, ka mawhna hangun huih letkhiat nahthel keu ka bang uhhi.
{ Topa } aw, mihing' omdan ama uk theih ahih lohna ka theita a, ama kalsuanna ding ama geeltheih hilo hi.

"Na khempeuh lakah lungsim a khem hatpen hi a, a kisia pha mahmah a hihi. Kua in lungsim theizo ding ahi hiam? 10 Keimah { Topa } in mi khempeuh' nuntakzia leh a gamtatna tawh kizui-in a piakhia dingin ngaihsutna ka entel a, lungsim ka sittel hi," a ci hi.
Mite in thuciamna bawl napi-in a thuciamte uh palsat uhhi. Zuau genin, mi thatin, guta-in, nulepa mawhna bawl uhhi. A sia khat khit a sia khat a banbanin gamta-in a mawhna uh behlaplap uhhi.
Note in mite' kiatna dingin Shittim-ah gum a thukpi-in na to uhhi; hih thu hangin note kong thuhilh ding hi.
Amaute a kampi bek uhhi a, a kampi bekun thu genin thuciamna a bawl uhhi. Lolai-a tumakuakte sungah gunei kiak a po mah bangin thusia neihna hong khang hi.

Na vengte' thu upin nei kei in la, na lawmte zong muan'in nei kei in. Na ang-a lum na zi kiang nangawnah thu na gending kidawm in. 6 Tuhun ciangin tapate in a pate haibawl a, tanute in a nute langpan' uh a, mote in a teeknu uh langneih uhhi. Mi khat-a' dingin ama innkuanpihte mah a gal a suak mawk hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh na sum omna uhah na lungsim uh om tawntung ding hi. 22 "Mittang pen pumpi-a' dingin meivak tawh kibang hi. Na mit uh cim leh na pumpi un hoihtakin khua mu thei hi. 23 Ahi zongin na mit uh maang leh na pumpi uh-a' dingin khua a mial hi. Tua ahih manin note' sunga a om khuavak pen a mial hi leh tua mialna pen nasia mahmah ding hi.

"Ahi zongin tuhun mite bang tawh genteh ding ka hi hiam cihleh: Mihon omna lamkabomah a tu naupang a kimawlte tawh kibang uhhi. Naupang honkhat in a lawmte kiangah, 17 ‘Lamna ding khuang kong tumsak uh hangin na lam nuam kei uh a, kah la ka sak uh hangin lah na kap nuam tuan kei uhhi,’ a kicite tawh a kibang uhhi.
‘Hih mite in a kampi bek uh tawh kei hong zahtak bawl uh a, ahi zongin a lungsim taktak uh kei tawh kigamla hi.

Ahi zongin kam sung panin a pusuakte pen lungsim panin hong kipankhia hi a, hihte in mi ninsakthei hi. 19 Banghang hiam cihleh lungsim panin mi thahnopna, mi zi tawh mawhnopna, nungak tawh mawhnopna, guktakna, zuau genna, mi gensiatna, leh ngaihsut hoihlo a tuamtuam hong piangkhia hi. 20 Hih bang nate in mi ninsak a, khut silloin annekna in mi ninsaklo hi," ci-in a dawng hi.
Ahi zongin Zeisu in amaute enin, "Mihingte' hihzawh ding hilo mah hi; ahi zongin Pasian in na khempeuh hihthei hi," a ci hi.
Ze-etna-ah na puk khaklohna dingun thu ngen un. Lungsim in ze-etna nang nuam napi-in pumpi in nangzolo hi," a ci hi.

A lehhekpa Judas in Zeisu a si dingin thu a kikhenna a muh ciangin kisikkik ahih manin siampi liante leh upate kiangah a ngun peek sawmthumte va paipih kik a, 4 "Mawhna a neilo mipa a si dingin lehhekkha ka hih manin ka mawh hi," a va ci hi. Ahi zongin amaute in, "Kote tawh bang kisai nawn ding ahi hiam? Nangma tavuan ahi hi," a na cihsan uhhi.

Mihingte sung panin a pusuak khiate in mihing ninsak hi. 21 Banghang hiam cihleh mihingte' lungsim sung panin nungak-tangval mawhnopna, guktakna, mi thahna, zilepasal neisate tawh mawhnopna, 22 huaihamna, gitlohna, khemna, gamtat hoihlohna, en'na, mi gensiatna, kisialhna, leh haitatna a piangsakthei ngaihsutna hoihlote khempeuh, 23 mihingte sung panin pusuakin mite ninsak ahihlam theilo na hi uhhiam?" a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in a thugen zomlai a, "Ke'n kong cihin-ah, kamsang a kuamah peuh ama khua-ah kipakta ngeilo hi

Mihoihpa in a lungsim sunga thuhoih omteng hong suahkhia a, migilopa in a lungsim sunga a gitlohna teng hong suahkhia hi. Banghang hiam cihleh mite pen amau' lungsim sunga a om bangbang a hong paukhia uh a hihi.

Zeisu in a pau theilo mi khat sung panin dawi hawlkhia a, dawi a paikhiat khit ciangin a mipa pauthei a, mite in lamdang a sa mahmah uhhi. 15 Ahi zongin mi pawlkhat in, "Dawimangpa Beelzebul in dawi hawlkhiat theihna ding vangliatna ama tungah a pia ahi hi," a ci uhhi.

"Note khatpeuh in na lo uh hong khawhsak ahi a, na tuu uh a hong cin'sak ahi zongin nasem khat nei le uh cin, inn-ah a hong tun' ciangin, ‘Hong pai in la na an ne pah in,’ na ci uhhiam? 8 Na ci kei uhhi. Ama kiangah, ‘Ka nitak-an ding hong bawl in la, na puan silhin ka annek sungteng hong vil in. Ka man khit ciangin na ne thei ding hi,’ na cizaw uhhi. 9 Tua bangin a sawlteng a sepna hangin a nasempa tungah, ‘Ka nuam mahmah hi,’ ci tuanlo hi. 10 Tua mah bangin note in zong hong kisawlteng na sepkhit uh ciangin, ‘Nasem mawkmawkte mah ihi a, i tavuanteng bek mah a sem khin ihi hi,’ na ci uhhi," ci-in a dawng hi.
A khua leh a tui-ah va pai a, ahi zongin a khuapih a tuipihte in ama thugen na ngailo uhhi.

Tua bangin mawhsak thukhenna a thuakna uh a hang in: Leitungah khuavak hong tungkhin napi-in a gamtatna uh hoihlo ahih manin leitung mite in khuavak sangin khuamial deihzaw uhhi. 20 A gamtat hoihlo mite in a siatna uh a kilatkhak ding utlo uh ahih manin khuavak deihlo uh a, khuavakah pai nuamlo uhhi. 21 Ahi zongin thumanin a gamta mite ahih leh a gamtatnate uh Pasian' deihna tawh kituak hi, ci-in a kilatsak theihna dingun khuavak sungah a pai uhhi.
Zeisu in ama kiangah, "Note in lim leh na lamdang lian ka bawl na muh kei uh leh Topa ka hihna thu na hong um kei ding uhhi," a cih ciangin
Nuntakna a piathei pen Pasian' Kha hi a, mihingte' hihtheih bangmah omlo hi. Keima hong gen thute pen nuntakna a hong piathei tua Kha thu a hihi.
Thu a theilopi-in kei na hong mawhsak uhhi; ahi zongin ke'n kuamah ka mawhsak kei hi.

Note pen na pa uh Dawimangpa' tate na hi uh a, na pa uh deihna bangin a gamta nuam na hi uhhi. A kipata kipanin na pa uh mi that hi a, thuman gen ngeilo ahih manin thuman tawh kipawl theilo hi. Amah pen zuauna khempeuh a pian'na a zuaugenpa ahih manin zuau a gen ciangin ama ngeina hi lel hi.
Ka hong gen ding tampi tak omlai hi; ahi zongin hong gen lai leng note-a' dingin tamlua ding hi.
Numei in a ta a suahhun a tun' ciangin na sa ahih manin a dah hi. Ahi zongin a ta a suahkhit ciangin leitungah naungek khat a piangsak khin ahihna hangin lungdamin a natna teng a mangngilh ta hi.

Ikonium khua a tun' uh ciangin Paul leh Barnabas zong Jew mite kikhopna inn-ah pai uh a, amaute' thuhilhna hangin Jew mi leh Gentail mi tampi tak in Pasian thu um uhhi. 2 Ahi zongin thu umlo Jew mite in Gentail mite holhthawh uh a, thu um mite a mudahsak uhhi.
Mihingte in a mawhna leh a gitlohna hangun Pasian' thuman selcip uh ahih manin van panin a hehna hong kilang sakin a gimpiakna dingzia hong kilangsak hi.

Mihingte tua zahta-in hailua uh ahih manin amau ututin a gamtat theihna dingun Pasian in khahkhong vet a, a zumhuai mahmahpi-in a gamta uhhi. 25 Amaute in a man ahi Pasian' thu um nuamlo uh a, a tawntungin phat dingin a kilawm a Piangsakpa bialoin, Pasian' bawlsa nate bia-in a zui uhhi. Tu-a bangin hi takpi uhhi.

Mite in a man ahi Pasian' thu ngaihsutin nei nuamlo uh ahih manin amaute' ngaihsut hoihlo bangin a gamtat theihna dingun Pasian in a khahkhia hi. Tua ahih manin a gamtat dingun a kilawm lopipi-in a gamta uhhi.

Gentail mite in thukham a neihloh uh hangin amau' ngaihsut tawmna tawh thukham' deihna bang a gamtat uh ciangin tua thukham' deihna a zui uhhi a, thukham a neihloh uh hangin a gamtat dingun a kilawm amau mahmah in a thei tawm uh a hihi. 15 Amau' lungsim sungah thukham' deihnate omkhin ahihna thu a gamtatna un hong kilangsak hi. Amau mahmah zong khat veivei hoih kisa, khat veivei sia kisa uh ahih manin, amau' lungsim sungah thukham' deihnate theihna omkhin ahihna thu, hih amau' kiphawk tawmna lungsim in nakpi takin hong kitelsak hi.
Laisiangtho sungah zong, "Pasian' muhna-ah mi man kuamah omlo a,11 a man a thei kuamah omlo a, Pasian tawh kipawl ding a hanciam kuamah omlo hi.
Mi khempeuh mawh ciat uh a, a hong honkhia Pasian tawh kigamla uh

Mi khat hangin leitungah mawhna hong om a, tua mawhna hangin sihna hong piang hi. Mi khempeuh mawh uh ahih manin tu-a bangzia-in mi khempeuh tungah sihna hong tung hi.13Thukham a omma pekin leitungah mawhna na omkhin a, thukham a omlohna munah Pasian in mawhna a ciamtehna laibu neilo hi.14Ahi zongin Adam huna kipan Moses hun dongin sihna in mite uk a, Adam in Pasian' thupiak a man'loh manin a khialh bangin a khial nailo mite nangawn sihna khutnuai mah hi veve uhhi. Adam pen a hong pai lai ding mipa' lim a hihi.15Ahi zongin Pasian' hong piak letsong pen Adam' mawhna tawh kibang lo ahih manin tuate gel tehkak theihding hilo hi. Tua mi khat a khialhna hangin mi tampi a sihna pen a man mah a hihi. Ahi zongin Pasian' hong itna leh hong hehpihna nakpi takin lianzaw lai a, mi khat ahi tua Zeisu Christ' hehpihna hangin mi tampi tak tungah hong kipia letsong lian mahmah hi.16Pasian' letsong leh mi khat' mawhna a hatna zia kilamdang hi. Khialhna khat a om khit ciangin, "Mawh hi," ci-in thukhenna kipia a, ahi zongin khialhna tampi tak a om khit ciangin a kilawm lopi mahin, "Dik hi," cihna piakkhong thupha a om hi.17Mi khat bek' mawhna hangin sihna in hong uk ahih leh mi khat mah ahi Zeisu Christ hangin nakpi takin a lian Pasian' hehpihna leh mihoih-a san'na a ngah mite nungta-in thahatzaw kan ding uhhi.18Tua hi a, khialhna khat in mi khempeuh tungah thukhenna tungsak ahih mah bangin gamtatna hoih khat mah in mi khempeuh khahin nungtasak hi.19Mi khat in thu a man'loh manin mi tampi mimawh a suahsak mah bangin mi khat in thu a man'na hangin mi tampi in Pasian tawh kipawl theihna a ngah ding uh a hihi.

Tua ahih manin tua bangin a gamta taktak pen kei hiloin ka sunga om mawhna hizaw hi. 18 Ka leitung pumpi sungah a hoih na khat beek omlo hi, ci-in ka thei hi. Ka sungah a hoih gamtatnopna lungsim a om hangin ka hihzo kei hi. 19 A hoih ka gamtatnop teng gamta loin, ka hihnoploh siatnate ka gamta zawsop hi. 20 Ka gamtat noplohteng ka gamtat veve ciangin tua a gamta pen kei hi nawnloin ka sunga om mawhna a gamta ahihna a hong kilang hi. 21 Tua ahih ciangin a hoih gamta nuam hinapi-in a sia bekbek a gamtakha ka hihna ka thei hi. 22 Ka lungsim tawng taktakah Pasian' thukham hoih ka sa hi. 23 Ahi zongin kei' deihloh thudang khat in ka lungsimah na hong sem hi. Tua ka sunga na hong sem pen in mawhna thu-ah kei hong mancip hi.

Leitung mihingte' gamtat bangin gamta kei unla, na lungsim uh kikheelin Pasian kipuahpha sak un. Tua hi leh a hoih nate bang hi a, bangte in amah lungkim sakin, bangte a kicing hiam ci-in thei-in Pasian' deihna na phawk thei ding uhhi.
Tua bang mite in i Topa Christ' na a sem hiloin, gilpi vai bek a sem uh a hihi. Amaute in mite phatin kamkhum nono zang uh ahih manin mihoih pawlkhat a khemzo uhhi.

Ahi zongin Khasiangtho a neilo mite in Pasian' Khasiangtho in a hong piak nate sang theilo uhhi. Khasiangtho a nei mite bek in theithei uh ahih manin amaute in tel theilo uh a, amau-a' dingin a haihuai thu khat ahi lel hi.

Note pen Pasian' biakinn na hihna uh leh note sungah Pasian' Kha Siangtho a teng ahih lamtak na theihsa uh a hihi. 17 Mi khatpeuh in Pasian' biakinn susia leh Pasian in tua mipa susia ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian' biakinn a siangtho hi a, note zong tua biakinn siangtho na hi uhhi.
I pian'pih ngeina mahmahah zong pasalte in sam sau a khawi pen amau-a' dingin a zumhuai thu ahihna,
Naupang ka hih hun lai-in naupang mah bangin kampau-in, thu ngaihsunin, ka gamta hi. Ahi zongin tu-in khangham ka hih manin naupang vaite ka zang nawn kei hi.
Tua thu hangin ka lungkia tuankei uhhi. Kote' leitung pumpi in damdamin muatlam ding a manawh ahi zongin ka kha nuntakna uh a nini-in thaksuak semsem hi.

Note in kei a hong pakta ding hinapi-in hong paktalo na hih manun note' bawlin mihai bangin kisialin ka gamta hi. Banghang hiam cihleh kei pen bangmahpi ka hihloh hangin sawltak thupi mahmahin na ngaihsutte uh sangin themkhat zong ka neuzaw tuan het kei hi. 12 Sawltak man taktak ka hihna lim a kilangsak nate, note lakah lungduai takin hong kisem a, lim, na lamdang, leh na a tuamtuamte note lakah hong kibawl hi.

Tu-in mihing pianzia hong kitel a, tuate pen: Numei tawh mawhna, thangtatna, lanluat mana khialhna, 20 milim biakna, mi bumna, kilangbawlna, kitotna, hazatna, hehna, huaihamna, kikhenna, pawltuam lungsim neihna, 21 en'na, zukhamna, leh biakna pawi-ah zukhamna-a kipan adangdangte a hihi. A beisa hunah ka hong hilhkholhsa bangin tu-in ka hong genkikin-ah: Hih bangin a gamta mite pen Pasian' Ukna sungah omkha hetlo ding hi.
Mi khatpeuh, bangmah hilo napi-in amah a kithupi ngaihsut mawkmawk leh amah leh amah a kikhem a hihi.

Pasian a kikhemzo dingin ngaihsunkha kei un. Mi khempeuh in ama vawh nam khaici mah ngahkik ding hi. 8 Mi khatpeuh in ama leitung pumpi deihna khaici a vawh leh sihna ngahding a, Khasiangtho deihna khaici a vawh leh Khasiangtho tung panin nuntak tawntungna ngahding hi. 9 Tua ahih manin na hoih sepding cimtak kei ni. Lungkia loin i sep nak leh a hun ciangin thaman i ngah ding hi. 10 Tua ahih ciangin hunhoih i ngah simin midangte tungah a hoihin i gamta ding a, a diakdiakin thu upna sungah i innkuanpihte khempeuh tungah i hoih gamtatding i phawk ding hi.

A taktakin eite khempeuh zong amaute mah i bang ngei a, i pian'pih lungsim zui-in nungta-in, i pumpi leh i lungsim deihna bangin i gamta hi. Tua ahih manin eite khempeuh zong Pasian' hehna hangin gim a thuak dingte ihi hi.
a ngaihsutnate uh khuamial tawh kibang hi. Amaute' lungsim khauhin bangmah thei hetlo uh ahih manin Pasian' hong piak nuntakna neikha hetlo uhhi.

Banghang hiam cihleh note kiangah Lungdamna Thu ka hong hilh lai-un kam bek tawh a hong gen hiloin, Khasiangtho' vangliatna leh Lungdamna Thu a man taktak hi, ci-in theihna tawh a hong pai ka hi uhhi. Note kiangah ka om laitakun note' phattuamna dingin ka sep ka bawlna khempeuh uh na thei uhhi.

Pasian biakna hangin a neihsateng tawh a lungkim mite pen biakna in mihau a suaksak takpi mah a hihi. 7 A taktakin ci lehang, leitungah mihingin i suah laitakin sumlepai tawh i suak kei a, i sih ciangin zong leitung panin bangmah i keng thei tuan kei hi. 8 Tua ahih manin annek tuidawn, nikten' puansilh i neih nak leh a phazo a hihi. 9 Ahi zongin a haunuam mite in ze-etna a tuamtuam thuak a, duhhopna huaihamna a haivai thute-ah awkcipin, haksatna leh siatna a tuahlawh uhhi. 10 Sum deihluatna in siatna namkim piangsak hi. Mi pawlkhat in sum deihlua liang uh ahih manin a upna panun pialkhia-in gimna lungkhamna tampi a thuaklawh uhhi.
Tua bang mite pawlkhat, mite inn-ah va hawh khiankhianin, deihna nam tuamtuam leh mawhna lungsim tawh a kidim numeite na thuzawh uhhi.

Mite in thuman a ngaih noploh hun, amaute' deihna bek a zuihnop hun, amaute' zaknop thute bek a gen ding sia a cial thuahthuah hun hong tung ding hi. 4 Amaute in thuman thutak ngainuam nawnloin tangthu phuahtawm peuh ngaihsutpi-in nei ding uhhi.
Lungsim siangthote-a' dingin na khempeuh a siang hi a, ahi zongin thu umlote a lungsim ngaihsutnate uh siakhin ahih manin amaute-a' dingin a siang bangmah omlo hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh eite zong nidangin haitatin, thumang loin, vakvai-in, duhna deihna a tuamtuamte thuaklahin, thusia leh en'na lungsim tawh a gamtate, mite in hong mudahin, eite khatlekhat zong a kimudah ngeite ihi hi.
Leitungah mihingin Zeisu a omlai-in sihna panin amah a honkhia theiding Pasian tungah thu ngenin khitui naptui tawh thumin na kiko hi.

Tua banah, i leitung pate in gim hong pia a, zong i zahtak lai hi. Tua ahih leh kha thu tawh kisai-ah i Pa' thu mang phazaw-in i nuntak ding kisam hi. 10 I leitung pate in amau' hoihsak bangin nuntak tomno sung ngaihsutna-in hong thuhilhin gim hong pia a, ahi zongin Pasian in amah tawh kibangin siangtho-in i omtheihna dingin eite hong khualna-in hong thuhilhin gim hong pia hi. 11 thuhilhna tawh gim hong kipiak ciangin nuam kisa hetloin na kisa mahmah sam a, ahi zongin tua thuhilhna a mangzote in thuman nuntakna hangin nopsakna thaman a nung ngah uhhi.

Mi khat peuhpeuh in tua bang ze-etna a thuak ciangin, "Pasian in kei hong ze-et hi," ci-in ngaihsun kei hen. Siatna in Pasian ze-et ngeilo a, mite a siatna dingin Pasian in zong ze-et ngeilo hi. 14 Mi khatpeuh in ama deihna zui-in a gamtat ciangin mawhna a piangsak a hihi. 15 Lungsim utna a gol semsem ciangin mawhna hong piang a, mawhna hong cingtaak ciangin sihna hong piang hi.
Mi khatpeuh in Christian ka hi hi, ci napi-in kampau a kidopzawh kei leh amahmah a kikhemtawm hi lel a, ama biakna neih a mawkna a hihi.

Sanggamte aw, hoihtakin na ngai un. Pasian a it mite tungah piakdingin a ciam vantung gam a ngahding leh upna thu-ah mihau a suak dingin Pasian in leitung mizawngte a teel hinapi-in, 6 note in mizawngte na simmawhbawl uhhi. Note hong bawlsia-in thukhen zum hong tun' pahpahte, mihaute hizaw uhhi. 7 Pasian in note a hong phuah min hoih a gensiate, mihaute mah ahi uhhi.

Tua mah bangin leii zong i pumpi na sung panin a neu mahmah khat hinapi-in thusia lianpipi piangsak zo hi. Gam khempeuh zong mei-ek neuno khat pan kipanin a kangtum thei hi. 6 Leii pen mei tawh kibang hi. I pumpi na sung panin a neuno khat hinapi-in i pumpi buppi a sia suahthei a, hell khuk sung panin a hong piang mei tawh i nuntakna buppi hong kangtumsak thei hi. 7 Mihingte in gamsa, vasa, a bokvak ganhing leh tui sunga om ngasate-a kipan ganhing khempeuh zualsakin ukzo uhhi. 8 Ahi zongin siattheihna ding gukhal tawh a kidim, a omkhong theilo leii pen zualsakin a ukzo kuamah omlo hi. 9 I leii tawh eite' pa ahi Topa i phat thei a, Pasian tawh a kisunin a kibawl i mipihte zong tua i leii mah tawh i samsia thei hi. 10 Kam khat sung panin thupha leh thusia pusuak khawm hi. Sanggamte aw, hih bang ahi ding hi hetlo hi. 11 Tuinak khat panin tui lim leh tui limlo hong luangkhia khawm thei ahi hiam? 12 Sanggamte aw, theikung in oliv hong gahthei a, leenggui in theipum hong gahthei ahi hiam? Tui-al in tuilim piangsak ngeilo hi. 13 Note lakah pilin thuthei a kisa a om leh kiniamkhiatin pilin, nuntak hoih leh gamtat hoih tawh a lahkhiat ding a hihi.
En'na leh huaihamna a om nak leh buaina leh siatna nam khempeuh tawh kizom pahpah hi.

Note lakah a om kitotna leh kilaina koi panin hong piang ahi hiam? Deihluatna lungsim na neih manun note' pumsung a kitoktok niloh a hihi. 2 Na na deih uh a, ahi zongin neilo na hih manun mi na thatnuam uhhi. Nate deihna lungsim na nei uh a, ahi zongin ngah zolo na hih manun kitawngin na kilailawh uhhi. Pasian kiangah na deih uh ngenlo na hih manun a ngahlo na hi uhhi.
Tua bang hinapi-in mi tampi tak in amau' gamtat hoihlohna zui ding uh a, tua bangin amau gamtatna hangin mite in thuman lampi gensia ding uhhi.

Lai a hong gelhna sungah a thugente tu-ate mah a gennuam a hihi. A laigelhna sungah a telhak thu tampi om a, theihna kicing loin lungsim kiplo mi pawlkhatte in Laisiangtho sung thu a ututun a kawihei uh bangin Paul' thugente zong a manlopi-in khia uh ahih manin siatna a tuaklawh uhhi.

Ka lawm itte aw, eite' pianzia ding taktak a telin hong kilat nailoh hangin tu-in Pasian' tate ihi hi. Ahi zongin Christ hong kilat ciangin ama pianzia ahi bang teekteekin mu ding ihih manin amah i batna ding thu teltakin i thei hi.
Hih mite in pawl kikhenna piangsakin, amau pumpi deihna bangin gamta uh a, Khasiangtho zong neilo uhhi.
Laban a tuumul met dingin a paikhia hi a, Rachel in a pa' innsung pasian-te na gu hi.

"Keimahlo ngal pasian dang na bia kei ding uhhi. 4 "A kiseek milim hita leh, tunga vantung hita leh, nuai-a leisung hita leh, leinuai-a om tui sungah hita leh a om na khat peuhpeuh a sun khat peuhpeuh note-a' dingin na bawl kei ding uhhi. 5 Tuate' mai-ah na kun kei ding uh a, tuate na bia kei ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh keimah note' { Topa } Pasian, a aam Pasian ka hi a, kei hong mudahte' tungah pate' mawhna tate' tungah khang thum khang lina dongin thuk-in, 6 ahih hangin kei hong itin ka thupiakte a zui mi a tul tampite tungah itna kip a lakpa ka hihi.
Note' tunga kong gente khempeuh thudon un; pasian dangte' min genin nei kei unla, na kam sung panun zong tua bangte kizasak kei un.
Amaute zingsangin tho baih uh a, meihal biakna pia-in thunuama biakna zong a paipih uhhi. Pawi an ne-in mite tu uh a, zu khamin numei pasal kisawk ngeingai uhhi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute in a biak uh keeldawite-a' dingin amau' biakpiaknate go nawnlo ding uhhi. Hih pen amau' khang tawntungin amaute' tungah ngeina kip khat hi ding hi.
"Milimte lamah kihei kei unla, note in a kisungtawm pasian-te nomau-a' dingin bawl kei un; kei pen { Topa } na Pasian uh ka hihi.

"Note in nomau-a' dingin a mai-ah na kun dingun milim bawlloin, a kiseek milim hita leh biakna song hita leh na dingsak kei ding uh a, na gamsung uhah suang milim na phut kei ding uhhi; Banghang hiam cihleh kei pen { Topa } na Pasian uh ka hihi.
Keimah in mual dawna na biaknate uh susia-in, na paknamtui biakna taute uh phukin, note' milim' siluang hawmte tungah na luanghawmte uh ka pai ding a, keimah in note kong kih ding hi.
"Tua ahih ciangin note hoihtakin kidawm un. Horeb-ah mei sung panin { Topa } in note' tungah thu hong gen ni-in bangmah mulo na hih manun,

A kiseek amau' pasian milimte mei tawh na hal ding uhhi. Tua nate-ah na awk khaklohna dingun amaute' tunga a om kham leh ngun deihgawh loin, note-a' dingin na la kei ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh tua pen { Topa } na Pasian uh tungah a kihhuai a hihi. 26 Note' inn sungah a kihhuai nate na tumpih kei ding uh a, tua nate tawh kibangin samsiat a thuak mi na kisuaksak kei ding uhhi. Note in tua nate mudah mahmahin na kih ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh tua nate a kisamsia na a hihi.

"‘{ Topa}-a' dingin a kihhuai ahi, khutsiampa' khut tawh a kibawl, a kiseek ahi a, a kisung ahi zongin milim bawlin, mun simthamah a koih mipa in gimna ngah ta hen,’ ci ding uhhi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in dawngin, ‘Amen,’ ci ding uhhi.
A muhdahhuai amau' na, singlesuang a kibawl, ngunlekham a kibawl, amaute' lakah a om a milimte uh na mu khin uhhi.

Amaute pen pasian dangte tawh ama hazat theihna dingin gamta uh a, a kihhuai gamtatnate tawh amaute in amah hehsak uhhi. 17 Amaute in pasian a hilo dawite, amau' theih ngeiloh pasian-te, hong suak nunung pasian thakte, na pu na pate un a theih ngeiloh pasian-te' tungah biakna a pia uhhi.
Pai unla note' teel pasian-te tungah ko un. Na lungkham hunun amaute kihonkhia sak un," a ci hi.

Kiriathjearim-ah Thuciamna Singkuang a om-a kipan, hun saupi, kum sawmnih bang pha a, Israel mite khempeuh in { Topa } ngai-in thuum uhhi. 3 Tua ciangin Samuel in Israel mite khempeuh kiangah, "Na lungsim khempeuh uh tawh { Topa' } lamah a kiheikik na hih uh leh note' lak panin gamdang pasian-te leh Ashtaroth nusian milim koihkhia-in { Topa' } lamah na lungsim uh ngat unla, amah bek bia un. Tua hi leh amah in Filistia-te' khutsung panin note hong honkhia ding hi," a ci hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh lehdona pen aisan mawhna bangmah hi a, lungkhauhna pen mawhna leh milim biakna mah a bang a hihi. Nangmah in { Topa' } thu nial khin na hih manin, amah in zong kumpi hihna pan nang hong nolh khin hi," a ci hi.
{ Topa } in Israel mite' mai-ah a hawlkhiat Amor mite mah bangin milimte zui-in a kihhuai mahmahin a gamta hi.
{ Topa } in amaute tungah, "Note in na hih kei ding uhhi," a cih milimte' na sem uhhi.

Amaute in ama thukhamte, leh a pu a pate uh tawh a bawl a thuciamna, leh amaute tungah a piak hilhkholhnate simmawh uhhi. Amaute in a mawkna milimte zui-in a mawkna suak uh a, amaute tawh kibangin gamta kei un ci-in { Topa } in a thupiak tawh kisai-in, amaute in amau' kiima om minamte zui uhhi. 16 Amaute in { Topa } a Pasian uh thupiakte khempeuh nusia-in amau-a' dingin a kisung bawngno lim nih bawl uhhi. Amaute in Asherah milim khat bawl uh a, vantunga om nate khempeuh bia-in Baal milim na sem uhhi. 17 Amaute in biakna-in a tanute uh leh a tapate uh halin vankahna leh aisanna zang uh a, { Topa' } muhna-ah a sia a gamta dingin kipia tawmin amah hehsak uhhi. 18 Tua ahih ciangin Israel mite tungah { Topa } heh a, ama muhna panin amaute hemkhia hi. Kuamah dang om nawnloin Judah gammi bek omlai hi.

Tua ahih ciangin hih minamte in { Topa } bia uh a, a kiseek amau' milimte' na zong semkawm uhhi. A tate uh leh a tate uh' tate zong tua bangmahin gamta uhhi. A pu a pate uh gamtat bangin a suan a khakte uh tuni dongin gamta uhhi.

Banghang hiam cihleh amah in a pa Hezekiah' suksiatsa mualtunga biaknate lamkik hi. Tua ciangin amah in Baal-a' dingin biakna taute phut a, Israel kumpi Ahab' bawl bangin Asherah milim khat bawl a, vantunga om nate khempeuh bia-in tuate' na a sem hi.
Amah in a pa' khekhap khempeuh tawn a, a pa in a na a sepsak milimte' na mah semin tuate a bia hi.

Tua thamloin { Topa' } biakinn sungah siampi Hilkiah in a muh laibu sungah a kigelh thukham kammalte amah in a kipsak theihna dingin Judah gamsung leh Jerusalem-a om vankahte, aisante, innsung pasian-te, milimte, leh a kihhuai nate khempeuh Josiah in a hemkhia hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in ama nate hawkkhia-in a lutang leh a galhiam la uh a, a milimte uh leh mite kiangah hih thuthak a ko dingin Filistia gamsung khempeuhah kamtaite a sawl uhhi.

Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } lian mahmah a, nakpi takin phat ding ahi hi; pasian khempeuh sangin lamdang sakzawk ding a hihi. 26 Banghang hiam cihleh minam dangte' pasian-te milim hi lel a, ahih hangin { Topa } ahih leh vantungte a bawlpa a hihi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute in a pu a pate uh Pasian, { Topa' } biakinn nusia uh a, Asherah milimte leh milim dangte' na sem uhhi. Hih amau' mawhna hangin Judah leh Jerusalem tungah hehna hong tung hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh amah a zo Damaskas-te' pasian-te tungah biakna pia-in, "Syria kumpite' pasian-te in amaute huh ahih manin amaute in kei hong huh theihna dingun amau' tungah biakna ka pia ding hi," ci hi. Ahih hangin tua pasian-te pen amah leh a mipihte khempeuh' siatna a hihi.
Pasian dang a teelte in amau' dahna khangsak hi. Amau' si theh biaknate ke'n bawlpih loin, amau' pasian-te ka biakpih kei ding hi.
Mawkna milim a thupi ngaihsutte na mudah hi; ahih hangin keimah in { Topa } ka hong muang hi.
Thu vaihawm kikhopna sungah Pasian in ama pan'mun hong len a, amah in pasian-te' lakah thu a khen hi.
{ Topa } a kici min nei nangmah bek leitung khempeuhah a Sangpenpa na hihna amaute theisak in.
Banghang hiam cihleh minam dangte' pasian khempeuh milim hi lel a, ahih hangin { Topa } ahih leh vantungte a bawlpa a hihi.

Amau-a' dingin thangzak ahi amau' milimte a biakpih uhhi. 37 Amaute in a tapate uh leh a tanute uh dawi biakna-in a nei uhhi. 38 Amaute in Kanaan gam milimte a biakna-un mawhna neilo a tanute uh leh a tapate uh that uh a, hih mi thahna hangin gamsung a nin a suak hi.

Amau' milimte pen ngun leh kham hi lel a, mihingte' khut tawh a kibawl a hihi. 5 Amaute in kam nei napi-in pau theilo uh a, mit nei napi-in khua mu theilo uhhi. 6 Amaute in bil nei napi-in khua zalo uh a, nak nei napi-in a nam theilo uhhi. 7 Amaute in khut nei napi-in lawng theilo uh a, khe nei napi-in pai theilo uhhi. Amaute in aw gingsak theilo uhhi. 8 Tuate a bawlte leh tuate a muangte khempeuh pen tuate mah tawh kibang uhhi.

Minam dangte' pasian-te pen mihingte' khut tawh a kibawl, ngun leh kham a hihi. 16 Amaute in kam nei napi, pau theilo uhhi. Amaute in mit nei napi, khua mu theilo uhhi. 17 Amaute in bil nei napi, khua za theilo uhhi. Amaute' kamsungah naksuk naktoh theihna neilo uhhi. 18 Milim a bawl mite pen milim mah bangsak in. Milim a muang khempeuhte zong tua milimte mah bangsak in.
Amaute in amau khut tawh a bawlsa uh biakna taute donlo ding uh a, amau' bawlsa Asherah milimte hita leh paknamtui halna biakna taute hita leh muan'in nei nawnlo ding uhhi.
Amau' gamsung milimte tawh kidim a, amau' khut tawh a bawlsate uh amaute in a bia uhhi.

Amah pen leitung a lingsakgawp dingin a hong kipat hun ciangin { Topa } kihtakna leh a lian ama minthan'na vang panin suanghawmpite sung leh keenhawmte sungah a buk theihna dingun amau' bawltawm ngun leh kham milimte, buite leh bakte a paih ding uhhi.
En in, sakol tung tuangte a kopkopin hong pai!" a ci hi. Adang khat in, "Babylon cim hi, cim hi. A milim pasian-te khempeuh leilak dongah amah in suksiatsak hi," ci-in a dawng hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Pasian pen kua tawh tehkak ding a, amah pen bang lim tawh kibang ci ding na hi uhhiam? 19 Milim tawh tehtheih ding hilo hi. Milim a bawlpa in sungin, khamseekpa khat in tua milim kham tawh zut a, tua milim-a' dingin ngun khainiangte a sun'sak hi. 20 Ngun leh kham a nei zolo mipa in biakna-in a zat dingin a muatlo ding sing teel a, a taang theilo milim khat ama-a' dingin a bawlsak dingin khutsiam mi khat a zong hi.
"Kei pen { Topa } ka hi a, { Topa } pen keima min a hihi. Pasian dang' tungah keima-a' tawh a kibang minthan'na ka pia kei a, a kisui milimte zong keimah hong kiphatnate pawl ka ngahsak kei hi.
A kisui milimte muangin, a kisung milimte kiangah, ‘Note, komau' pasian-te na hi uhhi,’ a ci mite kinolh ding a, maizum mahmahin ki-omsak ding hi.

Milim a bawl mite khempeuh a mawkna hi a, amau' deih milimte in phattuamna piangsak lo hi. Milim a biate in khua mu theiloin, thu thei theilo a, amaute in maizumna a thuak uhhi. 10 Bangmahin a kimanglo pasian kua in bawl a, milim kua in sung ahi hiam? 11 Milim a bia mite khempeuh in maizumna ngah ding uhhi. Milim a bawl khutsiamte pen mi hilel uhhi. Amaute khempeuh kikhawm sakin dingsak un. Amaute nakpi takin kilausak ding a, a vekpi-un maizumin kikoih khawm ding hi.

Tua ciangin tua kung pen mi khat-a' dingin mei sing a suak hi. Amah in tua sing kimkhat la-in khua lumna dingin mei-in cih a, amah in mei tawhin moh a em hi. Amah in pasian khat zong bawlin bia a, amah in milim khat bawlin tua milim mai-ah a kun hi. 16 Amah in a sing kimkhat meikhukah cih hi. Adang kimkhat tawh an ne a, amah in sa hangin a gil vah hi. Amah in mei awi-in, "Ah, ka khua lumta, mei mu khin ing," ci hi. 17 Amah in a vallai teng, ama milim pasian khatin a bawl hi. Tua milim mai-ah kunin a bia hi. Amah in tua milim tungah thu ngen a, "Nang pen keima pasian na hih ciangin kei hong honkhia in," ci hi. 18 Amaute in bangmah theilo a, amaute in bangmah khentel theilo uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh amaute in bangmah a muh theihlohna dingun amah in a mit uh humsakin, bangmah a theihlohna dingun a lungsim uh khaksak hi. 19 A kimkhat meikhukah cihin, a aam tungah moh zong ka em a, sa hangin ka ne khinzo hi. A omlai teng a kihhuai-in bawl buang ding ka hi hiam? Sing bek khat mai-ah kun buang ding ka hi hiam, a ci ding, thu a ngaihsun, theihna leh thumuhna a nei khat beek omlo hi. 20 Amah pen vut a nete tawh kibang lel hi. A lungsim haina in amah lam pialpih khin a, amah leh amah kihonkhia theiloin, "Ka khutsungah ka tawi milim pen a zumhuai hilo ahi hiam?" cih zong phawk theilo hi.
"Minamte sung panin a suaktalai note aw, nomau kikaikhawmin hong pai unla, hong nai un! Sing milim a pua kawikawi mite in theihna neilo uh a, a honkhia theilo pasian tungah thu ngenngen uhhi.

Sumbawm panin khamte uang zatin tawitehna tawh ngunte a tehkhiate in kham seekpa cial uh a, amah in tua nate pen pasian-in a seeksak hi. Tua ciangin amaute kunin tua milim a bia uhhi. 7 Amaute in tua pasian pen a liangko tung uhah ngato-in pua uh a, ama omna ding munah a koih uhhi. Tua a koihna-ah a milim om niloh hi. Ama omna panin kinkhia theilo hi. Mi khatpeuh in amah sam leh amah in dawng theilo a, ama lungkhamna panin zong a honkhia thei kei hi.
Kuamsunga om suangmaite na la uh a, tua suangmaite na bia uhhi. Tuate tungah tui tawh biakpiakna sungin, an tawh biakpiakna na paipih uhhi. Hih thute' hangin kei lungdam ding ka hi hiam?

Nang cimawhin na kiko ciangin na milim kaihkhopte kihonsak in! Huih in amaute mutkhia-in, husan'na in amaute seemkhia ding hi. Ahih hangin kei hong beel mi in leitang ngah ding a, ka mual siangtho a luah ding hi.
Ka mite in kei hong taisan uh ahih manin a mawhna uh hangin amau' tungah thu ka khen ding hi; pasian dangte tungah meihal biakna pia uh a, a khut uh tawh a bawlsa uh milimte a bia uhhi.

Naupangte in sing tomin, a pate un mei tawh uh a, nupite in a nusian uh vantung kumpinu-a' ding moh bawlna ding annel meek uh a, kei hong hehsakna dingun, pasian dangte' dawn dingin leenggahzu tawh biakna a pia tazen uhhi.

Amaute in a it uh, a na a sepsak uh, a delh uh, a zon' uh leh a biak uh ahi ni leh kha leh vana om nate khempeuh mai-ah a kiphokhia ding hi. Tua guhte kikhawm nawnlo ding a, kiphum nawnlo ding hi. Leilaka ek kinusia bang ahi lel ding hi.

Ngai un, gamsung mun khempeuhah ka mite' tanute kap uh a, "Zion khua-ah { Topa } om nawnlo ahi hiam? A kumpipa uh om nawnlo ahi hiam?" a ci uhhi. { Topa } in dawngkik a, "Banghangin milim bawltawmte leh a gamdang milimte uh tawh kei hong hehsak ahi uhhiam?" a ci hi.

{ Topa } in hih bangin ci hi: "Gamdangte' omdan ciing kei unla, vantunga lim lamdangte lunghihmawhna-in ngaihsun kei un. Banghang hiam cihleh gamdang mite in tuate a lunghihmawhpih uhhi. 3 Hih mite' ngeinate a kiman'na omlo hi. Gamlakah sing khat kiphuk a, khutsiampa in a hei tawh milimin a bawl hi. 4 Mite in tua pen kham leh ngun tawh zem uh a, a kilakkhiat theihlohna dingin sik tawh a kilh uhhi. 5 A milimte uh, tangmai huanah vasate' launa dingin a kikhai milimte tawh kibangin pau theilo uh a, lam pai theilo uh ahih manin puak a kul hi. Tuate kihta kei un; siatna bawl theilo uh a, phatna zong bangmah bawl theilo uhhi," a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Judah mite leh Jerusalem khuamite in meihal biakna tawh a biak uh a pasian-te uh' kiangah pai-in a va thum ding uhhi. Ahih hangin hih gimna hong tun' ciangin a honkhia thei tuan kei ding uhhi.

Na kihhuainate, na angkawmna, na hukna leh gamlak mualtungah numei paktat bangin milim pasian peuh na biak kawikawinate ka muzo hi. Jerusalem aw, gimna ngah ta in. Na siangthona dingin bang tanvei sawt ding ahi hiam, a ci hi.

Amaute' khialhna leh a mawhnate uh a zah nihin ka thuk ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh amaute in a muhthadahhuai siluang hawmte tawh a kibang milimte tawh ka gam a ninsak uh a, kihhuaina tawh ka gamh a dimsak uhhi," hong ci hi.
Mi in ama pasian ding bawltawm thei ahi hiam? Tuate pasian hilo hi," hong ci ding uhhi.

Jerusalem khua-a innte leh Judah kumpite' innte-a kipan, innkhum zangah vantunga aksite khempeuh tungah paknamtui hal biakna a kipiakna innte leh pasian dangte tungah dawn ding biakna a kibuakna innte khempeuh a vekin Tofeth mun bangin a nin a suak ding hi, ci hi, va ci in," hong ci hi.

Hinnom Kuam-ah a tapate leh a tanute uh tawh Molek pasian a biakna dingun Baal-a' ding biakna tau sangte a bawl uhhi. Hih a kihhuai na semin, Judah mite mawhna a bawlsakna dingun amaute ka sawl kei a, zong ka ngaihsunkha ngei beek kei hi.
Moab gam mualsang tungah biakna pia a, milim pasian-te tungah paknamtui a hal mite, { Topa } in kong cihin-ah, tua bang ka hihsak nawn kei ding hi.
Mi khempeuh hai-in pilna neilo hi khin uh a, kham seekte khempeuh in a milim uh a maizumlawh uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh a milim uh zuau hi lel a, nak theilo hi.
Tua ahih manin en un, { Topa } in kong cihin-ah, Babylon khua-ah a om a milimte uh tungah thu ka khen ni hun hong tung ding a, gamsung khempeuhah a liamte a tau ding uhhi.

salin a om ding uhhi. Tua bangin salin a omna uh mun panin, amau' lungsim cihtaklohna uh hangin kei hong nusiatna uh leh keimah sangin milim a deihzawkna uh hangin a maizumna dingun gim a pia ding ka hih lamtak thei-in kei hong phawk ding uhhi. Amau' gitlohna leh a haitatnasate uh hangin amau mahmah kimudahtawm ding uhhi.

Milimte' lak leh biakna tau kiimah si luanghawm kithehthang ding a, mual sang tungteng, mual dawnzangteng, singnim nuai citeng, tawsaw kung lian nuai khempeuh, leh milim biakna-in paknamtui a halna uh mun khempeuhah si luanghawm om ziazua kawikawi ding hi. Tua ciangin { Topa } ka hih lamtak mi khempeuh in hong thei ding uhhi.

{ Topa' } hehna amau' tungah a tun' ni ciangin, a ngun a khamte un amaute suahtak theilo ahih manin, a ngun a khamte uh nin bangin kongzing lakah paai ding uhhi. A gilkial uh ciangin zong an bangin tuate ne theilo uhhi. Ngun leh khamte in mawhna sungah amaute tumpihzaw hi.

"Mihing ahi Ezekiel aw, hih mite in milim bia uh a, milim in mawhna sungah amaute tun'pih hi. Amaute' thu theihnopte a gen dingin hong um uh ahi uhhiam? 4 Tua ahih ciangin Topa { Pasian } ahi keimah in amaute tungah ka gen hih thute gen in: Milim bia-in mawhna sungah milimte kitun'sak a, tua khit ciangin kamsangte tungah thu a dong dingin a hong pai Israel mi peuhmah in keima thudawn'na kam ngah ding uhhi. Tua thudawn'na pen a milim tampite uh in a zak dingun a kilawm dawn'na hi ding hi.
"Tua ciangin kei tawh na neih na tanute leh tapate la-in milim biakna-in haltum dingin na pia hi. Kei tungah na cihtaklohna thuneu lua sa a, 21 milim biakna dingin ka tate piathuah lai na hi hiam?
Topa { Pasian } in hih bangin ci hi: Nang in na puante suahkhia-in, numei paktat bangin na pumpi, na lunggulh mite leh na milimte tungah kipia-in, milim biakna-in na tate that na hih manin

Amah in Israel mite' milim biakte biakpihlo a, milim biakna pialo ding, ci-in a kikhamna munah milim biakna sate zong nelo hi. Midangte' zi zong luppih dingin zollo a, numei in nin a neih laitakin zong luppihlo hi.

Ahi zongin amaute in kei hong demin, ka thugen hong ngailo uhhi. A muhdahhuai a milimte uh paikhia tuanlo uh a, Egypt pasian-te zong nusialo uhhi. Tua hi a, ka heh mahmahna teng Egypt gamsungah thuaksakgawp ning, ci-in ka ngaihsun hi.
Hih bangin kiciamna ka bawlna pen, amaute in ka thupiaknate nialin, ka thukhamte zuilo uh a, ka Sabbath-te siasak uhhi. Tua banah a pu a pate un a biak milimte mah a biakna hang uh a hihi.

Tuni ciangdongin note in a kipia ngei letsongte mah puakin, tua milimte mah biakna-in na tate uh na hal uh ciangin no leh no a kininsaktawm na hi uhhi. Tua bangin na gamtat khit uh ciangin no Israel mite, kei kiangah thu a dong dingin nong pai lai uhhi. Kei pen a nungta Topa { Pasian } ka hih mah bangin, note' thudotin ka om het kei taktak ding hi.
Amah pen Assiria uliante khempeuh tawh a mawhsa khat hi a, ama huk luatna hangin Assiria milimte nangawn va bia hi.
nangma tungah hih bangteng hong tungsak hi. Minam dangte tawh na paktat a, a milimte uh tawh na kininsak hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Topa { Pasian } ahi keima thugen, hih bangin amaute kiangah gen in: Note in sasi, a sa tawh na nekhawm uh a, milim zong na bia uhhi. Mi zong na that lai uhhi. Tua ahih manin bangci-in hih gam pen kote-a' hi, ci thei na hi uhhiam?
Tua ahih manin gamsungah amaute' mi thahna leh a milimte uh tawh gamsungteng a nitsakna hangun ka hehnateng ka thuaksak hi.

Tua ahih ciangin tua mangliante khempeuh milim apna dingin milim mai-ah a ding uhhi. 4 Tua ciangin nakpi takin taangkona khat kibawl a, "Minam tuamtuamte leh paunam tuamtuamte khempeuh aw! 5 Peengkul ging na za ding uh a, tua khit ciangin tamngaite, laia lasakna gingte, harp lasakna gingte, gawsemte, leh tumtheih a tuamtuamte a hong kitum ciangin Kumpi Nebukhadnezzar' koih kham milim mai-ah kunin na bia ding uhhi. 6 A kunlo, a bialo peuhmah thakhat thu-in mei phualpi sungah kikhul pah ding hi," a ci hi. 7 Tua mah bangin minam kimte, minam tuamtuamte leh paunam tuamtuamte khempeuh in tumtheih gingte a zak phetun kunsukin Kumpi Nebukhadnezzar' kham milim koih a bia uhhi.
Kumpipa aw, a hong hotkhiat kei zenzen leh zong, na pasian lah ka bia tuan kei ding uh a, na kham milim mai-ah zong ka kun kei ding uhhi, ci-in theita in," a ci uhhi.

Vantung Topa' langah na pang hi. A biakinnpi hai leh kuangte la-in sabuai tungah nangmah tawh, na miliante tawh a zineute leh na zite uh tawh zunekna-in na zang uhhi. Theihna a neilo, a mu theilo, khua a za theilo ngun, kham, sumngo, sik, sing, leh suang tawh a kibawl pasian-te' min na phat uhhi. Na nuntakna leh na hihna khempeuh a hong uk Pasian na zahtak kei hi.
Tua pasian-te sangin kulhpi a dal pasian a thupisim zaw ding hi. Amah in kham, ngun, suangmanpha, leh a thupi letsongte, a pu a pate' biak ngeiloh pasian kiangah a pia ding hi.

{ Topa } in Hosea tung tawnin Israel-te tungah thu a na gencil lai-in, amah in Hosea kiangah, "Hih gammite kei tungah citakloin pasian dangte bia uh ahih manin, nang zong hong tulpihlo ding numei paktat khat ten'pih in la, tuanu tawh ta nei in," a ci hi.

{ Topa } in kei kiangah thu hong genkik a, "Lawm a ngai khinsa, pasal tawh a lumkhawmsa numei khat tawh va kingai in. Israel mite, pasian dangte kiangah pai uh a, leenggahphehkeu tawh a va biak uh hangin, amaute ka it lai veve mah bangin tua numei va it in," hong ci hi. 2 Tua ahih ciangin ngun shekel sawmlenga leh mangbuhham seu sawmlenga tawh zi lei-in 3 ama kiangah, "Sauveipi sung keima zi bangin na om ding a, midang tawh na paktat nawn kei ding hi. Midang tawh na lupkhoploh mah bangin kei nangawn tawh zong i lumkhawm kei ding hi," ka ci hi. 4 Hih pen kumpi ahi a, makai ahi zongin, biakpiakna leh biakpiakna khuampite ahi zongin, siampi puanpi leh milim pasian-te neiloin hun saupi sung Israel mite om ding a cihna a hihi. 5 Tua khit ciangin Israel mite in { Topa } amau' Pasian leh a kumpipa uh David lamah hong kiheikik ding uhhi. Tua hun ciangin amaute in { Topa } zahtakin, ama letsongte a ngah ding uhhi.
Ka mite in aisanin singthem peuh thudotin nei uh a, amau' thu theihnopte, ciangkang peuh in gen tazen hi. Amaute in kei hong taisan uh a, a paktat numei bangin pasian dangte a zuan uhhi.

Samaria khuapi mite in a biak kham bawngno ka deih kei hi. Tua a bia mite tungah ka heh hi. Amaute in mihoih a suahna ding uh bang tanvei ngak lai ding ahi uhhiam? 6 Israel sunga om mi khat in tua milim bawl a, tua milim pen Pasian hilo hi. Samaria mite in a biak milim kisuzan ding hi. 7 Paunak-ah, Huih a tuhte in huih ngahkik ding a, a vui omlo an kung in annek ding piangsaklo hi, kici hi. A vui omlo an kung panin an kingah mah taleh zong gamdang mite in netum ding hi.

{ Topa } in hih bangin gen hi: Israel kong muh cilin hoih mahmah a, sehnel gamsunga a gah a zun kiuhkeuh leenggah tawh kibang hi. Na pu na pate uh ka muh cilin hoih mahmah a, a hun ciangin a min a zun sitset theigah muh tawh kibang hi. Ahi zongin Baalpeor a tun' uh ciangin amaute in Baal milim bia pah uh ahih manin, amau' biak milimte ka muhdah zahin amaute nangawn ka mudah pah hi.
Ahi zongin limsap semsem leng gamla pai semsem hi. Ka mite in Baal tungah biakna pia uh a, milim biakna-in paknamtui a hal uhhi.

Efraim-te beh in thu a gen ciangin a dangte lau uh a, Israel minam beh dangte in Efraim-te beh tung et uhhi. Ahi zongin Baal milim biakna hangin amaute khial uhhi; tua thu hangin si ding uhhi. 2 Tua hinapi-in amaute khialthuah semsem uh a, a biak ding uh milim a bawl uhhi. Amau' ngunte milimin bawl uh a, a hoihtakin khutsiamte a bawlsak uhhi. Tua ciangin, "Hihte tungah biakna pia un," a ci uhhi. Mihing in milim bia-in nam tazen uhhi.

Israel mite in milim biakha nawnlo ding uhhi. Amaute' thungetna pia-in amaute ka kem ding hi. Amaute, a hing tawntung singkung kep bangin ka kem ding hi; amaute' thupha ngah khempeuh keima kiang pan ahi hi," a ci hi.
Kiman'na a neilo milim a biate in nangmah hong taisan uhhi.

A milim manphate khempeuh kisuzan gawp ding a, mei tawh kisusia ding hi. Pasian' tungah a thumanlohna hangun mihingte in hih milimte nei uh ahih manin, a thumanlohna uh tawh kizui-in tu-in thuakkik ding uhhi, ci hi.
Note' biak milimte leh na biakna songte uh ka susia gawp ding a, note' bawlsa nate na bia nawn kei ding uhhi.

Banghang hiam cihleh Kumpi Omri' gamtatna zui-in, ama tapa Kumpi Ahab' sep khempeuh na sem uh a, amau' gamtat khempeuh na zui uhhi. Tua ahih manin note kong susia ding hi. Minam dangte in note hong nuihsanin, amaute' simmnawhna na thuak ding uhhi.

Milim, banga kimang ahi hiam? Mihingte' bawltawm na khat hi lel a, thuman hong gen theilo hi. Tua bangin a pau thei beeklo pasian a bawlpa in muan'in a neih bang phatuam ahi hiam? 19 Sing khatpeuh a kibawl na khat kiangah, "Khanglo in," ci-in, a pau theilo suangtum kiangah, "Tho in," ci na hih manun gimna na ngah ding uhhi. Hih bang milim in note hong hilh thei ding ahi hiam? Ngun leh kham tawh limtakin a kizut hangin a sungah nuntakna omlo hi.

Innkhum zangah kahto-in, ni, kha, leh aksi a bia mi khempeuh ka susia ding a, keimah hong bia-in, keima tungah thuman ding gen napi-in, Milkom pasian' min tawh a kiciam teiteite zong, ka susia ding hi.

Mihingte in milim peuh thudotin nei uh a, a thu ngahte uh zuauthu leh a mawkna hi lel hi. Mang khiathei-a kineite in lam lakkhial uh a, amau' hehnepnate a mawknapi hi lel hi. Tua ahih manin tuu bangin mite mangthang uh a, makai a neihloh manun gimna a ngah uhhi.

Judah mite citakloin, Pasian tungah a thuciamna uh palsat uh a, Israel mite' lak leh Jerusalem khuasungah siatna tampi gamta uhhi. { Topa } in a it mahmah biakinn ninsak uhhi. { Topa } a hilo, pasian dang a bia numeite, zi-in la-in a ten'pih uhhi. 12 Hih bangin a gamta mi peuhmah, a kua a kua hita leh, { Topa } in sugawp hen la, Vanglian { Topa } tungah biakna a paipih ei minamte tawh hong kigawmsak nawn kei hen.

Tua ciangin Dawimangpa in mual sang mahmah khatah Zeisu paipihto a, leitung kumpi gam khempeuh leh a hoihna teng a lah khit ciangin, 9 "Ka mai-ah kunin kei hong bia lecin hihte khempeuh nangma tungah kong pia ding hi," a ci hi. 10 Zeisu in, "Satan aw, taikhia in. Laisiangtho in, ‘Na Topa Pasian bek bia in la, ama na bek sem in,’ ci hilo ahi hiam?" ci-in a dawng hi.

‘Hih mite in a kampi bek uh tawh kei hong zahtak bawl uh a, ahi zongin a lungsim taktak uh kei tawh kigamla hi. 9 Mihingte' bawltawm thukhamte, Pasian' thukham zahin mite tungah hilh uh ahih manin kei hong biak hangun a kiman'na omlo hi,’ ci hi," ci-in a dawng hi.
"To nih' na a semkhawmzo nasem kuamah omlo hi. A to khat mudahin khat it ding a, khat beelin khat a simmawh ding hi. Pasian' na leh leitung sum na na semkhawmzo kei ding uhhi," a ci hi.

Tua a kisam thute in: Milim biakna-in a kipiasa an khat peuhpeuh na neklohna ding uh, sasi na neklohna ding uh, a si luangkhiasak loin a kigawlmek sa khat peuhpeuh na neklohna ding uh, leh numei tawh khialhna panin na kikepna ding uh a hihi. Hih thute hoihtakin zui le uh cin note-a' dingin hoih ding hi. Na cidam ta un," ci-in kigelh hi.
Eite pen Pasian' tate ihih manin, mihing khutsiamte in bawlin a zep ngunte, khamte, suang milimte tawh a kibang dingin Pasian i ngaihsun kei ding hi.

Amaute pil a kisak mahmah uh hangin a hai mahmah uh a hihi. 23 A hing tawntung Pasian bialoin, mi, vasa, ganhing, ahih kei leh a bokvak ganhingte tawh a kibang limte a bia zawsop uhhi. 24 Mihingte tua zahta-in hailua uh ahih manin amau ututin a gamtat theihna dingun Pasian in khahkhong vet a, a zumhuai mahmahpi-in a gamta uhhi. 25 Amaute in a man ahi Pasian' thu um nuamlo uh a, a tawntungin phat dingin a kilawm a Piangsakpa bialoin, Pasian' bawlsa nate bia-in a zui uhhi. Tu-a bangin hi takpi uhhi.
Migilote, Pasian' Ukna sungah a lut hetlohna ding thu na thei uhhi. Note kihaibawl kei un. Numei tawh a paktatte, milim biate, mi zi ahih kei leh mi pasal tawh a mawhte, pasal leh pasal a khialte,
amaute pawlkhat in a biak bangin milim i bia kei ding hi. Laisiangtho in, "Anne zune dingin mite tu uh a, tua khit ciangin a lam dingin a ding uhhi," na ci hi.
Tua ahih manin lawm itte aw, milim biakna pelh un.

Israel mite' thu ngaihsun dih un. Biakna sa a ne khempeuh pen biakna tau tungah Pasian biakna thu-ah a kipawl hilo ahi uhhiam? 19 Hih bang ka cih ciangin bang ka cihnopna ahi hiam? Milim ahi a, milim biakna sa ahi zongin thupi hi, a cinuam ka hi kei hi. 20 Ka cihnopna pen, lawkite in gan a gawh uh ciangin dawi a biakna uhhi a, Pasian a biakna uhhilo hi. Dawi biakna-ah note na kihel ding uh ka hong deih kei hi. 21 Note in Topa tawh nekkhawmna hai sung pan leh dawi tawh nekkhawmna hai sung panin na dawnkhawm thei kei ding uhhi. Topa tawh nekkhawmna an leh dawi tawh nekkhawmna an zong na nekhawm thei kei ding uhhi.
Lawki na hih lai-un a pau theilo milimte' thu-in na gamta uh a, na lungsim uh tua milimte in hong zo mahmah hi.
A beisa hunah Pasian theilo na hih manun Pasian a hilo vangliatna a neite' sila-in na om uhhi.

Tu-in mihing pianzia hong kitel a, tuate pen: Numei tawh mawhna, thangtatna, lanluat mana khialhna, 20 milim biakna, mi bumna, kilangbawlna, kitotna, hazatna, hehna, huaihamna, kikhenna, pawltuam lungsim neihna, 21 en'na, zukhamna, leh biakna pawi-ah zukhamna-a kipan adangdangte a hihi. A beisa hunah ka hong hilhkholhsa bangin tu-in ka hong genkikin-ah: Hih bangin a gamta mite pen Pasian' Ukna sungah omkha hetlo ding hi.
Tua ahih manin nulepa mawhna, a kilawmlo gamtatna, hukna lanna, a hoihlo lunggulhna, leh milim biakna nam khat ahih manin huaihamna ahi note sungah a om leitung lungsimte na sisak un.
Tu-in note in dawibiate pawlpih nawnloin ut utin na phengtat loh uh ciangin lamdangsa-in note hong kosia uhhi.
Ka itte aw, milim na biakkhak lohna dingun na kidawm un.

Ahi zongin note ka hong mawhsakna ding thu tawmkhat a om hi. Milim biakna ante nesakin, nulepa paktatna piangsak a, Israel mite mawhna a gamtasak Balak tungah thu a hilh Balaam' thuhilhnate a um mi pawlkhat note lakah a om hi.

Ahi zongin note ka hong mawhsakna ding thu khat om hi. Kamsang numei ka hi, ci-in thu a gen Jezebel na nial kei uhhi. Ama thuhilhna hangin ka nasemte in numei-pasal paktatna gamta-in milim biakna ante a ne uhhi. 21 Tua numei a kisikkikna ding hun ka piak hangin a paktatna panin kihei nuamlo hi. 22 Tua ahih manin tu-in tua numei tawh a paktatna uh panin a kisikkik kei uh leh tua numei leh amah tawh a paktat mi khempeuh, lupna ngaksakin nakpi takin gimna ka thuaksak ding hi.

Hih gimna tawh a silo midangte pen amau' gamtatnasa panin kikheelkik nuamlo uhhi. Dawi a biaknate uh, khua a mu theilo, khua a za theilo, lam a pai theilo ngun, kham, sumngo, suang, leh sing a kibawl milim a biakte uh khawl tuanlo uhhi.

Ganhing masa omna-ah na lamdang bawltheihna ding thu ngah ahih manin a na lamdang bawlna tawh leitungah a om mi khempeuh khem a, namsau tawh a si ding zahin a kisat liamsa hinapi a nungta lai ganhing pahtawina ding milim khat a bawlna dingun a gen hi.
Ahi zongin a meidawite, a lehtatte, a lampialte, mi thatte, a paktatte, aisante, milim biate, leh zuaugente omna ding mun pen sihna nihna ahi kat a kikhulna meiphualpi kuang sung ahi hi," a ci hi.

Khuapi kulhkongpi sungah a luttheihna ding leh nuntakna singgah a nektheihna dingun a puan uh a siangin a sawp mite, mi hampha ahi uhhi. 15 Ahi zongin a lampial mite, aisan mite, a paktat mite, mi thatte, milim biate, leh zuaugen nuamsa-in zuau a gengen mite, khuapi pualamah a om uhhi.
Pasian in amaute thupha pia a, Pasian in amaute tungah, "Ci pha-in tampi pha unla, leitung dimin zo un. Tuipi ngasate tung, leitungah a gamtang, a nungtate khempeuh tungah ukna nei ta un," a ci hi.
Tu-in mipa in ama zi Eve luppih a, amah gai-in Kain nei a, "{ Topa' } huhna tawh mi khat ka ngah khin hi," ci hi.
Mi a that peuhmahte pen, midangte in amah that ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in ama lim bangin mi bawl hi.

Isaac in { Topa' } tungah a zi-a' dingin thu ngen hi. Banghang hiam cihleh amah ciing hi. { Topa } in ama thungetna pia a, a zi Rebekah gai hi. 22 Ama sungah a naute kilaigawp hi. Amah in, "Hih bang ahih leh Banghangin nungta se ka hi hiam?" a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin { Topa } kiangah thukan dingin amah pai hi.
Tua zawh kha thum ciangin Judah tungah, "Na monu Tamar paktatin gamta hi. Tua thamloin paktatna tawh naupaii hi," ci-in kigen hi. Judah in, "Amah paikhiatpih un; amah kihaltum hen," na ci hi.
Mi na that kei ding uhhi.

Mite kitawngin numei naupaii khat liamsak a, tatolhin; ahi zongin siatna in a zuihbeh kei nak leh, tuanu' pasal in ama tunga a cihzah tawh kituakin tua numei a liamsak mi kigam ding a, thukhente' khenna bangin amah liau ding hi.

Amah in a tui a dawnsak khit ciangin, tuanu amahmah kininsakin a pasal tungah thuman loin gamta ahih leh, tua tuisia pen ama sungah tumin nasak velval ding a, a pumpi pawmin a pheipi teem ding a, tua numei pen mite lakah hamsiatna-in kizang ding hi. 28 Ahih hangin amahmah a kininsak hiloin a siang ahih leh, tuanu suakta-in ta nei thei ding hi.
A nu' sung panin a suahkhiat ciangin a pum phel langkhat a bei misi bangin Miriam hisak kei in," a ci hi.
Mi na that kei ding uhhi.
Ahi zongin, hih bangin gamtatna tawh { Topa } thusim peuhmahlo na hih manin nang' sung panin a hong piang naungek si ding hi," a ci hi.

Tua hun laitakin Menahem in Tappuah leh a sunga teng khempeuh leh Tirzah pana kipan a gamsungteng a luh hi. Banghang hiam cihleh amaute in ama-a' dingin a kongpite uh honglo uhhi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in luhin, a sunga om numei naupaii khempeuh a phelkham hi.
Amaute in ama kiangah, "Hezekiah in hih bangin ci hi: ‘Tuni pen lungkham ni, hong kitai ni, mindai ni a hihi. Naungekte a suah hun tung a, amaute hin'khiatna ding thatang omlo hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, "Ka nu sung panin guaktangin ka suak a, guaktang mahin ka ciahkik ding hi. { Topa } in hong pia a, { Topa } mah in hong lakik hi. { Topa' } min kiphat ta hen," a ci hi.
"Ka suah ni, leh ‘Pasal naungek khat kipaii hi,’ a kicih zan beimang hen!
Banghangin a hun cing lo-a suakte bang, khuavak a mu manloin a si naungekte bangin hong kiseelcip hoh lo ahi hiam?
Kei a hong piangsak Pasian mah in keima nasemte zong a piangsak a hihi.

"Nangma khut tawh kei hong lomin na hong piangsak a, tu-in nangma khut mah in kei hong lehsuksiat hi. 9 Leivui pana kei nong bawlna hong phawkkik in.
