Leivui mahin hong dengvui kik takpi ding na hi hiam? 10 Kei ka pian'na dingin ka pa' tungah tha na guan' a, ka nu' sungah kei nong khangsak hi. 11 Guh leh thaguite tawh ka pumpi ding nong bawl a, sazang leh vun tawh tua guhte nong tuamsak hi. 12 Kei, nuntakna hong pia-in, nong it tawntung a, nangma hong kepna hangin kei ka nungta hi.

Ahih hangin nang pen gilsung panin kei a hong suaksakpa na hi a, ka nu' ang sungah a muan'huai-in keimah na hong kem hi. 10 Ka suah tunga kipan nangma tungah kong tung a, ka nu in hong paii lai-a kipan keima Pasian na hi hi.
A khialsa mahin kei ka suak a, ka nu in a gil sungah hong paii tunga kipan a mawhsa ka hihi.
En un, tate pen { Topa' } tung pana letsong hi a, tapate pen ama hong piak thupha a hihi.

Banghang hiam cihleh ka pumpi na khempeuh na hong piangsak a, ka nu' gil sungah keimah nong khuituah hi. 14 Kihtak dingin a kilawm na hih manin nang ka hong phat hi. Na nasepnate lamdang mahmah! Nangmah in kei nong lim theih mahmah hi. 15 A thukna sung mun simthamah kei hong kikhuituahin hong kibawl laitakin, ka guh ka taang, na mai-ah kiliahlo hi. 16 A kipiangsak nailo keima pumpi nate na mit in a mu hi. Ka pumpi nate khat beek a om ma, ka ni zah ding a kiciangtan laitakin, tuate khempeuh na laibu sungah kigelh khin hi.

Thah dinga a kikaikhia mipa honkhia in la, sihna ding mun a zuan mipa lehkaih kik in. 12 Ke'n theikha kei ing, na cihnop hangin lungsim a thei Pasian in theitel veve hi; nang hong encik Pasian in hong teltheihna phawk in. Mi khempeuh a gamtatna bangin a thukkik ding hi.
Thu a gen theilo mite-a' dingin thu gensak in la, a huh ding a omlo mite pan'pih in.
Nupi gai khat sungah nuntakna thak bangci kipat hiam, ci-in na theihzawhloh mah bangin na khempeuh a bawl Pasian' nasepna na theizo ngei kei ding hi.
Nangmah a hong bawl, gilsung panin nang a hong piangsak, nang a hong huh ding { Topa } in hih bangin ci hi: Ka nasempa Jacob aw, ka teelsa Israel aw, lau kei in.
Gilsung panin nangmah a hong piangsak, nangmah hong Honpa, { Topa } in hih bangin ci hi: "Keimah in na khempeuh bawlin, keimah guak in vantungte zalin, kuama seppih lohin leitung ka zal hi.
Tuipi gei-a om gamte aw, ka thu ngai un. Gamlapi-a om mihingte aw, ka thu ngai un. Ka suah ma-in { Topa } in kei hong teel a, ka nu sungah ka om lai-in amah in keima min hong pulak khin hi.

Ahih hangin { Topa } in, "Ama sung panin a suak a tapa a hehpihlo ding zahin nupi khat in ama nawi a teep naungek mangngilh thei ding ahi hiam? Hihte nangawn in mangngilhkha thei ding a, ahi zongin keimah in kong mangngilh kei ding hi.
"Gil sungah kong bawl ma-in nang kong thei khinzo hi. Na suah ma-in nang kong teelkhia khinzo a, minam dangte tungah kamsang dingin kong koih khinzo hi," hong ci hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh amah in ka nu' gilsungah kei hong thatlo hi. Hong that hi leh ka nu' gilsung ka han suakpah ding hi.
{ Topa } aw, hih mite tungah na piak ding bang hong ngen ding ka hi hiam? Amaute tatolhsak in la, a nawizu uh kangsak in.
Jacob in a nu sung nangawn pek panin a sanggampa sawk pah a, a khangham ciangin zong Pasian tawh kilai hi.
Israel-te in a Pasian uh lehdo uh ahih manin a mawhna uh thuak ding uhhi. Galsungah amaute si ding uh a, a naungekte uh lei kiden'na ding a, a nupi naupaiite uh kikuikham ding hi, a ci hi.
Gitlohna khang mahmah ding ahih manin ki-itna hong kiam ding hi.
Topa' muhna-ah amah milian khat hi ding hi. Amah in leenggahzu ahi a, khamtheihzu khat peuhpeuh ahi zongin nelo ding hi. A suah pheta kipanin Khasiangtho tawh kidim ding hi.
Na behnu Elizabeth zong thei in. A ciing hi, kici napi-in a teek mahmah zawh nungin nau paii a, tu-in a naupaii zawh kha guk pha ta hi.

Elizabeth in Mary' hopihna awging a zak ciangin a sunga a naupaii a hong diang hi. Elizabeth zong Khasiangtho tawh hong kidim a, 42 nakpi takin kiko-in, "Numei khempeuh lakah thupha ngahpennu na hi a, na neih ding naungek in thupha ngah ding hi. 43 Ka Topa' nu kei kiangah hong hawhna dingin, Banghangin hih bang thu lian kei tungah hong tung ahi hiam? 44 Banghang hiam cihleh nong hopihna awging ka zak phetin ka sunga naungek nuamin a diang hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh mite in, ‘Ta a nei ngeilo, naungek nawi a teepsak ngeilo numei ciingte mi hampha mahmah ahi hi,’ a cih hun hong tung ding hi.
Numei in a ta a suahhun a tun' ciangin na sa ahih manin a dah hi. Ahi zongin a ta a suahkhit ciangin leitungah naungek khat a piangsak khin ahihna hangin lungdamin a natna teng a mangngilh ta hi.
I mipihte na khemgawpin na khelbawl a, a ta ngekte uh a sihna dingin inn panin mun dangah a koihkhia sak hi.
Mihingte in a mawhna leh a gitlohna hangun Pasian' thuman selcip uh ahih manin van panin a hehna hong kilang sakin a gimpiakna dingzia hong kilangsak hi.

Mite in a man ahi Pasian' thu ngaihsutin nei nuamlo uh ahih manin amaute' ngaihsut hoihlo bangin a gamtat theihna dingun Pasian in a khahkhia hi. Tua ahih manin a gamtat dingun a kilawm lopipi-in a gamta uhhi. 29 Siatna nam khempeuh ahi, hoihlohna, huaihamna, khatlekhat kisiatsak nopna, hazatna, mi thahna, kitotna, khemna, a sialam bekbek ngaihsutna, zuau genna,

Ahi zongin Pasian in a hong hehpihna tawh ka suahma pekin kei hong teelin ama na a sem dingin hong sam khin hi. Keimah in ama Tapa hanga lungdamna thu, Gentail mite lakah ka hilhtheihna dingin kei tungah a Tapa hong kilatsak hun laitakin kuama kiangah thudongin ka pai kei a,
Tua numei naupaii hi a, nausuah natna tungta ahih manin na sa-in a kiko hi.
Pasian in amaute thupha pia a, Pasian in amaute tungah, "Ci pha-in tampi pha unla, leitung dimin zo un. Tuipi ngasate tung, leitungah a gamtang, a nungtate khempeuh tungah ukna nei ta un," a ci hi.

Im kei ning. Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } in Abraham' tunga a ciamsa thu a tun'sak theihna dingin ama khita a tate leh a innkuanpihte in thuman leh thutangin nasepna tawh { Topa' } thupiakte a zuih theihna dingun a hilh dingin amah ka teel khin hi," a ci hi.
Rachel in Jacob tawh ta a neih lohna a kimuh ciangin, amah in a sanggamnu eng hi. Amah in Jacob kiangah, "Ta hong pia in, tua ahih kei leh si ning!" a ci hi.
Esau khuadak to-in nupite leh naupangte a muh ciangin amah in, "Nang tawh a om hihte kua ahi hiam?" a ci hi. Jacob in, "Pasian in hehpihna tawh na nasempa a piak tate ahi hi," a ci hi.
Naudomte in Pasian zahtak uh ahih manin amah in amaute tungah suanlekhak a pia hi.

Tuate' mai-ah na kun kei ding uh a, tuate na bia kei ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh keimah note' { Topa } Pasian, a aam Pasian ka hi a, kei hong mudahte' tungah pate' mawhna tate' tungah khang thum khang lina dongin thuk-in
"{ Topa } na Pasian un note hong piak leitang tungah na khan' uh a sau theihna dingin na nu leh na pa uh zahtak un.
Na tate uh tungah limtakin na hilh ding uh a, na innsung uhah na tut uh ciang, lampi-ah na pai uh ciang, na lup ciang uh leh na thawh ciangun tua thute na gengen ding uhhi.
Na tate uh tungah na hilh ding uh a, na innsung uhah na lut laitak, lampi-ah na pai laitak, na lup ciang uh leh na thawh ciangun tuate genin na nei ding uhhi.
"Note' sung pana piangte, leh na leitang uh pana piangte, leh na ganhing uh pana piang, na bawngte uh pungin na tuuhonte uh tungah thupha om ding hi.
"{ Topa } i Pasian in hong lahkhiat loh thusim om a, ahih hangin hih thukham sunga om thute khempeuh i zuih theihna dingin hong lakkhia a, eite leh i suan i khakte' zuih tawntung ding a hihi.

Amah in Hannah a it hangin { Topa } in amah ta neisaklo ahih manin Hannah tungah tanh khat bek a pia hi. 6 { Topa } in amah ta neisaklo ahih manin amah a el a zipih in amah nakpi takin phin zel, hehsak zel hi. 7 Tua ahih ciangin a kumkumin tua bangin hi den uhhi. { Topa' } inn-ah a paitoh simin Peninnah in Hannah phin zel hi. Tua ahih ciangin Hannah kapin an nelo hi. 8 Tua ciangin ama pasal Elkanah in, "Hannah aw, Banghangin kap na hi hiam? Banghangin an nelo na hi hiam? Banghangin na lungsim dah ahi hiam? Kei pen tapa sawm sangin nang-a' dingin hoihzaw hilo ka hi hiam?" a ci hi. 9 Amaute in Shiloh-ah an a nek khit uh ciangin khatvei Hannah ding khia-in biakinn-ah thungen dingin a pai hi. Tua hun laitakin { Topa' } biakinn kongkhak khuam pangah siampi Eli na tu hi. 10 Tuanu nakpi takin lungkhamin { Topa' } tungah thu ngenin nakpi takin a kap hi. 11 Amah in thuciamna khat bawlin, "Vanglian { Topa } aw, nangmah in na nasemnu' gimna nong et takpi a, keimah hong phawkin na nasemnu hong mangngilh loin na nasemnu tungah tapa khat nong piak leh, { Topa' } tungah a khan' tawntungin amah kong pia ding a, ama lu-ah mulkiatna kitahlo ding hi," a ci hi. 12 { Topa' } mai-ah thungenin a om laitakin Eli in tuanu' kam na en hi. 13 Hannah a lungsimah pau hi. A mukte bek lingin a awging kizalo ahih ciangin Eli in tua numei zukhamin ngaihsun hi. 14 Tua ahih ciangin Eli in ama kiangah, "Bang tanvei zu kham ding na hi hiam? Na leenggahzu nek khawl in," a ci hi. 15 Ahih hangin Hannah in dawngin, "Hilo hi, ka topa aw; kei pen nakpi takin a lungkham numei ka hihi. Leenggahzu ahi a, khamtheihzu ahi zongin ka ne kei a, { Topa' } mai-ah ka lungsim a sungkhia ka hihi. 16 Lungkhamna leh gimna tawh a pau ka hih manin numei ginalo bangin na nasemnu hong ngaihsun kei in," a ci hi. 17 Tua ciangin Eli in dawngin, "Nuam takin pai in. Israel-te' Pasian in ama tungah na ngetsa thu hong pia hi," a ci hi. 18 Tua ciangin numei in, "Nangma mitah na nasemnu maipha hong musak in," a ci hi. Tua ciangin tua numei pai-in an ne a, dahmai pua nawnlo hi. 19 Amaute zingsangin tho baihin biakinn-ah { Topa } a biak khit uh ciangin amaute' khua Ramah-a a inn uhah a ciahkik uhhi. Tua ciangin Elkanah in a zi Hannah luppih a, { Topa } in tuanu' thungetna a pia hi. 20 A hun ciangin Hannah gai-in tapa khat nei a, a min Samuel a phuak hi. Banghang hiam cihleh amah in, "{ Topa' } tung panin amah ka nget ahi hi," a ci hi.
Hih naupang ka ngen hi. { Topa } in ama tungah keima ngetna hong pia hi.
Samuel pen saihadial siampipuan silhin { Topa' } mai-ah na a sem naupang khat a hihi.
Tu-in naupang Samuel a pumpi khangin { Topa } leh mite' maipha a ngahtoto hi.
Tu-in, { Topa } ka Pasian aw, kei pen naupangno khat hinapi-in ka pa David' munah kumpi-in na nasempa nong koih hi. Bangci gamtatin bangci nasep ding cih ka theih khat zong omlo hi.
naungekte leh naupangte' kam tawh nangmah phatna la kisa hi. Gal na neih manin galte leh langpangte na daihsakna dingin pan'munkip na bawl khin hi.
Ka suah tunga kipan nangma tungah kong tung a, ka nu in hong paii lai-a kipan keima Pasian na hi hi.
{ Topa } phat un. { Topa } zahtakin a thupiaknate nuam a sa mahmah mi, thupha ngah mi a hihi. 2 Ama suanlekhakte leitungah vanglian ding a, a lungsim thutang mite' suanlekhakte thupha kipia ding hi.
Amah in tasel numei tungah ta guan' a, ta a nei nu a lungdamin a bawl hi. { Topa } phat un.
En un, tate pen { Topa' } tung pana letsong hi a, tapate pen ama hong piak thupha a hihi. 4 Mi khat in a khangno lai-in a neih tate pen galhangpa' khutsunga a om a thaltangte tawh kibang hi.
Ka ta aw, na pa' hong thuhilhna hoihtakin zui in la, na nu' hong thugente ngai in. 9 Tua thuhilhnate in na gamtat hong hoihsak ding a, kizepna lukhu leh kizepna khi bangin hong etlawmsak ding hi.
Midikte in a tu a tate' luah ding gamh nei uh a, mawhneite' neihsate ahih leh midikte-a' ding hi lel hi.
A ta a tai nuamlote a ta mudah hi a, a ta a itte in limtakin thuhilhin a tai hi.
A pa' hilhna a ngai nuamlote mihai hi a, hilhna a mang nuamte mipil a hihi.
Tute pen puteekte-a' dingin minthan'na lukhu hi a, tate pen pate' minthan'na a hihi.
Thu hong man'theih lai-in na ta thuhilh in; na hilh kei leh a siatna ding a deih na hi hi.
A pa nawtgawpin a nu a notkhia tapa pen zumna leh mindaina a piangsak tapa a hihi. 27 thuhilhna a mang nuamlo tapa pen pilna a thei khalo ding tapa a hihi.
Naupangte nangawn mi citak mihoih ahihna a gamtatna panun kimukhia thei hi.
Naupang khat a neulai-in lampi man tawnsak lecin a teek dongin lampial nawnlo ding hi.
Naupangte a hai gamtat a ngeina hi a, deihtakin pangbetna in mihoih suaksak thei hi.
Naupangte sat ding lunghiang kei un; satna hangin silo ding hi. 14 Ciangduai tawh sat le uh cin nuntaklawh zaw ding uhhi.
Nangma pian'na na pa' thu ngai in la, na nu a teek ciangin simmawh bawl kei in.
Ta hoih a nei pa a lung dam ding a, ta pil a nei pa a ta' tungah lungkim ding hi.
Sik in sik mah hiamsak thei a, mi in midang pilsak thei hi. 18 Theikung a cingpa in a theigah ne a, a tapa a kempa in pahtakna ngah hi.
Ciangduai leh tai-na in pilna guan' a, a kikhahkhong ta in a nu maizumsak hi.
En un, { Topa } in kei hong piak ka tate leh keima pumpi pen Zion Mual tungah a teng Vanglian { Topa}' tung panin Israel mite' sungah lim leh kihilna ka hi uhhi.
"{ Topa } in na tapate khempeuh hoihtakin hilh ding a, na tapate daupai mahmah ding uhhi.

{ Topa } in kei hong hopih a, 5 "Gil sungah kong bawl ma-in nang kong thei khinzo hi. Na suah ma-in nang kong teelkhia khinzo a, minam dangte tungah kamsang dingin kong koih khinzo hi," hong ci hi. 6 Tua ciangin keimah in, "Ah, Topa { Pasian } aw, kei thugen ka siam kei a, naupang khat ka hi lel hi," ka ci hi. 7 Ahih hangin { Topa } in, "‘Naupang khat ka hi lel hi,’ ci kei in; Banghang hiam cihleh kong puakna khempeuhte kiangah na pai ding a, kong sawl peuhpeuh na gen ding hi. 8 Amaute kihta kei in; Banghang hiam cihleh nangmah a hong hu dingin ka hong ompih hi, { Topa } in kong ci hi," hong ci hi. 9 Tua ciangin { Topa } in a khut tawh hong zam phei-in ka muk hong lawn'sakin hong hopih hi. "En in, ka thute na kamsungah kong koih khinzo hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh tawlet vang panin sihna hong lut a, kumpipa' innsungah zong sihna hong lut hi. Kongzinga naupangte vatmang a, sumbuka tangvalte vatlum hi.

Pasian in na zite uh tawh pumkhat, lungsim khat ahi dingin hong bawl hilo ahi hiam? Hih bangin a hong bawlna pen bang a deihna ahi hiam? Pasian' mi taktak ahi ding tate i neih theihna ding a hihi. Tua ahih manin na khangno lai-un na ten'pih na zi uh tawh na thuciamna uh na palsatkhak lohna dingun kidawm un.

Zeisu in naupang khat samin amaute mai-ah dingsak a, 3 "A man mahmahin note kiangah kong genin-ah: Note kikheelin naupang na bat kei uh leh vantung ki-ukna sungah na lut ngei kei ding uhhi. 4 Hih naupang bangin a kiniamkhiat mite, vantung ki-ukna sungah a lianpen hi ding hi.
"Hih naupangnote khatpeuh na simmawhkhak lohna dingun kidawm un. Note kiangah kong genin-ah: Amaute a kem vantung mite pen vantungah ka Pa kiangah om tawntung uhhi.
Tua mah bangin vantungah a om na Pa un hih naupangnote khat zong a sih ding a deih kei hi.

Tua ciangin mi pawlkhat in a naupangte uh tungah Zeisu in a khut nga-in thu a ngetsakna ding deihin a naupangte uh a hong paipih uhhi. Ahi zongin a nungzuite in tua mite na taii uhhi. 14 Zeisu in, "Vantung ki-ukna pen naupangte tawh a kibang mite-a' ding ahih manin, tua naupangte ka kiangah hong paipihsak unla, khaktan kei un," a ci hi. 15 Tua ciangin Zeisu in naupangnote tungah a khut nga-in thupha a piak khit ciangin a paikhia hi.

Tua ciangin Zeisu in naupang khat la a, amaute laizangah paipihin a ang-ah tawi a, 37 "Keima hangin hih bang naupangno khat a limbawl mi in kei hong limbawl hi a, kei hong limbawl mi in kei hong limbawl hiloin kei hong sawlpa a limbawl ahi hi," a ci hi.
Zeisu in, "Mi khatpeuh in kei hong um hih naupangno khat a khialsak ding ahih leh a ngawngah an gawina suang lianpi khat kikhihin tuipi sungah kikhia leh ama-a' dingin hoihzaw thampek hi.

Mi pawlkhat in a naupangte uh Zeisu in a lawn'sak ding deih uh ahih manin hong paipih uh a, ahi zongin a nungzuite in na kham uhhi. 14 Zeisu in tua thu a phawk ciangin a heh suak a, a nungzuite kiangah, "Naupangte kham kei unla, ka kiangah hong paisak un. Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian' Ukna sungah hih bang mite a om a hihi. 15 Hih naupangno khat' man' bangin Pasian' Ukna a manglo mi peuhmah Pasian' Ukna sungah omlo ding ahihna thei un," a ci hi. 16 Tua ciangin naupangnote la-in a ang-ah tawi a, a tung uhah a khut nga-in thupha a pia hi.
Tua naupang hong khangin hong thahat hi. Lungpilna tawh kidim a, Pasian in thupha a pia hi.
Zeisu a pumpi leh a pilna khang a, ama gamtatna in Pasian leh mite a lungkimsak semsem hi.
Hih naupangno khat a khialhna ding a pian'sak sangin a ngawngah an gawina suang lianpi khat khihin tuipi sungah kikhia leh ama-a' dingin hoihzaw thampek ding hi.

Zeisu in thupha a piaksak ding a deihna-un mi pawlkhat in a naupangnote nangawn uh Zeisu kiangah hong paipih uhhi. A nungzuite in hih thu a theih uh ciangin amaute na taii uhhi. 16 Ahi zongin Zeisu in naupangnote sam a, "Naupangte hong pai ding khaktan kei un; ka kiangah hong paisak un. Banghang hiam cihleh naupang a bang mite pen Pasian' Ukna sungah om thei bek hi. 17 Ke'n kong cihin-ah, naupang bangin Pasian' Ukna a manglo peuhmah Pasian' Ukna sungah om theilo ding hi," a ci hi.

Tate aw, na nu na pate uh thu na man'ding uh Christian ngeina hi a, ahi ding mah a hihi. 2 Thupiakna a lian khat in, "Na nu leh na pa zahtak in," cihna hi a, khapna thu tawh kizom pahin, "Zahtak lecin nang-a' dingin thu hong hoihin, leitungah na khan' a sau ding hi," na ci pah hi. 3-4 Pate aw, na tate uh a hehtheihna dingin bawl kei unla, Christiante ngeina tawh kituakin taii-in hilhin pantah un.
Tate aw, na nu na pate uh thu man' tawntung ding pen na Christian nasep uh a hihi. Tua bang thuman'na in Pasian lungdamsak hi.
Ahi zongin numei in a kilawm a kituakin upna, itna leh siangthona thu-ah kiptakin a om nak leh nausuah gimna sihpihlo ding hi.
Tua ahih manin a khangno lai meigong numeite in pasal nei-in, ta nei-in, amau innkuansung ukin, i langte' hong gensiatna ding a omlohna ding ka deihzaw hi.
Naungek suakcilte na bang unla, note khangto-in hotkhiatna na ngahtheihna dingun kha thu tawh kisai nawizu siangtho duh belin na nei tawntung un.
Tate bangin ka hong neih mite a mantakin a gamtatna uh ka zakna hangin ka lungdamna sangin adang lungdamna lianzaw bangmah omlo hi.

Tua ciangin Jerusalem kumpipa Melkhizedek in an leh leenggahzu hong pusuah hi. Amah pen Sang Pen Pasian' siampi zong a hihi. 19 Amah in thupha pia a, "Vantung leh leitung a bawl, Sang Pen Pasian in Abram thupha pia hen! 20 Na galte na khutsungah a hong pia Sang Pen Pasian in thupha ngah hen," a ci hi. Abram in na khempeuh sawmah khat ama tungah a pia hi.

Note' omna inn tunga sisan pen note-a' dingin lim hi ding hi. Sisan ka muh ciangin note kong paisan ding a, Egypt leitang ka vatgawp ciangin note hong susia ding gimna note' tungah hong tunglo ding hi. 14 "Hih pen note-a' dingin phawkna ni hi ding a, note in { Topa' } tungah pawi bawlna ni-in na nei ding uhhi. Na khang tawntungun note in biakna ngeina kip khatin na nei tawntung ding uhhi," a ci hi.

Mite, an bek tawh nungta loin { Topa' } kamsung panin a pusuak thu khempeuh tawh nungta hi, ci-in note hong theihsakna dingin, amah in note hong niamkhiatin hong gilkialsak a, note hita leh na pu na pate uhhita leh in a theih ngeiloh manna tawh hong vak hi.

Ahih hangin eite' khialhna hangin amah kiliamsak a, eite' mawhna hangin amah kisatnim hi. Ama gim thuakna hangin nopna i ngah a, ama liamna hangin damna i ngah hi. 6 Eite khempeuh in tuu bangin lam i khial khin a, eite khempeuh eimau san ciatah i pai khin hi. { Topa } in eite khempeuh' mawhnate ama tungah a suan hi.
Mi tampite' mawhna a maina dingin a luangkhia, Pasian' thuciamna a kipsak, ka sisan a hihi.

Tua bangin an a nek laitakun Zeisu in anlum la-in lungdamna a kohkhit ciangin balnenin a nungzuite tungah pia a, "Ne un; hih pen keima pumpi ahi hi," a ci hi. 23 Tua ciangin hai la a, lungdamna a kohkhit ciangin a nungzuite tungah pia a, tua hai panin a dawnkim uhhi. 24 Tua ciangin amaute kiangah, "Hih pen mi tampite-a' dingin a luang, thuciamna thak a kipsak keima sisan a hihi.

Tua ciangin anlum la-in Pasian tungah lungdamna a kohkhit ciangin amaute tungah pia a, "Hih pen note-a' dingin a hong kipia keima pumpi a hihi. Keimah nong phawkna dingun na ne un," a ci hi. 20 Tua mah bangin an a nekkhit uh ciangin amaute tungah hai pia a, "Hih leenggahzu pen note-a' dingin a luangkhia, Pasian' thuciamna thak a kipsak ka sisan a hihi.

"Topa hingkik khin takpi hi. Simon kiangah na kilak khinzo hi," ci-in a kigengen laitak uh a tuak uhhi. 35 Tua ciangin tua mi nihte in zong a lam pai laitak uha thupiang teng, leh anlum a balnen ciangin Topa ahih lamtak a theihnate uh a gen uhhi.
Amaute tawh anne dingin a tut ciangin Zeisu in anlum la a, Pasian tungah lungdamna a kohkhit ciangin balnenin amaute a pia hi.
ahi zongin keima piakding tui a dawn khempeuh dangtak kik nawnlo ding uhhi. Tua ka piak tui a dawnte sungah nuntakna tuinak piang ding a, a nungtasak paisuak ding hi," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Kei pen nuntakna an ka hihi. Ka kiangah hong paite gilkial ngei nawnlo ding a, kei hong umte dangtak ngei nawnlo ding hi.

A mantakin kong genin-ah, kei hong umte bek in nuntak tawntungna ngah hi. 48 Kei pen nuntakna an ka hihi. 49 Na pu na pate un gamsungah manna ne uh a, a vekpi-un si veve uhhi. 50 Ahi zongin vantung panin a hong pai an a ne mi peuhmah silo ding hi. 51 Kei pen vantung panin a hong paisuk nuntakna an ka hihi. Tua an a ne mi peuhmah nungta tawntung ding hi. Leitung mite a nuntakna dingin ka piakding an pen keima sa ahi hi," a ci hi.

Tua ahih manin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, "A mantakin kong genin-ah, Mihing Tapa' sa na nek kei uh a, a sisan na dawn kei uh leh note sungah nuntakna omlo ding hi. 54 Ka sa ne-in ka si a dawnte a nungta tawntung hi a, nitawp ni ciangin ka hingsak ding hi. 55 Banghang hiam cihleh ka sa, an taktak hi a, ka sisan, dawnding tui taktak a hihi. 56 Ka sa ne-in ka si a dawnte pen kei tawh pumkhat ka hi uhhi. 57 A nungta Pa Pasian in kei hong sawl ahih manin ama hangin ka nuntak mah bangin keima sa a ne mite zong keima hang mahin nungta ding hi. 58 Tua ahih manin kei pen vantung panin a hong pai an ka hi a, na pu na pate un ne-in a sih veve-na ante tawh kibanglo hi. Hih kei' hong piak an a nete ahih leh nungta tawntung ding hi," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Keimah in a sisa mite thosakin a hingsak theipa ka hihi. Kei hong um mi peuhmah a sih hangin nungta ding hi.

Zeisu in, "Anlum, meh sungah diahin ka piak dingpa ahi hi," a cih khit ciangin a anlum diahin Simon Iskariot' tapa Judas a pia hi. 27 Judas in tua an a nek khit phetin ama sungah Satan hong lutpah hi. Tua ahih manin Zeisu in ama kiangah, "Na hih ding peuhpeuh hihpak in," a ci hi.
Sani nitakin an nekhawm dingin ka kikhawm uh a, a zingciangin a dingkhia ding ahih manin Paul in a thuhilh zankim ciangdong a zomsuak hi.
Tua ciangin inn dawl tungnungah kahto kikin anlum balnenin thu um mite tawh a nekhawm hi. Zingsang khuavak dong amaute tawh thu kikum uh a, tua ciangin a dingkhia hi.

Nekkhawm bawlna-ah leenggahzu hangin Pasian tungah lungdamna ko-in i dawn ciangin Christ sisan hangin thuphate eite in zong a ngahkhawm cihna hilo ahi hiam? I balnen anlum i nek ciangin zong Christ pumpi hangin thuphate mah a ngahkhawm cihna hilo ahi hiam? 17 Anlum khat bek hi a, eite mi tampi hinapi-in tua lum khat bek mah nekhawm ihih manin eite pumkhat bek mah ihi hi.

Nekkhawmna a bawl dingin note na kikhop uh ciangin Topa' Nekkhawmna a ne dingin na pai kei uhhi. 21 Banghang hiam cihleh nekkhawmna ne dingin na pai uh ciangin pawlkhatte amau' an tawh na tung masa-in ne pah uh ahih manin, pawlkhatte a kham mahmahin na om uh hangin pawlkhatte gilkialin a om uhhi.

Banghang hiam cihleh note kiangah ka hong gen thu pen Topa kiang panin ka ngah thu hi a, tua thu in: Topa Zeisu a kilehhek ding nitakin anlum la-in, 24 Pasian tungah lungdamna a kohkhit ciangin balnen a, "Hih pen note-a' dingin a hong kipia keima pumpi a hihi. Kei na hong phawkna dingun na ne un," ci hi. 25 Tua mah bangin nitak an a nekkhit uh ciangin hai la a, "Hih hai sunga om leenggahzu pen keima sisan tawh a kikipsak Pasian' thuciamna thak a hihi. Hih bangin na dawn simun, kei na hong phawkna dingun na dawn un," ci hi. 26 Banghang hiam cihleh hih bangin anlum ne-in hai sung panin leenggahzu na dawn simun, Topa a hong paikik matengin ama sihna thu a gengen na hi uhhi. 27 Tua ahih manin a kilawm lopi-in Topa' anlum ne-in, a hai panin leenggahzu a dawn mi peuhmah pen Topa' pumpi leh a sisan a mindaisak hi-in a mawh ahi uhhi. 28 Tua ahih manin a kuamah peuh ki-entel masa phot uh hen la, tua khit ciangin Topa' anlum ne-in a hai panin leenggahzu dawn pan ta hen. 29 Banghang hiam cihleh Topa' pumpi a khiatna theilopi-in anlum ne-in hai panin leenggahzu a dawn mi pen amahmah mawhsak thukhenna a kipiatawm a hihi. 30 Tua bang mawhna hangin note tampi tak cina-in na zawngkhal uh a, pawlkhat zong na si uhhi. 31 Eite hoihtakin ki-entel masa peuh lehang Pasian' mawhsak thukhenna i thuak kei ding hi. 32 Ahi zongin eite in hih leitung mite tawh mawhsakna i thuakkhawm lohna dingin Topa in eite hong thuhilhin gim hong pia hi. 33 Tua ahih ciangin sanggamte aw, nekkhawm ne dingin na kikhop uh ciangin kingakkim dimdiam un. 34 Tua bangin na kikhop uh ciangin Pasian' thukhenna na thuakkhak lohna dingun a gilkial na om uh leh zong na inn uhah an ne masa un. Thu dangdangte ahih leh ka hong pai ciangin ka hong gen ding hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Topa' pumpi a khiatna theilopi-in anlum ne-in hai panin leenggahzu a dawn mi pen amahmah mawhsak thukhenna a kipiatawm a hihi.
Tua ahih ciangin sanggamte aw, nekkhawm ne dingin na kikhop uh ciangin kingakkim dimdiam un.

Christ mahmah zong note-a' dingin si a, Pasian' kiangah hong tun'pih theihna dingin mihoih khat pen mihoihlote' mawhna hangin khatvei a si hi. Mite in ama leitung pumpi that a, ahi zongin Pasian in kha nuntakna a pia hi.

Ka itte aw, note na khialhkhak lohna ding uh ka deihna-in hih lai a hong gelh ka hihi. Ahi zongin mi khatpeuh a khialh ciangin eite-a' dingin Pa Pasian kiangah a hong thumsak dingin a thuman Zeisu Christ i nei hi. 2 Tua Zeisu hangin eite' mawhna hong kimaisak a, eite-a' ding bek hiloin leitung mi khempeuh' mawhna zong a maina ding a hihi.
Kongkhakah dingin kong ka hong kiu hi. Ka aw za-in kong hong honte kiangah lutin an ka nekhawm ding uhhi.

Suangdawk khat pen Mikmash mai leilu lamah dawkin a khat pen Geba mai leitaw lamah dawk hi. 6 Tua ciangin Jonathan in ama galhiam a pua tangvalpa kiangah, "Hong pai in; dawibia mi hih khuacingte kiangah va pai ni. { Topa } in eite-a' dingin hong hihsak khading hi. Banghang hiam cihleh hotkhiatna dingin a tam a tawm in { Topa } nawngkaisak lo ding hi," a ci hi. 7 Tua ciangin a galhiam puapa in ama kiangah, "Na lungsim in a sawm khempeuh hih in. Nang tawh ka om a, nang lungsim mah bangin kei' lungsim zong ahi hi," a ci hi.
Na lungsim' deihna amah in hong pia hen la, na geelna khempeuh hong tangtungsak ta hen!
{ Topa' } thungaihsutna kip ngitnget a, ama lungsim ngaihsutna khang tawntungin a kip hi.
{ Topa } in inn lampih kei leh innlamte' sepna a mawkna a hihi. { Topa } in khuapi hutpih kei leh khuapi cingte' cin'na a mawkna a hihi.
Deihna ngahna in lungsim nuamsak a, siat gamtatna panin mihaite pialkhia nuamlo hi.
A kipat cilin a tawpna ding thu ka pulak a, tanglai pek panin a piang nailo nate genin, ‘Ka thugen kip ding a, ka ngimna khempeuh ka tungsak ding hi,’ ka ci hi.
Na bukmun khan' in la, na ten'na puanbukte kizalsak in. Cil bawl kei in. Na khaute sausak in la, na khetphimte khenkip in.
Vantung pen leitung sangin a san'zawk mah bangin, keima paiziate zong, nomau paizia sangin sangzaw a, ka ngaihsutnate zong, nomau ngaihsutna sangin a sangzaw a hihi.
Tua ciangin amaute ciktui sawmlenih leh nisuh kung sawmsagih a omna mun Elim tung uh a, tui gei tua munah amaute in giahphual a sat uhhi.
Note in a ni masa ni-in singkung hoih gahte, nisuh hiangte, a teh tam singhiangpite, leh lui-a gialhekte la-in, { Topa } na Pasian uh pahtawina, ni sagih sung pawi na bawl ding uhhi.
Marah panin dingkhia uh a, Elim tung uhhi. Elim-ah cik tuikhuk sawmlenih leh nisuh kung sawmsagih om a, amaute in tua lai-ah giahphual sat uhhi.
Negeb gam, leh nisuh kung khuapi kuam a kici Jerikho panin Zoar ciangdong a kikhung zanglei a lak hi.
Tua ciangin Moses' sungpate nam ahi Ken' suanlekhakte, Judah mite tawh nisuh khuapi panin Negeb gam Arad gei-a om Judah gamah paito uh a, tua lai munah tungin tua mite tawh a tengkhawm uhhi.
Eglon in Ammon mite leh Amalek mite ama kiangah khawm a, va kuanin Israel-te va zo hi. Amaute in nisuh khuapi a luah uhhi.
Tuanu, Efraim mualtung gamsung Ramah leh Bethel kikal nisuhkung nuai-ah tu zel a, thu a khensak dingin ama kiangah Israel mite hong pai uhhi.

Amah in a sungnung leh a puanung inndeite, a kimkotin inn kawm khempeuh tungah kherub-te leh nisuh kungte leh pakpalhte a bawl hi.32Amah in kherub-te, nisuh kungte, leh pakpalh lim kibawlte tawh oliv sing kongkhak peek nihte a tuam hi; amah in tuate kham tawh zut a, kherub-te leh nisuh kungte tungah kham a theh hi.35Tuate tungah amah in kherub-te leh nisuh kungte leh pakpalhte bawl a, tua a bawlte tungah a tukimin kham tawh a zut hi.
Tua ciangin a kipsaknate leh a khawkte tungah a mun awng zah ciat tawh kizui-in amah in kherub-te, humpinelkaite, leh nisuh kungte gelhin a kimkotah pakkual a bawl hi.
Amah in taaksan tawh innpi kawm dapin kham hoih tawh zut a, tua tungah nisuh leh khainiang a bawl hi.

Tua ciangin tua na a sem dingin mite dingin galmatte la uh a, amaute lakah guaktangin a omte, a vanlakte uh sung pan puante silhsak uhhi. Amaute puan silhsak uh a, khedap kaihte pia-in an leh tui vak uh a, sathau nilh uhhi. Tua ciangin amaute lakah a tha ginalote la tungah pua uh a, nisuh khuapi ahi Jerikho khua amau' behte kiangah paipih uhhi. Tua ciangin Samaria-ah amaute ciahkik uhhi.
nisuh kung bangin thuman mi palh a, Lebanon mualtunga om taamtak kung bangin a khang hi.
Tuum kung bangin na etlawm a, na nawite pen, nisuh gah a bawk pha mahmah tawh a kibang hi.
Hih inndei neute' kawm a pualam pangah tawlet neu om a, inndei kikala om kawm tungah zong a vang neu om hi. Lampi omna lampang, inndei kikala kawmte tungah nisuh kung lim kibawl hi.

A inndei golzaw, a tawlette, leh nisuh kung lim a kibawlte pen nisuahna lam kongpi-a omte mah tawh kibangin kikim hi. Hih lai-ah zong kongpi lampi tun'na dingin kahlei dawl sagih om a, a nawlnunga om a inndei golzaw pen in a tual lam maingat hi.
Tua kongpi lampi tun'na dingin kahlei cial sagih mah om a, a inndei golzaw pen a nawlnung mahah omin a tual lam a nga hi. Lampi omna lampang, kawm sungnungte' tungah nisuh kung lim mah kibawl hi.
A inndei golzaw pen tual puanung lam a nga hi. Lampi pang tuaka kawmte tungah nisuh kung lim kibawl a, hih kongpi lampi tun'na dingin kahlei cial giat a om hi.
A inndei golzaw pen a tual puanung lam nga hi. Lampi pang tuakah a om kawmte tungah nisuh kung lim kibawl a, hih kongpi lampi tun'na dingin kahlei cial giat a om hi.

Hih thute hoihtakin zui le uh cin note-a' dingin hoih ding hi. Na cidam ta un," ci-in kigelh hi.

Mihingte tua zahta-in hailua uh ahih manin amau ututin a gamtat theihna dingun Pasian in khahkhong vet a, a zumhuai mahmahpi-in a gamta uhhi. 25 Amaute in a man ahi Pasian' thu um nuamlo uh a, a tawntungin phat dingin a kilawm a Piangsakpa bialoin, Pasian' bawlsa nate bia-in a zui uhhi. Tu-a bangin hi takpi uhhi. 26 Tua ahih manin amau utna bangin a zumhuaipi-in a gamtat theihna dingun Pasian in a khahkhong hi. A numeite un pasal tawh lupkhop ngeina zangloin a numeipihte mah uh lunggulhin lumkhawm uh a, 27 a pasalte uh zong numei tawh lumkhawm loin pasalte mah lunggulhin lumkhawm uh a, a zumhuaipi-in a gamta uhhi. Tua ahih manin amaute' gamtatsiatna tawh kituakin Pasian in gim a pia hi. 28 Mite in a man ahi Pasian' thu ngaihsutin nei nuamlo uh ahih manin amaute' ngaihsut hoihlo bangin a gamtat theihna dingun Pasian in a khahkhia hi. Tua ahih manin a gamtat dingun a kilawm lopipi-in a gamta uhhi.
Tua bangin a gamtate in sihna thuak ding hi, ci-in Pasian' thukhenna thei napi-in, tua bangin amaute a gamtat uh banah, tua bangin a gamtate pakta-in a awi zawsop lai uhhi.

Tua ahih manin a pasal a nuntak hun sungin pasal dang tawh a lupkhawm leh mi tawh a mawh kici hi. Ahi zongin a pasal a si hi leh thukham tawh kisai-in a suakta hi a, pasal dang a ten'pih hangin mi tawh a mawh hilo hi.

Thukham sungah, "Nulepa mawhna bawl kei in, mi that kei in, guta kei in, hazatna lungsim nei kei in," cihna leh adang khempeuhte pen, "Nang na ki-it bangin na vengte na it in," cihna thu in huam khinmang hi.

Tuhun pen bang hun hita ahi hiam, ci-in theita na hih manun tu-a bangin na gamtat ding uh a hihi. Tu-in note in khua phawkin na khan'lawh ding uh hun hita hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Zeisu Christ i up cil lai hun sangin tu-in Pasian in leitung haksatna panin eite hong hotkhiat ding hun hong naizaw hi. 12 Zan khuamial bei dektak a, sun khuavak hong tung dektak ta hi. Khuamial sunga gamtatnate khawlin khuavak sunga nazatte zam ta ni. 13 Sun khuavak sunga om mite bangin a kilawmin gamta ni. Gualnopna leh zukhamna, mawhna leh thangtatna, kitotna leh kihazatnate-in i hun beisak kei ni. 14 Kidalna dingin, Topa Zeisu Christ' hong piak galhiamte zang unla, na pumpi uh deihna bangin gamtatna ding hun omsak nawn kei un.

Note lakah numei tawh paktatna nasia mahmahin, lawkite nangawn a gamtatlohte na gamtatna uh hong kigen a, mi khat in ama nukik nangawn a luppihna thu ka za hi. 2 Tua bang kimlai bangci kisaktheih ding na hi uhhiam? Note na dah mahmah ding uhhizaw a, tua bang mite pen note lak panin na hepkhiat ding uh a hihi.

Lai ka hong gelhna sungah, numei tawh a paktat mite tawh na kikholhlohna ding uh ka hong gen hi. 10 Tua bang ka hong cih ciangin numei tawh a paktat, a huaiham, a guta, milim a bia lawkite tawh na kikhawl kei un, ka cihnopna hilo hi. Tuate tawh kikhawllo ding ci lehang, leitung panin paikhia un, cihna suak ding hi. 11 Tua ka hong laigelhna sungah ka cihnopna pen, thu upna sungah unau khat hi hang, ci napi-in numei tawh a paktat, a huaiham, milim a bia, mi gensia, zukham, ahih kei leh a guta theite tawh kikhawl kei un, cihnopna a hihi. Tua bang mite tawh an ne ding nangawnin zong na tukhawm kei un.

Migilote, Pasian' Ukna sungah a lut hetlohna ding thu na thei uhhi. Note kihaibawl kei un. Numei tawh a paktatte, milim biate, mi zi ahih kei leh mi pasal tawh a mawhte, pasal leh pasal a khialte, 10 a gutate, a huaihamte, zukhamte, mi gensiate, ahih kei leh mi' na a sutte khat beek, Pasian' Ukna sungah lutthei hetlo ding hi.

"An pen i gilpi-a' ding hi a, gilpi zong an-a' ding mah hilo ahi hiam?" a ci zong omkha ding hi. Ahi zongin Pasian in tuate gel a beisak hun hong tung ding hi. Pumpi pen paktatna-in zatding hilo a, Topa' na sepna-in zatding hizaw hi. Topa in pumpi-a' ding na hong sem hi. 14 Pasian in sihna panin Topa thosak kik hi. Tua mah bangin eite zong ama vangliatna tawh hong thosak kik ding hi. 15 Na pumpi uh, Christ pumpi nate khat ahih lamtak theilo na hi uhhiam? Christ pumpi nate khat la-in numei tawh paktatte' pumpi nate khat suaksak ding ihi hiam? Tuacih ngeiding hi peuhmahlo hi. 16 Numei paktat tawh a pumpi a kizomsakpa pen tua numei tawh pumkhat sakhat a suak ahih lamtak theilo na hi uhhiam? Banghang hiam cihleh Laisiangtho in, "Tua mi nihte pumkhat a suak ding uhhi," na ci hi. 17 Ahi zongin Topa tawh a kizomte pen kha thu tawh kisai-in amah tawh pumkhat ahi uhhi. 18 Numei tawh mawhna na pelh un. Mi khat in a bawl mawhna tuamtuamte in ama pumpi sukhalo hi, a ci om hi. Ahi zongin numei tawh a mawhte, ama pumpi tungah a khial a hihi. 19 Na pumpi uh, Pasian in a hong piak, note' sungah a teng Khasiangtho' biakinn ahih lamtak theilo na hi uhhiam? Note' pumpi, nomau' neihsa hilo a, Pasian-a' a hihi. 20 Note pen Pasian in a hong leisa na hih manun na pumpi uh Pasian' minthan'na dingin na zang un.

Tu-in nong laigelhna uh thu tawh kisai-in: Pasal in zi nei kei leh hoihzaw loding ahi hiam, na ci uhhi. 2 Ahi zongin numei tawh paktatna tamlua ahih manin pasal in ama zi tuam nei hen la, numei in ama pasal tuam nei leh hoih hi. 3 Pasal in a zi a luppih dingin a kilawm zahin luppih ding a, a zi in zong a pasal a luppih dingin a kilawm zahin a luppih ding a hihi. 4 Zi in ama pumpi a ut bangin zangthei nawnloin a pasal' zat ding hi a, tua mah bangin a pasal in zong ama pumpi a ut bangin zangthei nawnloin a zi' zat ding a hihi. 5 Thungetna-in hun na zattheihna dingun tawlkhat sung tuam om ding thukim khawm masa lopi-in lupkhop ding kinialkha kei un. Tua bangin tawlkhat sung na tuam om khit uh ciangin note' pumpi' deihna hangin Satan' ze-etna sungah na pukkhak lohna dingun a ngeina bangin lupkhawm ding kipan kik un.
Amaute pawlkhat bangin numei tawh paktatna i gamta kei ding hi. Nikhat thu-in mi tul sawmnih leh tul thum a si uhhi.

Na tuah uh ze-etnate khempeuh pen mite' tuah ngeingeite mah a hihi. Pasian in citakin a thuciamna lenkip ahih manin note' thuak zawhloh ding ze-etna hong tuaksaklo ding hi. Ze-etna na tuah hun uh ciangin zong na thuakzawhna ding uh thahatna hong guan'ding ahih manin na suahtak zawhna ding uh lampi hong hon'sak ding hi.

Note kiangah ka hong tun' ciangin a beisa hunah note tampi tak thangtatin, numei tawh mawhna, hukna, lannate hangin na khialhnate uh na kisikloh manun keimah dahin kapin, note' muhna-ah ka Pasian in kei hong maizumsak khakding ka lunghimawh mahmah hi.

Khasiangtho' deihna bangin na gamtat uh leh Thukham khutnuai-ah na om nawn kei uhhi. 19 Tu-in mihing pianzia hong kitel a, tuate pen: Numei tawh mawhna, thangtatna, lanluat mana khialhna, 20 milim biakna, mi bumna, kilangbawlna, kitotna, hazatna, hehna, huaihamna, kikhenna, pawltuam lungsim neihna, 21 en'na, zukhamna, leh biakna pawi-ah zukhamna-a kipan adangdangte a hihi. A beisa hunah ka hong hilhkholhsa bangin tu-in ka hong genkikin-ah: Hih bangin a gamta mite pen Pasian' Ukna sungah omkha hetlo ding hi.
Amaute in maizumna mel thei nawnlo uh a, siatna sung tungin, a ututun a kilawm lopipi-in gamta uhhi.
Note pen Pasian' mi na hih manun note lakah nulepa khialhna, a kilawmlo-a gamtatna, huaihamna cihte genin zong na nei vet kei un.

Nulepa khialhna a gamta mi, a kilawmlo-a a gamta mi, leh a huaiham (huaihamna zong milim biakna zahin sia hi) mite in Christ Ukna leh Pasian Ukna sungah bangmah ngah nei hetlo ding ahihna uh teltakin thei ta un.
Khuamial gamtatna, bangmahin a kimanglo nasepnate su vet kei unla, tua bang gamtatnate a hoihlohna pholak zaw un. 12 Kuama theihlohin a simthamin a hihte uh gen ding nangawnin zong zumhuai lua hi.

Note' nuntakna taktak Christ ahih manin amah hong kilat ciangin note zong amah tawh hong kilang khawmin amah tawh na minthang khawm ding uhhi. 5 Tua ahih manin nulepa mawhna, a kilawmlo gamtatna, hukna lanna, a hoihlo lunggulhna, leh milim biakna nam khat ahih manin huaihamna ahi note sungah a om leitung lungsimte na sisak un.

Note a siangtho-in nungta-in numei tunga mawhna tawh na kipelh siangthona ding uh Pasian in hong deih hi. 4 Pasian a theilo dawibiate in kilunggulhna hang bek tawh a pumpi uh a zat bang hiloin, note in a kilawm a siangtho-in na pumpi uh bangci zatding cih thu na theih ding uh hong deih hi. 5, 6 Hih bang thute-ah kuamah in Christ sungah na sanggamte uh tungah na khialhlohna ding uh leh na khasiatsak lohna ding uh hong deih hi. Pasian in hih bangin a gamta mite gim pia ding hi, ci-in khauhtakin note kiangah ka hong genkhol khinzo uhhi. 7 Eite a thanghuai gamtat dingin Pasian in a hong sam hilo a, a siangtho-in a nungta dingin a hong sam a hihi.

nulepa mawhna a gamtate, palepa mawhna a bawlte, mi a gute, zuauthu a gente, mite' siatna ding thu a gente, leh thuman tawh a kilehbulhin a gamta mite-a' dingin thukham a kibawl a hihi. 11 Thuman ka cih pen thupha tawh kidimin a minthang Pasian in ka hilh dingin kei tungah a hong piak Lungdamna Thu a hihi.
Ahi zongin a pumpi uh deihna zui-in a gamta meigong numeite pen a pumpi uh a nuntak hangin kha thu-ah a sikhin ahi uhhi.
Tua ahih manin khangno lunggulhna hoihlote pelh in la, lungsim takpi tawh Topa tungah huhna a ngen mite tawh thuman thutak, upna, itna, kilemna na neihtheihna dingun hanciam khawm un.

biakna thu a puathamteng zui napi-in biakna hangin vangliatna thu a omte deihlo ding uhhi. Tua bangin a gamta mite na pelh in. 6 Tua bang mite pawlkhat, mite inn-ah va hawh khiankhianin, deihna nam tuamtuam leh mawhna lungsim tawh a kidim numeite na thuzawh uhhi.

A hoih takpi mah hiam, ci-in sinna a thuak ciangin a nangzote a hampha mahmah a hihi. Tua bangin a nangzote in, amah a itte tungah Pasian in a piakdingin a ciam nuntakna lukhu a ngah ding uhhi. 13 Mi khat peuhpeuh in tua bang ze-etna a thuak ciangin, "Pasian in kei hong ze-et hi," ci-in ngaihsun kei hen. Siatna in Pasian ze-et ngeilo a, mite a siatna dingin Pasian in zong ze-et ngeilo hi. 14 Mi khatpeuh in ama deihna zui-in a gamtat ciangin mawhna a piangsak a hihi. 15 Lungsim utna a gol semsem ciangin mawhna hong piang a, mawhna hong cingtaak ciangin sihna hong piang hi.
Note a hong sampa a siangtho ahih mah bangin note zong na gamtatna khempeuh uhah na siangtho un. 16 Laisiangtho sungah zong, "Keimah siangtho ka hih manin note zong na siangtho un," na kici hi.
Ka itte aw, hih leitungah gamdang mi, a peempak bangin kingaihsun unla, na kha nuntakna uh tawh a kilehngat pumpi' deihnate na kikham un.

mite a gimsak mah bangun amaute tungah gimna kipia ding hi. A ut bangbangun suntangpi-in gamtat ding nuam a sa uhhi. Tua bang mite in note tawh ankuang hong umkhawmin, a zuau gamtatnate uhah nuamsa-in a om uh pen amaute-a' dingin a zumhuai mahmah a hihi. 14 Numei bekbek etnopin nei uh a, a mawhnopna lungsim uh kam theilo hi. Upna cingtaaklo mite zol belin nei uh a, huaihamna lungsim bekbek a nei uhhi. Tua bang mite, Pasian' samsiat mite ahi uhhi.

Christ in ama pumpi-in thuak ahih manin note in zong tua bang lungsim mah nei-in na kithakhauhsak ding uh a hihi. Banghang hiam cihleh pumpi-in a thuak mite peuhmah, mawhna tawh kisawhkha nawnlo uhhi. 2 Tua ahih manin tu-a kipanin na leitung nuntak sung uh mihingte' deihna bangin gamta loin Pasian' deihna bangin na gamtat ding uh a hihi. 3 A beisa hunah dawibiate' gamtat bangin a hoihkhop khat na gamta khinta uh a, a kilawm loin gamtatna, hukna lanna, zunekna, uangtatna, zukham luatna leh a muhdahhuai milim biakna-in na hun uh na beisak uhhi.
Ahi zongin Pasian kiangah i mawhnate va pulak lehang, amah citakin thuman ahih manin, i mawhnate hong maisakin i hoihlohnate khempeuh hong siangsak ding hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh pumpi deihna, mit tawh mu-in i deihte, leh mite' kisaktheihpih nate ahi leitung nate khempeuh pen Pa Pasian tawh a kizom thu hilo a, leitung tawh a kizom thu a hihi.

Sodom khua leh Gomorrah khua leh a kiima om khuapi mite zong tua vantung mite mah bangin gamta uh a, numei tawh mawhnopna bek thamloin pasal leh pasal kilunggulhna ciangdong nei uh ahih manin midangte' etteh dingin tawntung meikuang a thuak uhhi. 8 Tua mite mah bangin hih mite zong thumu-in kinei-in amau pumpi thanghuaisak uh a, Pasian' thu nialin tunglama om minthan'na a neite a simmawhbawl uhhi.

Ahi zongin note ka hong mawhsakna ding thu tawmkhat a om hi. Milim biakna ante nesakin, nulepa paktatna piangsak a, Israel mite mawhna a gamtasak Balak tungah thu a hilh Balaam' thuhilhnate a um mi pawlkhat note lakah a om hi. 15 Tua mah bangin Nicolas pawlte' thuhilhna a um mi pawlkhat zong note lak mahah a om hi. 16 Tua ahih manin na mawhna panun kisikkik un. Na kisik kei uh leh note kiangah kei hong pai baihin, ka kam panin a pusuak namsau tawh amaute ka do ding hi.

Ahi zongin note ka hong mawhsakna ding thu khat om hi. Kamsang numei ka hi, ci-in thu a gen Jezebel na nial kei uhhi. Ama thuhilhna hangin ka nasemte in numei-pasal paktatna gamta-in milim biakna ante a ne uhhi. 21 Tua numei a kisikkikna ding hun ka piak hangin a paktatna panin kihei nuamlo hi. 22 Tua ahih manin tu-in tua numei tawh a paktatna uh panin a kisikkik kei uh leh tua numei leh amah tawh a paktat mi khempeuh, lupna ngaksakin nakpi takin gimna ka thuaksak ding hi. 23 Tua numei' thu a zui mi khempeuh ka that ding hi. Tua hi leh, mihingte' ngaihsutna leh lungsim a kantelpa ka hihna thu pawlpi khempeuh in thei ding uhhi. Note' gamtatna ciat tawh kizui-in ka hong thukkik ding hi.
Ahi zongin a meidawite, a lehtatte, a lampialte, mi thatte, a paktatte, aisante, milim biate, leh zuaugente omna ding mun pen sihna nihna ahi kat a kikhulna meiphualpi kuang sung ahi hi," a ci hi.

Khuapi kulhkongpi sungah a luttheihna ding leh nuntakna singgah a nektheihna dingun a puan uh a siangin a sawp mite, mi hampha ahi uhhi. 15 Ahi zongin a lampial mite, aisan mite, a paktat mite, mi thatte, milim biate, leh zuaugen nuamsa-in zuau a gengen mite, khuapi pualamah a om uhhi.

Kei pen { Topa } na Pasian uh ka hihi. Tua ahih ciangin note ki-ap unla, kei siangtho ka hih manin note zong siangtho un. Leitungah a bokvak a hontat ganhing khat peuhpeuh tawh note na kininsak tawm kei ding uhhi. 45 Banghang hiam cihleh note' Pasian ahi dingin Egypt gam panin note a hong pai khiatpihpa pen keimah { Topa } ka hihi. Tua ahih ciangin kei siangtho ka hih manin note na siangtho ding uhhi," a ci hi.
"Israel mihonte khempeuh kiangah hih bangin gen in: Note na siangtho ding uhhi; Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } note' Pasian keimah ka siangtho hi.
Tua ahih ciangin note ki-ap unla siangtho un; Banghang hiam cihleh kei pen { Topa } na Pasian uh ka hihi.

"Na mit un a muhsa nate na nuntak sungun mangngilh kha-in, na lungsim panun paikhia khading ahih manin limtakin ngaihsunin hoihtakin kikem un. Horeb-a { Topa } na Pasian uh mai-ah na din' ni-un { Topa } in kei kiangah, ‘Leitungah a nuntak laiteng uh amaute in kei hong kihtakna ding leh amaute in a tate uh a hilhsawn theihna dingun keimah in amaute tungah ka thute ka zaksak theihna dingin ka kiangah mite hong khawm in,’ hong cihna thu, na tate uh leh na tate uh tate' tungah kitheisak un.

Jordan galkhatah a luah dingin na paina uh gamah na nuntak laitengun amaute in a thu za-in { Topa } na Pasian uh zahtak ding a theihna ding, leh hih thukham thute khempeuh limtakin a sep theihna ding, leh hih thu a thei nailo amau' tate in { Topa } na Pasian uh zahtak ding a theihna dingun, numei, pasal, leh naupangte, leh na khuapite uh sunga om peemtate, mi khempeuh khawm un," a ci hi.

Zeisu in amaute kiangah, "Kei hong zui un; nga mat bangin pawl tampi a ngah thei mi kong suaksak ding hi," ci hi. 20 Amaute gel in zong a ngente uh nusia-in Zeisu a zui pah uhhi. 21 Tua lai panin a paikhiat khit uh ciangin Zebedi tapa James leh Johan-te unau, a pa uh tawh gunkuang sungah ngen puahin a om mu leuleu a, amaute gel zong a sam hi. 22 Amaute gel in zong gunkuang leh a pa uh nusia-in Zeisu a zui pah uhhi.

"Note pen leitung mite-a' dingin khuavak tawh na kibang uhhi. Mual dawnah a om khua kiseelcip theilo hi. 15 Mei a vak khit ciangin kuamah in lawh khuhlo hi. Meivakna mun sangah koihzaw a, innsung khempeuh a taangsak hi. 16 Midangte in na gamtatna hoihte uh a muh ciangin vantungah a om na Pa uh min a phat theihna dingun mite mai-ah na gamtat hoihna uh khuavak bangin na kilangsak un.

Tua ciangin amah a zui midang khat in, "Topa aw, kei hong ciahsak in la, ka pa hong vuisak masa in," a cihleh 22 Zeisu in, "Nangmah in kei hong zui in la, misi bang ahi mite in misite a vui dingun nusiat in," ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua lai mun panin Zeisu a paikhiat ciangin siahdongpa Matthew a zumah tu-in a om mu a, "Hong zui in," a cihleh amah zong dingin a zuipah hi.
"A siapa sangin a sang naupangte lianzaw ngeilo a, a topa sangin a silate lianzaw ngeilo hi.
"Keima mi ahihna thu mite' theihin a genkhia mite, kei zong vantungah ka Pa' mai-ah keima mi ahihna thu ka gen ding hi.
"Kei sangin a nu a pa a itzawte kei tawh kilawmlo a, kei sangin a tapa a tanu a itzawte kei tawh kilawmlo hi. 38 Ama singlamteh mah puatawm lopi-in ka nung hong zuite kei tawh kilawmlo hi.

Tua ciangin Zeisu in a nungzuite kiangah, "Mi khatpeuh ka nungzui a suahnop leh, ama deihna bangin gamta nawnloin, a singlamteh kisuanin hong zui ding hi. 25 Hih a leitung nuntakna a hu nuamte in a nuntakna bulpi nangawn tawh suplawh ding a, keima hangin hih a leitung nuntakna a suplawhte in a nuntakna bulpi huzo ding hi.

Zeisu in, "Mi cingtaak na hihnop leh pai-in na neihsate va zuak in la, na sum khotte, mizawngte tungah va pia lecin, vantungah sum na hau ding hi. Tua ciangin hong pai in la kei hong zui in," a ci hi.

Ahi zongin note lakah tua bang hilo ding hi. Note lakah a lian ahi dingte note' nasem hi ding a, 27 note' lakah a lianpen ahi dingte note' sila hi ding hi. 28 Mihing Tapa zong nasem nei dingin hong pai hiloin mi dangte-a' ding na semin, mi tampi tatna ding a si dingin a hong pai ahih mah bangin note zong a tuaci ding na hi uhhi," a ci hi.

Nungzui sawmlekhatte zong, Zeisu in a gensa bangin Galilee gama mualtungah a pai uhhi. 17 Amaute in Zeisu a muh uh ciangin bia uh a, ahi zongin pawlkhat in umzo taktaklo uhhi. 18 Tua ciangin amaute mai-ah Zeisu hong pai a, "Leitungah ahi a, vantungah ahi zongin vangliatna khempeuh kei tungah hong kipia khinta hi. 19 Tua ahih ciangin note pai unla, midang khempeuh, keima nungzui mi suaksakin, Pa min, Tapa min, leh Khasiangtho min tawh tui sungah na phum un. 20 Tua ciangin note tungah ka hong gen thute khempeuh a zuihna dingun na hilh un. Hun bei dongin note a hong ompih tawntung ding ka hihna thu phawk ta un," a ci hi.

Galilee Tuili gei tawnin Zeisu a pai laitakin, Simon leh a nau Andru, ngabengte ahih manun, ngen tawh nga khuhin a om a mu hi. 17 Zeisu in amaute gel kiangah, "Kei hong zui un; nga mat bangin mi tampi a huaite kong suaksak ding hi," a ci hi. 18 Amaute gel in zong a ngen uh nusia-in Zeisu a zuipah uhhi. 19 Tawmkhat a pai khit ciangin Zebedi' tapa James leh a nau Johan zong, a gunkuang tung uhah a ngen uh khui-in a om a mu leuleu hi. 20 Zeisu in amaute a muh phetin sampah a, amaute gel in zong a pa uh Zebedi leh a thacialte uh nusia-in Zeisu' nung a zui uhhi.
Tua bangin a paina-ah Alfeas tapa Levi, a siahdon'na zumah tu-in a om a mu hi. Zeisu in ama kiangah, "Kei hong zui in," a ci hi. Levi zong dingin Zeisu' nung a zuipah hi.

Tua lai panin a mualtung lamah Zeisu paito a, mi a deihteng ama kiangah a sam hi. Tua a sap mite ama kiangah hong pai uh a, 14 amah in mi sawmlenih teelin, sawltakte, ci-in min a phuah hi. Zeisu in, "Kei tawh a kikhawl dingin noteng ka hong teel hi. Thu a hilh dingin zong ka hong sawl ding a, 15 dawi hawlkhiatna ding vangliatna na nei ding uhhi," a ci hi.
Amaute kiangah, "Ciangkhut simloh, na khualzinna uhah bangmah keng kei un. An ahi a, ip ahi a, sum ahi zongin keng kei un.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in mihonpite leh a nungzuite ama kiangah sam a, "Mi khatpeuh ka nungzui a suahnop leh ama deihna bangin gamta nawnloin a singlamteh kisuanin hong zui ding hi.

Tua ciangin Zeisu in itna tawh tua mipa enin, "Na khat bek na kisam lai hi. Pai in la, na neih khempeuh na zuak khit ciangin mizawngte tungah na sumkhotte va pia in. Tua hi leh vantungah sum na hau ding hi. Tua khit ciangin ka nung hong zui in," a ci hi.
Amah in Israel mi tampi tak, amau' Topa Pasian' kiangah tun'pihkik ding hi.
Tui gei-ah a gunkuangte uh a tun'pih khit uh ciangin a na khempeuh uh nusia-in Zeisu a zui uhhi.

Ni khat, thungen dingin mualtungah Zeisu pai a, zan tawntung Pasian kiangah thu ngenin a om hi. 13 Khua a vak ciangin a nungzuite sam a, amaute sung panin sawmlenih teelkhia-in sawltakte ci-in min a phuak hi.
Sang naupang khat a siapa sangin lianzaw ngeilo hi; a sin ding khempeuh a theihkhit ciangin a siapa tawh kikim pan bek ding hi."
Tua ciangin Zeisu in a nungzuite leh mi khempeuh kiangah, "Mi khatpeuh in kei hong zuihnop leh ama deihna bangin gamta nawn loin nisimin a singlamteh pua-in hong zui ding hi.

Lampi-ah a pai laitakun mi khat in Zeisu kiangah, "Na paina khempeuhah kong zui ding hi," a ci hi. 58 Zeisu in, "Ngiate in lupna ding kua nei uh a, vasate in zong giahna ding bu nei uhhi. Ahi zongin Mihing Tapa in a luptheihna ding mun koimahah neilo hi," a ci hi. 59 Tua ciangin Zeisu in midang khat kiangah, "Kei hong zui in," a ci hi. Ahi zongin amah in, "Topa aw, kei hong ciahsak in la, ka pa hong vuisak masa in," a ci hi. 60 Ahi zongin Zeisu in, "Misi bang ahi mite in misite na vui ta hen. Nang ahih leh va pai in la Pasian' Ukna thu va hilh in," a ci hi. 61 Tua ciangin midang khat in, "Topa aw, nang ka hong zui ding hi. Ahi zongin ka inn-ate, mangpha hong khasak masa in," a ci hi. 62 Zeisu in ama kiangah, "Bawng lokhawhna lenkawmin a nunglam a en mi pen Pasian' Ukna tawh kituaklo hi," ci-in a dawng hi.
Tu-in thei un. Gulpi leh momaite na sikgawpna ding uh leh na galte uh na zawhna dingun note tungah vangliatna ka hong piazo a, amaute in note bangmah hong cih zolo ding uhhi.
Banghang hiam cihleh a hun a tun' ciangin Khasiangtho in na gen dingteng uh hong hilh ding hi," a ci hi.

Mi tampi tak in Zeisu hong zui uh a, Zeisu zong kihei-in amaute kiangah, 26 "Kei kiangah a hong pai mite peuhmah in a nu leh a pa, a zi leh a ta, a sanggam numeite leh a sanggam pasalte, leh ama pumpi mahmah a nial ngam kei leh keima nungzui suak theilo ding hi. 27 Ama singlamteh mah puatawmin ka nung hong zuilote, keima nungzui hi theilo hi.
Tua mah bangin mi khat in a neih khempeuh a piakkhiat ngam kei leh keima nungzui suak theilo ding hi.

Zeisu in hih thu a zak ciangin ama kiangah, "Na khat na kisam lai hi. Na neihsa khempeuh zuak in la, mizawngte tungah na sum khotte pia in. Tua hi leh vantungah na hau ding hi. Tua khit ciangin ka nung hong zui in," a ci hi.
Zeisu in, "Hong pai unla, ka omna mun hong mu un," a na ci hi. Amaute gel in zong Zeisu va zui uh a, a omna mun a va mu uhhi. Tua hun pen nitak nai li hun pawl ahih manin ama kiangah a giak uhhi.
A zingciangin Zeisu in Galilee gamah pai ding ngaihsun hi. Philip tawh kituak a, ama kiangah, "Hong zui in," a ci hi.
Kamsangte in a lai gelhna uhah, ‘Pasian in mi khempeuh a hilh ding hi,’ na ci uhhi. Tua ahih manin Pa kiang panin thu za-in a thei mi khempeuh ka kiangah a hong pai a hihi.

Tua ahih manin Zeisu in a nungzui sawmlenihte kiangah, "Note zong na ciahkik nuam mai uhhiam?" a cih ciangin 68 Simon Peter in, "Topa aw, ciah le ung kua kiang zuan mawk ding ka hi uhhiam? Nangmah in nuntak tawntungna ding thu na nei hi. 69 Tu-in nang ka hong um uh a, Pasian kiang panin a hong pai a Siangtho Pa na hihna thu ka hong thei uhhi," ci-in a dawng hi. 70 Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Note na sawmlenih mahun ka hong teel hinapi-in khat pen dawi na suakmawk uhhi," a ci hi. 71 Sawmlenihte sung panin amah a lehpei ding ahih manin Simon Iskariot' tapa Judas thu a genna a hihi.

Tua ahih manin amah a um Jew mite kiangah Zeisu in, "Ka thuhilhnate na zuih paisuak nak uh leh ka nungzui taktakte na hi ding uhhi. 32 Tua ciangin thuman na thei ding uh a, tua thuman in note hong suaktasak ding hi," a cihleh
Keima tuute in ka aw za-in thei uh ahih manin kei hong zui uhhi.

Tua ahih manin hih leitung nuntakna a itte in a nuntakna taktak taanlawh ding a, hih leitung nuntakna a itlote in nuntakna taktak nei tawntung ding hi. 26 Ka nasemte keima omna-ah a omtheihna dingin ka na a sem nuam peuhmah in kei hong zui ding uh a, ka Pa in ka na a sem mite a pahtawi ding hi," a ci hi.

Zeisu in amaute' khe a silsak khit ciangin a puan silhkik a, annek sabuai-ah a tutnasa mun hong zuanin, "Tu-a note tungah ka hong gamtatna thu na thei uhhiam? 13 Note in kei pen Siapa, leh Topa, na hong ci uhhi. Na hong cih uh mah bangin a man ka hihi. 14 Note' Topa leh Siapa in na khe uh hong silsak ka hih leh note khatlekhat na kisilsak kan ding uh kilawm hi. 15 Note tungah ka hong gamtat bangin note na gamtat theihna dingun a lim a hong lak ka hihi. 16 A mantakin ci lehang, sila pen a topa sangin lianzaw ngeilo a, a kisawlpa zong a sawlpa sangin lianzaw ngeilo hi. 17 Hih thu thei-in na zuih uh leh na lung uh nuam mahmah ding hi.

Note tungah ka hong piak thak thu in: Note khatlekhat na ki-it ding uh a hihi. Note ka hong it mah bangin note khatlekhat na ki-it un. 35 Note khatlekhat ki-it le uh cin keima nungzuite na hihna uh mi khempeuh in hong thei ding uhhi," a ci hi.
Keima thupiakte sangin a zuite in keimah hong it ahi uhhi. Kei hong it mite pen ka Pa in zong it ding a, keimah in zong itin amaute tungah ka kilang ding hi," a ci hi.
Ahi zongin Pa in keima tangin a hong sawl ding Huhpa Khasiangtho a hong tun' ciangin note tungah thu khempeuh hong hilh ding a, note tungah ka hong gensa thu khempeuh zong hong phawksakkik ding hi.
Gah tampi gah le uh cin ka Pa' minthan'na a kilangsak na hi ding uh a, keima nungzui na hihna uh kilang ding hi.

Tua ahih manin thuman hong lak ding Khasiangtho hong tun' ciangin thu khempeuh a manin hong hilh ding hi. Ama ngaihsuttawm thu hong gen ding hilo a, ama tungah a kigen thute leh a hong tungding thute a hong gen ding a hihi.

An a nekkhit uh ciangin Zeisu in Simon Peter kiangah, "Johan' tapa Simon aw, hih adang khempeuhte' hong it sangin kei na hong nak itzaw hiam?" ci-in a dot ciangin amah in, "Topa aw, ka hong itzaw hi. Nang ka hong itna na thei hi," ci-in a dawng hi. 16 Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Ka tuunote na kem in," a ci hi. Tua ciangin Zeisu in a nihveina dong leuleu a, "Johan' tapa Simon aw, kei na hong it hiam?" ci-in a dot ciangin, "Topa aw, nang ka hong it a, ka hong itna thu na thei hi," a cih ciangin, "Ka tuute na kem in," a ci leuleu hi.

Ahi zongin note tungah Khasiangtho hong tun' ciangin vangliatna tawh na kidim ding uh a, Jerusalem khuasung, Judea gamsung, Samaria gamsung, leh leimong dongin note in keima thu na gen ding uhhi," ci-in a dawng hi.

Tua ahih ciangin sanggamte aw, Pasian in eite tam veipi tak hong hehpih ahih manin ama lungkimna ding leh ama nasepna dingin nomau mahmah a hingtangin Pasian tungah na kipiakna dingun ka hong thum hi. Tua banga kipiakna pen Pasian biakna man taktak a hihi. 2 Leitung mihingte' gamtat bangin gamta kei unla, na lungsim uh kikheelin Pasian kipuahpha sak un. Tua hi leh a hoih nate bang hi a, bangte in amah lungkim sakin, bangte a kicing hiam ci-in thei-in Pasian' deihna na phawk thei ding uhhi.

Ama-a' ding bekin kuamah nungtalo a, ama-a' ding bekin kuamah silo hi. 8 I nuntak leh Topa-a' dingin a nungta ihi a, i sih leh zong Topa-a' ding mahin a si ihi hi. Tua ahih manin i si a, i hing zongin Topa-a' ihi hi.

Tua ahih manin hih bangin thu ka hong gen uh ciangin zong, mihingte' hong hilh pilna kamte a zang hiloin, Khasiangtho a nei mite tungah kha tawh kisai thu ka gen uh ciangin Khasiangtho in a hong hilh kammalte zangin a gen ka hi uhhi.
Kote pen Christ' nasem, leh Pasian' thusim a zeekte-in nong ngaihsut ding uh a hihi.

Sanggamte aw, note-a' ding ka ngaihsutna-in hih thu khempeuh Apollos leh keima pumpi tungah ka zat uh thu a hihi. "A khengvalin gamta kei un," cihna thu na theihna dingun kote gel, etteh dingin ka hong zang hi. Note in mi khatpeuh kisaktheihpihin mi khatpeuh na simmawhbawl kei ding uhhi.
Keimah in Christ gamtatzia ka zuih mah bangin note in zong keima gamtatzia hong zui ta un.

Ama hangin a nungtate, amau-a' dingin nungta nawnloin, amau' hangin si-in a kihingkik sakpa-a' dingin a nuntak theihna dingun mi khempeuh-a' dingin amah a hong si hi. 16 Tua ahih manin kote in mihingte' ngeina zia tawh kuamah ka en nawn kei uhhi. Christ mahmah zong mihing lungsim ngaihsutna zia tawh ka et ngei uh hangin tu-in tua bangin ka ngaihsun nawn kei uhhi. 17 Tua ahih manin mi khatpeuh, Christ tawh a kipawl ciangin mi thak suak a, a mi lui ngeina bei-in a mi thak ngeina a neita a hihi.
Tua ahih ciangin kote pen Christ tangin nasem ka hi uh a, Pasian in kote zangin note tungah thu a hong gen a hihi. Pasian tawh kilemin pawlkhatin na omna dingun Christ tangin a hong thum ka hi uhhi.

Kote hong kisatin, thongah hong kikhia-in, mihonpi in hong hihgawp uhhi; nakpi takin na semin, an nelo, ihmulo liangin ka om uhhi. 6 Siangtho takin nuntakna, thu theihna, lungduaina, migitna, Khasiangtho' huhna, itna taktak neihna, 7 thuman genna, leh Pasian' nasemte ka hihna uh, Pasian' vang tawh ka kilangsak uhhi. Kote in kihutna ding leh galsimna dingin hiamin thuman ka zang uhhi. 8 Kote hong kipahtawi-in hong kimindaisak zel a, hong kisimmawh bawlin zong hong kiphat zel hi. Thuman gen hinapi-in zuaugen bangin hong kingaihsun a, 9 mi khempeuh in hong theih hinapi-in theihloh mi bangin hong kibawl a, nong theih uh mah bangin kote a nungta hinapi-in misi bangin hong kingaihsun hi. 10 Dahna ka thuak uh hangin ka lungdam uh a, kote a zawng tawh kibang napi-in mi tampi ka hausak uh a, bangmah a nei hetlo tawh kibang napi-in a taktakin ka neihloh uh bangmah omlo hi.

Khasiangtho' deihna bangin na gamtat uh leh Thukham khutnuai-ah na om nawn kei uhhi. 19 Tu-in mihing pianzia hong kitel a, tuate pen: Numei tawh mawhna, thangtatna, lanluat mana khialhna, 20 milim biakna, mi bumna, kilangbawlna, kitotna, hazatna, hehna, huaihamna, kikhenna, pawltuam lungsim neihna, 21 en'na, zukhamna, leh biakna pawi-ah zukhamna-a kipan adangdangte a hihi. A beisa hunah ka hong hilhkholhsa bangin tu-in ka hong genkikin-ah: Hih bangin a gamta mite pen Pasian' Ukna sungah omkha hetlo ding hi. 22 Ahi zongin Khasiangtho' sawlna bangin gamtatnate pen: Itna, lungdamna, lungnopna, lungduaina, migitna, hoihna, cihtakna, 23 dikna, leh pumpi ki-ukzawhna hi a, hih bangin a gamta mite, Thukham in bangmah cih theilo hi. 24 Tua hi a, Zeisu Christ a zui mite in a leitung lungsim pianzia uh leh a leitung lungsim deihna khempeuh uh a phiat khitsa a hihi. 25 Khasiangtho in eite hong nungtasak khinta ahih manin ama hong sawlna bangin eite a nungta ding ihi hi. 26 Kuamah kiphasak loin, khatlekhat kiphin loin, kuamah i kihaza kei ding hi.
Ama mai-ah eite pen paubaan'na a neilo, mi siangthote ahi ding leh Christ hangin ama mite ahi dingin leitung a pian'ma pek nangawnin Pasian in a hong teelsa ihi hi.

i Topa Zeisu Christ' Pasian ahi, a minthang Pa Pasian in note tungah Khasiangtho hong pia-in, tua Khasiangtho in note tungah lungpilna hong pia-in, note in Pasian na theihna dingun note tungah Pasian hong kilatsakna dingin thu ka hong ngetsak niloh hi.

Amah in mite tungah siamna a tuamtuam hong pia a, pawlkhatte sawltak nasep a semding, pawlkhatte kamsang nasep a semding, pawlkhatte thuhilh kawikawi nasep a semding, pawlkhatte pawlpi kem nasep a semding, leh pawlkhatte laihilh nasep a semdingin a hong seh hi.

Note pen khuamial sungah a omngei hinapi-in, Topa' mi na suahkhit uh ciangin khuavak sungah a om hita na hih uh manin khuavak sungah a om mite bangin na gamta un. 9 Banghang hiam cihleh khuavak sunga omna in a hoih, a man, a thutakte hong piangsak hi. 10 Bangteng in Topa lungkimsak ahi hiam, ci-in kan un. 11 Khuamial gamtatna, bangmahin a kimanglo nasepnate su vet kei unla, tua bang gamtatnate a hoihlohna pholak zaw un. 12 Kuama theihlohin a simthamin a hihte uh gen ding nangawnin zong zumhuai lua hi. 13 Na khat peuhpeuh khuavakah pusuah lehang a pian'zia man taktak hong kilang hi.
Keima genna leh ka gamtatna panin thei-in na san' uh thute, nomau pumpi mahmah tawh na zui un. Tua hi leh nopsakna a hong piathei Pasian in note hong ompih ding hi.
Tua ahih manin a milip tungah Christ' thu ka hilh uh a, Christ tawh a kipawlna uh hangin a milipin a khangcingin Pasian' omna-ah ka tun'pih theihna dingun a milip tungah hilhin ka genkhol uhhi.
Pasian in note hong itin, hong teelin, ama mi siangthote hikhin na hih manun note pen hehpihna nei-in, migi-in, kiniamkhiatin, dikin, na lungduai ding uh a hihi.
Topa in note tungah thaman a hong piakding lamtak phawk gige un. Tua bangin na sepna uhah Christ Topa' na a semsem na hi uhhi.

Note hong it mahmah ka hih manun Pasian kiang panin a hong pai Lungdamna Thu bek hong genloin, kote' nuntakna mahmah zong note-a' dingin a pia ngamin ka om uhhi. Tua ahih manin kote' hong muhna-ah note a manpha mahmah na hi uhhi.
Kote' gamtatzia bangin a gamta ding na hihna uh teltakin na thei uhhi. Note tawh ka hong omkhawm lai-un ka thadah om kei uhhi.
Hih bangin thupiakna pen, upna taktak leh kisuan'na om hetloin lungsim siangtho taktak tawh ngaihsutna panin a hong piangkhia ki-itna a khan'theihna ding deihna a hihi.

Meigong numei khatpeuh in tate ahi a, tute ahi zongin a neih leh innkuan sungah biakna tawh kisai-in tavuan a neihna uhhilh in la, a nu a pa, a pu a pite a huhna dingun gen in. Hih bang gamtatna pen Pasian' muhna-ah a hoih thu a hihi.

Mi tampite' theihin ka thuhilh, na zaksa thu khempeuh, midangte a hilhsawn thei dingin a citak mite tungah hoihtakin a zuih dingun na hilh in. 3 Christ Zeisu' galkap hoih hihna tawh thuakdingin a kisam khempeuh na na thuak in. 4 Galkap a semlai mipa in ama tungah a om bupa a lungkimsak theihna dingin na sem ahih manin tualsung mite' nasep tawh thuahkhawm lo hi.
I mite ommawk loin, thu kisam a phamawhte huh thei-in, na hoih na phate a septheihna dingun na hilh in.

Na makaite uh thu na mang unla, a genna uh bangin na gamta un. Pasian kiangah amaute in a nasepnate uh a pulak ding uh ahih manin tawlnga loin note hong lunghimawh tawntung uhhi. Amaute' thu mang le uh cin a nasepna uhah lungdam mahmah ding uh a, mang kei le uh cin dahpipi-in na sem ding uhhi. Dahpipi-in a nasepna uh note-a' dingin zong phattuamna a om tuan hilo hi.

Vantung panin a hong kisawl Khasiangtho' vangliatna tawh thu a gen thupuakte' tung panin na zak uh Thute mah kamsangte in a gen laitakun, tua a thugente uh amaute-a' ding hiloin note-a' ding ahihna thu, Pasian in tua kamsangte tungah a na genzo hi. Vantung mite nangawn in hih thute a theihtelnop khat uh a hihi. 13 Tua ahih manin na lungsim uh ki-ukin a kigingsa-in om unla, Zeisu Christ hong kilat ni ciangin na ngahding uh hehpihna thupha ngaihsutin nei un. 14 Pasian' thu na mang unla, na theih nailoh uh hun lai-in na gamtat ngei uh bangin na gamta nawn kei un. 15 Note a hong sampa a siangtho ahih mah bangin note zong na gamtatna khempeuh uhah na siangtho un. 16 Laisiangtho sungah zong, "Keimah siangtho ka hih manin note zong na siangtho un," na kici hi.

Ahi zongin note pen Pasian in a hong teelkhiat minam, Kumpi siampi pawl, a siangtho minam, Pasian' mite na hi uh a, khuamial sung panin a lamdang mahmah ama khuavak sungah a hong samkhiapa' nasepna a lamdangte a genkhia dingin Pasian in a hong teel mite na hi uhhi. 10 Nidangin Pasian' mi na hihloh uh hangin tu-in ama mi na hi uh a, nidangin Pasian' hehpihna na theihloh uh hangin tu-in ama hehpihna na ngah uhhi.
Christ mahmah in zong note-a' dingin thuakin, ama khekhap na zuihtheihna dingun etteh ding lim hong nusiat ahih manin hih bangin a thuakding mahin Pasian in note a hong sam a hihi.
Eite in ama thupiaknate i zuih leh amah a thei taktak ihihna hong kilang hi.
Pasian tawh ka kipawl hi, a ci mi khempeuh, Zeisu Christ a gamtat bangin a gamtat ding a hihi.
Ama thupiaknate zui-in ama lungkimna dingin gamta ihih manin ama kiang panin i nget peuhpeuh i ngah hi.
Pasian i it ciangin ama thupiakte a zui ihi hi. Eite-a' dingin ama thupiakte zuihding a haksa lua hilo hi.

Hih mite in numei tawh paktatna gamta ngei nailo uh a, paubaan'na a neilote ahi uhhi. Amaute in Tuuno a paina peuhpeuhah zui uh a, midang khempeuh sung panin a kitankhiasa, Pasian leh Tuuno tungah a kipia masa mite ahi uhhi.

Tua ciangin Pasian in, "Eima lim, eimah hong sunin mihing bawl ni. Tuipi ngasate tung, huihlak vasate tung, ganhingte tung, leh leitunga a bokvakte khempeuh tungah ukna neisak ni," a ci hi. 27 Tua ahih ciangin Pasian in ama lim bangin mihing piangsakin, Pasian' lim bangin amah a piangsak hi. Amah in pasal leh numei a piangsak hi. 28 Pasian in amaute thupha pia a, Pasian in amaute tungah, "Ci pha-in tampi pha unla, leitung dimin zo un. Tuipi ngasate tung, leitungah a gamtang, a nungtate khempeuh tungah ukna nei ta un," a ci hi.
Ahi zongin leitung khempeuhah keima min a kipulak theihna dingin note tungah ka vangliatna lah ding deihna-in kong nungtasak lai hi.
"{ Topa } na Pasian un note hong piak leitang tungah na khan' uh a sau theihna dingin na nu leh na pa uh zahtak un.

{ Topa } aw, na zia na tong a thei-in hong bawl in la, na lampite hong hilh in. 5 Na thuman sungah kei hong paipih in la, lam hong hilh in. Banghang hiam cihleh kei a hong hon Pasian na hi a, nang kong muang tawntung hi.
{ Topa } in inn lampih kei leh innlamte' sepna a mawkna a hihi. { Topa } in khuapi hutpih kei leh khuapi cingte' cin'na a mawkna a hihi.
{ Topa } in kei-a' dingin a ngaihsutte hong tungsak ding hi. { Topa } aw, na itna kip tawntung hi. Na sepsa na maban hong tun' ta in.

Jerusalem khua sungah kumpi a sem, David' tapa, Thugen Siampa' thugente: 2 Thugen Siampa in hih bangin ci hi: A mawknapi, a mawknapi, na khempeuh a mawknapi. 3 Gimpi-a nisa thuakin nasepna-ah mihing in bang noptuam ngah ahi hiam? 4 Khang khat bei-in khang khat hong tung a, ahi zongin leitung kibangbang niloh hi. 5 Ni hong suakin ni tum a, a suakkik dingin tum zel hi. 6 Leitaw lamah huih nungin leilu lamah nung leuleu a, a zuih ngeina teng mah zui-in nungnung niloh hi. 7 Lui khempeuh tuipi-ah luangsuk a, ahi zongin tuipi dim nailo hi. Tuipi tuite a khu-in lengin tuinakah guahin zu a, a nak panin hong luangsuk kik zel hi. 8 Na khempeuh lunggimhuai a, kuama genzawh ding hilo hi. Mit in a muh cim theilo a, bil in a zak cim theilo hi. 9 A omsa mah bangin hong piang kik ding a, a kisemsa bangin hong kisem kik ding hi. Leitungah a thak na khat beek omlo hi. 10 Hih pen a thak ahi hi, a kici thei ding khat beek omlo hi. Eite' khan' ma-in a omsa vive a hihi. 11 A beisa nate kiphawkkha nawnlo a, hong tung lai ding thute zong a khangkikte in phawk nawnlo ding hi. 12 Thugen Siampa kei pen Jerusalem khua-ah Israel kumpipa ka hi ngei hi. 13 Hih leitungah a kisem na khempeuh entelin a thu kan ding ka ngaihsun hi. Pasian in tua bang nasep ei tungah hong guat pen a nuam hetlo nasep khat a hihi. 14 Leitungah a kisem khempeuh ka mu khin a, tuate khempeuh a mawknapi na hi a, huihpi nung tawh kibang lel hi. 15 A kawisate kimamsak theilo a, a omlopi a omin kiseh theilo hi. 16 "Pilna sangpi ka nei a, keima mai-ah Jerusalem a uk dangte khempeuh sangin ka pilzaw hi. Pilna leh theihna a kici khempeuh ka theiloh omlo hi," ka ci hi. 17 Pilna leh haina, theihna leh mawlna, a kilamdan'na ka zong hi. Ahi zongin tua bang ka hahkatna zong a mawknapi ahihlam ka phawk hi. 18 Pil semsem lehang kilunghimawh semsem a, tam thei semsem lehang hong gimsak semsem zawsop hi.
Hih leitungah a piang thu khempeuh, Pasian in ama pian' hun dinga a sehsa hunin a pian'sak a hihi.

Hih thute khempeuh banah gen ding thu khat bek om hi. Mihing hong kipian'sakna a thu bulpi pen in: Pasian zahtakna leh a thupiakte man'na a hihi. 14 A pha hita leh a sia hita leh a simthamin i hih simte nangawn i hihna khempeuhah Pasian in thu hong khen ding hi.

Ahih hangin keimah in, "Na ka sem a, ahi zongin a kiman'na omlo hi. Ka thatang khempeuh ka beisak a, ahi zongin bangmah ka tangtun' kei hi. Ahi zongin { Topa } in a manin na hong sem ding, ci-in ka muang a, ka sep thaman hong pia ding hi, ci-in ka um hi," ka ci hi.
keima kam panin a paikhia ka thu zong tua mah bang ding hi. A hawmpi-in kei kiangah hong tungkiklo ding a, keima ngimnasa bangin tangtung sakin, amah ka sawlna thu tangtun' ding hi.
"Gil sungah kong bawl ma-in nang kong thei khinzo hi. Na suah ma-in nang kong teelkhia khinzo a, minam dangte tungah kamsang dingin kong koih khinzo hi," hong ci hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } in kong cihin-ah, mailamah lametna note kong piakkik ding, na siatna ding uhhiloin na phattuamna ding uh geelna ka neihte kei bek in ka thei hi. 12 Tua hun ciangin note in kei hong samin, hong pai-in thu nong ngen ding uh a, ke'n zong kong dawng ding hi. 13 Note in kei nong zong ding uh a, na lungsim khempeuh uh tawh nong zon' uh ciangin nong mu ding uhhi.

Mun khempeuhah a om no mihingte aw, { Topa } in a hoih nate hong gen khinzo hi. { Topa } in note tung panin hong kalh thu in: Thuman thutang sem ding a, itna kip nei tawntungin, kiniamkhiatna tawh Pasian' thu man' ding a hihi.

"Note pen leitung mite-a' dingin ci tawh na kibang uhhi. Ahi zongin ci a alna bei leh i alsakkik theihna ding lampi om nawnlo hi. A kizatna ding bangmah om nawnlo a, mite' tuatcilgawp dingin kipaai lel hi. 14 "Note pen leitung mite-a' dingin khuavak tawh na kibang uhhi. Mual dawnah a om khua kiseelcip theilo hi.

Tua hi leh vantungah a om na Pa uh tate na hi thei ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh amah in mihoihte leh misiate tungah a kibangin ni taangsak khawm a, a gamtat phate leh a gamtat siate tungah zong a kibang mahin guah zusak khawm hi.

"Tua ahih ciangin note kiangah kong genin-ah: Na nuntakna dingun bang ne-in bang dawn ding cih ahi a, na pumpi uh-a' dingin bang silh ding cih ahi zongin lunghimawh lua kei un. Nuntakna pen an sangin thupizaw a, pumpi pen puan sangin thupizaw hilo ahi hiam? 26 "Vanah a leeng vasate ngaihsun dih un: Amaute in khai tuhlo, an zong lalo, sal sungah zong khollo napi-in vantungah a om na Pa un tuate a nek ding uh tasamsak lo hi. Tua vasate sangin note manphazaw thampek hilo na hi uhhiam? 27 Na lunghihmawh manun kua in na khan' uh kum bangzah sotto thei na hi uhhiam? 28 Banghangin puansilh ding lunghimawh na hi uhhiam? Gamlaka om pakte a nuntakzia ngaihsun dih un: Amaute in amau-a' dingin na lah semlo, khau zong kheeklo napi-in, 29 a hau mahmah Solomon nangawn a hoihpenin a kizep ciangin zong hih pakte banzo nailo lai hi. 30 Tua ahih ciangin tuni-in hingin, a zingciang mahin meikhukah a kikhultum lel hih gamlak lopate Pasian in puansilh guan' ahih leh note hong lim guatzaw ding ahih manin na upna uh a neu mahmah a hihi. 31 Tua ahih manin bang ne ding a, bang dawn ding a, bang silh ding ihi hiam, ci-in lunghimawh lua kei un. 32 (Gentail mite in lunghihmawh penin a neihte uhhih bangte a hihi.) Hih nate khempeuh na kisap lamtak uh vantungah a om na Pa un a thei hi.33 Thudang khempeuh sangin Pasian' ukna leh ama deihna na zuih theihna ding uh thupi ngaihsut masazaw un. Tua hi leh hih na kisapna dangte khempeuh uh zong hong piathuah veve ding hi.
Vantungah a om ka Pa' deihna bangin a gamta mi peuhmah ka sanggam pasal, ka sanggam numei, ka nu ahi uhhi," ci-in a dawng hi.
Hih a leitung nuntakna a hu nuamte in a nuntakna bulpi nangawn tawh suplawh ding a, keima hangin hih a leitung nuntakna a suplawhte in a nuntakna bulpi huzo ding hi.

Tua ahih ciangin note pai unla, midang khempeuh, keima nungzui mi suaksakin, Pa min, Tapa min, leh Khasiangtho min tawh tui sungah na phum un. 20 Tua ciangin note tungah ka hong gen thute khempeuh a zuihna dingun na hilh un. Hun bei dongin note a hong ompih tawntung ding ka hihna thu phawk ta un," a ci hi.
Hih a leitung nuntakna a hu nuamte in a nuntakna bulpi nangawn tawh suplawh ding a, keima hang leh lungdamna thu hangin a nuntakna a suplawhte in a nuntakna bulpi huzo ding hi.

Na Topa Pasian uh, na lungsim khempeuh, na nuntakna khempeuh, na pilna khempeuh, leh na thahatna khempeuh uh tawh na it un, a cihna a hihi. 31 A nihna in: Nangma pumpi na it bangin na vengte na it in, cihna a hihi. Hihte gel sangin thukham a lianzaw a dang om nawnlo hi," ci-in a dawng hi.
Mi khat in leitung khempeuh a ngah hangin a nuntakna bulpi suplawh leh bang phattuamna om ding ahi hiam?

Tua ciangin Zeisu in amaute khempeuh kiangah, "Hoihtakin kidawm unla, na huaiham lohna dingun kikem un. Banghang hiam cihleh bangzahta-in mi khat a hauh hangin a neihsa tawh a nuntakna taktak kicing zolo hi," a ci hi.
Nuntakna a nei khempeuh in tua Thu tung panin a nuntakna uh ngah a, tua nuntakna in mi khempeuh tungah khuavak hong tun'pih hi.

Mihing khat tung panin leitung minam khempeuh hong piangsakin, leitung khempeuhah a omsak hi. Amah in mihingte a pian'sakma pekin, mihingte' nuntak tanvei ding leh a ten'na ding uh mun a sehsa a hihi. 27 Hih bangin a hihna pen mite in amah zongin a muhtheihna ding uh a deihna a hihi. Ahi zongin eite kiang panin Pasian gamla om hetlo hi. 28 Mi khat in, ‘Pasian hangin eite piangin, hingin i gamtang hi,’ ci-in gen a, note sung panin laphuah siampa khat in zong, ‘Eite zong ama tate ihi hi,’ na na ci hi.

Ahi zongin Topa Zeisu in kei sep dingin a hong piak, Pasian hehpihna hangin Lungdamna Thu, mite kiangah gen ding nasep ka tangtut zawh nak leh kei nuntakna-ah bangbang hong piang ta leh a thupi-in ka ngaihsun kei hi.
Ama deihna bang a sem dingin Pasian in a hong sap, amah a it eite-a' dingin na khempeuh a hoihlamin piangsak hi, ci-in i thei hi.
Na pumpi uh, Christ pumpi nate khat ahih lamtak theilo na hi uhhiam? Christ pumpi nate khat la-in numei tawh paktatte' pumpi nate khat suaksak ding ihi hiam? Tuacih ngeiding hi peuhmahlo hi.
Tua ahih manin keimah in ka hong gennop thu in: Na hihna khempeuh uh, nekna dawnna-ah ahi zongin Pasian' minthan'na dingin na hih un.

Sanggamte aw, note ahih leh a suakta mi ahi dingin Pasian in a hong sap a hihi. Ahi zongin tua suahtakna pen na pumpi uh ut bangbangin gamtat theihna dingin paulam zon'na-in nei kei unla, itna tawh khatlekhat kikhualna-in zangzaw un. 14 Banghang hiam cihleh Thukham khempeuh thu khatin kigawm thei a, "Nangmah na ki-it bangin na vengte na it in," cihna tawh kilomlak thei hi.
Pasian in Zeisu Christ hangin ama mite ahi dingin eite a hong bawl ding a sehkholhsa hi a, tua bangin a hong bawlding pen ama tupna leh a utna a hihi.

Na khempeuh, Pasian' ngaihsutna leh a geelsa bangin a piang hi. A cil peka kipanin a ngaihsutsa thu tawh kizui-in Christ tawh i kipawlna hangin Pasian' tate ihihna dingin Pasian mah in a hong sehsa ihi hi.
Eite a hong bawlpa pen Pasian hi a, Zeisu Christ tawh i kipawl ciangin i nuntakna-ah gamtat hoih a nei dingin a hong bawl ihi hi. Hih pen eite' omzia dingin a na ngaihsut kholhsa a hihi.

Thu khat peuhpeuhah lunghimawh lua kei unla, na kisap bangbang uh, lungdamna tawh Pasian kiangah na ngen un. 7 Mihingte in a theihtel zawhloh Pasian' hong piak lungsim nopna in, Christ Zeisu tawh na kipawlna uh hangin note hong lungnuamsak ding hi.
Pasian in note hong itin, hong teelin, ama mi siangthote hikhin na hih manun note pen hehpihna nei-in, migi-in, kiniamkhiatin, dikin, na lungduai ding uh a hihi.

Mite' nasem bangin kingaihsun loin, Pasian' nasem bangin kingaihsun unla, na sep peuhpeuh uh lungsim takpi tawh lawpin sem un. 24 Topa in note tungah thaman a hong piakding lamtak phawk gige un. Tua bangin na sepna uhah Christ Topa' na a semsem na hi uhhi.

Pasian' na a sem mite mi cingtaak hi-in, na hoih namkim a septheihna dingun Laisiangtho pen Pasian' lamlahna tawh a hong kipia hi a, thuman thutak hilhna ding, a khialte taiina ding, a manlote a manin puahna ding, a manin nuntak theihna ding thuhilhna dingin a manpha mahmah ahi hi
Ama pian'sakte khempeuh lakah eite a masa pen i suahtheihna dingin thuman thutak zangin ama utthu tawh eite a hong piangsak tawm a hihi.
Tua ahih manin Laisiangtho sungah, "Mihingte, lopa tawh kibang a, a minthan'nate uh lopa pak tawh kibang hi. Lopate vulin pakte pulh a,

Ahi zongin note pen Pasian in a hong teelkhiat minam, Kumpi siampi pawl, a siangtho minam, Pasian' mite na hi uh a, khuamial sung panin a lamdang mahmah ama khuavak sungah a hong samkhiapa' nasepna a lamdangte a genkhia dingin Pasian in a hong teel mite na hi uhhi.
A hoihin na gamtat manun gimna na thuak uh leh zong Pasian in thupha hong pia ding hi. Mite kihta kei unla, lunghihmawh ngaihsut kei un.

Tua ahih manin sanggamte aw, Pasian in note hong sapna leh hong teelna-ah a kip taktak na hihna dingun hahkat mahmah un. Tua bangin hahkat le uh cin na puk ngei kei ding uhhi. 11 Tua hi leh eite' Topa leh Honpa Zeisu Christ Uk tawntungna sungah nuamtakin na lut thei ding uhhi.

"Kote' Topa Pasian aw, nangmah in na khempeuh piangsakin, nangma deihna bangin na khempeuh omin, na khempeuh kipiangsak ahih manin, minthan'na, pahtawina, leh vangliatna na ngah tawntung dingin a kilawm hi," a ci uhhi.

Hih thute khit ciangin Pasian in Abraham ze-et a, ama kiangah, "Abraham," a ci hi. Amah in, "Hiah om ing," a ci hi. 2 Amah in, "Na it, na tapa neihsun Isaac, la in la Moriah gamah pai in. Tua lai muna nang kiangah kong gen ding mual khat tungah meihal biakpiakna-in amah hong pia in," a ci hi. 3 Tua ahih ciangin zingsangin Abraham tho baih a, a la tutphah vawhin, ama nasem tangval nih leh a tapa Isaac a paipih hi. Amah in meihal biakpiakna dingin sing ek a, ama tunga Pasian' gensa munah a pai hi. 4 A ni thum ni ciangin Abraham khuadak to-in a gamla-ah tua mun a mu hi.
"{ Topa } i Pasian in hong lahkhiat loh thusim om a, ahih hangin hih thukham sunga om thute khempeuh i zuih theihna dingin hong lakkhia a, eite leh i suan i khakte' zuih tawntung ding a hihi.

Hih thukham laibu na mangngilh ngei kei ding hi. A sunga kigelh thute khempeuh tawh kizui-in na gamtat theihna dingin sunlezanin na lungngaingai ding hi. Tua hi leh na ma vang ding a, na nasep tangtung ding hi.
