{ Topa } aw, kei hong ompih na hih manin khuamial thukpi ka nawk hangin ka lau kei hi. Na molhtum leh na ciangkhut in kei hong hu hi.
{ Topa } sungah lungkim in; amah in na deihna hong pia ding hi. 5 { Topa } tungah na vai teng ap in. Amah muang in; amah in hong sem ding hi.
{ Topa } in mi a lam paina ding lak a, ama lungkim bangin a gamtapa amah in a kipsak hi.
Nangma deih bang hihna-ah nuam ka sa hi, ka Pasian aw. Nangma thukham ka lung sungah om hi," ka ci hi.

"Om hithiat unla, Pasian ka hihna thei un. Minamte lakah keimah hong kisangsak a, leitung khempeuhah ka min hong kithangsak hi," a ci hi. 11 Vanglian { Topa, } eite tawh hong omkhawm a, Jacob' Pasian, eima belh a hihi.

Lungdam biakpiakna Pasian tungah pia unla, Sangpenpa tungah na thuciamnate uh bawl un. 15 Haksat hun ciangin keima tungah hong ko un. Note kong honkhia ding a, note in keima min nong thangsak ding uhhi," a ci hi.
Biakpiakna dingin lungdam piakna hong paipih mi in kei a hong pahtawi a hihi. Ka thu a mang mite khempeuh ka honkhia ding hi," a ci hi.
Nong hotkhiatna hangin hong lungdamsak kik in la, utna lungsim tawh keimah hong huh ta in.
Leitungah nangma deihna, minam khempeuhte lakah na vanglian hotkhiatna kithei ta hen.
Tua ahih ciangin pilna lungsim ka ngah theihna dingun ka nuntak hun uh a tomlam ka theihna dingun hong hilh in.
Nangma thu pen lam hong lak ding meivak hi a, ka paina lampi-ah khuavak a hihi.
{ Topa } in kei-a' dingin a ngaihsutte hong tungsak ding hi. { Topa } aw, na itna kip tawntung hi. Na sepsa na maban hong tun' ta in.
Keima Pasian na hih manin nangma deih bangin a gamta dingin kei hong hilh in. Kei hong hehpih in la, lam phei-ah hong kha in.
Na lungsim khempeuh tawh { Topa } muang in la, nang' theihna suang kei in. 6 Na hihna khempeuhah amah phawk in. Tua hi leh lampi man amah in hong lak ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin na zi tawh lungkim in la, na ten'pih numei tawh lungdam in. 19 A ithuai a ngaihbaangin ngaihsun tawntung in la, ama ngaihbaan'na tawh lungdamin, ama hong itna tawh lungkim in.
Thulamlak ding a neilo mihingte kipuk uh a, thulamlak tampi neihna pen lungmuan'na a hihi.
Mite in bangbang a geel zongin { Topa' } deihna bang bekin a piang ding hizaw hi.
{ Topa } in na khempeuh ngimna nei-in bawl a, migilote nangawn siatna a thuak dingin a bawl a hihi.
Mihing in thu geel a, ahi zongin { Topa' } deihna bangin kisemkhia hi.
Mite in bangbangin ai a san zongin, a piang ding thu pen { Topa' } deihna bangbek hizaw hi.
Mihing' ngaihsutna-ah thu tampi om a, ahi zongin { Topa' } deihna tawh a kituakte bek kimang ding hi.
Amah in na khempeuh amau' hun ciat tawh a kituak dingin a bawl hi. Amah in mailam thu theihnopna lungsim eite tungah hong guan' a, ahi zongin ama sepnate a cing-a theihzawhna ding hong guan'lo hi.

Tuipi sungah lampi bawlin, tui lianpi sungah paina ding sul bawl a, leeng leh sakolte, galkapte leh galhangte Egypt gam pan paikhiatpihin, a tho thei nawnlo dingin amaute a lumcipsak, amaute pen meivak khau kisumit bangin a mitsak { Topa } in hih bangin ci hi: 17-18 "Masa lama nate ciamteh kei unla, a beisa hun nate ngaihsun kei un. 19 Tu-in a thak na khat ka bawl a, tu-in hong piangkhia hi. Note in theilo na hi uhhiam? Gamlakah lam lianpi khat ka bawl ding a, sehnel gamsungah gunte ka luangsak ding hi.
A kipat cilin a tawpna ding thu ka pulak a, tanglai pek panin a piang nailo nate genin, ‘Ka thugen kip ding a, ka ngimna khempeuh ka tungsak ding hi,’ ka ci hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh keima ngaihsutnate nomau' ngaihsutna bang hilo a, keima paiziate nomau' paizia bang hilo hi, { Topa } in ci hi. 9 Vantung pen leitung sangin a san'zawk mah bangin, keima paiziate zong, nomau paizia sangin sangzaw a, ka ngaihsutnate zong, nomau ngaihsutna sangin a sangzaw a hihi. 10 Banghang hiam cihleh vantung panin guahtui leh vuk hong pai-in, amaute ciahkik loin leitung kawtsakin, kungnote mengin selkhiasak a, khai vawhpa khaici pia-in a nepa tungah an a piak mah bangin, 11 keima kam panin a paikhia ka thu zong tua mah bang ding hi. A hawmpi-in kei kiangah hong tungkiklo ding a, keima ngimnasa bangin tangtung sakin, amah ka sawlna thu tangtun' ding hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } in kong cihin-ah, mailamah lametna note kong piakkik ding, na siatna ding uhhiloin na phattuamna ding uh geelna ka neihte kei bek in ka thei hi. 12 Tua hun ciangin note in kei hong samin, hong pai-in thu nong ngen ding uh a, ke'n zong kong dawng ding hi. 13 Note in kei nong zong ding uh a, na lungsim khempeuh uh tawh nong zon' uh ciangin nong mu ding uhhi.
Topa' deihna bang bekin na khempeuh a piang a hihi.

"Pasian' min kiphat tawntung ta hen; amah pilin a vanglian hi. 21 Amah in hun leh khuahunte kheel a, kumpite koihin lah a lakhia hi. Amah in mite tungah pilna leh theihna a pia hi. 22 Amah in thuthukpite leh thusimte a lakkhia hi. Amah in khuamial sunga kiseelte thei a, khuavak in amah a umcih hi. 23 Nang pen ka pu ka pate' Pasian na hi a, ka hong phat a, ka hong zahtak hi. Nangmah in pilna leh thahatna na hong piazo hi. Ka thungetna nong za a, kumpipa kianga ka gen ding thu nong lakzo hi," a ci hi.

Ka mite in kei hong phawklo uh ahih manin ka susia ding hi. No siampite in kei hong phawknuam loin, ka thuhilhnate nial na hih manun ka siampi dingin kong deih nawn kei a, na tate uh zong siampi-in ka zang kei ding hi.

Hih thu a tun'na ding hun hi pah nailo ahih manin lai-in ciamteh in. Ahi zongin hong tung baihta ding a, kong lah khempeuh a manin hong tung ding hi. A tung hak tawh a kibangkha ahi zongin ngak keikai in. Ka seh hun a cin' ciangin hong tung takpi ding a, zekai lua nawnlo ding hi.
Tuipi, tui tawh a kidim mah bangin { Topa}' minthan'na theihna tawh leitung kidim ding hi.
Pasian' deihteng sepding a hanciamte Pasian in lungkimna ngahsak ding ahih manin thupha ngah mi ahi uhhi.
Pasian' deihna bangin a gamtat manin bawlsiatna a thuak mite vantung ki-ukna sungah a omte ahih manin thupha ngah mi ahi uhhi.
Tua ahih manin vantungah a om na Pa uh a cingtaak mah bangin note zong lungsim citakin na cingtaakna ding uh na hanciam un.

"Biakna tawh kizomin na hoih khat peuhpeuh na sep uh ciangin mite' phat ding deihna tawh a kilang theithei dingin na sepkhak lohna dingun na kingaihsun un. Tua bangin gamta le uh cin, vantungah a om na Pa uh kiang panin thaman na ngah kei ding uhhi. 2 "Tua ahih manin mi cimawhte tungah huhna na piak uh ciangin, mite in a phat ding uh a deihna tawh a kineihkhem mite in kikhopna innsung leh kongzing lakah a kilang theithei-in a hih uh bangin na hih kei un. Tua bangin a hih mite in thaman a ngah khinta ahihna thu limtakin na phawk un. 3 Ahi zongin note in mi cimawhte citna tawh na huh uh ciangin na lawm naihuai pente uh nangawn in hong theihlohna dingun pia unla, 4 kuamah theisak kei un. Tua hi leh kuama muhlohin na gamtatna uh a mu na Pa un note tungah thaman hong pia ding hi.
Na Gam hong piang tahen. Vantungah na deihna a kicin mah bangin, leitungah kicing tahen. (HCN)
Na ukna hun hong tung henla, vantungah nangma deihna bangin a kigamtat mah bangin leitungah zongh kigamta tahen. (PuKTT)
Na ukna hun hong tung hen la, vantung bangin leitungah zong na deih bangin kigamta hen. (TDM)
Na gam hong tung ta hen, vantungah na deihna a kihih bangin, leitung ah zong kihih ta hen. (ZIV)
Na kumpigam hong piang tahen. Vantung ah na deihna a kisep mah bangin, leitung ah zongh kisem tahen. (ZSV)

Note in midangte' hong mawhna na maisak uh leh vantungah a om na Pa un zong note' mawhna hong maisak ding hi. 15 Ahi zongin note in midangte' hong mawhna na maisak kei uh leh vantungah a om na Pa un zong note' mawhna hong maisaklo ding hi.

Nget in ne-in a kekseu theihna, gutate in luhin a guktheihna hih leitungah na sum uh khol kei un. 20 Nget in a nek theihlohna, a kekseu theihlohna, gutate in luhin a guk theihlohna mun vantungah note-a' dingin kholzaw un. 21 Banghang hiam cihleh na sum omna uhah na lungsim uh om tawntung ding hi.

Thudang khempeuh sangin Pasian' ukna leh ama deihna na zuih theihna ding uh thupi ngaihsut masazaw un. Tua hi leh hih na kisapna dangte khempeuh uh zong hong piathuah veve ding hi. 34 "Tua ahih manin zingciang huna ding ma lungkham masa kei un. Zingciang thu ding ama thu-in omsak lel un. Tuni thu pen tuni thu mah tawh beisak unla, lungkham ding behlap se kei un.

"Kei kiangah, ‘Topa, Topa aw,’ hong ci mi khempeuh, vantung ki-ukna sungah lutthei kimlo ding uh a, vantungah a om ka Pa' deihna bangin a gamtateng bek lutthei ding uhhi. 22 Tua ni ciangin mi tampi in kei kiangah, ‘Topa, Topa aw, nangma min tawh thu hilhin, nangma min tawh dawite hawlkhia-in, nangma min tawh na lamdang lian tampi bawl hilo ka hi uhhiam?’ hong ci ding uhhi. 23 Tua ciangin keimah in amaute kiangah, ‘Note ka hong thei ngei kei hi. Siatna a gamta mite aw, kei kiang panin kihemkhia un,’ ka ci ding hi.

"Banghang hiam cihleh vantung ki-ukna sung omzia pen a leenggah lo-ah na a sem ding a cial dingin zing tungin a kuankhia leenggah lo neipa tawh kibang hi. 2 Ni tha ngeina ngun peek khat piak dingin a kithukim khit uh ciangin a leenggah lo-ah na a sem dingin pawlkhat a kuansak hi. 3 Zingsang nai kua hun ciangin mihon omna sumbukah pai leuleu a, mi pawlkhat bangmah semloin a mawk om a muh ciangin, 4 ‘No zong leenggah lo-ah va kuan un; a kilawm zah khat ka hong pia ding hi,’ a cih ciangin pawlkhat a kuan uhhi. 5 Tua ciangin sun sawmlenih ciangin pawlkhat cial leuleu a, nitak nai thum ciangin pawlkhat a cial lai hi. 6 Nitak nai nga ciangin mihon omna sumbukah a pai leh mi pawlkhat a mawk om mu ahih manin, ‘Banghangin bangmah semloin sunthapai mawk om na hi uhhiam?’ ci-in a dot ciangin
tawmkhat pai lai-in leilakah bokin thu ngen a, "Pa aw, ahi thei ding ahih leh hih thuakna ding tawh hong kipelhsak in. Ahi zongin kei' deihna bang hiloin nangma deihna bang hizaw ta hen," a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin note pai unla, midang khempeuh, keima nungzui mi suaksakin, Pa min, Tapa min, leh Khasiangtho min tawh tui sungah na phum un.
Pasian' deihna bangin a gamta mi khempeuh ka nu leh ka sanggamte ahi uhhi," a ci hi.
"Pa aw, na khempeuh na hihthei hi. Hih ka thuak ding gimna tawh hong kipelhsak in. Ahi zongin kei' deihna bang hiloin nangma deihna bang hizaw hen," a ci hi.
"Banghangin, ‘Topa aw, Topa aw,’ hong ci napi-in ka hong gente zuilo na hi uhhiam?
Tua ciangin Zeisu in a nungzuite leh mi khempeuh kiangah, "Mi khatpeuh in kei hong zuihnop leh ama deihna bangin gamta nawn loin nisimin a singlamteh pua-in hong zui ding hi.
"Pa aw, nangma ngaihsutna bang ahihkhak leh hih ka thuakding gimna tawh hong kipelhsak in. Ahi zongin kei deihna bang hiloin nangma deihna bang hi ta hen," a ci hi.
Tua bangin Pasian' tate suahna pen leitung ngeina nute pate sung panin suahna tawh hiloin Pasian sung panin suahna a hihi.

Moses in gamlak khuam tungah sumngo gul a khai mah bangin Mihing Tapa zong hong kikhai ding a, 15 amah a um mi khempeuh nungta tawntung ding hi. 16 Pasian in leitung mite hong it mahmah ahih manin ama Tapa a um mi khempeuh si nawnloin a hin' tawntung theihna dingun a Tapa neihsun a hong piak dongin a hong itna a hong lak hi. 17 Pasian in leitungah a Tapa hong sawlna pen mawhsakna thukhen dingin a hong paisak hiloin, leitung mite a honkhia dingin a hong paisak hizaw hi.

Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Keimah hong sawlpa' deihna bangin na semin, sepdingin hong piak nasep zawhna pen ka nuntakna an a hihi. 35 Note in na paunak uhah, ‘Khai tuh khit kha li ciangin anlak hun hi,’ na ci uhhi. Tu-in note khuadakin lote en un. An khempeuh min khinta a, lakding bek in sam hi. 36 Khaituhpa leh anlapa a lungdam khawm theihna dingin anlapa thaman a kipiak mah bangin anlapa in zong a nungta tawntung dingin mi a khawm ding hi. 37 Tua ahih manin, ‘Khat in khai tuhin, adang khat in a an la,’ ci-in paunak a om pen thuman mahmah hi. 38 Tua ahih manin note in na khawhloh uh lo-ah an a la dingin ka hong sawl hi. Midang in tua lo na kho a, note in a lak bek a si na hi uhhi," a ci hi.
"Keima thu guak tawh ka hihtheih bangmah omlo hi. Pasian' hong genna bang bekin thu ka khen hi. Keima ut bangin semloin kei hong sawlpa' deih bangin sem ka hih manin ka thukhenna thuman hi.

Tua ciangin amaute in, "Tua ahih leh Pasian ka lungkimsak theihna dingun bangci gamtat ding ka hi uhhiam?" ci-in a dot uh ciangin 29 Zeisu in, "Pasian in a hong sawlpa um le uh cin Pasian a lungkimna dingin a gamta na hi uhhi," ci-in a dawng hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh keima ut bangin a sem ding hiloin kei hong sawlpa' deihna bangin a sem dingin vantung panin a hong pai ka hihi. 39 Kei hong sawlpa' deihna in: Ka khutsungah a hong piak mi khempeuh khat zong khahsuah loin nitawp ni ciangin ka hin'sakkik ding a hihi. 40 Tua ahih manin Tapa mu-in a um mi khempeuh in nuntak tawntungna ngahin, nitawp ni ciangin ka hin'sak ding, ka Pa in hong deih ahi hi," a ci hi.
Pasian' deihna bangin a gamta nuam mi peuhmah in, ka thugente pen Pasian' kiang panin a hong pai thu a gen ka hihna leh keima thu bek tawh a gen ka hihna khenthei ding uhhi.
Pasian in thukham a palsat mite' thu ngailo a, amah bia-in, ama deih bangin a gamta mite' thu ngai hi, ci-in ko ka thei uhhi.
Keima tuute in ka aw za-in thei uh ahih manin kei hong zui uhhi.
Keima min paulamin na hong nget nak uh leh ka hong pia ding hi," a ci hi.
Pa aw, leitung a kipian'sak ma-in nang tawh i neihkhawm na pianzia mah tu-in nangma omna munah hong pia ta in.

Pasian in kumpi dingin Saul a zat nawnloh ciangin amaute' kumpi dingin David a semsak hi. Pasian in David' thu genin, ‘Ka sawl khempeuh a sem ding, ka deih bang mi khat, Jessi' tapa David ka mukhin hi,’ a cihsa thu a hihi.

Mihing khat tung panin leitung minam khempeuh hong piangsakin, leitung khempeuhah a omsak hi. Amah in mihingte a pian'sakma pekin, mihingte' nuntak tanvei ding leh a ten'na ding uh mun a sehsa a hihi. 27 Hih bangin a hihna pen mite in amah zongin a muhtheihna ding uh a deihna a hihi. Ahi zongin eite kiang panin Pasian gamla om hetlo hi.
Ama Tapa hangin Lungdamna Thu ka lungsim khempeuh tawh hilhin a na ka sep Pasian in hih ka thugente a man taktak ahihna thu hong thei hi.
Pasian' Khasiangtho in a makaih mite, Pasian' tate ahi uhhi.
Pasian' bawlsate, amau utthu tawh hiloin siatna a thuak dingin Pasian mahmah in a ngaihsutsa a hihi. Ahi zongin lametna omlai hi.

Tua ahih manin eite bangzahin ginalo hita lehang eite a hong huh dingin Khasiangtho a hong pai hi. Eite in a kilawm bangin thunget ding nangawn i thei kei a, ahi zongin Khasiangtho mah in tauna tawh eite-a' dingin a hong thumsak hi. 27 Khasiangtho in Pasian' deihna tawh kizui-in Pasian' mite-a' dingin hong thumsak ahih manin mihingte' lungsimtawng thu a thei Pasian in Khasiangtho' ngaihsutna a thei hi. 28 Ama deihna bang a sem dingin Pasian in a hong sap, amah a it eite-a' dingin na khempeuh a hoihlamin piangsak hi, ci-in i thei hi.
Tua ahih ciangin mite' utna leh sepna tawh kisailo a, Pasian' hehpihna bek tawh kisaizaw hi.

Tua ahih ciangin sanggamte aw, Pasian in eite tam veipi tak hong hehpih ahih manin ama lungkimna ding leh ama nasepna dingin nomau mahmah a hingtangin Pasian tungah na kipiakna dingun ka hong thum hi. Tua banga kipiakna pen Pasian biakna man taktak a hihi. 2 Leitung mihingte' gamtat bangin gamta kei unla, na lungsim uh kikheelin Pasian kipuahpha sak un. Tua hi leh a hoih nate bang hi a, bangte in amah lungkim sakin, bangte a kicing hiam ci-in thei-in Pasian' deihna na phawk thei ding uhhi.

Lawmte aw, kei-a' dingin Pasian kiangah thu na hong ngetsakna dingun i Topa Zeisu Christ i upna hang leh Khasiangtho in a hong piak itna tawh a hong thum ka hihi. 31 Judea gamsunga a om thu umlo mite in kei hong gimsakkhak lohna ding leh Jerusalem khua-a a om Pasian mite-a' dingin nasepnate lungdam takin a hong san'theihna dingun thu hong ngetsak un. 32 Tua bangin thu hong ngetsak le uh cin, Pasian' deihna ahih nak leh note kiangah lungdam takin ka hong tung ding a, note tawh nuamtakin i kimu ding hi. 33 Nopsakna a hong pia Pasian in note khempeuh hong ompih ta hen. Amen.

Christ Zeisu' sawltak dingin Pasian in a hong teel keimah Paul leh thu upna sungah i sanggam Sosthenes in, 2 Zeisu Christ tawh kipawlna hangin Pasian' mi suakin, Pasian' mi siangtho cihna a ngah, Corin khua-a om Pasian' pawlpi mite leh eite' Topa bek hiloin, amaute' Topa zong ahi, i Topa Zeisu Christ tungah thu a ngen, mun khempeuhah a om mite tungah lai ka hong khak uhhi. 3 I Pa Pasian leh Topa Zeisu Christ in note tungah dikna leh nopsakna thupha hong tungsak ta hen.

Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian' deihna bangin gamta loin, leitung lungsim deihna bangin gamta lai na hih manun upna sungah naungek bang ahi lai na hi uhhi. Note khatlekhat kihaza-in kitawng kiselin na om uh ciangin hih leitung mite mah a bang lel na hihna uh hong kilang hi.

A neisate tungah, kei' ngaihsutna hilo, Topa' ngaihsutna ka gennop thu in: Zi in a pasal ciahsan kei ta hen. 11 A ciahsan leh zong pasal neiloin om paisuak hen. A om paisuakzawh kei leh a pasal ngei mah zuankik hen. Pasal in a zi ma kei ta hen.
Tu laitakin a omlai thu thumte pen upna, lametna, leh itna hi a, tua thumte sung panin itna mah a thu lianpen a hihi.

Tua ahih manin mi khatpeuh, Christ tawh a kipawl ciangin mi thak suak a, a mi lui ngeina bei-in a mi thak ngeina a neita a hihi. 18 Hih thu khempeuh Pasian' vaihawm hi a, eite pen Pasian' gal hinapi-in Christ hangin amah tawh a kilem mi hong hisak a, kote tungah tua kilemna ding nasep hong pia hi. 19 Tua ahih manin kote' thugen bulpi in: Pasian in mite' mawhnate ngaihsun nawnloin, Christ hangin leitung mi khempeuh leh amah a kilemin hong bawl a, tua kilemna thu a gen dingin kote hong seh hi. 20 Tua ahih ciangin kote pen Christ tangin nasem ka hi uh a, Pasian in kote zangin note tungah thu a hong gen a hihi. Pasian tawh kilemin pawlkhatin na omna dingun Christ tangin a hong thum ka hi uhhi.

Sanggamte aw, Masedonia gam pawpite-ah Pasian' hehpihna hangin a piang thute ka hong theisak nuam uhhi. 2 Amaute in haksatna a tuamtuam phukha-in nakpi takin ze-etna thuakin, amaute zawng mahmah hita se le uh lungdam mahmah uh ahih manin piakna lamsangah cingh thei mahmah uhhi. 3 Amaute in amau ngahna tawh kituak bekin a pia hiloin, a piak zawhzah dingun a kilawm sangin a tamzaw a piakna uh ka thei taktak uhhi. Kuama sawl hiloin amau lungsimah a uttawmna uh tawh, 4 Judea gama Pasian mite, ko zong hong huh sak un, ci-in hong thumthum uhhi. 5 Hih bangin a gamtatna uh kote' lamet sangin sangzaw pek hi. Amaute pen Topa tungah kipia masa uh a, tua ciangin Pasian' deihna bangin kote tungah zong a hong kipia uh a hihi. 6 Tua mah bangin Titus in zong hih bang nasepna ding hong pat khit ahih mah bangin midang huhna ding na sepnate uh note lakah hong zawhpih vet dingin ka hanthawn uhhi.
A siahuai tuhun sung panin eite a hong suahtaksakna dingin eite' Pa Pasian' deihna tawh kizui-in i mawhna hangin tua Zeisu Christ amahmah a hong kipiatawm a hihi.
Tua hi a, Zeisu Christ a zui mite in a leitung lungsim pianzia uh leh a leitung lungsim deihna khempeuh uh a phiat khitsa a hihi.

Pasian' sawlna tawh Zeisu Christ' sawltak ahi keimah Paul in Ephesa khua-ah a om thu um mite tungah lai ka hong khakhi. 2 Eite' Pa Pasian leh Topa Zeisu Christ in note tungah dikna leh nopsakna thupha hong tungsak ta hen. 3 Christ tawh eite i kipawlna hangin vantung gam panin kha tawh kisai letsong namkim hong pia ahih manin eite' Topa Zeisu Christ' Pa ahi Pasian tungah i lungdamna ko ciat ni. 4 Ama mai-ah eite pen paubaan'na a neilo, mi siangthote ahi ding leh Christ hangin ama mite ahi dingin leitung a pian'ma pek nangawnin Pasian in a hong teelsa ihi hi. 5 Pasian in Zeisu Christ hangin ama mite ahi dingin eite a hong bawl ding a sehkholhsa hi a, tua bangin a hong bawlding pen ama tupna leh a utna a hihi. 6 Ama it Tapa hangin hih bangin letsong hong pia ahih manin ama hong hehpihna hangin Pasian phat ni.

Na khempeuh, Pasian' ngaihsutna leh a geelsa bangin a piang hi. A cil peka kipanin a ngaihsutsa thu tawh kizui-in Christ tawh i kipawlna hangin Pasian' tate ihihna dingin Pasian mah in a hong sehsa ihi hi.
Eite a hong bawlpa pen Pasian hi a, Zeisu Christ tawh i kipawl ciangin i nuntakna-ah gamtat hoih a nei dingin a hong bawl ihi hi. Hih pen eite' omzia dingin a na ngaihsut kholhsa a hihi.
Eite-a' dingin na a hong sepsak, eite' ngetzah val, leh i ngaihsut zawhloh zah dongin a vangliatna tawh tampi tak a hong hihsak thei
Na heh uh ciangin, tua hehna hangin khialkha kei unla, a tawntungin heh paisuak kei un.
Bangteng in Topa lungkimsak ahi hiam, ci-in kan un.

Tua ahih ciangin hoihtakin kingaihsunin gamta unla, mihaite bang hiloin mipilte bangin gamta un. 16 Tuhun pen hun hoihlo hun ahih manin na hun neih khempeuh uh a hoih lamin zang un. 17 Tua ahih manin hai ommawk kei unla, Topa in bang a semdingin hong deih ahi hiam, ci-in kan un. 18 Zu in mi siasak thei ahih manin zu ne kei unla, Khasiangtho tawh a kidimin omzaw un. 19 La a tuamtuamte genin sakna tawh Topa' thu gen belin nei unla, na lungsim khempeuh uh tawh Topa phatna la sa un. 20 I Topa Zeisu Christ hangin thu khempeuhah Pa Pasian tungah lungdamna ko ta un.

Silate aw, launa leh lin'na tawh na leitung tote uh thu mang unla, Christ' na na sep uh mah bangin lungsim takpi tawh na na sepsak un. 6 A hong pahtak ding uh deihna tawh amaute' muhsung bekin tuaci gamtat kei unla, Christ' sila na hihna hangun Pasian' hong deih bangin lungsim takpi tawh na sem un. 7 Mihingte' na a sem bang lelin kingaihsun loin Topa' na a sem bangin kingaihsun unla, thanopna tawh sem un.

Tua ahih ciangin ka hong it sanggamte aw, note tawh ka hong omkhawm lai-in ka thu na hong man' tawntung uh mah bangin, tu-in note tawh ka hong omkhawm loh hun ciangin zong ka thu na hong man' ding uh thupizaw lai hi. Pasian kihtakna leh zahtakna tawh na ma uh nawt unla, amah in note hong hotkhiatna thu a cingtaak suaksak un. 13 Banghang hiam cihleh note in utna lungsim na neihna ding uh leh ama deihna na zuihzawhna dingun note sungah Pasian in a tawntungin na a hong sem a hihi. 14 Na khempeuh phunlo, thu nialloin sem un. 15 Tua hi leh a lungsim kawi, a hoihlo leitung mite lakah paubaan'na a neilo a siangtho, Pasian' tate na hi ding uh a, nuntakna thu na genna uh hangin leitung mite lakah khuavak bangin na hoihna uh a kilang mite na hi ding uhhi. 16 Tua hi leh a beisa hunah ka sepna leh ka hanciamnate a mawkna suaklo ding ahih manin Christ hong paikik ni ciangin kei ka kisial thei ding hi.

Thu khat peuhpeuhah lunghimawh lua kei unla, na kisap bangbang uh, lungdamna tawh Pasian kiangah na ngen un. 7 Mihingte in a theihtel zawhloh Pasian' hong piak lungsim nopna in, Christ Zeisu tawh na kipawlna uh hangin note hong lungnuamsak ding hi. 8 Sanggamte aw, a tawpna-ah ka hong gennop thu in, a hoih leh a phattaak thute tawh na lungsim uh na kidimsak un. Tuate in: A man, a dik, a tang, a siangtho, a deihhuai, leh a pahtakhuai thute a hihi. 9 Keima genna leh ka gamtatna panin thei-in na san' uh thute, nomau pumpi mahmah tawh na zui un. Tua hi leh nopsakna a hong piathei Pasian in note hong ompih ding hi. 10 Topa' hangin ka lungdamna lian mahmah hi. Hun sauveipi khit ciangin kei na hong phawkna uh na hong langsakkik thei uhhi. Kei hong kinloin omngei uh teh, a ci ka hi kei a, na hong kinna uh na hong lahna ding uh hun om theilo, ka cihna a hihi. 11 Bangbangin om ta leng a lungkim thei dingin a kisinsa ka hih manin hihbang ka hong gen ciangin ka kitangsapna a hong pulak nuam ka hi kei hi. 12 Cihmawhna leh cihtheihna a sinsa ka hihi. Tua ahih manin ka hau a ka zawng zongin, ka vah a ka kial zongin, koi mun koi mun hita lehah a lungkimthei dingin a kisinsa ka hihi. 13 Christ in a hong piak vangliatna tawh hihte khempeuh nawkzawhna ding thahatna a nei ka hihi.
A na ka sep i Topa Pasian in ama hauhna tawh kizui-in Christ Zeisu hangin note' kitangsapna khempeuh hong pia ding hi.

Pasian' deihna tawh Zeisu Christ' sawltak dingin a hong kiseh keimah Paul leh i sanggam Timothy in, 2 Colosian khua-ah a om Pasian' mi ahi, Christ sungah kiptakin a om sanggamte tungah lai ka hong khak uhhi. I Pa Pasian in note tungah dikna leh nopsakna thupha hong tungsak ta hen.

Tua bangin note' thu ka zak uh huna kipanin Pasian kiangah thu ka hong ngetsak uh a, kha thu tawh kisai pilna leh theihtelnate nei-in, Pasian' deihna na theihtheihna dingun ka hong ngetsak uhhi. 10 Tua bang hi leh Topa' deihna bangin nungta-in, amah a lungkimsak ding thute bek na sem tawntung ding uh a, na gamtatnate uh a hoih bekbek hong hi-in, Pasian' thu na theihna uh hong khang semsem ding hi.
Na kampauna, na gamtatnate khempeuh uhah, Topa Zeisu hangin Pa Pasian tungah lungdam kohna-in Zeisu min paulamin na hih ding uhhi.
Zeisu Christ nasem, note' makai Epafras in zong hong hopih hi. Pasian' deihna bangin note nungta-in, lungsim khanghamin kiptakin na omtheihna dingun amah in thu hong ngetsak tawntung hi.
Ahi zongin eite pen khuavak gamtatna a nei sun khuavak mi ihih manin pilvang ni. Awmdal bangin upna leh itna bulhin, siklukhu bangin i lamet hotkhiatna khu ni.

Lungdam tawntungin, 17 thu ngen niloh unla, 18 bangbang hong piang ta leh na lungdamna uh Pasian tungah ko tawntung un. Christ Zeisu tawh kipawlin na nuntakna sung uhah hih bangzia-in na om ding uh Pasian in a hong deih a hihi. 19 Khasiangtho nasepna dongtangsak kei unla,

A masa penin kong gennop thu in: Mi khempeuh-a' dingin Pasian tungah ngetna, thungetna, thumna leh lungdam kohna na neih ding uh a hihi. 2 Eite nuamtakin omthei-in, biakna lungsim nei-in a kilawm takin i nuntak theihna dingin kumpite leh uliante-a' dingin thu na ngetsak un. 3 Hih bang gamtatnate pen eite hong Hon Pasian' muhna-ah a hoih a kilawm thu a hihi. 4 Mi khempeuh in hotkhiatna ngahin, thuman a theihkim ding Pasian in deih hi.
Pasian' thu tawh a kituaklo, a haihuai tangthu phuahtawmte ngaihsutin na nei vet kei in. Pasian' deihna tawh a kituakin na nuntak zawhna dingin na kisin in.

Christ Zeisu tawh i kipawlna hangin hong kipia ding nuntakna thu a gen dingin Pasian' deihna tawh Christ Zeisu' sawltak nasep a sem dingin a hong kisawl keimah Paul in 2 Ka it ka ta Timothy tungah lai ka hong khak hi. Pa Pasian leh i Topa Christ Zeisu in dikna, hehpihna, leh nopsaknathupha nang tungah hong tungsak ta hen.
Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in eite tungah meidawina lungsim hong guan'lo a, thahatna, ki-itna, pumpi ki-ukzawhna lungsim hong guan' hizaw hi.

Eite' sepzawhna hang hiloin ama ngimnasa bang leh a dikna hangin Pasian in eite hong honkhia-in ama mi dingin a hong sam hi. Pasian in leitung a pian'ma pekin Christ Zeisu tung tawnin tua dikna a hong piak hi a,

Tua ahih manin i zaksa thuman thutakte i khahsuahkhak lohna dingin kiptak khotakin i letkip ding kisam hi. 2 Vantung mite in hong gen thute thuman hi a, tua thu a palsatte in a kilawm bangin gim thuak ding uhhi. 3 Tua ahih manin a thupi mahmah hih hotkhiatna thudon loin i om leh suahtakna om thei ngeilo ding hi. A masa-in Topa mahmah in hotkhiatna thu hong pulak a, tua thu a za mite in thuman ahihna thu eite tungah hong gen leuleu uhhi. 4 Amaute' thugenna banah Pasian in vangliatna lim, leh na lamdang a tuamtuamte bawlna tawh hong genbeh lai hi. Tua banah ama hoihsak bangin Pasian in Khasiangtho zong hong hawm lai hi

Pasian' deihna bangin Zeisu Christ gamta a, a tawntungin a kimang paisuak dingin ama pumpi biakna-in khatvei a kipiakna hangin eite khempeuh i mawhna panin a siang ihi hi. 11 Jew siampite nisimin a nasepna uh munah dingin a kibang biakpiakna mah pia niloh uh a, ahi zongin tua a piak uh biakpiaknate in mawhna maisak theilo hi.
Pasian' deihna bangin gamta-in, ama thuciam na ngahtheihna dingun lungduai-in thuakzawhna na kisam uhhi.
Khatlekhat tungah thuhoih kibawlin na kihuh ding uh mangngilh kei un. Hihbang gamtatnate pen Pasian a lungkimsak thei biakna a hihi.

Ama sihna hangin Tuucing Lianpa suakin, a sisan tawh tawntung thuciamna a kipsak i Topa Zeisu pen sihna panin a thokiksak, eite tungah nopsakna a hong pia Pasian in, 21 ama deihna bangin na na septheihna dingun a kisam thuhoihte khempeuh note tungah hong guan'in, ama lungkimna bangin i gamtat theihna dingin Zeisu Christ hangin eite sungah na hong sem hen la, Christ in a tawntungin minthan'na ngah paisuak ta hen. Amen.
Pilna kisam na om uh leh Pasian kiangah ngen un. Mi khempeuh tungah Pasian dikin cingh mahmah ahih manin hong pia ding hi.

Tuni ahih kei leh zingciangin tua khua tua khua-ah va pai-in, kum khat bang va omin, sumbawlin a meet tampi va ngah ni, a ci mite aw, ka thugen hong ngai dih un. 14 Zingciangin na nuntakna uh bangci ding cih nangawn na thei kei uhhi. Meiilum tawlkhat sung kaii-in a mangthang pak tawh a kibang lel na hi uhhi. 15 Note in, "Topa in hong thukimpih nak leh nungta-in tua bang tua bang i sem ding hi," na cihding uhhi bek hi. 16 Ahi zongin note kihisakin na kisial uhhi. Tua bangte hoih hetlo hi. 17 A hoih a manin gamtat ding thei napi-in a gamta lote a khial a hihi.

Topa' hangin leitung ukna aana neite' thu na mang un. Kumpipa' thu ahi a, 14 a gamtat siate gim pia-in, a gamtat hoihte a pahtawi dingin kumpipa in a sawl thuneite khempeuh' thu ahi zongin na mang un. 15 Banghang hiam cihleh thu theiloin a mot paupau mihaite, na gamtat hoihna un a daihsak ding, Pasian' deihna a hihi. 16 Sila a hilo mi bangin gamta unla, ahi zongin gitloh gamtatna dingin na suahtakna uh zang loin Pasian' sila bangin na gamtazaw un.
Gamtatsia-in i om sangin Pasian' deihna ahih nak leh i gamtat hoihna hangin gimna i thuak hoihzaw hi.

Christ in ama pumpi-in thuak ahih manin note in zong tua bang lungsim mah nei-in na kithakhauhsak ding uh a hihi. Banghang hiam cihleh pumpi-in a thuak mite peuhmah, mawhna tawh kisawhkha nawnlo uhhi. 2 Tua ahih manin tu-a kipanin na leitung nuntak sung uh mihingte' deihna bangin gamta loin Pasian' deihna bangin na gamtat ding uh a hihi. 3 A beisa hunah dawibiate' gamtat bangin a hoihkhop khat na gamta khinta uh a, a kilawm loin gamtatna, hukna lanna, zunekna, uangtatna, zukham luatna leh a muhdahhuai milim biakna-in na hun uh na beisak uhhi.

Pasian' piak na a zatsiamte bangin Pasian' kiang panin na ngah uh nate, midangte' phattuamna dingin na zang un. 11 Minthan'na leh vangliatna a nei tawntung Pasian in Zeisu Christ hangin thu khempeuhah phatna a ngahtheihna dingin thuhilhte in Pasian' thu na hilh unla, na a semte in Pasian' piak thahatna tawh na sem un. Amen. 12 Ka itte aw, note' upna hong kize-etna-in gimna haksate na thuak manun a thu lamdangpi-in ngaihsun kei unla, na lungkham ngaihsut kei un. 13 Tua bangin Christ tawh thuakkhawm le uh cin ama minthan'na hong kilat ciangin note lungdam mahmah ding na hih manun, tua banga na thuakna uhah na lungdamzaw un. 14 Christ nungzui hihna hangin mite' kosiatna na thuak uh leh note sungah a minthang Khasiangtho ahi Pasian' Khasiangtho hong om ahihna lim ahih manin a hampha mahmah na hi uhhi. 15 Ahi zongin mi thahna, guktakna, gamtat khialhna, leh thusia bawlna hangin gimna a thuakte na hikha kei un. 16 Ahi zongin Christian hihna hangin gimna na thuak uh leh kuamah in maizum ngaihsut kei unla, Christ min hangin na thuak manun Pasian tungah na lungdam un.
Tua ahih ciangin Pasian' deihna bangin gimna a thuak mite gamtat hoihin, a kamciam a tangtungsak tawntung hong Piangsakpa muangin ama khutsungah a ki-ap ding uh a hihi.
Pasian' deih bangin na gamtatna uh sanggam ki-itna tawh na behlap un; na sanggam ki-itna uh itna thukpi tawh na behlapzawhna dingun na hanciam un.

Mi pawlkhatte' ngaihsut bangin Topa in a kamciamna a hong tungsak hak hi zenzen lo hi. Note khat beek in siatna na thuakkhak ding uh deihloin na vekpi-un na kisik ding uh deih ahih manin hong pai nailohna pen note hong khualna hizaw hi.
Ahi zongin Pasian kiangah i mawhnate va pulak lehang, amah citakin thuman ahih manin, i mawhnate hong maisakin i hoihlohnate khempeuh hong siangsak ding hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh pumpi deihna, mit tawh mu-in i deihte, leh mite' kisaktheihpih nate ahi leitung nate khempeuh pen Pa Pasian tawh a kizom thu hilo a, leitung tawh a kizom thu a hihi. 17 Leitung nate leh leitung deihnate a beibei ding hita a, ahi zongin Pasian' deihna bangin a gamta mite pen kip tawntung ding hi.

Ka lawm itte aw, eite' pianzia ding taktak a telin hong kilat nailoh hangin tu-in Pasian' tate ihi hi. Ahi zongin Christ hong kilat ciangin ama pianzia ahi bang teekteekin mu ding ihih manin amah i batna ding thu teltakin i thei hi.
Hih pen Pasian tate leh Dawimangpa' tate a kilamdan'na a hihi. A manin gamta loin, a Christian mipihte a itlo mi peuhmah, Pasian' tate hilo uhhi.
Note' gamtatnate ka thei a, vot lah vot vetlo, sa lah sa vetloin na omna uh zong ka thei hi. A vot na hih kei uh leh a sa hi vet le uh cin ka ut hi.
{ Topa } in uk tawntung ding hi," a ci uhhi.
Vantung kipak hen la, leitung lungdam ta hen; minam khempeuhte lakah, "{ Topa } maang hi!" amaute in ci ta uh hen.

{ Topa } aw, liatna, vangliatna, minthan'na, guazawhna, leh min liatnate nangma-a' ahi hi; Banghang hiam cihleh vantung leh leitungah a om khempeuh zong nangma-a' a hihi. { Topa } aw, kumpi gam nangma-a' hi a, tuate khempeuh tungah nang a lutangin hong kisangsak hi. 12 Hauhna leh minphatna nangma kiang pan hong pai a, nangmah in na khempeuh tungah na uk hi. Na khutsungah vangliatna leh minthan'na om a, liatsakna ding leh thakhauhsakna ding na khutsungah om hi.
{ Topa } ahih leh kumpi za-ah tu ngitnget a, thukhenna dingin a tokhom a bawl hi. 8 Leitung mite' thu a mantakin khen a, a kilawm bangin mite' thu a khen hi.
Hih a minthang Kumpipa kua ahi hiam? Vanglian{ Topa, } minthang Kumpipa a hihi.
Na kumpi tokhom siangtho kip tawntung hi. Na kumpi ciangkhut thumanna ciangkhut hi a,
Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian pen leitung khempeuhte' kumpi a hihi. La sakna tawh amah phat un! 8 Pasian in minamte uk a, a tokhom siangtho tungah Pasian tu hi.

{ Topa } in uk a, vangliatna kumpi puan kisilhsak hi. { Topa, } kumpi puan kisilhsak a, thahatna tawh amah kidim hi. Leitung kikipsak a, kiling ngeilo ding hi. 2 Tanglai pek panin na tokhom a kipsa hi a, nang pen a tawntunga om na hi hi.
{ Topa } in vantungah ama tokhom phutkhin a, amah in mun khempeuh a uk hi.
Vantung pen { Topa}-a' hi a, ahih hangin leitung pen mihingte tungah hong pia khin hi.

Amaute in na kumpi gam a minthan'na thu gengenin na vangliatna thu sutsut ding uh a, 12 a vanglian nangma sepnate leh na kumpi gam a hoihna, a minthan'nate mi khempeuh tungah kitheisak ding uhhi. 13 Nangma kumpi gam pen a kip tawntung kumpi gam hi a, nangma ukna khang tawntungin a kip hi. A thuciamna khempeuhah { Topa } thutak mahmah a, a gamtatna khempeuhah zong hehpihna a nei a hihi.

Nidang ciangin { Topa}' inn a omna mual pen mual liante lakah a sangpenin kikipsak ding a, mual neute tungah kisangsak ding hi. Tua lai-ah minam khempeuh pai muamua ding uh a, 3 mi tampite hong pai-in, "Hong pai un, amah in ama zialetongte hong hilh theihna ding leh ama lampite i zuih theihna dingin Jacob' Pasian' inn, { Topa}' mualah paito ni," a ci ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } in Zion panin thu hong gen ding a, Jerusalem khua panin { Topa}' thuhilhna hong paikhia ding hi. 4 Amah in minamte khatlekhat kikalah thu khenin, mi tampite' thu khensak ding hi. Amaute in a namsaute uh lokhawhna tu, a teipite uh singhiang heuhna temkawi-in a seek ding uhhi. Minam khat leh minam khat kido nawnlo ding uh a, galdo dingin kithawi nawnlo ding uhhi.

Keivom pen tuuno tawh omkhawm ding a, kamkei gialbem pen keelno tawh lumkhawm ding hi. Bawngno leh humpinelkai leh ganhing thaute omkhawm ding uh a, naupangno khat nangawn in tuate hawlzo ding hi. 7 Bawngpi leh vompi in an nekhawm ding uh a, amau' note lumkhawm ding uhhi. Humpinelkai in bawngtal mah bangin buhkung ne ding hi. 8 Nawine naungek, gul gilo' kua vangah kimawl ding a, nawine nawnlo naupang in gul gunei' bu a sawk hangin a gul in tulo ding hi. 9 Ka mual siangtho buppi tungah amaute khatlekhat kiliamsak lo ding uh a, kisusia lo ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh tuite in tuipi omna a tuamcip mah bangin leitungah { Topa}' thu theihna kidim ding hi.
En un, ni khat ni ciangin thuman takin kumpi khat in hong uk ding a, uliante in thutang tawh hong uk ding uhhi.
Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } pen eite' thukhen, { Topa } pen eite hong ukpa, { Topa } pen eite' kumpi a hihi. Amah in eite hong honkhia ding hi.
"Vanglian { Topa}, Israel-te' Pasian, Kherub-te tunga a tupa aw, nangmah bek, leitung kumpi gam khempeuhte' Pasian na hi hi. Nangmah in vantung leh leitung na bawl khin hi.

Vantungte a piangsakpa (amah Pasian!) Leitung piangsakin a bawlpa (a kipsakpa; a awngthawl dingin bawlloin, ten'na dingin leitung a piangsakpa!) { Topa } in hih bangin ci hi: "Kei pen { Topa } ka hi a, kuamah dang omlo hi.

"Ka mite aw, ka thugen hong ngai un. Minamte tungah thu ka hilh a, keima thukham in amaute tungah khuavak tun' ding hi. 5 Manlangin hong pai-in amaute ka honkhia ding hi. Ka gualzawh ding hun hong naita hi. Keimah in minamte ka uk ding hi. Tuipi gei-a gamte in kei hong muang uh a, amaute in keima hotkhiat ding hong ngak uhhi.
Thuhoih hong puak, kilemna thu a genzak, thuhoih thupha a hong puak, hotkhiatna thu a genzak, Zion tungah, "Na Pasian in uk hi," ci-in mualte kantanin thu hong gen kamtaipa bangzahin hoih ahi hiam?

Tua hun ciangin Jerusalem khua pen { Topa' } kumpi tokhom kici ding a, Jerusalem khua { Topa' } omna-ah gam khempeuh hong kikhawmin, amaute in amau' mawhnopna lungsim uh a zui tentan nawn kei ding uhhi.

Tua kumpite a maan laitakun vantung Pasian in a bei thei ngeilo ding kumpi gam a hong phut ding hi. Tua kumpi gam kuamah in zo zolo ding a, tua gam in gamdang khempeuhte zogawpin a kip tawntung ding hi.

Amah in vangliatna, minthan'na, leh kumpi za ngah ahih manin minam kimte, minam tuamtuamte, paunam tuamtuamte khempeuh in ama na a sem ding uh a hihi. Amah in a tawntungin uk ding a, a kumpi gam a bei ngei kei ding hi.
Tua ciangin inn tawh kibangin a siasa David ukna gam keimah in ka puahkik ding a, a vang teng hu-in, a sia teng ka puahkik ding a, a nidanga a ngeina lui mah uh ka bangsak kik ding hi.

Mailam hunah { Topa' } biakinn a omna mual, a sangpen mual hong suak ding a, minam tampi in hong zuan ding uhhi. 2 Minam tampite hong pai-in, "Israel mite' Pasian' biakinn, { Topa' } mualah va paito ni. Tua lai-ah ama deihna hong hilh ding a, ama deihna bangin i gamta ding hi," ci ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh Zion panin thuhilhna hong gingkhia a, Jerusalem panin { Topa' } thu hong paikhia hi. 3 Amah in minam tampite' thu khensak ding a, Israel gam panin a gamla pekah a om, minam vangliante' thu khensak ding hi. Amaute in a namsaute uh lokhawhna tu-in seek ding uh a, a teipite uh singhiang heuhna temkawi-in seek ding uhhi. Minam khatlekhat kido nawnlo ding uh a, galkidona theikha nawnlo ding uhhi.
Tua ciangin { Topa } pen leitung khempeuh' kumpi suak ding a, mi khempeuh in amah bek thei-in bia ding uhhi.
"Vantung ki-ukna hun hong naita ahih manin na mawhnate uh kisik kik un," a ci hi.

Khuamial sunga a teng mite in khuavak lianpi mu ding uhhi. Sihna gam khuamial sungah a teng mite tungah khuavak hong taang ding hi," ci hi. 17 Tua huna kipan Zeisu in thuhilh ding kipan a, "Vantung ki-ukna hong naita ahih manin kisikin na omzia uh kheel un," ci-in thu a hilh hi.
"Kha thu lamah zawngkhal a kisate sungah vantung ki-ukna thu om ahih manin thupha ngah mi ahi uhhi.
Pasian' deihna bangin a gamtat manin bawlsiatna a thuak mite vantung ki-ukna sungah a omte ahih manin thupha ngah mi ahi uhhi.

Tua ahih manin hih thukhamte lakpan a neupente khat bek nangawn zuikha loin, midangte in zong a zuihlohna dingin a gen mite pen vantung ki-ukna sungah mi neupen hi ding uhhi. Ahi zongin hih thukhamte zui-in, midangte in zong a zuihna dingin a hilh mite pen vantung ki-ukna sungah milian hi ding uhhi. 20 Tua ahih manin Pasian' deihna bangin gamtatna ding thu-ah Thukham hilh siate leh Pharisee mite sangin na cihtakzawk uh leh vantung ki-ukna sungah a om thei bek ding na hi uhhi.
Na Gam hong piang tahen. Vantungah na deihna a kicin mah bangin, leitungah kicing tahen. (HCN)
Na ukna hun hong tung henla, vantungah nangma deihna bangin a kigamtat mah bangin leitungah zongh kigamta tahen. (PuKKT)
Na ukna hun hong tung henla, vantung bangin leitungah zongh na deih bangin kigamta hen. (TDM)
Na gam hong tung ta hen, vantungah na deihna a kihih bangin, leitung ah zong kihih ta hen. (ZIV)
Na kumpigam hong piang tahen. Vantung ah na deihna a kisep mah bangin, leitung ah zongh kisem tahen. (ZSV)
Pasian' Gam leh ama dikna zong masa un. Na zon' uhleh, tua na khempeuh a hong pia thuah ding hi.
Thudang khempeuh sangin Pasian' ukna leh ama deihna na zuih theihna ding uh thupi ngaihsut masazaw un. Tua hi leh hih na kisapna dangte khempeuh uh zong hong piathuah veve ding hi. (TDM)
Ahi hangin Pasian kumpigam le ama thumaanna zong masa un. Tua hileh hih nate khempeuh hong piathuah ding hi. (ZIV)

Nisuahna leh nitumna panin mi tampi tak hong pai-in vantung ki-ukna sungah Abraham, Isaac, leh Jacob-te tawh an ne-in sabuai-ah tukhawm ding uhhi. 12 Ahi zongin vantung ki-ukna sungah a om dingin a kingaihsun Israel mite ahih leh pualam khuamialna-ah kilawnkhia ding a, tua lai-ah kapin a hagawi ding uhhi," a ci hi.

"Kei kiangah, ‘Topa, Topa aw,’ hong ci mi khempeuh, vantung ki-ukna sungah lutthei kimlo ding uh a, vantungah a om ka Pa' deihna bangin a gamtateng bek lutthei ding uhhi. 22 Tua ni ciangin mi tampi in kei kiangah, ‘Topa, Topa aw, nangma min tawh thu hilhin, nangma min tawh dawite hawlkhia-in, nangma min tawh na lamdang lian tampi bawl hilo ka hi uhhiam?’ hong ci ding uhhi. 23 Tua ciangin keimah in amaute kiangah, ‘Note ka hong thei ngei kei hi. Siatna a gamta mite aw, kei kiang panin kihemkhia un,’ ka ci ding hi.
Nisuahna leh nitumna panin mi tampi tak hong pai-in vantung ki-ukna sungah Abraham, Isaac, leh Jacob-te tawh an ne-in sabuai-ah tukhawm ding uhhi.
Tua bangin khuapite leh khuaneute-ah Zeisu pai kawikawi a, a kikhopna uh innte-ah thu hilhin, Pasian' ukna hangin a lungdamhuai thute gen a, natna nam khempeuh a damsak hi.
Na paina peuh uhah, ‘Vantung ki-ukna hong naita hi,’ ci-in thu va hilh un.

Leitung mi khempeuh sung pan Tuiphumpa Johan a lianpen a hihi. Ahi zongin vantung ki-ukna sungah a neupen i cihte nangawn Johan sangin lianzaw lai hi. 12 Tuiphumpa Johan' thuhilh huna kipan tu ciangdong, mite in vantung ki-ukna thu hong kituhteh gawp uh a, thahatthu hong ciam uhhi.
Note' ngaihsut bang hiloin, Pasian' Kha in dawi hawlkhiatna ding vangliatna kei tungah hong pia ahih manin note lakah Pasian' ukna hun hong kipan khin ahihna hong kilang hi.
Zeisu in, "Vantung ki-ukna tawh kisai thusim note tungah hong kihilh a, ahi zongin amaute tungah kihilhlo hi.

Tua ciangin Zeisu in thugentehna dang khat gen leuleu a, "Vantung ki-ukna pen bang tawh kibang hiam cihleh, mi khat in a lo sungah a vawh ankam tang tawh kibang hi. 32 Khaici khempeuh lak panin ankam tang a neupen a hihi. Ahi zongin a khan'khit ciangin ankung lakah a golpen suak ahih manin vasate in a hiang tungah bu a tomtheihna zah ding ciang hong suak thei hi," a ci hi. 33 Tua ciangin thugentehna khat mah gen leuleu a, "Vantung ki-ukna pen bang tawh kibang hiam cihleh, nupi khat in annel seu thum dim mek manin silngo sawh a, a vekpi-in silngo in zelin a pawmsak tawh kibang hi," a ci hi.

Lolai pen leitung hi a, taangci hoih i cih pen Pasian' ukna sungah a om mite ahi uhhi. Tahumte pen Gilopa tawh a kipawl mite hi a, 39 tahum tang a vawh galpa pen Dawimangpa a hihi. Anlak hun pen leitung beina ding hun hi a, anla nasemte pen vantung mite a hihi.

"Vantung ki-ukna pen lolai-ah a kiseel sum tawh kibang hi. Mi khat in a muh ciangin limtakin a seelpha hi. Amah lungdam mahmahin a inn-ah ciahpah a, a neih khempeuh a zuak khit ciangin tua lo a lei hi. 45 "Vantung ki-ukna pen sumbawlpa in a zon' kep hoihpente tawh zong kibang hi. 46 Sumbawlpa in a manpha diak pawl kep khat a muh ciangin ciahpahin a neih khempeuh a zuak khit ciangin tua kep a lei hi. 47 "Vantung ki-ukna pen tui sungah kipai-in ngasa namkim a awkna ngen tawh zong kibang hi. 48 Ngasa tampi tak a awk ciangin ngabengte in tui gei-ah a ngen uh kaikhia-in tusuk uh a, nektheih ding ngasate, paipel sungah guangin, nektheihloh ding ngasate, a lawnkhia uhhi.

Vantung ki-ukna sung lutna ding tawhtangte, nangma tungah ka hong pia ding a, hih leitungah hoihlo na cihte, vantungah zong a hoihlo hi ding a, hih leitungah hoih hi na cihte, vantungah zong a hoih hi ding hi," a ci hi.

"A man mahmahin note kiangah kong genin-ah: Note kikheelin naupang na bat kei uh leh vantung ki-ukna sungah na lut ngei kei ding uhhi. 4 Hih naupang bangin a kiniamkhiat mite, vantung ki-ukna sungah a lianpen hi ding hi.
Zeisu in, "Vantung ki-ukna pen naupangte tawh a kibang mite-a' ding ahih manin, tua naupangte ka kiangah hong paipihsak unla, khaktan kei un," a ci hi.
"Bang hang hiam cih leh vantung ki-ukna sung omzia pen a leenggah lo-ah na a sem ding a cial dingin zing tungin a kuankhia leenggah lo neipa tawh kibang hi.

Tua ciangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, "Note in bangci ngaihsut na hi uhhiam? Mi khat in tapa nih nei hi. A ta uzaw kiangah, ‘Ka ta aw, tuni-in leenggah lo-ah va kuan in,’ ci-in a sawl ciangin 29 amah in, ‘Kuan nuam kei ing,’ ci napi-in a lungsim kikheelin a kuankik hi. 30 Tua ciangin a ta nauzaw kiangah tua mah bangin va ci a, ‘Pa aw, va kuan mah ning,’ ci napi-in a kuan kei hi. 31 Hih tapa nihte sung panin a koi bel pen a pa' deih bangin gamta ahi hiam?" a ci hi. Amaute in, "A ta uzaw a ta hi," a ci uhhi. Tua ciangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, "Note kiangah a mantaka kong genin-ah: Pasian' ukna sungah note sangin siahdongte leh numei paktatte lut masazaw ding hi. 32 Banghang hiam cihleh note kiangah Tuiphumpa Johan hong pai-in thuman lampi hong lak napi-in na um kei uh a, ahi zongin siahdongte leh numei paktatte in a um uhhi. Hih thu na theih khit uh ciang nangawnin na lungsim uh na kheel nuam tuan kei uh a, na um kei veve uhhi.

"Vantung ki-ukna zia pen a tapa-a' dingin mo pawi a bawl kumpipa' gamtatzia tawh kibang hi. 3 Mo pawi siim dingin a khohsa mite a sam dingin a nasemte sawl a, ahi zongin kuamah pailo hi. 4 Tua ciangin nasem dangte sawl leuleu a, ‘Ka khohsaksa mite kiangah hih bangin va gen un: Ka bawngtalte leh ka bawngno thaute kigo khin a, nitak an a minsa-in a om banah, na khempeuh a mansa-in om khinta hi. Mo pawi an ne dingin hong pai ta un, ci hi, ci-in va gen un,’ a ci hi. 5 Ahi zongin a khohsa mite in na thusimlo uh a, pawlkhat in lo na kuansanin, pawlkhat in a sumbukah na paisanin, 6 adangte in a nasemte manin a na satgawp khit uh ciangin a na that uhhi. 7 Kumpipa zong heh mahmah a, a galkapte kuansakin tua mi thatte a thahsak khit ciangin a khua a haltumsak hi. 8 Tua ciangin a nasemte kiangah, ‘Mo pawi an a baihsa-in om a, ahi zongin ka sap mite a ne dingin a kilawmlo mi a suak uhhi. 9 Tua ahih manin lamlianpi-ah va pai unla, mi na muh zahzah uh hong sam un,’ a ci hi. 10 Nasemte zong lamlianpi-ah va pai uh a, mihoih mi hoihlo ciloin a muh khempeuh uh va kaikhawm uh ahih manin mo pawi bawlna innsung dimin leengla hong om hi. 11 "Kumpipa, a leenglate a en dingin a hong lut ciangin mo pawi siimna puan a silhlo mi khat a mu hi. 12 Ama kiangah, ‘Lawm aw, mo pawi siimna puan silhlopi-in hih lai-ah hong bangci luttheih na hi hiam?’ a cih ciangin tua mipa in a cihna ding a thei kei hi. 13 Tua ciangin kumpipa in a nasemte kiangah, ‘A khut a khe hen unla, pualam khuamialna lakah lawnkhia un; tua lai-ah kapin a hagawi ding hi,’ a ci hi. 14 "Banghang hiam cihleh mi tampi a kisap hangin tawm bek a kiteel hi," a ci hi.

"Mihoih a kineihkhem, no Thukham hilh siate leh Pharisee mite in gimna na thuak ding uhhi. Note in vantung ki-ukna sungah mite a lut theihlohna dingin kong na khakcip uhhi. Note lah na lutnuam kei uh a, a lutnuamte lah na lutsak kei uhhi.
Tua ciangin mi khempeuh tungah teci ahi dingin Pasian' hong ukna hangin a lungdamhuai thu, leitung khempeuhah kihilh ding hi. Tua khit ciangin beina hong tung ding hi.

"Tua hun ciangin vantung ki-ukna zia pen zinei thakpa a uap dingin a meivak uh tawh a pai nungak sawmte tawh kibang ding hi. 2 Nungak sawmte sung panin nga pil uh a, nga hai uhhi. 3 Tua a haite in a meivak sung uhah a tui thunthuah lopi-in pai uh a, 4 ahi zongin a pil nungak ngate in a dimtakin thunin a pai uhhi.
Tua ciangin Kumpipa in a taklamah a om mite kiangah, ‘Ka Pa in thupha a piak mite aw, hong pai ta un. Leitung piancil a kipanin note-a' dingin a kibawlkholsa gamnuam hong luah un.
Note kiangah kong genin-ah: Ka Pa' Ukna sungah note tawh leenggahzu thak ka dawnkik ni matengin leenggahzu ka dawnkik nawn kei ding hi," a ci hi.
"A hunhoih hong tungta a, Pasian' Uk ding hun hong kipanta hi. Na mawhna uh kisikkik unla, hih Lungdamna Thuthak um un," ci-in a hilh hi.

Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Pasian' Ukna pen mi khat in a lolai-ah a vawh khaici tawh kibang hi. 27 Khaici vawhpa zanin ihmu a, zingsangin tho-in sunin a nasep ngeiteng a sem hi. Tua kikal sungin a khaici na po-in na khang a, ahi zongin tua a khan'theihna zia amah in a thu theilo hi. 28 Leitang in ama thu-in na khangsaktawm a, a masa-in a tehno, tua ciangin a kung, tua ciangin a tak a om dongin na khangsak hi. 29 An a min ciangin anlak ding hun ahih manin amah in a phiaukawi tawh an at ding a kipan hi," a ci hi. 30 Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Pasian' Ukna bang tawh kibang ci ding a, i gentelna dingin bang thugentehna zang ding ihi hiam? 31 Leitunga om khaici khempeuh lakah a neupenpen ankam tang tawh kibang hi. Mi khat in tua ankam tang lei-ah vawh a, 32 tawlkhat khit ciangin hong po-in hong khangto a, khaikung khempeuh lakah a golpen pawl hong suak hi. A kung golin a hiangte zaii ahih manin ama liim sung a hiang kawmah vasate in bu a tom uhhi," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in a thugen zomlai a, "Hih lai-a a om mi pawlkhatte a sih ma-in vanglianpi tawh Pasian' Ukna hong tung taktak ding ahihna thu phawk un," a ci hi.
Zeisu in tua thu a phawk ciangin a heh suak a, a nungzuite kiangah, "Naupangte kham kei unla, ka kiangah hong paisak un. Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian' Ukna sungah hih bang mite a om a hihi.

Zeisu in a kiima om a nungzuite enin amaute kiangah, "Pasian' Ukna sungah mihaute a lutding uh bangzah takin haksa ahi hiam?" a ci hi. 24 Nungzuite in hih thu a zak uh ciangin lamdangsa uh a, ahi zongin Zeisu in a thugen zomlai-in, "Tate aw, Pasian' Ukna sungah lutding bangzah takin haksa ahi hiam? 25 Pasian' ukna sungah mihau khat a lutding sangin phim bilvang sungah kalaoh khat a lutding baihzaw lai hi," a ci hi.
Zeisu in hih mipa' thugenzia hoihsa ahih manin, "Pasian' Ukna sungah a om dektak mahmah na hi hi," a ci hi. Tua khita kipanin Zeisu kiangah kuamah in thu dong ngam nawnlo uhhi.
Pasian' Ukna sungah leenggahzu thak ka dawnkik ni matengin leenggahzu a dawn nawnlo ding ka hihna thu limtakin thei un," a ci hi.
mite in a zahtak, ulian vaihawmte lakah a kihel, Pasian' Uk ding hun zong a lamen, Arimathea khuami Joseph, hangtakin Pilat kiangah hong pai-in Zeisu' luang a hong ngen hi.
Jacob suanlekhakte' kumpi hi paisuak ding a, ama ukna bei hun cih om ngeilo ding hi," a ci hi.
Ahi zongin amah in, "Pasian' Ukna hangin Lungdamna Thu a hilh ding mahin a hong kisawl ahih manin khua dangte-ah zong ka va hilh ding hi," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in a nungzuite en a, "No mizawngte Pasian' Ukna sungah om na hih manun thupha ngah mi na hi uhhi.
Tuazawh tawlkhat khit ciangin khuapite leh khuaneute-ah a ban banin Zeisu pai a, Pasian' Ukna hangin Lungdamna Thu hilhin a vak kawikawi hi. Tua a vak kawikawina-ah nungzui sawmlenihte,
Tua ciangin Pasian' Ukna thu a hilh ding leh cinatnate a damsak dingin kuankhia sakin
Ke'n kong cihin-ah, hih lai-ah a om mi pawlkhatte in Pasian' Ukna a muh khit uh matengin silo ding uh ahihna phawk un," a ci hi.
tua khuasunga cinate damsak un. A khuamite kiangah, ‘Pasian' Ukna ding hun note-a' dingin hong naita hi,’ ci-in gen un.
Zeisu in amaute kiangah, "Hih bangin na ngen ding uhhi: ‘Pa aw, na min siangtho kizahtak hen la,—- na Ukna hun hong tung ta hen.
Note' ngaihsut bang hiloin, ke'n Pasian' vangliatna tawh dawite hawlkhia ka hih manin, note kiangah Pasian' Ukna hun hong tungta ahihna phawk un.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Tuuhon tawmnote aw, lau-in lunghimawh kei un. Na Pa un ama Ukna sungah ukna thu a nei dingin a hong sehsa a hihi.

Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Pasian' Ukna bang tawh kibang a, bang tawh genteh ding ka hi hiam cihleh: 19 Mi khat in a lo-ah a vawh ankam tang khat tawh kibang hi. Tua ankam tang hong khangin kung golpi hong suak a, vasate in a hiang tungah bu a tom thei uhhi," a ci hi. 20 Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Pasian' Ukna bang tawh genteh leuleu ding ka hi hiam cihleh: 21 Nupi khat in annel lom sungah a sawh silngo tawh kibang hi. Tua silngo in a annel lom khempeuh a pawmsak hi," a ci hi.

Pasian' Ukna sungah Abraham, Isaac, Jacob, leh kamsangte khempeuh a omna mu napi-in, note a pualamah hong kihawlkhiat ciangin tua huna na kahna uh leh na ha gawina uh bangzah takin nasia ding ahi hiam? 29 Nisuahna leh nitumna, leilu leh leitaw lam panin mite hong pai-in Pasian' Ukna sung sabuai kiimah tukhawm ding uhhi.
An ne-a a tutpih mite khat in hih thu a zak ciangin Zeisu kiangah, "Pasian' Ukna sungah an ne-a a tu mite bangzahin mi hampha ahi uhhiam?" a ci hi.

"Tuiphumpa Johan' hun ciangdong Moses Thukham leh kamsangte' thugente pen zuih belin kinei a, ahi zongin Pasian' Ukna hangin Lungdamna Thu a kihilh huna kipanin hih thu-ah mi khempeuh hong kituhteh uhhi.

Khatvei Pharisee mite pawlkhat in, cik ciangin Pasian' Ukna hun hong tung ding ahi hiam, ci-in Zeisu dong uh a, Zeisu in, "Pasian' Ukna pen mit tawh muhtheihin hong tunglo ding hi. 21 Hih lai-ah om hi, hua lai-ah om hi, cih bangin kuama gentheih hilo hi. Banghang hiam cihleh note lakah Pasian' Ukna hong om khinzo hi," ci-in a dawng hi.

Zeisu in thupha a piaksak ding a deihna-un mi pawlkhat in a naupangnote nangawn uh Zeisu kiangah hong paipih uhhi. A nungzuite in hih thu a theih uh ciangin amaute na taii uhhi. 16 Ahi zongin Zeisu in naupangnote sam a, "Naupangte hong pai ding khaktan kei un; ka kiangah hong paisak un. Banghang hiam cihleh naupang a bang mite pen Pasian' Ukna sungah om thei bek hi. 17 Ke'n kong cihin-ah, naupang bangin Pasian' Ukna a manglo peuhmah Pasian' Ukna sungah om theilo ding hi," a ci hi.

Zeisu pen Jerusalem khua a tung dektak hi a, Pasian' Ukna hun hong tung kuanta ding hi, ci-in mite in zong ngaihsun uh ahih manin, mite in ama thugen a na ngaih laitakun Zeisu in amaute kiangah thugentehna khat genthuah lai a, 12 "Khatvei, ulian khat om a, kumpi za a lakkhit ciangin a ciahkik dingin gamlapi gamah a pai dingin a dingkhia hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian' Ukna hun hong tun' mateng, tu-a kipanin leenggahzu ka dawn nawn kei ding hi," a ci hi.

Tua laitakin Joseph a kici mi khat om a, Judea gamsunga om Arimathea khuami a hihi. Amah pen mihoih, a zahtakhuai mi khat hi a, Pasian' Uk ding hun lamenin a ngakngak mi khat a hihi. Amah pen ulian thuvaihawm sunga kihel hi a, ahi zongin a lawmte' vaihawmna leh a nasepnate uh thukimpih lo hi.

Zeisu in, "A mantakin kong genin-ah, mi khatpeuh a suahkik kei leh Pasian' Ukna sungah lut theilo ding hi," a ci hi. 4 Tua ciangin Nikodemas in, "Mi khat a teek khit ciangin bangci suahkik thei ding ahi hiam? A nu' sungah lutkikin suakkik thei ding ahi hiam?" ci-in a dot ciangin 5 Zeisu in, "A mantakin kong genin-ah, mi khatpeuh tui leh Khasiangtho tawh a suahkik kei leh Pasian' Ukna sungah lut theilo ding hi.
Ke'n kong cihin-ah, hih lai-ah a om mi pawlkhatte in Pasian' Ukna a muh khit uh matengin silo ding uh ahihna phawk un," a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Keima ukna pen hih leitung gam hilo hi. Keima ukna hih leitung gam hi leh Jerusalem khua-a Jew mi uliante' khutsungah hong kipiak lohna dingin ka nungzuite in a do ding uhhi. Tua ahih manin keima ukna pen hih leitung tawh kizomlo hi," a ci hi.
Ama sih khitzawh ni sawmli sung amaute tungah tam veipi kilang a, amah a nungta taktak ahihna teltakin a kithei a hihi. Amaute in amah mu uh a, Pasian' Ukna thu amaute tungah a gen hi.
Ahi zongin Pasian' Ukna Lungdamna Thu leh Zeisu Christ thu, Philip' gente a up uh ciangin, numei pasal a um khempeuh tui a kiphum uhhi.
Thu um mite a upna uhah citakin a omna dingun hanthawnin tha pia uh a, "Pasian' Ukna sungah i omtheihna dingin haksatna tampi thuak ding hi hang," ci-in a hilh uhhi.
Tua ciangin Paul in kikhopna innsungah hangtakin kha thum sung thu hilh a, mite in Pasian' Ukna thu a upzawhna dingun nakpi takin a gen hi.
"A beisa hunah Pasian' Ukna thu a hilhin note lakah kong vak kawikawi a, ahi zongin tu-in kuamah in nong muhkik nawnloh ding uh ka thei hi.

Tua ahih manin Paul tawh a kimuhna ding uh a ni khat seh uh a, tua a kiciam ni-un Paul a zintun'na munah Jew mite tampi tak a kikhawm uhhi. Paul in zingsanga kipan nitak dongin amaute tungah Pasian' Ukna thu gentel a, Zeisu' thu man hi, ci-in a uptheihna dingun Moses Thukham leh kamsangte' laigelhte siksanin a gen hi.
Amah in Pasian' Ukna thu, leh Topa Zeisu Christ' thu, hangtakin a ututin genin a hilh hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian' Ukna pen nek leh dawn tawh a kisai thu hilo a, Khasiangtho hangin i ngah Pasian' deih bangin gamtatna, kilemna, lungdamna, cihte hizaw hi.

Migilote, Pasian' Ukna sungah a lut hetlohna ding thu na thei uhhi. Note kihaibawl kei un. Numei tawh a paktatte, milim biate, mi zi ahih kei leh mi pasal tawh a mawhte, pasal leh pasal a khialte, 10 a gutate, a huaihamte, zukhamte, mi gensiate, ahih kei leh mi' na a sutte khat beek, Pasian' Ukna sungah lutthei hetlo ding hi.
Sanggamte aw, note kiangah ka hong gennop thu in: Pasian' Ukna sungah hih leitung silesa pumpi lut theilo ding a, a siathei pumpi pen a siatheilo pumpi suak theilo ding hi.

Tu-in mihing pianzia hong kitel a, tuate pen: Numei tawh mawhna, thangtatna, lanluat mana khialhna, 20 milim biakna, mi bumna, kilangbawlna, kitotna, hazatna, hehna, huaihamna, kikhenna, pawltuam lungsim neihna, 21 en'na, zukhamna, leh biakna pawi-ah zukhamna-a kipan adangdangte a hihi. A beisa hunah ka hong hilhkholhsa bangin tu-in ka hong genkikin-ah: Hih bangin a gamta mite pen Pasian' Ukna sungah omkha hetlo ding hi.

en'na, zukhamna, leh biakna pawi-ah zukhamna-a kipan adangdangte a hihi. A beisa hunah ka hong hilhkholhsa bangin tu-in ka hong genkikin-ah: Hih bangin a gamta mite pen Pasian' Ukna sungah omkha hetlo ding hi.
Amah in khuamial vangliatna panin eite hong honkhia-in, a lungmuan'huaina mun, a it a Tapa' ukna sungah hong koih a, 14 tua a Tapa in eite hong khahkhia a, i mawhna hong kimaisak khinta hi.
Tu-a na thuaknate uh hangin Pasian' Ukna sungah a om dingin a kilawm mi suak na hih manun Pasian' thukhenna a man ahihna hong kilangsak hi.
Keimah zong gualzo-in ka Pa' tokhomah ka tutkhawm uh mah bangin a gualzote khempeuh zong kei tawh ka tokhom tungah hong tutkhawm theihna dingun thu ka pia ding hi.
Pasian' na a sem dingin siampi za leh kumpi za na pia a, amaute in leitung ukin a om ding uhhi," a ci uhhi.
Topa Pasian pen amaute' khuavak hi-in, a tawntungin amaute in uk paisuak ding uh ahih manin khuamial hun cih om nawnlo ding a, khua a vaksak ding meivak leh nitaang cihte kisamlo ding uhhi.
Hih thute khit ciangin mang sungah { Topa' } thu Abram' tungah hong tung a, "Abram aw, lau kei in. Keimah in lauhuaina panin nang ka hong hu ding a, na thaman lian mahmah ding hi," a ci hi.
{ Topa } in note-a' dingin hong dosak ding a, note ahih leh na om hithiat ding uhhi bek hi," a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin note ki-ap unla siangtho un; Banghang hiam cihleh kei pen { Topa } na Pasian uh ka hihi.
Thahat unla, hang un. Lau kei unla, amaute kihta kei un. Banghang hiam cihleh note tawh hong paipa pen { Topa } na Pasian uh a hihi. Note hong cimawhsaklo ding a, hong nusialo ding hi," a ci hi.
Na nuntak sung tawntung kuamah in na mai hong khak zolo ding hi. Moses tawh ka om mah bangin nang tawh zong kong om ding hi. Nang kong tamasak kei ding a, kong nusia kei ding hi.
Thu hong pia khin hilo ka hi hiam? Thahat in la hang in. Lau kei in la lungkia kei in; Banghang hiam cihleh na paina peuhpeuhah { Topa } na Pasian nang tawh hong om hi," a ci hi.
"Pasian in a taii mite mi nuamsa hizaw ahih manin, Vanglianpa' taiina thupi san' in.
{ Topa } pen keima suangpi, ka munkip muan'huai, kei a hong honkhiapa, ka Pasian, ka suangpi, ka belhpa, ka lum, ka kihotkhiatna ki, ka munkip a hihi.
Banghang hiam cihleh amah in a thuak mi' gimna simmawh bawllo a, zong kihbawl lo hi. Ama kiang pan a mai seello a, ama tungah a koh ciangin, amah in a za hi.

{ Topa' } tung panin na khat ka ngen khin a, tua ngenin ka zon' ding pen: { Topa' } inn sungah ka khan' tawntungin om ding, { Topa' } hoihna et ding leh ama biakinn sungah thu dot dingte a hihi. 5 Banghang hiam cihleh haksat hun ciangin amah in a buk sungah kei hong seel ding hi. A puanbuk khuhna nuai-ah kei hong seel ding a, a sangna suang tungah kei hong koih ding hi.
{ Topa } muang in. Thakhauh in la, na lungsim hangsakin, { Topa } muang in.
Ama hehna tomno sung bek hi a, ama hong deihsakna pen khang tawntung-a ding a hihi. Zan hun sungteng kahna omkha mah ding a, ahih hangin zing khuavak tawh nuamna hong tung hi.
{ Topa } tawh kikhawl phot unla, ama hoihna thei un! Amah a beel mite mi lungdam ahi uhhi.
Lungsim kitamzante kiangah { Topa } hong om a, lungsim zangawpte a hon hi.

{ Topa } muang in la, gamtat hoih in. Gam nuamah teng in la, thumanin om in. 4 { Topa } sungah lungkim in; amah in na deihna hong pia ding hi. 5 { Topa } tungah na vai teng ap in. Amah muang in; amah in hong sem ding hi. 6 Amah in nangma dikna khuavak bangin, nangma thumanna nitaang bangin hong langsak ding hi.

{ Topa } lamenin ka ngak ngiungeu a, amah kei lam hong nga-in ka kikona aw hong za hi. 2 Dahna dum sung, buannawng panin kei hong kaikhia-in suangpi tungah ka khete nga a, ka khesikna mun a muan'huaisak hi.
Kei ahih leh zawngin ka cimawh a, ahih hangin { Topa } in kei hong mangngilhlo hi. Nang pen kei hong huhpa leh hong honkhiapa na hi hi. Zekai kei in, ka Pasian aw.
Pasian, i belh leh i thahatna hi a, haksat hunin a hong huh pahpahpa a hihi.

Hih pen eima Pasian hi a, a tawntungin eima Pasian hi, ci-in khangkikte tungah na gen theihna dingun Zion kiimvelin pai-in, a tausang phazah sim unla, a kulh phungmai a hoih mahmahte ngaihsunin, a phualpi muan'huaite va nawk kim un. Amah pen a tawntungin lam hong lak dingpa a hihi.
{ Topa } tungah na vangik nga in, amah in hong huh ding hi. Amah in mi thumante kilingsak ngeilo ding hi.
Eite' Pasian pen hong honkhia Pasian hi a, sihna pan a hong suaktasak Topa { Pasian } a hihi.
Ka lungsim leh ka pumpi zawngkhal khading a, ahih hangin Pasian pen ka lungsim hatna leh keima-a' hi tawntung ding hi.

Amah in ka khe taalsaklo ding a, kei hong kempa lusulo ding hi. 4 En un, Israel a kempa lusulo a, zong ihmulo hi. 5 { Topa } in nang hong cing ding a, nangmah a hong hu dingin na kiangah hong om hi. 6 Sunin ni in nang hong gimsaklo ding a, zanin kha in zong nang hong sukhalo ding hi. 7 { Topa } in siatna khempeuh panin nang hong hu ding a, amah in a muan'huai-in nang hong kem ding hi. 8 { Topa } in tu-a kipan a tawntungin na vaksuk na vaktohna-ah nang hong kem ding hi.
Nangmah in na khut na hong a, nuntak husan'na a nei khempeuhte' deihna a kicingin na pia hi.
Hih zong Vanglian { Topa}' kiang pan a hong pai thu a hihi. Amah pen thu lamlahna-ah lamdang mahmah a, pilna-ah lian mahmah hi.
Ahih hangin { Topa } a muang mite a tha uh dimkik ding a, muvanlai bangin kha tawh leengto-in, amaute tai napi-un tawllo ding uh a, amaute lam pai napi-un gimlo ding uhhi.
nang hong ompih ka hih manin lau kei in. Na Pasian ka hih manin lungkia kei in. Nang hong thakhauhsakin ka hong huh ding a, nang hong huhin ka hong honkhia ding hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh keimah { Topa } na Pasian in na khut taklam ka len hi. "Lau kei in, nangmah kong huh ding hi," nang tungah a hong cipa keimah ka hihi.

Ahih hangin Jacob aw, nangmah hong piangsakpa, Israel aw, nangmah hong bawlpa, { Topa } in tu-in hih bang ci hi: "Hong honkhia khin ka hih manin lau kei in. Na min tawh kong sam khinzo a, nang pen kei-a' na hi hi. 2 Tuite na kantan ciangin nang kong ompih ding a, gunte na kantan ciangin tui in hong tuumlo ding hi. Mei kantanin na pai ciangin na kang kei ding a, meikuangte in nang hong kangtumlo ding hi.
Tu-in a thak na khat ka bawl a, tu-in hong piangkhia hi. Note in theilo na hi uhhiam? Gamlakah lam lianpi khat ka bawl ding a, sehnel gamsungah gunte ka luangsak ding hi.

Ahih hangin { Topa } in, "Ama sung panin a suak a tapa a hehpihlo ding zahin nupi khat in ama nawi a teep naungek mangngilh thei ding ahi hiam? Hihte nangawn in mangngilhkha thei ding a, ahi zongin keimah in kong mangngilh kei ding hi.
A lunggim mite ka thahatsak theihna dingin Topa { Pasian } in ka gen ding thu hong hilh khin hi. Ama hong hilhnate a ngai dingin zingsang simin lawpna hong guan' hi.

Lau kei in, maizumna na thuak kei ding hi. Cihna ding theiloin om kei in; maizumin nang hong kikoihlo ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh na khangno lai-in na zulhtatna leh na meigon'na hangin hong kikonate na phawkkha nawn kei ding hi.

A honkhia zolo dingin { Topa } zawngkhallo a, khua a za theilo dingin a bil ngonglo hi. 2 Ahih hangin note' mawhnate in note leh na Pasian uh kikhenna hong piangsak a, amah in note' aw hong zak theihlohna dingin na khialhnate un ama maitang liah hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } in kong cihin-ah, mailamah lametna note kong piakkik ding, na siatna ding uhhiloin na phattuamna ding uh geelna ka neihte kei bek in ka thei hi.
{ Topa } in kong cihin-ah: "Kap nawn kei unla, na khitui uh nul un. Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } in kong cihin-ah, na nasep thaman uh na ngah uhhi. Amaute galte' gam panin hong ciahkik ding uhhi.
A bei theilo { Topa }' hong itna leh a hehpihna a kizom paisuak hi a, 23 zing nisuak bangin thaksuak tawntung a, ni a hong suah pelmawh mah tawh a kibang a hihi.
Bethlehem Efrathah khua aw, nang pen Judah gamah khua neupen khat na hi a, ahi zongin nang sung panin Israel-te a uk ding khat ka piangsak ding hi. Ama gui pen tangtawng pek tawh kizom hi.
{ Topa } hoih hi; lungkham hunin a mite huh a, amah a beel mite limtakin a kem hi.
"Kei, { Topa } ka hi a, lungsim a kheello mi ka hihi. No Jacob suanlekhakte aw, a siacimit na hi nai kei uhhi.
Keimah in na kong sep ni ciangin note in migilote nuaisiahin leivui bangin na tuancil ding uhhi.
Lungsim takpi tawh Pasian a zong mite in Pasian mu ding ahih manin thupha ngah mi ahi uhhi.

Gitta nih ciangin mat khatin kizuak lel hilo ahi hiam? Tua hinapi-in na Pa uh' thukim lohin tua gittate khat nangawn lei-ah mawkkiatlo hi. 30 Note ahih leh na lu tung uha na sammal phazah nangawn uh hong kiciamtehsak hi. 31 Tua ahih manin lau kei un. Gitta tampi sangin note na manphazaw uhhi.
"Na semin vangik pua-in a gim mite khempeuh aw, ka kiangah hong pai ta un. Note tungah lungsim tawldamna ka hong pia ding hi.
Pasian in, ‘Kei pen Abraham' Pasian, Isaac' Pasian, Jacob' Pasian ka hi hi,’ ci hi. Pasian pen a si mite' Pasian hiloin a nungta mite' Pasian ahi hi," a ci hi.

A kipat cilin Thu na om a, tua Thu, Pasian tawh na omkhawm a, tua Thu, Pasian a hihi. 2 Tua hi a, a kipat cila kipanin Thu leh Pasian na omkhawm hi. 3 Pasian in Thu tawh na khempeuh piangsak a, a kipiangsak na khempeuh, Thu tawh loin a kipiangsak khat beek omlo hi. 4 Nuntakna a nei khempeuh in tua Thu tung panin a nuntakna uh ngah a, tua nuntakna in mi khempeuh tungah khuavak hong tun'pih hi.
Kuamah in Pasian mu ngeilo hi. Pasian tawh a kinai pen, Pasian mah ahi Tapa khat bek in Pasian hong kilangsak hi.
Pasian pen Kha ahi hi; amah a biate in tua Kha' lamlahna leh thuman taktak tawh a bia ding uhhi," a ci hi.

Pasian in leitung a pian'sak cila kipanin a kimu theilo ama pianzia ahi tawntung vanglianpa leh Pasian ahihna thute ama bawlsa nate tung panin teltakin hong kilang hi. Tua ahih manin, "Thei kei ing," ci-in paulap a zon'theihna ding uh omlo hi.
Tuhuna i thuaknate pen Pasian in a hong piakding minthan'na tawh ka ngaihsut khawm ciangin, tuhuna i thuaknate gentham ka sa het kei hi.
Ama deihna bang a sem dingin Pasian in a hong sap, amah a it eite-a' dingin na khempeuh a hoihlamin piangsak hi, ci-in i thei hi.
Hihteng bang ahih khit ciangin bang gen ding om nawn ahi hiam? Pasian in eite hong koppih peuh leh kua in eite hong zo zo ding ahi hiam?
Khasiangtho' huhna tawh note' lametna a khan' semsem theihna dingin, lametna a hong piathei Pasian in, amah na upna uh hangin lungdamna leh nopsakna tawh note hong kidimsak ta hen.

Dal limlang sunga et bangin tu laitakin a kitel phaloin i mu milmial a, ahi zongin mailamah maitang kituahin i mu ding hi. Tu laitakin i theihnate kicinglo a, ahi zongin mailamah Pasian in eite hong theih mah bangin a kicing takin amah i thei ding hi.

Eite' Topa Zeisu Christ' Pa ahi, hehpihna a nei Pa, i kisapna khempeuhah a hong huh Pasian in thupha ngah ta hen.4 Amah in kote' haksatna khempeuhah hong huh ahih manin, kote in zong Pasian' tung panin ka ngah uh tua huhna mah zangin haksatna a nam tuamtuam a thuakte ka huhsawn thei leuleu uhhi.

Tuhun laitakin tomno sung lungkhamna ka thuakte uh in ka thuakna uh sangin nakpi takin a lianzaw tawntung minthan'na sung hong tun'pih ding hi. 18 Banghang hiam cihleh a kimuthei nate a mitsuan' ka hi kei uh a, a kimu theilo nate a mitsuan' ka hi uhhi. A kimuthei nate tomno sung bek kimang a, a kimu theilo nate a tawntungin a kip a hihi.
Kote' zat galdona hiam pen leitung galhiam lelte hilo a, galte' pan'mun phualpi a susiazo ding Pasian' galhiam khauhte a hihi.

Eite-a' dingin na a hong sepsak, eite' ngetzah val, leh i ngaihsut zawhloh zah dongin a vangliatna tawh tampi tak a hong hihsak thei 21 eite' Pasian pen, pawlpi mite khempeuh leh Christ Zeisu tawh a kipawl mi khempeuh in a khang khangin a tawntungin phat ciat ta uh hen. Amen.
Christ in a hong piak vangliatna tawh hihte khempeuh nawkzawhna ding thahatna a nei ka hihi.

Sanggamte aw, lametna a neilo mite bangin na dahluat lohna dingun a sisa mite' omzia ding thu na theih ding uh ka deih hi. 14 Zeisu si-in thokik hi, ci-in i up mah bangin Pasian in Zeisu hong paipih kik ciangin amah umin a si mite zong hong tonpih ding hi, ci-in i um hi.

Tua i Pasian bek mah a si theilo hi a, khuavak pha mahmah sungah om ahih manin kuamah in a kiang neh theilo hi. Kuamah in amah mu ngeilo a, zong mu theilo hi. A tawntungin amah kipahtawi hen la, vanglian tawntung ta hen. Amen.

Pasian' thu nungta-in a gamtang hi a, langnih a hiam namsau sangin hiamzaw lai hi. Kha leh lungsim, guh leh taang kituahna, guh leh guhngek dongin khenkhia thei hi. Mihingte' lungsim ngimna leh a ngaihsutnate zong theithei hi. 13 Pasian' mai-ah selcip theihding bangmah omlo hi. Eite khempeuh i din'na dingpa' mai-ah a kipiangsak na khempeuh a kiliah a ki-im thei om loin kimu sinsen hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh eite' Pasian pen a kangtum thei meikuang tawh a kibang a hihi.
Pasian khat bek om hi, ci-in na um hi. Tua pen hoih mahmah hi. Dawite nangawn in zong tua bangin umin lau-in ling deldel uhhi.

Thukham a piapa leh thu a khenpa pen Pasian bek hi a, amah bek in hong honkhiazo a, hong susiazo hi. Tua ahih manin Banghangin na mipihte uh gensia-in thu a khenthei dingin kingaihsun zenzen na hi uhhiam?
Note a hong sampa a siangtho ahih mah bangin note zong na gamtatna khempeuh uhah na siangtho un. 16 Laisiangtho sungah zong, "Keimah siangtho ka hih manin note zong na siangtho un," na kici hi.
Pasian in note hong kem ding ahih manin na lungkhamnate khempeuh uh ama kiang tun'pih un.

Pate aw, note tungah lai ka hong gelhna pen a kipat cila kipanin a na ompa na theihna hang uh a hihi. Tangvalte aw, note tungah lai ka hong gelhna pen note na lungsim uh thahatin, Pasian' thu zui-in, Dawimangpa zokhin na hihna hang uh a hihi.

A gualzo mi khempeuh in kei tung panin a ngahding thu in: Kei pen amaute' Pasian ka hi ding a, amaute keima ta ahi ding uhhi. 8 Ahi zongin a meidawite, a lehtatte, a lampialte, mi thatte, a paktatte, aisante, milim biate, leh zuaugente omna ding mun pen sihna nihna ahi kat a kikhulna meiphualpi kuang sung ahi hi," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, "Kei pen na pa' Pasian, Abraham' Pasian, Isaac' Pasian, leh Jacob' Pasian ka hi hi," na ci hi. Tua ciangin Moses in Pasian a muh ding lau ahih manin a maitang a hum hi.
Pasian in Moses kiangah, "{ Keimah } ka hi hi," ci hi. Tua ciangin Pasian in, "Israel mite tungah hih thu genin, ‘{ Keimah } a kicipa in note kiangah kei hong sawl hi,’ ci in," a ci hi.

Tuate' mai-ah na kun kei ding uh a, tuate na bia kei ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh keimah note' { Topa } Pasian, a aam Pasian ka hi a, kei hong mudahte' tungah pate' mawhna tate' tungah khang thum khang lina dongin thuk-in, 6 ahih hangin kei hong itin ka thupiakte a zui mi a tul tampite tungah itna kip a lakpa ka hihi.

Ahi zongin a ni sagih ni pen { Topa } note' Pasian' Sabbath ni a hihi. Tua ni-in note, na tapate, na tanute, na nasempate, na nasemnute, na ganhing uh ahi a, peemtate in ahi zongin na bangmah na sem kei ding uhhi.

Ama mai-ah { Topa } pai-in, { "Topa}, { Topa}, hehpihna nei-in a dik Pasian; lungduai-in itna kip leh thutakna tawh a dim; 7 mi tul tampite-a' dingin itna kip a nei; mawhna, thu palsatna leh khialhna maisakin; ahih hangin bangbang hita leh mawhna a khahkhong ngeilo; pate' mawhna tate' tung leh tute' tung, khang thum khang lina dongin a thukpa," ci-in a pulak hi.
Note in keima biakna ngeina kipte semin ka thukhamte lenin tuate na zui ding uhhi. Kei pen { Topa } na Pasian uh ka hihi.
A lian nangma itna kip tawh a kizui leh Egypt panin tuhun dong hih mite na maisaksa tawh kizui-in hih mite' mawhna maisak in, kong thum hi," a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin { Topa } na Pasian uh amah bek ahi Pasian hi a, amah itin a thupiakna a zuite tungah khang tul khat dongin thuciamna leh itna kip lenin a thuman Pasian,

"Tuni-in na teel dingun note' mai-ah nuntakna leh a hoih na, sihna leh siatna ka koih khinzo hi. 16 { Topa } na Pasian uh itna, ama lampite totna, ama thupiaknate leh ama thukhamte leh ama ngeina kipte zuihna tawh, tuni-a no tungah kong gen ahi { Topa } na Pasian uh thupiaknate na man' uh leh, note nungta-in tampi na pha ding uh a, a luah dingin note na lutna uh leitang tungah { Topa } na Pasian un note thupha hong pia ding hi.
"‘Tu-in thei un, keimah a kicipa pen kei ka hi a, kei simloh pasian dang kuamah omlo hi. Ka that a, ka nungtasak hi. Ka liamsak a, ka damsak hi. Ka khutsung pan a honkhiazo kuamah omlo hi.
"Israel aw, nangmah huh dingin vantungah a tuang a liatna tawh vanpi-ah a om, Pasian tawh a kibang kuamah dang omlo hi.

Ahih hangin { Topa } in Samuel kiangah, "A tungtham hita leh a tun' san'na hita leh en kei in. Banghang hiam cihleh amah ka nolh hi. { Topa } in mihingte' muh bangin mulo hi. Mihingte in a pualam a kilangte en a, ahih hangin { Topa } in a lungsim en hi," a ci hi.

"Ahi zongin gamsate va dong un, hong hilh ding uhhi. Vasate va dong un, hong hilh ding uhhi. 8 Leitung ganhingte va dong un, hong hilh ding uhhi. Tui sung ngasate zong va dong un, hong hilh ding uhhi. 9 Pasian' khut in amaute a bawlna thu a vekpi-un thei kim uhhilo ahi hiam? 10 A pian'saksate' nuntakna Pasian mah in a uk a hihi. Mihing khempeuhte' nuntakna ama khutsungah om hi.
Va-akte a gilkialin leng kawikawi-in, a note in an duhin kei tungah hong nget ciangun, tua va-akte an a piapa kua ahi hiam?
Mite a kibawlphat kik kei leh, Pasian in a thalkhau suii zo a, a namsau taat ding hi.
{ Topa' } thuciamnate, a siangtho thuciamna hi a, meikhuk sungah sagihvei a kisiangsak ngun tawh kibang hi.
Nangmah in keima mei nong vaksak a, { Topa } ka Pasian in ka khuamial na vaksak hi.
Hih Pasian — a thu kicing a, { Topa' } kamciamna a manna kilang hi. Amah a belte khempeuh-a' dingin kidalna lum a hihi.

Vantung in Pasian' minthan'na gen a, vanpi in ama nasepna taangko hi. 2 Nisimin thu gengen a, zan simin theihtelna pulaklak hi. 3 Pauna leh kammal omlo a, amau' aw kizalo hi. 4 Ahih hangin a aw uh leitung khempeuhah kizel a, a kammal uh leimong dongah a tung hi. Amau' sungah ni-a' ding omna khat bawl khin a, 5 a innsung pan a hong pusuak zi pi tangval tawh ahi zongin, lungtaii takin tai ding a kipan mi thahat khat tawh ahi zongin a kibang hi. 6 Ama suahna van mong pan hi a, mong khat dongin pai a, ama satna panin a kiliah thei bangmah omlo hi. 7 { Topa' } thu kicing a, nuntakna a thaksuaksak hi. { Topa' } teci pan'na hi takpi a, mi pillote pilsak hi. 8 { Topa' } thuhilhte man a, lungsim nuamsak hi. { Topa' } thupiakna siang a, mitte vaksak hi. 9 { Topa } a kizahtakna siang a, kip tawntung hi. { Topa' } ngeina kipte thuman a, a vekin kituakin man kim hi. 10 Kham sangin ahi zongin kham hoihpen sang ahi zongin tuate deihhuaizaw a, khuaizu leh khuailuzu taakte sangin zong khumzaw lai hi. 11 Tua thamloin tuate' hangin a thanempa in thuphawkna ngah a, tuate zuihna-ah noptuamna lian a om hi. 12 Ahih hangin kua in ama khialhnate mukhia theitawm ahi hiam? Theihloh manin khialhna panin kei hong siangsak hi. 13 Mawh kaltangnate panin zong na nasempa hong kem in la, tuate keima tungah hong uksak kei in! Tua ciangin kei ka kawkbaang kei ding a, mawhna liante panin ka siang ding hi. 14 { Topa, } ka belh suangpi leh keimah hong tankhiapa aw, ka kammal leh ka lungsim ngaihsutnate nangma muhna-ah a san'huai suaksak ta in!
Ama hehna tomno sung bek hi a, ama hong deihsakna pen khang tawntung-a ding a hihi. Zan hun sungteng kahna omkha mah ding a, ahih hangin zing khuavak tawh nuamna hong tung hi.
{ Topa } ka Pasian aw, na sep a lamdangte leh ko-a' dingin na ngaihsutnate tampi tak na phasak a, kuamah dang tawh tehtheih na hi kei hi. Tuate pulakin gen ding hi leng, genkhit zawh ding hilo hi.
Mite aw, amah muang tawntung unla, na lungkhamna teng uh ama tungah gen un. Pasian, eite' bukna a hihi.
Thuman leh thutang tawh na ukna za na phut a, itna kip leh thuman tawh na khempeuh na sem hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } hoih hi. Ama itna kipin kho tawntung a, ama thumanna a khang khangin kip hi.

Amah in eite' khialhna tawh a kituakin eite tungah hong bawllo a, eite' mawhna tawh a kituakin hong thukkiklo hi. 11 Vantung pen leitung panin a san' mah bangin amah a zahtakte' tungah ama itna kip lianin sang mahmah hi. 12 Nisuahna pen nitumna panin a gamlat mah bangin i mawhna hangin gimnate eite' kiang panin gamlapi-ah a nilkhia hi. 13 Pa in tate a hehpih bangin { Topa } in amah a zahtakte hong hehpih hi.
{ Topa } in vantungah ama tokhom phutkhin a, amah in mun khempeuh a uk hi.
{ Topa } aw, vantungah nangma thu kip tawntung hi.

A vanglian nangma bawlnate mite in taangko ding uh a, nangma vangliatna mah kei zong ka pulak ding hi. 7 Amaute in nangma liatna, na minthan'na genkhia-in nangma thumanna nakpi takin sa ding uhhi. 8 { Topa } dikin hehpihna nei a, heh hak mahmahin itna kip lianpi a nei hi.

{ Topa } phat un. Vantung panin { Topa } phat unla, a sangna panin amah phat un. 2 Ama vantung mi khempeuh aw, amah phat un. Ama mihonte khempeuh aw, amah phat un. 3 Ni leh kha aw, amah phat un. A taang aksi khempeuh aw, amah phat un. 4 Van sangpente leh vantunga om tuite aw, amah phat un. 5 { Topa' } min amaute phatsak un. Banghang hiam cihleh amah in thu pia a, amaute a piang hi. 6 Amaute a tawntunga om dingin amah in kipsak a, a palsatloh ding uh thupiakna amah in a bawl hi. 7 Leitung panin { Topa } phat un, no gulpi liante leh tuipi thuk khempeuh, 8 mei leh gial, tuikhal leh vuk, ama thupiakna a mang huihpi! 9 Amah phat un, no mual liante leh mual neute khempeuh, gah a nei singkungte leh taamtak singkung khempeuh! 10 Gamsate leh innsate khempeuh, a bokvak ganhingte leh a leeng vasate khempeuh! 11 No leitung kumpite leh mihing khempeuh, leitung uliante leh thukhente khempeuh! 12 Nungakte leh tangvalte, teeksiate leh naupangte aw, amah phat un. 13 { Topa' } min phat un. Banghang hiam cihleh amah bek a minlian hi a, ama minthan'na pen leitung leh vantung sangin sangzaw lai hi. 14 Amah in ama mite thahatsak a, ama mi siangthote khempeuh, ama mai-ah a om Israel-te khempeuh in amah phat uhhi. { Topa } phat un.

{ Topa } in a muhdah, a khahkhong ngeiloh ding, thu guk, tua zah bek hilo, thu sagih tak om a, tuate pen 17 kihihsakna, zuauthu genna, mawhneilo mi thahna, 18 thusia bawl ding ngaihsutna, gamtatsiat ding a manlangte, 19 zuauthu gen teci manlote, leh kitotna a piangsakte a hihi.
Amah in vantung bawlin tuipi kimkotah vanpi mong ding a bawl laitak,
Pasian in thu a ip manin a min thang a, kumpite in thu a genkhiat manin minthang uhhi.
