"Pasian in a thugen khempeuh a manna laktel a, amah a belte-a' dingin kidalna lum a hihi. 6 Ama genlohpi behlapsak kei in; na tua cihleh amah in nang hong tai-in zuau thugen na hihna hong kilang ding hi," a ci hi.
Amah in na khempeuh amau' hun ciat tawh a kituak dingin a bawl hi. Amah in mailam thu theihnopna lungsim eite tungah hong guan' a, ahi zongin ama sepnate a cing-a theihzawhna ding hong guan'lo hi.
Amaute khatlekhat kisamin: "Vanglian { Topa}, siangtho, siangtho, siangtho; leitung khempeuh ama minthan'na tawh kidim," ci-in awng uhhi.

Thei nailo a, za nailo na hi hiam? { Topa } pen tawntung Pasian hi a, leitung mong khempeuh dong a Piangsakpa a hihi. Amah gimlo a, zong tawllo hi. Ama thu theihtelna kigen zolo hi. 29 Amah in a gim mi tungah vangliatna pia a, thahatna a neilo mi a thahatna khangsak hi. 30 Khangnote nangawn gimin tawl ding a, khanglai mite a tha uh bei ding hi. 31 Ahih hangin { Topa } a muang mite a tha uh dimkik ding a, muvanlai bangin kha tawh leengto-in, amaute tai napi-un tawllo ding uh a, amaute lam pai napi-un gimlo ding uhhi.
nang hong ompih ka hih manin lau kei in. Na Pasian ka hih manin lungkia kei in. Nang hong thakhauhsakin ka hong huh ding a, nang hong huhin ka hong honkhia ding hi.

Ahih hangin Jacob aw, nangmah hong piangsakpa, Israel aw, nangmah hong bawlpa, { Topa } in tu-in hih bang ci hi: "Hong honkhia khin ka hih manin lau kei in. Na min tawh kong sam khinzo a, nang pen kei-a' na hi hi. 2 Tuite na kantan ciangin nang kong ompih ding a, gunte na kantan ciangin tui in hong tuumlo ding hi. Mei kantanin na pai ciangin na kang kei ding a, meikuangte in nang hong kangtumlo ding hi. 3 Banghang hiam cihleh kei pen { Topa } na Pasian, Israel-te' Siangtho Pa, nangmah hong honpa ka hihi. Nangmah tatna dingin Egypt ka pia a, nangmah khekna dingin Ethiopia leh Seba ka pia hi.

"Kei, keimah pen { Topa } ka hi a, kei simloh honpa dang omlo hi. 12 Note lakah pasian dang a om ma-in honkhia-in, pulakin, ka genkhol hi. Tua ahih ciangin note pen keima teci na hi uhhi," { Topa } in ci hi. 13 "Kei pen Pasian ka hi a, a kipat cila kipanin zong kei pen Amah ka hihi. Keima khutsung panin a lakhiazo kuamah omlo hi. Keima sepnate, a kua in hong khaktanzo ding ahi hiam?" a ci hi.
"Leitung mi khempeuhte aw, kei lamah hong kihei unla hotkhiatna ngah un! Banghang hiam cihleh kei pen Pasian ka hi a, kuamah dang omlo hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh a sang, a lian, a nungta tawntung Pa, ama min Siangtho ahipa in hih bangin ci hi: "Kei pen a sangna mun leh a siangtho munah ka om a, a kiniamkhiat mite' lungsim leh a kisik mite' lungsim a thakhauhsak kik dingin kisikna leh kiniamkhiatna lungsim a neite tawh zong kei ka omkhawm hi.
Pasian in ama vangliatna tawh leitung bawl a, ama pilna tawh leitung piangsakin, ama siamna tawh vantung a zal hi.
"Kei pen mun khat bekah a om Pasian ka hi hiam? Mun khempeuhah a om Pasian hilo ka hi hiam, { Topa } in kong ci hi.
Kei nong sap leh kong dawngkik ding a, na theih ngei nailoh a ki-imcip thu lianpite kong gen ding hi.
Nang pen hehpihna tawh kidimin mawhna na maisak a, ahih hangin kote in nang ka hong langpan' uhhi.

"Keimah in leitungah kialpi kong tun'sak hun hong tung ding hi. Tua kialpi pen an leh tui duhna kialpi hilo ding a, { Topa' } thu zaknop mahmahna kialpi hi ding hi. Topa { Pasian } ahi keimah in hih thu kong gen khin hi. 12 Mihingte, leilu pan leitaw dong, { Topa' } thu kanin vak kawikawi ding uh a, ahi zongin mu zolo ding uhhi.

{ Topa } aw, nang tawh a kibang Pasian dang omlo a, a omlai na mite' mawhna nangmah in na maisak hi. Nang na heh paisuak kei a, na itna kip nong lak hi. 19 Kote nong khasiat kik ding a, ka mawhnate uh hong sawpkhiat sakin, tuipi taw-ah nong paihsak ding hi.
{ Topa } Pasian in amah a demte koihkhonglo a, amah a langpangte gim pia-in a galte thukkik hi.

Tua ciangin vantung mi in kei kiangah, "{ Topa } in Zerubbabel tungah hih bangin thu gen hi: Galkap tam neihna hang hilo, nangma vangliatna hang zong hilo, keima tung panin na ngah vangliatna bek tawh na ma na tun'zo ding hi.
"Kei, { Topa } ka hi a, lungsim a kheello mi ka hihi. No Jacob suanlekhakte aw, a siacimit na hi nai kei uhhi.

{ Topa } a zahtak mite khatlekhat tua bangin thu kigen uh a, amaute' thugennate, { Topa } in ngai-in za hi. { Topa } in laibu khat nei a, amah zahtakin a thupi ngaihsut mite khempeuh tua sungah kiciamteh hi.17Vanglian { Topa } in hih bangin ci hi: "Tua a kiciamteh mite pen keima mite hi ding uh hi. Keimah in na ka sep ni ciangin amaute pen keima neihtuam taktak mite hi ding uh hi. Pa in ama thu a mang a tapa a hehpih mah bangin kei zong amaute ka hehpih ding hi.18Tua ciangin midikte leh migilote, leh keima na hong semte leh hong semlote a kilamdan'na na mukik ding uh hi," a ci hi.
Tua ahih manin vantungah a om na Pa uh a cingtaak mah bangin note zong lungsim citakin na cingtaakna ding uh na hanciam un.
Gitta nih ciangin mat khatin kizuak lel hilo ahi hiam? Tua hinapi-in na Pa uh' thukim lohin tua gittate khat nangawn lei-ah mawkkiatlo hi.
"Ka Pa in kei tungah na khempeuh hong pia khin hi. Pa simloh Tapa a thei kuamah omlo a, Tapa leh Tapa in a theihsaknop mite simloh, pa a thei kuamah omlo hi.

Kam sungah a tumsukte pen gil sung tawnin tua panin paikhiasuak hilo ahi hiam? 18 Ahi zongin kam sung panin a pusuakte pen lungsim panin hong kipankhia hi a, hihte in mi ninsakthei hi. 19 Banghang hiam cihleh lungsim panin mi thahnopna, mi zi tawh mawhnopna, nungak tawh mawhnopna, guktakna, zuau genna, mi gensiatna, leh ngaihsut hoihlo a tuamtuam hong piangkhia hi. 20 Hih bang nate in mi ninsak a, khut silloin annekna in mi ninsaklo hi," ci-in a dawng hi.

Amaute sung panin Thukham hilh siate khat in Zeisu a thangsiahna-in thu hong dong a, 36 "Sia aw, thukham khempeuh sung panin bang thukham lianpen ahi hiam?" ci-in a dong hi. 37 Zeisu in, "Na Topa Pasian na lungsim khempeuh, na nuntakna khempeuh, leh na pilna khempeuh tawh na it ding hi, cihna a hihi. 38 Hih pen a masapen, a lianpen thukham a hihi. 39 A nihna pen a masa mah tawh kibang a, nangma pumpi na it bangin na vengte na it in, cihna a hihi. 40 Hih thukham nihte tung panin thukham dang khempeuh leh kamsangte' thuhilhna khempeuh a hong mengkhia ahi hi," ci-in a dawng hi.

"Mihing Tapa a vantung mite tawh Kumpi-in hong paikhawm uh ciangin a kumpi tokhom tungah hong tu ding hi. 32 Ama mai-ah leitung minam khempeuh hong kikhawm ding hi. Gancingpa in tuu leh keelte a khen mah bangin mi khempeuh khen nihin hong koih ding hi. 33 Tuu a bang mite a taklamah koihin, keel a bang mite a veilamah koih ding hi. 34 Tua ciangin Kumpipa in a taklamah a om mite kiangah, ‘Ka Pa in thupha a piak mite aw, hong pai ta un. Leitung piancila kipanin note-a' dingin a kibawlkholsa gamnuam hong luah un. 35 Banghang hiam cihleh ka gilkial laitakin an nong pia uh a, ka dangtak laitakin tui nong pia uh a, khualmi ka hih laitakin zin nong do uh a, 36 puan neiloin ka om laitakin puan nong guan' uh a, ka cinat laitakin nong veh uh a, ka thongkiat laitakin nong hawh uhhi,’ a ci ding hi. 37 Tua ciangin mihoihte in, ‘Topa aw, cikin na gilkial hong mu-in an hong pia a, cikin na dangtak hong mu-in tui hong pia ka hi uhhiam? 38 Cikin khualmi na hih laitakin hong mu-in zin hong do a, cikin puan neilo na hih laitakin hong mu-in puan hong guan' ka hi uhhiam? 39 Cikin cina na hih laitakin hong mu-in hong veh a, cikin thongkia na hih laitakin hong mu-in hong hawh ka hi uhhiam?’ a ci ding uhhi. 40 Tua ciangin Kumpipa in amaute kiangah, ‘Note kiangah kong genin-ah: Hih ka sanggamte a neupen khat nangawn na limbawl uh ciangin kei tungah a hong bawl na hi uhhi,’ ci-in a dawng ding hi. 41 "Tua ciangin a veilamah a om mite kiangah, ‘Pasian in a samsiat mite aw, keima kiang panin paikhia unla, Dawimangpa leh a nungzuite-a' dingin a kibawl meikuang tawntung sungah pai un. 42 Banghang hiam cihleh ka gilkial laitakin an nong pia kei uh a, ka dangtak laitakin tui nong pia kei uh a, 43 khualmi ka hih laitakin zin nong do kei uh a, puan ka neihloh laitakin puan nong guan' kei uh a, ka cinat laitakin nong veh kei uh a, ka thongkiat laitakin nong hawh kei uhhi,’ a ci ding hi.

Zeisu, gunkuang tuangin a galkah khit ciangin, tuili gei ama kiangah mi tampi tak hong kikhawm leuleu uhhi. 22 Tua laitakin kikhopna inn a uk, Jairas a kici mi khat hong pai a, Zeisu a muh ciangin a khe phungah bokin, 23 "Ka tanu si dektak ta hi. Amah a cidam kikin a nuntak theihna dingin hong pai in la, ama tungah na khut hong ngaksak in," ci-in a thum hi. 24 Zeisu zong, tua mipa tawh a paikhia khawm hi. Mi tampi tak in zong zui uh ahih manin Zeisu a nehcip uhhi. 25 Tuate lakah, kum sawmlenih sung tawntung siluang natna a nei numei khat a om hi. 26 Siavuan tampi in amah bawl a, a sum neih khempeuh zangkhin napi-in noptuamzaw loin gim semsemzaw hi. 27 Tua numei in Zeisu' thu za ahih manin mihonte kawmah Zeisu' nung a zui hi. 28 Tuanu in, "A puan mong nangawn va lawngkha leng, dam ning," ci-in a ngaihsun hi. 29 A va lawn'khit phetin a siluang khawlpah a, ama sunga a natna a damlam a kiphawk hi. 30 Zeisu in ama sung panin a vangliatna a paikhiatlam phawkpah ahih manin mihonpite lakah khuadakin, "Kua in ka puan hong lawng na hi uhhiam?" a ci hi. 31 A nungzuite in, "Mihonpite in nang hong nehcihlam na thei hi. Banghangin kua in hong lawng na hi uhhiam, ci mawk na hi hiam?" a ci uhhi. 32 Ahi zongin amah a lawngte a theihna dingin Zeisu khuadak kawikawi lai hi. 33 Tua numei in ama tunga thupiang thei ahih manin laukawm lingkawmin hong pai-in a khephungah hong bok a, a thupiang khempeuh ahi bangbangin a hong gen hi. 34 Zeisu in zong tuanu kiangah, "Ka tanu aw, na upna in nang hong damsakzo hi. Cidamsuak in la, lungnuam takin va ciah in," a ci hi.
Tua ahih manin Pasian in a bawl theihloh khat zong omlo hi," ci-in a dawng hi.

Tua bang lelin note na gamta kei ding uhhi. Na galte uh itin amaute tungah thupha bawl unla, lohkik ding lamen loin leitawi pia un. Tua hi leh na thaman uh lian ding a, a Lianpen Pasian' tate na hi ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh lungdamna mel a thei theilo mite leh a huaiham mite tungah amah migi hi. 36 Tua ahih manin na Pa un hehpihna a neih bangin note in zong hehpihna lungsim nei ta un.

Tua ciangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah thugentehna khat gen a, "Mi haupa khat' lo-ah an tampi a piang hi. 17 Tua ciangin amah in a lungsim sungah, ‘Ka an khempeuh ka koihna ding mun kicinglo ahih manin bangcih ding ka hi hiam? 18 Tua ahih manin hih bangin ka gamta ding hi: Ka ansaalte phelin a lianzaw ansaalte ka lam ding a, tuate sungah ka ante leh ka neih khempeuh ka seng ding hi. 19 Tua ciangin keimah in: Mi hampha mahmah ka hihi. Kum tampi sung ka khom ding annek tuidawn leh na hoih tampi ka nei hi. An ne, zu ne-in, a nuam theithei-in ka om hithiat ding hi,’ ci hi. 20 Ahi zongin Pasian in ama kiangah, ‘Mihaipa aw, tuzan mahmahin na si ding hi. Hih na neihsa teng kua'n zang nawn ding ahi hiam?’ ci hi," a ci hi. 21 Tua ciangin Zeisu in a thugen a khupna-in, "Tua mah bangin amau-a' ding bekin a kholcipte pen Pasian' muhna panin mihau hilo uhhi," a ci hi.
Pasian in na lungsimtawng uh a hong thei hi. Banghang hiam cihleh mihingte in a manpha mahmahin a ngaihsutte pen Pasian in bangmahin simlo hi.

"Khatvei, mihau mahmah khat om a, nisimin puan manpha nono silhin, anlim nono ne-in a om hi. 20 Tua ciangin a pumtangin meima a vei, Lazaras a kici mizawng khat zong, mihaupa' kongbiangah hong kikoih a, 21 mihaupa' sabuai tung panin a kia annengte nenuamin a ngak hi. Tua bangin a om laitakin uite hong pai-in a meima hong liahliah sak uhhi. 22 Tua ciangin mizawngpa hong si a, vantunga Abraham kiangah a om dingin vantung mite in a paipih uhhi. Mihaupa zong hong si leuleu-in a kivui hi. 23 Ahi zongin hell khuk sungah gimna thuakin a om hi. A khuadak leh, gamlapi mun khatah Abraham leh Lazaras a omkhawm a galmuh hi. 24 Tua ahih manin nakpi takin kiko a, ‘Pa Abraham aw, kei hong hehpih in. Meiphual sungah omin nakpi takin gimna thuak ka hih manin Lazaras in a khutme dawn tui diahin ka leii hong votsakna dingin hong sawl in,’ a ci hi. 25 Ahi zongin Abraham in, ‘Ka ta aw, leitungah na nuntak laitakun nang nopsakna namkim na ngah laitakin Lazaras in haksatna namkim a thuak hi. Ahi zongin tu-in amah in hih lai-ah nopsakna a ngah laitakin nangmah in haksatna a thuak na hi hi. 26 Tua thamloin, i kikalah kuam thukpi khat om a, hih lai panin nang kiangah hong pai nuamte kuamah pai zolo a, nangma omna panin hih lai-ah zong kuamah hong pai zolo hi,’ ci-in a dawng hi. 27 Tua ciangin mihaupa in, ‘Pa aw, tua bang ahih leh zong, ka inn uhah Lazaras nong sawlsakna dingin ka hong thum hi. 28 Inn-ah nau pasal nga ka nei lai a, ke'n gim ka thuakna hih lai munah hong tun'khakloh teiteina dingun kei' gamtat bangin a gamtatlohna dingun hong hilhsak hen,’ a ci hi. 29 Ahi zongin Abraham in, ‘Na sanggamte a hilh dingin Moses leh kamsangte om uh ahih manin tuate' thugen na ngai ta uh hen,’ a ci hi. 30 Tua ciangin mihaupa in, ‘Pa Abraham aw, tua nong gen zong a kicing khin hi mah hi. Ahi zongin a sisa mi khat hingkikin amaute kiangah va paikik leh a mawhna panun ka naute kisik hamtang ding uhhi,’ a ci hi. 31 Ahi zongin Abraham in, ‘Amaute in Moses leh kamsangte' thu a man'nop kei uh leh, mi khat hong hingkikin amaute kiangah a va gen hangin umsakzo tuanlo ding hi,’ ci-in a dawng hi," a ci hi.
Zeisu in, "Banghangin kei midik hong ci na hi hiam? Pasian simloh kuamah a diktatzo omlo hi.

Nipi ni zingsang tungin numeite in a bawlsa uh paknamtui tawi-in hanah va pai uhhi. 2 Han phual a tun' uh ciangin hankhuk hukna suang a kilikkhia mu uh ahih manin 3 a sungah tumpah uh a, ahi zongin Topa Zeisu' luang na omlo hi. 4 Amaute in lamdangsa-in a om laitakun amaute gei-ah puanpak a silh mi nih hong dingvat uhhi. 5 Numeite lau mahmah uh ahih manin lei lam nga-in kuncip uhhi. Tua mi nihte in, "Banghangin misite lakah mihing zong na hi uhhiam? 6 Hih lai-ah om nawnlo hi; kithosak zo hi. Galilee gamah a om lai-in note kiangah thu hong genin, 7 ‘Mawhnei mite' khutsungah Mihing Tapa kipia ding a, singlamteh tungah kithatin, a ni thum ni-in hingkik ding hi,’ a cih thute phawk un," a ci uhhi. 8 Tua ciangin amaute in Zeisu' thugente phawkkik uh a, 9 han panin ciahkikin, nungzui sawmlekhatte leh midangte kiangah hih thute a gen uhhi. 10 Sawltakte kiangah hih thu a gen numeite pen Magdala khuami Mary, Joanna, James' nu Mary, leh numei dangte ahi uhhi. 11 Ahi zongin hih numeite' thugen pen thu phuahtawm bangin ngaihsun uh a, umlo uhhi. 12 Ahi zongin Peter dingin hanah va tai a, han sung a etsuk ciangin a kitunna puan bek na om hi. Tua ciangin amah in zong tua thupiang lamdangsa-in inn-ah a ciahkik hi. 13 Tua ni mahin, Zeisu' thu a zui mi nih, Jerusalem khua panin tai sagih bang a gamla Emmaus kici khua-ah a pai uhhi.
A kipat cilin Thu na om a, tua Thu, Pasian tawh na omkhawm a, tua Thu, Pasian a hihi.
Tua Thu mihing hong suakin kote lakah hong om a, itna nei-in citak mahmah ahih manin Pasian' pianzia a neihna ka mu cian uhhi. Hih pianzia pen Pasian' Tapa khat bek hihna tawh a neih pianzia a hihi.

Pasian in leitung mite hong it mahmah ahih manin ama Tapa a um mi khempeuh si nawnloin a hin' tawntung theihna dingun a Tapa neihsun a hong piak dongin a hong itna a hong lak hi. 17 Pasian in leitungah a Tapa hong sawlna pen mawhsakna thukhen dingin a hong paisak hiloin, leitung mite a honkhia dingin a hong paisak hizaw hi.
Pasian pen Kha ahi hi; amah a biate in tua Kha' lamlahna leh thuman taktak tawh a bia ding uhhi," a ci hi.
"A mantakin kong genin-ah: Ka thugennate za-in kei hong sawlpa a um khempeuh a nungta paisuak ding hita hi. Mawhsak thukhenna ngah nawnloin, sihna panin a hingkik ta a hihi.
Zeisu in ama kiangah, "Keimah in Lampi ka hi a, Thuman, leh Nuntakna zong ka hihi. Kei hong suangloin Pa kiangah kuamah tung theilo ding hi.
Ahi zongin Pa in keima tangin a hong sawl ding Huhpa Khasiangtho a hong tun' ciangin note tungah thu khempeuh hong hilh ding a, note tungah ka hong gensa thu khempeuh zong hong phawksakkik ding hi.
Nang bek a man Pasian na hihna thu leh nangmah in na hong sawl Zeisu Christ hong theihna pen amaute-a' dingin nuntak tawntung ngahna ding lampi a hihi.
Pa aw, leitung a pian'ma pekin kei na hong itna hangin na hong piak pianzia a mu dingin keimah na hong piak mite zong ka omna-ah a hong pai theihna ding ka deihsak hi.

Tua hun sungteng Saul in Topa' thu a um mite thahdingin a hanciamna zomlai hi. Siampi lianpenpa kiangah pai a, 2 Topa' thu a zui mi numei pasal a muh peuhpeuh manin Jerusalem khua-ah a ciahpih theihna dingin Damaskas khua-a Jew mi kikhopna inn ukte kiangah a lah dingin lai a ngen hi. 3 Damaskas khua a zuan dingin pai a, a tun' dektak ciangin thakhat thu-in van panin ama kimkotah a hong tangzaih khat a om hi. 4 Saul, leilakah puksuk a, tua laitakin awging khat in ama kiangah, "Saul, Saul aw, Banghangin kei hong bawlsia na hi hiam?" a ci hi. 5 Saul in, "Topa aw, kua na hi hiam?" ci-in a dot ciangin, "Nangmah in na hong bawlsiat Zeisu ka hihi. 6 Ahi zongin tho-in khuapi sungah lut in; tua lai panin na gamtatna dingteng hong kigen ding hi," a ci hi. 7 Saul tawh a tonkhawm mite in a awging a zak uh hangin kuamah mulo uh ahih manin lamdangsa lua-in pau theilo liangin a om uhhi. 8 Saul zong leilak panin thoto a, a mit a hah hangin khua mu theilo hi. Tua ahih manin a kikholhpihte in a khutin lenin Damaskas khua-ah a paipih uhhi. 9 Ni thum sung khua mu theiloin, anletui zong a ne kei hi.
Tua ciangin Peter a kam ka-in thu hilh ding kipan a, "Pasian in kuamah angvan' tuam neiloin, 35 kua mi kua mi hita leh amah zahtakin a manin a gamta mi khempeuh a san'na thu teltakin ka thei hi.

Pasian in leitung a pian'sak cila kipanin a kimu theilo ama pianzia ahi tawntung vanglianpa leh Pasian ahihna thute ama bawlsa nate tung panin teltakin hong kilang hi. Tua ahih manin, "Thei kei ing," ci-in paulap a zon'theihna ding uh omlo hi.
Pasian migi-in thu a diah hithiatna pen na kisikkik theihna ding uh a deihna ahih lamtak phawkkha loin, a migitna, a lungduaina, a hong thuaknate neu ngaihsutkha na hi uhhiam?

Tua ahih ciangin Thukham mahmah hita leh thupiaknate hita leh hoihin man a, siangtho hi. 13 Tua ahih leh a hoih na khat in kei' sihna ding hong piangsak ahi hiam? Hilo hi. Tua sihna pen mawhna' nasepna hi a, mawhna pianzia bangci bang taktak hiam, cih a kitheihna dingin a hoih na khat zangin kei tungah sihna a hong piangsak a hihi. Tua ahih manin thukham a om manin mawhna a siahuai mahmah ahihna hong kilangzaw kan lai hi. 14 Thukham pen i kha thu tawh kisai hi, ci-in i thei hi. Ahi zongin kei pen leitung pumpi tawh a nungta mi ka hi a, mawhna thu mangin a sal a suak ka hihi.

Tua mah bangin tuhunin zong Pasian in ama hehpihna tawh a teelsa mi tawmkhat omlai hi. 6 A teelna-ah mite' nasepna bulphuhin a teel hiloin ama dikna hangin a teel hizaw hi. Pasian in mihingte' nasepna bulphuhin a teel hi leh Pasian' dikna pen dikna kici theilo ding hi. 7 A thu omzia taktak hih bang a hihi. Israel mi a tamzaw in a hanciamciam uh ngahlo uhhi. Pasian' teel mi tawmkhat bek in ngah uh a, adangte in Pasian' sapna thudonlo uhhi.

Tua ahih manin Pasian' hong hehpihna nakliat mahmah a, a pilna leh a thu theihnate nakthuk mahmah hi. Ama thukhennate kua' gentheih ding hilo a, a nasepna ziate kua' telzawh ding hilo hi. 34 Tua ahih manin Laisiangtho in, "Kua in Topa' lungsim thei ding a, kua in ngaihsutna va pia thei ding ahi hiam? 35 Amah in hong thukkik theihna dingin kuamah in ama tungah thupha va bawl ngeilo hi," na ci hi. 36 Banghang hiam cihleh na khempeuh ama pian'sak hi a, na khempeuh ama hang leh ama minthan'na ding bekin a om a hihi. Mi khempeuh in Pasian phat tawntung ta hen! Amen.
Laisiangtho sungah, "Kei pen a nungta ka hih mah bangin ka mai-ah mi khempeuh hong kun ding a, Pasian ka hihna thu mi khempeuh in pulak taktak ding uhhi, Topa in ci hi," ci-in a kigelh hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian' haina pen mite' pilna sangin sangzaw lai a, Pasian' thaneemna pen mite' hatna sangin hatzaw lai hi.
Ahi zongin Pasian in Abraham tungah thuciamna a bawl laitakin kuamah sawlsawn neiloin amah bek in a piak a hihi.
Pasian a kikhemzo dingin ngaihsunkha kei un. Mi khempeuh in ama vawh nam khaici mah ngahkik ding hi.

Na tuah uh ze-etnate khempeuh pen mite' tuah ngeingeite mah a hihi. Pasian in citakin a thuciamna lenkip ahih manin note' thuak zawhloh ding ze-etna hong tuaksaklo ding hi. Ze-etna na tuah hun uh ciangin zong na thuakzawhna ding uh thahatna hong guan'ding ahih manin na suahtak zawhna ding uh lampi hong hon'sak ding hi.

Christ' khutnuai-ah na khempeuh a kikoih ciangin ama khutnuai-ah na khempeuh a koihsak Pasian' khutnuai-ah Tapa mahmah zong om ding a, Pasian pen na khempeuh leh a kuamah peuh tungah a lianpen hi ding hi.

Tua bang hinapi-in Pasian' hong hehpihna leh eite hong itna lian mahmah ahih manin, 5 i mawhna hangin kha thu tawh kisai-in misi ihih laitakin Christ tawh eite hong nungtasak hi. Pasian' hehpihna hangin hotkhiatna a ngah thei ihi hi.

Note' upna hangin Pasian' hong hehpihna tawh hotkhiatna a ngah na hi uhhi. Note' thalawhna hangin a ngah hiloin Pasian' hong piakkhong a hihi. 9 Note' hanciamna tawh a ngah hilo na hih manun na kisialhna ding uh a thu omlo hi.
Christ hong itna a kicing takin theihkhit zawhloh ding ahi ta zongin note in thei-in, Pasian thu a cingin na theihna dingun thu ka hong ngetsak hi.
A thutang a siangtho ahihna thu, nuntakna mahmah panin a kilangsak, Pasian' pian'zia tawh kibangin a kibawl na ngeina thak uh bangin na nungta un.
Mihingte in a theihtel zawhloh Pasian' hong piak lungsim nopna in, Christ Zeisu tawh na kipawlna uh hangin note hong lungnuamsak ding hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian khat bek om a, Pasian leh mite a hong kilemsak kik thei Christ Zeisu khat bek om hi. 6 Mi khempeuh a tankhia dingin tua Zeisu hong kipiatawm a, a hun lian laitakin a hong kipiakna pen Pasian in mi khempeuh a hotkhiat nopna thu a kilatna a hihi.
Kumpite' Kumpi, topate' Topa, thupha ngahin amah bek a lianpen ahi Pasian in hun a sak khatpeuh ciangin Zeisu hong kilangsak kik ding hi.
Ahi zongin tuhun nunung ciangin leitung vantung na khempeuh a bawlin a zat, a tawpna-ah na khempeuh a luah dingin a seh a Tapa zangin eite tungah thu hong gen hi.

Tu-in i gennop thu pen hih bang ahi hi: Vantungah Pasian' tokhom taklamah a tu tua bang Siampi Lianpen khat a nei ihi hi. 2 Amah in, mite' bawl a hilo, Topa mahmah in a bawl a taktak puanbuk ahi a Siangtho Pen mun sungah siampi lianpen nasep a sem a hihi.
Banghang hiam cihleh eite' Pasian pen a kangtum thei meikuang tawh a kibang a hihi.
A hoih thu leh na khempeuh, Pasian kiang panin hong pai hi a, vantung khuavak a Piangsakpa ahih manin amah kikheel ngeilo a, amah a kihei manin khua zong mial tuanlo hi.
Mihingte' hehna in Pasian' sepding thuhoihte khaktan hi.
Pa Pasian in a siangtho biakna citakin a ngaihsut thu in: Tagahte leh meigong numeite a haksatna uhah hoihtakin kemin, leitung siatnate tawh kisawhkha loin siangtho takin omna a hihi.

Laisiangtho sungah, "Eite sungah a hong guat kha pen Pasian in ngai mahmah hi," ci-in a kigelhna a mawkna-in a kigelh sa na hi uhhiam? 6 Laisiangtho in, "Pasian in a kihisakte nial a, a kiniamkhiatte a hehpih hi," a cih mah bangin Pasian' hong hehpihna lianzaw hi.
Pasian kiang nai un. Amah in zong hong nai ding hi. Mawhneite in na khut uh silsiang unla, a kineihkhemte in na lungsim uh siangsak un.
Note a hong sampa a siangtho ahih mah bangin note zong na gamtatna khempeuh uhah na siangtho un.
Pasian in ama hoihsak hun ciangin note hong laptoh theihna dingin a thahat Pasian' khutnuai-ah kiniamkhiatin na om un.

Mi pawlkhatte' ngaihsut bangin Topa in a kamciamna a hong tungsak hak hi zenzen lo hi. Note khat beek in siatna na thuakkhak ding uh deihloin na vekpi-un na kisik ding uh deih ahih manin hong pai nailohna pen note hong khualna hizaw hi.
Ama kiang panin za-in note tungah ka hong gen uh thu in: Pasian, khuavak hi a, khuamial tawh kizopna themkhat zong nei hetlo hi.
Pa Pasian in leitung mite a honkhia dingin a Tapa a hong paisakna thu kote in thei-in midang kiangah genbelin ka nei uhhi.

Pasian pen ki-itna ahih manin itna a neilo mite in Pasian theilo uhhi. 9 Pasian in eite hong itna hong bangci lah hiam cihleh: Ama hangin eite in nuntakna i ngahtheihna dingin a Tapa neihsun Pasian in leitungah a hong paisak hi. 10 Hih ka gen itna pen eite in Pasian i itna thu hilo a, Pasian in eite hong itin, i mawhna a maitheihna dingin a Tapa a hong paisakna thu a hihi. 11 Ka it lawmte aw, Pasian in tua zahta-in eite hong it ahih leh eite zong khatlekhat i ki-it ding a kilawm a hihi.

Tua meivakte lakah, puantualpi khat silhin a awm-ah kham kibawl awmgak a gak, mi tawh a kibang khat ka mu hi. 14 A samte tuumul bangin kangin, khuavak bangin pak a, a mittangte meikuang a bang hi. 15 A khete, pumbukah a kihalsan sumngo bang a, a awging ahih leh tuipi ging a bang hi. 16 A taklam khutah aksi sagih tawi-in, a kam sung panin langnih a hiam namsau khat hong pusuak a, a maitang sun nitaang a bang hi. 17 Amah ka muh ciangin misi bangin ama khe phungah ka puk hi. Ahi zongin amah in ka tungah a taklam khut hong nga a, "Lau kei in; kei pen a kipatna leh a tawpna ka hi a, 18 a nungta mipa zong ka hihi. Kei ka si ngei hi. Ahi zongin tu-in hong en in, a nungta tawntung ka hihi. Sihna leh misite omna gam keima khutnuai ahi uhhi.

Tua ganhing lite in kha guk ciat nei-in, tua a khate' sunglam leh a pualamah mittang a dimtakin om a, a sun a zan tawlnga loin la sa uh a,"A beisa, tuhun, leh a tawntungin a om Vanglian Topa Pasian, siangtho hi, siangtho hi, siangtho hi," a ci uhhi.

Tua ciangin vantung, leitung, leinuai, tuipi sung leh mun khempeuhah a om nuntakna a nei khempeuh in la a sakna uh ka za a, amaute in, "Tokhom tungah a tupa leh Tuuno in phatna, pahtawina, minthan'na leh vangliatna, ngah tawntung ta hen," a ci uhhi.
"Keimah Zeisu in pawlpite-a' dingin hih thute nang kiangah a hong gen dingin ka vantung mi ka hong sawl hi. Kei pen David' zung leh a suan ahi, zingsol ka hi hi," a hong ci hi.

Keimah Johan in hih laibu sungah a kigelh thu a za mi khempeuh ka hong hilhkholh nopna panin: A thu a behlap na om uh leh Pasian in zong hih laibu sungah a kigelh gimnate note tungah hong behlap ding a, 19 hih laibu sungah a kigelh thute a hemkhia na om uh leh Pasian in zong hih laibu sungah a kigelh nuntakna singgah leh Khuapi Siangtho sungah na ngahding uh hamphatnate note kiang panin hong hepkhiatsak ding hi.
Kilemna ding deihin a hanciam mite in Pasian' tate cihna ngah ding uh ahih manin thupha ngah mi ahi uhhi.

"Note in, ‘Na vengte uh na it unla, na galte uh na mudah un,’ ci-in a kigenna thu na zaksa uh a hihi. 44 Ahi zongin ke'n note kiangah kong genin-ah: Na galte uh na it unla, no hong bawlsiate-a' dingin thu na ngetsak un. 45 Tua hi leh vantungah a om na Pa uh tate na hi thei ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh amah in mihoihte leh misiate tungah a kibangin ni taangsak khawm a, a gamtat phate leh a gamtat siate tungah zong a kibang mahin guah zusak khawm hi.
Amaute pen vantung mi tawh kibang uh a, sithei nawnlo uhhi. Sihna panin a thokik khinte ahih manin amaute pen Pasian' tate ahi uhhi.

Tua bang hita se leh ama thu ngai-in amah a um mite khempeuh tungah Pasian' tate suahtheihna ding thu a pia hi. 13 Tua bangin Pasian' tate suahna pen leitung ngeina nute pate sung panin suahna tawh hiloin Pasian sung panin suahna a hihi. 14 Tua Thu mihing hong suakin kote lakah hong om a, itna nei-in citak mahmah ahih manin Pasian' pianzia a neihna ka mu cian uhhi. Hih pianzia pen Pasian' Tapa khat bek hihna tawh a neih pianzia a hihi.

Mi khat in, ‘Pasian hangin eite piangin, hingin i gamtang hi,’ ci-in gen a, note sung panin laphuah siampa khat in zong, ‘Eite zong ama tate ihi hi,’ na na ci hi. 29 Eite pen Pasian' tate ihih manin, mihing khutsiamte in bawlin a zep ngunte, khamte, suang milimte tawh a kibang dingin Pasian i ngaihsun kei ding hi.
I Pa' vangliatna tawh sihna panin Christ a kithawhsak kik mah bangin eite zong nuntakna thak i nuntak theihna dingin tui i kiphum ciangin amah tawh kiphum khawmin a sikhawm ihi hi.

Pasian' Khasiangtho in a makaih mite, Pasian' tate ahi uhhi. 15 Note tungah Pasian in a hong piak a Khasiangtho in note na launa dingun sila-in a hong bawl hilo a, Khasiangtho in Pasian' tate a hong suaksak ahi zaw hi. Tua Khasiangtho mah in Pasian pen, "Pa aw, Pa aw," hong ci theisak hi. 16 Eite, Pasian' tate ihihna thu eima lungsim bek in a gen hiloin Pasian' Khasiangtho in zong hong genpih hi.

Tuhuna i thuaknate pen Pasian in a hong piakding minthan'na tawh ka ngaihsut khawm ciangin, tuhuna i thuaknate gentham ka sa het kei hi. 19 Pasian' bawlsa khempeuh in Pasian' tate a hong kilahkhiat hun ding lawp mahmahin a ngak uhhi.

Ahi zongin a hun a cin ciangin eite khempeuh Pasian' tate i suahtheihna dingin Thukham nuai-ah a om mite a hong tankhia dingin Pasian in a Tapa hong paisak a, tua Tapa pen leitung ngeina bangin numei sung panin hong suakin, Jew Thukham sungah hong nungta hi.
Dawimangpa in hong suksiat theihna ding hun omsak kei un.
Note pen Pasian in a hong it a tate na hih manun amah tawh na kibatna dingun hanciam un.

Note pen Pasian' mi na hih manun note lakah nulepa khialhna, a kilawmlo-a gamtatna, huaihamna cihte genin zong na nei vet kei un. 4 A kilawmlo-a kampauna, leh ciamnuih hoihlo cihte zong na zang kei unla, Pasian tungah lungdam kohna kam na pauzaw un.

Note pen khuamial sungah a omngei hinapi-in, Topa' mi na suahkhit uh ciangin khuavak sungah a om hita na hih uh manin khuavak sungah a om mite bangin na gamta un. 9 Banghang hiam cihleh khuavak sunga omna in a hoih, a man, a thutakte hong piangsak hi.
Mawhna panin mite a siangthosakpa leh sian'thosakna a ngah mite in, Pa, a kibang a neikhawm uhhi. Tua hi a, Zeisu in mite, "Sanggam," a cih ding zum ngaihsutlo ahih manin,

Pasian in note, tate, hong ci-in hong hanthotna thu mangngilh khinta na hi uhhiam? Pasian in note kiangah, "Ka ta aw, Topa' hong thuhilhna zangkhai ngaihsut kei in la, gim a hong piak ciangin lungkia kei in. 6 Banghang hiam cihleh Topa in a it mite thuhilh a, ta taktakin a ngaihsut mite a taii hi," hong ci hi.
Tua ahih manin Pasian' thu na mang un. Dawimangpa na nial un. Nial le uh cin no kiang panin taikhia ding hi.

Ahi zongin note pen Pasian in a hong teelkhiat minam, Kumpi siampi pawl, a siangtho minam, Pasian' mite na hi uh a, khuamial sung panin a lamdang mahmah ama khuavak sungah a hong samkhiapa' nasepna a lamdangte a genkhia dingin Pasian in a hong teel mite na hi uhhi. 10 Nidangin Pasian' mi na hihloh uh hangin tu-in ama mi na hi uh a, nidangin Pasian' hehpihna na theihloh uh hangin tu-in ama hehpihna na ngah uhhi.

Ahi zongin ama thu a zui mite pen Pasian a itna a kicingtaak taktak mi a hihi. Hihbangin i gamtat leh Pasian tawh a kipawl taktak ihihna i thei hi. 6 Pasian tawh ka kipawl hi, a ci mi khempeuh, Zeisu Christ a gamtat bangin a gamtat ding a hihi.
Christ, thuman hi, ci-in na theih uh mah bangin a manin a gamta mi khempeuh zong Pasian' tate hi, ci-in na theihding uh a hihi.

Ka lawm itte aw, eite' pianzia ding taktak a telin hong kilat nailoh hangin tu-in Pasian' tate ihi hi. Ahi zongin Christ hong kilat ciangin ama pianzia ahi bang teekteekin mu ding ihih manin amah i batna ding thu teltakin i thei hi.

Pasian' tate in mawhna bawlbawllo uhhi. Pasian' tate hi a, Pasian' lungsim paii uh ahih manin mawhna zong bawl nuamlo uhhi. 10 Hih pen Pasian tate leh Dawimangpa' tate a kilamdan'na a hihi. A manin gamta loin, a Christian mipihte a itlo mi peuhmah, Pasian' tate hilo uhhi.

Pasian' tate in mawhna bawbawllo uhhi. Pasian' Tapa in amaute kem a, Dawimangpa in amaute susia zolo hi. 19 Leitung midang khempeuh Dawimangpa' khutsungah a om ahi zongin eite pen Pasian' mi ihihna thu i thei hi.
A gualzo mi khempeuh in kei tung panin a ngahding thu in: Kei pen amaute' Pasian ka hi ding a, amaute keima ta ahi ding uhhi.
Noah zong tua bangmahin gamta a, Pasian' thupiak khempeuh a hih hi.
{ Topa } in note-a' dingin hong dosak ding a, note ahih leh na om hithiat ding uhhi bek hi," a ci hi.
"Israel-te aw, tu-in, { Topa } na Pasian uh zahtak ding, ama lampite tot ding, amah it ding, na lungsim khempeuh uh leh na nuntakna khempeuh uh tawh { Topa } note' Pasian' na sep ding,

Hih a tampi nate khempeuh om napi-in note in lungdamna leh lungsim kipahna tawh { Topa } note' Pasian' na semlo na hih manun, 48 { Topa } in note' langah a hong sawl ding na galte uh' na, gilkialna leh dangtakna, pum guakin omna, leh na khempeuh kitangsapna tawh, na sem ding uhhi. Na galte un note hong suksiat matengin note' ngawngah sik hakkol hong thuah ding uhhi.

{ Topa' } nasem Moses in note hong piak thupiakna leh thukham ahi, { Topa } na Pasian uh it ding, ama lampi khempeuh zuih ding, ama thupiakte zuih ding, amah belh ding, leh na lungsim khempeuh uh leh na nuntakna khempeuh uh tawh ama na na sep ding uh limtakin ngaihsun un," a ci hi.

{ Topa' } na na sepnop kei uh leh, Gun galkhata a na na sepsak uh na pu na pate uh pasian ahi a, note' ten'na gam Amor mite' pasian ahi zongin, a na na sepsak ding peuhpeuh uh tuni-in teel un. Ahih hangin kei leh ka innkuanpihte in ahih leh { Topa' } na ka sem ding uhhi," a ci hi.
{ Topa } zahtak unla, na lungsim khempeuh uh tawh citakin ama na sem un; Banghang hiam cihleh note-a' dingin amah in na lian hong bawlsaksate ngaihsun un.

Tua ciangin Zadok' tapa Ahimaaz in Joab kiangah, "Bangbang piang ta leh kei zong Kush mipa' nungah hong taisak in," a ci kik hi. Joab in, "Lungdamna thu puakna hangin thaman ngahlo ding cih thei napi-in, ka tapa aw, Banghangin tai ding na hi hiam?" a ci hi. 23 Amah in, "Bangbang piang ta leh ka tai ding hi," a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Joab in ama kiangah, "Tai in," a ci hi. Tua ciangin Ahimaaz zanglei lam tawnin tai a, Kush mipa makhelh hi.
Amaute in { Topa' } thukham laibu kengin Judah gamsungah hilh uhhi. Judah khuapi khempeuhah amaute pai kawikawi-in mite lakah a hilh uhhi.
Ka tate aw, { Topa } in ama omna-ah a ding ding, ama na a sem ding, leh ama nasemte hi-in ama tungah paknamtui a hal dingin note hong teel khin ahih manin tu-in mawk om kei un," a ci hi.
Kipan in; nangma nasep ding ahi hi; kote in kong huh ding uhhi. Hang in la sem in," a ci hi.

Launa tawh { Topa' } na sem unla, lin'na tawh a khe nam un; tua hi kei leh amah sinso-in lamkalah na siamang ding uhhi; Banghang hiam cihleh amah heh pakpak hi. Amah a bel khempeuh mi nuamsate a hihi.

Hotkhiatna hangin lungdam thu mihonpi lakah ka gen ding hi. { Topa } aw, lungdam thugen ka khawl ngei kei ding hi. 10 Nangma hotkhiatna thu ka im kei a, na thumanna leh na hotkhiatna ka gen khin hi. Na itna kip leh na thumanna mihonpi tungah ka im kei hi.
Keima siatna ding a zongte kizahhuaisak khin a, minsia khinzo ahih manun thuman tawh na hong huhna sunthapai-in ka gengen ding hi.
Ahih hangin kei-a' dingin Pasian' kiangah om ding a hoih a hihi. Na sepnate khempeuh ka gentheihna dingin Topa { Pasian } ka hong bel hi.
{ Topa } tungah lungdamna ko-in, ama min phat unla, ama sepnate khempeuh mite lakah kitheisak un.
Kap kawmin kuankhia-in a tuh ding khaici a pua mi lungdamin kikona tawh buhlomte pua-in hong ciah ding hi.
Thah dinga a kikaikhia mipa honkhia in la, sihna ding mun a zuan mipa lehkaih kik in.

Tua ciangin, "Kua sawl ding a, eite-a' dingin kua va pai ding ahi hiam?" Topa' cihna aw ka za hi. Tua ciangin ke'n, "Hih lai-ah kei om ing! Kei hong sawl in," ka ci hi. 9 Tua ciangin amah in, "Pai in la, hih mite tungah, ‘Zaza napi tello; mumu napi theilo,’ va ci in.
Ni khat ni ciangin mite in, "{ Topa}' tungah lungdam ko unla, ama hong huh ding ngen un. Minam khempeuh lakah ama septe kitheisak unla, ama min kiliansak hi, ci-in gen un.
{ Topa } in, "En un; ka nasempa a dau pai-in, amah a lianin kikoihin kilaamto ding a, sang mahmah ding hi.
Tua ciangin keimah in, "Ah, Topa { Pasian } aw, kei thugen ka siam kei a, naupang khat ka hi lel hi," ka ci hi.

Keimah in, "Ama thu ka gen kei ding a, ama min ka lo kei ding hi," ci mah leng zong, ama thu ka lungsim sungah mei bangin hong kuang a, ka guh ka tang sungah kikhumcip ahih manin ka ki-ipipna-in ka gimlua a, genloin ka om thei kei hi.
"Mihing ahi Ezekiel aw, Israel minamte' galvilpa dingin nang kong koih hi. Nangma tungah ka hong gen hilhkholhnate khempeuh amaute tungah na gensawn ding hi.
"Mihing ahi Ezekiel aw, tu-in Israel minam khempeuhte' galvilpa dingin nang kong koih hi. Nang tungah kong piak hilhkholhna khempeuh amaute tungah na gensawn ding hi.
{ Topa } in Amittai' tapa Jonah tungah, 2 "Kithawi in la, a lian mahmah Nineveh khuapi-ah va pai-in thu va hilh in; Banghang hiam cihleh amau' gitlohna thu ka za khinzo hi," a ci hi.

Vanglian { Topa } in hih bangin ci hi: "Tua a kiciamteh mite pen keima mite hi ding uhhi. Keimah in na ka sep ni ciangin amaute pen keima neihtuam taktak mite hi ding uhhi. Pa in ama thu a mang a tapa a hehpih mah bangin kei zong amaute ka hehpih ding hi. 18 Tua ciangin midikte leh migilote, leh keima na hong semte leh hong semlote a kilamdan'na na mukik ding uhhi," a ci hi.

Mei a vak khit ciangin kuamah in lawh khuhlo hi. Meivakna mun sangah koihzaw a, innsung khempeuh a taangsak hi. 16 Midangte in na gamtatna hoihte uh a muh ciangin vantungah a om na Pa uh min a phat theihna dingun mite mai-ah na gamtat hoihna uh khuavak bangin na kilangsak un.
"Kuamah, to nih' sila hikhawm theilo hi. Khat mudahin khat it ding a, khat tungah thumanin khat simmawhbawl ding hi. Note in Pasian' na leh leitung sum na na semkhawm zo kei ding uhhi.

Mihonte a muh ciangin, a cing neilo tuuhon bangin gimna ngahin lungkhamin om uh ahih manin hehpihhuai a sa hi. 37 Tua ahih manin a nungzuite kiangah, "Anlak ding tampi om napi-in anlak na a sem ding mi tawmbek a om hi. 38 Tua ahih manin ama an a la dingin annei Topa in nasem tampi hong sawlna dingin thu ngen un," a ci hi.

Zeisu in hih mi sawmlenihte sawl a, "Gentail mite gamsung ahi a, Samaria mite khuasungah ahi zongin lut kei un. 6 Tuu bangin a mangthang Israel mite lakah va paizaw un. 7 Na paina peuh uhah, ‘Vantung ki-ukna hong naita hi,’ ci-in thu va hilh un. 8 Cinate damsakin, misite hingsakin, miphakte damsakin, dawite va hawlkhia un. Man piak kulloin hih vangliatna na ngah uh bangin hih vangliatna na zatna uhah zong man va ngen kei un. 9 Kham ahi a, ngun ahi a, sumngo ahi zongin sum peuhmah na ip sung uhah keng kei un. 10 Khualzinna-ah an ngenin puakna ding ip ahi a, khedap ahi a, ciangkhut ahi zongin keng kei unla, puanak zong a val kengthuah kei un. Nasem mite pen amau sapnateng mite in a piak ding a ngeina a hihi. 11 "Khuapi ahi a, khuaneu ahi zongin khua khat peuhpeuh na tun' uh ciangin tua khuasungah note zin hong tungsak nuam kua om ahi hiam, ci-in zong unla, na muh uh ciangin tuate' inn-ah tungin, tua khua na nusiat mateng uh tua lai mahah omsuak pah un. 12 Inn khat peuhpeuhah na lut uh ciangin a mite hopihin thupha na pia un. 13 Tua na hopihna uh innsunga mite in note hong tun'saknop leh na hopihna thupha uh amaute tungah kip ding a, ahi zongin hong tun'saknop kei uh leh na hopihna thupha uh na dokkik ding uhhi. 14 Inn khat peuhpeuh in ahi a, khua khat peuhpeuh in ahi zongin note hong tun'saknop kei a, na thugen uh hong ngaihnop kei leh tua lai panin paikhia unla, na khe uha leivui bangte sin'khiat un.

Tua bangin thusitna a thuak dingin hong kipaipih ciangin, bang gen ding ihi hiam, ci-in lunghimawh kei un. A hun a tun' ciangin na gending teng uh hong kihilh ding hi. 20 Thu na gen uh ciangin note' gen hiloin, na Pa uh' Khasiangtho in note tung tawnin thu a gen ding a hihi.
Zeisu in a nungzui sawmlenihte a vaikhakna a man khit ciangin tua kiimnai-a om khuate-ah thuhilh ding leh thugen dingin tua mun panin a paikhia hi.
"Banghang hiam cihleh mi tampi a kisap hangin tawm bek a kiteel hi," a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amaute mai-ah Zeisu hong pai a, "Leitungah ahi a, vantungah ahi zongin vangliatna khempeuh kei tungah hong kipia khinta hi. 19 Tua ahih ciangin note pai unla, midang khempeuh, keima nungzui mi suaksakin, Pa min, Tapa min, leh Khasiangtho min tawh tui sungah na phum un. 20 Tua ciangin note tungah ka hong gen thute khempeuh a zuihna dingun na hilh un. Hun bei dongin note a hong ompih tawntung ding ka hihna thu phawk ta un," a ci hi.

amah in mi sawmlenih teelin, sawltakte, ci-in min a phuah hi. Zeisu in, "Kei tawh a kikhawl dingin noteng ka hong teel hi. Thu a hilh dingin zong ka hong sawl ding a, 15 dawi hawlkhiatna ding vangliatna na nei ding uhhi," a ci hi.

Note hong kimanin, thusitna a thuak dingin thukhen zumah hong kipaipih ciangin bang gen ding ihi hiam, ci-in ma lunghihmawh kei un. A thugen ding pen note hiloin Khasiangtho ahih manin a hun tak ciangin na gen dingun a hong kisawl peuhpeuh na gen un.

Tua khit ciangin a tawpna-ah, an a nek laitakun nungzui sawmlekhatte mahmah kiangah a kilang hi. A kithawhkik sak khit ciangin amah a mu mite' thugen umlo uh ahih manin a lungkhauhna uh leh a uplohna hangun amaute a taii hi. 15 Tua khit ciangin amaute tungah, "Leitung khempeuhah note pai kawikawi unla, mi khempeuh tungah Lungdamna Thu na hilh ta un.
Nasep a kipat ciangin Zeisu ama khan' kum sawmthum bang a pha hi. Mite in ama pa Joseph hi, ci-in a ngaihsun uhhi. Joseph' pa Heli,

"Gimna a thuak mite tungah Lungdamna Thu a hilh dingin Topa in kei hong sehkhin ahih manin keima sungah Topa' kha hong om hi. Salin a kimante tungah suahtakna thu a gen ding, mittawte in khua a muhkik theihna ding, a kinengniamte a suaktasak ding leh 19 Topa in a mite a hotkhiat ding kum a pulak dingin kei hong sawl hi," ci-in a kigelh hi.

Ni khat, thungen dingin mualtungah Zeisu pai a, zan tawntung Pasian kiangah thu ngenin a om hi. 13 Khua a vak ciangin a nungzuite sam a, amaute sung panin sawmlenih teelkhia-in sawltakte ci-in min a phuak hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah thugentehna khat zong gen a, "Mittaw khat in mittaw dang khat lam paipih theilo hi. Paipih zenzen leh a nih tuakun hawkguamah kiakhawm ding uhhi.

Tua ciangin Pasian' Ukna thu a hilh ding leh cinatnate a damsak dingin kuankhia sakin 3 amaute kiangah, "Tu-a na khualzinna uhah bangmah keng kei un. Ciangkhut ahi a, ip ahi a, an ahi a, sum ahi zongin keng kei unla, puanak zong a valin kengthuah kei un. 4 Khua khatpeuhah na lut uh ciangin tua khua panin na paikhiat matengun a inn-ah hong tungsakte' inn mahah om paisuak un. 5 A inn uhah a hong tun'sak noplohna khua peuhpeuh panin na paikhiat uh ciangin amaute hilhkholhna-in na khe uha leivui bangte sin'san un," ci-in a vaikhak hi. 6 Nungzuite zong kuankhia uh a, khua khempeuhah pai-in Lungdamna Thu hilh uh a, a paina khempeuh uhah cinate a damsak uhhi.
Amaute kiangah, "Anlak ding tam mahmah a, ahi zongin mi tawm bek in anlak na sem uhhi. Tua ahih manin anneipa in a ante a la dingin mi hong sawlna dingin thu ngen un.
Ahi zongin khua khat peuhpeuhah na lut uh ciangin note hong tun'saknop kei leh a khuasung kongzingah pai unla,
"Note kiangah kong cihin-ah, keima mi ahihna mi' theihin a genkhiate, Mihing Tapa in zong Pasian' vantung mite' mai-ah, keima mi hi, ci-in genkhia ding a,

Thusitna a thuak dingin kikhopna inn-ah ahi a, hausa zumah ahi zongin hong paipih uh ciangin bang gen ding a, bangci kihut ding ka hi hiam, ci-in lunghimawh kei un. 12 Banghang hiam cihleh a hun a tun' ciangin Khasiangtho in na gen dingteng uh hong hilh ding hi," a ci hi.
Tua mah bangin kisikkik ding a kisamlo mihoih sawmkualekuate tungah lungdamna sangin mawhnei mi khat a kisikna hangin vantungah lungdamna lianzaw ding hi," a ci hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh a mangthangte a zong ding leh a honkhia dingin Mihing Tapa a hong pai ahi hi," a ci hi.
Jerusalem khua-a kipan minam khempeuh tungah a mawhna uh kisikin a kimaisakna ding thu, ama min tawh kihilh ding hi, ci-in kigelh hi.
Pasian in leitungah a Tapa hong sawlna pen mawhsakna thukhen dingin a hong paisak hiloin, leitung mite a honkhia dingin a hong paisak hizaw hi.

Note in na paunak uhah, ‘Khai tuh khit kha li ciangin anlak hun hi,’ na ci uhhi. Tu-in note khuadakin lote en un. An khempeuh min khinta a, lakding bek in sam hi. 36 Khaituhpa leh anlapa a lungdam khawm theihna dingin anlapa thaman a kipiak mah bangin anlapa in zong a nungta tawntung dingin mi a khawm ding hi.
"A mantakin kong genin-ah: Ka thugennate za-in kei hong sawlpa a um khempeuh a nungta paisuak ding hita hi. Mawhsak thukhenna ngah nawnloin, sihna panin a hingkik ta a hihi.
Kei hong sawl Pa in a kaihloh mite ka kiangah hong pai theilo ding a, ka kiangah hong pai mite nitawp ni ciangin ka hingsak ding hi.
Ka nasemte keima omna-ah a omtheihna dingin ka na a sem nuam peuhmah in kei hong zui ding uh a, ka Pa in ka na a sem mite a pahtawi ding hi," a ci hi.

"Ahi zongin Thuman a hong lak ding Huhpa ahi Khasiangtho ka Pa kiang panin ka hong sawl ding hi. Amah hong tun' ciangin keima thu hong gen ding hi. 27 A kipat cila kipanin kei tawh omkhawm na hih manun note in zong keima thu na gen ding uhhi.

Ahi zongin note tungah Khasiangtho hong tun' ciangin vangliatna tawh na kidim ding uh a, Jerusalem khuasung, Judea gamsung, Samaria gamsung, leh leimong dongin note in keima thu na gen ding uhhi," ci-in a dawng hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Topa Zeisu' thawhkikna thu teci pangin a hong genpih dingin Judas tangin mi khat i lakding kisam hi. Tua mipa pen Johan' tuiphum kipat huna kipanin Zeisu vanah a kilaktoh hun ciangdong, Zeisu' nasepna khempeuhah eite tawh a omkhawm mi khat ahih ding kisam hi," a ci hi.
Tua ahih manin kote in ka muhsa uh leh ka zaksa uh thute genloin ka om thei kei ding uhhi," ci-in a dawng uhhi.

Ahi zongin tua zanin Topa' vantung mi khat in thong kongkhakte hong a, sawltakte a paikhiatpih khit ciangin amaute kiangah, 20 "Biakinn-ah pai unla, hih nuntak thakna thu mite kiangah va gen un," ci-in a vaikhak hi.

Tua khit ciangin thu um mi hong tam tektek a, Jew mite leh Grik pau a zang Jew mite kikalah kiphunsanna thu hong om hi. Grik pau a zang Jew mite in, "Annek tuidawn, sumlepai hawmna-ah ka meigong numeite uh hong kipiaksak lo hi," ci-in lungkimlo uhhi. 2 Tua ahih manin sawltak sawmlenihte in thu um mi khempeuh samin kaikhawm uh a, "Kote in Pasian' thu hilh ding don manlo liangin annek tuidawn sumlepai vai-ah kong manlah ding uh kilawmlo hi. 3 Tua ahih ciangin sanggamte aw, note lak panin pilna leh Khasiangtho a nei mihing sagih hong kitengkhia unla, hih thute a vaihawm dingin i koih ding hi. 4 Tua hi leh kote in ka hun khempeuh uh thungetna leh thuhilhna-in kong zang thei ding uhhi," a ci uhhi.
Tua bangin a kithehthang mite pai kawikawi-in thu a hilh uhhi. 5 Philip zong Samaria gam khuapi-ah pai-in Christ thu a hilh hi.
Ahi zongin Pasian' Ukna Lungdamna Thu leh Zeisu Christ thu, Philip' gente a up uh ciangin, numei pasal a um khempeuh tui a kiphum uhhi.

Topa' vantung mi khat in Philip kiangah, "Kithawi in la, Jerusalem khua panin Gaza khua paina lampi zuan dingin leitaw lam manawhin pai in," a ci hi. (Tua lampi tu-in kizang pha nawnlo hi.) 27 Philip zong kithawi-in a pai hi. Lampi-ah Ethiopia mi mang lian khat tawh kituak hi. Tua mangpa pen Ethiopia kumpinu Kandeis khutnuai-a mang lian khat hi a, kumpinu neihsa khempeuh a ukpa a hihi. Jerusalem khua-ah Pasian bia dingin a va pai hi a, 28 inn zuan dingin leeng sungah a tuan' kawmin kamsang Isaiah laibu a sim hi. 29 Tua laitakin Khasiangtho in Philip kiangah, "Pai in la tua leeng mai-ah va om in," ci-in a sawl hi.

Tua laitakin Damaskas khua-ah Ananias min nei thu um mi khat a om hi. Amah in maang mu a, a mang sungah Topa in, "Ananias aw," ci-in a sam hi. Ananias in, "Topa aw, ka om hi," ci-in a dawng hi. 11 Tua ciangin Topa in Ananias kiangah, "Kithawi-in Kongzing Tang gei-a Judas inn-ah va pai in la, Tarsas khuami Saul min nei mi khat va kan in. Tua Saul in thu ngen a,
Ahi zongin Topa in Ananias kiangah, "Gentail mite, kumpite, leh Israel mite tungah keima min a kitheisak ding, keima na a sem dingin teelkhin ka hih manin ama kiangah va pai in.

Tua bangin Peter in a maang muh lungngaingai-in a om laitakin Khasiangtho in, "En in, mihing thum in nang hong zong uhhi. 20 Amaute nang kiangah a hong pai dingin ka hong sawl ahih manin kithawi-in kumsuk in la, lunghiang loin amaute zuipah in," a ci hi.

Lunghiang loin amaute ka zuihpahna dingin Khasiangtho in kei tungah hong gen khinzo hi. Joppa khua panin hih i sanggam gukte in zong Sisaria khua-ah hong zui uh a, ka vekpi-un Kornelias inn-ah ka lut uhhi.

Stephen a kithah huna bawlsiatna hangin thu um mite tampi kithehthang uhhi. Mi pawlkhatte Foenisia gam, Saipras gam, leh Antiok khua ciangdong tung uh a, Jew mite kiang bekah Pasian' thu a hilh uhhi. 20 Ahi zongin Saipras gammi leh Sairin khuami thu um mi pawlkhatte Antiok khua-ah pai uh a, Topa Zeisu hanga Lungdamna Thu, Gentail mite kiangah zong a gen uhhi. 21 Topa in nakpi takin amaute huh ahih manin mi tampi in thu umin Topa lamah a kihei uhhi. 22 Jerusalem-a om pawlpite in hih thu a zak uh ciangin Antiok khua-ah Barnabas a paisak uhhi. 23 Barnabas a tun' ciangin Pasian in amaute thupha a piakna mu-in lungdam mahmah a, amaute citakin a lungsim khempeuh uh tawh Topa tungah a thumanna dingun a hanthawn hi. 24 Barnabas pen mihoih mahmah, upna nei-in, Khasiangtho tawh a kidim mi khat a hihi. Mi tampi in Pasian a um uhhi.
Amaute in an tangin Pasian bia-in a om laitakun Khasiangtho in amaute kiangah, "Keima na a sem dingin ka sapsa ahih manin kei-a' dingin Barnabas leh Saul hong piakhia un," a ci hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Topa in kote kiangah thu hong pia khinzo a, ‘Leitung mi khempeuh in hotkhiatna a ngahtheihna dingin Gentail mite' khuavak ahi dingin ka hong koih hi,’ hong ci hi," a ci uhhi.

Ahi zongin Jew mite in tua khuasung uliante leh Gentail mi numei citheite holhthawh uh a, Paul leh Barnabas bawlsiat ding kipanin, tua gam panin a taikhia sak uhhi. 51 Sawltakte in zong a khe uha leivui bangte sin'khiat sanin Ikonium khua-ah a pai uhhi.

Antiok khua a tun' uh ciangin amaute in pawlpi mite khawm uh a, a khualzinna uhah Pasian in na a seppihna khempeuh leh Gentail mite in zong thu a uptheihna dingun Pasian in lam a hon'saknate khempeuh a gen uhhi.

Asia gamsungah thu a hilhding uh Khasiangtho in phallo ahih manin Frigia leh Galatia gamsung tengah a zin uhhi. 7 Mysia gamgi a tun' uh ciangin Bithynia gamsungah lutdingin kithawi uh a, ahi zongin tua gamah a pai ding uh Zeisu' Khasiangtho in phallo hi. 8 Tua ahih manin Mysia gam nawkin pai uh a, Troas khua-ah a tung uhhi. 9 Troas khua-ah a tun'ni zanin Paul in maang mu a, Masedonia gammi khat in ama kiangah, "Masedonia gamah hong pai in la, kote hong huh in," ci-in a thum hi. 10 Paul in mang a muhkhit phetin, tua lai-a om mite kiangah Lungdamna Thu a hilh dingin Pasian in eite hong sam hi, ci-in ngaihsun ka hih manun Masedonia gamah a pai dingin ka kithawi pah uhhi.

Zan khat, Paul in maang mu a, a mang sungah Topa in, "Lau kei in. Lungkia kei in la, na thugen zom in. 10 Hih khuasungah keima mi tampi om a, nang hong ompih ka hih manin kuamah in nang bangmah hong cihlo ding hi," a ci hi. 11 Tua ahih manin tua khua-ah kum khat leh alang sung omlai-in mite kiangah Pasian thu a hilh hi.

Ephesa pawlpi upate hong tun' ciangin Paul in amaute kiangah, "Asia gamsung kong tun' ni-a kipanin note tawh ka om sungteng ka nasepna khempeuh note in na thei uhhi. 19 Jew mite in kei hong thahsawmna hangin kiniamkhiatna leh khitui naptui tawh haksapi-in Topa' na ka sem hi. 20 Mihon lak ahi a, note' innsungah ahi zongin ka hong thuhilhna khempeuhah note' phattuamna ding a om khempeuh sit neiloin kong gen khin hi. 21 Jew mi leh Gentail mite a mawhna panun Pasian' lamah kihei-in i Topa Zeisu a upna dingun thu ka gen khinzo hi.

Ahi zongin Topa Zeisu in kei sep dingin a hong piak, Pasian hehpihna hangin Lungdamna Thu, mite kiangah gen ding nasep ka tangtut zawh nak leh kei nuntakna-ah bangbang hong piang ta leh a thupi-in ka ngaihsun kei hi.
A zingciangin ding leuleu-in Sisaria khua ka tung uh a, Pasian thu a hilh Philip' inn-ah tungin tua lai-ah ka taam uhhi. Tuapa pen Jerusalem khua-a a kiteel mi sagihte sungah a kihel a hihi.

Tua ciangin amah in, ‘I pu i pate' Pasian in ama deihna a thei ding, a thuman a Nasempa a mu ding, leh ama kam mahmah tawh a thugen a za dingin nang hong teel khinzo hi. 15 Tua ahih manin na muhsa leh na zaksa thu khempeuh, mi khempeuh tungah genin teci a pang ding na hi hi.
Amah in Pasian' Ukna thu, leh Topa Zeisu Christ' thu, hangtakin a ututin genin a hilh hi.
Pasian kiang panin a hong pai Lungdamna Thu a hilh dingin Pasian' teelna tawh sawltak ahi, Zeisu Christ' sila keimah Paul in lai ka hong khak hi.
Minam khempeuh in ama thu umin a zuihtheihna dingun Christ hangin sawltak nasep sep theihna ding hamphatna thu Pasian in Christ' na sepna dingin kote a hong pia hi.
Ama Tapa hangin Lungdamna Thu ka lungsim khempeuh tawh hilhin a na ka sep Pasian in hih ka thugente a man taktak ahihna thu hong thei hi.
Nuntakna sang mite leh nuntakna niam mite, mipilte leh mihaite, a kuamah peuh ka huh ding ka tavuan ahih manin, 15 Rom khua-a a om note tungah zong Lungdamna Thu hilhding ka lawp mahmah hi.
Ama deihna bang a sem dingin Pasian in a hong sap, amah a it eite-a' dingin na khempeuh a hoihlamin piangsak hi, ci-in i thei hi.

Kei, Christ tawh kipawl ka hih manin zuauthu ka gen thei kei hi. Khasiangtho lamlahna tawh, ka lungsim kitheihna-ah zuaugen hetloin a mantakin ka gen thu in: 2 Leitung silesa-ah ka mipihte-a' dingin nakpi takin dahin ka lunggimna a khang hi. 3 Hi thei ding hi leh amaute' hoihna dingin keimah in Pasian' samsiatna thuakin Christ tawh kikhenna ding ciangdong nangawnin amaute ka huhnuam hi.

Laisiangtho in zong, "Topa tungah huhna a ngen khempeuhte in hotkhiatna a ngah ding uhhi," ci hi. 14 Ahi zongin a uplohpa uh tungah kua in thu ngen thei ding ahi hiam? Ama thu za ngei kei leh kua in a thu um thei ding ahi hiam? Ama thu kigen kei leh kua in za thei ding ahi hiam? 15 A gen dingin kisawl kei leh kua in a thu gen thei ding ahi hiam? Tua ahih manin Laisiangtho sungah, "Lungdamna thu a hilh dingin a hong pai mite hangin kinuam mahmah hi," ci-in kigelh hi. 16 Ahi zongin Isaiah in, "Topa aw, ka thugente uh kua in um ahi hiam?" a cih mah bangin Lungdamna Thu a za mi khempeuh in um kimlo uhhi. 17 Tua ahih ciangin zakna panin upna hong piangthei a, Christ thu upna ding pen hilhna panin hong piangthei pan hi.
Tua ahih manin Pasian in hehpihna hong piakkhongna tawh kizui-in i siamna a tuamtuamte zang ciat ni. I siamna pen Pasian' thu gentheihna ding siamna ahih leh i upna neihzah tawh kizui-in gen ni.
Thadah kei unla, nakpi takin na sem un. Lawp mahmahna lungsim tawh Topa' na sem un.

Ukna thuneite pen note' hoihna dingin Pasian' nasemte ahi uhhi. Ahi zongin a sia-in na gamtat uh leh gim hong pia taktak ding uh ahih manin na lau ding uh a hihi. Banghang hiam cihleh amaute pen Pasian' nasemte hi a, a sia-in a gamta mite tungah Pasian' hehna bangin gim a pia dingte ahi uhhi.

Gentail mite tungah na a sem dingin Christ Zeisu sawltak hih theihna ding hamphatna lianpi Pasian in kei a hong piakna hang a hihi. Gentail mite pen Khasiangtho in Pasian' tungah a piak, ama san'theih biakpiaknate a suahtheihna dingin Pasian kiang panin a hong pai Lungdamna Thu ka hilhna-ah siampi bangin na ka sem hi. 17 Tua ahih manin Christ tawh kikopin Pasian-a' ding na ka sepna-ah kei ka kisathei mahmah hi. 18 Khasiangtho' vangliatna tawh lim leh na lamdangte zangin, Gentail mite in Pasian thu a zuihtheihna dingun Christ in ka thatang leh ka kam ka muk a zatna thute bekah hangtakin genin ka telkheh ding hi. Tua ahih manin Jerusalem khua panin Illyrikam gam ciangdong ka zinna khempeuhah Zeisu Christ hangin Lungdamna Thu ka hilh khinzo hi. 19-20 A tawntungin keima tup thu in: Mi khatpeuh in a patsa nasep maban, oltakin zomin a sem mi ka suahkhak lohna dingin Christ thu a kizak ngei nailohna munte bekah Lungdamna Thu hilh ding keima utna a hihi.
Judea gamsunga a om thu umlo mite in kei hong gimsakkhak lohna ding leh Jerusalem khua-a a om Pasian mite-a' dingin nasepnate lungdam takin a hong san'theihna dingun thu hong ngetsak un.

Christ in tuiphum nasep a sem dingin kei hong sawllo a, Lungdamna Thu a hilh dingin a hong sawl bek a hihi. Ka thuhilhna-ah zong thugen siamna leh pilna a nei ka hi kei hi. Tua bang hi kei hen la, pilna leh gensiamna a nei hi leng, Christ in singlamteh tunga a thuakna thu in vangliatna a neihna hang kisalo khading hi. 18 Banghang hiam cihleh sihna a thuak mite-a' dingin singlamteh tungah Christ sihna thu pen a haihuai thu a hihi. Ahi zongin hotkhiatna a ngah eite-a' dingin Pasian' vangliatna a hihi.

Sanggamte aw, Pasian in note hong sap laitakin na omzia uh ngaihsun un. Leitung mite' hong muhna panin note a tamzaw, mipil na hi kei uh a, mi vanglian zong na hi kei uh a, mi thupi zong na hi kei uhhi. 27 Ahi zongin Pasian in mipilte a maizumsakna dingin mihaite hong teel a, mi thahatte a maizumsakna dingin mi thaneemte a hong teel hi. 28 Leitung mite in thupi a sakte uh a suksiat theihna dingin Pasian in leitung mite' simmawh a niamte, bangmahin a ngaihsutloh uh mite a teel hi.

Sanggamte aw, Pasian' thu hilhin note kiangah kong pai lai-in, mipilte' zat kam thukpipi leh pilna kamte ka zang kei hi. 2 Banghang hiam cihleh note kiangah ka om laitakin singlamteh tungah Zeisu Christ a sihna thu simloh thudang peuhmah ngaihsutloh dingin ka ngaihsutsa a hihi. 3 Tua ahih manin note kiangah kong pai lai-in thaneemin, launa tawh ka ling a, 4 thu ka hong hilh ciangin zong leitung mipilte' zat kammalte leh siamnate ka zang kei a, Pasian' Khasiangtho vangliatna tawh thu ka hong hilh hi. 5 Tua ahih manin note' thu upna pen mihingte' pilna hang hiloin, Pasian' vangliatna hangin a um na hi uhhi.

A taktakin ci lehang, Apollos i cihte, Paul i cihte, bangpi hi zenzen ka hi uhhiam? Note in thu na uptheihna dingun Pasian' nasemte ka hi lel uhhi. Topa in kote' sepdingin a hong piak nasep tuak a sem ka hi lel uhhi.6Keima nasep pen khaici vawh hi a, Apollos' nasep pen tuibuah hi a, ahi zongin a khangsakpa ahih leh Pasian a hihi. 7 Khaici vawhpa leh tuibuakpa a thupi hilo a, a khangsak Pasian a thupi hi bek hi.

Biakinn-ah nasem dingin a kicial mite in biakinn mah panin an ngah uh a, biakna tau-ah na a semte in biakna sa mah a ngahna uh theilo na hi uhhiam? 14 Tua mah bangin lungdamna thu a hilhte in tua nasepna mah panin nuntakna a ngahna ding uh Topa' thupiak a hihi.

Lungdamna thu ka hilh hangin kisialhna ding thu bangmah omlo hi. Banghang hiam cihleh tua thu a hilh ding mahin a hong kisawl a hihi. Tua ahih manin lungdamna thu hilh kei leng kei-a' dingin a dahhuai mahmah a hihi. 17 Keima utthu tawh a sem hi leng sep thaman ka lamen ding hi. Ahi zongin Pasian in a sem dingin hong sawl ahih manin ka sepding nasep a sem ka hihi. 18 Tua ahih leh ka sep thaman bang ahi hiam? Ka thaman pen, lungdamna thu tawh kisai ka sepna-ah thaman ngenloin, a khongin Lungdamna Thu hilhding hamphatna ka neihna a hihi. 19 Kei pen kuama khutnuai mi hiloin a suakta mi hinapi-in, mi a tam theithei ka ngahzawhna dingin mi khempeuh' khutnuai mi-in ka kibawl hi. 20 Jew mite lakah na ka sep ciangin amaute ka ngahzawhna dingin Jew mite khat mah bangin ka gamta a, Moses Thukham ka zuihding a kisaploh hangin a zuite ka ngahzawhna dingin amaute lakah na ka sep ciangin amaute mah bangin ka gamta hi. 21 Tua mah bangin Jew mite' Thukham in a huamloh Gentail mite lakah na ka sep ciangin amaute ka ngahzawhna dingin Gentail mite bangmahin ka gamta hi. Hih bangin ka gen ciangin Pasian' thukham a zuilo, cihna hiloin Christ' thukham zui-in a gamta ka hihi. 22 Upna neu mite lakah na ka sep ciangin amaute ka ngahzawhna dingin amaute mah bangin ka gamta hi. Tua ahih manin ahih theihna lam peuhpeuhah mite ka ngahzawhna dingin mi khempeuh' ngeina ka zui hi. 23 Hih bangin ka gamtatna pen amaute tungah Lungdamna Thu ka tuttheihna ding leh keima nasep hoihtakin ka septheihna ding ka deihna a hihi.
Ahi zongin Pasian' thu a hilhte pen mite tungah thugen hi a, mite tungah huhna, hanthotna, leh hehnepna a pia a hihi.
Hong langpang tampi a om tei hangin limtakin na septheihna ding lam tampi tak a om hi.

Sanggamte aw, Stefanas-te innkuan pen Akhaia gamsunga thu um masa pente ahihna leh Pasian' mite-a' dingin nasem dingin a kipia mite ahihna thu na thei uhhi. 16 Tua bang mite leh amaute tawh tua bangmahin na a semkhawm mite' thu na man'na dingun ka hong thum hi.

Christ hangin lungdamna thu a hilh dingin Troas khua ka tun' ciangin tua lai-ah nasep theihna dingin Topa in lampi hong hon'sakna thu ka mu hi. 13 Ahi zongin tua lai-ah i sanggampa Titus na omlo ahih manin ka lungsim om thei nawnlo hi. Tua ahih manin tua lai-a om mite nusia-in Masedonia gamah ka paisuak hi. 14 Ahi zongin Pasian tungah lungdam mahmahna ding thu a om hi. Christ tawh ka kipawlna hangun gualzawhna tawh Christ a paina khempeuhah Pasian in kote hong zuisak hi. Mun khempeuhah paknamtui a kizelh bangin Christ thu theihna a kizelsak dingin Pasian in kote hong zang hi.
Pasian in hong hehpihna tawh hih nasep hong pia ahih manin ka thaneem hetkei uhhi.

Lungdamna thu ka hilhte uh kitello ahih leh zong siatna a thuak mite-a' ding bekin a kitello hi ding hi. 4 Tua bang mite pen hih leitung pasian gilote in a lungsim mit uh tawsak ahih manin umlo uh a, Pasian tawh a kibang teekteek Christ minthan'na hangin amaute tungah a hong taang lungdamna thu khuavak mu theilo uhhi. 5 Banghang hiam cihleh kote' hilh thu pen komau' thu hilo a, Christ Zeisu pen Topa ahi hi, ci-in a hilh ka hi uh a, kote pen Christ hangin nomau' na a semte ka hi uhhi.

Pasian zahtakna ding thu ka lungsim uhah om tawntung ahih manin mite ka zolzawhna dingun ka hanciam uhhi. Pasian in kote' lungsim teltakin hong thei a, note in zong na lungsim uhah kei hong thei dingin ka hong um hi.

Ka nasepna uhah mite in mawhna hong zon'ding uh utlo ka hih manun kuamah ka nawngkaisak khaklohna dingun ka hanciam uhhi. 4 Tua ahih manin ka sepna khempeuh uhah Pasian' nasemte ka hihna uh ka kilangsak uh a, lungduai takin gimna, haksatna, lungkhamnate ka thuak uhhi.

Tu-in kong hawhna ding pen a thumveina ding hita a, note' gimna dingin bangmah ka hong ngen het kei ding hi. Keima deih pen note' sumlepaite hiloin note mahmah na hi uhhi. A taktakin ci lehang, tate in nulepate a huhding hilo a, nulepate in tate a huhding hizaw hi. 15 Note ka hong huhtheihna dingin lungdam takin ka neih khempeuh kong piaknop banah keima pumpi mahmah zong ka hong kipia nuam hi. Tuazah takin ka hong itna pen itlohna tengin hong nei zawsop ding na hi uhhiam? 16 Sumlepai vai-in note themkhat zong ka hong gimsak hetlohna na theihsa uh a hihi. Ahi zongin mi pawlkhatte in, kei pen ngian zangin khemna tawh a lamdang khatah sum tamzaw ka ngahna ding a vaihawmin hong gen uhhi. 17 Note kiangah ka hong paisak mite tung tawnin note kiang panin keima hamphatna ding bang la ka hi hiam?

Note mai-ah ka mawhna uh a kiphelphel bang khatin na hong ngaihsutkhak uh leh tua bang hilo hi. Lawmte aw, ka hihna khempeuh uh note' phattuamna ding ka deihna uh tawh Christ in kote' gen ding a hong deih bangin Pasian' mai-ah thu genin nasem ka hi uhhi.

Mihingte' hong sehna leh hong sawlna tawh sawltak na a sem hiloin, Zeisu Christ leh sihna panin tua Zeisu a thosakkik Pasian' hong sawlna tawh sawltak na a sem keimah Paul in Galati gama om pawlpi tuamtuamte tungah lai ka hong khak hi.

Hih bangin thu ka gen ciangin mite' hong pahtak theihna ding a zong tawh kibang na hong sa uhhiam? Mite' pahtak ding a ut ka hi kei a, Pasian' hong pahtak ding a hanciam ka hihi. Mihingte' hong pahtak theihna dingin a gamta hi zenzen leng, Christ' nasem ka hi kei ding hi.

Amaute in genthuah ding a neih genloh, Jew mite tungah lungdamna thu hilh ding nasep, Pasian in Peter tungah a piak mah bangin, Gentail mite tungah lungdamna thu hilhna ding nasep, Pasian in kei tungah a hong piakna thu a muzaw uhhi. 8 Banghang hiam cihleh Jew mite lakah sawltak nasep a sem dingin Peter a koih mah bangin Gentail mite lakah sawltak nasep a sem dingin Pasian in kei a hong koih hi. 9 Makai-a kinei James, Peter, leh Johan-te in Gentail mite lakah nasem dingin Pasian in kei hong sehna thu thei uh ahih manin, Pasian sungah nasemkhawm khat ihi hi, cih hong lahna uh limin kei leh Barnabas tawh khut kiletna hong bawl uhhi. Kei leh Barnabas in Gentail mite lakah na semin amaute in Jew mite lakah na a sepna ding uh thukimna ka nei uhhi.
Pasian thu hilhna a za mipa in ama neih na hoihte khempeuh zong, amah a hilhpa tawh zangkhawm ta hen.
Tua lungdamna thuhilh a sem dingin Pasian in a tuam vilvelin ama vangliatna tawh kei a hong seh hi.
Tua ahih manin hai ommawk kei unla, Topa in bang a semdingin hong deih ahi hiam, ci-in kan un.

Silate aw, launa leh lin'na tawh na leitung tote uh thu mang unla, Christ' na na sep uh mah bangin lungsim takpi tawh na na sepsak un. 6 A hong pahtak ding uh deihna tawh amaute' muhsung bekin tuaci gamtat kei unla, Christ' sila na hihna hangun Pasian' hong deih bangin lungsim takpi tawh na sem un. 7 Mihingte' na a sem bang lelin kingaihsun loin Topa' na a sem bangin kingaihsun unla, thanopna tawh sem un.

Thu ka hilhtheih hun ding ciangin lungdamna thusim hangtakin ka hilhkhiat theihna dingin Pasian in ka thugen ding hong hilhna dingin kei-a' dingin zong thu na ngetsak ta un. 20 Pasian' thu genin tangmi ka sepna hang mahin sikkhau khihna thuakin thongkia ka hih manin ka hilhdingin a kilawm bangin hangtakin ka gen ngamna dingin thu hong ngetsak ta un. 21 Ka septe leh ka omzia khempeuh na theihna dingun Topa thu sungah i sanggam, thuman takin na a sem Tikhikas in note kiangah thu khempeuh a cingin hong gen ding hi.

Pawlkhatte in ahih leh lungsim hoih tawh hiloin ka thongkiatna-ah na ka sak semsem theihna dingin kei hong demna-in Christ thu a hilh uhhi. 18 Ahi zongin phamawh ka sa kei hi. Lungsim hoih tawh a kihilh a, lungsimkhem tawh a kihilh ahi zongin, bangbang hita se leh Christ' thu gen uh ahih nungsang, kei ka lungdam hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh Christ-a' ding bekin a nungta ka hi a, si ta leng zong kei-a' dingin hoihzaw semsem lai hi. 22 Leitung pumpi nungta lai hi leng na a manpha tampi semthei ding ka hih manin, sihding leh hin'ding ka teelsawn ding ka thei kei hi. 23 Hih thu nih khentat hak ka sa mahmah hi. Kei-a' dingin hoihzaw thampek ahih manin leitung pumpi si-in Christ tawh omkhawm ding ka ut hi.

Christ nasepna-ah note in pumpi tawh na hong huhkim theihloh manun note' tangin amah in kei a hong huh manin a nuntakna hong pia-in sihlawh dektak hi. Tua ahih manin hihbang mite na zahtakbawl mahmah unla, Topa' nasem taktak hi, ci-in lungdam takin na limbawl un.

Ahi zongin note in lungdamna thu na zak cil lai-un na neih uh lametna panin ling hetloin, bulkip nei-in citakin na om paisuak ding uh a hihi. Tua lungdamna thu mah keimah Paul in hilhin ka sepbel hi a, leitung mun khempeuhah a kihilh lungdamna thu mah a hihi.

Pasian in mi khempeuh-a' dingin a koihcing hih a thupi a deihhuai a thusim pen ama mite tungah pholak ding a sawm a hihi. Tua thusim in: Christ tawh a kipawlte in Pasian tawh minthan'na ngahkhawm ding hi, cihna a hihi. 28 Tua ahih manin a milip tungah Christ' thu ka hilh uh a, Christ tawh a kipawlna uh hangin a milipin a khangcingin Pasian' omna-ah ka tun'pih theihna dingun a milip tungah hilhin ka genkhol uhhi.

Mite' nasem bangin kingaihsun loin, Pasian' nasem bangin kingaihsun unla, na sep peuhpeuh uh lungsim takpi tawh lawpin sem un. 24 Topa in note tungah thaman a hong piakding lamtak phawk gige un. Tua bangin na sepna uhah Christ Topa' na a semsem na hi uhhi.
Lungsim takpi tawh thu ngen tawntung unla, kidawm kawmin lungdamna tawh thu ngen un.
Tua ciangin Arkhippas kiangah, "Pasian-a' dingin nasepna nang tungah hong kipia pen hoihtakin na zo in," ci-in na gen un.

Banghang hiam cihleh note kiangah Lungdamna Thu ka hong hilh lai-un kam bek tawh a hong gen hiloin, Khasiangtho' vangliatna leh Lungdamna Thu a man taktak hi, ci-in theihna tawh a hong pai ka hi uhhi. Note kiangah ka om laitakun note' phattuamna dingin ka sep ka bawlna khempeuh uh na thei uhhi.

Note kiangah ka hong pai lai-un kote na hong limbawlna thu uh, leh a nungta a man Pasian' thu zui-in a bia ding, 10 leh a hong tungding Pasian' hehna panin eite a hong honkhia, sihna panin Pasian in a thawhsakkik a Tapa Zeisu, van panin a hong paiding ngak dingin milim paisanin Pasian' lamah na kiheina uh thute mi khempeuh in gen belin a nei uhhi.

Sanggamte aw, Topa in note lam a hong lak ding leh a hong makai dingin a seh, note lakah na a hong sem mite, a kilawm a kituakin zahtakbawl un. 13 Amau' nasepna hangin amaute nakpi takin itbawlin zahtak un. Note khatlekhat kilem takin na om un.

Topa Zeisu Christ tawh minthan'na na ngahkhawm theihna dingun note tungah ka hong hilh uh Lungdamna Thu tawh hih nopsakna-ah Pasian in note a hong sam a hihi. 15 Tua ahih ciangin sanggamte aw, kam tawh ahi a, lai tawh ahi zongin ka hong hilh uh thumante limtakin zui unla, kiptakin om un.
Hihbangin na sepzawhna dingin thatang hatna a hong pia i Topa Christ Zeisu tungah ka lungdam hi. Ama nasem dingin kei hong muangin hong seh ahih manin ka nuam hi.
Hih ka gen thu pen zuau a hilo, thu taktak a gen ka hi a, Gentail mite lakah upna thu leh hih thuman a gen dingin sawltak na semin thu a hilh dingin kei a hong kisawl a hihi.
Hih a thak Lungdamna Thu hilhin a taangko ding leh sawltak na a sem dingin kei a hong kikoih a hihi.

Mi tampite' theihin ka thuhilh, na zaksa thu khempeuh, midangte a hilhsawn thei dingin a citak mite tungah hoihtakin a zuih dingun na hilh in. 3 Christ Zeisu' galkap hoih hihna tawh thuakdingin a kisam khempeuh na na thuak in. 4 Galkap a semlai mipa in ama tungah a om bupa a lungkimsak theihna dingin na sem ahih manin tualsung mite' nasep tawh thuahkhawm lo hi.

Lungdamna Thu ka hilhna sungah ka gen mah bangin David' suan, sihna panin a kithosak Zeisu Christ na na phawk in. 9 Ama hangin a kingah Lungdamna Thu ka hilh manin gimna ka thuak a, mithat bangin sikkol hong kibulh hi. Pasian' thu ahih leh sikkol kibulh theilo hi.
Pasian' thuman a mantakin hilhin, na nasepna-ah maizumna thuakloin, Pasian' pahtakna na ngahtheihna dingin na siam tawpin hanciam in.

Mi khatpeuh a hoihlo na khempeuh panin kikemin a siangtho takin a om nak leh na hoih nam khempeuh a sem dingin a Topa tungah ki-apin, a Topa tungah a manpha suak ahih manin a thupi diakte-ah amah kizang ding hi.

Topa' na a sem mite, kitot a hatte hilo ding a, mi khempeuh tungah lungsim nemin, thugen siamin, thuakzawhna nei-in, 25 thunem tawh a langte' hoihlohna a puahtheite hi ding hi. Tua bang hi leh Pasian in amaute kisiksak thei ding a, thuman thutak hong thei-in, 26 Dawimangpa in ama deihna bangin a gamta dingin a mat khit hangin ama thang panin amaute suakta khathei ding uhhi.

Pasian' na a sem mite mi cingtaak hi-in, na hoih namkim a septheihna dingun Laisiangtho pen Pasian' lamlahna tawh a hong kipia hi a, thuman thutak hilhna ding, a khialte taiina ding, a manlote a manin puahna ding, a manin nuntak theihna ding thuhilhna dingin a manpha mahmah a hihi.

hunhoih hunsia cih khen tuanloin Pasian' thu hilh ding na kin ngaihsutna ding, lungduaina tawh mite' lungsim zo-in, mite taii-in, hanthawnin na hilhna dingin thu a hong pia ka hihi. 3 Mite in thuman a ngaih noploh hun, amaute' deihna bek a zuihnop hun, amaute' zaknop thute bek a gen ding sia a cial thuahthuah hun hong tung ding hi. 4 Amaute in thuman thutak ngainuam nawnloin tangthu phuahtawm peuh ngaihsutpi-in nei ding uhhi. 5 Ahi zongin nang na hih leh thu khempeuhah na lungsim ki-ukin haksatnate na thuak in la, Pasian' thugen nasep semin, na nasepna-ah ma na tun' in.

Vantung mite in hong gen thute thuman hi a, tua thu a palsatte in a kilawm bangin gim thuak ding uhhi. 3 Tua ahih manin a thupi mahmah hih hotkhiatna thudon loin i om leh suahtakna om thei ngeilo ding hi. A masa-in Topa mahmah in hotkhiatna thu hong pulak a, tua thu a za mite in thuman ahihna thu eite tungah hong gen leuleu uhhi.

Ahi zongin amaute' lunggulh pen leitung sangin a hoihzaw vantung gam a hihi. Pasian in amaute-a' dingin khuapi khat na vaihawmsak ahih manin, tua bang mite in amah pen ka Pasian uhhi, ci-in a gen ding uh Pasian in maizumna-in na ngaihsunlo hi.
Note tungah Pasian' thu a hong gen, nidanga na makai masate uh phawk un. Amaute' nuntakna leh a sihna ziate uh ngaihsun unla, amaute' upna bang na neihna dingun hanciam un.
Pasian leh Topa Zeisu Christ sila keimah James in Leitung mun khempeuhah kithehthangin a om minam sawmlenihte tungah hopihna lai ka hong gelh hi.
tua bangin a khial mite lam manah a tun'pihkik mipa in a khial mite a sihna ding panin honkhia-in, mawhna tampi a maina dingin na a sempa ahihna thu na phawk un.

Vantung panin a hong kisawl Khasiangtho' vangliatna tawh thu a gen thupuakte' tung panin na zak uh Thute mah kamsangte in a gen laitakun, tua a thugente uh amaute-a' ding hiloin note-a' ding ahihna thu, Pasian in tua kamsangte tungah a na genzo hi. Vantung mite nangawn in hih thute a theihtelnop khat uh a hihi.

Na lungsim sung uhah Christ zahtakbawl unla, amah Topa-in nei un. Note' lametna thu a hong dong a omkhak leh hoihtakin a genthei dingin kiging tawntung unla, ahi zongin lungnemna leh zahtakna lim tawh gen un.

Christ mahmah zong note-a' dingin si a, Pasian' kiangah hong tun'pih theihna dingin mihoih khat pen mihoihlote' mawhna hangin khatvei a si hi. Mite in ama leitung pumpi that a, ahi zongin Pasian in kha nuntakna a pia hi. 19 Tua kha nuntakna tawh va pai-in thongkia-in a om khate kiangah thu a va hilh hi.

Mi pawlkhatte' ngaihsut bangin Topa in a kamciamna a hong tungsak hak hi zenzen lo hi. Note khat beek in siatna na thuakkhak ding uh deihloin na vekpi-un na kisik ding uh deih ahih manin hong pai nailohna pen note hong khualna hizaw hi.
meiphual sung panin dawhkhiat bangin midangte na honkhia un. Mi pawlkhatte' mawhna-ah note zong na siatkhak lohna dingun kidop kawmna tawh na huh unla, amau' gamtat hoihlo mawhnate na mudah un.
Note' nasepnate ka thei hi. Na tha uh a hatloh hangin ka thu zui-in kei tungah na hong cihtakna uh ka thei hi. Tua ahih manin kuamah in a khak zawhloh ding kong, note' mai-ah hon'sa-in ka koih hi.
Tua laizial phelin a sung a en dingin a kilawm kuamah kimulo ahih manin nakpi takin ka kap hi.

"Ka thei kei hi, topa aw. Nangmah in na theizaw ding hi," ka ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in keima kiangah, "Hih mite pen bawlsiatna lianpi thuakin a hong suakta mite ahi uhhi. Amaute in a puan uh sawpsiangin Tuuno sisan tawh a paksak uh a hihi. 15 Tua ahih manin Pasian' tokhom mai-ah amaute ding uh a, sun leh zanin a biakinn sungah ama na sem uhhi. Tokhom tungah a tupa in amaute ompihin a hu ding hi.
Ka teci nihte puanhampi silhin ka paisak ding a, amaute in ni tul khat za nih sawmguk sung Pasian' thu a gen ding uhhi," hong ci hi.

Tua ciangin vantungah nakpi takin awging khat ka za a, "Tu-in Pasian in hong honkhia khinta a, kumpi vangliatna a neihna hong lakkhia khinta a, ama Christ in aana a neihna thu lakkhia khinta hi. Banghang hiam cihleh a sun a zanin eite' Pasian' mai-ah dingin i sanggamte mawhsakna a gen tawntungpa, tu-in vantung panin kilawnkhia khinta hi. 11 I sanggamte in Tuuno sisan leh thuman a genna uh tawh amah na zo uh a, a nuntakna nangawn uh na pia ngam uhhi.

Biakinn sung panin vantung mi khat hong paikhia a, meiipi tungah a tu mipa nakpi takin samin, "Leitung mite lak dingin min mahmah a, a lak hun hong tungta ahih manin na phiaukawi tawh at in," a ci hi.

Tua ciangin numei kiangah, "Naupaina-ah na gimna nakpi takin ka khangsak ding a, na a sapipi-in nau na nei ding hi. Ahi zongin na pasal mah na deih ding a, amah in nang tungah hong uk ding hi," a ci hi. 17 Tua ciangin mipa kiangah, "Nang in na zi' thu mangin, ‘Nang in na ne kei ding hi,’ ci-in nang kong thupiak singgah ne na hih ciangin, nangma hangin leitang in samsiatna ngah hi. Na nuntak tawntung gimpi-in na semin na annek ding na zong ding hi. 18 Ling leh kiakte, nang-a' dingin hong pokhiasak ding a, nang in gamlak kungte na ne ding hi. 19 Lei-ah na ciahkik matengin khua-ul kai-in na na sep ciang bekin an na ne ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh lei sung panin nang hong kipiangsak a, nang, leivui na hih manin, leivui mah na suakkik ding hi," a ci hi.

{ Topa } in, "Banghangin hici gamtat na hi hiam? Na sanggampa' sisan, leilak panin kei tungah hong kiko hi. 11 Na sanggampa' sisan a hup dingin a kam a ka leitang tungah tu-in nang hong kisamsiat hi. 12 Lo na khawh ciangin nang-a' dingin an hong piangsak nawnlo ding hi. Nang pen a galtai, leitunga a vakvai na hi ding hi," a ci hi.

Leitungah mite tam dingin hong kipanin, amau' sung panin tanute hong suah ciangin, 2 vana om mite in leitung mite' tanute hoihsa uh ahih manin a deih bangun amaute zi-in a la uhhi. 3 Tua ciangin { Topa } in, "Mihingte sungah ka Kha om paisuak nawnlo ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh mihingte a mawh hi khinta a, kum za leh kum sawmnih sung kisikna ding hun kipia lai bek ding hi," a ci hi. 4 Vana om mite in leitung mihing tanute luppihin, amaute in ta a neih hun laitak hita leh tua khit hita leh, amau' suanlekhak Nefilim a kici mite leitungah om hi. Hih mite pen tang lai-a mi thahat, mi minthangte ahi uhhi. 5 Leitungah mihing a gitlohna a liatna leh mihing lungsim ngaihsutna peuhmah a sia ahih ngitngetna thu { Topa } in mu hi. 6 Leitungah mihing a bawl pen { Topa } khial kisa a, tua thu in ama lungsim dahsak hi. 7 Tua ahih ciangin { Topa } in, "Ka pian'saksa mihing, ganhing, a bokvak ganhingte leh huih lak vasate, leitung panin ka phiatkhia ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh amaute ka bawl ka khial hi," a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Noah in { Topa}-a' ding biakna tau khat lam a, a siangtho ganhing khempeuh leh a siangtho vasa khempeuh lak pan khat ciat la-in, biakna tau tungah meihal biakna a pia hi. 21 { Topa } in a namtui gimnam a zak ciangin, a lungsim sungah, "Mihing' gamtatna hangin leitang ka samsia kik ngei nawn kei ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh mihing' lungsim ngaihsutna pen a tangval lai panin a gilo hi mawk hi. Tu-a ka hih bangin nuntakna a nei khempeuh zong ka susia ngei nawn kei ding hi. 22 Leitung a omlai tengin, lo pawi hun leh anlak hun, a vot leh a sa, khuakhal leh phalbi, sun leh zan beilo ding hi," a ci hi.

Tuate' mai-ah na kun kei ding uh a, tuate na bia kei ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh keimah note' { Topa } Pasian, a aam Pasian ka hi a, kei hong mudahte' tungah pate' mawhna tate' tungah khang thum khang lina dongin thuk-in,

{ Topa } in Moses kiangah, 2 "Israel mite kiangah hih bangin gen in: Israel mite khat peuhpeuh hita leh Israel sunga a peem khualmite hita leh, a tate khat peuhpeuh Molek pasian tungah a pia mipa kithat ding a, mihonte in suang tawh denglum ding uhhi.

"Ahih hangin note in ka thu ngailoin, hih thupiaknate khempeuh na hih kei uh a, 15 ka thukhamte nialin, ka biakna ngeina kipte kih a, ka thupiaknate khempeuh semloin, ka thuciamna na palsat uh leh, 16 keimah in note tungah hih bangin kong hih ding hi: Note' tungah hong tung dingin keimah in thakhatthu-a dipkuatna, zawngkhalna, leh mite siasakin nuntakna a kiamsak ding cisa natna kong tungsak ding hi. Note' lopawi zong a mawkna hi ding hi; Banghang hiam cihleh na galte un tuate ne ding hi.

Amaute' mai-ah kunloin, amau' na na sem kei ding uhhi; Banghang hiam cihleh keimah { Topa } note' Pasian, a aam Pasian ka hi a, kei hong mudahte' tungah a pate' mawhna a tate' tungah khang thum khang lina dongin thuk-in,

Tua ahih ciangin, a kangtum thei mei bangin note' mai-ah a paipa pen { Topa } na Pasian uh ahihna thu tuni-in thei un. Amah in note' mai-ah amaute susia-in, amaute zogawp ding hi. Tua ahih ciangin { Topa } in note tungah hong ciamsa bangin amaute hawlkhia-in manlangin na siamangsak ding uhhi.
a mawhpa satna thuak dinga kilawm ahih leh, thukhenpa in amah lumsuk sakin a khialhna zahin ama muhin satsak ding hi.

"Ahih hangin note in { Topa } na Pasian uh thu mangloin, tuni-a kong gen ama thupiaknate leh ama thukhamte khempeuh limtakin na zuih kei uh leh, hih samsiatna khempeuh note tungah hong tung ding a, note hong ban ding hi.

Tua hun ciangin amaute tungah ka sin so-in, amaute nusia-in ka mai ka seel ding a, amaute beimang ding uhhi. Tua ni ciangin amaute in, ‘Eite' lakah i Pasian a omloh manin hih siatnate i tungah hong tung hilo ahi hiam?’ a cih theihna dingun amaute tungah siatna leh gimna tampi tung ding hi. 18 Amaute, pasian dangte lamah kihei uh ahih manin amau' gamtatnasa siatnate khempeuh hangin tua hun ciangin ka mai ka seel taktak ding hi.

Israel mite khial a, amaute in ka thupiak thuciamna palsat khin uhhi.
