Amaute in a ki-ap nate pawlkhat la uh a, amaute in gu-in zuauthu gen uh a, amau' van lakah tua nate koih uhhi. 12 Tua thu hangin Israel mite in a galte uh nang zolo uhhi. Amaute pen suksiat ding mi na suak khin uh ahih manin a galte uh mai-ah nungkik uhhi. Note' lak panin a ki-ap nate na suksiat kei uh leh note tawh kong omkhawm nawn kei ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Saul a thumanlohna hangin a si hi. Amah in { Topa' } thupiakna a zuihlohna, leh vankah khat thu dongin a lamlah ding a zon'na,
Tua ciangin gamlak singte in lungdamna tawh { Topa' } mai-ah la sa ding uhhi; Banghang hiam cihleh leitung thu khen dingin amah hong pai hi.
vantung panin za-in gamta in la, na nasemte thu khenin, a mawh mi a gamtatna ama lu tung mahah tusakin thuk in la, a thuman mi a thumanna tawh kizui-in thaman piakna tawh langsak in.
Leitung mite' thu a mantakin khen a, a kilawm bangin mite' thu a khen hi.
Kote' { Topa } Pasian aw, nang in amaute na dawng hi. Amau' mawhna hangin gim na piak tei hangin amau' mawhnate a maisak nuam Pasian na hihna amaute' tungah na kilangsak hi.

{ Topa } dikin hehpihna tawh kidim a, heh hakin, a lian mahmah itna kip tawh a kidim hi. 9 Amah in a tawntungin hong taii ngitngetlo ding a, amah heh paisuaklo ding hi. 10 Amah in eite' khialhna tawh a kituakin eite tungah hong bawllo a, eite' mawhna tawh a kituakin hong thukkiklo hi. 11 Vantung pen leitung panin a san' mah bangin amah a zahtakte' tungah ama itna kip lianin sang mahmah hi.12 Nisuahna pen nitumna panin a gamlat mah bangin i mawhna hangin gimnate eite' kiang panin gamlapi-ah a nilkhia hi.

Thumanin gamtat ding a hanciamte nungta ding a, a sia-in a gamta teiteite si ding uhhi. 20 { Topa } in lungsim gilote mudah a, a manin a gamtate tungah a lungkim hi. 21 Migilote in gim a thuak hamtangna ding, midikte gimna tawh a kipelhna ding teltakin thei in.
Mihoihte hih leitungah thaman kipia ahih leh migilo leh mawhneite gimna kipiazaw kan ding hi.
Leitung mite a tatsiatna hangun gim ka pia ding a, migilote a mawhna hangun gim ka thuaksak ding hi. Mi kihisakte' kiphatsakna beisiang sakin, a kisatheite' kiliatsakna ka niamkhiat ding hi.

Ka lungsim khempeuh tawh zanin nang kong deih a, zingsang khuavak ciangin lungsim tak tawh nang kong zong hi. Banghang hiam cihleh leitung leh a mite tungah thu na khen ciangin leitunga a teng mite in thuman i cih bang hiam, cih a phawk ding uhhi.

Banghang hiam cihleh en un, amau' mawhna hangin leitungah a teng mite gim a pia dingin ama omna panin { Topa } hong paikhia a, leitung in ama tunga a kithat mite lakkhia ding a, a kithat ama mite sincip nawnlo ding hi.
Amau' gamtatna bangin amah in thukkik ding a, amah a langpangte gim pia ding hi. Ama galte a thukkik ding hi. A gamla pekah a om tuipi gei-a gamte zong a thukkik ding hi.

Na gamtatna tawh kizui-in gimna ka hong pia ding hi, { Topa } in kong ci hi. Tulaka sing hoihte tawh a kilam na kumpi innte uh mei tawh kihal ding a, a kimkot khempeuh ka kangtumsak ding hi," a ci hi.

A awging, leimong dongah kithawn ding hi; Banghang hiam cihleh gamte' langkhatah { Topa } pang hi. Amah in mi khempeuh thu sit ding a, namsau tawh migilote a thatlum ding hi, { Topa } in ci hi,’ na ci ding hi.

Tua ni ciangin amaute in: "‘Pate in leenggah thuk ne uh a, a tate uh' ha a kim hi,’ a kici paunak a zang nawn kei ding uhhi. 30 Mi khempeuh amau' mawhna ciat uh hang bekin a si ding uhhi. Leenggah thuk a nete' ha bek a kim ding hi.

Migilopa khat pen si ding hi, ci-in kong gen ciangin, amah kikhelin a nuntak theihna dingin thu na hilhkholh kei leh, tua mipa pen mawhnei mahin si ding a, ahi zongin ama sihna thu ahih leh nang kong ngawh ding hi. 19 Migilo khat hilhkhol napi-in a mawh bawlna a tawp kei leh, a mawhnei mahin si ding a, ahi zongin nangma nuntakna suakta ding hi.

{ Topa } in kei tungah thu hong gen leuleu a, 2 "Israel gamsungah mite in zat belin a neih paunak, ‘A pate in leenggah thuk ne a, a tate' ha kim,’ cihna pen bang a cihnopna ahi hiam? 3 Kei pen a nungta Topa { Pasian } ka hih mah bangin kong genin-ah: Israel gamsungah hih paunak na zang nawn kei ding uhhi. 4 Mi khempeuh keima-a' hi a, pate ahi a, tate ahi zongin keima-a' a hihi. A mawh mipa bek si ding hi.

Tua ciangin kei tungah hong khialhna uh hangin Israel mite sal suak uh a, amaute nungngatin, a galte uh khutsungah pia-in galsungah a vekun a sisak ka hihna, 24 leh amaute' nitna leh a gitlohna uh tawh kituakin amaute tungah bawlin, amaute a nungngat ka hihna thu, minam dangte in thei ding uhhi," hong ci hi.

{ Topa } in hih bangin ci hi: "Tu mahmah nangawnin lungsim tak tawh kisik kikin, an tangin, kapin, thumna tawh kei kiangah hong paikik un. 13 Na dah taktakna uh lungkhamna tawh langsak unla, na puante uh a balkek bek hi kei un," hong ci hi. { Topa}, note' Pasian kiangah ciahkik un. Amah migi mahmahin hehpihna a nei hi a, a lungduai-in hong huh nuam tawntung a, gim hong pialoin hong maisak nuam tawntung hi.
Amau' khialhna hangin Israel gim ka piak ni ciangin, Bethel-a biakna taute zong ka susia ding a, biakna tau kite kitanin leilakah kia ding hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh minam kimte tungah ka thukhenna ding ni a naizo hi. Nang bawl bangin nangma tungah hong kibawl ding hi. Na hih bangin na lu bukah hong tukik ding hi. 16 Banghang hiam cihleh ka mual siangtho tungah na thuak mah bangun, na kiim na pama om minamte khempeuh in zong ka gimpiakna a thuak ding uhhi. Thuak tawntung ding uh a, maimang ding uhhi.
"Tua laitakin Jerusalem khuasung meivak tawh ka zong ding a, thuphawk loin, a ngeina bangun omcip a, ‘{ Topa } in a pha hita leh a sia hita leh bangmah bawl ngeilo hi,’ a ci mite, gim ka pia ding hi.
Tu mahmahin sing a bulphuk dingin hei tawh kingim zo hi. Tua ahih manin gah hoih a gahlo sing khempeuh kiphukin meikhuk sungah kikhul ding hi.

Ahi zongin ke'n note kiangah kong genin-ah: A sanggampa tungah a heh mi in thukhenna thuakkha thei ding hi. A sanggampa kiangah, ‘Bangmah-a kimang lo,’ ci-in a ko bawl mi in uliante mai-ah thusitna thuak thei ding a, a sanggampa kiangah, ‘Mi hai,’ ci-in a simmawh mi in hell meikuang sungah khulna thuak thei ding hi.

"Pasian in note hong mawhsak lohna dingin midangte va mawhsaksak nawn kei un. 2 Banghang hiam cihleh midangte' thu na khenzia uh tawh kizui-in note tungah hong khen ding a, midangte tungah na zat uh ngeina mah note tungah hong zang ding hi.
Gah limci a gahlo singkungte kiphukin meikhuk sungah kikhul hi.
Thukhen ni ciangin tua khuamite' thuakna sangin Sodom khua leh Gomorrah khuamite' thuakna olzaw lai ding ahihna thu hoihtakin phawk un.
Pumpi a thah khit ciangin kha a that theilote na kihta kei un. Hell khuk sungah pumpi leh kha a nihin a susia theipa na kihtazaw un.
Tua ahih manin thukhen ni ciangin note' thuakna sangin Sodom khuamite' thuakna baihzaw lai ding ahihna thu phawk ta un," a ci hi.

Note kiangah kong genin-ah: Thukhen ni ciangin mi khempeuh in phattuamna a omlo a kampaunate uh khempeuh bangin thusitna a thuak ding uhhi. 37 Banghang hiam cihleh nomau kampauna tawh kizui-in thu hong kikhen ding a, dik hi, cihna ahi a, mawh hi, cihna ahi zongin na ngahna dingun nomau kampau mah hong kibulphuh ding hi," a ci hi.
Tahumte kikaikhawmin meikhuk sungah a kikhultum mah bangin leitung bei hun ciangin tua bangmahin kihih ding hi.

"Mihoih a kineihkhem, no Thukham hilh siate leh Pharisee mite in gimna na thuak ding uhhi. Meigong numeite tungah nuamtak sa-in a neihsa teng uh laksakin na zangmang uh a, mite in mihoih hong saktheihna ding na deihna-un thu saupipi na ngen uhhi. Hih bangin na gamtatna uh hangin na gim thuak ding uh nasiazaw kan lai ding hi.
Gul a bang mite' suanlekhak mite aw, hell khuk tun'nading thukhenna panin a suakta dingin bangci-in kilamen thei na hi uhhiam?

khualmi ka hih laitakin zin nong do kei uh a, puan ka neihloh laitakin puan nong guan' kei uh a, ka cinat laitakin nong veh kei uh a, ka thongkiat laitakin nong hawh kei uhhi,’ a ci ding hi. 44 Tua ciangin amaute in zong, ‘Topa aw, cikin na gilkial hong mu a, cikin na dangtak hong mu a, cikin khualmi na hih hong mu a, cikin na puan neihloh hong mu a, cikin na cinat hong mu a, cikin na thongkiat hong mu a, cikin kote in nang hong huh nuamlo ka hi uhhiam?’ a ci ding uhhi. 45 Tua ciangin amah in, ‘Note kiangah kong genin-ah: Hih mite a neupen khat nangawn na huhloh uh ciangin kei a hong huhlo na hi uhhi,’ ci-in a dawng ding hi. 46 Tua ahih ciangin tawntung gimthuakna sungah amaute pai ding uh a, mihoihte ahih leh nuntak tawntungna sungah lut ding uhhi," a ci hi.

Meigong numeite tungah nuamtaksa-in a neihsate laksakin zangmang uh a, mite in mihoih a saktheihna ding uh a deihna hangun thu saupipi a ngen uhhi. Amau' kineihkhemna tawh kizui-in a gimthuak ding uh lianzaw ding hi," a ci hi.
Tu mahmahin sing a bulphuk dingin hei tawh kingimzo hi. Gah hoih a gahlo singkung khempeuh kiphukin meikhuk sungah kikhul ding hi," a ci hi.
Abel a kithah aa kipan biakna tau leh siangtho mun kikalah a kithat
a sihna ciangdong, tua mi thahna hangin gimna a thuak ding uhhi. Ke'n kong cihin-ah, hih thute khempeuh hangin tuhun aa mite gim hong kipia taktak ding hi.
Kuate kihta ding na hi uhhiam cihleh, mite in a thah khitsa mipa pen hell khuk sungah a khiathuah theilai Pasian na kihta un.

tua nasempa' topa pen ama upmawhloh ni, a theihkholh loh hunin hong tung ding hi. A topa in nakpi takin amah gim pia ding a, a thumanglo mite tawh a kibangin a thuaksak khawm ding hi. 47 A topa' deihna thei napi-in a topa' deih bangin a gamta nuamlo nasempa pen nakpi takin kisat ding hi. 48 Ahi zongin a topa' deihna a theihlohna hangin satthuakna ding a gamtakha nasempa pen kidamsatzaw deuh ding hi. Tampi a kipiaknapa tung pan tampi kikal ding a, a tamzaw a ki-apnapa tung pan a tamzaw kikal ding hi," ci-in a dawng hi.
Hilo hi. Ke'n kong cihin-ah, na mawhna panun na kisik kei uh leh amaute mah bangin note zong na si ding uhhi.
Hilo hi. Ke'n kong cihin-ah, na mawhna panun na kisikkik kei uh leh note zong amaute mah bangin na si ding uhhi," a ci hi.

"Jerusalem, Jerusalem aw, kamsangte na that a, Pasian' hong sawl kamtaite na denglum hi. Akpi in a kha tawh a note a huai mah bangin na mite ka huainuam tawntung a, ahi zongin na ut kei hi. 35 Tu-in na innte kinusiacip ding hi. ‘Topa min tawh a hong pai mipa, Pasian in thupha pia ta hen,’ na cih hun hong tun' matengin kei nong mu nawn kei ding hi," a ci hi.

Pasian in leitung mite hong it mahmah ahih manin ama Tapa a um mi khempeuh si nawnloin a hin' tawntung theihna dingun a Tapa neihsun a hong piak dongin a hong itna a hong lak hi. 17 Pasian in leitungah a Tapa hong sawlna pen mawhsakna thukhen dingin a hong paisak hiloin, leitung mite a honkhia dingin a hong paisak hizaw hi.
"A mantakin kong genin-ah: Ka thugennate za-in kei hong sawlpa a um khempeuh a nungta paisuak ding hita hi. Mawhsak thukhenna ngah nawnloin, sihna panin a hingkik ta a hihi.

Hih thu ka hong gen ciangin lamdangsa kei un. Han sungah a om misi khempeuh in ama aw za-in, 29 han sung panin a hong paikhiat uh hun hong tung ding hi. A gamtat hoih mite pen a nungta tawntung dingin hong thokik ding uh a, a gamtat siate ahih leh mawhsak thukhenna a thuak dingin hong thokik ding uhhi.
Mi mawhsakin thu a khen hita mah leng zong, a thukhen pen kei bek hiloin kei a hong sawl Pa Pasian leh keimah in a khenkhawm ka hih manun ka thukhennate a man taktak a hihi.
Kei pen, ‘Kei ka hihlam na hong up kei uh leh na mawhna uh a sihpih ding na hih manun, na mawhna uh na sihpih ding uhhi,’ ci-in ka hong genna pen hih thu hang ahi hi," a ci hi.

Ka thugenna za napi-in a zuilo mite tungah thu ka khen kei ding hi. Leitung mite mawhsakin thukhen dingin a hong pai ka hi kei a, a honkhia dingin a hong pai ka hizaw hi. 48 Kei hong nialin ka thugen a sanglo mite in thukhen ding khat nei uhhi. Nitawp ni ciangin keima thugente pen amaute' thukhen ding a hihi.
Amah hong tun' ciangin leitung mite tungah mawhna thu, thuman thu leh thukhenna thu laktel ding hi.

Pasian in mihingte' theihloh hun lai-a a gamtatnate uh phamawh a sakloh hangin, tu-in mun khempeuha om mi khempeuhte a gamtat siatna panun a kiheina dingun thu a hong pia khinzo hi. 31 Amah in leitung mi khempeuh thu a mantakin ama teel mipa a hong khensakna ding ni a sehkhol khinzo hi. Tua a ngaihsutna a man taktak hi, ci-in mi khempeuh tungah a hong lahna dingin a teel mipa, sihna panin a hingkiksak zo hi," ci-in thu a hilh hi.
Tua bangin a gamtate in sihna thuak ding hi, ci-in Pasian' thukhenna thei napi-in, tua bangin amaute a gamtat uh banah, tua bangin a gamtate pakta-in a awi zawsop lai uhhi.

Tua ahih ciangin midangte' thu a khen note pen kuakua hita le uh cin na suakta tuan kei ding uhhi. Midangte na mawhsakna uh thute mah note zong gamta veve na hih manun no zong a mawh mah na hi uhhi. 2 Tua bang mawhna a gamtate, Pasian in gim a piak pen a man mah ahihna i thei ciat hi. 3 Midangte a mawhna hangin thu khenin, no zong tua amau mawhnate mah na bawl veve uh ciangin Pasian' thukhenna tawh kipelh tuan dingin ki-um peuhmah na hi uhhiam? 4 Pasian migi-in thu a diah hithiatna pen na kisikkik theihna ding uh a deihna ahih lamtak phawkkha loin, a migitna, a lungduaina, a hong thuaknate neu ngaihsutkha na hi uhhiam? 5 Lungsim khauhin na kisik noplohna hangun Pasian' hehna leh a manin a thukhenna a hong kilat Ni ding ciangin na gimthuak ding uh a nasia semsem dingin a bawl na hi uhhi. 6 Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in mi khempeuh a gamtatna uh tawh kizui-in thukkik ding hi. 7 Pahtakna, minthan'na, leh hin' tawntungna deihin a gamtat hoih tawntung mite tungah Pasian in nuntak tawntungna pia ding a, 8 ahi zongin ama deihna bek zui-in, a gamtat dingin a kilawm bangin gamta loin, a manloin a gamta mite tungah Pasian in ama hehna hangin gimna tungsak ding hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in kuamah deidan loin mi khempeuh tungah a kibangin thu a khen hi. 12 Moses Thukham a neilo Gentail mite a khialh uh ciangin thukham neilopi mahin siatna thuak uh a, Moses Thukham a nei Jew mite a khialh uh ciangin tua thukham tawh kizui-in amaute tungah thu kikhen hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Pasian in mihingte lungsim sunga a ngaihsutnate uh, Zeisu Christ thu a khensak Ni ciangin, tu-a ka hong gen bang teekteekin a hong piang ding a hihi.

Pasian a manin gamta ahihna eite' gamtat khialhna in kilangsak semsem ahih ciangin eite in bang gen ding nei nawn ihi hiam? Pasian in eite gim a hong piak ciangin a thumanlo ahi hiam? (Hih bangin thu ka gen ciangin leitung mihingte' kammal zat ngeite a zang ka hihi.) 6 Gim hong piakna-ah a thumanlo hi hetlo hi. A thumanlo hi zenzen leh bangci-in leitung mi khempeuh' thu khenthei ding ahi hiam? 7 Keima zuautatna in Pasian a thumanna kilangsakin a min thangsak semsem ahih leh Banghangin mawhnei-in kei hong kiseh lailai ahi hiam? 8 Thupha a pian'na dingin gamtat sia gamta ni, ci ding ihi hiam? Mi pawlkhatte in tu-a bang teek mahin gen hi, ci-in hong mawhsak uh a, ka heh theihtheihna dingin kam a pau se uhhi. Tua bang mite in amau thuak dingin a kilawm gimna a thuak ding uhhi.
Tua ahih manin kuamah in paulap a zon' theihlohna ding leh mi khempeuh in Pasian' thukhenna a thuak theihna dingin Thukham a nei mite khempeuh in tua Thukham a zuihding uh ahihna thu i thei hi.
Thukham in Pasian' hehna ding piangsak hi. Ahi zongin thukham om kei leh thukham zuilo cih zong om theilo hi.
Ama sihna hangin tu-in Pasian tawh kipawlthei ihih manin Pasian' hehna hangin gimna panin zong hong suaktasak zaw kan lai ding hi.

Pasian' letsong leh mi khat' mawhna a hatna zia kilamdang hi. Khialhna khat a om khit ciangin, "Mawh hi," ci-in thukhenna kipia a, ahi zongin khialhna tampi tak a om khit ciangin a kilawm lopi mahin, "Dik hi," cihna piakkhong thupha a om hi.
Ahi zongin tu-in ahih leh Christ Zeisu tawh kipawlin a nungta mite pen mawhna thukhenna tawh kipelh hi.

Pasian in mawhlo hi, ci-in a gen khitsa ahih manin, Pasian' teelsa mite tungah kua in mawhna guan'thei nawnding ahi hiam? 34 Tua ahih manin kua in amaute tungah thu khenthei nawnding ahi hiam? Eite-a' dingin a hong thumsakpa pen Pasian' taklamah a tu, a sih khit ciangin sihna panin a kihing kiksak Christ Zeisu hilo ahi hiam?
Tua ahih manin Pasian' hong hehpihna nakliat mahmah a, a pilna leh a thu theihnate nakthuk mahmah hi. Ama thukhennate kua' gentheih ding hilo a, a nasepna ziate kua' telzawh ding hilo hi.

Lawmte aw, na hehna uh kuama tungah thukkik kei unla, Pasian' thukkik dingin koih lel un. Banghang hiam cihleh Laisiangtho sungah, "Keimah in amaute tungah ka thuk ding a, midangte a gimsak bangun ka gimsak ding hi, Topa in ci hi," ci-in kigelh hi.

Ukna thuneite pen note' hoihna dingin Pasian' nasemte ahi uhhi. Ahi zongin a sia-in na gamtat uh leh gim hong pia taktak ding uh ahih manin na lau ding uh a hihi. Banghang hiam cihleh amaute pen Pasian' nasemte hi a, a sia-in a gamta mite tungah Pasian' hehna bangin gim a pia dingte ahi uhhi.

Tua ahih leh banghangin na Christian pihte uh tungah thu khen a, banghangin simmawhbawl thei na hi uhhiam? Thukhenna a thuak dingin Pasian' mai-ah eite khempeuh a ding ciat ding ihi hi. 11 Laisiangtho sungah, "Kei pen a nungta ka hih mah bangin ka mai-ah mi khempeuh hong kun ding a, Pasian ka hihna thu mi khempeuh in pulak taktak ding uhhi, Topa in ci hi," ci-in a kigelh hi. 12 Tua ahih manin a kuamah peuh in i gamtatna ciat Pasian' mai-ah a va kigentel ciat ding ihi hi.

Midangte in a puklawh theih annekna, zunekna, leh na khat peuhpeuh i kikep ding a man pen a hihi. 22 Hih thu-ah no' upna leh no' ngaihsutnate, Pasian tawh note' kikal thu hisak un. Amau lungsim sungah man a sak bangun a gamta zote pen a lung uh nuam mahmah hi. 23 Ahi zongin lunghimawhpipi-in a ne a om leh, a upna uh tawh kizui-in a gamta hilo uh ahih manin Pasian in tua bang mite a mawhsak ding hi. I upna bangin gamtatlohna peuhpeuh mawhna a hihi.

Tua a kilam nate mei tawh a kize-et ding Ni hong tung ding a, tua nasepnate a bangci hiam, ci-in mei in ze-et ding ahih manin a lam mite' nasep ciat hong kilang ding hi. 14 Mi khat in tua khuamte tungah a lam nate bangmah a cihzawh kei leh a nasep thaman a ngah ding hi. 15 Ahi zongin mi khat in a lam nate a kattum leh amah a sum hi ding hi. Tua nate a lampa ahih leh meikatna ding panin a suakta bang keekin a suakta bek ding hi.

Tua ahih manin a hun a tun'ma-in kuamah mawhsakin thu khen kei un. Topa hong pai ciangin a tawpna thukhenna hong om ding a, amah in thusimte hong pholakin, mihingte in a lungsim sung uhah a ipcip uh thute hong telkheh ding hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in amau' ngahdingin a kilawm phatna, Pasian' kiang panin a ngah ciat ding uhhi.

Tua bang a pualam mite mawhsakin thu ka khen ding kei' nasep hilo hi. Pasian in amaute' thu khen ngawn ding hi. Ahi zongin note in na pawlpih uh mite tungah thu na khen ding uh a hihi. Laisiangtho in, "Note lak panin migilopa na lakhia un," na ci hi.

Eite hoihtakin ki-entel masa peuh lehang Pasian' mawhsak thukhenna i thuak kei ding hi. 32 Ahi zongin eite in hih leitung mite tawh mawhsakna i thuakkhawm lohna dingin Topa in eite hong thuhilhin gim hong pia hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh Christ mai-ah thusitna a thuakdingin eite khempeuh a kilak ding ihi a, leitung i pumpi-in i omlai-in i gamtatna tawh kizui-in eite tawh a kituak ciatin a sia ahi a, a pha ahi zongin a ngah ciat ding ihi hi.
Mi khatpeuh in ama leitung pumpi deihna khaici a vawh leh sihna ngahding a, Khasiangtho deihna khaici a vawh leh Khasiangtho tung panin nuntak tawntungna ngahding hi.

A taktakin eite khempeuh zong amaute mah i bang ngei a, i pian'pih lungsim zui-in nungta-in, i pumpi leh i lungsim deihna bangin i gamta hi. Tua ahih manin eite khempeuh zong Pasian' hehna hangin gim a thuak dingte ihi hi.
Hih bang mawhnate i bawl hangin phamawh kei, ci-in a mawk gen mite' khemsa-in ta kei un. Pasian thu mangloin hih bangin a gamta mite in Pasian' hehna a thuak ding uh a hihi.

Singlamteh tungah Christ a sihna thu tawh a kilehngatin a nungta mi tampi tak a omna thu, a beisa hunah tamveipi ka hong genkhin a, tu-in zong khitui tawh ka hong genpha kikkik hi. 19 Amaute in amau pumpi deihnate Pasian zahin ngaihsun uh a, a maizumna ding uh thute-ah kisial zawsopin, leitung nate bek ngaihsutin nei uh ahih manin Hell khuksung a tung ding uh a hihi.
Ama thu a manglo mite tungah hihbang gamtatna hangin Pasian' hehna hong tung ding hi.
Pasian in ama hehna a thuak dingin eite a hong teel hilo a, i Topa Zeisu Christ hangin hotkhiatna a ngah dingin a hong teel a hihi.

Pasian in a manin na sem ding ahih manin note a hong gimsak mite tungah Pasian in gimna pia ding a, 7 tu-a gimna a thuak note leh kote tungah zong nopsakna hong pia ding hi. Vantung panin Topa Zeisu leh a vanglian a vantung mite, meikuang tawh hong kilat ciangin, 8 Pasian a theilo mite, leh i Topa Zeisu tawh kisai Lungdamna Thu a umlo mite tungah gimna a tungsak ding hi.

Satan' vangliatna tawh A Gilopa hong pai-in, lim leh na lamdang a tuamtuamte hong bawl ding a, 10 gitloh khemna a nam tuamtuam zangin, siatna a thuakding mite a khem ding hi. Tua bang mite in a suahtakna dingun thuman sang nuamlo, deihlo uh ahih manin siatna a tuak uh a hihi. 11 Tua ahih manin Pasian in amaute lakah nasem dingin zuau thahatna paisak ahih manin amaute in a manlo thu um uhhi. 12 Tua ahih manin thuman umloin, mawhna sungah nuam a sa khempeuh in mawhsak thukhenna thuak ding uhhi.
Pasian' mai, leh a hingte hita leh a site hita leh mi khempeuh' thu a khending Christ Zeisu' mai-ah nakpi takin ka hong hanthawn hi. Amah Kumpi-in hong paikikin ukna hong kipan ding ahih manin,

Mi khempeuh khatvei si-in, tua khit ciangin Pasian' thukhenna a thuakding ahih mah bangin, 28 mi tampite' mawhna a thuak dingin Christ zong khatvei bek a kipia hi. A nihveina hong kilatkik ciangin mawhna thu tawh kisai nasem ding hi nawnloin, lawptakin amah a ngak mite a honkhia ding a hihi.

Thuman thutak i theih khit ciangin mawhna i bawl hamtang lai leh i mawhna a kimaisakna dingin biakpiakna dang om nawnlo a, 27 a kihtakhuai thukhenna leh Pasian' thu a nial mite a kangtum ding meikuangpi bek omlai hi.
vantungah a min a kikhum Pasian' ta upate a kikhopna, mi khempeuhte' thu a khen Pasian' kiang, a cingtaakin a kibawl midikte' kha a omna,

Mi khempeuh in nupa thu thupi ngaihsut uh hen la, zite pen pasalte tungah citakin, pasalte zong a zite uh tungah citak uh hen. Pasian in a thangtat mite leh nulepa mawhna a gamta mite tungah thu khen ding hi.

Tua ahih manin mi a khahkhia thei thukham tawh kizui-in thukhenna a thuakding mi bangin kampau-in na gamta un. 13 Banghang hiam cihleh hehpihna lungsim a neilote tungah Pasian in thu a khen ciangin hehpihlo ding a, hehpihna lungsim a neite tungah Pasian in thu a khen ciangin a hehpihna in zozaw ding hi.
Sanggamte aw, mite tungah thu a hilh eite pen midangte sangin a khauhzaw-in thu hong kikhen ding ahih manin note tampi sia na suaknuam se kei un.
A citaklo mite aw, leitung tawh kipawlna pen Pasian tawh kigalneihna ahih lamtak theilo na hi uhhiam? Leitung tawh a kipawl mite pen Pasian tawh a kigalneih dingin a kibawlbawl ahi uhhi.

Thukham a piapa leh thu a khenpa pen Pasian bek hi a, amah bek in hong honkhiazo a, hong susiazo hi. Tua ahih manin Banghangin na mipihte uh gensia-in thu a khenthei dingin kingaihsun zenzen na hi uhhiam?
Sanggamte aw, Pasian in note tungah thu hong khenkhak lohna dingin khatlekhat na kiphunsan kei un. Thukhen dingpa hong nai mahmah ta a, hong tung dektak ta hi.
Sanggamte aw, Pasian in note tungah thu hong khenkhak lohna dingin khatlekhat na kiphunsan kei un. Thukhen dingpa hong nai mahmah ta a, hong tung dektak ta hi.
Amah a kizahko ciangin na ko thuklo hi. Gimna a thuak ciangin na tawnggawp lo a, a manin thu a khen Pasian muan'in a na nei hi.

Ahi zongin amaute in a site leh a hingte' thu a khen dingin a om Pasian' mai-ah thudotna thuak ding uhhi. 6 Tua thu hang mahin, midang khempeuh thu a khen mah bangin a leitung nuntakna uhah Pasian in thu a khen khit tei hangin kha nuntakna-ah Pasian mah bangin a nuntak theihna dingun mi sisate kiangah Christ in Lungdamna Thu a hilh a hihi.
Tu-in thukhen kipat hunding hong tungta-in Pasian' mi eite tungah hong kipan ahih leh Pasian kiang panin hong pai Lungdamna Thu a umlo mite-a' dingin bangzahin lungkhamhuai ding ahi hiam?
Banghang hiam cihleh vantung mite nangawn in khialhna a neih ciangin Pasian in khahkhong loin hell khuk sungah khia a, Thukhen Ni hun dong ngakin khuamial sungah kol bulhsa-in a omsak hi.

Ngeina bangin a gamtalo mite in Lot a lungkhamsakna panun Pasian in mihoih Lot a honkhia hi. 8 Tua mihoihpa, amaute lakah teng a, nisimin amaute' gamtat hoihlohnate za-in mu tawntung ahih manin lunggim mahmah hi. 9 Tua ahih manin Topa in tua bang mihoihte a gimna uh panin suakta sakin, tua bang migilote Thukhen Ni hun dongin gimna pia-in a koihcip theihna ding siamna a nei hi. 9 Tua ahih manin Topa in tua bang mihoihte a gimna uh panin suakta sakin, tua bang migilote Thukhen Ni hun dongin gimna pia-in a koihcip theihna ding siamna a nei hi.

Lai a hong gelhna sungah a thugente tu-ate mah a gennuam a hihi. A laigelhna sungah a telhak thu tampi om a, theihna kicing loin lungsim kiplo mi pawlkhatte in Laisiangtho sung thu a ututun a kawihei uh bangin Paul' thugente zong a manlopi-in khia uh ahih manin siatna a tuaklawh uhhi.

Thukhen Ni ciangin kisuan'na nei hetloin i omtheihna dingin eite in a cingtaak itna a nei ihi hi. Christ mah bangin hih leitung i nuntakna-ah nungta-in gamta ihih manin tua bang kisuan'na a neilo ding ihi hi.
Amau' aana neih huamsung bekah omloin a omna panun a paikhia vantung mite zong leinuai khuamial sungah sikkol kibulhin amau' thu a kikhen ding Ni lianpi ngakin Pasian in a koihcip hi.
Pasian' deihna bangin a gamtatlohna hang uh leh kam hoihlopipi zangin Pasian a gensiatnate uh hangin Pasian' deihna bangin a gamtalo mite tungah thu khenin mawhsakna pia ding hi," na ci hi.

Amaute nakpi takin kiko uh a, "A thuman, a siangtho, a Vanglian Topa aw, leitungah a omlai, kote a hong that mite tungah cik ciangin thu khenin, kote hong thahna hangin cik ciangin phu la ding na hi hiam?" a ci uhhi.

Na hehna hong kilat hun hong tungta a, misite thukhenna ding hun hong tungta ahih manin minam dangte heh mahmah uhhi. Nangma nasem kamsangte, a lian a neu, nang hong kihta mi khempeuhte thaman na piak ding hun hi ta a, leitung a susia mite na suksiat ding hun hi ta hi," a ci uhhi.
Amah nakpi takin kiko a, "Amah in mihingte thu a khen ding hun hong tungta ahih manin Pasian kihta unla amah phat un. Van leh lei, tuinak leh tuipite a bawlpa hong bia ta un," a ci hi.
Ganhing lite sung panin khat in a nungta tawntung Pasian' hehna a dim hai sagih, vantung mi sagihte kiangah a pia hi
Tua ciangin biakinn panin awging khat in vantung mi sagihte kiangah, "Leitungah va pai unla, hai sungah a om Pasian' hehnate va sungkhia un," ci-in awging lianpi tawh a genna ka za hi.
Vantung aw, ama siatna hangin lungdam in. Mi siangthote, sawltakte, leh kamsangte aw, note tungah hong gamtatna hangin Pasian in ama tungah thukhenna pia khinta ahih manin lungdam ta un," a ci uhhi.

A lian a neu misite tua tokhom mai-ah dingin laibute a kilem ka mu hi. Tua ciangin a nungta mite a kigelhna laibu a dang khat zong a kilem ka mu hi. Amaute' gamtatna tua laibute sungah a kigelhna tawh kizui-in misite tungah thu a kikhen hi. 13 Tuipi sungah a om misite, tuipi in hong pusuah a, Sihna leh Misite' Gam in zong amau sungah a om misite hong pusuah uhhi. Tua ciangin a vekpi-in amaute' gamtatnasa tawh kizui-in thu a kikhen hi. 14 Tua ciangin Sihna leh Misite' Gam, meiphualpi sungah a kilawn hi. Hih meiphualpi pen sihna nihna a hihi. 15 A nungta mite a kigelhna laibu sungah a min a omlo peuhmah meiphualpi sungah kilawn hi.
Ahi zongin a meidawite, a lehtatte, a lampialte, mi thatte, a paktatte, aisante, milim biate, leh zuaugente omna ding mun pen sihna nihna ahi kat a kikhulna meiphualpi kuang sung ahi hi," a ci hi.
Ahi zongin a sianglo, a hoihloin a gamta mi, zuau a gen mite kuamah lut theilo ding uh a, a nungta mite a kigelhna Tuuno laibu sungah a min a omte bek tua khuapi sungah lutthei ding uhhi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Kei ka hong pai baihta ding a, mi khempeuh a gamtatna uh tawh kizui-in a thaman ding uh ka hong puak ding hi.

Abraham in, "Hih lai munah Pasian zahtakna om hetlo hi. Ka zi' hangin amaute in kei hong that ding hi, ci-in ngaihsun kha ka hih manin hih bangin a gamta ka hihi. 12 Tua thamloin a taktakin amah ka sanggamnu mah a hihi. Pa kikhat, nu tuam ka hi uh a, amah ka ten'pih a hihi.
Naudomte in Pasian zahtak uh ahih manin amah in amaute tungah suanlekhak a pia hi.
Israel mite in Egypt mite' tungah { Topa' } bawl nasepna lianpi mu uh a, mite in { Topa } a zahtak uhhi. Amaute in { Topa } leh ama nasem Moses a um uhhi.

Tu-in mite khempeuh in vangingte, peengkul aw, leh mual meikhu thu a theihtel uh ciangin, lau-in a ling uhhi. Amaute a gamla-ah ding uh a, 19 Moses kiangah, "Nangmah in kote kiangah thu hong gen in; kote in ka ngai ding uhhi. Ahi zongin kote si khading ka hih uh ciangin ko tungah Pasian hong gensak kei in," a ci uhhi. 20 Moses in mite kiangah, "Lau kei un; Banghang hiam cihleh note khialkha loin amah na kihtak theihna dingun note' tungah a laktel dingin Pasian hong pai ahi hi," a ci hi.
Note in bilngongte phuisam loin, mittawte' mai-ah a puk theihna ding na na koih kei ding uh a, note in na Pasian uh na zahtak ding uhhi; kei pen { Topa } ka hihi.
Note khatlekhat kikhem loin na Pasian uh na zahtak ding uhhi; Banghang hiam cihleh kei pen { Topa } ka hihi.
Amaute leh a suan a khakte uh a nopsak tawntung theihna dingun keimah zahtak ding leh ka thupiak khempeuh zuih ding hih bang ngaihsutna nei tawntung le-uh ka deih a hihi.
{ Topa } na Pasian uh na zahtak ding uhhi. Ama na bek na sem ding uh a, ama min tawh na kiciam ding uhhi.
Tuhuna bangin i nuntak theihna dingin amah in eite' hoih tawntung ding a deihna-in, { Topa } i Pasian zahtakin hih thukhamte khempeuh i zuih ding { Topa } in thu hong pia hi.

"Israel-te aw, tu-in, { Topa } na Pasian uh zahtak ding, ama lampite tot ding, amah it ding, na lungsim khempeuh uh leh na nuntakna khempeuh uh tawh { Topa } note' Pasian' na sep ding, 13 leh nomau' hoihna dingin tuni-a kong gen thupiaknate leh { Topa' } thukhamte zuih ding cih simloh, { Topa } na Pasian un note' tung panin bang dang hong kal ahi hiam?
{ Topa } note' Pasian na zahtak ding uh a, ama na semin, amah beelin, ama min tawh na kiciam ding uhhi.

Hih thukham sunga thute leh hih ngeinate kemin zuihna tawh { Topa } a Pasian zahtak ding a theihna ding, a mipihte tungah ama lungsim a kiliatsak lohna ding, thupiaknate them khat zong a pelhlohna ding, leh Israel-te sung ahi ama kumpi gam sungah amah leh a tate saupi a om theihna dingin amah in a nuntak sung tawntung tua sunga thute sim ding hi.

Jordan galkhatah a luah dingin na paina uh gamah na nuntak laitengun amaute in a thu za-in { Topa } na Pasian uh zahtak ding a theihna ding, leh hih thukham thute khempeuh limtakin a sep theihna ding, leh hih thu a thei nailo amau' tate in { Topa } na Pasian uh zahtak ding a theihna dingun, numei, pasal, leh naupangte, leh na khuapite uh sunga om peemtate, mi khempeuh khawm un," a ci hi.
{ Topa } vanglian mahmah hi, ci-in leitung mi khempeuh in a theihna ding leh { Topa } na Pasian uh na zahtak tawntung theihna ding uh ahi hi," a ci hi.
"Tua ahih ciangin tu-in { Topa } zahtak unla, lungsim tak leh thumanna tawh ama na sem un. Na pu na pate un Gun gal leh Egypt gamsungah a biak uh pasian-te koihkhia unla, { Topa' } na sem un.
Note in { Topa } zahtakin ama na sem a, ama aw ngai-in { Topa' } thupiakna na langpan' kei uh a, note a hong uk kumpipa leh na Pasian uh na zuih uh leh thu hong nuam ding hi.
{Topa } zahtak unla, na lungsim khempeuh uh tawh citakin ama na sem un; Banghang hiam cihleh note-a' dingin amah in na lian hong bawlsaksate ngaihsun un.

Israel Pasian kampau khin a, Israel a hupa in kei kiangah hong ci khin hi: Mi khat in mite tungah thutang takin ukin Pasian zahtakna tawh limtakin a uk ciangin 4 amah pen amaute tungah zingsang khuavak bangin taang ziazua a, meii kaai loh ni zingsanga ni taangkhia, leilak panin lopate a selsak guahtui tawh kibang hi.
Tua ciangin Judah gam kimkotah a om kumpi gam khempeuh tungah { Topa } kihtakna om a, amaute in Jehoshafat do ngam nawnlo uhhi.

Tu-in note in { Topa } zahtak unla, na hihnate uhah kingaihsun un. Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } i Pasian in thuman heikhiatna, mi deidanna, leh sumgolh laknate deihlo hi," a ci hi. 8 Tua thamloin, { Topa}-a' dingin thukhenna a pia ding leh thuneite a khensak dingin Levi mite leh siampite leh Israel mi beh lutangte pawlkhat, Jehoshafat in Jerusalem-ah a seh hi. Amaute in Jerusalem-ah a phual ding uh nei uhhi. 9 Tua ciangin amah in amaute thuhilh a, "{ Topa } zahtakna, cihtakna, leh na lungsim khempeuh uh tawh hih bangin na hih ding uhhi.
{ Topa } in Israel-te' galte a dosakna thu a zak uh ciangin kumpi gamte khempeuh in { Topa } a kihta uhhi.

Keima hong thungetna leh nangma min a zahtak nuam na nasemte' thungetna na bil hong ngat in. Tu-in kei tungah mavan'na hong pia in la, kei tungah hih kumpipa hong migitna ding lungsim hong guan' in," ka ci hi. Tua hun laitakin kei pen kumpipa' an a piapa ka hihi.
Tua ciangin keimah in, "Note' gamtatna hoihlo hi. I gal ahi minam dangte' zahkona i ngahlohna dingin i Pasian zahtakna tawh na gamtat ding uh kilawm hi.
Uz gamah Job kici min nei mi khat a om hi. Tua mipa a paubaanglo, a thutang, Pasian a zahtak mi khat hi a, amah in gamtat hoihlo peuhmah pel hi.

Tua ciangin { Topa } in Satan kiangah, "Ka nasem Job na phawkkha hiam? A paubaanglo, a thutang, Pasian zahtakin gamtat hoihlo a pel amah tawh a kibang midang leitungah na mu kei ding hi," a ci hi. 9 Tua ciangin Satan in { Topa } dawngin, "Job in Pasian hong mawk zahtak ahi hiam?

Tua ciangin { Topa } in Satan kiangah, "Ka nasem Job na phawk hiam? A paubaanglo, a thutang, Pasian zahtakin gamtat hoihlo a pel, amah tawh a kibang midang leitungah omlo hi. Thu omlopi-in amah susia dingin kei nong kam pausak a, ahi zongin ama hoihna bangmah hem tuanlo hi," a ci hi.
"Tua ciangin amah in mihingte tungah thu genin, ‘Topa zahtakna, pilna hi a, siatna pelhna pen thutheihna hi,’ ci hi," a ci hi.

Launa tawh { Topa' } na sem unla, lin'na tawh a khe nam un; tua hi kei leh amah sinso-in lamkalah na siamang ding uhhi; Banghang hiam cihleh amah heh pakpak hi. Amah a bel khempeuh mi nuamsate a hihi.

{ Topa } aw, na biakinn sungah kua om ding ahi hiam? Na mual siangtho tungah kua teng ding ahi hiam? 2 Paubaang loin gamta-in, a manin na sem a, lungsim tak a gen mi, 3 mi gensia loin, a lawmte tungah siatna bawllo a, a vengte a mawhsaklo mi, 4 migilote thusimlo a, ahi zongin { Topa } a zahtakte a pahtawi mi, ama natna ding nangawnah a ciampello mi,
{ Topa } a kizahtakna siang a, kip tawntung hi. { Topa' } ngeina kipte thuman a, a vekin kituakin man kim hi.
{ Topa } a zahtak mi khempeuh aw, amah phat un. Jacob' suan mi khempeuh aw, amah minthangsak un. Israel mi khempeuh aw, amah lamdang sa un.

{ Topa } a zahtak mi kua ahi hiam? Ama lampi zuih ding Pasian' hilhna a ngah mi a hihi. 13 Amah nuamsa tawntung ding a, a tate in leitang nei ding uhhi. 14 { Topa } tawh kilawmtatna pen amah a zahtakte-a' ding hi a, a thuciamna amau tungah kitheithangsak hi.
Nang hong zahtakte-a' dingin na koihsa na hoihte, nang hong beelte-a' dingin mite' muhna-ah na bawl, nangma hoihna kicing a, mi khempeuh in thei uhhi.

Leitung khempeuh in { Topa } zahtak uh hen la, leitunga tengte khempeuh, amah lamdangsakna tawh ding ta uh hen! 9 Banghang hiam cihleh amah pau a, leitung hong piang hi; amah in thu pia a, na khempeuh hong om hi.
Amah a zahtakte, a itna kip lametna a neite, sihna panin honkhia-in, kialpi hun sungin amaute a hin'kep theihna dingin { Topa } in amaute en tawntung hi.

Amah a zahtakte' kiimah { Topa' } vantung mi in giahphual sat a, amaute a honkhia hi. 8 { Topa } tawh kikhawl phot unla, ama hoihna thei un! Amah a beel mite mi lungdam ahi uhhi. 9 Ama mi siangthote aw, { Topa } zahtak un; Banghang hiam cihleh amah a zahtak mite in kitangsapna neilo hi. 10 Humpinelkai khanglaite in kisapna leh gilkialna thuak a, ahih hangin { Topa } a zongte in na hoih a kisap uh omlo hi. 11 Tate aw, hong pai unla hong ngai un; { Topa } zahtakna thu ka hong hilh ding hi.
Mawhna in migilopa' lungsim tawngah thu gen a, amah in Pasian zahtakna nei hetlo hi. 2 Banghang hiam cihleh ama mawhna kidawkkhia lo a, muhdahna thuaklo ahih manin amah kimawkphat tawm hi.
Eima Pasian phatna la thak keimah hong hilh hi. Mi tampite in hih thu mu-in amah zahtak ding uh a, amaute khempeuh in { Topa } muang ding uhhi.

Amah in ka galsimna sungah kei hong kem ding a, a muan'huai munah kei hong koih ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh keimah a hong do dingin mi tampi tak kigual deudau uhhi. 19 Tanglai pek panin kumpi-in a kikoih Pasian in za-in amaute niamkhiat ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh amaute in thukham zuilo uh a, Pasian zahtaklo uhhi.

Thalte panin kihemin a kikaihkhopna dingun nang hong zahtakte-a' dingin dial khat na koih khin hi. 5 Nangma it mite a suahtak theihna dingin na khut taklam tawh gualzawhna pia in la, kote' ngetna hong pia in.

Ahih hangin nang na kihtakhuai mahmah hi. Na heh khit phot ciangin nangma mai-ah kua ding ngam nawn ding ahi hiam? 8 Vantung panin thukhenna na genkhia hi. Gimna a thuak leitung mi khempeuh a hon dingin thukhen dingin Pasian a kipat ciangin leitung lau mahmahin tang hetloin a om khikhe hi.
I gam sungah minthan'na a om theihna dingin amah a zahtakte-a' dingin ama hong hotkhiatna hong om takpi hi.
{ Topa } aw, nang tungah hong thumanin nangma lampi ka zuih theihna dingin kei hong hilh in la, nangma min a zahtakte tawh keima lungsim pumkhat hong bangsak in.

Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } pen vantunga kua tawh kitehthei ding ahi hiam? Mi siangthote' kikhopna sungah a kizahtak Pasian, a kiima omte khempeuh tungah lianin a zahtakhuai { Topa } pen van mite' lakah kua pen tawh kibang ahi hiam?
Nang hong kizahtakna dingin na sinsona' vangliatna kua in thei a, na hehna' husiatna kua in thei ahi hiam?

Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } lian a, nakpi takin phat ding ahi hi; pasian dangte khempeuh sangin amah zahtak zawk ding a hihi. 5 Banghang hiam cihleh minam dangte' pasian khempeuh milim hi lel a, ahih hangin { Topa } ahih leh vantungte a bawlpa a hihi.
Vantung pen leitung panin a san' mah bangin amah a zahtakte' tungah ama itna kip lianin sang mahmah hi.

Ahih hangin { Topa' } itna kip pen amah a zahtak mite tungah a tawntung pan a tawntung dongin kip ngitnget a, ama thumanna pen ama thuciamna zui-in a thupiak bangin sep ding a phawk mite tungah a khang khangin a kip tawntung hi.
Amah in amah a zahtakte an pia a, a thuciamna a phawk tawntung hi.
{ Topa } zahtakna pen pilna kipatna a hihi. Ama thupiak a zuite khempeuh tungah thukhen siamna a pia hi. Amah phat tawntung ding a hihi.
{ Topa } phat un. { Topa } zahtakin a thupiaknate nuam a sa mahmah mi, thupha ngah mi a hihi. 2 Ama suanlekhakte leitungah vanglian ding a, a lungsim thutang mite' suanlekhakte thupha kipia ding hi.

{ Topa } a zahtakte aw, { Topa } muang un. Amah pen note hong huhpa leh hong hupa a hihi. 12 { Topa } in eite hong phawk a, thupha hong pia ding hi. Amah in Israel mite, thupha hong pia ding a, amah in Aaron innkuante thupha hong pia ding hi. 13 Amah in { Topa } a zahtakte a lian a neu-in thupha hong pia ding hi.
Nang kong zahtakna hangin ka khuasikmul suak a, na thukhennate ka zahtak hi.

{ Topa } zahtakin ama thu a zui mi khempeuh thupha ngah mi a hihi. 2 Na khut tawh na sep thaman na ne ding a, na lung damin na mavang ding hi. 3 Nangma inn sungah na zi, a gah pha mahmah leenggui tawh kibang ding a, na sabuai kiimah a tu na tate, oliv no dawng hilhhelh tawh kibang ding uhhi. 4 En un, { Topa } a zahtak mi tua bangin thupha kipia ding hi. 5 { Topa } in Zion panin nang thupha hong pia hen la, na nuntak sung tawntung Jerusalem' nopsakna mu ta in.
{ Topa } aw, nangmah in mawhneite ciamteh lecin, { Topa } aw, kua in thuakzo ding ahi hiam? 4 Ahih hangin nangmah hong kizahtak theihna dingin nangmah in mawhna na maisak hi.
Amah a zahtakte' deihna a kicingin tungsak a, amaute' kikona zong za-in amaute a honkhia hi. 20 { Topa } in amah a itte khempeuh kem a, ahih hangin migilo khempeuh amah in susia ding hi.
Ama lungkimna leh amah in nuam a saknate pen sakol thahatna leh galhangte' hang hilo hi. 11 Amah a zahtak mite leh ama itna kip a muangte tungah { Topa } a lungkim hi.
{ Topa } zahtakna in pilna kipatna hi a, mihaite in pilna leh thuhilhna donlo uhhi.

Note in pilna na deih kei uh a, { Topa } na zahtak nuam kei uhhi. 30 Ka thugente na deih kei uh a, kong thuhilhna ngai nuamlo na hih manun, 31 na gamtatna bangun na thuak ding uh a, nomau' gamtatna mah in note hong gimsak ding hi.

Pilna thute limtakin ngai in la, na theihtel zawhna dingin hanciam in. 3 Thu theihna ding hanciam takpi in la, thu muhna ding hahkat takpi in. 4 Ngun, ahih kei leh a kiseel sum manpha zon' bangin, hahkatin pilna zong in. 5 Tua hi leh, { Topa } zahtakna thu na thei ding a, Pasian na theitel ding hi. 6 Banghang hiam cihleh pilna a piapa pen { Topa } hi a, amah pen pilna leh siamna a hilhpa a hihi.
Nangmah a pilin kingaihsun tawm kei in la, { Topa } zahtakin a sia peel in. 8 Tua hi leh nang-a' dingin damna zatui tawh kibang ding a, na meimate hong damsakin na natnate hong daisak ding hi.
{ Topa } zahtakna pen thusia muhdahna hi a, kiphatsakna leh kihihsakna, gamtatsia leh thuzuau ka mudah hi.
{ Topa } zahtakna pen pilna kipatna hi a, Siangtho Pa theihna pen thumuhna a hihi.
{ Topa } zahtakna in pilna kipatna hi a, mihaite in pilna leh thuhilhna donlo uhhi.
Thumanin a gamta mite in { Topa } zahtak uh a, a sia-in a gamta mite in { Topa } simmawh uhhi.
{ Topa } a zahtak mi in lungmuan'na nei a, a tate' belhtheih ding mi kician a hihi. 27 { Topa } zahtakna pen nuntakna tuinak tawh kibang a, sihna thang tawh hong kipelhsak hi.
Hau napi-in lungkham sangin zawng napi-in { Topa } zahtakna hoihzaw tham hi.
{ Topa } zahtakna pen pilna mah hi pah a, kiniamkhiatna in pahtawina hong ngahsak hi.
Thumanna leh cihtakna mawhmai ngahna hi a, { Topa } zahtakna siatna tawh kipelhna a hihi.
{ Topa } a zahtakte a khan' sau a, lungkim takin nuamsa-in om uh a, siatna bangmah tuak khalo uhhi.
Kiniamkhiat-a { Topa } zahtakna thaman in hauhna, minthan'na, leh khan'sauna a hihi.
Mawhnei mite engkha kei in la, { Topa } zahtakna zom paisuak in. 18 Tua bang hi lecin lametna om a, cithei-in na khan' sau ding hi.
Ka ta aw, { Topa } leh kumpipa zahtak khawm in la, amau a langpangte tawh kipawlkha kei in.
{ Topa } a zahtak tawntungte pen mi nuamsa hi a, a lungkhauh mite in lungkhamna tuak ding uhhi.
Ngaihbaan'na pen zuaupi hithei a, melhoihna zong maimang thei hi. Ahi zongin { Topa } a zahtak numei a phattaak a hihi.
Pasian' sep khempeuh a kip tawntung ding ahihna ka thei hi. I behlap theih ding omlo a, i paihkhiat ding zong omlo hi. Amah i zahtak theihna dingin Pasian in tua bang ding mahin a bawl a hihi.
A nih tuakin lenkip in. Pasian na zahtak nak leh khat peuhpeuh na zuihna-ah na ma vang ding hi.

Mawhnei khat in zavei dong siatna bawl napi-in a khan' sau veve hi. Ahi zongin "Pasian a zahtakte-a' dingin thu khempeuh nuam ding hi. 13 Migilote-a' dingin thu nuamlo ding a, amaute in Pasian zahtaklo uh ahih manin a nuntak hun uh nilim bangin beipak ding a, khan'sih ding uhhi," kici hi.
Hih thute khempeuh banah gen ding thu khat bek om hi. Mihing hong kipian'sakna a thu bulpi pen in: Pasian zahtakna leh a thupiakte man'na a hihi.

"Hih mite' vaihawmna pawlpih kei un. Amau' kihtakte kihta kei unla, lau kei un. 13 Ahih hangin Vanglian { Topa } pen a siangtho-in na ngaihsun ding uhhi. Amah pen note' zahtakpa leh note' kihtakpa na hisak ding uhhi.

{ Topa}' kha in ama tungah ama mite a ukna ding pilna, thutheihna, leh siamna pia ding hi. Amah in { Topa}' deihna thei-in { Topa } zahtak ding hi. 3 Amah in { Topa}' nasep nuamsa ding hi. Amah in a tungtham bek muhna tawh thu khenlo ding a, kam lengsawn bek zakna tawh thu khentatlo ding hi.
{ Topa } kihta a, a nasempa' thu a mangte khempeuh khuamial sungah na pai hangun { Topa } muang unla, Pasian suan'in nei un.
Tua ahih ciangin nisuahna leh nitumna kikalah a om mi khempeuh in amah zahtakin, a vangliatna kihta ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh huihpi nung bang, tuipi khang bangin amah hong pai ding hi.

"Tua hinapi, Judah kumpipa Hezekiah leh Judah mi khempeuhte in amah that zenzen uh ahi hiam? Kumpipa in { Topa } zahtakin, { Topa' } pahtak ding a nget ciangin { Topa } in zong amau' tungah siatna tun'sak dingin a gensa khelkikzaw hilo ahi hiam? Ahih hangin eite in eite' tungah siatna lianpi khat i tungsak dektak hi," a ci uhhi.

Amaute' hoihna ding leh amaute' nunga a tu a tate uh a hoihna dingin a tawntungin kei hong zahtakna dingun a lungsim uh kikhat sakin, a nuntak dan uh zong ka kikhatsak ding hi. 40 Amaute tungah a tawntungin hoihna ka bawl denna dingin amaute tawh tawntung thuciamna khat ka bawl ding hi. Kei kiang panin a kiheikhiat lohna dingun amaute sungah kei hong zahtakna ding uh lungsim ka guan ding hi.

Ka gamsunga om mi khempeuh in Daniel' Pasian kihta-in a zahtakna dingun thu ka pia hi. "Banghang hiam cihleh amah a nungta Pasian hi a, a tawntungin a uk ding hi. Ama gam kisia ngeilo ding a, a vangliatna a bei ngei kei ding hi.
Tua ciangin Jonah domto-in tuipi sungah a khiat uh leh tuipi a daai pah hi. 16 Tua ciangin tua mite in { Topa } kihta mahmah uh a, { Topa' } tungah biakna pia-in thuciamna a bawl uhhi.
Tua ahih manin ka mite in kei hong zahtakin ka thuhilhna ngai ding uh a, mangngilhlo ding uhhi, ci-in ka ngaihsun hi. Ahi zongin a gamtatsiat ngei bangun gamtalai veve uhhi," a ci hi.

Vanglian { Topa } in siampite tungah hih bangin hong ci hi: "Tapa in a pa zahtak a, nasempa in a topa kihta hi. Kei pen na pa uhhinapi, Banghangin hong zahtaklo a, na topa uhhinapi, Banghangin hong kihtalo na hi uhhiam? No siampite in kei hong simmawh napi-in, ‘Bang hong ci simmawh ka hi uhhiam?’ na cilai uhhi.

A tuuhon lakah tuutal cidam nei napi-in, a kamciamsa bangin kei tungah hong piak ciangin, a sitbaang ganhing a hong pia mi khempeuh in samsiatna thuak ta hen. Banghang hiam cihleh kei pen a lian mahmah Kumpipa ka hi a, minam khempeuh in kei hong zahtak uhhi," a ci hi.

Vanglian { Topa } in hih bangin ci hi: "Note tungah thukhen dingin ka hong pai ding hi; ai tawite, numei tawh a mawhte, a manlopi-a teci pangte, numeite' thaman piakna-ah khemna a zangte; meigong, tagah, leh gamdang mite a zawhthawh bawlte, leh kei hong zahtaklo mi khempeuhte' langkhatah thakhatin teci pangin thu ka khen ding hi.

{ Topa } a zahtak mite khatlekhat tua bangin thu kigen uh a, amaute' thugennate, { Topa } in ngai-in za hi. { Topa } in laibu khat nei a, amah zahtakin a thupi ngaihsut mite khempeuh tua sungah kiciamteh hi. 17 Vanglian { Topa } in hih bangin ci hi: "Tua a kiciamteh mite pen keima mite hi ding uhhi. Keimah in na ka sep ni ciangin amaute pen keima neihtuam taktak mite hi ding uhhi. Pa in ama thu a mang a tapa a hehpih mah bangin kei zong amaute ka hehpih ding hi.
Pumpi a thah khit ciangin kha a that theilote na kihta kei un. Hell khuk sungah pumpi leh kha a nihin a susia theipa na kihtazaw un.
amah a zahtak mite tungah a khangkhangin hehpihna a lak hi.

"Lawmte aw, note kiangah kong genin-ah, pumpi a thahkhit ciangin a siazaw a hihthei nawnlote na kihta kei un. 5 Kuate kihta ding na hi uhhiam cihleh, mite in a thah khitsa mipa pen hell khuk sungah a khiathuah theilai Pasian na kihta un.
Ahi zongin a khatpa in a lawmpa taii a, "Pasian nangawn kihta lo na hi hiam? I vekpi-in gim hong kipiakna kibangkim hi.
‘Kei pen na pu na pate uh ahi Abraham, Isaac, leh Jacob-te' Pasian ka hi hi,’ a na ci hi. Moses zong lau-in linggawp a, en ngamlo hi.

Tua ahih manin Judea gam, Galilee gam, leh Samaria gamsunga om pawlpite in bawlsiatna thuak nawnloin nuamtakin om uh a, Topa zahtakna tawh gamta uh ahih manin Khasiangtho huhna tawh a mi khangin a kibehlap uhhi.
Tua ciangin Peter a kam ka-in thu hilh ding kipan a, "Pasian in kuamah angvan' tuam neiloin, 35 kua mi kua mi hita leh amah zahtakin a manin a gamta mi khempeuh a san'na thu teltakin ka thei hi.

Hih thu-ah Pasian a migit mahmahna leh a khauh mahmahna i mu hi. A khial mite tungah khauh mahmah a, ama migitna a kizop paisuak theihna dingin na up paisuak nak uh leh note tungah hong migi mahmah hi. Ahi zongin na zop paisuak kei uh leh note zong hong kisatkhia ding hi.

Ukna thuneite pen note' hoihna dingin Pasian' nasemte ahi uhhi. Ahi zongin a sia-in na gamtat uh leh gim hong pia taktak ding uh ahih manin na lau ding uh a hihi. Banghang hiam cihleh amaute pen Pasian' nasemte hi a, a sia-in a gamta mite tungah Pasian' hehna bangin gim a pia dingte ahi uhhi.

Pasian zahtakna ding thu ka lungsim uhah om tawntung ahih manin mite ka zolzawhna dingun ka hanciam uhhi. Pasian in kote' lungsim teltakin hong thei a, note in zong na lungsim uhah kei hong thei dingin ka hong um hi.
Tua ahih manin ka hong it lawmte aw, pumpi leh lungsim a ninsak theite khempeuh panin kisian'suahin, Pasian zahtakna tawh nungta-in siangtho sinsenin om ni.
Christ na zahtakna uh hangin na thu uh na kimang tuak un.

Tua ahih ciangin ka hong it sanggamte aw, note tawh ka hong omkhawm lai-in ka thu na hong man' tawntung uh mah bangin, tu-in note tawh ka hong omkhawm loh hun ciangin zong ka thu na hong man' ding uh thupizaw lai hi. Pasian kihtakna leh zahtakna tawh na ma uh nawt unla, amah in note hong hotkhiatna thu a cingtaak suaksak un.

Thuman thutak i theih khit ciangin mawhna i bawl hamtang lai leh i mawhna a kimaisakna dingin biakpiakna dang om nawnlo a, 27 a kihtakhuai thukhenna leh Pasian' thu a nial mite a kangtum ding meikuangpi bek omlai hi.

Tua ahih manin a kilingsak zolo Pasian' gam i ngah manin lungdamin, zahtakna leh lamdangsakna tawh Pasian' lungkimna bangin amah bia ni. 29 Banghang hiam cihleh eite' Pasian pen a kangtum thei meikuang tawh a kibang a hihi.
Mi khempeuh amau gamtatna tawh kizui-in a kibang kimin thu a khen Pasian kiangah thu na nget uh ciangin, "Pa aw," ci na hih manun hih leitungah na om laiteng uh amah zahtakin om un.
Mi khempeuh zahtak bawlin thu uppih mite na it unla, Pasian zahtak bawlin kumpipa zong na zahtak un.

Na lungsim sung uhah Christ zahtakbawl unla, amah Topa-in nei un. Note' lametna thu a hong dong a omkhak leh hoihtakin a genthei dingin kiging tawntung unla, ahi zongin lungnemna leh zahtakna lim tawh gen un.

Na hehna hong kilat hun hong tungta a, misite thukhenna ding hun hong tungta ahih manin minam dangte heh mahmah uhhi. Nangma nasem kamsangte, a lian a neu, nang hong kihta mi khempeuhte thaman na piak ding hun hi ta a, leitung a susia mite na suksiat ding hun hi ta hi," a ci uhhi.

Tua ciangin leitungah a teng mi namkim, pau namkim a zang mite tungah a tawntungin Lungdamna ding Thu gen ding a nei vantung mi khat vankim lai-ah a leeng ka mu hi. 7 Amah nakpi takin kiko a, "Amah in mihingte thu a khen ding hun hong tungta ahih manin Pasian kihta unla amah phat un. Van leh lei, tuinak leh tuipite a bawlpa hong bia ta un," a ci hi.

Topa aw, nang, kua in hong kihtalo ding a, na liatna hong phatlo ding ahi hiam? Nang bek na siangtho hi. Thumanin na sepnate mi khempeuh in mu uh ahih manin minam khempeuh nang kiangah hong pai-in, na mai-ah hong bia ding uhhi," a ci uhhi.
Tua ciangin tokhom panin aw khat hong ging a, "Amah a kihta a lian a neu mite, leh ama nasem khempeuhte aw, eite' Pasian phat un," a ci hi.
Naupang khang a, nawi tawh hong kikhen ta hi. Isaac nawi tawh a kikhen ni ciangin Abraham in pawi lianpi khat bawl hi.

Amaute in, "Nang tawh { Topa } a omna teltakin ka mu uhhi. Tua ahih ciangin, kote in nang hong sukha loin, nang' tungah bangmah hong hih loin, a hoihin gamta-in lungnuam takin kong sawl khiat mah bangun kote' tungah nang in siatna nong bawl lohna dingin nang leh kote' kikalah kiciamna khat om hen la, nang tawh thuciamna khat bawl ni, a ci hi ung. Nang pen tu-in { Topa' } thupha piak na hi hi," a ci uhhi. 29 30 Tua ahih ciangin amah in amaute-a' dingin pawi khat bawl a, amaute in pawi an ne-in a dawn uhhi. 31 Zingsangin amaute tho baih uh a, khatlekhat kiciamna a bawl uhhi. Isaac in amaute a lampi ding uhah kha a, ama kiang panin amaute lungnuam takin a paikhia uhhi.
Tua ahih ciangin Laban in tua muna mi khempeuh kaikhawmin pawi khat a bawl hi.
Jacob in mualtungah biakpiakna pia-in an ne dingin a behte a sam hi. Amaute in an ne uh a, zan tawntung mualtungah a om uhhi.

Moses in, "Ka khangnote uh leh ka khanghamte uh tawh ka paikhawm ding uhhi. Ka tapate uh, ka tanute uh, ka tuuhonte uh, leh ka bawnghonte uh tawh ka pai ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa}-a' dingin pawi khat ka kham ding uhhi," a ci hi.

Hih bang zia-in na ne ding uhhi: Na kawng uh gakin, na khedap uh na khe uhah bulhin, na ciangkhut uh na khut uhah na tawi ding uh a, na nawh nek ding uhhi. Tua pen { Topa' } Paisan Pawi a hihi. 13 Note' omna inn tunga sisan pen note-a' dingin lim hi ding hi. Sisan ka muh ciangin note kong paisan ding a, Egypt leitang ka vatgawp ciangin note hong susia ding gimna note' tungah hong tunglo ding hi. 14 "Hih pen note-a' dingin phawkna ni hi ding a, note in { Topa' } tungah pawi bawlna ni-in na nei ding uhhi. Na khang tawntungun note in biakna ngeina kip khatin na nei tawntung ding uhhi," a ci hi.

Note in silngo sawhloh anlum pawi na bawl ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh hih ni teekteekin Egypt leitang panin na mihonte uh ka paikhiatpih hi. Tua ahih ciangin note in na khan' tawntungun hih ni pen biakna ngeina kip khatin na nei tawntung ding uhhi.
Tua ciangin Moses in Israel upate khempeuh samin amaute kiangah, "Nomau-a' dingin na innkuan uh tawh a kituakin tuunote teel unla, Paisan Pawi bawlna ding tuuno go un.

note in, ‘{ Topa' } Paisanna hangin biakpiakna a hihi. Amah in eite' innkuante hong khawi-in Egypt mite a thah lai-in Egypt gam sungah Israel innkuante paisan hi,’ na ci ding uhhi," a ci hi. Mite in a lu uh kunin Pasian a bia uhhi.
{ Topa } in Moses leh Aaron kiangah, "Hih Paisan Pawi pen biakna ngeina kip khat hi ding a, gamdangmi kuamah in nelo ding hi.

Khualmi khat note kiangah hong peem a, { Topa}-a' dingin Paisan Pawi a bawl leh, ama mipih pasal khempeuh a vun ki-atsak un. Tua khit ciangin amah a nai-ah hong pai-in bawl thei ding a, amah pen gammi khat tawh kibang ding hi. Ahih hangin vun ki-atlo mi kuamah in nelo ding hi.

Moses in mite tungah, "Salsuahna Egypt gam panin na paikhiat uhhih ni phawk un. Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } in vangliatna tawh hih mun panin note hong paikhiatpih hi. Silngo sawh anlum kinelo ding hi.
"Numei aisannu na hingkhawi kei ding uhhi.

"Kum khatin thumvei, keima-a' dingin pawi na bawl ding uhhi. 15 Silngo sawhloh anlum pawi na bawl ding uhhi. Keimah in note kong thupiak bangin Abib kha sung a kisehsa hun ciangin ni sagih sung silngo sawhloh anlum na ne ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh tua kha sungin Egypt panin note na paikhia uhhi. Khut hawmguak tawh keima mai-ah kuamah hong kilaklo ding hi. 16 "Note in lo-a na tuh uh, na nasepna uh a gah masa, anlak pawi na bawl ding uhhi. Note in lo panin na nasepna uh a gah na kaihkhop uh kum bei ciangin an kaihkhopna pawi na bawl ding uhhi.

"Silngo sawhloh anlum pawi na bawl ding uhhi. Abib kha, a kisehsa hun sungteng, nang kong thupiak mah bangin ni sagih sung silngo sawhloh anlum na ne ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh Abib kha sungin Egypt panin note na paikhia uhhi.

"Nipikalte' pawi, mangbuh a tung masa pawi, leh kum bei ciangin an kaihkhop pawi na bawl ding uhhi. 23 "Pasal khempeuh Israel Pasian, { Topa } Pasian' mai-ah kum khatin thumvei kilak ding uhhi. 24 Banghang hiam cihleh note' mai-ah minam dangte ka hawlkhia ding a, na gamgite uh nomau-a' dingin ka keek ding hi. { Topa } na Pasian uh' mai-ah kum khatin thumvei a kilak dingin na paitoh sungun na leitang uh mi khat peuhpeuh in a hong deihgawh khak ding lunghihmawhna omlo ding hi. 25 "Note in silngo tawh keimah biakpiakna si na pia khawm kei ding uh a, Paisan Pawi biakpiakna zong zingsang dong na omsak kei ding uhhi.

{ Topa } in Moses kiangah, 2 "Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: Note in a siangtho biak kikhopnate hi, ci-in na gen ding uh keimah { Topa' } pawi a kisehte hih bang a hihi. 3 Ni guk sungin nasep kizo ding a, ahih hangin a ni sagih ni pen a thupi tawlngakna Sabbath, a siangtho kikhopna a hihi. Note in tua ni-in na na sem kei ding uhhi. Tua pen note' ten'na khempeuhah { Topa}-a' dingin Sabbath a hihi. 4 "Hihte pen amaute-a' dingin a kiseh hunin note in na gen ding uh ahi { Topa' } pawi a kisehte, a siangtho biak kikhopnate a hihi. 5 "A kha masa, a ni sawmleli nitak pen { Topa' } Paisan Pawi a hihi. 6 Tua kha mah, a ni sawmlenga ni pen { Topa' } tungah silngo sawhloh anlum pawi a hihi. Ni sagih sung note in silngo sawhloh anlum na ne ding uhhi. 7 A ni masa ni-in note in a siangtho kikhopna khat na nei ding uh a, thatang nasep na sem kei ding uhhi. 8 Ahih hangin note in { Topa' } tungah meihal biakna ni sagih sung na pia ding uhhi. A ni sagih ni pen a siangtho kikhopna ni hi ding a, thatang nasep na sem kei ding uhhi," a ci hi.
"Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: Hih kha sagihna a ni sawmlenga ni-a kipan ni sagih sung pen { Topa}-a' ding buk pawi a hihi.

"Note in leitanga piangte na kaihkhop khit uh, kha sagihna, a ni sawmlenga ni-a kipan ni sagih sung { Topa' } pawi na bawl ding uhhi. A ni masa ni pen a thupi tawlngakna khat hi a, a ni giat ni zong a thupi tawlngakna khat mah hi ding hi.
Note in tua pen kum simin ni sagih sung pawi-in na nei ding uh a, note' khang tawntungin ngeina khat hi tawntung ding hi. Note in kha sagihna sungah na bawl ding uhhi.

"A kiseh hunin Paisan Pawi, Israel mite khamsak in. 3 A kiseh hun, tu kha ni sawmleli ni nitakin a thukhamte leh a ngeina kip omte bangin na kham ding uhhi," a ci hi. 4 Tua ahih ciangin amaute in Paisan Pawi a khamna dingun Moses in Israel mite tungah a gen hi. 5 Amaute in a kha masa, a ni sawmleli ni nitakin Sinai sehnel gamah Paisan Pawi kham uh a, { Topa } in Moses a thupiak bangin Israel mite a gamta uhhi. 6 Misi luang a lawn'na uh hangin a nin mi pawlkhat om uh a, tua ni-in amaute in Paisan Pawi kham theilo uh ahih manin Moses leh Aaron' mai-ah pai uhhi.
"Kha masa a ni sawm leh ni li ni pen { Topa' } Paisan Pawi ni a hihi.
"Na nipikal pawi hunun { Topa' } tungah an thak tawh biakna na piak hun uh anpal piak ni-in a siangtho kikhopna khat na nei ding uhhi. Tua ni-in leitung nasep na sem kei ding uh a,
"A kha sagihna ni sawm leh ni nga ni-in a siangtho kikhopna khat nei-in tua ni-in leitung nasep na sem kei ding uh a, { Topa}-a' dingin ni sagih sung pawi na kham ding uhhi.
A kha masa, tua kha ni sawm leh ni nga ni-in Rameses panin amaute dingkhia uhhi. Paisan Pawi masa ni khit a zingciangin Egypt mite khempeuh' muhna-ah gualzawhna tawh Israel mite paikhia uh a,

"Abib kha tang unla, { Topa } na Pasian uh-a' dingin Paisan Pawi bawl un. Banghang hiam cihleh Abib kha sungin { Topa } na Pasian un Egypt gam panin zanin note hong paikhiatpih hi. 2 Tuuhon pan ahi a, bawnghon pan ahi zongin { Topa } in ama min omna dingin a teelna munah Paisan Pawi biakpiakna { Topa } na Pasian uh tungah na pia ding uhhi. 3 Silngo sawh anlum tawh na ne kei ding uh a, ni sagih sung silngo sawhloh anlum, gimna anlum tawh na ne ding uhhi. Egypt gam panin nawhsa-in na taikhia uhhi. Egypt gam panin na taikhiat uh hun na nuntak sung tawntung uh na phawk theihna ding uh a hihi. 4 Na gamsung khempeuh uhah ni sagih sung note lakah silngo kimulo ding hi. A ni masa nitakin biakpiakna-ah na piak uh sa khat peuhpeuh zong a zingsang dong zan tawntung na omsak kei ding uhhi. 5 "{ Topa } na Pasian un note hong piak khua khempeuhah Paisan Pawi biakpiakna na pia thei kei ding uhhi. 6 { Topa } na Pasian un ama min omna dingin a teelna mun bekah ni a tum khit nitak, Egypt panin na paikhiat uh hunin Paisan Pawi biakpiakna na pia ding uhhi. 7 { Topa } na Pasian un a teelna munah huanin na ne ding uh a, zingsang ciangin na puanbukte uhah na ciah thei ding uhhi. 8 Ni guk sung silngo sawhloh anlum na ne ding uh a, a ni sagih ni-in { Topa } na Pasian uh-a' dingin a thupi kikhopna khat na nei ding uhhi. Tua ni-in na na sem kei ding uhhi. 9 "An na lak masak ni uha kipanin nipikal sagih na simto ding uhhi. 10 Tua ciangin { Topa } na Pasian un note thupha hong piakna tawh kizui-in na piak ding uh ahi note' khutsung panin utthu-a piakna tawh { Topa } na Pasian uh tungah nipikal pawi na bawl ding uhhi. 11 { Topa } na Pasian uh mai, ama min omna dingin { Topa } na Pasian un a teelna munah, note-a kipan na tanute leh na tapate, na nasem numeite leh na nasem pasalte, na khua sunga om Levi mite, peemtate, pa neilote, leh note lakah a om meigong numeite tawh na lungdam khawm ding uhhi. 12 Egypt-ah sila na hihna uh na phawk ding uh a, hih thukhamte zuih ding limtakin na ngaihsun ding uhhi. 13 "Na ancilna uh leh na leenggah sukna panun an na kaihkhop uh ciangin ni sagih sung buk pawi na bawl ding uhhi. 14 Tua pawi sungah nanga kipan na tanute leh na tapate, na nasem numeite leh na nasem pasalte, Levi mite, peemtate, pa neilote, leh na khua sunga om meigong numeite tawh na lungdam khawm ding uhhi. 15 { Topa } in a teelna munah ni sagih sung { Topa } na Pasian uh tungah pawi na bawl ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh note na lungdam khawm theihna dingun na khawhsa uh leh na khut uh tawh na sepna khempeuh uhah { Topa } na Pasian un note thupha hong pia ding hi. 16 "Amah in a teelna mun, { Topa } na Pasian uh mai-ah pasal khempeuh kum khatin thumvei, silngo sawhloh anlum pawi, nipikal pawi, leh buk pawi-ah kilaak ding uhhi. Amaute khut hawmguakin { Topa' } mai-ah kilaklo ding uhhi. { Topa } na Pasian un note thupha hong piaknasa tawh kizui-in mi khempeuh in ama hih theih bang ciatin pia ding uhhi.

Israel mite Gilgal-a giahphualah a om sungun tua kha a ni sawmleli ni nitakin Jerikho zanglei-ah Paisan Pawi a bawl uhhi. 11 Paisan Pawi khit a zingciang ni teekteekin amaute in tua gama piang silngo sawhloh moh leh ankan' a ne uhhi.
Tua ciangin numei kiangah a pa paisuk a, Samson in zong tua lai-ah pawi khat a kham hi; Banghang hiam cihleh tangvalte' hih ngei a hihi.

Tu-in Filistia uliante a pasian uh Dagon tungah biakna lianpi khat a pia ding leh a gualnuam dingin kikhawm uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh amaute in, "I pasian in i khutsungah i galpa Samson hong piazo hi," a ci uhhi.

Tua ciangin Nabal kiangah Abigail hong tungkik hi. Kumpipa' pawi tawh kibangin amah in a inn sungah pawi na kham hi. Nabal lungnuam mahmah hi. Banghang hiam cihleh amah in zu kham mahmah hi. Tua ahih ciangin zingsang khuavak mateng ama kiangah bangmah gen peuhmahlo hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh tuni-in amah paisuk khinin, bawngtalte, ganno thaute, leh tuute, tampi tak biakna-in pia a, kumpipa' tapate khempeuh, galkapte a ukpa Joab, leh siampi Abiathar sam hi. Amaute in ama-a' ding pawi bawl uh a, ‘Kumpi Adonijah a khan' sau hen!’ ci uhhi.

Tua ciangin Solomon khanglo a, hih pen a mang na hi hi. Tua ciangin Jerusalem-ah amah pai a, { Topa' } Thuciamna Singkuang mai-ah amah dingin meihal biaknate leh thunuama biaknate pia-in, a nasemte khempeuh-a' dingin pawi khat a kham hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa in mi khempeuh thu pia a, "Hih thuciamna laibu sungah a kigelh mah bangin { Topa } na Pasian uh pahtawina-in Paisan Pawi bawl un," a ci hi. 22 Banghang hiam cihleh Israel-te thu a khen thukhente' huna kipan hita leh, Israel kumpite ahih kei leh Judah kumpite' hun sung khempeuh tua bang Paisan Pawi kibawl ngeilo hi. 23 Ahih hangin Kumpi Josiah' uk kum sawmlegiatna kumin Jerusalem-ah { Topa}-a' dingin Paisan Pawi kibawl hi. 24 Tua thamloin { Topa' } biakinn sungah siampi Hilkiah in a muh laibu sungah a kigelh thukham kammalte amah in a kipsak theihna dingin Judah gamsung leh Jerusalem-a om vankahte, aisante, innsung pasian-te, milimte, leh a kihhuai nate khempeuh Josiah in a hemkhia hi.

Tua hun laitakin Solomon leh amah tawh a om Israel khempeuh mihon tampi in Hamath lutna panin Egypt lui ciangdongah ni sagih sung pawi a kham uhhi. 9 Tua ciangin a ni giat ni-in amaute in a thukhupna khat nei uhhi; Banghang hiam cihleh amaute in biakinn apna ni sagih sung pawi kham uh a, tua pawi ni sagih sung kibawl hi. 10 A kha sagihna a ni thum ni-in, { Topa } in David leh Solomon, leh ama mi Israel tungah a hoih a bawlna hangin amah in lungdamna leh kipakna tawh a inn uhah mite a ciahsak hi.

Israel Pasian, { Topa' } Paisan Pawi a bawl dingin Jerusalem-a { Topa' } biakinn-ah hong paina dingun Hezekiah in Israel mi khempeuh leh Judah mite kiangah mi sawl a, Efraim mite leh Manasseh mite tungah zong laikhakte a gelh hi. 2 Banghang hiam cihleh kumpipa leh a uliante leh Jerusalem-a a kikhawm khempeuh in Paisan Pawi a kha nihna sungin bawl ding kikum khin uhhi.

Tua ahih ciangin mite hong pai-in Israel Pasian, { Topa}-a' dingin Jerusalem-ah Paisan Pawi a bawlna dingun Beersheba panin Dan ciangdong Israel sung khempeuhah taangkona khat a bawlna ding uh thukhensatna khat bawl uhhi; Banghang hiam cihleh bawl dinga a kigen bangin amaute in a lianpi-in bawl ngeilo uhhi.
Tua ciangin a kha nihna sungin silngo sawhloh anlum pawi a bawl dingin Jerusalem-ah mihon tampi tak hong pai uhhi.

Tua ciangin amaute in a kha nihna a ni sawmleli ni-in Paisan Pawi tuuno go uhhi. Tua ciangin biakna vai-in a siangtho nailo siampite leh Levi mite nakpi takin maizum uhhi. Tua ahih ciangin amau mah kisian'suahin { Topa' } biakinn sungah meihal biaknate hong paipih uhhi. 16 Pasian' mipa Moses' thukham bangin amaute in amau' pan'mun ngei hong la uh a, siampite in Levi mite' khut tung panin a ngah uh sisan theh uhhi. 17 Bang hang hiam cih leh a kikhawm lakah amau mah a kisian'suah nailo tampi om uhhi. Tua ahih ciangin { Topa' } tungah a siangtho-in a kibawlna dingun a nin khempeuh-a' dingin Levi mite in Paisan Pawi tuuno a gawh ding uh kisam hi. 18 Bang hang hiam cih leh mi tampi tak, Efraim, Manasseh, Issakhar, leh Zebulun sung pan, amau mah kisian'suah nailo uh a, ahi zongin ngeina lopi-in amaute in Paisan Pawi ne uhhi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Hezekiah in amaute-a' dingin thu ngenin, "Ka pute ka pate uh' Pasian a dik { Topa } aw, 19 biakinn siangthona ngeina om bangin lungsim tak tawh nang hong biate khempeuh' mawhna maisak in," a ci hi. 20 Tua ciangin { Topa } in Hezekiah' thungetna pia-in mite' mawhna maisak a, gimna ngahsak lo hi.
Tua ciangin adang ni sagih sung mah tua pawi a bawlthuah lai ding uh a kikhawm khempeuh thukim uhhi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute in lungdamna tawh adang ni sagih sung mah bawlthuah uhhi.
Josiah in { Topa}-a' dingin Jerusalem-ah Paisan Pawi bawl hi. Amaute in a kha masa a ni sawmleli ni-in Paisan Pawi tuuno go uhhi.

Tua ciangin Paisan Pawi bawlna ganhing go-in nomau mah kisian'suah unla, Moses' tung tawnin { Topa' } thugen bangin na sanggamte uh-a' dingin kithawi un," a ci hi. 7 Tua ciangin Josiah in tua lai-a a om mi khempeuhte-a' dingin Paisan Pawi piakna-in a ganhon panin mi nautangte tungah tuunote leh keelnote tul sawmthum ciangdong, leh bawngtal tul thum a pia hi. Hihte pen kumpipa' neihsa sung pan a kipia a hihi. 8 Tua ciangin ama uliante in zong utna lungsim tawh mite tung, siampite tung, leh Levi mite tungah a pia uhhi. Pasian' biakinn-ah ulianpite ahi Hilkiah,

, leh Jehiel-te in siampite tungah Paisan Pawi bawlna dingin tuuno leh keelno tul nih leh za guk, leh bawngtal za thum a pia uhhi. 9 Levi mi ukpite Konaniah, Shemaiah, leh a sanggam Nethanel, Hashabiah, Jeiel leh Jozabad-te in Paisan Pawi piakna dingin Levi mite tungah tuuno leh keelno tul nga, leh bawngtal za nga a pia uhhi.

Tua ahih ciangin Kumpi Josiah' thupiakna bangin Paisan Pawi bawlna ding leh { Topa' } biakna tau tungah meihal biaknate piakna dingin tua ni-in { Topa' } nasepna ding khempeuh a kithawi uhhi. 17 Tua lai-ah a om Israel mite in tua hunin Paisan Pawi, leh Silngo Sawhloh Anlum Pawi ni sagih sung a bawl uhhi. 18 Kamsang Samuel huna kipan Israel sungah tua bang Paisan Pawi kibawl ngeilo hi. Josiah leh siampite leh Levi mite, leh tua lai-ah a om Judah leh Israel mi khempeuh, leh Jerusalem-a a teng mite in a bawl Paisan Pawi tawh a kibang, Israel kumpite kuamah in bawl ngeilo hi. 19 Josiah' uk a kum sawmlegiatna kumin hih Paisan Pawi kibawl hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in a kikipsaksa bangin buk pawi bawl uh a, nisimin zat dingin a kisehsa zah bangin meihal biakna nisimin a pia uhhi.

Tua ciangin Moses laibu sungah a kigelh bangin Jerusalem-a Pasian' nasepna dingin siampite amau' pan'mun ngei-ah pangsak uh a, Levi mite amau' nasepna ngei-ah a semsak kik uhhi. 19 A kha masa a ni sawmleli ni-in sal a suaksa a hong ciahkik mite in Paisan Pawi a bawl uhhi. 20 Siampite leh Levi mite a vekpi-un kisian'suah khin uh a, a vekpi-un zehsiang khin uhhi. Tua hi a, amaute in sal suaksa a hong ciahkik khempeuh-a' ding, a siampipihte uh leh amau mahmah-a' dingin Paisan tuuno a go uhhi. 21 Salsuahna panin a hong ciahkik Israel-te leh Israel Pasian, { Topa } a bia dingin tua gama midang tengte leh a nitna uh pan amau leh amau a kihemkhia tawm mite khempeuh in tua Paisan Pawi an a ne uhhi. 22 Tua hi a, amaute in lungdamna tawh ni sagih sung silngo sawhloh anlum pawi a bawl uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh amau' lungdamna ding a om theihna dingin { Topa } in Assiria kumpipa' lungsim amau' tungah a nuam dingin a bawlsak hi. Tua ahih manin Israel Pasian ahi Pasian' biakinn a sepna uhah kumpipa in amaute a huh hi.

Tua ciangin, a kha sagihna pawi hun sungin sawlbuk sungah Israel mite a omna ding thu, leh amaute in a khuapi khempeuh uh leh Jerusalem-ah taangko-in, "A kigensa bangin sawlbuk lamna dingin gamlakah pai unla oliv hiangte, gamlak oliv hiangte, mui sing hiangte, leh a teh tam singhiang dangte va sat un," ci-in a gen ding uh, Moses tung tawnin { Topa } in a thupiakna pen thukham sungah a kigelh lam a mu uhhi.
Ama tapate in inn khat panin inn khatah a ban banin pawi bawlin pai kawikawi uh a, tua pawi a siim dingin a sanggam numei thumte uh zong a sam kawikawi uhhi.
Kitawng kawmkawmin pawipi sungah an nekna sangin lungnuam takin mohkeu themkhat nekna hoihzaw hi.
Note' Khadet nite leh na pawite uh ka mudah hi. Tuate pen kei-a' dingin vangikpi khat suakkhin a, tuate khempeuh ka puakna-in ka gim hi.

Ahi zongin no Pasian' mite in ahih leh biakna pawi a kikham ni zana bangin la na sa ding uhhi. Israel-te a hu { Topa}' biakinn-ah a pai dingin tamngai aw gin'na zui-in a kuankhiate bangin na lungdam ding uhhi.
"A kha masa a ni sawmleli ni-in Paisan Pawi na kipan ding uh a, mi khempeuh in ni sagih sung silngo sawhloh anlum na ne ding uhhi.
Kumpi a suah ciangin Belshazzar in pawi lianpi khat bawl a, a mi liante tul khat samin amaute tawh zu a ne uhhi.

Na biakna pawite uh mudahin ka deih kei a, na biak kikhopnate uhah ka lung a kim kei hi. 22 Meihal biakna leh an tawh biakna nong paipih uh hangin tuate kong sang kei ding hi. Thunuama biakpiakna dingin na hong paipih uh a thau mahmah ganhingte zong et-in ka nei vet kei ding hi. 23 La sa-in na gamlumnate uh khawl un; na lasakna uh a gingte ka za nuam kei hi. 24 Thutang, tui bangin luangkhiasak unla, thuman, a kang ngeilo tui bangin luangsak un.

En un, mualtungah kamtaipa hong tai a, gualzawhna ding thupha hong gen ding a hihi. Judah mite aw, pawi bawl unla, Pasian' tungah na ciam bangun gamta un. Banghang hiam cihleh migilote kisusiacip khin a, na gam uh hong simkik nawnlo ding hi.

Tua bangin galte a kizawhgawp khit ciangin, galte sung panin a nungtalai mite in Vanglian { Topa, } kumpi ahihna hangin a bia ding leh ama gualzawhna pawi a bawl dingin kumsimin Jerusalem-ah pai tawntung ding uhhi. 17 Minam khat peuhpeuh, Vanglian { Topa } ahi kumpipa a bia dingin Jerusalem-ah a painop kei leh amau' gamsungah guah zulo ding hi. 18 Tua gualzawhna pawi a bawl dingin Egypt mite a painop kei leh, tua bangin a pai nuamlo minamte' thuak ding gimnate mah, amau' tungah a tung ding hi. 19 Gualzawhna pawi a bawl dingin a pai nuamlo Egypt mite leh minam dang khempeuhte tungah a tung ding gimna pen tu-a bang a hihi.
Ahi zongin Herod' suah ni pawi bawl hun hong tun' ciangin mihonte mai-ah Herodias' tanu hong laam ciangin Herod lungdam mahmah ahih manin,

Zeisu in amaute kiangah thugentehna dang khat zangin thu hilh a, 2 "Vantung ki-ukna zia pen a tapa-a' dingin mo pawi a bawl kumpipa' gamtatzia tawh kibang hi. 3 Mo pawi siim dingin a khohsa mite a sam dingin a nasemte sawl a, ahi zongin kuamah pailo hi. 4 Tua ciangin nasem dangte sawl leuleu a, ‘Ka khohsaksa mite kiangah hih bangin va gen un: Ka bawngtalte leh ka bawngno thaute kigo khin a, nitak an a minsa-in a om banah, na khempeuh a mansa-in om khinta hi. Mo pawi an ne dingin hong pai ta un, ci hi, ci-in va gen un,’ a ci hi. 5 Ahi zongin a khohsa mite in na thusimlo uh a, pawlkhat in lo na kuansanin, pawlkhat in a sumbukah na paisanin, 6 adangte in a nasemte manin a na satgawp khit uh ciangin a na that uhhi. 7 Kumpipa zong heh mahmah a, a galkapte kuansakin tua mi thatte a thahsak khit ciangin a khua a haltumsak hi. 8 Tua ciangin a nasemte kiangah, ‘Mo pawi an a baihsa-in om a, ahi zongin ka sap mite a ne dingin a kilawmlo mi a suak uhhi. 9 Tua ahih manin lamlianpi-ah va pai unla, mi na muh zahzah uh hong sam un,’ a ci hi. 10 Nasemte zong lamlianpi-ah va pai uh a, mihoih mi hoihlo ciloin a muh khempeuh uh va kaikhawm uh ahih manin mo pawi bawlna innsung dimin leengla hong om hi. 11 "Kumpipa, a leeng late a en dingin a hong lut ciangin mo pawi siimna puan a silhlo mi khat a mu hi. 12 Ama kiangah, ‘Lawm aw, mo pawi siimna puan silhlopi-in hih lai-ah hong bangci luttheih na hi hiam?’ a cih ciangin tua mipa in a cihna ding a thei kei hi.

Silngo Sawhloh Anlum Pawi a kipat ni-in nungzuite in Zeisu kiangah, "Paisan Pawi annek ding koilai takah hong bawlsak le ung deih na hi hiam?" ci-in a dong uhhi. 18 Zeisu in, "Jerusalem khuasungah va pai unla, tua mipa kiangah, ‘Siapa in, "Ka hun hong naita hi. Na inn-ah ka nungzuite tawh Paisan Pawi an ka hong ne ding uhhi," ci hi,’ va ci un," a ci hi.
Paisan Pawi hun simin Rom gam ukpa in mihonte' deih thongkia mi khat a khah a ngeina a hihi.

Ahi zongin a tawpna-ah Herodias in hunhoih ngah hi. Herod a suah ni hun a tun' ciangin kumpi uliante, galkapmangte, leh Galilee gamsunga om ulian khempeuh-a' dingin pawi a kham hi. 22 Tua pawi bawlna sungah Herodias' tanu hong pai-in hong laam a, Herod leh a leeng late khempeuh lungdam mahmah uhhi. Tua ahih ciangin kumpipa in, "Bang deih na hiam; na deih peuhpeuh kong pia ding hi," a ci hi.
Kikhopna inn sungah, uliante-a' dingin a kikoihcing tutphah nuamte tungah tunuam uh a, pawi sungah zong uliante' tutna mun hoihte bekah a tunuam uhhi.
Paisan Pawi hun simin mite in Pilat tungah a nget peuhpeuh mi khat, thong panin a khah a ngeina a hihi.
Kumsimin Jerusalem khua-a Paisan Pawi a kibawlna-ah Zeisu' nu leh pa a pai zel uh a hihi.
Tua ciangin Levi in ama inn-ah Zeisu vakna annek pawipi bawl a, annekna sabuai-ah siahdong dang tampite leh midangte zong tawh a tukhawm uhhi.

Tua bangin anvakna pawi na bawl ciangin mizawngte, khezawte, khebaite, leh mittawte sam in. 14 Amaute in nang hong thukkik zolo ding uh ahih manin nang-a' dingin a lungdamhuai hong hi ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh sihna panin mihoihte a thawhkik hun ciangin Pasian in nang tungah hong thukkik ding hi," a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Zeisu in tua ahih kei leh zong, "Numei khat in sum peek sawm a neih sung panin khat man'suah leh bangcih ding ahi hiam? Meivak vakin, a innsung teng phiatin, a muh matengin mun khempeuh limtakin zong ding hi. 9 A muh ciangin a lawmte leh a vengte samin amaute kiangah, ‘Ka sum man'suahsa mukik ka hih manin ka nuam mahmah hi. Lungdamna pawi bawl ni,’ ci ding hi. 10 Tua mah bangin mawhnei mi khat a kisikkikna hangin Pasian' vantung mite lungdam mahmah uhhi," a ci hi.

Ahi zongin a pa in a nasemte sam a, ‘Hong manlang un. Puan hoihpen hong la unla silhsak un. A khutme-ah zungbuh butsak unla, a khe-ah khedap zong bulhsak un. 23 Tua ciangin i bawngno limcipen hong go unla, lungdam pawi bawl ni. 24 Banghang hiam cihleh ka tapa a sisa hong nungta a, ka tapa a mangsa hong tungkik hi,’ a ci hi. Tua ahih manin lungdamna pawi bawl a kipan uhhi.

A tapa uzaw in, ‘Tu a beisa hunsung khempeuh, nasemte khat bangin nangma-a' dingin na ka sem a, na thu zong kong nial ngei het kei hi. Tua hinapi, kei bang hong pia ngei na hi hiam? Ka lawmte tawh pawi ka bawlna dingin keel khat nangawn nong pia kei hi.
Tu-in na naupa a sisa hong hingkik a, a mangsa hong tungkik ahih manin lungdamin pawi i bawl ding ahi hi,’ ci-in a pa in a dawng hi," a ci hi.

"Thukham hilh siate na batkhak lohna dingun kidawm un. Amaute in puantualpi silhnuam uh a, mihon lakah a kizahtak hopih ding deihin, kikhopna innsung leh pawi lakah a om uh ciangin uliante' tutna mun hoihte bekah tunuam uhhi.
Tu-in Paisan Pawi a kici Silngo Sawhloh Anlum Pawi hun hong naita hi.7Tua ciangin Silngo Sawhloh Anlum Pawi hunsungin Paisan Pawi an-a nekding tuuno gawh ni hun hong tung hi.
Zeisu in Peter leh Johan kiangah, "Va pai unla, eite' Paisan Pawi annek ding va vaihawm un," ci-in a sawl hi.

a innteekpa kiangah, ‘Siapa in: Ka nungzuite tawh Paisan Pawi an ka nektheihna ding uh inndei koi lai hiam, ci hi,’ ci-in va dong un. 12 Amah in a baihsa-in a na kikoihsa inndei tungnung a zai khat hong lak ding hi. Tua lai-ah a kisam khempeuh a baihsa-in na koih un," a ci hi. 13 Amaute gel zong pai uh a, Zeisu' gensa bang teekteekin va mu uh a, tua lai-ah Paisan Pawi annek ding a bawl uhhi. 14 A hun a tun' ciangin Zeisu zong sawltakte tawh sabuai-ah a tu hi. 15 Tua ciangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, "Sihna ka thuakma-in note tawh hih Paisan Pawi an i nekkhop ding ka ut mahmah khat a hihi. 16 A mantakin kong genin-ah, Pasian' Ukna sungah a cingtaak Paisan Pawi hun hong tun' mateng, Paisan Pawi an ka ne ngei nawn kei ding hi," a ci hi.
(Paisan Pawi hun simin Pilat in amaute' deih thongkia khat a khah ding a hihi.)

Tua zawh ni nih khit ciangin Galilee gam Kana khua-ah mo pawi om a, Zeisu' nu zong tua pawi-ah a om hi. 2 Zeisu leh a nungzuite zong tua pawi-ah a kisam hi. 3 Leenggahzu a bei ciangin Zeisu' nu in, "Leenggahzu om nawnlo hi," ci-in Zeisu kiangah a gen hi. 4 Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Nu aw, Banghangin na lunghihmawhna hong ko zenzen na hi hiam? Keima hun tung nailo hi," ci-in a dawng hi.
Jew mite' Paisan Pawi hun hong naita ahih manin Jerusalem khua-ah Zeisu a pai hi.
Paisan Pawi hun laitakin Jerusalem khuasungah Zeisu a om sungin Zeisu in vangliatna tawh na lamdang a bawlte mu uh ahih manin mi tampi in amah a um uhhi.
Paisan Pawi hun laitakin Jerusalem-ah Galilee mite va pai-in, tua pawi sungah Zeisu' septe khempeuh mu khin uh ahih manin, Zeisu a tun' ciangin Galilee mite in na limbawl mahmah uhhi.
Jew mite' Paisan Pawi hun nai mahmah ta hi.
Jerusalem-ah Biakinn Apkikna Pawi bawl hun hong tung a, phalbi hunsung a hihi.
Jew mite' Paisan Pawi hun hong nai ciangin, tua pawi kipatma hunsungin biakna vai-in kisian'suahna a bawl dingin gamsung khuate panin Jerusalem khuapi-ah mi tampi hong pai uhhi.

Tu-in Paisan Pawi hun ding ni khat bek in sam a, Zeisu in hih leitung nusia-in a Pa kiangah a pai ding hun a tun'na thu a thei hi. Hih leitungah a om ama mite it mahmah ahih manin a hih theihna zah ciang tawh a itna a lak hi.

Tua ciangin Kaiafas' inn panin gam ukpa Pilat' omna kumpi inn-ah Zeisu a paipih uhhi. Tua hun pen zingsang tung a hihi. Jew mite ahih leh Paisan Pawi annekna sungah kihel nuam uh ahih manin biakna vai-in a siang a suahtheihna dingun kumpi inn huang sungah lutlo uhhi.39Tua ahih manin na Paisan Pawi hun uh ciangin note-a' dingin mi khat ka khahkhiat a ngeina ahih manin note-a' dingin hih Jew kumpipa hong khahkhia leng na ut uhhiam?" ci-in a dot ciangin,
Tua ni pen Paisan Pawi hun ding Kigin' ni hi a, sunkim laitak hun a hihi. Pilat in Jew mihonte kiangah, "Hih lai-ah na Kumpipa uh om!" a cih ciangin
Peter a kimat khit ciangin thongah kikoih a, galkap li ciat a om galkap pawl lite in a cin'dingin ki-ap hi. Herod in Paisan Pawi a ven' ciangin mipi mai-ah Peter thu sit dingin a ngaihsut a hihi.

Note na siangtho theihna dingun mawhna silngo luite na paikhia un. Tua hi leh silngo sawhloh annel lom thak na hi ding uh a, zong ahi takpi mah na hi uhhi. Banghang hiam ci leh i Paisan Pawi hun hong tungta a, eite' Paisan Tuuno ahi Christ kigo khinzo ta hi. 8 Tua ahih ciangin mawhna leh gitlohna ahi silngo lui a kisawh anlum tawh Paisan Pawi bawlloin, silngo a kisawhlo, siangthona leh thutakna tawh bawlzaw ni.
