Tua ahih manin annek tuidawn, biakna pawite, Khadet Pawi, leh Sabbath ni tawh kisai-in kuamah in ngeina zuihding bawl kei un.
Mi That Vantungmi in Israel mite ta upa pen khempeuh a thahkhak lohna dingin Paisan Pawi kipiangsakin, inntual kongtungzawl khempeuh sisan a kizutna zong upna hang mah a hihi.

Teci a pang tua kamsang nihte in leitung mite tungah gimna nakpi takin tungsak uh ahih manin hih mi nihte a sihna hangin lungdamin pawi bawl ding uh a, a nuamna uh hangin khatlekhat letsong kipia ding uhhi.

Tuuno' zineih ding hun hong tungta a, a Lawmnu a kithawisa-in omkhin ahih manin lungdam kipakin amah phat ni. 8 Puan hoih mahmah, siangin a pak mahmahte, ama silh dingin kipia hi," a ci uhhi. Tua puan hoih pen Pasian' mi siangthote' gamtatna mante a hihi. 9 Tua ciangin vantung mi in keima kiangah, "Hih thu gelh in: Tuuno' zineihna pawi-ah a kisam mite a hampha mahmah ahi hi," hong cihkhit ciangin, "Hihte pen Pasian' gen taktak kammal ahi hi," hong cithuah lai hi.

"Tua khit ciangin mi khempeuh tungah ka kha ka sung ding a, na puteekte un mang manin na tangvalte un maang mu ding uhhi.29Tua hun ciangin nasem numei leh nasem pasalte tung nangawnah ka kha ka sung ding hi.

Keimah in Pa kiangah ka ngen ding a, note tawh a omkhawm tawntung dingin Thuman a hong lak Khasiangtho, note hong Huhpa ding a hong pia ding hi. 17Leitung mite in tua Khasiangtho mu theilo, thei theilo uh ahih manin sang theilo ding uhhi. Ahi zongin note sungah tua Khasiangtho hong omding ahih manin note in na thei ding uhhi.

"Note tawh ka hong omkhawm hunsungin hih thute a hong gen ka hihi. 26 Ahi zongin Pa in keima tangin a hong sawl ding Huhpa Khasiangtho a hong tun' ciangin note tungah thu khempeuh hong hilh ding a, note tungah ka hong gensa thu khempeuh zong hong phawksakkik ding hi.

Lawm Theofilas aw, Lai ka hong gelh masakna sungah Zeisu in nasep a kipat tunga kipanin vantungah amah a kilaktoh hun ciangdong, a thuhilhna leh a septe khempeuh cingtakin ka gelh hi. Ama sawltak dingin a teelsa mite, Khasiangtho tung tawnin thu a vaikhak khit ciangin vantungah amah kilato hi.

Ahi zongin note tungah Khasiangtho hong tun' ciangin vangliatna tawh na kidim ding uh a, Jerusalem khuasung, Judea gamsung, Samaria gamsung, leh leimong dongin note in keima thu na gen ding uhhi," ci-in a dawng hi.

Pentecost ni hong tun' ciangin Zeisu a um mi khempeuh mun khatah kikhawm uhhi. 2 Tua laitakin huihpi nung bangin huging khat hong tungvat a, amaute' kikhopna innsung khempeuh hong dim hi. 3 Tua ciangin leii tawh a kibang meikuang bang pian amaute lakah hong kithehthang a, tuate in mi khempeuh sukha kim hi. 4 Amaute khempeuh Khasiangtho tawh kidim uh a, tua Kha in minam dangte' pau tawh amaute a pau theisak hi. 5 Tua laitakin biakna pawi siim dingin gam tuamtuam panin a hong pai Jew mi biakna hahkat mi tampi tak, Jerusalem khuasungah a om uhhi. 6 Hih huging a zak uh ciangin mihon tampi tak hong kikhawm uh a, hih Zeisu a um mite' thugen pen amau' pau ciatin za uh ahih manin lamdang a sa mahmah uhhi. 7 Amaute in hih thu lamdangsa mahmah uh ahih manin, "Hih thugen mite pen Galilee mi vive hilo ahi hiam?8Tua hinapi-in Banghangin amaute' thugen pen eima pau ciatin za ihi hiam? 9 Eite pen Parthia gam, Media gam, Elam gam, Mesopotamia gam, Judea gam, Kappadosia gam, Pontas gam, Asia gam, 10 Frigia gam, Pamfilia gam, Egypt gam, leh Sairin khuapi gei-a om Libya gamte pan ihi a, pawlkhatte Rom gam pan ihi hi. 11 Jew mite leh Gentail mi Jew biakna a zuite ihi a, pawlkhatte pen Krete gam leh Arabia gam pan ihi hi. Tua bang hinapi-in, Pasian' sep na lamdang liante a kigenna eima pau ciatin i za hi," a ci uhhi.

Tua ciangin Peter in amaute kiangah, "Na mawhna uh kisik unla, na mawhna uh hong kimaisak theihna dingin Zeisu Christ min tawh tui kiphum ciat un. Tua hi leh Pasian' piakkhong Khasiangtho na ngah ding uhhi.
Tua thu gen dingin ka kipat laitakin eite in Khasiangtho i ngah cil huna mah bangin amaute tungah Khasiangtho hong tung hi.

Corin khua-ah Apollos a om laitakin Paul khual hong zinin Ephesa khua hong tung hi. Tua khua-ah thu um mi pawlkhat tawh kimu a, 2 "Thu na up uh ciangin Khasiangtho na ngah uhhiam?" ci-in a dot leh, "Khasiangtho a omlam nangawn ka za nai kei uhhi," ci-in a dawng uhhi. 3 Tua ciangin Paul in, "Tua ahih leh na kituiphumna dan uh bangci bang ahi hiam?" ci-in a dot ciangin, "Tuiphumpa Johan' thugen bang pawl ahi hi," ci-in a dawng uhhi. 4 Tua ciangin Paul in, "Johan' hilh tuiphumna pen mawhna a kisik mite-a' ding a hihi. Amah in Israel mite kiangah, ‘Keima nunga hong pai dingpa Zeisu um un,’ ci-in gen hi," a ci hi. 5 Amaute in hih thu a zak uh ciangin Topa Zeisu' minin tui a kiphum uhhi. 6 Paul in amaute tungah a khut a ngakkhit ciangin amaute tungah Khasiangtho hong tung hi. Amaute in pau lamdang hong paupah uh a, Pasian' thu zong a gen uhhi.
Paul in Jerusalem khua-ah Pentecost Pawi hun lapnuam ahih manin Asia gamsungah ban man dingin ngaihsunlo a, Ephesa khua-ah taam sawmlo hi.

Pasian' bawlsa nate bek hilo a, Pasian' hong piakkhong Khasiangtho maleep a ngah eite mahmah nangawn in zong, Pasian in ama tate-in hong bawlin i buppi-in a hong suahtaksak ding i ngakkawmin thumin tau-in i om hi.
Ahi zongin hih Ephesa khua mahah Pentecost Pawi hun ciangdong ka om ding hi.
Christ a siangtho mah bangin amah tawh kibat ding a lamen khempeuh in zong a nuntakna uh siangthosak ding hi.

Ka it lawmte aw, kha ka nei a ci mi khempeuh' thugen um kei unla, tua thute Pasian kiang pan mah ahi hiam, ci-in kantel un. Banghang hiam cihleh leitungah kamsang a kineihkhem tampi hong om khinta hi.

Amaute in a mawhnate uh hong pulak uh a, Johan in Jordan Gun sungah amaute a tuiphum hi. 7 Ahi zongin Pharisee mite leh Saddusi mite tampi tak tui a kiphum dingin a hong pai a muh ciangin Johan in amaute kiangah, "Gul bangin ngian a zang note aw, a hong tung ding Pasian' hehna panin na suahtak theihna ding uh kua in hong hilhkhol ahi hiam?
Tua ahih manin Pasian' deihna bangin gamtatna ding thu-ah Thukham hilh siate leh Pharisee mite sangin na cihtakzawk uh leh vantung ki-ukna sungah a om thei bek ding na hi uhhi.

Mi pen tuu sangin nakpi takin manphazaw ahih manin Sabbath ni-in a hoih sep ding a kilawm ahi hi," ci-in a dawn' khit ciangin 13 a mipa kiangah, "Na khut zan in," a ci hi. A mipa in zong a khut zanpah a, midangte mah bangin hoihtakin a damkik hi. 14 Ahi zongin Pharisee mite paikhia uh a, Zeisu a thahtheihna ding uh vai a hawm uhhi.
Pharisee mite pawlkhat Zeisu kiangah hong pai uh a, amah a mawhsak theihna ding uh a deihna-un, "Thu khat peuhpeuh hangin zi maktheih ding mah ahi hiam?" ci-in a dong uhhi.

Hih tapa nihte sung panin a koi bel pen a pa' deih bangin gamta ahi hiam?" a ci hi. Amaute in, "A ta uzaw a ta hi," a ci uhhi. Tua ciangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, "Note kiangah a mantaka kong genin-ah: Pasian' ukna sungah note sangin siahdongte leh numei paktatte lut masazaw ding hi. 32 Banghang hiam cihleh note kiangah Tuiphumpa Johan hong pai-in thuman lampi hong lak napi-in na um kei uh a, ahi zongin siahdongte leh numei paktatte in a um uhhi. Hih thu na theih khit uh ciang nangawnin na lungsim uh na kheel nuam tuan kei uh a, na um kei veve uhhi.

Tua ciangin Zeisu in mihonte leh a nungzuite kiangah thu gen a, 2 "Thukham hilh siate leh Pharisee mite, Moses' aana a nei-in thugente ahih manun, 3 amaute' gen khempeuh zui-in sem unla, ahi zongin amaute pen a gen bangun gamtalo uh ahih manin amaute' gamtat bangin gamta kei un. 4 Amaute in midangte tungah vangik mahmah suanin khihcip uh a, ahi zongin tua van a puakpih dingin a khutmeno khat nangawn uh a tangsak nuam kei uhhi. 5 Amaute in a sepna khempeuh uh mite' muhtheih dingin a hih se uhhi. Amaute in a talsuan leh a banbulhte uh a golpipi-in bawlin, a puanmongteep uh a sau theithei-in a bawl uhhi.

Mihoih a kineihkhem, no Thukham hilh siate leh Pharisee mite in gimna na thuak ding uhhi. Note in Pasian tungah lengmasel, masala, leh kummin sing namtui-a kipanin meh namtui nam khempeuh, sawmah khat pia napi-in, thukham sungah a thupizaw ahi thutang, hehpihna, leh thumante na don kei uhhi. Adangte nusia tuanloin hih thute na zuihding uh a hihi. 24 A makai ding hinapi-in, mittaw bangin bangmah tumloteng thupi ngaihsutin, a thupiteng na nusiakha uh a, tui tawh na dawnkhop khaklohna dingun thovai khaih napi-in kalaoh a nawmvalhkha tawh na kibang uhhi. 25 "Mihoih a kineihkhem, no Thukham hilh siate leh Pharisee mite in gimna na thuak ding uhhi. Note in hai leh kuangte a pualam na siangsak uh a, ahi zongin tuate sungah, thatanghat thu leh huaihamna tawh mi-a' na suh uh nate a om hi. 26 A mittaw Pharisee mite aw, a pualam zong a siangtho a suahtheihna dingin hai leh kuang sunga a om nate a siangtho hisak phot un. 27 "Mihoih a kineihkhem, no Thukham hilh siate leh Pharisee mite in gimna na thuak ding uhhi. Note pen leikang tawh a kizut manin a pualam a hoih mahmah tawh kibang napi-in a sungah misi guh leh a kihhuai nin nam khempeuh a omna hankhuk tawh na kibang uhhi. 28 Tua mah bangin note zong mite' muhin mihoih mahmah bang napi-in na sung tawng taktak uhah mawhna leh kineihkhemna bek a om hi.

Tua hun laitakin Tuiphumpa Johan' nungzuite leh Pharisee mite in an a tang uhhi. Zeisu kiangah mi pawlkhat hong pai-in, "Banghangin Tuiphumpa Johan' nungzuite leh Pharisee mite' nungzuite in an tang uh a, nangma nungzuite in tanglo se ahi uhhiam?" ci-in a dong uhhi. 19 Zeisu in, "Mo pawi a siim mite in an nelo dingin um na hi uhhiam? Zineipa tawh a omkhawm sung uh an neloin omlo ding uhhi. 20 Ahi zongin amaute kiang panin zineipa a kipaikhiatpih hun hong tung ding a, tua hun a tun' ciangin an neloin a om ding uhhi.

Pharisee mi pawlkhat hong pai uh a, amah a mawhsak theihna ding uh a deihna-in, "Mi khat in a zi a mathei ding mah ahi hiam?" ci-in a dong uhhi. 3 Zeisu in, "Moses in bang thu hong pia ahi hiam?" ci-in a dot ciangin amaute in,

Tua ciangin Levi in ama inn-ah Zeisu vakna annek pawipi bawl a, annekna sabuai-ah siahdong dang tampite leh midangte zong tawh a tukhawm uhhi. 30 Pharisee mite leh amau sung panin Thukham hilh siate, nungzuite tungah phun uh a, "Banghangin siahdongte leh thukham khial mite tawh an nekhawm na hi uhhiam?" a ci uhhi. 31 Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Cidamte in siavuan kisamlo uh a, cina mite bek in kisam uhhi.

Pharisee mite khat in a inn-ah anne dingin Zeisu sam a, Zeisu zong pai-in anne dingin a tu hi. 37 Tua khuasungah a paktat numei khat om hi. Pharisee mipa' inn-ah Zeisu in anne-in a omna thu a zak ciangin paknamtui suangngo thawl a dim khat hong paipihin,
Sabbath ni khatin Pharisee mi upa khat' inn-ah anne dingin Zeisu pai a, mite in amah encik uhhi.

Amaute hoih kisa mahmahin, midang khempeuh a simmawhbawl mite tungah Zeisu in zong thugentehna khat gen a, 10 "Thungen dingin biakinn-ah mi nih a pai uhhi. Khat pen Pharisee mi hi a, a khat pen siahdongpa a hihi.

"Thukham hilh siate na batkhak lohna dingun kidawm un. Amaute in puantualpi silhnuam uh a, mihon lakah a kizahtak hopih ding deihin, kikhopna innsung leh pawi lakah a om uh ciangin uliante' tutna mun hoihte bekah tunuam uhhi. 47 Meigong numeite tungah nuamtaksa-in, khemin a neihsateng uh laksak uh a, mite in mihoih a sakna ding uh a deihna-un thu saupipi a ngen uhhi. Amau' kineihkhemna tawh kizui-in a gimthuak ding uh lianzaw ding hi," a ci hi.

Amaute in Pharisee mite kiangah tua mittaw ngeipa a paipih uhhi. 14 Zeisu in buan bawlin a mit a vaksak ni pen Sabbath ni a hihi. 15 Pharisee mite in tua mipa in khua a muhtheih kikna zia thu dong leuleu uhhi. Amah in, "Tua mipa in ka mitah buan hong nuh a, ka mai ka phiat leh khua ka mu theikik hi," a ci hi. 16 Pharisee mi pawlkhat in, "Amah in Sabbath ni tanglo ahih manin Pasian kiang panin hong pai mi hilo ding hi," a ci uhhi. Ahi zongin pawlkhatte in, "A gamta khial mi in Banghangin hih bangin na lamdang bawlthei ding ahi hiam?" ci leuleu ahih manin mite' ngaihsutna kituaklo hi. 17 Tua ahih manin Pharisee mite in mittawpa kiangah, "Ka mit khua hong musak hi, ci na hih manin amah kua hi dingin ngaihsun na hi hiam?" ci-in a dotkik uh ciangin, "Amah kamsang khat hi ding hi," ci-in a dawng hi.

Leitung pian' cila kipanin pian'pih mittaw khua a musak thei a omlam kiza ngei nailo hi. 33 Tua ahih manin Pasian kiang panin hong pai hi kei leh hih bang hih theilo ding hi," ci-in a dawng hi. 34 Tua ciangin amaute in, "Mawhna bulomtang sung panin suakin a khangkhia mipa in kote tungah thu hong hilhsawm na hi hiam?" ci-in tua mittaw ngeipa a hawlkhia uhhi. 35 Hih mipa a kihawlkhiatna thu Zeisu in za ahih manin amah a muh ciangin, "Mihing Tapa na um hiam?" ci-in a dong hi. 36 Amah in, "Amah ka uptheihna dingin amah kua ahi hiam?" a ci hi. 37 Zeisu in, "Amah na mukhin a, nang tawh a kiho mipa ahi hi," a cih ciangin 38 amah in, "Topa aw, ka hong um hi," ci-in Zeisu a bia hi. 39 Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Mittawte in khua a muhtheihna ding leh khua mu thei-a kineite mittaw a battheihna dingin leitungah thukhen dingin a hong pai ka hi hi," a ci hi. 40 Ama kiangah a om Pharisee mi pawlkhat in hih bangin a thugenna a zak uh ciangin, "Kote zong a mittaw-in hong ngaihsun na hi hiam?" ci-in a dong uhhi. 41 Zeisu in, "A mittaw hi le uh cin mawhna tawh na kipelh ding uhhi. Ahi zongin khua mu thei ung, ci na hih manun na mawhna uh a ngei mahin a omlai ahi hi," ci-in a dawng hi.
Ahi zongin Pasian in mipilte a maizumsakna dingin mihaite hong teel a, mi thahatte a maizumsakna dingin mi thaneemte a hong teel hi.

Ahi zongin Khasiangtho a neilo mite in Pasian' Khasiangtho in a hong piak nate sang theilo uhhi. Khasiangtho a nei mite bek in theithei uh ahih manin amaute in tel theilo uh a, amau-a' dingin a haihuai thu khat ahi lel hi.

A maitang panin a vangtaang a beilam Israel mite in a muhkhak ding uh a deih lohna-in Moses in a maitang puan tawh a liah bangin a gamtate ka hi kei uhhi. 14 Amaute' lungsim khauh ahih manin tudongin bangmah thei tuanloin om uh a, thuciamna lui laibu a sim uh ciangin puan tawh liah bangmahin bangmah mu theilo, thei theilo uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh mi khatpeuh Christ tawh a kipawl ciang bekin a muhtheihna dingin a kiliahna puan a kilakhia pan a hihi. 15 Tuhun dongin amaute in Moses Thukham laibu a sim uh ciangin liahna puan in a lungsim uh a liah lai hi. 16 Ahi zongin Laisiangtho in, "Topa' mai-ah Moses a pai ciangin a kiliahna puan a lakhia hi," a cih mah bangin Topa lamah mi khatpeuh a kihei ciangin a liah puan kilakhia hi.
Adah in tapa Jabal nei hi. Amah pen puanbukte sungah tengin ganhing a neite' pian'na pupi a hihi. 21 A sanggampa' min Jubal hi a, laia lasakna leh tamngai tumte khempeuh' pian'na pupi a hihi.

Tua ciangin Moses leh Israel mite in { Topa' } tungah hih la sa uh a, "{ Topa } phatna la ka sa ding hi. Amah in minthangin zo khin a, amah in sakol leh a tuangpa tuipi sungah a lawn hi. 2 { Topa}, kei a hong hupa hi a, keimah hong honkhiapa a hihi. Amah, keima Pasian hi a, amah ka phat ding hi. Ka pa' Pasian hi a, amah ka liansak ding hi.

Tua ahih manin Aaron' sanggamnu Miriam in a khutah khuang khat tawi hi. Ama nungah numeite khempeuh laamin khuang tawh a zui uhhi. 21 Miriam in amaute la sak hi: "{ Topa } la sak un. Amah in minthangin zo khin a, amah in sakol leh a tung tuangte, tuipi sungah a lawn hi," a ci hi.
Ngai un, kumpite aw, na bil uh ngat un, uliante aw. { Topa } tungah la ka sa ding a, Israel-te' Pasian, { Topa' } tungah la ngaih ka sa ding hi.

Tua ciangin David leh Israel mite khempeuh in { Topa' } mai-ah a tha neih zahun la sa-in, laia khausai lasaknate, harp khausai lasaknate, khuangneute, kuangtuahte, leh daltuahte tumin lungdamin a lam uhhi.

Tua ciangin Kumpi David kiangah, "Pasian' Thuciamna Singkuang hangin { Topa } in Obededom innkuan leh ama neih khempeuh thupha pia hi," ci-in kigen hi. Tua ahih ciangin David pai-in Obededom' inn panin David khuapi-ah lungdamna tawh Pasian' Thuciamna Singkuang paipihto hi. 13 { Topa' } Thuciamna Singkuang a puate kal guk a suan khit ciangin amah in a puate tawlkhat khawlsakin bawngtal khat leh bawngno thau khat biakna-in a pia hi. 14 Tua ciangin a tha neih khempeuh tawh { Topa' } mai-ah David lam hi. David in saihadial siampipuan khat silh hi. 15 Tua ahih ciangin David leh Israel mi khempeuh in otna leh saki tumna awging tawh { Topa' } Thuciamna Singkuang paipihto uhhi.

a tapa Shimea, a tapa Haggiah, leh a tapa Asaiah ahi uhhi. 31 { Topa' } biakbuk sungah Thuciamna Singkuang a tawlngak khit ciangin tua sungah lasak nasep a ukin David in a koih hih mite a hihi. 32 Solomon in Jerusalem-ah { Topa' } Biakinn a lam ciangdong amaute in kikhopna puanbuk ahi biakbuk mai-ah lasak na sem uh a, amaute in a nasep uh a hunhun a banbanin sem uhhi.

Amaute in harp lasakna khat ciat leh Pasian' mi siangthote in thungetna-in a zat uh paknamtui a dimin a om paknamtui beel khat ciat a tawi uhhi. 9 Amaute in la thak khat sa uh a, "Nang Tuuno, tua laizial a lakhia ding leh a ciamtehnate a lakhia dingin na kilawm hi. Nang hong kigo khin ahih manin mi namkim leh pau namkim a pau mite sung panin na sisan tawh Pasian-a' dingin mite na lei khin a, 10 Pasian' na a sem dingin siampi za leh kumpi za na pia a, amaute in leitung ukin a om ding uhhi," a ci uhhi.

Amaute in nakpi takin la sa uh a, "A kigo Tuuno in vangliatna leh hauhna, pilna leh thahatna, pahtawina, minthan'na, leh phatna, a ngah dingin kilawm hi," a ci uhhi. 13 Tua ciangin vantung, leitung, leinuai, tuipi sung leh mun khempeuhah a om nuntakna a nei khempeuh in la a sakna uh ka za a, amaute in, "Tokhom tungah a tupa leh Tuuno in phatna, pahtawina, minthan'na leh vangliatna, ngah tawntung ta hen," a ci uhhi.

Tokhom, ganhing lite, leh upate' lam nga-in tua mihonpite in la thak khat a sa uhhi. Tua la pen leitungah a kitankhiasa mi tul za leh tul sawmli leh tul lite simloh kuamah dang in sa theilo uhhi. 4 Hih mite in numei tawh paktatna gamta ngei nailo uh a, paubaan'na a neilote ahi uhhi. Amaute in Tuuno a paina peuhpeuhah zui uh a, midang khempeuh sung panin a kitankhiasa, Pasian leh Tuuno tungah a kipia masa mite ahi uhhi.

Tua ciangin mei tawh a kihel limlang peekpi kiphah tuipi tawh a kibang ka mu hi. Ganhing, a lim, leh a min nambat tawh a kipiasa a zote, Pasian' lasakna harpte tawi-in tuipi tawh a kibang gei-ah a ding uhhi. 3 Amaute in Pasian' nasem Moses la leh Tuuno la sa uh a, "A Vanglian Topa Pasian aw, na nasepnate lamdangin lian mahmah hi. Khang tawntunga Kumpipa aw, na nasepnate-ah thumanin na thutang hi. 4 Topa aw, nang, kua in hong kihtalo ding a, na liatna hong phatlo ding ahi hiam? Nang bek na siangtho hi. Thumanin na sepnate mi khempeuh in mu uh ahih manin minam khempeuh nang kiangah hong pai-in, na mai-ah hong bia ding uhhi," a ci uhhi.

Tua khit ciangin vantungah mihonpi a kikona awging tawh a kibang khat ka za a, "Pasian phat un! Hotkhiatna, minthan'na leh vangliatna pen eite' Pasian-a' a hihi. 2 A thukhennate thumanin thutang a, a paktatna tawh leitung mi khempeuh a siasak, a paktatnu tungah thu khen khinta a, ama nasemte a thahsakna hangin ama tungah a phu la khinta hi," a ci uhhi. 3 Tua ciangin khatvei kiko kik leuleu uh a, "Pasian phat un! Tua khuapi a katna khu tatsat loin van lamah khuto tawntung hi," a ci uhhi. 4 Tua ciangin upa sawmnihlelite leh ganhing lite in tokhom tungah a tu Pasian mai-ah kunin bia uh a, "Amen! Pasian phat un!" a ci uhhi. 5 Tua ciangin tokhom panin aw khat hong ging a, "Amah a kihta a lian a neu mite, leh ama nasem khempeuhte aw, eite' Pasian phat un," a ci hi.

Eite, ‘Khuapi sungah lut ni,’ ci lehang, khuapi sungah kialpi om a, tua lai-ah i si ding hi. Hih lai-ah tu lehang lah eite i si veve ding hi. Tua ahih ciangin tu-in hong pai un. Syria-te' giahphualah va pai ni. Amaute in eite hong hingkhawi leh eite i nungta ding a, ahih hangin amaute in eite hong that leh zong a si veve ding mah ihi lel hi," kici uhhi.
Egypt gam panin note a hong lakhia, { Topa } na Pasian uh ka hihi. Na kam uh a golin ka un, keimah in kong dimsak ding hi.

Na lungsim khempeuh tawh { Topa } muang in la, nang' theihna suang kei in. 6 Na hihna khempeuhah amah phawk in. Tua hi leh lampi man amah in hong lak ding hi. 7 Nangmah a pilin kingaihsun tawm kei in la, { Topa } zahtakin a sia peel in.
Midangte' leiba lohsak dingin kamciamin leiba tavuan lakha kei un.
Midangte kihtakna in hong lunghimawhsak a, { Topa } muan'na in hong lungmuangsak hi.

Sumbawlna dingin na sumte zang in. Ni khat ni peuh teh a meet na ngah ding hi. 2 Na sumbuk vante mun sagih-ah ahi a, mun giat-ah ahi zongin khen kawikawi in. Hih leitungah bang thusia hong piang ding cih na theikhol kei hi. 3 Meii sungah tui a tamluat ciangin leitungah guah-in hong zusuk a, singkung khatpeuh a puk ciangin a pukna san sanah om paisuak hi. 4 Huih leh guah ngakin khuahun hoih dong a ngak mi in khaici tuh ngeilo ding a, an zong la ngeilo ding hi. 5 Nupi gai khat sungah nuntakna thak bangci kipat hiam, ci-in na theihzawhloh mah bangin na khempeuh a bawl Pasian' nasepna na theizo ngei kei ding hi. 6 Zingsanga kipan khaici tuh in la, nitak dong mateng khawl kei in. A vekpi-in a po kim ding ahi a, a khat sia-in, a khat a po ding ahi zongin na theihkholh bangmah omlo hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } in kong cihin-ah, mailamah lametna note kong piakkik ding, na siatna ding uhhiloin na phattuamna ding uh geelna ka neihte kei bek in ka thei hi.

Ama singlamteh mah puatawm lopi-in ka nung hong zuite kei tawh kilawmlo hi. 39 Hih leitung nuntakna a hon nuamte in a nuntakna taktak taanlawh ding a, keima hangin a nuntakna a taanlawhte in a nuntakna taktak a ngah ding uhhi.

Tua ciangin Peter in, "Topa aw, nang na hihtakpi leh, tui tung tawnin nang kiangah kei zong hong paisak in," a ci hi. 29 Zeisu in, "Hong pai in," a cih ciangin Peter zong gunkuang tung panin kumkhia a, Zeisu' omna lam manawhin tui tungah a pai hi.
Ahi zongin Zeisu in amaute enin, "Mihingte' hihzawh ding hilo mah hi; ahi zongin Pasian in na khempeuh hihthei hi," a ci hi.

"Inn panin khualzin dingin a paikhia mipa tawh zong kibang hi. Amah in a nasemte samin, a neihsateng a nasemte' kep dingin a ap hi. 15 Amau' siamna tawh kizui-in khat tungah tul nga, khat tungah tul nih, khat tungah tul khat a ap khit ciangin a zinkhia hi. 16 Tul nga a ngahpa in sum bawlna-in zangpah a, a meet tul nga mah a ngahthuah hi. 17 Tul nih a ngahpa in zong a meet tul nih mah a ngahthuah hi. 18 Ahi zongin tul khat a ngahpa in leisung to-in a topa' sum a selcip hi. 19 "Hun sawtpi khit ciangin tua nasemte' topa hong ciahkik a, a nasemte tawh a sum thu a siangsak uhhi. 20 Tul nga a ngahpa in a dang tul nga mah hong tawithuahin, ‘Topa aw, kei tungah tul nga nong ap hi. Hih lai-ah tul nga mah ka meetsak hi,’ hong cih ciangin 21 a topa in, ‘Hoih mahmah hi; a hoih a citak nasempa aw, a tawmno na zekna-ah siam na hih manin a tampi tak ka hong zeksak ding hi. Hong pai in; kei tawh nuamsa khawm ni,’ a ci hi. 22 Tua ciangin tul nih a ngahpa zong hong pai-in, ‘Topa aw, kei tungah tul nih nong ap hi. Hih lai-ah tul nih mah ka na meetsak hi,’ hong cih ciangin 23 a topa in, ‘Hoih mahmah hi; a hoih a citak nasempa aw, a tawmno na zekna-ah siam na hih manin a tampi tak ka hong zeksak ding hi. Hong pai in; kei tawh nuamsa khawm ni,’ a ci hi. 24 Tul khat a ngahpa zong hong pai-in, ‘Topa aw, nang pen na seploh na bawl lohnapi-ah na a deih, mi genhak mahmah na hihna ka hong thei hi. 25 Tua ahih manin ka hong kihta a, leisungah na sum tul khat ka seel hi. Tu-in hih lai-ah na sumzah mah om hi,’ a hong cih ciangin 26 a topa in, ‘A hoihlo, a thadah nasempa aw, ka seploh ka bawl lohnapi-ah ka deihlam hong thei na hih leh, 27 sumkholna-ah ka sum na koihsak lecin hoih ding hi. Tua hi leh tu-a ka hong tun'kik ciangin a bulpi leh a meet ka ngahkhawm ding hi. 28 Tua ahih manin ama tung panin a tul khat laksak unla, tul sawm a neipa tungah piathuah un. 29 Banghang hiam cihleh a neisate kipiathuah ding a, hau semsem ding hi. Ahi zongin a neilote tung panin a neihsa sunsun nangawn kilaksak ding hi. 30 Bangmahin a kimanglo hih nasempa ahih leh pualam khuamialna lakah lawnkhia un. Tua lai-ah kapin a hagawi ding hi,’ ci hi.

Tua ciangin Zeisu in mihonpite leh a nungzuite ama kiangah sam a, "Mi khatpeuh ka nungzui a suahnop leh ama deihna bangin gamta nawnloin a singlamteh kisuanin hong zui ding hi. 35 Hih a leitung nuntakna a hu nuamte in a nuntakna bulpi nangawn tawh suplawh ding a, keima hang leh lungdamna thu hangin a nuntakna a suplawhte in a nuntakna bulpi huzo ding hi. 36 Mi khatpeuh in hih leitung khempeuh a ngah hangin a nuntakna bulpi suplawh leh bang phattuamna om ahi hiam?

Mi khatpeuh in inn lianpi khat lamding a sawm leh, ka zo zo ding hiam cih a theihna dingin a bei dingzah tuat masa hi. 29 Tua bangin tuat masa kei leh tua inn a khuampite a phuhkhit ciangin zawhlohpi-in khawl ding a, tua inn a kizolo a mu mite khempeuh in amah nuihsan ding uhhi. 30 ‘Hih mipa in inn lamding kipan napi-in zo zolo hi,’ ci ding uhhi. 31 Galkap tul sawm a nei kumpi khat in galkap tul sawm nih tawh a hong kuan kumpi khat do dingin a kithawi leh, tua kumpipa a dozo ding mahin i hat takpi hiam ci-in ngaihsun masa ding hi. 32 A zo zo ding ahih vet kei leh, tua kumpipa a hong tun' ma, a gamla-ah a om lai-in, ama kiangah kamtaite sawl ding a, kilemna ding thu gensak ding hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, "Na gunkuang taklam pang uhah na ngen uh paii le uh cin na man ding uhhi," a ci hi. Amaute in zong a ngen uh paii uh a, ngasa tam awk lua ahih manin a ngen uh a kaizo kei uhhi.
Hihteng bang ahih khit ciangin bang gen ding om nawn ahi hiam? Pasian in eite hong koppih peuh leh kua in eite hong zo zo ding ahi hiam?

Tua ahih ciangin hoihtakin kingaihsunin gamta unla, mihaite bang hiloin mipilte bangin gamta un. 16 Tuhun pen hun hoihlo hun ahih manin na hun neih khempeuh uh a hoih lamin zang un. 17 Tua ahih manin hai ommawk kei unla, Topa in bang a semdingin hong deih ahi hiam, ci-in kan un.
Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in eite tungah meidawina lungsim hong guan'lo a, thahatna, ki-itna, pumpi ki-ukzawhna lungsim hong guan' hizaw hi.
Tua ahih manin thaman lianpi a hong ngahsak thei na lungsim han'na uh na khahsuah kei un.

Sum deihluatna tawh na kipelhna dingun na nuntakna uhah kikem unla, na neihzah uh tawh lungkim un. Pasian in, "Note ka hong nusia ngei kei ding a, ka hong tamasak ngei kei ding hi," hong ci hi. 6 Tua ahih manin kimuan'na lungsim tawh hangtakin, "Topa, kei hong huhpa hi a, ka lau kei ding hi. Kua in bang hong cihzo ding ahi hiam?" ci ngam ni.

Tuni ahih kei leh zingciangin tua khua tua khua-ah va pai-in, kum khat bang va omin, sumbawlin a meet tampi va ngah ni, a ci mite aw, ka thugen hong ngai dih un. 15 Note in, "Topa in hong thukimpih nak leh nungta-in tua bang tua bang i sem ding hi," na cihding uhhi bek hi.
Ahi zongin a meidawite, a lehtatte, a lampialte, mi thatte, a paktatte, aisante, milim biate, leh zuaugente omna ding mun pen sihna nihna ahi kat a kikhulna meiphualpi kuang sung ahi hi," a ci hi.

"Note in na leitang panun an na lak uh ciangin, na lonawl dongun la loin, an na lak khit uh ciangin a sangte zong na khawm kei ding uh a, mizawngte leh khualmi-a' dingin tuate na nusia ding uhhi; kei pen { Topa } na Pasian uh ka hi hi," a ci hi.
Citna tawh amah na pia ding uh a, amah na piak uh ciangin lungsim neihna na nei kei ding uhhi. { Topa } na Pasian un na sepna na hihna khempeuh uhah hih thu hangin note thupha hong pia ding hi.
Solomon in thunuama biakna-in { Topa' } tungah bawngtal tul sawmnih leh tul nih leh tuu tul za khat leh tul sawmnih a pia hi. Tua bangin kumpipa leh Israel mi khempeuh in { Topa' } biakinn a ap uhhi.

Tua gamsungah guah zulo ahih manin tawlkhat khit ciangin a lui a kang hi. 8 Tua ciangin Elijah kiangah { Topa' } thu hong tung a, 9 "Ding in la, Sidon mite' khua Zarefath-ah pai-in tua lai-ah om in. Tua lai-ah nangmah a hong vak dingin meigongnu khat thu ka piazo hi," a ci hi. 10 Tua ahih ciangin amah dingin Zarefath-ah a pai hi. Khuapi kulhkongpi a tun' ciangin, meigongnu khat in sing na tom hi. Amah in tuanu samin, "Ka dawn theihna dingin beel khat sungah tui tawm hong paipih in," a ci hi. 11 Tuanu in paipih dingin a kisak laitakin, amah in tuanu samin, "Anlum neu khat hong tawi kawm in," a ci hi. 12 Tua ciangin amah in, "{ Topa } na Pasian a nungta ahih mah bangin emsa bangmah ka nei kei a, beel sungah annel khutdim khat leh um sungah sathau tawmno khat bek om hi. Tu-in keimah leh ka tapa-a' dingin tuate bawlin kote in ka nek theihna dingun singkang nih khawng a tom ka hi a, tua ciangin a si ta ding ka hi uhhi," a ci hi. 13 Tua ciangin Elijah in ama kiangah, "Lunghimawh kei in; pai in la na gensa bangin an hong bawl in. Kei-a' dingin mohneu khat hong bawlsak masa-in kei kiangah hong paipih in la, tua khit ciangin nang leh na tapa-a' ding bawl in. 14 Banghang hiam cihleh Israel Pasian, { Topa } in hih bangin ci hi: ‘{ Topa } in leitungah guah a zuksak ni matengin beel sunga annel beilo ding a, um sunga sathau zong kiam ngeilo ding hi,’ ci hi," a ci hi. 15 Tua ciangin amah pai-in Elijah' gensa bangin hih hi. Tuanu, leh amah, leh tuanu' innkuan in ni tampi sung ne uhhi. 16 Elijah' tung tawnin { Topa' } thugen bangin beel sunga annel beilo a, um sunga sathau zong kiam ngeilo hi.

Tua ciangin Israel upate khempeuh hong pai uh a, Levi mite in Thuciamna Singkuang la uhhi. 5 Tua ciangin amaute in Thuciamna Singkuang, leh kikhopna buk, leh puanbuk sunga om a siangtho umlebeel khempeuh puato uh a, siampite leh Levi mite in tuate puato uhhi. 6 Tua ciangin Kumpi Solomon leh ama mai-ah a kikhawm Israel-te khempeuh Thuciamna Singkuang mai-ah om uh a, biakna-in tuu leh bawngtal tampi tak pia uh ahih manin a phazah kisim zolo hi.
Mi pawlkhat in sum zang ziahziah napi-in hau semsem uh a, mi pawlkhat cil mahmah napi, zawng semsem hi.
A cingh mihaupa' maipha ngah ding ki-ut ciat a, na a piak mi khempeuh ama lawm a hihi.
Mizawngte tungah a piate in { Topa' } tungah a pia hi a, { Topa } in a cingin amaute tungah lohkik ding hi.
Na galte a gil a kial leh an pia in la, a dang a tak leh tui pia in. 22 Tua hi leh amau' maizumna dingin a bawl na hi a, { Topa } in nang tungah thaman hong pia ding hi
Mizawng a huhte cimawh ngeilo ding a, huhna a pia nuamlote in samsiatna ngah ding hi.
Bangmahin a kimanglo piaknate hong paipih nawn kei un. Paknamtui halna ka kih hi. Khadet ni, Sabbath ni, leh thupi takin na kikhopnate uh mawhna tawh kidim ahih manin ke'n ka thuakzo kei hi.

Inn sungah amaute lut uh a, naungek leh a nu Mary a mu uhhi. Amaute khukdin'in tua naungek a biak khit uh ciangin a vanpuakte uh suahkhia uh a, kham, saledi paknamtui, leh myrrh paknamtuite, letsongin a pia uhhi.
Mi khat peuhpeuh in na khat peuhpeuh hong nget leh na pia in la, nang kiang panin na a hong leitawi mite na pia in.

"Biakna tawh kizomin na hoih khat peuhpeuh na sep uh ciangin mite' phat ding deihna tawh a kilang theithei dingin na sepkhak lohna dingun na kingaihsun un. Tua bangin gamta le uh cin, vantungah a om na Pa uh kiang panin thaman na ngah kei ding uhhi. 2 "Tua ahih manin mi cimawhte tungah huhna na piak uh ciangin, mite in a phat ding uh a deihna tawh a kineihkhem mite in kikhopna innsung leh kongzing lakah a kilang theithei-in a hih uh bangin na hih kei un. Tua bangin a hih mite in thaman a ngah khinta ahihna thu limtakin na phawk un. 3 Ahi zongin note in mi cimawhte citna tawh na huh uh ciangin na lawm naihuai pente uh nangawn in hong theihlohna dingun pia unla, 4 kuamah theisak kei un. Tua hi leh kuama muhlohin na gamtatna uh a mu na Pa un note tungah thaman hong pia ding hi.

"Nget in ne-in a kekseu theihna, gutate in luhin a guktheihna hih leitungah na sum uh khol kei un. 20 Nget in a nek theihlohna, a kekseu theihlohna, gutate in luhin a guk theihlohna mun vantungah note-a' dingin kholzaw un. 21 Banghang hiam cihleh na sum omna uhah na lungsim uh om tawntung ding hi.

Zeisu in, "Mi cingtaak na hihnop leh pai-in na neihsate va zuak in la, na sum khotte, mizawngte tungah va pia lecin, vantungah sum na hau ding hi. Tua ciangin hong pai in la kei hong zui in," a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Kumpipa in a taklamah a om mite kiangah, ‘Ka Pa in thupha a piak mite aw, hong pai ta un. Leitung piancil a kipanin note-a' dingin a kibawlkholsa gamnuam hong luah un. 35 Banghang hiam cihleh ka gilkial laitakin an nong pia uh a, ka dangtak laitakin tui nong pia uh a, khualmi ka hih laitakin zin nong do uh a, 36 puan neiloin ka om laitakin puan nong guan' uh a, ka cinat laitakin nong veh uh a, ka thongkiat laitakin nong hawh uhhi,’ a ci ding hi. 37 Tua ciangin mihoihte in, ‘Topa aw, cikin na gilkial hong mu-in an hong pia a, cikin na dangtak hong mu-in tui hong pia ka hi uhhiam? 38 Cikin khualmi na hih laitakin hong mu-in zin hong do a, cikin puan neilo na hih laitakin hong mu-in puan hong guan' ka hi uhhiam? 39 Cikin cina na hih laitakin hong mu-in hong veh a, cikin thongkia na hih laitakin hong mu-in hong hawh ka hi uhhiam?’ a ci ding uhhi. 40 Tua ciangin Kumpipa in amaute kiangah, ‘Note kiangah kong genin-ah: Hih ka sanggamte a neupen khat nangawn na limbawl uh ciangin kei tungah a hong bawl na hi uhhi,’ ci-in a dawng ding hi. 41 "Tua ciangin a veilamah a om mite kiangah, ‘Pasian in a samsiat mite aw, keima kiang panin paikhia unla, Dawimangpa leh a nungzuite-a' dingin a kibawl meikuang tawntung sungah pai un. 42 Banghang hiam cihleh ka gilkial laitakin an nong pia kei uh a, ka dangtak laitakin tui nong pia kei uh a, 43 khualmi ka hih laitakin zin nong do kei uh a, puan ka neihloh laitakin puan nong guan' kei uh a, ka cinat laitakin nong veh kei uh a, ka thongkiat laitakin nong hawh kei uhhi,’ a ci ding hi. 44 Tua ciangin amaute in zong, ‘Topa aw, cikin na gilkial hong mu a, cikin na dangtak hong mu a, cikin khualmi na hih hong mu a, cikin na puan neihloh hong mu a, cikin na cinat hong mu a, cikin na thongkiat hong mu a, cikin kote in nang hong huh nuamlo ka hi uhhiam?’ a ci ding uhhi. 45 Tua ciangin amah in, ‘Note kiangah kong genin-ah: Hih mite a neupen khat nangawn na huhloh uh ciangin kei a hong huhlo na hi uhhi,’ ci-in a dawng ding hi. 46 Tua ahih ciangin tawntung gimthuakna sungah amaute pai ding uh a, mihoihte ahih leh nuntak tawntungna sungah lut ding uhhi," a ci hi.
Na Topa Pasian uh, na lungsim khempeuh, na nuntakna khempeuh, na pilna khempeuh, leh na thahatna khempeuh uh tawh na it un, a cihna a hihi.

Biakinn sumpi khiatna kuang gei-ah Zeisu tu a, mihonte in sumpi a khiat laitakun a en hi. A haute in tampipi hong khia uhhi. 42 A zawng meigong numei khat zong hong pai a, sumnen tang nih hong khia hi. 43 Tua ciangin a nungzuite sam a, "Adangte khempeuh sangin hih mizawng meigongnu in tam khia zaw hi. 44 Banghang hiam cihleh adangte in a neihval a lamval sung panun a khia uh ahi hi; ahi zongin amah zawng mahmah napi-in ama kivakna ding nangawn sitloin a neih khempeuh a khiakhin ahi hi," a ci hi.

Midangte tungah pia un. Tua hi leh Pasian in note tungah zong hong pia ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh midangte na piakna uh tawh kizui-in a henhen, a tahtah, a dimletin Pasian in note tungah hong pia ding hi," a ci hi.

Na neihsa uh zuak unla, mizawngte tungah tua sumte na pia un. Note-a' dingin a sia theilo sumkholna na bawl unla, gutate in a luh zawhlohna, leikha in zong a nek zawhlohna, cikmahin a kiam ngei hetlohna ding mun vantungah na sumte uh na khol un.

Tua bangin anvakna pawi na bawl ciangin mizawngte, khezawte, khebaite, leh mittawte sam in. 14 Amaute in nang hong thukkik zolo ding uh ahih manin nang-a' dingin a lungdamhuai hong hi ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh sihna panin mihoihte a thawhkik hun ciangin Pasian in nang tungah hong thukkik ding hi," a ci hi.
"A tawmno-ah a diktatte pen a tamah zong diktat uh a, a tawmno-ah a citaklote pen a tamah zong citaklo uhhi.

Zeisu a khuadak leh mihaute in biakinn sumkuang sungah a letsong uh a khiatna, 2 leh a zawng meigong khat in zong sumnen tang nih a khiat a mu hi. 3 Tua ciangin amah in, "Ke'n kong cihin-ah, hih a zawng meigongnu in a dangte khempeuh sangin tamzaw a khia hi. 4 Banghang hiam cihleh adangte in a zatval uh sumte a khia uh a hihi. Ahi zongin hih numei a zawng mahmah hinapi-in a nuntakna ding khempeuh a khia khin ahi hi," a ci hi.

Topa Zeisu mahmah in, ‘Ngahna sangin piak khiatna-ah lungdamna lianzaw hi,’ a cihna phawkkawmin nakpi takin nasepna tawh na khempeuhah a zawngkhalte huh ding hi hang, ci-in note kiangah kong lak khinzo hi," ci-in a vaikhak hi.
Nuntakna sang mite leh nuntakna niam mite, mipilte leh mihaite, a kuamah peuh ka huh ding ka tavuan ahih manin,

Tua ahih manin Pasian in hehpihna hong piakkhongna tawh kizui-in i siamna a tuamtuamte zang ciat ni. I siamna pen Pasian' thu gentheihna ding siamna ahih leh i upna neihzah tawh kizui-in gen ni. 7 Nasepna ding siamna a nei ihih leh na sem ni. Hilhna ding siamna a nei ihih leh hilh ni. 8 Midangte hanthot theihna ding siamna a nei ihih leh midangte hanthawn ni. Midangte hoptheihna ding a nei ihih leh citna taktak tawh hawm ni. Makaih theihna ding siamna a nei ihih leh hoihtakin na sem ni. Midangte hehpih theihna ding a nei ihih leh maitaii takin hih ni.
Na Christian pihte uh a kisapna bangin na neihsate uh na hawm unla, zin leh leengla do a siam mite na hita un.
Ka neih khempeuh midangte tungah pia-in, Pasian' nasepna hangin kihaltumna ka thuak ahi zongin itna ka neih kei leh ka phattuamna bangmah omlo hi.
Piaknopna lungsim na neih nak uh leh na neihlohnate uh siksan hiloin na neihna uh tawh kizui-in na piak uh Pasian in hong sang ding hi.

Note in na phawk ding uh thu panin: Khaici tawm a vawhte in tawm mah la ding a, tampi a vawhte in tampi mah la ding uhhi. 7 Pasian in piaknopna lungsim tawh a pia mite bek deih ahih manin, a kuamah peuh in na lungsim sung uhah na ngaihsutsa zah ciat uh na pia unla, pia nuamlopipi leh sawlzawh thu bek tawh na pia kei un.

Note ka hong huhtheihna dingin lungdam takin ka neih khempeuh kong piaknop banah keima pumpi mahmah zong ka hong kipia nuam hi. Tuazah takin ka hong itna pen itlohna tengin hong nei zawsop ding na hi uhhiam?
Kote in amaute lakah a om mizawngte ka phawkding uh hong kal bek a, tua lah kei zong ngaihsut penin ka neihsa thu mah a hihi.
Note' phattuamna ding bek ngaihsun kei unla, midangte' phattuamna ding ngaihsutsak zaw un.
Sanggamte aw, a thadah mite hilh unla, a meidawite hanthawnin, a zawngkhal mite huh unla, hihbang mite ngongbawl kei un.
Mi khatpeuh in a beh a phung, a diakdiakin a innkuansung mite a vak nop kei leh a upna a nusia hita a, thu umlo mite sangin siazaw lai hi.

Tuhuna a hau mite kisatheikha loin, a kiplo hauhnate muan' leh suan'in neikha loin, eite in nuamtakin i zat theihdingin citna tawh a hong pia Pasian a muan' a suan'na dingun na hilh in. 18. A hoih nate semin, gamtat pha-in, citna lungsim nei-in midangte a hopnopna dingun na hilh in. 19. Tua hi leh mailamah amaute' nuntakna ding bulpi taktak ahi neihsate, amau-a' dingin a khol mite ahi ding uhhi.

Pasian, a manloin gamta ngeilo ahih manin na Christian pihte uh a beisa hunah na huhna uh leh tudongin na huh laina uh tawh ama-a' dingin na nasepna uh leh amah na itna uh na lahnate uh hong mangngilh hetlo ding hi.
Khatlekhat tungah thuhoih kibawlin na kihuh ding uh mangngilh kei un. Hihbang gamtatnate pen Pasian a lungkimsak thei biakna a hihi.
A hoih thu leh na khempeuh, Pasian kiang panin hong pai hi a, vantung khuavak a Piangsakpa ahih manin amah kikheel ngeilo a, amah a kihei manin khua zong mial tuanlo hi.
Pa Pasian in a siangtho biakna citakin a ngaihsut thu in: Tagahte leh meigong numeite a haksatna uhah hoihtakin kemin, leitung siatnate tawh kisawhkha loin siangtho takin omna a hihi.

Gentehna-in, na mipih khat peuhpeuh uh annek tuidawn, nikten' puansilh neiloin haksapi-in om hen la, 16 note khat peuhpeuh in, ama pumpi kisapna bangmah pialopi-in, "Khualum gilvah takin om in," ci mawk lel le uh cin bang phattuamna om ding ahi hiam? 17 Tua ahih ciangin gamtatna in a zuilo upna guak pen a si a hihi. 18 Ahi zongin mi khatpeuh in, "Mi khat in upna nei a, adang khat in gamtatna nei hi," ci zenzen leh, gamtatna in a zuilo upna hong lak dih in; keimah in ahih leh ka upna ka gamtatna tawh ka hong lak ding hi, ka ci ding hi.
Pasian' piak na a zatsiamte bangin Pasian' kiang panin na ngah uh nate, midangte' phattuamna dingin na zang un.
Mi khat hau mahmah hen la, a Christian mipih a cimawhte mu napi-in huhna bangmah pianuam hetkei leh, banghangin amah in Pasian ka it hi, ci thei ding ahi hiam?

Tua ciangin Pasian in, "Eima lim, eimah hong sunin mihing bawl ni. Tuipi ngasate tung, huihlak vasate tung, ganhingte tung, leh leitunga a bokvakte khempeuh tungah ukna neisak ni," a ci hi. 27 Tua ahih ciangin Pasian in ama lim bangin mihing piangsakin, Pasian' lim bangin amah a piangsak hi. Amah in pasal leh numei a piangsak hi.
Mi a that peuhmahte pen, midangte in amah that ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in ama lim bangin mi bawl hi.
Amah in zi dang khat a lakthuah leh, a zi masa' annek, a puansilh, ahih kei leh lupkhopna ding thuneihna khiamlo ding hi.

Note in bilngongte phuisam loin, mittawte' mai-ah a puk theihna ding na na koih kei ding uh a, note in na Pasian uh na zahtak ding uhhi; kei pen { Topa } ka hihi. 15 "Note in thukhenna-ah thu a tangloin na khen kei ding uhhi. Mizawngte langgen loin, a liante' thu zuiloin, thumanna tawh na vengte uh thu na khen ding uhhi.

"Na gamsung uhah note lakah khualmi khat hong peem leh, ama tungah a manloin na gamta kei ding uhhi. 34 Note lakah a hong peem khualmite tualsung mi mah bangin na ngaihsun ding uh a, nomau mah bangin amaute na it ding uhhi; Banghang hiam cihleh note pen Egypt gam sungah khualmi na hi ngei uhhi; kei pen { Topa } na Pasian uh ka hihi.
"Na gei-a om na sanggampa zawngin, nangma tungah amahmah hong kizuak leh, sila bangin na na semsak kei ding hi.
Mihonpi-a' dingin ngeina khat om ding a, note leh note' lakah hong peem mi-a' dingin tawntung ngeina khat na khang tawntungun om ding hi. { Topa' } mai-ah note leh peemta mite na kibang ding uhhi.

"Tua hun laitakin na thukhente uh ka thuhilh a, ‘Na sanggamte uh thu neihte za unla, mi khat leh a sanggampa ahi a, amah tawh a om khualmipa tawh ahi zongin thu a mantakin khen un. 17 Thukhenna-ah angvan na nei kei ding uhhi. A neu leh a liante a kibangin a thu na ngai ding uh a, maitang zahtak tuam na nei kei ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh thukhenna pen Pasian-a' a hihi. Note-a' dingin a haksa lua thute kei kiangah nong paipih ding uh a, keimah in tua thu ka za ding hi,’ ka ci hi.
Mi khat in a pa' zidangte ten'pihlo ding a, a pa-a' ahi numei tawh mawhlo ding hi.
"Bawng in an a cil laitakin a muk na tuam kei ding uhhi.
‘Amah in a pa' tungah maizumna tun' ahih manin, a pa' zidang tawh a lumkhawm mipa in gimna ngah ta hen,’ ci ding uhhi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in, ‘Amen,’ ci ding uhhi.

Tua ciangin Samuel in kumpipa' thuneihna leh a nasepte mite kiangah gen a, amah in tuate laibu khat sungah gelhin Topa' mai-ah a koih hi. Tua ciangin Samuel in mi khempeuh amau' inn ciatah a ciahsak hi.
Tua ahih ciangin David in Israel-te khempeuh uk a, a mite khempeuh tungah thutang leh thuman a zang hi.

Tua ciangin Ammon in Tamar kiangah, "Na khut tung panin ka nek theihna dingin inndei sungah an hong paipih in," a ci hi. Tamar in a bawlsa mohphengte la-in inndei sung a sanggampa Ammon kiangah paipih hi. 11 Ahih hangin amah in a nek dingin ama kiang nai-ah a paipih ciangin, amah in tua numei lenin ama kiangah, "Hong pai in; kei tawh hong lum in ka sanggamnu aw," a ci hi. 12 Amah in dawngin, "Hilo hi, ka sanggampa aw, kei hong thatang hih kei in; Banghang hiam cihleh Israel sungah tua bangin kigamta lo hi. Hih bangin hai gamtat lua kei in. 13 Keimah in ka maizumna koi-ah seelcipzo ding ka hi hiam? Nang zong, Israel-te sungah mihai luate khat bang na hi ding hi. Tua ahih ciangin tu-in kong thum hi, kumpipa kiangah gen in; Banghang hiam cihleh amah in nang-a' dingin kei hong khaktanlo ding hi," a ci hi. 14 Ahih hangin amah in a thugen ngailo hi. Amah sangin hatzaw ahih manin thatanghat thu tawh hihin amah luppih hi. 15 Tua ciangin Ammon in nakpi takin Tamar mudah hi. Amah in a cil-a a itna zah sangin a muhdahna lianzaw hi. Tua ahih ciangin Ammon in ama kiangah, "Ding in, paikhia in," a ci hi. 16 Ahih hangin a numei in ama kiangah, "Hilo hi, ka sanggampa aw; Banghang hiam cihleh kei nong sawlkhiatna pen kei tungah nong hihsa thu sangin lianzaw hi," a ci hi. Ahih hangin a thu ngailo hi. 17 Amah in a nasem tangvalpa samin, "Ka omna panin hih numei koihkhia in la, ama nungah kongkhak kalh in," a ci hi. 18 Tuanu in puantualpi ban nei khat silh hi; Banghang hiam cihleh kumpipa' tanute in tua bangin puan silh hi. Tua ahih ciangin a nasempa in tuanu koihkhia-in ama nungah kongkhak kalh hi. 19 Tua ciangin Tamar in a lu tungah vut koihin ama silh puantualpi bansau balkek hi. Tua ciangin a lu tungah a khut koihin paikhia a, a paikawmin a gingin a kap hi. 20 Tua ciangin a sanggampa Absalom in ama kiangah, "Na sanggampa Ammon in nang hong bawlsia ahi hiam? Bangbang hita leh kilungnuamsak in, ka sanggamnu aw; amah pen na sanggampa ahi hi; hih thu na lungsimah koih kei in," a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin a sanggampa Absalom' inn-ah Tamar lungzuang khawngai-in a om hi. 21 Kumpi David in hih thute khempeuh a zak ciangin heh mahmah hi.

Tua thamloin Absalom in, "Gamsungah kei thukhen hi leng! Thu ahi a, a hang khat peuhpeuh ahi zongin a nei mi peuhmah kei kiangah hong pai ding a, keimah in ama tungah thu a tangin ka khen ding hi," a ci hi.
A ginalo mite leh pa a neilo mite tungah thuman unla, a thuakte leh a cimawhte' thu a manin khen un.

Sihna ding ngeina a bawl, a gilo gam ukte, nang tawh kipawl ding ahi hiam? 21 Amaute in thuman mihoihte thah sawm uh a, a mawhbaanglo mite sihna thuaksak uhhi. 22 Ahih hangin { Topa } pen keima munkip, keima Pasian, ka belh suangpi a suak khinta hi. 23 Amah in amau' mawhnate amau' tung mahah tungsak kikin, a gitlohna hangun amaute a maimangsak ding hi. { Topa, } i Pasian in amaute maimangsak ding hi.
Mizawngte bawlsiatna pen a piangsak Pasian simmawhna hi a, mizawngte tungah citna pen Pasian zahtakna a hihi.
A hau a zawng a kilamdan'na omlo a, a nih tuakun { Topa' } bawlsa ahi uhhi.
Midikte in mi cimawhte-a' ding thu khual uh a, migilote in tua bang thukhualna theilo uhhi.

Thu a gen theilo mite-a' dingin thu gensak in la, a huh ding a omlo mite pan'pih in. 9. Amau-a' ding thu genin thu a tangin khen in la, a zawng a cimawh mite amau-a' dingin a kilawm hamphatna ngahsak in.
Gamtat hoih ding kisin un. Thumanin gamta unla, kinetniamna kheel un. Pa neilote hu unla, meigong numei pan'pih un, ci hi.
Mimawhte sumgolh tawh khah a, midikte a mawhsakte in gimna ngah ta hen!

A cimawhte' thutang kimlai hei khiatsakin, keima mite sungah a zawngte' thuman sutkhia-in, meigong numeite' neihsa amau-a' ding a suahtheihna ding leh pa neilote' neihsa amau' nek dingin a bawl theihna dingun a manlo thukhensatna pia a, nenniamna thu a gelhte in gimna ngah ta uh hen!
Mihingte pen kham hoihte sangin a hoihzaw, minam pen Ofir gam khamte sangin a hoihzaw-in ka bawl ding hi.
Gitlohna lamah a hun bek a theithei kei uhhi. Tagah mite' phattuamna ding khualloin thu a manlopi-in khen uh a, mizawngte' tungah thumanlo uhhi.

{ Topa } in hih bangin ci hi: Ammon mite thumvei a khialh khit, a liveina hangin pelloin amaute gim ka pia ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh amaute in huaihamin gam a deihthuah manun Gilead gam simgawp uhhi.

{ Topa } in hih bangin ci hi: Israel mite thumvei a khialh khit, a liveina hangin pelloin amaute gim ka pia ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh amaute in leiba a loh zawhloh man bekun midik kimlai zuak uh a, khedap bu khat man a loh zawhloh man bekun mi cimawhte sila-in a zuak uhhi. 7 Amaute in mizawngte' lutang leivui lakah tuancil uh a, keima min siangtho a ninsak dingin biakinn-a numei paktatte kiangah tangvalte leh papite a pai uhhi. 8 Biakna tau gei khempeuhah amaute lum uh a, sum leitawina hangin a puan kepsakte uh a phah uhhi. Amaute in a Pasian uh' biakinn sungah leibate kiang pan a laksak uh leenggahzu a dawn uhhi.
Thutang lumletin thuman mite lei a den'na, note-a' dingin bangzahin nasia ding ahi hiam?

Note in thukhen zumah thutang a deihpa na mudah uh a, thuman a genpa na hua uhhi. 11 Note in mizawngte tuancilin, a an neihteng khempeuh uh laksak na hih manun, suangseek inn na lam hangun tua suang innsungah na tengkha kei ding uh a, leenggui lo hoih na neih hangun a leenggahzu na dawnkha kei ding uhhi. 12 Banghang hiam cihleh na khialhna tampite uh leh na mawhna tampite uh a vekin ka thei khin hi. Thuman mite gimsakin, sumgolh na la uh a, thukhenna zumah mizawngte' thu a manin na khen kei uhhi. 13 Tua ahih manin hih bang hunsiat hun laitakin thu ngaihsun thei mite, pauloin a om khikhe, lamdang sak ding hilo hi.

Mi cimawhte tuancil gawpin, gamsung mizawngte a susiagawp mite aw, hih thu ngai un: 5 Note in na lungsim sung uhah, "I ante i zuak theihna dingin zumkhak hun bei ding i ngaklah hi. I mangbuhte i zuaktheihna dingin cik ciangin Sabbath ni bei ding ahi hiam? I antehna seu neuseekin sum tampi i ngen nuam a, tawikhaina manlo zangin a hong leite i khem nuam hi. 6 Khedap bu khat man dingin mizawngte sila-in i zuak nuam a, i mangbuh hoihlote sum tampi i khawng nuam hi," na ci uhhi. 7 { Topa, } Israel Pasian kiciam a, "Na gamtatsiatnate uh ka mangngilh ngei kei ding hi.

Mun khempeuhah a om no mihingte aw, Topa in a hoih nate hong gen khinzo hi. Topa in note tung panin hong kalh thu in: Thuman thutang sem ding a, itna kip nei tawntungin, kiniamkhiatna tawh Pasian' thu man' ding a hihi.
"Note in thu a tangin khenin, khatlekhat tungah itna leh hehpihna kilakin,

Vanglian { Topa } in hih bangin ci hi: "Note tungah thukhen dingin ka hong pai ding hi; ai tawite, numei tawh a mawhte, a manlopi-a teci pangte, numeite' thaman piakna-ah khemna a zangte; meigong, tagah, leh gamdang mite a zawhthawh bawlte, leh kei hong zahtaklo mi khempeuhte' langkhatah thakhatin teci pangin thu ka khen ding hi.

Meigong numeite tungah nuamtaksa-in a neihsate laksakin zangmang uh a, mite in mihoih a saktheihna ding uh a deihna hangun thu saupipi a ngen uhhi. Amau' kineihkhemna tawh kizui-in a gimthuak ding uh lianzaw ding hi," a ci hi.
Note tungah ka hong piak thak thu in: Note khatlekhat na ki-it ding uh a hihi. Note ka hong it mah bangin note khatlekhat na ki-it un.
Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in kuamah deidan loin mi khempeuh tungah a kibangin thu a khen hi.
Tua ahih manin leitung ngeina tawh a suak tate pen Pasian' ta hilo a, Pasian' thuciamna tawh kizui-a a suakte bek suanlekhak taktakin a kisim pan hizaw hi.
Pasal in a zi a luppih dingin a kilawm zahin luppih ding a, a zi in zong a pasal a luppih dingin a kilawm zahin a luppih ding a hihi.
Tua ahih manin Jew mi leh Gentail mi, sila leh sila a hilo, numei leh pasal cih bangin kideidanna om nawnlo a, note khempeuh Christ tawh na kipawlna hangun pawlkhat hi-in, a kibangkim na hi uhhi.

Tua ahih manin Gentail mi leh Jew mi, vun-at mi leh vun-atloh mi, khuapi mi leh khuaneu mi, sila leh sila a hilo, cih bangin a kilamdan'na omlo a, Christ pen mi khempeuh-a' ding hi thei a, thu khempeuh-a' ding hi thei a, thu khempeuhah amah bek a hihi.
Pasalte aw, na zite uh it unla, amaute tungah ngongtat kei un.

Laisiangtho sungah, "Nangmah na ki-it bangin na vengte na it in," ci-in a genna Topa' Thukham zui le uh cin a hoih hi pah hi. 9 Ahi zongin mi na deidan uh leh note a khial na hi uh a, Thukham a palsat na hi veve uhhi.

A haute aw, tu-in ka thugen hong ngai dih un. Note tungah a hong tungding lungkhamna hangin kapin thum un.n 2 Na neihsate uh muattumta a, na puante uh nget in netum khinta hi. 3 Na ngun leh na khamte uh kekseu khinta hi. Hih kekseuna pen note langah teci suak a, mei in a kattum bangin na sa uh hong netum ding hi. Hih a hun nunung ciangin tu-a bangin a piang dingin neihsa a khol na hi uhhi. 4 Na lo uh a hong khawhsakte a thaman pialo na hih manun tu-in amaute' phunna za un. Anla dingin na sawl uh mite' phunna Vanglian Topa in za khinta hi. 5 Hih leitung na nuntak sungun uang nekin na noptat mahmah uhhi. Note hong kigawh hun ding kigin'na-in a kithausak phitphet na hi uhhi. 6 A thuman mite mawhsakin na that uh a, amaute in na thu uh hong nial zolo uhhi.
Nasemte aw, na tote uh thu na mang un. A thudik a migi na tote bek uh a zahtak hiloin a gilo na tote uh thu zong na mang un.
Tua Zeisu hangin eite' mawhna hong kimaisak a, eite-a' ding bek hiloin leitung mi khempeuh' mawhna zong a maina ding a hihi.
Nangmah a hong mudahpa' la a van tawh a puk na muh leh a la tawh amah na nusia kei ding a, tua la phot toh ding na huh ding hi.
Mi simna-ah a kihel, kum sawmnih panin a tungsiah peuhmah in { Topa' } tungah biakna pia ding hi.
"Note, sam kangte' mai-ah na kun ding uh a, puteekte' maitang zahtakin, na Pasian uh na kihta ding uhhi; kei pen { Topa } ka hihi.

"Nang leh Aaron in Israel mihonte khempeuh a innkuankuan, a behbehin, pasal peuhmah a milipin a phazah sim un. 3 Israel sungah kum sawmnih panin a tungsiah a pha, galdo dingin a kuan thei ding mi khempeuh a honhonin na sim ding uhhi.

"Hih pen Levi mite tawh a kisai thu a hihi. Kum sawmnih leh kum nga pan a tungsiah a phate, kikhopna buk nasepna sungah na a sem dingin hong pai ding uhhi. 25 Kum sawmnga a phak uha kipan nasepna panin amau kihemkhia-in na sem nawnlo ding uhhi.
Na luanghawmte uhhih gamlakah lum ding hi. Note khempeuh, kum sawmnih pan a tungsiah, kei hong phunsante,
{ Topa } na Pasian un hong piak ahi keima hong thugente na zuih theihna dingun no kong thupiakte behlap loin, zong na khiam kei ding uhhi.

Amah pen nang-a' dingin na nuntakna a hong piakik, leh na khanghamna-ah hong vakpa hi ding hi; Banghang hiam cihleh, tapa sagih sangin a thupizaw, nangmah hong it na monu' neih tapa ahi hi," a ci uhhi.
Tu-in naupang Samuel a pumpi khangin { Topa } leh mite' maipha a ngahtoto hi.

Tua ciangin Amaziah in Judah mite khawm a, a tul-a ukte leh a za-a ukte' khutnuai-ah Judah mite leh Benjamin mite a behbeh, a pawlpawlin a koih hi. Amah in kum sawmnih leh a tungsiah a pha mite khawm a, galsim dingin a hoih, teipi leh lum a zang thei, a kitengkhia mihing tul za thum a pha hi.

Amaute, Jerusalem khua-a Pasian' biakinn-ah a hong ciahkik uh a kum nihna, tua kum a kha nihna sungin Shealtiel' tapa Zerubbabel leh Jozadak' tapa Jeshua, nasep kipan uh a, a Israel mipihte, siampite, Levi mite, leh salsuahna panin Jerusalem-ah a hong ciahkik mite khempeuh in zong a huh uhhi. Amaute in Levi mite kum sawmnih panin a tungsiah peuhmah { Topa' } biakinn sungah biakna nasepte a vaan dingin a seh uhhi.
"Hong hilh thei le uh cin, pauloin ka ompah ding hi. Ka khialhna hong theitelsak dih un.
"Khanghamte in pilna nei a, nuntak saute in thu theitel uhhi.
Na pa' pian'ma-a a piang puteek samkangte' tung panin kote in ka pilnate uh a ngah ka hi uhhi.

Elihu ahih leh amaute lak panin a khangno pen ahih manin adangte a pau kim khit mateng bangmah pauloin a om hi. 5 Ahi zongin hih mihing thumte in Job a dawn' theihloh a muh ciangin a hehna thuakzo nawnlo hi. 6 Tua ahih ciangin Buz-te beh Barakhel' tapa Elihu in thu gen ding hong kipan a, "Kei a khangno lai hi-in, note a khangham na hih manun, ka ngaihsutna note lakah kong gen ngam kei hi. 7 No a khangham zawte in thu a gen ding kilawm hi, ci-in ka ngaihsun hi. 8 Ahi zongin mihingte tungah a hong tung pilna pen Vanglian Pasian' kha in a hong piak a hihi. 9 Khanghamna in mi pilsaklo a, thuman zong theisak tuanlo hi.

{ Topa } aw, na biakinn sungah kua om ding ahi hiam? Na mual siangtho tungah kua teng ding ahi hiam? 2 Paubaang loin gamta-in, a manin na sem a, lungsim tak a gen mi, 3 mi gensia loin, a lawmte tungah siatna bawllo a, a vengte a mawhsaklo mi, 4 migilote thusimlo a, ahi zongin { Topa } a zahtakte a pahtawi mi, ama natna ding nangawnah a ciampello mi, 5 ama sum a meetin a khalo, thutang mite a langpan'lo, golhguk a lalo mite teng ding uhhi. Hih bangin a gamtate pen ling ngeilo ding hi.
{ Topa, } ka belh suangpi leh keimah hong tankhiapa aw, ka kammal leh ka lungsim ngaihsutnate nangma muhna-ah a san'huai suaksak ta in!
Siatna panin kihemkhia in la, a hoih bawl in. Kilemna ding hanciam in la, na phak mateng delh in.
Migilote' hangin kilungsosak kei in la, a manloin a gamta mite en' dingin ngaihsun kei in. 2 Banghang hiam cihleh lopa bangin amaute vulpak ding uh a, lokung hingte bangin keutum ding uhhi.
Hehna panin kikham in la, sinsona nusia in. Nangmah kilungso tawmsak ke'n; tua in siatna bekah a hong paipih hi.
Thuman mi a kinusiacip, a suanlekhakte ngen tawmin a kivak, ka neu lai-a kipanin tu-a ka teek hun ciangdong ka mu ngei nai kei hi.
thuman deihin gitlohna na mudah hi. Tua ahih ciangin Pasian ahi, nangma Pasian in na khan'gualte tungah a kikhai to-in lungdamna sathau nang hong nilhzo a,
A ginalo mite leh pa a neilo mite tungah thuman unla, a thuakte leh a cimawhte' thu a manin khen un. 4 A ginalo mite leh a cimawh mite hon unla, migilote' khutsung panin amaute honkhia un," a ci hi.
A sia na peuhmah ka deih kei ding hi. Lamkhial mite' nasepna ka mudah a, tuate tawh ka kisukha kei ding hi. 4 Lungsim kawina ka deih hetkei a, siatna, ngaihsutin zong ka neikha kei ding hi.
Thuman lampi ka teel khin a, na biakna ngeina kipte ka deih hi.
Na thuhilhnate hangin thu theihtelna ka ngah hi. Tua ahih ciangin a manlo lampi khempeuh ka mudah hi. 105 Nangma thu pen lam hong lak ding meivak hi a, ka paina lampi-ah khuavak a hihi.

David' tapa, Israel kumpi Solomon' paunakte: 2 Mite in pilna leh thuhoihte a phawk theihna ding, khiatna thuk a nei kammalte a theih theihna ding. 3 A hoihin a pil gamtat theihna ding, thuman, thutang, a kilawmin a gamtat theihna ding. 4 Thuthei nailote in a theihna ding, khangnote in pilna leh thu ngaihsut theihna a ngahna ding. 5 Mi ciimsate ciimsak semsemin, mi pilsate pilsak semsemin, 6 paunakte leh thugentehnate hoihtakin thei-in, mipilte' kampau leh a thugente uh a theihna ding a hihi.

Na hihzawh ding ahih nak leh midangte' kitangsapna huh tawntung in. 28 Na vaihawmsak theihpah ding thute ahih nak leh, zingciangin hong paikik in, ci-in a hun sotto kei in. 29 Nangmah hong muangin nangma nai-ah a hong teng na vengpa, gim a ngahna ding bangmah vaihawm kei in. 30 Nangma tungah siatna bangmah a hong bawllo, mi khatpeuh tawh thu omlopi-in kimawk tot kei in.
Ngaihsut kicing nailote aw, na lungsim uh khanghamsak un. Mihaite aw, thu ngaihsun un.
Mipilte thuhilh lecin pil semsemna-in nei ding a, thuman mite thuhilh lecin a thutheihna uh khang semsem ding hi.
Mihaite in a hehna uh langsakpah uh a, mipilte in a hehna uh ipzo hi.
Thumanna in midikte hu a, gitlohna pen mawhneite' pukna a hihi.
Thusia bekbek a deih tawntung migilote kiangah, a gilo kamtaipa bangin sihna tung ding hi.
A thu za khin nailopi-in dawn'kikna pen haina leh maizumna a hihi.
Thuthei lopi-in lawpluatna hoihlo a, mawk nawhtatna in lungkhamna piangsak thei hi.
Pilna in mi lungduaisak a, mi' hong hehsaknate kiphawkmawh bawlna in minthan'na a hihi.
Thu theilote in satna bek tawh pilna ngahzo a, thungaihsun theite in taina lel tawh pilna ngahzo uhhi.
Na pu na pate' phuhsa gisuang cikmah hunin khin kei un.

Thu kician omlopi-in na vengpa' langkhatah teci pang kei in la, amau' siatna dingin zuauthu gen kei in. 29 Kei tungah hong bawl bangin kei zong ka bawl ding a, ama hong hihna bangin ka thuk ding hi, cikha kei in. 30 Mi thadahpa' lo gei-ah ka va pai a, mihaipa' leenggui lo ka va nawkkha hi. 31 Limtakin ka et ciangin a lo ciing bupah kiak dim a, a leitang khempeuh lopa in khuhcip a, a umna a phungcian suangte kicim khin hi. 32 Tua bang ka muh ciangin thu ka lungngaingai a, thu manpha khat ka mukhia hi. 33 Tawmkhat ihmutna, tawmkhat lusukna, tawmkhat sung na seplohna, khutzepin ommawkna hangin 34 i tungah zawn'na hong tung a, cihmawhna in hong khuhcip hi.
Mihaite' thudotna dawngdawng lecin nang zong amau mah bangin a hai na hi hi. 5 Mihaite a pilin a kingaihsut khaklohna dingin amau' haina tawh kizui-in dawng zaw in.
Eite tawh a kisailo kitotna sunga kiphumna pen ui ommuang khat a bil-in i kaihsak tawh kibang hi.
Midangte in hong phat lohbuang nangmah kiphattawm kei in. Khual mite in hong phat lohbuang nangma kamin kiphattawm kei in.
Mihaite in pahtawina la hong sak sangin mipilte' hong taina hoihzaw hi.
Heh pahpah kei in; hehna a haihuai a hihi.

A manin a gamta, a khial ngei hetlo, leitungah mi khat zong om hetlo hi. 21 Mi' gen khempeuh thudon kei in. Na nasempa' hong samsiatna na zakha ding hi. 22 Nang zong midang na samsiat zelzelna teltakin na kithei hi.
Nang tungah gam ukpa a heh leh na nasep za taisan pah kei in. Dai tak-a om hithiatna in khialhna lianpi maisak thei hi.
Gamtat hoih ding kisin un. Thumanin gamta unla, kinetniamna kheel un. Pa neilote hu unla, meigong numei pan'pih un," ci hi.
Note in utna lungsim nei-in thu na man' nak uh leh lei pana piang a gah hoihte na ne ding uhhi.
Ahih hangin mipi lungsim a nei mi in na a hoihte geel a, thuhoih nate-ah a pang hi.
I mawhna hangin gim i thuak ciangin Banghangin phunphun ding ihi hiam?
Singkung cidamte in gah ginalo gah ngeilo a, singkung ginalote in gah limci gah ngeilo hi.
Kilemna ding deihin a hanciam mite in Pasian' tate cihna ngah ding uh ahih manin thupha ngah mi ahi uhhi.
Midangte in na gamtatna hoihte uh a muh ciangin vantungah a om na Pa uh min a phat theihna dingun mite mai-ah na gamtat hoihna uh khuavak bangin na kilangsak un.

Nangma tungah mi khatpeuh lungkim loin zumah hong khiat leh, zum na tun' ma-un hun om lai-in na kilem pakna dingin hanciam in. Tua hi kei leh zum na tun' uh ciangin thukhente khutsung na tung ding a, thukhente in palikte khutsungah hong apin, palikte in thong sungah hong khum ding hi.

Na gen peuhmah ahi ahih leh, ‘Hi,’ ci in la, a hilo ahih leh, ‘Hilo,’ cihna tawh kicingsak in. Tua bang hiloin kiciamna kam na zat ciangin Dawimangpa tawh kizomin thumanlo na hih lamtak hong kilang hi.
Tua ahih manin vantungah a om na Pa uh a cingtaak mah bangin note zong lungsim citakin na cingtaakna ding uh na hanciam un.
"Uite tungah a siangtho nate pia kei un. Pia le uh cin hong pet zawsop ding hi. Vokte mai-ah na suangmanphate uh lot kei un. Lot le uh cin sikcip lel ding uhhi.
"Na sanggamte uh na tung uhah hong khialh leh pai-in note gel bek theihin a khialhna va gen un. Na thu uh a hong man' leh na sanggampa uh a ngahkik na hi uhhi.
Tua naungek a pumpi leh a lungsim siamna hong khang a, Israel mite lakah a kilaak hun matengin sehnel gamsungah a om hi.
Tua naupang hong khangin hong thahat hi. Lungpilna tawh kidim a, Pasian in thupha a pia hi.
Zeisu a pumpi leh a pilna khang a, ama gamtatna in Pasian leh mite a lungkimsak semsem hi.
No hong phuisamte thupha na pia unla, no hong bawlsiate-a' ding thu na ngetsak un.

Mihoihpa in a lungsim sunga thuhoih omteng hong suahkhia a, migilopa in a lungsim sunga a gitlohna teng hong suahkhia hi. Banghang hiam cihleh mite pen amau' lungsim sunga a om bangbang a hong paukhia uh a hihi.
Mihing sung panin a suakte mihing mah hi bek a, Kha tawh a suakte pen kha mi a hihi. 7 Tua ahih manin, ‘Na suahkik ding ahi hi,’ ka hong cihna hangin lamdangsa kei in.

Thesaloni khuamite sangin Berea khuamite in mipi lungsim neizaw uhhi. Amaute in lawp mahmahna tawh Paul' thugente ngai uh a, Paul' thugente man taktak hiam ci-in a theihna dingun nisimin Laisiangtho a sim uhhi.
Tua ahih manin Pasian mai leh mite mai-ah lungsim kisuan'na a om hetlo dingin a tawntungin ka gamta hi.
Nuntakna sang mite leh nuntakna niam mite, mipilte leh mihaite, a kuamah peuh ka huh ding ka tavuan ahih manin, 15 Rom khua-a a om note tungah zong Lungdamna Thu hilhding ka lawp mahmah hi.

Haksatna i thuak laitak nangawnin i lungdam veve hi. Banghang hiam cihleh haksatna in thuakzawh hatna piangsak a, 4 thuakzawh hatna in Pasian' pahtakna hong ngahsak a, ama hong pahtakna in lametna lianpi hong neisak ahihna thu i thei hi.
I ngaihsutna, i pumpi deihna uksak lehang sihna tawh kizom hi; i ngaihsutna, Khasiangtho uksak lehang nuntakna leh nopsakna tawh a kizom hi.
Ama deihna bang a sem dingin Pasian in a hong sap, amah a it eite-a' dingin na khempeuh a hoihlamin piangsak hi, ci-in i thei hi.

Leitung mihingte' gamtat bangin gamta kei unla, na lungsim uh kikheelin Pasian kipuahpha sak un. Tua hi leh a hoih nate bang hi a, bangte in amah lungkim sakin, bangte a kicing hiam ci-in thei-in Pasian' deihna na phawk thei ding uhhi.

No a hong bawlsia mite, Pasian in thupha a piakna dingin thu ngetsak unla, tua bang mite samsia loin thupha piazaw un. 15 A lungdam mite lungdampih unla, a dah mite dahpih un. 16 Mi deidan loin a kibangin en un. Kiphasak loin mineute tawh kikhawlthei un la, kipilsak se kei un. 17 Midangte' gitlohnate thukkik kei unla, mi khempeuh in hoih hi, ci-in a ngaihsut ding bangin gamta un. 18 Ahih theih laiteng mi khempeuh tawh na kilemna dingun hanciam un. 19 Lawmte aw, na hehna uh kuama tungah thukkik kei unla, Pasian' thukkik dingin koih lel un. Banghang hiam cihleh Laisiangtho sungah, "Keimah in amaute tungah ka thuk ding a, midangte a gimsak bangun ka gimsak ding hi, Topa in ci hi," ci-in kigelh hi. 20 Tua ahih ciangin Lai Siangtho sungah, "Na galte uh a gil a kial leh an na pia un. A dang a taak leh tui na pia un. Tua bangin na gamtat uh leh amaute' maizumna dingin a bawl na hi uhhi," ci-in a kigelh bangin gamtazaw un. 21 Tua ahih manin gitlohna kizosak kei unla, a pha gamtatna tawh gitlohnate a zo na hi ta un.
Tua ahih manin a kuamah peuh in i gamtatna ciat Pasian' mai-ah a va kigentel ciat ding ihi hi.
Ahi zongin kha thu lamah a khangham mite tungah pilna thu ka gen hi. Tua ka gen pilna pen tu-in a maimang kuankuanta ding hih leitung mite' pilna leh vangliatna thu hilo hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian' deihna bangin gamta loin, leitung lungsim deihna bangin gamta lai na hih manun upna sungah naungek bang ahi lai na hi uhhi. Note khatlekhat kihaza-in kitawng kiselin na om uh ciangin hih leitung mite mah a bang lel na hihna uh hong kilang hi.

Note khatlekhat thu na kineih uh ciangin Pasian' mi siangthote khensakzaw loin lawki thukhente' mai na kitun' ngam uhhi. 2 Pasian' mite in leitung mite' thu a khensakzaw ding ahihlam theilo na hi uhhiam? Note pen leitung mite' thu a khensak ding na hih uh ciangin tua bang thu neute khen theilo lawmlawm na hi uhhiam? 3 Eite pen vantung mite' thu nangawn a khensak ding ihih lamtak theilo na hi uhhiam? Tua ahih manin hih leitunga no' thu neuneute leltak na khentheih zawk kan ding uh a hihi. 4 Tua bang hinapi-in hih bang thu themthem hong pian' ciangin pawlpi sungah bangmahin a kisimlo mite' mai kitun'ding na hi uhhiam? 5 Note-a' dingin zumhuai mahmah hi. Note khatlekhat na kithu-neihnate uh a khenthei ding note lakah mipil khat beek om buang ding hi. 6 Tua hinapi, khatlekhat thu kineihin zum na kitun' uh a, lawki thukhente na khensak tazen uhhi. 7 Note khatlekhat zum na kitut mahmah uh zong a gina hetlo na hihna uh hong kilangsak hi. Banghangin thuakzaw mailo a, sum ngamzaw mailo na hi uhhiam? 8 Note khatlekhat kisu-in, khatlekhat na kisut zawsop uh a, na sanggamte teekteek nangawn uh tawh thu na nei uhhi.
Naupang ka hih hun lai-in naupang mah bangin kampau-in, thu ngaihsunin, ka gamta hi. Ahi zongin tu-in khangham ka hih manin naupang vaite ka zang nawn kei hi
Sanggamte aw, na thu ngaihsutnate uhah naupang bang kei un. Gitlohna lamah naupang bang unla, ahi zongin thu ngaihsutna-ah a khangham hi ta un.

Pasian in eite ahi zelzul dingin a hong sam hilo a, hoihtak nuamtakin a om dingin a hong sam ahih manin Pasian' thu gen ding lawpna lungsim pen a gen dingpa a ki-ukzawh ding a kisam a hihi. Pasian' pawlpi mite khempeuh lakah a kizang ngeina ahih mah bangin,
Na khempeuh a kilawm a kituakin na hih un.
Tua thu hangin ka lungkia tuankei uhhi. Kote' leitung pumpi in damdamin muatlam ding a manawh ahi zongin ka kha nuntakna uh a nini-in thaksuak semsem hi.
Ka nasepna uhah mite in mawhna hong zon'ding uh utlo ka hih manun kuamah ka nawngkaisak khaklohna dingun ka hanciam uhhi.
Siangtho takin nuntakna, thu theihna, lungduaina, migitna, Khasiangtho' huhna, itna taktak neihna,

Tua ahih manin tuhuna ka nuntakna zia pen kei hang hi nawnloin ka sungah a hong om Christ hang a hihi. Tua hi a, keimah hong itin, keima-a' dingin a nuntakna a hong pia Pasian' Tapa ka muan'na tawh tu laitakin a nungta ka hihi.
Tua mah bangin eite zong kha thu-ah i neulai hun sungteng huihlak a uk vangneite' khutnuai-ah a om ihi hi.

Ahi zongin Khasiangtho' sawlna bangin gamtatnate pen: Itna, lungdamna, lungnopna, lungduaina, migitna, hoihna, cihtakna, 23 dikna, leh pumpi ki-ukzawhna hi a, hih bangin a gamta mite, Thukham in bangmah cih theilo hi.

Sanggamte aw, mi khatpeuh a gamta khial a om ciangin, Khasiangtho' deihna bangin a nungta note in tua a khialpa a manin a gamtatkik theihna dingin thunem zangin na huh un. Note in zong amah bangin ze-etna na tuahkhak lohna dingun na kikem un. 2 Thu haksa na tuah uh ciangin khatlekhat na kihuh un. Tua hi leh Christ' thukham a zui na hi uhhi.
Eite a hong bawlpa pen Pasian hi a, Zeisu Christ tawh i kipawl ciangin i nuntakna-ah gamtat hoih a nei dingin a hong bawl ihi hi. Hih pen eite' omzia dingin a na ngaihsut kholhsa a hihi.

Hih nasep a tuamtuamte khempeuh a semdingin Pasian' mi khempeuh kigingkhol sakin Christ-a' dingin na semin Christ pumpi a khan'sak theihna ding deihna a hihi. 13 Tua hi leh Pasian' Tapa i theihna leh i thu upna-ah kithukhatin, eite a khangcing suakin, Christ' cingtaakna ciang i banto ding hi. 14 Tuahun ciangin thu upna lamah naupang ihi nawn kei ding a, mite khemin a khialsak theite' mutna hangin i suk hoi i to hoi nawn kei ding a, 15 itna lungsim tawh thutak genin, lutang ahi Christ tawh i kibat dongin i khangto ding hi. 16 Ama ukna mangin pumpi na a tuamtuamte a kituak takin kizom a, amaute limtakin a kizop dimdiamna hangin pumpi pen pumkhat a suak thei hi. Pumpi na a tuamtuamte in amau' sepding ciat hoihtakin a sep uh ciangin itna hangin pumpi khangin a cingtaak a suak thei hi.

Zuauna lungsim in a suksiat khitsa, nidangin na nuntakna ngei uh ahi na pian'lui uh paikhia unla, 23 na lungsim uh leh na ngaihsutna uh thaksuak sak un. 24 A thutang a siangtho ahihna thu, nuntakna mahmah panin a kilangsak, Pasian' pian'zia tawh kibangin a kibawl na ngeina thak uh bangin na nungta un.

Na heh uh ciangin, tua hehna hangin khialkha kei unla, a tawntungin heh paisuak kei un. 27 Dawimangpa in hong suksiat theihna ding hun omsak kei un. 28 Guta ngeite in gu nawnloin, ama nuntakna ding thuman takin thalawhin, mizawngte zong a huhtheih laina dingin thatang tawh nasep ding kipan ta uh hen. 29 Na kiho uh ciangin kamguh zang kei unla, na pauna uh a za mite in phattuamna a ngahtheihna dingin na-in a kimang kam hoihte bek na pau un.
Tua ahih ciangin hoihtakin kingaihsunin gamta unla, mihaite bang hiloin mipilte bangin gamta un.
Note sungah hih nasep hoih a hong pankhia Pasian in Zeisu Christ hong paikik hun ciangdong, mi cingtaak na hihna dingun hong huh ding hi, ci-in teltakin ka thei hi.

Note-a' ding deihsakna tawh thu ka hong ngetsak thu in: Note' lungsimah itna khang semsemin, a sia leh a pha a mantakin khenthei-in a hoihpen na teeltheihna ding uh a hihi. 10 Tua hi leh Christ hong paikik ni ciangin paubaan'na omloin a siangtho na hi ding uhhi. 11 Zeisu Christ in note mihoih a hong suahsak theihna leh mite in Pasian pahtawi-in a phattheihna thu, note' gamtat hoih in midangte tungah kilangsak ding hi.

Tua ahih ciangin ka hong it sanggamte aw, note tawh ka hong omkhawm lai-in ka thu na hong man' tawntung uh mah bangin, tu-in note tawh ka hong omkhawm loh hun ciangin zong ka thu na hong man' ding uh thupizaw lai hi. Pasian kihtakna leh zahtakna tawh na ma uh nawt unla, amah in note hong hotkhiatna thu a cingtaak suaksak un.

Christ nasepna-ah note in pumpi tawh na hong huhkim theihloh manun note' tangin amah in kei a hong huh manin a nuntakna hong pia-in sihlawh dektak hi. Tua ahih manin hihbang mite na zahtakbawl mahmah unla, Topa' nasem taktak hi, ci-in lungdam takin na limbawl un.

Ahi zongin ka utna tungkhin ing, cingtaak khinta ing, a ci ka hi kei hi. Christ Zeisu in kei-a' dingin a hong sepsak hamphatnate kimtakin ka ngahtheihna dingin a hanciam lai ka hihi. 13 Sanggamte aw, tua hamphatna a ngah khinin ka kingaihsun kei hi. Tua ahih manin a beisa thute mangngilh bawlin mainawtin ka hanciam a, 14 Christ Zeisu nasepna tawh vantung nuntakna-ah Pasian' hong sapna ahi hamphatna ka ngahtheihna dingin, a kung lam zuanin tangtakin ka tai hi. 15 Kha thu-ah a khangham eite in hihbang lungsim pua ciat ni. Hihbang lungsim a neilo i omkhak leh zong, Pasian in a kitel takin hong kilangsak ding hi.
Sanggamte aw, a tawpna-ah ka hong gennop thu in, a hoih leh a phattaak thute tawh na lungsim uh na kidimsak un. Tuate in: A man, a dik, a tang, a siangtho, a deihhuai, leh a pahtakhuai thute a hihi.

Bangbangin om ta leng a lungkim thei dingin a kisinsa ka hih manin hihbang ka hong gen ciangin ka kitangsapna a hong pulak nuam ka hi kei hi. 12 Cihmawhna leh cihtheihna a sinsa ka hihi. Tua ahih manin ka hau a ka zawng zongin, ka vah a ka kial zongin, koi mun koi mun hita lehah a lungkimthei dingin a kisinsa ka hihi. 13 Christ in a hong piak vangliatna tawh hihte khempeuh nawkzawhna ding thahatna a nei ka hihi.

Note, lungsim han'na tawh kidimin, thu a man taktakin na theihna hangun lungkip takin omin, itna tawh pumkhat na suahtheihna ding uh ka deihna a hihi. Tua hi leh Pasian' thusim ahi Christ mahmah na thei ding uhhi

Note hong honpa dingin Topa Christ na sansa uh ahih mah bangin amah tawh hoihtakin kipawlin nungta un. 7 Note tungah a hong kihilhsa bangin ama sungah zungthuk kha unla, ama deihna bangin nungta-in, na upna uhah khauh semsemin, lungdam takin om un. 8 Christ thu tawh a kituak lopi-in, tangthu tuanthu ahi a, huihlak a ukte' thu siksanin ahi zongin, bangmahin a kimanglo leitung pilna tawh mite' khemsa-in sila na suahkhak lohna dingun kingaihsun un.
Pasian in note hong itin, hong teelin, ama mi siangthote hikhin na hih manun note pen hehpihna nei-in, migi-in, kiniamkhiatin, dikin, na lungduai ding uh a hihi.
Mite' nasem bangin kingaihsun loin, Pasian' nasem bangin kingaihsun unla, na sep peuhpeuh uh lungsim takpi tawh lawpin sem un.

A pualam mite tungah a kilawm a kituakin gamta unla, hunhoih na ngah khempeuh uh na valkhongsak ngei kei un. 6 Kam na pau uh ciangin mi' zaknop, mi' ngaihnop dingin na pau un. Tua hi leh na kihopih uh mite khempeuh-a' dingin phattuamna a nei kam a pau na hi ding uhhi.
Zeisu Christ nasem, note' makai Epafras in zong hong hopih hi. Pasian' deihna bangin note nungta-in, lungsim khanghamin kiptakin na omtheihna dingun amah in thu hong ngetsak tawntung hi.
Tu ma-a ka hong gensa uh mah bangin kamtam nuam se loin hoihtakin om hithiatna, no tawh a kisai thu bek ngaihsutna, leh note' nuntakna ding na na sepna ding uh hanciamin nei un.

Sanggamte aw, note' upna nakpi takin khang a, note khatlekhat na ki-itna uh lian semsem ahih manin Pasian tungah lungdamna kohding a kilawm ahih mah bangin, note hangin ama tungah lungdamna ka ko tawntung uhhi.
Tu-in tua bang mite in kuamah nawngkaisak nawnloin man manin na sem hiathiatin amau' nuntakna dingun na a sepna dingun Topa Zeisu Christ min tawh hanthawnin thu ka hong pia uhhi.

Nang sangin a uzaw mite taiibawl kei in la, na pa bangin ngaihsunin hanthawn in. Nang sangin a nauzawte na nau bangin bawl in. 2 Nang sangin a uzaw numeite na nu bangin bawl in la, nang sangin a nauzaw numeite, lungsim siangtho tak tawh na nau numei bangin bawl in. 3 Meigong taktak ahi numeite zahtakbawl in.

Hebrews aw, nang tungah a hong kipia thute hoihtakin na zui in. Mi pawlkhatte in, "Thu theihna," ci-in a ngaihsutkhak uh, Pasian' thu tawh a kituaklo, thu kihai selnate na pelh in. 21 Mi pawlkhatte in tua bang pilna a nei-in kingaihsun uh a, upna thu bulpi khahsuahna-in a nei uhhi. Note khempeuh tungah Pasian' dikna thupha hong tung ta hen.

Thu kihai selna, theilopi-a thu kinialnate na pelh in. Tua bangte in kitotna a pian'sak lamtak na theihsa a hihi. 24 Topa' na a sem mite, kitot a hatte hilo ding a, mi khempeuh tungah lungsim nemin, thugen siamin, thuakzawhna nei-in, 25 thunem tawh a langte' hoihlohna a puahtheite hi ding hi. Tua bang hi leh Pasian in amaute kisiksak thei ding a, thuman thutak hong thei-in,

Pasian' na a sem mite mi cingtaak hi-in, na hoih namkim a septheihna dingun Laisiangtho pen Pasian' lamlahna tawh a hong kipia hi a, thuman thutak hilhna ding, a khialte taiina ding, a manlote a manin puahna ding, a manin nuntak theihna ding thuhilhna dingin a manpha mahmah a hihi.

Pasal khanghamte a kilawm a kituakin a omtheihna ding, thu ngaihsun thei mi ahihna ding, a kikemzo mite ahih theihna ding, upna man a neihtheihna ding, itna man a neihtheihna ding uh leh a manin lungkipin a thuakzawhna dingun na gen in. 3 Tua mah bangin mite in Pasian' thu a gensiatkhak lohna dingun numei khanghamte zong a gamtat a khuahek uh a zahtakhuai ahihna ding, mi gensiate ahih lohna ding, zunek kiphamawhte ahih lohna ding, thuhoih thupha hilhin, 4 amaute sangin a nauzaw nupite in a pasalte uh leh a tate uh a itna dingun a hilh ding, 5 thu ngaihsun thei, a gamtat siangtho, inn nasep a kizen, a migi, leh a pasalte uh thu a mang thei mi ahihna dingun na gen in.

kuamah gensia loin, mite tawh kilemin kikhawl thei-in, lungsim nemin, mi khempeuh tungah a dikna ding uh na gen in. 3 Banghang hiam cihleh eite zong nidangin haitatin, thumang loin, vakvai-in, duhna deihna a tuamtuamte thuaklahin, thusia leh en'na lungsim tawh a gamtate, mite in hong mudahin, eite khatlekhat zong a kimudah ngeite ihi hi.
Tua ahih manin i zaksa thuman thutakte i khahsuahkhak lohna dingin kiptak khotakin i letkip ding kisam hi.

Tu-in note pen midang a hilh dingin sia na suahtheih ding uh hun hikhin napi-in note mahmah pen Pasian' thu a bulpite hilhding na kisam lai uhhi. Antak nethei nailoin nawi bek a nethei lai na hi uhhi. 13 Nawi bek a ne laite pen naungek ahih manin a man leh a manlo thu bangmah phawkthei nailo uhhi. 14 Ahi zongin antak i cih pen a sia leh a pha a khenthei, a lim leh a limlo a khentheita, a khangham khinsa mite-a' ding a hihi.

Tua ahih manin Christ thu a kipat cilna lelte nusia-in a thuthuk zawte ngaihsutin nei ni. Bangmahin a kimanglo nasepnate nusiat ding, Pasian upna thu, 2 tuiphumna leh khut ngakna thu, misite thawhkikna leh tawntung gimthuakna, cih thute genpha sansan nawn kei ni. 3 Eite in mainawt ni. Pasian in hong thukimpih ahih nak leh i mainawt ding a hihi. 4 A tawpkik khinsate a kisik kikna dingin kibawl zolo hi. Pasian' khuavak sungah amaute om khinin, vantung nopna ciam khinin, Khasiangtho ngah khinin,

Tua hi a, eite in i kiim i pamah hih zahin a tam teci nei ihih ciangin eite a hong dongtangsak thei nate khempeuh leh eite a hong gakcip mawhna leh khialhnate khempeuh paikhia-in, i mai-ah a om taina ding lampi a mong dongin lungsim kiptakin tai ni. 2 Eite hong makai-in i upna a hong cingtaaksak Zeisu mitsuan'in nei ni. Mailamah a ngahding lungdamna hangin maizumna kihta loin singlamteh tungah sihna hong thuak a, tu-in Pasian tokhom taklamah a tu hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh Topa in a it mite thuhilh a, ta taktakin a ngaihsut mite a taii hi," hong ci hi. 7 Pasian' hong thuhilhna na thuakding mah uh a hihi. Pasian in note ta-in hong ngaihsun ahih manin a thuak na hi uhhi. Pate' thuhilhna leh taiina a thuaklo ta kuamah omlo hi. 8 Tate' thuak bangin thuhilhna leh taiina thuakloin hong kikoih mawk leh ta taktak hiloin zawlta na hi lel ding uhhi.

Tua ahih ciangin a zaw nuangnuang na khutte uh leh a no dakdak na khukte uh khauhsak un. 13 Bai luangluangin a paite, na guh na taang uh a kipelhlohna dingin lampi tang zui-in na pai un. 14 Mi khempeuh tawh na kilem theihna ding uh hanciam un. Nuntak siangtholo tawh kuamah in Topa mu zolo ding ahih manin nuntak siangtho na nungta un. 15 Pasian' hehpihna a ngahlah na hihkhak lohna dingun na kidawm un. Zungkha a nei singkung hong khangin mi tampi gimsakin a siatsak bangin mite a siasak na hihkhak lohna dingun na kidawm un.

Sanggamte aw, thuhaksa a tuamtuam na thuak uh ciangin lungdamna dingin na ngaihsun zaw un. 3 Tua bangin na upna hong hong kize-etna na thuakzawh uh ciangin na kipna uh hong kilangsak ahihna thu na thei uhhi. 4 A kisam bangmah omloin a cingtaak na suahtheihna dingun na thuakna uh hangin a tawntungin na kip paisuakna dingun na ngaihsun un.
Sanggamte aw, note in na theihding uh ka deih thu in: Thu kigen khempeuh hoihtakin ngai pahpah un. Ahi zongin pau pahpah kei unla, heh pakpak kei un.
