Ahi zongin mite a suaktasak thei thukham cingtaak hoihtakin a et khit ciangin a thu ngai-in a mangngilh pah hiloin, hoihtakin ngaihsun tawntungin a zuite pen a sepna khempeuh uhah Pasian in thupha a pia ding hi. 26 Mi khatpeuh in Christian ka hi hi, ci napi-in kampau a kidopzawh kei leh amahmah a kikhemtawm hi lel a, ama biakna neih a mawkna a hihi.
Eite khempeuh a khialthei zelzelte vive ihi hi. Kampauna-ah a khial ngeilo mi a om leh a cingtaak mahmah hi a, a pumpi zong a ukzo mi a hihi.
En'na leh huaihamna a om nak leh buaina leh siatna nam khempeuh tawh kizom pahpah hi.

Hih thute khempeuh banah, sanggamte aw, thu khat peuhpeuh na gen uh ciangin kiciam se kei un. Vantung ahi a, na khat peuhpeuh tawh ahi zongin kiciam kei un. Pasian' thukhenna na thuakkhak lohna dingun a hite, "Hi," ci lel unla, a hilote, "Hilo," na ci lel un.

Note na gamtat khialhna uh hangin hong kisat ciangin lungduai takin na thuak manun bangmah phattuamna omlo hi. Ahi zongin a manin gamta napi-in gimna na thuak uh ciangin lungduai takin na thuak uh leh Pasian in thupha hong pia ding hi.

Note in a hoih gamtat ding utin hanciam le uh cin kua in hong bawlsia ding ahi hiam? 14 A hoihin na gamtat manun gimna na thuak uh leh zong Pasian in thupha hong pia ding hi. Mite kihta kei unla, lunghihmawh ngaihsut kei un.

Tua mah bangin no khangnozaw deuhte in zong a khanghamte' thu na mang un. Laisiangtho in, "Pasian in a kiphasak mite nial a, a kiniamkhiat mite a hehpih hi," a cih mah bangin na vekpi-un kiniamkhiatna puan bangin silhin, khatlekhat na na kisepsak un.
Hehpihna thu leh i Topa leh Honpa Zeisu Christ theihna thu-ah na khangto semsem zaw un. Tuhuna kipanin a tawntungin amah in minthan'na ngah paisuak ta hen. Amen.

Tua ahih ciangin keimah in a sia leh a pha ka theihtheihna dingin na mite ukna ding thu theihtelna lungsim na nasempa hong pia in. Banghang hiam cihleh hih a lian a tam na mite kua in ukzo ding ahi hiam?" a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Israel mi khempeuh in kumpipa' piak thukhenna za uhhi. Thutang a sem dingin ama tungah Pasian in pilna pia hi, ci-in phawk uh ahih manin amaute in kumpipa lamdangsa-in a om uhhi.

Pasian in Solomon dawngin, "Hih thu na lungsim sungah om a, nangmah in neihsate, hauhna, pahtawina, ahih kei leh nang hong mudahte' nuntakna hong ngenloin, a tungah kumpi-in nang kong koihna ka mite na uk theihna dingin nang-a' ding pilna leh theihna hong ngen na hih manin, 12 pilna leh theihna nangma tungah hong kipia hi. Nang' ma-a kumpite kuamah in a neih ngeiloh, nang' khit-ate kuamah in zong tua bang a neihloh ding hauhnate, neihnate, leh pahtawina zong, nangma tungah kong pia thuah ding hi," a ci hi.
"Khanghamte in pilna nei a, nuntak saute in thu theitel uhhi.
"Tua ciangin amah in mihingte tungah thu genin, ‘Topa zahtakna, pilna hi a, siatna pelhna pen thutheihna hi,’ ci hi," a ci hi.
Ahi zongin mihingte tungah a hong tung pilna pen Vanglian Pasian' kha in a hong piak a hihi.

Leitung ka bawl laitakin nang om na hi hiam? Thei kisa na hih leh tua thu hong gen in. 5 Bangcia-in golsak ding cih kua in seh ahi hiam? Kua in a golna ding zah khau khai ahi hiam? Hihte khempeuh thei kisa na hi hiam? 6 Leitung a pua khuampite bang tungah kiphut ahi hiam? Kua in leitung a bulpi phut ahi hiam? 7 Tua ni-in zingsang aksite in la sa khawm uh a, Pasian' tapate lungdamin a kiko uhhi.
Thuman mi' kam in pilna gen a, a leii in thutang gen hi.
Tua ahih ciangin pilna lungsim ka ngah theihna dingun ka nuntak hun uh a tomlam ka theihna dingun hong hilh in.
{ Topa } zahtakna pen pilna kipatna a hihi. Ama thupiak a zuite khempeuh tungah thukhen siamna a pia hi. Amah phat tawntung ding a hihi.
Na thu deih mahmah ing. Sun tawntungin ka lungngaihngaih a hihi. 98 Na thupiakna in ka langte khempeuh sangin a pilzaw-in hong bawl hi. Banghang hiam cihleh tua pen kei tawh omkhawm den hi.
{ Topa } zahtakna in pilna kipatna hi a, mihaite in pilna leh thuhilhna donlo uhhi.
Banghang hiam cihleh thu theilote in pilna a donloh manun sihlawh uh a, mihaite in lunghihmawhna a neihloh manun siatlawh uhhi.

Pilna thute limtakin ngai in la, na theihtel zawhna dingin hanciam in. 3 Thu theihna ding hanciam takpi in la, thu muhna ding hahkat takpi in. 4 Ngun, ahih kei leh a kiseel sum manpha zon' bangin, hahkatin pilna zong in. 5 Tua hi leh, { Topa } zahtakna thu na thei ding a, Pasian na theitel ding hi. 6 Banghang hiam cihleh pilna a piapa pen { Topa } hi a, amah pen pilna leh siamna a hilhpa a hihi. 7 Pasian in thuman mite pilna guan' a, midikte a hu hi.
Nangmah a pilin kingaihsun tawm kei in la, { Topa } zahtakin a sia peel in.
Pilna nei-in thu a thei mipa, a lungdam mi a hihi. 14 Pilna nei leeng ngun sangin hoihzaw a, kham sangin zong manpha zaw hi.
Ka ta aw, pilna leh thu ngaihsut theihna len tawntung in la, cikmah ciangin khahsuah ngei kei in.

Pilna nusia kei in; tua hi leh siatna panin nang hong hu ding hi. Pilna deih in; tua hi leh lungmuang takin na omna dingin hong kem ding hi. 7 Pilna na ngahna ding a thupi masa pen hi a, na neih khempeuh na beilawh zongin na zon' ding a hihi.

Hong kihilhnate zui-in pilna ngah unla, thudon loin ommawk kei un. 34 Ka thugenna a ngai, nisimin ka kong gei-ah omin, ka inn-ah a ngak mipa in lungdamna ngah ding hi. 35 Kei hong mu mi in nuntakna a mu hi a, { Topa' } mai-ah maipha ngah a hihi. 36 Ahi zongin kei hong mulo mi, amahmah a kisusia hi a, kei hong mudah peuhmah, a si nuam ahi hi," hong ci hi.

{ Topa } zahtakna pen pilna kipatna hi a, Siangtho Pa theihna pen thumuhna a hihi.11 Pilna in na khang hong khan ding a, na nuntakna hong sausak ding hi.12 Pil lecin nangma phattuamna ding hi a, pilna don kei lecin nangma supna ding a hihi.
Hihte pen Solomon' paunakte ahi hi: Ta pil in a pa lungdamsak a, ta hai in a nu dahsak hi.
Mipilte in thuhilhna mang a, a hai paute in lungkhamna tuak hi.
Thungaihsun theite' kamsungah pilna om a, mihaite' nungzangah ciangduai kinga hi.
Pilna a deihte, kithuhilh ding ut uh a, kitai ding utlohna pen haina a hihi.
Mihaite pen amau mah thuman kisa tawntung a, mipilte in mi' thugenna ngai nuam uhhi. 16 Mihaite in a hehna uh langsakpah uh a, mipilte in a hehna uh ipzo hi.
Ta pil in a pa' hilhna mang a, a kihisak mi in a khial min pua nuamlo hi.
Hilh ding utlo, kihihsakna in kitotna bek piangsak thei a, hong kithuhilh ding utna pen a hoihzaw a hihi.
Thungaihsun theite pilna tawh gamta a, mihaite in a haina taangko hi.
Mipil tawh kikhawl lecin na pil ding a, mihai tawh kikhawl lecin gimna na thuak ding hi.
Numei pilte in innsung nuntakna khangsak a, numei haite in innsung susia hi.
Thungaihsun theite a pilna in lampi man musak a, mihaite a haina in lam khialsak hi. 9 Mihaite in a khialh hangun phamawh salo uh a, mipilte a khialh ciangun mawhmaisak ding deih uhhi.
Mipilte kidawmin siatna panin kihem a, mihaite in thu ngaihsun masa loin gamta pahpah hi. 17 A lungtom mite hai gamtat a, mipilte lungduai hi.
A lungduaite mipil hi a, lungtomna pen haina kilatna a hihi.
A pa' hilhna a ngai nuamlote mihai hi a, hilhna a mang nuamte mipil a hihi.
A kihisak mite in ki thuhilhna ngai nuamlo uh a, mipilte kiangah thu dong ngeilo uhhi.
{ Topa } zahtakna pen pilna mah hi pah a, kiniamkhiatna in pahtawina hong ngahsak hi.
Kham sangin pilna hoihzaw a, ngun sangin thutheihna deihhuai zaw hi.
Mihaite pauloin om leh a pil mahin kingaihsun hi. Thungaihsun thei na hihna a kilatna dingin pauloin om khinkhian in.
Mihaite in thu a teltheih zawhna ding uh kinlo uh a, pil si, a kicih theihna ding deihna bek tawh thu gen uhhi.
Thungaihsun theite in a pilna uh behlap a, pilna a ngahna dingun mipilte in a bil uh tawh limtakin ngai uhhi.
Thuthei lopi-in lawpluatna hoihlo a, mawk nawhtatna in lungkhamna piangsak thei hi.
Pilna a zongpa in ama phattuamna ding a zong hi a, thu a thei mipa' sepna mavang ding hi.
Pilna in mi lungduaisak a, mi' hong hehsaknate kiphawkmawh bawlna in minthan'na a hihi.
Thu kigente ngai-in hong kihilhte mang lecin mailamah na pil ding hi.
Thuhilhna a mang nuamlo tapa pen pilna a thei khalo ding tapa a hihi.
Pilna tawh kam na pau theih leh kham leh suang manpha sangin a manphazaw a nei na hi hi.
Mi kiphasakte gim a kipiak ciangin mi mawkmawkte in pillawh uh a, mipilte a kihilh ciangin thutheihna-in nei uhhi.
Mipilpa' innsungah neihlelam a dimin om a, ahi zongin mihaipa in a ngahzahzah zangkhia pah hi.
Mipilte in a lauhuai thu mu thei-in pelh uh a, mi mawkmawkte in phusuakin thuak uhhi.
A nasepna-ah a siam mahmah mi na theikha uhhiam? Amah in mi mawkmawkte' na semlo ding a, kumpite' na sem ding hi.

Pilna tawh inn kilam a, ngaihsut siamna tawh inn kip hi. 4 Thungaihsut theihna inn sungah a hoih a manpha nate a dimtakin om hi. 5 Thahatna sangin pilna hoihzaw a, thakhauhna sangin thutheihna hoihzaw hi.
Sik in sik mah hiamsak thei a, mi in midang pilsak thei hi.
Ei leh ei kimuan'na haina hi a, mipilte' hilhna zuihna pen lungmuan'na a hihi.
Pilna a deih mi in a pa lungdamsak a, numei paktat tawh a kikhawl mi in a neihsa teng lawnmang hi.
Mihaipa a hehna bangin kam pau-in gamta gawp a, mipilpa ahih leh ki-ipin a hehna damsak hi.
Ciangduai leh tai-na in pilna guan' a, a kikhahkhong ta in a nu maizumsak hi.
Pil semsem lehang kilunghimawh semsem a, tam thei semsem lehang hong gimsak semsem zawsop hi.

Pasian in amah a lungdamsakte tungah pilna, theihna, leh lungdamna pia a, ahi zongin a hehpihhuai mimawhte ahih leh a sep bek sisakin, amau' thalawhsa khempeuh amah a lungdamsakte tungah a piaksak hi. Hih pen a mawknapi taktak, huihpi nungdelh bang bek a hihi.
Heh pahpah kei in; hehna a haihuai a hihi. 10 "Banghangin nidang lai-in hih sangin hoihzaw tham ahi hiam?" ci-in dong kei in. Tua bangte pil thudotna hilo hi.
Sum in hong lungmuan'sak bangin pilna in zong hong lungmuangsak hi. Pilna a manphatna, a pilte a nuntaksak theihna a hihi.
Khuapi a uk mihing sawm sangin pilna in mi khat hatsak zaw hi.
Hih zong Vanglian { Topa}' kiang pan a hong pai thu a hihi. Amah pen thu lamlahna-ah lamdang mahmah a, pilna-ah lian mahmah hi.

Tua ahih ciangin en un, hih mite tungah a tumdang leh a lamdang ahi a lamdang nate ka bawlkik ding hi. Amau' mipilte' pilna kisia ding a, amau' thu mutheite' thu muhtel theihna kiseel ding hi," a ci hi.
Thei nailo a, za nailo na hi hiam? { Topa } pen tawntung Pasian hi a, leitung mong khempeuh dong a Piangsakpa a hihi. Amah gimlo a, zong tawllo hi. Ama thu theihtelna kigen zolo hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh keima ngaihsutnate nomau' ngaihsutna bang hilo a, keima paiziate nomau' paizia bang hilo hi, { Topa } in ci hi.

Nang pen ka pu ka pate' Pasian na hi a, ka hong phat a, ka hong zahtak hi. Nangmah in pilna leh thahatna na hong piazo hi. Ka thungetna nong za a, kumpipa kianga ka gen ding thu nong lakzo hi," a ci hi.
A pilte ahih uh leh vantung khuavak tawh a taangkhawm ding uhhi. A pha-in gamtat ding mi tampi a hilhte pen aksi bangin a taang tawntung ding uhhi.
Mi tampite kisian'suahin a hoih leh a hoihlo a kikhentel ding uhhi. Migilote in bangmah theitel theilo uh ahih manin a gilo semsem ding uhhi. Ahih hangin mipilte in theihtel theihna a nei ding uhhi.
"Ka thuhilhna za-in a zui mi khempeuhte pen suang tungah a inn a lam mipilpa tawh kibang ding hi.

Mihing Tapa hong pai leuleu a, zune anne-in a om ciangin, ‘Zuhai anhaipa; siahdongte leh midangte in a kikholhpih noploh mite tawh a kikhawlpa,’ ci leuleu uhhi. Ahi zongin Pasian' pilna a man taktakna thu a gah panin hong kilang hi," a ci hi.
"A pil a citak nasem i cih a bangcite ahi hiam? A naseppih dangte ukin a hun manmanin amaute' nekzah ding ciat an a pia dingin a topa in a seh a nasempa a hihi.
Tua ciangin thuman na thei ding uh a, tua thuman in note hong suaktasak ding hi," a cihleh

Thesaloni khuamite sangin Berea khuamite in mipi lungsim neizaw uhhi. Amaute in lawp mahmahna tawh Paul' thugente ngai uh a, Paul' thugente man taktak hiam ci-in a theihna dingun nisimin Laisiangtho a sim uhhi.

Amaute in Pasian thei napi-in a zahtak dingun a kilawm bangin zahtak loin, a tungah a lungdam dingun a kilawm bangin lungdamlo uhhi. Amaute in thuhoih ngaihsun nuamlo uh a, a ngaihsutnate uh a mawknapi a suak hi. 22 Amaute pil a kisak mahmah uh hangin a hai mahmah uh a hihi.

Banghang hiam cihleh sihna a thuak mite-a' dingin singlamteh tungah Christ sihna thu pen a haihuai thu a hihi. Ahi zongin hotkhiatna a ngah eite-a' dingin Pasian' vangliatna a hihi. 19 Banghang hiam cihleh Laisiangtho sungah, "Mipilte' pilna ka susia ding a, miteite' teina ka heikhiatsak ding hi," ci-in kigelh hi. 20 Tua ahih manin tuhuna mipilte, miteite, leh thusel a siamte, bangin kimang ahi hiam? Hih leitung pilna pen haina a suahsak khitna kilang khinzo hi. 21 Pasian in ama pilna hong zang a, mihingte in amau' pilna tawh pasian a theih zawhlohna dingun a bawl hi. Tua ahih manin mite in, "A haihuai thu," ci-in a ngaihsut uh i thuhilhna a umte, Pasian in hotkhiatna a piazaw hi. 22 A uptheihna dingun Jew mite in na lamdang kal uh a, Grik mite in pilna a thupisak uhhi. 23 Ahi zongin kote in singlamteh tungah a kikhai Christ' thu ka hilh uh a, tua thu pen Jew mite-a' dingin a hehhuai thu hi a, Gentail mite-a' dingin a haihuai thu a hihi. 24 Ahi zongin Pasian in a hong sap ei Jew mite leh Gentail mite-a' dingin Christ pen Pasian' vangliatna leh Pasian' pilna a hihi. 25 Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian' haina pen mite' pilna sangin sangzaw lai a, Pasian' thaneemna pen mite' hatna sangin hatzaw lai hi.
Ahi zongin Pasian in mipilte a maizumsakna dingin mihaite hong teel a, mi thahatte a maizumsakna dingin mi thaneemte a hong teel hi.
Ahi zongin Pasian in Zeisu Christ hangin note tungah nuntakna hong pia a, tua Zeisu Christ pen eite' pilna, Pasian tawh i kipawl theihna, Pasian' mi siangtho suakin, hotkhiatna i ngah theihna a hihi.

Tua ahih manin note' thu upna pen mihingte' pilna hang hiloin, Pasian' vangliatna hangin a um na hi uhhi. 6 Ahi zongin kha thu lamah a khangham mite tungah pilna thu ka gen hi. Tua ka gen pilna pen tu-in a maimang kuankuanta ding hih leitung mite' pilna leh vangliatna thu hilo hi. 7 Tua ka gen pilna thu pen mite' theihloh dingin Pasian in a ipcip Pasian' pilna thusim hi a, eite' minthan'na dingin leitung pian'ma pekin Pasian in a na koihsa thu a hihi. 8 Hih leitung a uk mite kuamah in hih pilna thu theilo uhhi. Thei hi le uh, a minthang Topa pen singlamteh tungah na thatlo ding uhhi.
Khasiangtho a nei mite in na khempeuh theithei uh a, ahi zongin leitung mite in bangmah theilo uh ahih manin a lungmang uhhi.

Note khatpeuh hih leitung ngeina-ah a pilin na kingaihsut uh leh a pil taktak na hih theihna dingun a hai na suak phot un. 19 Hih leitung mite in pilna hi, ci-in a ngaihsutte, Pasian-a' dingin a haihuai thu a hihi. Banghang hiam cihleh Laisiangtho in, "Mipilte amau' ngian mahah awksak hi," a na ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin hoihtakin kingaihsunin gamta unla, mihaite bang hiloin mipilte bangin gamta un. 16 Tuhun pen hun hoihlo hun ahih manin na hun neih khempeuh uh a hoih lamin zang un.

Note, lungsim han'na tawh kidimin, thu a man taktakin na theihna hangun lungkip takin omin, itna tawh pumkhat na suahtheihna ding uh ka deihna a hihi. Tua hi leh Pasian' thusim ahi Christ mahmah na thei ding uhhi. 3 Christ pen Pasian' pilna leh a thuthuk khempeuh a kitheih theihna ding a hihi.
Pilna kisam na om uh leh Pasian kiangah ngen un. Mi khempeuh tungah Pasian dikin cingh mahmah ahih manin hong pia ding hi.

Note lakah pilin thuthei a kisa a om leh kiniamkhiatin pilin, nuntak hoih leh gamtat hoih tawh a lahkhiat ding a hihi. 14 Ahi zongin na lungsim uhah en'na, gitlohna, leh huaihamna a om leh a zuaugen na hi uh a, pil ing, ci-in kisialhna ding bangmah omlo hi. 15 Tua bang pilnate vantung panin a hong pai hilo a, leitung pilna, kha thu tawh a kisailo, a dawivai a hihi.
Ahi zongin tunglam panin a kingah pilna a siangtho a hihi. Mi tawh kilem thei-in dik a, mi tawh kikhawl thei a, hehpihna lungsim nei-in gamtat hoih a, mi lang-etlo a, kineihkhem cihte omlo hi.

Ahih hangin gulpi in numei kiangah, "Na si kei ding uhhi. 5 Banghang hiam cihleh tua singgah na nek ciangun na mitte uh hong vak ding a, a pha leh a sia thei-in, Pasian tawh na kibat ding lamtak uh Pasian in thei hi," a ci hi. 6 Tua ahih ciangin singkung a hoihna, mi a pilsak dingin tua a gah a deihhuaina a muh ciangin, a singgah lo-in a ne hi. Amah in singgah kimkhat a pasal pia a, a pasal in zong a ne hi.

"Thei in; Judah minam Hur' tapa ahi Uri' tapa Bezalel a minin ka sam khin hi. 3-5 Lim hoihte a geel ding; kham, ngun, sumngo tawh na a bawl ding; siamna nam khempeuhah nasepna ding; bulh ding suangte seekna leh singzep nasep a sem dingin vangliatna, siamna, pilna, theihna, leh khutsiam nasep khempeuh tawh amah ka kidimsak hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh Egypt panin nong paikhiat lai-un { Topa } in note' mai-ah San Tuipi a kan'sakna, leh Jordan galkhata om na suksiatmang uh Amor mite' kumpi nihte ahi Sihon leh Og tungah na bawlna uh ka za khin uhhi. 11 Tua thu ka zak phetun ka lungsim uh bei a, note' hangin mite' lungsimah han'na bei hi; bang hang hiam cih leh { Topa } na Pasian uh, tunga om vantung leh nuai-a om leitungah Pasian a hihi. 12 Tua ahih ciangin tu-in note tungah kong dik gamtat bangin note zong ko innkuanah nong dik gamtatna ding uh { Topa' } min tawh kei tungah hong kiciam un la, a man taktak lim khat kei hong pia un. 13 Ka nu, ka pa, ka sanggamnute, ka sanggampate, leh amaute tawh a kizomte khempeuh hong hon un la, sihna panin kote hong suaktasak un," a ci hi. 14 Mite in ama tungah, "Nang' tangin kote ka si ngam uhhi. Hih ko' thu na genkhiat kei nak leh, { Topa } in kote tungah hih leitang hong piak ciangin nang tungah dikna leh thumanna tawh kong gamta ding uhhi," a ci uhhi.

Tua ciangin a lai sungah genthuah lai a, "{ Topa}-a' dingin biakinn khat, leh ama-a' dingin kumpi inn khat a lam ding, thutheihna leh thutelna tawh a kidim mipil, David tungah a pia, van leh lei a bawl Israel { Topa } Pasian in thupha ngah ta hen.
A kamkaih tawh uk lohin a phamawh, thutheihna a neilo, sakol leh la bang kei in.

Mihai in a lungsim sungah, "Pasian omlo hi," ci-in ngaihsun hi. Amaute sia uhhi. A kihhuai-in gamta uh a, a hoihin a gamta kuamah omlo hi. 2 A pil, Pasian a zong mi a om uhhiam, cih a theihna dingin Pasian in vantung panin mihingte hong ensuk hi.
Na thupiakte um ka hih manin thu khentel theihna leh theihsiamna hong hilh in.
Na lungsim ngaihsutnate nuntakna nak hi a, na neihsa a manpha pen bangin na kep ding a hihi.
Mi tampite kisian'suahin a hoih leh a hoihlo a kikhentel ding uhhi. Migilote in bangmah theitel theilo uh ahih manin a gilo semsem ding uhhi. Ahih hangin mipilte in theihtel theihna a nei ding uhhi.

"Ngiahon lakah tuu a kikhah bangin note hong sawlkhia ka hih manin gul bangin pilvang unla, vakhu bangin migi un. 17 Mi pawlkhatte in note hong manin zumah hong paipih ding uh a, amaute' kikhopna innsungah hong satgawp ding uh ahih manin hoihtakin kidawm un.
Tua ahih ciangin bang hunin na Topa uh hong pai ding cih theilo na hih manun na pilvang un.
Galkap tul sawm a nei kumpi khat in galkap tul sawm nih tawh a hong kuan kumpi khat do dingin a kithawi leh, tua kumpipa a dozo ding mahin i hat takpi hiam ci-in ngaihsun masa ding hi.
Ahi zongin keimah in, ‘Topa aw, tuate go-in ka ne het kei ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh a ninin a kingaihsun an peuhmah ka kam ka tun' ngei kei hi,’ ka ci hi.

Pasian in leitung a pian'sak cila kipanin a kimu theilo ama pianzia ahi tawntung vanglianpa leh Pasian ahihna thute ama bawlsa nate tung panin teltakin hong kilang hi. Tua ahih manin, "Thei kei ing," ci-in paulap a zon'theihna ding uh omlo hi.

Gentail mite in thukham a neihloh uh hangin amau' ngaihsut tawmna tawh thukham' deihna bang a gamtat uh ciangin tua thukham' deihna a zui uhhi a, thukham a neihloh uh hangin a gamtat dingun a kilawm amau mahmah in a thei tawm uh a hihi. 15 Amau' lungsim sungah thukham' deihnate omkhin ahihna thu a gamtatna un hong kilangsak hi. Amau mahmah zong khat veivei hoih kisa, khat veivei sia kisa uh ahih manin, amau' lungsim sungah thukham' deihnate theihna omkhin ahihna thu, hih amau' kiphawk tawmna lungsim in nakpi takin hong kitelsak hi.
Eite' ngah lungsim pen leitung mite' lungsim hilo a, Pasian in eite tungah a hong piak na khempeuh i theihna dingin Pasian' hong piak Khasiangtho lungsim a hihi.
Sanggamte aw, mi' khemsa-in ta kei un. Kikholhpih hoihlote in mi siasak thei hi.

i Topa Zeisu Christ' Pasian ahi, a minthang Pa Pasian in note tungah Khasiangtho hong pia-in, tua Khasiangtho in note tungah lungpilna hong pia-in, note in Pasian na theihna dingun note tungah Pasian hong kilatsakna dingin thu ka hong ngetsak niloh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin hoihtakin kingaihsunin gamta unla, mihaite bang hiloin mipilte bangin gamta un. 16 Tuhun pen hun hoihlo hun ahih manin na hun neih khempeuh uh a hoih lamin zang un.

Note, lungsim han'na tawh kidimin, thu a man taktakin na theihna hangun lungkip takin omin, itna tawh pumkhat na suahtheihna ding uh ka deihna a hihi. Tua hi leh Pasian' thusim ahi Christ mahmah na thei ding uhhi.3 Christ pen Pasian' pilna leh a thuthuk khempeuh a kitheih theihna ding a hihi.
Christ thu tawh a kituak lopi-in, tangthu tuanthu ahi a, huihlak a ukte' thu siksanin ahi zongin, bangmahin a kimanglo leitung pilna tawh mite' khemsa-in sila na suahkhak lohna dingun kingaihsun un.
Tua ahih ciangin midangte bangin eite mawk om hithiat loin khua phawkin pilvang ni.

Thu um mi to-in a nei silate in upna sungah sanggam khat hi hang, ci-in ngaihsutna tawh a tote uh zahtakbawl loin omkha kei uh hen. Amaute' nasepna hangin hamphatna a ngah mite pen thu um mi leh a it uh mite ahih manin a hoihzaw-in a sepsak ding uh a kilawmzaw a hihi.
Tua bang numeite in thu a zakzak uh hangin a man leh a manlo khen theilo uh ahih manin thuman thutak thei zolo uhhi.
Mailamah a thaman ding mukhol thei ahih manin Egypt gamsunga hauhna leh nopsaknate khempeuh sangin Christ hangin simmawhna thuak taakzaw tham hi, ci-in a ngaihsun hi.
Sanggamte aw, mite' khemsa-in om kei un.
Na khempeuh a beina ding hun hong naita hi. Nomau pumpi ki-uktawm thei-in pilvang unla, hoihtakin thu a ngen thei-in om ta un.

Note pilvangin khua phawk un. Na gal uh ahi Dawimangpa, humpinelkai bangin a nektheih ding zongin vak kawikawi hi. 9 Leitungah thu um dang khempeuh in zong note' thuak mah bangin a thuak ahihna thu thei unla, na upna uhah kipin Dawimangpa na nial un.
Ka it tate aw, mite' khemsa-in ta kei un. Christ a thuman ahih mah bangin a manin a gamtate khempeuh a thuman a hihi.

Ni sagih ma-in Pasian in a nasepte zo khinta a, ama hihsa nasep khempeuh panin ni sagih ni-in a tawlnga hi.3 Tua ahih ciangin Pasian in ni sagih ni thupha pia-in siangthosak hi. Banghang hiam cihleh pian'sak nasepna ama nasep khempeuh panin tua ni-in Pasian a tawlnga hi.

amah in amaute kiangah, "{ Topa' } hong thupiak hih bang ahi hi: ‘Zingciang pen a thupi-a tawlngak ni, { Topa}-a' dingin Sabbath siangtho ni a hihi. Na em dingte uh emin, na huan dingte uh huan unla, a omlai teng zingsang ciangdong koih un,’ ci hi," ci-in a gen hi.

Moses in, "Tuni-in ne un; tuni pen { Topa}-a' dingin Sabbath a hihi. Tuni-in a pualamah na mu kei ding uhhi. 26 Note in ni guk sung na khawm ding uh a, ahi zongin Sabbath ni ahi a ni sagih ni-in bangmah omlo ding hi," a ci hi.

Thei un! { Topa } in note' tungah Sabbath hong piazo hi. Tua ahih ciangin ni guk ni-in amah in note tungah ni nih khom ding an hong pia hi. Note na milipun nomau' omna ciatah om un. A ni sagih ni-in ama omna panin kuamah paikhia kei hen," a ci hi.

"Sabbath ni a siangtho-a zat ding phawk un.10Ahi zongin a ni sagih ni pen { Topa } note' Pasian' Sabbath ni a hihi. Tua ni-in note, na tapate, na tanute, na nasempate, na nasemnute, na ganhing uh ahi a, peemtate in ahi zongin na bangmah na sem kei ding uhhi.11Banghang hiam cihleh a ni guk sung tengin { Topa } in van leh lei, tuipi leh tuate sunga om khempeuh bawl a, a ni sagih ni tawlnga hi. Tua ahih ciangin { Topa } in Sabbath ni thupha pia-in siangthosak hi. 9 Ni guk sung nomau' na semin na nasep ding khempeuh uh na hih ding uhhi.10Ahi zongin a ni sagih ni pen { Topa } note' Pasian' Sabbath ni a hihi. Tua ni-in note, na tapate, na tanute, na nasempate, na nasemnute, na ganhing uh ahi a, peemtate in ahi zongin na bangmah na sem kei ding uhhi.11Banghang hiam cihleh a ni guk sung tengin { Topa } in van leh lei, tuipi leh tuate sunga om khempeuh bawl a, a ni sagih ni tawlnga hi. Tua ahih ciangin { Topa } in Sabbath ni thupha pia-in siangthosak hi.

"Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: ‘Keima Sabbath ni-in note na tawlnga ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh hih pen { Topa } ahi keimah in note a hong siangthosak ka hihna na theihna dingun na khang tawntungun keimah leh note' kikalah lim khat hi ding hi. 14 Sabbath ni-in note na tawlnga ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh note-a' dingin a siangtho a hihi. Tua ni-in a tawlngalo mi peuhmah kithat ding a, tua ni-in na a sem mi peuhmah ama mite' kiang panin kikhenkhia ding hi. 15 Ni guk sungin nasep kizo ding hi. Ahih hangin a ni sagih ni pen a thupi-a tawlngakna Sabbath ni hi a, { Topa' } tungah siangtho hi. Sabbath ni-in nasep khat peuhpeuh a sem mi peuhmah kithat ding hi. 16 Tua ahih ciangin a tawntung thuciamna-in amau' khang tawntungin Sabbath tangin, Israel mite in Sabbath kem ding uhhi. 17 Ni guk sung teng { Topa } in van leh lei bawlin, a ni sagih ni-in amah tawlnga a, a tha dimsak kik hi. Keimah leh Israel mite' kikalah hih Sabbath ni pen lim khat hi tawntung ding hi, ci hi,’ ci in," a ci hi.
"Ni guk sung na na sem ding uh a, ahi zongin a ni sagih ni-in na tawlnga ding uhhi. Lokhawh hun leh anlak hun sungin zong na tawlnga ding uhhi.

Ni guk sungin nasep kiman ding a, ahih hangin a ni sagih ni-in thupi-a tawlngakna Sabbath siangtho { Topa' } tungah na nei ding uhhi. Tua ni-in na khat peuhpeuh a sem peuhmah kithat ding hi.3Sabbath ni-in na ten'na khempeuh uhah mei na cih kei ding uhhi," a ci hi.
Tua pen note-a' dingin a thupi tawlngakna Sabbath hi a, an na tang ding uhhi. Tua pen a tawntunga thukham a hihi.

Note a kuamah peuh in na nu leh na pa uh zahtakin, note in ka Sabbath-te na tang ding uhhi; kei pen { Topa } na Pasian uh ka hihi.30Note in ka Sabbath ni tangin keimah hong kibiakna mun na zahtak ding uhhi; kei pen { Topa } ka hihi.

Ni guk sungin nasep kizo ding a, ahih hangin a ni sagih ni pen a thupi tawlngakna Sabbath, a siangtho kikhopna a hihi. Note in tua ni-in na na sem kei ding uhhi. Tua pen note' ten'na khempeuhah { Topa}-a' dingin Sabbath a hihi.
Note hong kisan' theihna dingin amah in { Topa' } mai-ah anlom vei ding a, Sabbath ni a zingciangin siampipa in tua anlom vei ding hi.

"Note in Sabbath khit a zingciang, vei-a biakna anlom na paipih ni uha kipan nipikal sagih bit dong a ni na simto ding uhhi. 16 A Sabbath sagihna khit a zingciangdong ni sawmnga dong na simto ding uh a, tua ciangin note in { Topa' } tungah an thak tawh biakna na paipih ding uhhi.

{ Topa } in Moses kiangah, 27 "Hih a kha sagihna ni sawm ni pen kilemna ni a hihi. Tua pen note-a' dingin a siangtho kikhop hun hi ding a, note in an tangin, { Topa' } tungah meihal biakna na pia ding uhhi. 28 Note in tua ni-in na na sem kei ding uhhi; Banghang hiam cihleh tua pen { Topa } note' Pasian' mai-ah note-a' dingin kilemna bawlna dingin kilemna bawl ni a hihi. 29 Banghang hiam cihleh tua ni-in bang khat peuhpeuh a nekha mi peuhmah ama mite kiang panin kihawlkhia ding hi. 30 Tua ni-in na khat peuhpeuh a sem mi peuhmah keimah in ama mite lak panin ka that ding hi. 31 Note in na na sem kei ding uhhi. Tua pen na khang tawntungun na ten'na khempeuh uhah ngeina khat hi tawntung ding hi. 32 Tua pen note-a' dingin a thupi tawlngakna Sabbath ni hi ding a, an na tang ding uhhi. Tua kha ni kua nitaka kipan, a nitak panin a nitak kik dong note in na Sabbath uh na tang ding uhhi," a ci hi.
Note in { Topa' } tungah na piak uh { Topa' } Sabbath-te, note' letsongte, thuciamna hangin na biaknate khempeuh uh leh utthu-a na biaknate khempeuh uh banah piak ding a hihi.
Sabbath ni simin Aaron in a tawntung thuciamna-in Israel mite tangdingin { Topa' } mai-ah a ngeina bangin koih tawntung ding hi.
Ahih hangin a kum sagihna-ah leitang-a' ding a thupi tawlngakna Sabbath, { Topa } pahtawina Sabbath om ding hi. Note in na lo uh na pawi kei ding uh a, na leenggui lo uh na hah kei ding uhhi.
Note in ka Sabbath-te tangin keimah hong kibiakna mun na zahtak ding uhhi; kei pen { Topa } ka hihi.

Tua ciangin na galte uh leitangah na om tanvei uh, gamkhingin a om sungteng, leitang in tawlngak hun a ngah hi ding hi. Leitang tawlnga-in, a Sabbath-te a tang hi ding hi. 35 Ama tungah na ten' laitakun na ngahsak loh uh tawlngakna ahi a Sabbath-te, gamkhingin a om sungteng a tawlnga hi ding hi.

Ahih hangin amaute in leitang nusia-in, amaute omloin gamkhingin a om sungteng leitang in a Sabbath-te na ngah ding hi. Amaute in ka biakna ngeina kipte nialin, ka thukhamte mudah uh ahih manin, a mawhna uh a kipuahphat ding uh kisam hi.

Israel mite gamlakah a om sungun, Sabbath ni-in sing a tom mi khat mu uhhi. 33 Sing a tom laitak a mu mite in Aaron leh Moses, leh mihonte khempeuh kiangah amah paipih uhhi. 34 Amah bang kicih ding ci-in teltakin kigenlo ahih manin amaute in khumcip uhhi. 35 { Topa } in Moses kiangah, "Tua mipa kithat ding hi. Mihonte khempeuh in giahphual pua-ah suang tawh amah deng ding uhhi," a ci hi. 36 Mihonte khempeuh in giahphual pua-ah amah paipih uh a, { Topa } in Moses a thupiak bangin suang tawh amah a denglum uhhi.

"Sabbath ni-in a sitbaanglo, kum khat a pha tuuno nih leh an tawh biakna-in sathau tawh a kibawl annel lawh nih leh a leenggahzu tawh biakna hi ding hi.10Hih pen tatsat loin meihal biakna leh a leenggahzu tawh biaknate banah Sabbath simin meihal biakna a hihi.

"{ Topa } note' Pasian in hong thupiak bangin na sian'thosakna dingun Sabbath ni tang un. 13 Ni guk sung na semin na nasep ding khempeuh uh na hih ding uhhi. 14 Ahih hangin a ni sagih ni pen { Topa } note' Pasian' Sabbath ni a hihi. Tua ni-in note bangin na nasem numei leh na nasem pasalte uh a tawlngak theihna dingin note, na tapate, na tanute, na nasemnute, na nasempate, na bawngtal, na la, na ganhing khat peuhpeuh uh leh na huang sung uha om zinte in na khat peuhpeuh semlo ding uhhi. 15 Egypt-ah nasem na hihna uh leh tua lai panin { Topa } na Pasian un a vangliatna khut leh a thahatna tawh hong paikhiatpihna na phawk ding uhhi. Tua ahih ciangin Sabbath ni na tan' ding uh { Topa } note' Pasian in thu hong pia hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, "Banghangin tuni-in ama kiangah pai ding na hi hiam? Khadet ni ahi a, Sabbath ni ahi zongin hilo hi," a ci hi. Amah in, "Hong hoih na ding hi," a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amah in amaute thu pia a, "Note hih bangin na gamta ding uhhi: Sabbath ni-in nasep pengin kumpipa inn a cing no seh thumah sehkhatte in 6 (adang seh thumah sehkhatte Sur kulhkongpi-ah omin adang seh thumah sehkhatte a cingte' nung kulhkongpi-ah om hi) kumpi inn na cing ding uhhi. 7 Tua ciangin Sabbath ni-in na semin { Topa' } biakinn a cing no a khennihte in 8 na khutsung uhah na hiam ciat uh tawh kumpi Joash na cing ding uhhi. Note kiang nai-ah a hong pai peuhpeuh kithat ding hi. Kumpipa a paikhiat ciang leh a sungtum ciangin amah na cing ding uhhi," a ci hi. 9 A ukte in siampi Jehoiada' thupiak khempeuh bangin hih uh a, Sabbath ni-in nasep a sem dingte tawh Sabbath ni-in ama mi nasep a peng dingte hong paipih ciat uh a, siampi Jehoiada kiangah hong tung uhhi.
Tua ciangin Assiria kumpipa a mai-etna dingin amah in Sabbath ni-in zat dingin a sungah a kikoih tutna khuhna leh kumpipa' lutna a puanung, { Topa' } biakinn panin a lakhia hi.
Kohath mi amau' behte pawlkhat in zong Sabbath simin koih ding Ompihna Anlum uk uhhi.
a mal zah a kisam bangin Sabbath nite, Khadet nite, leh pawi nite-in { Topa } tungah meihal biakna a kipiak peuhpeuh ciangin a tawntungin { Topa' } mai-ah om ding uhhi.

En in, Israel-te-a' dingin a tawntunga ding a kikipsaksa bangin, ama mai-ah a namtui nate ahi paknamtui halna ding, leh Ompihna Anlum piak tawntungna ding, leh Sabbath nite, Khadet nite, leh { Topa } kote' Pasian-a' dingin a kisehsa pawi nite-in zing leh nitakin meihal biaknate piakna dingin { Topa } ka Pasian' minin biakinn khat lamin ama tungah a ap ding ka hihi.

Tua ciangin Sabbath nite, Khadet nite, leh kum simin a kinei pawi thum — silngo sawhloh anlum pawi, nipikal pawi, leh biakbuk pawite-a' dingin Moses' thupiakna tawh kizui-in nisimin piakna nasep ding a kisam ahih mah bangin innliim mai-a a lam { Topa' } biakna tau tungah Solomon in meihal biakna { Topa } tungah a pia hi.
Note in hih bangin na hih ding uhhi: Sabbath ni-in nasep a peng no siampite leh Levi mite sung panin seh thumah seh khat kulhkongpi cingte na hi ding uh a,

Siampi Jehoiada' thupiak khempeuh bangin Levi mite leh Judah mi khempeuh gamta uhhi. Amaute in amau' mi ciat Sabbath ni-in na a sem ding mite tawh Sabbath ni-in nasep a peng ding mite hong paipih uhhi; Banghang hiam cihleh Jehoiada in nasep a peng ding siampite ciahsak lo hi.

Kumpipa in ama neihsa sung panin a piakte pen meihal biakna ding a hihi. { Topa' } thukham sungah a kigelh mah bangin zing leh nitaka meihal biaknate, Sabbath nite, Khadet nite, leh a kiseh pawite-a' dingin meihal biaknate a hihi.

Tua sungin Israel leitang in a Sabbath-te a kicingin na tang hi. Kamsang Jeremiah tung tawnin { Topa' } thugen a tun'na dingin kum sawmsagih a cin'na dingin leitang a kinusiat sung khempeuh leitang in Sabbath tawlngakna a nei a hihi.
na nasempa Moses tung tawnin amaute tungah na Sabbath siangtho na theisak a, thupiaknate, ngeinate, leh thukhamte na pia hi.

Hih mite in Sabbath ni-in van ahi a, an ahi zongin hong zuak leh Sabbath ni leh ni siangtho khat peuhpeuh ni-in i lei kei ding hi. Kum sagihna-a an piangte nusia-in tua kumin leiba khempeuh i maisak ding hi. 32 Eite' Pasian' biakinn-ah nasepna ding ahi Ompihna Anlum, a manmanin an tawh biakna, a manmanin meihal biakna, Sabbath ni, Khadet ni, a kiseh pawite, biakna letsongte, leh Israel mite' tangin a kibawlsak ahi kilemna bawlna dingin mawhna hanga biaknate, leh i Pasian' biakinn-ah sep ding a kisam dangte khempeuhah zat dingin kum simin shekel khat seh thumah khat piak ding ka kiciam uhhi.

Tua hun lai-in Judah gamsungah mite in Sabbath ni-in leenggah sukin, a khawhsate uh khawmin late tungah suanin, leenggah, thei, leh van namkim, Sabbath ni-in Jerusalem-ah hong puakna ka mu hi. Tua ni-in na a zuakna uh hangin ka lungkimlohna amaute tungah ka gen hi. 16 Jerusalem khuasunga teng Taia khuamite in zong ngasa leh van namkim hong paipihin Judah mite tung leh Jerusalem khuasungah Sabbath ni-in zuak uhhi. 17 Tua ciangin Judah uliante tungah lungkim loin amaute kiangah, "Banghangin hih bangin hoihlohna gamta-in Sabbath ni ninsak ngam na hi uhhiam? 18 Na pu na pate uh tu-a bang teekin a gamtat manin eite tung leh hih khuapi tungah hih bang siatna khempeuh hong tung hilo ahi hiam? Tua hinapi-in note in Sabbath ni nitsakna tawh Israel tungah hehna tamzaw na tungsak uhhi," ka ci hi. 19 Tua hi a, Sabbath ni ding khuamial ciangin kongpite a kikhakna ding ka sawl a, Sabbath bei khit mateng a kihon'lohna dingin thu ka pia hi. Tua ciangin, Sabbath ni-in khua sungah van hong kilutpih lohna dingin kongpite a cing dingin ka nasemte pawlkhat ka koih hi. 20 Tua ahih manin sumbukte leh na nam tuamtuam a zuakte, khatvei nihvei khawng Jerusalem khua pualamah giak uhhi. 21 Ahi zongin amaute hilhkholin amaute kiangah, "Banghangin kulh gei-ah giak na hi uhhiam? Nong giah kik uh leh note tungah thu kong bawl ding hi," ka ci hi. Tua huna kipanin Sabbath ni-in amaute hong pai nawnlo uhhi. 22 Tua ciangin Sabbath ni a siangtho-in a omsak theihna dingun amaute kisian'suah tawmin kongpite hong cin'na dingun Levi mite ka sawl hi. Ka Pasian aw, hih thu-ah zong hong phawk in la, na itna tawh kizui-in siatna panin kei hong pengsak in.
Bangmahin a kimanglo piaknate hong paipih nawn kei un. Paknamtui halna ka kih hi. Khadet ni, Sabbath ni, leh thupi takin na kikhopnate uh mawhna tawh kidim ahih manin ke'n ka thuakzo kei hi.

Hih banga a gamta mite, hih thu a lenkip mihingte, Sabbath tangin a siasak lote, siatna bawlna ding panin hoihtakin a kikemte, thupha ngah mi ahi hi," a ci hi. 3 { Topa } pawlin a beel gamdang mipa in, "{ Topa } in ama mite kiang panin kei hong khenkhia taktak ding hi," ci kei hen. A kiget mipa in, "En un, kei pen Pasian' mite lakah a kihel thei ding ka hi kei hi," ci kei hen. 4 Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } in hih bangin ci hi: "Keima Sabbath nite tangin, kei hong lungdamsak thei nate teel a, ka thuciamna a lenkip a kiget mite tungah 5 ka innsung leh ka huangsungah tanu leh tapate sangin a hoihzaw phawkna leh min ka pia ding a, a mang ngei nawnlo ding a kip tawntung min amaute tungah ka pia ding hi. 6 "Ama na a sem ding, { Topa}' min a it ding, ama nasem a suak dingin { Topa } pawlin amah a beel gamdang mite, Sabbath ni tangin a siasaklo, ka thuciamna hoihtakin a lenkip mi peuhmah,

Note in Sabbath siangtho sakin, keima ni siangtho ni-in na nasepna panun khawlin Sabbath ni pen deihhuai sa-in, { Topa}' ni siangtho pen pahtawihuai na cih uh a, note in pahtawi-in note' deihbang zuiloin, note' ut bang hiloin motpau loin na om uh leh,

{ Topa } in hih bangin ci hi: Na nuntak nop lai uh leh kidawm unla, Sabbath ni-in van pua kei un. Jerusalem khua kongpite-ah bangmah hong lutpih kei un. 22 Sabbath ni-in na inn uhah bangmah sem kei un. Na pu na pate uh ka thupiak mah bangin Sabbath ni siangthosak un.
"Ahih hangin { Topa } in kong cihin-ah, note in ka thu nong ngaih uh a, Sabbath ni-in hih khua kongpite-ah bangmah hong lutpih loin, Sabbath ni siangthosakin, na na sep kei uh leh,

Ahih hangin ka thu nong ngaih kei uh a, Sabbath ni siangthosak loin, Jerusalem khua kongpite-ah van pua-in nong lutpih uh leh, tua kongpite ka hal ding hi. A mei in Jerusalem khua kumpi innte lawhin kangtum ding a, a mei a kiphelhzo kei ding hi,’ va ci in," hong ci hi.
Amah in biakna Biakinnpi a zan gawpsak hi. Amah in biakna ni siangtho nite leh Sabbath nite a beisak hi. Kumpite leh siampite in a nasia ama hehna a thuakkhawm uhhi.

Note in na lungsim sung uhah, "I ante i zuak theihna dingin zumkhak hun bei ding i ngaklah hi. I mangbuhte i zuaktheihna dingin cik ciangin Sabbath ni bei ding ahi hiam? I antehna seu neuseekin sum tampi i ngen nuam a, tawikhaina manlo zangin a hong leite i khem nuam hi.

{ Topa } ahi keimah in amaute pen mi siangtho-in ka bawlna thu a phawkna dingun kote' kikalah thukimna limin Sabbath tan' ding thu ka pia hi. 13 Ahi zongin Israel mite in gamlak nangawnah kei hong dem uh a, a zui peuhpeuh in nuntakna a ngahna ding uh ahi keima thukhamte leh ka thupiaknate a nial uhhi. Ka Sabbath-te zong nakpi takin siasak uhhi. Tua ahih manin amaute a maiman'na dingin ka hehnateng gamlakah a thuaksakgawp dingin ka kithawi hi.

Tua bangin kiciamna ka bawlna pen, amaute in ka thupiaknate nialin, ka thukhamte zuilo uh a, ka Sabbath-te siasak uhhi. Amaute in kei hong biak ding uh sangin milim biak ding utzaw uh ahihna hang a hihi.

Kei pen { Topa } ahi note' Pasian ka hihna na phawkna ding uh leh note tawh i bawlsa thukimna lim dingin Sabbath-te na siangthosak un,’ ka ci hi. 21 "Ahi zongin a tate nangawn un kei hong dem uhhi. A zuite in nuntakna a ngahna ding ahi ka thukhamte palsatin ka thupiaknate manglo uh a, Sabbath-te siasak uhhi. Tua ahih manin, ka hehnateng gamlakah thuaksak gawpin, amaute a sumai dingin ka kithawi hi.
Hih bangin kiciamna ka bawlna pen, amaute in ka thupiaknate nialin, ka thukhamte zuilo uh a, ka Sabbath-te siasak uhhi. Tua banah a pu a pate un a biak milimte mah a biakna hang uh a hihi.
Mun siangthote zong zahtakna mel kinei loin, Sabbath-te zong kitanglo hi.

A siampite un ka thukham palsatin, a siangtho biakna nate ninsak uhhi. A siangtho biakna nate leh a mawkmawk nate khenna mel neilo uh a, a tate uh tungah a siang leh a nin a kilamdan'na zong hilhlo uhhi. Sabbath-te zong donin neilo uhhi. Tuate khempeuh hangin Israel mite in kei hong zahtaklo uhhi.
Amaute' gamtatna tu-a bangteng bek hilo lai hi. Ka biakinn ninsak uh a, ka Sabbath-te zong palsat lai uhhi.
Thunei khat peuhpeuh a om ciangin, keima ngeina omsa tawh kizui-in thu khen ding uhhi. A kiseh pawite a ngeina omsa bangin bawl ding uh a, Sabbath-te siangthosak ding uhhi.

Gam uk ulianpa in biakna-in piak ding ganhingte, an tawh biakna-in zat dingte, leh pawi khempeuh, Khadet ni, Sabbath nite-in Israel mibuppite-a' dingin tuiphih biaknate a piak ding ama nasep a hihi. Israel mite' mawhna a maitheihna dingin mawhna hanga biakna, an tawh biakna, meihal biakna, leh thunuama biakpiakna-in a zat dingte khempeuh amah in a si ding a hihi.

"Topa { Pasian } in hih bangin ci hi: Nisuahna lama om, tual sungnung kongpi pen nasep ni guk sung kikhakcip ding a, ahi zongin Sabbath ni leh Khadet ni-in kihong ding hi. 2 Siampite in meihal biakna leh thunuama biakna a piak laitakun, gam uk ulianpa pen tual puanung lam panin inndei lianpi kongpi-ah pai-in kongpi khuamte gei-ah ding ding a, tua kongpi-ah bia-in tua khit ciangin pusuak kik ding hi. Nitak mateng tua kongpi kikhaklo ding hi. 3 Sabbath ni leh Khadet nisimin mi khempeuh in zong tua kongpi mai-ah { Topa } bia-in kun ding uhhi. 4 Gam uk ulianpa in Sabbath ni-in meihal biakna dingin paubaan'na a omlo tuuno guk leh tuutal khat pia ding hi.

Gam uk ulianpa in ama utthu-in biakpiakna, meihal biakna ahi a, thunuama biakna ahi zongin khat peuhpeuh a piak ciangin, ama lutna dingin nisuahna lama om tual sungnung kongpi kihon'sak ding hi. Amah in Sabbath ni-in biakpiakna a bawl mah bangin pia ding hi. Amah a ciahkik khit ciangin a kongpi kikhak ding hi.

Tua zawh a sawtloin Sabbath ni khatin mangbuh lo nawkin Zeisu a pai hi. A nungzuite a gil uh kial ahih manin mangbuhvuite zutin a ne uhhi. 2 Pharisee mite in a muh uh ciangin Zeisu kiangah, "En in, Sabbath ni-in i hih dingin a kilawmlo gamtatna na nungzuite gamta uhhi," a ci uhhi.
Tua ahih kei leh zong siampite in Sabbath sim mahin biakinn sungah Sabbath thukham khial napi-in mawhsakna a ngah tuanlohna thu uh, Moses Thukham sungah sim ngeilo na hi uhhiam?
Banghang hiam cihleh Mihing Tapa pen Sabbath ni a ukpa ahi hi," ci-in a dawng hi.

Tua lai-ah a khut langkhat a zaw mi khat a na om hi. Zeisu gamta khial hi, ci-in a mawhna a zong nuam mi pawlkhat tua lai-ah om uh ahih manin tua mite in Zeisu kiangah, "Sabbath ni-in cina damsak ding a kilawm mah ahi hiam?" ci-in a dong uhhi. 11 Zeisu in amaute kiangah, "Note khatpeuh in tuu khat nei unla, Sabbath ni-in dum sungah tua tuu kia leh, tua tuu va lenin kaikhiato ding hilo na hi uhhiam? 12 Mi pen tuu sangin nakpi takin manphazaw ahih manin Sabbath ni-in a hoih sep ding a kilawm ahi hi," ci-in a dawn' khit ciangin 13 a mipa kiangah, "Na khut zan in," a ci hi. A mipa in zong a khut zanpah a, midangte mah bangin hoihtakin a damkik hi.
Mihingte' bawltawm thukhamte, Pasian' thukham zahin mite tungah hilh uh ahih manin kei hong biak hangun a kiman'na omlo hi,’ ci hi," ci-in a dawng hi.

Tua galtai hun pen phalbi laitak leh Sabbath ni ahih khaklohna dingin thu na ngen un. 21 Banghang hiam cihleh leitung pian'cila kipan tuhun dong, cikmahin tua bang haksatna a om ngeilo, nidang ciangin zong a om ngei nawnlo ding, tua hun laitakin hong tung ding hi.
A zingciang, Sabbath ni-in Pilat kiangah siampi liante leh Pharisee mite hong pai uh a,
Nipini khitciangin, ni sagih lakah ni kipat ni, khua a vak pat laitakin Magdala khua Mary leh adang Mary te in daihawh dingin a pai uhhi. (HCN)
Sabbath ni khit, Nipi ni zingsang khua hong vak kuan ciangin Magdala khuami Mary leh adang Mary, daihawh dingin a va pai uhhi. (TDM)
Sabbath ni khit nipikal ni masapen ni, phalvak tungin Mary Magdalen leh adang Mary-te han hawh dingin a pai uhhi. (ZIV)
Tu in Sabbath ni a bei khit nipi kal sunga ni masapen ni zingsang phalvak tungin Magdala khuami Mary leh Mary dang khat daihawh dingin a pai uhhi. (ZSV)
Tua ciangin Kapernaum khua tung uh a, a Sabbath ni-in kikhopna inn sungah Zeisu pai-in thu hilh ding a kipan hi.

Khatvei, Sabbath ni khatin Zeisu leh a nungzuite, mangbuh lo nawkin a pai uhhi. A paikawmun a nungzuite in mangbuhvui a zut uhhi. 24 Tua ahih ciangin Pharisee mite in Zeisu kiangah, "Banghangin Sabbath ni-in gamtatloh dingpi, na nungzuite gamta uh ahi hiam?" a ci uhhi.

Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Sabbath ni, mihingte' phattuamna dingin a kibawl hi a, mihing pen Sabbath ni a phattuamna dingin a kibawl hilo hi. 28 Tua ahih ciangin Mihing Tapa pen Sabbath ni nangawn a ukpa ahi hi," ci-in a thugen a khum hi.

Zeisu gamtakhial hi, ci-in a mawhsak nuam mi pawlkhat tua lai-ah om uh a, Sabbath ni-in hih mipa a damsakkha hiam, ci-in vil gige uhhi. 3 Zeisu in khutzaw mipa kiangah, "Hih a mailamah hong ding in," a ci hi. 4 Tua ciangin mite kiangah, "Sabbath ni-in bang i hih ding i Thukham in hong deih ahi hiam? Huh ding maw, gimsak ding; mi khat a nuntakna hot ding maw, thah ding; koi hong deihzaw ahi hiam?" ci-in a dong hi. Ahih hangin kuamah in dawnglo hi.

A Sabbath ni ciangin kikhopna inn-ah thu a hilh hi. Ama thuhilh a za mi tampite in lamdangsa-in, "Hihpa in hih thute koi panin a ngah ahi hiam? Hihpa tungah a kipia pilna a bang pilna ahi hiam? Bangci-in na lamdang hici bawltheih ahi hiam?
Tua ni pen Sabbath ni ma, Kigin' ni ahih manin nitak lam ciangin,
Sabbath ni a bei khit ciangin Magdala khuami Mary, James nu Mary, leh Salome-te in Zeisu' luang a va zutna dingun paknamtui a va lei uhhi.

Tua ciangin ama khan'na Nazareth khua-ah Zeisu pai a, Sabbath ni ciangin a paingei bangin kikhopna inn-ah a pai hi. Laisiangtho a sim dingin amah ding a,31Tua ciangin Galilee gam Kapernaum khua-ah paisuk a, Sabbath ni-in thu a hilh hi.

Sabbath ni khatin mangbuh lo nawkin Zeisu leh a nungzuite a pai uhhi. A nungzuite in mangbuhvuite zut uh a, a khutsung uhah nuai-in a ne uhhi. 2 Amaute lakah a om Pharisee mite pawlkhat in, "Sabbath ni-in i hih dingin a kilawmlo gamtatna Banghangin gamta na hi uhhiam?" a ci uhhi.

Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Mihing Tapa pen Sabbath ni a Ukpa ahi hi," ci-in a thugen a khum hi. 6 Sabbath a ni dang khatin kikhopna inn khatah Zeisu pai-in thu a hilh hi. A khut taklam a zaw mi khat tua lai-ah na om hi. 7 Thukham hilh siate leh Pharisee mite pawlkhat in Zeisu a mawhsak theihna ding uh thu zongnuam uh ahih manin, Sabbath ni-in hih mipa a damsak hiam, ci-in na encik gige uhhi. 8 Ahi zongin Zeisu in amau' ngaihsutna thei ahih manin a khutzaw mipa kiangah, "Ding in la, mihonte mai hih lai munah hong pai in," a ci hi. A mipa zong hong pai-in mihon mai-ah a hong ding hi. 9 Tua ciangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, "Note tungah thu khat kong dong nuam hi. Sabbath ni-in a pha bawlding leh a sia bawlding koi kilawmzaw a, mi khat' nuntakna suahtaksak ding leh siatsak ding koi hoihzaw ahi hiam?" a ci hi.
Sabbath ni khatin Zeisu in kikhopna inn khat sungah thu hilhin a om hi.

Ahi zongin Zeisu in Sabbath ni-in cina a damsakna hangin kikhopna inn ukpa a heh suak a, mite kiangah, "Na a kisep theihna ding hun ni guk sung om hi. Tua hun sungin hong pai-in kidamsak unla, ahi zongin Sabbath ni-in hong pai kei un," a ci hi. 15 Tua ciangin Topa in amah dawng a, "No a kineihkhem mite aw, note in Sabbath ni mahin zong na bawngte uh ahi a, na late uh ahi zongin a buk panin na khihna khaute uh sutin, tui pia dingin paipih hilo na hi uhhiam? 16 Tua mah bangin Satan in Abraham' suante khat ahi hih numei pen kum sawmlegiat sung hencip hi. Hih a kihencipna panin Sabbath ni-in hih numei khahkhiat ding kilawm hilo ahi hiam?" a ci hi.

Sabbath ni khatin Pharisee mi upa khat' inn-ah anne dingin Zeisu pai a, mite in amah encik uhhi. 2 Tua laitakin a khut leh a khe a bawk mi khat Zeisu kiangah hong pai a, 3 Zeisu in zong Thukham hilh siate leh Pharisee mite kiangah, "Sabbath ni-in cina damsak ding i Thukham in hong hiam, khak hiam?" ci-in a dong hi. 4 Ahi zongin kuamah in dawngloin omcip uhhi. Zeisu in zong tua mipa samin a damsak khit ciangin a ciahsak hi. 5 Tua ciangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, "Note khatpeuh' tapa ahi a, na bawngtal uh ahi zongin tuikhuk thukpi sungah Sabbath ni-in kia leh, Sabbath ni hinapi-in kaikhia veve ding hilo na hi uhhiam?" a ci hi.

Tua ni pen nipi zawh ni nga ni hi a, Sabbath ni hong hi dektak ta hi. 55 Galilee gam panin a hong zui numeite in zong a kivuina-ah zui uh ahih manin a hanphual leh a luang kisialzia khempeuh zong a mu uhhi. 56 Tua ciangin amaute ciah uh a, Zeisu' luang a nuh dingun paknamtui leh sathau a bawlkhol uhhi. Thukham zui-in Sabbath ni tawlnga-in a om uhhi.

tua cinapa thakhatin dampah a, a lupna pheek la-in a paipah hi. Tua ni pen Sabbath ni hi citciat ahih manin, 10 Jerusalem khuasunga om Jew mi uliante in cina damkikpa kiangah, "Tuni pen Sabbath ni ahih manin lupna pheek na puak ding ngeina hilo hi," a cih uh ciangin 11 amah in, "Kei hong damsakpa in, ‘Na lupna pheek la in la pai in,’ hong ci hi," ci-in a dawng hi.

Tua ahih manin Zeisu in Sabbath ni-in cina a damsakna hangin amaute in Zeisu bawlsiat ding a kipan uhhi. 17 Ahi zongin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, "Ka Pa in tuni dongin na sem tawntung ahih manin kei zong ka sep ding mah ahi hi," a ci hi. 18 Hih bangin ama kampauna hangin amaute in Zeisu thatnuam semsem uhhi. Amah in Sabbath thukham a palsat bek hiloin, Pasian nangawn ka Pa ci ahih manin Pasian tawh a kikimin kiseh hi, ci-in a mawhsak uhhi.

Zeisu in, "Sabbath ni-in cina damsakna na lamdang khat ka bawlna hangin lamdang na sa mahmah uhhi. 22 Moses in na tapate uh vun na at ding uh thu hong pia a, (a taktakin Moses thupiak ma pekin na pu na pate un a palsat thu ahi hi) vun at ni ding leh Sabbath ni a kituahkhak ciangin a vun na at veve uhhi. 23 Moses thupiakna a kipelhlohna dingin Sabbath ni-in vun at na hih uh leh Sabbath ni-in mi khat ka damsak manin Banghangin kei tungah heh na hi uhhiam?

Zeisu in buan bawlin a mit a vaksak ni pen Sabbath ni a hihi. 15 Pharisee mite in tua mipa in khua a muhtheih kikna zia thu dong leuleu uhhi. Amah in, "Tua mipa in ka mitah buan hong nuh a, ka mai ka phiat leh khua ka mu theikik hi," a ci hi. 16 Pharisee mi pawlkhat in, "Amah in Sabbath ni tanglo ahih manin Pasian kiang panin hong pai mi hilo ding hi," a ci uhhi. Ahi zongin pawlkhatte in, "A gamta khial mi in Banghangin hih bangin na lamdang bawlthei ding ahi hiam?" ci leuleu ahih manin mite' ngaihsutna kituaklo hi.

Tua ni pen Kigin' ni hi a, a zingciang Sabbath ni thupi diak ahih manin tua ni-in singlamteh tungah a luangte a omlai ding deihlo uh ahih ciangin Jerusalem khua-a Jew mi uliante, Pilat kiangah va pai-in a khete uh kuaitanin a luangte a lakkhiatna dingun a ngen uhhi.

Zeisu, singlamteh tungah a kithahna mun tawh kinai-ah huan khat om a, tua huansungah kuamah a kivui ngei nailohna hankhuk thak khat a om hi. 42 Tua ni pen Kigin' ni hi a, Jew mite' Sabbath ni hong naita ahih manin, tua hankhuk a nai ahihna hangin nawhsa thu-in tua lai munah Zeisu a vui uhhi.
Ahi zongin Perga khua panin amaute paisuak uh a, Pisidia gam Antiok khua a tung uhhi. Sabbath ni-in kikhopna inn-ah pai-in a tu uhhi.

Jerusalem khua-a a teng mite leh a makaite un Zeisu pen Honpa ahih lamtak na theilo uh a, Sabbath nisimin a kisim niloh kamsangte' thu zong na tello uhhi. Amaute in Zeisu na mawhsak uh ahih manin kamsangte' thugente a manin hong tung hi.

Kikhopna inn panin Paul leh Barnabas a ciahding uh ciangin, Sabbath ni kik ciangin hih thute mah hong gen lai un, ci-in mite in a vaikhak uhhi. 43 Kikhopna inn panin a ciahkhiat uh ciangin Jew mi tampite leh Jew biakna a zui Gentail mi tampite in Paul leh Barnabas zui uh a, amaute gel in zong tua mite hanthawnin, Pasian' hehpihna suangin kiptakin a omna dingun a gen uhhi. 44 A Sabbath ni kik ciangin Pasian' thu a ngai dingin a khuazang phialun hong kikhawm uhhi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Sabbath nisimin kikhopna innte-ah Moses Thukhamte kisim ngitnget a, khua khempeuhah Moses thugente mah hilh belin kinei hi," a ci hi.
A Sabbath ni ciangin Jew mite' thungetna mun om ding hi, ci-in ka upna uh khua pualama gun gei-ah ka pai uh a, tua lai-ah tu-in a kikhawm numeite tungah thu ka hilh uhhi.

A pai ngei zel mah bangin Paul zong kikhopna inn-ah pai a, Sabbath ni thum sung Laisiangtho siksanin mite tawh thu kikum a, 3 Christ in sihna thuakin, sihna panin a thawhkik ding a kisam ahi hi, ci-in a laktel hi. Tu-a note kiangah kong pulak Christ pen Laisiangtho sunga kigen Christ ahi hi, ci-in Paul in a gen hi.
Sabbath ni simin kikhopna inn-ah limtakin thu gen a, Jew mi leh Grik mite in thu a upna dingun a hanciam hi.
Sani nitakin an nekhawm dingin ka kikhawm uh a, a zingciangin a dingkhia ding ahih manin Paul in a thuhilh zankim ciangdong a zomsuak hi.

Ahi zongin note in tu-in Pasian meltheih khinin, tua ahih kei leh Pasian in note hong meltheih khinta ahih manin, a Banghangin bangmah a hih zolo, a ginalo tua bangte lamah kiheikik nuam a, sila va suakkik nuam na hi uhhiam? 10 Note in nite, khate, hunte, kumte-a kipan pawi tuamtuamte limtakin tan'ding na hah ngaihsut mahmah uhhi. 11 Tua ahih manin note-a' dingin ka nasepna khempeuh a mawkna a suahkhak ding ka hong lunghihmawhsak mahmah hi.
Tua ahih manin annek tuidawn, biakna pawite, Khadet Pawi, leh Sabbath ni tawh kisai-in kuamah in ngeina zuihding bawl kei un.
Laisiangtho mun khatah, "A ni sagih ni-in a nasepna khempeuh panin Pasian tawlnga hi," ci-in ni sagihna thu tawh kisai na gen hi.

Tua ahih manin tu-a thu om zia-ah ci lehang ni sagih ni-in Pasian a tawlngak mah bangin Pasian' mite a tawlngakna ding omlai hi. 10 Banghang hiam cihleh a nasepna panin Pasian a tawlngak mah bangin va pai-in Pasian tawh a tawlngate khempeuh zong a nasepna panun khawl ding uhhi.

Tua ciangin { Topa } Pasian in gulpi kiangah, "Nang, hih bangin gamta khin na hih manin, ganhing khempeuhte leh gamlak ganhing khempeuhte sangin ciamsiatna na ngahzaw hi. Na gilpi-in lam na pai ding a, na nuntak sung tawntungin leivui na ne ding hi. 15 Nang leh numei kikal na suanlekhakte leh ama suanlekhakte kikalah kilangneihna ka omsak ding hi. Amah in na lutang hong sunim ding a, nang in ama khetul na sunim ding hi," a ci hi.

Tua ciangin mipa kiangah, "Nang in na zi' thu mangin, ‘Nang in na ne kei ding hi,’ ci-in nang kong thupiak singgah ne na hih ciangin, nangma hangin leitang in samsiatna ngah hi. Na nuntak tawntung gimpi-in na semin na annek ding na zong ding hi.
Na sanggampa' sisan a hup dingin a kam a ka leitang tungah tu-in nang hong kisamsiat hi.

{ Topa } in a namtui gimnam a zak ciangin, a lungsim sungah, "Mihing' gamtatna hangin leitang kasamsia kik ngei nawn kei ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh mihing' lungsim ngaihsutna pen a tangval lai panin a gilo hi mawk hi. Tu-a ka hih bangin nuntakna a nei khempeuh zong ka susia ngei nawn kei ding hi.
amah in, "Kanaan in samsiatna ngah ta hen la, a sanggamte' sila hi ta hen.
Nang thupha hong piate thupha ka pia ding a, nang hong samsiate ka samsia ding hi. Nang' thupha ngah bangin thupha a ngahna dingun leitung midang khempeuh in hong ngen ding uhhi," a ci hi.

Ka pa in kei hong lawngkha leh, amah in ka khemna hong thei ding a, kei' tungah thupha hiloinsamsiatna hong tung zawsop ding hi," a ci hi.13 A nu in ama kiangah, "Nangma thuak ding samsiatna kei tungah hong tung ta hen, ka ta aw; ka thu hong mangpeuh inla, pai-in keelnote kei' kiangah hong puak in," a ci hi.

Mite in nangma na hong sem hen la, minamte na mai-ah hong kun ta uh hen. Na sanggamte' tungah topa hi in la, na sanggamte' suanlekhakte, na mai-ah hong kun uh hen. Nang hong samsiapeuhmah in samsiatna ngah hen la, thupha hong pia peuhmah in thupha ngah ta hen," a ci hi.
Amau' sinsona lauhuai a, amau' hehna kihtakhuai hi. Ciamsiatna ngah ta uh hen! Jacob suante sungah amaute ka khenthang ding a, Israel sungah amaute ka thehthang ding hi.

Tuate' mai-ah na kun kei ding uh a, tuate na bia kei ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh keimah note' { Topa } Pasian, a aam Pasian ka hi a, kei hong mudahte' tungah pate' mawhna tate' tungah khang thum khang lina dongin thuk-in, 6 ahih hangin kei hong itin ka thupiakte a zui mi a tul tampite tungah itna kip a lakpa ka hihi. 7 { Topa } note' Pasian' min a sia lamin na zang kei ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } in ama min a zang khialte gim pia ding hi.

"Ama pa hita leh ama nu hita leh a sat peuhmah kithat ding hi. 16 "Zuak ding ahi a, sila-in neih ding ahi zongin mi a gu mi peuhmah kithat ding hi. 17 "Ama pa hita leh ama nu hita leh a samsia mi peuhmah kithat ding hi.
"Thukhente na simmawh kei ding uh a, na mite uh a ukpa zong na samsia kei ding uhhi.
Note in a manlopi-in keima min tawh na kiciam kei ding uh a, tua bangin na Pasian uh' min na daisak kei ding uhhi; kei pen { Topa } ka hihi.
Note in bilngongte phuisam loin, mittawte' mai-ah a puk theihna ding na na koih kei ding uh a, note in na Pasian uh na zahtak ding uhhi; kei pen { Topa } ka hihi.
"Banghang hiam cihleh a nu ahih kei leh a pa a samsia mi peuhmah kithat ding hi. Amah in a nu ahih kei leh a pa samsia khin a, ama sihna amahmah ngawh ding a hihi.
Israel numei' tapa in Min Siangtho gensia-in samsia hi. Amaute in Moses kiangah amah paipih uhhi. Ama nu' min pen Shelomith hi a, Dan minam, Dibri' tanu a hihi.

"A samsia mipa pen giahphual pualamah paipih in. Ama samsiat a za mi khempeuh ama lu tungah amau' khut ngasak in la, mihonte khempeuh amah denglumsak in. 15 Tua ciangin Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: Ama Pasian a samsia mi peuhmah in ama khialhna thuak ding hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Moses in Israel mite tungah hih thu a gen hi. Amaute in a samsia mipa giahphual pualamah paipih uh a, suang tawh a denglum uhhi. { Topa } in Moses a thupiak bangin Israel mite in a hih uhhi.

Tu-in hong pai in la, amaute hat lua uh ahih manin hih mite hong samsiatsak in. Tua hi leh amaute zo-in hih gam panin ka hawlkhiazo khading hi. Banghang hiam cihleh thupha na piak mi in thupha ngahin, na samsiat mi in siatna a ngahna ka thei hi," cisak hi.

‘En in, Egypt panin mihon khat hong paikhia a, lei maitang teng dim uhhi. Tu-in hong pai in la, amaute hong samsiatsak in. Tua hi leh amaute do-in ka hawlkhiazo khading hi,’ hong ci hi," ci-in a gen hi. 12 Pasian in Balaam kiangah, "Amaute na zui kei ding hi. Tua mite thupha a kipia ahih manin nasamsia kei ding hi," a ci hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh minphatna lianpi nang kong pia ding a, kei' tunga nong gen peuhpeuh ka hih ding hi. Hong pai in la, hih mite hong samsiatsak in,’ ci hi," ci-in a gen uhhi.
Pasian' samsiat loh mite bangci samsiat ding ka hi hiam? { Topa' } mawhsak loh mite bangci mawhsak ding ka hi hiam?

Tua ciangin Balak in Balaam kiangah, "Kei bang hong cih na hi hiam? Ka galte a samsia dingin nang kong sam a, ahi zongin amaute bangmah cihloin, amaute thupha na pia zawsop hi," a ci hi. 12 Amah in, "{ Topa } in ka gen dingin hong sawl thu, donlo ding ka hi hiam?" ci-in a dawng hi. 13 Tua ciangin Balak in ama kiangah, "Amaute na muh theihna ding mun dangah kei hong zui in. Amaute a madawk teng bek na mu ding a, a vekpi-in na mu kei ding hi. Tua ciangin tua lai panin amaute nong samsiatsak ding hi," a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Balak in Balaam kiangah, "Amaute samsia peuhmah kei in la, thupha zong pia peuhmah kei in," a ci hi. 26 Ahih hangin Balaam in Balak kiangah, "‘{ Topa' } cih khempeuh keimah in ka hih ding hi,’ hong ci hilo ka hi hiam?" ci-in a dawng hi. 27 Balak in Balaam kiangah, "Tu-in hong pai in; mun dangah kong paipih ding hi. Tua lai panin amaute nong samsiatsakna ding Pasian in hong lungkimpih khading hi," a ci hi.

Amaute bok a, humpinelkai pa bangin lumsuk uhhi. Humpinelkaipi bangin lumsuk uhhi. Kua in amaute phong ngam ding ahi hiam? Note thupha hong piate in thupha ngah hen la, note hongsamsiate in samsiatna ngah ta hen," a ci hi. 10 Balaam' tungah Balak heh mahmah a, amah in a khut leh a khut a tuum hi. Balak in Balaam kiangah, "Ka galte a samsia dingin nang kong sam hi. En in, nang in amaute thumvei tak thupha na pia khinzo hi.
"‘{ Topa } note' Pasian' min a sia lamin na zang kei ding uhhi; Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } in ama min a sia lamin a zang mi a mawhlo hi, cilo ding hi.

Note' inn sungah a kihhuai nate na tumpih kei ding uh a, tua nate tawh kibangin samsiat a thuak mi na kisuaksak kei ding uhhi. Note in tua nate mudah mahmahin na kih ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh tua nate a kisamsia na a hihi.

Banghang hiam cihleh Egypt panin na paikhiat lai-un lampi-ah an leh tui tawh amaute in note hong dawnlo uh a, note hong samsia dingin Mesopotamia gam Pethor khua panin Beor' tapa Balaam cial uhhi. 5 Ahih hangin { Topa } na Pasian un Balaam' thu ngailo hi. { Topa } na Pasian un note hong it ahih manin, { Topa } na Pasian un samsiatna pen note-a' dingin thupha-in hong heisakzaw hi.

"Ahih hangin note in { Topa } na Pasian uh thu mangloin, tuni-a kong gen ama thupiaknate leh ama thukhamte khempeuh limtakin na zuih kei uh leh, hih samsiatna khempeuh note tungah hong tung ding a, note hong ban ding hi. 16 "Khuapi sungah hong kisamsia ding a, lo-ah zong hong kisamsia ding hi. 17 "Na lawhte uh leh na annel mekna kuangte un zong samsiatna ngah ding hi. 18 "Note' sung pana piangte leh na leitang uh pana piangte, na bawngte uh leh na tuuhon note uh in zong samsiatna ngah ding hi. 19 "Na sep na bawlna khempeuh uhah hamsia na ngah ding uhhi. 20 "Note in { Topa } na nusiat uh a, na gamtatsiat uh leh, note sia-in na sihmang khit matengun { Topa } in note tungah samsiatna, buaina, cihmawhnate hong tungsak ding hi.

{ Topa } in note na kidamsak kik theihloh ding uh a nasia mahmah meimatumte tawh na khukte uh leh na khete uh meimasak gawpin, na khenuai panun na luzang dong uhah na thuak ding uhhi. 36 "Note leh na pu na pate un a theih ngeiloh minam khat kiangah { Topa } in note leh note tungah na koih uh na kumpipa uh hong tun'pih ding a, tua lai-ah singlesuang tawh a kibawl pasian dangte' na na sem ding uhhi. 37 { Topa } in note hong paikhiatpihna mite lakah a cikzethuai, Paunak, leh gentehna na suak ding uhhi. 38 "Khaici tampi lo-ah na tuh ding uh a, ahi zongin tawmno bek na khawm ding uhhi; Banghang hiam cihleh kauphe in nemang ding hi. 39 Note in leenggah lo zuanin na puah ding uh a, ahih hangin leenggahzu dawnloin, leenggah zong na ne kei ding uhhi; Banghang hiam cihleh lung in tuate ne ding hi. 40 Na gamsung khempeuh uhah oliv kung na nei ding uh a, ahih hangin a thau tawh note na kizut kei ding uhhi; Banghang hiam cihleh na oliv gahte uh pulh ding hi. 41 Tanute leh tapate na nei ding uh a, ahih hangin amaute pen nomau-a' hilo ding uhhi; Banghang hiam cihleh amaute galmat suak ding uhhi. 42 Na singte khempeuh uh leh, na leitang panun a piang khempeuh kauphete in tang ding uhhi.

"Amah in note hong piak thupiaknate leh thukhamte zuiloin, { Topa } na Pasian uh thu manglo na hih manun, note na sih matengun hih samsiatnate khempeuh note' tungah hong tungin, note hong delhin hong pha ding uhhi.

{ Topa } in amah maisaklo ding a, { Topa' } hehna leh hazatna meikhu bangin tua mipa' langkhatah khuzaw-in, hih laibu sunga kigelh samsiatnate ama tungah tu ding a, { Topa } in a mun khempeuh panin ama min phiat ding hi. 21 { Topa } in hih thukham laibu sunga a kigelh thuciam samsiatnate khempeuh tawh kizui-in gimna a thuak dingin Israel minamte khempeuh lak panin amah tengkhia ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin a mite tungah { Topa } heh mahmah a, hih laibu sunga om samsiatnate khempeuh hih leitungah tungsak hi.
"Note' mai-ah ka koih, na teel ding thu thupha leh samsiatna, hih nate khempeuh note tungah hong tungin, { Topa } in note hong hawlkhiatna minamte lakah hih thute phawk kikin,
{ Topa } na Pasian un hih samsiatnate khempeuh, no hong bawlsia na galte uh leh na langte uh tungah tungsak ding hi.

Tuni-in note' langkhatah teci a pang dingin vantung leh leitung ka sam a, note' mai-ah na teel dingun nuntakna leh sihna, thupha leh samsiatna ka koih hi. Tua ahih ciangin note leh na suanlekhakte uh na hin'theihna dingun nuntakna teel unla,

Tua hun laitakin Joshua in amaute tungah thuciamna khat koih a, "Mi khat kipanin hih Jerikho khuapi a lamkikpa in { Topa' } mai-ah samsiatna thuak ta hen. A tacil luang khaamin tua khuapi bulpi phut ding a, a tapa neupen luang khaamin a kulhkongpite phut ding hi," a ci hi.
Tua khit ciangin amah in thukham laibu sunga a kigelh bangbangin thukham kammal khempeuh, thupha leh samsiatnate a sim hi.
Tu-in note hong kisamsia a, note pawlkhat a tawntungin sila, ka Pasian uh inn-a dingin sing suite leh tui tawite na hi ding uhhi," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Moab kumpipa, Zippor' tapa Balak hong khangin Israel mite hong do hi. Amah in mi sawlin note hong samsia dingin Beor' tapa Balaam a samsak hi.

"{ Topa' } vantung mi in, ‘Meroz khua samsia in, a sunga teng mite nasia takin samsia in. Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } a huh dingin a thahatpa dona-ah { Topa } a huh dingin hong kuanlo uhhi,’ a ci hi.
Pasian in Shekhem mite khempeuh' gitlohna hangin Jerubbaal' tapa Jotham' samsiatna bangin amau' tungah gimna a tungsak hi.

Amah in a nu kiangah, "Ngun pek tul leh za khat hong kiguksak lai-in a gupa na samsiatna thu ka za hi. A ngunte pen keima guk hi a, tu-in hih lai-ah tuate om hi," a ci hi. Tua ciangin a nu in, "Ka tapa aw, { Topa } in thupha hong pia ta hen," a ci hi.
Ahi zongin amau' zi dingin i tanute i pia thei kei hi," a ci uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh Israel mite kiciam khinin, "Benjamin-te tungah zi a pia mipa in samsiatna ngah ta hen," a ci uhhi.

Israel mite tua ni-in lungkham uhhi; Banghang hiam cihleh Saul in mite tungah kiciamna khat koih a, "Tu nitak mateng leh ka galte ka thukzawh matengin an a nepa in samsiatna ngah ta hen," a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin mite khat beek in an ciamlo uhhi.
Tua ciangin mite khat in, "Na pa in kiciamna khat tawh nakpi takin mite thuhilh a, ‘Tuni-in an a ne mipa in samsiatna ngah ta hen,’ ci hi," a ci hi. Mite gim mahmah uhhi.
Tua ciangin Filistia-pa in David kiangah, "Ui hong sa a, ciangkang tawh sat hong sawm na hi hiam?" a ci hi. Filistia-pa in a pasian-te' min tawh David samsia hi.

Tua ahih ciangin tu-in ka to kumpipa in a nasempa' thu za in. Keimah a do dingin nang hong toksuahpa pen { Topa } ahih leh amah in biakna hong sang ta hen; ahih hangin mihing ahih leh amaute in { Topa' } mai-ah samsiatna ngah ta hen. Banghang hiam cihleh amaute in, ‘Pai in; pasian dangte' na sem in,’ ci-in { Topa' } gamh ka ngahlohna dingin tuni-in kei hong hawlkhia uhhi.

Bahurim-ah Kumpi David a tun' ciangin Saul' innsung innkuan mi, Gera' tapa Shimei min nei mi khat hong paikhia a, a paikawmin David samsia tawntung hi. 6 Amah in Kumpi David leh a nasemte khempeuh suang tawh deng hi. Mi khempeuh leh mi thahatte khempeuh David' taklam leh veilamah om uhhi. 7 Shimei in a samsiat kawmin, "Pai mang, pai mang, nang mi thatpa, bangmah manlo mipa! 8 Ama tangin na uk Saul' innkuante na thahna hangin { Topa } in nangma tungah hong thuk hi. { Topa } in na tapa Absalom' tungah kumpi gam pia khinta hi. Thei in, na siatna nangma lu tungah hong tu hi; Banghang hiam cihleh nang pen mi thatpa na hi hi," a ci hi. 9 Tua ciangin a nu Zeruiah ahi Abishai in kumpipa kiangah, "Banghangin hih uisi a banglel mi khat in ka to kumpipa samsia ding ahi hiam? Hong kuansak in la a lu hong tankhiasak in," a ci hi. 10 Ahih hangin kumpipa in, "No Zeruiah tapate aw, note tawh bang kisai ahi hiam? { Topa } in ama kiangah, ‘David samsia in,’ a cihna hangin hong samsia ahih leh, ‘Banghangin tuaci hih na hi hiam?’ kua in ci ding ahi hiam?" a ci hi. 11 Tua ciangin David in Abishai leh a nasemte khempeuh kiangah, "En un, keima tapa mahmah in kei thah dingin hong zong hi; hih Benjamin mi in bangzahin tu-in hong zongzaw kan ding ahi hiam! Ama thu-in omsak un, amah hong samsiasak un; Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } in amah a sawl hi khading hi.12 { Topa } in ka thuakna hong enin, tuni-a kei hong samsiatna hangin { Topa } in a hoih tawh kei hong thuk khading hi," a ci hi. 13 Tua ahih ciangin ama galkhat mualpangah Shimei pai a, a paikawmin samsia-in suang tawh amah dengin leivui a theh laitakin David leh a mite lampi-ah pai uhhi.
Tua ciangin a nu Zeruiah ahi Abishai hong paukhia a, "Amah in { Topa' } sathau nilhpa samsia ahih manin hih thu hangin Shimei thah ding hilo ahi hiam?" a ci hi.

Mahanaim-ah ka pai lai-in a nasia samsiatna tawh kei a hong samsia, Bahurim panin a hong pai Benjamin mi Gera' tapa Shimei zong nang tawh om hi. Ahih hangin Jordan-ah keimah a dawn dingin hong pai ciangin ama tungah { Topa } tawh kiciamin, ‘Namsau tawh nang kong that kei ding hi,’ ka ci hi.
Ama mai-ah mi ginalo nih koihin ama langkhatah mawhna zong sakin, ‘Nang in Pasian leh kumpipa na samsia hi,’ cisak un. Tua ciangin amah lakhia unla denglum un," a ci hi.

Tua ciangin mi ginalo nihte hong pai-in ama mai-ah tu uhhi. Tua ciangin mi ginalo nihte in mite' omin Naboth' mawhna zong uh a, "Naboth in Pasian leh kumpipa samsia hi," a ci uhhi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute in khuapi pualamah amah paipih uh a, suang tawh amah denglum uhhi.
Tua ciangin amah a kiimah khuadak a, amah in amaute a muh ciangin { Topa' } min tawh amaute a samsia hi. Tua ciangin gamlak panin vompi nih hong pai-in naupang sawmlenih balnen hi.
Tua ciangin amaute sungtumin an ne-in tui a dawn uhhi. Tua ciangin amah in, "Tu-in a kisamsiahih numei tawm unla, phum un. Bangbang ahi ta zongin amah kumpipa' tanu hibuang hi," a ci hi.

amaute gamkhing leh samsiat a ngahte a suahna dingin hih mun leh a tungah a teng mite tungah ka kampauna na zak ciangin na lungsim kisikin { Topa' } mai-ah nangmahmah kiniamkhiatin, na puante balkekin ka mai-ah na kahna thu, keimah in zong ka za hi, { Topa } in ci hi.
{ Topa } in hih bangin ci hi: En un, Judah kumpipa mai-ah a kisim laibu sunga kigelh samsiatnate khempeuh ahi siatna, hih mun leh a tungah a teng mi khempeuh tungah ka tungsak ding hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh amaute in an leh tui tawh Israel mite na dawnlo uh a, amaute a samsiadingin Balaam cial zawsop uhhi. Ahi zongin i Pasian in tua samsiatna thupha-in hong heisak hi.

Amaute taigawpin ka samsia a, pawlkhat satin a sam uh ka bawhsak gawp hi. Tua ciangin Pasian' min tawh amaute ka kiciamsak a, "Note in amau' tapate' zi dingin na tanute uh na pia kei ding uh a, na tapate uh zi ding ahi a, nomau' zi dingin ahi zongin amaute' tanu na la kei ding uhhi.

Tua banga a pawi bawl uh gual khat a kikhit ciangin Job in a tapate samin amaute sian'suah a, zingsangin tho baihin a ta phazah tawh kizui-in meihal biakna a pia hi; Banghang hiam cihleh Job in, "Ka tate khialin, a lungsim sung uhah Pasian samsia khathei ding uhhi," a ci hi. Tu-a bangin Job in hih tawntung hi.
Ahi zongin na khut zanin ama neihsa khempeuh suksak lecin na maitang mahmahah nang hongsamsia pah ding hi," a ci hi.
Tu-in na khut zan in la, ama sa leh a guh suksak lecin nangma maitang mahah pelloin nang hongsamsia ding hi," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin a zi in, "Na upna khiam tuanlo ding na hi hiam? Pasian samsia in la sisuk mai in," a ci hi.
Hih bang teng khit ciangin Job in thugen hong kipan a, mihingin a pian' ni a samsia hi.
Phuisamna tawh awle a khiim thei, a mitphial tawh tuipi ganhing a hencip thei mite in tua zansamsia ta hen.
"Tua bang migilo peuhpeuh tuikhang in taii a, ama neih leitangte Pasian in samsia a, tua leenggui lote-ah nasemin kikuan nawnlo hi.
A sih ding uh deihna tawh ka samsia ngei kei hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh migilo in a lungsim deihna kisaktheihpih a, ngahna dingah a huaihampa in { Topa } phuisamin a taisan hi.
Ama kampaute pen hamsia, khemna, leh netniamna tawh kidim a, siatna leh manlohna bekbek thugenin a nei tawntung hi.
Siat nading panin na leii kem in la, zuau genna panin na muk kem in. 14 Siatna panin kihemkhia in la, a hoih bawl in. Kilemna ding hanciam in la, na phak mateng delh in.
Ama kammalte pen siatna leh khemna vive hi a, pil gamtatna leh hoih gamtatna bei khinta hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa' } thupha piakte in leitung luah ding uh a, ahih hangin a samsiatte kipuaseh ding hi.
"Ka leii tawh ka khialhlohna dingin ka gamtatna ka kikem ding a, ka omna-ah migilote a omlaiteng ka kam ka kham ding hi," ka ci hi.
Amau' kama a mawhna a muk uh tawh a pauna hangin, amau' kiphatsakna-ah amau mah awksak in. Amaute in hamsiatna zangin zuauthu a genna hangun,
Amah a zaliatna panin sukniam ding bekbek amaute in a sawm uhhi. Amaute in thuman lo-ah nuamsa mahmah uhhi. Amaute in a kampi uh tawh phat khem uh a, ahih hangin a sungtawng uhah samsiat uhhi.

Amah in mi samsiat nuam a sa hi. Ama tungah samsiatnate tungsak in. Amah in thupha pia nuamlo hi. Kuamah in amah thupha pia kei ta hen. 18 Amah pen puansilh bangin samsiatna kingeina seh hi. Tua a samsiatnate ama pumpi sungah tui bangin a guhte sungah sathau bangin lutin kizel ta hen. 19 Tua samsiatnate pen ama kituamna puan tawh kibang hen la, nisimin amah a kigakna a kawnggak tawh kibang ta hen.
Amaute in kei hong samsiat hangin nangmah in kei thupha nong pia ding hi. Ka langte zahhuaisak in la, na nasempa keimah hong kipsak ta in.
Nangmah in na thupiaknate panin a pialkhia, a kisamsiat, a kiphasakte na thuhilh hi.
{ Topa } in migilote' innsung samsia a, thuman mite' innsung thupha a pia hi.
Midikte in pilna thu gen uh a, thu hoihlo a gente' leii ki-attan ding hi. 32 Midikte in a gen ding uh thuhoih thei a, migilote in thusia bekbek gengen uhhi.
An man khan'ding ngakna-in a zuak nuamlote kisamsia a, leinop hunin a zuakpahte kiphat hi.
Ngaihsun lo-a kampauna in tem hiam bangin mi liamsak thei a, mipilte' kampauna in tua bang liamna damsak thei hi.
Kam nemin dawn'na in hehna damsak a, kam khauh in hehna piangsak hi.
Kampauna in sihna ahi a, hin'na ahi zongin piangsak thei a, i kampauna bangin a piangte san'loh phamawh hi.
Na nu leh na pa na samsiat leh khuamial sunga om meivak kisumit na bang ding hi.
Kampau a ki-ipzote lungkhamna tawh kipelh hi.
Mimawh kimlai a diksak thukhenpa leitunga mi khempeuh in mudahin phuisam ding hi.
Mizawng a huhte cimawh ngeilo ding a, huhna a pia nuamlote in samsiatna ngah ding hi.
Guktakna sungah a kipawl mipa ama-a' dingin thusia zongpa a hihi. A guktakna pulak leh amah gim kipia ding a, genkhia kei leh lah Pasian in samsia veve ding hi.
A pate samsia-in a min a daisak, a nute a phatlo mi pawlkhat om hi.

Khialkha ing, ci-in Pasian' siampipa' mai-ah na gen ding kisam khading ahih manin na kampauna hangin khialkha kei in. Tua bangin gamta khial lecin nangma tungah Pasian heh ding a, na sepsa khempeuh hong suksiatsak ding hi.
Mi' gen khempeuh thudon kei in. Na nasempa' hong samsiatna na zakha ding hi. 22 Nang zong midang na samsiat zelzelna teltakin na kithei hi.
Na lungsim nangawnah kumpipa gensia kei in. Kuama zaklohna mun na lupna tung nangawnah mihaute samsia kei in. Thopi in na thugen teng na puakkha ding hi.
Leitang tungah amau guak a teng ding dong zahin midangte-a' dingin mun khempeuh a bei matengin inn khatlekhat, lo khatlekhat gawmin a la thuah tawntung mite in gimna ngah ta hen.
Tua ahih ciangin { Topa } in leitung samsiatin susia a, a tunga a teng mite in amau' mawhna hangun a thuak uhhi. Tua ahih ciangin leitungah a teng mite tawm semsem hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh mun khempeuhah angkawmte a dim hi. { Topa' } hamsiatna hangin gamsung tengah kahna dim a, gamlak lonona munte a keu mang hi. Amaute gamtatsia uh a, a vangliatna uh a manlopi-in a zang uhhi.
"{ Topa' } na citakin a semlopa in kamsiatna thuak ta hen. Thahna dingin a namsau a doklopa in hamsiatna thuak ta hen.
Amaute phuisam in la, a cimawh dingin hawlkhia in.
Mi khempeuh keima-a' hi a, pate ahi a, tate ahi zongin keima-a' a hihi. A mawh mipa bek si ding hi.

Israel-te khempeuh in na gensa thute leh na thukhamte khempeuh a palsat khinzo uhhi. Na tungah khialhna ka hong bawl manun, na nasem Moses' thukham sunga kigelh bangin kote' tungah samsiatna a hong tung hi.

Vanglian { Topa } in hih samsiatna a khahkhiatna ding thu gen a, guta mite khempeuh leh a manloin ka min tawh thuciam mite khempeuh' innsungah lut ding hi. Tua bang mite' innsungah a tawntungin hamsiatna omin, amaute-a kipan a sing a suang, a vekpi-in sumai ding hi," hong ci hi.

A tuuhon lakah tuutal cidam nei napi-in, a kamciamsa bangin kei tungah hong piak ciangin, a sitbaang ganhing a hong pia mi khempeuh in samsiatna thuak ta hen. Banghang hiam cihleh kei pen a lian mahmah Kumpipa ka hi a, minam khempeuh in kei hong zahtak uhhi," a ci hi.

Na gamtatna uh tawh kei nong zahtak ding uhhi. Ka thugente ngailoin, thupi takin na lak kei uh leh note tungah samsiatna ka hong tungsak ding a, siampi hihna tawh na ngah uh thuphate tungah samsiatna ka tungsak ding hi. A taktakin ci lehang, note in ka thupiaknate thupi laklo na hih manun na thupha ngahte uh tungah samsiatna ka tungsakzo hi.
Na minam bupun keima neihsa hong guksak na hih manun note khempeuh tungah samsiatna hong tung hi.

‘Abraham' suante ihi ngawn hi,’ cihna lungsim nei mawk kei un. Ke'n kong cihin-ah, Pasian in hih suangte nangawn Abraham' suanlekhakte-in a bawl thei hi lel hi. 10 Tu mahmahin sing a bulphuk dingin hei tawh kingim zo hi. Tua ahih manin gah hoih a gahlo sing khempeuh kiphukin meikhuk sungah kikhul ding hi. 11 Na kisikkik khitna uh a kilatna dingin tui sungah note ka hong phum a, ahi zongin kei nungah a hong paipa in Khasiangtho leh mei sungah note hong phum ding hi. Tua a hong pai dingpa pen kei sangin nakpi takin lianzaw a, ama khedap a tawisak ding nangawnin ka kilawmzo nai kei hi. 12 Amah in a khutah anzapna tawi-in a ante zap a, a taksate khawmin a ansal sungah koih ding a, a ansite ahih leh a mit ngeilo mei sungah a khul ding hi," ci-in thu a hilh hi.

Ahi zongin ke'n note kiangah kong genin-ah: A sanggampa tungah a heh mi in thukhenna thuakkha thei ding hi. A sanggampa kiangah, ‘Bangmah-a kimang lo,’ ci-in a ko bawl mi in uliante mai-ah thusitna thuak thei ding a, a sanggampa kiangah, ‘Mi hai,’ ci-in a simmawh mi in hell meikuang sungah khulna thuak thei ding hi.

Kei hong pawlpihlo peuhmah keima lang hi uh a, kei hong kaihkhoppih lo peuhmah a thehthang ahi uhhi. 31 Tua ahih manin note kiangah kong genin-ah: Mihingte' kampau khialhna leh gamtat khialhnate kimaisak thei ding a, ahi zongin Khasiangtho langpangin a gensiate kimaisak lo ding hi. 32 Mihing Tapa langpangin a gensiate a mawhna uh kimaisak thei ding a, ahi zongin Khasiangtho langpangin a gensiate pen tuhuna kipan a tawntungin a mawhna uh kimaisaklo ding hi.

Note kiangah kong genin-ah: Thukhen ni ciangin mi khempeuh in phattuamna a omlo a kampaunate uh khempeuh bangin thusitna a thuak ding uhhi. 37 Banghang hiam cihleh nomau kampauna tawh kizui-in thu hong kikhen ding a, dik hi, cihna ahi a, mawh hi, cihna ahi zongin na ngahna dingun nomau kampau mah hong kibulphuh ding hi," a ci hi.
A kiliansakte khempeuh in niamkhiatna thuak ding uh a, a kiniamkhiatte khempeuh a lianin kibawl ding hi.
"Tua ciangin a veilamah a om mite kiangah, ‘Pasian in a samsiat mite aw, keima kiang panin paikhia unla, Dawimangpa leh a nungzuite-a' dingin a kibawl meikuang tawntung sungah pai un.
Ahi zongin Khasiangtho langpangin thu a gente in mawhna kip sukha uh ahih manin a mawhna uh kimaisak ngeilo ding hi," a ci hi.
Moses in, ‘Na nu leh na pa zahtak un. A nu a pa a samsiate kithat hen,’ ci hi.
Peter in a thu phawk ahih manin, "Sia aw, na theikung samsiat a sita hi," a ci hi.
No hong phuisamte thupha na pia unla, no hong bawlsiate-a' ding thu na ngetsak un.

Mihoihpa in a lungsim sunga thuhoih omteng hong suahkhia a, migilopa in a lungsim sunga a gitlohna teng hong suahkhia hi. Banghang hiam cihleh mite pen amau' lungsim sunga a om bangbang a hong paukhia uh a hihi.
Hih mihonte in ahih leh Moses Thukham theilo uh ahih manin Pasian' samsiatna a thuak dingte hi lel uhhi," a ci uhhi.

A kam uh tawh mi that uh a, a kam uh tawh zuauthu gen uh a, a kampaute uh gulgu tawh kibang hi. 14 A kam uh tawh mi samsia uh a, gitlohna bek tawh a kidim uhhi. 15 Mi that pakpak uh a, 16 a paina khempeuh uhah lungkhamna a piangsak uhhi. 17 Nopna a pian'na dingin gamta ngeilo uh a, 18 Pasian zahtak ding ngaihsutin neilo uhhi," ci-in a kigelh hi.
Hi thei ding hi leh amaute' hoihna dingin keimah in Pasian' samsiatna thuakin Christ tawh kikhenna ding ciangdong nangawnin amaute ka huhnuam hi.
No a hong bawlsia mite, Pasian in thupha a piakna dingin thu ngetsak unla, tua bang mite samsia loin thupha piazaw un.
Kote' nektawm ding ka thatang mahmah uh tawh nakpi takin ka sem uhhi. Hong kisamsiat ciangin thupha ka lehpiak uh a, hong kibawlsiat ciangin ka gumthuak uhhi.

Tua ahih manin Khasiangtho in lam a lah mite in, "Zeisu in samsiatna ngah ta hen," a cihlohna, leh Khasiangtho in lam lak kei leh kuamah in, "Zeisu pen Topa hi," a cih theihlohna ding thu na theihding uh a hihi.
Topa a itlo mi peuhmah in samsiatna ngah ta hen. I Topa hong pai ta hen.
