Hih thu tawh kisai-in Laisiangtho in, "Thukham laibu sunga kigelh khempeuh a vekpi-in a zuikhin tawntung lote in Pasian' samsiatna thuak hi," ci ahih manin Thukham a suangte pen samsiatna a ngah mite ahi uhhi.

Laisiangtho in, "Sing tungah a kikhai mi peuhmah Pasian' samsiat mi ahi hi," na ci ahih manin eite-a' dingin Christ in samsiatna a thuak manin Thukham zuihlahna hangin samsiatna panin eite a hong tankhia a hihi.

Na heh uh ciangin, tua hehna hangin khialkha kei unla, a tawntungin heh paisuak kei un. 27 Dawimangpa in hong suksiat theihna ding hun omsak kei un. 28 Guta ngeite in gu nawnloin, ama nuntakna ding thuman takin thalawhin, mizawngte zong a huhtheih laina dingin thatang tawh nasep ding kipan ta uh hen. 29 Na kiho uh ciangin kamguh zang kei unla, na pauna uh a za mite in phattuamna a ngahtheihna dingin na-in a kimang kam hoihte bek na pau un.
A kilawmlo-a kampauna, leh ciamnuih hoihlo cihte zong na zang kei unla, Pasian tungah lungdam kohna kam na pauzaw un.

Na khempeuh phunlo, thu nialloin sem un. 15 Tua hi leh a lungsim kawi, a hoihlo leitung mite lakah paubaan'na a neilo a siangtho, Pasian' tate na hi ding uh a, nuntakna thu na genna uh hangin leitung mite lakah khuavak bangin na hoihna uh a kilang mite na hi ding uhhi.
Ahi zongin tu-in hehna, thangpaihna, muhdahna, gensiatna, kam hoihlo pauna cihte nei nawn kei un.
mite' mawhmat theihloh ding kamhoihte na zang in. Tua hi leh i langte in hong gensiat theihna ding muloin a mai uh zum lel ding hi.
kuamah gensia loin, mite tawh kilemin kikhawl thei-in, lungsim nemin, mi khempeuh tungah a dikna ding uh na gen in.
Ahi zongin tua leitang in lingkungte leh sialtalling kungte hong posak leh Pasian in samsia-in, mei tawh kihaltum ding hi.
Mi khatpeuh in Christian ka hi hi, ci napi-in kampau a kidopzawh kei leh amahmah a kikhemtawm hi lel a, ama biakna neih a mawkna a hihi.
I leii tawh eite' pa ahi Topa i phat thei a, Pasian tawh a kisunin a kibawl i mipihte zong tua i leii mah tawh i samsia thei hi.

Hih thute khempeuh banah, sanggamte aw, thu khat peuhpeuh na gen uh ciangin kiciam se kei un. Vantung ahi a, na khat peuhpeuh tawh ahi zongin kiciam kei un. Pasian' thukhenna na thuakkhak lohna dingun a hite, "Hi," ci lel unla, a hilote, "Hilo," na ci lel un.

Hong bawlsiate siatna tawh thukkik loin hong samsia mite samsia kik kei unla, Pasian in note a hong sap lai-in thupha a hong piak dingin hong ciamsa ahih manin, hong siat bawlte thupha tawh na thukzaw un. 10 Banghang hiam cihleh Laisiangtho in, "Nuntak nuam deihin, hunhoih a zang nuamte in kamsia pau kei uh hen la, zuauthu gen kei ta uh hen.
Christ nungzui hihna hangin mite' kosiatna na thuak uh leh note sungah a minthang Khasiangtho ahi Pasian' Khasiangtho hong om ahihna lim ahih manin a hampha mahmah na hi uhhi.
Numei bekbek etnopin nei uh a, a mawhnopna lungsim uh kam theilo hi. Upna cingtaaklo mite zol belin nei uh a, huaihamna lungsim bekbek a nei uhhi. Tua bang mite, Pasian' samsiat mite ahi uhhi.
Tua ahih manin Pasian, ama min, a omna mun, leh vantungah a omte khempeuh samsia-in a ko gawpgawp hi.
Nisa in mite kanggawp ahih manin mite in hih gimna tawh kisai-ah thu a nei Pasian a samsia uhhi. Ahi zongin a mawhna uh panin kisikin Pasian a phatding uh utlo uhhi.
a meimate uh na a sak manun vantung Pasian a samsia uhhi. Ahi zongin a gamtat siatna uh panin kisik nuamlo uhhi.
Gial golpipi, khat ciangin tawi sawmthum val a gik, van panin mite tungah hong kia hi. Tua gimna nasialua ahih manin tua gialte hangin mite in Pasian a samsia uhhi.
Pasian' samsiatna a ngah peuhpeuh tua khuasungah omlo hi. Tua khuapi sungah Pasian leh Tuuno' tokhom om ding a, ama nasemte in amah a bia ding uhhi.
Tu-in kum khat sungin Solomon tungah a tung kham a gihna talen zaguk leh sawmgukleguk (666) hi a,
Adonikam suante, zaguk sawmgukleguk (666) a hihi.

Tua kumpite a maan laitakun vantung Pasian in a bei thei ngeilo ding kumpi gam a hong phut ding hi. Tua kumpi gam kuamah in zo zolo ding a, tua gam in gamdang khempeuhte zogawpin a kip tawntung ding hi.

Hih bangin hilhtelna kei a hong kipia hi: "Sapi lina pen leitunga hong om ding kumpi gam lina ding hi a, kumpi gamdangte tawh kilamdang mahmah ding hi. Amah in leitung buppi valhtum ding a, tuancil gawpin a sukham ding hi. 24 Ki sawmte pen tua kumpi gamsung panin a hong piang ding kumpi sawmte ahi uhhi. Tua ciangin kumpi dang khat hong piang leuleu ding a, amah in a omsate tawh a kilamdang mahmahin kumpi thum a nuaisiah ding hi. 25 "Amah in a Lianpen Pasian langpangin thu gen ding a, Pasian' mite a bawlsia ding hi. Amah in amaute' biakna tawh kipawl thukhamte leh pawi bawlna hunte kheelsak ding hanciam ding a, ama khutsungah kum thum leh alang sung Pasian' mite a om ding uhhi.

Ka khuadaktoh leh gun gei-ah tuutal khat a dingin a om ka mu hi. Amah in a sau mahmah ki nih nei a, a ki po nunung pen a po masa sangin a sauzaw hi. 4 Tua tuutal in a ki tawh nitumna lam, saklam, leh khanglam a si kawikawi ka mu hi. Ama ut bangin kiphasakin gamta ahih manin amah a khozo ding leh a thahatna pan a suaktazo ding ganhing khat beek a om kei hi. 5 A bangci hi ding hiam, ci-in ngaihsun theiloin ka om laitakin nitumna lam panin keeltal khat a hong tai veva hi. Hat lua mahmah ahih manin a khe in lei a sukha kei hi. A mitte gel kikalah a tuampian ki lamdang khat a nei hi. 6 Ki nih a nei gun gei-a a ding ka muh tuutal kiang a hong phak ciangin a thaneih zahin a si hi. 7 Hehlua mahmah ahih manin tua tuutal laigawp a, a kite gel a suktansak hi. Tuutal in nang zolo ahih manin lei kiden'na a, a huhzo ding kuamah a om kei hi. 8 Tua keeltal a thahatna hong khangto semsem a, ahih hangin a thahat pen laitakin a ki a kitan hi. Tua a ki pona munah a lamdang ki li hong poto kik a, mun tuamtuam a kawk hi. 9 Tua ki lite lak pan khat' tungah ki neu dang khat hong po a, khanglam, nisuahna lam, leh Thuciamna Gam lamah a vangliatna a lak hi. 10 Vantung galkapte nangawn a dozo zah dong dingin a thahatna hong khangto a, aksi pawlkhatte leitungah lawnkhia-in, a tuancilgawp hi. 11 Amah in vantung galkap kumpipa nangawn do-in, ama tunga kipia tawntung biakpiaknate na-ngawn khawlsakin, biakinnpi biaknate a beisak hi. 12 Nisim biakpiaknate-ah mawhna dim a, biakna man pen leilakah a kipaikhia hi. A sepna peuhpeuhah tua ki thahat mahmah hi. 13 Vantung mi khat in adang vantung mi khat kiangah thu a dot ka za a, "Hih

bang tanvei sawt ding a, a muhdahhuai mawhna in nisim biakpiakna bang tanvei khaktan ding ahi hiam? Vantung galkapte leh biakinnpi bang tanvei kituancil ding ahi hiam?" a ci hi. 14 Amah in, "Zingsang leh nitak biakpiakna tul nih leh zathum vei a cin' khit ciangin biakinnpi kipuahkik ding hi," a ci hi. 15 Keimah Daniel in mangmuhna a khatna thei nuamin ka hanciam hi. Thakhat thu-in mihing mel tawh a kibang khat ka mai-ah a hong ding hi. 16 Ulai gungal panin mihing' aw khat hong ging a, "Gabriel aw, a muh nate ama kiangah a khiatna hilh in," a cihna ka za hi. 17 Gabriel hong pai-in ka kiangah hong ding a, laulua mahmah ka hih manin leitungah ka puk hi. Amah in, "Leitung mi aw, a khiatna thei in.

pen hun beina ding lahna ahi hi," ci-in ka kiangah a hong gen hi. 18 Amah in thu a hong gen laitakin sibupin leilakah ka tuk hi. Ahih hangin amah in hong domto-in a hong dingsak hi. 19 Amah in, "Pasian' hehna hangin thupiang dingte ka hong lak ding hi. Na maang muh pen hun beina ding lahna a hihi. 20 Na muh ki nih a nei tuutal pen Media leh Persia gam kumpite a cihnopna a hihi. 21 Keeltal pen Grik kumpi gam hi a, a mit kikala a po ki pen kumpi masa pen a cihnopna a hihi. 22 Ki po masa pen a kitan khit ciangin a nunga hong po ki lite pen tua gam panin kumpi gam li hong piang ding a cihnopna a hihi. Ahih hangin tua gamte ahih leh a masa pen kumpi gam zahin a thahat kei ding uhhi. 23 "Tua kumpi gamte a bei ding hun a nai ciangin gilo lua mahmah ding uh ahih manin gim a kipia ding hi. Tua ciangin ama thu bek thu a sa, mawhna pawlpawl tawh a kidim, zuauphuah hat kumpi khat a hong om ding hi. 24 Amah thahat mahmah ding a, ahih hangin ama thahatna ahi kei ding hi. Amah in a dipkuathuai siatna piangsak ding a, a hihna khempeuhah a thahat mahmah ding hi. Amah in mi thahatte leh Pasian' mite a susia ding hi. 25 A lungsim daplan lua ahih manin zuauphuah siamna tawh a hih khempeuh a tangtun' ding hi. Amah kiliansak lua-in theihkholh lohin mi tampi susia-in, a lianpen kumpite' kumpipa nangawn a langpan' ding hi. Ahih hangin mihing thahatna kizang loin amah a kisusia ding hi.

Kumpipa in a pu a pate' biak pasian leh numeite in a it pasian a thusim kei ding hi. Pasian a kici peuhmah khat beek a thusim kei ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh tuate sangin amah a lianzaw-in a kingaihsun hi.
A nai, a gamla-ah galkidona thu na za ding uhhi. Hihte a piang mah ding hi a, ahi zongin a beina ding hi nailo ahih manin patau kei un.

Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Keima ukna pen hih leitung gam hilo hi. Keima ukna hih leitung gam hi leh Jerusalem khua-a Jew mi uliante' khutsungah hong kipiak lohna dingin ka nungzuite in a do ding uhhi. Tua ahih manin keima ukna pen hih leitung tawh kizomlo hi," a ci hi.

Tua A Gilopa in mite' biak pasian a kici khempeuh leh na khempeuh nialgawp ding hi. Tuate khempeuh sangin a lianzaw-in a kingaihsut banah, Pasian ka hi hi, ci-in Pasian' biakinn sung mahmahah pai-in va tu ding hi.
A khamcippa a kilakkhiat khit ciangin A Gilopa hong kilang ding a, Topa Zeisu hong pai ciangin tua A Gilopa mutlum ding a, vanglian minthangin hong kilatna tawh a maimangsak ding hi.
Tu-in kum khat sungin Solomon tungah a tung kham a gihna talen zaguk leh sawmgukleguk (666) hi a,
Amaute in Pasian' thu genin a teci pan'na a zawhkhit uh ciangin kuahawm thukpi sung panin a hong paikhia ganhing in tua teci pangte simin zogawpin that ding a,

Tua ka muh ganhing pen kamkei tawh kibang a, a khete vom khe tawh kibang a, a kam pen humpinelkai kam tawh a kibang hi. Gulpi in tua ganhing tungah ama vangliatna, ama tokhom, leh aana lianpi a pia hi.
Tua ganhing, kiphatsakna leh kam khelnono a pautheihna ding leh kha sawmlenih sung aana a zattheihna dingin thu kipia hi.
Leitung a cil panin thahna a thuak khin Tuuno nuntakna laibu sungah a min uh a kigelhlo leitungmi khempeuh in sahang a bia ding uhhi. (HCN)
Tua ahih manin a kigo Tuuno laibu sungah a nungta ding mite' min, leitung pian'ma pekin a kikhumna-ah a kihello leitung mi khempeuh in tua ganhing bia ding uhhi. (TDM)
Leitung kipiansak aa kipan a kigosa Tuuno nuntakna laibu sungah a min a kigelhlote khempeuh – leitung aa a tengte khempeuh in tua gamsa bia ding uhhi. (ZIV)
Leitung piancil aa thahna a thuak Tuuno Nuntakna Laibupi sungah min a kigelhlo, leitung aa a teng mi khempeuh in tua sapi a bia ding uhhi. (ZSV)

Tua ciangin leisung panin a hong pusuak ganhing adang khat ka mu hi. Tua ganhing in tuu bangin ki nih nei a, a kampau zia pen gulpi kampau tawh kibang hi. 12 Tua ganhing masa a omna mahah ganhing masa' aana khempeuh zang a, a liamma a damsa tua ganhing masa pen leitung leh a tunga om mi khempeuh, aana tawh a biasak hi. 13 Tua ganhing nihna in na lamdang lianpipi bawl a, mi khempeuhte' muhin van panin leitungah meikuang nangawn a kiasak thei hi. 14 Ganhing masa omna-ah na lamdang bawltheihna ding thu ngah ahih manin a na lamdang bawlna tawh leitungah a om mi khempeuh khem a, namsau tawh a si ding zahin a kisat liamsa hinapi a nungta lai ganhing pahtawina ding milim khat a bawlna dingun a gen hi. 15 Tua ganhing nihna in ganhing masa lim dingin a kibawl milim sungah a hu a muap ciangin hong pauthei a, tua milim a bialo khempeuh a thahtheihna dingin thu a ngah hi. 16 Tua ganhing in a lian a neu, a hau a zawng, sila leh sila a hilo, mi khempeuh in a taklam khut tung uh ahih kei leh a taltang uhah ciamtehna a neihna dingun thu a pia hi. 17 Tua ahih manin tua ganhing min ahih kei leh a min tangin a nambat ciamtehna a tungah a neilo mi peuhmah, vanlei vanzuakin paikhia theilo uhhi. 18 Hih thu-ah pilna kisam hi. Hih nambat pen 666 hi a, mihing khat min tangin a ding hi a, mipil mitei peuhpeuhte in hih ganhing nambat a cihnopna thei ding uhhi.
Pasian' thupiakna zui-in Zeisu tungah a citak Pasian' mite-a' dingin thuakzawhna kisam hi.

Tua na muh ganhing nidangin a om hangin tu-in om nawnlo hi. Ahi zongin tu-in kuahawm thukpi panin hong pusuakin sihna a thuakdingin paikhia ding hi. Tua ganhing nidangin omngei a, tu-in om nawnlo napi-in khatvei hong kilangkik ding ahih manin, a nungta mite' min a kikhumna laibu sungah leitung pian'ma-in a kigelh nailo, tu laitakin leitungah a om mite in tua ganhing a et uh ciangin lamdangsa ding uhhi.

Tua ciangin a ganhing leh tua ganhing omna-ah na lamdang a bawl kamsang zuaupa kiman khawm hi. Ganhing ciamtehna a neite leh ganhing lim a biate pen tua na lamdangte tawh a kikhem a hihi. Ganhing leh kamsang zuaupa, a nihun kat kikhulna meiphualpi sungah a hingtangun kilawn hi.

Tua ciangin tokhom tungah a tu mi pawlkhat ka mu a, tua mite tungah thukhenna ding aana a kipia a hihi. Zeisu thu a genna leh Pasian thu hangin a kithat mite' kha zong ka mu hi. Tua mite in ganhing ahi a, a lim ahi zongin bialo uhhi; a taltang uhah ahi a, a khut tung uhah ahi zongin ganhing ciamtehna neilo uhhi. Amaute hong hingkik uh a, Christ tawh kum tul khat sung ukna aana a neikhawm uhhi.
Tua ahih ciangin zingsangin Jacob tho baih a, amah in lukhamin a zat suang la-in khuamin phut a, a tungah sathau a sung hi.
meivakte-a' ding sathau, nilh sathau ding leh paknamtui dingin a namtui nate,
"Meivak a kuangin a om tawntung theihna dingin mei-a vak ding oliv gah a kisuzan, sathau siangtho, Israel mite in nang kiangah hong paipihna dingun thu na pia ding hi.
Amaute in keima tungah siampi na a sep theihna dingun na sanggampa Aaron leh a tapate na silhsak ding a, amaute sathau nilhin, nasem dingin kipsakin, na siangthosak ding hi.
Nangmah in nilh sathau la-in, ama lu tungah sungin amah na nilh ding hi.
"Aaron' biakna puan siangthote pen ama sih khit ciangin a tapate' tungah kipia ding a, amaute sathau kinilhin a kikipsakna ding a hihi.

Tua thamloin, { Topa } in Moses kiangah, 23 "A hoihpen a namtui nate la in. Myrrh paknamtui shekel za nga leh a namtui thaksing tuazah lang, shekel za nih leh sawmnga a gik, leh a khum a namtui paknamtui za nih leh sawmnga, 24 biakinn shekel tawh kituakin thaksing nam khat za nga, leh oliv thau bung khat, 25 nangmah in paknamtui bawlte' bawl mah bangin a siangtho sathau nilh dingin hihte na gawm ding a, tua pen a siangtho sathau nilh hi ding hi. 26 Nangmah in tua tawh kikhopna buk leh thuciamna singkuang, 27 sabuai leh a nazat khempeuh, meivakkhuam leh a nazatte leh paknamtui biakna tau, 28 meihal biakna tau a nazat khempeuh tawh, kuang leh a ngakna na zut ding hi. 29 Tuate a siangtho pen ahih theihna dingin na siangthosak ding a, tuate a lawng peuhmah a siangtho suak ding hi. 30 Amaute in keima tungah siampi na hong sep theihna dingun Aaron leh a tapate nangmah in sathau nilhin amaute na siangthosak ding hi. 31 Nangmah in Israel mite kiangah, ‘Hih pen na khang tawntungun a siangtho keima sathau nilh hi ding hi. 32 Mi mawkmawkte' pumpi tungah tua sathau kisunglo ding a, tua bangin a kigawm sathau dang na bawl kei ding uhhi. Tua pen a siangtho hi a, note-a' dingin a siangtho hi ding hi.
meivak-a' ding sathau, nilh sathau leh a paknamtui dingin a namtui nate,
meivak ding, nilh sathau ding, leh paknamtui dingin a namtui nate leh sathau hong paipih uhhi.

"Tua ciangin sathau la-in, biakbuk leh a sunga om khempeuh na nuh ding a, biakbuk leh a innsungvan khempeuh na ap ding hi. Tua ciangin a siangtho biakna van a suak ding hi. 10 Nangmah in meihal biakna tau leh a nazat khempeuh zong sathau nuhin biakna tau na ap ding a, tua biakna tau a siangtho pen hi ding hi.

a khialpa pen sathau a kinilh siampipa ahih a, mite tungah tua bangin mawhna hong tut leh, ama gamtatnasa a khialhna hangin a sitbaanglo bawngtalno khat { Topa' } mai-ah khialhna hanga biakna-in amah piasak un.
Tua ciangin sathau a kinilh siampipa in a bawngtal si tawmkhat la-in, kikhopna bukah paipih ding hi.
Tua ciangin sathau a kinilh siampipa in kikhopna bukah bawngtal si kimkhat paipih ding a,
"Aaron leh a suante sathau a kinilh ni-in { Topa' } tungah hih bangin biakna kipia ding hi: An tawh biakna ngeina bangin annel lawh khat, alang zingsangin, alang nitakin pia ding hi.
Tua ciangin Moses in nilh sathau la-in, biakbuk leh a sunga om khempeuh nuhin tuate a ap hi.
Amah in nilh sathau kimkhat Aaron' tungah sung a, ap dingin amah a sathau a nilh hi.

Tua ciangin Moses in nilh sathau kimkhat leh biakna tau tunga om a si la-in, Aaron leh ama tapate leh amau' puante tungah a theh hi. Tua ahih ciangin Moses in Aaron leh ama tapate, a puante uh tawh a apkhawm hi.
A pa' tanga siampi dingin sathau a kinilh a ki-ap siampipa in kilemna bawlin, a siangtho saihadial puante silh ding hi.
sathau a kinilh siampi, siampi za-ah na a sem dingin a kikipsak, Aaron' tapate' minte a hihi.
Na gamsung khempeuh uhah oliv kung na nei ding uh a, ahih hangin a thau tawh note na kizut kei ding uhhi; Banghang hiam cihleh na oliv gahte uh pulh ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin kisilin sathau kinuh in la, na puan hoihpente silhin ancilna-ah paisuk in. Ahih hangin a nek a dawn a man mateng ama kiangah na pailam kitheisak kei in.

Tua ciangin Samuel in sathau thawl khat la a, ama lu tungah buakin amah nam a, "{ Topa } in ama mi Israel-te tungah ulian dingin nang sathau hong nilh khin hilo ahi hiam? Nangmah in { Topa' } mite ukin a kiima om amau' galte' khutsung panin amaute na honkhia ding hi. { Topa } in ama luahte tungah ulian dingin nang sathau hong nilh khitna lim hih bang hi ding hi:

Tua ciangin Samuel in a sathau biing sunga sathau la-in a sanggamte laizangah amah sathau a nilh hi. Tua ni-a kipanin { Topa' } kha in khauhtakin David hong uk hi. Tua ciangin Samuel dingin Ramah-ah a ciah hi.

En in, { Topa } in tuni-in leihawm sung, ka khutsungah nang hong piakna nangmahmah in tuni-in na thei khin hi. Mi pawlkhat in nang a that dingin kei hong sawl a, ahih hangin nang kong hih kei hi. Keimah in, ‘Ka topa tungah ka khut ka nga kei ding hi; Banghang hiam cihleh amah pen { Topa' } sathau nilhpa ahi hi,’ ka ci hi.
David in ama kiangah, "{ Topa' } sathau nilhpa a that dingin na khut na liik khiat ding na lauloh a bangci thu ahi hiam?" a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Judah mite hong pai-in amaute in tua lai munah Judah kumpi dingin David sathau a nilh uhhi. Amaute in David kiangah, "Saul a vuite pen Jabeshgilead mite hi,"ci-in a gen uh ciangin

Tua ahih ciangin Joab in Tekoa-ah mi sawlin tua panin numei pil khat la-in ama kiangah, "Dahin a kap kineih in la, dahna lim puante silh in. Sathau nilh kei in la, misi hangin ni tampi a thum khin numei bangin gamta in.
Tua ciangin Israel kumpi dingin Nimshi' tapa Jehu sathau na nilh ding hi. Tua ciangin nangma mun-ah kamsang dingin Abelmeholah khuami Shafat' tapa Elisha sathau na nilh ding hi.
amaute kuamah nengniamsak lo hi. Amaute' hangin amah in kumpite taigawp a, 22 "Ka sathau nilhte lawng kei unla, ka kamsangte tungah siatna hih kei un!" ci hi.
Leitung kumpite leh gam ukte in { Topa } leh ama sathau nilhpa langpangin vaihawm uh a,
Ka galte omna mai-ah kei aa ding an nong lui hi. Ka lu sathau nong nilh aa, ka hai a dimlet hi. (HCN)
Keima galte' muhna munah an nong lui hi. Thupi takin nong pahtawi a, keima hai zong dimlet ta hi. (TDM)
Ka galte ompi-in ka mai ah sabuai nong lui hi. Ka lu sathau nong nilh a; ka hai a dimlet hi. (ZIV)

thuman deihin gitlohna na mudah hi. Tua ahih ciangin Pasian ahi, nangma Pasian in na khan'gualte tungah a kikhai to-in lungdamna sathau nang hong nilhzo a, 8 na puantualpite myrrh paknamtui, aloes paknamtui, leh thalsing namtuite a nam hi. Saiha tawh kibawl innpite panin khausai lasaknate in nang hong lungdamsak a,
Ka nasempa David ka muzo hi. Ka thahatna ama tungah a om ngitnget theihna ding, ka vangliatna in zong, amah a thakhauhsak theihna dingin ka sathau siangtho amah ka nilh khin hi.
mihing lungsim a nuamsak ding leenggahzu, mihing maitang a zolsak ding sathau, mihing lungsim a hatsak ding an na piangsak hi.
Amah pen puansilh bangin samsiatna kingeina seh hi. Tua a samsiatnate ama pumpi sungah tui bangin a guhte sungah sathau bangin lutin kizel ta hen.
Na nasempa David tungah thu na ciamzo hi; na sathau nilhpa nial kei in.

En un, sanggamte pumkhat suakin a tut khawm uh ciangin bangzahin hoihin nuam ahi hiam? 2 Tua pen a puan ngawng tungah Aaron' khamul kaisuk zui-in a lu tung panin a taaksuk, sathau manpha tawh kibang hi. 3 Tua pen Zion mualte tungah a kia, Hermon mual pana hong piang daitui tawh kibang hi. Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } in nuntak tawntungna thupha tua munah a pia hi.
Khenuai-a kipan luzang dong nangawnin a cidamna mun omlo a, sanim gawpnate, meimapite, leh siluang liammate a om hi. Tuate pen a nai kisallo, kitunlo, sathau tawh zong kinomsak lo hi.
Amaute in sabuai phahin, sualpuante phah uh a, an ne-in tui dawn uhhi. Uliante aw, tho un; lum, sathau nuh un!

amaute pen a thuman mite kici-in, amah a kiminthan'sak theihna dingin { Topa } in a mite kem hi, a kicih theihna dingin Zion-ah a om a dah mite a lungdamna ding, a lungkham mite in phatna la a saktheihna ding, a lunggim mite in Pasian a phattheihna dingin amah in kei hong sawlzo hi.

Tua ciangin biakinn lutna kongkhakah hong paipih kik hi. Biakinn kongkhak sangkil nuai panin tui luang a, biakinn ngatna nisuahna lamah luang sukin, biakna tau leitaw lampang tawn suk hi. 2 Tua ciangin a mipa in leilu lam kongpi tawnin hong pusuahpih a, nisuahna lam kongpi pualamah hong paipih hi. Leitaw lam kulhkongpi-ah a tui hong luangkhia hi. 3 A mipa in a tehna piciang tawi-in a tui luan'na nisuahna lam pi tul khat zaguk sawmgiat ciangdong tehsuk a, a tui kei hong ngaptansak hi. A tui pen siakmit ciang bek thuk hi.

Hih thu ciamteh in la thei in: Jerusalem lamkikna ding thu a kipiak huna kipan sathau kinilhpa hong pai dong kum sagih mun sagih sung hi ding hi. Jerusalem kongzing lampi nei leh kulhpi nei-in kilamkik ding a, kum sawmguklenih mun sagih sung kip ding a, ahih hangin buai hun sung ahi ding hi.
"Tua khit ciangin mi khempeuh tungah ka kha ka sung ding a, na puteekte un mang manin na tangvalte un maang mu ding uhhi.

{ Topa } hoih hi; lungkham hunin a mite huh a, amah a beel mite limtakin a kem hi. 8 Tuikhang in a suksiat bangin a langte susiagawp a, a galte khempeuh khuamial sungah a nawtkhia hi. 9 Banghangin { Topa } sawm ngam na hi hiam? Amah in nang hong susia ding hi. Amah a su peuhpeuh a dingkikzo om ngeilo hi.
Tuipi, tui tawh a kidim mah bangin { Topa}' minthan'na theihna tawh leitung kidim ding hi.

Tua ciangin vantung mi in kei kiangah, "{ Topa } in Zerubbabel tungah hih bangin thu gen hi: Galkap tam neihna hang hilo, nangma vangliatna hang zong hilo, keima tung panin na ngah vangliatna bek tawh na ma na tun'zo ding hi.
Cinate damsakin, misite hingsakin, miphakte damsakin, dawite va hawlkhia un. Man piak kulloin hih vangliatna na ngah uh bangin hih vangliatna na zatna uhah zong man va ngen kei un.

Bethany khua-a miphak ahi ngei Simon inn-ah Zeisu a om laitakin, 7 numei khat in a manpha mahmah sathau namtui suangngo thawl a dim khat hong tawi-in Zeisu kiangah hong pai a, Zeisu anne-in a tut laitakin a lu tungah a buaksuk hi. 8 Ahi zongin nungzuite in a muh uh ciangin heh uh a, "Banghangin hih sathau namtui mawk beisak ahi hiam? 9 Hih sathau kizuak leh sum tampi tak kikhawng ding a, mizawngte huhna-in kipia thei ding hi," a ci uhhi. 10 Ahi zongin Zeisu in hih thu phawk ahih manin amaute kiangah, "Hih numei bang nuammawh na hi uhhiam? Kei tungah a kilawm mahmahin amah hong gamta hi. 11 Mizawngte pen note tawh hong omkhawm tawntung ding a, ahi zongin note tawh kei ka hong omkhawm tawntung kei ding hi. 12 Keima tungah hih bangin sathau hong buak ciangin ka luanghawm kivuina dingin a hong bawlbawl a hihi. 13 Note kiangah a mantaka kong genin-ah: Keima hangin a piangding lungdamna thu a kigenna leitung khempeuhah hih numei kiphawkin a gamtatnate kigengen ding hi," a ci hi.
Dawi tampi hawlkhia uh a, cina mi tampi sathau zutin a damsak uhhi.
Amah in ka luang a kivuina dingin paknamtui a hong ma nuhkhol hi a, a hihtheih zahzah ciang a hih khinta a hihi.

"Gimna a thuak mite tungah Lungdamna Thu a hilh dingin Topa in kei hong sehkhin ahih manin keima sungah Topa' kha hong om hi. Salin a kimante tungah suahtakna thu a gen ding, mittawte in khua a muhkik theihna ding, a kinengniamte a suaktasak ding leh
Zeisu' nungah tu-in kap a, a khitui tawh Zeisu' khete kawtsakin a sam tawh nulsak a, a khete namin a sathau puak a nuh hi.
Nang in ka lu sathau nong nilhsak kei a, ahi zongin amah in ka khe nangawn sathau namtui hong nuhsak hi.
a kiangah va pai-in a liammate sathau leh leenggahzu a nuhsak khit ciangin a tunsak hi. Tua ciangin a la tungah tuangsak a, zintun' inn khatah paipihin tua lai-ah a khoi hi.
Tua ciangin amaute ciah uh a, Zeisu' luang a nuh dingun paknamtui leh sathau a bawlkhol uhhi. Thukham zui-in Sabbath ni tawlnga-in a om uhhi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Topa' vantung mi khat in tua bual tui lok thei zel a, tui a kilawh khit ciangin tua lai a tung masa penpen ama natna panin a dam hi.
Tua laitakin Mary in a manpha mahmah nard sathau namtui thawl khat hong paipih a, Zeisu' khe a nuhkhit ciangin a sam tawh a nulsak hi. Tua innsung khempeuh sathau namtui gim hong nam hi.
Ahi zongin a thuhilhna-ah Saul hong siam semsem a, Zeisu pen Christ hi, ci-in teltakin lakthei ahih manin, Damaskas khua-a om Jew mite in a nialna ding uh om theilo hi.

Nazareth khuami Zeisu tungah Pasian in Khasiangtho leh vangliatna pia a, Pasian in a ompihna hangin tua Zeisu in a paina khempeuhah na hoih semin, Dawimangpa in a gimsak mite khempeuh a damsakna thu zong na thei uhhi.
Pasian in Paul' tung tawnin na lamdang lianpipi a bawl hi. 12 Ama zat mainul ahi a, a puante ahi zongin cinate kiangah a kipaipih ciangin a natnate uh damin, a sunga om dawite zong a taikhia uhhi.
Pasian kiang panin a hong pai Lungdamna Thu a hilh dingin Pasian' teelna tawh sawltak ahi, Zeisu Christ' sila keimah Paul in lai ka hong khak hi.

Christ in tuiphum nasep a sem dingin kei hong sawllo a, Lungdamna Thu a hilh dingin a hong sawl bek a hihi. Ka thuhilhna-ah zong thugen siamna leh pilna a nei ka hi kei hi. Tua bang hi kei hen la, pilna leh gensiamna a nei hi leng, Christ in singlamteh tunga a thuakna thu in vangliatna a neihna hang kisalo khading hi.

Christ sungah kote leh note a hong kipsakpa, leh nasem dingin kote a hong sawlpa pen Pasian a hihi. 22 Amah in eite pen ama-a' ihihna ciamtehna eite tungah hong bawl a, ama-a' ihihna leh eite tungah a hong piakding na khempeuh a hong pia takpi ding ahihna a kitelna dingin eite' lungsim sungah Khasiangtho a hong mapiak hi.

Amah in mite tungah siamna a tuamtuam hong pia a, pawlkhatte sawltak nasep a semding, pawlkhatte kamsang nasep a semding, pawlkhatte thuhilh kawikawi nasep a semding, pawlkhatte pawlpi kem nasep a semding, leh pawlkhatte laihilh nasep a semdingin a hong seh hi. 12 Hih nasep a tuamtuamte khempeuh a semdingin Pasian' mi khempeuh kigingkhol sakin Christ-a' dingin na semin Christ pumpi a khan'sak theihna ding deihna a hihi.

A cina na om uh leh pawlpi upate sam un. Amaute in thu hong ngetsakin Topa min tawh sathau hong zut ding uhhi. 15 Upna tawh thu a kinget ciangin Topa in cinate noptuamsakin, damsak ding a, mawhna nei ahih leh zong a mawhna maisak ding hi. 16 Tua ahih manin na ci uh a damna dingin khatlekhat tungah na mawhna uh kipulakin thu na kingetsak ta un. Mihoihte' thungetna in vang nei a, na lianpi semzo hi.
Ahi zongin Christ in note tungah Khasiangtho hong piakhin ahih manin note khempeuh in a man na thei uhhi.

Christ in note tungah ama Khasiangtho hong piakhin a, tua Khasiangtho na neih laiteng uh kuamah in note hong hilhding kisam nawnlo hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Khasiangtho in note tungah thu khempeuh hong hilh a, tua a hong hilh thute a man vive hi a, zuauthu khat zong omlo hi. Tua ahih manin Khasiangtho' hilhnate zui unla, Christ sungah kiptakin om un.
Na galte na khutsungah a hong pia Sang Pen Pasian in thupha ngah hen," a ci hi. Abram in na khempeuh sawmah khat ama tungah a pia hi.

Tua ciangin Jacob in thuciamna khat bawlin, "Pasian in kei hong ompih a, hih ka paina lampi-ah kei hong kep a, nek ding an leh silh ding puan hong piak a, 21 lungnuam takin ka pa' inn-ah ka ciahkik leh, { Topa } pen keima Pasian hi ding a, 22 khuamin ka phuhsa hih suang pen Pasian' inn hi ding hi. Keima tungah nangmah in nong piak khempeuh sawmah khat nang' tungah kong pia kik ding hi," a ci hi.

"Leitang panin a piang khempeuh khaici hita leh singgah hita leh sawmah khat { Topa}-a' hi a, { Topa}-a' dingin siangtho hi. 31 Mi khatpeuh in sawmah khat a piak na khat peuhpeuh a tat nop leh, amah in tua banah nga-ah khat behlap ding hi. 32 Bawnghon leh tuulekeel hon sawmah khat khempeuh leh a cingpa' ciangkhut nuai-a a pai ganhing khempeuh sawmah khat peuhmah { Topa}-a' dingin a siangtho hi ding hi.

"Kikhopna buk sungah amaute' nasepna thaman dingin Israel sunga sawmah khat khempeuh, Levi mite' tungah gamh-in ka pia hi. 22 Amaute in khialhna thuakin si khading uh ahih manin, tu-a kipanin kikhopna buk sungah Israel midangte pai-in tua sawmah khat nekpihlo ding uhhi. 23 Ahih hangin Levi mite in kikhopna buk nasep sem ding uh a, amaute in a tavuan uh pua ding uhhi. Tua pen amau' khang tawntungin ngeina kip hi ding a, amaute in Israel mite' lakah luah neilo ding uhhi. 24 Banghang hiam cihleh amaute in biakna-in { Topa' } tungah a piak uh Israel mite' sawmah khat pen Levi mite tungah luah dingin ka pia khin hi. Tua ahih ciangin Israel mite lakah amaute in luah a neihloh ding uh ka gensa ahi hi," a ci hi. 25 { Topa } in Moses kiangah, 26 "Levi mite kiangah hih bangin na gen lai ding hi: ‘Note' luah dingin amaute' tung panin kong piak sawmah khat, Israel mite' tung panin na lak uh ciangin, tua sung panin { Topa' } tungah biakna, sawmah khat sung pan sawmah khat na pia sawn ding uhhi. 27 Tua na biaknate uh, ancilna pana an leh leenggah sukna pana kipia mah bangin note-a'-in kiciamteh ding hi. 28 Tua ahih ciangin Israel mite' tung panin na ngah uh sawmah khat khempeuh tung panin { Topa' } tungah biakna na pia ding uhhi. Tua bangin siampi Aaron' tungah { Topa } a kibiakna na pia ding uhhi. 29 Note tungah hong kipia letsong lakah a limci pen, a siangtho pen paipihin { Topa}-a' ding biakna khempeuh na pia ding uhhi,’ ci-in gen in. 30 Tua ahih ciangin amaute kiangah, ‘Tuate sung panin a limci pen teng na piak khit uh ciangin, a omlai teng Levi mite-a' dingin ancilna panin a piangte leh leenggah sukna panin a piangte a kipia mah bangin kiciamteh ding hi. 31 Nang leh na innkuanpihte in mun khat peuhpeuhah na ne thei ding uhhi; Banghang hiam cihleh tua pen kikhopna buk sungah note' nasepna thaman a hihi. 32 Tua sung panin a limci pen na piak nak uh leh tua thu hangin mawhsakna na thuak kei ding uhhi. Israel mite' na a siangthote na ninsak kei ding uhhi. Na nitsak uh leh na si ding uhhi,’ ci-in gen in," a ci hi.

{ Topa } na Pasian un na minam khempeuh uh sung panin ama min koihna dingin teelin, ama omna dinga a bawlna mun na zong ding uhhi. 6 Tua lai-ah na pai ding uh a, na meihal biaknate uh leh na biakpiaknate uh, note in na piak uh sawmah khat leh na piak thuahte uh, thuciamna biakpiakna, utthu-a na piakna, na bawnghon tacilte uh leh na tuuhon tacilte uh tua lai-ah na paipih ding uhhi. 7 { Topa } na Pasian uh mai tua lai munah na ne ding uh a, { Topa } na Pasian un note thupha hong piakna hangin na hihna khempeuh uhah note leh na innkuanpihte na lungdam ding uhhi. 8 "Tua hun ciangin mi khempeuh in ama hoihsak bangin a gamtat ngei ciat bangin na gamta nawn kei ding uhhi. 9 Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } na Pasian un note hong piak tawlngakna leh luahna-ah na tung nai kei uhhi. 10 Ahih hangin Jordan galkhatah pai-in, { Topa } na Pasian un luah dingin note hong piak leitangah tengin, nuamtakin na nuntak theihna dingun na kiim uha na langte khempeuh uh kiang panin tawlngakna hong piak ciangin, 11 { Topa } na Pasian un ama min omna ding munin a teelna munah note kong sawl khempeuh na paipih ding uhhi. Na meihal biaknate uh leh na biakpiaknate uh, note in na piak uh sawmah khat leh na piak thuahte uh leh { Topa' } tungah na ciam uh na thuciam piaknate uh na paipih ding uhhi.

"A kum kumin na lo uhah a piang, na khaici panun a piang khempeuh sawmah khat na pia ding uhhi. 23 { Topa } na Pasian uh na zahtak tawntungna ding uh na theihna dingun, ama min a ten'na dingin a teelna mun { Topa } note' Pasian' mai-ah na an uh, na leenggahzu uh, na sathau uh sawmah khat, leh na bawnghon uh leh na tuuhon tacilte uh na ne ding uhhi. 24 { Topa } na Pasian un a min koihna dingin a teelna mun pen, { Topa } na Pasian un no thupha hong piak ciangin note kiang panin gamla lua a, no-a' dingin lam a sau luat manin sawmah khat na paipih zawh kei uh leh, 25 tuate sum na suah ding uh a, a sumte tunin, { Topa } na Pasian un a teelna munah na pai ding uh a, 26 na deih peuhpeuh uh bawng ahi a, tuu ahi a, leenggahzu ahi a, khamtheihzu ahi zongin, na duh peuhpeuh uh leina-in a sum na zang ding uhhi. { Topa } na Pasian uh mai tua lai munah na ne ding uh a, note leh na innkuanpihte uh na lungdam ding uhhi. 27 "Note bangin amaute in tanh leh luah neilo ahih manin na khuasung uha om Levi mite na mangngilh kei ding uhhi. 28 "Kum thum simin tua kuma note' anpiang sawmah khat khempeuh hong paikhiatpihin na khuasung uhah na khol ding uhhi. 29 { Topa } na Pasian un na sepnate khempeuh uhah thupha hong piak theihna dingin, note tawh kibangin amaute in tanh ahi a, luah ahi zongin neilo uh ahih manin note' khua sunga om Levi mite, peemtate, pa neilote, leh meigong numeite hong pai-in tua ante ne-in a gilvah ding uhhi.

"Sawmah khat piak kum ahi, a kum thumna kumin, amaute in na khuapite uh sungah an ne-in, gilvahin a om theihna dingun Levi mite, peemtate, pa neilote, leh meigong numeite tungah na piak uh, na khawhsa uh sawmah khat na piak khit uh ciangin, 13 { Topa } note' Pasian' mai-ah, ‘Ka innsung panin a siangtho dingteng ka tuamkoih khin hi. Tua thamloin kei nong sawlna bangin na thupiaknate khempeuh tawh kizui-in Levi mite, peemtate, pa neilote, leh meigong numeite tungah ka pia khin hi. Hih tungtangah na thupiakna khat zong ka khial kei a, ka mangngilh zong omlo hi. 14 Dahin ka kah sungin zong sawmah khat ka ne kei a, ka nit sungin zong ka khenkhia kei a, misite tungah zong ka pia kei hi. { Topa } ka Pasian' thu ka mang a, kei nong thupiakna khempeuh bangin ka hih khin hi. 15 Vantung, nangma omna a siangtho panin hong ensuk in la, kote' pulepate tungah bawngnawi leh khuaizu tui bangin a luan'na gam na ciam mah bangin, nangma mi Israel-te leh na hong piaksa leitang thupha hong pia in,’ na ci ding uhhi.

Tua thupiakna a kitheihthang phetin Israel mite in anpalte, leenggahzu, leh lo-a piang khempeuh tampi tak hong pia uhhi. Tua ciangin amaute in na khempeuh sung pan sawmah khat ahi tampi tak hong paipih uhhi. 6 Tua ciangin Judah khuapite sungah a teng Israel mite leh Judah mite in zong bawng leh tuu sawmah khat leh { Topa } a Pasian uh tungah a kipiasa a ki-ap nate hong paipih uh a, a lom a lomin a koih uhhi. 7 A kha thumna sungin amaute in tua a lomte cian ding kipan uh a, a kha sagihna sungin a mansiang uhhi. 8 Hezekiah leh uliante hong pai-in a lomte a muh uh ciangin amaute in { Topa } leh ama mi Israel-te thupha a pia uhhi. 9 Tua ciangin Hezekiah in a lomte' thu, siampite leh Levi mite a dong hi. 10 Zadok' suan ahi siampi lianpenpa Azariah in amah dawngin, "Amaute in amau' piakte uh { Topa' } biakinn sungah paipih ding hong kipat uh-a kipan kote in an ka ne uh a, a kicing nei-in tampi vallai hi. { Topa } in ama mite thupha pia ahih manin hih na tampi a omlai i nei hi," a ci hi. 11 Tua ciangin amaute in { Topa' } biakinn sungah inndeite a bawlna ding uh Hezekiah in thu pia a, amaute in zong a deite a bawl uhhi. 12 Tua ciangin amaute in a piaknate, sawmah khat leh a ki-ap nate cihtakna tawh hong paipih uhhi. Tuate a en ulian penpa Levi mi Konaniah hi a, a sanggampa Shimei pen amah a huhpa a hihi.

Thukham sunga kigelh mah bangin i Pasian' biakinn-ah a om, i Pasian' biakinn sungah na a sem siampite kiangah zong tapa upa pente leh bawngte' tacilte, leh ganhonte' tacilte, leh tuuhonte' tacilte paipih ding, 37 leh annel lom meek masak pen siampite tungah puak ding, leh gahnei sing khempeuh panin a gah masa, sathau leh leenggahzu thakte khempeuh i Pasian' biakinn sung vankoihna-ah puak ding, leh lokhawhna khuaneute khempeuhah sawmah khat a kaikhawmte pen Levi mite ahih manin leitang panin sawmah khat khempeuh Levi mite kiangah puak ding ka kiciam uhhi. 38 Levi mite in sawmah khat a khop uh ciangin Aaron' suan siampite tawh hih khawm ding uhhi. Tua ciangin Levi mite in i Pasian' biakinn sunga vankoihna a kilawm mun inndeite-ah sawmah khat a ngah uh sung pan sawmah khat puaksawn ding uhhi. 39 Banghang hiam cihleh biakinn umlebeelte a kikoihna inndeite leh na a sem siampite, kongcingte leh lasate a giahna inndeite-ah Israel mite leh Levi mite in a kipia ante, leenggahzu leh sathaute a paipih ding uh a hihi. Eite' Pasian' biakinn kinloin i om kei ding hi.

Tua ciangin khuapite' kiimah lo omte panin a golna leh a neuna tawh kizui-in siampite leh Levi mite-a' dingin thukham sunga om bangin a kaihkhop ding uh a kipia nate, anpalte, leh sawmah khatte a koihna ding uh vankoihna innte a uk dingin mi kiseh hi; Banghang hiam cihleh siampite leh Levi mite' nasepna hangin Judah mi khempeuh lungdam mahmah uhhi.

Levi mite, lasate, leh kongcingte tungah piak dingin a kisawl an tawh biakna, paknamtui, umlebeelte, sawmah khat a kipia an, leenggahzu, leh sathau, leh siampite-a' dingin a kipia nate a koihna ngei uh inndei lianpi khat, Tobiah-a' dingin bawlsak hi. 6 Babylon kumpipa Artakzaksis in a uk kum sawmthum leh nihna kumin ama kiangah pai ka hih manin hih thu a pian' laitakin Jerusalem-ah ka om kei hi. Tawlkhat khit ciangin kumpipa kiangah a khuan ka ngen a,7 Jerusalem-ah ka ciahkik hi. Tua ciangin Tobiah-a' dingin Pasian' biakinn huang sungah inndei khat a vaihawmsakna thu, Eliashib' gamtat hoihlohna ka phawkkhia hi. 8 Hih thu-ah lungkim hetlo ka hih manin inndei sung panin Tobiah' van teng ka lawnkhia hi. 9 Tua ciangin tua inndei a sian'sakna ding uh, leh Pasian' biakinn-a umlebeelte, an tawh biakna leh paknamtui a koihkikna dingun thu ka pia hi. 10 Levi mite' ngah dingte amau' tungah kipialo ahih manin Levi mite leh lasate in a nasep ngeite uh nusia-in a lote uhah na a sepna uh zong ka phawkkhia hi. 11 Tua ahih ciangin uliante tungah ka lungkim kei a, "Banghangin Pasian' biakinn kinusiacip ahi hiam?" ka ci hi. Tua hi a, amaute kaikhawm kikin amau' sepna ngei mun ciatah ka pangsakkik hi. 12 Tua ciangin Judah mite khempeuh in an, leenggahzu, leh sathau sung pan sawmah khat hong paipihin vankoihna innte-ah hong tun' uhhi.
Leitung leh a tunga omte, leitung leh a tunga tengte { Topa}-a' a hihi.
Israel mite aw, Bethel-a mun siangtho-ah va pai unla, tua lai-ah khialhna va bawl un. Gilgal-ah va pai unla, va khial semsem un. Zingsang simin biakna va pia unla, ni thum simin sawmah khat pia un.

Keimah in note kong dotnop thu pen, mi khatpeuh in Pasian' na guksak ding kilawm ahi hiam? Kilawmlo hinapi-in note in nong guksak uhhi. Ahi zongin note in, ‘Bang hong guksak ka hi uhhiam?’ na ci uhhi. Sawmah khat piakna leh biakpiaknate-ah nong guksak uhhi. 9 Na minam bupun keima neihsa hong guksak na hih manun note khempeuh tungah samsiatna hong tung hi. 10 Ka biakinn-ah an a om theihna dingin sawmah khat a kimin hong paipih un. Kei hong ze-et un; vantung kongkhakte hongin, note-a' dingin na hoih tampi kong piakna na mu ding uhhi. 11 Lo panin a piang na ante uh, kauphe ka nesak nawn kei ding a, na leenggui uh gahpha mahmah ding hi. 12 Tua ciangin na gam uh, ten'na dingin a hoih mahmah leitang hong suak ding ahih manin, minam dang khempeuh in note pen a nuamsa minam, hong ci ding uhhi," a ci hi.
amaute in, "Sisar' lim leh a min kigelh hi," a ci uhhi. Tua ciangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, "Sisar' nate Sisar' tungah na pia unla, Pasian' nate Pasian' tungah na pia un," a ci hi.

"Mihoih a kineihkhem, no Thukham hilh siate leh Pharisee mite in gimna na thuak ding uhhi. Note in Pasian tungah lengmasel, masala, leh kummin sing namtui-a kipanin meh namtui nam khempeuh, sawmah khat pia napi-in, thukham sungah a thupizaw ahi thutang, hehpihna, leh thumante na don kei uhhi. Adangte nusia tuanloin hih thute na zuihding uh a hihi.

Biakinn sumpi khiatna kuang gei-ah Zeisu tu a, mihonte in sumpi a khiat laitakun a en hi. A haute in tampipi hong khia uhhi. 42 A zawng meigong numei khat zong hong pai a, sumnen tang nih hong khia hi. 43 Tua ciangin a nungzuite sam a, "Adangte khempeuh sangin hih mizawng meigongnu in tam khia zaw hi. 44 Banghang hiam cihleh adangte in a neihval a lamval sung panun a khia uh ahi hi; ahi zongin amah zawng mahmah napi-in ama kivakna ding nangawn sitloin a neih khempeuh a khiakhin ahi hi," a ci hi.

"No Pharisee mite in gimna na thuak ding uhhi. Note in Pasian tungah lengmasel, thuambuak-a kipan anteh theipuam dongin sawmah khat pia napi-in, mite tungah thuman ding leh Pasian itding na donkha kei uhhi. Hihte khempeuh na hihkim ding uhhi a, paihkhiat na neih ding uhhilo hi.
"A tawmno-ah a diktatte pen a tamah zong diktat uh a, a tawmno-ah a citaklote pen a tamah zong citaklo uhhi.
Nipikal khatin ni nih sung an ka tang a, ka ngah khempeuh sung panin sawmah khat nang tungah kong pia hi,’ a ci hi.

Zeisu a khuadak leh mihaute in biakinn sumkuang sungah a letsong uh a khiatna, 2 leh a zawng meigong khat in zong sumnen tang nih a khiat a mu hi. 3 Tua ciangin amah in, "Ke'n kong cihin-ah, hih a zawng meigongnu in a dangte khempeuh sangin tamzaw a khia hi. 4 Banghang hiam cihleh adangte in a zatval uh sumte a khia uh a hihi. Ahi zongin hih numei a zawng mahmah hinapi-in a nuntakna ding khempeuh a khia khin ahi hi," a ci hi.
Tua mah bangin lungdamna thu a hilhte in tua nasepna mah panin nuntakna a ngahna ding uh Topa' thupiak a hihi.
Tawlkhat sung bek a kimang na in minthan'na nei ahih leh a kip tawntung na in minthan'na lianzaw nei kan ding hi.
Christ tawh na kipawl nak uh leh Abraham' suante na hita uh a, Pasian' hong khap thute a ngah ding na hi uhhi.

Tua ahih manin bangzah takin milian ahihna thu na thei uhhi. I pupi Abraham nangawn in zong gal sungah a ngah nate sung panin ama tungah sawmah khat na pia hi. 5 Levi suanlekhak sung panin siampi a sem mite pen Abraham' suanlekhak mah hinapi-in, amau mipih Israel-te tung panin sawmah khat a lakna dingun Thukham a na kibawl hi. 6 Ahi zongin Melkhizedek ahih leh Levi' suanlekhak hilo napi-in Abraham' tung panin sawmah khat na la-in thuciamna a ngah mipa zong thupha a na pia lai hi. 7 A lianzawte in a neuzawte thupha a na piakna pen a man thu hi a, sel theihding hilo hi. 8 Siampite' lakna tawh kisai-in ahih leh a sithei mi mah ahi siampite in mite tung panin sawmah khat a la uhhi. Ahi zongin Melkhizedek' lakna tawh kisai-in ahih leh Laisiangtho in a gen mah bangin a nungta tawntung mipa in sawmah khat a la a hihi. 9 Abraham in Melkhizedek tungah sawmah khat a piak ciangin ama suan Levi in zong ama pupi Abraham tung tawnin a pia mah kici thei hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in pai in. Keimah in na thugenna-ah kong huh ding a, na thugen ding nang kong hilh ding hi," a ci hi.
{ Topa } in amah leh Dan minam Ahisamak' tapa Oholiab tungah midangte hilh siamna pia khin hi.
{ Topa } in Moses tung tawnin amaute' tunga a gensa thukhamte khempeuh note in Israel mite a hilh ding na hi uhhi," a ci hi.

"Na mit un a muhsa nate na nuntak sungun mangngilh kha-in, na lungsim panun paikhia khading ahih manin limtakin ngaihsunin hoihtakin kikem un. Horeb-a { Topa } na Pasian uh mai-ah na din' ni-un { Topa } in kei kiangah, ‘Leitungah a nuntak laiteng uh amaute in kei hong kihtakna ding leh amaute in a tate uh a hilhsawn theihna dingun keimah in amaute tungah ka thute ka zaksak theihna dingin ka kiangah mite hong khawm in,’ hong cihna thu, na tate uh leh na tate uh tate' tungah kitheisak un.

"Israel-te aw, za un: { Topa } i Pasian, { Topa } khat bek a hihi. 5 { Topa } note' Pasian, na lungsim khempeuh uh, na nuntakna khempeuh uh, leh na thahatna khempeuh uh tawh na it ding uhhi. 6 Tuni-a no kong piak hih thute na lungsim uhah om ding hi. 7 Na tate uh tungah limtakin na hilh ding uh a, na innsung uhah na tut uh ciang, lampi-ah na pai uh ciang, na lup ciang uh leh na thawh ciangun tua thute na gengen ding uhhi.
Na tate uh tungah na hilh ding uh a, na innsung uhah na lut laitak, lampi-ah na pai laitak, na lup ciang uh leh na thawh ciangun tuate genin na nei ding uhhi.

"Note lakah kamsang khat ahi a, mangman khat ahi zongin hong khangin, lim ahi a, na lamdang ahi zongin hong lak a, 2 ama hong gen lim ahi a, na lamdang ahi zongin hong tungin, na theih ngeiloh uh, ‘Adang pasian-te' nung zui-in amaute va bia ni,’ hong cihleh, 3 tua kamsangpa' thu ahi a, mangmanpa' thu ahi zongin na ngai kei ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } note' Pasian na lungsim khempeuh uh leh na nuntakna khempeuh uh tawh na it uhhiam cih a kitheihna dingin { Topa } na Pasian un no hong ze-etna a hihi.
"‘Mittawpa lam a lakkhial mipa in gimna ngah ta hen,’ ci ding uhhi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in, ‘Amen,’ ci ding uhhi.

Ka thuhilhte guahmal bangin zu-in, ka thugente daitui bangin kia hen la, lo ngeek tunga guah phin leh ankung tunga guahzu bang ta hen. 3 Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa' } min ka phat ding hi. Eite' Pasian a liatna gen un!
Siampi Jehoiada in amah thuhilh ahih manin Joash in ama uk hun sung tawntung { Topa' } muhna-ah a man gamta hi.
Amaute in Pasian' thukham laibu sung panin a kitel takin sim uh a, a cihnopna a kitelin gen uh a, tua a kisim thute a telna dingun a hilh uhhi.
Na paina ding lampi lakin ka hong hilh ding a, ka mit tawh hong enin thu kong hilh ding hi.
Tate aw, hong pai unla hong ngai un; { Topa } zahtakna thu ka hong hilh ding hi.

Amaute pen Pasian tungah a lungsim thumanlo, lungsim kip a neilo khangmi, lungsim khauhin a lehdo khangmi, amau' pulepate tawh kibang loin, amaute in Pasian sungah amau' lametna koihin, Pasian' nasepnate mangngilh loin, ama thupiakte zui-in, a suak nailo naupangte, a hong piangkik khang thakte in a thu thei-in, amaute ding khia-in amau' tuletate tungah a thu a gentheihna dingin, amah in, i pate in a tate a hilhsawn dinga a sawl ahi, Israel sungah thukham khat koihin, Jacob sungah tecipan'na khat a koih hi.
Ka siate khempeuh sangin thu ka telzaw hi. Banghang hiam cihleh na teci pan'nate ka ngaihsunsun hi.

Mite in pilna leh thuhoihte a phawk theihna ding, khiatna thuk a nei kammalte a theih theihna ding. 3 A hoihin a pil gamtat theihna ding, thuman, thutang, a kilawmin a gamtat theihna ding. 4 Thuthei nailote in a theihna ding, khangnote in pilna leh thu ngaihsut theihna a ngahna ding.
Banghang hiam cihleh kong hilh thute thuhoih a hihi. Kong hilhte khempeuh limtakin ciamteh un.
Hong kihilhnate lencip in la, khahsuah kei in. Na nuntakna ding ahih manin limtakin zui in.

Tua ciangin, "Banghangin thu thei hoh lo a, hong kihilhna mang hoh lo ka hi hiam? 13 Kei hong hilh siate' thu ka mang nuam kei a, amau' hong hilhnate ka don keikha hi. 14 Tua ahih manin tu-in ka cimawh vat a, mi' mai-ah ka min a sia hi," na ci ciat ding uhhi.
Ngun sangin kong thuhilhnate deihzaw unla, kham hoihpen sangin thutheihna deihzaw un.
Hong kihilhnate zui-in pilna ngah unla, thudon loin ommawk kei un.
Thulamlak ding a neilo mihingte kipuk uh a, thulamlak tampi neihna pen lungmuan'na a hihi.
Hilh ding utlo, kihihsakna in kitotna bek piangsak thei a, hong kithuhilh ding utna pen a hoihzaw a hihi.
Thu kihilh ding utlohna pen siat ding utna hi a, thu kihilhna zuihna pen lungnopna a hihi.
A ta a tai nuamlote a ta mudah hi a, a ta a itte in limtakin thuhilhin a tai hi.
A kihisak mite in ki thuhilhna ngai nuamlo uh a, mipilte kiangah thu dong ngeilo uhhi.
Thu kigente ngai-in hong kihilhte mang lecin mailamah na pil ding hi.
Naupang khat a neulai-in lampi man tawnsak lecin a teek dongin lampial nawnlo ding hi.
Mi khat tai-in thuhilh lecin tungthama phatna sangin a tawpna-ah lungdamzaw ding hi.

Ka ta aw, na phawk ding thudang khat omlai hi. Lai gelh-in a bu-a bawlna in bei hun nei theilo a, lai tam sin luatna in pumpi gimsak hi. 13 Hih thute khempeuh banah gen ding thu khat bek om hi. Mihing hong kipian'sakna a thu bulpi pen in: Pasian zahtakna leh a thupiakte man'na a hihi. 14 A pha hita leh a sia hita leh a simthamin i hih simte nangawn i hihna khempeuhah Pasian in thu hong khen ding hi.
Topa in note tungah cihmawhna leh gimna hong tun'sak hangin amahmah in note hong hilh ding a, note in amah na mu ding uhhi.
A lunggim mite ka thahatsak theihna dingin Topa { Pasian } in ka gen ding thu hong hilh khin hi. Ama hong hilhnate a ngai dingin zingsang simin lawpna hong guan' hi.
"{ Topa } in na tapate khempeuh hoihtakin hilh ding a, na tapate daupai mahmah ding uhhi.

Ahih hangin { Topa } in kong cihin-ah, tua hun hong tun' ciangin Israel minamte tawh hih bangin thuciamna ka bawl ding hi: Amaute' sungah ka thukham ka koih ding a, amaute' lungtang tungah ka gelh ding hi. Kei pen amaute' Pasian ka hi ding a, amaute pen keima mite ahi ding uhhi. 34 Kuamah in midangte leh a sanggamte uh kiangah, ‘{ Topa } thei in,’ ci-in a kihilh nawn kei ding uhhi; Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } in kong cihin-ah, amaute in a neupen panin a lianpen dongin, a vekpi-un kei a hong thei ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh amau' khialhnate ka maisak ding a, amaute' mawhnate zong phawkin ka nei nawn kei ding hi," a ci hi.

Migilopa khat pen si ding hi, ci-in kong gen ciangin, amah kikhelin a nuntak theihna dingin thu na hilhkholh kei leh, tua mipa pen mawhnei mahin si ding a, ahi zongin ama sihna thu ahih leh nang kong ngawh ding hi.
"Amaute (siampi) in ka mite tungah, biakna na a siangtho leh a mawkmawk nate, leh a nin leh a siang nate a kilamdan'na hilh ding uhhi.
A pilte ahih uh leh vantung khuavak tawh a taangkhawm ding uhhi. A pha-in gamtat ding mi tampi a hilhte pen aksi bangin a taang tawntung ding uhhi.

Banghang hiam cihleh Kumpi Omri' gamtatna zui-in, ama tapa Kumpi Ahab' sep khempeuh na sem uh a, amau' gamtat khempeuh na zui uhhi. Tua ahih manin note kong susia ding hi. Minam dangte in note hong nuihsanin, amaute' simmnawhna na thuak ding uhhi.

Tua ciangin Levi' suanlekhakte ahi siampite tawh ka thuciamna a kip nawnlo ahihna thu, hih thu kong genna-ah na thei ding uhhi. 5 "Amaute a nuntakna ding leh a nopsakna ding thu ka ciam a, amaute in kei hong zahtak theihna dingun hih ka thuciamte khempeuh ka pia hi. Amaute in kei hong zahtakin hong kihta takpi uhhi. 6 Amaute in thuman taktakte mah hilhin gen uh a, amaute' kam panin zuauthu gingkhialo hi. Ka deihna bangin amaute gamta uh a, a khial ding mi tampite, thuman lamah a paisak uhhi. 7 Siampite' nasep pen Pasian a manin theihna ding a hilh ding uh a hihi. Amaute pen, Vanglian { Topa' } kamtaite ahih manun, mite in keima deihna a theihna dingun amaute' tungah thu a dot ding uh a hihi.

Tua ahih manin hih thukhamte lakpan a neupente khat bek nangawn zuikha loin, midangte in zong a zuihlohna dingin a gen mite pen vantung ki-ukna sungah mi neupen hi ding uhhi. Ahi zongin hih thukhamte zui-in, midangte in zong a zuihna dingin a hilh mite pen vantung ki-ukna sungah milian hi ding uhhi.

"Kamsang taktak a hilote na muh uh ciangin limtakin kikem un. Amaute in a tungthamah tuu lim hong pua-in, ahi zongin a sungtawng taktak uh ngia hangsan bang ahi uhhi. 16 Amaute' gamtatna tawh amau' pianzia na thei ding uhhi. Lingvom kung panin leenggah kilo ngeilo a, sialtalling kung panin theigah kilo ngei ahi hiam?

Tua ni ciangin mi tampi in kei kiangah, ‘Topa, Topa aw, nangma min tawh thu hilhin, nangma min tawh dawite hawlkhia-in, nangma min tawh na lamdang lian tampi bawl hilo ka hi uhhiam?’ hong ci ding uhhi. 23 Tua ciangin keimah in amaute kiangah, ‘Note ka hong thei ngei kei hi. Siatna a gamta mite aw, kei kiang panin kihemkhia un,’ ka ci ding hi.

Na paina peuh uhah, ‘Vantung ki-ukna hong naita hi,’ ci-in thu va hilh un. 8 Cinate damsakin, misite hingsakin, miphakte damsakin, dawite va hawlkhia un. Man piak kulloin hih vangliatna na ngah uh bangin hih vangliatna na zatna uhah zong man va ngen kei un.
"A siapa sangin a sang naupangte lianzaw ngeilo a, a topa sangin a silate lianzaw ngeilo hi.

Zeisu in, "Banghangin note in na pupa ngeina uh zui-in, Pasian' thupiakna palsat zawsop na hi uhhiam? 4 Pasian in, ‘Na nu leh na pa na zahtak in,’ ci a, tua banah, ‘A nu ahi a, a pa ahi zongin a gensiate in thahna thuak ding hi,’ ci lai hi. 5 Ahi zongin note in, ‘Mi khatpeuh in a nu ahi a, a pa ahi zongin a huh theihna ding na khat peuhpeuh a neih leh, tua na pen Pasian-a' ding hi, ci peuh leh, a nu leh a pa piak kul nawnlo hi,’ ci-in thu na hilh uhhi.

Pawi sungah a om uh ciangin uliante' tutna dinga a kibawl munah tunuam se uh a, kikhopna innsungah zong uliante tutna tutphah nuampente tungah a tunuam diak uhhi. 7 Mihon lakah mite in hopihin, ‘Sia aw,’ a cihding uh a ut uhhi. 8 Ahi zongin note pen, ‘Sia,’ na kicihding uhhilo hi. Sia khat bek na nei uh a, no adangte khempeuh unau khat na hi uhhi.

Tua ahih ciangin note pai unla, midang khempeuh, keima nungzui mi suaksakin, Pa min, Tapa min, leh Khasiangtho min tawh tui sungah na phum un. 20 Tua ciangin note tungah ka hong gen thute khempeuh a zuihna dingun na hilh un. Hun bei dongin note a hong ompih tawntung ding ka hihna thu phawk ta un," a ci hi.

Amaute in, "Sia aw, nangmah in thutang genin, midangte' pauding phamawh na saklohna, uliante' maitang zahtak tuanloin, Pasian in mite a gamtat dingin a deihna thute tangtakin na hilhna ka thei uhhi. Tua ahih manin Rom Kumpipa Sisar tungah siah i piak ding kilawm ahi hiam, kilawmlo ahi hiam?
Zeisu in a thuhilhna-ah, "Thukham hilh sia pawlkhatte na bat khaklohna dingun na kidawm un. Amaute in puantualpi silhnuam uh a, mite lakah mite in a zahtak hopih ding a deih uhhi.
Tua ahih manin Pasian in a bawl theihloh khat zong omlo hi," ci-in a dawng hi.

Amah a muh zawhloh uh ciangin Jerusalem-ah kileh kikin a zong uhhi. 46 A ciahzawh uh a ni thum ni ciangin biakinn sungah amah mu uh a, siate lakah tu-in a thugen uh ngai-in, thu zong dong zelin a om a mu uhhi.
Sang naupang khat a siapa sangin lianzaw ngeilo hi; a sin ding khempeuh a theihkhit ciangin a siapa tawh kikim pan bek ding hi."

No Thukham hilh siate in gimna na thuak ding uhhi. Note in pilna ngah theihna ding konghon'na tawhtang nei napi-in a sungah note na lut tuan kei uh a, a tum dingin a paite zong lah na khaktan uhhi," a ci hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh a hun a tun' ciangin Khasiangtho in na gen dingteng uh hong hilh ding hi," a ci hi.

"Thukham hilh siate na batkhak lohna dingun kidawm un. Amaute in puantualpi silhnuam uh a, mihon lakah a kizahtak hopih ding deihin, kikhopna innsung leh pawi lakah a om uh ciangin uliante' tutna mun hoihte bekah tunuam uhhi.

Khatvei zan khuamial laitakin Zeisu kiangah va pai a, "Sia aw, mi khat peuhpeuh Pasian in ompihlo hi leh hih na lamdangte kuamah in bawl theilo ding ahih manin nang pen Pasian' hong sawl siapa na hihna ka hong thei uhhi," a ci hi.
Zeisu in, "Israel mite' sia hinapi-in hih thu thei theilo na hi hiam?
Kamsangte in a lai gelhna uhah, ‘Pasian in mi khempeuh a hilh ding hi,’ na ci uhhi. Tua ahih manin Pa kiang panin thu za-in a thei mi khempeuh ka kiangah a hong pai a hihi.
Tua ciangin amaute in, "Mawhna bulomtang sung panin suakin a khangkhia mipa in kote tungah thu hong hilhsawm na hi hiam?" ci-in tua mittaw ngeipa a hawlkhia uhhi.

Note in kei pen Siapa, leh Topa, na hong ci uhhi. Na hong cih uh mah bangin a man ka hihi. 14 Note' Topa leh Siapa in na khe uh hong silsak ka hih leh note khatlekhat na kisilsak kan ding uh kilawm hi.
Ahi zongin Pa in keima tangin a hong sawl ding Huhpa Khasiangtho a hong tun' ciangin note tungah thu khempeuh hong hilh ding a, note tungah ka hong gensa thu khempeuh zong hong phawksakkik ding hi.
Amaute in sawltakte tung panin thu sinin amaute tawh kikhawl uh a, amaute tawh an nekhawmin, thu zong a ngenkhawm uhhi.
Hih sawltak nihte in misite thokik ding hi, cih a lahtelna dingun sihna panin Zeisu thokik hi, ci-in mite kiangah thu hilh uh ahih manin nawngkai a sa uhhi.

Ama gen mah bangin sawltakte zong zingsang ciangin biakinn-ah pai-in thuhilh ding a kipan uhhi. Siampi lianpenpa leh ama kikholhpihte in ulian kikhopna a cingtaakkhat a omtheihna dingin Jew mi upa khempeuh a kikhopna dingun a sam uhhi. Tua khit ciangin thong panin sawltakte va kai-in uliante mai-ah a hong paipihna dingun palikte a sawl uhhi.
Nisimin biakinn sung leh mite inn-ah thu hilh uh a, Zeisu, Christ hi, cih Lungdamna Thu a gengen uhhi.

Saul a muh ciangin Antiok khua-ah a paipih hi. Kum khat sung tawntung tua lai-a om pawlpi mite tawh amaute gel omkhawm uh a, mi tampi tak thu a hilh uhhi. Thu um mite pen Christian ci-in min a kiphuah masakna mun in Antiok khua a hihi.

Ahi zongin Antiok khua-ah Paul leh Barnabas taam lai uh a, midang tampite tawh kopin Topa' thu a hilh uhhi. 35-36 Tawlkhat khit ciangin Paul in Barnabas kiangah, "Topa' thu i hilhnasa khua tuamtuama i sanggamte kiangah va hawhkikin bang a cici uhhiam cih va en ni," a ci hi.

Thesaloni khuamite sangin Berea khuamite in mipi lungsim neizaw uhhi. Amaute in lawp mahmahna tawh Paul' thugente ngai uh a, Paul' thugente man taktak hiam ci-in a theihna dingun nisimin Laisiangtho a sim uhhi.
Tua ahih manin tua khua-ah kum khat leh alang sung omlai-in mite kiangah Pasian thu a hilh hi.
Sani nitakin an nekhawm dingin ka kikhawm uh a, a zingciangin a dingkhia ding ahih manin Paul in a thuhilh zankim ciangdong a zomsuak hi.
Mihon lak ahi a, note' innsungah ahi zongin ka hong thuhilhna khempeuhah note' phattuamna ding a om khempeuh sit neiloin kong gen khin hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh note tungah Pasian' thu kong genloh khat zong om nawnlo hi.
Amah in Pasian' Ukna thu, leh Topa Zeisu Christ' thu, hangtakin a ututin genin a hilh hi.

Thukham thei na hih manun Pasian' deihnate na thei uh a, a man leh a manlo na khenthei uhhi. 19 Mittawte lam a lak ding, khuamial sunga om mite khuavak a musak ding, 20 mihaite a hilh ding, naupangte a hilh dingte ihi a, thukham sunga om thu khempeuh thei-in i gen khempeuh man mahmah hi, ci-in na kimuang uhhi. 21 Midangte a hilh note in, nomau mah kihilhlo ding na hi uhhiam? "Guta kei un," ci-in mi hilh napi-in nomau mahmah guta hilo na hi uhhiam? 22 "Numei tawh mawh kei un," ci-in mi hilh napi-in nomau mahmah mawh hilo na hi uhhiam? Milimte mudah napi-in milim biakna inn sunga nate gu hilo na hi uhhiam? 23 Note in thukham kisaktheihpih napi-in thukham palsatin Pasian' min na daisak uhhi.

Nasepna ding siamna a nei ihih leh na sem ni. Hilhna ding siamna a nei ihih leh hilh ni. 8 Midangte hanthot theihna ding siamna a nei ihih leh midangte hanthawn ni. Midangte hoptheihna ding a nei ihih leh citna taktak tawh hawm ni. Makaih theihna ding siamna a nei ihih leh hoihtakin na sem ni. Midangte hehpih theihna ding a nei ihih leh maitaii takin hih ni.
Thu upna sungah sanggamte aw, note mihoih hi-in, bangci gamtat ding cih thei-in, khatlekhat zong a kihilhthei dingin kong muang mahmah hi.

Lawmte aw, note' theihsa thute gensia langpangin, mite' upna nawngkaisakin pawl a kikhensak mite kidawm un. Tua bang mite tawh kikhawl vet kei un. 18 Tua bang mite in i Topa Christ' na a sem hiloin, gilpi vai bek a sem uh a hihi. Amaute in mite phatin kamkhum nono zang uh ahih manin mihoih pawlkhat a khemzo uhhi.

Tua ahih manin Pasian in pawlpi sungah mi khempeuh ama pan'mun ciat dingah a hong bulh hi. A masa-in sawltakte, a nihna-ah kamsangte, a thumna-ah laihilhte, tua ciangin na lamdang bawltheite, cina damsak theite, midang a huhtheite, thu vaihawm a siamte, leh pau lamdang a pau theite ahi uhhi. 29 A vekpi-un sawltak hilo a, a vekpi-un kamsang zong hilo uhhi. A vekpi-un laihilh, thuhilh hilo uh a, a vekpi-un na lamdang zong bawllo uhhi.
Itna pen a tawntungin a kip a hihi. Thuhilh siamna a om tei hangin tawlkhat sung bek kimangin, pau lamdang pautheih siamnate a om hangin bei ding a, thutheih siamna a om hangin maimang ding hi.
Ahi zongin Pasian' thu a hilhte pen mite tungah thugen hi a, mite tungah huhna, hanthotna, leh hehnepna a pia a hihi.

Pasian thu gen ding a neite sung panin nih leh thum bang bek in a banbanin gen ding uh a, adangte in limtakin na telngaih ding uhhi. 30 A kikhawm mite sung panin mi khatpeuh in Pasian thu gen ding hong neih leh tua a thugen laipa khawl phot ding hi. 31 Na vekpi-un a thu thei-in thahatna na ngahtheihna dingun no thugen ding a neite khempeuh in khat khatin thu na ban gen ding uhhi.
Amaute pen sawltak taktak hiloin, sawltak a kineihkhemte hi uh a, a nasepna uhah zong zuau-in, Christ' sawltak taktak a battheihna dingun a meel kiseel ahi uhhi.
Note tungah ka hong hilhsa uh lungdamna thu tawh a kilehngatin, kote-a kipan vantung mi dongin thudang a hong hilh a om leh tua a hong hilh mipa hell khuk sungah tung ta hen!
Antiok khua-ah Peter hong hawh sungin a gamtat khialhna hangin thu uppih mite lak mahah amah ka taii hi.
Pasian thu hilhna a za mipa in ama neih na hoihte khempeuh zong, amah a hilhpa tawh zangkhawm ta hen.
Christ hong itna a kicing takin theihkhit zawhloh ding ahi ta zongin note in thei-in, Pasian thu a cingin na theihna dingun thu ka hong ngetsak hi.

Amah in mite tungah siamna a tuamtuam hong pia a, pawlkhatte sawltak nasep a semding, pawlkhatte kamsang nasep a semding, pawlkhatte thuhilh kawikawi nasep a semding, pawlkhatte pawlpi kem nasep a semding, leh pawlkhatte laihilh nasep a semdingin a hong seh hi. 12 Hih nasep a tuamtuamte khempeuh a semdingin Pasian' mi khempeuh kigingkhol sakin Christ-a' dingin na semin Christ pumpi a khan'sak theihna ding deihna a hihi.
itna lungsim tawh thutak genin, lutang ahi Christ tawh i kibat dongin i khangto ding hi.
Pate aw, na tate uh a hehtheihna dingin bawl kei unla, Christiante ngeina tawh kituakin taii-in hilhin pantah un.
Christ thu a cingtakin note lungsimah hong om hen la, pilna tawh khatlekhat thu kihilhin na kitai un. Pasian tungah lungdam kohna-in Thuciam Lui sunga late, la thakte, leh biakna late na sa un.

Tu-in sanggamte aw, Pasian' deihna leh ama lungkimna dingin bangci nuntak ding cih thu kote kiang panin na theihsa uh thute tawh kizui-in na nuntaksa uh ahih mah bangin a kicingzaw semsemin na nuntakna dingun i Topa Zeisu min tawh hong thumin ka hong hanthawn uhhi. 2 Banghang hiam cihleh Topa Zeisu min tawh ka hong thuhilhnate uh na theihsa uh a hihi.
Ahi zongin thu uppih mite it ding tawh kisai-in bangmah gelh ding na kisam nawn kei uhhi. Khatlekhat na ki-itna ding uh Pasian in note tungah hong hilh khinzo hi.

Sanggamte aw, Topa in note lam a hong lak ding leh a hong makai dingin a seh, note lakah na a hong sem mite, a kilawm a kituakin zahtakbawl un. 13 Amau' nasepna hangin amaute nakpi takin itbawlin zahtak un. Note khatlekhat kilem takin na om un. 14 Sanggamte aw, a thadah mite hilh unla, a meidawite hanthawnin, a zawngkhal mite huh unla, hihbang mite ngongbawl kei un.
Thuhilhnate simmawhbawl kei un.
Tua ahih ciangin sanggamte aw, kam tawh ahi a, lai tawh ahi zongin ka hong hilh uh thumante limtakin zui unla, kiptakin om un.

Thei kisa ngelin a gen kankan uh thute leh amau kampauna mahmah zong bang gen ka hi hiam cih a thei hetlo hinapi-in amaute pen Pasian' thukhamte a hilh dingin utzaw lai uhhi. 8 Thukham pen a kizatna ding a kilawm ciangah zangthei lehang a hoih thu khat hi, ci-in i thei hi.
Hih ka gen thu pen zuau a hilo, thu taktak a gen ka hi a, Gentail mite lakah upna thu leh hih thuman a gen dingin sawltak na semin thu a hilh dingin kei a hong kisawl a hihi.
Numeite in gamdai takin kiniamkhiatna tawh thu ngai-in a sin ding uh a hihi. 12 Numeite in pasalte tungah aana nei-in thu a hilh ding ka phalkei hi. Gamdai takin a om ding uh a hihi.
Tua ahih manin siate pen paubaan'na a neilo mi, zi khat bek a nei mi, lungsim hoih hithiat mi, thu a ngaihsun thei mi, a kilawm a kituakin a gamta mi, zin leh leengla do a siam mi, thuhilh a siam mi,
Tua bang zuau thuhilhnate pen zuau genin mi a khem, sik emsa tawh tatgawp bangin a lungsim un a hoih leh a hoihlo a khenthei nawnlote' kam panin hong gingkhia ding hi.
Nang in na zuihsa upna thu leh thuhilhna man na zuih kawmin hih ka hong thugente, i sanggamte kiangah na gen nak leh Christ Zeisu' nasem a hoih khat na hi ding hi.
Ka hong gensa thute na hilhsawn in.

Kei ka hong pai matengin mipi mai-ah Laisiangtho simna, a khiatna genna, leh hanthotnate-ah tavuan na la in. 14 Kamsangte' thugennate leh upate in na tungah a khut uh nga-in thu hong ngetsakna ahi nangma hihtheih siamnate na valkhongsak kei in.
Na gamtatna leh na thuhilhnate-ah hoihtakin kidawmin om lecin nangmah-a kipan na thugen a za mite-a' dingin phattuamna omding ahih manin na nasepna-ah hoihtakin om in.
Pawlpi sungah ukna leh makaihna siamin, thuhilh leh thugen hahkat tawh a thuah upate pen thaman a zah nih piakdingin kilawm hi.

Topa Zeisu Christ thu tawh a kituaklo, i biakna paizia tawh a kilehngatin thu tuamdang a hilh mite pen, 4 a kiphasak mawkmawk hi uh a, bangmah a thei hetlo ahi uhhi. Tua bang mite in thu kisel thu kinial cihte ut belin nei uh a, hazatna, lungsim kituahlohna, kizahkona, a sialamin ki-upmawhnate piangsak uh a, 5 thuman thutak zuiloin, a lungsim paizia uh a man nawnlo, biakna pen hauhtheihna ding lampi bekin a ngaihsun mite in a tawntungin kitot kiselna a piangsak uh a hihi.
Hih a thak Lungdamna Thu hilhin a taangko ding leh sawltak na a sem dingin kei a hong kikoih a hihi.
Mi tampite' theihin ka thuhilh, na zaksa thu khempeuh, midangte a hilhsawn thei dingin a citak mite tungah hoihtakin a zuih dingun na hilh in.

Na mite thu kinialin a kitotlohna dingun Pasian' mai-ah thupi takin na hilhkhol in. Tua bang thu kinialna in a za mite phattuamna ngahsak loin a siasak bek a hihi. 15 Pasian' thuman a mantakin hilhin, na nasepna-ah maizumna thuakloin, Pasian' pahtakna na ngahtheihna dingin na siam tawpin hanciam in.

Ahi zongin nang na hih leh na theihsa na upsa thute-ah kip paisuak in. Nang tungah thu hong hilhte kua mi ahi hiam cih na theihsa hi a, 15 Christ Zeisu upna hangin hotkhiatna a hong ngahsak thei ding pilna a hong pia Laisiangtho pen na neutunga kipanin a theisa na hihna thu zong na theihsa thu mah a hihi. 16-17 Pasian' na a sem mite mi cingtaak hi-in, na hoih namkim a septheihna dingun Laisiangtho pen Pasian' lamlahna tawh a hong kipia hi a, thuman thutak hilhna ding, a khialte taiina ding, a manlote a manin puahna ding, a manin nuntak theihna ding thuhilhna dingin a manpha mahmah a hihi.

Pasian' mai, leh a hingte hita leh a site hita leh mi khempeuh' thu a khending Christ Zeisu' mai-ah nakpi takin ka hong hanthawn hi. Amah Kumpi-in hong paikikin ukna hong kipan ding ahih manin, 2 hunhoih hunsia cih khen tuanloin Pasian' thu hilh ding na kin ngaihsutna ding, lungduaina tawh mite' lungsim zo-in, mite taii-in, hanthawnin na hilhna dingin thu a hong pia ka hihi. 3 Mite in thuman a ngaih noploh hun, amaute' deihna bek a zuihnop hun, amaute' zaknop thute bek a gen ding sia a cial thuahthuah hun hong tung ding hi. 4 Amaute in thuman thutak ngainuam nawnloin tangthu phuahtawm peuh ngaihsutpi-in nei ding uhhi. 5 Ahi zongin nang na hih leh thu khempeuhah na lungsim ki-ukin haksatnate na thuak in la, Pasian' thugen nasep semin, na nasepna-ah ma na tun' in.
Pawlpi siate pen Pasian' nasem ahih manin paubaan'na a omlo, a kiphasaklo, zukham thei mi a hilo, a ngongtatlo, a huaihamlo,

Upna bulpi tawh a kituak thute limtakin lenkip ding uhhi. Tua hi leh thuhilhna man tawh midangte hanthawn thei ding uh a, thuman a nial mite' khialhna zong laktel thei ding uhhi. 10 Banghang hiam cihleh thu a manglo, thu a mawk gengen, mi a khem thei, a diakdiakin Jew ngeina bangin vun-atna ding thu a gen tampi tak a om uhhi. 11 Sum ngahtheihna ding bekin a kilawm lopi-in thu hilhin biakna innkuan buppi nawngkaisak uh ahih manin thu a gen nawnlohna dingun khaktan ding a hihi.

Ahi zongin nangmah in upna man tawh a kituak thu na hilh in. 2 Pasal khanghamte a kilawm a kituakin a omtheihna ding, thu ngaihsun thei mi ahihna ding, a kikemzo mite ahih theihna ding, upna man a neihtheihna ding, itna man a neihtheihna ding uh leh a manin lungkipin a thuakzawhna dingun na gen in. 3 Tua mah bangin mite in Pasian' thu a gensiatkhak lohna dingun numei khanghamte zong a gamtat a khuahek uh a zahtakhuai ahihna ding, mi gensiate ahih lohna ding, zunek kiphamawhte ahih lohna ding, thuhoih thupha hilhin, 4 amaute sangin a nauzaw nupite in a pasalte uh leh a tate uh a itna dingun a hilh ding, 5 thu ngaihsun thei, a gamtat siangtho, inn nasep a kizen, a migi, leh a pasalte uh thu a mang thei mi ahihna dingun na gen in. 6 Tua mah bangin khangnote zong amau pumpi a ki-ukzawhna dingun na hanthawn pha in. 7 Nangma pumpi mahmah gamtat hoihna-a kipan thu khempeuhah etteh hoih dingin na om in. Lungsim takpi tawh mite' zahtaktheih dingin thu na hilh in la, 8 mite' mawhmat theihloh ding kamhoihte na zang in. Tua hi leh i langte in hong gensiat theihna ding muloin a mai uh zum lel ding hi. 9 Silate in zong a tote uh thu mangin, thu khempeuhah a tote uh a lungkimsakna ding, a tote uh thu seelloin, 10 a guktaklohna ding, a tawntungin hoih gamtatin a cihtakna uh a kilatsakna dingun na hanthawn in. Tua hi leh eite hong Hon Pasian' thu a hoihna a kilangsakte ahi ding uh a hihi. 11 Bang hang hiam cih leh mi khempeuh in hotkhiatna a ngahtheihna dingun Pasian in ama hehpihna hong lak khinzo hi. 12 Eite in i lamet, a lian Pasian leh eite hong Hon Zeisu Christ a vangliatna hong kilatkik ding hun ngakin i om laitakin i biakna tawh a kituaklo thute leh leitung nate deihna phiatin, lungsim hi hithiatin omin, thutangin, hih leitungah Pasian' deihna bangin i nuntakna dingin tua hehpihna thu in eite hong hilh hi.

Tu-in note pen midang a hilh dingin sia na suahtheih ding uh hun hikhin napi-in note mahmah pen Pasian' thu a bulpite hilhding na kisam lai uhhi. Antak nethei nailoin nawi bek a nethei lai na hi uhhi.

Ahi zongin tu-in Israel mite tawh ka bawldingthuciamna hih bang a hihi. Amaute sungah ka thukham ka guang ding a, amaute lungtang tungah gelhin, amaute' Pasian ka hi ding a, amaute pen keima mi ahi ding uhhi. 11 A neupen pan a lianpen dongin mi khempeuh in hong thei ding uh ahih manin ‘Topa thei in,’ ci-in a ulenau leh a mipihte kiangah kuamah in a hilh ding kisam nawnlo ding hi.

Tua banah, i leitung pate in gim hong pia a, zong i zahtak lai hi. Tua ahih leh kha thu tawh kisai-ah i Pa' thu mang phazaw-in i nuntak ding kisam hi. 10 I leitung pate in amau' hoihsak bangin nuntak tomno sung ngaihsutna-in hong thuhilhin gim hong pia a, ahi zongin Pasian in amah tawh kibangin siangtho-in i omtheihna dingin eite hong khualna-in hong thuhilhin gim hong pia hi. 11 Thuhilhna tawh gim hong kipiak ciangin nuam kisa hetloin na kisa mahmah sam a, ahi zongin tua thuhilhna a mangzote in thuman nuntakna hangin nopsakna thaman a nung ngah uhhi.
Sanggamte aw, mite tungah thu a hilh eite pen midangte sangin a khauhzaw-in thu hong kikhen ding ahih manin note tampi sia na suaknuam se kei un.

Na lungsim sung uhah Christ zahtakbawl unla, amah Topa-in nei un. Note' lametna thu a hong dong a omkhak leh hoihtakin a genthei dingin kiging tawntung unla, ahi zongin lungnemna leh zahtakna lim tawh gen un.

Christ mahmah zong note-a' dingin si a, Pasian' kiangah hong tun'pih theihna dingin mihoih khat pen mihoihlote' mawhna hangin khatvei a si hi. Mite in ama leitung pumpi that a, ahi zongin Pasian in kha nuntakna a pia hi. 19 Tua kha nuntakna tawh va pai-in thongkia-in a om khate kiangah thu a va hilh hi.

Pasian' piak na a zatsiamte bangin Pasian' kiang panin na ngah uh nate, midangte' phattuamna dingin na zang un. 11 Minthan'na leh vangliatna a nei tawntung Pasian in Zeisu Christ hangin thu khempeuhah phatna a ngahtheihna dingin thuhilhte in Pasian' thu na hilh unla, na a semte in Pasian' piak thahatna tawh na sem un. Amen.

Pasian in note' khutsungah a hong piak tuuhonte hoihtakin na cing unla, utlopipi hiloin, Pasian' hong deih bangin utna lungsim takpi tawh na cing un. Sum ngahnopna bek tawh a sem hiloin utna lungsim tawh a semte na hi un. 3. Note' kepdingin a hong kipia tuute, aana neihna tawh a cing hiloin tuute' etteh dingin a gamtate na hi un.

Mite lakah kamsang manlo a omngei mah bangin note lakah sia manlo hong om ding hi. Siatna a piangsak thei thuhilhna a manlo hong lutpih simin, amaute mahmah a tankhia Topa nangawn nial ding uhhi. Tua ahih manin thakhat thu-in siatna thuaklawh ding uhhi. 2 Tua bang hinapi-in mi tampi tak in amau' gamtat hoihlohna zui ding uh a, tua bangin amau gamtatna hangin mite in thuman lampi gensia ding uhhi. 3 Hih sia manlote in a huaiham manun note kiang panin sum a ngahtheihna dingun phuahtawm thu hong gen ding uhhi. Ahi zongin sawtpeka kipanin amaute' thu a Khen dingpa a kigingsa-in om niloh a, amaute a Susia dingpa in en gige hi. 4 Banghang hiam cihleh vantung mite nangawn in khialhna a neih ciangin Pasian in khahkhong loin hell khuk sungah khia a, Thukhen Ni hun dong ngakin khuamial sungah kol bulhsa-in a omsak hi.

Lai a hong gelhna sungah a thugente tu-ate mah a gennuam a hihi. A laigelhna sungah a telhak thu tampi om a, theihna kicing loin lungsim kiplo mi pawlkhatte in Laisiangtho sung thu a ututun a kawihei uh bangin Paul' thugente zong a manlopi-in khia uh ahih manin siatna a tuaklawh uhhi.

Christ in note tungah ama Khasiangtho hong piakhin a, tua Khasiangtho na neih laiteng uh kuamah in note hong hilhding kisam nawnlo hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Khasiangtho in note tungah thu khempeuh hong hilh a, tua a hong hilh thute a man vive hi a, zuauthu khat zong omlo hi. Tua ahih manin Khasiangtho' hilhnate zui unla, Christ sungah kiptakin om un.
Pa Pasian in leitung mite a honkhia dingin a Tapa a hong paisakna thu kote in thei-in midang kiangah genbelin ka nei uhhi.

Ahi zongin note ka hong mawhsakna ding thu tawmkhat a om hi. Milim biakna ante nesakin, nulepa paktatna piangsak a, Israel mite mawhna a gamtasak Balak tungah thu a hilh Balaam' thuhilhnate a um mi pawlkhat note lakah a om hi.

Note in mizawngte tuancilin, a an neihteng khempeuh uh laksak na hih manun, suangseek inn na lam hangun tua suang innsungah na tengkha kei ding uh a, leenggui lo hoih na neih hangun a leenggahzu na dawnkha kei ding uhhi.

Tua ahih ciangin Samuel in ama tung panin kumpi khat a ngen mite kiangah { Topa' } thugen khempeuh a gen hi. 11 Amah in, "Note hong uk ding kumpipa' hih zia dingte in: Amah in na tapate uh la-in a leengte-ah na semin a sakol nasem ding, leh a leengte mai-ah a tai dingin seh ding hi. 12 Tua ciangin amah in ama-a' dingin a tul-a uk leh a sawmnga-a ukte, leh pawlkhatte a lo kho-in a an a la ding, leh a galsung nazatte leh a leeng nate a bawl dingin seh ding hi. 13 Amah in na tanute uh paknamtui bawl ding, an huan ding, leh an em dingin la ding hi. 14 Amah in na lote uh, na leenggui lote uh, leh na oliv lote uh sung panin a limcipen teng la-in ama nasemte tungah pia ding hi. 15 Amah in na an leh na leenggahte uh sawmah khat la-in ama uliante leh ama nasemte tungah pia ding hi. 16 Amah in na nasem numeite uh, na nasem pasalte uh, na bawngte, uh leh na late uh a gina pen teng la-in ama na a sem dingin koih ding hi.

Israel mite khatlekhat kiho-in, "Hih hong paikhia mipa na mu ngei uhhiam? Israel-te a to dingin hong paito takpi hi. Amah a that mipa tungah kumpipa in sum tampi pia-in, ama tanu zong pia ding a, a pa' innkuante, Israel sungah aana nasep leh siah khempeuh kipengsak ding hi," a ci uhhi.

Tua ahih ciangin kumpipa in amau' ukpi Jehoiada samin ama kiangah, "{ Topa' } nasem Moses in { Topa' } ompihna puanbuk-a dingin Israel mihonte tung panin a khon mangmu bang hangin Judah leh Jerusalem panin Levi mite khawmsak lo na hi hiam?" a ci hi.

Pawlkhatte in kial tun' huhau-in an leina dingin a lote, a leenggah lote, leh a innte uh a piakna hong gen uhhi. 4 Pawlkhatte in kumpipa tungah siah piak dingin a lote uh leh a leenggui lote uh khamin a piakna uh hong gen uhhi.
Kumpipa Ahasueras in a ukna gam leitung leh tuikulh tunga tengte tung panin siah kai hi.

Note in mizawngte tuancilin, a an neihteng khempeuh uh laksak na hih manun, suangseek inn na lam hangun tua suang innsungah na tengkha kei ding uh a, leenggui lo hoih na neih hangun a leenggahzu na dawnkha kei ding uhhi.
Tua ahih manin no hong itte bek na it uh leh Pasian in bang thaman hong pia zenzen ding ahi hiam? Siahdongte nangawn in amau a itte it thei uhhi.

Tua lai mun panin Zeisu a paikhiat ciangin siahdongpa Matthew a zumah tu-in a om mu a, "Hong zui in," a cih leh amah zong dingin a zuipah hi. 10 Zeisu in Matthew' inn-ah nitak an a nek laitakin siahdong dangte leh thukham a khial midang tampite in zong Zeisu leh a nungzuite tawh an a nekhawm uhhi. 11 Pharisee mite in hih thu a muh uh ciangin Zeisu nungzuite kiangah, "Bang hangin na siapa un siahdongte leh thukham khialte tawh an nekhawm ahi hiam?" a ci uhhi. 12 Zeisu in hih thu a zak ciangin, "Cidamte in siavuan kisamlo uh a, cina mite bek in kisam uhhi.

Mihing Tapa hong pai leuleu a, zune anne-in a om ciangin, ‘Zuhai anhaipa; siahdongte leh midangte in a kikholhpih noploh mite tawh a kikhawlpa,’ ci leuleu uhhi. Ahi zongin Pasian' pilna a man taktakna thu a gah panin hong kilang hi," a ci hi.

Kapernaum khua-ah a tun' uh ciangin biakinn siahdongte in Peter kiangah, "Na siapa in biakinn siah hamu a piak ngei mah ahi hiam?" ci-in a dot uh ciangin, 25 "A piak ngei mah ahi hi," ci-in a dawng hi. Innsungah Peter a lut ciangin Zeisu in na paupih masa zaw a, "Simon aw, nang na bangci ngaihsut hiam? Leitung kumpite in kuate tung panin siah kai ahi uhhiam? Amau tate tung panin siah kai ahi uhhiam, tua ahih kei leh midangte tung panin kai ahi uhhiam?" ci-in a dot ciangin 26 Peter in, "Midangte tung panin siah a kai uhhi," ci-in a dawng hi. Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Tua ahih leh siah piak ding panin a tate a peng a hihi. 27 Ahi zongin amau' nasepna a nawngkaisak i suahkhak lohna dingin tuili-ah nga siahna sikkawi va khia in la, a awk masa penpen hong kaikhia in. Tua a ngasa kam sung en lecin dangka tang peek khat na om ding hi. Tua sum la in la, eite gel-a' dingin biakinn siah va pia in," a ci hi.
Amah in tua mite' thu a man'nop kei leh pawlpite tungah a thu ko un. Pawlpite' thu nangawn a man'nop kei leh Gentail mite leh siahdongte bangin na ngaihsun un.

Tua ciangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, "Note in bangci ngaihsut na hi uhhiam? Mi khat in tapa nih nei hi. A ta uzaw kiangah, ‘Ka ta aw, tuni-in leenggah lo-ah va kuan in,’ ci-in a sawl ciangin 29 amah in, ‘Kuan nuam kei ing,’ ci napi-in a lungsim kikheelin a kuankik hi. 30 Tua ciangin a ta nauzaw kiangah tua mah bangin va ci a, ‘Pa aw, va kuan mah ning,’ ci napi-in a kuan kei hi. 31 Hih tapa nihte sung panin a koi bel pen a pa' deih bangin gamta ahi hiam?" a ci hi. Amaute in, "A ta uzaw a ta hi," a ci uhhi. Tua ciangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, "Note kiangah a mantaka kong genin-ah: Pasian' ukna sungah note sangin siahdongte leh numei paktatte lut masazaw ding hi. 32 Bang hang hiam cih leh note kiangah Tuiphumpa Johan hong pai-in thuman lampi hong lak napi-in na um kei uh a, ahi zongin siahdongte leh numei paktatte in a um uhhi. Hih thu na theih khit uh ciang nangawnin na lungsim uh na kheel nuam tuan kei uh a, na um kei veve uhhi.

Tua ahih ciangin Rom kumpipa Sisar tungah siah i piak ding kilawm hiam, na ngaihsutna nong genna dingin ka deih uhhi," a ci uhhi. 18 Ahi zongin Zeisu in amau' gitloh geelna thei ahih manin, "Mihoih a kineihkhem mite aw, bang hangin kei hong thangsiah se na hi uhhiam? 19 Siahin na piakding uh sum hong lak dih un," a cih ciangin sumtang peek khat hong paipih uhhi. 20 Tua ciangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, "Hih sum tungah kua lim leh kua min om ahi hiam?" ci-in a dot ciangin 21 amaute in, "Sisar' lim leh a min kigelh hi," a ci uhhi. Tua ciangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, "Sisar' nate Sisar' tungah na pia un la, Pasian' nate Pasian' tungah na pia un," a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Galilee Tuili gei-ah Zeisu a paikik hi. Ama kiangah mihonpi hong pai uh a, Zeisu in tua mihonte thu a hilh hi. 14 Tua bangin a paina-ah Alfeas tapa Levi, a siahdon'na zumah tu-in a om a mu hi. Zeisu in ama kiangah, "Kei hong zui in," a ci hi. Levi zong dingin Zeisu' nung a zuipah hi. 15 Tua nung ciangin Zeisu in Levi' inn-ah an a va ne hi.
