Siahdong mi tampi leh thukham a khial mi tampite in Zeisu zui uh a, amaute tampi in Zeisu leh a nungzuite tawh an a nekhawm uhhi. 16 Hih thukham khialte leh siahdongte tawh Zeisu in an a nekkhopna Pharisee mite sung panin Thukham hilh siate pawlkhat in a muh uh ciangin a nungzuite kiangah, "Bang hangin hih bang mite tawh an nekhawm ahi hiam?" ci-in a dong uhhi. 17 Zeisu in hih thu a zak ciangin amaute kiangah, "Cidamte in siavuan kisamlo uh a, cina mite bek in kisam uhhi. Mite in a zahtak mihoihte a kisikna dingun a sam dingin a hong pai ka hi kei a, mite in a pampaih mite a kisikna dingun a sam dingin a hong pai ka hi hi," a ci hi.

Amaute in zong dangka peek khat hong paipih uh a, tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Hih dangka tunga om kua' lim hi a, kua' min ahi hiam?" ci-in a dot ciangin, "Rom Kumpipa Sisar' lim leh a min ahi hi," ci-in a dawng uhhi. 17 Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Tua ahih leh, Sisar' neihsate Sisar' tungah pia un la, Pasian' neihsate Pasian' tungah pia un," a ci hi. Tua ama thudawn'na hangin lamdang a sa mahmah uhhi.

Johan in, "Puanak nih a nei mipa in a neilote hawm un la, annek ding a neite in a neilote hawm un," ci-in a dawng hi. 12 Siahdongte pawlkhat zong tui a kiphum dingin hong pai-in Johan kiangah, "Sia aw, bangci gamtat ding ka hi uhhiam?" ci-in a dong uhhi. 13 Amah in, "Na don' dingun a kilawm zahval na dong kei un," ci-in a dawng hi. 14 Galkap pawlkhatte in zong ama kiangah, "Kote, bangci gamtat ding ka hi uhhiam?" ci-in a dot uh ciangin, "Zawhthawh thu tawh ahi a, a manlopi-in mawhsakna tawh ahi zongin kuama sum sut kei un la, na khasum ngahzah uh tawh lungkim un," ci-in a dawng hi.

Tua khit ciangin Zeisu paikhia a, siahdongpa Levi, a zumah a tu a mu hi. Zeisu in, "Kei hong zui in," a ci hi. 28 Levi zong dingpah a, a na khempeuh nusia-in Zeisu a zui hi. 29 Tua ciangin Levi in ama inn-ah Zeisu vakna annek pawipi bawl a, annekna sabuai-ah siahdong dang tampite leh midangte zong tawh a tukhawm uhhi. 30 Pharisee mite leh amau sung panin Thukham hilh siate, nungzuite tungah phun uh a, "Bang hangin siahdongte leh thukham khial mite tawh an nekhawm na hi uhhiam?" a ci uhhi. 31 Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Cidamte in siavuan kisamlo uh a, cina mite bek in kisam uhhi.
Siahdongte leh midangte khempeuh in hih thu a zak uh ciangin Pasian' deihna zui-in Johan' khutsungah tui a kiphum uhhi.
Mihing Tapa hong pai leuleu a, zune anne-in a om ciangin, ‘Zuhai, anhaipa, siahdongte leh midangte in a kikholhpih noploh mite tawh a kikhawlpa,’ ci leuleu uhhi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh, thusimin a kikoih peuhmah, khatvei teitei thulang a suaklo ding, a kiselcip peuhmah, khatvei teitei a kipholaklo ding, bangmah omlo hi.

Khatvei, Zeisu' thugen a ngai dingin siahdongte leh mawhneite tampi tak a hong pai uhhi. 2 Pharisee mite leh Thukham hilh siate phun uh a, "Hih mipa, mawhneite tawh kikhawlin an nangawn nekhawm hi," a ci uhhi. 3 Tua ahih manin Zeisu in amaute kiangah thugentehna khat gen a, 4 "Note sung panin khatpeuh in tuu za khat nei-in, tua sung panin khat man'suah leh bangcih ding ahi hiam? Lopa ne-in a gamta tuu sawmkualekuate nusia-in, a muh matengin tua a mang tuu khat a zong dingin kuankhia ding hi.

Pharisee mipa dingin thu ngen a, ‘Pasian aw, kei pen midangte bangin a huaiham, a thumanlo, numei tungah a mawh mi ka hi kei hi; hua lai-a siahdongpa bang hilo ka hih manin nangma tungah ka nuamna kong pulak hi. 12 Nipikal khatin ni nih sung an ka tang a, ka ngah khempeuh sung panin sawmah khat nang tungah kong pia hi,’ a ci hi. 13 Ahi zongin siahdongpa pen a gamla simah ding a, vantung lamah zong dak ngamloin a dip humin kuncip a, ‘Pasian aw, kei mimawh mi khialpa hong hehpih in,’ ci-in a ngen hi. 14 Ke'n kong cihin-ah, hih mipa pen Pasian tawh a kilemsa-in a inn-ah ciah a, a khatpa pen tua bangin ciahlo hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh a kiliansakte pen kiniamkhiatsuk ding a, a kiniamkhiatte pen a lianin kibawl ding hi," a ci hi.

Jerikho khua-ah Zeisu lut a, a paisuak dingin khuasung a nawk laitakin, 2 Zakkhias a kici siahdong ukpa khat na om a, amah mihau khat a hihi. 3 Amah in Zeisu kua hiam cih a muhna dingin hanciam hi; ahi zongin amah mi tuntom khat ahih manin mihon lakah a mu zo kei hi. 4 Tua ahih manin amah na matai a, Zeisu a muhtheihna dingin a totna ding lampi gei-a theithek kung tungah a na kah hi. 5 Zeisu, tua mun a tun' ciangin khuadak to-in ama kiangah, "Zakkhias aw, manlangin hong kumsuk in. Na inn-ah tuzan kong taam ding hi," a ci hi.

Rom Kumpipa Sisar' tungah siah i piak ding a kilawm mah ahi hiam, kilawmlo ahi hiam?" ci-in a dong uhhi. 23 Ahi zongin Zeisu in amau' ngianbawlna thei ahih manin, 24 "Sum peek khat hong lak dih un. Hih sum tunga om lim leh min kua-a' ahi hiam?" a cih ciangin, "Kumpipa' lim leh min hi," ci-in a dawng uhhi. 25 Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Tua ahih leh, Kumpipa-a' teng Kumpipa tungah na pia un la, Pasian-a' teng Pasian' tungah na pia un," a ci hi. 26 Ama kampauna tawh mihon lak panin a matna dingun thu om theilo ahih manin ama thudawn'na hangin lamdangsa-in a om khikhe uhhi.
A kuamah peuh in hong ukte' thu na mang ciat un. Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian' thukimpih lohin kuamah in ukna thu neilo hi; ukna thu nei i cih mite pen Pasian' koih mite a hihi.
Tua ahih manin phiangsiah piak dingte tungah pia-in, mangmu piak dingte tungah pia-in, zahtak dingte zahtak bawlin, pahtawi dingte pahtawi ta un.

Na mite in hong uk kumpite leh aana neite' thu mangin, thuhoih khempeuh a sem dingin a kigingsa-in a om ding uh phawksak in la, 2 kuamah gensia loin, mite tawh kilemin kikhawl thei-in, lungsim nemin, mi khempeuh tungah a dikna ding uh na gen in.

Topa' hangin leitung ukna aana neite' thu na mang un. Kumpipa' thu ahi a, 14 a gamtat siate gim pia-in, a gamtat hoihte a pahtawi dingin kumpipa in a sawl thuneite khempeuh' thu ahi zongin na mang un. 15 Bang hang hiam cih leh thu theiloin a mot paupau mihaite, na gamtat hoihna un a daihsak ding, Pasian' deihna a hihi.

Tua ciangin Jerusalem kumpipa Melkhizedek in an leh leenggahzu hong pusuah hi. Amah pen Sang Pen Pasian' siampi zong a hihi. 19 Amah in thupha pia a, "Vantung leh leitung a bawl, Sang Pen Pasian in Abram thupha pia hen! 20 Na galte na khutsungah a hong pia Sang Pen Pasian in thupha ngah hen," a ci hi. Abram in na khempeuh sawmah khat ama tungah a pia hi.
note pen keima siampi nasep a sem minam, leh minam siangtho na hi ding uhhi. Israel mite tungah hih thute na gen ding ahi hi," a ci hi.
Aaron in nitakin zong meivakte a koih ciangin tuate hal ding a, na khang tawntungun { Topa' } mai-ah a namtui hi tawntung ding hi.

Amah in a siangtho na a hih khialhna-ah lohkikna zong bawl ding a, seh nga-ah khat gawm behin siampipa tungah pia ding hi. Siampipa in mawhna hanga biakna tuutal tawh ama-a' dingin kilemna bawlsak ding a, amah kimaisak ding hi.
Amah in a siangtho mun khatah, a pumpi tui sungah silin, a puante silh ding a, hong paikhia-in, ama meihal biakna leh mite' meihal biakna pia-in, ama-a' ding leh mite-a' dingin kilemna bawl ding hi.
Siampipa khat peuhpeuh' tanu in paktatna tawh amah leh amah a kidaisak leh, ama pa a daisak a hihi. Tua numei tawh kihallum ding hi.
Nangmah in Aaron leh a tapate na seh ding a, amaute in a siampi nasep uh don ding uhhi. Ahih hangin midang khatpeuh in siampi nasep a sep leh, tua mi kithat ding hi," a ci hi.
Siampi Aaron' tapa Eleazar pen Levi mi makaite tungah a ukpi hi ding a, biakbuk a en mite' nasepna vil ding hi.
A siangthopen nate nai-ah amaute a pai ciangun siloin a hin'na dingun hih un. Aaron leh a tapate pai-in a nasep ding uh leh a van puak ding ciat uhah amaute seh ding uhhi.

Tua ciangin siampipa in amah kiciam sakin, ‘Na pasal' ukna nuai-ah na om sungin, kuamah in nang hong luppih loin, nitna lamah a kihello na hih leh, hih tuisia panin suakta in.20Ahih hangin na pasal' ukna nuai-ah om napi-in nangmah vakvai a, nang leh nang kininsakin, na pasal a hilo midang khat in nang hong luppih leh,21(siampipa in tua numei kiciamsak ding a, tuanu kiangah) { Topa } in na pheipi teemsakin na pumpi a pawmsak ciangin, na mite lakah hamsia leh kiciamna-a zat dingin { Topa } in nang hong bawlin,22hih tuisia in na gilsung zui hen la, na pumpi pawmsakin na pheipi teemsak hen,’ ci ding hi. Tua ciangin numei in, ‘Amen, Amen,’ ci ding hi.
Israel mite tungah hehna a om nawnlohna dingin biakbuk nasep leh biakna tau nasep note in na sem ding uhhi.
Moses in amaute, minam khat panin tul khat ciat, biakinn nate leh pataukohna dingin peengkulte siampi Eleazar' tapa Finehas kengsakin ama makaihna tawh gal sungah a kuansak hi.

Ahih hangin siampite a mi tawmlua uh ahih manin meihal biaknate khempeuh a vun hawk khin zolo uh a, siampi dangte a kisian'suah ma sungteng, a sanggam uh Levi mite in nasep a kizawh mateng amaute huh uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh kisian'suahna thu-ah siampite sangin Levi mite ngentel zaw uhhi.
Siampite mi a kicingzah ding amau kisian'suah nailo uh a, mite zong Jerusalem-ah kikhawm nailo uh ahih manin a hunin bawl theilo uhhi.
A makai siampite leh mi khempeuh zong tua bangmahin citaklo mahmah uh a, minam dangte' kihhuainate zui uhhi. Amah in Jerusalem-ah a siangtho-in a koih { Topa' } biakinn amaute in ninsak uhhi.

Tua ciangin Judah leh Benjamin sunga innkuan lutangte, leh siampite leh Levi mite, Jerusalem khua-a om { Topa' } biakinn a lamkik dingin a lungsim sung uhah Pasian in a suahsak mite khempeuh kithawi uhhi.

Siampite sung panin: Jeshua-te beh panin Jedaiah suante — za kua sawmsagihlethum a hihi. 37 Immer suante — tul khat sawmngalenih a hihi. 38 Pashhur suante — tul khat za nih sawmlilesagih a hihi. 39 Harim suante — tul khat sawmlesagih ahi uhhi.
Siampite sung panin zong: Habaiah suante, Hakkoz suante, leh Barzilai suante (amah in Gilead mi Barzillai tanute khat ten'pihin tua min tawh a kilo pah) ahi uhhi.
Siampite, Levi mite, leh mi pawlkhatte Jerusalem leh a kiim nai-ah teng uhhi. Lasate, kongcingte, biakinn nasemte, leh Israel mi khempeuh amau' khuapi ciatah a teng uhhi.

A kha sagihna hong cin' ciangin Israel mite amau' khuapi ciatah teng khin uh ahih manin, khekhat khai bangin Jerusalem-ah hong kituah diam uhhi. 2 Tua ciangin Jozadak' tapa Jeshua leh a siampipihte, leh Shealtiel' tapa Zerubbabel leh a behte hong kipan uh a, Pasian' mi Moses thukham sungah a kigelh bangin meihal biaknate piakna dingin Israel Pasian biakna tau a bawl uhhi.

Siampite leh Levi mite a vekpi-un kisian'suah khin uh a, a vekpi-un zehsiang khin uhhi. Tua hi a, amaute in sal suaksa a hong ciahkik khempeuh-a' ding, a siampipihte uh leh amau mahmah-a' dingin Paisan tuuno a go uhhi.

a pa Abishua, a pa Finehas, a pa Eleazar, a pa siampi lianpenpa Aaron— 6 hih Ezra pen Babylon panin hong tungto hi. Amah pen Israel Pasian, { Topa } in a piak Moses thukham a siam laithei mi khat a hihi. { Topa } ahi ama Pasian in ompih ahih manin ama nget khempeuh kumpipa in a pia hi. 7 Kumpi Artakzaksis in a uk a kum sagihna kumin Israel mite, siampite, Levi mite, lasate, kongcingte, leh biak-inn nasem pawlkhat zong, Jerusalem-ah Ezra tawh tungto uhhi.

Siampite, Levi mite, lasate, kongcingte, biakinn nasemte, ahih kei leh hih Pasian' biakinn-a nasemte khat peuhpeuh tung panin siah ahi a, mangmu ahi a, losap ahi zongin lakna ding thu na neih lohna uh zong kong zasak uhhi, ka ci hi.

Tua ciangin siampi liante sung panin mi sawmlenih — Sherebiah, Hashabiah, leh amau' behte mi sawm ka tuamkoih hi. 25 Tua ciangin i Pasian' biakinn nasepna dingin kumpipa leh a thu lamlakte leh a uliante leh tua lai-a a om Israel mi khempeuh in a tuam khen ciat uh ngun leh kham leh umlebeelte, amaute tungah ka ap hi.

Siampi liante, Levi mite, leh Israel mi beh lutangte' muhin Jerusalem khua-ah { Topa' } biakinn dei sungah na puak dong mateng uh vilin kem un," ka ci hi. 30 Tua ahih manin siampite leh Levi mite in Jerusalem-a i Pasian' biakinn-ah puak dingin ngun, kham, leh umlebeelte a hong sang uhhi.

Hih thute khempeuh a kisep khit ciangin keima kiangah makaite pawlkhat hong pai-in, "Hih gama teng gamdang mite' nitna leh Kanaan mite, Hit mite, Perez mite, Jebus mite, Ammon mite, Moab mite, Egypt mite, leh Amor' mite' gamtat a kihhuaite panin Israel mi, siampite leh Levi mite nangawn zong, a siangtho-in tuam omlo uhhi. 2 Amaute leh a tapate un hih gama teng minam dangte' numeite ten'pih uh a, tua thu hangin a siangtho minam pen tu-in gamdang mite tawh a kihel suak ta hi. Tua hi a, hih thu-ah makaite leh thukhen uliante pen a khial masa ahi uhhi," hong ci uhhi.
Tua ciangin Ezra dingin, a kigensa bangin amaute a gamtatna dingun a kiciam dingin siampi makaite, Levi mite, leh Israel mi khempeuh sawl a, amaute zong a kiciam pah uhhi.

Siampite beh lak panin Jozadak' tapa Jeshua leh a sanggamte beh sung panin Maaseiah, Eliezer, Jarib, leh Gedaliah-te in gamdang numei a ten'pihna kimu hi. 19 Amaute in a zite a mak ding uh kiciam uh a, amau' mawhna hangin biakna-in tuuhon panin tuutal khat hong paipih uhhi.

Siampite sung panin: Jeshua-te beh panin Jedaiah suante — za kua sawmsagihlethum a hihi. 40 Immer suante — mi tul khat sawmngalenih a hihi. 41 Pashhur suante — mi tul khat za nih sawmlisagih a hihi. 42 Harim suante — mi tul khat sawmlesagih ahi uhhi.

Siampite' sung panin zong: Hobaiah suante, Hakkoz suante, Barzilai suante (amah in Gilead mi Barzilai' tanute khat ten'pihin tua min tawh a kilo pah) ahi uhhi. 64 Hih mite in khang ciamtehna sungah a kiciamteh mite lakah amau' min a zon' uh hangin mulo uh ahih manin amaute a siangloin seh uh a, siampi nasep semsak theilo uhhi. 65 Tua hi a, Urim leh Thummim aisanna tawh ai san ding siampi khat a om matengin amaute in biakna an siangtho pente a neklohna ding uh gam ukpa in a gen hi. 66 Mi a vekpi-in tul sawmli tul nih zathum sawmguk pha a, 67 amaute' nasem numei leh pasal tul sagih zathum sawmthumsagihte kisimlo lai hi. Tua banah amaute in lasa numei leh pasal za nih sawmlinga nei uhhi. 68 Amau' sakol za sagih sawmthum guk, a la-sakol uh za nih sawmli nga, 69 a kalaoh uh za li sawmthum nga, leh a late uh tul guk za sagih sawmnih a pha hi. 70 Beh lutang mi pawlkhat in nasepna dingin nate pia uhhi. Gam ukpa in vanmanpha koihna-ah kham darik tul khat, kuang-uk sawmnga, leh siampipuan za nga sawmthum a pia hi. 71 Tua ciangin beh lutang pawlkhatte in vanmanpha koihna-ah kham darik tul sawmnih leh ngun mina tul nih za nih a pia uhhi. 72 Tua ciangin midangte' piakte pen kham darik tul sawmnih, ngun mina tul nih, leh siampipuan sawmguklesagih a hihi. 73 Tua ciangin siampite, Levi mite, leh mi pawlkhatte Jerusalem khua leh a kiimah teng uhhi; kongcingte, lasate, biakinn nasemte, leh Israel midangte amau' khuapi ciatah a teng uhhi.

Tua ciangin a gam ukpa Nehemiah, laitheipa lah hi-in siampi lah ahi Ezra, leh mite a hilh Levi mite in amaute khempeuh kiangah, "Tuni pen { Topa } note' Pasian-a' dingin biakna ni siangtho ahi hi; a kap a mau om kei un," a ci hi. Banghang hiam cihleh thukham kammalte a zak uh ciangin mi khempeuh kap uhhi.
A omlai Israel mite, siampite, Levi mite, kongcingte, lasate, biakinn nasemte, a zite a tapate leh a tanute, thu teltheihna a nei, Pasian' thukham hangin gamdang mite panin a tuam om mi khempeuh in

Tua ciangin thukham sunga a kigelh bangin a kiseh hunin a kumkumin { Topa } eite' Pasian' biakna tau tungah cih dingin beh a banbanin i Pasian' biakinn sungah sing a kitutna dingin siampite, Levi mite, leh ko mi vekpite in sing pua ding sehna ai ka san uhhi. 35 I leitang panin a piang anpalte leh singgah kungte panin a gah masa khempeuh a kumkumin { Topa' } biakinn-ah puak ding ka kiciam uhhi. 36 Thukham sunga kigelh mah bangin i Pasian' biakinn-ah a om, i Pasian' biakinn sungah na a sem siampite kiangah zong tapa upa pente leh bawngte' tacilte, leh ganhonte' tacilte, leh tuuhonte' tacilte paipih ding, 37 leh annel lom meek masak pen siampite tungah puak ding, leh gahnei sing khempeuh panin a gah masa, sathau leh leenggahzu thakte khempeuh i Pasian' biakinn sung vankoihna-ah puak ding, leh lokhawhna khuaneute khempeuhah sawmah khat a kaikhawmte pen Levi mite ahih manin leitang panin sawmah khat khempeuh Levi mite kiangah puak ding ka kiciam uhhi. 38 Levi mite in sawmah khat a khop uh ciangin Aaron' suan siampite tawh hih khawm ding uhhi. Tua ciangin Levi mite in i Pasian' biakinn sunga vankoihna a kilawm mun inndeite-ah sawmah khat a ngah uh sung pan sawmah khat puaksawn ding uhhi.
A omlai Israel-te, siampite, leh Levi mite ahih leh Judah khuapi dangte-ah amau' luah leitang ciatah teng uhhi.

Shealtiel' tapa Zerubbabel leh Jeshua tawh a hong ciahkik siampite leh Levi mite: 2 Amariah, Maluk, Hattush, 3Shekaniah, Rehum, Meremoth, 4 Iddo, Ginnethoi, Abijah, 5 Mijamin, Maadiah, Bigah, 6 Shemaiah, Joiarib, Jedaiah, 7 Sallu, Amok, Hikiah, leh Jedaiah-te ahi uhhi. Hihte pen Jeshua hun lai-in siampite leh a sanggamte uh lakah a ukpite ahi uhhi.

Ahi zongin tua hun ma-in, i Pasian' biakinn sunga vankoihna inndeite a uk dingin a kiseh, Tobiah tawh a kimeltheih siampi Eliashib in, 5 Levi mite, lasate, leh kongcingte tungah piak dingin a kisawl an tawh biakna, paknamtui, umlebeelte, sawmah khat a kipia an, leenggahzu, leh sathau, leh siampite-a' dingin a kipia nate a koihna ngei uh inndei lianpi khat, Tobiah-a' dingin bawlsak hi.

Tua ciangin tua vankoihna innte a kem dingin siampi Shelemiah, laithei Zadok, leh Levi mi Pedaiah, leh amaute a huh dingin Mattaniah' tapa Zakkur, a tapa Hanan ka seh hi; Banghang hiam cihleh amaute mi muan'huai ahi uhhi. Amau' nasep pen a sanggamte uh tungah amau' tahn ciat uh a hawmkhia ding uh a hihi.

Siampi lianpenpa Eliashib' tapa Jehoiada' tapate khat pen Horonaim khuami Sanbalat' makpa na hi hi. Tua ahih manin keima kiang panin amah ka hawlkhia hi. 29 Ka Pasian aw, amaute in siampi nasepna leh siampite leh Levi mite' thuciamna siasak uh ahih manin amaute thei ta in. 30 Tua bangin gamdang tawh a kizom nate khempeuh panin amaute ka siangsak a, siampite leh Levi mite a nasep ngei mah uhah ka semsak kik hi.
{ Topa } in thu ciamzo a, ama ngaihsutna kheello ding hi. "Melkhizedek bangin a tawntungin siampi na hi hi," a ci hi.

Khialkha ing, ci-in Pasian' siampipa' mai-ah na gen ding kisam khading ahih manin na kampauna hangin khialkha kei in. Tua bangin gamta khial lecin nangma tungah Pasian heh ding a, na sepsa khempeuh hong suksiatsak ding hi.

Ahih hangin note pen { Topa}' siampite hong kici ding a, mihingte in note pen i Pasian' nasemte, ci-in hong gen ding uhhi. Minamte' hauhna teng note in na ne ding uh a, amau' hauhna teng note in na kisaktheihpih ding uhhi.

Siampite in, ‘{ Topa } koi-ah om ahi hiam?’ ci-in donglo uhhi. Thukham a theite nangawn in kei hong theilo uhhi. Kei tungah kumpi uliante hong khial khin uh a, kamsangte in Baal min tawh thu genin kiman'na a neilo milimte a bia uhhi.

A dipkuathuai, a patauhhuai thu khat gamsungah a piang khinzo hi. 31 Kamsangte in thuman genlo uh a, siampite in zong amau' ut bangun a uk uhhi. Ka mite in phamawh salo sawnsawn uhhi. A tawpna hun hong tun' ciangin bang cih ding uh ahi hiam, { Topa } in ci hi, ci-in gen in," hong ci hi.
{ Topa } in a cihin-ah, "Kamsangte leh siampite in Pasian a zahtak kei uhhi. Ka biakinnsung nangawnah amau' gitlohna ka mu hi.
Jerusalem khua panin Nebukhad- nezzar in Babylon khua-ah salin a paikhiatpih uliante, siampite, kamsangte, leh mi khempeuhte' tungah lai khat ka khak hi.

A siampite un ka thukham palsatin, a siangtho biakna nate ninsak uhhi. A siangtho biakna nate leh a mawkmawk nate khenna mel neilo uh a, a tate uh tungah a siang leh a nin a kilamdan'na zong hilhlo uhhi. Sabbath-te zong donin neilo uhhi. Tuate khempeuh hangin Israel mite in kei hong zahtaklo uhhi.

leilu lam a nga inndei pen biakna tau-ah na a sem siampite-a' ding a hihi. Tua siampite khempeuh pen Zadok' suan Levi mite vive ahi uhhi. Ama na a sem dingin { Topa }' omna-ah amaute bek kipaisak hi, hong ci hi.

Siampite in { Topa } tungah biakna pia-in biakinn sungah a lut khit uh ciangin a pualamah a pusuah nop uh leh, { Topa } tungah biakna a piak laitakun a silh uh puante suahin hih inndeite sungah koih ding uhhi. Tua lai panin puan dang silhin midangte omna-ah pai thei pan uhhi," hong ci hi.

A tual sungnung paina kongpi-ah a lut uh ciangin saihadial puan silh ding uhhi. Tual sungnung sung leh biakinn sungah na a sep laitakun samul puan peuhmah silhlo ding uhhi.18 Amaute in saiha dial puan khimin, saihadial puan tengin, khua-ul a suaksak thei kawnggak gaklo ding uhhi. 19 Midangte a omna biakinntual puanungah a pusuah ma-un, biakinn sungah na a sep laitakun a zat uh puante suahin inndei siangtho sungah nusia ding uhhi. Tua lai panin amaute in puan dangte silhin pusuak ding uhhi. Tua hi kei leh a biakna puan siangthote un midangte lawhkha ding hi. 20 "Amaute in a sam uh mettollo ding uh a, a saulua-in zong khawilo ding uhhi. A kilawm ciang bekin met ding uhhi.

Meigong numei ahi a, a kimasa numei ahi zongin zi-in neilo ding uh a, Israel nungak, ahih kei leh siampite' zi meigongte bek ten'pih thei ding uhhi. 23 "Amaute in ka mite tungah, biakna na a siangtho leh a mawkmawk nate, leh a nin leh a siang nate a kilamdan'na hilh ding uhhi.

Hih a kisehkhia mun sungteng pen biakna leitang siangtho hi ding a, { Topa' } biakinn sungah na a sem siampite-a' ding hi ding hi. Hih mun sungteng pen siampite' inn lamna ding mun leh biakinn lamna ding mun siangtho hi ding hi.

Siampite in hih a siangtho leitang sung panin tanh ngah ding uh a, leilu lampang leh leitaw lampang tai sawm tuak hi-in, nisuahna lam leh nitumna lampang tai li tuak hi ding hi. Siampite' ngahna sung hih leitang laizangah { Topa' } biakinn om ding hi. 11 Hih munteng pen Zadok' suanlekhak siampite-a' ding a hihi. Banghang hiam cihleh Israel midangte a gamtat khialh uh ciangin Levi midangte bangin va zuilo uh a, hih mite in citakin keima na hong sem uhhi. 12 Tua ahih manin Levi midangte zomah hih bangin a mun tuam diak khat nei ding uh a, tua mun a siangtho pen mun khat hi ding hi. 13 Hih siampite' zomah Levi mite in leitang ngah ding uh a, a sauna tai sawm hi-in, a zaina tai li hi ding hi. 14 { Topa } tungah a kipia hih leitang siangtho pen, leitang khempeuh panin a hoihpen mun hi a, hih leitang sung panin mun khat peuhpeuh, kizuak theilo, adang tawh zong kikhek theilo, midang tungah zong kipia theilo ding hi. Hih leitang pen a siangtho leitang hi a, { Topa}-a' a hihi.

Ka mite in kei hong phawklo uh ahih manin ka susia ding hi. No siampite in kei hong phawknuam loin, ka thuhilhnate nial na hih manun ka siampi dingin kong deih nawn kei a, na tate uh zong siampi-in ka zang kei ding hi.

Amah pen { Topa' } biakinn a lam dingpa hi a, kumpite' ngah theih minliatna ngahin, ama mite uk ding hi. Ama kumpi tokhom gei-ah siampi khat om ding a, kithutuakin, kilemin na semkhawm ding uhhi," ci hi,’ va ci in.

Siampite' nasep pen Pasian a manin theihna ding a hilh ding uh a hihi. Amaute pen, Vanglian { Topa' } kamtaite ahih manun, mite in keima deihna a theihna dingun amaute' tungah thu a dot ding uh a hihi.

Tua ciangin Zeisu in ama kiangah, "Hih thupiang kuama kiangah gen masa loin siampipa kiangah va paisuak pahin va kivelsak in la, na damkhitna thu mi khempeuh in a theihna dingin Moses thupiakna tawh kizui-in biakna va pia in," ci-in a vaikhak hi.
A zingsang ciangin siampi liante leh upate in Zeisu a thahna ding uh a vaihawm uhhi.
"Hih thu kuama kiangah gen kei in. Siampipa kiangah paisuak pahin amah kivelsak in. Tua ciangin na damsiangna thu mi khempeuh in a theihna dingin Moses thupiaksa bangin biakpiakna bawl in," a ci hi.

Judea gam a hong uksawn kumpi Herod hun laitakin siampi Abijah' pawlte' sung panin Zechariah minnei siampi khat a om hi. A zi' min Elizabeth hi a, amah zong Aaron' suan ahih manin siampi nam mah a hihi.

Nikhat, ama pawlte' sep hunding a tun' ciangin Zechariah in Pasian' mai-ah siampi nasep a sem hi. 9 Siampite' hih ngeizel bangin biakna tau tungah, paknamtui kua in hal ding, ci-in ai a kisan ciangin Zechariah in a ngah hi. Tua ahih manin Topa' biakinn sungah amah lut a, 10 amah in paknamtui halin a om laitakin mihonpi dangte a pualamah thungenin na om uhhi. 11 Tua laitakin Topa' vantung mi khat ama kiangah hong kilang a, paknamtui a kihalna biakna tau taklam pangah a ding hi. 12 Zechariah in vantung mi a muh ciangin lamdangsa mahmah a, a lau mahmah hi. 13 Ahi zongin vantung mi in ama kiangah, "Zechariah aw, lau kei in. Pasian in na thungetna hong zakhin a, na zi Elizabeth in tapa khat a nei ding hi. A min dingin Johan na phuak ding hi.

Tua ciangin Zeisu in ama kiangah, "Hih thu kuamah dang kiangah gen kei in. Siampipa kiangah paisuakpah in la kivelsak in. Tua ciangin na damna thu a kilatna dingin Moses thupiak mah bangin biakna pia in," ci-in thu a pia hi.

Siampi liante leh Thukham hilh siate in mihonpite kihta uh ahih manin kuama theihlohin Zeisu a kithah theihna ding lampi a zong uhhi. 3 Tua ciangin sawmlenihte sung panin Iskariot tapa Judas sungah Satan hong lut hi. 4 Tua ahih manin Judas va paikhia a, siampi liante leh biakinncing palikmangte tawh va kiho uh a, amaute' khutsungah Zeisu a piaktheihna dingzia a kikum uhhi. 5 Amaute na nuam mahmah uh a, sum tawh guaih dingin thuciam a na pia uhhi. 6 Judas zong thukim a, mihonte' theihlohin amaute' khutsungah Zeisu a piaktheihna ding lampi zon'ding a kipan pah hi.

Khua a vak ciangin upate, siampi liante, leh Thukham hilh siate hong kikhawm uh a, uliante mai-ah Zeisu hong kipaipih hi. 67 Amaute in, "Christ na hi hiam, hong gen in," ci-in a dot uh ciangin Zeisu in, "Kong gen hangin nong um kei ding uh a, 68 thu kong dot hangin zong nong dawng kei ding uhhi. 69 Ahi zongin tu-a kipanin a Vanglian Pasian' taklamah Mihing Tapa tu ding hi," ci-in a dawng hi.

Simon Peter leh a nungzui dang khat in zong Zeisu a zui uhhi. Hih a nungzui dang khatpa leh siampi lianpenpa kithei uh ahih manin siampi lianpenpa' inntual dongah Zeisu tawh a lutkhawm hi. 16 Ahi zongin Peter ahih leh kong pualamah a khawl hi. Tua ahih manin siampi lianpenpa tawh a kithei nungzui dang khatpa zong va pai kikin kongcing numei a hopih khit ciangin Peter zong a tumpih hi. 17 Kongcing numei in Peter kiangah, "Hih mipa' nungzuite khat hilo na hi hiam?" a cihleh, "Ka hi kei hi," ci-in a dawng hi. 18 Khua dam mahmah ahih manin nasemte leh palikte in meihol cih a, tua mei awi-in a kiimah ding uh ahih manin Peter zong va pai-in mei awi-in amaute tawh a dingkhawm hi. 19 Siampi lianpenpa Annas in Zeisu kiangah ama nungzuite thu leh a thuhilhna tawh kisai thu a dong hi.

amaute in, "That in, that in, singlamteh tungah that in," ci-in a kiko uhhi. Pilat in, "Na Kumpipa uh that mawk ding ka hi hiam?" a cih ciangin siampi liante in, "Rom gam khempeuh a uk Kumpipa simloh kumpi dang ka nei kei uhhi," ci-in a dawng uhhi. 16 Tua ahih ciangin singlamteh tungah thahdingin amaute' khutsungah Zeisu a pia ta hi.
Eite khempeuh i gitlohna panin kikheelin thupha a hong piaktheihna dingin Pasian in a Nasem dingin Zeisu teelin, eite kiangah a hong sawl masa ahi hi," ci-in thu a gen hi.

Ama gen mah bangin sawltakte zong zingsang ciangin biakinn-ah pai-in thuhilh ding a kipan uhhi. Siampi lianpenpa leh ama kikholhpihte in ulian kikhopna a cingtaakkhat a omtheihna dingin Jew mi upa khempeuh a kikhopna dingun a sam uhhi. Tua khit ciangin thong panin sawltakte va kai-in uliante mai-ah a hong paipihna dingun palikte a sawl uhhi. 22 Ahi zongin thongah palikte a va tun' uh ciangin sawltakte na om lo hi. Tua ahih manin uliante kiangah kileh kikin, 23 "Thongah ka tun' uh ciangin a kongkhakte limtak mahin tawh kikalh a, thongcingte in zong kongpi-ah limtak mahin a na cing ka mu uhhi. Ahi zongin thong kong ka hon' uh ciangin a sungah kuamah na omlo hi," ci-in a zasak uhhi. 24 Biakinn ukpa leh siampi liante in hih thu a zak uh ciangin hih sawltakte a bangci thu hi ding hiam, ci-in lamdang a sa mahmah uhhi. 25 Tua laitakin mi khat hong pai-in amaute kiangah, "Thong sungah na khum uh mite in tu mahmahin biakinn sungah thuhilhin om uhhi," ci-in a hong gen hi. 26 Tua ciangin biakinn ukpa leh a mite va pai-in sawltakte hong paipih kik uhhi. Mihonte in suang tawh amaute a den'gawp khakding lau uh ahih manin sawltakte ngongbawl loin thudam tawh a paipih uhhi. 27 Tua ciangin uliante mai-ah sawltakte dingsak uh a, siampi lianpenpa in sawltakte kiangah thu genin, 28 "Hih mipa' min tawh thu na hilh nawnlohna dingun khauhtakin thu kong pia uhhi. Tu-in na gamtatnasate uh thei un. Jerusalem khuasung khempeuhah thu na genthang uh a, ama sihna pen kote nong ngawh nuam uhhi," a ci hi.
Tua bangin Pasian' thu kizelin hong khang semsem hi. Jerusalem khuasungah thu um mi tampi tak hong kibehlap a, siampi tampi tak in zong Lungdamna Thu a hong um uhhi.

Hih ka thugente a man ahihna thu, siampi lianpenpa leh upa khempeuh in hong genthei ding uhhi. Damaskas khua-a om i Jew mipihte ka lah dingin amaute in lai hong pia uh ahih manin, upate in gim a piaktheihna dingun tua khua-a om thu um mite manin sikkhau khihin Jerusalem khua-ah a ciahpih dingin ka va pai hi.

Jew mite in Banghangin Paul mawhsak ahi uhhiam, ci-in teltakin galkapmangpa in theinuam ahih manin a zingciangin Paul a khihsakna sikkhaute sutsak a, siampi liante leh upate thu kikupna a nei dingin a samsak hi. Tua ciangin Paul paikhiatpihin uliante mai-ah a dingsak hi.
Paul in, "Lawmte aw, siampi lianpenpa ahihlam ka thei kei hi. Laisiangtho in, ‘Na mite uh a ukpa na gensia kei ding uhhi,’ ci hi," ci-in a dawng hi.

Tua ahih manin mihingte' mawhna a kimaisak theihna dingin Pasian' na a sepna-ah mite-a' dingin hehpihna leh cihtakna tawh Siampi Lianpen a suahtheihna dingin a sanggamte tawh a kibangin mihing lim a hong puakding a kisam a hihi.

Tua ahih manin Pasian' sapna a ngah mi siangthote aw, eite' upna thu tawh kisai-ah Siampi Lianpen a sem dingin Pasian' sawltak Zeisu' thu ngaihsun dih un. 2 Pasian' innsungah na a sepna-ah Moses a cihtak mah bangin hih siampi nasep a sem dingin a seh Pasian' tungah Zeisu a citak hi.

Tua ahih manin eite in Pasian' omna vantung a va tung khinsa, Siampi Lianpen ahi Pasian' Tapa Zeisu neikhin ihih manin i san'sa upna thu kiptakin len ni. 15 Eite' neih Siampi Lianpenpa in i ginat lohna-ah eite a hong hehpih theilo ding hilo hi; eite mah bangin ze-etna khempeuh a thuak hi a, ahi zongin mawhna a bawllo a hihi.

Siampi lianpen ahi peuhpeuh mipa pen a mite' mawhna hangin Pasian' tungah biakna leh letsong a piaksak dingin ama mipihte lak panin kiteelin nasep a kiguan' a hihi. 2 Amah zong lam tampi-ah a ginalo thei mi mah ahih manin thu theilo mite leh a khial mite tungah lungnem takin na sem thei hi. 3 Amah zong miginalo mi mah ahih manin mite' mawhna hangin biakna a pia hi bek loin ama mawhna mahmah hangin zong biakna a pia a hihi. 4 Tua bangin pahtawina a nei siampi lianpen nasep pen a semdingte amau utthu tawh a kisehtawm mawk hilo hi; siampi lianpen a sem dingin amahmah a kisehtawm hilo a, Aaron a kisap mah bangin Pasian in amah a seh a hihi. 5 Tua mah bangin Christ zong, amahmah in siampi lianpen nasep a semtawm mawk hiloin Pasian in ama kiangah, "Nang, ka Tapa na hi hi. Tuni-in na Pa ka suak hi," na ci hi. 6 Mun dang khatah zong, "Melkhizedek siampi gui zui-in a tawntungin siampi na hi ding hi," na ci lai hi. 7 Leitungah mihingin Zeisu a omlai-in sihna panin amah a honkhia theiding Pasian tungah thu ngenin khitui naptui tawh thumin na kiko hi. 8 Amah, Pasian' Tapa hinapi-in a thuakna tawh thumang ahih theihna ding a na kisin hi. 9 Tua bangin a cingtaak mi a suahkhit ciangin ama thu a mang mite khempeuh-a' dingin tawntung hotkhiatna a kipatna hong suak a, 10 Melkhizedek gui zui-in siampi lianpen dingin Pasian in a bawl hi.
Tua lai munah eite' tangin Zeisu na ma tun' khinta a, siampi Melkhizedek gui zui-in a om tawntung ding siampi lianpen a suak hi.

Abraham in a galsimna-ah kumpite thatin gualzo-in a hong ciah ciangin A Lianpen Pasian' siampi ahih banah Jerusalem khua kumpi zong ahi Melkhizedek in Abraham na dawnin thupha a pia hi. 2 Abraham in a na ngah khempeuh sung panin Melkhizedek tungah sawmah khat a pia hi. Melkhizedek min a khiatna in, "Thuman Kumpi," a cihna hi phot a, tua banah Jerusalem khua kumpi zong hi lai ahih manin ama min pen, "Kilemna Kumpi," cihna zong a hihi. 3 Melkhizedek' pa leh a nu-a kipanin a suahna thu, a sihna thu, leh a khang tangthu peuhmah a kiciamtehna omlo ahih manin Pasian' Tapa tawh a kibang hi a, siampi mah hi tawntung paisuak hi. 4 Tua ahih manin bangzah takin milian ahihna thu na thei uhhi. I pupi Abraham nangawn in zong gal sungah a ngah nate sung panin ama tungah sawmah khat na pia hi. 5 Levi suanlekhak sung panin siampi a sem mite pen Abraham' suanlekhak mah hinapi-in, amau mipih Israel-te tung panin sawmah khat a lakna dingun Thukham a na kibawl hi.

Israel mite in Levi' suanlekhak siampite tung tawnin Thukham ngah uhhi. Levi' suanlekhak siampite' nasepna kicingtaak hi leh Melkhizedek siampi nam zui-in siampi namdang a pian'ding kisam nawnlo ding a, Aaron gui zui-in siampi omsa a kimangpah ding a hihi. 12 Siampi nam kikheel ahih manin a thukham zong a kikheel ding kisam hi. 13 Hih bang thute a kigenna i Topa pen a namtuam khat hi a, ama phung sung panin biakna tau-ah siampi na a sem khat beek omlo hi. 14 I Topa pen Judah suan sung panin a piang ahih manin Moses in siampi thu a na gen ciangin hih Judah minam genin na neilo hi. 15 Melkhizedek tawh a kibang siampi namtuam khat hong pian' ciangin hih thu hong kitelpha semsem hi. 16 Amah pen mihingte' bawl ngeina zui-in siampi a suak hilo a, a si theilo nuntak tawntungna vang tawh siampi a suak a hihi. 17 Banghang hiam cihleh Laisiangtho in, "Melkhizedek nam bangin tawntung siampi na hi hi," na ci hi.

Tua banah Pasian' kiciamna zong hong omlai hi. Midangte siampi-in a kibawl laitakin tua bang kiciamna na omlo hi. 21 Ahi zongin Pasian in Zeisu kiangah, "Topa in a lungsim a kheellohna ding limtakin kiciam khin a, ‘Nang, tawntung siampi na hi hi,’" na ci ahih manin kiciamna tawh Zeisu siampi a na suak a hihi. 22 Hih bangin a kilamdang diakin a kibawlna in Zeisu pen kiciamna hoihzaw ahihna thu hong kilangsak hi. 23 A kilamdan'na a dang khat in: Siampi dangte pen sithei-in a nasep zom paisuak theilo ahih manin a mi malin tampi pha uhhi. 24 Ahi zongin Zeisu nungta tawntung ahih manin midang tungah a nasep ki-ap nawnloin amahmah in siampi nasep sem paisuak hi. 25 Tua hi a, mite-a' dingin a thumsak thei dingin amah nungta tawntung ahih manin ama tung tawnin Pasian kiang a zuante khempeuh, tu-a kipanin a tawntungin a honkhia thei a hihi. 26 Tua bangin a siangtho, paubaan'na a neilo, vantungah a lian penin a kikoih Siampi Lianpen Zeisu i neih a hoih mahmah a hihi. 27 Siampi lianpen dangte in nisimin amau' mawhna hangin biakna pia masa-in, tua ciangin midangte' mawhna hangin a piak niloh bang hiloin, amah khatvei bek a kipiakna tawh a tawntunga dingin a kimang paisuak a hihi. 28 Moses Thukham in siampi lianpen a sem dingin cingtaakna a nei theilo mihing mah na seh a, ahi zongin tua Thukham nungah a hong piang Pasian' thuciamna in a tawntungin a cingtaakin a kibawl Tapa, Siampi Lianpen dingin kiciamna tawh a na seh hi.

Tu-in i gennop thu pen hih bang ahi hi: Vantungah Pasian' tokhom taklamah a tu tua bang Siampi Lianpen khat a nei ihi hi. 2 Amah in, mite' bawl a hilo, Topa mahmah in a bawl a taktak puanbuk ahi a Siangtho Pen mun sungah siampi lianpen nasep a sem a hihi. 3 Pasian tungah letsong a tuamtuamte a piading leh ganhing tawh biakna a pia dingin siampi lianpen a sem peuhpeuhte a kiseh ahih mah bangin eite' Siampi Lianpenpa in zong bangkhat teitei a piakding kisam hi. 4 Jew Thukham tawh kizui-in Pasian tungah letsongte a piading siampite om khinta ahih manin leitungah Zeisu a omlai hi leh siampi hithei hetlo ding hi. 5 Leitunga siampite' sepsepte pen vantungah a om thu, a limin a sem uh a hihi. Banghang hiam cihleh Moses in Puanbuk lamding a kipat ciangin Pasian in, "Mual tungah i om lai-in a limding khempeuh kong lah bang teekteekin a kihihna dingin na thei in," na ci hi. 6 Tua ahih manin Pasian leh mite kikalah Zeisu in a bawl thuciamna pen na a hoihzaw piakna ding thuciamna ahih mah bangin Zeisu tungah a kipia siampi nasep pen siampi dang khempeuhte' sep sangin a lianzaw a hihi.
Hih bang tengin a kibawl khit ciangin a dei puanung sungah nisim a nasep uh a sem dingin siampite a lut hi.

Kum simin Siangtho Pen Mun-ah Jew Siampi Lianpente amau' sisan a hilo, ganhing sisan tawh a pai zelzel bangun amah va pai themthum lo hi. 26 Tua bangin va pai zelzel hi leh leitung pian'cil-a kipanin a va thuak zelzel ding a hihi. Ahi zongin amah biakna-in a va kipiakna hangin a kimang paisuak a suahtheihna dingin mawh maisakna dingin hun bei kuan ciangin amah khatvei a va kipia hi.

Ahi zongin note pen Pasian in a hong teelkhiat minam, Kumpi siampi pawl, a siangtho minam, Pasian' mite na hi uh a, khuamial sung panin a lamdang mahmah ama khuavak sungah a hong samkhiapa' nasepna a lamdangte a genkhia dingin Pasian in a hong teel mite na hi uhhi.
ama Pa Pasian' na a sem dingin siampi leh kumpi za-ah a hong koih hi. Tua Zeisu in minthan'na leh vangliatna nei tawntung ta hen. Amen.
Pasian' na a sem dingin siampi za leh kumpi za na pia a, amaute in leitung ukin a om ding uhhi," a ci uhhi.

Hih thawhkikna masa sungah a kihel mite pen Pasian' mi siangtho hi a, a hampha mahmah ahi uhhi. Nihvei sihna in tua bang mite bangmah cihzo nawnlo ding a, amaute pen Pasian leh Christ' siampite hi ding uh a, amah tawh kum tul khat sung ukna aana nei ding uhhi.

Tua ciangin Jerusalem kumpipa Melkhizedek in an leh leenggahzu hong pusuah hi. Amah pen Sangpen Pasian' siampi zong a hihi. 19 Amah in thupha pia a, "Vantung leh leitung a bawl, Sangpen Pasian in Abram thupha pia hen! 20 Na galte na khutsungah a hong pia Sangpen Pasian in thupha ngah hen," a ci hi. Abram in na khempeuh sawmah khat ama tungah a pia hi.

"A dum, a dupsan, a ausan, a kopin a kikhuk khau hoih kigan tawh dalna puan khat na bawl ding a, hoihtakin a kibawl kherub-te tawh kizem ding hi. 32 Ngun tawh kibawl bullen lite tungah a om, kham kibawl vankhaina nei-in, kham tawh a kizut singkha khuampi lite tungah na khai ding hi. 33 A kilhnate-ah dalna puan khai sukin, dalna puan sung tua lai munah thuciamna singkuang na koih ding a, dalna puan in Siangthopen mun panin siangtho mun khen ding hi.
Nangmah tawh ka kituahna ding mun, thuciamna tunga a om hehpihna tokhom mai, thuciamna singkuang kiangah a om dalna puan mai-ah biakna tau na koih ding hi.

Amaute in a dum, a dupsan, a ausan khaute leh a kopin a kikhuk a kigan puan hoih tawh dalna puan a bawl uhhi. Hoihtakin a kibawl kherub-te tawh amaute in tua dalna puan a zem uhhi. 36 Tua puan-a' dingin amaute in singkha khuampi li bawl uh a, kham tawh tua khuampite a zut uhhi. A vankhainate pen kham hi a, tua khuamte-a' dingin ngun bullen li a sung uhhi.
Tua buk sungah thuciamna singkuang na koih ding a, dalna puan tawh singkuang na dal ding hi.
Biakbuk sungah singkuang paipihin, kongpuankhai dalna puan khai a, thuciamna singkuang a dal hi.

{ Topa } in Moses kiangah, "Thuciamna singkuang tunga om hehpihna tokhom mai, dalna puan sunglam a siangtho munah a hunlopi-in hong pai nawnlohna dingin na sanggampa Aaron kiangah gen in. A hunlopi-in hong pai leh amah si ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh tua mun pen hehpihna tokhom tunga meii sungah kei ka kilatna mun a hihi.

Amah in tua bangin Israel mite' nitna hang, amau' thu palsatna hang, leh amau' khialhna khempeuh hangin siangtho muna dingin kilemna bawl ding hi. Amah in amau' nitna sungah amau tawh a omkhawm kikhopna buk-a' dingin tua mah bangin a bawl ding hi. 17 Siangtho munah kilemna bawl dingin amah tumin ama-a' ding, a innkuanpihte-a' ding, leh Israel mihonte khempeuh-a' dingin kilemna a bawl khit hong paikhiat matengin kikhopna buk sungah kuamah omlo ding hi.
Amah in sual panin innsun dong inn nunglam pi sawmthum taamtak peekte tawh lam a, amah in Siangthopen mun, biakinn sungnung dingin a inn sungah a bawl hi.
Amah in { Topa' } Thuciamna Singkuang koihna dingin a sungtawng penah biakinn sungnung a bawl hi.

Biakinn sungnung lutna dingin amah in oliv sing kongkhak peekte a bawl hi; a bangtung zawl leh kongkhak khuamte in kiu nga piangsak hi. 32 Amah in kherub-te, nisuh kungte, leh pakpalh lim kibawlte tawh oliv sing kongkhak peek nihte a tuam hi; amah in tuate kham tawh zut a, kherub-te leh nisuh kungte tungah kham a theh hi.

Israel upate khempeuh hong pai uh a, siampite in Thuciamna Singkuang la-in Biakinn-ah paipih uhhi. 4 Tua ciangin amaute in kikhopna buk, leh puanbuk sunga om a siangtho nazatte khempeuh a paipih uhhi. Siampite leh Levi mite in tuate paipihto uhhi. 5 Thuciamna Singkuang mai-ah a kikhawm Kumpi Solomon leh Israel mihonte khempeuh in biakna-in tuu leh bawngtalte tampi tak pia uh ahih manin tuate a phazah kisim zolo hi. 6 Tua ciangin siampite in a kherub-te' kha nuai, siangthopen munsung, biakinn sungnung lama ama munah { Topa' } Thuciamna Singkuang paipih uhhi. 7 Kherub-te in Thuciamna Singkuang omna mun tungah a kha uh zak ahih manin Thuciamna Singkuang leh a zawlte tungah kherub-te in khuhna piangsak uhhi. 8 A zawlte sau mahmah ahih manin biakinn sungnung mai siangtho mun panin a zawl mongte kimu a, ahih hangin a pualam panin kimu theilo hi. Tuni dongin tua san takah tuate om hi. 9 Tua Thuciamna Singkuang sungah, Egypt gam panin a paikhiat lai-un { Topa } in Israel mite tawh thuciamna a bawlna Horeb-ah Moses in suangpeek nih a koih simloh bangmah dang omlo hi.

Tua ciangin amah in Siangthopen mun bawl hi. A dung pen a vai tawh kizui-in pi sawmthum hi a, a vai zong pi sawmthum mah a hihi. Amah in kham hoih talen zaguk tawh a zut hi. 9 A kilhnate a gihna kham shekel sawmnga a hihi. Tua ciangin amah in a inn dawl tungnungte kham tawh a zut hi. 10 Amah in Siangthopen mun sungah sing kherub nih bawlin kham tawh tuate zut hi.
Tua ciangin amah in a dum, a ausan, leh a dupsan puante, leh saihadial puan tawh a dalna puan bawl a, tua tungah kherub-te a bawl hi.

Tua ahih ciangin siampite in kherub-te' kha nuai, Siangthopen mun sung, biakinn sungnung sung ama munah { Topa' } Thuciamna Singkuang a paipih uhhi. 8 Kherub-te in Thuciamna Singkuang tungah a khate uh zak uh ahih manin kherub-te pen Thuciamna Singkuang leh a zawlte tungah khuhna khat a suak uhhi. 9 A zawlte sau ahih manin siangtho mun panin biakinn sungnung mai-ah a mongte kidawk a, ahih hangin a pualam panin kimu theilo hi; tuni dongin tua lai-ah tuate om hi.
Siangthopen mun lamah ka khutte hong laamto a, nangma kiangah huhna kong nget mah bangin kong thumna aw hong za in.
Tua inndei sungnung a teh ciangin a dung a vai pi sawmthumli tuak a pha hi. Tua ciangin amah in kei kiangah, "Hih lai pen Siangthopen Mun ahi hi," hong ci hi.
Hih biakna leitang siangtho sung panin Siangthopen mun leh biakinn mun dingin a saulam tai sawm, a zailam tai li kisehkhia ding hi.
Tua laitakin biakinn sung deina puan, a lu panin a taw dongin kikekin phelnih a suak hi. Zin zong lingin suangtumpite kitam hi.
Ahi zongin tu-a kipanin a Vanglian Pasian' taklamah Mihing Tapa tu ding hi," ci-in a dawng hi.
tua hun sungin biakinn sung dalna puan kikekin phelnih a suak hi.
Christ in eite a hong it manin Pasian in eite' mawhna hong maisak theihna dingin a namtui biakna-in Pasian kiangah a kipiak mah bangin note zong itna tawh na gamta un.
Note pen Christ tawh a thokik khinte na hih manun, Pasian' taklam a kumpi tokhom tungah Christ a tutna mun vantung thute ngaihsutin nei un.

A beisa hunah Pasian in kamsangte zangin i pupite tungah a lam tuamtuam tawh a khen khenin thu na gen ngeizo hi. 2 Ahi zongin tuhun nunung ciangin leitung vantung na khempeuh a bawlin a zat, a tawpna-ah na khempeuh a luah dingin a seh a Tapa zangin eite tungah thu hong gen hi. 3 Tua Tapa in Pasian' minthan'na vang hong taangkhiasak a, Pasian' lim taktak mah hong pua-in, ama kampauna tawh leitung vantung buppi pai-in a kip hi. Mihingte a mawhna panun a sian'sak khit ciangin Vanglianpipa Pasian' taklam, vantungah a tu hi.

Tua ahih manin mihingte' mawhna a kimaisak theihna dingin Pasian' na a sepna-ah mite-a' dingin hehpihna leh cihtakna tawh Siampi Lianpen a suahtheihna dingin a sanggamte tawh a kibangin mihing lim a hong puakding a kisam a hihi.
Pasian' innsungah na a sepna-ah Moses a cihtak mah bangin hih siampi nasep a sem dingin a seh Pasian' tungah Zeisu a citak hi.

Tua ahih manin eite in Pasian' omna vantung a va tung khinsa, Siampi Lianpen ahi Pasian' Tapa Zeisu neikhin ihih manin i san'sa upna thu kiptakin len ni. 15 Eite' neih Siampi Lianpenpa in i ginat lohna-ah eite a hong hehpih theilo ding hilo hi; eite mah bangin ze-etna khempeuh a thuak hi a, ahi zongin mawhna a bawllo a hihi.

Siampi lianpen ahi peuhpeuh mipa pen a mite' mawhna hangin Pasian' tungah biakna leh letsong a piaksak dingin ama mipihte lak panin kiteelin nasep a kiguan' a hihi. 2 Amah zong lam tampi-ah a ginalo thei mi mah ahih manin thu theilo mite leh a khial mite tungah lungnem takin na sem thei hi. 3 Amah zong miginalo mi mah ahih manin mite' mawhna hangin biakna a pia hi bek loin ama mawhna mahmah hangin zong biakna a pia a hihi. 4 Tua bangin pahtawina a nei siampi lianpen nasep pen a semdingte amau utthu tawh a kisehtawm mawk hilo hi; siampi lianpen a sem dingin amahmah a kisehtawm hilo a, Aaron a kisap mah bangin Pasian in amah a seh a hihi. 5 Tua mah bangin Christ zong, amahmah in siampi lianpen nasep a semtawm mawk hiloin Pasian in ama kiangah, "Nang, ka Tapa na hi hi. Tuni-in na Pa ka suak hi," na ci hi. 6 Mun dang khatah zong, "Melkhizedek siampi gui zui-in a tawntungin siampi na hi ding hi," na ci lai hi. 7 Leitungah mihingin Zeisu a omlai-in sihna panin amah a honkhia theiding Pasian tungah thu ngenin khitui naptui tawh thumin na kiko hi. 8 Amah, Pasian' Tapa hinapi-in a thuakna tawh thumang ahih theihna ding a na kisin hi. 9 Tua bangin a cingtaak mi a suahkhit ciangin ama thu a mang mite khempeuh-a' dingin tawntung hotkhiatna a kipatna hong suak a, 10 Melkhizedek gui zui-in siampi lianpen dingin Pasian in a bawl hi.

I lungsim a hong kipsak dingin tu-a bang lametna a nei ihi hi. Tua i lametna kician mahmah a, vantung biakinn siangtho tawngnung sung ciangdong tung khinta hi. 20 Tua lai munah eite' tangin Zeisu na ma tun' khinta a, siampi Melkhizedek gui zui-in a om tawntung ding siampi lianpen a suak hi.

Abraham in a galsimna-ah kumpite thatin gualzo-in a hong ciah ciangin A Lianpen Pasian' siampi ahih banah Jerusalem khua kumpi zong ahi Melkhizedek in Abraham na dawnin thupha a pia hi. 2 Abraham in a na ngah khempeuh sung panin Melkhizedek tungah sawmah khat a pia hi. Melkhizedek min a khiatna in, "Thuman Kumpi," a cihna hi phot a, tua banah Jerusalem khua kumpi zong hi lai ahih manin ama min pen, "Kilemna Kumpi," cihna zong a hihi. 3 Melkhizedek' pa leh a nu-a kipanin a suahna thu, a sihna thu, leh a khang tangthu peuhmah a kiciamtehna omlo ahih manin Pasian' Tapa tawh a kibang hi a, siampi mah hi tawntung paisuak hi.

A kilamdan'na a dang khat in: Siampi dangte pen sithei-in a nasep zom paisuak theilo ahih manin a mi malin tampi pha uhhi. 24 Ahi zongin Zeisu nungta tawntung ahih manin midang tungah a nasep ki-ap nawnloin amahmah in siampi nasep sem paisuak hi. 25 Tua hi a, mite-a' dingin a thumsak thei dingin amah nungta tawntung ahih manin ama tung tawnin Pasian kiang a zuante khempeuh, tu-a kipanin a tawntungin a honkhia thei a hihi. 26 Tua bangin a siangtho, paubaan'na a neilo, vantungah a lian penin a kikoih Siampi Lianpen Zeisu i neih a hoih mahmah a hihi.

Tu-in i gennop thu pen hih bang ahi hi: Vantungah Pasian' tokhom taklamah a tu tua bang Siampi Lianpen khat a nei ihi hi. 2 Amah in, mite' bawl a hilo, Topa mahmah in a bawl a taktak puanbuk ahi a Siangthopen mun sungah siampi lianpen nasep a sem a hihi.

Tua ahih manin Pasian leh mite kikalah Zeisu in a bawl thuciamna pen na a hoihzaw piakna ding thuciamna ahih mah bangin Zeisu tungah a kipia siampi nasep pen siampi dang khempeuhte' sep sangin a lianzaw a hihi.

Tua Siangtho Mun a kideina zomah Siangthopen Mun a kici a dei dang khat om leuleu hi. 4 Tua sungah paknamtui halna ding kham kibawl biakna tau leh kham tawh a kizut Thuciamna Singkuang om hi. Tua Thuciamna Singkuang sungah manna anlum a kikoihna kham beel, tehno nei-in a hing Aaron' ciangkhut leh thukhamte a kigelhna suangpek nihte kikoih hi.

Ahi zongin a dei sungnung sungah Siampi Lianpenpa bek kum khatin khatvei pai a, theihloh manin amah leh mite' khialhna hangin ganhing sisan tawh biakpiakna a bawl hi. 8 A puanung inndei a om laiteng a sungnung ahi, a Siangthopen Mun a kihong nailo ahihna thu Khasiangtho in hong kilangsak hi.

Ahi zongin tu-in a hoihzaw thu a semding Siampi Lianpen Christ hong tung khinta a, ama lutna biakbuk pen a kipiangsak tawm, khut tawh a kibawl biakbuk hiloin a lianzaw, a cingtaakzaw mun a hihi. 12 Siangthopen Mun-ah a tawntungin a kimang dingin khatvei bek Christ a va lut ciangin biakpiakna dingin keel sisan leh bawngno sisante va keng loin ama sisan va keng a, eite-a' dingin tawntung hotkhiatna a hong ngahsak hi. 13 Keel sisan, bawngtal sisan, leh bawngla kihaltum vute, biakna vai-in a sianglo mite tungah a kitheh ciangin biakna vai-in mite' pum tung siangthosak thei ahih leh, 14 tawntung Khasiangtho hangin Pasian tungah a cingtaak biakpiakna dingin Christ in a piak ama sisan in na tam semkhia zozaw ding a, a nungta Pasian' na i septheihna dingin bangmahin a kimanglo nasepna panin ama sisan in i lungsim hong siangsak ding hi.

Jew siampite nisimin a nasepna uh munah dingin a kibang biakpiakna mah pia niloh uh a, ahi zongin tua a piak uh biakpiaknate in mawhna maisak theilo hi. 12 Ahi zongin Christ in mawhna hangin khatvei a piakkhit ciangin a tawntunga dingin kimang ahih manin Pasian' taklamah tu hithiat a, 13 Pasian in ama khenuai-ah a galte khempeuh a koihsakna ding hun ngakin a om hi.14 Mawhna panin a sian'thosak mite, khatvei bek biakpiakna a bawlna tawh siangtho paisuak sak hi.

Tua ahih ciangin sanggamte aw, Zeisu hong sihna hangin Siangthopen Mun-ah ut utin luttheihna ding thu i neita hi. 20 Ama pumpi mahmah ahi dalna puan tawnin nuntakna lampi-ah i pai theihna dingin amah in lampi thak hong hon'sak hi. 21 Pasian' innsung a uk siampi lianpen zong i nei hi. 22 Tua ahih manin mawhna thu-ah kisuan'na lungsim om nawnloin, tui siangtho tawh i pumpi a kisawpsa-in muan'na leh lungsim takpi tawh Pasian kiang zuan ni.

Eite hong makai-in i upna a hong cingtaaksak Zeisu mitsuan'in nei ni. Mailamah a ngahding lungdamna hangin maizumna kihta loin singlamteh tungah sihna hong thuak a, tu-in Pasian tokhom taklamah a tu hi.

Na pu na pate uh nuntakzia, bangmahin a kimanglo nuntakna panin a hong suahtaksakna dingin Pasian in note' man dingin a piak pen a man a kiam thei ngun leh khamte bang hilo a, 19 tuuno bangin paubaan'na a omlo, a manpha mahmah Christ, biakna-in a hong kipiakna tawh Pasian in note a hong suaktasak a hihi.
Tu-in vantungah tua Christ pai khin a, Pasian' taklamah omin, vantung mite leh ukna aana a neite khempeuh tungah a ukin a om hi.
Nang na hih leh, nuamtakin na pu na pate kiang na zuan ding a, khan' kicingin hong kivui ding hi.
a hu tawpna sang a, a teek, kum tampi a pha, a khanghamin si a, ama mite tawh kivui khawm hi.
Hor Mual tungah na sanggampa Aaron si-in a mite kiangah a kigawm bangin, na kahtohna mualtungah si in la, na mite kiangah pai-in kigawm in.
{ Topa } in thatin hingsak kik a, amah in Leinuai-ah paipih sukin thotosak hi.
Tu-in Samuel si khin a, Israel-te khempeuh ama hangin kapin, ama khuapi Ramah-ah vui uhhi. Saul in vankahte leh aisante a gamsung panin beisak hi.
Tua ciangin { Topa } in Elijah' aw ngai hi; naupang hong nak kikin a hingkik hi.
Tua ciangin Jehu si a, amaute in Samaria-ah amah a vui uhhi. Tua ciangin ama tapa Jehoahaz in ama tangin a uk hi.
Tua ciangin Ahaz si a, David khuapi sungah a pate tawh kivui hi. Tua ciangin ama tangin a tapa Hezekiah in a uk hi
Tua ciangin Jotham si a, David khuapi sungah amaute in amah a vui uhhi. Tua ciangin a tapa Ahaz in ama tangin a uk hi.
Ahi zongin mi si a, amah maimang pah hi. Amah a beina tungta a, koi-ah om nawn ahi hiam?
Ahi zongin vanpi a omlaiteng, misite thokik ngeilo ding a, a ihmutna panun khanglo ngeilo, gamtang ngeilo ding uhhi.

"Ahi zongin a tawpna-ah kei hong pan'pih ding a nungta tawntung khat vantungah a omna thu ka thei hi. 26 Natna in ka vun a nektum khit hangin, hih ka pumpi mahmah tawh Pasian ka mu ding hi. 27 Keima mit teekteek tawh amah ka mu ding a, amah in kei hong khualmi etlo ding hi. "Ka lungsim han'na a bei hi.
Misite' gam khuamial kongkhakpi, mi khatpeuh in nang hong lak ngei ahi hiam?
Banghang hiam cihleh misite omna gam sungah nangmah phawk theihna ding bangmah omlo ahih manin, Leinuai panin kua in nang hong phat thei ding ahi hiam?
Tua ahih ciangin lungdamin ka kipak a, lungmuangin ka om hi. 10 Banghang hiam cihleh Leinuai nong zuansak kei a, na mihoihpa Leihawmpi na musak kei hi.
Ahih hangin Pasian in Leinuai' vangliatna panin kei hong honkhia ding hi; Banghang hiam cihleh amah in kei hong sang ding hi.

A sisate-a' dingin na lamdang a bawl na hi hiam? Nangmah a phat dingin mi a si khinsate hong tho ding ahi hiam? 11 Han sungah na itna kip kigen ding a, siatna munah nangma thumannate kigen ding ahi hiam? 12 Khuamialna sungah na na lamdangte kithei a, mangngilhna gamsungah na hotkhiat huhna kithei ahi hiam?
Kote' nuntak sung kum sawmsagih bang hi a, cidam le-ung kum sawmgiat bang hithei hi. Ahih hangin tua hunsung nangawn gimna leh haksatna hi a, tua hunte bei pakin kote ka maimang uhhi.

Eite ihih leh i nuntakna pen lopa tawh kibang a, lolai-ah a po pakte bangin a palh hi. 16 Banghang hiam cihleh huih in amah semin beimang a, tua mun in amah thei nawnlo hi. 17 Ahih hangin { Topa' } itna kip pen amah a zahtak mite tungah a tawntung pan a tawntung dongin kip ngitnget a, ama thumanna pen ama thuciamna zui-in a thupiak bangin sep ding a phawk mite tungah a khang khangin a kip tawntung hi.
Misite ahi a, gamdaihna sungah a pai peuhpeuhte in ahi zongin { Topa } phatlo uhhi. 18 Ahih hangin eite in tu-a kipanin a tawntungin { Topa } i phat ngitnget ding hi. { Topa } phat un.
Vantungah kahto leng tua lai-ah nang na om ding a, Leinuai misite' gamah lupna bawlta leng zong tua lai-ah zong nang na om veve ding hi.
A husan'na a bei ciangin lei-ah ciahkik uh a, tua ni mahmahin a ngaihsutnate uh beita hi.

A tawpna-ah ci lehang, mihingte leh ganhingte in a tuah ding uh kibang a, ganhing mah bangin mihing zong a si a hihi. Mihing leh ganhing in a kibangin nuntakna hu nei a, mihing leh ganhing nuntakna a kiman'na bangmah omlo ahih manin, mihing pen ganhing sangin a hoihzawkna bangmah om tuanlo hi. 20 A nih tuakun mun khatah tung khawm ding uh a, leivui panin a piang uh ahih mah bangin leivui mah suakkik ding uhhi. 21 Mihingte' kha vanah kahto-in ganhingte' kha lei-ah lutsuk hi, cih a thei zong kuamah omlo hi.

A hing laite in a si ding ahihlam uh thei a, a sisate in bangmah thei nawnlo uhhi. A sisate in thaman bangmah nei nawnlo uh a, amaute kiphawkkha nawnlo hi. 6 Amau-a' dingin itna, muhdahna, hanciamna cihte om nawnlo a, leitunga om nate khat beek theikha kik nawnlo ding uhhi.
Na mai-ah sep ding a om khempeuh, na tha neihzah tawh sem in. Banghang hiam cihleh na zuat ding sihna gamsungah nasepna leh thungaihsutna, pilna leh theihna cihte omlo hi.
I pumpi, lei suakkik ding a, i nuntakna a hong pia Pasian' kiangah i kha ciahkik ta ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Leinuai in a duhna khangsakin bangmah tawh a kiteh theilo zahin a kam ka beba a, Jerusalem' hoihna teng, a mipite, a mihonte, ama sunga a lungdam mite, a nawmvalh hi.

Keivom pen tuuno tawh omkhawm ding a, kamkei gialbem pen keelno tawh lumkhawm ding hi. Bawngno leh humpinelkai leh ganhing thaute omkhawm ding uh a, naupangno khat nangawn in tuate hawlzo ding hi. 7 Bawngpi leh vompi in an nekhawm ding uh a, amau' note lumkhawm ding uhhi. Humpinelkai in bawngtal mah bangin buhkung ne ding hi. 8 Nawine naungek, gul gilo' kua vangah kimawl ding a, nawine nawnlo naupang in gul gunei' bu a sawk hangin a gul in tulo ding hi. 9 Ka mual siangtho buppi tungah amaute khatlekhat kiliamsak lo ding uh a, kisusia lo ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh tuite in tuipi omna a tuamcip mah bangin leitungah { Topa}' thu theihna kidim ding hi.

"Nang na paisuk ciangin a hong dawntuah dingin Leinuai-a misite kihanthawn a, nangmah a hong hopih dingin leitungah a lian ngei misi uliante kipusuak sak hi. A minamte' kumpite khempeuh amau' kumpi tokhom panin hong ding uhhi. 10 Amaute in nang hong hopihin, ‘Nang zong kote mah bangin na thahat kei hi. Kote mah na bangta hi,’ hong ci ding uhhi. 11 Nangma harp lasakna awte, nangma liatna khempeuh Leinuai-ah kipaipih suk hi. Thante pen nangma delhphah hi a, thante pen nangma silh a hihi.

Nangma mi a sisate hingkik ding uh a, amau' pumpi thokik ding hi. Han sungah a lum mite aw, tho-in lungdamin la sa un! Banghang hiam cihleh zing daitui in leitung a nosak kik bangin sawtpi-a a sisa mite { Topa } in hingkiksak ding hi.
Tua ciangin sihna tawh na thuciamna uh kiphiat ding a, Leinuai tawh na thukimna uh kiplo ding hi. A tumcip ding tuiciin in a hong nawk ciangin note hong sugawp ding hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Leinuai-ah a om mite in nangma tungah lungdamna hong ko theilo a, a sisa mite in nang hong phat theilo uhhi. Gum sunga a paisukte in nangma thumanna hong muang theilo uhhi.
Egypt mite a pan'pih galhang pente in misite' gam Leinuai panin amaute na dawn ding uh a, ‘Pasian a theilo, galsunga si mite hong paisuk uh a, hih lai-ah lumta uhhi,’ ci-in kiko ding uhhi.

Tua ciangin { Pasian } in kei kiangah, "Mihing ahi Ezekiel aw, Israel mite pen hih guhte tawh kibang uhhi. Amaute in, ‘I keucip a, i lamet ding bangmah om nawnloin i nuntakna guipi beita hi,’ ci uhhi. 12 Tua ahih ciangin ka mi Israel-te tungah thu gen in la, Topa { Pasian } in hih bangin ci hi, ci-in gen in: Ka mite aw, tu-in note' hankhuk kong hon'sak ding a, note hong paikhiatpihin, Israel gam kong tun'pihkik ding hi. 13 Note na kiphumna uh hankhuk hong hon'sakin kong paikhiatpih ciangin { Topa } ka hihna thu nong thei ding uhhi. 14 Note sungah keima nuntakna hu kong guan ding a, note hong hingsak kikin, na gam uhah kong tengsak kik ding hi. Tua ciangin { Topa } ka hihna thu nong thei ding uhhi. Hih bangin kong hihna ding thu ka kiciamzo a, ka kiciam bangin kong hih ding hi. { Topa } ahi keimah in hih thu ka gen khinzo hi, ci-in gen in," hong ci hi.
A sisa mi tampite in nuntakna a ngahkik ding uhhi. Pawlkhatte nungta tawntung ding uh a, pawlkhatte in a tawntung zumna leh minsiatna a ngah ding uhhi.
Nang Daniel na hih leh a tawpdong muan'huai takin om in. Tua ciangin na si ding a, ahi zongin hun a bei ciangin thaman a sang dingin na hingkik ding hi," a hong ci hi.

Nisuahna leh nitumna panin mi tampi tak hong pai-in vantung ki-ukna sungah Abraham, Isaac, leh Jacob-te tawh an ne-in sabuai-ah tukhawm ding uhhi. 12 Ahi zongin vantung ki-ukna sungah a om dingin a kingaihsun Israel mite ahih leh pualam khuamialna-ah kilawnkhia ding a, tua lai-ah kapin a hagawi ding uhhi," a ci hi.
Pumpi a thah khit ciangin kha a that theilote na kihta kei un. Hell khuk sungah pumpi leh kha a nihin a susia theipa na kihtazaw un.

Mihing Tapa in a vantung mite hong sawl ding a, ama ukna sungah a om migilote leh mi a mawhna dingin a bawl mi khempeuh kaikhawmin 42 meikhukpi sungah tua bang mite lawn ding uh a, tua lai-ah amaute kapin a hagawi ding uhhi.
meikhukpi sungah tua migilote a khul ding uhhi. Tua lai-ah kapin a hagawi ding uhhi.

Ahi zongin Zeisu in, "Note in Laisiangtho thu ahi a, Pasian' vangliatna ahi zongin theilo na hih manun na ngaihsunkhial uhhi. 30 Banghang hiam cihleh misite a thawhkik uh ciangin vantungah a om vantung mite tawh kibang ding uh a, zinei pasalnei cih omlo ding hi. 31 Misite thawhkikna thu tawh kisai-in note tungah a gen thute sim ngeilo na hi uhhiam? 32 Pasian in, ‘Kei pen Abraham' Pasian, Isaac' Pasian, Jacob' Pasian ka hi hi,’ ci hi. Pasian pen a si mite' Pasian hiloin a nungta mite' Pasian ahi hi," a ci hi.

Ama mai-ah leitung minam khempeuh hong kikhawm ding hi. Gancingpa in tuu leh keelte a khen mah bangin mi khempeuh khen nihin hong koih ding hi. 33 Tuu a bang mite a taklamah koihin, keel a bang mite a veilamah koih ding hi. 34 Tua ciangin Kumpipa in a taklamah a om mite kiangah, ‘Ka Pa in thupha a piak mite aw, hong pai ta un. Leitung piancil a kipanin note-a' dingin a kibawlkholsa gamnuam hong luah un.
Note kiangah kong genin-ah: Ka Pa' Ukna sungah note tawh leenggahzu thak ka dawnkik ni matengin leenggahzu ka dawnkik nawn kei ding hi," a ci hi.
Hankhukte zong kihong a, Pasian' mi a sisa tampite zong kithokik sak hi.
Amah sungtumin, "Banghangin hici gamlum na hi uhhiam? Banghangin kap na hi uhhiam? Numeino a si hilo hi; a ihmu hibek hi," a ci hi.
Tua lai-a om mi khempeuh, tua numeino' sihna hangin kapin, thumin na om uhhi. Ahi zongin Zeisu in, "Kap nawn kei un, amah a si hilo hi; a ihmu bek ahi hi," a ci hi.

Pasian' Ukna sungah Abraham, Isaac, Jacob, leh kamsangte khempeuh a omna mu napi-in, note a pualamah hong kihawlkhiat ciangin tua huna na kahna uh leh na ha gawina uh bangzah takin nasia ding ahi hiam?

Tua ciangin mizawngpa hong si a, vantunga Abraham kiangah a om dingin vantung mite in a paipih uhhi. Mihaupa zong hong si leuleu-in a kivui hi. 23 Ahi zongin hell khuk sungah gimna thuakin a om hi. A khuadak leh, gamlapi mun khatah Abraham leh Lazaras a omkhawm a galmuh hi.

Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Tu huna hih leitung mite in numei leh pasal kiten'na nei uhhi. 35 Ahi zongin sihna panin thokikin a hong tungding hunah a nungta dingin a kilawm mite in kiten'na cihte neilo uhhi. 36 Amaute pen vantung mi tawh kibang uh a, sithei nawnlo uhhi. Sihna panin a thokik khinte ahih manin amaute pen Pasian' tate ahi uhhi. 37 Tua thamloin Moses in zong misite a thawhkikna thu teltakin hong lak hi. Sawlpang kuang thu a genna munah Topa pen, ‘Abraham Pasian, Isaac Pasian, Jacob Pasian,’ ci-in a na gen hi. 38 Amaute khempeuh hing uh ahih manin, Pasian pen mihingte' Pasian hi a, misite' Pasian hilo hi, a cihnopna ahi hi," ci-in a dawng hi.
Zeisu in ama kiangah, "A mantakin ke'n kong cihin-ah: Tuni-in Paradais-ah kei tawh na omkhawm ding hi," a ci hi.
Numeite lau mahmah uh ahih manin lei lam nga-in kuncip uhhi. Tua mi nihte in, "Banghangin misite lakah mihing zong na hi uhhiam

Tua ciangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, "Bang thu ahi hiam?" ci-in a dot ciangin amaute in, "Nazareth khuami Zeisu tunga thupiang a hihi. Amah pen kamsang khat hi a, Pasian leh mite khempeuh in a thugen leh a nasepna-ah vang a nei mahmah khatin a ngaihsut uh a hihi. 20 Ahi zongin ka siampi liante uh leh ka uliante un sihna thukhenna a thuak dingin Pilat tungah ap uh a, singlamteh tungah kithat hi. 21 Amah pen Israel mite a honkhia dingpa hi, ci-in ka lamet uh a hihi. Tua bang hinapi-in hih thuteng hong piang a, tu-in a thu pian'zawh a ni thumna hita hi. 22 Ko pawlte' sung panin numei pawlkhat in lamdang ka sak uh thu hong gen uhhi. Amaute, tu zingsang tungin hanah va pai uh a, 23 ahi zongin ama luang na om nawnlo hi. Tua ciangin amaute hong ciahkik uh a, vantung mite a muhna uh leh tua vantung mite in Zeisu a hin'kik khitna thu a gennate uh hong gensawn uhhi. 24 Tua ciangin ka lawmte uh pawlkhat zong hanah va pai uh a, numeite' gen bang teekteekin va mu uh a, ahi zongin Zeisu mulo uhhi," ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua ahih manin Tapa a um mi peuhmah nungta tawntung ding a, Tapa' thu a manglote in nuntak mulo ding a, amaute tungah Pasian heh tawntung ding hi," a ci hi.

"A mantakin kong genin-ah: Ka thugennate za-in kei hong sawlpa a um khempeuh a nungta paisuak ding hita hi. Mawhsak thukhenna ngah nawnloin, sihna panin a hingkik ta a hihi. 25 A taktakin ci lehang: A si mite in Pasian' Tapa' aw a zak hun uh hong tung ding hi bek loin tu-in a hun hong tungkhin hita a, ama aw a za mi khempeuh nungta ding uhhi.

Hih thu ka hong gen ciangin lamdangsa kei un. Han sungah a om misi khempeuh in ama aw za-in, 29 han sung panin a hong paikhiat uh hun hong tung ding hi. A gamtat hoih mite pen a nungta tawntung dingin hong thokik ding uh a, a gamtat siate ahih leh mawhsak thukhenna a thuak dingin hong thokik ding uhhi.

Ka nuntakkik theihna dingin si ngam ka hih manin ka Pa in kei hong it hi. 18 Kuamah in ka nuntakna hong laksak theilo a, keima utthu tawh ka piak hizaw hi. Ka nuntakna piakkhiat theihna ding leh lakkik theihna ding thu ka Pa in kei tungah a hong piak ahi hi," a ci hi.
a nungzuite kiangah, "I lawmpa Lazaras ihmu zo hi. Ahi zongin amah a phong dingin ka pai ding hi," a ci hi.

Zeisu in, "Na u hong thokik ding hi," a cihleh 24 Martha in, "Nitawp ni-a thawhkik ni ciangin hong thawhkik ding ka thei hi," a ci hi. 25 Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Keimah in a sisa mite thosakin a hingsak theipa ka hihi. Kei hong um mi peuhmah a sih hangin nungta ding hi.

a cih khit ciangin nakpi takin kiko-in, "Lazaras aw, hong pusuak in," a ci hi. 44 Tua ciangin a misipa a khut a khe dial tawh kituamin, a maitang puan tawh a kitunsa-in hong pusuak hi. Zeisu in amaute kiangah, "A dial leh a puante phelkhia un," a ci hi.

Note' omna ding mun a bawlkhol dingin a pai ding ka hihi. Ka Pa' innsungah omna ding mun tampi om hi. A omlo ding hi leh hih bangin thu ka hong gen kei ding hi. 3 Kei va pai-in note' omna ding mun ka va bawlkholh khit ciangin keima omna munah note na hong om theihna dingun note a hong la dingin ka hong paikik ding hi.
Note zong tua mah tawh na kibang ding uhhi. Note zong tu-in na dah uh hangin note tawh kimukik ding ihih manin na lung uh dam mahmah ding a, tua na lungdamna uh kuamah in hong beisak theilo ding hi.
Ahi zongin Pasian in misite lak panin amah hingkiksak a, sihna in amah lencip zolo ahih manin sihna hanga gimna panin amah a suaktasak hi.
Ananias in hih thu a zak phetin thakhatin si-in puksukpah a, hih thu a za mi khempeuh a lau mahmah uhhi. 6 Tua ciangin tangvalte hong kipanin puan tawh a luang tun uh a, puakhia-in a va vui uhhi.
Amah zong thakhat thu-in si-in Peter khe kiangah a puksuk hi. Tua ciangin tangvalte hong lut uh a, a sih khitlam a muh uh ciangin puakhia-in a pasal' gei-ah a phum uhhi.
Hih Stephen thahna thu-ah Saul in zong thukimpih hi. 2 Thu um mi pawlkhat in Stephen vui uh a, nakpi takin dahin a kap uhhi.
David in ama hun lai-in Pasian' deihna bangin na sem a, a sih ciangin a pu a pate gei mahah kisialin muatna a thuak hi.
Amaute' up leh lamet mah bangin, Pasian in miphate leh misiate a kibangin sihna panin hingkik sak khawm ding hi, ci-in umin ka lamen hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh misite a kihingkik saklo ding hi leh Christ zong kihingkik saklo ding hi.

Misite a thawhkikna zong hihte mah tawh kibang hi. A kiphum pen a muat thei hi a, a thokik pen a muat theilo a hihi. 43 A kiphum laitakin hatloin melsia a, a kithawhsak kik ciangin thahatin a melhoih hi. 44 A kiphum laitakin leitung pumpi hi a, a kithawhsak kik ciangin kha pumpi a hihi. Leitung pumpi a om mah bangin kha pumpi zong a omding a hihi.

Banghang hiam cihleh hih ka ten'na ka leitung pumpi uh a sih ciangin mihingte bawl a hilo, Pasian in a kip tawntung dingin kote-a' dingin a hong bawlsak inn, vantungah a neiding ka hihna uh ka thei uhhi. 2 Tu laitakin ka vantung inn uhah ka omnopna uh lianlua mahmah ahih manin ngaklahin ka khuisasa uhhi. 3 Vantung inn-ah ka om uh ciangin pumpi neiloin guak om ding ka hi kei uhhi. 4 Hih leitung pumpi tawh ka om uh laitakin lungkhamin ka khuisasa uhhi. Hih ka leitung pumpi uh ka nusiat nopna hang uhhiloin a sithei pumpi pen a sithei nawnlo pumpi tawh a kilaih theihna dingin ka vantung pumpi uh ka deihna hang uh a hihi. 5 Hih kikheelna ding a hong vaihawmsakpa pen Pasian hi a, kote a hong piakdingte khempeuh hong pia taktak ding cih a lahna-in kote tungah ama Khasiangtho a hong pia hi.

Zeisu Christ thei-in, ama thawhkik bangin thokikin, kei zong sihna panin hong hingsak kik ding hi, ci-in ka lametna hangin ama thuak bangin thuakin, sihna-ah zong amah tawh ka kibat ding ka utpi pen a hihi.
Zeisu si-in thokik hi, ci-in i up mah bangin Pasian in Zeisu hong paipih kik ciangin amah umin a si mite zong hong tonpih ding hi, ci-in i um hi.
Mi khempeuh khatvei si-in, tua khit ciangin Pasian' thukhenna a thuakding ahih mah bangin,
Tua ahih manin ka sih khit ciangin hih thute na phawkkik kik theihna dingun ka hihtheih zahin ka hanciam ding hi.
Pasian' Tapa tawh a kipawl peuhmah in nuntak tawntungna nei a, Pasian' Tapa tawh a kipawllote in nuntak tawntungna neilo uhhi, cihna a hihi.
a nungta mipa zong ka hihi. Kei ka si ngei hi. Ahi zongin tu-in hong en in, a nungta tawntung ka hihi. Sihna leh misite omna gam keima khutnuai ahi uhhi.
Tua ahih manin zakna ding bil a neite in Khasiangtho in pawlpite kiangah a gen thute na za un. A gualzo mite, nihvei sihna in gimsakkha nawnlo ding hi.

Ciamtehna ngana a hon' ciangin Pasian' thu a genna hang leh Pasian' thu citakin teci a pan'na uh hangin a kithat mite' kha, biakna tau nuai-ah a om ka mu hi. 10 Amaute nakpi takin kiko uh a, "A thuman, a siangtho, a Vanglian Topa aw, leitungah a omlai, kote a hong that mite tungah cik ciangin thu khenin, kote hong thahna hangin cik ciangin phu la ding na hi hiam?" a ci uhhi. 11 Tua ciangin amaute tungah puantualpi a kang khat ciat kipia a, amaute a kithah mah bangin a kithat lai ding a naseppihte uh leh a sanggamte uh a kim matengin tawlkhat sung a tawlngak laina ding uh kigen hi.
Amaute a kibawlsiatna mei, khu tawntung a, ganhing leh a lim bia-in, a min kigelhna a nei mi peuhmah in a sun a zanin tatsat loin gimna thuak paisuak uhhi," a ci hi.

Tua ciangin tokhom tungah a tu mi pawlkhat ka mu a, tua mite tungah thukhenna ding aana a kipia a hihi. Zeisu thu a genna leh Pasian thu hangin a kithat mite' kha zong ka mu hi. Tua mite in ganhing ahi a, a lim ahi zongin bialo uhhi; a taltang uhah ahi a, a khut tung uhah ahi zongin ganhing ciamtehna neilo uhhi. Amaute hong hingkik uh a, Christ tawh kum tul khat sung ukna aana a neikhawm uhhi. 5 Kum tul khat a cin'mateng a si dangte hingkiklo uhhi. Hih pen sihna panin thawhkikna a masa a hihi. 6 Hih thawhkikna masa sungah a kihel mite pen Pasian' mi siangtho hi a, a hampha mahmah ahi uhhi. Nihvei sihna in tua bang mite bangmah cihzo nawnlo ding a, amaute pen Pasian leh Christ' siampite hi ding uh a, amah tawh kum tul khat sung ukna aana nei ding uhhi.

Amaute a khem Satan pen ganhing leh kamsang zuaupa a omna mun, kat a kikhulna meiphualpi sungah kilawn a, a sun a zanin tua lai munah amaute in gimna a thuak tawntung ding uh a hihi. 11 Tua ciangin tokhom kang a lian khat leh a tungah a tupa ka mu hi. Ama omna panin lei leh van lengkhiamang a, a tun'na mel uh kitheilo hi. 12 A lian a neu misite tua tokhom mai-ah dingin laibute a kilem ka mu hi. Tua ciangin a nungta mite a kigelhna laibu a dang khat zong a kilem ka mu hi. Amaute' gamtatna tua laibute sungah a kigelhna tawh kizui-in misite tungah thu a kikhen hi. 13 Tuipi sungah a om misite, tuipi in hong pusuah a, Sihna leh Misite' Gam in zong amau sungah a om misite hong pusuah uhhi. Tua ciangin a vekpi-in amaute' gamtatnasa tawh kizui-in thu a kikhen hi. 14 Tua ciangin Sihna leh Misite' Gam, meiphualpi sungah a kilawn hi. Hih meiphualpi pen sihna nihna a hihi. 15 A nungta mite a kigelhna laibu sungah a min a omlo peuhmah meiphualpi sungah kilawn hi.
Amaute' mit panin khitui khempeuh nulsak ding hi. Thu luisate maimang khinta ahih manin sihna, dahna, leh na sa-a kahna cihte om nawnlo ding hi," a ci hi.
Ahi zongin a meidawite, a lehtatte, a lampialte, mi thatte, a paktatte, aisante, milim biate, leh zuaugente omna ding mun pen sihna nihna ahi kat a kikhulna meiphualpi kuang sung ahi hi," a ci hi.

Lei-ah na ciahkik matengin khua-ul kai-in na na sep ciang bekin an na ne ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh lei sung panin nang hong kipiangsak a, nang, leivui na hih manin, leivui mah na suakkik ding hi," a ci hi.
"Tuni-in na teel dingun note' mai-ah nuntakna leh a hoih na, sihna leh siatna ka koih khinzo hi.

Tuni-in note' langkhatah teci a pang dingin vantung leh leitung ka sam a, note' mai-ah na teel dingun nuntakna leh sihna, thupha leh samsiatna ka koih hi. Tua ahih ciangin note leh na suanlekhakte uh na hin'theihna dingun nuntakna teel unla,
Ahih hangin tu-in amah si ta hi; Banghangin an tang nawn ding ka hi hiam? Amah lakik thei ding ka hi hiam? Ama kiangah kei ka pai ding a, ahih hangin kei kiangah amah hong kiklo ding hi," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, "Ka nu sung panin guaktangin ka suak a, guaktang mahin ka ciahkik ding hi. { Topa } in hong pia a, { Topa } mah in hong lakik hi. { Topa' } min kiphat ta hen," a ci hi.
A hun ciangin ancilna phualah buhlom a tun' mah bangin a teek sihin han na zuan ding hi.
A nuntak tan ding kisehkhol a, a nuntak kha phazah ding kiciangtan khin hi. Nangmah in na ciangtan khin a, kikheel thei nawnlo hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh ka hun nai mahmah ta a, ka lehzuih nawnloh ding lampi zui-in a pai ka hita hi.
Natna in ka vun a nektum khit hangin, hih ka pumpi mahmah tawh Pasian ka mu ding hi.
Kei ka hih leh, thumanna tawh na maitang ka en ding a, ka khan'lawh ciangin nangma mel muhna tawh ka lungkim ding hi.
"{ Topa } aw, ka mong leh ka hun a kisehzah hong theisak in la, ka nuntakna a beipak hun ding hong theisak in!" ka ci hi.

Pa neilote' pa leh meigong numeite a hupa pen, a siangtho mahmah ama omna-ah a om Pasian a hihi. 6 Pasian in a cimawhte a ten'na ding innlelo guan' a, thongkia mite nopsakna munah a tun'pih hi. Ahih hangin mi lehdote ahih leh keugaw gamah teng uhhi.
Ka lungsim leh ka pumpi zawngkhal khading a, ahih hangin Pasian pen ka lungsim hatna leh keima-a' hi tawntung ding hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh amah in eite' pian'na hong thei a, eite pen leivui ihihna a phawk hi.
Na maitang na seel ciangin amaute khasia uhhi. Amau' husan'na na lakkhiat ciangin amaute si-in amau' pian'na leivui-ah a ciahkik uhhi.
Misite ahi a, gamdaihna sungah a pai peuhpeuhte in ahi zongin { Topa } phatlo uhhi.
Ama mi siangthote a sih ciangin { Topa } in na sa mahmah hi.
Hih pen ka thuakna-ah keima kihehnepna hi a, na thuciamna in kei tungah nuntakna hong pia hi.
A husan'na a bei ciangin lei-ah ciahkik uh a, tua ni mahmahin a ngaihsutnate uh beita hi.
Thumanin gamtat ding a hanciamte nungta ding a, a sia-in a gamta teiteite si ding uhhi.
Mihingte in thuman lampi hi, ci-in a ngaihsutte pen sihna lampi hikha thei hi.

Thah dinga a kikaikhia mipa honkhia in la, sihna ding mun a zuan mipa lehkaih kik in. 12 Ke'n theikha kei ing, na cihnop hangin lungsim a thei Pasian in theitel veve hi; nang hong encik Pasian in hong teltheihna phawk in. Mi khempeuh a gamtatna bangin a thukkik ding hi.
Han khuk, taciing numei, tui a deih tawntung lei keu, leh a kisumit zolo meikuang.
Suah hun om a, sih hun om hi. Suan hun om a, bawhkhiat hun om hi. 3 Gawh hun om a, khoi hun om hi. Phel hun om a, lam hun om hi. 4 Kah hun om a, nuih hun om hi. Dah hun om a, laam hun om hi.

A manpha paknamtui sangin minpha hoihzaw a, i suah ni sangin i sih ni hoihzaw hi. 2 Pawisimna sangin sigalna hoihzaw hi. Sih ding bek a ngak ahihna mihing khempeuh in a phawk ding uh kilawm hi. 3 Nuihna sangin dahna hoihzaw hi; na mai hong gumsak zahin na thu theihna hong khangsak hi. 4 Mipilte dahna lakah omtual a, mihaite nopna lakah omtual hi.

A hong piang ding thu i thei kei a, a hong gen thei zong kuamah omlo hi. 8 A sih ding a pelhthei, a sih ding hun a phiatthei kuamah omlo hi. Gal a om ciangin gallauna a pelhthei, siatna sungah a lut ciangin a pengthei kuamah omlo hi.
Mihing in ama hun ding thei ngeilo hi. Thang-ah a awk vasate leh ngen-ah a awk ngasate tawh i kibang hi. Lametloh hun laitak keekin hunsia sungah mihingte i tung hi.
I pumpi, lei suakkik ding a, i nuntakna a hong pia Pasian' kiangah i kha ciahkik ta ding hi.
Amah in sihna beimangsak ding a, maitang khempeuh panin khitui nul ding hi. Leitung khempeuh panin ama mite a kizahkona lakhia ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } in hih thu gen khinzo hi.

Nangma mi a sisate hingkik ding uh a, amau' pumpi thokik ding hi. Han sungah a lum mite aw, tho-in lungdamin la sa un! Banghang hiam cihleh zing daitui in leitung a nosak kik bangin sawtpi-a a sisa mite { Topa } in hingkiksak ding hi.

Amah in a gim mi tungah vangliatna pia a, thahatna a neilo mi a thahatna khangsak hi. 30 Khangnote nangawn gimin tawl ding a, khanglai mite a tha uh bei ding hi. 31 Ahih hangin { Topa } a muang mite a tha uh dimkik ding a, muvanlai bangin kha tawh leengto-in, amaute tai napi-un tawllo ding uh a, amaute lam pai napi-un gimlo ding uhhi.
{ Topa } in, "Kei, keimah pen note hong hehnempa ka hihi. Lopa sangin sauvei a nungta zaw tuanlo, mihing lellelte, Banghangin kihta na hi uhhiam?

Thuman mipa si a, kuamah in tua thu ngaihsutin nei nawnlo hi. Kuamah in a theihloh kalin thutak mite si uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh tuahsiatna panin thuman mipa kilakhia a, nopsakna sungah amah tum hi. 2 Thutangin a gamta mite in a sihna uhah nopna ngahin tawlnga uhhi.

Topa in hehpihna nei ahih manin hong nial paisuaklo ding hi. 32 Dahna hong thuaksak thei ding a, ahih hangin eite a hong itna muan'huai-in kip tawntung hi. 33 Dahna leh gimna a hong thuaksak ciangin amah lungdampah samlo hi.
A sisa mi tampite in nuntakna a ngahkik ding uhhi. Pawlkhatte nungta tawntung ding uh a, pawlkhatte in a tawntung zumna leh minsiatna a ngah ding uhhi.

Leinuai-a misite' omna-ah a paina ding uh panin honin, sihna ding panin suaktasak ding ka hi hiam? Sihna aw, gimna na piakna-ah amaute ka hehpih kei hi. Leinuai-a misite' gam aw, na suksiatna-ah amaute ka khasiat kei hi.
Dahin a thum a tau mite Pasian in amaute hehnem ding ahih manin thupha ngah mi ahi uhhi.
Pumpi a thah khit ciangin kha a that theilote na kihta kei un. Hell khuk sungah pumpi leh kha a nihin a susia theipa na kihtazaw un.
Ke'n kong genin-ah: Nang pen suangneu a cihnopna Peter na hi hi. Hih suangpi tungah ka pawlpi ka lam ding a, sihna nangawn in zo zo ngeilo ding hi.
Ahi zongin Pasian in ama kiangah, ‘Mihaipa aw, tuzan mahmahin na si ding hi. Hih na neihsa teng kua'n zang nawn ding ahi hiam?’ ci hi," a ci hi.
Zeisu in ama kiangah, "A mantakin ke'n kong cihin-ah: Tuni-in Paradais-ah kei tawh na omkhawm ding hi," a ci hi.
"A mantakin kong genin-ah: Ka thugennate za-in kei hong sawlpa a um khempeuh a nungta paisuak ding hita hi. Mawhsak thukhenna ngah nawnloin, sihna panin a hingkik ta a hihi.
Hih thu ka hong gen ciangin lamdangsa kei un. Han sungah a om misi khempeuh in ama aw za-in,

Tua ahih manin amaute tungah nuntak tawntungna pia ka hih manin si ngei nawnlo ding uh a, keima khutsung panin kuamah in amaute hong sut zolo ding uhhi. 29 Ka khutsungah a hong pia ka Pa sangin a lianzaw kuamah omlo ahih manin ka Pa' khutsung panin kuamah in lakhia zolo ding hi.
a nungzuite kiangah, "I lawmpa Lazaras ihmu zo hi. Ahi zongin amah a phong dingin ka pai ding hi," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Keimah in a sisa mite thosakin a hingsak theipa ka hihi. Kei hong um mi peuhmah a sih hangin nungta ding hi.
Tua bangin suang a khiat thuahthuah laitakun Stephen in thu ngen a, "Topa Zeisu aw, ka kha hong la in," a ci hi.

Mihing khat tung panin leitung minam khempeuh hong piangsakin, leitung khempeuhah a omsak hi. Amah in mihingte a pian'sakma pekin, mihingte' nuntak tanvei ding leh a ten'na ding uh mun a sehsa a hihi.
Eite' mawhna hangin a si dingin Zeisu kipia a, Pasian tawh eite i kipawl theihna dingin kihingkik sak hi.

Ahi zongin eite mawhna nei ihih laitakin eite-a' dingin Christ hong si ahih manin Pasian in eite hong it mahmahna thu hong lak khin hi. 9 Ama sihna hangin tu-in Pasian tawh kipawlthei ihih manin Pasian' hehna hangin gimna panin zong hong suaktasak zaw kan lai ding hi. 10 Pasian tawh eite i kilangneih laitakin ama Tapa' sihna hangin amah tawh hong kilemsak ahih leh tu-in Pasian tawh kipawl khinta ihih manin Christ nuntakna in eite hong honkhiazo zaw kan ding hilo ahi hiam? 11 Tuateng bek hilo lai a, Pasian tawh hong kilemsak i Topa Zeisu Christ hangin Pasian tungah i nuam mahmah hi. 12 Mi khat hangin leitungah mawhna hong om a, tua mawhna hangin sihna hong piang hi. Mi khempeuh mawh uh ahih manin tu-a bangzia-in mi khempeuh tungah sihna hong tung hi.
Mi khat bek' mawhna hangin sihna in hong uk ahih leh mi khat mah ahi Zeisu Christ hangin nakpi takin a lian Pasian' hehpihna leh mihoih-a san'na a ngah mite nungta-in thahatzaw kan ding uhhi.
