Christ Zeisu tawh i kipawl theihna dingin ama sungah a kiphum eite pen ama sihna mahah zong a sikhawm ihihlam theilo na hi uhhiam? 4 I Pa' vangliatna tawh sihna panin Christ a kithawhsak kik mah bangin eite zong nuntakna thak i nuntak theihna dingin tui i kiphum ciangin amah tawh kiphum khawmin a sikhawm ihi hi.

Mi khatpeuh' thu a mang dingin ama khutsungah na kipiak uh ciangin a thu na mante uh' sila na hi uhhi. Mawhna na bawl uh leh sihna a thuak ding na hi uh a, thumangin na om uh leh Pasian tawh pawlkhat a suak ding na hi uhhi.
Banghang hiam cihleh mawhna in thaman hong piak pen sihna hi a, ahi zongin i Topa Zeisu tawh i kipawl manin Pasian' hong piakkhong pen nuntak tawntungna a hihi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Christ Zeisu tawh a hong kipawlsak Khasiangtho in mawhna leh sihna a piangsak thukham panin kei hong suaktasak khinta hi.
I ngaihsutna, i pumpi deihna uksak lehang sihna tawh kizom hi; i ngaihsutna, Khasiangtho uksak lehang nuntakna leh nopsakna tawh a kizom hi.
Na pumpi uh deihna zui-in na gamtat uh leh na si ding uh a, ahi zongin Khasiangtho huhna tawh na mawh gamtatnate uh na sihsak uh leh na nungta ding uhhi.
Bangmah in ama hong itna tawh hong kikhensakzo hetlo ding hi, ci-in ka thei hi. Sihna, nuntakna, vantung mite, vantung vangliatnate, tuhun nate leh a hong tungding nate,
I nuntak leh Topa-a' dingin a nungta ihi a, i sih leh zong Topa-a' ding mahin a si ihi hi. Tua ahih manin i si a, i hing zongin Topa-a' ihi hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in a galte khempeuh zo-in a khenuai-ah a koihkhit hundong mateng Christ in uk ding hi. 26 A tawpna-ah suksiat ding a gal nunung pen in sihna a hihi.

Misite a thawhkikna zong hihte mah tawh kibang hi. A kiphum pen a muat thei hi a, a thokik pen a muat theilo a hihi. 43 A kiphum laitakin hatloin melsia a, a kithawhsak kik ciangin thahatin a melhoih hi. 44 A kiphum laitakin leitung pumpi hi a, a kithawhsak kik ciangin kha pumpi a hihi. Leitung pumpi a om mah bangin kha pumpi zong a omding a hihi.

Kuamah kim in a theihloh thusim khat na ngai un. Eite khempeuh a si khin ding ihi kei a, thakhatthu-in a kikheelvat ding ihi hi. 52 Peengkul nunung hong gin' ciangin mitphiat kikal sungin i kikheelpak ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh peengkul hong gin' ciangin misite a sithei nawnlo dingin hong tho ding a, i vekpi-in i kikheel ding hi. 53 A muatthei pumpi pen a muattheilo pumpi-in hong kikheel ding a, a sithei pumpi pen a sitheilo pumpi-in hong kikheel ding hi. 54 A muatthei pen a muattheilo hong suakin, a sithei pen a sitheilo hong suah ciangin Laisiangtho thu hong tung taktak ding hi. Laisiangtho in, "Sihna maimangin gualzawhna in khuplet hi. 55 Sihna aw, na gualzawhna koi-ah om a, midangte na suksiat zawhna ding na thahatna koi-ah omta ahi hiam?" na ci hi. 56 Sihna a pian'na mawhna hang hi a, mawhna a kitheihna Thukham hang a hihi.

Tua thu hangin ka lungkia tuankei uhhi. Kote' leitung pumpi in damdamin muatlam ding a manawh ahi zongin ka kha nuntakna uh a nini-in thaksuak semsem hi. 17 Tuhun laitakin tomno sung lungkhamna ka thuakte uh in ka thuakna uh sangin nakpi takin a lianzaw tawntung minthan'na sung hong tun'pih ding hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh hih ka ten'na ka leitung pumpi uh a sih ciangin mihingte bawl a hilo, Pasian in a kip tawntung dingin kote-a' dingin a hong bawlsak inn, vantungah a neiding ka hihna uh ka thei uhhi.
Lungmuang takin a ki-om hithiat hi a, hih leitung pumpi nusia-in Topa tawh omkhawm ding a ki-utzaw a hihi.

Tua na dahna uh hotkhiatna ngahtheihna dingin na lungsim uh na kheelna dingun Pasian in hong zang ahih manin dahna ding bangmah omlo hi. Ahi zongin hih leitung dahna lelte in ahih leh sihna piangsak hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Christ-a' ding bekin a nungta ka hi a, si ta leng zong kei-a' dingin hoihzaw semsem lai hi.

Zeisu Christ thei-in, ama thawhkik bangin thokikin, kei zong sihna panin hong hingsak kik ding hi, ci-in ka lametna hangin ama thuak bangin thuakin, sihna-ah zong amah tawh ka kibat ding ka utpi pen a hihi.

Sanggamte aw, lametna a neilo mite bangin na dahluat lohna dingun a sisa mite' omzia ding thu na theih ding uh ka deih hi. 14 Zeisu si-in thokik hi, ci-in i up mah bangin Pasian in Zeisu hong paipih kik ciangin amah umin a si mite zong hong tonpih ding hi, ci-in i um hi. 15 Topa' thugen note kiangah ka hong gen uh thu in: Topa hong paikik ni ciangin a nungta lai eite pen a sisa mite tawh a kimuh ma-in Topa tawh i kimu kei ding hi. 16 Pasian' thupiakna awging lianpi, vantung mi mangpa' thugenna, leh Pasian' peengkul hong ging ding a, vantung panin Topa mahmah hong paisuk ding hi. 17 Tua ciangin tua hun laitakin a nungta lai eite pen vankim lai-ah Topa a dawn dingin amah a um a sisa mite tawh hong kilakhawm ding a, Topa tawh i omkhawm tawntung ding hi, cihna a hihi. 18 Tua ahih ciangin note khatlekhat hih thu tawh na kihehnem un.
Tate a cih mite pen leitung cilesa a nei mite ahih manin, ama sihna hangin sihna a uk Dawimangpa a sukgawp theihna dingin Zeisu in mihing pian'zia mah hong nei phot hi.

Ahi zongin Pasian' hehpihna hangin mi khempeuh-a' dingin Zeisu a sih theihna dingin tawlkhat sung vantung mite sangin a neuzaw-in a kibawlna i mu a, sihna a thuakna hangin minthan'na leh pahtawina a ngahna thu i thei hi.
Leitungah mihingin Zeisu a omlai-in sihna panin amah a honkhia theiding Pasian tungah thu ngenin khitui naptui tawh thumin na kiko hi.

Siampite' lakna tawh kisai-in ahih leh a sithei mi mah ahi siampite in mite tung panin sawmah khat a la uhhi. Ahi zongin Melkhizedek' lakna tawh kisai-in ahih leh Laisiangtho in a gen mah bangin a nungta tawntung mipa in sawmah khat a la a hihi.

tawntung Khasiangtho hangin Pasian tungah a cingtaak biakpiakna dingin Christ in a piak ama sisan in na tam semkhia zozaw ding a, a nungta Pasian' na i septheihna dingin bangmahin a kimanglo nasepna panin ama sisan in i lungsim hong siangsak ding hi.15 Thuciamna masa in a huamkhak mite, a mawhna panun a suahtak theihna ding uh ngeina om pen a si suak khinta ahih manin, Pasian' sap mite in a ciamsa tawntung thupha a ngahtheihna dingun Christ in thuciamna thak a hong vaihawm a hihi.
Mi khempeuh khatvei si-in, tua khit ciangin Pasian' thukhenna a thuakding ahih mah bangin,
Eite-a' dingin hih leitungah a kip khuapi omlo ahih manin a hong piang lai ding khuapi a zong ihi hi.

I Topa Zeisu Christ' Pa Pasian tungah lungdam ni. Ama hong hehpih mahmahna hangin sihna panin Zeisu Christ a thawhkik sakna tawh eite tungah nuntakna thak a hong pia hi. Tua ahih manin i lametna kiam ngeilo a, 4 Pasian in ama mite-a' dingin a koih thuphate i ngahna dingin lamenin i om hi. Tua thuphate sia ngeilo, nin ngeilo, mual ngeiloin a om tawntungna vantungah note-a' dingin a hong koihsak hi.

Christ mahmah zong note-a' dingin si a, Pasian' kiangah hong tun'pih theihna dingin mihoih khat pen mihoihlote' mawhna hangin khatvei a si hi. Mite in ama leitung pumpi that a, ahi zongin Pasian in kha nuntakna a pia hi.
I Topa Zeisu Christ in teltakin hong genkhin ahih manin hih leitung pumpi ka nusiat baihna ding thu ka thei hi.

Ka lawm itte aw, eite' pianzia ding taktak a telin hong kilat nailoh hangin tu-in Pasian' tate ihi hi. Ahi zongin Christ hong kilat ciangin ama pianzia ahi bang teekteekin mu ding ihih manin amah i batna ding thu teltakin i thei hi.

Amah ka muh ciangin misi bangin ama khe phungah ka puk hi. Ahi zongin amah in ka tungah a taklam khut hong nga a, "Lau kei in; kei pen a kipatna leh a tawpna ka hi a, 18 a nungta mipa zong ka hihi. Kei ka si ngei hi. Ahi zongin tu-in hong en in, a nungta tawntung ka hihi. Sihna leh misite omna gam keima khutnuai ahi uhhi.

Na thuakding uh haksatnate kihta kei un. Dawimangpa in note pawlkhat thong sungah hong khia-in hong ze-et ding hi. Gimna na thuak hun ding uh ni sawm sung bek hi ding hi. Na sih dongun kei tungah hong citak un. Tua hi leh nuntakna lukhu ka hong pia ding hi.
I sanggamte in Tuuno sisan leh thuman a genna uh tawh amah na zo uh a, a nuntakna nangawn uh na pia ngam uhhi.

Tua ciangin vantung panin awging khat ka za a, "Tu-a kipanin Topa thu-ah a si mite mi hampha mahmah ahi hi, cihna gelh in," a ci hi. Tua ciangin Khasiangtho in, "Hi takpi hi. Amaute' nasepna thaman in amaute zui ding ahih manin a nasep gimna panun tawlnga-in nuamsa-in om ding uhhi," ci-in a dawng hi.

Hih thawhkikna masa sungah a kihel mite pen Pasian' mi siangtho hi a, a hampha mahmah ahi uhhi. Nihvei sihna in tua bang mite bangmah cihzo nawnlo ding a, amaute pen Pasian leh Christ' siampite hi ding uh a, amah tawh kum tul khat sung ukna aana nei ding uhhi.
Tua ciangin Sihna leh Misite' Gam, meiphualpi sungah a kilawn hi. Hih meiphualpi pen sihna nihna a hihi.
Amaute' mit panin khitui khempeuh nulsak ding hi. Thu luisate maimang khinta ahih manin sihna, dahna, leh na sa-a kahna cihte om nawnlo ding hi," a ci hi.

"Tu-in hihte pen amaute' tungah na piak ding biakna ngeina kipte a hihi. 2 Hebrews mi sila khat na lei uh ciangin, amah in kum guk sung na hong sepsak ding a, a kum sagihna ciangin bangmah hong pia loin a suakta-in paikhia ding hi. 3Amah guakin hong pai ahih leh amah guak mahin paikhia ding a, zi neisa-in hong pai ahih leh amah tawh a zi zong paikhia ding hi.
"Zuak ding ahi a, sila-in neih ding ahi zongin mi a gu mi peuhmah kithat ding hi

"Mi khat in molhtum khat tawh ama sila ahi pasal hita leh numei hita leh satin a phualah a sih pah leh, amah gim kipia ding hi. 21 Ahih hangin ni khat ahi a, ni nih ahi zongin sila a nuntak leh, amah gim piak ding hilo hi. Banghang hiam cihleh sila pen ama neihsa ahih manin sila a sih ciangin amah a sumh khin a hihi.

"Mi khat in ama sila ahi pasal hita leh numei hita leh a mit satin a suksiatkhak leh amah in tua mit' hangin sila suakta sakin paikhiasak ding hi. 27 Amah in a sila ahi pasal hita leh numei hita leh a ha a tupkhiat leh, amah in tua ha' hangin sila suakta sakin paikhiasak ding hi.

"Sila ahi numei, midang khat in zuthawl a piaksa, kitankhia nailoin amah suahtakna a kipia nailo nu, pasal dang khat in a lupkhoppih leh, thukanna kinei ding hi. Amaute kithatlo ding hi; Banghang hiam cihleh tuanu sila hi lai hi.
Ahih hangin siampipa khat in ama-a' dingin sum tawh sila khat a lei leh, tua a sila in ne thei ding hi. Ama inn sungah a suak mite in ama an ne thei ding uhhi.

Note in a kum sawmngana siangtho sakin, gamsunga a teng mi khempeuh tungah suahtakna thu na zasak ding uhhi. Note in nomau' neihsa ciat ngahkikin, sila-in a kizuak mite nomau' innkuanpihte ciat kiangah na ciahkik uh ciangin note-a' dingin jubilee hi ding hi.

"Na gei-a om na sanggampa zawngin, nangma tungah amahmah hong kizuak leh, sila bangin na na semsak kei ding hi. 40 Amah pen a kicial nasem leh peemta bangin nang kiangah om ding hi. Amah in jubilee kum mateng nangma na hong sem ding a, 41 tua ciangin nang kiang panin amah leh ama kiangah a om a tate paikhia ding a, ama innkuan zuan kikin, a pate' neihsa ngahkik ding hi. 42 Banghang hiam cihleh amaute pen Egypt gam panin ka paikhiatpih keima nasemte hi a, amaute sila-in kizuaklo ding hi. 43 Note in hih gawpgawpna tawh amah na uk kei ding uh a, na Pasian uh na zahtak ding uhhi. 44 Note in na neih theih ding uh sila numei leh sila pasalte hih bang ahi hi: Na kimkot uha om minam dangte lak panin sila numei leh sila pasal na lei thei ding uhhi. 45 Note in na gamsung uhah a suak, note lakah a hong peem khualmite leh note tawh a om amau' innkuante lak panin zong na lei thei ding uh a, amaute pen nomau-a' hi thei ding uhhi. 46 Note in amaute pen note' khit ciangin na tapate uh tungah amau' neih tawntung dingin a luah dingin na pia thei ding uhhi. Note in sila-in amaute na nei thei ding uh a, ahih hangin na sanggam uh Israel mite khatlekhat hih gawpgawpna tawh na ki-uk kei ding uhhi.

"Na sanggampa, Hebrews pasal khat ahi a, Hebrews numei khat ahi zongin nang tungah hong kizuak leh, amah in nangma na kum guk sung hong sem ding a, a kum sagihna ciangin nang kiang panin a suakta-in na paikhiasak ding hi. 13 Na kiang panin a suakta-in na paikhiatsak ciangin khuthawm guakin na paisak kei ding hi. 14 Na tuuhon lak, na ancilna leh na leenggah sukna panin citna tawh tampi na pia ding a, { Topa } na Pasian in nang thupha hong piak zahin amah na pia ding hi.

"A topa' kiang panin no kiangah a hong tai sila, a topa kiang mahah na apkik kei ding uhhi. 16 Na khuapite uh lak panin ama teelna mun, ama lungkim penna, note lakah note tawh amah hong teng ding a, amah na nengniam kei ding uhhi.
"Mi khat in Israel mi a sanggamte khat gu-in, amah in sila bangin a bawl ahi a, a zuak ahi zongin a kimuh leh, tua gutapa kithat ding hi. Tua bangin note' lak panin siatna na siangsak ding uhhi.

Note na zin kik ngei nawn kei ding uhhi, ci-in kong ciam khualzinna, Egypt gamah teembaw tawh { Topa } in note hong paipih kik ding hi. Tua lai-ah sila numei leh sila pasal dingin na galte uh tungah na kizuak ding uh a, ahih hangin kuamah in note hong leilo ding hi," a ci hi.
Zebulun minamte in Kitron-a teng mite ahi a, Nahalol-a teng mite ahi zongin hawlkhia lo a, Kanaan mite amaute lakah tengin aana tawh nasemte a suak uhhi.
Filistia mite aw, hang unla, pasal bangin gamta un. Tua hi kei leh amaute, note' sila hong hih mah bangin Hebrews mite' sila na suak ding uhhi. Pasal lungsim nei-in do un," a ci uhhi.

Amaute in Egypt mi khat gamlakah mu uh a, David kiangah amah paipih uhhi. Amaute in an pia uh a, amah in ne hi. Amaute in tui dawn ding zong a pia uhhi. 12 Theimoh khat leh leenggahkeu bawk nih zong a pia uhhi. Amah in tuate a nek khit ciangin a tha hong dimkik hi. Banghang hiam cihleh an ahi a, tui ahi zongin sun thum leh zan thum nelo dawnloin om hi. 13 Tua ciangin David in ama kiangah, "Nang kuate na hi hiam? Koi pan na hi hiam?" a ci hi. Amah in, "Kei pen Amalek-te khat' nasem, Egypt mi tangval khat ka hihi. Tuma ni thum lai-in ka ci na ahih manin ka topa in hong nusia hi. 14 Kote in Khereth mite' Negeb gam leh Judah-te' gamsung leh Kaleb mite' Negeb gam ka sim uh a, mei tawh Ziklag ka hal uhhi," a ci hi. 15 Tua ciangin David in ama kiangah, "Hih mite kiangah nong paipih suk nuam ding hiam?" a ci hi. Amah in, "Nangmah in kei nong thahlohna ding ahi a, ka topa' khutsungah nong apkik lohna ding ahi zongin Pasian' min tawh kei tungah hong kiciam peuh lecin hih mihonte kiangah nang kong paipihsuk ding hi," a ci hi.

Tu-in kamsang honte sung pan mi khat' zi Elisha' tungah kiko-in, "Na nasem ka pasal si hi. Na nasempa in { Topa } a zahtakna na thei hi. Ahih hangin ka tapate nih sila dingin a la dingin a leibatnapa hong pai hi," a ci hi.

Kote pen sal ka hi takpi uhhi; ahi zongin ka salsuahna uhah ka Pasian un nong nusia kei a, kote' Pasian' biakinn puahkikin ka din'sakkik theihna ding uh leh Judah leh Jerusalem-ah kidalna kulh ka neih theihna dingun kipat thakna na hong piak theihna dingin Persia kumpite ko tungah a thunuam dingin nong bawlsak hi.
A pil silapa in a topa' ta hai tungah aana nei-in a topa' gamh pawlkhat a luah hi.
Mihaite a nop lua-in a nuntak ding kilawmlo a, silate in miliante a uk ding kilawmlo zaw lai hi.
Hauhnop manin mihaute letsong pia leeng kizawn'lawh a, hauhnop manin mizawngte' neihsa laksak lehang zong kihauhlawh tuanlo hi.
Sila khat a topa kiangah gensia kei in; amah in nang hong gensia-in gimna na thuakkha ding hi.

{ Topa } in Jacob hehpihin Israel teelkik ding a, amaute pen a gam uhah koihkik ding hi. Khual mite in amaute pawlin Jacob innkuan bel ding uhhi. 2 Israel mite in amaute manin amau' gamah ciahpih ding uh a, { Topa' } gamsungah amaute pen sila numei sila pasal dingin nei ding uhhi. Amaute a man ngei mite pen tu-in amaute in lehmat ding uh a, amaute a nengniam ngei mite tungah tu-in ukna nei ding uhhi. 3 A haksa nasep hong kisepsakna, gimna leh lungkhamna panin { Topa } in note tungah tawldamna hong piak ciangin, 4 Babylon kumpipa tungah hih zahkona kam na zang ding uh a, "Kumpi gilopa pukta a, amah in kuamah nengniamzo nawnlo ding! 5 Tawlnga loin mihingte satna-in a kizang, hehna tawh minamte ukin nakpi takin a bawlsia, migilote' ciangkhut leh gam ukte' kumpi ciangkhut, { Topa } in kuaitan khinta hi.

Gimna a thuak mite tungah thuhoih a puak dingin { Topa } in kei hong teelin hong sawl ahih manin keima sungah Topa { Pasian}' kha hong om hi. Lungsim kitamzante a damsak ding, salin a kimante tungah suahtakna thu a gen ding, a kikhum mite-a' dingin thong kong a hong ding,

Zedekiah kumpipa in numei ahi a, pasal ahi zongin Hebrews mipih silate khahkhia-in, kuamah in a Jew mipihte sila-in khawi theilo ding hi, ci-in suahtakna ding thu zasak a, Jerusalem khua-a mi khempeuh tawh thuciamna a bawl hi.

Minam dang khempeuh kaikhawmin Jehoshafat Kuam-ah ka paipih ding hi. Ka mihingte tungah a bawlnasa uh hangin tua munah amaute thu ka khen ding hi. Amaute in Israel mite, gamdangah thehthang uh a, ka gamsung teng phelhawm mangkhin uhhi. 3 A galmatte uh kua in ngah ding, ci-in ai san uh a, zu leh numei leina dingin numeino leh naupangnote sila-in a zuak uhhi.
Khedap bu khat man dingin mizawngte sila-in i zuak nuam a, i mangbuh hoihlote sum tampi i khawng nuam hi," na ci uhhi.
Lametna a om no salte aw, ciahkik unla, a muan'huai mahmah na mun ngei uh zuankik un. Note' thuaknasa a zah nihin thupha ka hong piakna ding tuni-in note kiangah ka hong gen hi.
"Kuamah, to nih' sila hikhawm theilo hi. Khat mudahin khat it ding a, khat tungah thumanin khat simmawhbawl ding hi. Note in Pasian' na leh leitung sum na na semkhawm zo kei ding uhhi.

Ahi zongin Zeisu in amaute sam a, "Mi a uk Gentail-te in mite tungah aana nei uh a, mi a makai Gentail-te in thuneihna tawh a ukna thu na thei uhhi. 26 Ahi zongin note lakah tua bang hilo ding hi. Note lakah a lian ahi dingte note' nasem hi ding a, 27 note' lakah a lianpen ahi dingte note' sila hi ding hi. 28 Mihing Tapa zong nasem nei dingin hong pai hiloin mi dangte-a' ding na semin, mi tampi tatna ding a si dingin a hong pai ahih mah bangin note zong a tuaci ding na hi uhhi," a ci hi.

"A pil a citak nasem i cih a bangcite ahi hiam? A naseppih dangte ukin a hun manmanin amaute' nekzah ding ciat an a pia dingin a topa in a seh a nasempa a hihi. 46 A topa hong ciah ciangin ama sawl bangin na semin a om a muhpa pen mi hampha mahmah khat a hihi. 47 Ke'n kong genin-ah, ama neihsa khempeuh a uk dingin a topa in tua nasempa a koih ding hi. 48 Ahi zongin tua nasempa nasem hoihlo hi hen la, a lungsim sungah, ‘Ka topa hong ciahhak ding hi,’ ci-in, 49 a naseppih a lawmte satgawp hen la, zukham thei mite tawh anne zune-in na om leh, 50 a topa tung dingin a uploh ni hun khatpeuhin a topa hong tung ding a, 51 a topa in nakpi takin gim pia-in, mihoih a kineihkhemte' gimthuak dingteng thuaksak ding a, amah kapin a hagawi ding hi.

"Inn panin khualzin dingin a paikhia mipa tawh zong kibang hi. Amah in a nasemte samin, a neihsateng a nasemte' kep dingin a ap hi. 15 Amau' siamna tawh kizui-in khat tungah tul nga, khat tungah tul nih, khat tungah tul khat a ap khit ciangin a zinkhia hi. 16 Tul nga a ngahpa in sum bawlna-in zangpah a, a meet tul nga mah a ngahthuah hi. 17 Tul nih a ngahpa in zong a meet tul nih mah a ngahthuah hi. 18 Ahi zongin tul khat a ngahpa in leisung to-in a topa' sum a selcip hi. 19 "Hun sawtpi khit ciangin tua nasemte' topa hong ciahkik a, a nasemte tawh a sum thu a siangsak uhhi. 20 Tul nga a ngahpa in a dang tul nga mah hong tawithuahin, ‘Topa aw, kei tungah tul nga nong ap hi. Hih lai-ah tul nga mah ka meetsak hi,’ hong cih ciangin

Ahi zongin Zeisu in amaute samin, "Leitung mi a ukte in mite tungah aana nei-in, mi a makaite in thuneihna tawh a ukna thu na thei uhhi. 43 Ahi zongin note lakah tua bangin hilo ding hi. Note lakah a lian nuam khat peuhpeuh, adangte khempeuh' nasem hi ding a, 44 a makai ahi nuam khat peuhpeuh, adangte khempeuh' sila hi ding hi. 45 Banghang hiam cihleh Mihing Tapa zong, midangte ama na a semsak dingin a hong pai hilo hi. Midangte' na a sem ding leh mi tampi a tatkhiatna ding ama nuntakna a pia dingin a hong pai ahi zaw hi," a ci hi.

"Gimna a thuak mite tungah Lungdamna Thu a hilh dingin Topa in kei hong sehkhin ahih manin keima sungah Topa' kha hong om hi. Salin a kimante tungah suahtakna thu a gen ding, mittawte in khua a muhkik theihna ding, a kinengniamte a suaktasak ding leh

Topa in, "A pil a citak nasempa i cih a bangcite ahi hiam? A naseppih dangte ukin a hun manmanin amaute' nekzah ding ciat a pia dingin a topa in a seh nasempa a hihi. 43 A topa hong ciah ciangin hih ama sawl bangin a sem a muh nasempa pen mi hampha mahmah a hihi. 44 Ke'n kong cihin-ah, a neihsa khempeuh a uk dingin a topa in tua nasempa koih takpi ding hi. 45 Ahi zongin tua nasempa in a lungsim sungah, ‘Ka topa hong ciahkik hak ding hi,’ ci-in ngaihsunin a naseppih numei leh pasalte satgawp hen la, zukham ankhamin ommawk leh, 46 tua nasempa' topa pen ama upmawhloh ni, a theihkholh loh hunin hong tung ding hi. A topa in nakpi takin amah gim pia ding a, a thumanglo mite tawh a kibangin a thuaksak khawm ding hi.
"To nih' na a semkhawmzo nasem kuamah omlo hi. A to khat mudahin khat it ding a, khat beelin khat a simmawh ding hi. Pasian' na leh leitung sum na na semkhawmzo kei ding uhhi," a ci hi.

"Khatvei, ulian khat om a, kumpi za a lakkhit ciangin a ciahkik dingin gamlapi gamah a pai dingin a dingkhia hi. 13 A din'khiat ma-in ama nasem mihing sawmte sam a, amaute tungah sum za khat ciat pia-in, ‘Ka omloh sungin hih sumte tawh na siam bang bangun sum na bawl ciat un,’ ci-in a vaikhak hi. 14 Ahi zongin ama gammite in hih ulianpa mudah uh ahih manin ama nungah kamtai sawl uh a, ‘Ka kumpi dingun nang kong deih kei uhhi,’ cisak uhhi. 15 "Ahi zongin hih ulianpa kumpi za ngahsa-in hong tun'kik ciangin, sum a ap a nasemte in bangzah ciat a na meetsak uhhiam ci-in a theihna dingin a kiangah a nasemte hong paina dingun thu a pia hi. 16 A nasem khat hong pai masa a, ‘Topa aw, nong sum piak za khat tawh tul khat ka meetsak hi,’ hong ci hi. 17 Amah in, ‘Hoih mahmah hi; nang pen nasem gina na hi hi. Thuneu-ah citak na hih manin khuapi sawm na uk ding hi,’ a ci hi.

Tua ahih manin amah a um Jew mite kiangah Zeisu in, "Ka thuhilhnate na zuih paisuak nak uh leh ka nungzui taktakte na hi ding uhhi. 32 Tua ciangin thuman na thei ding uh a, tua thuman in note hong suaktasak ding hi," a cihleh 33 amaute in, "Kote Abraham' suanlekhakte ka hi uh a, cikmahin kuama salin ka om ngei kei uhhi. Tua ahih manin Banghangin, ‘Note suakta ding,’ hong cithei na hi hiam?" a ci uhhi. 34 Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "A mantakin ci lehang mawhna a bawl mi peuhmah mawhna' sila ahi uhhi. 35 Silate pen innkuan mite tawh omkhawm paisuak lo a, tapa ahih leh om paisuak hi. 36 Tua ahih manin Tapa in note hong khah leh a suakta takpi na hi uhhi.
A mantakin ci lehang, sila pen a topa sangin lianzaw ngeilo a, a kisawlpa zong a sawlpa sangin lianzaw ngeilo hi.

Nasemte in a tote' nasepna bangmah theilo ahih manin note pen nasemte ka hong ci nawn kei ding hi. Ka Pa' tung panin ka zak thu khempeuh note kiangah hong genkhin ka hih manin note, lawm, ka hong ci zaw ding hi.
Pasian kiang panin a hong pai Lungdamna Thu a hilh dingin Pasian' teelna tawh sawltak ahi, Zeisu Christ' sila keimah Paul in lai ka hong khak hi.

Mi khatpeuh' thu a mang dingin ama khutsungah na kipiak uh ciangin a thu na mante uh' sila na hi uhhi. Mawhna na bawl uh leh sihna a thuak ding na hi uh a, thumangin na om uh leh Pasian tawh pawlkhat a suak ding na hi uhhi.

Thukham pen i kha thu tawh kisai hi, ci-in i thei hi. Ahi zongin kei pen leitung pumpi tawh a nungta mi ka hi a, mawhna thu mangin a sal a suak ka hihi. 15 Ka hihnopteng hihkha loin ka hih noplohteng keek mah hih zawsop ka hih manin keima gamtatna mahmah zong ka tel thei kei hi. 16 Ka hih noplohteng ka hih veve ciangin Thukham a deihhuai khat hi, ci-in ka ngaihsutna hong langsak hi. 17 Tua ahih manin tua bangin a gamta taktak pen kei hiloin ka sunga om mawhna hizaw hi.

Note tungah Pasian in a hong piak a Kha Siangtho in note na launa dingun sila-in a hong bawl hilo a, Kha Siangtho in Pasian' tate a hong suaksak ahi zaw hi. Tua Kha Siangtho mah in Pasian pen, "Pa aw, Pa aw," hong ci theisak hi.

Sila ahi mi khat Pasian in a sap leh phamawhlo hi; sila mahin ki-om thei veve hi. Ahi zongin suahtak theihna ding lampi a om leh tua hunhoih hamphatna zang ta hen. 22 Banghang hiam cihleh Topa in a sap sila ahi mi pen Topa-a' dingin mi suakta hi a, tua mah bangin Christ in a sap a suakta mi pen Christ-a' dingin sila a hihi. 23 Note pen Pasian' hong leisa na hih manun mite' sila suak kei un.
Kei pen kuama khutnuai mi hiloin a suakta mi hinapi-in, mi a tam theithei ka ngahzawhna dingin mi khempeuh' khutnuai mi-in ka kibawl hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh kote' hilh thu pen komau' thu hilo a, Christ Zeisu pen Topa ahi hi, ci-in a hilh ka hi uh a, kote pen Christ hangin nomau' na a semte ka hi uhhi.

Christ sungah a kiphum note in Christ' pianzia a nei khinta na hi uhhi. 28 Tua ahih manin Jew mi leh Gentail mi, sila leh sila a hilo, numei leh pasal cih bangin kideidanna om nawnlo a, note khempeuh Christ tawh na kipawlna hangun pawlkhat hi-in, a kibangkim na hi uhhi. 29 Christ tawh na kipawl nak uh leh Abraham' suante na hita uh a, Pasian' hong khap thute a ngah ding na hi uhhi.

Ahi zongin gamhluah ding tapa in a pa' neihsa khempeuh a luah ding hinapi-in a neulai hun sungteng silate mah bangin bangmah thu neilo hi. 2 A pa in ama gamhluah dingteng a piakma, a neulai hun sungteng, midang in tua naupang kemin a vai ding a hawmsak hi. 3 Tua mah bangin eite zong kha thu-ah i neulai hun sungteng huihlak a uk vangneite' khutnuai-ah a om ihi hi. 4 Ahi zongin a hun a cin ciangin eite khempeuh Pasian' tate i suahtheihna dingin Thukham nuai-ah a om mite a hong tankhia dingin Pasian in a Tapa hong paisak a, tua Tapa pen leitung ngeina bangin numei sung panin hong suakin, Jew Thukham sungah hong nungta hi. 5, 6 Note pen ama tate na hihna uh a hong lahna dingin Pasian in ama Tapa' Khasiangtho, eite sungah hong tumsak a, tua Khasiangtho in Pasian pen, "Pa aw, pa aw," hong cisak hi. 7 Tua ahih manin note pen sila hi nawnloin Pasian' tate na hih manun Pasian in ama tate-a' dingin a koih khempeuh, note tungah hong pia ding hi.

Lai Siangtho sungah hih bangin na kigelh hi: Abraham in tapa nih nei a, khat pen a zi' silanu tawh a neih a tapa hi a, a khat pen a zi tawh a neih a tapa a hihi. 23 Silanu tawh a neih a tapa pen leitung ngeina bangin a suak mawkmawk hi a, ahi zongin a zi tawh a neih a tapa pen Pasian' thuciamna tawh kizui-in a suak a hihi. 24 Hihte pen gentehna lim a hihi. Hih nupi nihte pen thuciamna nam nih a lahna a hihi. Sila a suak tate a hingkhia nu Hagar hi a, Sinai Mual tunga kipia thuciamna a lahnopna a hihi.

Ahi zongin Lai Siangtho sungah, "Sila numei' tapa in sila a hilo numei' tapa tawh gamh luahkhawm theilo ding ahih manin, sila numei leh a tapa hawlkhia in," na kici hi. 31 Tua ahih manin sanggamte aw, eite pen sila numei' tate ihi kei a, sila a hilo numei' tate ihi hi.
Christ in eite hong khahkhiat khitna hangin mi suaktate hi khinta ihih manin tua suahtakna thu-ah kipin om unla, sila va suakkik nawn kei un.

Sanggamte aw, note ahih leh a suakta mi ahi dingin Pasian in a hong sap a hihi. Ahi zongin tua suahtakna pen na pumpi uh ut bangbangin gamtat theihna dingin paulam zon'na-in nei kei unla, itna tawh khatlekhat kikhualna-in zangzaw un.

Silate aw, launa leh lin'na tawh na leitung tote uh thu mang unla, Christ' na na sep uh mah bangin lungsim takpi tawh na na sepsak un. 6 A hong pahtak ding uh deihna tawh amaute' muhsung bekin tuaci gamtat kei unla, Christ' sila na hihna hangun Pasian' hong deih bangin lungsim takpi tawh na sem un. 7 Mihingte' na a sem bang lelin kingaihsun loin Topa' na a sem bangin kingaihsun unla, thanopna tawh sem un. 8 Salte ahi a, sal ahilote ahi zongin na hoih a sem mi khempeuh, Topa in thaman a piakding lamtak na thei un. 9 Tote aw, silate in note hong bawl mah bangin note in zong amaute limbawl unla, tawn' gawpgawpnate zang nawn kei un. Note leh na silate uh vantung panin To khat khutnuai-ah a om na hihna uh leh tua Topa in kuamah maitang zahtak tuam neiloin a kibangin mi khempeuh thu a khen ahihna thu na phawk ta un. 10 Tu-a kipanin Topa tawh na kipawlna uh leh ama vangliatna hangin na tha uh khauhsak ta un.

Silate aw, thu khempeuhah na leitung topa uh thu na mang un. Amau' hong pahtak ding deihna tawh a hong muhsung bekin a hoih tatte hi kei unla, Topa na zahtakna uh hangin lungsim tak tawh gamta un. 23 Mite' nasem bangin kingaihsun loin, Pasian' nasem bangin kingaihsun unla, na sep peuhpeuh uh lungsim takpi tawh lawpin sem un. 24 Topa in note tungah thaman a hong piakding lamtak phawk gige un. Tua bangin na sepna uhah Christ Topa' na a semsem na hi uhhi.
Tote aw, note in zong vantungah To khat na neihna uh phawk unla, na silate uh a kilawm a kituakin bawl un.
Banghang hiam cihleh Laisiangtho in, "Buh a cil bawngtal muk na tuam kei in," a cih banah, "Nasempa in a thaman a ngahding a kilawm ahi hi," na ci hi.

Kuamah in Pasian' min leh i thuhilhnate hong gensiatsak lohna dingin sila khempeuh in a tote uh zahtakbawl ta uh hen. 2 Thu um mi to-in a nei silate in upna sungah sanggam khat hi hang, ci-in ngaihsutna tawh a tote uh zahtakbawl loin omkha kei uh hen. Amaute' nasepna hangin hamphatna a ngah mite pen thu um mi leh a it uh mite ahih manin a hoihzaw-in a sepsak ding uh a kilawmzaw a hihi.

Silate in zong a tote uh thu mangin, thu khempeuhah a tote uh a lungkimsakna ding, a tote uh thu seelloin, 10 a guktaklohna ding, a tawntungin hoih gamtatin a cihtakna uh a kilatsakna dingun na hanthawn in. Tua hi leh eite hong Hon Pasian' thu a hoihna a kilangsakte ahi ding uh a hihi.

Tate a cih mite pen leitung cilesa a nei mite ahih manin, ama sihna hangin sihna a uk Dawimangpa a sukgawp theihna dingin Zeisu in mihing pian'zia mah hong nei phot hi. 15 Tua ahih manin sihna a kihtak manin sal bangin a om mite amah in hong suaktasak hi.
Pasian leh Topa Zeisu Christ sila keimah James in Leitung mun khempeuhah kithehthangin a om minam sawmlenihte tungah hopihna lai ka hong gelh hi.

Sila a hilo mi bangin gamta unla, ahi zongin gitloh gamtatna dingin na suahtakna uh zang loin Pasian' sila bangin na gamtazaw un. 17 Mi khempeuh zahtak bawlin thu uppih mite na it unla, Pasian zahtak bawlin kumpipa zong na zahtak un. 18 Nasemte aw, na tote uh thu na mang un. A thudik a migi na tote bek uh a zahtak hiloin a gilo na tote uh thu zong na mang un.
Amaute pen siatna a piangsak thei zongsatna lelin sila hinapi-un mite tungah suahtakna ding thu a gen uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh mite pen, a hong zo peuhpeuhte' sila ihi hi.
Tua ganhing in a lian a neu, a hau a zawng, sila leh sila a hilo, mi khempeuh in a taklam khut tung uh ahih kei leh a taltang uhah ciamtehna a neihna dingun thu a pia hi.
"Na gamsung uhah note lakah khualmi khat hong peem leh, ama tungah a manloin na gamta kei ding uhhi.
{ Topa' } vantung mi in ama kiangah, "Banghangin na la thumvei dong sat na hi hiam? En in, hih na khualzinna-ah lungkimlo ka hih manin nang hong pang dingin kong kuankhia hi.
{ Topa } in amah ta neisaklo ahih manin amah a el a zipih in amah nakpi takin phin zel, hehsak zel hi.

Ama zomah Harar mi Agee' tapa Shammah a hihi. Besan a dimna mun Lehi-ah Filistia-te kikaikhawm uh a, Filistia-te' kiang panin mite tai uhhi. 12 Ahih hangin amah in tua munah pan'mun la-in hu a, Filistia-te that a, { Topa } in gualzawhna lianpi a piangsak hi.

Amah tua lai panin Bethel-ah paito hi. Lampi-ah a paitoh laitakin khuapi panin naupangneu pawlkhat hong paikhia-in amah zahko uh a, "Paito in, nang lukolhpa" a ci uhhi. 24 Tua ciangin amah a kiimah khuadak a, amah in amaute a muh ciangin { Topa' } min tawh amaute a samsia hi. Tua ciangin gamlak panin vompi nih hong pai-in naupang sawmlenih balnen hi.
Sanballat in kote' kulh cian'na thu a zak ciangin lungkim loin heh mahmah a, ko Jew mite hong zahko hi.

Nopna a neih theihna dingin nuntakna leh khan'sau a deih kua ahi hiam? 13 Siatna ding panin na leii kem in la, zuau genna panin na muk kem in. 14 Siatna panin kihemkhia in la, a hoih bawl in. Kilemna ding hanciam in la, na phak mateng delh in.

{ Topa } aw, bang tanvei hong enkhong ding na hi hiam? Amau' hong sukgawpna panin keimah hong honkhia in la, humpinelkaite kiang panin kei hong hon in. 18 Tua ciangin mihon kikhopna lian sungah nangma tungah lungdamna ka hong ko ding a, mihonpite lak panin nang ka hong phat ding hi. 19 A manlopi-a ka gal a hite kei tungah lungdamsak kei in la, thu omlopi-a kei hong mudahte, mitheek kipiasak kei in. 20 Banghang hiam cihleh amaute in kilemna thu genlo uh a, daitakin a om mite langpangin, khemna thu ngaihsun uhhi. 21 Amaute in kei hong kamkat beba uh a, amaute in, "Ha, Ha! Mu khin hang ei!" ci uhhi. 22 { Topa } aw, na mu khin hi; dai ommawk ke'n! { Topa } aw, kei kiang panin gamla om ke'n! 23 Ka Topa, ka Pasian aw, ka thu hong thei in la, kei-a' dingin nangmah hong kisosuah tawm in! 24 Ka { Topa, } ka Pasian aw, na thumanna tawh a kituakin keima thutan'na hong langsak in la, keima gimna-ah amaute lungdamsak ke'n! 25 Amau leh amau tungah, "Ha, i tuptup tung ei!" kicisak kei in. "Amah nawmvalhtum khin hang," amaute cisak kei in. 26 Kei' kamsiatna-ah a lungdamte maizumsak in la, zahhuaigawp sak in! Kei tungah a hong kiliansakte maizumna leh mindaina thuaksak in! 27 Kei thutang ka hihna lahkhiat ding a deihte lungdamin awngin, kipaksak in la, "A nasempa' hoihna-ah a lungkim { Topa } lian hi," cici sak in. 28 Tua ciangin na thumanna leh nangmah phatna sunthapai-in ka gengen ding hi.
A ginalo mite leh a cimawh mite hon unla, migilote' khutsung panin amaute honkhia un," a ci hi.

{ Topa } in a muhdah, a khahkhong ngeiloh ding, thu guk, tua zah bek hilo, thu sagih tak om a, tuate pen 17 kihihsakna, zuauthu genna, mawhneilo mi thahna, 18 thusia bawl ding ngaihsutna, gamtatsiat ding a manlangte,19 zuauthu gen teci manlote, leh kitotna a piangsakte a hihi.
Muhdahna in kitotna piangsak a, itna in mawhna khempeuh maisak hi.
Ngaihsun lo-a kampauna in tem hiam bangin mi liamsak thei a, mipilte' kampauna in tua bang liamna damsak thei hi.
Mi a simmawh theite in pilna a zon' uh hangin ngah zolo uh a, thungaihsun theite in olno takin ngah thei uhhi.
Mizawngte bawlsiatna pen a piangsak Pasian simmawhna hi a, mizawngte tungah citna pen Pasian zahtakna a hihi.
Kam nemin dawn'na in hehna damsak a, kam khauh in hehna piangsak hi.
A zawngte a simmawhpa in amah a Piangsakpa a simmawh hi a, midangte' tuahsiatna-ah a lungdam mipa in gim thuak hamtang ding hi.
Mi' khialhna a maisakte midangte in itin lawm hau uh a, mi' khialhna ciamtehna pen lawm taanna a hihi.
Kitot i kipat ciangin tui lipi cin'na phung kehsakkhak tawh kibang hi. Tua ahih manin a nasiat ma-in kitot khawlpak in.
Kampauna in sihna ahi a, hin'na ahi zongin piangsak thei a, i kampauna bangin a piangte san'loh phamawh hi.
Mi kiphasakte hawlkhia lecin kitotna leh kisimmawhna bei pah ding hi.

Nangma tungah a heh mite khempeuh maizumna kithuaksakin kikoihkhong ding hi. Nangmah hong dem mite a mawkna suakin siatna thuak ding uhhi. 12 Nangmah hong langpangte na zon' hangin amaute na mu nawn kei ding hi. Nangmah hong dote pen bangmah hi hetlo ding uhhi. 13 Banghang hiam cihleh keimah { Topa } na Pasian in na khut taklam ka len hi. "Lau kei in, nangmah kong huh ding hi," nang tungah a hong cipa keimah ka hihi.

{ Topa } in, "Kei, keimah pen note hong hehnempa ka hihi. Lopa sangin sauvei a nungta zaw tuanlo, mihing lellelte, Banghangin kihta na hi uhhiam? 13 Vantungte zalin, lei bulpite a koih, note a hong bawl { Topa} hong mangngilh khinta na hi uhhiam? Note susia dingin a kithawi, no a hong nengniamte' hehna, Banghangin kihta-in lau tawntung na hi uhhiam? Amaute' hehna in note hong susiazo hetlo ding hi.
Thuman leh thutang in nang hong thahatsak ding hi. Nenniamna tawh na kigamla ding a, nang na lau kei ding hi. Kihtakna tawh na kigamla ding a, nangma nai-ah tuate hong pailo ding hi.
"Midangte in keima hangin a manlopi-in hong simmawhin hong bawlsia a, a nam tuamtuamin hong gensiat uh ciangin thupha ngah mi na hi uhhi.

Ahi zongin ke'n note kiangah kong genin-ah: A sanggampa tungah a heh mi in thukhenna thuakkha thei ding hi. A sanggampa kiangah, ‘Bangmah-a kimang lo,’ ci-in a ko bawl mi in uliante mai-ah thusitna thuak thei ding a, a sanggampa kiangah, ‘Mi hai,’ ci-in a simmawh mi in hell meikuang sungah khulna thuak thei ding hi.

"Note in, ‘Mittang khat tangding mittang khat, ha khat tangding ha khat,’ ci-in a kigenna na zaksa uh a hihi. 39 Ahi zongin note kiangah ke'n kong genin-ah: A gilote na thukkik kei un. Mi khatpeuh in na paang taklam hong bet leh a langkhat zong na dawh lai zaw in. 40 Mi khatpeuh in na puansungsilh a ngahnop manin zumah hong khia-in hong laksak leh na puantungsilh zong na piathuah lai in. 41 Galkapte khatpeuh in tai khat sung a van pua dingin hong sawl leh a valin tai khat sung mah na puaksak lai in. 42 Mi khat peuhpeuh in na khat peuhpeuh hong nget leh na pia in la, nang kiang panin na a hong leitawi mite na pia in. 43 "Note in, ‘Na vengte uh na it unla, na galte uh na mudah un,’ ci-in a kigenna thu na zaksa uh a hihi. 44 Ahi zongin ke'n note kiangah kong genin-ah: Na galte uh na it unla, no hong bawlsiate-a' dingin thu na ngetsak un. 45 Tua hi leh vantungah a om na Pa uh tate na hi thei ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh amah in mihoihte leh misiate tungah a kibangin ni taangsak khawm a, a gamtat phate leh a gamtat siate tungah zong a kibang mahin guah zusak khawm hi. 46 Tua ahih manin no hong itte bek na it uh leh Pasian in bang thaman hong pia zenzen ding ahi hiam? Siahdongte nangawn in amau a itte it thei uhhi. 47 Na lawmte bek uh hopihin thupha na piak uh leh mi mawkmawkte sangin na hoihzawkna uh bang om ahi hiam? Gentail mite nangawn in tua bang ciang lel hih thei uhhi. 48 Tua ahih manin vantungah a om na Pa uh a cingtaak mah bangin note zong lungsim citakin na cingtaakna ding uh na hanciam un.

"Pasian in note hong mawhsak lohna dingin midangte va mawhsaksak nawn kei un. 2 Banghang hiam cihleh midangte' thu na khenzia uh tawh kizui-in note tungah hong khen ding a, midangte tungah na zat uh ngeina mah note tungah hong zang ding hi. 3 Banghangin na lawmte' mit sunga ninthem tang muhsak thei napi-in nangma mit sunga singluang tang phawk theilo na hi hiam? 4 Nangma mit sungah singluang a tang kimlai, bangci-in na lawmte kiangah, ‘Na mit sunga ninthem tang hong lakkhiatsak ning,’ ci thei ding na hi hiam? 5 No a kineihkhem mite aw, note' mit sunga singluang tang lakhia masa le uh cin, na lawmte uh mit sunga ninthem tang na lakkhiat theihna dingun hoihtakin khua na mu thei pan ding uhhi.
Tua ahih manin note tungah hong kibawl ding na deih bangun midangte tungah na bawl un. Moses Thukhamte leh kamsangte' thuhilhnate pen hih mah a deihna a hihi.
Zeisu in, "Mi khatpeuh in kei hong um hih naupangno khat a khialsak ding ahih leh a ngawngah an gawina suang lianpi khat kikhihin tuipi sungah kikhia leh ama-a' dingin hoihzaw thampek hi.
A nihna in: Nangma pumpi na it bangin na vengte na it in, cihna a hihi. Hihte gel sangin thukham a lianzaw a dang om nawnlo hi," ci-in a dawng hi.

"Ahi zongin ka thugen a za note kiangah kong cihin-ah: Na galte uh na it unla, no hong mudah mite tungah a pha na bawl un. 28 No hong phuisamte thupha na pia unla, no hong bawlsiate-a' ding thu na ngetsak un. 29 Na paang langkhat a hong bengte, a langkhat zong na dawhlai un. Na puantungsilh uh a hong sutte tungah, na puansungsilh uh zong na piathuah lai un. 30 A hong ngente peuhmah na pia un la, na na uh a hong laksakte tung panin lakik kei un. 31 Note tungah a hong kibawl ding na deih uh bangin midangte tungah na bawl un.
Amaute in Zeisu kiangah dong teitei uh ahih manin amah zong dingin amaute kiangah, "Note lakah mawhna a nei hetlopa in deng masa un," a cih khit ciangin,
"Note tungah ka hong piak thu in: Note ka hong it zahin note khatlekhat na ki-it un.

Keimah tawh na hong kipawlna uh hangin lungnopna na neihtheihna dingun hih thu a hong gen ka hihi. Leitung gimna na thuak ding uhhi. Ahi zongin keimah in leitung nate zo khinta ka hih manin lungnuamin om un," a ci hi.

Hih bangin Zeisu a pau ciangin biakinncing palikte khat in Zeisu beng a, "Banghangin hih bangin siampi lianpenpa tungah kampau ngam na hi hiam?" a ci hi. 23 Ahi zongin Zeisu in, "A manloin kampau khial ka hih leh ka khialhna hong lak in. Ka thugen a man ahih manin Banghangin hong beng zenzen na hi hiam?" ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua ahih ciangin midangte' thu a khen note pen kuakua hita le uh cin na suakta tuan kei ding uhhi. Midangte na mawhsakna uh thute mah note zong gamta veve na hih manun no zong a mawh mah na hi uhhi.

Tua ahih manin bang in Christ' itna tawh hong kikhensakzo ding ahi hiam? Haksatna, lungkhamna, bawlsiatna, gilkialna, zawn'na, lauhuaina, sihnate khat peuhpeuh in hong khenzo ding ahi hiam? 36 Laisiangtho sungah zong, "Note hangin sunthapai-in siatna ding lauhuaina ka thuak uh a, gawhding tuu bangin a hong kibawl hi," ci-in a kigelh hi. 37 Eite a hong itpa' hangin hih thu khempeuhah a gualzo pente ihi hi.

Leitung mihingte' gamtat bangin gamta kei unla, na lungsim uh kikheelin Pasian kipuahpha sak un. Tua hi leh a hoih nate bang hi a, bangte in amah lungkim sakin, bangte a kicing hiam ci-in thei-in Pasian' deihna na phawk thei ding uhhi.
No a hong bawlsia mite, Pasian in thupha a piakna dingin thu ngetsak unla, tua bang mite samsia loin thupha piazaw un.

Midangte' gitlohnate thukkik kei unla, mi khempeuh in hoih hi, ci-in a ngaihsut ding bangin gamta un. 18 Ahih theih laiteng mi khempeuh tawh na kilemna dingun hanciam un. 19 Lawmte aw, na hehna uh kuama tungah thukkik kei unla, Pasian' thukkik dingin koih lel un. Banghang hiam cihleh Laisiangtho sungah, "Keimah in amaute tungah ka thuk ding a, midangte a gimsak bangun ka gimsak ding hi, Topa in ci hi," ci-in kigelh hi. 20 Tua ahih ciangin Laisiangtho sungah, "Na galte uh a gil a kial leh an na pia un. A dang a taak leh tui na pia un. Tua bangin na gamtat uh leh amaute' maizumna dingin a bawl na hi uhhi," ci-in a kigelh bangin gamtazaw un.
Tua ahih ciangin Christ in note hong san' mah bangin midangte in Pasian a phattheihna dingun note khatlekhat na kisang un.
Note na hi uh a, leitung mite in ahi zongin kei tungah mawhna hong zongin thu nong khen uh hangin bangmah phamawh ka sa kei hi. Keimahmah zong kimawhsakin thu ka kikhen kei hi.
Na sepna khempeuh uhah ki-itna tawh na gamta un.
Na kiho uh ciangin kamguh zang kei unla, na pauna uh a za mite in phattuamna a ngahtheihna dingin na-in a kimang kam hoihte bek na pau un.
Hih bang mawhnate i bawl hangin phamawh kei, ci-in a mawk gen mite' khemsa-in ta kei un. Pasian thu mangloin hih bangin a gamta mite in Pasian' hehna a thuak ding uh a hihi.
Huaihamna lungsim leh kisialh nopna lungsim tawh bangmah gamta kei un. Kiniamkhiat ciat unla, midangte thupi ngaihsutzaw un.

Nitawp ni hun pen a lauhuai hun ahih ding lamtak phawk in. 2 Tuahun ciangin mite in amau angsung ding bek ngaihsunin, huaihamin, kisialin, kihisakin, mi zahko-in, nu leh pate' thu mangloin, lungdam theihna mel neiloin, biakna lungsim neiloin, 3 mi khualloin, hehpihna neiloin, mi gensia-in, ngongtatin, kihtakhuai-in, thuhoih deihloin, 4 ciampelin, thu khualloin, kiphasak gawpin, Pasian donloin pumpi nopsakna bek deihin,

A tawpna-ah kong gennop thu in: Lungsim leh ngaihsutna kikhat nei-in unau ki-itna lungsim nei unla, migi-in kiniamkhiat un. 9 Hong bawlsiate siatna tawh thukkik loin hong samsia mite samsia kik kei unla, Pasian in note a hong sap lai-in thupha a hong piak dingin hong ciamsa ahih manin, hong siat bawlte thupha tawh na thukzaw un.
Note in a hoih gamtat ding utin hanciam le uh cin kua in hong bawlsia ding ahi hiam?
Mi khatpeuh in khuavak gamtatna ka gamta hi, ci napi-in a Christian mipihte a muhdah leh khuamial gamtatna mah a gamta lai a hihi.
A Christian mipih a mudah mi peuhmah mi that hi a, mi thatte in nuntak tawntungna a neihlohna thu na thei uhhi.

A lian a neu misite tua tokhom mai-ah dingin laibute a kilem ka mu hi. Tua ciangin a nungta mite a kigelhna laibu a dang khat zong a kilem ka mu hi. Amaute' gamtatna tua laibute sungah a kigelhna tawh kizui-in misite tungah thu a kikhen hi.
Amaute' mit panin khitui khempeuh nulsak ding hi. Thu luisate maimang khinta ahih manin sihna, dahna, leh na sa-a kahna cihte om nawnlo ding hi," a ci hi.
Ahi zongin a meidawite, a lehtatte, a lampialte, mi thatte, a paktatte, aisante, milim biate, leh zuaugente omna ding mun pen sihna nihna ahi kat a kikhulna meiphualpi kuang sung ahi hi," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Kei ka hong pai baihta ding a, mi khempeuh a gamtatna uh tawh kizui-in a thaman ding uh ka hong puak ding hi.
Note tawh a om, a zawng keima mite khat peuhpeuh tungah sum leitawi na piak uh leh, ama tungah sum leitawi a piapa bangin na om kei ding uh a, ama tung panin a meet na dok kei ding uhhi.

Topa na Pasian un note hong piak gam sunga na khuate uh khat peuhpeuh sungah na sanggam khat uh note lakah a zawng a om leh na lungsim uh khauhsak loin, na sanggam zawngpa uh huhloin na om kei ding uhhi.
Na sanggampa tungah sumgum hita leh, ankhing hita leh, a meet ngaihsutna-in na khat peuhpeuh leitawi na pia kei ding uhhi.
"‘A vengpa' gisuang a botkhia mipa in gimna ngah ta hen,’ ci ding uhhi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in, ‘Amen,’ ci ding uhhi.

Note' leitangah ama hunin guah a zusak ding leh na sepna khempeuh uh thupha a pia dingin Topa in a na hoih kholna vantung note hong hon' ding hi. Note in minam tampite tungah leitawi na pia ding uh a, ahih hangin note in leitawi na la kei ding uhhi.
Topa in zawngsakin hausak a, amah in niamkhiat sukin, zong sangtosak hi.

Pasian in Solomon dawngin, "Hih thu na lungsim sungah om a, nangmah in neihsate, hauhna, pahtawina, ahih kei leh nang hong mudahte' nuntakna hong ngenloin, a tungah kumpi-in nang kong koihna ka mite na uk theihna dingin nang-a' ding pilna leh theihna hong ngen na hih manin, 12. pilna leh theihna nangma tungah hong kipia hi. Nang' ma-a kumpite kuamah in a neih ngeiloh, nang' khit-ate kuamah in zong tua bang a neihloh ding hauhnate, neihnate, leh pahtawina zong, nangma tungah kong pia thuah ding hi," a ci hi.
Migilote' hauhna sangin thuman mite in tawmno khat bek a neihna hoihzaw lai hi. 17 Banghang hiam cihleh migilote' thahatna kipaih khiatsak ding a, ahih hangin, Topa, in mihoihte a huh hi.
Na neihsa leh na anpalte tawh Topa zahtak in.
Thadahna in zawn'na hi a, thanuamna in hauhna hi.
Mi pawlkhat in sum zang ziahziah napi-in hau semsem uh a, mi pawlkhat cil mahmah napi, zawng semsem hi. 25 A cingh mite hau semsem ding a, midang a huhte in huhna mah ngahkik ding hi.
Tuk lai-a singteh tam bangin midikte' hauhna khang ding a, phalbi lai-a singteh pulh bangin hauhna a suangte kiam ding uhhi.
Midikte in a tu a tate' luah ding gamh nei uh a, mawhneite' neihsate ahih leh midikte-a' ding hi lel hi.
Bawngtal om kei leh lo panin an tawm bek kila a, bawngtal tha tawh an a kihau a hihi.
Thuman loin hauhna sangin thumanin tawmno neihna a hoihzaw a hihi.
Kham sangin pilna hoihzaw a, ngun sangin thutheihna deihhuai zaw hi.
Mihaipa in thu ngaihsun theilo ahih manin pilna zon'na ding sum tampi a zat hangin a phattuamna omlo hi.
Mihaute in lawm mu thuahthuah a, mizawngte in a neihsun teng nangawn khahsuahsuah uhhi.
Mi khempeuh in a sanggam zawngpa uh mudah ciat ahih manin a lawmte in a taisatna a thu lamdang hilo hi.
{ Topa } a zahtakte a khan' sau a, lungkim takin nuamsa-in om uh a, siatna bangmah tuak khalo uhhi.
Tawisuang nam nih leh piciang nam nih zangin mi khemna pen { Topa } in a deihlohna kibang hi.
A baih lamin hauhpakna pen a tawpna-ah phattuamna omlo hi.
Zuaugenna tawh hauhnate beimang pak a, sihna khuk sung hong tun'pih hi.
Mipilpa' innsungah neihlelam a dimin om a, ahi zongin mihaipa in a ngahzahzah zangkhia pah hi.
Hauhna sangin min hoihna deihhuai zaw a, kham leh ngun sangin mi' hong thusimna deihhuai zaw hi.
A hau a zawng a kilamdan'na omlo a, a nih tuakun { Topa' } bawlsa ahi uhhi.
Mihaute in mizawngte uk a, leitawi a late pen a piate' sila a suak hi.
Hauhnop manin mihaute letsong pia leeng kizawn'lawh a, hauhnop manin mizawngte' neihsa laksak lehang zong kihauhlawh tuanlo hi.
Hauhnop man bekin sum' sila suak kei unla, a manloin gamtakha kei un.5 Na ngahsa uh sumte mitphiat kalin beimang thei a, muvanlai bangin thakhatin lengmang thei hi.
Na tuuhonte hoihtakin thei in la, na bawnghonte hoihtakin kem in. 24 Bang hang hiam cih leh neihsa kip tawntung lo a, hauhna pen a khangkhangin kizom suak lo hi.
A citak mipa in thupha tampi ngah ding a, a hau baih nuam mipa in gim tuak pelmawh ding hi.

Sum deihna lungsim na neih leh lungkim hun cih na thei ngei kei ding hi. Na hauhnop hangin na deih khempeuh na ngah ngei kei ding hi. Hih pen a mawknapi a hihi. 11 Hau semsem lecin na vak ding mi tam semsem a, a hau zaw hi'ng, ci-a na theih bek cih simloh bangmah phattuamna na ngah kei hi. 12 Na a sem mipa pen a nek ding nei ta leh nei ta kei leh lungnuam takin ihmu thei a, a haute ahih leh lungnuam takin ihmu theilo uhhi. 13 A hoih hetlo na khat hih leitungah ka mu hi: Mite amau' lunggimna dingin hau uhhi. 14 Na a sep khialh manun a neihsa teng uh suplawh uh a, a tu a tate' luah ding bangmah om nawnlo hi. 15 I nute' sung panin bangmah neiloin guaktangin i suah mah bangin guaktang mahin i ciahkik hi. I sepsate I ciahpihkik theih bangmah omlo hi.
Sum in hong lungmuan'sak bangin pilna in zong hong lungmuangsak hi. Pilna a manphatna, a pilte a nuntaksak theihna a hihi.
Sumbawlna dingin na sumte zang in. Ni khat ni peuh teh a meet na ngah ding hi.
Tui tampi nangawn tawh kisumit zolo a, tui sungah i phumcip hangin mitzo tuanlo hi. Mi khat in a neihsa sum khempeuh tawh itna a lei dingin hong kithawi leh kinuihsan lel ding hi.
Thumanlopi tawh a hau mi pen ama tui lopi a keuhsak dingin a opsim vasa tawh kibang hi. A khan'lai-in a neihsa teng taan ding a, a tawpna-ah mihaipi a suak ding hi.

Note in na lungsim sung uhah, "I ante i zuak theihna dingin zumkhak hun bei ding i ngaklah hi. I mangbuhte i zuaktheihna dingin cik ciangin Sabbath ni bei ding ahi hiam? I antehna seu neuseekin sum tampi i ngen nuam a, tawikhaina manlo zangin a hong leite i khem nuam hi. 6 Khedap bu khat man dingin mizawngte sila-in i zuak nuam a, i mangbuh hoihlote sum tampi i khawng nuam hi," na ci uhhi. 7 { Topa, } Israel Pasian kiciam a, "Na gamtatsiatnate uh ka mangngilh ngei kei ding hi.

Tua ciangin kei zong amaute kiangah, "Hoih na sak uh leh ka tuucin' thaman hong pia un. Hoih na sak kei uh leh lah tang lel un," ka ci hi. Tua ciangin ka thaman dingin ngun shekel sawmthum hong pia uhhi. 13 Tua ciangin { Topa } in kei kiangah, "Biakinn sumkoihna sungah tuate koih in," hong ci hi. Tua ciangin kei zong, kei tawh kituakin tam a sak mahmah uh tua dangka sawmthum la-in biakinn sumkoihna sungah ka koih hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh na sum omna uhah na lungsim uh om tawntung ding hi.
"Kuamah, to nih' sila hikhawm theilo hi. Khat mudahin khat it ding a, khat tungah thumanin khat simmawhbawl ding hi. Note in Pasian' na leh leitung sum na na semkhawm zo kei ding uhhi.

Cinate damsakin, misite hingsakin, miphakte damsakin, dawite va hawlkhia un. Man piak kulloin hih vangliatna na ngah uh bangin hih vangliatna na zatna uhah zong man va ngen kei un. 9 Kham ahi a, ngun ahi a, sumngo ahi zongin sum peuhmah na ip sung uhah keng kei un. 10 Khualzinna-ah an ngenin puakna ding ip ahi a, khedap ahi a, ciangkhut ahi zongin keng kei unla, puanak zong a val kengthuah kei un. Nasem mite pen amau sapnateng mite in a piak ding a ngeina a hihi.

Lingbulsum omna leilakah a tu khaicite pen Pasian' thu za napi-in amau nuntakna sung uhah leitung lunghihmawhna leh hauh nopnate in Pasian' thu vuknelh ahih manin bangmah a suakkhia zolote a cihnopna a hihi.

Vantung ki-ukna pen lolai-ah a kiseel sum tawh kibang hi. Mi khat in a muh ciangin limtakin a seelpha hi. Amah lungdam mahmahin a inn-ah ciahpah a, a neih khempeuh a zuak khit ciangin tua lo a lei hi.

Zeisu in, "Mi cingtaak na hihnop leh pai-in na neihsate va zuak in la, na sum khotte, mizawngte tungah va pia lecin, vantungah sum na hau ding hi. Tua ciangin hong pai in la kei hong zui in," a ci hi.
Keima sum pen keima ut bangin ka zattheih ding hilo ahi hiam? Tua ahih kei leh kei ka cit manin na heh suak ahi hiam?’ a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Pasian biakna innpi huang sungah Zeisu lut a, tua sungah van zuak van lei-a a om mi khempeuh a hawlkhia hi. Sumkhek nasemin a om mite' sabuai leh vakhu zuakte' tutnate a lumletsak gawp hi. 13 Amaute kiangah, "Pasian in Laisiangtho sungah, ‘Ka inn pen thungetna inn kici ding hi,’ ci napi-in, note in guktakna phualpi na suaksak uhhi," a ci hi.
amaute in, "Sisar' lim leh a min kigelh hi," a ci uhhi. Tua ciangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, "Sisar' nate Sisar' tungah na pia unla, Pasian' nate Pasian' tungah na pia un," a ci hi.

"Inn panin khualzin dingin a paikhia mipa tawh zong kibang hi. Amah in a nasemte samin, a neihsateng a nasemte' kep dingin a ap hi. 15 Amau' siamna tawh kizui-in khat tungah tul nga, khat tungah tul nih, khat tungah tul khat a ap khit ciangin a zinkhia hi. 16 Tul nga a ngahpa in sum bawlna-in zangpah a, a meet tul nga mah a ngahthuah hi. 17 Tul nih a ngahpa in zong a meet tul nih mah a ngahthuah hi. 18 Ahi zongin tul khat a ngahpa in leisung to-in a topa' sum a selcip hi. 19 "Hun sawtpi khit ciangin tua nasemte' topa hong ciahkik a, a nasemte tawh a sum thu a siangsak uhhi. 20 Tul nga a ngahpa in a dang tul nga mah hong tawithuahin, ‘Topa aw, kei tungah tul nga nong ap hi. Hih lai-ah tul nga mah ka meetsak hi,’ hong cih ciangin 21 a topa in, ‘Hoih mahmah hi; a hoih a citak nasempa aw, a tawmno na zekna-ah siam na hih manin a tampi tak ka hong zeksak ding hi. Hong pai in; kei tawh nuamsa khawm ni,’ a ci hi. 22 Tua ciangin tul nih a ngahpa zong hong pai-in, ‘Topa aw, kei tungah tul nih nong ap hi. Hih lai-ah tul nih mah ka na meetsak hi,’ hong cih ciangin 23 a topa in, ‘Hoih mahmah hi; a hoih a citak nasempa aw, a tawmno na zekna-ah siam na hih manin a tampi tak ka hong zeksak ding hi. Hong pai in; kei tawh nuamsa khawm ni,’ a ci hi. 24 Tul khat a ngahpa zong hong pai-in, ‘Topa aw, nang pen na seploh na bawl lohnapi-ah na a deih, mi genhak mahmah na hihna ka hong thei hi. 25 Tua ahih manin ka hong kihta a, leisungah na sum tul khat ka seel hi. Tu-in hih lai-ah na sumzah mah om hi,’ a hong cih ciangin 26 a topa in, ‘A hoihlo, a thadah nasempa aw, ka seploh ka bawl lohnapi-ah ka deihlam hong thei na hih leh, 27 sumkholna-ah ka sum na koihsak lecin hoih ding hi. Tua hi leh tu-a ka hong tun'kik ciangin a bulpi leh a meet ka ngahkhawm ding hi. 28 Tua ahih manin ama tung panin a tul khat laksak unla, tul sawm a neipa tungah piathuah un. 29 Banghang hiam cihleh a neisate kipiathuah ding a, hau semsem ding hi. Ahi zongin a neilote tung panin a neihsa sunsun nangawn kilaksak ding hi. 30 Bangmahin a kimanglo hih nasempa ahih leh pualam khuamialna lakah lawnkhia un. Tua lai-ah kapin a hagawi ding hi,’ ci hi.
Ahi zongin siampite in tua ngun peekte tawm uh a, "Hih sumte pen mi thahna dingin a kipia sum ahih manin biakinn sumkholna-ah koihdingin kilawmlo hi," a ci uhhi.

Amaute in zong dangka peek khat hong paipih uh a, tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Hih dangka tunga om kua' lim hi a, kua' min ahi hiam?" ci-in a dot ciangin, "Rom Kumpipa Sisar' lim leh a min ahi hi," ci-in a dawng uhhi.

Biakinn sumpi khiatna kuang gei-ah Zeisu tu a, mihonte in sumpi a khiat laitakun a en hi. A haute in tampipi hong khia uhhi. 42. A zawng meigong numei khat zong hong pai a, sumnen tang nih hong khia hi. 43. Tua ciangin a nungzuite sam a, "Adangte khempeuh sangin hih mizawng meigongnu in tam khia zaw hi. 44. Banghang hiam cihleh adangte in a neihval a lamval sung panun a khia uh ahi hi; ahi zongin amah zawng mahmah napi-in ama kivakna ding nangawn sitloin a neih khempeuh a khiakhin ahi hi," a ci hi.

Galkap pawlkhatte in zong ama kiangah, "Kote, bangci gamtat ding ka hi uhhiam?" ci-in a dot uh ciangin, "Zawhthawh thu tawh ahi a, a manlopi-in mawhsakna tawh ahi zongin kuama sum sut kei unla, na khasum ngahzah uh tawh lungkim un," ci-in a dawng hi.
Mi khat in leitung khempeuh a ngah hangin a nuntakna bulpi suplawh leh bang phattuamna om ding ahi hiam?

Tua ciangin Zeisu in amaute khempeuh kiangah, "Hoihtakin kidawm unla, na huaiham lohna dingun kikem un. Banghang hiam cihleh bangzahta-in mi khat a hauh hangin a neihsa tawh a nuntakna taktak kicing zolo hi," a ci hi.

Na neihsa uh zuak unla, mizawngte tungah tua sumte na pia un. Note-a' dingin a sia theilo sumkholna na bawl unla, gutate in a luh zawhlohna, leikha in zong a nek zawhlohna, cikmahin a kiam ngei hetlohna ding mun vantungah na sumte uh na khol un.
Hih leitung sumte-ah na cihtak kei uh leh kua in no tungah vantung sum hong ap ngam ding ahi hiam?

"To nih' na a semkhawmzo nasem kuamah omlo hi. A to khat mudahin khat it ding a, khat beelin khat a simmawh ding hi. Pasian' na leh leitung sum na na semkhawmzo kei ding uhhi," a ci hi. 14. Sum a deih phadiak Pharisee mite in hih thute a zak uh ciangin Zeisu a nuihsan uhhi. 15. Zeisu in amaute kiangah, "Mite in note a man penin hong ngaihsut theihna dingin na om uh a, ahi zongin Pasian in na lungsimtawng uh a hong thei hi. Banghang hiam cihleh mihingte in a manpha mahmahin a ngaihsutte pen Pasian in bangmahin simlo hi.

Inn ahi a, lo ahi zongin a neite in zuak uh a, a sum ngahte uh sawltakte kiangah a ap uhhi. Mi khempeuh tungah a kisapna bang ciatun a sumte hawm uh ahih manin amaute lakah sum kitangsam kuamah omlo uhhi.

Tua khit ciangin thu um mi hong tam tektek a, Jew mite leh Grik pau a zang Jew mite kikalah kiphunsanna thu hong om hi. Grik pau a zang Jew mite in, "Annek tuidawn, sumlepai hawmna-ah ka meigong numeite uh hong kipiaksak lo hi," ci-in lungkimlo uhhi. 2 Tua ahih manin sawltak sawmlenihte in thu um mi khempeuh samin kaikhawm uh a, "Kote in Pasian' thu hilh ding don manlo liangin annek tuidawn sumlepai vai-ah kong manlah ding uh kilawmlo hi.
Ahi zongin Peter in, "Pasian' piakkhong na pen sum tawh lei theih dingin ngaihsun na hih manin na sumteng tawh sikhawm in.

Tu-in kong hawhna ding pen a thumveina ding hita a, note' gimna dingin bangmah ka hong ngen het kei ding hi. Keima deih pen note' sumlepaite hiloin note mahmah na hi uhhi. A taktakin ci lehang, tate in nulepate a huhding hilo a, nulepate in tate a huhding hizaw hi. 15 Note ka hong huhtheihna dingin lungdam takin ka neih khempeuh kong piaknop banah keima pumpi mahmah zong ka hong kipia nuam hi. Tuazah takin ka hong itna pen itlohna tengin hong nei zawsop ding na hi uhhiam? 16 Sumlepai vai-in note themkhat zong ka hong gimsak hetlohna na theihsa uh a hihi. Ahi zongin mi pawlkhatte in, kei pen ngian zangin khemna tawh a lamdang khatah sum tamzaw ka ngahna ding a vaihawmin hong gen uhhi. 17 Note kiangah ka hong paisak mite tung tawnin note kiang panin keima hamphatna ding bang la ka hi hiam?
Tuhun pen hun hoihlo hun ahih manin na hun neih khempeuh uh a hoih lamin zang un.

thuman thutak zuiloin, a lungsim paizia uh a man nawnlo, biakna pen hauhtheihna ding lampi bekin a ngaihsun mite in a tawntungin kitot kiselna a piangsak uh a hihi. 6 Pasian biakna hangin a neihsateng tawh a lungkim mite pen biakna in mihau a suaksak takpi mah a hihi. 7 A taktakin ci lehang, leitungah mihingin i suah laitakin sumlepai tawh i suak kei a, i sih ciangin zong leitung panin bangmah i keng thei tuan kei hi. 8 Tua ahih manin annek tuidawn, nikten' puansilh i neih nak leh a phazo a hihi. 9 Ahi zongin a haunuam mite in ze-etna a tuamtuam thuak a, duhhopna huaihamna a haivai thute-ah awkcipin, haksatna leh siatna a tuahlawh uhhi. 10 Sum deihluatna in siatna namkim piangsak hi. Mi pawlkhat in sum deihlua liang uh ahih manin a upna panun pialkhia-in gimna lungkhamna tampi a thuaklawh uhhi.

Tuhuna a hau mite kisatheikha loin, a kiplo hauhnate muan' leh suan'in neikha loin, eite in nuamtakin i zat theihdingin citna tawh a hong pia Pasian a muan' a suan'na dingun na hilh in. 18. A hoih nate semin, gamtat pha-in, citna lungsim nei-in midangte a hopnopna dingun na hilh in. 19. Tua hi leh mailamah amaute' nuntakna ding bulpi taktak ahi neihsate, amau-a' dingin a khol mite ahi ding uhhi.

Mi khat in a sih khit ciangin a gamhluah dingin a deihpa lai-in ciamtehin a koih leh a laibawlpa a sih phot ding kisam hi. 17 A laibawlpa a hin' laiteng tua lai kizang theilo a, a sih khit ciangin kizang thei bek hi.
Sum deihluatna tawh na kipelhna dingun na nuntakna uhah kikem unla, na neihzah uh tawh lungkim un. Pasian in, "Note ka hong nusia ngei kei ding a, ka hong tamasak ngei kei ding hi," hong ci hi.

A haute aw, tu-in ka thugen hong ngai dih un. Note tungah a hong tungding lungkhamna hangin kapin thum un. 2 Na neihsate uh muattumta a, na puante uh nget in netum khinta hi. 3 Na ngun leh na khamte uh kekseu khinta hi. Hih kekseuna pen note langah teci suak a, mei in a kattum bangin na sa uh hong netum ding hi. Hih a hun nunung ciangin tu-a bangin a piang dingin neihsa a khol na hi uhhi. 4 Na lo uh a hong khawhsakte a thaman pialo na hih manun tu-in amaute' phunna za un. Anla dingin na sawl uh mite' phunna Vanglian Topa in za khinta hi. 5 Hih leitung na nuntak sungun uang nekin na noptat mahmah uhhi. Note hong kigawh hun ding kigin'na-in a kithausak phitphet na hi uhhi. 6 A thuman mite mawhsakin na that uh a, amaute in na thu uh hong nial zolo uhhi.

Pasian in note' khutsungah a hong piak tuuhonte hoihtakin na cing unla, utlopipi hiloin, Pasian' hong deih bangin utna lungsim takpi tawh na cing un. Sum ngahnopna bek tawh a sem hiloin utna lungsim tawh a semte na hi un. 3. Note' kepdingin a hong kipia tuute, aana neihna tawh a cing hiloin tuute' etteh dingin a gamtate na hi un.
Hih leitung nate leh Pasian tawh a kizomlo thute deihluatin nei kei un. Mi khatpeuh in hih leitung nate a deihluat leh amah in Pa Pasian it taktak theilo hi.
Mi khat hau mahmah hen la, a Christian mipih a cimawhte mu napi-in huhna bangmah pianuam hetkei leh, Banghangin amah in Pasian ka it hi, ci thei ding ahi hiam?
Note a zawng, a mittaw, puansilh ding a neilo, a hehpihhuai, a lungkhamhuai na hih lamtak uh theiloin, kote hau-in ka cithei uh a, bangmah kisapna ka nei kei uhhi, na ci uhhi.
Amah in, "Keimah in hih tuikhuk ka tawhna thu-ah nang in keima-a' dingin teci na hih theihna dingin nangmah in ka khutsung panin hih tuununo sagihte na la ding hi," a ci hi.
Tu-in hong pai in, nang leh kei in thuciamna khat bawl ni; suangcian khat bawlin nang leh kei' kikalah teci hisak ni," a ci hi.

Laban in, "Hih suangcian pen tuni-in nang leh kei' kikalah teci ahi hi," a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in, Galeed, ci-in min phuak a, 49 a khuam pen Mizpah, ci hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Laban in, "Eite khatlekhat i tuam om ciangin { Topa } in nang leh kei' kikalah hong encik ta hen. 50 Ka tanute na bawl siat a, ka tanute' banah zi na lak beh leh, eite tawh kuamah a omloh hangin nang leh kei' kikalah, Pasian, teci ahihna phawk in," a ci hi. 51 Tua ciangin Laban in Jacob' kiangah, "Nang leh kei' kikalah ka phuhsa hih suangcian mu in. 52 Siatna a bawl dingin keimah in hih suangcian khengin nang kiangah kong pailohna ding, nang zong hih suangcian leh khuam khengin kei kiangah nong pailohna dingin hih suangcian leh suangkhuam, teci a hihi.
"Na vengte uh langkhatah a manloin teci na pang kei ding uhhi.

"Thumanlo na genkhia kei ding uhhi. Elna tawh teci pang dingin migilopa tawh na kipawl kei ding uhhi. 2 Siatna a bawl dingin mihon na zui kei ding uhhi. Thutang a hei khia dingin mihonpi nung zui-in thu neihna-ah teci na pang kei ding uhhi.
"Mi khatpeuh teci pang dingin a kisap ciangin a muhsa a theihsa thute genloin a ip leh, amah in tua mawhna pua ding hi.
pasal khat in tuanu luppihin, a pasal in tua thu a theih kei a, tuanu kininsak napi-in kuamah in phawkloin, a khialh laitakin tuanu kimanlo ahih manin a langah a pang ding teci a omloh hangin,
Khatpeuh in mi khat a thah leh, tecite' genna siksanin mi thatpa kithat ding hi. Ahih hangin teci khat bek' teci pan'na siksanin kuamah kithatlo ding hi.

Jordan galkhat luah dingin na paina leitang uhah na siat maimang baihna dingun note' langkhatah teci pang dingin tuni-in van leh lei ka sam hi. Tua leitang tungah note sauvei na hing kei ding uh a, na siamaimang ding uhhi.
Na vengte uh langkhatah zong a manloin teci na pang kei ding uhhi.

teci nih ahih kei leh thum bang genna tawh a si dingpa kithat ding a, teci khat bek thugenna tawh mi kithatlo ding hi. 7 A that dingin tecite masa ding a, tua khit ciangin midang khempeuh in hih ding uhhi. Tua bangin note' sung panin hoihlohna na siangsak ding uhhi.

"Mi khat in a hihkhak mawhna lian ahi a, khialhna khat peuhpeuh a gamtatna-ah ahi zongin tua mipa' langah tecikhat guak kicinglo ding a, teci nih ahih kei leh teci thum bang thugenna tawh mawhsakna kikipsak bek ding hi. 16 Elna lungsim a nei teci khat in mi khat gamta khial hi, ci-in a mawhsak leh, 17 thuneite a langnih tuakin, tuahun laitaka siampite leh thukhente' mai, { Topa' } mai-ah pai ding uhhi. 18 Thukhente in limtakin kan ding uh a, tecipa pen zuau teci hi-in, a manlopi-in a sanggampa a mawhsak ahih leh,
amaute in teci pangin, ‘Kote in hih mipa ka that kei uh a, a kithahlam zong ka thei kei uhhi.

Tuni-in note' langkhatah teci a pang dingin vantung leh leitung ka sam a, note' mai-ah na teel dingun nuntakna leh sihna, thupha leh samsiatna ka koih hi. Tua ahih ciangin note leh na suanlekhakte uh na hin'theihna dingun nuntakna teel unla,

"Tua ahih ciangin hih lai gelh in la, Israel mite hilh in. Hih la, kei-a' dingin Israel mite' langkhatah teci a suah theihna dingin amaute tungah hilh in. 20 Banghang hiam cihleh a pu a pate uh tungah piak dinga ka kiciamna, bawngnawi leh khuaizu tui bangin a luan'na gamah amaute tun'pih khinin, amaute in ne-in khamin a thau khit uh ciangin, pasian dangte a bia dingin kihei-in kei hong simmawhin ka thuciamna siasak ding uhhi. 21 Siatna leh haksatnate amaute tungah a tun' ciangin hih la, teci-in amaute' langkhatah pang ding hi (Banghang hiam cihleh a suanlekhakte un mangngilhlo ding uhhi); Banghang hiam cihleh piak dingin ka kiciam leitangah amaute ka paipih ma-in, amau' vaihawm kholh a ngimnate uh ka thei hi," a ci hi.

"Hih Thukham laibu la unla, note' langkhatah teci dingin a om theihna dingin { Topa } na Pasian uh Thuciamna Singkuang gei-ah koih un. 27 Banghang hiam cihleh a lehdo mite leh a lungkhauh thei mite na hihna uh ka thei hi. En un, note tawh kei a nungta khawm laipi mahin, tuni-in { Topa } na lehdo khin uhhi. Ka sih khit ciangin bangzah takin lehdozaw lai ding na hi uhhiam! 28 Hih thute amaute' bilah genin, amau' langkhatah teci a pang dingin vantung leh leitung ka sap theihna dingin na minam upate uh leh na uliante khempeuh uh kei kiangah hong khawm un.

Tua ahih ciangin kote in, ‘Meihal biakna ahi a, biakpiakna ding ahi zongin hiloin, ama omna-ah ka meihal biaknate uh leh ka biakpiaknate uh leh thunuama ka piaknate uh tawh { Topa' } na ka sepna uh kote leh note' kikal leh ko' khit ciangin i suanlekhakte kikalah teci dingin bawl ni. Tua bang hi kei leh hong tung ding hunte-ah na tate un ko' tate tungah, "{ Topa' } sungah no' tanh bangmah omlo hi," ci khading uhhi,’ ka ci uhhi.

Tua ahih ciangin hong tung ding hunte-ah kote tung ahi a, kote' suanlekhakte' tungah ahi zongin hih bangin hong kicihleh, ‘Meihal biakna ding ahi a, biakpiakna ding ahi zongin hiloin note leh kote kikalah teci dingin ka pu ka pate un a bawl { Topa' } biakna tau lim en un,’ i ci ding hi, ci-in ka ngaihsun uhhi.
Reuben mite leh Gad mite in a biakna tau uh min dingin "teci" a phuak uhhi. "Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } pen Pasian ahihna thu eite' kikalah teci ahi hi," amaute in ci uhhi.
Tua ciangin Joshua in mite kiangah, "Ama na a sem dingin { Topa } na teel khitna uhah note-a' dingin note mah tecina hi uhhi," a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute in, "Kote, teci ka hi uhhi," a ci uhhi.

Tua ciangin Joshua in mi khempeuh kiangah, "En un, hih suangtum pen eite' langkhatah teci hi ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } in eite tungah hong thugen khempeuh hih suangtum in za khin hi. Tua ahih ciangin note, na Pasian uh tungah a manloin na gamtatlohna dingun hih suangtum pen note' langkhatah teci hi ding hi," a ci hi.
Gilead upate in Jefthah kiangah, "{ Topa } pen eite' kikalah teci hi ding hi. Na cih bangin ka gamta ding uhhi," a ci uhhi.

Tua ciangin Boaz in upate leh mi khempeuh kiangah, "Tuni-in note pen Naomi' tung panin Elimelek leh Khilion leh Mahlon' neihsa khempeuh ka lei khitna thu teci na hi uhhi. 10 A site' min ama sanggamte leh a pian'na a khuasung panin a maiman'lohna dingin ama gamhluahna-ah a site' min a kizop theihna dingin a si khin Mahlon' zi, Moab numei Ruth zong ka zi dingin ka lei khin hi; note pen tuni-in teci na hi uhhi," a ci hi. 11 Tua ciangin kulhkongpi-a om mite khempeuh leh upate in, "Kote, teci ka hi uhhi. { Topa } in Israel-te' pian'na Rachel leh Leah bangin na innkuan sunga hong pai numei bawl ta hen. Efrathah-ah na dau pai hen la, Bethlehem-ah na min thang ta hen.

Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, "Note in kei tungah bangmah na muhlohna thu uh { Topa } pen note' langkhatah teci hi a, ama sathau nilhpa zong tuni-in teci ahi hi," a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute in, "Hi mah hi; { Topa, } iteci ahi hi," a ci uhhi. 6 Tua ciangin Samuel in mite kiangah, "Moses leh Aaron teelin Egypt gam panin na pu na pate uh a paikhiatpih { Topa, } teci a hihi.

Tua ciangin Jonathan in David kiangah, "Israel-te' Pasian, { Topa, } teci hi ta hen! Zingciang tubang hun ahi a, a ni thum ni-in ahi zongin, ka pa' ngaihsutna tawng ka kankhiat khit ciangin, nangma tungah a lungsim a hoih leh, nang kiangah mi hong sawlin hong pulaklo ding ka hi hiam?

Ulian ngate' uk Filistia mite khuakulh tawh a ki-um khuapite leh a ki-umlo khuaneute-a' dingin a khua phazah tawh kizui-in kham simbengte zong a hihi. { Topa' } Thuciamna Singkuang a koihna gei uha suangtumpi pen Bethshemesh khuami Joshua' lo-ah tuni dongin teci a hihi.
Tua ciangin Samuel in suangtum khat la-in Mizpah leh Jeshanah kikalah phut a, a min Ebenezer a phuak hi; Banghang hiam cihleh amah in, "Hih pen { Topa } in eite hong huhna teci ahi hi," a ci hi.

Tua ciangin David in ama kiangah, "Nangma mawhna nangma lu tungah tung ta hen; Banghang hiam cihleh nangma kampau in nang' langkhatah teci pangin, ‘{ Topa' } sathau nilhpa ka that khin hi,’ na ci hi," a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amah in kumpipa' tapa paikhiatpihin, ama lu tungah kumpi lukhu khusak a, kumpi hihna tecipan'na lai amah a pia hi. Tua ciangin amaute in amah kumpi hi, ci-in taangko-in amah sathau a nilh uhhi. Tua ciangin amaute in a khut uh bengin, "Kumpipa khan'sau hen!" a ci uhhi.

Amah in a lungsim khempeuh tawh na thupiaknate, na teci pan'nate, leh na thukhamte kemin a vekpi-in sem a, keimah in ka vaihawmsa biakinn lianpi amah in a lam theihna dingin ka tapa Solomon tungah utna lungsim guan' in," a ci hi.
Ahi zongin { Topa' } lamah amaute a paipih kik dingin amah in amaute lakah kamsangte a puak hi. Hihte in amau' langkhatah teci pang a, ahih hangin amaute in donlo uhhi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa ama munah dingin, hih laibu sungah a kigelh thuciamna kammalte a sem dingin a lungsim khempeuh leh a nuntakna khempeuh tawh { Topa' } nung a zuihna ding leh ama thupiaknate, ama tecipan'nate, leh a thukhamte a zuihna ding, { Topa' } mai-ah thuciamna khat a bawl hi.
Kei a hong langpang dingin teci na nei tawntung a, keima tungah na hehna hong khang semsem a, kei nong sukna ding thuthak na mu tawntung hi.
Vantungte in hih mipa' mawhna pholak uh a, leitung in ama langah teci a pang hi.
{ Topa' } thu kicing a, nuntakna a thaksuaksak hi. { Topa' } teci pan'na hi takpi a, mi pillote pilsak hi.
Ka langte' deihna bangin kei hong nusia kei in; Banghang hiam cihleh teci manlote ka langah pang khin a, amaute in zuau genin kei hong tawng niloh uhhi.
Mi a el tecite hong kipan uh a, ka theihloh thute kei hong dong uhhi.
"Ka mite aw, ngai un; thu ka hong gen ding hi. Israel-te aw, note' langkhatah teci ka pang ding hi. Kei pen Pasian ka hi a, nomau' Pasian ka hihi.

Amaute pen Pasian tungah a lungsim thumanlo, lungsim kip a neilo khangmi, lungsim khauhin a lehdo khangmi, amau' pulepate tawh kibang loin, amaute in Pasian sungah amau' lametna koihin, Pasian' nasepnate mangngilh loin, ama thupiakte zui-in, a suak nailo naupangte, a hong piangkik khang thakte in a thu thei-in, amaute ding khia-in amau' tuletate tungah a thu a gentheihna dingin, amah in, i pate in a tate a hilhsawn dinga a sawl ahi, Israel sungah thukham khat koihin, Jacob sungah tecipan'na khat a koih hi.
Amah in meii khuampi sung pan amaute tungah thu gen a, ama teci pan'nate leh amah in amaute tungah a thukham piakte amaute in a zui uhhi.
Na teci pan'nate a theihna dingun nang hong zahtakte kei' lamah hong kiheisak in.
Na kam pana na teci pan'nate ka zuih theihna dingin na itna kip tawh kei hong hingsak in.
Migilote in keimah a hong that dingin hong buk uhhi. Ahih hangin na teci pan'nate ke'n ka lungngaingai ding hi.
Ka siate khempeuh sangin thu ka telzaw hi. Banghang hiam cihleh na teci pan'nate ka ngaihsunsun hi.
Leitunga migilote khempeuh sik-ek bangin na ngaihsun hi. Tua ahih ciangin na teci pan'nate ka deih hi.
Na teci pan'nate a tawntungin thuman hi. Thu theihtelna hong guan in; tua hi leh ka nungta ding hi.
Na tate in, amau' tungah ka hilh ding ka thuciamna leh ka teci pan'nate a zuih nak uh leh, amau' tate zong na kumpi tokhom tungah tu paisuak ding uhhi," na ci hi.
zuauthu gen teci manlote, leh kitotna a piangsakte a hihi.
Thuman mite in thu taktak mah gen uh a, zuau tecite in khemna thu bek gen uhhi.
A citak teci in thuman bekbek gen tawntung a, a ginalo teci in zuau bekbek gen tawntung hi.
Thutak a gen teci in nuntakna huzo a, zuauthu a gen teci in mi lehhek hi.
Thuman genlo teci in gim tuak pelmawh ding a, zuaugen mi suaktalo ding hi.
Thumanlo teci in gim tuak pelmawh ding a, zuaugen mi in sihna thuak ding hi.
Mi a susia nuam teci in thuman gen nuamlo a, migilote in gitloh tatna nuamsa uhhi.
A manlo tecite mangthang ding uh a, thuman tecite' kam kizaza ding hi.
Thu kician omlopi-in na vengpa' langkhatah teci pang kei in la, amau' siatna dingin zuauthu gen kei in.
A lawmte' langkhatah teci manlo a pang mi pen molhtum, namsau, ahih kei leh thal hiam tawh kibang hi.

Amau' maiput in amau' langah teci pang hi. Sodom bangin amaute a langtangin gamta uh a, amaute in imlo uhhi. Amaute in gimna ngah ta hen! Banghang hiam cihleh amaute in amau' tung mahah siatna kitun' uhhi.
Hih thu a thei dingin a muan'huai teci, siampi ahi Uriah leh Jeberekhiah' tapa Zechariah ka nei hi, hong ci hi.
Thukham leh teci pinnate bek ngai un. Amaute in hih kammalte tawh kizui-in a paukei uhleh amau adingin phalvak khuavak a neilo suak uhhi. (ZIV)
Tua ciangin note in, "{ Topa } in note hong hilh thute ngai un. Aisante' thu ngai kei un. Amaute' hong gen thute a kiman'na omlo hi," ci-in dawng un. (TDM)

Tua pen Vanglian { Topa}-a' dingin Egypt gamsungah lim leh teci hi ding hi. A nengniam mite' bawlsiatna hangin { Topa } tungah amaute a kiko ciangin, amah in amaute kiangah honpa khat sawl ding a, amaute hu'-in khahkhia ding hi.
Tu-in pai in la, hong tung lai ding hunte-ah teci ahi ngitnget dingin amaute' mai-ah suangpeek tungah gelh in la, laibu khat sungah at in.

Minamte khempeuh kikaikhawmsak unla, mihingte kikhawmsak un. Amaute' lak panin kua in hih thu hong genkhia thei-in, a beisa huna nate kua in laktel thei ahi hiam? Amau' dikna a langsak dingin a tecite uh hong paipihsak unla, amaute a thu zasakin, man mah hi, cisak un. 10 "Note pen keima teci na hi uhhi," { Topa } in ci a, "Kei pen Amah ka hihna thu, nangmah in thei-in keimah nong upna ding, nong theihtelna dingin kong teelsa ka nasempa na hi hi. Kei' ma-in pasian omlo a, kei' khitah zong kuamah omlo ding hi.
Note lakah pasian dang a om ma-in honkhia-in, pulakin, ka genkhol hi. Tua ahih ciangin note pen keima teci na hi uhhi," { Topa } in ci hi.

Lau kei unla, kihta kei un. Tanglai pek panin note kiangah hong genin hong pulak khin hilo ka hi hiam? Note khempeuh keima teci na hi uhhi. Kei simloh pasian dang om ahi hiam? Suangpi dang omlo hi. Khat beek ka thei kei hi," a ci hi.
David pen mite tungah teci ding, mite a makai ding leh a ukpa dingin ka koih hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh nangma tungah kote' thupalsatna tampi tak pha a, ka mawhnate un kote' langah teci hong pang hi. Kote' thupalsatnate, ka mawhnate uh ka thei uhhi.

Banghang hiam cihleh amaute, Israel gamah hai gamtat uhhi: A innvengte' zite mawhpih uh a, thu ka piaklohpi ka min tawh zuauthu a gen uhhi. Keimah { Topa } in ka mu a, teci ka hi hi, hong ci hi," ci-in ka gelh hi.
Israel mite' kiphatsakna in amau' langkhatah teci pang hi. Ahi zongin hih thu khempeuhah zong, amau' { Topa } Pasian ahi kei' lamah hong kihei tuanlo uh a, kei hong zonglo uhhi.
No minam khempeuhte aw, hih thu za un: Leitungah a teng mi khempeuhte aw, hih thu ngai un: Note' langkhatah { Topa } Pasian in teci pang a, a vantung biakinn panin thu hong gen hi.
Khatlekhat kisiatsakna ding vaihawm kei unla, a manlopi-in teci pangin kiciam kei un. Zuauna, thumanlohna, leh kibawlsiatnate ka deih kei hi," hong ci hi.

Vanglian { Topa } in hih bangin ci hi: "Note tungah thukhen dingin ka hong pai ding hi; ai tawite, numei tawh a mawhte, a manlopi-a teci pangte, numeite' thaman piakna-ah khemna a zangte; meigong, tagah, leh gamdang mite a zawhthawh bawlte, leh kei hong zahtaklo mi khempeuhte' langkhatah thakhatin teci pangin thu ka khen ding hi.

Ahi zongin na thu uh a hong man'nop kei leh, Laisiangtho sungah, ‘Mi nih ahih kei leh mi thum' theihna bek tawh mawhsakna khat peuhpeuh man pan hi,’ a cih mah bangin midang khat ahi a, nih ahi zongin tonpih un.
Tua ciangin mi khempeuh tungah teci ahi dingin Pasian' hong ukna hangin a lungdamhuai thu, leitung khempeuhah kihilh ding hi. Tua khit ciangin beina hong tung ding hi.

Siampi liante leh uliante in Zeisu a thahtheihna dingun zuau teci a pangding mi a zong uhhi. 60 teci tampi in hong gen hangin thahtheihna ding zuau teci pangding kimulo hi. A tawpna ciangin mi nih in thu hong gen a,
Tua ahih manin na pu na pate uh gamtatnate a thukimpih, a tecite na hi uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh amaute in kamsangte thatin, note in a han na bawl uhhi.
Note pen hih thu khempeuh a thei teci na hi uhhi.

Johan in hih mipa thu teci na pang a, "Vantung panin vakhu bangin Kha hong paisukin ama tungah a om ka mu hi. 33 Keimah in amah ka theih nailoh hangin, tui sungah mite a phum dingin kei a hong sawl Pasian in, ‘A tungah Kha hong paisukin a omna mipa pen Khasiangtho sungah mite a phum dingpa ahi hi,’ ci-in hong genkhol hi. 34 Tua ahih manin hih mipa pen Pasian' Tapa hi, ci-in thei ka hih manin teci ka pang hi," a ci hi.
A mantakin kong genin-ah, kote in ka theihsa uh thu bek genin, ka muhsa uh thu bek teci a pang ka hi uh a, ahi zongin note kuamah in ka thugente uh nong um nuam kei uhhi.

"Keima thu tawh kisai-ah keimahmah in teci pang leng kuamah in a thumanin sang theilo ding hi. 32 Tua ahih manin keima-a' ding teci a pangding mi khat om a, keima thu genin teci a pan'na thuman hi, ci-in ka thei hi. 33 Note in Johan kiangah thu a dong dingin mi na sawl uh a, amah in note kiangah a thuman hong genzo hi. 34 Keimah in mihingte' teci pan'na a kisam ka hi kei a, note in hotkhiatna na ngahtheihna dingun note-a' ding ngaihsutna tawh hih thuteng a hong gen ka hizaw hi. 35 Johan pen meivak bangin kuangin a taang hi a, ama khuavak sungah tawlkhat nuamsa-in omding na ut uhhi. 36 Ahi zongin Johan' teci pan'na sangin a lianzaw teci khat ka nei a, tua in: Ka Pa in sepdingin a hong piak tu-a ka sep thute in kei-a' dingin teci a pang hi a, Pa in kei a hong sawl taktak ahihna hong kilangsak hi. 37 Tua ban panin kei a hong sawl Pasian in zong keima-a' dingin teci a pang hi. Note in Pasian' sawlpa' thu umlo na hih manun Pasian' aw lah za ngeilo, a maitang lah mu ngeilo, na lungsim uhah zong ama thu a ciinglo na hi uhhi. 38-39 Nuntak tawntung ngahtheihna ding lametna tawh Laisiangtho sung na lim sim mahmah uh a, tua na sim uh Laisiangtho in keima thu mah genin teci pang napi-in, 40 na nuntak theihna dingun kei kiangah nong painuam kei veve uhhi.

Na Thukham sung uhah zong, ‘Thu khat peuhpeuhah mi nih in a manna teci pangin a gen leh a genna uh thuman hi,’ ci-in na kigelh ahih mah bangin, 18 keima-a' ding teci ka pang a, kei hong sawl Pa Pasian in zong keima-a' dingin teci a pang hi," ci-in a dawng hi.
