"Tua ahih ciangin Topa Zeisu' thawhkikna thu teci pangin a hong genpih dingin Judas tangin mi khat i lakding kisam hi. Tua mipa pen Johan' tuiphum kipat huna kipanin Zeisu vanah a kilaktoh hun ciangdong, Zeisu' nasepna khempeuhah eite tawh a omkhawm mi khat ahih ding kisam hi," a ci hi.
Pasian in sihna panin hih Zeisu hingkiksak a, kote khempeuh pen hih thu a thei teci vive ka hi uhhi.
Tua ahih ciangin mite tungah nuntakna a piapa na that uh a, ahi zongin sihna panin Pasian in amah hingkiksak hi. Kote gel pen hih thu a thei teci ka hi uhhi.
Topa Zeisu' thawhkikna thu, sawltakte in vangliatna tawh teci pang uh a, Pasian in amaute khempeuh tungah thupha tampi a pia hi.
Hih thute thei-in teci a pangte pen ko sawltakte bek hiloin Khasiangtho tawh zong ka hi uh a, tua Khasiangtho pen amah a um mite tungah Pasian in a khongin a piak ahi hi," ci-in a dawngkik uhhi.
khua pualamah kaikhia-in suang golpipi a khiat uhhi. Hih thu-ah teci pangin Stephen a deng mite in a puantungsilh uh suahin Saul a kici tangval khat kiangah lawnin a kemsak uhhi.

Amah in Jerusalem khua leh Jew mite omna mundang khempeuhah a septe khempeuh a thei tecite ka hi uhhi. Jew mite in sing tungah amah khai-in a that uhhi. 40Ahi zongin Pasian in a ni thum ni-in amah hingkik sakin hong kilangsak kik hi. 41 Mi khempeuh tungah kilangsak loin, a thei teci dingin Pasian in a hong teelsa kote bek tungah hong kilangsak hi. Sihna panin a hin'kik khit ciangin kote in amah tawh an nekhawm tui dawnkhawmin ka om uhhi. 42 Kote in mite kiangah thu ka hilhna ding uh leh mihing leh misite tungah thu a khen dingin Pasian in amah a sehna thu teci a pang dingin a hong sawl hi.
Tua ahih manin na muhsa leh na zaksa thu khempeuh, mi khempeuh tungah genin teci a pang ding na hi hi.
Tua zanin Paul kiangah Topa hong ding a, "Hang takin om in. Hih Jerusalem khuasungah keima thu genin teci na pan' mah bangin Rom khuapi-ah zong keima thu genin teci na pang ding hi," a ci hi.
Ahi zongin tu-in thukham zuihna hang hiloin thudang khat hangin Pasian tawh kipawl theihna ding lampi hong kilangzo a, Thukham leh kamsangte in zong hih thu-ah teci a pang uhhi.
Amaute in Pasian a kin mahmah lamtak uh thei-in teci-in ka pang ngam hi. Ahi zongin amaute in a man lampi tawh kin khalo uhhi.
Tua bek zong hilo lai-in, misite a kihingkik saklo ding hi leh Pasian in Christ hingkik sak hi, ci-in teci pang ka hih manun, mite kiangah Pasian' thu a manlopi-in a gen ka suak ding uhhi.
Note kiangah kong pailohna pen note ka hong dopna hizaw hi. Hih thu hong theihpih ka teci pen Pasian a hihi.
Moses Thukham a zuilote pen mi nih leh thum in mawh mah hi, ci-in teci a pan' khit nak leh kihehpih hetloin sihna kithuaksak hi.

Tua hi a, eite in i kiim i pamah hih zahin a tam teci nei ihih ciangin eite a hong dongtangsak thei nate khempeuh leh eite a hong gakcip mawhna leh khialhnate khempeuh paikhia-in, i mai-ah a om taina ding lampi a mong dongin lungsim kiptakin tai ni.

Na ngun leh na khamte uh kekseu khinta hi. Hih kekseuna pen note langah teci suak a, mei in a kattum bangin na sa uh hong netum ding hi. Hih a hun nunung ciangin tu-a bangin a piang dingin neihsa a khol na hi uhhi.

Thu upna sungah mi citakin ka ngaihsut Silas' huhna tawh hih lai tomno gelhin amah ka hong puasak hi. Hih thute pen Pasian' hong hehpihna taktak hi, ci-in teci pangin note ka hong hanthawn hi. Tua ahih manin hih thute-ah kipin om un.

Leitung pian'cil lai peka kipanin a omsa ahi nuntakna a piathei Thu tawh kisai, note kiangah ka hong gelh uhhi. Kote mahmah in ama thugen ka za uh a, ka mit mahmah uh tawh amah mu-in, limtakin ka ettel uhhi a, ka khut mahmah uh tawh ka lawn' uh a hihi. 2 Hih nuntakna pen a kimuthei a hong suah ciangin kote mahmah in ka mu uhhi. Tua ahih manin kote tungah a hong kilak, Pa Pasian tawh a omkhawm tua nuntak tawntungna pen genbelin nei-in, note tungah zong a hong gen ka hi uhhi. 3 Pa Pasian leh a Tapa Zeisu Christ tawh kote pawlkhatin ka om uh mah bangin note zong kote tawh pawlkhat nong suahtheihna ding uh deihna-in ka muhsa uh leh ka zaksa uh thute a hong gen ka hi uhhi.

Hih Zeisu Christ pen tui tawh kiphumna leh a sisan luangin sihna tawh a hong pai hi a, tui bek tawh a hong pai hiloin tui leh sisan tawh a hong pai a hihi. Kha mahmah in hih thu a manna teci a pang hi. Kha pen thuman gen a hihi. 7 Hih thu-ah teci a pang thum om a, 8 tuate pen Kha, tui, leh sisan ahi uhhi. Hih thumte' teci pan'na kibang kim hi. 9 Mihingte' teci pan'na sangthei ihih leh Pasian' teci pan'na i san'theih ding thupizaw hi. Pasian in ama Tapa' thu tu-a bangin teci hong pang hi. 10 Tua ahih manin Pasian' Tapa a um mi peuhmah in Pasian' teci pan'na a sang a hihi. Ahi zongin Pasian' thugen a umlo mi peuhmah in ama Tapa thu teci pangin a gennate a umlo uh ahih manin Pasian pen zuaugen a suaksak ahi uhhi. 11 Tu-in Pasian' teci pan'na in: Pasian in ama Tapa tung tawnin eite tungah nuntak tawntungna a hong pia hi.

thuman takin teci a pang, sihna panin a kithosak kik Tapa upa, leitung kumpite tungah ukna aana a nei Zeisu Christ kiang panin note tungah hehpihna leh nopsakna thupha hong tung ta hen.Tua Zeisu Christ in eite hong it a, ama sihna tawh i mawhna panin eite hong suaktasak a,

Satan in a kumpi tokhom a phuhna munah a om na hih lamtak uh ka thei hi. Keima thu citakin teci a pang cinten Antipas, Satan' omna munah a kithah hun laitak nangawnin kei na hong upna uh na khahsuah kei uhhi.
"Laodisia khua pawlpi vantung mi kiangah lai gelh in la, thuman leh citakin teci a pang, Pasian' pian'sakte khempeuh a kipatna ahi Amen' thugen in:
Ciamtehna ngana a hon' ciangin Pasian' thu a genna hang leh Pasian' thu citakin teci a pan'na uh hangin a kithat mite' kha, biakna tau nuai-ah a om ka mu hi.

Ka teci nihte puanhampi silhin ka paisak ding a, amaute in ni tul khat za nih sawmguk sung Pasian' thu a gen ding uhhi," hong ci hi. 4 Tua teci nihte pen leitung Topa mai-ah a om oliv kung nihte leh meivakna nihte ahi uhhi.
Amaute in Pasian' thu genin a teci pan'na a zawhkhit uh ciangin kuahawm thukpi sung panin a hong paikhia ganhing in tua teci pangte simin zogawpin that ding a,

teci a pang tua kamsang nihte in leitung mite tungah gimna nakpi takin tungsak uh ahih manin hih mi nihte a sihna hangin lungdamin pawi bawl ding uh a, a nuamna uh hangin khatlekhat letsong kipia ding uhhi. 11 Ahi zongin ni thum leh ni lang a cin'khit ciangin amaute sungah Pasian kiang panin nuntakna hu lutin, amaute a khe-un hong ding uh ahih manin a mute khempeuh nakpi takin lau mahmah uhhi. 12 Tua ciangin tua teci pang nihte in, "Hih lai-ah hong pai un," ci-in vantung panin a kisapna awging a za uhhi. Tua ahih manin a galte uh' muhin vantung meiipi sungah paito uhhi.
Hih thu khempeuh hong genin teci a pang mipa in, "Ka hong pai baih taktak ding hi," hong ci hi. Na cih bangin hi ta peuh hen. Topa Zeisu aw, hong pai ta in!

"Na vengte uh inn na deihgawh kei ding uhhi. Na vengte uh zi hita leh, ama nasempa hita leh, ama nasemnu hita leh, ama bawngtal hita leh, ama la hita leh, na vengte-a' ahi na khat peuhpeuh na deihgawh kei ding uhhi," a ci hi.

{ Topa } pen tuucin' bangin hong cing hi a, kisapna teng kicing ta hi. 2 Lo nona-ah hong lumsak a, tuidam kiangah hong paipih hi. 3 Thahatna thak kei hong guan' hi. A hong ciamsa mah bangin-ah lampi manah kei hong kha hi. 4 { Topa } aw, kei hong ompih na hih manin khuamial thukpi ka nawk hangin ka lau kei hi. Na molhtum leh na ciangkhut in kei hong hu hi. 5 Keima galte' muhna munah an nong lui hi. Thupi takin nong pahtawi a, keima hai zong dimlet ta hi. 6 Na hoihna leh nong itna in ka khan'tawnin a hong zuih ding tel takin-ah ka thei ta a, a tawntungin na inn sungah ka om ding hi.

Ahih hangin kei ka hih leh ka khe kisuipuk dektak a, ka khe taal dektak hi. 3 Banghang hiam cihleh migilote' daupaina ka muh ciangin mi kihisakte ka eng hi. 4 Banghang hiam cihleh amaute in nat velvalna bangmah thuaklo uh a, a pumpi uh cidamin zol hilhial hi. 5 Amaute in midangte bangin haksatna thuaklo uh a, amaute in midangte bangin gimna ngahlo uhhi. 6 Tua ahih ciangin amaute in khainiang bangin kiphatsakna ok uh a, puan bangin ngongtatna silh uhhi.

Pa in tate a hehpih bangin { Topa } in amah a zahtakte hong hehpih hi. 14 Banghang hiam cihleh amah in eite' pian'na hong thei a, eite pen leivui ihihna a phawk hi.15 Eite ihih leh i nuntakna pen lopa tawh kibang a, lolai-ah a po pakte bangin a palh hi.
Amah hoih ahih manin { Topa } tungah lungdamna ko un; Banghang hiam cihleh ama itna kip tawntung hi. 2 Lungdamna pen pasian-te' Pasian' tungah ko un; Banghang hiam cihleh ama itna kip tawntung hi.

David' tapa, Israel kumpi Solomon' paunakte: 2 Mite in pilna leh thuhoihte a phawk theihna ding, khiatna thuk a nei kammalte a theih theihna ding. 3 A hoihin a pil gamtat theihna ding, thuman, thutang, a kilawmin a gamtat theihna ding. 4 Thuthei nailote in a theihna ding, khangnote in pilna leh thu ngaihsut theihna a ngahna ding. 5 Mi ciimsate ciimsak semsemin, mi pilsate pilsak semsemin, 6 paunakte leh thugentehnate hoihtakin thei-in, mipilte' kampau leh a thugente uh a theihna ding a hihi. 7 { Topa } zahtakna in pilna kipatna hi a, mihaite in pilna leh thuhilhna donlo uhhi.
Na lungsim khempeuh tawh { Topa } muang in la, nang' theihna suang kei in. 6 Na hihna khempeuhah amah phawk in. Tua hi leh lampi man amah in hong lak ding hi.
Lungnopna in pumpi cidamsak a, hazatna pen guh a muatsak natna a hihi.
Sik in sik mah hiamsak thei a, mi in midang pilsak thei hi.
Mihingte muan'in nei nawn kei un. Amaute leltak banga simtham ding ahi hiam?

"Banghang hiam cihleh vantung ki-ukna sung omzia pen a leenggah lo-ah na a sem ding a cial dingin zing tungin a kuankhia leenggah lo neipa tawh kibang hi. 2 Ni tha ngeina ngun peek khat piak dingin a kithukim khit uh ciangin a leenggah lo-ah na a sem dingin pawlkhat a kuansak hi. 3 Zingsang nai kua hun ciangin mihon omna sumbukah pai leuleu a, mi pawlkhat bangmah semloin a mawk om a muh ciangin, 4 ‘No zong leenggah lo-ah va kuan un; a kilawm zah khat ka hong pia ding hi,’ a cih ciangin pawlkhat a kuan uhhi. 5 Tua ciangin sun sawmlenih ciangin pawlkhat cial leuleu a, nitak nai thum ciangin pawlkhat a cial lai hi. 6 Nitak nai nga ciangin mihon omna sumbukah a pai leh mi pawlkhat a mawk om mu ahih manin, ‘Banghangin bangmah semloin sunthapai mawk om na hi uhhiam?’ ci-in a dot ciangin

"Inn panin khualzin dingin a paikhia mipa tawh zong kibang hi. Amah in a nasemte samin, a neihsateng a nasemte' kep dingin a ap hi. 15 Amau' siamna tawh kizui-in khat tungah tul nga, khat tungah tul nih, khat tungah tul khat a ap khit ciangin a zinkhia hi. 16 Tul nga a ngahpa in sum bawlna-in zangpah a, a meet tul nga mah a ngahthuah hi. 17 Tul nih a ngahpa in zong a meet tul nih mah a ngahthuah hi. 18 Ahi zongin tul khat a ngahpa in leisung to-in a topa' sum a selcip hi. 19 "Hun sawtpi khit ciangin tua nasemte' topa hong ciahkik a, a nasemte tawh a sum thu a siangsak uhhi. 20 Tul nga a ngahpa in a dang tul nga mah hong tawithuahin, ‘Topa aw, kei tungah tul nga nong ap hi. Hih lai-ah tul nga mah ka meetsak hi,’ hong cih ciangin 21 a topa in, ‘Hoih mahmah hi; a hoih a citak nasempa aw, a tawmno na zekna-ah siam na hih manin a tampi tak ka hong zeksak ding hi. Hong pai in; kei tawh nuamsa khawm ni,’ a ci hi. 22 Tua ciangin tul nih a ngahpa zong hong pai-in, ‘Topa aw, kei tungah tul nih nong ap hi. Hih lai-ah tul nih mah ka na meetsak hi,’ hong cih ciangin 23 a topa in, ‘Hoih mahmah hi; a hoih a citak nasempa aw, a tawmno na zekna-ah siam na hih manin a tampi tak ka hong zeksak ding hi. Hong pai in; kei tawh nuamsa khawm ni,’ a ci hi. 24 Tul khat a ngahpa zong hong pai-in, ‘Topa aw, nang pen na seploh na bawl lohnapi-ah na a deih, mi genhak mahmah na hihna ka hong the i hi. 25 Tua ahih manin ka hong kihta a, leisungah na sum tul khat ka seel hi. Tu-in hih lai-ah na sumzah mah om hi,’ a hong cih ciangin 26 a topa in, ‘A hoihlo, a thadah nasempa aw, ka seploh ka bawl lohnapi-ah ka deihlam hong thei na hih leh, 27 sumkholna-ah ka sum na koihsak lecin hoih ding hi. Tua hi leh tu-a ka hong tun'kik ciangin a bulpi leh a meet ka ngahkhawm ding hi. 28 Tua ahih manin ama tung panin a tul khat laksak unla, tul sawm a neipa tungah piathuah un. 29 Banghang hiam cihleh a neisate kipiathuah ding a, hau semsem ding hi. Ahi zongin a neilote tung panin a neihsa sunsun nangawn kilaksak ding hi. 30 Bangmahin a kimanglo hih nasempa ahih leh pualam khuamialna lakah lawnkhia un. Tua lai-ah kapin a hagawi ding hi,’ ci hi.

Kua lianpen ding ihi hiam, ci-in nungzuite lakah kiselna khat hong om hi. 47 Zeisu in amaute' lungsim ngaihsutna a phawk ciangin naupang khat la-in a gei-ah omsak a, 48 a nungzuite kiangah, "Keima hangin hih naupang a limbawl mi peuhmah in kei hong limbawl hi a, kei hong limbawl mi peuhmah in kei hong sawlpa zong a limbawl a hihi. Note khempeuh lakah a neupenpa a lianpenpa ahi hi," a ci hi.

Amaute hoih kisa mahmahin, midang khempeuh a simmawhbawl mite tungah Zeisu in zong thugentehna khat gen a, 10 "Thungen dingin biakinn-ah mi nih a pai uhhi. Khat pen Pharisee mi hi a, a khat pen siahdongpa a hihi. 11 Pharisee mipa dingin thu ngen a, ‘Pasian aw, kei pen midangte bangin a huaiham, a thumanlo, numei tungah a mawh mi ka hi kei hi; hua lai-a siahdongpa bang hilo ka hih manin nangma tungah ka nuamna kong pulak hi. 12 Nipikal khatin ni nih sung an ka tang a, ka ngah khempeuh sung panin sawmah khat nang tungah kong pia hi,’ a ci hi. 13 Ahi zongin siahdongpa pen a gamla simah ding a, vantung lamah zong dak ngamloin a dip humin kuncip a, ‘Pasian aw, kei mimawh mi khialpa hong hehpih in,’ ci-in a ngen hi. 14 Ke'n kong cihin-ah, hih mipa pen Pasian tawh a kilemsa-in a inn-ah ciah a, a khatpa pen tua bangin ciahlo hi. Banghang hiam cihleh a kiliansakte pen kiniamkhiatsuk ding a, a kiniamkhiatte pen a lianin kibawl ding hi," a ci hi.

Nungzuite lakah kua a lianpenin kingaihsun ding, ci-in kiselna thu hong piang hi. 25 Tua ciangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, "Gentail mi hih leitung kumpite in a mite uh tungah ukna aana zang uh a, tua bangin mi a uk Gentail-te in amaute pen, ‘Mite' nopsakna dingin nasemte,’ a kicih ding deih lai uhhi. 26 Ahi zongin note lakah tua bang hilo ding hi; a lianpenpa a neupen bangin om ding a, a makai penpa a nungzui nunungpen bangin om ding hi. 27 Anne dingin sabuai-ah a tupa leh an a piapa kua lianzaw ahi hiam? Anne dingin a tupa lianzaw mah hi. Ahi zongin kei pen note lakah anpia-in na a sempa bangin ka hong om hi.

An a nekkhit uh ciangin Zeisu in Simon Peter kiangah, "Johan' tapa Simon aw, hih adang khempeuhte' hong it sangin kei na hong nak itzaw hiam?" ci-in a dot ciangin amah in, "Topa aw, ka hong itzaw hi. Nang ka hong itna na thei hi," ci-in a dawng hi.

Ahi zongin Topa Zeisu in kei sep dingin a hong piak, Pasian hehpihna hangin Lungdamna Thu, mite kiangah gen ding nasep ka tangtut zawh nak leh kei nuntakna-ah bangbang hong piang ta leh a thupi-in ka ngaihsun kei hi.

Topa Zeisu mahmah in, ‘Ngahna sangin piak khiatna-ah lungdamna lianzaw hi,’ a cihna phawkkawmin nakpi takin nasepna tawh na khempeuhah a zawngkhalte huh ding hi hang, ci-in note kiangah kong lak khinzo hi," ci-in a vaikhak hi.

Leitung mihingte' gamtat bangin gamta kei unla, na lungsim uh kikheelin Pasian kipuahpha sak un. Tua hi leh a hoih nate bang hi a, bangte in amah lungkim sakin, bangte a kicing hiam ci-in thei-in Pasian' deihna na phawk thei ding uhhi. 3 Pasian in kei tungah hehpihna hong piakkhongna hangin note tungah kong gennop thu in: Note tawh a kituakzah valin kilian ngaihsutzaw kha kei un. Pasian in note tungah upna hong piakzah tawh kizui-in kingaihsun bek zaw unla, a kilawm ciang khat bekin kingaihsun un.

Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian' deihna bangin gamta loin, leitung lungsim deihna bangin gamta lai na hih manun upna sungah naungek bang ahi lai na hi uhhi. Note khatlekhat kihaza-in kitawng kiselin na om uh ciangin hih leitung mite mah a bang lel na hihna uh hong kilang hi.
Tua ahih manin keima gamtatzia na hong zuihna dingun ka hong thum hi.

Na tuah uh ze-etnate khempeuh pen mite' tuah ngeingeite mah a hihi. Pasian in citakin a thuciamna lenkip ahih manin note' thuak zawhloh ding ze-etna hong tuaksaklo ding hi. Ze-etna na tuah hun uh ciangin zong na thuakzawhna ding uh thahatna hong guan'ding ahih manin na suahtak zawhna ding uh lampi hong hon'sak ding hi.
Keimah in Christ gamtatzia ka zuih mah bangin note in zong keima gamtatzia hong zui ta un.
Kote ahih leh tua bangin a kiliansak mahmah mite tawh a kikimin ka kingaihsun ngam buang kei ding uhhi. Amaute khatlekhat ki-en kakin thupi kisa mahmah uh ahih manin mihai taktak ahi uhhi.

Note in kei a hong pakta ding hinapi-in hong paktalo na hih manun note' bawlin mihai bangin kisialin ka gamta hi. Banghang hiam cihleh kei pen bangmahpi ka hihloh hangin sawltak thupi mahmahin na ngaihsutte uh sangin themkhat zong ka neuzaw tuan het kei hi. 12 Sawltak man taktak ka hihna lim a kilangsak nate, note lakah lungduai takin hong kisem a, lim, na lamdang, leh na a tuamtuamte note lakah hong kibawl hi.

Hih bangin thu ka gen ciangin mite' hong pahtak theihna ding a zong tawh kibang na hong sa uhhiam? Mite' pahtak ding a ut ka hi kei a, Pasian' hong pahtak ding a hanciam ka hihi. Mihingte' hong pahtak theihna dingin a gamta hi zenzen leng, Christ' nasem ka hi kei ding hi.

Tua ahih manin tuhuna ka nuntakna zia pen kei hang hi nawnloin ka sungah a hong om Christ hang a hihi. Tua hi a, keimah hong itin, keima-a' dingin a nuntakna a hong pia Pasian' Tapa ka muan'na tawh tu laitakin a nungta ka hihi.
A kuamah peuh in ama gamtatna ciat entel hen la, kisialhna ding a om leh ama gamtatna siksanin kisial hen la, midangte tawh ki-ettehin kisial kei hen.

Ahi zongin keimah in ahih leh, singlamteh tungah i Topa Zeisu a sihna thu bek ka kisialhpih ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh singlamteh tungah ama sihna hangin kei-a' dingin leitung thute misi bang a, kei zong, leitung thu-ah misi mah ka bang hi.
Mite' nasem bangin kingaihsun loin, Pasian' nasem bangin kingaihsun unla, na sep peuhpeuh uh lungsim takpi tawh lawpin sem un.

Tu ma-a ka hong gensa uh mah bangin kamtam nuam se loin hoihtakin om hithiatna, no tawh a kisai thu bek ngaihsutna, leh note' nuntakna ding na na sepna ding uh hanciamin nei un. 12 Tua bangin gamta le uh cin thu umlo mite in note hong zahtak ding uh a, mite' neihsa na duhgawh kei ding uhhi.
A taktakin ci lehang, leitungah mihingin i suah laitakin sumlepai tawh i suak kei a, i sih ciangin zong leitung panin bangmah i keng thei tuan kei hi.

Tua ahih manin mi a khahkhia thei thukham tawh kizui-in thukhenna a thuakding mi bangin kampau-in na gamta un. 13 Banghang hiam cihleh hehpihna lungsim a neilote tungah Pasian in thu a khen ciangin hehpihlo ding a, hehpihna lungsim a neite tungah Pasian in thu a khen ciangin a hehpihna in zozaw ding hi.
En'na leh huaihamna a om nak leh buaina leh siatna nam khempeuh tawh kizom pahpah hi.
Hih leitung nate leh Pasian tawh a kizomlo thute deihluatin nei kei un. Mi khatpeuh in hih leitung nate a deihluat leh amah in Pa Pasian it taktak theilo hi.
Hih mite in pawl kikhenna piangsakin, amau pumpi deihna bangin gamta uh a, Khasiangtho zong neilo uhhi.
A zuau dingin Pasian pen mihing hilo a, a kisik dingin mihing' tapa hilo hi. Amah in gen khin hi; a gen bangin hihlo ding ahi hiam? Amah in ci khin hi; a cih bangin tungsaklo ding ahi hiam?

Thahat unla, hang un. Lau kei unla, amaute kihta kei un. Banghang hiam cihleh note tawh hong paipa pen { Topa } na Pasian uh a hihi. Note hong cimawhsaklo ding a, hong nusialo ding hi," a ci hi. 7 Tua ciangin Moses in Joshua samin, Israel-te khempeuh muhin ama kiangah, "Thahat in la hang in. Banghang hiam cihleh amaute tungah piak dingin { Topa } in amau' pute pate tungah a ciamsa leitangah hih mite tawh na pai ding a, nangmah in tua leitang amaute na ngahsak ding hi. 8 Na mai-ah a paipa pen { Topa } a hihi. Amah in nang hong ompih ding a, nang hong cimawhsak loin, zong hong nusialo ding hi. Lau kei in la, lungkia kei in," a ci hi.

ka Pasian, ka kihutna, ka buknapa, lum bangin kei a hong dal, ka munmuan'huai leh ka belh, keimah hong honkhiapa hi a, ngong hihna panin hong hon hi. 4 A phat taak { Topa } ka sam a, ka galte kiang panin kei hong kihon hi.

Tua ciangin David in a tapa Solomon kiangah, "Thakhauhin hang in la sem in. Lau kei in; Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } Pasian, keima Pasian nangawn nang tawh hong om hi. { Topa' } biakinn sung nasepna khempeuh a kizawh matengin amah in nang hong tamasaklo ding a, hong nusialo ding hi.
Pasian a mangngilhte tua bangmah a hihi. Pasian a donlo mite' lametna a bei ta a hihi.
Pasian in kei hong that mah taleh zong, phamawh ka sa kei hi. Ahi zongin ama mai-ah ka thu ka gen veve ding hi.
"A kiphuk khinsa singkung nangawn in lametna nei buang a, a bul sel kikin nungtakik thei hi. 8 Lei sungah a zungte teek a, a bulsum a si zongin, 9 guahtui ngahin, singkungno-in hong selkik hi.
{ Topa } aw, lungnemte' deihna na ngai ding hi. A lungsim uh na hatsak ding a, na bil na ngat ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin lungdamin ka kipak a, lungmuangin ka om hi.

{ Topa } pen tuucin' bangin hong cing hi a, kisapna teng kicing ta hi. 2 Lo nona-ah hong lumsak a, tuidam kiangah hong paipih hi. 3 Thahatna thak kei hong guan' hi. A hong ciamsa mah bangin-ah lampi manah kei hong kha hi. 4 { Topa } aw, kei hong ompih na hih manin khuamial thukpi ka nawk hangin ka lau kei hi. Na molhtum leh na ciangkhut in kei hong hu hi. 5 Keima galte' muhna munah an nong lui hi. Thupi takin nong pahtawi a, keima hai zong dimlet ta hi. 6 Na hoihna leh nong itna in ka khan'tawnin a hong zuih ding tel takin-ah ka thei ta a, a tawntungin na inn sungah ka om ding hi.

{ Topa' } tung panin na khat ka ngen khin a, tua ngenin ka zon' ding pen: { Topa' } inn sungah ka khan' tawntungin om ding, { Topa' } hoihna et ding leh ama biakinn sungah thu dot dingte a hihi. 5 Banghang hiam cihleh haksat hun ciangin amah in a buk sungah kei hong seel ding hi. A puanbuk khuhna nuai-ah kei hong seel ding a, a sangna suang tungah kei hong koih ding hi.
{ Topa } muang in. Thakhauh in la, na lungsim hangsakin, { Topa } muang in.

Ama khialhna kimaisak a, ama mawhna a kiselcipsak mi, thupha ngah a hihi. 2 { Topa } in mawhna a khuksakloh mi, a lungsim sungah khemna a omlo mi, thupha ngah a hihi. 3 Ka mawhna ka pulak loh ciangin, sunthapai ka tautauna hangin ka pumpi a thaneem hi. 4 Sun leh zan tawntung gim nong piakna ka thuak a, khuakhal nisa' kat bangin ka thahatna a keucip hi. 5 Keima khialhnate nangma tungah kong pulak a, ka mawhna ka im kei hi. "Ka khialhnate khempeuh { Topa' } tungah ka pulak ding hi," ka ci hi. Tua ciangin ka mawhna nin nong maisak hi.
{ Topa } a ngak mi khempeuh aw, na tha uh khauhsak unla, na lungsim uh hangsak ta un!
Amah a zahtakte, a itna kip lametna a neite, sihna panin honkhia-in, kialpi hun sungin amaute a hin'kep theihna dingin { Topa } in amaute en tawntung hi.
{ Topa } aw, nang kong lamet uh mah bangin kote' tungah na itna kip hong omsak in.

{ Topa } muang in la, gamtat hoih in. Gam nuamah teng in la, thumanin om in. 4 { Topa } sungah lungkim in; amah in na deihna hong pia ding hi. 5 { Topa } tungah na vai teng ap in. Amah muang in; amah in hong sem ding hi. 6 Amah in nangma dikna khuavak bangin, nangma thumanna nitaang bangin hong langsak ding hi. 7 { Topa' } mai-ah khawl dide in la, lungduai takin ngak in. A hihna a daupaipa tung leh siatna a bawlpa tungah kilungso tawmsak ke'n!
Ahih hangin { Topa } aw, nangmah ka hong muang hi. { Topa } ka Pasian aw, a hong dawng dingpa nangmah na hi hi.
Tu-in Topa aw, ke'n, bang ngaklai ding ka hi hiam? Keima lametna nangma sung bekah om hi.

Hotkhiatna hangin lungdam thu mihonpi lakah ka gen ding hi. { Topa } aw, lungdam thugen ka khawl ngei kei ding hi. 10 Nangma hotkhiatna thu ka im kei a, na thumanna leh na hotkhiatna ka gen khin hi. Na itna kip leh na thumanna mihonpi tungah ka im kei hi.
Banghangin khakunkun a, lunghimawh niloh ka hi hiam? Pasian' sungah lametna nei ning; Banghang hiam cihleh kei a hong huh ka Pasian ka phatkik ngawn ding hi.
Banghangin khakunkun a, lunghimawh niloh ka hi hiam? Pasian sungah lametna nei ning; Banghang hiam cihleh kei a hong huh ka Pasian ka phatkik ngawn ding hi.
Pasian, i belh leh i thahatna hi a, haksat hunin a hong huh pahpahpa a hihi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Topa { Pasian } aw, ka neu lai-a kipanin ka hong lamet, ka hong muan' na hi hi, { Topa } aw.
Ahih hangin ke'n, nang kong lamen ding a, nangmah kong phat semsem lai ding hi.
{ Topa } aw, "Ka khe taal," ci-in ka ngaihsut ciangin na itna kip in kei hong kaito hi. 19 Ka lungsim ngaihsutna a tam mahmah ciangin kei na hong hehnem a, na hong lungdamsak hi.
Keimah nong lametsakna ahi na nasempa' tungah na thuciamna hong phawk in.
Nangma thuciamna muang ka hih manin nang hong zahtakte in kei hong mu-in lungdam ding uhhi.
Na hong hotkhiat ding ka ngakngakna-in ka tha bei ta a, nangma thu muangin ka lamen hi.
Nang pen keima bukna mun leh kei hong hupa na hi hi. Na thuciamna ka muang hi.
Kei ka nuntak theihna dingin na thuciamna tawh kizui-in kei hong huh in la, ka lametna-ah kei hong zahhuaisak kei in.
{ Topa } aw, nong hotkhiat ding ka ngak a, na thupiakte ka sem hi.
{ Topa } in siatna khempeuh panin nang hong hu ding a, amah in a muan'huai-in nang hong kem ding hi. 8 { Topa } in tu-a kipan a tawntungin na vaksuk na vaktohna-ah nang hong kem ding hi.
{ Topa' } hong huh ding lawpna tawh ka ngak a, ama thugen ka muang hi.
Israel aw, { Topa } muang in. Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa' } itna kip tawntungin, hong honkhia nuam tawntung hi.

Haksatna tuamtuamte ka thuak ciangin kei nong kem hi. A heh ka galte, kei' tangin nong dosak a, na thahatna tawh kei na hong honkhia hi. 8 { Topa } in kei-a' dingin a ngaihsutte hong tungsak ding hi. { Topa } aw, na itna kip tawntung hi. Na sepsa na maban hong tun' ta in.
Jacob' Pasian pen amah huhpa hi-in, ama { Topa } Pasian a muang mipa mi lungdam a hihi.
Mihoihte' lametna lungdamna hi a, migilote' lametna a hawmpi a hihi.
Lamet tun'lohna in lungsim cinasak a, deihna tangtun'na pen lungdamna a hihi.
Migilopa ama tatsiatna in puksak a, mihoihpa ama hoihtatna in hu hi.
Tua bang hi lecin lametna om a, cithei-in na khan' sau ding hi.
Haksatna na tuah ciangin na lung a kiat leh a ginalo mi na hi hi.
Pilna pen i nuntakna-ah khuaizu tawh kibang a, pilna nei lecin mailamah lametna om a, na khan' hong sausak ding hi.
Gimna lianpi ka thuakna pen keima lungnopna hong suak ding hi. Lauhuaina khempeuh panin kei nong honkhia a, ka mawhna khempeuh na hong maisak hi.
Ahih hangin { Topa } a muang mite a tha uh dimkik ding a, muvanlai bangin kha tawh leengto-in, amaute tai napi-un tawllo ding uh a, amaute lam pai napi-un gimlo ding uhhi.
nang hong ompih ka hih manin lau kei in. Na Pasian ka hih manin lungkia kei in. Nang hong thakhauhsakin ka hong huh ding a, nang hong huhin ka hong honkhia ding hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh keimah { Topa } na Pasian in na khut taklam ka len hi. "Lau kei in, nangmah kong huh ding hi," nang tungah a hong cipa keimah ka hihi.
Amah in leitungah thutang thu a phuh khit matengin lungsi lo, lungkia lo ding hi. Tuipi gei-a om gamte in ama thu ngak uhhi.

Ahih hangin Jacob aw, nangmah hong piangsakpa, Israel aw, nangmah hong bawlpa, { Topa } in tu-in hih bang ci hi: "Hong honkhia khin ka hih manin lau kei in. Na min tawh kong sam khinzo a, nang pen kei-a' na hi hi. 2 Tuite na kantan ciangin nang kong ompih ding a, gunte na kantan ciangin tui in hong tuumlo ding hi. Mei kantanin na pai ciangin na kang kei ding a, meikuangte in nang hong kangtumlo ding hi. 3 Banghang hiam cihleh kei pen { Topa } na Pasian, Israel-te' Siangtho Pa, nangmah hong honpa ka hihi. Nangmah tatna dingin Egypt ka pia a, nangmah khekna dingin Ethiopia leh Seba ka pia hi.
nang hong ompih ka hih manin lau kei in. Na Pasian ka hih manin lungkia kei in. Nang hong thakhauhsakin ka hong huh ding a, nang hong huhin ka hong honkhia ding hi.

Gimna a thuak mite tungah thuhoih a puak dingin { Topa } in kei hong teelin hong sawl ahih manin keima sungah Topa { Pasian}' kha hong om hi. Lungsim kitamzante a damsak ding, salin a kimante tungah suahtakna thu a gen ding, a kikhum mite-a' dingin thong kong a hong ding,
Ahi zongin { Topa } aw, nang pen kote' Pa na hi hi. Kote pen tungman bang hi-in, nang pen beelsekpa bang na hi a, kote khempeuh nangma bawl mite ka hi uhhi.
"{ Topa } muangin amah a beel mi in thupha a ngah a hihi.
Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } in kong cihin-ah, mailamah lametna note kong piakkik ding, na siatna ding uhhiloin na phattuamna ding uh geelna ka neihte kei bek in ka thei hi.

{ Topa } in kong cihin-ah: "Kap nawn kei unla, na khitui uh nul un. Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } in kong cihin-ah, na nasep thaman uh na ngah uhhi. Amaute galte' gam panin hong ciahkik ding uhhi. 17 Na mailam uh-a' dingin lametna a om hi, { Topa } in kong ci hi. Na tate uh zong na gam mah uhah hong ciahkik ding uhhi.

Ahi zongin ka phawk giugiau thu khat in lametna khat hong nei theisak hi. 22 A bei theilo { Topa }' hong itna leh a hehpihna a kizom paisuak hi a, 23 zing nisuak bangin thaksuak tawntung a, ni a hong suah pelmawh mah tawh a kibang a hihi. 24 { Topa } longal neihdang neilo ka hih manin ama tung bekah lametna ka nei hi. 25 Amah a muangte-a' dingin { Topa } a hoih hi. 26 Tua ahih ciangin thuakzawhna tawh ngak kenkanzo lehang a hoihpen a hihi. A hong hotkhiat ding amah ngak ni.
Zion Mual panin { Topa } hong hawksuk a, Jerusalem panin hong awngkek a, vanpi leh leipi a ling damdam hi. Ahi zongin { Topa } pen ama mite' belhpa hi a, Israel mite a hu ding hi.

{ Topa } na Pasian un note hong ompih a, ama vangliatna in hong gualzosak hi. Note tungah { Topa } lungkim ding a, ama hong itna tawh hong thakbawl ding hi. Note' hangin { Topa } lungdamin la sa ding a,
Lametna a om no salte aw, ciahkik unla, a muan'huai mahmah na mun ngei uh zuankik un. Note' thuaknasa a zah nihin thupha ka hong piakna ding tuni-in note kiangah ka hong gen hi.
Thudang khempeuh sangin Pasian' ukna leh ama deihna na zuih theihna ding uh thupi ngaihsut masazaw un. Tua hi leh hih na kisapna dangte khempeuh uh zong hong piathuah veve ding hi.
Na semin vangik pua-in a gim mite khempeuh aw, ka kiangah hong pai ta un. Note tungah lungsim tawldamna ka hong pia ding hi.

Tua laitakin kikhopna inn ukpa' inn panin kamtaite hong tung uh a, "Na tanu si khinta hi. Banghangin Siapa mawk gimsak nawn ding na hi hiam?" a ci uhhi. 36 Ahi zongin Zeisu in amau thu kigen donloin kikhopna inn ukpa kiangah, "Lunghimawh kei in; upna nei peuh in," a ci hi.
Zeisu in, "Banghangin na hihtheih leh, ci na hi hiam? A umte-a' dingin na khempeuh hithei hilo ahi hiam?" a ci hi.
Tua ahih manin Pasian in a bawl theihloh khat zong omlo hi," ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in a nungzuite kiangah, "Note lunghimawh kei un. Pasian um unla, kei zong hong um un.

Zeisu in, "Hih tui a dawn khempeuh dangtak kik ding uh a, 14 ahi zongin keima piakding tui a dawn khempeuh dangtak kik nawnlo ding uhhi. Tua ka piak tui a dawnte sungah nuntakna tuinak piang ding a, a nungtasak paisuak ding hi," a ci hi.
Zeisu in ama kiangah, "Keimah in Lampi ka hi a, Thuman, leh Nuntakna zong ka hihi. Kei hong suangloin Pa kiangah kuamah tung theilo ding hi.
"Note a cimawh dingin ka hong nusia kei ding hi. Note kiangah ka hong paikik ding hi.

Keimah tawh na hong kipawlna uh hangin lungnopna na neihtheihna dingun hih thu a hong gen ka hihi. Leitung gimna na thuak ding uhhi. Ahi zongin keimah in leitung nate zo khinta ka hih manin lungnuamin om un," a ci hi.

Uliante in Peter leh Johan a han' mahmahna thu leh amaute pilna sang a neilo mi mawkmawk ahihna thu a theih uh ciangin lamdang a sa mahmah uhhi. Tua ciangin Zeisu tawh a kikhawl khin ngeite ahihna uh a phawk uhhi.

Paul in tua uliante lakah Saddusi mi leh Pharisee mi a omlam a muh ciangin amaute kiangah, "Lawmte aw, kei pen Pharisee mite' suan ahi Pharisee mi ka hihi. Mi site hingkik ding hi, ci-in lamenin upna ka neih manin hih lai-ah thusitna ka thuak hi," a ci hi.

Ahi zongin nangma kiangah kong pulaknop thu in: Amaute in manlo hi, a cih uh tua Thu zui-in kote' pu leh pate' Pasian ka bia hi. Moses' Thukham laibu sunga a kigelh thu khempeuh leh kamsangte' laibu sunga a kigelhte khempeuh zong ka um hi. 15 Amaute' up leh lamet mah bangin, Pasian in miphate leh misiate a kibangin sihna panin hingkik sak khawm ding hi, ci-in umin ka lamen hi.

Laisiangtho sungah, "Na suanlekhakte aksi zahin tam ding hi," ci-in a kigelh mah bangin tua bang a pian'theihna ding lametna a om nailopi mahin Abraham in umin lamen ahih manin minam tampite' pupi a suak hi.

Tu-in upna hangin Pasian tawh kipawl khinta ihih manin i Topa Zeisu Christ hangin Pasian tawh a kilemkik ta ihi hi. 2 Ama hangin upna tawh tu-a i omna Pasian hehpihna sungah a tung ihi a, Pasian tawh minthan'na ngahkhawm ding, ci-in lamen ihih manin i lung a dam hi. 3 Haksatna i thuak laitak nangawnin i lungdam veve hi. Banghang hiam cihleh haksatna in thuakzawh hatna piangsak a, 4 thuakzawh hatna in Pasian' pahtakna hong ngahsak a, ama hong pahtakna in lametna lianpi hong neisak ahihna thu i thei hi. 5 Pasian in eite tungah a hong piak a Khasiangtho tawh eite sungah ama itna hong guang ahih manin hih lametna in eite hong lungkiasak ngeilo hi.

Hih bangin lamenin i upna in eite hong honkhia khin hi. Ahi zongin i lamet pen i muh ciangin tua pen lamet hi nawnlo hi. Kua in a muhsa nate lamen nawn ahi hiam? 25 I muhlohte i lamet ciangin lungduai takin i ngak thei hi.

Tua ahih manin bang in Christ' itna tawh hong kikhensakzo ding ahi hiam? Haksatna, lungkhamna, bawlsiatna, gilkialna, zawn'na, lauhuaina, sihnate khat peuhpeuh in hong khenzo ding ahi hiam? 36 Laisiangtho sungah zong, "Note hangin sunthapai-in siatna ding lauhuaina ka thuak uh a, gawhding tuu bangin a hong kibawl hi," ci-in a kigelh hi. 37 Eite a hong itpa' hangin hih thu khempeuhah a gualzo pente ihi hi.
Lamet na neihna hangun lungdamin om tawntung unla, lungkhamna na thuak uh ciangin lungduai-in thu na ngen tawntung un.
Laisiangtho sungah a om thu khempeuh pen eite hilhna ding, eite in lametna nei-in i thuakzawhna ding, leh i thahat theihna dingin a kigelh a hihi.
Khasiangtho' huhna tawh note' lametna a khan' semsem theihna dingin, lametna a hong piathei Pasian in, amah na upna uh hangin lungdamna leh nopsakna tawh note hong kidimsak ta hen.

Tua ahih manin Laisiangtho sungah, "Kuamah in a muh ngeiloh, a zak ngeiloh, piangthei dingin zong a ngaihsutloh uh thu pen Pasian in amah a it mite-a' dingin a bawlkholh saksa ahi hi," ci-in na kigelh hi.
Tu laitakin a omlai thu thumte pen upna, lametna, leh itna hi a, tua thumte sung panin itna mah a thu lianpen a hihi.
Christ hangin i lamet thu pen hih i leitung nuntak sung thu ding bek hi takpi leh leitung midang khempeuhte sangin a hehpihhuai zaw ihi ding hi.
Hih bang lametna nei ka hih manun hangtakin a om ka hi uhhi.

Tua thu hangin ka lungkia tuankei uhhi. Kote' leitung pumpi in damdamin muatlam ding a manawh ahi zongin ka kha nuntakna uh a nini-in thaksuak semsem hi. 17 Tuhun laitakin tomno sung lungkhamna ka thuakte uh in ka thuakna uh sangin nakpi takin a lianzaw tawntung minthan'na sung hong tun'pih ding hi. 18 Banghang hiam cihleh a kimuthei nate a mitsuan' ka hi kei uh a, a kimu theilo nate a mitsuan' ka hi uhhi. A kimuthei nate tomno sung bek kimang a, a kimu theilo nate a tawntungin a kip a hihi.

Tua na dahna uh hotkhiatna ngahtheihna dingin na lungsim uh na kheelna dingun Pasian in hong zang ahih manin dahna ding bangmah omlo hi. Ahi zongin hih leitung dahna lelte in ahih leh sihna piangsak hi.
Kei ka thaneem mahmah laitakin a thahat mahmah suak ka hih manin Christ hangin ka thaneemna, simmawh ka thuakna, haksatna leh bawlsiatna leh lungkhamna ka thuaknate tawh ka lung a kim mahmah hi.
Kote ahih leh Pasian in amah tawh a kipawlthei dingin hong bawl ding hi, ci-in lamenin, kote' upna hangin Khasiangtho' vangliatna tawh hong piangding hi, ci-in a om ka hi uhhi.
Tua ahih manin na hoih sepding cimtak kei ni. Lungkia loin i sep nak leh a hun ciangin thaman i ngah ding hi.

Note bangdingin hong sam a, a mite tungah a hong ciam thupha lamdangte bangzah takin lian a, thu um ahi eite sungah na a hong sem vangliatna bangzah takin lian ahi hiam, cih na muhtheihna dingun note' lungsim mit hong vaksakna dingin thu ka na ngen hi. Eite sungah na a hong sem vangliatna pen sihna panin Christ hingsakin, vantung gamah zong, ama taklamah a tutsakna dingin a zat vangliatna mah a hihi.
A kibang lametna khat bek a ngahkhawm dingin Pasian in note hong sap mah bangin eite khempeuh pumkhat bek hi-in Khasiangtho zong khat bek mah a neikhawm ihi hi.
Siklukhu khuk bangin hotkhiatna nei unla, Khasiangtho in a hong piak Pasian' thu pen namsau zat bangin na zang un.

Ka si a, ka hing zongin, a diak diakin tu-a kipanin a tawntungin midangte in Christ phat theihna ding lungsim han'na a neih theihna dingun ka lungsim leh ka pumpi tawh keima tavuan ka lelh hetlohna ding pen ka deihdeih, ka lametet bulpi a hihi.
Sanggamte aw, a tawpna-ah ka hong gennop thu in, a hoih leh a phattaak thute tawh na lungsim uh na kidimsak un. Tuate in: A man, a dik, a tang, a siangtho, a deihhuai, leh a pahtakhuai thute a hihi.
Christ in a hong piak vangliatna tawh hihte khempeuh nawkzawhna ding thahatna a nei ka hihi.
Thudang na zakma un, lungdamna thuman taktak na zak uh ciangin lametna na nei uhhi. Note-a' dingin vantungah a hong kikoihsak tua lametna hangin note in muan'na leh itna a nei na hi uhhi.

Ahi zongin note in lungdamna thu na zak cil lai-un na neih uh lametna panin ling hetloin, bulkip nei-in citakin na om paisuak ding uh a hihi. Tua lungdamna thu mah keimah Paul in hilhin ka sepbel hi a, leitung mun khempeuhah a kihilh lungdamna thu mah a hihi.

Pasian in mi khempeuh-a' dingin a koihcing hih a thupi a deihhuai a thusim pen ama mite tungah pholak ding a sawm a hihi. Tua thusim in: Christ tawh a kipawlte in Pasian tawh minthan'na ngahkhawm ding hi, cihna a hihi.

Banghang hiam cihleh i Pa Pasian kiangah thu ka nget simun note' upna hangin na nuntakziate uh, itna na neih manun nakpi takin na nasepnate uh leh i Topa Zeisu Christ hong paikik ding lametna na neih manun kiptakin na omnate uh ka phawk tawntung uhhi.
I Topa Zeisu Christ mahmah leh, eite hong itin, a hong hehpihna tawh thakhauhna leh lametna a hong pia tawntung eite' Pa Pasian in
Sanggamte aw, lametna a neilo mite bangin na dahluat lohna dingun a sisa mite' omzia ding thu na theih ding uh ka deih hi.
Ahi zongin eite pen khuavak gamtatna a nei sun khuavak mi ihih manin pilvang ni. Awmdal bangin upna leh itna bulhin, siklukhu bangin i lamet hotkhiatna khu ni.
Eite a hong hon Pasian leh eite' lamet Christ Zeisu' thupiakna tawh Christ Zeisu' sawltak ahi keimah Paul in
A diakdiakin ei thu umte in mi khempeuh a Honkhia, a nungta Pasian muangin lamen ihih manin nakpi takin hanciamin na a sem ihi hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in eite tungah meidawina lungsim hong guan'lo a, thahatna, ki-itna, pumpi ki-ukzawhna lungsim hong guan' hizaw hi.

Eite in i lamet, a lian Pasian leh eite hong Hon Zeisu Christ a vangliatna hong kilatkik ding hun ngakin i om laitakin i biakna tawh a kituaklo thute leh leitung nate deihna phiatin, lungsim hi hithiatin omin, thutangin, hih leitungah Pasian' deihna bangin i nuntakna dingin tua hehpihna thu in eite hong hilh hi.
ama hong hehpihna hangin Pasian tawh kilemin i lamet nuntak tawntungna a ngah thei ihi hi.
Ahi zongin Christ pen Pasian' innsung a uk Tapa ahihna tawh a citak a hihi. I lametna thu tawh kisai-in lungsim han'na leh muan'na tawh i omsuak nak leh eite pen Pasian' inn ihi hi.
Tua ahih manin a kisap hunin, eite a hong huhdingin hehpihna leh dikna thupha i ngahtheihna dingin, kimuan'na lungsim tawh hehpihna tokhom va zuan ciat ni.
Note khat ciat' lametna thu hong tun' taktak theihna dingin a tawp dongin lawpin na thanop paisuakna ding uh ka hong deihsak pha uhhi.

Tua hi a, a kikheel theilo thu nih kithuap ahih manin Pasian in zuau gen theilo ding hi. Tua hi a, amah a beel eite in eite mai-ah hong kikoih lametna thu kiptakin i letcipna dingin i tha hong nuamsak hi. 19 I lungsim a hong kipsak dingin tu-a bang lametna a nei ihi hi. Tua i lametna kician mahmah a, vantung biakinn siangtho tawngnung sung ciangdong tung khinta hi.
Pasian in piakdingin a hong ciam thu muangngam ihih manin i lametna thu kiptakin len ni.
Upna nei i cih ciangin i muhtheih nailoh i lamette ngah takpi ding, ci-in muan'na lungsim neihna a hihi.
A hoih takpi mah hiam, ci-in sinna a thuak ciangin a nangzote a hampha mahmah a hihi. Tua bangin a nangzote in, amah a itte tungah Pasian in a piakdingin a ciam nuntakna lukhu a ngah ding uhhi.

I Topa Zeisu Christ' Pa Pasian tungah lungdam ni. Ama hong hehpih mahmahna hangin sihna panin Zeisu Christ a thawhkik sakna tawh eite tungah nuntakna thak a hong pia hi. Tua ahih manin i lametna kiam ngeilo a,
Tua ahih manin na lungsim uh ki-ukin a kigingsa-in om unla, Zeisu Christ hong kilat ni ciangin na ngahding uh hehpihna thupha ngaihsutin nei un.
Sihna panin amah hingkiksakin minthan'na a pia Pasian, ama hangin muang thei na hih uh manin, na up na muan' na lamet uh Pasian a hihi.

Na lungsim sung uhah Christ zahtakbawl unla, amah Topa-in nei un. Note' lametna thu a hong dong a omkhak leh hoihtakin a genthei dingin kiging tawntung unla, ahi zongin lungnemna leh zahtakna lim tawh gen un.
Christ a siangtho mah bangin amah tawh kibat ding a lamen khempeuh in zong a nuntakna uh siangthosak ding hi.

Itna nei lehang launa omlo a, itna cingtaak nei peuh lehang launa beimangta hi. Banghang hiam cihleh launa i cih pen gimthuak ding kihtakna hi a, gimthuak ding a laute pen itna cingtaak a neilote a hihi.

Na thuakding uh haksatnate kihta kei un. Dawimangpa in note pawlkhat thong sungah hong khia-in hong ze-et ding hi. Gimna na thuak hun ding uh ni sawm sung bek hi ding hi. Na sih dongun kei tungah hong citak un. Tua hi leh nuntakna lukhu ka hong pia ding hi.

Nangma mi a sisate hingkik ding uh a, amau' pumpi thokik ding hi. Han sungah a lum mite aw, tho-in lungdamin la sa un! Banghang hiam cihleh zing daitui in leitung a nosak kik bangin sawtpi-a a sisa mite { Topa } in hingkiksak ding hi.

Amah in kei kiangah, "Mihing ahi Ezekiel aw, hih misi guhte a nungtakik thei ding hiam?" ci-in hong dong hi. Kei zong, "Topa { Pasian } aw, hih thu nang bek in na thei ding hi," ci-in ka dawng hi. 4 Tua ciangin amah in, "Hih guhte tungah thu hilh in la, hih guhkeute in { Topa' } thu a ngaihna dingun gen in. 5 Topa { Pasian } ahi keimah in amaute tungah ka gen thu hih bangin gen in: Note sungah hu kong guan ding a, note kong nungtasak kik ding hi. 6 Thagui leh sazang kong guan ding a, vun tawh kong tuam ding hi. Tua ciangin na sung uhah hu hong guan in kong nungtasak kik ding hi. Tua ciangin { Topa } ka hihna nong thei ding uhhi, ci-in gen in," hong ci hi. 7 Tua ahih ciangin hong sawl bangin thu ka gen hi. Tua bangin thu ka gen laitakin a kigawi zuazua a ging ka za a, tua guhte khatlekhat kizomkik uhhi. 8 Tua bangin ka et laitakin thagui leh sazang in tua guhte tuam a, tua ciangin a vun in zong hong tuam hi. Ahi zongin tua pumpite sungah hin'theihna hu om nailo hi. 9 Tua ciangin amah in kei kiangah, "Mihing ahi Ezekiel aw, huihte tungah thu gen in la, hih a sisa pumpite sungah hu sangin a hingkiksak dingin mun khempeuh panin hong pai un, ci-in Topa { Pasian } in thu hong pia hi, ci-in gen in," hong ci hi. 10 Tua ahih ciangin hong sawl bangin ka gen hi. Tua pumpite sungah hin'theihna hu hong lut a, tua ciangin amaute hingin a khe-un hong ding uhhi. Galkap honpi khat zah pha-in tam mahmah uhhi. 11 Tua ciangin { Pasian } in kei kiangah, "Mihing ahi Ezekiel aw, Israel mite pen hih guhte tawh kibang uhhi. Amaute in, ‘I keucip a, i lamet ding bangmah om nawnloin i nuntakna guipi beita hi,’ ci uhhi. 12 Tua ahih ciangin ka mi Israel-te tungah thu gen in la, Topa { Pasian } in hih bangin ci hi, ci-in gen in: Ka mite aw, tu-in note' hankhuk kong hon'sak ding a, note hong paikhiatpihin, Israel gam kong tun'pihkik ding hi. 13 Note na kiphumna uh hankhuk hong hon'sakin kong paikhiatpih ciangin { Topa } ka hihna thu nong thei ding uhhi. 14 Note sungah keima nuntakna hu kong guan ding a, note hong hingsak kikin, na gam uhah kong tengsak kik ding hi. Tua ciangin { Topa } ka hihna thu nong thei ding uhhi. Hih bangin kong hihna ding thu ka kiciamzo a, ka kiciam bangin kong hih ding hi. { Topa } ahi keimah in hih thu ka gen khinzo hi, ci-in gen in," hong ci hi.
A sisa mi tampite in nuntakna a ngahkik ding uhhi. Pawlkhatte nungta tawntung ding uh a, pawlkhatte in a tawntung zumna leh minsiatna a ngah ding uhhi.

Tua unau pasal sagihte a sih khit ciangin a numei zong a si hi. 28 Tua ahih manin tua unau pasal sagihte in tuanu ten'pihkim uh ahih manin, thawhkik hun ciangin a koi pen' zi hi ding ahi hiam?" ci-in a dong uhhi. 29 Ahi zongin Zeisu in, "Note in Laisiangtho thu ahi a, Pasian' vangliatna ahi zongin theilo na hih manun na ngaihsunkhial uhhi.
Hankhukte zong kihong a, Pasian' mi a sisa tampite zong kithokik sak hi.

Tua ciangin, thawhkikna omlo hi, a ci Saddusi mi pawlkhat hong pai leuleu uh a, 19 "Sia aw, ‘Mi khat in ta neiloin a zi a sihsan leh tua a si mipa' khang a kizop theihna dingin a naupa in tua meigongnu ten'pih ding hi,’ ci-in Moses in eite-a' dingin ngeina a koih hi. 20 Khatvei, unau pasal sagih om uhhi. A u pen in zi nei a, ta neiloin a si hi. 21 A nau in a upa' zi luah hi; amah zong ta neiloin si leuleu hi. A thumnapa, 22 leh adangte khempeuh, a sagihna dong in tuanu ten'pih uh a, ta neilo vive mahin a si uhhi. A tawpna ciangin tua numei zong a si hi. 23 Tua ahih leh, hih unau pasal sagihte in hihnu ten'pih kim ciat uh ahih manin, mi khempeuh a thawhkik ni ciangin a kua pen' zi hi ding ahi hiam?" ci-in a dong uhhi. 24 Zeisu in, "Na khial mahmah uhhi. Laisiangtho ahi a, Pasian' vangliatna ahi zongin na theihlohna hang uh a hihi. 25 Sihna panin mite a thawhkik ciangin vantungah a om vantung mite mah bangin zinei pasalnei cih omlo ding uhhi. 26 Thawhkikna thu tawh kisai-in ci lehang, Moses' laigelhna sung sawlpang kuang thu a genna munah Pasian in Moses kiangah, ‘Kei pen Abraham' Pasian, Isaac' Pasian, Jacob' Pasian ka hi hi,’ a cihna mun sim ngeilo na hi uhhiam? 27 Tua bang a cih ciangin Pasian pen misite' Pasian hiloin mihingte' Pasian hi, a ci nuam a hihi. Tua ahih manin na ngaihsun khial mahmah uhhi," ci-in a dawng hi.

Hih thu ka hong gen ciangin lamdangsa kei un. Han sungah a om misi khempeuh in ama aw za-in, 29 han sung panin a hong paikhiat uh hun hong tung ding hi. A gamtat hoih mite pen a nungta tawntung dingin hong thokik ding uh a, a gamtat siate ahih leh mawhsak thukhenna a thuak dingin hong thokik ding uhhi.

Kei hong sawlpa' deihna in: Ka khutsungah a hong piak mi khempeuh khat zong khahsuah loin nitawp ni ciangin ka hin'sakkik ding a hihi. 40 Tua ahih manin Tapa mu-in a um mi khempeuh in nuntak tawntungna ngahin, nitawp ni ciangin ka hin'sak ding, ka Pa in hong deih ahi hi," a ci hi.

Tua ahih manin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, "A mantakin kong genin-ah, Mihing Tapa' sa na nek kei uh a, a sisan na dawn kei uh leh note sungah nuntakna omlo ding hi. 54 Ka sa ne-in ka si a dawnte a nungta tawntung hi a, nitawp ni ciangin ka hingsak ding hi. 55 Banghang hiam cihleh ka sa, an taktak hi a, ka sisan, dawnding tui taktak a hihi.

Ahi zongin a thuman taktak ci lehang, a sisa mite zong hingkik takpi ding hi cih a kitel theihna dingin sihna panin Christ kihingkik sak khinzo hi. 21 Banghang hiam cihleh mi khat hangin sihna a ommah bangin mi khat hang mahin misite zong hin'kikna om hi. 22 Banghang hiam cihleh Adam tawh a kizop manin mi khempeuh si a, tua mah bangin Christ tawh a kizom khempeuh zong kihingsak kik ding hi. 23 Ahi zongin tua hin'kikna pen ama hun tawh kizui-in a banbanin hi ding hi. A masa penin Christ hi a, Christ hong paikik ciangin ama pawlte khempeuh hingkik ding hi.

Misite a thawhkikna zong hihte mah tawh kibang hi. A kiphum pen a muat thei hi a, a thokik pen a muat theilo a hihi. 43 A kiphum laitakin hatloin melsia a, a kithawhsak kik ciangin thahatin a melhoih hi. 44 A kiphum laitakin leitung pumpi hi a, a kithawhsak kik ciangin kha pumpi a hihi. Leitung pumpi a om mah bangin kha pumpi zong a omding a hihi.

Peengkul nunung hong gin' ciangin mitphiat kikal sungin i kikheelpak ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh peengkul hong gin' ciangin misite a sithei nawnlo dingin hong tho ding a, i vekpi-in i kikheel ding hi.

Zeisu si-in thokik hi, ci-in i up mah bangin Pasian in Zeisu hong paipih kik ciangin amah umin a si mite zong hong tonpih ding hi, ci-in i um hi. 15 Topa' thugen note kiangah ka hong gen uh thu in: Topa hong paikik ni ciangin a nungta lai eite pen a sisa mite tawh a kimuh ma-in Topa tawh i kimu kei ding hi. 16 Pasian' thupiakna awging lianpi, vantung mi mangpa' thugenna, leh Pasian' peengkul hong ging ding a, vantung panin Topa mahmah hong paisuk ding hi. 17 Tua ciangin tua hun laitakin a nungta lai eite pen vankim lai-ah Topa a dawn dingin amah a um a sisa mite tawh hong kilakhawm ding a, Topa tawh i omkhawm tawntung ding hi, cihna a hihi. 18 Tua ahih ciangin note khatlekhat hih thu tawh na kihehnem un.
Mi khempeuh khatvei si-in, tua khit ciangin Pasian' thukhenna a thuakding ahih mah bangin,

Tui pen note a hong honkhia tuiphumna lim hi a, pumpi panin nin sawpkhiatna lim hiloin, Zeisu Christ thawhkikna hangin lungsim siangthona dingin Pasian' tungah kamciamna lim a hihi. Tua Zeisu thawhkikna in note hong honkhia a hihi. 22 Tu-in vantungah tua Christ pai khin a, Pasian' taklamah omin, vantung mite leh ukna aana a neite khempeuh tungah a ukin a om hi.

Tua ciangin tokhom tungah a tu mi pawlkhat ka mu a, tua mite tungah thukhenna ding aana a kipia a hihi. Zeisu thu a genna leh Pasian thu hangin a kithat mite' kha zong ka mu hi. Tua mite in ganhing ahi a, a lim ahi zongin bialo uhhi; a taltang uhah ahi a, a khut tung uhah ahi zongin ganhing ciamtehna neilo uhhi. Amaute hong hingkik uh a, Christ tawh kum tul khat sung ukna aana a neikhawm uhhi. 5 Kum tul khat a cin'mateng a si dangte hingkiklo uhhi. Hih pen sihna panin thawhkikna a masa a hihi. 6 Hih thawhkikna masa sungah a kihel mite pen Pasian' mi siangtho hi a, a hampha mahmah ahi uhhi. Nihvei sihna in tua bang mite bangmah cihzo nawnlo ding a, amaute pen Pasian leh Christ' siampite hi ding uh a, amah tawh kum tul khat sung ukna aana nei ding uhhi.
Tuipi sungah a om misite, tuipi in hong pusuah a, Sihna leh Misite' Gam in zong amau sungah a om misite hong pusuah uhhi. Tua ciangin a vekpi-in amaute' gamtatnasa tawh kizui-in thu a kikhen hi.

Tua ciangin numei kiangah, "Naupaina-ah na gimna nakpi takin ka khangsak ding a, na a sapipi-in nau na nei ding hi. Ahi zongin na pasal mah na deih ding a, amah in nang tungah hong uk ding hi," a ci hi.
"Note in thukhenna, a sau tehna, a tam tehnate-ah a manloin na gamta kei ding uhhi.
Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } in kong cihin-ah, mailamah lametna note kong piakkik ding, na siatna ding uhhiloin na phattuamna ding uh geelna ka neihte kei bek in ka thei hi.

"Midangte in keima hangin a manlopi-in hong simmawhin hong bawlsia a, a nam tuamtuamin hong gensiat uh ciangin thupha ngah mi na hi uhhi. 12 Note-a' dingin vantungah thaman lianpi hong kikoih kholhsak ahih manin tua bang na tuah uh ciangin nuamin na lungdam un. Note' hun ma-a kamsangte zong tua bangmahin a na kibawlsia ngei a hihi.
"Kuamah, to nih' sila hikhawm theilo hi. Khat mudahin khat it ding a, khat tungah thumanin khat simmawhbawl ding hi. Note in Pasian' na leh leitung sum na na semkhawm zo kei ding uhhi.
"A tawmno-ah a diktatte pen a tamah zong diktat uh a, a tawmno-ah a citaklote pen a tamah zong citaklo uhhi.
Ahi zongin Peter leh sawltak dangte in, "Mite' thu sangin Pasian' thu ka mangzaw ding uhhi.

A kuamah peuh in hong ukte' thu na mang ciat un. Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian' thukimpih lohin kuamah in ukna thu neilo hi; ukna thu nei i cih mite pen Pasian' koih mite a hihi. 2 Tua ahih manin ukna thunei a nialte pen Pasian' koihsa mite a nial suak a, tua bang mite in thukhenna a thuak ding uh a hihi.

Silate aw, launa leh lin'na tawh na leitung tote uh thu mang unla, Christ' na na sep uh mah bangin lungsim takpi tawh na na sepsak un. 6 A hong pahtak ding uh deihna tawh amaute' muhsung bekin tuaci gamtat kei unla, Christ' sila na hihna hangun Pasian' hong deih bangin lungsim takpi tawh na sem un. 7 Mihingte' na a sem bang lelin kingaihsun loin Topa' na a sem bangin kingaihsun unla, thanopna tawh sem un. 8 Salte ahi a, sal ahilote ahi zongin na hoih a sem mi khempeuh, Topa in thaman a piakding lamtak na thei un. 9 Tote aw, silate in note hong bawl mah bangin note in zong amaute limbawl unla, tawn' gawpgawpnate zang nawn kei un. Note leh na silate uh vantung panin To khat khutnuai-ah a om na hihna uh leh tua Topa in kuamah maitang zahtak tuam neiloin a kibangin mi khempeuh thu a khen ahihna thu na phawk ta un.

Mite' nasem bangin kingaihsun loin, Pasian' nasem bangin kingaihsun unla, na sep peuhpeuh uh lungsim takpi tawh lawpin sem un. 24 Topa in note tungah thaman a hong piakding lamtak phawk gige un. Tua bangin na sepna uhah Christ Topa' na a semsem na hi uhhi. 25 A manloin a gamtate in ahih leh a gamtatna bangun thuak ding uhhi. Pasian in kuamah deidan loin amau' gamtatna bang ciatin thu a khen a hihi.

Lungdam tawntungin, 17 thu ngen niloh unla, 18 bangbang hong piang ta leh na lungdamna uh Pasian tungah ko tawntung un. Christ Zeisu tawh kipawlin na nuntakna sung uhah hih bangzia-in na om ding uh Pasian in a hong deih a hihi.

Pasian, a manloin gamta ngeilo ahih manin na Christianpihte uh a beisa hunah na huhna uh leh tudongin na huh laina uh tawh ama-a' dingin na nasepna uh leh amah na itna uh na lahnate uh hong mangngilh hetlo ding hi.

Sanggamte aw, thuhaksa a tuamtuam na thuak uh ciangin lungdamna dingin na ngaihsun zaw un. 3 Tua bangin na upna hong hong kize-etna na thuakzawh uh ciangin na kipna uh hong kilangsak ahihna thu na thei uhhi. 4 A kisam bangmah omloin a cingtaak na suahtheihna dingun na thuakna uh hangin a tawntungin na kip paisuakna dingun na ngaihsun un.
A hoih takpi mah hiam, ci-in sinna a thuak ciangin a nangzote a hampha mahmah a hihi. Tua bangin a nangzote in, amah a itte tungah Pasian in a piakdingin a ciam nuntakna lukhu a ngah ding uhhi.
A hoih a manin gamtat ding thei napi-in a gamta lote a khial a hihi.
Na lo uh a hong khawhsakte a thaman pialo na hih manun tu-in amaute' phunna za un. Anla dingin na sawl uh mite' phunna Vanglian Topa in za khinta hi.

Pasian' thu na ngaihsutna uh tawh a kilawm lopi mahin gimna na thuak uh leh na thuakna uh hangin Pasian in thupha hong pia ding hi. 20 Note na gamtat khialhna uh hangin hong kisat ciangin lungduai takin na thuak manun bangmah phattuamna omlo hi. Ahi zongin a manin gamta napi-in gimna na thuak uh ciangin lungduai takin na thuak uh leh Pasian in thupha hong pia ding hi. 21 Christ mahmah in zong note-a' dingin thuakin, ama khekhap na zuihtheihna dingun etteh ding lim hong nusiat ahih manin hih bangin a thuakding mahin Pasian in note a hong sam a hihi. 22 Khialhna bangmah gamtalo a, zuau a genlam zong kiza ngeilo hi.

Tua mah bangin pasalte aw, note sangin na zite uh a thahatlo zawdeuh ahihna thu na phawk un. Note mah bangin Pasian' piak nuntakna a ngahte ahih uh manin na zite uh zahtak bawl un. Tua hi leh na thungetna uh bangmah in hong nawngkaisak lo ding hi.
Tua bang hinapi-in mi tampi tak in amau' gamtat hoihlohna zui ding uh a, tua bangin amau gamtatna hangin mite in thuman lampi gensia ding uhhi.
Thulamlak ding a neilo mihingte kipuk uh a, thulamlak tampi neihna pen lungmuan'na a hihi.
Lunghihmawhna in lungkhamna piangsak a, kampau hoih in mi lungdamsak hi.
Maitaina in lung nuamsak a, thuhoih zakna in lung damsak hi.
A kilawm hunin kammal khat paukhiatna pen ngun pek tunga kham pek khat a kisuang tawh kibang hi.
A dangtak mipa in tuivot lim a sak bangin gamlapi-a om lawmte' kiang panin thuzak nuam kisa hi.
Mi' gen khempeuh thudon kei in. Na nasempa' hong samsiatna na zakha ding hi.
Sehnel gam leh a khuapite, Kedar mite' ten'na khuaneute a aw uh sangkhai sak un. Sela gama teng mite lungdamna tawh la sasak unla, mual dawn panin amaute awngsak un.
Thuhoih hong puak, kilemna thu a genzak, thuhoih thupha a hong puak, hotkhiatna thu a genzak, Zion tungah, "Na Pasian in uk hi," ci-in mualte kantanin thu hong gen kamtaipa bangzahin hoih ahi hiam?
Tua ciangin mite in, "I Zak thu kua in um thei ding ahi hiam? Hih bang thu-ah { Topa}' vangliatna khut kua in bangci muh theih ding ahi hiam?

A lian mahmah Theofilas aw:—- Eite lakah a piang ngeisa thu a kigente, mi tampi in amau siamna zahciat tawh lai-in a gelh uhhi. 2 A kipat cila kipanin amau' mit mahmah tawh a mu mite in hong gente uh a gelh uh a hihi. 3 Kei zong, hih thute khempeuh a kipat cila kipanin limtakin kantel khin ka hih manin, a thu a kizomzomin nang-a' dingin hong gelhsak leng hoih ding hi, ci-in ka ngaihsun hi. 4 Nang tungah a hong kigensa thute khempeuh a man taktak na theihna ding deihsakna tawh ka hong gelh a hihi.
Na mittang uh note' pumpi-a' dingin meivak tawh kibang hi. Na mit uh ciim leh na pumpi khempeuh un hoihtakin mu thei a, na mit uh maang leh na pumpi uh-a' dingin khuamial a hihi.
Ahi zongin Abraham in, ‘Na sanggamte a hilh dingin Moses leh kamsangte om uh ahih manin tuate' thugen na ngai ta uh hen,’ a ci hi.
Pasian in leitung mite hong it mahmah ahih manin ama Tapa a um mi khempeuh si nawnloin a hin' tawntung theihna dingun a Tapa neihsun a hong piak dongin a hong itna a hong lak hi.

Ahi zongin Isaiah in, "Topa aw, ka thugente uh kua in um ahi hiam?" a cih mah bangin Lungdamna Thu a za mi khempeuh in um kimlo uhhi. 17 Tua ahih ciangin zakna panin upna hong piangthei a, Christ thu upna ding pen hilhna panin hong piangthei pan hi.
Sanggamte aw, mi' khemsa-in ta kei un. Kikholhpih hoihlote in mi siasak thei hi.
Na kiho uh ciangin kamguh zang kei unla, na pauna uh a za mite in phattuamna a ngahtheihna dingin na-in a kimang kam hoihte bek na pau un.
Note pen Pasian' mi na hih manun note lakah nulepa khialhna, a kilawmlo-a gamtatna, huaihamna cihte genin zong na nei vet kei un.
La a tuamtuamte genin sakna tawh Topa' thu gen belin nei unla, na lungsim khempeuh uh tawh Topa phatna la sa un. 20 I Topa Zeisu Christ hangin thu khempeuhah Pa Pasian tungah lungdamna ko ta un.
Thu khempeuh entel pha unla, a hoihte kemin, 22 a sia lamsang peuhmah pelh un.
Ka hong gensa thute na hilhsawn in.
Tua bang numeite in thu a zakzak uh hangin a man leh a manlo khen theilo uh ahih manin thuman thutak thei zolo uhhi.
Sanggamte aw, note in na theihding uh ka deih thu in: Thu kigen khempeuh hoihtakin ngai pahpah un. Ahi zongin pau pahpah kei unla, heh pakpak kei un.
Tua mah bangin lei zong i pumpi na sung panin a neu mahmah khat hinapi-in thusia lianpipi piangsak zo hi. Gam khempeuh zong mei-ek neuno khat pan kipanin a kangtum thei hi.

"Keimah longal pasian dang na bia kei ding uhhi. 4 "A kiseek milim hita leh, tunga vantung hita leh, nuai-a leisung hita leh, leinuai-a om tui sungah hita leh a om na khat peuhpeuh a sun khat peuhpeuh note-a' dingin na bawl kei ding uhhi. 5 Tuate' mai-ah na kun kei ding uh a, tuate na bia kei ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh keimah note' { Topa } Pasian, a aam Pasian ka hi a, kei hong mudahte' tungah pate' mawhna tate' tungah khang thum khang lina dongin thuk-in, 6 ahih hangin kei hong itin ka thupiakte a zui mi a tul tampite tungah itna kip a lakpa ka hihi. 7 "{ Topa } note' Pasian' min a sia lamin na zang kei ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } in ama min a zang khialte gim pia ding hi. 8 "Sabbath ni a siangtho-a zat ding phawk un. 9 Ni guk sung nomau' na semin na nasep ding khempeuh uh na hih ding uhhi. 10 Ahi zongin a ni sagih ni pen { Topa } note' Pasian' Sabbath ni a hihi. Tua ni-in note, na tapate, na tanute, na nasempate, na nasemnute, na ganhing uh ahi a, peemtate in ahi zongin na bangmah na sem kei ding uhhi. 11 Banghang hiam cihleh a ni guk sung tengin { Topa } in van leh lei, tuipi leh tuate sunga om khempeuh bawl a, a ni sagih ni tawlnga hi. Tua ahih ciangin { Topa } in Sabbath ni thupha pia-in siangthosak hi. 12 "{ Topa } na Pasian un note hong piak leitang tungah na khan' uh a sau theihna dingin na nu leh na pa uh zahtak un.13 "Mi na that kei ding uhhi. 14 "Nulepa mawhna na bawl kei ding uhhi. 15 "Na na gu kei ding uhhi. 16 "Na vengte uh langkhatah a manloin teci na pang kei ding uhhi. 17 "Na vengte uh inn na deihgawh kei ding uhhi. Na vengte uh zi hita leh, ama nasempa hita leh, ama nasemnu hita leh, ama bawngtal hita leh, ama la hita leh, na vengte-a' ahi na khat peuhpeuh na deihgawh kei ding uhhi," a ci hi.

{ Topa } in Moses kiangah, "Keima kiang mualtungah hong paito in la, tua lai-ah ngak in. Amaute a kihilhna dingin keima gelhsa, thukham leh thupiakna tawh, suangpek nang tungah kong pia ding hi," a ci hi.
Sinai Mual tungah thugenna a man khit ciangin Pasian' khut tawh a kigelh suangpeek ahi thuciamna suangpeek nihte, amah in Moses a pia hi.
Tua lai-ah sun sawmli leh zan sawmli sung { Topa } tawh Moses om a, tua hun sungteng anletui a ne kei hi. Amah in suangpeek tungah thuciamna kammalte ahi thupiak sawmte a gelh hi.
"Hihlo ding, ci-in { Topa' } thupiakte khat peuhpeuh, mi khatpeuh in hihin a khialh leh, a theihlohna hang hita leh zong, amah a mawh hi veve-in, ama mawhna mah pua ding hi.
"Tua ahih ciangin note in ka thupiaknate zui-in tuate na sem ding uhhi; kei pen { Topa } ka hihi.
A kiseh hun, tu kha ni sawmleli ni nitakin a thukhamte leh a ngeina kip omte bangin na kham ding uhhi," a ci hi.
Thupiak Sawmte ahi note' hih dinga hong thupiak ama thuciamna note' tungah hong gen a, amah in suangpeek nih tungah tuate a gelh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin note leh note' khita na tate uh tungah thu hong nuamin, { Topa } na Pasian un a tawntunga hong piak gam sungah na khan' uh na sausak theihna dingun tuni-a no kiangah kong gen ahi ama thukhamte leh a thupiakte na zui ding uhhi," a ci hi.
Moses in Israel-te khempeuh samin amaute kiangah, "Israel-te aw, tuni-a note' zakin kong gen thukhamte leh ngeina kipte ngai unla, note in thei-in limtakin zuih ding na ngaihsun ding uhhi.

"‘Kei pen salsuahna Egypt leitang panin note a hong paikhiatpih { Topa } na Pasian uh ka hihi. 7 "‘Keimah longal pasian dang na nei kei ding uhhi. 8 "‘A kiseek milim hita leh, tunga vantung hita leh, nuai-a leitung hita leh, leinuai-a om tui sung hita lehah a om na khat peuhpeuh a sun khat peuhpeuh note-a' dingin na bawl kei ding uhhi. 9 Amaute' mai-ah kunloin, amau' na na sem kei ding uhhi; Banghang hiam cihleh keimah { Topa } note' Pasian, a aam Pasian ka hi a, kei hong mudahte' tungah a pate' mawhna a tate' tungah khang thum khang lina dongin thuk-in, 10 ahih hangin kei hong itin ka thupiakte a zui mi a tul tampite' tungah itna kip a lakpa ka hihi. 11 "‘{ Topa } note' Pasian' min a sia lamin na zang kei ding uhhi; Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } in ama min a sia lamin a zang mi a mawhlo hi, cilo ding hi. 12 "‘{ Topa } note' Pasian in hong thupiak bangin na sian'thosakna dingun Sabbath ni tang un. 13 Ni guk sung na semin na nasep ding khempeuh uh na hih ding uhhi. 14 Ahih hangin a ni sagih ni pen { Topa } note' Pasian' Sabbath ni a hihi. Tua ni-in note bangin na nasem numei leh na nasem pasalte uh a tawlngak theihna dingin note, na tapate, na tanute, na nasemnute, na nasempate, na bawngtal, na la, na ganhing khat peuhpeuh uh leh na huang sung uha om zinte in na khat peuhpeuh semlo ding uhhi. 15 Egypt-ah nasem na hihna uh leh tua lai panin { Topa } na Pasian un a vangliatna khut leh a thahatna tawh hong paikhiatpihna na phawk ding uhhi. Tua ahih ciangin Sabbath ni na tan' ding uh { Topa } note' Pasian in thu hong pia hi. 16 "‘{ Topa } note' Pasian in hong piak leitang tungah na khan' uh sau-in na nopsak theihna dingun { Topa } note' Pasian in hong thupiak bangin na nu na pa uh zahtak un. 17 "‘Mi na that kei ding uhhi. 18 "‘Nulepa mawhna zong na bawl kei ding uhhi. 19 "‘Na na gu kei ding uhhi. 20 "‘Na vengte uh langkhatah zong a manloin teci na pang kei ding uhhi. 21 "‘Na vengte uh zi zong na deihgawh kei ding uhhi. Na vengte' inn, a lo, a nasempa, a nasemnu, a bawngtal, a la, ahih kei leh na vengte' na khat peuhpeuh na deihgawh kei ding uhhi,’ ci hi.
{ Topa } note' Pasian, na lungsim khempeuh uh, na nuntakna khempeuh uh, leh na thahatna khempeuh uh tawh na it ding uhhi.
Tua hun laitakin { Topa } in, tuni dongin ama na a sem ding leh ama min tawh thupha a pia dingin { Topa' } mai-ah dingin, { Topa' } thuciamna singkuang a pua dingin Levi minamte a tuam koih hi.

"Israel-te aw, tu-in, { Topa } na Pasian uh zahtak ding, ama lampite tot ding, amah it ding, na lungsim khempeuh uh leh na nuntakna khempeuh uh tawh { Topa } note' Pasian' na sep ding, 13 leh nomau' hoihna dingin tuni-a kong gen thupiaknate leh { Topa' } thukhamte zuih ding cih simloh, { Topa } na Pasian un note' tung panin bang dang hong kal ahi hiam?

"En un, tuni-in na mai uhah thupha khat leh hamsia khat ka koih hi. 27 Tuni-a kong gen, { Topa } na Pasian uh thupiaknate na zuih uh leh thupha hi a, 28 { Topa } na Pasian uh thupiaknate mangloin, na theih nailoh uh pasian dangte' nungzui dingin tuni-a no kong thupiakna panin na kiheikhiat uh leh hamsia a hihi.

"Note in { Topa } na Pasian uh thu mangin, tuni-a kong gen ama thupiakna khempeuh limtakin na zuih uh leh { Topa } na Pasian un leitung minam dangte khempeuh sangin a lianzaw-in note hong bawl ding hi.
"{ Topa } i Pasian in hong lahkhiat loh thusim om a, ahih hangin hih thukham sunga om thute khempeuh i zuih theihna dingin hong lakkhia a, eite leh i suan i khakte' zuih tawntung ding a hihi.

Hih thukham laibu na mangngilh ngei kei ding hi. A sunga kigelh thute khempeuh tawh kizui-in na gamtat theihna dingin sunlezanin na lungngaingai ding hi. Tua hi leh na ma vang ding a, na nasep tangtung ding hi.
Siatna panin kikem in la, gamtat hoih in; tua hi leh na khan'tawnin, na kip paisuak ding hi.
A lungsim sungah ama Pasian' thukham om a, a gamtatna khempeuhah lampial hetlo hi.
Nangma deih bang hihna-ah nuam ka sa hi, ka Pasian aw. Nangma thukham ka lung sungah om hi," ka ci hi.

Eite ihih leh i nuntakna pen lopa tawh kibang a, lolai-ah a po pakte bangin a palh hi. 16 Banghang hiam cihleh huih in amah semin beimang a, tua mun in amah thei nawnlo hi. 17 Ahih hangin { Topa' } itna kip pen amah a zahtak mite tungah a tawntung pan a tawntung dongin kip ngitnget a, ama thumanna pen ama thuciamna zui-in a thupiak bangin sep ding a phawk mite tungah a khang khangin a kip tawntung hi.
{ Topa } phat un. { Topa } zahtakin a thupiaknate nuam a sa mahmah mi, thupha ngah mi a hihi.

Amau' gamtatna-ah paubaan' omloin { Topa' } ngeina sungah a gamtate thupha ngah a hihi. 2 Ama thuhilhnate zui-in, a lungsim khempeuh uh tawh amah zongin, khialhna zong bawlloin, ama lampi a zuite, thupha ngah a hihi. 3 4 Nangma thuhilhte limtakin zuih dingin thu nong pia hi. 5 Nangma ngeina kipte zuihna-ah ka gamtatna kip ta hen. 6 Na thupiakte khempeuh mitsuan'in nei ka hih manin, kei ka maizum kei ding hi. 7 Nangmah biakna ngeina kipte ka sin khit ciangin lungsim thutang tawh nangmah kong phat ding hi. 8 Nangma ngeina kipte ka zui ding hi; kei hong nusia suak kei in.
Nungta-in nangma thu ka zuih theihna dingin na nasempa tungah hong cingh in. 18 Nangma thukham sung panin a lamdang nate ka muh theihna dingin keima mitte hong hon'sak in.
Nangma thumanna kip tawntung a, na thukham zong man tawntung hi.
Thukham a zuite a khan' sau ding a, thukham a zuilote si ding hi.
Mi khat in thukham a zuihnop kei leh ama thungetna nangawn Pasian in zakthadahhuai sa hi.
Amah in { Topa}' nasep nuamsa ding hi. Amah in a tungtham bek muhna tawh thu khenlo ding a, kam lengsawn bek zakna tawh thu khentatlo ding hi.

Ahih hangin { Topa } in kong cihin-ah, tua hun hong tun' ciangin Israel minamte tawh hih bangin thuciamna ka bawl ding hi: Amaute' sungah ka thukham ka koih ding a, amaute' lungtang tungah ka gelh ding hi. Kei pen amaute' Pasian ka hi ding a, amaute pen keima mite ahi ding uhhi.

a pute a pate uh tungah piak dingin na ciamsa, bawngnawi leh khuaizu tui bangin a luan'na hih gam na pia hi. 23 Amau zong lutin a luahpah uhhi. Ahih hangin amaute in na thu hong mangloin, thukham hong zuilo uh a, hih dinga na thupiakte khat beek a hih kei uhhi. Tua ahih manin amaute tungah hih siatna khempeuh na tungsak hi.

a zui peuhpeuh a nuntak theihna ding ka thukhamte leh ka thupiaknate ka hilh hi. 12 { Topa } ahi keimah in amaute pen mi siangtho-in ka bawlna thu a phawkna dingun kote' kikalah thukimna limin Sabbath tan' ding thu ka pia hi.

Kei pen { Topa } ahi note' Pasian ka hihi. Ka thukhamte zui unla, ka thupiaknate bangin gamta un. 20 Kei pen { Topa } ahi note' Pasian ka hihna na phawkna ding uh leh note tawh i bawlsa thukimna lim dingin Sabbath-te na siangthosak un,’ ka ci hi. 21 "Ahi zongin a tate nangawn un kei hong dem uhhi. A zuite in nuntakna a ngahna ding ahi ka thukhamte palsatin ka thupiaknate manglo uh a, Sabbath-te siasak uhhi. Tua ahih manin, ka hehnateng gamlakah thuaksak gawpin, amaute a sumai dingin ka kithawi hi.

"Moses Thukham leh kamsangte' thuhilhnate a phiat dingin hong pai hi, ci-in hong ngaihsun kei un. Tuate a phiat dingin a hong pai hiloin, amaute' hilhna a kicingsak dingin a hong pai ka hizaw hi. 18 Hoihtakin na phawk ding uh thu panin: Van leh lei a bei mateng, hih thukhamte a neupen khat nangawn' deihna tangtung lopi-in mawkmailo ding hi. 19 Tua ahih manin hih thukhamte lakpan a neupente khat bek nangawn zuikha loin, midangte in zong a zuihlohna dingin a gen mite pen vantung ki-ukna sungah mi neupen hi ding uhhi. Ahi zongin hih thukhamte zui-in, midangte in zong a zuihna dingin a hilh mite pen vantung ki-ukna sungah milian hi ding uhhi. 20 Tua ahih manin Pasian' deihna bangin gamtatna ding thu-ah Thukham hilh siate leh Pharisee mite sangin na cihtakzawk uh leh vantung ki-ukna sungah a om thei bek ding na hi uhhi.
Tua ahih manin note tungah hong kibawl ding na deih bangun midangte tungah na bawl un. Moses Thukhamte leh kamsangte' thuhilhnate pen hih mah a deihna a hihi.

Zeisu in amaute kiangah, "David leh a kikholhpihte a gilkial laitakun David' gamtatna thu sim ngeilo na hi uhhiam? 4 Pasian' innsungah amah lut a, siampite lobuang, amah leh a kikholhpihte in a nektheih ding a hilo Ompihna Anlum la-in amah leh a kikholhpihte in a ne uhhi. 5 Tua ahih kei leh zong siampite in Sabbath sim mahin biakinn sungah Sabbath thukham khial napi-in mawhsakna a ngah tuanlohna thu uh, Moses Thukham sungah sim ngeilo na hi uhhiam?

Khatvei, Zeisu kiangah mi khat hong pai a, "Sia aw, nuntak tawntungna ka ngahna dingin bang gamtat hoih gamta ding ka hi hiam?" ci-in a hong dong hi. 17 Zeisu in, "Banghangin bang hoih hiam cih thu hong dong na hi hiam? A hoih khat bek om hi. Nuntak tawntungna sungah na lutnop leh thukhamte na zui in," ci-in a dawng hi. 18 Amah in, "Bang thukhamte ahi hiam?" ci-in a dot ciangin Zeisu in, "Mi that kei in; numei tungah mawh kei in; mi neihsa gu kei in; zuauthu gen kei in; 19 na nu na pa zahtak in; nang na ki-it bangin na vengte na it in, cihnate ahi hi," a ci hi. 20 Tua ciangin tangvalpa in, "Hihte khempeuh ka zuihsa ahi hi; bang kisam lai ding ka hi hiam?" a cih ciangin 21 Zeisu in, "Mi cingtaak na hihnop leh pai-in na neihsate va zuak in la, na sum khotte, mizawngte tungah va pia lecin, vantungah sum na hau ding hi. Tua ciangin hong pai in la kei hong zui in," a ci hi.
Hih pen a masapen, a lianpen thukham a hihi. 39 A nihna pen a masa mah tawh kibang a, nangma pumpi na it bangin na vengte na it in, cihna a hihi.

Zeisu in a khualzinna a zom dingin a paikhiat ding laitakin mi khat hong tai-in a mai-ah hong khukdin' a, "A dik siapa aw, nuntak tawntungna ka ngahna dingin bang hih ding ka hi hiam?" a ci hi. 18 Zeisu in, "Banghangin kei midik hong ci na hi hiam? Pasian simloh kuamah a diktatzo omlo hi. 19 Mi that kei in; numei tungah mawh kei in; mi' neihsa gu kei in; mi khem kei in; na nu na pa zahtak in, cihna thukhamte theilo na hi hiam?" a ci hi. 20 Amah in, "Sia aw, ka neutunga kipanin hih thukhamte khempeuh ka zuikhin hi," a ci hi. 21 Tua ciangin Zeisu in itna tawh tua mipa enin, "Na khat bek na kisam lai hi. Pai in la, na neih khempeuh na zuak khit ciangin mizawngte tungah na sumkhotte va pia in. Tua hi leh vantungah sum na hau ding hi. Tua khit ciangin ka nung hong zui in," a ci hi.

Tua thukidotna a za Thukham hilh siate khat in, Saddusi mite' dotnate limtakin Zeisu in a dawn'theihna a muh ciangin Zeisu hong neh a, "Thukham khempeuh lakah bang thukham a lianpen ahi hiam?" ci-in a dong hi. 29 Zeisu in, "Thukham a lianpen in: Israel mite aw, ngai un: I Topa Pasian bek mah Topa a hihi. 30 Na Topa Pasian uh, na lungsim khempeuh, na nuntakna khempeuh, na pilna khempeuh, leh na thahatna khempeuh uh tawh na it un, a cihna a hihi. 31 A nihna in: Nangma pumpi na it bangin na vengte na it in, cihna a hihi. Hihte gel sangin thukham a lianzaw a dang om nawnlo hi," ci-in a dawng hi. 32 Tua ciangin Thukham hilh siapa in, "Sia aw, na gen mah bangin hi ka sa mahmah hi. Topa bek mah Pasian hi a, amah simloh pasian dang kuamah omlo hi. 33 Mite in a lungsim khempeuh, a pilna khempeuh, leh a hatna khempeuh uh tawh Pasian itin, amau pumpi a it bangin a vengte a it ding uh a hihi. Pasian biakna dingin biakna tau tunga gan gawhnate leh biakna dang khempeuh sangin hih thukham nihte zuih ding thupizaw takpi hi," a ci hi. 34 Zeisu in hih mipa' thugenzia hoihsa ahih manin, "Pasian' Ukna sungah a om dektak mahmah na hi hi," a ci hi. Tua khita kipanin Zeisu kiangah kuamah in thu dong ngam nawnlo uhhi.
Zeisu in a thuhilhna-ah, "Thukham hilh sia pawlkhatte na bat khaklohna dingun na kidawm un. Amaute in puantualpi silhnuam uh a, mite lakah mite in a zahtak hopih ding a deih uhhi.
Ahi zongin Thukham a neupen themno khat nangawn a maiman' ding sangin van leh lei a man'than' ding olzaw lai hi.

"Thukham hilh siate na batkhak lohna dingun kidawm un. Amaute in puantualpi silhnuam uh a, mihon lakah a kizahtak hopih ding deihin, kikhopna innsung leh pawi lakah a om uh ciangin uliante' tutna mun hoihte bekah tunuam uhhi.
A kicing ama hong itna hangin eite khempeuh tungah thupha a banbanin hong pia hi. 17 Pasian in Moses tung tawnin Thukham hong pia a, ahi zongin Zeisu Christ hangin itna leh cihtakna thu hong pai hi.

Note tungah ka hong piak thak thu in: Note khatlekhat na ki-it ding uh a hihi. Note ka hong it mah bangin note khatlekhat na ki-it un. 35 Note khatlekhat ki-it le uh cin keima nungzuite na hihna uh mi khempeuh in hong thei ding uhhi," a ci hi.
"Note tungah ka hong piak thu in: Note ka hong it zahin note khatlekhat na ki-it un.
Ka hong thupiak bangin na gamtat uh leh ka lawmte na hi uhhi.
Tua hi a, note ka hong thupiak in: Khatlekhat na ki-it un, cihna a hihi.

Moses Thukham a neilo Gentail mite a khialh uh ciangin thukham neilopi mahin siatna thuak uh a, Moses Thukham a nei Jew mite a khialh uh ciangin tua thukham tawh kizui-in amaute tungah thu kikhen hi. 13 Thukham zakna bek hangin Pasian tawh kipawlna a piang hilo a, thukham sunga Pasian' genna bangin a gamtate bek Pasian tawh a kipawl thei a hihi.

Amau' lungsim sungah thukham' deihnate omkhin ahihna thu a gamtatna un hong kilangsak hi. Amau mahmah zong khat veivei hoih kisa, khat veivei sia kisa uh ahih manin, amau' lungsim sungah thukham' deihnate theihna omkhin ahihna thu, hih amau' kiphawk tawmna lungsim in nakpi takin hong kitelsak hi.

Thukham in mihingte a mawhna kilangsak thei bek ahih manin thukham zuihna hangin kuamah in Pasian tawh kipawl theihna ngah zolo hi. 21 Ahi zongin tu-in thukham zuihna hang hiloin thudang khat hangin Pasian tawh kipawl theihna ding lampi hong kilangzo a, Thukham leh kamsangte in zong hih thu-ah teci a pang uhhi. 22 Tua thu in: Jew mi leh Gentail mi kuamah a kilamdan'na omloin Zeisu Christ upna hangin mi khempeuh in Pasian tawh kipawl theihna a ngah hi. 23 Mi khempeuh mawh ciat uh a, a hong honkhia Pasian tawh kigamla uhhi. 24 Ahi zongin Pasian in a hong hehpihna hangin Christ Zeisu tawh hong tatkhiat manin amah tawh i kipawlthei kik hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh mi khatpeuh Pasian tawh a kipawl theihna pen Thukham zuihzawhna hang hiloin upna hang hi, ci-in i genzo hi.
Tua ahih leh hih upna thu i gen ciangin Thukham a phiat ihi hiam? Hilo hi; a kipsak semsem ihi hi.

Thukham zuihna hangin Pasian' thuciamnate a kingah ding hi leh mite' upna pen a kiman'na omloin, Pasian' thuciamnate zong a mawkna suak ding hi. 15 Thukham in Pasian' hehna ding piangsak hi. Ahi zongin thukham om kei leh thukham zuilo cih zong om theilo hi. 16 Tua ahih manin Abraham' suanlekhakte khempeuh tungah Pasian' hehpihna piakkhong a suahtheihna dingin Thukham a zuite bek in ngah loin, Abraham' up bangin a umte in zong a ngahtheihna dingun upna bulphuhin thuciamna kipia hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Abraham pen kha thu lamah eite khempeuh' pupi a hihi. 17 Laisiangtho sungah zong, "Minam tampite' pupi dingin ka hong bawl khin hi," ci-in a kigelh hi. Tua hi a, bangmah a om nailopi a thupiakna tawh a omsak thei, a site a hingsak thei, Abraham in a up Pasian' muhna-ah hih thuciamna kipin a kizang a hihi.

Eite cimawhin i om laitakin Pasian' hoihsak hunin ei mi gilote-a' dingin Christ hong si hi. 7 Mihoih khat-a' dingin a si ngam a omkha ahi zongin thukham zuizo mipa-a' dingin sih ngamna ding a thu haksa mahmah khat a hihi. 8 Ahi zongin eite mawhna nei ihih laitakin eite-a' dingin Christ hong si ahih manin Pasian in eite hong it mahmahna thu hong lak khin hi.

Khialhna a tam semsemna dingin thukham hong kipia hi. Ahi zongin khialhna a tamna munah Pasian' hehpihna hong lianzaw zel hi. 21 Tua ahih manin mawhna thahatin hong sihsak mah bangin, i Topa Zeisu Christ hangin Pasian' hehpihna thahat zaw lai a, mihoihin hong sangin nuntak tawntungna sung a hong tun'pih hi.

Note pen thukham' sawlna hangin nasem hiloin Pasian' hong lah thuhoihte' hangin nasem na hih uh manin mawhna' sawlna mangin na gamta nawn kei un. 15 Eite pen thukham' uk hiloin Pasian' hehpihna in hong uk ahih manin mawhna i gamta kei ding hi. 16 Mi khatpeuh' thu a mang dingin ama khutsungah na kipiak uh ciangin a thu na mante uh' sila na hi uhhi. Mawhna na bawl uh leh sihna a thuak ding na hi uh a, thumangin na om uh leh Pasian tawh pawlkhat a suak ding na hi uhhi.

I leitung lungsim tawh i nuntak laiteng, thukham hangin i hihnop semsem mawhnopnate i gamta a, tuate khempeuh sihna tawh a kizom a hihi. 6 Ahi zongin nidangin a hong lencip thukham panin Pasian in eite hong suaktasak khin ahih manin tua thukham tawh kisai-ah eite a sikhin ihi hi. Lai sungah a kigelh thukham lui sungah nungta nawnloin, Khasiangtho' hong piak nuntakna thakah a nungta ihi hi. 7 Tua ahih leh Thukham mahmah pen a siahuai ahi hiam? A sia hilo hi. Mawhna bang hiam cih Thukham in hong theitel sak hi. Thukham in, "Hazatna lungsim nei kei in," ci-in genlo hi leh, haza i cih bang ahi hiam, ci-in ka thei kei ding hi. 8 Thukham a omna hangin mawhna in nuamtak sa-in hazatna a tuamtuam ka neihtheihna ding hong piangsak hi. Thukham om kei leh mawhna in bangmah sem theilo hi. 9 Thukham ka theih ma-in mi nungta ka hi ngei a, thukham ka theih ciangin mawhnopna lungsim hong khangin kei ka si hi.10 Nuntak ngahna dingin a kibawl thukham pen keima-a' dingin sihna hong hi zawsop hi. 11 Banghang hiam cihleh thukham a om manin mawhna in nuamtaksa a, kei hong khemin tua thukham tawh a hong that hi. 12 Tua ahih ciangin Thukham mahmah hita leh thupiaknate hita leh hoihin man a, siangtho hi.

Tua ahih ciangin a hoih gamta nuam hinapi-in a sia bekbek a gamtakha ka hihna ka thei hi. 22 Ka lungsim tawng taktakah Pasian' thukham hoih ka sa hi. 23 Ahi zongin kei' deihloh thudang khat in ka lungsimah na hong sem hi. Tua ka sunga na hong sem pen in mawhna thu-ah kei hong mancip hi. 24 Kei pen a lungkham mi ka hita hi. Kei a hong sisak ding hih lungsim lui panin kua in kei hong honkhiazo ding ahi hiam? 25 I Topa Zeisu Christ in hong honkhiazo ding ahih manin Pasian tungah ka lung a dam hi. Kei' omzia taktak ahih leh: Ka lungsim tawh Pasian' thu ka zui a, ka pumpi in mawhna a piangsak thu a zui hi.
