Ahi zongin tu-in ahih leh Christ Zeisu tawh kipawlin a nungta mite pen mawhna thukhenna tawh kipelh hi. 2 Banghang hiam cihleh Christ Zeisu tawh a hong kipawlsak Khasiangtho in mawhna leh sihna a piangsak thukham panin kei hong suaktasak khinta hi. 3 Mihingte thahatlo ihih manin Thukham in a hih zawhloh thute Pasian in a hihzo hi. Mawhna a beisak theihna dingin mihingte sunga om mawhna tungah thu a khenna-in ama Tapa hong sawl a, amah pen mihingte' mawhna lungsim mah a nei-in a hong pai hi. 4 Eite' deihna bangin nungta loin Pasian' Khasiangtho' deihna bangin a nungta eite sungah Thukham' deihna teng a kicin' theihna dingin Pasian in a Tapa a hong sawl a hihi.
Thukham a omna hangin mawhna in nuamtak sa-in hazatna a tuamtuam ka neihtheihna ding hong piangsak hi. Thukham om kei leh mawhna in bangmah sem theilo hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh upna a nei mi khempeuh Pasian tawh a kipawl theihna dingin Christ in Thukham a beisak hi.

Khatlekhat ki-it ding cih lohbuang, kuama tungah leiba nei kei un. Midang a itte in Thukham deihna teng a zuikhin a hihi. 9 Thukham sungah, "Nulepa mawhna bawl kei in, mi that kei in, guta kei in, hazatna lungsim nei kei in," cihna leh adang khempeuhte pen, "Nang na ki-it bangin na vengte na it in," cihna thu in huam khinmang hi. 10 Midangte a it mi peuhmah in amaute tungah siatna bawl hetlo ahih manin itna i neih ciangin Thukham buppi a zui khinta ihi hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh vun atna leh vun atlohna a thupi hilo a, Pasian' thupiakte zuihding a thupi a hihi.

Thuciamna thak nasem thei dingin kote tungah siamna a hong pia hi. Tua hong piakna pen lai-a kigelh thukham tawh hiloin Khasiangtho tawh a hihi. Banghang hiam cihleh lai-a kigelh thukham in sihna piangsak a, ahi zongin Khasiangtho in nuntakna hong pia hi.

Ahi zongin Zeisu Christ upna hang bek tawh Pasian tawh kipawl theihna kingahin, Thukham zuihna hang tawh kingah ngeilo hi, ci-in ka thei uhhi. Kote mahmah in zong, Christ hangin Pasian tawh ka kipawl theihna dingun Zeisu Christ ka um uh a, Thukham deihna ka zuihna hang uh tawh hilo hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Thukham zuihna hang tawh kuamah in Pasian tawh kipawl theihna ngah zolo hi.

Thukham tawh kisai-in ahih leh Pasian-a' dingin ka nuntak theihna dingin tua Thukham mah in kei hong thatkhin ahih manin Thukham tawh kisai thu-ah misi bang ka hihi. Singlamteh tungah Christ a kithah lai-in kei zong amah tawh a sikhawm ka hihi. 20 Tua ahih manin tuhuna ka nuntakna zia pen kei hang hi nawnloin ka sungah a hong om Christ hang a hihi. Tua hi a, keimah hong itin, keima-a' dingin a nuntakna a hong pia Pasian' Tapa ka muan'na tawh tu laitakin a nungta ka hihi. 21 Hih bang ka gen ciangin Pasian' hehpihna thupha ka deihlohna ahi kei a, Thukham zuihzawhna hangin Pasian tawh kipawl theihna om hi leh, singlamteh tungah Christ sihna a mawkna hi lel ding hi, a cinuam ka hizaw hi.

Galati mihaite aw, singlamteh tungah Zeisu Christ a sihna thu teltakin na theihsa uh ahih manin kua' khemsa-in hici thei mawk na hi uhhiam? 2 Thukham na zuihna hangun Pasian' Khasiangtho ngah na hi uhhiam, ahih kei leh lungdamna thu za-in na upna hang uhhizaw ahi hiam? 3 Pasian' Khasiangtho tawh na patkhit uh ciangin nomau' thatanghat thu tawh khup a sawm ding zahin hici hai lawmlawm na hi uhhiam?

Note in Thukham na zuihna hangun Pasian in Kha Siangtho hong pia-in na lamdang hong bawl ahi hiam, ahih kei leh lungdamna thu za-in na upna hang uhhizaw ahi hiam? 6 Abraham tunga thupiang ngaihsun dih un. Lai Siangtho in, "Abraham in Pasian um a, tua a upna hangin Pasian in amah tawh a kipawlthei dingin mihoihin a sang hi," na ci hi.

Hih thu tawh kisai-in Lai Siangtho in, "Thukham laibu sunga kigelh khempeuh a vekpi-in a zuikhin tawntung lote in Pasian' samsiatna thuak hi," ci ahih manin Thukham a suangte pen samsiatna a ngah mite ahi uhhi.

Laisiangtho in, "Sing tungah a kikhai mi peuhmah Pasian' samsiat mi ahi hi," na ci ahih manin eite-a' dingin Christ in samsiatna a thuak manin Thukham zuihlahna hangin samsiatna panin eite a hong tankhia a hihi.

Tu-in ka hong gennop thu in: Pasian in Abraham tawh thuciamna bawl a, tua a thuciamna peksat sawmlo hi. Tua ahih manin tua thuciamna a kibawlzawh kum zali leh kum sawmthum khit ciangin a kinung piak Thukham in tua thuciamna peksatin phiat theilo ding hi. 18 Pasian' hong piakkhong pen Thukham zuihna hang tawh a kingah hi mawk leh piakding hong ciamna hangin a kingah hi nawnlo ding hi. Ahi zongin Pasian in Abraham tungah letsong a piakna pen a thuciamnasa tawh kizui-in a piak a hihi.

Tua hi a, i upna hangin Pasian tawh kipawl theihna i ngahna dingin Christ a hong pai hun ciangdong, Thukham in eite a hong uk a hihi. 25 Tu-in ahih leh upna hun hita ahih manin Thukham in eite hong uk thei nawnlo hi.

Ahi zongin a hun a cin ciangin eite khempeuh Pasian' tate i suahtheihna dingin Thukham nuai-ah a om mite a hong tankhia dingin Pasian in a Tapa hong paisak a, tua Tapa pen leitung ngeina bangin numei sung panin hong suakin, Jew Thukham sungah hong nungta hi.
Thukham zuihna hangin Pasian tawh kipawl theihna ding a hanciamte pen Christ tawh a kikhen na hi uh a, Pasian' hehpihna in note hong huam theilo hi.

Sanggamte aw, note ahih leh a suakta mi ahi dingin Pasian in a hong sap a hihi. Ahi zongin tua suahtakna pen na pumpi uh ut bangbangin gamtat theihna dingin paulam zon'na-in nei kei unla, itna tawh khatlekhat kikhualna-in zangzaw un. 14 Banghang hiam cihleh Thukham khempeuh thu khatin kigawm thei a, "Nangmah na ki-it bangin na vengte na it in," cihna tawh kilomlak thei hi.
Khasiangtho' deihna bangin na gamtat uh leh Thukham khutnuai-ah na om nawn kei uhhi.

Ahi zongin Khasiangtho' sawlna bangin gamtatnate pen: Itna, lungdamna, lungnopna, lungduaina, migitna, hoihna, cihtakna, 23 dikna, leh pumpi ki-ukzawhna hi a, hih bangin a gamta mite, Thukham in bangmah cih theilo hi.
Thu haksa na tuah uh ciangin khatlekhat na kihuh un. Tua hi leh Christ' thukham a zui na hi uhhi.

Note' upna hangin Pasian' hong hehpihna tawh hotkhiatna a ngah na hi uhhi. Note' thalawhna hangin a ngah hiloin Pasian' hong piakkhong a hihi. 9 Note' hanciamna tawh a ngah hilo na hih manun na kisialhna ding uh a thu omlo hi.
Ui bangin a miginalo, a gitloh gamtat, vun at ding a ci teiteite kiang panin na kidawm un.

Christ tawh kiptakin kipawl khin ka hih manin Thukham zuihna tawh a kingah thei keima hanciamna tawh dik ngahna cihte ka nei nawn kei hi. Tu-in, Zeisu Christ upna hangin Pasian in a hong piak diksakna ka ngah a, tua pen upna siksanin a hong kipia a hihi.

A beisa hunah na mawhna uh hangin kha thu tawh kisai-in misi na hi uh a, Gentail mi na hih manun Thukham neilote na hi uhhi. Ahi zongin Christ hangin Pasian in note hong hingsak a, i mawhna khempeuh hong maisak khinta hi. 14 Eite-a' dingin a hoihlo, i mawhna a kiciamtehna khempeuh, hong phiatsak a, tuate khempeuh singlamteh tungah kilhcipin a beisak ta hi. 15 Amah in huihlak a ukte leh vangliatna a nei khempeuh, singlamteh tungah zogawp khin a, galzote in a sal matte a kaih uh bangin mi khempeuh muhin a gualzawhna a lak hi. 16 Tua ahih manin annek tuidawn, biakna pawite, Khadet Pawi, leh Sabbath ni tawh kisai-in kuamah in ngeina zuihding bawl kei un. 17 Hihte pen mailamah a hong piangding nate' lim hi lel a, ahi zongin tu-in a taktak ahi Christ hong omta hi.

Thukham pen a kizatna ding a kilawm ciangah zangthei lehang a hoih thu khat hi, ci-in i thei hi. 9 Ahi zongin i phawk dingah, mi hoihte-a' dingin thukham a kibawl hilo a, thukham zuilote, thumang lote, Pasian' deih bangin a gamta lote leh mawhneite, biakna lungsim a neilote leh kam kilawmlo a paute, nute pate a thatte, midang a thatte, 10 nulepa mawhna a gamtate, palepa mawhna a bawlte, mi a gute, zuauthu a gente, mite' siatna ding thu a gente, leh thuman tawh a kilehbulhin a gamta mite-a' dingin thukham a kibawl a hihi. 11 Thuman ka cih pen thupha tawh kidimin a minthang Pasian in ka hilh dingin kei tungah a hong piak Lungdamna Thu a hihi.

Ahi zongin i phawk dingah, mi hoihte-a' dingin thukham a kibawl hilo a, thukham zuilote, thumang lote, Pasian' deih bangin a gamta lote leh mawhneite, biakna lungsim a neilote leh kam kilawmlo a paute, nute pate a thatte, midang a thatte,

amah in eite hong honkhia hi. Eite in na hoih i sepzawhna hangin hong honkhia hiloin eite tungah suahtakna leh nuntakna thak a hong pia Khasiangtho in hong sawpsiangna hangin a hong hehpihna tawh a hong honkhia a hihi.

Ngeina lui pen ginaloin, a kiman'na omlo ahih manin kinawlkhin hi. 19 Moses Thukham ahi ngeina lui in a cingtaaksak zawh bangmah omlo ahih manin eite in Pasian i naihtheihna ding lametna ahi ngeina thak hong kithun hi.

Ahi zongin tu-in Israel mite tawh ka bawl ding thuciamna hih bang a hihi. Amaute sungah ka thukham ka guang ding a, amaute lungtang tungah gelhin, amaute' Pasian ka hi ding a, amaute pen keima mi ahi ding uhhi.

septheihna dingin bangmahin a kimanglo nasepna panin ama sisan in i lungsim hong siangsak ding hi. 15 Thuciamna masa in a huamkhak mite, a mawhna panun a suahtak theihna ding uh ngeina om pen a si suak khinta ahih manin, Pasian' sap mite in a ciamsa tawntung thupha a ngahtheihna dingun Christ in thuciamna thak a hong vaihawm a hihi.
Thukham kizatna sungah na khempeuh sisan tawh kisian'suah a, sisan a kiluan'sak khit ciang bekin mawhna kimaisak thei pan hi.

Jew Thukham pen mailam hunah a taktak a hong tungding lim lahkholhna hi bek ahih manin tua Thukham tawh kizui-in a kum a kumin a kipia biakpiakna in Pasian kiang a zuan mite mi cingtaak suahzo ngeilo hi.
"Topa in hih bangin ci hi: Mailam hunah amaute tawh thuciamna khat ka bawl ding a, amaute sungah ka thukhamte guan'in, amaute lungtang tungah ka gelh ding hi," a cih khit ciangin,

Ahi zongin mite a suaktasak thei thukham cingtaak hoihtakin a et khit ciangin a thu ngai-in a mangngilh pah hiloin, hoihtakin ngaihsun tawntungin a zuite pen a sepna khempeuh uhah Pasian in thupha a pia ding hi.
Ahi zongin mi na deidan uh leh note a khial na hi uh a, Thukham a palsat na hi veve uhhi. 10 Mi khatpeuh in thukham dang khempeuh a zuih hangin khat a khialh nak leh a vekpi-in a khial mah a hihi.

Sanggamte aw, khatlekhat kigensia kei un. A mipihte gensia-in thu a khente in Thukham gensia-in thu a khen a hihi. Thukham na gensiat uh leh Thukham a zui hiloin thu a khen na hi uhhi. 12 Thukham a piapa leh thu a khenpa pen Pasian bek hi a, amah bek in hong honkhiazo a, hong susiazo hi. Tua ahih manin Banghangin na mipihte uh gensia-in thu a khenthei dingin kingaihsun zenzen na hi uhhiam?

Eite in ama thupiaknate i zuih leh amah a thei taktak ihihna hong kilang hi. 4 Mi khatpeuh in, "Pasian ka thei hi," ci napi-in a thupiaknate a zuih kei leh tua mi a zuaugen mi hi a, a thutaklo mi a hihi. 5 Ahi zongin ama thu a zui mite pen Pasian a itna a kicingtaak taktak mi a hihi. Hihbangin i gamtat leh Pasian tawh a kipawl taktak ihihna i thei hi. 6 Pasian tawh ka kipawl hi, a ci mi khempeuh, Zeisu Christ a gamtat bangin a gamtat ding a hihi.
Mawhna i cih pen thukham palsatna ahih manin a mawh mi khempeuh thukham palsat ahi uhhi. 5 Christ pen mawhna a nei hetlo hi a, mite' mawhna a lakhia dingin Christ hong kilang ahihna thu na thei uhhi.

Ama thupiaknate zui-in ama lungkimna dingin gamta ihih manin ama kiang panin i nget peuhpeuh i ngah hi. 23 Ama hong thupiakna in: A Tapa Zeisu Christ umin zui-in, Christ' hong sawl bangin eite khatlekhat i ki-it ding a hihi. 24 Pasian' thupiakna a zui mi khempeuh, Pasian tawh om uh a, Pasian in zong amaute a ompih hi. Pasian in eite tungah a hong piak Khasiangtho hangin Pasian in eite a hong ompihna thu i thei hi.

Zeisu, Christ hi, ci-in a um mi khempeuh Pasian' tate hi a, pa a it mi peuhmah in a ta zong a it hi. 2 Pasian itin ama thupiakte i zuihna tawh Pasian tate a it ihihlam i kithei ding hi. 3 Pasian i it ciangin ama thupiakte a zui ihi hi. Eite-a' dingin ama thupiakte zuihding a haksa lua hilo hi.
Pasian' thupiakna zui-in Zeisu tungah a citak Pasian' mite-a' dingin thuakzawhna kisam hi.

Tua ciangin { Topa } in ama kiangah, "Tua bang hilo ding hi. Khatpeuh in Kain a thah leh tuapa tungah a zah sagihin kithuk ding hi," a ci hi. Amah a tuakpeuh in a thahkhak lohna dingin { Topa } in Kain' tungah ciamtehna khat a koih hi.

Mi khatpeuh in hong thah leh ama tungah sihna dan ka pia ding hi. A hong that ganhing peuhmah ka that ding a, a mipihte a that mi peuhmah gim ka pia ding hi. 6 Mi a that peuhmahte pen, midangte in amah that ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in ama lim bangin mi bawl hi.
Nang thupha hong piate thupha ka pia ding a, nang hong samsiate ka samsia ding hi. Nang' thupha ngah bangin thupha a ngahna dingun leitung midang khempeuh in hong ngen ding uhhi," a ci hi.

Siatna khatpeuh in a zuihbeh leh, tua ciangin nuntakna tangding nuntakna, 24 mit tangding mit, ha tangding ha, khut tangding khut, khe tangding khe, 25 meikang tangding meikang, liamna tangding liamna, siatna tangding siatna pia ding hi.

mi tul tampite-a' dingin itna kip a nei; mawhna, thu palsatna leh khialhna maisakin; ahih hangin bangbang hita leh mawhna a khahkhong ngeilo; pate' mawhna tate' tung leh tute' tung, khang thum khang lina dongin a thukpa," ci-in a pulak hi.
Note in nomau' mipihte tungah phu la loin, amau na lungsim neih kei ding uh a, nomau na ki-it uh bangin na vengte uh na it ding uhhi; kei pen { Topa } ka hihi.

"Mi a thatpa kithat ding hi. 18 Ganhing a thatpa in a ganhing mahin loh ding hi. A thu-in ci lehang nuntakna leh nuntakna a kithuk ding a hihi. 19 "Mi khat in a vengte khat a poisak leh, ama hih bangin ama tung mahah kithukkik ding a, 20 guh kitan tangding guh kitan, mittang tangding mittang, ha tangding ha kihih ding a, amah in mi khat a poisak bangin amah kipoisak ding hi. 21 Ganhing a thatpa in loh ding a, mi a thatpa kithat ding hi.

Tua bang hi kei leh, amah in a beisa hunah a vengpa tawh kigal neihna neilo ahih manin sihna ding thu omlo napi-in, a hehna tawh phula nuampa in mi that khapa delhin lampi a gamlatna hangin amah pha-in a si dingin liamsak khading hi. 7 Tua ahih ciangin, khuapi thum tuamkoih un, ci-in note thu a hong pia ka hihi.

Thukhente in limtakin kan ding uh a, tecipa pen zuau teci hi-in, a manlopi-in a sanggampa a mawhsak ahih leh, 19 a sanggampa tungah amah in hih dinga a sawm bang teekin ama tungah na hih ding uhhi. Tua bangin note sung panin gitlohna na siangsak ding uhhi. 20 Tua hi leh a omlai mite in za-in lau ding a, note lakah tua bang gitlohna bawlkik ngei nawnlo ding uhhi. 21 Amah na hehpih kei ding uhhi. Nuntakna tangding nuntakna, mit tangding mit, ha tangding ha, khut tangding khut, khe tangding khe na hisak ding uhhi.

Hih a tampi nate khempeuh om napi-in note in lungdamna leh lungsim kipahna tawh { Topa } note' Pasian' na semlo na hih manun, 48 { Topa } in note' langah a hong sawl ding na galte uh' na, gilkialna leh dangtakna, pum guakin omna, leh na khempeuh kitangsapna tawh, na sem ding uhhi. Na galte un note hong suksiat matengin note' ngawngah sik hakkol hong thuah ding uhhi.
Phulakna leh thukkikna kei-a' hi a, a hun ciangin amaute puk ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh amau' gimngah hun ding hong naita a, amau' siatna ding hong tung pah hi.
"{ Topa' } mite phat un, no minam dangte aw; Banghang hiam cihleh amah in a nasemte' phu la a, alangte thuk-in, ama mite' gam-a' dingin kilemna a bawl hi," a ci hi.

Samson in amaute kiangah, "Hih pen, note' hih ahih leh, ka kiciam hi. Note kong thuk ding a, tua khit ciangin ka khawl ding hi," a ci hi. 8 Amah in amaute dawmloin tampi that a, tua ciangin paisukin Etam suanghawm sungah a om hi.

Tua ciangin Samson in { Topa } samin, "{ Topa } Pasian aw, kei hong phawk in, kong thum hi. Tu-a ka mittang nihte' tangdingin Filistia mite ka thuktheihna dingin hong thahatsak in, tu-a bek kong thum hi," a ci hi. 29 Samson in innpi a do khuampi nihte manin, a khut taklamin khat, a khut veilamin khat lenin ama gihna tawh a khuamte a luai hi.
{ Topa } in kei leh nang kikalah thu hong khen ta hen. { Topa } in kei taangin nang tungah hong thuk ta hen. Ahih hangin keima khut tawh nang kong hih kei ding hi.

Ahih hangin David in Abishai kiangah, "Ama tungah siatna bawl kei in; Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa' } sathau nilhpa a su peuhpeuh mawhna pan peng ding sa na hi hiam?" a ci hi. 10 David in, "{ Topa } a nungta ahih mah bangin { Topa } in amah vat taktak ding hi; tua ahih kei leh zong a sih hun hong tung ding hi; tua ahih kei leh gal kikapna sungah amah paisukin si ding hi. 11 { Topa' } sathau nilhpa tungah ka khut ka ngak ding { Topa } in kei hong kham hi; ahih hangin tu-in a lukhungah a om a teipi leh a tuithawl la-in paikhia ni," a ci hi. 12 Tua ahih ciangin David in Saul' lukhunga a om a teipi leh a tuithawl a la hi. Tua ciangin amaute paikhia uhhi. Kuamah in mulo hi; zong theilo hi; kuamah khanglo lo hi. Amaute khempeuh ihmu uhhi; Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } in amaute ihmut suak mahmah sak hi.
Hebron-ah Abner hong paikik ciangin, Joab in amah tawh a kituam ho dingin kulhkongpi pamah paikhiatpih a, a sanggampa Asahel' phulakna-in amah in a gil sun a, tua ciangin a si hi.
Kamsang ka nasemte a thahna leh { Topa' } nasemte khempeuh a thahna hangin Jezebel' tungah phu ka laktheihna dingin na topa Ahab' innkuan na satpuk ding hi.
Tua ciangin Judah gam kimkotah a om kumpi gam khempeuh tungah { Topa } kihtakna om a, amaute in Jehoshafat do ngam nawnlo uhhi.
hong thuhkik sakin keima nuai-ah mite a hong zawhsak Pasian,
Heh thukna a muh ciangin thuman mipa lungdam ding a, migilote' sisan sungah amah in a khete sil ding hi.
A thukkik Pasian, a thukkik Pasian, { Topa } aw, na hehna hong lakkhia in. 2 Tho in, leitung thukhenpa aw, a kiphasak mite tungah amau' ngah ding a kilawm gimna pia ta in.
A numei' pasal a hehzawk theihna ding thudang om nawnlo a, a heh thukna-ah khawl hun cih nei theilo hi.
Muhdahna in kitotna piangsak a, itna in mawhna khempeuh maisak hi.
Midikte thumanin gamta uh a, migilote amau' hoihlohna in susia hi.
{ Topa' } deih bangin gamtatna pen galte nangawn lawma kaihzawhna a hihi.
Mite' hong bawlsiatna thuk ding ngaihsun kei in la, { Topa' } hong huh ding ngakzaw in.
Na galte in gimna a ngah ciangin lungdam kei in la, a puk ciangin kipak kei in.
Kei tungah hong bawl bangin kei zong ka bawl ding a, ama hong hihna bangin ka thuk ding hi, cikha kei in.

A dah a lungkham mipa kiangah lasakna pen khuadam laitakin puan suahkhiat tawh kibang a, meima ci-al nuh tawh kibang hi. 21 Na galte a gil a kial leh an pia in la, a dang a tak leh tui pia in. 22 Tua hi leh amau' maizumna dingin a bawl na hi a, { Topa } in nang tungah thaman hong pia ding hi.
Mihoih khat in mihoih lote' gamtatna a zuihkhak ciangin hawktui nin, ahih kei leh tui uih tawh kibang hi.
Mihaipa a hehna bangin kam pau-in gamta gawp a, mipilpa ahih leh ki-ipin a hehna damsak hi.

Na uliante, mi lehdote hi a, gutate tawh a kikhawlte a hihi. Mi khempeuh in sumgolh leh letsong a deih uhhi. Amaute in pa neilote pan'pihlo uh a, meigongnu' thu amaute in sanglo uhhi. 24 Tua ahih ciangin, Topa, Vanglian { Topa}, Israel-te' Vanglian Pasian in hih bangin ci hi: "Ah, ka lang ahi note' tungah ka hehna kong khahkhia ding a, ka gal ahi note tungah keimah in kong thuk ding hi.

Nangmah dona dingin a kibawl hiam peuhmah mavang lo ding a, thukhenna sungah na langah a pang mi khempeuh na nialgawpzo ding hi. Hih thu pen { Topa}' nasemte' gamhluah leh keima kiang panin amaute' dikna a kilahna ahi hi, { Topa } in ci hi," a ci hi.

Note salin kong koihna khuapi' phattuamna ding bawl unla, tua khuapi-a' dingin { Topa' } tungah thu ngetsak un. Banghang hiam cihleh tua khuapi in phattuamna ngah leh no zong phattuamna a ngah mah na hi uhhi.
Topa { Pasian } in kei kiangah thu hong gen a, "Edom mite in Judah mite tungah a phulakna uh nasia lua ahih manin tua a phulakna hangun Edom mite tungah mawhna om hi.

Topa { Pasian } in kei kiangah thu hong gen a, "Filistia mite in galin a neih tawntung mite uh tungah phu nasia lakin hehna tawh susiagawp uhhi. 16 Tua ahih ciangin Filistia mite simin ka beimangsakna ding thu a hong genkhia ta ka hihi. Filistia Zanglei-a a omlai mi khempeuh ka susiamang ding hi. 17 Amaute nakpi takin gim pia-in, a kicing zah dongin amaute tungah phu ka la ding a, ka hehna a thuak ding uhhi. Tua ciangin { Topa } ka hihna thu hong thei ding uhhi," a hong ci hi.
{ Topa } Pasian in amah a demte koihkhonglo a, amah a langpangte gim pia-in a galte thukkik hi.
Midang a hehpih mite tungah Pasian in hehpihna pia ding ahih manin thupha ngah mi ahi uhhi.

"Note in, ‘Mittang khat tangding mittang khat, ha khat tangding ha khat,’ ci-in a kigenna na zaksa uh a hihi. 39 Ahi zongin note kiangah ke'n kong genin-ah: A gilote na thukkik kei un. Mi khatpeuh in na paang taklam hong bet leh a langkhat zong na dawh lai zaw in. 40 Mi khatpeuh in na puansungsilh a ngahnop manin zumah hong khia-in hong laksak leh na puantungsilh zong na piathuah lai in. 41 Galkapte khatpeuh in tai khat sung a van pua dingin hong sawl leh a valin tai khat sung mah na puaksak lai in. 42 Mi khat peuhpeuh in na khat peuhpeuh hong nget leh na pia in la, nang kiang panin na a hong leitawi mite na pia in. 43 "Note in, ‘Na vengte uh na it unla, na galte uh na mudah un,’ ci-in a kigenna thu na zaksa uh a hihi. 44 Ahi zongin ke'n note kiangah kong genin-ah: Na galte uh na it unla, no hong bawlsiate-a' dingin thu na ngetsak un.

Note in midangte' hong mawhna na maisak uh leh vantungah a om na Pa un zong note' mawhna hong maisak ding hi. 15 Ahi zongin note in midangte' hong mawhna na maisak kei uh leh vantungah a om na Pa un zong note' mawhna hong maisaklo ding hi.
Tua ahih manin note tungah hong kibawl ding na deih bangun midangte tungah na bawl un. Moses Thukhamte leh kamsangte' thuhilhnate pen hih mah a deihna a hihi.

Tua ciangin Peter in Zeisu va naih a, "Topa aw, ka sanggamte khatpeuh ka tungah hong khialh ciangin bangzah vei maisak ding ka hi hiam? Sagihvei dongtak maisak ding ka hi hiam?" ci-in a dot ciangin 22 Zeisu in, "Sagihvei ciangbek maisak in kong ci kei hi. Sawm sagih mun sagihvei maisak in kong ci hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in ama kiangah, "Na namsau a paai-ah siatkik in. Namsau a zangte namsau mah tawh si ding hi.

"Ahi zongin ka thugen a za note kiangah kong cihin-ah: Na galte uh na it unla, no hong mudah mite tungah a pha na bawl un. 28 No hong phuisamte thupha na pia unla, no hong bawlsiate-a' ding thu na ngetsak un.
Note tungah a hong kibawl ding na deih uh bangin midangte tungah na bawl un.
A zingsang ciangin zintun' inn neipa kiangah sum peek nih pia a, ‘Hih mipa limtakin na khoi in. Na beina dang khempeuh, kong paikik ciangin kong loh ding hi,’ ci hi.

Note hoihtakin kingaihsun un. Na sanggampa uh no tungah hong khialh leh amah taii unla, a kisik leh a mawhna maisak un. 4 Nikhat sungin sagihvei ciangdong hong khialh hangin zong, a sagihvei mahin no kiangah hong pai-in, ‘Ka kisik hi,’ hong cih nak leh na maisak khin ding uhhi," a ci hi.
Ahi zongin Zeisu in, "Pa aw, amaute in bang hih ihi hiam cih theilo uh ahih manin a mawhna uh na maisak in," a ci hi. Tua ciangin amau' ngah ding ciat a theihna dingun ai sanin a puante a hawm uhhi.

Tua bangin suang a khiat thuahthuah laitakun Stephen in thu ngen a, "Topa Zeisu aw, ka kha hong la in," a ci hi. 60 Tua ciangin amah kunin nakpi takin kiko a, "Topa aw, hih mite' mawhna na maisak in," a cih khit ciangin a si ta hi.

Leitung mihingte' gamtat bangin gamta kei unla, na lungsim uh kikheelin Pasian kipuahpha sak un. Tua hi leh a hoih nate bang hi a, bangte in amah lungkim sakin, bangte a kicing hiam ci-in thei-in Pasian' deihna na phawk thei ding uhhi.

Midangte' gitlohnate thukkik kei unla, mi khempeuh in hoih hi, ci-in a ngaihsut ding bangin gamta un. 18 Ahih theih laiteng mi khempeuh tawh na kilemna dingun hanciam un. 19 Lawmte aw, na hehna uh kuama tungah thukkik kei unla, Pasian' thukkik dingin koih lel un. Banghang hiam cihleh Laisiangtho sungah, "Keimah in amaute tungah ka thuk ding a, midangte a gimsak bangun ka gimsak ding hi, Topa in ci hi," ci-in kigelh hi. 20 Tua ahih ciangin Laisiangtho sungah, "Na galte uh a gil a kial leh an na pia un. A dang a taak leh tui na pia un. Tua bangin na gamtat uh leh amaute' maizumna dingin a bawl na hi uhhi," ci-in a kigelh bangin gamtazaw un. 21 Tua ahih manin gitlohna kizosak kei unla, a pha gamtatna tawh gitlohnate a zo na hi ta un.

Note khatlekhat thu na kineih uh ciangin Pasian' mi siangthote khensakzaw loin lawki thukhente' mai na kitun' ngam uhhi. 2 Pasian' mite in leitung mite' thu a khensakzaw ding ahihlam theilo na hi uhhiam? Note pen leitung mite' thu a khensak ding na hih uh ciangin tua bang thu neute khen theilo lawmlawm na hi uhhiam?

Banghang hiam cihleh Christ mai-ah thusitna a thuakdingin eite khempeuh a kilak ding ihi a, leitung i pumpi-in i omlai-in i gamtatna tawh kizui-in eite tawh a kituak ciatin a sia ahi a, a pha ahi zongin a ngah ciat ding ihi hi.

Sanggamte aw, tu-in mangpha na man un. Na omzia uh na kipuahpha-in ka hong thugente na zui unla, khatlekhat kithutuak kilem takin na om un. Itna leh kilemna a piathei Pasian in note hong ompih ta hen.

Pasian a kikhemzo dingin ngaihsunkha kei un. Mi khempeuh in ama vawh nam khaici mah ngahkik ding hi. 8 Mi khatpeuh in ama leitung pumpi deihna khaici a vawh leh sihna ngahding a, Khasiangtho deihna khaici a vawh leh Khasiangtho tung panin nuntak tawntungna ngahding hi.

Kimuhdahna, hehna, thangpaihna, kitotna, kikona, kilungsim neihna khempeuh beisak unla, 32 khatlekhat kihehpihin, lungsim neem tawh na kihozaw unla, Christ' hangin Pasian in note' mawhna hong maisak mah bangin khatlekhat na mawhna uh na kimaisak ta un.
A manloin a gamtate in ahih leh a gamtatna bangun thuak ding uhhi. Pasian in kuamah deidan loin amau' gamtatna bang ciatin thu a khen a hihi.
Amau' nasepna hangin amaute nakpi takin itbawlin zahtak un. Note khatlekhat kilem takin na om un.
Gitlohna lamsang kuamah kithuk loin, note khatlekhat tung, mi khempeuh tungah a pha kibawl ding ngaihsutpi-in na nei un.

Pasian in a manin na sem ding ahih manin note a hong gimsak mite tungah Pasian in gimna pia ding a, 7 tu-a gimna a thuak note leh kote tungah zong nopsakna hong pia ding hi. Vantung panin Topa Zeisu leh a vanglian a vantung mite, meikuang tawh hong kilat ciangin, 8 Pasian a theilo mite, leh i Topa Zeisu tawh kisai Lungdamna Thu a umlo mite tungah gimna a tungsak ding hi.

Thuman thutak i theih khit ciangin mawhna i bawl hamtang lai leh i mawhna a kimaisakna dingin biakpiakna dang om nawnlo a, 27 a kihtakhuai thukhenna leh Pasian' thu a nial mite a kangtum ding meikuangpi bek omlai hi. 28 Moses Thukham a zuilote pen mi nih leh thum in mawh mah hi, ci-in teci a pan' khit nak leh kihehpih hetloin sihna kithuaksak hi. 29 Tua bang ahih leh Pasian' Tapa a simmawh, mawhna a hong maisak Pasian' thuciamna sisan a thudonlo, Pasian' hehpihna a hong puak Khasiangtho a hehsakte' thuakding bangzah takin lianzaw kan ding ahi hiam? 30 Banghang hiam cihleh, "Phulakna keima-a' hi a, ka thukkik ding hi," a cipa leh, "Topa in ama mite thu a khen ding," a cipa i theih a hihi. 31 A nungta Pasian' khutsungah thumang loin i tun'khak ding a lauhuai mahmah a hihi.

Tua ahih manin mi a khahkhia thei thukham tawh kizui-in thukhenna a thuakding mi bangin kampau-in na gamta un. 13 Banghang hiam cihleh hehpihna lungsim a neilote tungah Pasian in thu a khen ciangin hehpihlo ding a, hehpihna lungsim a neite tungah Pasian in thu a khen ciangin a hehpihna in zozaw ding hi.

Christ mahmah in zong note-a' dingin thuakin, ama khekhap na zuihtheihna dingun etteh ding lim hong nusiat ahih manin hih bangin a thuakding mahin Pasian in note a hong sam a hihi. 22 Khialhna bangmah gamtalo a, zuau a genlam zong kiza ngeilo hi. 23 Amah a kizahko ciangin na ko thuklo hi. Gimna a thuak ciangin na tawnggawp lo a, a manin thu a khen Pasian muan'in a na nei hi.

Hong bawlsiate siatna tawh thukkik loin hong samsia mite samsia kik kei unla, Pasian in note a hong sap lai-in thupha a hong piak dingin hong ciamsa ahih manin, hong siat bawlte thupha tawh na thukzaw un.
Itna in mawhna tampi khuhcip thei ahih manin lungsim takpi tawh khatlekhat ki-it ding thupi ngaihsut pha pen un.

Amaute nakpi takin kiko uh a, "A thuman, a siangtho, a Vanglian Topa aw, leitungah a omlai, kote a hong that mite tungah cik ciangin thu khenin, kote hong thahna hangin cik ciangin phu la ding na hi hiam?" a ci uhhi.
A kipat cilin Pasian in vantung leh leitung a piangsak hi.2 Leitung in limlemeel neiloin a awngthawlpi a hihi. Tuipi tung tengah khua mial bikbek a, tua tui tungah Pasian' Kha in na a sem hi.
Tua ciangin Pasian in, "Eima lim, eimah hong sunin mihing bawl ni. Tuipi ngasate tung, huihlak vasate tung, ganhingte tung, leh leitunga a bokvakte khempeuh tungah ukna neisak ni," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin { Topa } Pasian in, "En un, mipa pen eite khat tawh kibang a, a pha leh a sia thei hi. Amah in nuntakna singgah ne-in a hin' tawntung khak lohna dingin i vaihawm ding hi," ci hi.
Hong pai un, amaute khatlekhat' thugen a kitheih lohna dingun eite paisukin amau' kampau va kitukalhsak ni," a ci hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh eite-a' dingin naungek khat hong suak a, eite' tungah tapa khat hong kipia hi. Amah pen eite hong ukpa hi ding a, ama min pen "Lamdang Thulakpa, Vanglian Pasian, Tawntung Pa, Nopsakna Kumpi," kici ding hi.

Zeisu a kituiphum khit phetin tui sung panin a paikhia pah hi. Tua laitakin vantung hong kihong a, vakhu bangin Pasian' Khasiangtho hong kumsukin ama tungah a khawl a mu hi. 17 Tua sung mahin vantung panin aw khat hong ging a, "Hih pen ka it mahmah ka Tapa hi a, ama tungah ka lungkim mahmah hi," a hong ci hi.
Note' ngaihsut bang hiloin, Pasian' Kha in dawi hawlkhiatna ding vangliatna kei tungah hong pia ahih manin note lakah Pasian' ukna hun hong kipan khin ahihna hong kilang hi.
Tua ahih ciangin note pai unla, midang khempeuh, keima nungzui mi suaksakin, Pa min, Tapa min, leh Khasiangtho min tawh tui sungah na phum un.
Vantung mi in, "Nangma tungah Khasiangtho hong tung ding a, nangma tungah Pasian' vangliatna hong om ding hi. Tua ahih manin a hong suakding a siangtho naungek pen Pasian' Tapa kici ding hi.

Mi khempeuh a kituiphum khit uh ciangin Zeisu zong a kituiphum hi. Zeisu in thu a nget laitakin vantung kihong a, 22 vakhu pumpi lim nei-in Khasiangtho ama tungah hong kumsuk hi. Tua laitakin vantung panin aw khat hong ging a, "Nang pen ka it ka Tapa na hi a, nangma tungah ka lungkim mahmah hi," a ci hi.
Tua Thu mihing hong suakin kote lakah hong om a, itna nei-in citak mahmah ahih manin Pasian' pianzia a neihna ka mu cian uhhi. Hih pianzia pen Pasian' Tapa khat bek hihna tawh a neih pianzia a hihi.

Pasian in leitung mite hong it mahmah ahih manin ama Tapa a um mi khempeuh si nawnloin a hin' tawntung theihna dingun a Tapa neihsun a hong piak dongin a hong itna a hong lak hi. 17 Pasian in leitungah a Tapa hong sawlna pen mawhsakna thukhen dingin a hong paisak hiloin, leitung mite a honkhia dingin a hong paisak hizaw hi.

Kei leh ka Pa pumkhat ka hi uhhi," ci-in a dawng hi. 31 Tua ciangin Jew mihonte in amah deng dingin suang tawm leuleu uh ahih manin 32 Zeisu in, "Ka Pa' hong sawl bangin note' muhna-ah na hoih tampi ka hong sepna hangin suang tawh den' hong sawm na hi uhhiam?" a cih ciangin 33 mihonte in, "Nasep hoih na sep manin hong dengnuam ka hi kei uh a, Pasian na simmawhbawl manin hong dengnuam ka hi uhhi. Nang pen mi hi lel hinapi-in Pasian na kineihnuam hi," ci-in a dawng uhhi. 34 Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Na Thukham sung uhah Pasian in, ‘Note pen pasiante na hi uhhi,’ ci hi. 35 Laisiangtho sungah a kigelh thute a tawntungin a thuman hi a, Pasian' thu a ngah mite pen Pasian in, ‘pasian-te,’ na ci hi. 36 Tua ahih manin kei pen Pa Pasian in hong teelin leitungah a hong sawl ka hih manin, ‘Pasian' Tapa ka hi hi,’ ka cih ciangin Banghangin Pasian simmawhbawl hong cithei na hi uhhiam?

Keimah in Pa kiangah ka ngen ding a, note tawh a omkhawm tawntung dingin Thuman a hong lak Khasiangtho, note hong Huhpa ding a hong pia ding hi. 17 Leitung mite in tua Khasiangtho mu theilo, thei theilo uh ahih manin sang theilo ding uhhi. Ahi zongin note sungah tua Khasiangtho hong omding ahih manin note in na thei ding uhhi.

Zeisu in, "Philip aw, hih tanvei omkhawm khin napi kei hong thei nailo lai na hi hiam? Kei a hong mu khinte in Pa a mu khin ahih manin Banghangin, ‘Pa hong lak in,’ ci thei na hi hiam? 10 Kei pen Pa tawh pumkhat ka hih lamtak umlo na hi hiam? Note tungah ka hong gen thute keima thu bek tawh a hong gen ka hi kei a, kei tawh a om Pa Pasian in na semin a hong gen a hihi. 11 Pa tawh pumkhat ka hihna thu hoihtakin hong um un. Na hong up nai kei uh leh zong ka na lamdang bawlnate hangin hong um beek un.
Ahi zongin Pa in keima tangin a hong sawl ding Huhpa Khasiangtho a hong tun' ciangin note tungah thu khempeuh hong hilh ding a, note tungah ka hong gensa thu khempeuh zong hong phawksakkik ding hi.
"Ahi zongin Thuman a hong lak ding Huhpa ahi Khasiangtho ka Pa kiang panin ka hong sawl ding hi. Amah hong tun' ciangin keima thu hong gen ding hi.
Pa aw, leitung a kipian'sak ma-in nang tawh i neihkhawm na pianzia mah tu-in nangma omna munah hong pia ta in.

Keima neih khempeuh nangma-a' hi a, nangma neih khempeuh keima-a' ahih manin, tua mite' hangin nangma pianzia ka neihna hong kilang hi. 11 Tu-in nangma kiangah kei a hong paita ding ka hih manin leitungah ka om nawn kei ding a, ahi zongin amaute a omlai ding uh a hihi. Tua ahih manin a Siangtho ka Pa aw, nang leh kei pumkhat ihih mah bangin amaute zong pumkhat ahihna dingun na vangliatna tawh hoihtakin na kem in.
Nang leh kei pumkhat ihih mah bangin amaute zong pumkhat a suah theihna dingun keima tungah na hong piak pianzia mah amaute tungah ka pia hi.
Amaute tawh a omkhawm laitakin amah in amaute kiangah, "Jerusalem khua panin paikhia kei unla, note kiangah ka hong gensa ka Pa' hong kamciam thu na ngak un.
Amah in Pasian' taklamah omna dongin liatna ngah a, ama tungah Pasian in a ciamsa Khasiangtho zong a ngahkhin hi. Tu laitaka na muh na zak uh nate pen kote tungah a hong piak tua Khasiangtho a hihi.

Nazareth khuami Zeisu tungah Pasian in Khasiangtho leh vangliatna pia a, Pasian in a ompihna hangin tua Zeisu in a paina khempeuhah na hoih semin, Dawimangpa in a gimsak mite khempeuh a damsakna thu zong na thei uhhi.

Pasian in kamsangte tung tawnin hih Lungdamna Thu a gensa hi a, Laisiangtho sungah a omsa thu a hihi. 3 Tua thu pen eite' Topa Zeisu Christ ahi ama Tapa' thu a hihi. Tua Tapa pen leitung silesa lam panin David' suan hi a, 4 Khasiangtho thu lamsangah ci lehang misite lak panin vangliatna tawh a thawhsak kikna hangin Pasian' Tapa ahihna thu Pasian in a kilangsak hi.
Note sungah Pasian' Khasiangtho hong om nak leh nomau pumpi deihna bangin gamta loin Khasiangtho deihna bangin na gamta ding uhhi. Christ lungsim a neilote Christ tawh kipawllo hi.
Zeisu pen Topa hi, ci-in mite kiangah genin, Pasian in sihna panin amah hingkiksak zo hi, ci-in na lungsim sung uhah na up taktak uh leh hotkhiatna na ngah ding uhhi.

Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian' Ukna pen nek leh dawn tawh a kisai thu hilo a, Khasiangtho hangin i ngah Pasian' deih bangin gamtatna, kilemna, lungdamna, cihte hizaw hi. 18 Hih bang danin Christ' na a sem mite in Pasian lungdamsak a, mite zong a lungkimsak uhhi.

Ahi zongin Pasian in a Khasiangtho tawh eite tungah tua thusim a hong langsak hi. Tua Khasiangtho in na khempeuh kankhia a, Pasian' ngimna a ki-imcip a thutawng dongtakin a kankhia hi. 11 Mihing khat' ngaihsutna pen ama lungsim bek mah in a theih mah bangin Pasian' Khasiangtho bek mah in Pasian' thu a cingin a thei hi.

Note pawlkhat, tua bangin na gamta uhhi. Ahi zongin note pen i Topa Zeisu Christ leh i Pasian' Khasiangtho hangin mawhna panin a hong kisiangsak khinsa, Pasian' tungah a kipiasa, Pasian tawh a kipawlsa mite na hi uhhi.

eite-a' dingin Pasian khat bek, Pa khat bek a om hi. Ama-a' dingin i nuntaknapa, na khempeuh a piangsakpa a hihi. Eite tungah nuntakna a hong pia, na khempeuh a piangsak Topa Zeisu Christ khat bek a om hi.

Tu-in siamna a nam tuamtuam om a, ahi zongin a hong pia Khasiangtho a kibang a hihi. 5 Nasepna a nam tuamtuam om a, ahi zongin a na i sepsak Topa a kibang a hihi. 6 Nasepna ding siamna a nam tuamtuam om a, ahi zongin septheihna ding siamna a hong pia Pasian a kibang a hihi.

Christ sungah kote leh note a hong kipsakpa, leh nasem dingin kote a hong sawlpa pen Pasian a hihi. 22 Amah in eite pen ama-a' ihihna ciamtehna eite tungah hong bawl a, ama-a' ihihna leh eite tungah a hong piakding na khempeuh a hong pia takpi ding ahihna a kitelna dingin eite' lungsim sungah Khasiangtho a hong mapiak hi.
Hih lai munah Topa a cih pen Khasiangtho hi a, Topa' Khasiangtho a omna mun peuhpeuhah suahtakna om hi.
Topa Zeisu Christ hong hehpihna thupha, leh Pasian' hong itna, leh Khasiangtho tawh kikholh theihna, note khempeuh tungah hong tung ta hen.

i Topa Zeisu Christ' Pasian ahi, a minthang Pa Pasian in note tungah Khasiangtho hong pia-in, tua Khasiangtho in note tungah lungpilna hong pia-in, note in Pasian na theihna dingun note tungah Pasian hong kilatsakna dingin thu ka hong ngetsak niloh hi.
Christ hangin Jew mi leh Gentail mi ahi eite khempeuh, Khasiangtho huhna tawh Pa Pasian kiangah i paithei hi.
Note zong midangte tawh kigawmin ama tungah na kilam uh a, Khasiangtho-in Pasian a ten'na ding inn na suak uhhi.

A kibang lametna khat bek a ngahkhawm dingin Pasian in note hong sap mah bangin eite khempeuh pumkhat bek hi-in Khasiangtho zong khat bek mah a neikhawm ihi hi. 5 Topa khat bek, upna khat bek, tuiphumna khat bek mah a zangkhawm ihi hi. 6 Mi khempeuh' Pa ahi Pasian khat bek om a, mi khempeuh' Topa hi-in, na khempeuh hih kimin, mun citengah a om hi.

Note in Zeisu Christ lungsim puakzia na nei un. Tua lungsim puak zia in: 6 Zeisu Christ in Pasian' pianzia nei napi-in, Pasian tawh a kizakim theihna dingin thathanghat thu a suang kei hi. 7 Amah kiniamkhiat tawm zaw a, nasem lim a hong puazaw hi. Mihing bangin amah hong kibawl a, mihing teekteek mah a hong sun hi. 8 Amah hong kiniamkhiat tawm a, singlamteh tung nangawnah sihding a ut hi.

Christ pen a kimu theilo Pasian' lim hi a, a kipiangsak khempeuh lakah tapa upa pen a hihi. 16 Vantung leh leitungah a om na khempeuh, kha thu tawh kisai vangliatna, tote, mi ukte, aana neihnate-a kipan a kimuthei hita leh a kimu theilo hita leh na khempeuh, Pasian in amah zangin a piangsak hi. Leitunga kipanin huihlakah a om khempeuh dongin, Pasian in Christ-a' dingin amahmah zangin a piangsak hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh mihing hong suahna sungah Christ in Pasian' pian'zia khempeuh a kimtakin nei aa,
Pasian in eite hong Hon Zeisu Christ hangin eite tungah a kicing takin Khasiangtho hong pia ahih manin, 7 ama hong hehpihna hangin Pasian tawh kilemin i lamet nuntak tawntungna a ngah thei ihi hi.

tawntung Khasiangtho hangin Pasian tungah a cingtaak biakpiakna dingin Christ in a piak ama sisan in na tam semkhia zozaw ding a, a nungta Pasian' na i septheihna dingin bangmahin a kimanglo nasepna panin ama sisan in i lungsim hong siangsak ding hi.

Pa Pasian in ama ngimnasa bangin note hong teel a, note in Zeisu Christ' thu mangin, ama sisan tawh siangthona a ngahdingin a Khasiangtho tawh note mi siangtho-in a hong bawl hi. Note tungah hehpihna leh nopsakna thupha hong tam tun' semsem ta hen.

Christ in gimna thuakin, tua khit ciangin minthan'na a ngahna ding thu Khasiangtho in a gen ciangin, amaute sungah a om tua Christ' Khasiangtho in kua a cihna hi a, bang hun ciang hi ding hiam, ci-in a kankan uh pen tuhun thu a gen a hihi.

Tua ahih leh zuau thugen i cihte kuate ahi hiam? Zeisu pen Christ hilo hi, a cite a hihi. Hih bangin thugente pen Christ' Gal hi a, amaute in Pa leh Tapa a nihin nial uhhi. 23 Tapa a nialte in Pa zong a nial hi a, Tapa a sangte in Pa zong a sang a hihi.
Hih thu-ah teci a pang thum om a, 8 tuate pen Kha, tui, leh sisan ahi uhhi. Hih thumte' teci pan'na kibang kim hi.

Ahi zongin ka it note ahih leh a siangtho na upna uhah na kip semsem unla, Khasiangtho vangliatna tawh thu na ngen un. 21 I Topa Zeisu Christ in a hong hehpihna tawh nuntak tawntungna hong piakding na ngakkawmun Pasian' itna sungah na kip un.

Tua upate' huamsung, ganhing lite leh kumpi tokhom kikalah Tuuno a ding ka mu hi. Tua Tuuno pen a kigo lumsa tawh kibang a, leitung khempeuhah a kisawlkhia, Pasian' khate' lim ahi ki sagih leh mittang sagih a nei hi. 7 Tua Tuuno va pai a, tokhom tungah a tupa in a taklamah a tawi laizial a va la hi.

Nang thupha kong pia taktak ding a, na suanlekhakte vana aksite leh tuipi gei-a sehnel bangin tampi ka phasak ding hi. Na suanlekhakte in amau' galte' khuapite luah ding uh a, 18 na suanlekhakte thupha ka piak bangin, leitung minam khempeuh in thupha a ngahna dingun hong ngen ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh nang in ka thu na mang hi," a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in note in ka thu mangin ka thuciamna na zuih uh leh mite khempeuh lak panin note pen keima mi na hi ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh leitung khempeuh keima-a' hi a,

Amah thudonin ama aw ngai unla, amah lehdo kei un. Banghang hiam cihleh amah in note' thu palsatna hong maisaklo ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh keima min tawh nasem a hihi. 22 "Ahih hangin note in ama aw limtakin ngai-in keima gen bangin na gamtat uh leh na galte uh' tungah gal ka hi ding a, na langte uh' tungah lang ka hi ding hi.
"Note in ka thukham zui-in, ka thupiaknate mangin tuate na sep uh leh, 4 keimah in note tungah guahtui a hunin kong pia ding a, leitang in an hong piangsakin, lo-a kungte in amau' gah gah ding uhhi.

{ Topa } in Moses kiangah, 8 "Ciangkhut la-in, nang leh na sanggampa Aaron in mihonte khawm unla, suangpi in amau' muhin tui a piak ding sawl un. Tua bangin mihonte leh amau' ganhingte tui na ngahsak ding uhhi," a ci hi. 9 Moses in zong { Topa' } thupiak bangin ciangkhut a la hi.
"Tu-in Israel-te aw, note nungta-in, { Topa, } na pate uh Pasian in note hong piak leitangah va pai-in na luah theihna dingun note kong hilh thukhamte leh ngeina kipte don unla zui un.

Tua ahih ciangin tunga om vantung hita leh nuai-a om leitung hita lehah { Topa } pen Pasian ahihna thu tuni-in thei unla, na lungsim uhah ciamteh un; kuamah dang omlo hi. 40 Tua ahih ciangin note leh note' khita na tate uh tungah thu hong nuamin, { Topa } na Pasian un a tawntunga hong piak gam sungah na khan' uh na sausak theihna dingun tuni-a no kiangah kong gen ahi ama thukhamte leh a thupiakte na zui ding uhhi," a ci hi.
Note nungta-in, nuamsa-in na luah ding uh leitangah sawtpi na nuntakna dingun { Topa } na Pasian un note hong thupiakna lampi khempeuh na tawn ding uhhi.

{ Topa' } hong ciamsa bangin note' mai panin na langte khempeuh uh nawhkhiatna tawh na pu na pate uh tungah piak dingin { Topa } in a ciamsa leitang hoih note in na luah theihna ding uh leh note na nopsak theihna dingun { Topa' } muhna-ah a man leh a hoih nate na sem ding uhhi.
"Tua ahih ciangin { Topa } na Pasian uh itin ama hong thuhilhna, a thukhamte, a ngeina kipte, a thupiakte na zui tawntung ding uhhi.
"{ Topa } na Pasian uh itin, na lungsim khempeuh uh leh na nuntakna khempeuh uh tawh ama na na sepna dingun tuni-a kong gen ama thupiaknate na zuih uh leh,

"Note in { Topa } na Pasian uh thu mangin, tuni-a kong gen ama thupiakna khempeuh limtakin na zuih uh leh { Topa } na Pasian un leitung minam dangte khempeuh sangin a lianzaw-in note hong bawl ding hi.
"Note in { Topa } na Pasian uh hong thupiaknate zui-in ama lampi na tot uh leh amah in note tungah hong ciamsa bangin ama-a' dingin a siangtho mi dingin { Topa } in note hong kipsak ding hi.

Note in tuni-a kong thugente limtakin zuihna tawh { Topa } na Pasian uh thupiaknate mangin, tuni-a no kong thupiakna kammalte panin, pasian dangte' na semin a bia dingin na pial kei nak uh leh, { Topa } in a makai-in note hong bawl ding a, mi' nung zui-in hong bawllo ding hi. Tunglam bekah na kah ding uh a, na nuaikiat ngei kei ding uhhi.

Hih thukham laibu na mangngilh ngei kei ding hi. A sunga kigelh thute khempeuh tawh kizui-in na gamtat theihna dingin sunlezanin na lungngaingai ding hi. Tua hi leh na ma vang ding a, na nasep tangtung ding hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh amaute in { Topa' } thu a ngaihlohna hangun Egypt panin a hong paikhia minam bup, galhang mite a sih khit dong kum sawmli sung sehnel gamah Israel mite lam pai uhhi. { Topa } in amau' tungah a piak dingin a pu a pate tungah a ciamsa bawngnawi leh khuaizu tui bangin a luan'na leitang a muhsak lohna ding thu amaute tungah { Topa } kiciam hi.

amaute kiangah, "{ Topa' } nasem Moses in note hong thupiak khempeuh zui-in, keimah in note kong thupiakna khempeuhah ka thu na hong mang khin uhhi. 3 Tuni dong hih hun saupi sung na sanggamte uh na nusia kei uh a, { Topa } na Pasian uh hong sawlna limtakin zuih ding na ngaihsun uhhi. 4 Tu-in { Topa } na Pasian un amaute tungah a ciamsa bangin na sanggamte uh tawlngakna pia hi. Tua ahih ciangin { Topa' } nasem Moses in note hong piak Jordan galkhat, note' neihsa a omna leitang na inn uhah note ciah un. 5 { Topa' } nasem Moses in note hong piak thupiakna leh thukham ahi, { Topa } na Pasian uh it ding, ama lampi khempeuh zuih ding, ama thupiakte zuih ding, amah belh ding, leh na lungsim khempeuh uh leh na nuntakna khempeuh uh tawh ama na na sep ding uh limtakin ngaihsun un," a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Samuel in, "{ Topa } in meihal biaknate leh biakpiaknate { Topa' } thu man' ding zahin deih ahi hiam? En in, biakpiakna sangin thu man' ding hoihzaw a, tuutal thaute sangin thu ngaih ding hoihzaw hi.

Israel tuite khempeuh sangin Damaskas gama om Abana leh Farpar gun tuite hoihzaw hilo ahi hiam? Tuate' sungah kisilin siang theilo ding ka hi hiam?" a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah kihei-in paikhia hi. 13 Ahih hangin a nasemte a nai-ah hong pai-in ama kiangah, "Ka topa aw, kamsangpa in na lian khat a sem dingin hong sawl hi leh sem ding hilo na hi hiam? Tua ahih ciangin amah in nang kiangah, ‘Kisil in la siang in,’ hong cih ciangin na hih ding bangzah ta-in kilawmzaw hilo ahi hiam?" a ci uh hi. 14 Tua ahih ciangin Pasian mipa' kamgen bangin amah paisukin Jordan gun sungah sagihvei kidiah hi. Tua ciangin a cilesa naupangno cilesa bangin a ngei bangkikin amah a siang hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh amah in { Topa } kiptakin len hi. Amah zuihna panin kihemkhia lo a, { Topa } in Moses tungah a gen thupiaknate a zui hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Ezra in { Topa' } thukham sinin zuih ding, leh Israel mite a hilh dingin amah kipia hi.
Ka thu a zak phetun amaute in hong mang pah uh a, gamdang mite in kei hong mai-et uhhi.

{ Topa } na Pasian' tungah na thuciamnate uh pia unla, tuate khempeuh zui un. Leitung kumpite sangin a kihtakhuai zaw, uliante' lungsim a niamkhiat, zahtak ding ahipa' tungah, ama kiimah a om mi khempeuhte in letsong puak ta uh hen!
Amah in meii khuampi sung pan amaute tungah thu gen a, ama teci pan'nate leh amah in amaute tungah a thukham piakte amaute in a zui uhhi.
Ama thugen a ngai, ama thu bangin a sem no a thahat, no ama vantung mite aw, { Topa } phat un.
{ Topa } zahtakna pen pilna kipatna a hihi. Ama thupiak a zuite khempeuh tungah thukhen siamna a pia hi. Amah phat tawntung ding a hihi.
Ama thuhilhnate zui-in, a lungsim khempeuh uh tawh amah zongin, khialhna zong bawlloin, ama lampi a zuite, thupha ngah a hihi.
Nangma ngeina kipte zuihna-ah ka gamtatna kip ta hen.
Thuman lampi ka teel khin a, na biakna ngeina kipte ka deih hi. 31 { Topa } aw, na thuhilhnate ka pom hi. Kei hong zahhuaisak kei in.
Nangma thu tatsat loin ka zui ngitnget ding hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh ka deih nangma thupiakna zuih ding nuam ka sa hi. 48 Keima deih ahi na thupiakte ka zahtak a, na ngeina kipte ka lungngaingai ding hi.
Ka gamtatnate ka ngaihsun a, na ngeinate zuih ding ka kiciam hi. 60 Kei kinawhin, na thupiakte zuih ding ka zekai kei hi.

Khanghamte sangin thu ka telzaw hi. Banghang hiam cihleh na thuhilhnate ka zui hi. 101 Na thu ka zuih theihna dingin gamtatsia khempeuh ka pelh hi. 102 Nangmah in hong hilh khin na hih manin na biakna ngeina kipte panin kei ka pial kei hi.
Nangma ngeina kipte ka sih mateng a zui tawntung dingin ka lungsim ka khensat hi.
Na thuhilhnate lamdang pha mahmah a, ka lungsim khempeuh tawh tuate ka zui hi.
Nangma thuhilhte ka zuih theihna dingin hong nengniamte' kiang pan kei hong honkhia in.
Na thuhilhnate leh na ngeina kip omte khempeuh hoihtakin ka zui a, ka gamtatna khempeuh nangmah in na hong mu hi.
Keima Pasian na hih manin nangma deih bangin a gamta dingin kei hong hilh in. Kei hong hehpih in la, lam phei-ah hong kha in.
Ka ta aw, na pa' hong thuhilhna hoihtakin zui in la, na nu' hong thugente ngai in. 9 Tua thuhilhnate in na gamtat hong hoihsak ding a, kizepna lukhu leh kizepna khi bangin hong etlawmsak ding hi.
Ka ta aw, kong thuhilhte mangngilh kei in la, kong thugente phawk tawntung in. 2 Kong thuhilhte in na khan' hong sausak ding a, hong daupaisak ding hi.
Ka ta aw, na pa' hong gen bangin gamta in la, na nu' hong thuhilhnate mangngilh kei in.
Mipilte in thuhilhna mang a, a hai paute in lungkhamna tuak hi.
Kihilhna man'na nuntak lampi zuihna hi a, hilhna man' noplohna lampi lauhuai zuihna a hihi.
Pilna a deihte, kithuhilh ding ut uh a, kitai ding utlohna pen haina a hihi.
Thu kihilh ding utlohna pen siat ding utna hi a, thu kihilhna zuihna pen lungnopna a hihi.
Thukihilhna a zuilo mi in zawn'na leh mindaina ngah a, thukihilhna a zui mi in minphatna leh pahtawina a ngah hi.
A pa' hilhna a ngai nuamlote mihai hi a, hilhna a mang nuamte mipil a hihi.
A gamta khial mite nakpi takin kithuhilh a, thukihilhna a mang nuamlote in sihna thuak ding uhhi.
Kihilh ding a utlote amahmah a kisusia hi a, kithuhilh ding a utte pil semsem ding hi.
Thuhilhna a mang mite a ma vang ding a, { Topa } a muang mite a lung dam ding hi.
Thu kigente ngai-in hong kihilhte mang lecin mailamah na pil ding hi.
Hih thute khempeuh banah gen ding thu khat bek om hi. Mihing hong kipian'sakna a thu bulpi pen in: Pasian zahtakna leh a thupiakte man'na a hihi.

Note in utna lungsim nei-in thu na man' nak uh leh lei pana piang a gah hoihte na ne ding uhhi. 20 Ahih hangin note in kei hong nialin na hong lehdo uh leh namsau in note hong vatmai ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } in hih thu gen khinzo hi," a ci hi.

Ahih hangin, ‘Ka thu hong mang un; tua hi leh note' Pasian ka hi ding a, note pen ka mite na hi ding uhhi. Note-a' dingin a hoihzawkna dingin na khempeuhah kong thupiak bang na zui un,’ ci-in thu ka pia zaw hi.

Mun khempeuhah a om no mihingte aw, { Topa } in a hoih nate hong gen khinzo hi. { Topa } in note tung panin hong kalh thu in: Thuman thutang sem ding a, itna kip nei tawntungin, kiniamkhiatna tawh Pasian' thu man' ding a hihi.

Na gamtatna uh tawh kei nong zahtak ding uhhi. Ka thugente ngailoin, thupi takin na lak kei uh leh note tungah samsiatna ka hong tungsak ding a, siampi hihna tawh na ngah uh thuphate tungah samsiatna ka tungsak ding hi. A taktakin ci lehang, note in ka thupiaknate thupi laklo na hih manun na thupha ngahte uh tungah samsiatna ka tungsakzo hi.

Ahi zongin ka thu a hong mang note tungah dikna ni hong taang ding a, tua in nizang bangin note tungah cidamna hong tun' ding hi. Bawng khumna panin a kikhah bawngnote bangin suakta-in nuam na sa ding uhhi.
Tua lai mun panin Zeisu a paikhiat ciangin siahdongpa Matthew a zumah tu-in a om mu a, "Hong zui in," a cihleh amah zong dingin a zuipah hi.
Nungzuite gel zong Zeisu sawl bangin va pai uhhi.
Tua bangin a paina-ah Alfeas tapa Levi, a siahdon'na zumah tu-in a om a mu hi. Zeisu in ama kiangah, "Kei hong zui in," a ci hi. Levi zong dingin Zeisu' nung a zuipah hi.

"Banghangin, ‘Topa aw, Topa aw,’ hong ci napi-in ka hong gente zuilo na hi uhhiam? 47 Ka kiangah hong pai a, ka thuhilhna za-in a zuite khempeuh pen kua tawh kibang hiam cihleh, 48 suang tungah inn lamin, a khuamkua ding suangsung thukpi tak to-in a phutpa tawh kibang hi. Tui a khan' ciangin tui in tua inn a nawk hangin limtakin kilam ahih manin susia zolo hi.

Amah in, "Na Topa Pasian na lungsim khempeuh, na nuntakna khempeuh, na hatna khempeuh, leh na pilna khempeuh tawh na it in la, nangmah na ki-it bangin na vengte na it in," ci-in kigelh hi, ci-in a dawng hi.
Ahi zongin Zeisu in, "Pasian' thu za-in a zuite hamphazaw lai hi," ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua ahih manin Tapa a um mi peuhmah nungta tawntung ding a, Tapa' thu a manglote in nuntak mulo ding a, amaute tungah Pasian heh tawntung ding hi," a ci hi.
"Keima thu guak tawh ka hihtheih bangmah omlo hi. Pasian' hong genna bang bekin thu ka khen hi. Keima ut bangin semloin kei hong sawlpa' deih bangin sem ka hih manin ka thukhenna thuman hi.
Tua ahih manin amah a um Jew mite kiangah Zeisu in, "Ka thuhilhnate na zuih paisuak nak uh leh ka nungzui taktakte na hi ding uhhi.
A mantakin ci lehang, keima thuhilhna a zui peuhpeuh si nawnlo ding hi," ci-in a dawng hi.
Hih thu thei-in na zuih uh leh na lung uh nuam mahmah ding hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Kei na hong it uh leh ka thupiakte zong na zui ding uhhi.
Keima thupiakte sangin a zuite in keimah hong it ahi uhhi. Kei hong it mite pen ka Pa in zong it ding a, keimah in zong itin amaute tungah ka kilang ding hi," a ci hi.
Zeisu in, "Kei hong itte in ka thu zui ding uhhi. Ka Pa in zong it ding a, ka nihun tua mite kiangah pai-in amaute tawh ka omkhawm ding uhhi.
Ahi zongin leitung mite in Pa Pasian ka itna thu a theihna dingun Pa' vaihawmna bangbangin a gamta ding ka hihi. Tua ahih manin kithawi un; hih lai mun panin paikhia ta ni," a ci hi.
Ka Pa' hong thupiakte zui-in ama itna sungah ka om mah bangin note in zong ka thupiaknate na hong zuih uh leh ka itna sungah a om na hi ding uhhi.
Ka hong thupiak bangin na gamtat uh leh ka lawmte na hi uhhi.
Nangmah in sepdingin na hong piak nasep khempeuh sem khinta ka hih manin leitungah na min a thangsak ka hihi.
Ahi zongin Peter leh sawltak dangte in, "Mite' thu sangin Pasian' thu ka mangzaw ding uhhi.
Minam khempeuh in ama thu umin a zuihtheihna dingun Christ hangin sawltak nasep sep theihna ding hamphatna thu Pasian in Christ' na sepna dingin kote a hong pia hi.
Thukham zakna bek hangin Pasian tawh kipawlna a piang hilo a, thukham sunga Pasian' genna bangin a gamtate bek Pasian tawh a kipawl thei a hihi.

Mi khatpeuh' thu a mang dingin ama khutsungah na kipiak uh ciangin a thu na mante uh' sila na hi uhhi. Mawhna na bawl uh leh sihna a thuak ding na hi uh a, thumangin na om uh leh Pasian tawh pawlkhat a suak ding na hi uhhi. 17 Nidangin silate bangin mawhna' thu a mang hinapi-in, tu-in note tungah a hong kipia thuhilhna kipte, na lungsim khempeuh uh tawh zui na hih manun Pasian tungah i lungdam mahmah hi.
Pasian' Khasiangtho in a makaih mite, Pasian' tate ahi uhhi.
Ama deihna bang a sem dingin Pasian in a hong sap, amah a it eite-a' dingin na khempeuh a hoihlamin piangsak hi, ci-in i thei hi.
A kuamah peuh in hong ukte' thu na mang ciat un. Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian' thukimpih lohin kuamah in ukna thu neilo hi; ukna thu nei i cih mite pen Pasian' koih mite a hihi.
Note in kei hong phawk tawntungin ka hong hilh thu khempeuh zui na hih manun ka hong phat mahmah hi.
Mite' ngaihsutna a manlote ka thalnial gawpzo uh a, Pasian' thu theihna ding a khaktan thei nate ka susiagawp uh a, mi khempeuh' ngaihsutna zo gawpin Christ' thu a mang dingin ka bawl uhhi.
Note kiangah ka hong gen thu in: Khasiangtho' hong sawlna bangin gamta unla, na pumpi uh utna bangin gamta kei un.
Eite a hong bawlpa pen Pasian hi a, Zeisu Christ tawh i kipawl ciangin i nuntakna-ah gamtat hoih a nei dingin a hong bawl ihi hi. Hih pen eite' omzia dingin a na ngaihsut kholhsa a hihi.
Hih bang mawhnate i bawl hangin phamawh kei, ci-in a mawk gen mite' khemsa-in ta kei un. Pasian thu mangloin hih bangin a gamta mite in Pasian' hehna a thuak ding uh a hihi.
Christ na zahtakna uh hangin na thu uh na kimang tuak un.

Tate aw, na nu na pate uh thu na man'ding uh Christian ngeina hi a, ahi ding mah a hihi. 2 Thupiakna a lian khat in, "Na nu leh na pa zahtak in," cihna hi a, khapna thu tawh kizom pahin, "Zahtak lecin nang-a' dingin thu hong hoihin, leitungah na khan' a sau ding hi," na ci pah hi.
Silate aw, launa leh lin'na tawh na leitung tote uh thu mang unla, Christ' na na sep uh mah bangin lungsim takpi tawh na na sepsak un.

Tua ahih ciangin ka hong it sanggamte aw, note tawh ka hong omkhawm lai-in ka thu na hong man' tawntung uh mah bangin, tu-in note tawh ka hong omkhawm loh hun ciangin zong ka thu na hong man' ding uh thupizaw lai hi. Pasian kihtakna leh zahtakna tawh na ma uh nawt unla, amah in note hong hotkhiatna thu a cingtaak suaksak un.
Tate aw, na nu na pate uh thu man' tawntung ding pen na Christian nasep uh a hihi. Tua bang thuman'na in Pasian lungdamsak hi.
Silate aw, thu khempeuhah na leitung topa uh thu na mang un. Amau' hong pahtak ding deihna tawh a hong muhsung bekin a hoih tatte hi kei unla, Topa na zahtakna uh hangin lungsim tak tawh gamta un.
I Topa Zeisu hong kilatkik Ni dongin paubaan'na leh mawhsakna om hetloin nang hong kipia thute na zui in.
Na mite in hong uk kumpite leh aana neite' thu mangin, thuhoih khempeuh a sem dingin a kigingsa-in a om ding uh phawksak in la,

Amah, Pasian' Tapa hinapi-in a thuakna tawh thumang ahih theihna ding a na kisin hi. 9 Tua bangin a cingtaak mi a suahkhit ciangin ama thu a mang mite khempeuh-a' dingin tawntung hotkhiatna a kipatna hong suak a,

Noah in zong a upna hang mah tawh mailama thupiang ding a muh theihlohpi mahin Pasian' thugenna na mang a, teembaw khat bawlin a innkuanpihte tawh na suakta hi. Hih bangin a gamtatna tawh leitung midangte a mawh ahihna kilangsak a, a upna hangin mihoih hihna thu Pasian kiang panin a ngah hi. 8 Pasian in ama tungah piakdingin a ciam leitangah Abraham a pai dingin a sap lai-in Abraham in Pasian' sapna a man'na pen a upna hang mah a hihi. A paina ding mun nangawn theilopi-in a gam leh a lei nusia-in a dingkhia hi.

Na makaite uh thu na mang unla, a genna uh bangin na gamta un. Pasian kiangah amaute in a nasepnate uh a pulak ding uh ahih manin tawlnga loin note hong lunghimawh tawntung uhhi. Amaute' thu mang le uh cin a nasepna uhah lungdam mahmah ding uh a, mang kei le uh cin dahpipi-in na sem ding uhhi. Dahpipi-in a nasepna uh note-a' dingin zong phattuamna a om tuan hilo hi.
Mi khat in thu a zak bek tawh maisakin a zakna bangin a zuih kei leh limlangah a maitang a ki-en mipa tawh kibang bek hi.
Mi khatpeuh in thukham dang khempeuh a zuih hangin khat a khialh nak leh a vekpi-in a khial mah a hihi.
Lawmte aw, gamtatna in a zuilo upna pen a hawmpi ahihna thu ka hong lak ding hi.
Tua ahih manin, mi khatpeuh in a upna bek tawh hiloin, a sepna tawh a kizuih ciangin Pasian tawh kipawl theihna ngah pan ahihna thu na thei uhhi.
Tua ahih manin Pasian' thu na mang un. Dawimangpa na nial un. Nial le uh cin no kiang panin taikhia ding hi.

Pa Pasian in ama ngimnasa bangin note hong teel a, note in Zeisu Christ' thu mangin, ama sisan tawh siangthona a ngahdingin a Khasiangtho tawh note mi siangtho-in a hong bawl hi. Note tungah hehpihna leh nopsakna thupha hong tam tun' semsem ta hen.

Pasian' thu na mang unla, na theih nailoh uh hun lai-in na gamtat ngei uh bangin na gamta nawn kei un. 15 Note a hong sampa a siangtho ahih mah bangin note zong na gamtatna khempeuh uhah na siangtho un.
a gamtat siate gim pia-in, a gamtat hoihte a pahtawi dingin kumpipa in a sawl thuneite khempeuh' thu ahi zongin na mang un.
Nasemte aw, na tote uh thu na mang un. A thudik a migi na tote bek uh a zahtak hiloin a gilo na tote uh thu zong na mang un.

Tua mah bangin no khangnozaw deuhte in zong a khanghamte' thu na mang un. Laisiangtho in, "Pasian in a kiphasak mite nial a, a kiniamkhiat mite a hehpih hi," a cih mah bangin na vekpi-un kiniamkhiatna puan bangin silhin, khatlekhat na na kisepsak un.

Ahi zongin ama thu a zui mite pen Pasian a itna a kicingtaak taktak mi a hihi. Hihbangin i gamtat leh Pasian tawh a kipawl taktak ihihna i thei hi. 6 Pasian tawh ka kipawl hi, a ci mi khempeuh, Zeisu Christ a gamtat bangin a gamtat ding a hihi.
Leitung nate leh leitung deihnate a beibei ding hita a, ahi zongin Pasian' deihna bangin a gamta mite pen kip tawntung ding hi.
Ama thupiaknate zui-in ama lungkimna dingin gamta ihih manin ama kiang panin i nget peuhpeuh i ngah hi.
Pasian itin ama thupiakte i zuihna tawh Pasian tate a it ihihlam i kithei ding hi. 3 Pasian i it ciangin ama thupiakte a zui ihi hi. Eite-a' dingin ama thupiakte zuihding a haksa lua hilo hi.
Itna thu ka hong gen ciangin Pasian' thupiakte zuiding cihna a hihi. A kipat cila kipan na zaksa uh ahi hih thupiakna pen na khan' tawntungun zui-in itna na nei ta un.
Christ' thuhilhna zuiloin a khengvalin a pai mite pen Pasian tawh a kipawllo a hihi. Ahi zongin a thuhilhna a zuite pen Pa Pasian leh a Tapa tawh a kipawl ahi uhhi.
Pasian' thupiakna zui-in Zeisu tungah a citak Pasian' mite-a' dingin thuakzawhna kisam hi.
Zeisu in, "Kei a hong pai baihta ding ka hihi. Hih laibu sunga kigelh thu a zui mite mi hampha ahi hi," a hong ci hi.
Abraham in thu gen leuleu a, "En in, leivui leh vut bang ahi lel keimah in { Topa' } tungah thu kong gen ngamna hong maisak in.

Tua lai-ah sun sawmli leh zan sawmli sung { Topa } tawh Moses om a, tua hun sungteng anletui a ne kei hi. Amah in suangpeek tungah thuciamna kammalte ahi thupiak sawmte a gelh hi. 29 A khutsungah thuciamna suangpeek nih tawh Sinai Mual tung panin Moses hong paisuk ciangin, Pasian tawh amah kiho khin ahih manin a maitang vun a taan' lamtak Moses in theilo hi.

Tua ciangin ni a omlai-in anne dingin David a zol dingin mi khempeuh hong pai uh a, ahih hangin David kiciamin, "Ni a tum matengin an ahi a, na khat peuhpeuh ahi zongin ka ciap taak leh Pasian in kei hong dawm kei ta hen!" a ci hi.
Solomon' thungetna in { Topa } lungkimsak hi.
Tua ciangin amah tho a, an ne-in tui dawn a, tua an thahatna tawh Pasian' mual Horeb ciangdong sun sawmli leh zan sawmli sung a pai hi.

Jabez in Israel Pasian tungah thu ngen a, "Kei thupha hong pia-in ka gamgi hong keeksak in. Kei hong ompih in la, siatna khatpeuh in kei hong gimsak lohna dingin hong kem in," a ci hi. Tua ciangin Pasian in ama ngetna pia hi.
Solomon a thunget a tawp ciangin, vantung panin meikuang hong paisukin meihal biakna leh biakpiaknate kangtum a, tua ciangin { Topa' } minthan'na vang biakinn sung hong dim hi.

keima minin a kisam ka mite amau mahmah kiniamkhiatin, thu ngenin ka mai hong zong a, amau' gitlohnate panin a kihei uh leh, keimah in vantung panin ka za ding a, amaute' khialhna maisakin a leitang uh ka hoihsak kik ding hi.

Tua ciangin Pasian' biakinn panin Ezra paikhia-in Eliashib' tapa Jehohanan' omna inndei-ah pai-in tua lai-ah a giak hi. Salsuahna pan a hong ciahkik mite' khialhna hangin dah ahih manin amah in an leh tui ne zolo hi.
A thuman ka Pasian aw, ka hong sap ciangin hong dawng in. Gimna ka thuak ciangin nopsakna nong pia hi. Kei hong hehpih in la, ka thungetna hong za in.
{ Topa } aw, zingsang simin ka aw nong za a, zingsang simin nangma-a' dingin biakna bawlin kong ngak hi.
Ka gimna-ah { Topa } ka sam a, ka Pasian' tungah huhna ngenin ka kiko hi. Amah in a biakinnpi panin ka aw hong za a, amah ka kohna aw in ama bilte va banto hi.
{ Topa, } ka belh suangpi leh keimah hong tankhiapa aw, ka kammal leh ka lungsim ngaihsutnate nangma muhna-ah a san'huai suaksak ta in!
{ Topa' } tung panin na khat ka ngen khin a, tua ngenin ka zon' ding pen: { Topa' } inn sungah ka khan' tawntungin om ding, { Topa' } hoihna et ding leh ama biakinn sungah thu dot dingte a hihi.
Nangma khutsungah keimah kong ki-ap hi. { Topa, } a thuman Pasian aw, keimah na hong hon ding hi.
Huhna a ngen dingin thumante a kiko ciangin { Topa } in za a, a haksatna khempeuh panun amaute a honkhia hi.
{ Topa } tungah na vai teng ap in. Amah muang in; amah in hong sem ding hi.
{ Topa } in sun tawntungin a itna kip hong lak a, zan hun ciangin nuntakna a hong pia Pasian' tungah thungetna la ka sa hi.
Haksat hun ciangin keima tungah hong ko un. Note kong honkhia ding a, note in keima min nong thangsak ding uhhi," a ci hi.
{ Topa } tungah na vangik nga in, amah in hong huh ding hi. Amah in mi thumante kilingsak ngeilo ding hi.
Ama tungah huhna ngenin nakpi takin ka kiko a, lasakna tawh amah ka phat hi.
Amaute ka itna, amaute-a' dingin thu ka ngetsakna nangawn amaute in hong thukna-in kei hong mawhsak uhhi.
Ka cihmawhna-ah { Topa } ka sam a, { Topa } in hong dawngin mun tanzau-ah hong koih hi.
{ Topa, } ka belh suangpi leh keimah hong tankhiapa aw, ka kammal leh ka lungsim ngaihsutnate nangma muhna-ah a san'huai suaksak ta in!
Ka thungetna pen na mai-ah paknamtui bangsak in la, ka khutte ka laptohna pen nitak biakpiakna bangsak in.
{ Topa } aw, ka thungetna hong za in la, kong thumnate hong ngai in. Na thumanna leh na thutakna tawh kizui-in kei hong dawng in.
Amah a sam mi khempeuh kiangah { Topa } nai om a, lungsim takpi tawh a sam mi khempeuh kiangah amah nai om hi.
{ Topa } in midikte' thungetna ngai a, migilote' thungetna thudonlo hi.
Mi khat in thukham a zuihnop kei leh ama thungetna nangawn Pasian in zakthadahhuai sa hi.
Note in a kitawng ding, a kilai ding, gitloh gamtatin, khuttum tawh a kitum ding bekin an na tang uhhi. Hih bang lelin antan'na tawh na thungetna uh hong kingai ding ahi hiam?

Na an uh a gilkialte tawh nekhawm un la, inn neilo a zawngte na innsung uhah paipihin, tangguakin a om mite puan silhsakin, na mipihte uh kiang panin bu lo ding hilo na hi uhhiam? 8 Tua ciangin ka maipha pen phalvaktung hong bang ding a, note' tungah hong taangkhia ding hi. Manlang takin na liammate uh hong dam ding hi. Note hong ompih tawntungin note kong hon ding a, na nung na mai uhah ka hong dal ding hi. 9 Tua ciangin nong thungetna uh ka hong pia ding a, nong sap uh ciangin ka hong dawng ding hi. Mi bawlsiatnate khawlin, mi simmawhna leh kam gilo na paunate uh na khawl uh a, 10 gilkial mite an pia-in, kisapna a nei mite tungah a kisapnate na piak uh leh na kimkot uha khuamial pen khuavak hong suak ding a, na lungzin'na uh nitaang hong bang ding hi.
Amaute in hong sap ma-in ke'n ka dawng ding a, amaute in thu a gen laitakin ke'n ka za ding hi.
Tua hun ciangin note in kei hong samin, hong pai-in thu nong ngen ding uh a, ke'n zong kong dawng ding hi.
Kei nong sap leh kong dawngkik ding a, na theih ngei nailoh a ki-imcip thu lianpite kong gen ding hi.

Nang pen ka pu ka pate' Pasian na hi a, ka hong phat a, ka hong zahtak hi. Nangmah in pilna leh thahatna na hong piazo hi. Ka thungetna nong za a, kumpipa kianga ka gen ding thu nong lakzo hi," a ci hi.

Tua bang thupiakna lai kihawmkhia khinzo ta hi, ci-in Daniel in a theih ciangin a inn-ah a ciah hi. A inn dawl tungnungah Jerusalem lam a nga tawlet thum a om hi. Tua laitakah tawlet hon'sa-in a hih ngei bangin khukdin'in ni khatin thumvei ta Pasian kiangah thu a ngen hi.

Kumpipa a inn-ah ciahkik a, tua zan tawntung an ngawlin gualnopna zong a bawl kei hi. Tua zanin a ihmu thei peuhmah kei hi. 19 Zingsang khuavaktung phetin kumpipa tho-in humpinelkai kikhumna-ah a va paipah hi. 20 Humpinelkai kikhumna a tun' dektak laitakin aw ling kawmin, "Daniel, a nungta Pasian' nasempa! Thuman takin na biak tawntung na Pasian in humpinelkai kamsung panin a hong honkhia thei hiam," ci-in a kiko hi.

Amah kumpi a suah a kum masa kumin keimah Daniel in, { Topa } in kamsang Jeremiah tungah Jerusalem kum sawmsagih sung kisia ding hi, ci-in a genna thu ngaihsunin biakna laibute ka sim hi. 3 An ngawlin, puanhampi silhin, vut lakah tu-in, Topa' kiangah deih takin thu ka ngen hi. 4 { Topa } ka Pasian' kiangah thu ngenin ka mite' mawhna ka pulak hi. Keimah in, "Topa Pasian aw, nang na lian a, ka hong zahtak uhhi.Nang na thuman a, na thuciamna leh na thupiakna a mangte leh a hong itte a tawntungin na it hi.

Tua ciangin amah in, "Daniel aw, lau kei in. Kiniamkhiat dingin na lungsim na khensat masak pen ni-a kipan, tua thu na theihtheihna dingin Pasian in na thungetna a hong zazo hi. Na thungetna bang a hong pia dingin ka hong pai hi.
Ahi zongin ke'n note kiangah kong genin-ah: Na galte uh na it unla, no hong bawlsiate-a' dingin thu na ngetsak un.

Ahi zongin thu na nget uh ciangin na innsung uhah tumin kong khak unla, na muh theihloh uh na Pa uh kiangah na ngen un. Tua hi leh kuama muhlohin na gamtatna uh a hong mu na Pa un note' tungah thaman hong pia ding hi. 7 "Thu na nget uh ciangin i thunget sau leh Pasian in hong pia deuh ding hi, ci-in a ngaihsun Gentail mite bangin khiatna a nei tumlo kam tampi na luilui kei un. 8 Tua na thunget ma nangawnun na Pa un note' kisapna teng hong theikhin ahih manin Gentail mite na bang kei un.

Tua ahih manin, thu na nget uhciang hibangin na ngen un: "Vantung aa om kote Pa aw, nangma Min siangtho tahen. 10. Na Gam hong piang tahen. Vantungah na deihna a kicin mah bangin, leitungah kicing tahen. 11 Tuni aa ka khamkhop ding uh an hong pia in. 12 Kote tungah hong mawhte ka maisak uh bangin, kote' mawhna zongh hong maisak ta in. 13. Khemna hong thuaksakkei in. Gilopa kiang pan hong hon khia in", ci-in thu na ngen un. (HCN)

Tua ahih manin thu na nget uhcaingin hih bangin na ngen un: "Vantungah a om kote’ Pa aw, na min siangtho hong kiphat tahen. 10 Na ukna hun hong tung henla, vantungah nangma deihna bangin a kigamtat mah bangin leitungah zongh kigamta tahen. 11 Tuni aa ka nek ding uh an hong pia in. 12 Mi dangte’ hong mawhna ka maisak uh mah bangin kote’ mawhna zongh hong maisak ta in. 11 Ze-etna haksa hong thuaksakkei inla, a gilopa’ kiang pan hong honkhia in" ci-in na ngen ding uhhi." (PuKKT)

Tua ahih manin thu na nget uh ciangin hih bangin na ngen un: ‘Vantunga om kote' Pa aw, na min siangtho kizahtak hen. 10 Na ukna hun hong tung hen la, vantung bangin leitungah zong na deih bangin kigamta hen. 11 Nisim khamkhop an hong pia in. 12 Kote tungah a hong mawhte mawh maisakna ka neih bangun ko' mawhna zong hong maisak in. 13 Ze-etna lian hong thuaksak ke'n. Gilo' kiang pan hong honkhia in,’ (Uk zawhna, vangliatna, minthan'na, na nei tawntung hi. Amen.) ci-in na ngen ding uhhi. (TDM)

Note in hih bangin thu na ngen un: "‘Vantunga om kote Pa aw, nangma min kisiangthosak ta hen; 10 na gam hong tung ta hen, vantungah na deihna a kihih bangin, leitung ah zong kihih ta hen. 11 Ka nisim an uh tu ni-in ko hong pia in. 12 Ko tunga hong bate ka maisak uh bangin, kote leibate hong maisak ta in. 13 Zia-etna sungah hong pi kenla, gilopa panin hong hukhia in.’ e ci un. (ZIV)

Tua ahih manin hih bangin thu na ngen un, Vantung aa om kote Pa aw, Na min siangtho kizahtak hen. 10 Na kumpigam hong piang tahen. Vantung ah na deihna a kisep mah bangin, leitung ah zongh kisem tahen. 11 Tuni aa ka nek ding uh an hong pia in. 12 Ko tung aa hong khialte ka maisak uh bangin, kote’ khialhna zongh hong maisak ta in. 13 Ze-etna sungah hong lutsakkei inla, gilopa kiang panin hong honkhia in. Banghang hiam cihleh ukzawhna, vangliatna leh minthanna, nang aa ahi tawntung hi. Amen. (ZSV)

"Ngen un; na nget uh leh hong kipia ding hi. Zong un; na zon' uh leh na mu ding uhhi. Kongkhak na kiu un; na kiuh uh leh hong kihon ding hi. 8 Banghang hiam na cih uh leh a ngente khempeuh in ngah ding uh a, a zongte khempeuh in mu ding uh a, a kiute khempeuh-a' ding kong kihon ding hi.
Note mihoihlo hinapi-in na tate uh tungah na hoih piakding ngaihsun thei na hih uh leh vantungah a om na Pa un a ngen mite tungah na hoihte hong piazaw mahmah ding hilo ahi hiam?
Thungetna leh antan'na tawh lobuang, thudang tawh hih bangte kihawlkhia theilo hi," ci-in a dawng hi.

Leitungah note nih thukimin na nget uh na khat peuhpeuh, vantungah a om ka Pa in hong pia ding hi. 20 Banghang hiam cihleh keima minin mi nih leh thum bek nangawn a kikhopna peuhpeuhah kei ka om hi," a ci hi.
Upna na neih nak uh leh na nget peuhpeuh uh na ngah ding uhhi," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu a nungzuite tawh Gethsemane a kici munah pai-in amaute kiangah, "Hua lamah pai-in thu ka va nget kal sungteng hih lai-ah na om un," a ci hi.
Ze-etna-ah na puk khaklohna dingun thu ngen un. Lungsim in ze-etna nang nuam napi-in pumpi in nangzolo hi," a ci hi.

Innsungah Zeisu a tumkhit ciangin a nungzuite in, "Banghangin kote in dawi hawlkhia theilo ka hi uhhiam?" ci-in a dongsim uhhi. 29 "Thungetna simloh a dang in hih bangte hawlkhia theilo hi," ci-in Zeisu in a dawng hi.

Tua ahih manin note kiangah kong genin-ah: Na khat peuhpeuh na nget uh ciangin ngah ding ci-in um un; tua hi leh na nget peuhpeuh uh na ngah ding uhhi. 25 Thungen dingin na din' uh ciangin midang tungah na hehna uh a om khat peuhpeuh maisak un; tua hi leh vantungah a om na Pa un note' mawhna hong maisak ding hi.
Dawimangpa in ni sawmli sung a ze-et hi. Tua hun sung Zeisu in bangmah nelo a, tua ze-etna hun a bei ciangin a gil kial mahmah hi.
Ahi zongin gamdaihna munah Zeisu paikhia-in thu a ngen hi.
Ni khat, thungen dingin mualtungah Zeisu pai a, zan tawntung Pasian kiangah thu ngenin a om hi.
No hong phuisamte thupha na pia unla, no hong bawlsiate-a' ding thu na ngetsak un.

Tua ciangin Zeisu in anlum nga leh ngasa tawn nih la-in vantung lam nga a, Pasian tungah lungdamna ko-in balnen a, mite tungah a lui dingin a nungzuite tungah a pia hi. 17 Mi khempeuh in ne-in a khamkhit uh ciangin, a nungzuite in a kikhamval teng khawm uh a, paipel sawmlenih a dim hi.

Khat vei, Zeisu in mun khatah thu a ngen hi. A thunget a mankhit ciangin a nungzuite khat in, "Topa aw, Johan in a nungzuite a hilh bangin kote zong thungetzia hong hilh in," a ci hi. 2 Zeisu in amaute kiangah, "Hih bangin na ngen ding uh hi: ‘Pa aw, na min siangtho kizahtak hen la,—- na Ukna hun hong tung ta hen. 3 Nisim khamkhop an hong pia in. 4 Kote tungah a hong mawhte mawh maisakna ka neih bangun ko' mawhna zong hong maisak in. Ze-etna lian hong thuaksak ke'n,’ ci-in na ngen ding uh hi," a ci hi.
Tua ahih manin note kiangah kong cihin-ah: Ngen un; na ngah ding uhhi. Zong un; na mu ding uhhi. Kiu un; kongkhak hong kihon ding hi.
Note mihoihlo hinapi-in na tate uh tungah a hoih piakding theithei na hih uh leh, vantunga om na Pa un a ngente tungah Khasiangtho piazaw kan ding hilo ahi hiam?" a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amaute in thu ngen tawntungin a lungkiat ngeilohna ding uh a hilh nopna-in Zeisu in a nungzuite kiangah thugentehna khat gen a, 2 "Khuapi khat sungah Pasian a zahtaklo, mi zong a donlo thukhen mang khat a om hi. 3 Tua khuasung mahah meigong numei khat zong om a, ama kiangah hong pai tawntungin, ‘Ka thu uh hong khensak in,’ ci-in a thum tawntung hi.
Amaute tawh anne dingin a tut ciangin Zeisu in anlum la a, Pasian tungah lungdamna a kohkhit ciangin balnenin amaute a pia hi.
Pasian in thukham a palsat mite' thu ngailo a, amah bia-in, ama deih bangin a gamta mite' thu ngai hi, ci-in ko ka thei uhhi.
Tapa' hangin Pasian' pianzia a kilat theihna dingin keima min paulamin na hong nget khempeuh uh ka hong pia ding hi. 14 Keima min paulamin na hong nget nak uh leh ka hong pia ding hi," a ci hi.
Kei tawh na hong kizop uh a, note sungah ka thu a om nak leh na deih peuhpeuh uh hong ngen le uh cin hong kipia ding hi.

Note in kei na hong teel kei uh a, ahi zongin keimah in note ka hong teel a, note va pai-in a kimang tawntung ding gah a gah dingin ka hong seh hi. Tua ahih manin keima min suangin Pa kiangah na nget peuhpeuh uh hong pia ding hi.

Tua hun hong tun' ciangin, Pa Pasian kiangah ka hong ngetsak ding hi, ka hong ci nawn kei ding a, nomau mahmah in ka min suangin Pa kiangah na ngenpah ding uhhi. 27 Banghang hiam cihleh note in kei hong itin, Pa kiang panin a hong pai ka hihna thu um na hih manun Pa mahmah in note hong it ahihna hang a hihi.
Numeite, Zeisu' nu Mary, leh Zeisu' naute tawh thungen khawm dingin a kikhawm zelzel uhhi.
Amaute in sawltakte tung panin thu sinin amaute tawh kikhawl uh a, amaute tawh an nekhawmin, thu zong a ngenkhawm uhhi.
A lawmte un hih thu a zak uh ciangin a vekpi-un lungsim kikhatin Pasian' kiangah thu ngen uh a, "Van leh lei, tuipi tuineu leh a sunga om khempeuh a piangsak Topa aw,
A zingciangin Joppa khua-ah amaute a tun'dektak laitakun, thungen dingin sun laitakin innkhumzangah Peter a kahto hi.

Kornelias in, "Tuni tawh sim tuma ni li lai-in tubang hun nitak nai thum laitakin ka inn-ah thungenin ka om hi. Tua bangin thungenin ka om laitakin puanpak mahmah a silh mi khat ka mai-ah hong dingvat a,
Tua ahih manin thong sungah Peter kikhum a, ahi zongin pawlpi mite in lungsim takpi tawh ama-a' dingin Pasian kiangah thu a ngetsak uhhi.
Hih thu a phawk khit ciangin Johan Mark nu Mary' inn-ah a pai hi. Tua lai-ah mi tampi kikhawmin thu a na ngen uhhi.
Amaute in zong an tangin, a lu tung uhah a khut uh nga-in thu a ngetsak khit uh ciangin a kuankhia sak uhhi.

Zankim laitakin Paul leh Silas in Pasian kiangah thu ngenin la sa uh a, thongkia dangte in amau' thungetna leh lasaknate a ngai uhhi. 26 Thakhatin nakpi takin zin hong ling a, thonginn a bulpi dongin a lokgawp hi. Thakhatthu-in thong kongkhak khempeuh kihong a, thongkiate a kikhihna sikkhau khempeuh a kiphelkhia hi.
Paul in hih bangin a kam vaikhak a man khit ciangin a vekpi-un khukdin' uh a, Paul in thu a ngen hi.

Tua ahih manin eite bangzahin ginalo hita lehang eite a hong huh dingin Khasiangtho a hong pai hi. Eite in a kilawm bangin thunget ding nangawn i thei kei a, ahi zongin Khasiangtho mah in tauna tawh eite-a' dingin a hong thumsak hi. 27 Khasiangtho in Pasian' deihna tawh kizui-in Pasian' mite-a' dingin hong thumsak ahih manin mihingte' lungsimtawng thu a thei Pasian in Khasiangtho' ngaihsutna a thei hi.
Sanggamte aw, i mipihte in hotkhiatna a ngahna ding deihsakin lungsim takpi tawh Pasian kiangah thu ka ngetsak hi.

Laisiangtho in, "Amah a um mi peuhmah tavailo ding hi," ci hi. 12 Banghang hiam cihleh Jew mi leh Gentail mi a kideidanna omlo ahih manin Topa pen mi khempeuh' Topa hi kim a, ama kiangah a ngen khempeuh tungah thupha tampi tak a pia hi.
Laisiangtho in zong, "Topa tungah huhna a ngen khempeuhte in hotkhiatna a ngah ding uhhi," ci hi.
Lamet na neihna hangun lungdamin om tawntung unla, lungkhamna na thuak uh ciangin lungduai-in thu na ngen tawntung un.
No a hong bawlsia mite, Pasian in thupha a piakna dingin thu ngetsak unla, tua bang mite samsia loin thupha piazaw un.

Thungetna-in hun na zattheihna dingun tawlkhat sung tuam om ding thukim khawm masa lopi-in lupkhop ding kinialkha kei un. Tua bangin tawlkhat sung na tuam om khit uh ciangin note' pumpi' deihna hangin Satan' ze-etna sungah na pukkhak lohna dingun a ngeina bangin lupkhawm ding kipan kik un.

Na lungsim bek tawh Pasian tungah lungdamna na koh ciangin kikhopna sungah a om midangte in bangci-in nang' thungetna, "Amen," hong cihpih thei ding ahi hiam? Nangma thungette a theihtheihna ding uh bangmah omlo hi. 17 Pasian tungah lungdam ko-in na thungetna a hoih mahmah hangin midangte in bangmah phattuamna ngah hetlo hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in, "A hunhoih a tun' ciangin note' hong ngetna ka hong ngai a, kong hotkhiat ni ding ciangin note ka hong huh hi," na ci hi. Tua hi a, tuhun pen a hunhoih hi a, tuhun pen hotkhiat ni hun hita hi.

Tua natna tawh ka kipelh theihna dingin Topa kiangah thumvei tak thu ka ngen hi. 9 Ahi zongin Topa in kei kiangah, "Na tha a nem ciangin keima vangliatna hat mahmah ahih manin nangma kisap na pen keima hehpihna hi bek hi," ci-in hong dawng hi. Tua ahih manin keima sungah Christ vangliatna hong omtheihna dingin lungdam takin ka thaneemna ka kisialhpih semsem hi.
Amah tawh i kipawlna leh amah i muan'na hangin kimuang takin Pasian kiangah paitheihna ding hun i nei hi.
Na heh uh ciangin, tua hehna hangin khialkha kei unla, a tawntungin heh paisuak kei un.
Khasiangtho tawh kopin a tawntungin Pasian kiangah na kisapna khempeuh uh ngenin na thum unla, tatsat loin Pasian mi khempeuh-a' dingin thu na ngetsak un.

Note ka hong phawk simin ka biak Pasian tungah ka lungdamna ka ko hi. 4 Note in lungdamna thu na zak ni uha kipanin tuni ciangdong, lungdamna thuhilh nasepna-ah kei na hong huhna uh hangin ka nuam mahmah a, note-a' dingin thu ka nget simin lungdam mahmahna tawh ka ngen tawntung hi.
Note hong thungetsakna leh Zeisu Christ Khasiangtho huhna tawh suakta ding hi ing, ci-in thei ka hih manin ka lungdam hi.

Thu khat peuhpeuhah lunghimawh lua kei unla, na kisap bangbang uh, lungdamna tawh Pasian kiangah na ngen un. 7 Mihingte in a theihtel zawhloh Pasian' hong piak lungsim nopna in, Christ Zeisu tawh na kipawlna uh hangin note hong lungnuamsak ding hi.
