Note in Christ Zeisu na muan'na uh leh Pasian' mite khempeuh na itna thu uh za ka hih manun note-a' ding thu ka hong ngetsak uh ciangin i Topa Zeisu Christ' Pa Pasian tungah lungdamna ka ko tawntung uhhi.
Lungsim takpi tawh thu ngen tawntung unla, kidawm kawmin lungdamna tawh thu ngen un.

thu ngen niloh unla, 18 bangbang hong piang ta leh na lungdamna uh Pasian tungah ko tawntung un. Christ Zeisu tawh kipawlin na nuntakna sung uhah hih bangzia-in na om ding uh Pasian in a hong deih a hihi.
Sanggamte aw, kote-a' ding thu hong ngetsak un.

Tua ahih manin ama hong sapna tawh a kilawm a kituak nuntakna na nuntak theihna ding uh leh ama vangliatna tawh a hoih na hihnop khempeuh uhhihzo-in, na upna uh hangin na khempeuh na zawhtheihna dingun Pasian kiangah thu ka hong ngetsak tawntung uhhi.

Sanggamte aw, tu-in note lak mah bangin mun dangah zong Topa' thu manlang takin kizel pakin lungdam takin a kisan' theihna dingin kote-a' ding thu hong ngetsak un. 2 Mi khempeuh in thu um nailo uh ahih manin a gilo a siahuai mite panin Pasian in kote hong hotkhiatna dingin zong hong ngetsak un.

A masa penin kong gennop thu in: Mi khempeuh-a' dingin Pasian tungah ngetna, thungetna, thumna leh lungdam kohna na neih ding uh a hihi. 2 Eite nuamtakin omthei-in, biakna lungsim nei-in a kilawm takin i nuntak theihna dingin kumpite leh uliante-a' dingin thu na ngetsak un.
Mun khempeuhah a om pasal khempeuh in kuamah tawh kitotna leh lungsim kinopmawhna nei hetloin, lungsim siangtho tawh a khut uh lamin thu a nget ding uh ka deih hi.
Pasian' bawlsa na khempeuh a hoih hi a, nialloin, lungdamna pulakin san' ding a hihi. 5 Pasian' thu leh thungetna hang tawh tuate a hoih a suak a hihi.
Kamsangte' thugennate leh upate in na tungah a khut uh nga-in thu hong ngetsakna ahi nangma hihtheih siamnate na valkhongsak kei in.
Tua ahih manin a kisap hunin, eite a hong huhdingin hehpihna leh dikna thupha i ngahtheihna dingin, kimuan'na lungsim tawh hehpihna tokhom va zuan ciat ni.
Leitungah mihingin Zeisu a omlai-in sihna panin amah a honkhia theiding Pasian tungah thu ngenin khitui naptui tawh thumin na kiko hi.

Tua ahih ciangin sanggamte aw, Zeisu hong sihna hangin Siangtho Pen Mun-ah ut utin luttheihna ding thu i neita hi. 20 Ama pumpi mahmah ahi dalna puan tawnin nuntakna lampi-ah i pai theihna dingin amah in lampi thak hong hon'sak hi. 21 Pasian' innsung a uk siampi lianpen zong i nei hi. 22 Tua ahih manin mawhna thu-ah kisuan'na lungsim om nawnloin, tui siangtho tawh i pumpi a kisawpsa-in muan'na leh lungsim takpi tawh Pasian kiang zuan ni.

Pilna kisam na om uh leh Pasian kiangah ngen un. Mi khempeuh tungah Pasian dikin cingh mahmah ahih manin hong pia ding hi. 6 Ahi zongin na nget uh ciangin hong pia takpi ding hi, ci-in muan'na tawh na ngen un. A muanglah mite pen huih nun'na lam peuhah a kinil kawikawi tuihualte tawh kibang lel hi. 7 Tua bang mite, lungsim kip a neilo, a kineihkhem hi lel uh a, Topa kiang panin bangmah a ngah hetloh ding lamtak uh a theih ding uh a hihi.

Na na deih uh a, ahi zongin neilo na hih manun mi na thatnuam uhhi. Nate deihna lungsim na nei uh a, ahi zongin ngah zolo na hih manun kitawngin na kilailawh uhhi. Pasian kiangah na deih uh ngenlo na hih manun a ngahlo na hi uhhi. 3 Pasian kiangah na nget sun uh ciangin zong note' nopsakna ding bek ngenin, na ngaihsutna uh manlo ahih manin a ngahlo na hi uhhi.

Lungkhamna a thuak na om uh leh thu na ngen un. A lungdam na om uh leh phatna la na sa un. 14 A cina na om uh leh pawlpi upate sam un. Amaute in thu hong ngetsakin Topa min tawh sathau hong zut ding uhhi. 15 Upna tawh thu a kinget ciangin Topa in cinate noptuamsakin, damsak ding a, mawhna nei ahih leh zong a mawhna maisak ding hi. 16 Tua ahih manin na ci uh a damna dingin khatlekhat tungah na mawhna uh kipulakin thu na kingetsak ta un. Mihoihte' thungetna in vang nei a, na lianpi semzo hi.
Topa in a thuman mite mu a, amaute' thungetna pia tawntung hi. Ahi zongin a gamtatsia mite Topa in a langbawl hi," na ci hi.
Na khempeuh a beina ding hun hong naita hi. Nomau pumpi ki-uktawm thei-in pilvang unla, hoihtakin thu a ngen thei-in om ta un.
Pasian in note hong kem ding ahih manin na lungkhamnate khempeuh uh ama kiang tun'pih un.
Ahi zongin Pasian kiangah i mawhnate va pulak lehang, amah citakin thuman ahih manin, i mawhnate hong maisakin i hoihlohnate khempeuh hong siangsak ding hi.
Ama thupiaknate zui-in ama lungkimna dingin gamta ihih manin ama kiang panin i nget peuhpeuh i ngah hi.

Eite in ama deihna tawh kituakin i nget nak leh i nget khempeuh Pasian in hong piading hi, ci-in kimuan'na lungsim i nei hi. 15 Eite' ngetna khempeuh amah in na za hi, ci-in thei ihih manin ama kiang panin i nget khempeuh zong hong piading hi, ci-in i thei hi. 16 Mi khatpeuh in a Christian mipihte a sihna ding zah ciang a hilo mawhna a gamta a muh leh ama-a' dingin thu ngetsak ta hen. Ama thungetna bangin Pasian in a nuntakna suksaklo ding hi. Hih pen sihna zah ciang mawhna a hilote ka cihna a hihi. Ahi zongin sihna ding zah ciang ahi mawhna om a, tuate-a' ding ngetsak un, a ci ka hi kei hi.

Ama kiang panin Lot a paikhiat khit ciangin { Topa } in Abram' kiangah, "Khuadak to in la, nangma omna panin leilu lam, leitaw lam, nisuahna lam, leh nitumna lam en in. 15 Banghang hiam cihleh na muh gam khempeuh nang leh na suanlekhakte kong pia paisuak ding hi.
Nang thupha kong pia taktak ding a, na suanlekhakte vana aksite leh tuipi gei-a sehnel bangin tampi ka phasak ding hi. Na suanlekhakte in amau' galte' khuapite luah ding uh a,

Khatvei Jacob in meh huanin a om laitakin gamlak a sa betna panin phukhong vei-in Esau hong ciah hi. 30 Esau in Jacob kiangah, "Gilkialin phukhong vei ka hih manin tua na meh san tawmkhat hong nesak in," a ci hi. (Tua ahih manin ama min Edom kici hi.) 31 Jacob in, "Na innluahza hong pia lecin ka meh kong pia ding hi," na ci hi. 32 Esau in, "A si ding ka hita hi; kei-a' dingin innluahza bangin kimang ding ahi hiam?" a ci hi. 33 Jacob in, "Kei' tungah hong kiciam masa in," a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin ama tungah Esau kiciam a, Jacob' tungah a innluahza a zuak hi. 34 Tua ciangin Jacob in an leh bemeh Esau a pia hi. Esau in zong an ne-in tui a dawn khit ciangin a paina ding a zuan hi. Tua ahih manin Esau in a innluahza tua ciang bang bekin a ngaihsun a hihi.

Isaac in tua leitangah khai tuh a, tua kum mahin a zah za khat la hi. { Topa } in amah thupha pia a, 13 a neihsa kibehlaplap ahih manin a hau mahmah khat a suak hi. 14 Amah in tuuhon leh bawnghon, leh innkuan mi tampi nei a, Filistia mite in amah eng uhhi.

Pasian in na tungah vantung daitui hong pia hen la, na lote hoihsak ta hen. An leh leenggahzu tampi hong pia ta hen. 29 Mite in nangma na hong sem hen la, minamte na mai-ah hong kun ta uh hen. Na sanggamte' tungah topa hi in la, na sanggamte' suanlekhakte, na mai-ah hong kun uh hen. Nang hong samsia peuhmah in samsiatna ngah hen la, thupha hong pia peuhmah in thupha ngah ta hen," a ci hi.
Note in { Topa } na Pasian uh nong bia ding uh a, keimah in na an uh leh na tui uh thupha ka pia ding hi. Keimah in note' lak panin cinatna ka la khia ding hi.

‘{ Topa } in note thupha hong pia-in hong kem ta hen. 25 { Topa } in note tungah a maitang hong taangsakin note hong ompih ta hen. 26 { Topa } in note tungah a maipha hong pia hen la, note tungah nopsakna hong pia ta hen,’ ci-in thupha pia uh hen.

"Note in { Topa } na Pasian uh thu mangin, tuni-a kong gen ama thupiakna khempeuh limtakin na zuih uh leh { Topa } na Pasian un leitung minam dangte khempeuh sangin a lianzaw-in note hong bawl ding hi. 2 { Topa } na Pasian uh thu na man' uh leh hih thuphate khempeuh note tungah hong tung ding hi. 3 "Khuapi sungah thupha ngah mi na hi ding uh a, lote-ah zong thupha ngah mi mah na hi ding uhhi. 4 "Note' sung pana piangte, leh na leitang uh pana piangte, leh na ganhing uh pana piang, na bawngte uh pungin na tuuhonte uh tungah thupha om ding hi. 5 "Na seengte uh leh na annel mekna kuangte uhah thupha om ding hi.
"{ Topa } in note' ansal tung leh na hihna khempeuh uhah thupha hong puak ding hi. { Topa } na Pasian un note hong piakna leitangah amah in note tungah thupha hong pia ding hi.

Note' leitangah ama hunin guah a zusak ding leh na sepna khempeuh uh thupha a pia dingin Topa in a na hoih kholna vantung note hong hon' ding hi. Note in minam tampite tungah leitawi na pia ding uh a, ahih hangin note in leitawi na la kei ding uhhi.

Amah in note hong itin, tampi hong phasak ding hi. Amah in note tungah piak dingin na pu na pate uh tungah a ciam gam sungah note' suanlekhakte leh na gamsung panun a piangte, na an uh leh na leenggahzu uh leh na sathau uh, leh na ganhingte uh pungsakin, na tuulekeelno honte uh zong thupha pia ding hi.

{ Topa } na Pasian uh itna, ama lampite totna, ama thupiaknate leh ama thukhamte leh ama ngeina kipte zuihna tawh, tuni-a no tungah kong gen ahi { Topa } na Pasian uh thupiaknate na man' uh leh, note nungta-in tampi na pha ding uh a, a luah dingin note na lutna uh leitang tungah { Topa } na Pasian un note thupha hong pia ding hi.

Amah in leivui panin mizawngte phongto a, amah in a cimawhte a lungkhamna panun a phongto hi. Uliante tawh tukhawmsak a, minphatna ngahsak hi. Banghang hiam cihleh leitung khuampite { Topa}-a' hi a, tuate tungah amah in leitung pumpi a koih hi.
Hauhna leh minphatna nangma kiang pan hong pai a, nangmah in na khempeuh tungah na uk hi. Na khutsungah vangliatna leh minthan'na om a, liatsakna ding leh thakhauhsakna ding na khutsungah om hi.

keima minin a kisam ka mite amau mahmah kiniamkhiatin, thu ngenin ka mai hong zong a, amau' gitlohnate panin a kihei uh leh, keimah in vantung panin ka za ding a, amaute' khialhna maisakin a leitang uh ka hoihsak kik ding hi.
"Job aw, tu-in Pasian tawh kilem in la, amah galbawl nawn kei in. Tua hi leh amah in nang thupha hong pia ding hi.

Mi nuamsa i cihte pen migilote' thu a zuilo mi, mimawhte' gamtat bangin a gamtalo mi, mi a thusim lote tawh a kipawllo mi a hihi. 2 Ama nopsakna pen { Topa } thu sung bek mah hi a, sun leh zanin ama thu a ngaihsunsun mi a hihi. 3 Amah pen lui tuiluang gei-a a kisuan ama gah hunin gah a, a teh a vul ngeilo singkung tawh kibang hi. Ama hihna khempeuhah a ma pai mahmah hi.
Na lungsim' deihna amah in hong pia hen la, na geelna khempeuh hong tangtungsak ta hen!

Topa in tuu bang aa kei hong cing Pa hi aa, bangmah ka kisamkei ding hi. 2 Lonona-ah kei hong lumsak aa, tui kiangah kei hong paipih hi. 3 Ka nuntakna tha hong dimsak aa, ama Min aa dingin thuman lampi-ah kei hong kha hi. 4 Sihna lim guam sung nangawn ka nawk hangin siatna ka kihtakei hi. Banghang hiam cihleh kei tawh nang nong omkhawm hi. Na molhtum leh na ciangkhut in kei hong lungmuang sak hi. 5 Ka galte omna mai-ah kei aa ding an nong lui hi. Ka lu sathau nong nilh aa, ka hai a dimlet hi. 6 Hoihna leh Hehpihna in ka khan tawntungin hong zui taktak ding aa, Topa' inn sungah ka om tawntung ding hi. (HCN)

{ Topa } pen tuucin' bangin hong cing hi a, kisapna teng kicing ta hi. 2 Lo nona-ah hong lumsak a, tuidam kiangah hong paipih hi. 3 Thahatna thak kei hong guan' hi. A hong ciamsa mah bangin-ah lampi manah kei hong kha hi. 4 { Topa } aw, kei hong ompih na hih manin khuamial thukpi ka nawk hangin ka lau kei hi. Na molhtum leh na ciangkhut in kei hong hu hi. 5 Keima galte' muhna munah an nong lui hi. Thupi takin nong pahtawi a, keima hai zong dimlet ta hi. 6 Na hoihna leh nong itna in ka khan'tawnin a hong zuih ding tel takin-ah ka thei ta a, a tawntungin na inn sungah ka om ding hi. (TDM)

TOPA in tuucin-a hong cingpa hi-a, bangmah ka kisam kei ding hi. 2 Lonona ah kei hong lumsak a, tuidam kiangah kei hong pi-in 3 ka hinna tha hong dim kik hi. Ama min hangin thumaanna lampite ah kei hong makaih hi. 4 Sihna e liim guam sung nangawn ka tawn zongin kei tawh omkhawm na hi manin siatna peuhmah ka kihta kei ding hi; na khetbuk le na ciangkhut in kei hong khamuangsak hi. 5 Ka galte ompi-in ka mai ah sabuai nong lui hi. Ka lu sathau nong nilh a; ka hai a dimlet hi. 6 Ka nuntak sung tawntung hoihna le itna in hong zui taktak dinga tuateh TOPA’ inn ah ka teng denta ding hi. (ZIV)
Nang hong zahtakte-a' dingin na koihsa na hoihte, nang hong beelte-a' dingin mite' muhna-ah na bawl, nangma hoihna kicing a, mi khempeuh in thei uhhi.
{ Topa } tawh kikhawl phot unla, ama hoihna thei un! Amah a beel mite mi lungdam ahi uhhi.
{ Topa } muang in la, gamtat hoih in. Gam nuamah teng in la, thumanin om in. 4 { Topa } sungah lungkim in; amah in na deihna hong pia ding hi.
{ Topa } a muang a, mi kiphasakte lamah a kiheilo, pasian manlote lamah a pialkhialo mi thupha ngah a hihi.

Mi genthei a khualte thupha ngah a hihi. { Topa } in haksatna hunah amaute honkhia ding hi. 2 { Topa } in amaute hu-in hingsak ding a, leitungah amaute thupha ngah mi kici ding hi. Amau' galte' khutsungah amaute pialo ding hi.
Leitang in ama hauhna gahkhia khinta a, Pasian, eima Pasian in eite thupha hong pia khin hi. 7 Pasian in eite thupha hong pia khin hi. Leimong dong mi khempeuhte in amah zahtak uh hen.
{ Topa } in a hoih nate eite tungah hong pia ding a, i leitang in hauhna piangsak ding hi.
Amah in leivui panin mizawngte laamto-in, ninphual panin mi cimawhte leh a lungkhamte domto a,8uliante tawh kikhawl sakin ama mite' ulianin a bawl hi.
Ama thuhilhnate zui-in, a lungsim khempeuh uh tawh amah zongin, khialhna zong bawlloin, ama lampi a zuite, thupha ngah a hihi.
Zingsangin tho baihin, gimpi-a nangma sepsa an na nek hakna zong a mawkna mah a hihi. Banghang hiam cihleh amah in ama itte tungah a ihmut sung nangawnun a pia hi.
Na neihsa leh na anpalte tawh { Topa } zahtak in. 10 Tua hi leh na ansalte an tawh kidim ding a, beel dimletin leenggahzu na nei ding hi.
Migilote in a man nei taktak bangmah ngahlo a, thumanin a gamtate in peelloin thaman hoih a ngah hi.
Midikte in a tu a tate' luah ding gamh nei uh a, mawhneite' neihsate ahih leh midikte-a' ding hi lel hi.
Na geelnate khempeuh { Topa } ap in; tua hi leh na geelna bangin tangtung ding hi.
Thuhilhna a mang mite a ma vang ding a, { Topa } a muang mite a lung dam ding hi.
Mi khat thumanin a hoihin a nuntak leh ama suanlekhakte mi hampha ahi uhhi.
Limtakin ngaihsunin geelgeelna pen hauhna lampi hi a, nawhsa-in lopthop hihna pen zawn'na lampi a hihi.
Mipilpa' innsungah neihlelam a dimin om a, ahi zongin mihaipa in a ngahzahzah zangkhia pah hi.
A citak mipa in thupha tampi ngah ding a, a hau baih nuam mipa in gim tuak pelmawh ding hi.
A huaiham mi in kitotna piangsak a, { Topa } a muang mite mihau hi ding hi.

Pasian in amah a lungdamsakte tungah pilna, theihna, leh lungdamna pia a, ahi zongin a hehpihhuai mimawhte ahih leh a sep bek sisakin, amau' thalawhsa khempeuh amah a lungdamsakte tungah a piaksak hi. Hih pen a mawknapi taktak, huihpi nungdelh bang bek a hihi.
"{ Topa } in na tapate khempeuh hoihtakin hilh ding a, na tapate daupai mahmah ding uhhi.

"{ Topa } muangin amah a beel mi in thupha a ngah a hihi. 8 Amah, gun gei-a a kisuan singkung bang hi a, lui gei-ah a zung a kha hi. A tehte hing den ahih manin nisa kihtalo hi. Tatsat loin gah den ahih manin guah zukloh kum ciangin zong lungkham tuanlo hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } in kong cihin-ah, mailamah lametna note kong piakkik ding, na siatna ding uhhiloin na phattuamna ding uh geelna ka neihte kei bek in ka thei hi.
Ka biakinn-ah an a om theihna dingin sawmah khat a kimin hong paipih un. Kei hong ze-et un; vantung kongkhakte hongin, note-a' dingin na hoih tampi kong piakna na mu ding uhhi.
"Midangte in keima hangin a manlopi-in hong simmawhin hong bawlsia a, a nam tuamtuamin hong gensiat uh ciangin thupha ngah mi na hi uhhi.

Dahin a thum a tau mite Pasian in amaute hehnem ding ahih manin thupha ngah mi ahi uhhi. 5 A lungnem mite in Pasian' ciamsa leitang ngah ding uh ahih manin thupha ngah mi ahi uhhi. 6 Pasian' deihteng sepding a hanciamte Pasian in lungkimna ngahsak ding ahih manin thupha ngah mi ahi uhhi. 7 Midang a hehpih mite tungah Pasian in hehpihna pia ding ahih manin thupha ngah mi ahi uhhi. 8 Lungsim takpi tawh Pasian a zong mite in Pasian mu ding ahih manin thupha ngah mi ahi uhhi. 9 Kilemna ding deihin a hanciam mite in Pasian' tate cihna ngah ding uh ahih manin thupha ngah mi ahi uhhi. 10 Pasian' deihna bangin a gamtat manin bawlsiatna a thuak mite vantung ki-ukna sungah a omte ahih manin thupha ngah mi ahi uhhi. 11 "Midangte in keima hangin a manlopi-in hong simmawhin hong bawlsia a, a nam tuamtuamin hong gensiat uh ciangin thupha ngah mi na hi uhhi.
a topa in, ‘Hoih mahmah hi; a hoih a citak nasempa aw, a tawmno na zekna-ah siam na hih manin a tampi tak ka hong zeksak ding hi. Hong pai in; kei tawh nuamsa khawm ni,’ a ci hi.

"Ahi zongin ka thugen a za note kiangah kong cihin-ah: Na galte uh na it unla, no hong mudah mite tungah a pha na bawl un. 28 No hong phuisamte thupha na pia unla, no hong bawlsiate-a' ding thu na ngetsak un.
Pasian' Gam leh ama dikna zong masa un. Na zon uhleh, tua na khempeuh a hong pia thuah ding hi. (HCN)
Thudang khempeuh sangin Pasian' ukna leh ama deihna na zuih theihna ding uh thupi ngaihsut masazaw un. Tua hi leh hih na kisapna dangte khempeuh uh zong hong piathuah veve ding hi. (TDM)
Ahi hangin Pasian kumpigam le ama thumaanna zong masa un. Tua hileh hih nate khempeuh hong piathuah ding hi. (ZIV)

Midangte tungah pia un. Tua hi leh Pasian in note tungah zong hong pia ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh midangte na piakna uh tawh kizui-in a henhen, a tahtah, a dimletin Pasian in note tungah hong pia ding hi," a ci hi.
A kicing ama hong itna hangin eite khempeuh tungah thupha a banbanin hong pia hi.

Khaituhpa leh anlapa a lungdam khawm theihna dingin anlapa thaman a kipiak mah bangin anlapa in zong a nungta tawntung dingin mi a khawm ding hi. 37 Tua ahih manin, ‘Khat in khai tuhin, adang khat in a an la,’ ci-in paunak a om pen thuman mahmah hi. 38 Tua ahih manin note in na khawhloh uh lo-ah an a la dingin ka hong sawl hi. Midang in tua lo na kho a, note in a lak bek a si na hi uhhi," a ci hi.
Gutate pen a gu ding, a that ding, leh a siasak ding bekin hong pai hi. Kei ka hih leh tuute a nungta maimai bek hiloin nuntakna cingtaak a neihtheihna dingun a hong pai ka hihi.

Topa Zeisu mahmah in, ‘Ngahna sangin piak khiatna-ah lungdamna lianzaw hi,’ a cihna phawkkawmin nakpi takin nasepna tawh na khempeuhah a zawngkhalte huh ding hi hang, ci-in note kiangah kong lak khinzo hi," ci-in a vaikhak hi.
Ama Tapa nangawn sitloin eite khempeuh-a' dingin hong piakhia ahih manin, na dang khempeuh zong hong piazaw kan ding hilo ahi hiam?
leitunga om nate, leinuai-a om nate, Pasian' bawlsa nate khat peuhpeuh in i Topa Christ Zeisu hangin Pasian in eite hong itna tawh hong khenzo hetlo ding hi.

Laisiangtho in, "Amah a um mi peuhmah tavailo ding hi," ci hi. 12 Banghang hiam cihleh Jew mi leh Gentail mi a kideidanna omlo ahih manin Topa pen mi khempeuh' Topa hi kim a, ama kiangah a ngen khempeuh tungah thupha tampi tak a pia hi. 12 Banghang hiam cihleh Jew mi leh Gentail mi a kideidanna omlo ahih manin Topa pen mi khempeuh' Topa hi kim a, ama kiangah a ngen khempeuh tungah thupha tampi tak a pia hi. 13 Laisiangtho in zong, "Topa tungah huhna a ngen khempeuhte in hotkhiatna a ngah ding uhhi," ci hi.
Note in na kisap khempeuh uh na neihtheihna ding uh leh midangte huhna ding zong na neihthuah theihna dingun Pasian in hong pia thei hi.
Christ tawh eite i kipawlna hangin vantung gam panin kha tawh kisai letsong namkim hong pia ahih manin eite' Topa Zeisu Christ' Pa ahi Pasian tungah i lungdamna ko ciat ni.

Ahi zongin ka utna tungkhin ing, cingtaak khinta ing, a ci ka hi kei hi. Christ Zeisu in kei-a' dingin a hong sepsak hamphatnate kimtakin ka ngahtheihna dingin a hanciam lai ka hihi. 13 Sanggamte aw, tua hamphatna a ngah khinin ka kingaihsun kei hi. Tua ahih manin a beisa thute mangngilh bawlin mainawtin ka hanciam a, 14 Christ Zeisu nasepna tawh vantung nuntakna-ah Pasian' hong sapna ahi hamphatna ka ngahtheihna dingin, a kung lam zuanin tangtakin ka tai hi.
Mihingte in a theihtel zawhloh Pasian' hong piak lungsim nopna in, Christ Zeisu tawh na kipawlna uh hangin note hong lungnuamsak ding hi.
A na ka sep i Topa Pasian in ama hauhna tawh kizui-in Christ Zeisu hangin note' kitangsapna khempeuh hong pia ding hi.
Topa Zeisu Christ hehpihna thupha, note khempeuh tungah hong tung ta hen.

Pasian biakna hangin a neihsateng tawh a lungkim mite pen biakna in mihau a suaksak takpi mah a hihi. 7 A taktakin ci lehang, leitungah mihingin i suah laitakin sumlepai tawh i suak kei a, i sih ciangin zong leitung panin bangmah i keng thei tuan kei hi. 8 Tua ahih manin annek tuidawn, nikten' puansilh i neih nak leh a phazo a hihi. 9 Ahi zongin a haunuam mite in ze-etna a tuamtuam thuak a, duhhopna huaihamna a haivai thute-ah awkcipin, haksatna leh siatna a tuahlawh uhhi.
Topa Zeisu Christ hehpihna thupha, note tungah hong tung ta hen.
A hoih takpi mah hiam, ci-in sinna a thuak ciangin a nangzote a hampha mahmah a hihi. Tua bangin a nangzote in, amah a itte tungah Pasian in a piakdingin a ciam nuntakna lukhu a ngah ding uhhi.
A hoih thu leh na khempeuh, Pasian kiang panin hong pai hi a, vantung khuavak a Piangsakpa ahih manin amah kikheel ngeilo a, amah a kihei manin khua zong mial tuanlo hi.

Ahi zongin mite a suaktasak thei thukham cingtaak hoihtakin a et khit ciangin a thu ngai-in a mangngilh pah hiloin, hoihtakin ngaihsun tawntungin a zuite pen a sepna khempeuh uhah Pasian in thupha a pia ding hi.

Hong bawlsiate siatna tawh thukkik loin hong samsia mite samsia kik kei unla, Pasian in note a hong sap lai-in thupha a hong piak dingin hong ciamsa ahih manin, hong siat bawlte thupha tawh na thukzaw un.

Ama minthan'na leh a hoihnate a neikhawm dingin a hong sampa i theihna hangin Pasian' deih bangin biakna mantak i nuntak theihna dingin ama vangliatna in eite' kisap na khempeuh a hong pia hi. 4 Amah in piakdingin a hong ciam a manpha mahmah nate hih bangzia-in hong pia a, hih ama hong piak nate hangin leitungah a om siatna a piangsak thei duhluatna leh deihluatnate panin na suakta uh a, Pasian' pianziate na nei uhhi.

Tua hun sungteng Saul in Topa' thu a um mite thahdingin a hanciamna zomlai hi. Siampi lianpenpa kiangah pai a, 2 Topa' thu a zui mi numei pasal a muh peuhpeuh manin Jerusalem khua-ah a ciahpih theihna dingin Damaskas khua-a Jew mi kikhopna inn ukte kiangah a lah dingin lai a ngen hi.

Saul a muh ciangin Antiok khua-ah a paipih hi. Kum khat sung tawntung tua lai-a om pawlpi mite tawh amaute gel omkhawm uh a, mi tampi tak thu a hilh uhhi. Thu um mite pen Christian ci-in min a kiphuah masakna mun in Antiok khua a hihi.

Kei ka om nawnloh ciangin, sa gilote in gannote a phialgawp bangin, mi pawlkhat in thu um mite hong phialgawp ding lamtak ka thei hi. 30 Note sung mahmah panin zong mi pawlkhat in thu um mite khemin a zolkhiat hun hong tung ding hi. 31 Tua ahih ciangin limtakin kiging unla, kum thum sung tawntung khitui naptui tawh note khempeuh ka hong thuhilhna na ciamteh un.
Tua ciangin Agrippa in Paul kiangah, "Hih hun tomno sungin Christian hong suaksakzo dingin kingaihsun na hi hiam?" a cih ciangin

Tua ahih manin Pasian in hong it a, ama mi dingin a hong sap, no Rom khua-a a om Christiante khempeuh tungah lai a hong khak ka hihi. I Pa Pasian leh Topa Zeisu Christ in note tungah dikna leh nopsakna thupha hong tungsak ta hen.
Na Christianpihte uh a kisapna bangin na neihsate uh na hawm unla, zin leh leengla do a siam mite na hita un.
Tua ahih leh Banghangin na Christian pihte uh tungah thu khen a, Banghangin simmawhbawl thei na hi uhhiam? Thukhenna a thuak dingin Pasian' mai-ah eite khempeuh a ding ciat ding ihi hi.

Tua ahih manin khatlekhat kimawhsakin thu kikhen kei unla, i Christian pihte i puksakkhak lohna ding, a dongtangsak ihihkhak lohna dingin ngaihsun ciat ni. 14 Topa Zeisu tawh kipawlin a lungsim ka theihna tawh, na khat peuhpeuh ama thu-in a dawizek om hetlo hi, ci-in teltakin ka thei hi. Ahi zongin mi khatpeuh in dawizek hi, ci-in a ngaihsut leh ama-a' dingin a dawizek hi pah hi. 15 An khatpeuh na nekna uh hangin na Christian pihte' lungnopmawhna na pian'sak uh leh itna lungsim tawh a gamta na hi nawn kei uhhi. Na an nekna uh tawh, Christ in a sihlawh mite' siatna ding piangsak kei un.

Jew mipih ahih banah ka thongkiatpih ahi Andronikas leh Junias zong na hopih sak un. Amaute pen kei' Christian suahma pekin a na suak khinsate na hi uh a, sawltakte khempeuh in a theihkim uh mite ahi uhhi.
Jew mipih Herodion leh Narsissas innkuan sunga i Christian sanggamte zong na hopih sak un.
Asinkritas, Flegon, Hermes, Patrobas, Hermas, leh amaute tawh a kikhawm khawm Christian sanggamte zong na hopih sak un.
Keima zintun'napa leh pawlpite' kikhopna inn neipa zong ahi Gaias in zong hong hopih hi. Ka omna khuapi sumkempa Erastas leh i Christian sanggam Kuartas in zong hong hopih uhhi.
Christ leh Dawimangpa bangci-in kithutuak theiding a, thu um mi leh thu umlo mi bangci-in a ngaihsutna uh kibang theiding ahi hiam?
Tuma kum sawmleli hun lai-in vantung a dawl tungnung penah Christian khat kilato hi. A pumpi taktak hiam, maang mu ahi hiam ka thei kei hi. Pasian in thei hi.
Thu um taktak mah ihi hiam, ci-in nomau mahmah na ki-entel ciat un. Na ki-ettelna uhah a cingtaaklo na hih kei nak uh leh note sungah Christ om ahih manin thu phawk un.
Kei tawh a omkhawm i Christian pihte in zong note hong hopih uhhi.
Tate aw, na nu na pate uh thu na man'ding uh Christian ngeina hi a, ahi ding mah a hihi.
Pate aw, na tate uh a hehtheihna dingin bawl kei unla, Christiante ngeina tawh kituakin taii-in hilhin pantah un.

Banghang hiam cihleh Christ nasem ka hihna hangin thongkia ka hihna thu, inncing galkapte-a kipanin mi khempeuh in a thei uhhi. 14 Tua banah keima thongkiatna hangin hih lai-a om Christiante a tamzaw in Topa muan'na-in nei uh a, lau hetloin Pasian' thu gen ngamna-in neizaw uhhi.
Hih lai-a om Christian khempeuh, a diakdiakin kumpi nasem i lawmte in note hong hopih uhhi.

Zite aw, Christian te gamtat dingin a kilawm ahih mah bangin na pasalte uh thu na mang un. 19 Pasalte aw, na zite uh it un la, amaute tungah ngongtat kei un. 20 Tate aw, na nu na pate uh thu man' tawntung ding pen na Christian nasep uh a hihi. Tua bang thuman'na in Pasian lungdamsak hi.

Justas zong a kici zel Zeisu in zong note hong hopih hi. Vun-atna a zang Jew mi Christian a hong suakte lak panin hih mi thumte bek, Pasian thu-ah ka naseppih lakah a hong kihel a hihi. Ka nasepna-ah amaute in nakpi takin hong huh uhhi.
Christian a suaktungte zong hilo ding hi. Tua bang mi thakte kiphasak thei a, Dawimangpa mah bangin thukhenna a thuak mite hikha thei ding hi.
Thu umte ihihna hangin Christian sungah eite i kikholh manin, Christ hangin i nuntakna sungah i ngah thupha a hoih khempeuh na theihna a kicin' semsemna dingin thu ka ngen hi.

Pasian, a manloin gamta ngeilo ahih manin na Christianpihte uh a beisa hunah na huhna uh leh tudongin na huh laina uh tawh ama-a' dingin na nasepna uh leh amah na itna uh na lahnate uh hong mangngilh hetlo ding hi.
Mi khatpeuh in Christian ka hi hi, ci napi-in kampau a kidopzawh kei leh amahmah a kikhemtawm hi lel a, ama biakna neih a mawkna a hihi.
Tu-in lungdamna thuman na zuihna hangun note kisian'suah khinin, na thu uppih mite uh lungsim tak tawh itthei khinta na hih manun na lungsim khempeuh uh tawh limtakin na ki-it un.
Ahi zongin Christian hihna hangin gimna na thuak uh leh kuamah in maizum ngaihsut kei unla, Christ min hangin na thuak manun Pasian tungah na lungdam un.
Christian ki-itna tawh khatlekhat kinamin na kihopih un. Christ thu um note khempeuh tungah nopsakna thupha hong tung ta hen.

Mi khatpeuh in khuavak gamtatna ka gamta hi, ci napi-in a Christian mipihte a muhdah leh khuamial gamtatna mah a gamta lai a hihi. 10 A Christian mipihte a it mite pen khuavak gamtatna a gamta hi a, tua bang mite a puktheihna ding thu omlo hi. 11 Ahi zongin a Christian mipihte a mudah mite pen khuamial sungah omin khuamial gamtatna a gamta uhhi a, tua khuamial in bangmah ngaihsunsak theilo ahih manin a gamtatna ding mel uh theilo uhhi.
Hih pen Pasian tate leh Dawimangpa' tate a kilamdan'na a hihi. A manin gamta loin, a Christian mipihte a itlo mi peuhmah, Pasian' tate hilo uhhi.

Ei Christian te khatlekhat ki-it ihih manin sihna khutsung panin paikhia-in nuntakna khutsungah a lut khinta ihihna thu i thei khinzo hi. Itna lungsim a neilote pen sihna khutsung mahah a omlai uh a hihi. 15 A Christian mipih a mudah mi peuhmah mi that hi a, mi thatte in nuntak tawntungna a neihlohna thu na thei uhhi. 16 Itna i cih bangci theihding ihi hiam cihleh: Christ in eite-a' dingin a nuntakna hong pia hi. Ei zong i Christian mipihte-a' dingin i nuntakna i piak ngam ding a hihi. 17 Mi khat hau mahmah hen la, a Christian mipih a cimawhte mu napi-in huhna bangmah pianuam hetkei leh, Banghangin amah in Pasian ka it hi, ci thei ding ahi hiam?

Mi khatpeuh in, "Pasian ka it hi," ci napi-in a Christian mipihte a muhdah leh a zuaupi a gen a hihi. Banghang hiam cihleh a muhtheih a Christian mipih a itlo mi in a muhtheihloh Pasian it theilo ding hi.21Christ in eite tungah hong thupiakna in: Pasian a it mi in a Christian mipihte zong it ding hi, cihna a hihi.

Mi khatpeuh in a Christian mipihte a sihna ding zah ciang a hilo mawhna a gamta a muh leh ama-a' dingin thu ngetsak ta hen. Ama thungetna bangin Pasian in a nuntakna suksaklo ding hi. Hih pen sihna zah ciang mawhna a hilote ka cihna a hihi. Ahi zongin sihna ding zah ciang ahi mawhna om a, tuate-a' ding ngetsak un, a ci ka hi kei hi.

Nang a mantakin a gamta na hih takpi mah bangin, i Christian mipih hih lai-a hong pai peuhpeuh in a mantakin na nuntakna thu hong gen uh ahih manin ka nuam mahmah hi. 4 Tate bangin ka hong neih mite a mantakin a gamtatna uh ka zakna hangin ka lungdamna sangin adang lungdamna lianzaw bangmah omlo hi. 5 Ka hong it lawm Gaias aw, na theih ngeiloh hinapi-in i Christian mipihte lungsim takpi tawh na na huh hi.

Tua ahih manin Pasian thuman nasepna-ah nasem khawm mite ihih theihna dingin ei Christian te in hihbang mite i huh ding a hihi. 9 Na pawlpite kiangah lai ka gelh ngei hi. Ahi zongin na pawlpi sungah milian pen a ut Diotrefes in ka thugen hong mang nuamlo hi. 10 Tua ahih manin kong pai ciangin kote hong gensiatna, zuauthu a genna, leh a gamtatna khempeuh ka pholak ding hi. Tua bang mi gensiatna ciang bek hiloin, i Christian mipihte zin nangawn tungsak nuamlo a, zin a tungsak nuamte nangawn khamin, pawlpi panin hawlkhiat ding hanciam lai hi.

Joseph' sanggamte in a pa uh a sih khit ciangin, "Joseph in eite hong mudahin ama tunga siatna i bawl khempeuh hong thukkik khading hi," ci uhhi. 16 Tua ahih ciangin amaute in Joseph kiangah thu puak uh a, "I pa in a sih ma-in thu hong pia a, 17 ‘Joseph kiangah hih bangin ci un: Na sanggamte' thupalsatna leh a khialhna na maisak in, kong thum hi. Banghang hiam cihleh nang' tungah amaute in siatna hong bawl uhhi,’ ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin tu-in nang' tungah kong thum uhhi. I pa' Pasian' nasemte' thupalsatna hong maisak in," a ci uhhi. Amaute in ama kiangah tua bangin thu a gen ciangun Joseph a kap hi.
Aaron in Moses kiangah, "Ka topa aw, kote hai gamtatin ka khialhna hangun gim hong pia kei in.
Siatna ding panin na leii kem in la, zuau genna panin na muk kem in. 14 Siatna panin kihemkhia in la, a hoih bawl in. Kilemna ding hanciam in la, na phak mateng delh in.

Pasian aw, nangma itna kip om bangin kei hong hehpih in la, na hehpihna lian om bangin ka thu palsatnate hong phiatkhiatsak in. 2 Ka khialhna panin hong silsiang kiuhkeuh in la, ka mawhna panin kei hong siangsak in. 3 Banghang hiam cihleh ka thupalsatnate ka thei a, ka mawhnate khempeuh ka phawk ngitnget hi.
Muhdahna in kitotna piangsak a, itna in mawhna khempeuh maisak hi.
Mihaite in a khialh hangun phamawh salo uh a, mipilte a khialh ciangun mawhmaisak ding deih uhhi.
A kilawm hunin kammal khat paukhiatna pen ngun pek tunga kham pek khat a kisuang tawh kibang hi.

Na mawhna na phawk ding bek kisam hi. { Topa } na Pasian na langpan'na, singlim nuai khempeuhah gamdang pasian-te tawh na khialh kawikawina leh ka thu nong man'lohnate pulak in, { Topa } in kong ci hi.
Lungsim takpi tawh Pasian a zong mite in Pasian mu ding ahih manin thupha ngah mi ahi uhhi. 9 Kilemna ding deihin a hanciam mite in Pasian' tate cihna ngah ding uh ahih manin thupha ngah mi ahi uhhi.

Tua ahih manin Pasian tungah biakna a pia dingin biakna tau mai-ah na om laitakin na sanggamte khat peuhpeuh na tungah a lungkimlohna thu na phawk leh, 24 Pasian na biakna ding nate, a biakna tau mai-ah nusia photin, pai-in na sanggampa tawh va kilem phot in la, tua khit ciangin hong paikikin Pasian biakna pia in.

Note in midangte' hong mawhna na maisak uh leh vantungah a om na Pa un zong note' mawhna hong maisak ding hi. 15 Ahi zongin note in midangte' hong mawhna na maisak kei uh leh vantungah a om na Pa un zong note' mawhna hong maisaklo ding hi.

Zeisu in amaute' ngaihsutna thei ahih manin amaute kiangah, "Gam khat peuhpeuh, a gammite kiphelkhamin pawlkhat leh pawlkhat kido le uh tua gam a sia suak ding hi; khua khat ahi a, innkuan khat ahi zongin kiphelkhamin kido le uh kiplo ding hi.

"Na sanggamte uh na tung uhah hong khialh leh pai-in note gel bek theihin a khialhna va gen un. Na thu uh a hong man' leh na sanggampa uh a ngahkik na hi uhhi. 16 Ahi zongin na thu uh a hong man'nop kei leh, Laisiangtho sungah, ‘Mi nih ahih kei leh mi thum' theihna bek tawh mawhsakna khat peuhpeuh man pan hi,’ a cih mah bangin midang khat ahi a, nih ahi zongin tonpih un. 17 Amah in tua mite' thu a man'nop kei leh pawlpite tungah a thu ko un. Pawlpite' thu nangawn a man'nop kei leh Gentail mite leh siahdongte bangin na ngaihsun un.
Kote tungah a hong mawhte mawh maisakna ka neih bangun ko' mawhna zong hong maisak in. Ze-etna lian hong thuaksak ke'n,’ ci-in na ngen ding uhhi," a ci hi.

Note hoihtakin kingaihsun un. Na sanggampa uh no tungah hong khialh leh amah taii unla, a kisik leh a mawhna maisak un. 4 Nikhat sungin sagihvei ciangdong hong khialh hangin zong, a sagihvei mahin no kiangah hong pai-in, ‘Ka kisik hi,’ hong cih nak leh na maisak khin ding uhhi," a ci hi.
Note khatlekhat ki-it le uh cin keima nungzuite na hihna uh mi khempeuh in hong thei ding uhhi," a ci hi.
Ahih theih laiteng mi khempeuh tawh na kilemna dingun hanciam un.
Tua ahih ciangin mi tawh kilem theihna ding, leh kha thu-ah khatlekhat thahatna i kipiak theihna ding thute hanciam ciat ni.

Note khatlekhat thu na kineih uh ciangin Pasian' mi siangthote khensakzaw loin lawki thukhente' mai na kitun' ngam uhhi. 2 Pasian' mite in leitung mite' thu a khensakzaw ding ahihlam theilo na hi uhhiam? Note pen leitung mite' thu a khensak ding na hih uh ciangin tua bang thu neute khen theilo lawmlawm na hi uhhiam? 3 Eite pen vantung mite' thu nangawn a khensak ding ihih lamtak theilo na hi uhhiam? Tua ahih manin hih leitunga no' thu neuneute leltak na khentheih zawk kan ding uh a hihi. 4 Tua bang hinapi-in hih bang thu themthem hong pian' ciangin pawlpi sungah bangmahin a kisimlo mite' mai kitun'ding na hi uhhiam? 5 Note-a' dingin zumhuai mahmah hi. Note khatlekhat na kithu-neihnate uh a khenthei ding note lakah mipil khat beek om buang ding hi. 6 Tua hinapi, khatlekhat thu kineihin zum na kitun' uh a, lawki thukhente na khensak tazen uhhi. 7 Note khatlekhat zum na kitut mahmah uh zong a gina hetlo na hihna uh hong kilangsak hi. Banghangin thuakzaw mailo a, sum ngamzaw mailo na hi uhhiam? 8 Note khatlekhat kisu-in, khatlekhat na kisut zawsop uh a, na sanggamte teekteek nangawn uh tawh thu na nei uhhi. 9 Migilote, Pasian' Ukna sungah a lut hetlohna ding thu na thei uhhi. Note kihaibawl kei un. Numei tawh a paktatte, milim biate, mi zi ahih kei leh mi pasal tawh a mawhte, pasal leh pasal a khialte, 10 a gutate, a huaihamte, zukhamte, mi gensiate, ahih kei leh mi' na a sutte khat beek, Pasian' Ukna sungah lutthei hetlo ding hi. 11 Note pawlkhat, tua bangin na gamta uhhi. Ahi zongin note pen i Topa Zeisu Christ leh i Pasian' Khasiangtho hangin mawhna panin a hong kisiangsak khinsa, Pasian' tungah a kipiasa, Pasian tawh a kipawlsa mite na hi uhhi. 12 "Ka ut peuhpeuh ka hihtheihna ding thu om hi," a ci omkha ding hi. Ahi zongin na khempeuh hihding kilawmlo hi. Kei zong ka ut khempeuh ka hih theih hangin tua bang gamtatna khat peuhpeuh' sila ka suak nuam kei hi.

Itna neite a lungduai-in migi hi. Itna neite in hazatna lungsim neiloin, zong kisathei lo hi. 5 Itna neite a kilawm loin gamtalo, heh pakpaklo, mite' mawhna ciamtehlo hi. 6 Thuman lote-ah lungdam ngeilo uh a, thumante bekah lungdam uhhi. 7 Itna neite lungkia cih om ngeilo hi; a upna, a lametna, lungduai takin a ngaknate uh a mawkna cih om ngeilo hi.
Naupang ka hih hun lai-in naupang mah bangin kampau-in, thu ngaihsunin, ka gamta hi. Ahi zongin tu-in khangham ka hih manin naupang vaite ka zang nawn kei hi.
Amah na itkik ding uh ka hong thumna thu zong amah na theisak un. 9 Note in ze-etna bangzah ciang thuakzo-in, ka thugente na hong mangzo uhhiam cih ka theihna dingin tua lai a hong gelh ka hihi.

Note lakah na ka sepna hangin huhna bangmah kong ngetloh cih simloh, pawlpi dangte sangin kong hamsiatsak zawkna bangmah om hetlo hi. Tua bangin note kiang panin bangmah kong ngetlohna hangin midang tawh hong kibangsak lo suak ka hih manin, tua khialhna hong maisak ta un.
Sanggamte aw, na thu ngaihsutnate uhah naupang bang kei un. Gitlohna lamah naupang bang unla, ahi zongin thu ngaihsutna-ah a khangham hi ta un.
Na heh uh ciangin, tua hehna hangin khialkha kei unla, a tawntungin heh paisuak kei un.

Kimuhdahna, hehna, thangpaihna, kitotna, kikona, kilungsim neihna khempeuh beisak unla, 32 khatlekhat kihehpihin, lungsim neem tawh na kihozaw unla, Christ' hangin Pasian in note' mawhna hong maisak mah bangin khatlekhat na mawhna uh na kimaisak ta un.

Note lakah khatlekhat a kilungkimlo na om uh ciangin khatlekhat na mawhna uh kimaisakin na kihuh ciat un. Topa in note' mawhna hong maisak bangin note zong khatlekhat na mawhna uh na kimaisak ding uhhi.
Tua ahih manin tu laitakin na omzia uh mah bangin khatlekhat kihanthawnin na kihuh ciat ta un.

Mi khempeuh tawh na kilem theihna ding uh hanciam un. Nuntak siangtholo tawh kuamah in Topa mu zolo ding ahih manin nuntak siangtho na nungta un. 15 Pasian' hehpihna a ngahlah na hihkhak lohna dingun na kidawm un. Zungkha a nei singkung hong khangin mi tampi gimsakin a siatsak bangin mite a siasak na hihkhak lohna dingun na kidawm un.
Tua ahih manin na ci uh a damna dingin khatlekhat tungah na mawhna uh kipulakin thu na kingetsak ta un. Mihoihte' thungetna in vang nei a, na lianpi semzo hi.

Tua mah bangin no khangnozaw deuhte in zong a khanghamte' thu na mang un. Laisiangtho in, "Pasian in a kiphasak mite nial a, a kiniamkhiat mite a hehpih hi," a cih mah bangin na vekpi-un kiniamkhiatna puan bangin silhin, khatlekhat na na kisepsak un.
Ahi zongin Pasian kiangah i mawhnate va pulak lehang, amah citakin thuman ahih manin, i mawhnate hong maisakin i hoihlohnate khempeuh hong siangsak ding hi.

Ka itte aw, note na khialhkhak lohna ding uh ka deihna-in hih lai a hong gelh ka hihi. Ahi zongin mi khatpeuh a khialh ciangin eite-a' dingin Pa Pasian kiangah a hong thumsak dingin a thuman Zeisu Christ i nei hi. 2 Tua Zeisu hangin eite' mawhna hong kimaisak a, eite-a' ding bek hiloin leitung mi khempeuh' mawhna zong a maina ding a hihi. 3 Eite in ama thupiaknate i zuih leh amah a thei taktak ihihna hong kilang hi.

Mi khatpeuh in khuavak gamtatna ka gamta hi, ci napi-in a Christian mipihte a muhdah leh khuamial gamtatna mah a gamta lai a hihi. 10 A Christian mipihte a it mite pen khuavak gamtatna a gamta hi a, tua bang mite a puktheihna ding thu omlo hi. 11 Ahi zongin a Christian mipihte a mudah mite pen khuamial sungah omin khuamial gamtatna a gamta uhhi a, tua khuamial in bangmah ngaihsunsak theilo ahih manin a gamtatna ding mel uh theilo uhhi.

Ka it lawmte aw, Pasian pen itna hong pian'khiatna bulpi ahih manin eite khatlekhat ki-it ni. Itna a nei mi peuhmah, Pasian' tate hi a, Pasian a thei uhhi. 8 Pasian pen ki-itna ahih manin itna a neilo mite in Pasian theilo uhhi.

Lo leh a sunga om khempeuh nuamin diang uh hen. Gamlaka sing om khempeuh in { Topa' } mai-ah lungdamin la sa hi. Banghang hiam cihleh amah hong pai ta hi. Leitung mite' thu a khen dingin hong pai ta hi. Amah in thumanna tawh leitung ukin mite' thu ahi bangin khen ding hi.

Tua ni ciangin, "En un, amah pen eima Pasian a hihi. Eite a hong hon dingin amah i ngak hi. Amah pen eima { Topa } a hihi. Amah i ngak hi. Amah in eite hong honkhia ahih manin lungdamin kipak ni," kici ding hi.

Zan ka maang muh hun sungin ka khuadak leh mihing tawh a kibang mi khat meii tungah a hong pai ka mu hi. A nungta tawntung mipa kiangah pai-in, ama kiangah a kipia hi. 14 Amah in vangliatna, minthan'na, leh kumpi za ngah ahih manin minam kimte, minam tuamtuamte, paunam tuamtuamte khempeuh in ama na a sem ding uh a hihi. Amah in a tawntungin uk ding a, a kumpi gam a bei ngei kei ding hi.

Tua ciangin saihadial puan a silh vantung mi in, "Na mite a cing, a lian vantung mi Michael hong kilang ding hi. Tua ciangin leitungah mihing a pian'zawha kipan a nasia penpen gimna hun hong tung ding hi. Tua hun a hong tun' ciangin Pasian' laibu sungah a min a kigelh na mite khempeuh kihonkhia ding hi. 2 A sisa mi tampite in nuntakna a ngahkik ding uhhi. Pawlkhatte nungta tawntung ding uh a, pawlkhatte in a tawntung zumna leh minsiatna a ngah ding uhhi.

Puanpak silhpa in a khutte gel vantung lamah lamto-in, Tawntung Pasian' min tawh thuciamna a bawl hi. Amah in, "Kum thum leh alang hi ding hi. Pasian' mite a kibawlsiatna a bei ciangin hih thute khempeuh hong piang ding hi," ci-in a gen ka za hi
Tua ni hong tun' ciangin khuadam, vukkiat cihte om nawnlo ding a,

A Pa' minthan'na vang leh a vantung mite tawh Mihing Tapa hong paikik ding a, mi khempeuh amau' gamtatna ciat tawh a kizui-in a thuk ding hi. 28 Hih lai-a a om mi pawlkhatte a sih ma-in Mihing Tapa, Kumpi-in hong pai ding ahih lamtak phawkkhial kei un," a ci hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh leitung pian'cila kipan tuhun dong, cikmahin tua bang haksatna a om ngeilo, nidang ciangin zong a om ngei nawnlo ding, tua hun laitakin hong tung ding hi. 22 Pasian in tua gimna hun a ni khiamlo hi leh a suaktazo kuamah omlo ding hi. Ahi zongin ama teel mite a khualna-in a ni a khiam ding hi. 23 "Tua laitakin mi khat peuh in, ‘Hih lai-ah Christ om hi, hua lai-ah Christ om hi,’ ci-in hong gen leh, um kei un. 24 Banghang hiam cihleh Christ a kineihkhemte leh kamsang a kineihkhemte hong piang ding a, ahih zawh leh a teelsa mite nangawn a khemna dingun lim leh na lamdang lianpipi hong bawl ding uhhi. 25 A hun ma-in hong genkholkhin ka hih manin limtakin kidawm un. 26 "Tua ahih kei leh zong mite in, ‘Gamlakah Christ om hi,’ hong cihleh zong va paikha kei un. ‘Innsungah Christ bu hi,’ hong cihleh zong umkha kei un. 27 Banghang hiam cihleh Mihing Tapa hong pai ciangin khuaphialep in van mong khat panin mong khatdong a taan'zaihsak mah bangin kitheikim ding hi. 28 "Sapul omna peuhah musane kikaikhawm ding hi." 29 "Tua gimna hun a tun'khit phetin ni hong mialin kha hong taang nawnlo ding a, vantung panin aksite hong kia ding a, vantunga om nate a pai ngei-in pai theiloin lampialgawp ding hi. 30 Tua ciangin Mihing Tapa' lim vantungah hong kilang ding hi. Tua ciangin leitung minam khempeuh dahin kap ding uh a, vangliatna leh minthan'na tawh meii lakah Mihing Tapa a hong pai a mu ding uhhi. 31 Nakpi takin peengkul hong ging ding a, leitung mun khempeuhah a vantung mite hong paisakin, leimong khat pan mong khatdongin, a teelsa mite a kaikhawmsak ding hi.

"Mihing Tapa a vantung mite tawh Kumpi-in hong paikhawm uh ciangin a kumpi tokhom tungah hong tu ding hi. 32 Ama mai-ah leitung minam khempeuh hong kikhawm ding hi. Gancingpa in tuu leh keelte a khen mah bangin mi khempeuh khen nihin hong koih ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tawntung gimthuakna sungah amaute pai ding uh a, mihoihte ahih leh nuntak tawntungna sungah lut ding uhhi," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Nangmah in tua mah na ci khin hi. Ahi zongin note khempeuh kiangah ka hong genin-ah: Vanglianpa' taklamah Mihing Tapa omin meii tungah a hong pai na mu ding uhhi," a ci hi.

"Tua haksatna hun khit ciangin ni hong mial ding a, kha hong taang nawnlo ding hi. 25 Van panin aksite hong kia ding a, vantunga om nate a omngei bangin omthei nawnlo ding hi. 26 Tua ciangin Mihing Tapa, vangliatna leh minthan'na tawh meii lakah a hong paisuk kimu ding hi. 27 Tua ciangin leitung mun khempeuhah vantung mite sawl ding a, leimong khat pan mong khat kikalah a om a teel mite khempeuh a kaikhawmsak ding hi.
Zeisu in, "Ka hi hi; Vanglian Pasian' taklamah Mihing Tapa omin meii lakah a hong pai na mu ding uhhi," a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Mihing Tapa hong kilang ding a, minthan'na leh vangliatna tawh meii lakah hong pai ding hi. 28 Hih thute a pian'ding hong kipat ciangin, note hong kihotkhiat ding hun hong naita ahih manin, dingin nuamna lungsim tawh khuadak un," a ci hi. 29 Tua ciangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah thugentehna khat gen a, "Thei kung-a kipan singkung khempeuh en dih un. 30 A teh hong no na muh uh ciangin khuakhal hong naita hi, ci-in na thei uhhi. 31 Tua mah bangin hih thute hong piang na muh uh ciangin Pasian' Ukna hun hong tungta ding hi, ci-in na thei ding uhhi.
i Topa Zeisu Christ hong kilatkik ding ngakin na om hun sungun thupha na ngahloh uh khat beek omlo hi.

Tua ahih manin a hun a tun'ma-in kuamah mawhsakin thu khen kei un. Topa hong pai ciangin a tawpna thukhenna hong om ding a, amah in thusimte hong pholakin, mihingte in a lungsim sung uhah a ipcip uh thute hong telkheh ding hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in amau' ngahdingin a kilawm phatna, Pasian' kiang panin a ngah ciat ding uhhi.
Ahi zongin tua hin'kikna pen ama hun tawh kizui-in a banbanin hi ding hi. A masa penin Christ hi a, Christ hong paikik ciangin ama pawlte khempeuh hingkik ding hi.

Kuamah kim in a theihloh thusim khat na ngai un. Eite khempeuh a si khin ding ihi kei a, thakhatthu-in a kikheelvat ding ihi hi. 52 Peengkul nunung hong gin' ciangin mitphiat kikal sungin i kikheelpak ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh peengkul hong gin' ciangin misite a sithei nawnlo dingin hong tho ding a, i vekpi-in i kikheel ding hi. 53 A muatthei pumpi pen a muattheilo pumpi-in hong kikheel ding a, a sithei pumpi pen a sitheilo pumpi-in hong kikheel ding hi. 54 A muatthei pen a muattheilo hong suakin, a sithei pen a sitheilo hong suah ciangin Laisiangtho thu hong tung taktak ding hi. Laisiangtho in, "Sihna maimangin gualzawhna in khuplet hi.
Topa a itlo mi peuhmah in samsiatna ngah ta hen. I Topa hong pai ta hen.
Topa Zeisu hong paikik Ni ciangin a cingtakin thei ding na hih manun note hangin ka kisialh uh mah bangin note zong kote hangin na kisial ding uhhi.
Note sungah hih nasep hoih a hong pankhia Pasian in Zeisu Christ hong paikik hun ciangdong, mi cingtaak na hihna dingun hong huh ding hi, ci-in teltakin ka thei hi.
Note' nuntakna taktak Christ ahih manin amah hong kilat ciangin note zong amah tawh hong kilang khawmin amah tawh na minthang khawm ding uhhi.

Sanggamte aw, lametna a neilo mite bangin na dahluat lohna dingun a sisa mite' omzia ding thu na theih ding uh ka deih hi. 14 Zeisu si-in thokik hi, ci-in i up mah bangin Pasian in Zeisu hong paipih kik ciangin amah umin a si mite zong hong tonpih ding hi, ci-in i um hi. 15 Topa' thugen note kiangah ka hong gen uh thu in: Topa hong paikik ni ciangin a nungta lai eite pen a sisa mite tawh a kimuh ma-in Topa tawh i kimu kei ding hi. 16 Pasian' thupiakna awging lianpi, vantung mi mangpa' thugenna, leh Pasian' peengkul hong ging ding a, vantung panin Topa mahmah hong paisuk ding hi. 17 Tua ciangin tua hun laitakin a nungta lai eite pen vankim lai-ah Topa a dawn dingin amah a um a sisa mite tawh hong kilakhawm ding a, Topa tawh i omkhawm tawntung ding hi, cihna a hihi.
Amah a hong paikik ciangin a hing ihi a, a si ihi zongin amah tawh i omkhawm theihna dingin eite-a' dingin amah a hong si a hihi.
A khamcippa a kilakkhiat khit ciangin A Gilopa hong kilang ding a, Topa Zeisu hong pai ciangin tua A Gilopa mutlum ding a, vanglian minthangin hong kilatna tawh a maimangsak ding hi.

Pasian' mai, leh a hingte hita leh a site hita leh mi khempeuh' thu a khending Christ Zeisu' mai-ah nakpi takin ka hong hanthawn hi. Amah Kumpi-in hong paikikin ukna hong kipan ding ahih manin, 2 hunhoih hunsia cih khen tuanloin Pasian' thu hilh ding na kin ngaihsutna ding, lungduaina tawh mite' lungsim zo-in, mite taii-in, hanthawnin na hilhna dingin thu a hong pia ka hihi.

Mi khempeuh khatvei si-in, tua khit ciangin Pasian' thukhenna a thuakding ahih mah bangin, 28 mi tampite' mawhna a thuak dingin Christ zong khatvei bek a kipia hi. A nihveina hong kilatkik ciangin mawhna thu tawh kisai nasem ding hi nawnloin, lawptakin amah a ngak mite a honkhia ding a hihi.
Tanglai pekin Adam pan khang sagihna Enok in zong hih thu mah na genkhol a, a genna-ah, "En un, Topa, a mi siangtho honpite tawh hong pai ding a,

En un, amah hong paita ding a, meiipi tawh hong tonkhawm ding hi. Teipi tawh amah a sunte-a kipan mi khempeuh in a mu ding uhhi. Amah a hong pai ciangin leitung mi khempeuh lau-in a kap ding uhhi. Hih ka gen bangin hong piang takpi ding hi. Amen.

Hih thuteng khit ciangin ka khuadak leh vantungah kong a kihongsa-in a om ka mu hi. Peengkul awging tawh a kibang, kei kiangah thu a hong gensa awging mah in, "Hih lai-ah hong paito in. Tunung ciangin thupiang dingte ka hong lak ding hi," hong ci hi. 2 Thakhat thu-in Khasiangtho tawh ka kidim a, tua vantunga tokhom tungah mi khat a tu ka mu hi.

Laidal a kizial bangin vanpi kizialin maimang a, mual leh tuikulhte khempeuh a omna uh panin maimangta hi. 15 Tua ciangin leitung kumpite leh miliante, galkapmangte, mihaute leh mi vangliante, silate leh sila a hilote-a kipanin a kuamah peuh, mualtunga leihawmte sungah bu uh a, 16 mualte leh suangtum lianpite kiangah, "Kote tungah hong kiasuk unla, tokhom tungah a tupa' maitang leh Tuuno' hehna panin kote hong liah un. 17 Amaute' hehna hangin gimna hun hong tungta ahih manin kua in thuakzo ding ahi hiam?" a ci uhhi.

Tua ciangin a thahat vantung mi khat, meiipi in tuamin, a lu tungah sakhituihup khimin, a maitang nitaang tawh kibangin, a khete meikuang khuampi tawh a kibang khat, vantung panin a hong kumsuk ka mu hi.

Tua ciangin a sagihna vantung mi in a peengkul hong tum a, vantungah nakpi takin aw hong ging a, "Leitung ukna ding aana neihna pen i Topa Christ-a' hong suakkhin a, amah in a tawntungin uk paisuak ding hi," hong ci hi. 16 Pasian mai-a a tokhom ciat uhah a tu upa sawmnihlelite zong mai pukin Pasian bia uh a, 17 "A beisa hun leh tu hunah a om tawntung a Vanglian Topa Pasian aw, tu-in na vangliatna zangin ukding hong kipan khin na hih manin nangma tungah ka nuamna uh ka hong ko uhhi. 18 Na hehna hong kilat hun hong tungta a, misite thukhenna ding hun hong tungta ahih manin minam dangte heh mahmah uhhi. Nangma nasem kamsangte, a lian a neu, nang hong kihta mi khempeuhte thaman na piak ding hun hi ta a, leitung a susia mite na suksiat ding hun hi ta hi," a ci uhhi. 19 Tua ciangin vantungah a om Pasian biakna innpi kihong a, a Thuciamna Singkuang zong biakinn sungah a om a kimu hi. Tua ciangin nakpi takin khua phia-in a ging lianpi om a, van gingin zin ling a, gialpi a kia hi.

Tua ciangin ka khuadak leh meiipi a bang a kang biakbuak om a, tua meiipi tungah mihing tawh a kibang khat tu-in, kham lukhu khu-in, a khutah phiaukawi hiam khat a tawi ka mu hi. 15 Biakinn sung panin vantung mi khat hong paikhia a, meiipi tungah a tu mipa nakpi takin samin, "Leitung mite lak dingin min mahmah a, a lak hun hong tungta ahih manin na phiaukawi tawh at in," a ci hi. 16 Tua ahih manin meii tungah a tupa in leitungah a phiaukawi hong van a, leitung mite a at hi.
Tua ciangin vantung a kihong ka mu a, sakol kang khat a om hi. A tungah a tuangpa pen a Citak a Thumanpa kici hi. Amah in thumanin thu khenin gal a do hi.

Tua ciangin tokhom kang a lian khat leh a tungah a tupa ka mu hi. Ama omna panin lei leh van lengkhiamang a, a tun'na mel uh kitheilo hi. 12 A lian a neu misite tua tokhom mai-ah dingin laibute a kilem ka mu hi. Tua ciangin a nungta mite a kigelhna laibu a dang khat zong a kilem ka mu hi. Amaute' gamtatna tua laibute sungah a kigelhna tawh kizui-in misite tungah thu a kikhen hi.

Tua ciangin van thak khat leh lei thak khat ka mu hi. Van masa leh lei masa maimang khin a, tuipi zong om nawnlo hi. 2 Mothak khat a pasal tawh a kituah dingin a kizem bangin vantung Pasian kiang panin Khuapi Siangtho ahi Jerusalem khua thak a hong paisuk ka mu hi. 3 Tokhom panin nakpi takin awging khat ka za a, "Tu-in Pasian omna inn pen mite tawh omkhawm ta hi. Pasian in amaute ompih ding a, amaute pen ama mite hi ding uhhi. Pasian mahmah amaute tawh omkhawm ding a, amah pen amaute' Pasian hi ding hi. 4 Amaute' mit panin khitui khempeuh nulsak ding hi. Thu luisate maimang khinta ahih manin sihna, dahna, leh na sa-a kahna cihte om nawnlo ding hi," a ci hi.
Nang leh numei kikal na suanlekhakte leh ama suanlekhakte kikalah kilangneihna ka omsak ding hi. Amah in na lutang hong sunim ding a, nang in ama khetul na sunim ding hi," a ci hi.
{ Topa } Pasian in mipa leh a zi-a' dingin savun puan bawl a, amaute silhsak hi.
Ka Pasian, ka Pasian aw, banghangin kei hong nusia na hi hiam? Nong huhna ding ka hong thumna panin banghangin gamla om na hi hiam?
Ahih hangin kei pen lungno khat bang lel ka hi a, mi ka bang kei hi. Mite' ko gawpgawp, mite' simmawh ka hihi. 7 Hong mu mi khempeuh in kei hong zahko-in, hong mukpiksan uh a, a lu uh hong peisan hi.
Ka kiimah uite om a, siatna bawl mi honkhat in kei hong umcih uhhi. Ka khut ka khete hong sunletzo uhhi.
Amaute in ka puante hawm uh a, ka puan a hawmna dingun lai ai a san uhhi.
Amah in thuman mipa kem a, a guh khat zong kitanlo hi.

Amah pen mite in simmawhin nusia a, gimna leh natna a thuak a hihi. Mite in en nuamloin a mai uh a humsan uh mipa bangin amah kisimmawh a, eite in amah i thusim kei hi. 4 "Amah in eite' natna teng thuakin, eite' gimna teng pua khin taktak hi. Ahi zongin eite in amah pen ama mawhna hangin Pasian in a gimsak, gimna a thuak bangin i ngaihsun hi. 5 Ahih hangin eite' khialhna hangin amah kiliamsak a, eite' mawhna hangin amah kisatnim hi. Ama gim thuakna hangin nopna i ngah a, ama liamna hangin damna i ngah hi. 6 Eite khempeuh in tuu bangin lam i khial khin a, eite khempeuh eimau san ciatah i pai khin hi. { Topa } in eite khempeuh' mawhnate ama tungah a suan hi. 7 "Amah kinengniamin gimna a kithuaksak hangin amah kam khat beek paulo hi. Sa gote kiangah a kipaipih tuuno leh a mulmette mai-ah a kipaipih tuu a hamloh mah bangin amah kam khat beek paulo hi. 8 Nenniamna leh thukhenna tawh amah kipaikhiatpih hi. A hingte' gam panin amah kikhenkhia-in, ama mite' khialhna hangin amah in gimna thuak hi, ci-in ama khang mite kua in thei ahi hiam? 9 Amah in mawhna bawllo, zuau gen ngeilo napi-in, amaute in migilote tawh sihna a kibang, mihaute tawh hankhuk a kibang a bawlsak uhhi," a ci uhhi. 10 Ahih hangin amah a kisatnim ding pen { Topa}' deihna a hihi. Amah in natna thuaksak hi. Mawhna hangin ama pumpi a kipiak ciangin amah in a suanlekhakte mu ding a, ama khan' a sau ding hi. { Topa}' deihna ama khutsungah pung ding hi. 11 Amah in a gimna thaman mu-in a lungdam ding hi. A mawk thuak ahihlohna thei-in a thuman ka nasempa in mi tampi tak a dik suaksak ding a, amah in amaute' mawhnate pua ding hi. 12 Tua ahih ciangin amah pen miliante tawh nate ka hawmsak ding a, amah in mihaute tawh nate a hawm ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh amah in sihna dongin a nuntakna piakhia a, khialhna a nei mite tawh a kisim khawm hi. Ahih hangin amah in mi tampi' mawhna pua a, khialhna a neite-a' dingin a thumsak hi.
Tua ni ciangin sunkim laipi mahin ni ka tumsak ding a, sunkim laipi mahin leitung khempeuhah khua ka mialsak ding hi. Topa { Pasian } ahi keimah in hih thu kong gen khin hi.

"David' suanlekhakte leh Jerusalem khuamite' tungah hehpihna lungsim leh thungetna lungsim ka guan' ding hi. Amaute in a sutlup uh mipa enin, ta khat neihsun a sihsuah mite bangin kap ding uh a, tacil a khuaisuahte bangin nakpi takin kapin thum ding uhhi.
"Tua ni hong tun' ciangin David' suanlekhakte leh Jerusalem khuamite' mawhna leh nitnateng khempeuh a silsiang dingin tuinak khat hong phul ding hi.
"Na theihsa uh mah bangin tuzawh ni nih khit ciangin Paisan Pawi hun hong tungta ding hi. Tua ciangin singlamteh tungah thah dingin Mihing Tapa kipia ding hi," a ci hi.

A nitak ciangin Zeisu leh sawmlenihte an ne dingin a tukhawm uhhi. 21 Amaute anne-in a om laitakun Zeisu in, "Note khat in kei na hong lehhek ding uhhi," a cih ciangin 22 amaute dah mahmah uh a, amaute in a banbanin, "Topa aw, kei ka hi hiam?" ci-in a dong uhhi. 23 Zeisu in, "Ankuang ka sawk khawmpihpa in kei hong lehhek ding hi. 24 Mihing Tapa ahih leh Laisiangtho sungah a kigelhsa mah bangin a si ding ahi hi; ahi zongin Mihing Tapa a lehhekpa in gimna thuakding hi. Tua mipa pen a piang vetlo hi leh ama-a' dingin hoihzaw ding hi," a ci hi.

A lehhekpa Judas in Zeisu a si dingin thu a kikhenna a muh ciangin kisikkik ahih manin siampi liante leh upate kiangah a ngun peek sawmthumte va paipih kik a, 4 "Mawhna a neilo mipa a si dingin lehhekkha ka hih manin ka mawh hi," a va ci hi. Ahi zongin amaute in, "Kote tawh bang kisai nawn ding ahi hiam? Nangma tavuan ahi hi," a na cihsan uhhi. 5 Tua ciangin amah in biakinn sungah a ngun peekte lawn'in paikhia a, amahmah a gui-awk hi.

Sun nai sawmlenih huna kipanin nitak nai thum dong, nai thum sung, tua gamsung khempeuhah khim a zing hi. 46 Nitak nai thum hun pawl laitakin Zeisu nakpi takin kiko a, "Ka Pasian, ka Pasian, Banghangin kei hong nusia na hi hiam?" a cihna ahi, ‹ "Eloi, Eloi, lama sabakthani›," a ci hi. 47 A gei-ah a om a pauna a za mite pawlkhat in, "Hih mipa in Elijah a sam ahi hi," a ci uhhi. 48 Tua ciangin amaute khat va tai-in tuihupna la-in leenggahzu-hau sungah a diahkhit ciangin pumpeng dawnah henin Zeisu' hup dingin a tahto hi. 49 Ahi zongin adangte in, "Khawl dih un; amah a honkhia dingin Elijah hong pai hiam ngak dih ni," a ci uhhi. 50 Tua ciangin Zeisu nakpi takin kiko kikin a si ta hi. 51 Tua laitakin biakinn sung deina puan, a lu panin a taw dongin kikekin phelnih a suak hi. Zin zong lingin suangtumpite kitam hi. 52 Hankhukte zong kihong a, Pasian' mi a sisa tampite zong kithokik sak hi. 53 Hankhuk panin amaute paikhia uh a, sihna panin Zeisu a thawhkik khit ciangin, amaute zong khuapi siangtho sungah hong lut uh a, mi tampi in a mu uhhi. 54 Zeisu enin a om galkapbupa leh galkapte in zinlin'na leh a thupiangte a muh uh ciangin lamdangsa mahmah uh a, "Hihpa, Pasian' Tapa taktak mah ahi hi," a ci uhhi.

Pilat in amaute kiangah, "Galkapte cingsak unla, a muan'huai theithei dingin na siam bangun hih un," a ci hi. 66 Tua ahih ciangin amaute pai uh a, a han hukna suang limtakin a ciamteh khit uh ciangin galkapte a cingsak uhhi.

Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Mihing Tapa in tampi tak thuak ding hi; upate, siampi liante, leh Thukham hilh siate in amah nial ding uhhi. Amah kithat ding a, ni thum khit ciangin hingkik ding hi," ci-in a nungzuite hilh ding a kipan hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh a nungzuite kiangah thu hilh a, "Mihing Tapa, mihingte' khutsungah kipia-in amaute in that ding uh a, ahi zongin ni thum khit ciangin hingkik ding hi," a ci hi.
Tua mite in amah simmawh bawlin, cilphihin, satin a that ding uhhi. Ni thum khit ciangin amah thokik ding hi," a ci hi.
Paisan Pawi leh Silngo Sawhloh Anlum Pawi a tun' ma ni nih ni-in siampi liante leh Thukham hilh siate in Zeisu simmatin a thahtheihna ding uh lampi a zong uhhi.

Paisan Pawi an dingin tuuno a kigawh ni, Silngo Sawhloh Anlum Pawi ni masa ni-in a nungzuite in Zeisu kiangah, "Koi lai-ah pai-in Paisan Pawi an ding hong bawlsak ding ka hi uhhiam?" ci-in a dong uhhi.

Tua ciangin siampi lianpenpa in a puan balkek a, "Thudang kisam nawnlo hi. 64 Pasian' tungah a paukhialhna na zazo uhhi. Bangci ngaihsut na hi uhhiam?" a ci hi. Hih mipa thah dingin kilawm hi, ci-in amaute khempeuh in thu a khen uhhi. 65 Tua ciangin mi pawlkhat in cilphih uh a, a mai tunsakin beng uh a, "Kua in hong beng ahi hiam, gen in," a ci uhhi. Palikte in zong amah paipihin a beng uhhi.

Tua ciangin Silngo Sawhloh Anlum Pawi hunsungin Paisan Pawi an-a nekding tuuno gawh ni hun hong tung hi. 8 Zeisu in Peter leh Johan kiangah, "Va pai unla, eite' Paisan Pawi annek ding va vaihawm un," ci-in a sawl hi.

Zeisu' nung zui-in mi tampi tak pai uh a, tuate lakah Zeisu kahin a tamlawh numei pawlkhat zong a kihel hi. 28 Zeisu zong amaute lamah kihei a, "Jerusalem khua numeite aw, kei hong kah kei unla, note leh na tate uh-a' dingin kap un. 29 Banghang hiam cihleh mite in, ‘Ta a nei ngeilo, naungek nawi a teepsak ngeilo numei ciingte mi hampha mahmah ahi hi,’ a cih hun hong tung ding hi. 30 Tua hun hong tun' ciangin mite in, ‘Mual lian mual neute in hong cipnelhin a si khin hi lehang utzaw hang,’ ci ding uhhi. 31 Singkung hing bang ahi kei tungah hih bangin hong bawl uh ahih leh singkung keu bang ahi note tungah hong nak hihzaw kan ding uhhilo ahi hiam?" a ci hi.
Ahi zongin Zeisu in, "Pa aw, amaute in bang hih ihi hiam cih theilo uh ahih manin a mawhna uh na maisak in," a ci hi. Tua ciangin amau' ngah ding ciat a theihna dingun ai sanin a puante a hawm uhhi.

Zeisu in ama kiangah, "A mantakin ke'n kong cihin-ah: Tuni-in Paradais-ah kei tawh na omkhawm ding hi," a ci hi. 44 Tua hun laitak pen sunkim nai sawmlenih pawl hi a, ni mial ahih manin nitak lam nai thum ciangdong leitung khempeuhah khua mial a, 45 tua hun sungin biakinn sung dalna puan kikekin phelnih a suak hi. 46 Tua ciangin nakpi takin Zeisu kiko a, "Pa aw, nangma khutsungah keimah kong ki-ap hi," a cih khit ciangin a si ta hi. 47 Galkapmangpa in hih thupiang a muh ciangin Pasian phat a, "Hihpa, mihoih taktak khat ahi hi," a ci hi.

Moses in gamlak khuam tungah sumngo gul a khai mah bangin Mihing Tapa zong hong kikhai ding a, 15 amah a um mi khempeuh nungta tawntung ding hi. 16 Pasian in leitung mite hong it mahmah ahih manin ama Tapa a um mi khempeuh si nawnloin a hin' tawntung theihna dingun a Tapa neihsun a hong piak dongin a hong itna a hong lak hi. 17 Pasian in leitungah a Tapa hong sawlna pen mawhsakna thukhen dingin a hong paisak hiloin, leitung mite a honkhia dingin a hong paisak hizaw hi.

Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Mihing Tapa in Pasian' pianzia a ngahding hun hong tungta hi. 24 A mantakin ci lehang, mangbuhhum tang khat leilakah kituhin si masa kei leh tang khat bek mah hi ngitnget hi; ahi zongin si masa leh tang tampi tak hong nei thei hi.
Tua ahih manin galkapte leh a bute leh Jew mi palikte in Zeisu manin hen uh a, 13 tua kumin siampi lianpen a sem Kaiafas' sungpa Annas kiangah a paipih masa uhhi.
Pilat in, "Thuman na cih bang ahi hiam?" ci-in a dong hi.

Tua ciangin Pilat in ama kiangah Zeisu paipih sakin a satsak hi. 2 Galkapte in a kumpi lukhu dingin ling vialin Zeisu khusak uh a, a kumpi puan dingin puansan a silhsak khit uh ciangin 3 ama kiangah nehin, "Jew mite Kumpipa, na khan' sau ta hen!" ci-in hopihin a khut uh tawh a beng uhhi. 4 Pilat zong khatvei hong pusuak kikin mihonte kiangah, "Ama khialhna bangmah a mulo ka hihna thu na theihna dingun note kiangah Zeisu ka hong paikhia sak hi," a ci hi. 5 Tua ahih manin Zeisu zong ling lukhu khukawm leh puansan silhkawmin hong pusuak a, Pilat in mihonte kiangah, "En un, hih lai-ah na mipa uh om hi," a ci hi. 6 Siampi liante leh biakinncing palikte in a muh uh ciangin "Singlamteh tungah that in, singlamteh tungah that in!" ci-in a kiko uhhi. Pilat in amaute kiangah, "Na ut uh leh paipih unla, singlamteh tungah that un! Ke'n ama khialhna ka mu kei hi," a cih ciangin 7 Jew mihonte in, "Amah Pasian' Tapa-in kigen ahih manin a kithah theihna ding Thukham ka nei uhhi," ci-in a genna uh 8 Pilat in a zak ciangin a lunghimawh semsem hi.

Pilat in lai khat gelhsakin, "Jew mite' Kumpipa, Nazareth khuami Zeisu," cisak a, singlamteh tungah a suangsak hi. 20 Zeisu a kikhaina mun pen Jerusalem khuapi tawh kinai ahih manin Judea gammi tampi in hih lai kigelh a sim uhhi. Tua lai pen Hebrews lai, Latin lai, leh Grik lai-in a kigelh hi. 21 Tua ciangin Jew siampi liante in Pilat kiangah, "‘Jew mite' Kumpipa,’ ci-in gelh kei in la, ‘Hih mipa in Jew mite' kumpi ka hi hi, ci hi,’ ci-in gelh in," a cih uh leh 22 Pilat in, "Ka gelhsa pen ka gelhsa bangbangin kip hi," ci-in a dawng hi. 23 Galkapte in singlamteh tungah Zeisu a khai khit uh ciangin a puante la uh a, khenkhat ciatin a ngah dingun khen li a suah uhhi. Mong a neilo, a kiphan a puantualpi zong a la uhhi. 24 Ahi zongin amaute in, "Hih puan balkek kei ni. A ngah ding i theihna dingin ai san ni," a kici uhhi. Laisiangtho sungah, "Amaute in ka puante hawm uh a, ka puantualpi ngahna dingin ai a san uhhi," ci-in a kigelhna a tun'na dingin hih bangin galkapte a gamta ahi uhhi. 25 Zeisu' singlamteh gei-ah ama nu; ama nuno ahi, Klopas' zi Mary; leh Magdala khuami Mary a ding uhhi. 26 Zeisu in ama nu leh a it a nungzuipa a dingkhawm a muh ciangin a nu kiangah, "Nu aw, tua lai-ah na tapa om hi," a ci hi. 27 Tua ciangin a nungzuipa kiangah, "Na nu tua lai-ah om hi," a ci leuleu hi. Tua ahih manin tua huna kipanin nungzuipa in ama inn-ah Zeisu' nu Mary a kem hi. 28 Tua hun ciangin Zeisu in na khempeuh kicingta hi, ci-in thei ahih manin Laisiangtho sungah a kigelh thu a tun'theihna dingin, "Ka dangtak hi," a ci hi. 29 Tua lai-ah beel khat dimin leenggahzu-hau om ahih manin amaute in tua sungah tuihupna diahin puknah hiang dawnah a koih khit uh ciangin Zeisu' kamah a va tahto uhhi. 30 Zeisu in tua leenggahzu-hau ciamin, "Man khinta hi," a cih khit ciangin a lu puksukin a si ta hi.

Tua ahih manin galkapte hong pai uh a, a tuah masakpa uh a khe a kuaihtansak khit uh ciangin a langkhata ompa-a' zong a kuaihtansak uhhi. 33 Ahi zongin Zeisu' khe kuaitan dingin a kithawi uh ciangin amah a na sihkhitna thei uh ahih manin a khe a kuaihtansak nawn kei uhhi. 34 Ahi zongin galkapte khat in a teipi tawh Zeisu' pangpi a sut leh sisan leh tui hong leengkhia hi. 35 Note in na uptheihna dingun hih thupiang a mupa in ama muhna bang a hong gen a hihi. Ama thugente a man thu hi a, a genpa in a mantaktak a gen ahihna thu zong a thei hi. 36 Laisiangtho sungah, "Ama guhte khat zong kitanlo ding hi," ci-in a genna thu a tun'theihna dingin hih bangin a piang a hihi. 37 Tua banah Laisiangtho mundang khatah, "Teipi tawh a sutpa uh a en ding uhhi," na kici lai hi. 38 Tua ciangin Arimathea khuami Joseph in Zeisu' luang a lakkhiat theihna dingin Pilat kiangah va pai-in a ngen hi. (Joseph i cih pen Zeisu' nung a zui khat hi a, ahi zongin Jerusalem khua-a Jew uliante a kihtakna hangin a simzuih khat a hihi.) Joseph in Zeisu' luang a lakkhiat theihna dingin thu ngah ahih manin va pai-in Zeisu' luang a lakhia hi. 39 Zeisu kiangah a zan hawh ngei Nikodemas zong hong pai a, Zeisu' luang a siatlohna dingin a bawlna ding myrrh leh aloes paknamtui kigawm tawi sawmnih bang a gik a hong pua hi. 40 Tua mi nihte in si a vui uh ciangin a bawl ngeina bangun a paknamtuite nuhin puan tawh a tun uhhi. 41 Zeisu, singlamteh tungah a kithahna mun tawh kinai-ah huan khat om a, tua huansungah kuamah a kivui ngei nailohna hankhuk thak khat a om hi. 42 Tua ni pen Kigin' ni hi a, Jew mite' Sabbath ni hong naita ahih manin, tua hankhuk a nai ahihna hangin nawhsa thu-in tua lai munah Zeisu a vui uhhi.
Pasian in thu a ma theihkholhna leh ama geelna tawh kizui-in note' khutsungah tua Zeisu a hong piakding a ngaihsutsa hi a, note in singlamteh tungah khai-in migilote' khut tawh amah na that uhhi.

A cih mah bangin Herod leh Pontias Pilat in hih khuapi sung teek mahah Gentail mite leh Israel mite tawh kikupna nei uh a, nangmah in Christ dingin na bawl, a siangtho na Nasempa Zeisu thahdingin a vaihawm uhhi.

Eite cimawhin i om laitakin Pasian' hoihsak hunin ei mi gilote-a' dingin Christ hong si hi. 7 Mihoih khat-a' dingin a si ngam a omkha ahi zongin thukham zuizo mipa-a' dingin sih ngamna ding a thu haksa mahmah khat a hihi. 8 Ahi zongin eite mawhna nei ihih laitakin eite-a' dingin Christ hong si ahih manin Pasian in eite hong it mahmahna thu hong lak khin hi. 9 Ama sihna hangin tu-in Pasian tawh kipawlthei ihih manin Pasian' hehna hangin gimna panin zong hong suaktasak zaw kan lai ding hi. 10 Pasian tawh eite i kilangneih laitakin ama Tapa' sihna hangin amah tawh hong kilemsak ahih leh tu-in Pasian tawh kipawl khinta ihih manin Christ nuntakna in eite hong honkhiazo zaw kan ding hilo ahi hiam?
Banghang hiam cihleh sihna a thuak mite-a' dingin singlamteh tungah Christ sihna thu pen a haihuai thu a hihi. Ahi zongin hotkhiatna a ngah eite-a' dingin Pasian' vangliatna a hihi.

Laisiangtho in, "Sing tungah a kikhai mi peuhmah Pasian' samsiat mi ahi hi," na ci ahih manin eite-a' dingin Christ in samsiatna a thuak manin Thukham zuihlahna hangin samsiatna panin eite a hong tankhia a hihi.
Amah in huihlak a ukte leh vangliatna a nei khempeuh, singlamteh tungah zogawp khin a, galzote in a sal matte a kaih uh bangin mi khempeuh muhin a gualzawhna a lak hi.
Amah a hong paikik ciangin a hing ihi a, a si ihi zongin amah tawh i omkhawm theihna dingin eite-a' dingin amah a hong si a hihi.

Eite, mawhna lamah misi bangin, thuman lamah nungta-in i gamtat theihna dingin Christ mahmah in eite' mawhna ama pumpi mahmah tawh singlamteh tungah a pua hi. Ama liamna hangin note in damna na ngah uhhi.

Christ mahmah zong note-a' dingin si a, Pasian' kiangah hong tun'pih theihna dingin mihoih khat pen mihoihlote' mawhna hangin khatvei a si hi. Mite in ama leitung pumpi that a, ahi zongin Pasian in kha nuntakna a pia hi.
Hih ka gen itna pen eite in Pasian i itna thu hilo a, Pasian in eite hong itin, i mawhna a maitheihna dingin a Tapa a hong paisakna thu a hihi.

Amaute in la thak khat sa uh a, "Nang Tuuno, tua laizial a lakhia ding leh a ciamtehnate a lakhia dingin na kilawm hi. Nang hong kigo khin ahih manin mi namkim leh pau namkim a pau mite sung panin na sisan tawh Pasian-a' dingin mite na lei khin a,
Nang leh numei kikal na suanlekhakte leh ama suanlekhakte kikalah kilangneihna ka omsak ding hi. Amah in na lutang hong sunim ding a, nang in ama khetul na sunim ding hi," a ci hi.
"Ahi zongin a tawpna-ah kei hong pan'pih ding a nungta tawntung khat vantungah a omna thu ka thei hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Leinuai nong zuansak kei a, na mihoihpa Leihawmpi na musak kei hi.
Amah in sihna beimangsak ding a, maitang khempeuh panin khitui nul ding hi. Leitung khempeuh panin ama mite a kizahkona lakhia ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } in hih thu gen khinzo hi.

Note na kiphumna uh hankhuk hong hon'sakin kong paikhiatpih ciangin { Topa } ka hihna thu nong thei ding uhhi. 14 Note sungah keima nuntakna hu kong guan ding a, note hong hingsak kikin, na gam uhah kong tengsak kik ding hi. Tua ciangin { Topa } ka hihna thu nong thei ding uhhi. Hih bangin kong hihna ding thu ka kiciamzo a, ka kiciam bangin kong hih ding hi. { Topa } ahi keimah in hih thu ka gen khinzo hi, ci-in gen in," hong ci hi.
Gentail mite in simmawh bawlin, satin, singlamteh tungah a khai dingin amaute khutsungah a pia ding uhhi. Ahi zongin a ni thum ni-in kihing kiksak ding hi," ci-in a tuamin thu a hilh hi.
Hankhuk panin amaute paikhia uh a, sihna panin Zeisu a thawhkik khit ciangin, amaute zong khuapi siangtho sungah hong lut uh a, mi tampi in a mu uhhi.

Ahi zongin tua vantung mi in numeite kiangah, "Lau kei un. Singlamteh tungah a kithat Zeisu a zong na hihlam uh ka thei hi. 6 Hih lai-ah amah om nawnlo hi. A gensa bangin thokik khinta hi. Hong pai unla, amah a kisialna mun hong en un.

Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Mihing Tapa in tampi tak thuak ding hi; upate, siampi liante, leh Thukham hilh siate in amah nial ding uhhi. Amah kithat ding a, ni thum khit ciangin hingkik ding hi," ci-in a nungzuite hilh ding a kipan hi.

Han sungah a lut uh leh, a taklam pang uhah, puanpak a silh tangval khat a tu mu uh a, lamdangsa-in a lau uhhi. 6 Tua tangvalpa in, "Lamdangsa kei un. Singlamteh tungah a kithat Nazareth khuami Zeisu na zong uhhi. Amah kithosak kik khin a, hih lai-ah om nawnlo hi. Amah a kisialna mun hong en un. 7 Tu-in pai unla, Peter leh Zeisu' nungzui dangte kiangah hih thu va gen un. Note tungah hong gensa bangin Galilee gam amaute mai-ah pai hi; tua lai-ah amah na mu ding uhhi, ci hi, ci un," a ci hi.
Sihna panin Zeisu a thawhkik khit ciangin ama sung pan dawi sagih a hawlkhiatna, Magdala khuami Mary tungah Nipi ni zingsang tungin kilang masa hi.

Hih lai-ah om nawnlo hi; kithosak zo hi. Galilee gamah a om lai-in note kiangah thu hong genin, 7 ‘Mawhnei mite' khutsungah Mihing Tapa kipia ding a, singlamteh tungah kithatin, a ni thum ni-in hingkik ding hi,’ a cih thute phawk un," a ci uhhi.

amaute kiangah, "Christ in sihna thuakin, a ni thum ni-in sihna panin hingkik ding a, 47 Jerusalem khua-a kipan minam khempeuh tungah a mawhna uh kisikin a kimaisakna ding thu, ama min tawh kihilh ding hi, ci-in kigelh hi.

Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Mary!" a cihleh Mary zong ama lamah kihei a, "Rabboni," ci-in a dawng hi. (Rabboni pen Hebrews pau hi a, "Siapa," a cihna a hihi.) 17 Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Kei hong lenlen nawn kei in. Ka Pa kiangah a paito nailo ka hihi. Ka sanggamte kiangah va pai in la, ‘Keima Pa leh note' Pa, keima Pasian leh note' Pasian' kiangah ka pai ding hi,’ ci hi, ci-in va gensak zaw in," a ci hi. 18 Tua ahih manin Magdala khuami Mary zong nungzuite kiangah pai-in Topa a muh khitna thu va gen a, hih a kam vaikhakte zong a zasak hi. 19 Tua ni pen Nipi ni nitak lam hi a, nungzuite zong a nitakin innsung khatah a kikhop laitakun Jerusalem khua-a Jew mi uliante a kihtakna uh hangin inn a kikalhnelh uhhi. Tua bang hinapi-in amaute lakah Zeisu hong ding a, "Nopna ngah ta un," ci-in a hopih hi. 20 Tua bangin a hopih khit ciangin a khutte leh a pangpi zong a lak hi. Topa a muhna hangun nungzuite a nuam mahmah uhhi. 21 Tua ciangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, "Note in nopna ngah ta un. Pa in kei a hong sawl bangin note zong ka hong sawl hi," ci-in a vaikhak leuleu hi. 22 Tua khit ciangin amaute lamah a hu sang a, "Khasiangtho na sang un. 23 Mite' mawhna na maisak uh leh amaute' mawhna a mai hi ding a, na maisak kei uh leh amaute' mawhna a mailo hi ding hi," a ci hi. 24 Nungzuite kiangah Zeisu a kilah laitakin sawmlenihte sung panin Unau Peeng minno a nei Thomas omlo hi.
Zeisu hong pai-in anlum la-in amaute tungah pia a, tua mah bangin ngasa zong a pia hi. 14 Hih pen sihna panin Zeisu a kithawhkik sak khitzawh nungzuite tungah a kilah a thum veina hita hi.

Pasian in thu a ma theihkholhna leh ama geelna tawh kizui-in note' khutsungah tua Zeisu a hong piakding a ngaihsutsa hi a, note in singlamteh tungah khai-in migilote' khut tawh amah na that uhhi. 24 Ahi zongin Pasian in misite lak panin amah hingkiksak a, sihna in amah lencip zolo ahih manin sihna hanga gimna panin amah a suaktasak hi.
Tua ahih ciangin mite tungah nuntakna a piapa na that uh a, ahi zongin sihna panin Pasian in amah hingkiksak hi. Kote gel pen hih thu a thei teci ka hi uhhi.
Topa Zeisu' thawhkikna thu, sawltakte in vangliatna tawh teci pang uh a, Pasian in amaute khempeuh tungah thupha tampi a pia hi.
Khasiangtho thu lamsangah ci lehang misite lak panin vangliatna tawh a thawhsak kikna hangin Pasian' Tapa ahihna thu Pasian in a kilangsak hi.
Eite' mawhna hangin a si dingin Zeisu kipia a, Pasian tawh eite i kipawl theihna dingin kihingkik sak hi.

I Pa' vangliatna tawh sihna panin Christ a kithawhsak kik mah bangin eite zong nuntakna thak i nuntak theihna dingin tui i kiphum ciangin amah tawh kiphum khawmin a sikhawm ihi hi. 5 Banghang hiam cihleh ama sihna-ah sikhawmin pawlkhat i suah leh amah a thawhkikna-ah zong pawlkhat suakin i thokhawm ding hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh sihna panin Christ kihingkik sak khin a, si kik ngei nawnlo ding hi. Ama tungah sihna in vangliatna nei nawnlo hi, ci-in i thei hi.
Sihna panin Zeisu a thokiksak Pasian' Khasiangtho note sungah hong om leh sihna panin Christ a hingkik sakpa mah in note sungah a om ama Khasiangtho mah tawh a sithei pumpi a hong nungtasak ding hi.

Tua ahih manin kua in amaute tungah thu khenthei nawnding ahi hiam? Eite-a' dingin a hong thumsakpa pen Pasian' taklamah a tu, a sih khit ciangin sihna panin a kihing kiksak Christ Zeisu hilo ahi hiam?

Zeisu pen Topa hi, ci-in mite kiangah genin, Pasian in sihna panin amah hingkiksak zo hi, ci-in na lungsim sung uhah na up taktak uh leh hotkhiatna na ngah ding uhhi. 10 Banghang hiam cihleh i lungsimah i up taktakna hangin Pasian tawh kipawl theihna kingah a, i kamin i genna hangin hotkhiatna a kingah a hihi.

Ama-a' ding bekin kuamah nungtalo a, ama-a' ding bekin kuamah silo hi. 8 I nuntak leh Topa-a' dingin a nungta ihi a, i sih leh zong Topa-a' ding mahin a si ihi hi. Tua ahih manin i si a, i hing zongin Topa-a' ihi hi. 9 Hih thu hangin Christ pen a site leh a hingte' Topa ahih theihna dingin hong si-in hong nungtakik hi.
Pasian in sihna panin Topa thosak kik hi. Tua mah bangin eite zong ama vangliatna tawh hong thosak kik ding hi.

Kei tungah a hong kihilh a thupi pen note tungah ka hong gensawn a, tua in: Laisiangtho sungah a kigelh mah bangin eite' mawhna tangdingin Christ hong si-in 4 kivui a, Laisiangtho sungah a kigelh mah bangin a ni thum ni-in Pasian in hingkiksak hi. 5 Tua ciangin Peter kiangah kilang a, a zomah sawltak sawmlenihte kiangah kilang hi. 6 Tua ciangin thu um mi za nga val tungah thakhatin kilang hi. Tua mi za nga valte, pawlkhat a sih khit tei hangin a tamzaw nungta lai uhhi. 7 Tua ciangin James tungah kilang a, tua banah sawltak sawmlenihte tungah kilang leuleu hi. 8 A tawpna penah, kei pen a ngeina bangin a suaklo naungek tawh a kibang hinapi-in kei tungah zong hong kilang hi.

Christ a kihingkik saklo hi leh note' upna a mawkna hi ding a, na mawhna sung mah uhah note a omlai na suak ding uhhi. 18 Christ thu a um, a sisa mite zong a mawkna mah hi lai ding hi. 19 Christ hangin i lamet thu pen hih i leitung nuntak sung thu ding bek hi takpi leh leitung midang khempeuhte sangin a hehpihhuai zaw ihi ding hi. 20 Ahi zongin a thuman taktak ci lehang, a sisa mite zong hingkik takpi ding hi cih a kitel theihna dingin sihna panin Christ kihingkik sak khinzo hi. 21 Banghang hiam cihleh mi khat hangin sihna a ommah bangin mi khat hang mahin misite zong hin'kikna om hi. 22 Banghang hiam cihleh Adam tawh a kizop manin mi khempeuh si a, tua mah bangin Christ tawh a kizom khempeuh zong kihingsak kik ding hi. 23 Ahi zongin tua hin'kikna pen ama hun tawh kizui-in a banbanin hi ding hi. A masa penin Christ hi a, Christ hong paikik ciangin ama pawlte khempeuh hingkik ding hi.
A muatthei pen a muattheilo hong suakin, a sithei pen a sitheilo hong suah ciangin Laisiangtho thu hong tung taktak ding hi. Laisiangtho in, "Sihna maimangin gualzawhna in khuplet hi.

Zeisu Christ thei-in, ama thawhkik bangin thokikin, kei zong sihna panin hong hingsak kik ding hi, ci-in ka lametna hangin ama thuak bangin thuakin, sihna-ah zong amah tawh ka kibat ding ka utpi pen a hihi.
Na khempeuhah amah a lianpen ahih theihna dingin, amah pen pawlpi ahi ama pumpi lutang hi a, pawlpi' nuntakna a kipatna hi a, sihna panin a kithosak kik Tapa cil a hihi.
Zeisu si-in thokik hi, ci-in i up mah bangin Pasian in Zeisu hong paipih kik ciangin amah umin a si mite zong hong tonpih ding hi, ci-in i um hi.

Thuman lampi panin amaute pialkhin uh a, thawhkikna thu pen a beisa thu hi ta hi, ci-in thu um mi pawlkhat lungmangsak uhhi. 19 Ahi zongin Pasian in a phuhsa sutpi kilokzo ngeilo ding hi. Tua sutpi tungah, "Topa in ama mi kua teng hiam cih thei hi," cihna leh, "Topa tawh kipawl ing, a ci peuhmah in mawhna sukhalo ding hi," cihna kigelh hi.
Pasian in a sisa nangawn hingkiksak thei ding hi, ci-in Abraham in a up mah bangin Abraham in a sisa a tapa Isaac a limin a ngahkik a hihi.

I Topa Zeisu Christ' Pa Pasian tungah lungdam ni. Ama hong hehpih mahmahna hangin sihna panin Zeisu Christ a thawhkik sakna tawh eite tungah nuntakna thak a hong pia hi. Tua ahih manin i lametna kiam ngeilo a,
Sihna panin amah hingkiksakin minthan'na a pia Pasian, ama hangin muang thei na hih uh manin, na up na muan' na lamet uh Pasian a hihi.

Noah in teembaw a bawl hun laitakin Pasian in lungduai takin ngak hinapi-in hih kha a nei mite pawlkhat in Pasian' thu manglo uhhi.
