Teembaw sungah a om mi giat bek, tui in a suaktasak hi. 21 Tui pen note a hong honkhia tuiphumna lim hi a, pumpi panin nin sawpkhiatna lim hiloin, Zeisu Christ thawhkikna hangin lungsim siangthona dingin Pasian' tungah kamciamna lim a hihi. Tua Zeisu thawhkikna in note hong honkhia a hihi.
Egypt gamah tampi a om laitakin amah in tua kum sagih sunga ante khempeuh khawm a, khuapite sungah an khol hi. A kiima lote panin khuapi simah amah in an khol hi.
Thadahpa aw, miksite kiangah pai in la, amau' nuntakzia va en in. 7 Amaute in a uk ding leh a makai ding kuamah neilo napi-in, 8 khuakhal sungin a nek ding uh, tuk hun sungin kaikhawm khol uhhi.
Thungaihsun theite pilna tawh gamta a, mihaite in a haina taangko hi.
Lim ngaihsut loin sepna tawh bangmah piang zolo a, limtakin geelna tawh ma kitun'zo bek hi.
Limtakin ngaihsunin geelgeelna pen hauhna lampi hi a, nawhsa-in lopthop hihna pen zawn'na lampi a hihi.
Mipilpa' innsungah neihlelam a dimin om a, ahi zongin mihaipa in a ngahzahzah zangkhia pah hi.
Hauhnop man bekin sum' sila suak kei unla, a manloin gamtakha kei un. 5 Na ngahsa uh sumte mitphiat kalin beimang thei a, muvanlai bangin thakhatin lengmang thei hi.
Pilna tawh inn kilam a, ngaihsut siamna tawh inn kip hi. 4 Thungaihsut theihna inn sungah a hoih a manpha nate a dimtakin om hi.
Ama lungsim a ki-uk zolo mipa pen dalna kulhpi a neilo khuapi tawh kibang hi.
Mipilte in a lauhuai thu muthei-in pelh uh a, mi mawkmawkte in phusuakin thuak uhhi.

Na tuuhonte hoihtakin thei in la, na bawnghonte hoihtakin kem in. 24 Banghang hiam cihleh neihsa kip tawntunglo a, hauhna pen a khangkhangin kizom suaklo hi. 25 Lopate ki-atmang khin a, ahi zongin a no hong selkik hi. Mualtungah a po lopa hing khempeuh ki-atin inn-ah kipua a, 26 tuute in na puan ding hong guan' a, na keeltal mante lo ciing khat man tawh kikim hi. 27 Na keelnawite ahih leh na innkuan annek ding, leh na nasem numeite' nuntakna dingin kicing ding hi.
Hih leitungah a piang thu khempeuh, Pasian in ama pian' hun dinga a sehsa hunin a pian'sak a hihi.

"Inn panin khualzin dingin a paikhia mipa tawh zong kibang hi. Amah in a nasemte samin, a neihsateng a nasemte' kep dingin a ap hi. 15 Amau' siamna tawh kizui-in khat tungah tul nga, khat tungah tul nih, khat tungah tul khat a ap khit ciangin a zinkhia hi.

Tua ciangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah thugentehna khat gen a, "Mi haupa khat' lo-ah an tampi a piang hi. 17 Tua ciangin amah in a lungsim sungah, ‘Ka an khempeuh ka koihna ding mun kicinglo ahih manin bangcih ding ka hi hiam? 18 Tua ahih manin hih bangin ka gamta ding hi: Ka ansaalte phelin a lianzaw ansaalte ka lam ding a, tuate sungah ka ante leh ka neih khempeuh ka seng ding hi. 19 Tua ciangin keimah in: Mi hampha mahmah ka hihi. Kum tampi sung ka khom ding annek tuidawn leh na hoih tampi ka nei hi. An ne, zu ne-in, a nuam theithei-in ka om hithiat ding hi,’ ci hi. 20 Ahi zongin Pasian in ama kiangah, ‘Mihaipa aw, tuzan mahmahin na si ding hi. Hih na neihsa teng kua'n zang nawn ding ahi hiam?’ ci hi," a ci hi. 21 Tua ciangin Zeisu in a thugen a khupna-in, "Tua mah bangin amau-a' ding bekin a kholcipte pen Pasian' muhna panin mihau hilo uhhi," a ci hi.
Topa in, "A pil a citak nasempa i cih a bangcite ahi hiam? A naseppih dangte ukin a hun manmanin amaute' nekzah ding ciat a pia dingin a topa in a seh nasempa a hihi.

Mi khatpeuh in inn lianpi khat lamding a sawm leh, ka zo zo ding hiam cih a theihna dingin a bei dingzah tuat masa hi. 29 Tua bangin tuat masa kei leh tua inn a khuampite a phuhkhit ciangin zawhlohpi-in khawl ding a, tua inn a kizolo a mu mite khempeuh in amah nuihsan ding uhhi. 30 ‘Hih mipa in inn lamding kipan napi-in zo zolo hi,’ ci ding uhhi.

Tua ciangin Zeisu in a nungzuite kiangah, "Sum haupa khat om a, a neihsateng a uk dingin ama khutnuai-ah mi khat a koih hi. Tua a neihsateng a uk dingin a koih mipa in a topa' sumteng phengzat gawp hi, ci-in kikhia hi. 2 A topa in zong amah sam a, ‘Na gamtatna ka zak a bangci thu ahi hiam? Keima neihsa a uk dingin hong koih thei nawnlo ding ka hih manin a beisa hunsungah ka neihsate na zeekna sazian a kimtakin hong pia in,’ a ci hi.

"A tawmno-ah a diktatte pen a tamah zong diktat uh a, a tawmno-ah a citaklote pen a tamah zong citaklo uhhi. 11 Hih leitung sumte-ah na cihtak kei uh leh kua in no tungah vantung sum hong ap ngam ding ahi hiam? 12 Midangte' neihsa tungah na cihtak kei uh leh, kua in no tungmah nomau gamhluah ding hong ap ngam ding ahi hiam?
Sun khuavak laiteng kei hong sawlpa' na i sem ding hi. Kuamah in na a sep theihloh zan hun zong hong tung ding hi.

Inn ahi a, lo ahi zongin a neite in zuak uh a, a sum ngahte uh sawltakte kiangah a ap uhhi. Mi khempeuh tungah a kisapna bang ciatun a sumte hawm uh ahih manin amaute lakah sum kitangsam kuamah omlo uhhi.

Tua lo na zuakma-in nangma-a' hi a, na zuakkhit ciangin a sum zong nangma-a' mah a hihi. Tua hinapi-in Banghangin tua bangin gamtat ding ngaihsun peuhmah na hi hiam? Mite a khem hiloin Pasian a khem na hi hi," a ci hi.
Amaute in na tampi tak hong pia uh a, teembaw tungah ka tuan'kik uh ciangin lamkala zat ding a kisam khempeuh hong puak uhhi.
Midangte a hilh note in, nomau mah kihilhlo ding na hi uhhiam? "Guta kei un," ci-in mi hilh napi-in nomau mahmah guta hilo na hi uhhiam?
Thadah kei unla, nakpi takin na sem un. Lawp mahmahna lungsim tawh Topa' na sem un.
A kuamah peuh in note' angsung ding bek zong kei unla, midangte' phattuamna ding zongzaw un.

Tua ahih manin keimah in ka hong gennop thu in: Na hihna khempeuh uh, nekna dawnna-ah ahi zongin Pasian' minthan'na dingin na hih un. 32 Jew mi ahi a, Gentail mi ahi a, Pasian' pawlpi mi ahi zongin na lungnopmawh saklohna dingun na gamta un.

Tu-in Judea gama om Pasian mite huhna ding sum kaihkhopna ding thu tawh kisai-in: Galatia gama pawlpite in a hihding zia uh ka gen bangin note in zong na hih un. 2 Kei ka hong pai ciangin sumpi kaihkhop tawm a omlohna dingin na ngahna uh tawh kizui-in Nipi simin na tuamkoih unla, na na khol un.
Hih bangin a gamtatna uh kote' lamet sangin sangzaw pek hi. Amaute pen Topa tungah kipia masa uh a, tua ciangin Pasian' deihna bangin kote tungah zong a hong kipia uh a hihi.
Piaknopna lungsim na neih nak uh leh na neihlohnate uh siksan hiloin na neihna uh tawh kizui-in na piak uh Pasian in hong sang ding hi.
Note in na phawk ding uh thu panin: Khaici tawm a vawhte in tawm mah la ding a, tampi a vawhte in tampi mah la ding uhhi.
Tua ahih ciangin hoihtakin kingaihsunin gamta unla, mihaite bang hiloin mipilte bangin gamta un. 16 Tuhun pen hun hoihlo hun ahih manin na hun neih khempeuh uh a hoih lamin zang un.

Tuhuna a hau mite kisatheikha loin, a kiplo hauhnate muan' leh suan'in neikha loin, eite in nuamtakin i zat theihdingin citna tawh a hong pia Pasian a muan' a suan'na dingun na hilh in. 18 A hoih nate semin, gamtat pha-in, citna lungsim nei-in midangte a hopnopna dingun na hilh in. 19 Tua hi leh mailamah amaute' nuntakna ding bulpi taktak ahi neihsate, amau-a' dingin a khol mite ahi ding uhhi.
Pasian' piak na a zatsiamte bangin Pasian' kiang panin na ngah uh nate, midangte' phattuamna dingin na zang un.

Ahi zongin Pharisee mite leh Saddusi mite tampi tak tui a kiphum dingin a hong pai a muh ciangin Johan in amaute kiangah, "Gul bangin ngian a zang note aw, a hong tung ding Pasian' hehna panin na suahtak theihna ding uh kua in hong hilhkhol ahi hiam?

Na kisikkik khitna uh a kilatna dingin tui sungah note ka hong phum a, ahi zongin kei nungah a hong paipa in Khasiangtho leh mei sungah note hong phum ding hi. Tua a hong pai dingpa pen kei sangin nakpi takin lianzaw a, ama khedap a tawisak ding nangawnin ka kilawmzo nai kei hi. 12 Amah in a khutah anzapna tawi-in a ante zap a, a taksate khawmin a ansal sungah koih ding a, a ansite ahih leh a mit ngeilo mei sungah a khul ding hi," ci-in thu a hilh hi. 13 Tua laitakin Galilee gam panin Zeisu hong pai a, Johan' khutsungah a kituiphum dingin ama omna Jordan Gun-ah a hong tung hi. 14 Ahi zongin Johan in na tuiphum nuamlo a, "Nang in kei nong tuiphum dingin a kilawmzaw kimlai, kei' phum dingin nang hong pai zawsop na hi hiam?" a na ci hi. 15 Ahi zongin Zeisu in, "Pasian in hih dingin kisam a sak khempeuh i hih ding a kilawm thu ahih manin tu-in hong phum hoh in," a cih ciangin Johan in zong a mang hi. 16 Zeisu a kituiphum khit phetin tui sung panin a paikhia pah hi. Tua laitakin vantung hong kihong a, vakhu bangin Pasian' Khasiangtho hong kumsukin ama tungah a khawl a mu hi. 17 Tua sung mahin vantung panin aw khat hong ging a, "Hih pen ka it mahmah ka Tapa hi a, ama tungah ka lungkim mahmah hi," a hong ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin note pai unla, midang khempeuh, keima nungzui mi suaksakin, Pa min, Tapa min, leh Khasiangtho min tawh tui sungah na phum un.
Lungdamna Thu umin tui a kiphum mi peuhpeuh in hotkhiatna ngah ding a, a umlo mi peuhpeuh in mawhsakna thuak ding uhhi.

Tua ahih ciangin Johan in amaute kiangah, "Keimah in tui sungah note ka hong phum hi; ahi zongin kei sangin nakpi takin a lianzaw khat hong pailai ding hi. Ama khedap khau a sutsak ding nangawnin kei ka kilawmzo nai kei hi. Amah in Khasiangtho leh mei sungah note hong phum ding hi.

Mi khempeuh a kituiphum khit uh ciangin Zeisu zong a kituiphum hi. Zeisu in thu a nget laitakin vantung kihong a, 22 vakhu pumpi lim nei-in Khasiangtho ama tungah hong kumsuk hi. Tua laitakin vantung panin aw khat hong ging a, "Nang pen ka it ka Tapa na hi a, nangma tungah ka lungkim mahmah hi," a ci hi.

A zingciangin Johan in ama kiangah Zeisu hong pai a muh ciangin, "En un, leitung mawhna a lakhia Pasian' Tuuno hih lai-ah hong pai hi. 30 Keima nungah mi khat hong pai ding a, keima suah ma-in amah omkhin ahih manin kei sangin amah lianzaw hi, ci-in ka genpa a hihi. 31 Amah a bangci mi hi ding cih theilo napi-in, Israel mite in amah a theihna dingun tui sungah mite a phum dingin a hong pai ka hi hi," a ci hi. 32 Johan in hih mipa thu teci na pang a, "Vantung panin vakhu bangin Kha hong paisukin ama tungah a om ka mu hi. 33 Keimah in amah ka theih nailoh hangin, tui sungah mite a phum dingin kei a hong sawl Pasian in, ‘A tungah Kha hong paisukin a omna mipa pen Khasiangtho sungah mite a phum dingpa ahi hi,’ ci-in hong genkhol hi.
Tuiphumpa Johan zong thong kia nailo hi. Tua hi a, tui tampi omna Salim khua kiang Ainon kici munah Johan in mite tuiphum a, ama kiangah mite hong pai-in tui a kiphum uhhi.
A taktakin Zeisu mahmah in tui phumloin a nungzuite bek in a phum a hihi.
Johan in tui sungah mite phum a, ahi zongin a sawtloin Pasian in Khasiangtho tawh note hong kidimsak ding hi," ci-in thu a pia hi.

"Tua ahih ciangin Topa Zeisu' thawhkikna thu teci pangin a hong genpih dingin Judas tangin mi khat i lakding kisam hi. Tua mipa pen Johan' tuiphum kipat huna kipanin Zeisu vanah a kilaktoh hun ciangdong, Zeisu' nasepna khempeuhah eite tawh a omkhawm mi khat ahih ding kisam hi," a ci hi.

Amaute in hih thu a zak uh ciangin a lungsim uh nakpi takin sukha a, Peter leh sawltak dangte kiangah, "Sanggamte aw, bangci gamtat ding ka hi uhhiam?" ci-in a dong uhhi. 38 Tua ciangin Peter in amaute kiangah, "Na mawhna uh kisik unla, na mawhna uh hong kimaisak theihna dingin Zeisu Christ min tawh tui kiphum ciat un. Tua hi leh Pasian' piakkhong Khasiangtho na ngah ding uhhi. 39 Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in ama kamciamna pen note tung, na suan na khakte uh tung leh gamlapi-a om mi khempeuh, i Topa Pasian in a sap mi khempeuh tungah a hong bawl ahi hi," ci-in a dawng hi. 40 Tua ciangin Peter in amaute tungah thu tampi genthuahin hanthawn a, "Hih migilote' gimthuak ding na tuahkhak lohna dingun nomau mah in na suahtakna ding uh lampi zong ciat un," a ci hi. 41 Mi tampi in ama thugen umin tui kiphum uh a, tua ni-in mihing tul thum bang kibehlap uhhi.
Simon mahmah in zong um a, tui a kiphum khit ciangin Philip zui tawntung a, lim leh na lamdang lianpipite a bawl a muh ciangin lamdang a sa mahmah hi.

Philip zong a kam ka-in thugen ding kipan a, tua a Laisiangtho simna mun-a kipanin Zeisu thu ciangdong a gen hi. 36 Lampi-ah a pai laitakun tui omna mun tung uh a, mangpa in, "Hih lai-ah tui om hi. Tui kiphum nuam peuh leng kua'n hong kham thei ding ahi hiam?" a ci hi. 37 Philip in, "Na lungsim takpi tawh na up nak leh tui na kiphum thei ding hi," a cih ciangin, "Zeisu Christ pen Pasian' Tapa hi, ci-in ka um hi," ci-in a dawng hi. 38 Tua ciangin a leeng a khawlsakna dingin mangpa in thu pia a, Philip tawh a nihun tui phualah pai-in Philip in amah a tuiphum hi. 39 Tui sung panin a paikhiat khit uh ciangin Topa' Khasiangtho in Philip paikhiatpih hi. Mangpa in Philip mu nawnlo hi; ahi zongin lungdam takin a lampai a zom hi.
Tua laitakin Saul' mit panin ngasalip tawh a kibang na pawlkhat kia a, khua a mukik thei hi. Saul zong tui kiphumpah a,
Zeisu Christ min tawh amaute tui a kiphumna ding uh a sawl hi. Tua ciangin amaute kiangah Peter a tam laina dingin a thum uhhi.
Tua ciangin Topa in, ‘Johan in tui sungah hong phum a, ahi zongin Pasian in Khasiangtho tawh note hong kidimsak ding hi,’ a cihsa thu ka phawkkik hi.
Amah leh a innsunga om mi khempeuh tui kiphum uh a, "Topa thu a um mi taktak hi, ci-in na hong ngaihsut nak uh leh hong pai unla, ka inn-ah hong tung un," ci-in hong samin a hong zol hi.

Thongcingpa in zong meivak a la dingin mi khat sawl a, thong sungah tai-in laukawm lingkawmin Paul leh Silas khe kiang va kiden'na-in a va boksuk hi. 30 Tua ciangin amaute pusuahpih a, "Tote aw, hotkhiatna ka ngahna dingin bangci gamtat ding ka hi hiam?" ci-in a dong hi. 31 Amaute in, "Topa Zeisu um in. Tua hi leh nang leh na innkuanpihte in hotkhiatna na ngah ding uhhi," ci-in a dawng uhhi. 32 Tua ciangin amaute in amah leh a innsunga om mi khempeuh tungah Topa' thu a hilh uhhi. 33 Tua zankim laitakpi mahin thongcingpa in amaute' liammate sawpsiangsak a, amah leh a innkuanpih mi khempeuh a kituiphum pah uhhi.

Tua ciangin Paul in, "Johan' hilh tuiphumna pen mawhna a kisik mite-a' ding a hihi. Amah in Israel mite kiangah, ‘Keima nunga hong pai dingpa Zeisu um un,’ ci-in gen hi," a ci hi. 5 Amaute in hih thu a zak uh ciangin Topa Zeisu' minin tui a kiphum uhhi.
Tu-in bang ngak lai ding na hi hiam? Tho in la, Pasian kiangah thu ngenin kituiphum in la, na mawhnate silsiangsak in,’ hong ci hi.

Christ Zeisu tawh i kipawl theihna dingin ama sungah a kiphum eite pen ama sihna mahah zong a sikhawm ihihlam theilo na hi uhhiam? 4 I Pa' vangliatna tawh sihna panin Christ a kithawhsak kik mah bangin eite zong nuntakna thak i nuntak theihna dingin tui i kiphum ciangin amah tawh kiphum khawmin a sikhawm ihi hi.
(Eh! Stefanas-te innkuan zong ka tuiphum mah hi. Tuate cih simloh kuamah dang ka tuiphumlam ka thei kei hi.)

Sanggamte aw, Moses a zui i pu i pate tungah a piang thu na phawk ding uh ka deih hi. Meiipi in amaute khempeuh na hu a, a vekpi-un nuamtakin San Tuipi na kantanzo uhhi. 2 Meiipi sung leh tuipi sungah ama nungzui a suak dingin Moses sungah amaute na kiphum uhhi.

Jew mi ihi a, Gentail mi ihi zongin, sila ihi a, sila a hilo ihi zongin, eite minam tuamtuam ihih hangin Khasiangtho khat bek mah in Zeisu' pumpi a suak dingin ama sungah hong phum a, eite khempeuh tungah a hong kipia pen tua a kibang Khasiangtho khat bek mah a hihi.
Christ sungah a kiphum note in Christ' pianzia a nei khinta na hi uhhi.

A kibang lametna khat bek a ngahkhawm dingin Pasian in note hong sap mah bangin eite khempeuh pumkhat bek hi-in Khasiangtho zong khat bek mah a neikhawm ihi hi. 5 Topa khat bek, upna khat bek, tuiphumna khat bek mah a zangkhawm ihi hi. 6 Mi khempeuh' Pa ahi Pasian khat bek om a, mi khempeuh' Topa hi-in, na khempeuh hih kimin, mun citengah a om hi.
Note tui na kiphum uh ciangin Zeisu tawh kiphum khawmin, misite' lak panin Christ a thosak Pasian' vangliatna na up manun Christ mah tawh tuiphumna panin a thokhawm leuleu na hi uhhi.

Amah tawh na kipawlna uh hangin mihingte in pumpi vun a at uh bang hiloin, Christ' vun-atna ahi mawhnopna lungsim tawh kipelhna a ngah khinta na hi uhhi. 12 Note tui na kiphum uh ciangin Zeisu tawh kiphum khawmin, misite' lak panin Christ a thosak Pasian' vangliatna na up manun Christ mah tawh tuiphumna panin a thokhawm leuleu na hi uhhi.

Noah in teembaw a bawl hun laitakin Pasian in lungduai takin ngak hinapi-in hih kha a nei mite pawlkhat in Pasian' thu manglo uhhi. Teembaw sungah a om mi giat bek, tui in a suaktasak hi. 21 Tui pen note a hong honkhia tuiphumna lim hi a, pumpi panin nin sawpkhiatna lim hiloin, Zeisu Christ thawhkikna hangin lungsim siangthona dingin Pasian' tungah kamciamna lim a hihi. Tua Zeisu thawhkikna in note hong honkhia a hihi.

Hih Zeisu Christ pen tui tawh kiphumna leh a sisan luangin sihna tawh a hong pai hi a, tui bek tawh a hong pai hiloin tui leh sisan tawh a hong pai a hihi. Kha mahmah in hih thu a manna teci a pang hi. Kha pen thuman gen a hihi. 7 Hih thu-ah teci a pang thum om a, 8 tuate pen Kha, tui, leh sisan ahi uhhi. Hih thumte' teci pan'na kibang kim hi.
Amah in { Topa } muang hi. Tua ahih manin ahi ding bangin Abram gamta hi, ci-in { Topa } in a ciamteh hi.

{ Topa } aw, ka galte tam mahmah a, mi tampi tak in kei hong langpan' nainai uhhi. 2 Pasian in amah huhlo ding, mi tampi in hong ci uhhi. 3 Ahih hangin { Topa } aw, nang pen ka kidalna lum, ka minthan'na leh ka lu hong phongpa na hi hi. 4 Nakpi takin { Topa } ka galsap a, amah in a mual siangtho panin kei a hong dawng hi. 5 Lumin ka ihmu a, { Topa } in hong kem ahih manin ka thokik hi. 6 Keimah a hong galbawl keimah a hong umcih mi tul sawm tampite ka kihta kei hi. 7 Tho in, { Topa}! Kei hong hon in, ka Pasian! Banghang hiam cihleh ka galte khempeuh' paang nangmah in na beenggawp a, migilote' ha na sutan hi. 8 Gualzawhna pen { Topa } nangma hang a hihi. Na mite tungah na thupha hong tung ta hen!
Banghang hiam cihleh haksat hun ciangin amah in a buk sungah kei hong seel ding hi. A puanbuk khuhna nuai-ah kei hong seel ding a, a sangna suang tungah kei hong koih ding hi.
{ Topa } tungah na vai teng ap in. Amah muang in; amah in hong sem ding hi. 6 Amah in nangma dikna khuavak bangin, nangma thumanna nitaang bangin hong langsak ding hi.
{ Topa } lamenin ka ngak ngiungeu a, amah kei lam hong nga-in ka kikona aw hong za hi.

Pasian, i belh leh i thahatna hi a, haksat hunin a hong huh pahpahpa a hihi. 2 Tua ahih ciangin, leitung kikhinin, mualte tuipi sung a kiden'na zongin, a tuite ging zuazua-in phuan zuazua a, hih gin'na hangin mual liante a ling zongin, i lau kei ding hi.
"Om hithiat unla, Pasian ka hihna thei un. Minamte lakah keimah hong kisangsak a, leitung khempeuhah ka min hong kithangsak hi," a ci hi.
Na lungsim khempeuh tawh { Topa } muang in la, nang' theihna suang kei in. 6 Na hihna khempeuhah amah phawk in. Tua hi leh lampi man amah in hong lak ding hi.
Ahih hangin { Topa } a muang mite a tha uh dimkik ding a, muvanlai bangin kha tawh leengto-in, amaute tai napi-un tawllo ding uh a, amaute lam pai napi-un gimlo ding uhhi.

Kapernaum khua a tun' ciangin Rom mi galkapbu khat ama kiangah hong pai-in, 6 "Topa aw, ka nasempa cina-in inn-ah lupna ngakin om a, gim mahmahin tangzo hetlo ahih manin hong damsak in," ci-in a thum hi. 7 Zeisu in, "Hong pai-in ka damsak ding hi," a ci hi. 8 Ahi zongin galkapbupa in, "Topa aw, keima inn-ah nangpipi nong pai dingin kilawmlo ka hih manin a damna dingin thu pia lel lecin zong ka nasempa dam ding hi. 9 Kei zong uliante khutnuai-ah nasem mi ka hi a, keima khutnuai-ah zong galkapte a om hi. Tua galkapte khat kiangah, ‘Pai in,’ ci-in sawl leng pai a, adang khat kiangah, ‘Hong pai in,’ ci-in sam leng hong pai a, ka nasempa kiangah, ‘Hih sem in,’ ci-in sawl leng a sem hi," a ci hi. 10 Zeisu in hih bupa thugen a zak ciangin lamdangsa a, amah a zui mihonte kiangah, "A mantaka kong genin-ah Israel mite lak nangawnah hih bang upna a nei ka mu nai kei hi. 11 Nisuahna leh nitumna panin mi tampi tak hong pai-in vantung ki-ukna sungah Abraham, Isaac, leh Jacob-te tawh an ne-in sabuai-ah tukhawm ding uhhi. 12 Ahi zongin vantung ki-ukna sungah a om dingin a kingaihsun Israel mite ahih leh pualam khuamialna-ah kilawnkhia ding a, tua lai-ah kapin a hagawi ding uhhi," a ci hi. 13 Tua ciangin Zeisu in galkapbupa kiangah, "Na inn-ah ciah in. Na up bangin hong piang ding hi," a ci hi. Tua hun laitak teek mahin a nasempa a dam hi.
Zeisu in, "Banghangin tuaci lau na hi uhhiam? Na upna uh neu mahmah hi," a cih khit ciangin tho-in huihpi leh tuihualte thu pia a, a dai dide pah hi.

Mi pawlkhat in khutlekhezaw mi khat, a lupna pheek tawh hong pua-in Zeisu kiang a hong tun'pih uhhi. Zeisu in amaute' upna a muh ciangin a cina mipa kiangah, "Ka ta aw, na lungsim kinuamsak in; na mawhna hong kimaisak khinta hi," a ci hi.
Zeisu zong hong kihei a, tua numei a muh ciangin, "Ka tanu aw, na lung kinuamsak in. Na upna in nang hong damsak khinta hi," a cih khit phetin tua numei a dampah hi.
"Keimah in ka teelsa ka nasempa, ka it mahmah, ka lungkimnapa en un. Keima Kha ama tungah ka pia ding a, Gentail mite tungah upna man a pulak ding hi.

Khaici khempeuh lak panin ankam tang a neupen a hihi. Ahi zongin a khan'khit ciangin ankung lakah a golpen suak ahih manin vasate in a hiang tungah bu a tomtheihna zah ding ciang hong suak thei hi," a ci hi.

Zeisu in, "Hong pai in," a cih ciangin Peter zong gunkuang tung panin kumkhia a, Zeisu' omna lam manawhin tui tungah a pai hi. 30 Ahi zongin huihpi nung a muh ciangin lau a, tui sungah tum dektak ahih manin, "Topa aw, hong hon in," a ci hi. 31 Zeisu in zong a khut tawh Peter zamin len a, "Upna cingtaak lopa aw, bang ci-a hong tuaci muan'lah na hi hiam?" a ci hi.

Ahi zongin tua nupi hong pai-in Zeisu' mai-ah khukdin' a, "Topa aw, kei hong huh in," a ci hi. 26 Zeisu in, "Tate' annek ding laksakin ui khawite piak ding kilawm lo hi," ci-in a dawng hi. 27 Nupi in, "Hi mah hi, Topa aw; a topa sabuai tung panin a kia annengte, ui khawite in zong nebuang hilo ahi hiam?" a ci hi. 28 Tua ciangin Zeisu in tua nupi kiangah, "Nupi aw, na upna lian taktak hi. Na deihna bangin hong piang ding hi," ci-in a dawn' khit ciangin a tanu thakhatin a dampah hi.

Zeisu in, "Na upna uh a cingtaak lohna hang a hihi. Ahi taktakin note kiangah kong genin-ah: Ankam tang cia bang upna na neih nak uh leh, hih mual kiangah, ‘Hih lai panin hua lai-ah kin in,’ ci le uh cin kinkhia ding hi. Na hih theihloh uh khat zong omlo ding hi.

Zeisu in, "Note kiangah a mantaka kong genin-ah: Note in uplahna nei hetloin, upna taktak na neih nak uh leh hih theikung tungah a piang bang na hih theih uh banah, hih mual kiang nangawnah, ‘Na omna pan paikhia-in tuipi sung kiden'na in,’ ci le uh cin na cih bangun piang ding hi. 22 Upna na neih nak uh leh na nget peuhpeuh uh na ngah ding uhhi," a ci hi.

Zeisu pen gunkuang nunglamah lukham khamin ihmu-in a om hi. A nungzuite in amah phongin, "Sia aw, kote sita le ung phamawh hong salo na hi hiam?" a ci uhhi. 39 Zeisu zong tho-in, "Nung nawn kei in," ci-in huihpi thu pia a, tuihualte kiangah, "Kilok nawn kei un," a ci hi. Tua ciangin huihnung khawlin dai khipkhep pah hi. 40 Tua ciangin Zeisu in a nungzuite kiangah, "Banghangin lau na hi uhhiam? Tu ciangdong upna nei nailo na hi uhhiam?" a ci hi. 41 A nungzuite in lamdangsa mahmah uh a, "Huihpi leh tuihualte nangawn, ama sawl bangin a gamta uhhi," a ci uhhi.
Ahi zongin Zeisu in amau thu kigen donloin kikhopna inn ukpa kiangah, "Lunghimawh kei in; upna nei peuh in," a ci hi.
Zeisu in, "Banghangin na hihtheih leh, ci na hi hiam? A umte-a' dingin na khempeuh hithei hilo ahi hiam?" a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Na ciah thei ta ding hi; na upna in nang hong damsakzo hi," a cihkhit phetin amah in khua mukik theipah a, tua a paina lampi-ah Zeisu' nung a zui hi.

Zeisu in amaute kiangah, "Upna nei un. 23 Upna na neih nak uh leh hih mual kiangah, ‘Na omna panin paikhia-in tuipi sung kiden'na in,’ ci le uh cin, na lungsim sung uhah uplahna omloin na gen bangun piang taktak ding hi, ci-in na up nak uh leh, na cih bangun hong piang ding hi. 24 Tua ahih manin note kiangah kong genin-ah: Na khat peuhpeuh na nget uh ciangin ngah ding ci-in um un; tua hi leh na nget peuhpeuh uh na ngah ding uhhi.
Lungdamna Thu umin tui a kiphum mi peuhpeuh in hotkhiatna ngah ding a, a umlo mi peuhpeuh in mawhsakna thuak ding uhhi.
Tua ahih manin Pasian in a bawl theihloh khat zong omlo hi," ci-in a dawng hi.
Topa in nang tungah a hong gen thute hong tung taktak ding hi, ci-a upna pen nang-a' dingin a lungdamhuai mahmah ahi hi," a ci hi.
Zeisu in amaute' upna a muh ciangin a mipa kiangah, "Lawm aw, na mawhnate hong kimaisak khinta hi," a ci hi.

Gamlaka pakte ngaihsun dih un. Tuate in a nekding uh na semlo uh a, a silhding uh puan zong ganlo uhhi. Ahi zongin note kiangah kong genin-ah: Bangzahin a hauh hangin Solomon nangawn, hih pakte khat zahin a hoihin kizem zolo lai hi. 28 Upna neu mite aw, tuni-in om a, zingciangin keutumin meikhuk sungah a kikhultum lopa kungte, Pasian in puansilh guan' ahih leh note hong guan'zaw kan ding hilo ahi hiam?

Nikhat, sawltakte in Topa kiangah, "Ka upna uh hong liansak in," a ci uhhi. 6 Topa in, "Ankam tang cia a pha upna nei le uh cin, hih nailung kung kiangah, ‘Kizunglot in la tuipi sungah va po in,’ ci le uh cin na cih bangun piangzo ding hi.
Ahi zongin Zeisu in, "Mihingte' hih zawhloh pen Pasian in hihzo hi," ci-in a dawng hi.

Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Na upna in nang hong damsak khinta hi," a ci hi. 43 Amah in zong thakhatin khua muthei pah a, Zeisu zui-in Pasian tungah a lungdamna a ko hi. Mihonpite in zong a muh ciangin a vekpi-un Pasian a phat uhhi.

Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Simon, Simon aw, lokhopa in buhhum a haih bangin note khempeuh hong ze-etna dingin Satan in thu a ngah khitna thu phawk in. 32 Ahi zongin, Simon aw, na upna na khahsuah lohna dingin nang-a' dingin thu kong ngetsak khin hi. Kei kiangah nong kiheikik ciangin nungzui na lawmte na hanthawn in," a ci hi.
Tua bang hita se leh ama thu ngai-in amah a um mite khempeuh tungah Pasian' tate suahtheihna ding thu a pia hi.
Pasian in leitung mite hong it mahmah ahih manin ama Tapa a um mi khempeuh si nawnloin a hin' tawntung theihna dingun a Tapa neihsun a hong piak dongin a hong itna a hong lak hi.
Amah a um mite in mawhsak thukhenna thuaklo ding uhhi. Amah a umlote pen Pasian' Tapa neihsun umlo uh ahih manin mawhsak thukhenna a thuak khinta uh a hihi.
Tua ahih manin Tapa a um mi peuhmah nungta tawntung ding a, Tapa' thu a manglote in nuntak mulo ding a, amaute tungah Pasian heh tawntung ding hi," a ci hi.
A taktakin ci lehang: A si mite in Pasian' Tapa' aw a zak hun uh hong tung ding hi bek loin tu-in a hun hong tungkhin hita a, ama aw a za mi khempeuh nungta ding uhhi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Kei pen nuntakna an ka hihi. Ka kiangah hong paite gilkial ngei nawnlo ding a, kei hong umte dangtak ngei nawnlo ding hi.
A mantakin kong genin-ah, kei hong umte bek in nuntak tawntungna ngah hi.
Laisiangtho sungah, ‘Kei hong um mite sung panin nuntakna tui luangkhia ding hi,’ a cih mah bangin kei hong um mite ka kiangah hong pai-in hong dawn ta un," a ci hi.
Kei pen, ‘Kei ka hihlam na hong up kei uh leh na mawhna uh a sihpih ding na hih manun, na mawhna uh na sihpih ding uhhi,’ ci-in ka hong genna pen hih thu hang ahi hi," a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Keimah in a sisa mite thosakin a hingsak theipa ka hihi. Kei hong um mi peuhmah a sih hangin nungta ding hi. 26 A nungta-a kei hong um mite si ngei nawnlo ding hi. Hih thu na um hiam?" a cih ciangin,
Zeisu in, "Na up nak leh Pasian' vangliatna na mu ding hi, ci-in hong genkhin hilo ka hi hiam?" a ci hi.
A mantakin ka hong genin-ah, kei hong umte in keima sep nate mah sem ding hi. Pa kiangah kei ciahding ka hih manin keima sep sangin zong a lianzaw sem lai ding uhhi.

Thomas in zong, "Ka Topa, ka Pasian!" ci-in a dawn' ciangin 29 Zeisu in, "Kei na hong muhkhit ciang bekin hong um pan na hi hiam? Kei hong mulo napi-in hong umte-a' dingin lungdamhuai mahmah zaw ding hi," a ci hi.
Hih laibu sungah a kigelh thute pen Zeisu, Pasian' Tapa, Christ ahihna thu na uptheihna ding uh leh ama min hangin tua upna tawh nuntakna na ngahtheihna ding uh deihna tawh a kigelh a hihi.

Tua ciangin Peter in amaute kiangah, "Na mawhna uh kisik unla, na mawhna uh hong kimaisak theihna dingin Zeisu Christ min tawh tui kiphum ciat un. Tua hi leh Pasian' piakkhong Khasiangtho na ngah ding uhhi.

A vekpi-un sawltakte' thugente thukimpih uh ahih manin, Khasiangtho tawh kidimin upna a nei Stephen, Philip, Prokhoras, Nikanor, Timon, Parmenas, leh Antiok khua pan Gentail mi ahi Jew biakna a zui Nicolas a teel uhhi.

Jerusalem-a om pawlpite in hih thu a zak uh ciangin Antiok khua-ah Barnabas a paisak uhhi. 23 Barnabas a tun' ciangin Pasian in amaute thupha a piakna mu-in lungdam mahmah a, amaute citakin a lungsim khempeuh uh tawh Topa tungah a thumanna dingun a hanthawn hi. 24 Barnabas pen mihoih mahmah, upna nei-in, Khasiangtho tawh a kidim mi khat a hihi. Mi tampi in Pasian a um uhhi.

Amah in Paul' thuhilhte limtakin a ngai hi. Tua mipa in damna a ngahzawhna ding zahin upna nei hi, ci-in Paul in a muh ciangin limtakin amah en a, 10 "Na khe-in dingto in!" nakpi takin a ci hi. Tua mipa zong dingin lam pai kawikawi dingin a kipan hi.
Thu um mite a upna uhah citakin a omna dingun hanthawnin tha pia uh a, "Pasian' Ukna sungah i omtheihna dingin haksatna tampi thuak ding hi hang," ci-in a hilh uhhi.

Mihingte' lungsim sungthu a thei Pasian in Gentail mite in zong thu a uptheih ding mah hi, cih a lahna-in eite tungah a hong piak mah bangin amaute tungah zong Khasiangtho a pia hi. 9 Pasian in eite leh Gentail mite deidanna hong neilo a, amaute in zong a up manun mi siangtho-in a bawl hi.
A Sabbath ni ciangin Jew mite' thungetna mun om ding hi, ci-in ka upna uh khua pualama gun gei-ah ka pai uh a, tua lai-ah tu-in a kikhawm numeite tungah thu ka hilh uhhi.

Jew mite in kei hong thahsawmna hangin kiniamkhiatna leh khitui naptui tawh haksapi-in Topa' na ka sem hi. 20 Mihon lak ahi a, note' innsungah ahi zongin ka hong thuhilhna khempeuhah note' phattuamna ding a om khempeuh sit neiloin kong gen khin hi. 21 Jew mi leh Gentail mite a mawhna panun Pasian' lamah kihei-in i Topa Zeisu a upna dingun thu ka gen khinzo hi.

Pasian' teel mite' omna muna amau omna ding mun sanah hong om theihna dingun keimah hong upna uh tawh a mawhna uh a kimaisak theihna dingin Satan' khutsung panin Pasian' khutsungah a heikhia ding leh khuamial panin khuavak lamah hei-in a mit uh khua a musak dingpa na hi hi,’ a hong ci hi.

Laisiangtho sungah, "Pasian a upna hangin amah tawh pawlkhat ahi mite nungta ding hi," ci-in a kigelh mah bangin Pasian in amah tawh a kipawl theihna dingin mite a bawlna zia, lungdamna thu in hong kilangsak hi. Tua pen, a patna panin a tawp dongin upna hang bek tawh ahihna thu hong laktel hi.

Tua thu in: Jew mi leh Gentail mi kuamah a kilamdan'na omloin Zeisu Christ upna hangin mi khempeuh in Pasian tawh kipawl theihna a ngah hi. 23 Mi khempeuh mawh ciat uh a, a hong honkhia Pasian tawh kigamla uhhi. 24 Ahi zongin Pasian in a hong hehpihna hangin Christ Zeisu tawh hong tatkhiat manin amah tawh i kipawlthei kik hi. 25 Ama hong sihna hangin mawhna a kimaisak theihna dingin Pasian in Zeisu hong pia a, amah a umte in mawhmaisakna a ngah uhhi. Amah tawh i kipawl theihna ding zia hong lahna-in hih bangin Pasian a hong gamta a hihi. Pasian a lungduaina hangin a beisa hunah i mawhnate hong en khong phot hi. 26 Ahi zongin tuhun ciangin Zeisu a um mi khempeuh Pasian tawh a kipawl theihna ding leh amah thuman ahihna a kilatsakna dingin mihingte' mawhna tawh kisai-in na hong sem hi. 27 Tua ahih leh mihingte in i kisialhpih ding bang om ahi hiam? Bangmah omlo hi. Bang bulphuh ding ihi hiam? Thukham zuihna bulphuh ding ihi hiam? Hilo hi. I upna a bulphuh ding ihi hi. 28 Banghang hiam cihleh mi khatpeuh Pasian tawh a kipawl theihna pen Thukham zuihzawhna hang hiloin upna hang hi, ci-in i genzo hi. 29 Pasian, Jew mite' Pasian bek hi a, Gentail mite' Pasian hilo ahi hiam? Gentail mite' Pasian zong hi veve hi. 30 Pasian khat bek hi a, a upna uh hangin Jew mite amah tawh a kipawl thei-in a bawl mah bangin Gentail mite zong a upna uh hang mah tawh amah tawh a kipawl thei-in a bawl hi. 31 Tua ahih leh hih upna thu i gen ciangin Thukham a phiat ihi hiam? Hilo hi; a kipsak semsem ihi hi.

Ahi zongin Pasian' maipha ngahna dingin nasepna suangloin upna a suang mipa pen Pasian in mimawh kimlai midik hi, ci-in sang ahih manin, amah tawh a kipawl theihna dingin Pasian in tua mipa' upna thupi san' hi.

Tua ahih manin Abraham' suanlekhakte khempeuh tungah Pasian' hehpihna piakkhong a suahtheihna dingin Thukham a zuite bek in ngah loin, Abraham' up bangin a umte in zong a ngahtheihna dingun upna bulphuhin thuciamna kipia hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Abraham pen kha thu lamah eite khempeuh' pupi a hihi.
Amah in Pasian' thuciamna muan'lah dingin ngaihsunlo a, a upna khahsuah hetlo hi. A upna hangin thakhauh semsemin Pasian a phat hi.
Sihna panin i Topa Zeisu a hingsakpa a um eite khempeuh zong i upna hangin mihoihin hong kisang ding hi, ci-in eite-a' dingin zong a kigelh a hihi.

Tu-in upna hangin Pasian tawh kipawl khinta ihih manin i Topa Zeisu Christ hangin Pasian tawh a kilemkik ta ihi hi. 2 Ama hangin upna tawh tu-a i omna Pasian hehpihna sungah a tung ihi a, Pasian tawh minthan'na ngahkhawm ding, ci-in lamen ihih manin i lung a dam hi. 3 Haksatna i thuak laitak nangawnin i lungdam veve hi. Banghang hiam cihleh haksatna in thuakzawh hatna piangsak a, 4 thuakzawh hatna in Pasian' pahtakna hong ngahsak a, ama hong pahtakna in lametna lianpi hong neisak ahihna thu i thei hi. 5 Pasian in eite tungah a hong piak a Khasiangtho tawh eite sungah ama itna hong guang ahih manin hih lametna in eite hong lungkiasak ngeilo hi.

Hih bangin lamenin i upna in eite hong honkhia khin hi. Ahi zongin i lamet pen i muh ciangin tua pen lamet hi nawnlo hi. Kua in a muhsa nate lamen nawn ahi hiam? 25 I muhlohte i lamet ciangin lungduai takin i ngak thei hi.

Zeisu pen Topa hi, ci-in mite kiangah genin, Pasian in sihna panin amah hingkiksak zo hi, ci-in na lungsim sung uhah na up taktak uh leh hotkhiatna na ngah ding uhhi. 10 Banghang hiam cihleh i lungsimah i up taktakna hangin Pasian tawh kipawl theihna kingah a, i kamin i genna hangin hotkhiatna a kingah a hihi.

Ahi zongin Isaiah in, "Topa aw, ka thugente uh kua in um ahi hiam?" a cih mah bangin Lungdamna Thu a za mi khempeuh in um kimlo uhhi. 17 Tua ahih ciangin zakna panin upna hong piangthei a, Christ thu upna ding pen hilhna panin hong piangthei pan hi.

Pasian in kei tungah hehpihna hong piakkhongna hangin note tungah kong gennop thu in: Note tawh a kituakzah valin kilian ngaihsutzaw kha kei un. Pasian in note tungah upna hong piakzah tawh kizui-in kingaihsun bek zaw unla, a kilawm ciang khat bekin kingaihsun un.
Upna neu mite pawlbawl unla, na ngaihsutna uh a kituah kei leh zong mawhsak kei un.

Hih thu-ah no' upna leh no' ngaihsutnate, Pasian tawh note' kikal thu hisak un. Amau lungsim sungah man a sak bangun a gamta zote pen a lung uh nuam mahmah hi. 23 Ahi zongin lunghimawhpipi-in a ne a om leh, a upna uh tawh kizui-in a gamta hilo uh ahih manin Pasian in tua bang mite a mawhsak ding hi. I upna bangin gamtatlohna peuhpeuh mawhna a hihi.
Upna lamah a thahat eite in upna zawngkhalte' ginatlohna i thuakpih ding kilawm hi; eima ut bangin i gamta kei ding hi.

Khasiangtho' huhna tawh note' lametna a khan' semsem theihna dingin, lametna a hong piathei Pasian in, amah na upna uh hangin lungdamna leh nopsakna tawh note hong kidimsak ta hen. 14 Thu upna sungah sanggamte aw, note mihoih hi-in, bangci gamtat ding cih thei-in, khatlekhat zong a kihilhthei dingin kong muang mahmah hi.
Tua ahih manin note' thu upna pen mihingte' pilna hang hiloin, Pasian' vangliatna hangin a um na hi uhhi.
Thuhilh siamna nei-in, thusim khempeuh thei-in, na khempeuh thei-in, mualte kinsak zawhna ding upna ka neih hangin itna ka neih kei leh ka kiman'na bangmah omlo hi.
Tu laitakin a omlai thu thumte pen upna, lametna, leh itna hi a, tua thumte sung panin itna mah a thu lianpen a hihi.
Kiging tawntungin na upna uhah kip unla, thahatin hang un.
Hih bangin um un, ci-in thatanghat thu tawh a hong gen ding ka hi kei uhhi. Note na upna uhah kipkhin na hih manun note' lungdamna dingin note tawh na a semkhawm ka hi uhhi.

Laisiangtho in, "Um ka hih manin ka gen hi," a cih mah bangin kote in zong um ka hih uh manin a gen ka hi uhhi. 14 Topa Zeisu a hingkik sakpa in Zeisu mah tawh kote zong hong hingkik sak khawmin note tawh ama omna-ah hong paipih khawm ding hi, ci-in ka thei uhhi.

Tua ahih manin lungmuang takin ka om tawntung uhhi. Hih ka leitung pumpi uhah ka om laiteng uh Topa' hong piakding pumpi tawh a omkhawm nailo ka hi uhhi. 7 Muhna hang tawh lungmuangin a om hiloin upna hang tawh lungmuang takin a om ka hi uhhi.
Thu um taktak mah ihi hiam, ci-in nomau mahmah na ki-entel ciat un. Na ki-ettelna uhah a cingtaaklo na hih kei nak uh leh note sungah Christ om ahih manin thu phawk un.

A taktakin ci lehang kote pen ka pian' ka patun Jew mi ka hi uh a, "Mawhnei Gentail mi," ka cih pawlte uh ka hi kei uhhi. 16 Ahi zongin Zeisu Christ upna hang bek tawh Pasian tawh kipawl theihna kingahin, Thukham zuihna hang tawh kingah ngeilo hi, ci-in ka thei uhhi. Kote mahmah in zong, Christ hangin Pasian tawh ka kipawl theihna dingun Zeisu Christ ka um uh a, Thukham deihna ka zuihna hang uh tawh hilo hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Thukham zuihna hang tawh kuamah in Pasian tawh kipawl theihna ngah zolo hi.

Tua ahih manin tuhuna ka nuntakna zia pen kei hang hi nawnloin ka sungah a hong om Christ hang a hihi. Tua hi a, keimah hong itin, keima-a' dingin a nuntakna a hong pia Pasian' Tapa ka muan'na tawh tu laitakin a nungta ka hihi.

Abraham tunga thupiang ngaihsun dih un. Lai Siangtho in, "Abraham in Pasian um a, tua a upna hangin Pasian in amah tawh a kipawlthei dingin mihoihin a sang hi," na ci hi. 7 Tua ahih manin Abraham' suanlekhak a man taktak i cihte pen upna a nei mite ahihna thu na theihding uh a hihi.
Abraham in a up manin Pasian in thupha a piak mah bangin Pasian a um midang khempeuh in zong thupha a ngah ahi uhhi.

Tu-in Laisiangtho in, "Upna hangin Pasian tawh a kipawlthei mite bek nungta ding hi," na ci ahih manin Thukham hangin kuamah in Pasian tawh kipawl theihna a ngahlohna thu teltakin hong kilang hi. 12 Laisiangtho in, "Thukham' deih bangin a gamta zote nungta ding hi," na ci ahih manin Thukham zuihna leh upna thu na kimemat khalo hi.

Tua ahih leh Thukham leh Pasian' thuciamnate a kilehngat ahi uhhiam? Hi hetlo hi. Mihingte tungah hong kipia Thukham in nuntakna taktak hong pia thei hi leh tua Thukham zuihna hangin mi khempeuh in Pasian tawh kipawl theihna ngah ding uhhi. 22 Ahi zongin Zeisu Christ a um mite tungah a upna hangun Pasian' thuciam a kipiak theihna dingin Laisiangtho in, "Mawhna khutnuai-ah leitung mi khempeuh a om hi," na ci hi.
Christ Zeisu tawh na kipawl manun note khempeuh Pasian' tate na suahtheihna uh pen na upna hang uh a hihi.
Kote ahih leh Pasian in amah tawh a kipawlthei dingin hong bawl ding hi, ci-in lamenin, kote' upna hangin Khasiangtho' vangliatna tawh hong piangding hi, ci-in a om ka hi uhhi.
Note' upna hangin Pasian' hong hehpihna tawh hotkhiatna a ngah na hi uhhi. Note' thalawhna hangin a ngah hiloin Pasian' hong piakkhong a hihi.

note' lungsim a thahatna dingin Pasian in a kicing ama vangliatna sung panin a Khasiangtho tawh note hong thakhauh sakin, 17 na upna hangun note lungsim sungah Christ hong tengin, itna thu-ah zung thuk khakin bulkip na neihna dingun thu ka ngen hi.
Tua banah, dawimangpa' hong kapna thaltang kuangte na sukmitna dingun lum puak bangin upna na nei tawntung un.

Note khempeuh hangin Pasian tungah lungdamna ko tawntungin, ka thungetna uhah note ka hong phawk tawntung uhhi. 3 Banghang hiam cihleh i Pa Pasian kiangah thu ka nget simun note' upna hangin na nuntakziate uh, itna na neih manun nakpi takin na nasepnate uh leh i Topa Zeisu Christ hong paikik ding lametna na neih manun kiptakin na omnate uh ka phawk tawntung uhhi.

Tua ahih manin ka thuakzawh nawnloh ciangin note' upna zia a thei dingin Hebrews ka hong sawl hi. Dawimangpa' ze-etna in note hong puksakkha-in, kote' nasepna a mawkna suakkha ding hi, ci-in ka lunghimawh uhhi.
Tua ahih manin sanggamte aw, note' upna thu ka zak uh ciangin lungkham sinkhamna ka thuak laitakun ka tha uh hong hatsak hi.

Sanggamte aw, note' upna nakpi takin khang a, note khatlekhat na ki-itna uh lian semsem ahih manin Pasian tungah lungdamna kohding a kilawm ahih mah bangin, note hangin ama tungah lungdamna ka ko tawntung uhhi.
Pasian a theilo mite, leh i Topa Zeisu tawh kisai Lungdamna Thu a umlo mite tungah gimna a tungsak ding hi.
Sanggamte aw, i Topa Zeisu Christ min tawh kong sawlnop uh thu panin: Note tungah ka hong hilhsa uh thute a zuilo, a thadah gamtat thu uppih mite tawh na kikhawl kei un.
Hih bangin thupiakna pen, upna taktak leh kisuan'na om hetloin lungsim siangtho taktak tawh ngaihsutna panin a hong piangkhia ki-itna a khan'theihna ding deihna a hihi.
Pasian in genzawh lohin kei hong hehpih a, Christ Zeisu tawh kipawlna hangin i ngahtheih upna leh itna a hong guan' hi.
na upna leh lungsim kisuang loin na omna thu kiptakin len paisuak in. Mi pawlkhatte in a lungsim kitheihna uhah man a kisakna bangun gamtalo uh ahih manin a thu upna uh a mawkna a suah uhhi.
Nidang ciangin a upna panun mi pawlkhat pialin, zuauthu gente leh dawi thu a kigente a zuihna ding uh Khasiangtho in teltakin a gen hi.
Khangno lai na hihna thu hangin mite' simmawh dingin na om kei in la, kampauna, gamtatna, itna, upna leh siangthona-ah thu um mite' etteh dingin na om in.

Ahi zongin Pasian' mi ahi nangmah in tua thute khempeuh pelh in la, thuman thutak, Pasian' deih bangin nuntakna, upna, itna, kipna, leh lungnemna na neihzawhna dingin hanciam in. 12 Upna thu-ah hoihtakin nawksuak in la, mi tampi' zakin na pulaksa, Pasian in nangmah a hong piak nuntak tawntungna lenkip in.
Christ Zeisu upna hangin hotkhiatna a hong ngahsak thei ding pilna a hong pia Laisiangtho pen na neutunga kipanin a theisa na hihna thu zong na theihsa thu mah a hihi.

Kidemna-ah ka hat tawpin ka hih khin a, a mong dongin ka tai khin a, upna thu khotakin lenin ka zokhin hi. 8 Thu a manin a khen Topa in tua Ni ciangin kei a hong piakding thuman lukhu ahi gualzawhna thaman in tu-in kei hong ngak gige hi. Kei tung bekah a hong piading hilo a, ama hong paikik ding itna tawh a ngakte khempeuh tungah zong a piading a hihi.
Tua ahih manin mawhna thu-ah kisuan'na lungsim om nawnloin, tui siangtho tawh i pumpi a kisawpsa-in muan'na leh lungsim takpi tawh Pasian kiang zuan ni.

Ahi zongin keima mi a thuman mite in ka thu umin nungta ding uh a, a nungkik a om uh leh tua mite tungah ka lungkim kei ding hi," na ci hi. 39 Eite pen nungkikin a maimang mite ihi kei a, upna nei-in hotkhiatna a ngah mite ihi hi.

Upna nei i cih ciangin i muhtheih nailoh i lamette ngah takpi ding, ci-in muan'na lungsim neihna a hihi. 2 Tanglai mite in upna a na neih manun Pasian in a na pakta hi. 3 Pasian' kampauna tawh leitung leh vantung piang a, tu-a i muhtheih nate a om nailopi panin hong piang hi, ci-in i upna bek mah tawh a thei ihi hi. 4 A upna hang mah tawh Abel in Kain' piakna sangin a san'theih huaizaw biakpiakna Pasian' tungah a na pia hi. Pasian in ama biakna na sang ahih manin a upna hangin mihoih hi, ci-in Pasian' pahtakna a na ngah hi. Abel a sihzawh a sawtpi hikhin napi-in tudong mahin upna thu a hong gengen lai a suak hi. 5 A upna hang mahin Enok zong sihna tawh kipelh hi. Pasian in ama kiangah lato ahih manin kuamah in Enok mu nawnlo hi. Amah a kilaktoh ma-in Enok in Pasian' lungkimna ngah hi, ci-in Laisiangtho in a na gen hi. 6 Upna lo tawh kuamah in Pasian lungkimsak zolo hi. Pasian kiang a zuan mi peuhmah in Pasian a om takpi ahihna thu leh amah a zongte Pasian in thaman pia hi, ci-in a up ding kisam hi. 7 Noah in zong a upna hang mah tawh mailama thupiang ding a muh theihlohpi mahin Pasian' thugenna na mang a, teembaw khat bawlin a innkuanpihte tawh na suakta hi. Hih bangin a gamtatna tawh leitung midangte a mawh ahihna kilangsak a, a upna hangin mihoih hihna thu Pasian kiang panin a ngah hi. 8 Pasian in ama tungah piakdingin a ciam leitangah Abraham a pai dingin a sap lai-in Abraham in Pasian' sapna a man'na pen a upna hang mah a hihi. A paina ding mun nangawn theilopi-in a gam leh a lei nusia-in a dingkhia hi. 9 Pasian in piakdingin a ciam gamah a upna hang mah tawh gamdangpi hinapi-in peemta-in va om phot a, ama ngah bangin thuciamna a ngah a ta Isaac leh a tu Jacob tawh puanbuk peuhah a om phot uhhi. 10 Pasian in geelin a lam, bulkip a nei khuapi, Abraham in a ngakna-in tua bangin a om a hihi.

Pasian in Abraham a ze-et laitakin Abraham in a upna hang mah tawh Pasian biakna dingin a tapa Isaac na pia ngam hi. Pasian mah in Abraham tungah tapa ka hong pia ding ci-in a ciam hinapi-in, Pasian' ciamna bangin a neih tua a tapa neihsun mah, Pasian biakna dingin Abraham in pia dingin na kithawi hi.
Moses a suah ciangin a nu leh a pa in hoihsa mahmahin, kumpipa' thupiakna kihta tuanloin kha thum sung a selcip ngamna uh zong a upna hang mah uh a hihi.

Eite hong makai-in i upna a hong cingtaaksak Zeisu mitsuan'in nei ni. Mailamah a ngahding lungdamna hangin maizumna kihta loin singlamteh tungah sihna hong thuak a, tu-in Pasian tokhom taklamah a tu hi.

Sanggamte aw, thuhaksa a tuamtuam na thuak uh ciangin lungdamna dingin na ngaihsun zaw un. 3 Tua bangin na upna hong hong kize-etna na thuakzawh uh ciangin na kipna uh hong kilangsak ahihna thu na thei uhhi.

Nomau kikhem tawmin thu zak bek tawh maisak kei unla, na zak bangun zui-in semzaw un. 23 Mi khat in thu a zak bek tawh maisakin a zakna bangin a zuih kei leh limlangah a maitang a ki-en mipa tawh kibang bek hi. 24 Limlangah a ki-en mipa in amah hoihtakin a kimuh khit ciangin paikhia a, bangci pian ka hi hiam cih a mangngilh pah hi. 25 Ahi zongin mite a suaktasak thei thukham cingtaak hoihtakin a et khit ciangin a thu ngai-in a mangngilh pah hiloin, hoihtakin ngaihsun tawntungin a zuite pen a sepna khempeuh uhah Pasian in thupha a pia ding hi.

Sanggamte aw, mi khat in, "Upna ka nei hi," a cih hangin a sepna in a zuih kei leh bang phattuamna om ding ahi hiam? Tua a upna bek in amah honkhia ding ahi hiam? 15 Gentehna-in, na mipih khat peuhpeuh uh annek tuidawn, nikten' puansilh neiloin haksapi-in om hen la, 16 note khat peuhpeuh in, ama pumpi kisapna bangmah pialopi-in, "Khualum gilvah takin om in," ci mawk lel le uh cin bang phattuamna om ding ahi hiam? 17 Tua ahih ciangin gamtatna in a zuilo upna guak pen a si a hihi. 18 Ahi zongin mi khatpeuh in, "Mi khat in upna nei a, adang khat in gamtatna nei hi," ci zenzen leh, gamtatna in a zuilo upna hong lak dih in; keimah in ahih leh ka upna ka gamtatna tawh ka hong lak ding hi, ka ci ding hi. 19 Pasian khat bek om hi, ci-in na um hi. Tua pen hoih mahmah hi. Dawite nangawn in zong tua bangin umin lau-in ling deldel uhhi. 20 Lawmte aw, gamtatna in a zuilo upna pen a hawmpi ahihna thu ka hong lak ding hi. 21 Eite' pupi Abraham in biakna tau tungah a tapa Isaac a piakna hangin Pasian tawh kipawl thei hi. 22 Tua ahih manin upna leh sepna kizom khawm a, sepna in upna a kicin'sakna thu na thei uhhi. 23 Laisiangtho in, "Abraham in Pasian um a, a upna hangin Pasian in mihoihin a sang hi," ci-in a genna thumanin tung takpi a, Abraham pen Pasian' lawmpa kici hi. 24 Tua ahih manin, mi khatpeuh in a upna bek tawh hiloin, a sepna tawh a kizuih ciangin Pasian tawh kipawl theihna ngah pan ahihna thu na thei uhhi. 25 Numei paktat Rahab zong tua bangmah a hihi. Israel mi thukante hoihtakin zin na do-in, lampi dangah ciahsakin na suaktasak a, ama nasepna hangin Pasian tawh kipawl theihna a ngah a hihi. 26 Tua ahih manin hu a diiklo, hu a sanglo pumpi pen a si ahih mah bangin sepna tawh a kizomlo upna zong a si a hihi.
Upna tawh thu a kinget ciangin Topa in cinate noptuamsakin, damsak ding a, mawhna nei ahih leh zong a mawhna maisak ding hi.

Note' upna hangin nitawp ni ciangin na ngahding uh hotkhiatna nomau-a' ahihna a kilatsakna dingin Pasian in ama vangliatna tawh a hong kepsak a hihi. 6 Tua ahih manin tu laitakin mite' bawlsiatna a tuamtuam na thuak manun tawlkhat na lungkham uh ahi zongin hihbang thuakna hangin lungdamzaw un. 7 Hihbang thuaknate in a um takpi mah na hihna uh hong kilangsak hi. A siathei khamte nangawn, a hoih taktak mah ahi hiam, ci-in mite in mei tawh sin uh ahih manin, kham sangin a manphazaw note' upna zong a kiptak mah ahi hiam, ci-in Pasian in hong sin ding mah a hihi. Tua bangin na thuakzawh uh leh Christ hong kilat Ni ciangin phatna, minthan'na, leh pahtawina na ngah ding uhhi. 8 Amah mu ngeilo napi-in na it uh a, amah mu ngeilo napi-in a thu umin kama genzawhloh zah dongin nakpi takin na lungdam uhhi. 9 Tua bangin na upna uh hangin kha thu-ah hotkhiatna a ngah na hi uhhi.
Sihna panin amah hingkiksakin minthan'na a pia Pasian, ama hangin muang thei na hih uh manin, na up na muan' na lamet uh Pasian a hihi.
Leitungah thu um dang khempeuh in zong note' thuak mah bangin a thuak ahihna thu thei unla, na upna uhah kipin Dawimangpa na nial un.
Zeisu Christ nasem leh sawltak ahi keimah Simon Peter in—- Eite' Pasian leh Honpa ahi Zeisu Christ a thumanna hangin kote' upna zah mahin upna manpha a nei mite tungah lai ka hong khak hi.

Hih thu hangin na upna ban uhah gamtat hoihna na behlap unla, na gamtat hoihna uh thutheihna tawh na behlap un; 6 na thutheihna uh pumpi ki-ukzawhna tawh na behlap unla, na pumpi ki-ukzawhna uh thuakzawhna tawh na behlap un; na thuakzawhna uh Pasian' deih bangin gamtatna tawh na behlap unla, 7 Pasian' deih bangin na gamtatna uh sanggam ki-itna tawh na behlap un; na sanggam ki-itna uh itna thukpi tawh na behlapzawhna dingun na hanciam un. 8 Hih bang hoihnate a kicingin na neih uh leh i Topa Zeisu Christ na theihna uhah thahatin kiman'na na nei ding uhhi.
Zeisu, Christ hi, ci-in a um mi khempeuh Pasian' tate hi a, pa a it mi peuhmah in a ta zong a it hi.

Pasian' ta ahite peuhmah in leitung nate zo uh a, i upna tawh leitung nate tungah a gualzo ihi hi. 5 Kuate in leitung nate zo ding ahi hiam i cihleh, Zeisu pen Pasian' Tapa hi, ci-in a umte bek in zo ding uhhi.
Pasian' Tapa a um mite in nuntak tawntungna a nei na hih lamtak uh na theihna dingun hih lai a hong gelh ka hihi.

A um taktak zolote hehpih unla, 23 meiphual sung panin dawhkhiat bangin midangte na honkhia un. Mi pawlkhatte' mawhna-ah note zong na siatkhak lohna dingun kidop kawmna tawh na huh un la, amau' gamtat hoihlo mawhnate na mudah un.
Leitung a omlai tengin, lo pawi hun leh anlak hun, a vot leh a sa, khuakhal leh phalbi, sun leh zan beilo ding hi," a ci hi.

Isaac in tua leitangah khai tuh a, tua kum mahin a zah za khat la hi. { Topa } in amah thupha pia a, 13 a neihsa kibehlaplap ahih manin a hau mahmah khat a suak hi. 14 Amah in tuuhon leh bawnghon, leh innkuan mi tampi nei a, Filistia mite in amah eng uhhi.

"Mi khat in a luah ama leitang phelkhat { Topa' } tungah a ap leh, nangma sehna pen khaici vawh zah ding tawh kizui ding hi. Mangbuhham beem khat dim a pawina leitang pen ngun shekel sawmnga-in kiseh ding hi.
"Leitang panin a piang khempeuh khaici hita leh singgah hita leh sawmah khat { Topa}-a' hi a, { Topa}-a' dingin siangtho hi.

Sathau tawh a kibawl ahi an tawh a biakna dingin zong, bawngtal khat ciangin annel lawh thum, tuutal khat ciangin lawh nih, 29 tuuno sagihte khat ciangin lawh khat tawh na pia khawm ding uhhi. 30 Note-a' dingin kilemna bawlna dingin keel a pa khat zong na pia ding uhhi. 31 A kitatsat lo-a meihal biakna leh an tawh a biaknate banah tuate leh leenggahzu tawh a biakna na pia ding uhhi. Tuate a sitbaanglo ahih ding thei ta un.
"Na leenggui lo uhah khaici nam nih na vawh kei ding uhhi. Vawh le-uh cin na vawh uh an leh na leenggui lo uhah a piang khempeuh a nin suak ding hi.

Tua ciangin Elisha in tua numei kiangah, "Nang-a' dingin bang hong hihsak thei ding ka hi hiam? Inn sungah bang nei na hi hiam?" a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in, "Na nasemnu in sathau biing khat cih simloh inn sungah bangmah dang neilo hi," a ci hi. 3 Tua ciangin amah in, "A pua-ah paikhia in la, beel hawm a tawm lualo, na vengte khempeuh' beel va kawm in. 4 Tua ciangin sungtumin, nang leh na tapate kong kikhaknelh unla, hih beelte khempeuh sungah sung in. Beel khat a dim simin tuamkoih pahpah in," a ci hi.
Mawhna bawlin buaina a piangsak mi in a gamtatna bangin a gah a atna ka thei hi.
Amaute in lo-ah an tuhin leenggui suan uh a, a gah tampi tak a ngah uhhi.
Khitui tawh khai a tuhte lungdamin kikona tawh an la sak ta in. 6 Kap kawmin kuankhia-in a tuh ding khaici a pua mi lungdamin kikona tawh buhlomte pua-in hong ciah ding hi.
Mi pawlkhat in sum zang ziahziah napi-in hau semsem uh a, mi pawlkhat cil mahmah napi, zawng semsem hi. 25 A cingh mite hau semsem ding a, midang a huhte in huhna mah ngahkik ding hi.
Thumanlo khaici a vawhte in lungkhamna tuak uh a, amau' hehna ciangduai amau' tung mah tukik ding hi.
Judah gammite leh Jerusalem khuamite tungah { Topa } in hih bangin ci hi: "Na lote uh kal unla, ling lakah khai vawh kei un.
Paunak-ah, Huih a tuhte in huih ngahkik ding a, a vui omlo an kung in annek ding piangsaklo hi, kici hi. A vui omlo an kung panin an kingah mah taleh zong gamdang mite in netum ding hi.

Khai tuh bangin thuman tuhin, kei nong itna hangun a piang thuphate at un. Note' { Topa } keima lamah nong kihei ding uh a hun hita ahih manin lo thak lei kalkham un. Tua hi leh kei hong pai-in note tungah thupha kong pia ding hi, ka ci hi.

Ahi zongin note in mi cimawhte citna tawh na huh uh ciangin na lawm naihuai pente uh nangawn in hong theihlohna dingun pia unla, 4 kuamah theisak kei un. Tua hi leh kuama muhlohin na gamtatna uh a mu na Pa un note tungah thaman hong pia ding hi.
Tua ahih manin note tungah hong kibawl ding na deih bangun midangte tungah na bawl un. Moses Thukhamte leh kamsangte' thuhilhnate pen hih mah a deihna a hihi.

Khaici khempeuh lak panin ankam tang a neupen a hihi. Ahi zongin a khan'khit ciangin ankung lakah a golpen suak ahih manin vasate in a hiang tungah bu a tomtheihna zah ding ciang hong suak thei hi," a ci hi.

Midangte tungah pia un. Tua hi leh Pasian in note tungah zong hong pia ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh midangte na piakna uh tawh kizui-in a henhen, a tahtah, a dimletin Pasian in note tungah hong pia ding hi," a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Pasian' Ukna bang tawh kibang a, bang tawh genteh ding ka hi hiam cihleh:19Mi khat in a lo-ah a vawh ankam tang khat tawh kibang hi. Tua ankam tang hong khangin kung golpi hong suak a, vasate in a hiang tungah bu a tom thei uhhi," a ci hi.

Note in na paunak uhah, ‘Khai tuh khit kha li ciangin anlak hun hi,’ na ci uhhi. Tu-in note khuadakin lote en un. An khempeuh min khinta a, lakding bek in sam hi. 36 Khaituhpa leh anlapa a lungdam khawm theihna dingin anlapa thaman a kipiak mah bangin anlapa in zong a nungta tawntung dingin mi a khawm ding hi. 37 Tua ahih manin, ‘Khat in khai tuhin, adang khat in a an la,’ ci-in paunak a om pen thuman mahmah hi. 38 Tua ahih manin note in na khawhloh uh lo-ah an a la dingin ka hong sawl hi. Midang in tua lo na kho a, note in a lak bek a si na hi uhhi," a ci hi.

Tua ahih manin Zeisu in Sabbath ni-in cina a damsakna hangin amaute in Zeisu bawlsiat ding a kipan uhhi. 17 Ahi zongin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, "Ka Pa in tuni dongin na sem tawntung ahih manin kei zong ka sep ding mah ahi hi," a ci hi. 18 Hih bangin ama kampauna hangin amaute in Zeisu thatnuam semsem uhhi. Amah in Sabbath thukham a palsat bek hiloin, Pasian nangawn ka Pa ci ahih manin Pasian tawh a kikimin kiseh hi, ci-in a mawhsak uhhi.

Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Mihing Tapa in Pasian' pianzia a ngahding hun hong tungta hi. 24 A mantakin ci lehang, mangbuhhum tang khat leilakah kituhin si masa kei leh tang khat bek mah hi ngitnget hi; ahi zongin si masa leh tang tampi tak hong nei thei hi. 25 Tua ahih manin hih leitung nuntakna a itte in a nuntakna taktak taanlawh ding a, hih leitung nuntakna a itlote in nuntakna taktak nei tawntung ding hi.

Topa Zeisu mahmah in, ‘Ngahna sangin piak khiatna-ah lungdamna lianzaw hi,’ a cihna phawkkawmin nakpi takin nasepna tawh na khempeuhah a zawngkhalte huh ding hi hang, ci-in note kiangah kong lak khinzo hi," ci-in a vaikhak hi.

Tua ahih ciangin sanggamte aw, Pasian in eite tam veipi tak hong hehpih ahih manin ama lungkimna ding leh ama nasepna dingin nomau mahmah a hingtangin Pasian tungah na kipiakna dingun ka hong thum hi. Tua banga kipiakna pen Pasian biakna man taktak a hihi.
Keima nasep pen khaici vawh hi a, Apollos' nasep pen tuibuah hi a, ahi zongin a khangsakpa ahih leh Pasian a hihi. 7 Khaici vawhpa leh tuibuakpa a thupi hilo a, a khangsak Pasian a thupi hi bek hi.
Note lakah kha thu tawh kisai khaici hong vawh ka hih manun, note tung panin leitung nate ka ngah uh hangin a lianlua hilo hi.

Mi pawlkhatte in, "A sisa mite bangci thawhkik ding a, bang pumpi tawh thokik ding ahi hiam?" cikha thei hi. 36 Tua bang ngaihsutna haihuai mahmah hi. Khaici na tuh uh ciangin a muatlopi-in hong po theilo hi. 37 Mangbuhci ahi a, khaici dang khat peuhpeuh ahi zongin na tuh uh ciangin hong po-in a khan'khit ciangin a kung omzia dingteng tawh a tuh na hi kei uh a, a khaici bek a tuh na hi uhhi. 38 Ahi zongin Pasian in ama hoihsak bangin a kung ding na pia a, khaici nam tuamtuamte-a' ding kung nam tuamtuam a guan' hi.
Note in na phawk ding uh thu panin: Khaici tawm a vawhte in tawm mah la ding a, tampi a vawhte in tampi mah la ding uhhi.

Tua ahih manin vawhding khaici leh nekding an hong pia Pasian in note' cit piakna hangin nopsakna lian tampi na ngahtheihna dingun note tungah a kisam khaici hong guan'in a pungsak ding hi. 11 Kote tung tawnin note' huhna sumte a ngahna uh hangin mi tampi in Pasian a phattheihna dingin note na cit gamtatzawh tawntungna dingun Pasian in hong hausak tawntung ding hi. 12 Banghang hiam cihleh note' huhna sumte in Pasian' mi a cimawhte' dong a hu bek hiloin, Pasian' tungah lungdam kohna ding zong a piangsak a hihi.

Pasian a kikhemzo dingin ngaihsunkha kei un. Mi khempeuh in ama vawh nam khaici mah ngahkik ding hi. 8 Mi khatpeuh in ama leitung pumpi deihna khaici a vawh leh sihna ngahding a, Khasiangtho deihna khaici a vawh leh Khasiangtho tung panin nuntak tawntungna ngahding hi. 9 Tua ahih manin na hoih sepding cimtak kei ni. Lungkia loin i sep nak leh a hun ciangin thaman i ngah ding hi.
Ama sihna hangin Tuucing Lianpa suakin, a sisan tawh tawntung thuciamna a kipsak i Topa Zeisu pen sihna panin a thokiksak, eite tungah nopsakna a hong pia Pasian in,
Kilemna a piangsak mite in lungnuam takin a tuh khaici in hoihna leh dikna a piangsak hi.
A kipat cilin Pasian in vantung leh leitung a piangsak hi.
{ Topa } in Moses kiangah, "Nangmah in Israel mite tungah hih bangin na gen ding hi: ‘Vantung panin note kong hopihna note mahmah in na thei khin uhhi.
Amaute in hih mun lamah hong nget uh ciangin na mi Israel-te' hong thumna zong ngai in. Na ten'na mun vantung panin hong za in la, ka mawhna uh hong maisak in.
Tua ciangin amaute a pai kawmkawm a kiho laitakun, mei leeng khat leh mei sakolte in amaute nih a khen hi. Tua ciangin vantungah Elijah pingpei-in paito hi.

Ahih hangin vantung, a sang pen vantung nangawn in amah huam zolo ahih manin ama-a' dingin kua in biakinn lamzo ding ahi hiam? Ama mai-ah paknamtui halna ding cih simloh ama-a' dingin biakinn a lamsak dingin kei kua ka hi hiam?

na ten'na mun vantung panin za in la, maisakin, amau' gamtatna khempeuh tawh kizui-in a lungsim uh na theih bangin amaute tungah pia ciat in (banghang hiam cihleh nang, nang bek in mihing' lungsim na thei hi).
na ten'na vantung panin amau' thungetna leh hong thumnate za in la, amau' vai huhin nang tungah hong khial na mite maisak in.

Nang bek { Topa } na hi hi. Nangmah in a sang pen vantung leh vana om khempeuh, leitung leh a tunga om khempeuh, leh tuipi leh a sunga om khempeuh na bawl hi. Nangmah in tuate khempeuh na omsak a, vantung mihonpi in nang hong bia uhhi.
Amah bek in vanpi zal a, tuipi tuihualte tuancil hi.
Vantung aa a tupa in amaute na nuihsan a, tua { Topa } in amaute a zahko hi.

Na nasepna, na bawlsa, kha leh aksite, leh na vantungte ka et ciangin, 4 na ngaihsut tham dingin mihing bang hi lel a, na phawk tham dingin mihing' ta bang hi lel ahi hiam? 5 Ahi zongin, vantung mi sangin a neuzaw deuh bekin na bawl a, minthan'na leh pahtawina nangmah in na guan hi. 6 Na khut tawh na bawlsate khempeuh tungah ukna thu ama tungah na pia a, na khempeuh na uksak hi.
{ Topa } a biakinn siangtho sungah om a, { Topa' } tokhom vantungah om hi. Amah in mihingte hong en a, mihingte' gamtatna khempeuh a theitel hi.
A pil gamtat, Pasian a zong a om uhhiam, cih a theihna dingin { Topa } in vantung panin mihingte hong ensuk hi.
Nangmah in nuntakna lampi keimah nong lak hi. Nangma omna munah lungdamna lianpi om a, nangma taklamah nop tawntungnate a om hi.
Vantung in Pasian' minthan'na gen a, vanpi in ama nasepna taangko hi.
{ Topa } in a sathau nilhpa a huh ding tu-in ka thei ta a, ama vantung siangtho panin amah dawng ding a, a vangliatna tawh amah gualzosak ding hi.
Hoihna leh Hehpihna in ka khan tawntungin hong zui taktak ding aa, Topa' inn sungah ka om tawntung ding hi. (HCN)
Na hoihna leh nong itna in ka khan'tawnin a hong zuih ding tel takin-ah ka thei ta a, a tawntungin na inn sungah ka om ding hi. (TDM)
Ka nuntak sung tawntung hoihna le itna in hong zui taktak dinga tuateh TOPA’ inn ah ka teng denta ding hi. (ZIV)
{ Topa' } kampauna tawh vantung piang a, a kam pana husan'na tawh vantung nate a piang hi.
Vantung in ama thumanna gen hi; banghang hiam cihleh Pasian mahmah thukhenpa a hihi.
Thulahna tawh keimah nong makaih a, a nung ciangin minthan'na munah na hong tun'pih ding hi. 25 Nang simloh vantungah kua nei ka hi hiam? Nang simloh ka deih ding leitungah kuamah omlo hi.
Vantung pen leitung panin a san' mah bangin amah a zahtakte' tungah ama itna kip lianin sang mahmah hi.
{ Topa } in vantungah ama tokhom phutkhin a, amah in mun khempeuh a uk hi.
Pasian aw, vantungte' tungah sangto lai in. Leitung khempeuhah na minthan'na omsak in.
Vantung pen { Topa}-a' hi a, ahih hangin leitung pen mihingte tungah hong pia khin hi.
Van leh lei a bawl { Topa' } tung panin eite huhna hong pai hi.
Thu ngaihsun masa-in pau in la, Pasian' tungah thu mawk ciampak kei in. Vantungah Pasian om a, leitungah nang om na hih manin na pau ding-a kilawm zahval pau kei in.
I nute' sung panin bangmah neiloin guaktangin i suah mah bangin guaktang mahin i ciahkik hi. I sepsate i ciahpihkik theih bangmah omlo hi.
I pumpi, lei suakkik ding a, i nuntakna a hong pia Pasian' kiangah i kha ciahkik ta ding hi.
Keimah in leitung ka bawl a, tua tungah mi ka piangsak hi. Keima khut in vantungte zal a, keimah in vantung na honpite khempeuh thu ka pia hi.

Vantungte a piangsakpa (amah Pasian!) Leitung piangsakin a bawlpa (a kipsakpa; a awngthawl dingin bawlloin, ten'na dingin leitung a piangsakpa!) { Topa } in hih bangin ci hi: "Kei pen { Topa } ka hi a, kuamah dang omlo hi.
Vantung pen leitung sangin a san'zawk mah bangin, keima paiziate zong, nomau paizia sangin sangzaw a, ka ngaihsutnate zong, nomau ngaihsutna sangin a sangzaw a hihi.
Pasian in ama vangliatna tawh leitung bawl a, ama pilna tawh leitung piangsakin, ama siamna tawh vantung a zal hi.
Topa { Pasian}! Nangma vangpi leh na khut tawh vantung leh leitung na bawl khinzo hi. Nang-a' dingin a haksalua khat beek omlo hi.
Vantunga om Pasian tungah i lungsim pia-in thu ngen ni.

ahi zongin amaute' lu tung sana om a kuum tung san panin awging kiza lai hi. 26 Tua kuum tungzangah, sapfaia suangmanpha tawh a kibawl kumpi tokhom bang pian khat om a, tua tokhom tungah mi tawh a kibang pian lim khat a tu hi. 27 Tua tokhom tungah a tu ka muh pen meikhuk sunga kihalsan sumngo bangin taang heuhau a, a kimkot khempeuh zong tua mah bangin taang pempam hi. 28 Tua a taang khuavak in meii lakah sakhituihup a kai ciangin a neih mel nam tuamtuam khempeuh a nei kim hi. { Topa }' vangliatna lim pen tu-a ka gen bang a hihi. Hih bang ka muh ciangin leilakah ka boksuk a, tua ciangin awging khat ka za hi.
Amah in leitung mite bangmahin a sim kei a, vantung mite leh leitung mite ama khutnuai a hihi. Ama deihna kuamah in nial theilo a, a bawlnate kuamah in a hang a kan thei kei hi.

{ Topa } in vantungah a inndeite bawl a, van kuumpi tawh leitung a khuhsuk hi. Amah in tuipi panin tuite samkhia a, leitung khempeuhah tua tuite a sung hi. Hih bangin a bawlpa' min pen { Topa } a hihi.

Hoihtakin na phawk ding uh thu panin: Van leh lei a bei mateng, hih thukhamte a neupen khat nangawn' deihna tangtung lopi-in mawkmailo ding hi. 19 Tua ahih manin hih thukhamte lakpan a neupente khat bek nangawn zuikha loin, midangte in zong a zuihlohna dingin a gen mite pen vantung ki-ukna sungah mi neupen hi ding uhhi. Ahi zongin hih thukhamte zui-in, midangte in zong a zuihna dingin a hilh mite pen vantung ki-ukna sungah milian hi ding uhhi. 20 Tua ahih manin Pasian' deihna bangin gamtatna ding thu-ah Thukham hilh siate leh Pharisee mite sangin na cihtakzawk uh leh vantung ki-ukna sungah a om thei bek ding na hi uhhi.
Tua ahih manin, thu na nget uhciang hibangin na ngen un: "Vantung aa om kote Pa aw, nangma Min siangtho tahen. (HCN)
Tua ahih manin thu na nget uhciangin hih bangin na ngen un: "Vantung aa om kote Pa aw, na min siangtho hong kiphat tahen. (PuKKT)
Tua ahih manin thu na nget uh ciangin hih bangin na ngen un: ‘Vantunga om kote' Pa aw, na min siangtho kizahtak hen. (TDM)
Note in hih bangin thu na ngen un: "Vantunga om kote Pa aw, nangma min kisiangthosak ta hen; (ZIV)
Tua ahih main hih bangin thu na ngen un, Vantung aa om kote Pa aw, Na min siangtho kizahtak hen. (ZSV)

"Nget in ne-in a kekseu theihna, gutate in luhin a guktheihna hih leitungah na sum uh khol kei un. 20 Nget in a nek theihlohna, a kekseu theihlohna, gutate in luhin a guk theihlohna mun vantungah note-a' dingin kholzaw un.
Ahi zongin nuntak tawntungna tun'na ding kong kawcikin a lampi haksa a, mi tawmno bek in a zuizo uhhi.
"Kei kiangah, ‘Topa, Topa aw,’ hong ci mi khempeuh, vantung ki-ukna sungah lutthei kimlo ding uh a, vantungah a om ka Pa' deihna bangin a gamtateng bek lutthei ding uhhi.

Nisuahna leh nitumna panin mi tampi tak hong pai-in vantung ki-ukna sungah Abraham, Isaac, leh Jacob-te tawh an ne-in sabuai-ah tukhawm ding uhhi. 12 Ahi zongin vantung ki-ukna sungah a om dingin a kingaihsun Israel mite ahih leh pualam khuamialna-ah kilawnkhia ding a, tua lai-ah kapin a hagawi ding uhhi," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Vantung leh leitung Topa ahi ka Pa aw, mipilte leh misiamte tungah na ip hih thute, bangmah a theilo hih mite tungah lak na hih manin ka nuam hi.
Tua hun ciangin Pasian' mite ahih leh a Pa uh Ukna sungah ni bangin a taang ding uhhi. Zakna ding bil a neite in hih thu na za ta un.
"Hih naupangnote khatpeuh na simmawhkhak lohna dingun kidawm un. Note kiangah kong genin-ah: Amaute a kem vantung mite pen vantungah ka Pa kiangah om tawntung uhhi.
Zeisu in, "Vantung ki-ukna pen naupangte tawh a kibang mite-a' ding ahih manin, tua naupangte ka kiangah hong paipihsak unla, khaktan kei un," a ci hi.

Zeisu in, "Mi cingtaak na hihnop leh pai-in na neihsate va zuak in la, na sum khotte, mizawngte tungah va pia lecin, vantungah sum na hau ding hi. Tua ciangin hong pai in la kei hong zui in," a ci hi.

Ahi zongin Zeisu in, "Note in Laisiangtho thu ahi a, Pasian' vangliatna ahi zongin theilo na hih manun na ngaihsunkhial uhhi. 30 Banghang hiam cihleh misite a thawhkik uh ciangin vantungah a om vantung mite tawh kibang ding uh a, zinei pasalnei cih omlo ding hi.
Van leh lei a maimang zongin ka thugente maimang ngeilo ding hi.
Tua ciangin Kumpipa in a taklamah a om mite kiangah, ‘Ka Pa in thupha a piak mite aw, hong pai ta un. Leitung piancil a kipanin note-a' dingin a kibawlkholsa gamnuam hong luah un.
Tua ahih ciangin tawntung gimthuakna sungah amaute pai ding uh a, mihoihte ahih leh nuntak tawntungna sungah lut ding uhhi," a ci hi.
Ahi zongin dawite in na thu uh hong man'na hangin lungdam kei unla, vantungah na min uh a kigelh manin lungdamzaw un," a ci hi.

Na neihsa uh zuak unla, mizawngte tungah tua sumte na pia un. Note-a' dingin a sia theilo sumkholna na bawl unla, gutate in a luh zawhlohna, leikha in zong a nek zawhlohna, cikmahin a kiam ngei hetlohna ding mun vantungah na sumte uh na khol un.

Nisuahna leh nitumna, leilu leh leitaw lam panin mite hong pai-in Pasian' Ukna sung sabuai kiimah tukhawm ding uhhi. 30 Tua hi a, tuhuna mineute tuahun ciangin milian hi ding a, tuhuna miliante tuahun ciangin mineu hi ding hi," a ci hi.
Tua mah bangin kisikkik ding a kisamlo mihoih sawmkualekuate tungah lungdamna sangin mawhnei mi khat a kisikna hangin vantungah lungdamna lianzaw ding hi," a ci hi.

mihaupa' sabuai tung panin a kia annengte nenuamin a ngak hi. Tua bangin a om laitakin uite hong pai-in a meima hong liahliah sak uhhi. 22 Tua ciangin mizawngpa hong si a, vantunga Abraham kiangah a om dingin vantung mite in a paipih uhhi. Mihaupa zong hong si leuleu-in a kivui hi. 23 Ahi zongin hell khuk sungah gimna thuakin a om hi. A khuadak leh, gamlapi mun khatah Abraham leh Lazaras a omkhawm a galmuh hi.
Ahi zongin tu-a kipanin a Vanglian Pasian' taklamah Mihing Tapa tu ding hi," ci-in a dawng hi.
Zeisu in ama kiangah, "A mantakin ke'n kong cihin-ah: Tuni-in Paradais-ah kei tawh na omkhawm ding hi," a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Jerusalem khuasung panin Bethany khuagei ciang amaute paipih a, tua lai panin a khut laamto-in amaute thupha a pia hi. 51 Amaute thupha a piak laitakin amaute kiang panin paikhia-in vantungah amah a kilato hi.

Hih leitung thute tawh a kisai thu kong gen ciangin umlo na hih uh leh vantung thute ka hong gen ciangin bangci up mah ding na hi uhhiam? 13 Vantung panin a hong paisuk Mihing Tapa keimah simloh vantungah a paito ding kuamah omlo hi," a ci hi.

A mantakin kong genin-ah, kei hong umte bek in nuntak tawntungna ngah hi. 48 Kei pen nuntakna an ka hihi. 49 Na pu na pate un gamsungah manna ne uh a, a vekpi-un si veve uhhi. 50 Ahi zongin vantung panin a hong pai an a ne mi peuhmah silo ding hi.
Tua ahih manin kei pen vantung panin a hong pai an ka hi a, na pu na pate un ne-in a sih veve-na ante tawh kibanglo hi. Hih kei' hong piak an a nete ahih leh nungta tawntung ding hi," a ci hi.
Mihing Tapa ama omna ngei-ah a ciahto kik a mu hi le uh cin bang na ci ding uhhiam?
Tua ahih manin amaute tungah nuntak tawntungna pia ka hih manin si ngei nawnlo ding uh a, keima khutsung panin kuamah in amaute hong sut zolo ding uhhi.
Ka nasemte keima omna-ah a omtheihna dingin ka na a sem nuam peuhmah in kei hong zui ding uh a, ka Pa in ka na a sem mite a pahtawi ding hi," a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Simon Peter in, "Topa aw, koi-ah pai ding na hi hiam?" ci-in a dot ciangin Zeisu in, "Ka paina dingah tu-in na hong zui thei nai kei ding hi; ahi zongin nidang ciangin na hong zui ding hi," ci-in a dawng hi.

Note' omna ding mun a bawlkhol dingin a pai ding ka hihi. Ka Pa' innsungah omna ding mun tampi om hi. A omlo ding hi leh hih bangin thu ka hong gen kei ding hi. 3 Kei va pai-in note' omna ding mun ka va bawlkholh khit ciangin keima omna munah note na hong om theihna dingun note a hong la dingin ka hong paikik ding hi. 4 Ka paina ding mun tun'theihna ding lampi na thei uhhi," a ci hi. 5 Tua laitakin Thomas in, "Topa aw, na paina ding mun theilo ka hih manun a lampi ding bangci theih ding ka hi uhhiam?" a cih ciangin 6 Zeisu in ama kiangah, "Keimah in Lampi ka hi a, Thuman, leh Nuntakna zong ka hihi. Kei hong suangloin Pa kiangah kuamah tung theilo ding hi.
Hih thu a genkhit ciangin amaute' muhtangpi mahin vanah Zeisu kilato a, meiipi in liah ahih manin amah mu thei nawnlo uhhi.

Ahi zongin kamsangpa in, ‘Topa in hih bangin ci hi: Vantung pen keima tokhom hi a, leitung zong ka khe ngakna mun a hihi. Kei-a' ding bang biakinn hong lamsak thei ding a, ka omna ding koi lai mun hi thei ding ahi hiam? Hih nate khempeuh keima bawlsa hilo ahi hiam, ci hi,’ ci-in a gen mah bangin mihingte' lamsa innsungah a Lianpen Pasian a teng hilo hi.
Mihingte in a mawhna leh a gitlohna hangun Pasian' thuman selcip uh ahih manin van panin a hehna hong kilang sakin a gimpiakna dingzia hong kilangsak hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh hih ka ten'na ka leitung pumpi uh a sih ciangin mihingte bawl a hilo, Pasian in a kip tawntung dingin kote-a' dingin a hong bawlsak inn, vantungah a neiding ka hihna uh ka thei uhhi.
Lungmuang takin a ki-om hithiat hi a, hih leitung pumpi nusia-in Topa tawh omkhawm ding a ki-utzaw a hihi.

Tuma kum sawmleli hun lai-in vantung a dawl tungnung penah Christian khat kilato hi. A pumpi taktak hiam, maang mu ahi hiam ka thei kei hi. Pasian in thei hi. 3 Tua mipa pen Paradais-ah a om a hihi. A pumpi taktak tawh ahi hiam, maang mu ahi hiam ka thei kei a, Pasian in thei hi.

Note bangdingin hong sam a, a mite tungah a hong ciam thupha lamdangte bangzah takin lian a, thu um ahi eite sungah na a hong sem vangliatna bangzah takin lian ahi hiam, cih na muhtheihna dingun note' lungsim mit hong vaksakna dingin thu ka na ngen hi. Eite sungah na a hong sem vangliatna pen sihna panin Christ hingsakin, vantung gamah zong, ama taklamah a tutsakna dingin a zat vangliatna mah a hihi.
Ahi zongin eite ihih leh vantung gam mite ihi a, vantung panin a hong pai ding Topa Zeisu Christ, eite' Honpa, lawptakin a ngakte ihi hi.

Note pen Christ tawh a thokik khinte na hih manun, Pasian' taklam a kumpi tokhom tungah Christ a tutna mun vantung thute ngaihsutin nei un. 2 Vantungah a om thute ngaihsutin nei unla, leitungah a om thute ngaihsutin nei kei un.

Pasian' thupiakna awging lianpi, vantung mi mangpa' thugenna, leh Pasian' peengkul hong ging ding a, vantung panin Topa mahmah hong paisuk ding hi. 17 Tua ciangin tua hun laitakin a nungta lai eite pen vankim lai-ah Topa a dawn dingin amah a um a sisa mite tawh hong kilakhawm ding a, Topa tawh i omkhawm tawntung ding hi, cihna a hihi.
Tua bangin a siangtho, paubaan'na a neilo, vantungah a lian penin a kikoih Siampi Lianpen Zeisu i neih a hoih mahmah a hihi.

Tu-in i gennop thu pen hih bang ahi hi: Vantungah Pasian' tokhom taklamah a tu tua bang Siampi Lianpen khat a nei ihi hi. 2 Amah in, mite' bawl a hilo, Topa mahmah in a bawl a taktak puanbuk ahi a Siangtho Pen mun sungah siampi lianpen nasep a sem a hihi.
Ahi zongin Christ in mawhna hangin khatvei a piakkhit ciangin a tawntunga dingin kimang ahih manin Pasian' taklamah tu hithiat a,

Ahi zongin amaute' lunggulh pen leitung sangin a hoihzaw vantung gam a hihi. Pasian in amaute-a' dingin khuapi khat na vaihawmsak ahih manin, tua bang mite in amah pen ka Pasian uhhi, ci-in a gen ding uh Pasian in maizumna-in na ngaihsunlo hi.

Eite hong makai-in i upna a hong cingtaaksak Zeisu mitsuan'in nei ni. Mailamah a ngahding lungdamna hangin maizumna kihta loin singlamteh tungah sihna hong thuak a, tu-in Pasian tokhom taklamah a tu hi.

Ahi zongin note pen Zion Mual, a nungta Pasian' khuapi, vantung Jerusalem, simzawhloh vantung mite a omna, 23 vantungah a min a kikhum Pasian' ta upate a kikhopna, mi khempeuhte' thu a khen Pasian' kiang, a cingtaakin a kibawl midikte' kha a omna, 24 thuciamna thak a hong vaihawm Zeisu kiang, Abel' sisan sangin thu hoihzaw a gen sisan a kithehna mun na tungzo uhhi.
Eite-a' dingin hih leitungah a kip khuapi omlo ahih manin a hong piang lai ding khuapi a zong ihi hi.
Pasian in ama mite-a' dingin a koih thuphate i ngahna dingin lamenin i om hi. Tua thuphate sia ngeilo, nin ngeilo, mual ngeiloin a om tawntungna vantungah note-a' dingin a hong koihsak hi.
Tu-in vantungah tua Christ pai khin a, Pasian' taklamah omin, vantung mite leh ukna aana a neite khempeuh tungah a ukin a om hi.

Ahi zongin theihkholh lohpi-in guta bangin Topa hong paiding Ni hong tung ding hi. Tua Ni ciangin nakpi takin a ging in vantungte maimang sakin, vantung nate mei in kangtumin maimang ding a, leitung leh a tunga om na khempeuh a mangthang ding hi.
Eite in Pasian' hong ciamsa, thuman bekbek a kizatna ding mun van thak leh lei thak a ngak ihi hi.
Tua ahih manin zakna ding bil a neite in Khasiangtho in pawlpite kiangah a gen thute na za un. A gualzo mite tungah, Pasian' Huan sunga om nuntakna singgahte a nektheihna dingun thu ka pia ding hi.

Hih thuteng khit ciangin ka khuadak leh vantungah kong a kihongsa-in a om ka mu hi. Peengkul awging tawh a kibang, kei kiangah thu a hong gensa awging mah in, "Hih lai-ah hong paito in. Tunung ciangin thupiang dingte ka hong lak ding hi," hong ci hi. 2 Thakhat thu-in Khasiangtho tawh ka kidim a, tua vantunga tokhom tungah mi khat a tu ka mu hi. 3 Tua tokhom tungah a tupa pen Jasper leh Karnelian suangmanpha bangin taang ziazua a, a tokhom kimkot pen Emerald suangmanpha bangin suum pempam hi. 4 Tua tokhom kimkotah tokhom sawmnihleli om a, tuate tungah puanpak silhin kham lukhu a khu upa sawmnihlelite tu uhhi. 5 Tua tokhom panin khuaphialep hong taangkhia-in, awging leh vanging hong kipankhia a, a tokhom mai-ah Pasian' kha ahi meivak sagih a kivak hi. 6 A tokhom mailam tengah Kristal suangmanpha bangin a siang kilkel, limlang peekpi kiphah tuipi bangin a dum dide hi. Tua tokhom kiim a pang ciatah a nung leh a mai-ah mit a dimin a nei ganhing li a om hi. 7 A ganhing a khatna pen humpinelkai tawh kibang a, a nihna bawngtal tawh kibang a, a thumna in mihing maitang nei a, a lina pen muvanlai a leeng lai tawh kibang hi. 8 Tua ganhing lite in kha guk ciat nei-in, tua a khate' sunglam leh a pualamah mittang a dimtakin om a, a sun a zan tawlnga loin la sa uh a,"A beisa, tuhun, leh a tawntungin a om Vanglian Topa Pasian, siangtho hi, siangtho hi, siangtho hi," a ci uhhi. 9 Tua ganhingte in a nungta tawntung, tokhom tungah a tupa tungah a lungdamna uh ko-in pahtawi-in a phat simun 10 nungta tawntungin tokhom tungah a tupa mai-ah tua upa sawmnihlelite zong bokin amah bia uh a, tua tokhom mai-ah a lukhute uh lawnin la sa uh a, 11 "Kote' Topa Pasian aw, nangmah in na khempeuh piangsakin, nangma deihna bangin na khempeuh omin, na khempeuh kipiangsak ahih manin, minthan'na, pahtawina, leh vangliatna na ngah tawntung dingin a kilawm hi," a ci uhhi.

Tua ciangin vantung, leitung, leinuai, tuipi sung leh mun khempeuhah a om nuntakna a nei khempeuh in la a sakna uh ka za a, amaute in, "Tokhom tungah a tupa leh Tuuno in phatna, pahtawina, minthan'na leh vangliatna, ngah tawntung ta hen," a ci uhhi.

Tua khit ciangin ka khuadak leh mi namkim, pau namkim panin kuama sim zawhloh dingin a tam mahmah mihonpite, tokhom mai leh Tuuno mai-ah ding uh a, puanpak silhin a khut uhah nisuh hiang a tawi uh ka mu hi.

Tua laitakin upate khat in keima kiangah, "Hih puanpak a silh mite kuate hi a, koi lai panin hong pai ahi uhhiam?" ci-in hong dot ciangin, 14 "Ka thei kei hi, topa aw. Nangmah in na theizaw ding hi," ka ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in keima kiangah, "Hih mite pen bawlsiatna lianpi thuakin a hong suakta mite ahi uhhi. Amaute in a puan uh sawpsiangin Tuuno sisan tawh a paksak uh a hihi. 15 Tua ahih manin Pasian' tokhom mai-ah amaute ding uh a, sun leh zanin a biakinn sungah ama na sem uhhi. Tokhom tungah a tupa in amaute ompihin a hu ding hi. 16 Amaute gilkial cih om nawnlo ding a, a dang uh zong taak nawnlo ding hi. Nisa zong thuakkha nawnlo ding uh a, a sa in zong kangkha nawnlo ding hi. 17 Banghang hiam cihleh Tokhom laizangah a om Tuuno, amaute a kempa hi ding a, nuntakna tui omna-ah amaute paipih ding a, Pasian in a khitui khempeuh uh nulsak ding hi," hong ci hi.

Tua ciangin vantungah a om Pasian biakna innpi kihong a, a Thuciamna Singkuang zong biakinn sungah a om a kimu hi. Tua ciangin nakpi takin khua phia-in a ging lianpi om a, van gingin zin ling a, gialpi a kia hi.

Tu-in vantungah galkidona hong om a, Michael leh a vantung mite in gulpi leh a vantung mite a do uhhi. 8 Ahi zongin tua gulpi guallel ahih manin tua gulpi leh a vantung mite, vantungah kiom sak nawnlo hi. 9 Tua ciangin tua tanglai gulpi, Dawimangpa ahih kei leh Satan a kici, leitung mi khempeuh a khempa pen a vantung mite tawh leitungah kilawnsuk hi.

Tua ciangin tokhom tungah a tu mi pawlkhat ka mu a, tua mite tungah thukhenna ding aana a kipia a hihi. Zeisu thu a genna leh Pasian thu hangin a kithat mite' kha zong ka mu hi. Tua mite in ganhing ahi a, a lim ahi zongin bialo uhhi; a taltang uhah ahi a, a khut tung uhah ahi zongin ganhing ciamtehna neilo uhhi.
