Amaute hong hingkik uh a, Christ tawh kum tul khat sung ukna aana a neikhawm uhhi.
Tua ciangin tokhom kang a lian khat leh a tungah a tupa ka mu hi. Ama omna panin lei leh van lengkhiamang a, a tun'na mel uh kitheilo hi.

Tua ciangin van thak khat leh lei thak khat ka mu hi. Van masa leh lei masa maimang khin a, tuipi zong om nawnlo hi. 2 Mothak khat a pasal tawh a kituah dingin a kizem bangin vantung Pasian kiang panin Khuapi Siangtho ahi Jerusalem khua thak a hong paisuk ka mu hi. 3 Tokhom panin nakpi takin awging khat ka za a, "Tu-in Pasian omna inn pen mite tawh omkhawm ta hi. Pasian in amaute ompih ding a, amaute pen ama mite hi ding uhhi. Pasian mahmah amaute tawh omkhawm ding a, amah pen amaute' Pasian hi ding hi. 4 Amaute' mit panin khitui khempeuh nulsak ding hi. Thu luisate maimang khinta ahih manin sihna, dahna, leh na sa-a kahna cihte om nawnlo ding hi," a ci hi. 5 Tua ciangin tokhom tungah a tupa in, "Tu-in na khempeuh a thakin ka bawl hi," ci hi. Tua ciangin, "Hih thute thumanin muan'taak ahih manin lai-ah gelh in," hong ci lai hi.
Tua khuapi pen Pasian' vang tawh te ziazua a, Jasper suangmanpha bangin taang a, Kristal suangmanpha bangin siang kilkel hi.

A kulhpi dingin jasper suangmanpha kiciang a, a khuasung pen kham citak tawh a kibawl hi a, limlang bangin siang kilkel hi. 19 Tua khuapi kulh suangtawphahte pen suangmanpha namkim tawh kizem hi. A masa-in jasper suangmanpha, a nihna-ah sapfira suangmanpha, a thumna-ah agate suangmanpha, a lina-ah emerald suangmanpha, 20 a ngana-ah onik suangmanpha, a gukna-ah karnelian suangmanpha, a sagihna-ah khrisolait suangmanpha, a giatna-ah beryl suangmanpha, a kuana-ah topaz suangmanpha, a sawmna-ah khrisoprase suangmanpha, a sawmlekhatna-ah jakinth suangmanpha, a sawmlenihna-ah amethyst suangmanpha tawh a kizem hi. 21 A kongpi sawmlenihte kep sawmlenih tawh a kibawl hi a, kongpi khat ciangin kep sabit khat a hihi. A khuapi sung lampite kham citak vive hi a, limlang bangin a sung kimu paisuak thei hi. 22 A Vanglian Topa Pasian leh Tuuno pen khuapi biakinn hita ahih manin tua khuasungah biakinn dang ka mu kei hi. 23 Pasian' minthan'na vang pen khuavak hi a, Tuuno zong meivak hi khin ahih manin tua khuapi in nitaang leh khataang cihte kisamlo hi. 24 Tua a taang sungah leitung mite lam pai ding uh a, leitung kumpite in a neihsa khempeuh uh hong paipih ding uhhi. 25 Zan khuamial hun cih omlo ding ahih manin kulhkongpite khak hun cih omloin a tawntungin kihong paisuak ding hi. 26 Leitung mite' hauhna leh liatnateng tua khuapisung hong kitun'pih ding hi. 27 Ahi zongin a sianglo, a hoihloin a gamta mi, zuau a gen mite kuamah lut theilo ding uh a, a nungta mite a kigelhna Tuuno laibu sungah a min a omte bek tua khuapi sungah lutthei ding uhhi.

Tua ciangin vantung mi in Pasian leh Tuuno tokhom panin a hong luangkhia, kristal suangmanpha bangin a te selsel gun tui hong lak a, 2 khuapi sung lampi laizangah a luang hi. Tua gun pang tuakah nuntakna singkung po a, kha simin gah ahih manin kum khat sungin sawmlenih vei a gah hi. A tehte zong natna damna ding zatui-in kizang hi. 3 Pasian' samsiatna a ngah peuhpeuh tua khuasungah omlo hi. Tua khuapi sungah Pasian leh Tuuno' tokhom om ding a, ama nasemte in amah a bia ding uhhi. 4 Amaute in ama maitang mu ding uh a, a taltang tung uhah ama min kigelh ding hi. 5 Topa Pasian pen amaute' khuavak hi-in, a tawntungin amaute in uk paisuak ding uh ahih manin khuamial hun cih om nawnlo ding a, khua a vaksak ding meivak leh nitaang cihte kisamlo ding uhhi.
Ahi zongin a lampial mite, aisan mite, a paktat mite, mi thatte, milim biate, leh zuaugen nuamsa-in zuau a gengen mite, khuapi pualamah a om uhhi.
Amah in mipa hawlkhia hi. Kherub-te leh mun khempeuh a nga thei meikuang namsau pen Eden Huan nisuahna lamah nuntakna singkung lampi a cing dingin a koih hi.

{ Topa' } vantung mi in Shur paina lampi-a cik ahi, sehnel gama ciktui gei khatah amah a mu hi. Amah in, "Sarai' sila numei Hagar aw, koi pan hong pai a, koi-ah pai ding na hi hiam?" a ci hi. Amah in, "Ka tonu Sarai' kiang panin a taikhia ka hi hi," a ci hi. 9 Tua ciangin { Topa' } vantung mi in ama kiangah, "Na tonu' kiangah ciahkik in la, ama tungah ki-ap in," a ci hi.10{ Topa' } vantung mi in ama kiangah, "Na suanlekhakte nakpi takin tamsak ding ka hih manin amaute kisim zolo ding hi," zong ci lai hi.11Tua ciangin { Topa' } vantung mi in ama kiangah, "En in, nau na paii a, tapa khat na nei ding hi. Ama min Ishmael na phuak ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } in nangma thuakna hong mu khin hi.
Zingsang khuavak ciangin vantung mite in, "Khuapi gimpiakna sungah kangtum khading na hih uh ciangin kinawh in la, hih lai-a om na zi leh na tanute la in," ci-in Lot sawl hamtang uhhi.

Pasian in naupang' kahna aw a za hi. Pasian' vantung mi in vantung panin Hagar sam a, ama kiangah, "Hagar aw, bang in hong lungkhamsak ahi hiam? Lau kei in. Banghang hiam cihleh naupang a omna munah a kahna awging Pasian in za hi.
Ahih hangin { Topa' } vantung mi in vantung panin, "Abraham, Abraham!" ci-in a sam hi. Amah in, "Hiah om ing," a ci hi.15{ Topa' } vantung mi in vantung panin Abraham a nih veina sam a,

Ka pa' inn leh ka suahna leitang panin kei hong la-in, kei kiangah thu hong genin kei tungah hong kiciam a, ‘Na suanlekhakte' tungah hih leitang ka pia ding hi,’ a hong ci vantung Pasian, { Topa } in nangma mai-ah a vantung mi sawl ding a, tua lai mun panin nangmah in ka tapa-a' ding zi khat na la ding hi.
Ahih hangin amah in kei tungah, ‘A thu ka man' { Topa } in nang tawh a vantung mi hong sawlin na ma hong vangsak ding hi. Nang in ka behte leh ka pa' inn panin ka tapa-a' ding zi khat na la ding hi.
Amah in mang man a, leitungah kahlei khat kiphutin, a kahlei dawn in van ban hi. Pasian' vantung mite tua kahlei tungah kah to-in a kum suk a mu hi.
Tua ciangin Pasian' vantung mi in ka mang sungah, ‘Jacob,’ hong ci a, ke'n, ‘Hiah om ing!’ ka ci hi.
Jacob zong ama lampi-ah paisuak a, Pasian' vantung mite in amah na dawn hi.

siatna khempeuh panin kei hong tankhia vantung mi in hih tangvalte thupha pia hen la, amaute sungah keima min leh ka pa Abraham leh Isaac' min kizomsak hen la, leitungah amaute mi honpi khatin khangsak ta hen!" a ci hi.
{ Topa' } vantung mi sawlpang kawm, meikuang sung panin ama tungah hong kilang hi. Amah khuadak a, sawlpang a kuang a mu hi. Ahi zongin kangtumlo hi.
Tua ciangin Israel mihonpite' mai-ah a pai Pasian' vantung mi kikhinin amaute' nungah a pai hi. Amaute' mai panin meii khuam kikhinin amaute' nungah ding a,
"En un, keimah in ka bawlsa munah note hong paipih ding leh lamkalah note hong cing dingin note' mai-ah vantung mi khat ka sawl hi.
"Note' mai-ah ka vantung mi pai-in Amor mite, Hit mite, Perez mite, Kanaan mite, Hiv mite, leh Jebus mite kiangah note hong paipihin, keimah in amaute ka phiat khiat ciangin,

Ahih hangin tu-in pai in; nang' tunga kong gensa munah mite paipih in. En in, na mai-ah ka vantung mi pai ding hi. Ahi zongin ka thukkik ni ciangin amau' khialhna amau' tungah ka thuk ding hi," a ci hi.
Note' mai-ah vantung mi khat ka sawl ding a, Kanaan mite, Amor mite, Hit mite, Perez mite, Hiv mite, leh Jebus mite ka hawlkhia ding hi.
{ Topa' } tungah ka kiko uh ciangin amah in ka aw uh hong za a, vantung mi khat hong sawlin, Egypt panin hong paikhiatpih a, tu-in nangma gam nawl Kadesh khuapi-ah ka om uhhi.

Ahih hangin amah pai ahih manin Pasian heh a, amah a khaktan dingin { Topa' } vantung mi in lampi-ah na pang hi. Tu-in a la tungah amah tuang a, a nasemte nih in zong a zui uhhi.23{ Topa' } vantung mi in a khutsungah namsau dawhsa tawi-in lampi-ah a ding, a la in mu ahih manin lampi panin pialin gamlakah a pai hi. Balaam in lampi-ah a paikikna dingin a la a sat hi.24Tua ciangin leenggui lo kikal, a pang tuakah phung a omna lam kawcikah vantung mi na ding leuleu hi.25La in { Topa' } vantung mi a muh ciangin phung phu a, phungah Balaam' khe nengcip ahih ciangin amah in a la sat kik hi.26Tua ciangin { Topa' } vantung mi na ma pai-in, taklamah ahi a, veilamah ahi zongin kihei theihna ding a omlohna mun kawcik khatah na ding leuleu hi.27La in { Topa' } vantung mi a muh ciangin Balaam' nuai-ah lumsuk hi. Balaam heh mahmah a, a ciangkhut tawh a la a sat hi.

Tua ciangin { Topa } in Balaam' mitte hon'sak a, a khutsungah namsau dawhsa tawh { Topa' } vantung mi lampi-ah a ding mu ahih manin a lu kunin a boksuk hi.32{ Topa' } vantung mi in ama kiangah, "Banghangin na la thumvei dong sat na hi hiam? En in, hih na khualzinna-ah lungkimlo ka hih manin nang hong pang dingin kong kuankhia hi. 33 La in kei hong mu-in thumvei dong hong pel hi. Hong pel kei leh, tu mahmahin nang hong that khinin na la ka hingsak ding hi," a ci hi. 34 Tua ciangin Balaam in { Topa' } vantung mi kiangah, "Kei hong pangin lampi-ah na din'lam theilo ka hih manin ka khial hi. Tua ahih ciangin tu-in ka khualzinna hoihsalo na hih leh ka ciahkik ding hi," a ci hi. 35 Topa' vantung mi in Balaam kiangah, "Mite zui in; ahih hangin nang kong sawlteng bek na gen ding hi," a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Balaam in Balak' uliante a zuisuak hi.
Sang Penpa in minam dangte tungah amau' gamh pia a, mihingte a ten'na ding mun a seh ciangin vantung mi a phazah tawh a kizui-in mite' gamgi a phut hi.

Tu-in Gilgal panin Bokhim-ah { Topa' } vantung mi paito hi. Amah in Israel mite kiangah, "Egypt panin note kong paipihto a, na pu na pate uh tungah piak dinga ka ciam leitangah note kong paipih hi. Keimah in, ‘Note tawh ka thuciam ka siasak ngei kei ding a,
Topa' vantung mi in Israel mi khempeuh tungah hih thute a gen ciangin mite a kap uhhi.

"{ Topa' } vantung mi in, ‘Meroz khua samsia in, a sunga teng mite nasia takin samsia in. Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa } a huh dingin a thahatpa dona-ah { Topa } a huh dingin hong kuanlo uhhi,’ a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Ofrah khua-ah { Topa' } vantung mi hong pai a, Abiezer mi Joash neihsa tawsaw nuai-ah hong tu hi. Tua laitakin Joash' tapa Gideon in Midian mite' muhloh dingin leenggah sukna-ah mangbuh cil simin na om hi.12{ Topa' } vantung mi ama tungah kilangin ama kiangah, "{ Topa } in nang hong ompih hi, a thahat a vanglian mipa aw," a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Pasian' vantung mi in ama kiangah, "Sa leh silngo sawhloh moh la-in hih suang tungah koih in la, a tungah satui sung in," a ci hi. Tua bangmahin amah in a hih hi. 21Tua ciangin { Topa' } vantung mi in a khutsunga om ciangkhut dawn dawksakin, sa leh silngo sawhloh mohte a su hi. A suang panin mei piangkhia-in, sa leh silngo sawhloh moh a kangtum hi. Tua ciangin ama muhna panin { Topa' } vantung mi a mang hi. 22 Tua ciangin Gideon in amah pen { Topa' } vantung mi ahihlam a thei hi. Gideon in, "Ala, Topa { Pasian}! { Topa' } vantung mi mai kituahin ka mukha khin hi," a ci hi.
{ Topa' } vantung mi tua numei kiangah kilangin ama kiangah, "En in, na tasel a, ta na nei kei hi. Ahi zongin tu-in gai-in tapa khat na nei ding hi.

Tua ciangin tuanu pai-in a pasal' kiangah gen a, "Pasian' mi khat ka kiangah hong pai a, ama mel pen Pasian' vantung mi mel tawh kibangin dipkuathuai mahmah hi. Koi panin hong pai cih amah ka dong kei a, amah in ama min hong genlo hi.
Pasian in Manoah' aw ngai-in lo lai-ah tuanu a tut laitakin Pasian' vantung mi ama kiangah hong pai hi. Ahih hangin a pasal Manoah amah tawh omlo hi.

Tua ciangin { Topa' } vantung mi in Manoah' kiangah, "Numei' kiangah ka gente khempeuh na kidawm hen. 14 Amah in leenggui pana piang peuhmah ne theilo ding a, leenggahzu ahi a, khamtheihzu ahi zongin ne theiloin, a nin na khat peuhpeuh ne theilo ding hi; amah ka thupiak khempeuh tang hen," a ci hi.15 Manoah in { Topa' } vantung mi kiangah, "Kong thum hi; tawlkhat khawl in la, nang-a' dingin keelno khat hong bawlsak nung," a ci hi.16{ Topa' } vantung mi in Manoah kiangah, "Nong khawlsak zongin na an ka ne kei ding hi. Ahih hangin meihal biakna ding a baihsa-in na bawl leh { Topa } tungah pia in," a ci hi. (Banghang hiam cihleh Manoah in amah { Topa' } vantung mi ahihlam theilo hi.)17Manoah in { Topa' } vantung mi kiangah, "Na thugente a manin hong tun' ciangin nang kong pahtawi theihna dingun, na min bang ahi hiam?" a ci hi.18{ Topa' } vantung mi in ama kiangah, "Hih thu a lamdang hi, ci-in thei napi-in banghangin ka min hong dong na hi hiam?" a ci hi. 19 Tua ahih ciangin Manoah in an-a biakna tawh a keelno la-in na lamdang a bawl { Topa}-a' dingin suang tungah a pia hi. 20 Biakna tau panin vantung lamah meikuang a paitoh ciangin, Manoah leh a zi in a et laitakun biakna tau meikuang sungah { Topa' } vantung mi kahto hi. Tua ciangin amaute leilakah a bok uhhi. 21 Manoah leh a zi' tungah { Topa' } vantung mi kilang nawnlo hi. Tua ciangin Manoah in amah { Topa' } vantung mi ahihlam thei hi.

Tua ciangin Akhish in David dawngin, "Nang pen keima muhna-ah Pasian' vantung mi khat mah bangin paubaanglo na hihna ka thei hi; ahi zongin Filistia galkap a ukte in, ‘Amah pen eite tawh galphualah hong kuanto lo ding hi,’ ci uhhi.

Na nasemnu in, ‘Ka to kumpipa' kammal in nopsakna hong pia ding hi,’ ci-in ngaihsun hi; banghang hiam cihleh ka to kumpipa pen a pha leh a sia a khenthei dingin Pasian' vantung mi tawh kibang hi. { Topa } na Pasian in nang hong ompih ta hen!" a ci hi.
Na thu paizia khekna dingin na nasempa Joab in hih thu hih hi. Ahih hangin ka topa in leitunga om na khempeuh theihna dingin Pasian' vantung mi pilna tawh a kibang pilna na nei hi," a ci hi.
Amah in ka to kumpipa kiangah na nasempa hong gensia hi. Ahih hangin ka to kumpipa pen Pasian' vantung mi tawh kibang hi. Tua ahih ciangin hoih na sak bangin hong hih in.

vantung mi in Jerusalem khua a susia dingin kithawi-in a khut a zan ciangin tua tatsiatna panin { Topa } kisik a, mite lakah suksiatna na a sem vantung mi kiangah, "Phazo hi; tu-in khawl ta in," a ci hi. { Topa' } vantung mi pen Jebus mi Araunah' ancilna gei-ah a om hi.17Tua ciangin mite a vat vantung mi a muh ciangin David in { Topa' } tungah thu gen a, "En in, ka mawh hi; a khialpa pen kei ka hihi. Hih mite in bang khialhna nei ahi uhhiam? Kong thum hi; kei leh ka innkuante bek gim hong pia in," a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amah in, "Kei zong nangmah bangin kamsang khat ka hi a, { Topa' } sawlna bangin vantung mi khat in kei tungah thu hong gen a, ‘Amah in an leh tui ne-in a dawn theihna dingin na inn-ah amah paipih kik in,’ hong ci hi," a ci hi. Ahih hangin amah in Pasian' mipa tungah zuau genin a phuahtawm a hihi.

Tua ciangin poding kung khat nuai-ah amah lumsukin a ihmu hi. Tua laitakin vantung mi khat in amah lawngin ama kiangah, "Tho in la an ne in," a ci hi. 6 Amah khuadak a, ama lutang gei suang sa tungah a ki-em moh khat leh tui hai khat na om hi. Amah in tuate ne-in dawnin lumkik hi. 7 Tua ciangin { Topa' } vantung mi a nihveina hong paikikin amah lawng a, "Tho in la an ne in; tua hi kei leh nang-a' dingin khualzinna haksa lua ding hi," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Mikaiah in, "Tua ahih ciangin { Topa' } thu ngai in: { Topa } a kumpi tokhom tungah tu-in, ama taklam leh a veilamah vantung mihonpi a ding ka mu hi.

Ahih hangin { Topa' } vantung mi in Tishbe mi Elijah kiangah, "Ding in, Samaria kumpipa' kamtaite a dawn dingin paito-in amaute kiangah, ‘Ekron pasian, Baalzebub kiangah thu a dong dingin na paina dingun Israel sungah Pasian om nawnlo ahi hiam?’ ci in.
Tua ciangin { Topa' } vantung mi in Elijah kiangah, "Amah tawh paisuk in; amah kihta kei in," a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah dingin kumpipa kiangah amah tawh paisuk a,
Tua zanin { Topa' } vantung mi paikhia a, Assiria-te giahphualah galkap tul za khat leh tul sawmgiat leh tul nga a that hi. Zingsang tungin mite a thawh ciangin, hihte khempeuh si luanghawm na hi hi.

Kialpi kum thum sung, ahih kei leh na galte in nang hong simgawp laitakin na galte mai-ah kha thum sung galtaina, ahih kei leh gamsungah pulnatna leh { Topa' } vantung mi in Israel sung khempeuhah suksiatna ni thum sung a piangsak { Topa' } namsau,’ ci hi. Tu-in kei hong sawlpa kiangah ka ciahpih ding dawn'na ding khentel in," a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Pasian in a susia dingin Jerusalem-ah vantung mi sawl hi. Ahih hangin amah in a suksiat ding laitakin { Topa } in mu a, tua thusia-ah amah kisik hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in a susia vantung mi kiangah, "Phazo hi; tu-in khawl ta in," a ci hi. Jebus mi Ornan' ancilna gei-ah { Topa' } vantung mi a din' laitak a hihi.16Tua ciangin David khuadak to a, leitung leh vantung kikalah { Topa' } vantung mi dingin, a khutsungah a kidoksa namsau khat omin Jerusalem tungah a zan mu hi. Tua ciangin David leh a upate puanhampi silhin maipuk uhhi. 17 Tua ciangin David in Pasian kiangah, "Mi phazah a sim dingin thu a piapa keimah hilo ka hi hiam? Khialin a gitloh gamtat mahmahpa keimah ka hihi. Ahih hangin hih mite in bang gamtat khialhna nei ahi uhhiam? { Topa } ka Pasian aw, kong thum hi, keimah leh ka innkuan gim hong pia in. Ahih hangin na mite tungah gimna tungsak kei in," a ci hi. 18 Tua ciangin David paito-in Jebus mi Ornan' ancilna phualah { Topa}-a' ding biakna tau khat a lamna ding a gen dingin { Topa' } vantung mi in Gad sawl hi. 19 Tua ahih ciangin { Topa' } min tawh a gen Gad' kammal bangin David paito hi. 20 Ornan leh a tapa lite in mangbuh a cilcil laitakin a khuadak uh leh { Topa' } vantung mi mu uh a, a tapa lite lau-in a bu uhhi.
Tua ciangin { Topa' } thupiakna tawh vantung mi in a namsau a pai sungah a siatkik hi.
Ahih hangin amah in { Topa' } vantung mi' namsau kihta ahih manin Pasian tungah thu a dong dingin tua lai-ah David pai ngamlo hi.
Tua ciangin Mikaiah in, "{ Topa' } thugen za in: { Topa } a kumpi tokhom tungah tu a, a taklam leh a veilamah vantung mihon khempeuh a ding ka mu hi.

Tua ciangin { Topa } in Assiria kumpipa' giahphualah a thahat galhang khempeuh leh galkap a ukte leh uliante a susia vantung mi khat a sawl hi. Tua ahih ciangin ama gamah maizumna tawh a ciahkik hi. Ama pasian' inn sungah amah a tun' ciangin ama tapate pawlkhat in namsau tawh amah satlum uhhi.

Nang bek { Topa } na hi hi. Nangmah in a sang pen vantung leh vana om khempeuh, leitung leh a tunga om khempeuh, leh tuipi leh a sunga om khempeuh na bawl hi. Nangmah in tuate khempeuh na omsak a, vantung mihonpi in nang hong bia uhhi.
Ni khat ni-in { Topa' } omna-ah vantung mite hong pai uh a, tuate lakah Satan zong hong kihel hi.
Ni khat ni-in { Topa' } omna-ah vantung mite hong paikik uh a, Satan zong amaute lakah hong kihelin { Topa' } omna mahah hong pai hi.

Huih in ka mai hong mut a, ka khuasikmul hong suaksak hi. 16 A meel ka khen theihloh lim khat hong ding a, keima mai-ah mihing lim khat hong om a, tua ciangin aw un duadua khat ka za a, 17 ‘Pasian' mai-ah mi khatpeuh paubaang loin omzo ngei ding ahi hiam? Amah a Bawlpa' mai-ah sitbaang loin omzo ngei ding ahi hiam? 18 Pasian in ama nasemte mahmah muangzo loin, ama sawltakte' mawhna mu ahih leh,
Pasian in a siangtho vantung mite nangawn muanglo ahih leh, ei mawhnei mite banghangin hong muang mah ding ahi hiam?
Ama na a sem vantung mite bangzah pha cih kua in simzo ding ahi hiam? Pasian' khuavak in a batlohna koi lai mun om ahi hiam?
"Mihingte' tavuan a phawksak, Pasian' vantung mi tul tampite lak panin vantung mi khat amah a huh dingin hong paikhia ding hi.

Leitung ka bawl laitakin nang om na hi hiam? Thei kisa na hih leh tua thu hong gen in. 5 Bangcia-in golsak ding cih kua in seh ahi hiam? Kua in a golna ding zah khau khai ahi hiam? Hihte khempeuh thei kisa na hi hiam? 6 Leitung a pua khuampite bang tungah kiphut ahi hiam? Kua in leitung a bulpi phut ahi hiam? 7 Tua ni-in zingsang aksite in la sa khawm uh a, Pasian' tapate lungdamin a kiko uhhi.
Ahi zongin, vantung mi sangin a neuzaw deuh bekin na bawl a, minthan'na leh pahtawina nangmah in na guan hi.
Amah a zahtakte' kiimah { Topa' } vantung mi in giahphual sat a, amaute a honkhia hi.
{ Topa' } vantung mi' hawlna tawh huih letkhiat ansite tawh amaute kibangsak in.6{ Topa' } vantung mi' delhna-ah a taina lampi uh mialin nalsak in.
Leeng muan'huai tul sawmnih, vantung mi a tultul tawh, Sinai mual pan siangtho munah Topa hong pai hi.
Mihingte in vantung mite' an ne uh a, amah in amaute tungah an tampi a puak hi.

Amaute' tungah a lauhuai ama sinsona, hehna, thangpaihna, gimna, leh a susiathei van mi honkhat a khah hi. 50 Amah in a sinsona iplo-in, kuamah hin'khawilo a, pulnatna tawh amaute a sisak hi. 51 Ham' suante' innsungah a ta upa pen teng, Egypt gamsung tacil khempeuh amah in a vatmai hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh nangmah a hong cing dingin amah in ama vantung mi nang hong kemsak ding hi.
{ Topa } in uk hi. Mihonte ling hen. Kherub-te tungah amah tu hi. Leitung ling ta hen.
Ama thugen a ngai, ama thu bangin a sem no a thahat, no ama vantung mite aw, { Topa } phat un.
Ama vantung mi khempeuh aw, amah phat un. Ama mihonte khempeuh aw, amah phat un.

Kumpi Uzziah a sih kumin, a sang mahmah, a lian kumpi tokhom tungah Topa a tu ka mu hi. Ama kumpi puanpi pen biakinn sungteng a dim hi. 2 Ama kiimah serafim van mite a ding uhhi. Tuate in kha guk ciat nei uhhi; nih tawh a mai liahin, nih tawh a khe tuamin, nih tawh a leeng uhhi. 3 Amaute khatlekhat kisamin: "Vanglian { Topa}, siangtho, siangtho, siangtho; leitung khempeuh ama minthan'na tawh kidim," ci-in awng uhhi.

"Nang Khuavak' ta, Zingsol, Babylon kumpipa aw, vantung panin nang bangci kiat na hi hiam? Minamte a niam koihpa ahi nangmah leilak dongah hong bangci kiphukpai ahi hiam? 13 Nang in na lungsim sungah, ‘Vantungah ka kahto ding hi. A sangna mun, Pasian' aksite' tung pekah ka kumpi tokhom ka koih ding a, leilu lam peka kikhopna mualtungah ka tu ding hi. 14 Meiite' tung pekah ka kahto ding a, Sang Penpa bangin ka kibawl ding hi,’ na ci hi.
Tua ciangin { Topa}' vantung mi kuankhia-in Assiria mite' giahphualah mihing tul za leh tul sawmgiat leh tul nga a that hi. Zingsangin mite a thawh ciangin hihte khempeuh misi luang bekbek na hi hi.
Tua thu hangin leitung kap ding a, vantung mial ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh ka gensa, ka khensatsa hi a, ka kisikloh bangin ka lungsim zong ka khelkik kei ding hi," a ci hi.

Gamdang pasian zuaute' lakah guah a zusak thei om ahi hiam? Tua ahih kei leh zong vantung mi in ama thu-in guah zu tawmsak thei ahi hiam? Tua bang a hih thei nang bek hilo na hi hiam? { Topa } kote' Pasian aw, nangmah in tuate khempeuh hih na hih manin nangma sungah lametna kong nei uhhi.
Topa in a heh manin Jerusalem khuapi a mialcipsak hi. A vantung minthan'na teng uh kisiatna a suaksak hi. Amah in a heh ni-in a Biakinnpi nangawn a susia hi.

Tua kumpite a maan laitakun vantung Pasian in a bei thei ngeilo ding kumpi gam a hong phut ding hi. Tua kumpi gam kuamah in zo zolo ding a, tua gam in gamdang khempeuhte zogawpin a kip tawntung ding hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa in, "Shadrak, Meshak, leh Abednego-te' Pasian phat un. Amah in a vantung mite sawl a, amah a muang ama nasem hih mite a honkhia hi. Amaute in ka thupiakna mangloin, amau' Pasian longal pasian dang' mai-ah kun nuamlo, bia nuamlo uh ahih manin mei phualpi sungah khul ding a utzaw uh ahi hi," a ci hi.
"Ka mangmuhna ngaihsunin ka om laitakin ka khuadak leh a vil, a patau vantung mi khat vantung pan a hong tuaksuk ka mu hi.

Hih pen a vil, a patau vantung mi' thukhenna a hihi. Tua ahih ciangin mun khempeuhah a om mi khempeuhte in, a Lian Pasian in mite' kumpi gamah vai a hawm hi, cih a thei ding uhhi. Amah in a teel peuhpeuh a neupente nangawn kumpi a suaksak thei ding hi,’ a ci hi.

Kumpipa in na et laitakin, vantung mi khat vantung panin hong paisuk a, "A singkung phuk in la susia in; ahih hangin leisungah a bul leh a zungte nusia in. A bulah sik leh sumngo kual vial in la, gamlak lopate tawh nusiakhawm in. A tungah daitui kia hen la, kum sagih sung ganhingte tawh omkhawm ta hen," a ci hi.
Amah in leitung mite bangmahin a sim kei a, vantung mite leh leitung mite ama khutnuai a hihi. Ama deihna kuamah in nial theilo a, a bawlnate kuamah in a hang a kan thei kei hi.

Pasian in a vantung mi hong sawl a, ka liamlohna dingin humpinelkaite' kam a humcipsak hi. Kumpipa aw, mawhna ka bawllohlam leh, nang tungah zong khialhna ka bawllohna amah in hong thei ahih manin tua bangin a hong bawl hi," a ci hi.

vantung mi khat in adang vantung mi khat kiangah thu a dot ka za a, "Hih mangmuhna bang tanvei sawt ding a, a muhdahhuai mawhna in nisim biakpiakna bang tanvei khaktan ding ahi hiam? Vantung galkapte leh biakinnpi bang tanvei kituancil ding ahi hiam?" a ci hi.
Thu ka nget laitakin ka maang muh masak sunga ka muh mipa Gabriel, ka omna munah a hong lengsuk hi. Tua hun pen nitak lam biakpiak hun laitak a hihi.

Persia gam a cing vantung mi in ni sawmnihlekhat sung kei a hong nial hi. Tua ciangin kei a hong huh dingin vantung mi thupite khat ahi Michael a hong pai hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Persia gamsungah keimah guak bek ka om hi.

Amah in, "Banghangin na kiangah hong pai ka hi hiam, cih na thei hiam? Thuman Laibu sungah a kigelh thute a lak dingin a hong pai ka hihi. Tu-in ciahkikin, Persia gam a cing vantung mi tawh ka kido ding hi. Tua khit ciangin Grik gam a cing vantung mi a hong kilang ding hi. Michael longal kei a hong huh ding kuamah a om kei hi.
Israel a cing vantung mi pen kei hong huhpa leh a hong dalpa ahi hi," a hong ci hi.

Tua ciangin saihadial puan a silh vantung mi in, "Na mite a cing, a lian vantung mi Michael hong kilang ding hi. Tua ciangin leitungah mihing a pian'zawha kipan a nasia penpen gimna hun hong tung ding hi. Tua hun a hong tun' ciangin Pasian' laibu sungah a min a kigelh na mite khempeuh kihonkhia ding hi.

{ Topa' } vantung mi khat sakol san khat tungah a tuang ka mu hi. Kuam sunga a om mui singkungte lakah amah khawl a, ama nungah sakol dang a san, a gial, a kang om hi. 9 Tua ciangin keimah in, "Sia aw, hih sakolte bang a cihnopna ahi hiam?" ci-in ka dong hi. Amah in hong dawng a, "Bang a cihnopna hiam cih kong lak ding hi. 10 Hih sakol tung tuangte pai kawikawi-in leitung a en dingin { Topa } in a sawl ahi hi," hong ci hi. 11 Tua ciangin mui kung lakah a khawl { Topa' } vantung mite kiangah amaute in, "Leitung khempeuh ka en kawikawi khin uh a, leitung khempeuh khuaphawk loin nuamtakin om uhhi," ci-in thu a zasak uhhi. 12 Tua ciangin { Topa' } vantung mi in, "Vanglian { Topa } aw, Jerusalem khuapi leh Judah gam khuapite tungah kum sawmsagih sung na heh khinta hi. Amaute hehpih loin bang tanvei omlai ding na hi hiam?" ci hi. 13 Tua ciangin { Topa } in dikna leh hehnepna kam tawh vantung mite dawng a,14 Vanglian { Topa } in ama tungah a gensa thute khempeuh keimah in ka taangko sawnna dingin tua vantung mi in kei hong sawl a, "Ka khuapi siangtho Jerusalem, nakpi takin itin ka lunghimawh hi.

Tua ciangin vantung mi in ka taangkona ding hong genkik leuleu a, "Ama khuapite nakpi takin cithei kikin, Jerusalem khuapi a hehnep kikna ding, leh ama khuapi-in a neihkikna ding, Vanglian { Topa } in gen hi, ci-in gen in," hong ci hi. 18 Ka khuadak leh saki li ka mu hi. 19 Bang a cihnopna ahi hiam, ci-in vantung mi kiangah ka dong hi. Amah in hong dawng a, "Judah mite leh Jerusalem mite a thehthang gawp leitung vangliatnate a cihnopna ahi hi," hong ci hi.

Tua ciangin vantung mipa hong paikhia a, vantung midang khat in amah na dawntuah hi. 4 Tua ciangin vantung mi a masapa in a dawntuahpa kiangah, "Va tai in la, tehna khau a tawi tangvalpa kiangah hih thu va gen in. Jerusalem khuasungah mihing leh ganhing tam mahmah ding ahih manin Jerusalem kulhhuam sungah ta zolo ding uhhi.

{ Topa } in maang hong musak a, { Topa' } vantung mi mai-ah siampi lianpenpa Joshua' mawhna a zong dingin a kiangah Satan zong a om ka mu hi. 2 { Topa' } vantung mi in Satan kiangah, "Satan aw, { Topa } in nang hong mawhsak hi. Jerusalem a it { Topa } in nang hong mawhsak hi. Hih Joshua pen meikhuk sung panin a kiteenkhia singkhuah tawh kibang hi," a ci hi. 3 Joshua ahih leh vantung mi mai-ah ding a, puan a nin mahmah a silh hi. 4 vantung mi in ama sawltak van midangte kiangah, "Hih mipa' silh a puan ninte suahkhiatsak un," ci-in thu a pia hi. Tua ciangin vantung mi in Joshua kiangah, "Na mawhna teng kong paihkhiatsak khin a, tu-in na silh dingin puan thak ka hong pia ding hi," a ci hi. 5 Tua ciangin a sawltak van mite thu pia a, Joshua' lu tungah dial siangtho a khipsak ding uh a sawl hi. { Topa' } vantung mi tua munah a din' sung mahin, amaute in zong Joshua, dial siangtho khimsakin, tua khit ciangin puan siangtho zong a silhsak uhhi. 6 Tua ciangin { Topa' } vantung mi in Joshua kiangah limtakin thu gen a, 7 Vanglian { Topa } in hih bangin ci hi: "Ka thukhamte zui-in kong sawl thute na sep leh, ka biakinn sung leh biakinn huang sungteng na uk ding a, hih ka kianga om vantung mite' thu ka ngaih bangin nangma thu zong ka hong ngai ding hi.
Kei tawh a kiho vantung mi mah hong paikik a, a ihmu kimlai a kiphong bang keekin kei hong khanglosak hi.

Tua ciangin kei zong vantung mi kiangah, "Sia aw, hihte bang a cihnopna ahi hiam?" ci-in ka dot ciangin 5 amah in, "A cihnopna theilo na hi hiam?" ci-in hong dawng a, kei zong, "Sia aw, ka thei kei hi," ci-in ka dawngkik hi. 6 Tua ciangin vantung mi in kei kiangah, "{ Topa } in Zerubbabel tungah hih bangin thu gen hi: Galkap tam neihna hang hilo, nangma vangliatna hang zong hilo, keima tung panin na ngah vangliatna bek tawh na ma na tun'zo ding hi.

Tua ciangin vantung mi hong kilang kikin kei kiangah, "Tu-a a hong pai ding en in," hong ci hi.8Tua ciangin vantung mi in, "Hih numei pen gitlohna lim ahi hi," hong ci hi. Tua ciangin vantung mi in ciangpi sungah tua numei hensuk kik a, a sin tawh tua ciangpi a sinkik hi.10Tua ciangin vantung mi kiangah, "Koi lai-ah leen'pih ding ahi uhhiam?" ci-in ka dot leh
Tua ciangin vantung mi kiangah, "Sia aw, hih sakolleengte bang a cihnopna ahi hiam?" ci-in ka dong hi.

Tua sakolte, paikhia-in leitung teng a et ding uh ngaklah mahmah uhhi. Tua ahih manin vantung mi in, "Pai unla, leitungteng va en un," ci-in thu a pia hi. Amaute zong pai-in va en uhhi. 8 Tua ciangin vantung mi in kei hong otsan a, "Leilu lam Babylon gamah a paite in { Topa' } hehna damsak hi," hong ci hi.

Tua ni ciangin { Topa } in Jerusalem-a a teng mite hu ding a, a ginalo pente nangawn David zahin thahat ding hi. David' suanlekhakte in { Topa' } vantung mi leh Pasian mahmah bangin amaute a makai ding uhhi.

Ahi zongin hih bangin thu a ngaihsut laitakin a mang sungah Topa' vantung mi khat hong kilang a, David suan Joseph aw, Mary sunga nau pen Khasiangtho in a gaisak ahih manin amah ten'pih ngamlah kei in.
Joseph zong a khan'lawh ciangin Topa' vantung mi' sawl bangin a zi a la hi.

Tua mipilte a ciah khit uh ciangin Joseph' mang sungah Topa' vantung mi khat hong kilang a, "Kithawi-in naungek leh a nu, Egypt gamah taipih in. Pai khia un, ci-in kong genkik matengin tua gamah va om un. Herod in naungek thah dingin hong zong ding hi," a ci hi.

"Pasian' Tapa taktak na hih leh Laisiangtho sungah, ‘Pasian in nang a hong kem dingin a vantung mite hong sawl ding hi. Na khete leh suang a kitahkhak lohna dingin vantung mite in a khut uh tawh nang hong dom ding hi,’ ci-in kigelh ahih manin, hih lai panin tuaksuk in," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Dawimangpa paikhia a, vantung mite hong pai-in Zeisu huhin an a vak uhhi.

tahum tang a vawh galpa pen Dawimangpa a hihi. Anlak hun pen leitung beina ding hun hi a, anla nasemte pen vantung mite a hihi. 40 Tahumte kikaikhawmin meikhuk sungah a kikhultum mah bangin leitung bei hun ciangin tua bangmahin kihih ding hi. 41 Mihing Tapa in a vantung mite hong sawl ding a, ama ukna sungah a om migilote leh mi a mawhna dingin a bawl mi khempeuh kaikhawmin
A Pa' minthan'na vang leh a vantung mite tawh Mihing Tapa hong paikik ding a, mi khempeuh amau' gamtatna ciat tawh a kizui-in a thuk ding hi.
"Hih naupangnote khatpeuh na simmawhkhak lohna dingun kidawm un. Note kiangah kong genin-ah: Amaute a kem vantung mite pen vantungah ka Pa kiangah om tawntung uhhi.
Banghang hiam cihleh misite a thawhkik uh ciangin vantungah a om vantung mite tawh kibang ding uh a, zinei pasalnei cih omlo ding hi.
Nakpi takin peengkul hong ging ding a, leitung mun khempeuhah a vantung mite hong paisakin, leimong khat pan mong khatdongin, a teelsa mite a kaikhawmsak ding hi.
Ahi zongin a ni leh a nai hun ding pen kuamah in theilo hi. Vantungah a om vantung mite ahi a, Tapa nangawn in ahi zongin theilo a, Pa Pasian bek in thei hi.
"Mihing Tapa a vantung mite tawh Kumpi-in hong paikhawm uh ciangin a kumpi tokhom tungah hong tu ding hi.
Ka Pa kiangah ngen hi leng, vantung galkapte hon sawm leh hon nih val, thakhat thu-in hong puakpah theihding lamtak theilo na hi hiam?
Thakhatin zin nakpi takin hong ling hi. Topa' vantung mi khat, vantung panin hong paisuk a, han hukna suang a likkhiat khit ciangin a tungah a tu hi.
Ahi zongin tua vantung mi in numeite kiangah, "Lau kei un. Singlamteh tungah a kithat Zeisu a zong na hihlam uh ka thei hi.
Gamlakah ni sawmli sung om a, Satan in tua hun sungteng a ze-et hi. Tua lai-ah gamsa gilote zong om a, ahi zongin vantung mite hong pai-in amah huhin an a vak uhhi.

Pasian theiloin a gilo hih mite lakah keima hang leh ka thuhilhte hangin maizumin kei hong pulak ngamlo mi peuhmah, a Pa' minthan'na vang leh a siangtho vantung mite tawh a minthangin hong paikik ciangin Mihing Tapa zong ama hangin maizumin pulak ngamlo ding hi," a ci hi.
Sihna panin mite a thawhkik ciangin vantungah a om vantung mite mah bangin zinei pasalnei cih omlo ding uhhi.
Tua ciangin leitung mun khempeuhah vantung mite sawl ding a, leimong khat pan mong khat kikalah a om a teel mite khempeuh a kaikhawmsak ding hi.
Ahi zongin tua ni leh tua nai hun ding kuamah in theilo hi. Vantunga om vantung mite ahi a, Tapa ahi keimah in ahi zongin ka thei kei a, ka Pa bek in a thei hi.

Tua laitakin Topa' vantung mi khat ama kiangah hong kilang a, paknamtui a kihalna biakna tau taklam pangah a ding hi.12 Zechariah in vantung mi a muh ciangin lamdangsa mahmah a, a lau mahmah hi.13 Ahi zongin vantung mi in ama kiangah, "
aw, lau kei in. Pasian in na thungetna hong zakhin a, na zi Elizabeth in tapa khat a nei ding hi. A min dingin Johan na phuak ding hi.

Tua ciangin Zechariah in vantung mi kiangah, "Hih na thugen a manna bangci theih ding ka hi hiam? Kei ka teekta a, ka zi zong lah a teek mahmah ahi hi," a cih ciangin 19 vantung mi in dawng a, "Kei pen Pasian' na a sem Gabriel ka hihi. Nang kiangah thu hong genin, hih lungdamna thu a ko dingin a hong sawl ka hihi.
Elizabeth a gaizawh kha guk a cin' ciangin Pasian in Galilee gam Nazareth khua-ah vantung mi Gabriel a paisak hi.

Mary in vantung mi' thugen a zak ciangin, bang a cihnopna hi ding ahi hiam, ci-in lamdang a sa mahmah hi. 30 Tua ciangin vantung mi in, "Mary aw, lamdangsa-in lunghimawh kei in. Pasian' maipha a ngah na hi hi.
Tua ciangin Mary in vantung mi kiangah, "Kei, pasal tawh a lumkhawm ngei nailopi, hih thu bangci pian'theih ding ahi hiam?" a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Mary in, "Kei pen Topa' nasemnu ka hihi. Na gensa bangin keima tungah hong piang ta hen," a ci hi. Tua ciangin ama kiang panin vantung mi a paikhia hi.

Amaute kiangah Topa' vantung mi khat hong kilang a, Topa' minthan'na vang in amaute hong taan' ahih manin a lau mahmah uhhi.10 Ahi zongin vantung mi in, "Lau kei un. Mi khempeuh a lungdamsak ding thuthak hoih khat note-a' ding ka hong puak hi.
Tua khit phetin tua vantung mi tawh vantung mihonpite thakhatin hong omin Pasian phatna la sa uh a,
Tua bangin naungek a muh uh ciangin, vantung mi in amaute kiangah hih naungek tawh kisai thu a gente a gensawn uhhi.
Naungek a vun a ki-at ni hun nipikal khat a cin' khit ciangin, amah a kipaii ma-in a min dingin vantung mi in a piaksa ahi Zeisu, a min dingin a phuak uhhi.

Banghang hiam cihleh Laisiangtho in, ‘Pasian in nang a hong kem dingin a vantung mite hong sawl ding hi,’ ci-in a gen banah,11‘Na khete nangawn suang tawh kitatin a liam khaklohna dingin vantung mite in a khut uh tawh nang hong dom ding uhhi,’ zong ci lai hi," a cih ciangin

Keima hang leh ka thuhilhnate hangin a maizum peuhmah, a Pa' minthan'na vang leh a siangtho vantung mite' minthan'na tawh a minthangin hong paikik ciangin Mihing Tapa zong ama hangin a maizum ding hi.
vantung minthan'na vang lim nei uh a, Jerusalem khua-ah pai-in sihna tawh Pasian' deihna a tun'sakna ding thu a kikumkum uh a hihi.

"Note kiangah kong cihin-ah, keima mi ahihna mi' theihin a genkhiate, Mihing Tapa in zong Pasian' vantung mite' mai-ah, keima mi hi, ci-in genkhia ding a,9 ahi zongin keima mi ahihna mi' theihin a genkhia nuamlote, Pasian' vantung mite mai-ah zong keima mi hi, ci-in Mihing Tapa in genkhia nuamlo ding hi.
Tua mah bangin mawhnei mi khat a kisikkikna hangin Pasian' vantung mite lungdam mahmah uhhi," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin mizawngpa hong si a, vantunga Abraham kiangah a om dingin vantung mite in a paipih uhhi. Mihaupa zong hong si leuleu-in a kivui hi.
Amaute pen vantung mi tawh kibang uh a, sithei nawnlo uhhi. Sihna panin a thokik khinte ahih manin amaute pen Pasian' tate ahi uhhi.
Tua ciangin vantung panin ama kiangah vantung mi khat hong pai a, Zeisu' tha a hatsak hi.
ahi zongin ama luang na om nawnlo hi. Tua ciangin amaute hong ciahkik uh a, vantung mite a muhna uh leh tua vantung mite in Zeisu a hin'kik khitna thu a gennate uh hong gensawn uhhi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Ke'n a mantak kong genin-ah, vantung a kihong na mu ding uh a, Mihing Tapa leh vantung kikalah Pasian' vantung mite a kumsuk a kahto na mu ding uhhi," a ci hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Topa' vantung mi khat in tua bual tui lok thei zel a, tui a kilawh khit ciangin tua lai a tung masa penpen ama natna panin a dam hi.

Zeisu' luang a kisialna a lu lamah khat, a khe lamah khat, puanpak silhin a tu vantung mi nih a mu hi.13 Tua vantung mite in Mary kiangah, "Banghangin kap na hi hiam?" ci-in a dot uh ciangin amah in, "Amaute in ka Topa paikhiatpih uh a, koi lai-ah koih ahi uhhiam, cih ka thei kei hi," ci-in a dawng hi.
Ahi zongin tua zanin Topa' vantung mi khat in thong kongkhakte hong a, sawltakte a paikhiatpih khit ciangin amaute kiangah,
Ulian kikhopna sunga a kihel mi khempeuh in Stephen en uh a, a maitang pen vantung mi maitang tawh kibang hi, ci-in a mu kim uhhi.
"Tua gamah kum sawmli a ten' khit ciangin, Sinai Mual tung gamlakah sawlpang laka meikuang sungah vantung mi khat ama kiangah hong kilang hi.

"Moses pen Israel mite in deihloin, ‘Kote a hong uk ding leh thu a hong khen dingin kua in hong koih ahi hiam?’ a cihpa uh a hihi. Ahi zongin Moses pen sawlpang kuang sung pan ama kiangah a kilang vantung mi' huhna tawh ukpa leh honkhiapa ahi dingin Pasian in a sawlpa a hihi.

Amah pen Israel mite tawh gamlakah a ompa hi a, Sinai Mual tunga ama kiangah thu a gen vantung mi leh i pute tawh a kikhawlpa a hihi. Eite tungah hong gensawn dingin Pasian kiang panin a tul ngeilo thu a ngah a hihi.
Note in vantung mi tung tawnin Pasian' hong piak thukham ngah napi-in na mang nuam kei uhhi," a ci hi.
Topa' vantung mi khat in Philip kiangah, "Kithawi in la, Jerusalem khua panin Gaza khua paina lampi zuan dingin leitaw lam manawhin pai in," a ci hi. (Tua lampi tu-in kizang pha nawnlo hi.)

Khatvei nitak nai thum pawlin maang mu a, Pasian' vantung mi khat hong pai-in ama kiangah, "Kornelias aw," ci-in a sapna teltakin a thei hi. 4 Amah in zong laukawmin vantung mi en a, "Topa aw, bang thu ahi hiam?" a cih ciangin, "Pasian in na thungetna hong za a, mizawngte na huhna zong hong thei-in nang hong phawk hi.
Tua khit ciangin ama kiangah thu a gen vantung mi paikhia a, Kornelias in zong ama innsung nasemte nih leh biakna a hahkat mahmah, ama sawltakin a neih galkapte khat sam a,

Amaute in, "Galkapbupa Kornelias in nang kiangah kote hong sawl hi. Amah pen Pasian a bia mihoih mahmah khat hi a, Jew mi khempeuh in zong a zahtak mahmah khat uh a hihi. Amah in nangma thugente a zaktheihna dingin a inn-ah nang a hong sapna dingin Pasian in a vantung mite khat ama kiangah gensak hi," ci-in a dawng uhhi.
Tua ciangin amah in vantung mi khat a inn sungah a ding mu-in, tua vantung mi in ama kiangah, ‘Simon Peter a kici mipa a sam dingin Joppa khua-ah mi sawl in.

Thakhatthu-in Peter gei-ah Topa' vantung mi khat hong omin thong sung khempeuh khua a vak hi. vantung mi in Peter' liangko lokin phong a, "Manlangin tho in," a ci hi. Thakhatin Peter' khut panin a sikkhaute kitolkhia hi. 8 Tua ciangin vantung mi in, "Na kawng hoihtakin gakin na khedap bulh in," ci-in a gen bangin Peter zong a gamta hi. Tua ciangin vantung mi in, "Na puan silh in la hong zui in," a cih mah bangin, 9 thong sung panin Peter in amah zui-in a paikhia hi. Ahi zongin tua vantung mi' gamtatna pen ahi takpi mah ahi hiam cih theilo ahih manin maang a mu-in kingaihsun hi.10 Thongcingte' vilna mun a khatna leh a nihna a khen'khit uh ciangin khuapi sung lutna ding sik kibawl thong kongpi a tung uhhi. Tua kongpi pen ama thu-in hong kihongtawm a, amaute a paikhia uhhi. Khuasung lampi-ah a pai laitakun thakhatin vantung mi in Peter guak a nusia hi. 11 Tua ciangin Peter in khua phawk a, "Maang a mu ka kisak leh a takpi na hi mawk! Topa in a vantung mi kei kiangah hong sawl a, Herod in hong gimsakna ding leh Jew mite in gimna hong thuaksakna ding panin kei hong honkhia hi," a ci hi.
Amaute in, "A hai hi teh!" na cihsan lel uhhi. Ahi zongin amah in, "Peter a om taktak mah hi," a cih teitei ciangin amaute in, "Amah a cing vantung mi hi ding hi," ci-in a dawng uhhi.
Herod in mite, Pasian phatsak loin amah phatsak ahih manin thakhatin Topa' vantung mi in Herod cinasak a, a hut in amah netumin a si hi.
Bangmah in ama hong itna tawh hong kikhensakzo hetlo ding hi, ci-in ka thei hi. Sihna, nuntakna, vantung mite, vantung vangliatnate, tuhun nate leh a hong tungding nate,

Ko sawltakte pen vantung mi leh leitung mi khempeuh in a et dingin mipi' mai-ah thahna a thuakdingin thukhenna a kipia mi bangin Pasian in a zaneu penin hong koih tawntung tawh kibang ka sa hi. 10 Christ hangin mite mai-ah kote mihai ka suak uh a, ahi zongin note pen Christ sungah mipil na kisa uhhi. Kote ka thaneem uh a, ahi zongin note a hat na kisa uhhi. Kote hong kisimmawhbawl a, ahi zongin note hong kizahtakbawl na kisa uhhi.
Eite pen vantung mite' thu nangawn a khensak ding ihih lamtak theilo na hi uhhiam? Tua ahih manin hih leitunga no' thu neuneute leltak na khentheih zawk kan ding uh a hihi.
Tua ahih ciangin a pasalte uh ukna nuai-ah a om ahihna a lahna dingun vantung mite' muhna-ah numeite in a lu uh a khuhding uh kilawm hi.
Keimah in mihingte pau a tuamtuamte leh vantung mite' pau nangawn ka pautheih hangin itna ka neih kei leh a bil-aphuai zam leh daltuah kitum tawh a kibang lel ka hihi.

Amaute pen sawltak taktak hiloin, sawltak a kineihkhemte hi uh a, a nasepna uhah zong zuau-in, Christ' sawltak taktak a battheihna dingun a meel kiseel ahi uhhi. 14 Tua pen lamdang sak ding hilo hi. Satan nangawn Pasian' vantung mi tawh a kibangin kibawltawm thei hi.
Note tungah ka hong hilhsa uh lungdamna thu tawh a kilehngatin, kote-a kipan vantung mi dongin thudang a hong hilh a om leh tua a hong hilh mipa hell khuk sungah tung ta hen!

Tua ahih leh Thukham bangin a kimang ding ahi hiam? Khialhna cih bang ahi hiam, cih a kitheihna dingin thuciamna banah hong kipiathuah hi a, thuciam a kipiakna, Abraham' suanpa' hun ciangdong bek a kimang dingin a kingaihsun a hihi. Mihingte tungah Thukham hong kipiak lai-in vantung mi hong kisawlsawn a, mihing ahi Moses tungah hong kipiasawn hi.

Ka pumpi cidam lohna pen note-a' dingin thu haksapi hinapi-in kei na hong simmawhbawl tuan kei uh a, zong na hong nolh tuan kei uhhi. Vantung panin a hong pai vantung mi zin do bang, leh Christ Zeisu mahmah zin a do bangin na hong limbawl uhhi.

Pasian in a geelsim thute a kisep khiatna thu mi khempeuh a musak dingin Pasian in kei tungah hih hamphatna hong pia hi. Tuhun laitakin vantung a uk van mite in pawlpi' hangin Pasian' pilna a nam tuamtuamin a muhtheihna dingun na khempeuh a bawl Pasian in a beisa hunah hih thu khempeuh a imcip hi.

Maang a muhna hangun a thupi diakin kingaihsunin, a kilawmlo zah dongin kiniamkhiatna ding leh vantung mite biakding a hong hanthawn mite' khemsa-in ta kei un. Tua bang mite pen amau' ngaihsut tawmna tawh a kihisak mawk hi a,
Pasian' thupiakna awging lianpi, vantung mi mangpa' thugenna, leh Pasian' peengkul hong ging ding a, vantung panin Topa mahmah hong paisuk ding hi.
tu-a gimna a thuak note leh kote tungah zong nopsakna hong pia ding hi. Vantung panin Topa Zeisu leh a vanglian a vantung mite, meikuang tawh hong kilat ciangin,

I biakna pen a thuthuk a thulian taktak ahihna thu hih bangin i thei hi: Mihing lim pua-in amah hong kilang a, a man taktak ahihna thu Khasiangtho in kilangsak a, vantung mite in a mu uhhi. Mi khempeuh tungah ama thu kihilh a, mun khempeuhah ama thu ki-umin, vantungah amah kilato hi.
Hih ka hong gen thute na zatna-ah kuamah guptuam paihtuam nei hetloin hoihtakin hong mangin na zatna dingin Pasian, Christ Zeisu, leh a siangtho vantung mite' muhna-ah limtakin a hong gen ka hihi.

vantung mite' ngah minthan'na sangin Tapa tungah Pasian in a piak min a liatzawk mah bangin vantung mite sangin Tapa lianzaw thampek hi. 5 Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in vantung mi khat peuhpeuh tungah, "Ka Tapa na hi hi. Tu ni-in na Pa ka suak hi," ci ngeilo hi. Tua mah bangin, "Kei, ama Pa ka hi ding a, amah, ka Tapa ahi ding hi," ci-in zong kam pau ngeilo hi. 6 Tua banah, Pasian in leitungah a Tapa neihsun hong paisak ding ciangin, "Pasian' vantung mi khempeuh in amah bia ding uhhi," na ci hi. 7 Ahi zongin vantung mite' thu a gen ciangin, "Pasian in a vantung mite huih bangin bawl a, a nasemte meikuang bangin bawl hi," na ci hi.

Ahi zongin Pasian in ama vantung mite kiangah, "Na galte na khenuai-ah ka hong sikcipsak matengin ka taklamah hong tu in," ci ngeilo hi. 14 Vantung mite pen Pasian' na a sem, a kimu theilo khate hi uh a, hotkhiatna a ngahding mite a huh dingin Pasian in a hong sawl a hihi.

Eite in genbelin i neih a hong tungding leitung pen Pasian in vantung mite' khutsungah koihlo hi. 6 Laisiangtho mun khatah a kigenna-ah, "Pasian aw, nangma ngaihsut tham dingin mi pen bang hi a, na phawk tham dingin mihing' ta bang hi lel ahi hiam? 7 Ahi zongin vantung mite sangin a neuzaw deuhin na bawl a, minthan'na leh pahtawina na guan' a, 8 na khempeuh na uk sak hi," na ci hi. "Pasian in na khempeuh a uk dingin bawl," a cih ciangin na khempeuh a huamkhin hita hi. Mihing in na khempeuh a uklam i thei nai kei hi. 9 Ahi zongin Pasian' hehpihna hangin mi khempeuh-a' dingin Zeisu a sih theihna dingin tawlkhat sung vantung mite sangin a neuzaw-in a kibawlna i mu a, sihna a thuakna hangin minthan'na leh pahtawina a ngahna thu i thei hi.
Ama lunghihmawh pen vantung mite hilo a, Abraham' suanlekhakte a lunghimawh ahihna thu hong kitel hi.
Ahi zongin note pen Zion Mual, a nungta Pasian' khuapi, vantung Jerusalem, simzawhloh vantung mite a omna,
Khualmite hoihtakin zin na do ding uh na phawk un. Mi pawlkhat in vantung mite zindo ahihlam a phawklopi-in a do na hi gige uhhi.
Tu-in vantungah tua Christ pai khin a, Pasian' taklamah omin, vantung mite leh ukna aana a neite khempeuh tungah a ukin a om hi.
Banghang hiam cihleh vantung mite nangawn in khialhna a neih ciangin Pasian in khahkhong loin hell khuk sungah khia a, Thukhen Ni hun dong ngakin khuamial sungah kol bulhsa-in a omsak hi.
Hih sia manlote sangin hatzaw-in a vanglianzaw vantung mite nangawn in Topa' mai-ah minthan'na a nei vantung mite gensia ngamlo, mawhsak ngamlo uhhi.

Amau' aana neih huamsung bekah omloin a omna panun a paikhia vantung mite zong leinuai khuamial sungah sikkol kibulhin amau' thu a kikhen ding Ni lianpi ngakin Pasian in a koihcip hi. 7 Sodom khua leh Gomorrah khua leh a kiima om khuapi mite zong tua vantung mite mah bangin gamta uh a, numei tawh mawhnopna bek thamloin pasal leh pasal kilunggulhna ciangdong nei uh ahih manin midangte' etteh dingin tawntung meikuang a thuak uhhi.

Vantung milianpa Michael nangawn tua bangin gamta ngamlo hi. Moses' luanghawm kituhin Dawimangpa tawh a kitot laitakin Michael in Dawimangpa zahkona kammal zang ngamloin, "Topa in nang hong taii ta hen," ci bek hi.

Hih laibu pen a piang baih ding thute, Pasian' nasemte tungah a lah dingin Pasian in Zeisu tungah a thu pia a, Zeisu in mang sungah a lah thute a hihi. Christ in ama vantung mi sawl a, a nasempa Johan kiangah hih thute a kilangsak hi.

Tu-in ka taklam khutsungah na muh aksi sagihte leh kham kibawl meivakna sagihte a khiatna in: Aksi sagihte pen pawlpi sagihte' vantung mite a cihna hi a, meivakna sagihte pen pawlpi sagihte a cihna a hihi.
"Ephesa khua-a pawlpi vantung mi kiangah lai gelh in la, a taklam khutah aksi sagih tawi-in, kham kibawl meivakna lakah a pai kawikawi Zeisu' thugenna hih bang a hihi.
Smyrna khua pawlpi vantung mi kiangah lai gelh in la, a kipatna leh a tawpna, si ngei napi-in a hingkikpa' thugen in,
"Pergamum khua pawlpi vantung mi kiangah lai gelh in la, a langnihin a hiam mahmah namsau a neipa' thugen in:
"Thiatira khua pawlpi vantung mi kiangah lai gelh in la, meikuang tawh a kibang mittang nei-in sumngo kihalsan tawh a kibang khe a nei Pasian' Tapa' thugen in:
"Sardis khua pawlpi vantung mi kiangah lai gelh in la, Pasian Khasiangtho sagih leh aksi sagih a neipa' thugen in: Note' gamtatnate ka thei a, note a si hinapi-in a hing min na pua uhhi.

A gualzo mite in tua bangin puanpak silh ding uh a, a nungta mite a kikhumna laibu sung panin amaute' min ka phiat kei ding hi. Ka Pa leh ama vantung mite kiangah zong keima mite ahihna uh ka pulak ding hi. 6 Tua ahih manin zakna ding bil a neite in Khasiangtho in pawlpite kiangah a gen thute na za un. 7 "Filadelfia khua pawlpi vantung mi kiangah lai gelh in la, David' tawhtang kemin, ama hon'sa kong kuamah in a khak zawhloh, ama khaksa kong kuamah in a hon' zawhloh, a thuman a siangthopa' thugen in:
"Laodisia khua pawlpi vantung mi kiangah lai gelh in la, thuman leh citakin teci a pang, Pasian' pian'sakte khempeuh a kipatna ahi Amen' thugen in:

Tua ganhing lite in kha guk ciat nei-in, tua a khate' sunglam leh a pualamah mittang a dimtakin om a, a sun a zan tawlnga loin la sa uh a,"A beisa, tuhun, leh a tawntungin a om Vanglian Topa Pasian, siangtho hi, siangtho hi, siangtho hi," a ci uhhi.

Tua ciangin a thahat vantung mi khat ka mu a, amah in nakpi takin, "Hih laizial a ciamtehnate lakhia-in a laizial a phel dingin a kilawm kua om ahi hiam?" hong ci hi.11Tua ciangin ka khuadak leh tokhom leh ganhing lite leh upate' kimkotah a tul a makin a ding miaimuai vantung mite' awging ka za hi.

Tua khit ciangin leitung kiu li-ah vantung mi li, kiu khatah khat ciat dingin leitung, tuipi tung, leh singkung khat peuhpeuh a mutkhak lohna dingin leitung huih lite lencipin a om uh ka mu hi. 2 Tua ciangin a nungta Pasian' ciamtehna a tawi vantung mi khat, nisuahna lam panin hong paito ka mu hi. Leitung leh tuipi suksiat theihna ding vangliatna a kipia vantung mi lite kiangah amah in nakpi takin gen a,
Tokhom, upate, leh ganhing lite kimkotah vantung mi khempeuh dingin tokhom mai ngatin kunin Pasian bia uh a,

Tua ciangin Pasian mai-ah a ding vantung mi sagihte ka mu a, amaute tungah peengkul sagih a kipia hi. 3 Tua ciangin kham kibawl paknamtui kuang a tawi vantung mi adang khat hong pai-in biakna tau mai-ah a ding hi. Pasian' mite in thungetna-in a zat paknamtuite tawh hal beh ding leh tokhom mai-ah a om kham kibawl biakna tau tungah piak dingin amaute tungah paknamtui tampi tak a kipia hi. 4 Pasian' mai-ah a ding vantung mipa' khutsung panin paknamtui khu leh Pasian' mite' thungetna van lam manawhin kizialto hi. 5 Tua ciangin tua vantung mi in paknamtui kuang la a, biakna tau panin mei-am la-in a sungah a koih khit ciangin leitungah lawn'suk a, nakpi takin van gingin zin ling a, khua phia-in kek a kia hi. 6 Tu-in peengkul sagih a tawi vantung mi sagihte a peengkul uh a tum dingin hong kithawi uhhi. 7 A masa vantung mi in a peengkul hong tum a, gialpi leh mei, sisan tawh kihelin leitungah a kiasuk hi. Leitung sehthumsuah sehkhat, leh lopa hing sehthumsuah sehkhat a kangtum hi. 8 A nihna vantung mi in a peengkul hong tum a, mual lianpi tawh a kibang, mei in kangin a kuang zuazua khat, tuipi sungah kilawnsuk hi. 9 Tuipi sehthumsuah sehkhat sisan suakin, tuipi sunga om ganhingte sehthumsuah sehkhat si a, teembaw sehthumsuah sehkhat a kisia hi. 10A thumna vantung mi in a peengkul hong tum a, vantung panin aksi lian khat meikuang bangin hong kiasukin gunte leh tuinakte sehthumsuah sehkhat tungah a tu hi. 11 Tua aksi a min Gamsai hi a, tui sehthumsuah sehkhat gamsai tui suak a, tua tui khasak ahih manin a dawn mi tampi tak a si uhhi. 12 A lina vantung mi in a peengkul hong tum a, ni sehthumsuah sehkhat kisatkhia-in, kha zong sehthumsuah sehkhat mah kisatkhia a, aksi zong sehthumsuah sehkhat mah kisatkhia ahih manin a taan'na uh sehthumsuah sehkhat ciat a bei hi. Sunin hun sehthumsuah sehkhat tang khua vaklo a, zanin zong hun sehthumsuah sehkhat tang mah kha leh aksi taanglo hi.
Tua ciangin a ngana vantung mi in a peengkul hong tum a, vantung panin leitungah aksi khat a leengsuk ka mu hi. Tua aksi tungah kuahawm thukpi hon'na tawhtang a kipia hi.

Amaute in tua kuahawm thukpi a uk vantung mi pen kumpi-in nei uh a, tua vantung mi a min pen Hebrews pau-in ‹ Abaddon › hi a, Grik pau-in ‹ Apollion › hi a, "A Susiapa," a cihnopna a hihi. 12 Tu-in gimna khatna a beina hita a, ahi zongin gimna nam nih hong tung lai ding a om hi.13 Tua ciangin a gukna vantung mi in a peengkul hong tum a, Pasian' mai-ah a om kham kibawl biakna tau kiu lite panin awging khat ka za hi.14 Tua awging in peengkul a tawi vantung mi a gukna kiangah, "Eufratis Gun lianpi-ah a kihencip vantung mi lite khahkhia in," a ci hi.15 Tua ahih manin leitung mi khempeuh sehthumsuah sehkhat a thahding uh a kum, a kha, a ni, a nai hun ngakin a kigingsa-in a om tua vantung mi lite a kikhahkhia hi.

Tua ciangin a thahat vantung mi khat, meiipi in tuamin, a lu tungah sakhituihup khimin, a maitang nitaang tawh kibangin, a khete meikuang khuampi tawh a kibang khat, vantung panin a hong kumsuk ka mu hi.

Tua ciangin tuipi leh leitung kalkakin a ding ka muh vantung mi in vantung lamah a taklam khut lamto-in, 6 a nungta tawntung, vantung leh a sunga om khempeuh, leitung leh a sunga om khempeuh, leh tuipi leh a sunga om khempeuh a bawl Pasian' min tawh kiciam a, "Tu-in zekai nawn hetlo ding hi. 7A sagihna vantung mi in a peengkul a tum ciangin ama nasem kamsangte tungah a gensa bangin Pasian in ama ip thusim a geelte hong semkhia ding hi," a ci hi. 8 Tua ciangin vantung panin awging ka zak in kei kiangah thu hong genkik a, "Tuipi leh leitung kalkakin a ding vantung mi' khutsungah a om laizial kiphelsa pen va la in," hong ci hi. 9 Tua ahih manin vantung mi kiangah va pai-in tua laizial neu a hong piakna dingin ka va gen leh amah in, "La in la, ne in. Na gil sung a tun' ciangin thuk mahmah ding a, ahi zongin na kam sungah khuaizu bangin khum mahmah ding hi," hong ci hi. 10 Kei zong tua vantung mi' khutsung panin a laizial neu la-in ka ne hi. Ka kamah khuaizu bangin khum dekdak a, ahi zongin ka nekkhit ciangin ka gil sung thuk velvalsak hi.

Tua ciangin a sagihna vantung mi in a peengkul hong tum a, vantungah nakpi takin aw hong ging a, "Leitung ukna ding aana neihna pen i Topa Christ-a' hong suakkhin a, amah in a tawntungin uk paisuak ding hi," hong ci hi.

Tu-in vantungah galkidona hong om a, Michael leh a vantung mite in gulpi leh a vantung mite a do uhhi. 8 Ahi zongin tua gulpi guallel ahih manin tua gulpi leh a vantung mite, vantungah kiom sak nawnlo hi. 9 Tua ciangin tua tanglai gulpi, Dawimangpa ahih kei leh Satan a kici, leitung mi khempeuh a khempa pen a vantung mite tawh leitungah kilawnsuk hi.

Tua ciangin leitungah a teng mi namkim, pau namkim a zang mite tungah a tawntungin Lungdamna ding Thu gen ding a nei vantung mi khat vankim lai-ah a leeng ka mu hi. 7 Amah nakpi takin kiko a, "Amah in mihingte thu a khen ding hun hong tungta ahih manin Pasian kihta unla amah phat un. Van leh lei, tuinak leh tuipite a bawlpa hong bia ta un," a ci hi. 8 Tua ciangin vantung mi a nihna in hong zui a, "A Lian Babylon khuapi kicim, kicim! Amah a huk a lanna leenggahzu, mi khempeuh tungah pia-in khamsak a, gimna thuaksak hi," a ci hi. 9 Tua ciangin vantung mi a thumna in a masate gel hong zui leuleu-in nakpi takin, "Tua ganhing leh a lim bia-in a taltang ahih kei leh a khut tungah ciamtehna a ngah mi peuhmah in,10 Pasian' leenggahzu zong dawn ding uhhi. Pasian in ama hehna ahi leenggahzu khauh pen ama hehna hai sungah a dimtakin sung khinzo ta hi. Tua bang mite pen a siangtho vantung mite leh Tuuno mai-ah meikuang leh kat khu tawh gimna kipia ding hi.

Biakinn sung panin vantung mi khat hong paikhia a, meiipi tungah a tu mipa nakpi takin samin, "Leitung mite lak dingin min mahmah a, a lak hun hong tungta ahih manin na phiaukawi tawh at in," a ci hi. 16 Tua ahih manin meii tungah a tupa in leitungah a phiaukawi hong van a, leitung mite a at hi.17 Tua ciangin vantung biakinn panin vantung mi adang khat hong paikhia leuleu a, amah in zong phiaukawi hiam khat mah a tawi hi. 18 Tua ciangin biakna tau panin vantung mi adang khat hong paikhia leuleu hi. Tua vantung mi pen mei a ukpa hi a, phiaukawi hiam a tawipa kiangah nakpi takin, "Leitung mite leenggah bangin minta ahih manin leitung mite na phiaukawi tawh atin a lom lomin kaikhawm in," a ci hi.19 Tua ahih manin vantung mi in zong leitungah a phiaukawi hong van a, leitung mite kaikhawmin Pasian' hehna lian leenggah cilna phualah a kaikhawm hi.
Tua ciangin vanah na lamdang lian mahmah khat ka mu hi. Gimna nam sagih a hong keng vantung mi sagih om uh a, Pasian' hehna a lah tawpna uh ahih manin a nunung pente ahi uhhi.

Tua biakinn sung panin vantung mi sagih, gimna sagih tawh hong pusuak uh a, puanpak silhin, kham awmgak tawh a awm uh a gak uhhi. 7 Ganhing lite sung panin khat in a nungta tawntung Pasian' hehna a dim hai sagih, vantung mi sagihte kiangah a pia hi. 8 Tua biakinn sungah Pasian' minthan'na leh a vangliatna khu kidim ahih manin, vantung mi sagihte in hong paipih gimna sagih a ven' matengin biakinn sungah kuamah lut theilo uhhi.

Tua ciangin biakinn panin awging khat in vantung mi sagihte kiangah, "Leitungah va pai unla, hai sungah a om Pasian' hehnate va sungkhia un," ci-in awging lianpi tawh a genna ka za hi.2 Tua ahih manin a khatna vantung mi va pai-in leitungah hai va bung a, a tungah ganhing ciamtehna a neite leh a lim a bia mite tungah a kihhuai meima a na mahmah hong piang hi.3 A nihna vantung mi in tuipi tungah a hai hong bung a, tuipi tuite misite' sisan tawh kibang hong suak ahih manin tuipi sungah a om nuntakna a nei khempeuh a si hi.4 A thumna vantung mi in gunte leh tuinakte tungah a hai hong bung a, a tui khempeuh sisan a hong suak hi.5 Tua ciangin tuite a uk vantung mi in, "A beisa huna kipanin tuhun dongin a om a Siangtho Pa aw, hih bangin na thukhenna-ah nang na thuman hi.

A lina vantung mi in ni tungah a hai hong bung a, ni in a satna tawh mite a kanggawp hi. 9 Nisa in mite kanggawp ahih manin mite in hih gimna tawh kisai-ah thu a nei Pasian a samsia uhhi. Ahi zongin a mawhna uh panin kisikin Pasian a phatding uh utlo uhhi. 10 A ngana vantung mi in ganhing tokhom tungah a hai hong bung a, tua ganhing' ukna gamsung tengah khua hong mial hi. Mite in na a sak manun a leii pet uh a, 11 a meimate uh na a sak manun vantung Pasian a samsia uhhi. Ahi zongin a gamtat siatna uh panin kisik nuamlo uhhi. 12 A gukna vantung mi in Eufratis Gun lianpi tungah a hai hong bung a, nisuahna lam kumpite hong paina ding lam a bawlkholhna-in a tuite hong kangcip hi.
A sagihna vantung mi in huihlakah a hai hong bung a, biakinn sung tokhom panin nakpi takin aw khat hong gingin, "Man khinta hi," a ci hi.

Tua ciangin hai sagih a tawi vantung mi sagihte sung panin kei kiangah khat hong pai a, "Hong pai in; gun tampi gei-ah a kilam a paktat mahmah khuapi gimna a kipiakzia ding ka hong lak ding hi. 2 Leitung kumpite in tua a paktat mahmahnu tawh gamtat hoihlo gamta uh a, leitung mite in ama paktatna leenggahzu dawnin a kham uhhi," hong ci hi. 3 Khasiangtho tawh kidimin ka om a, vantung mi in gamlak mun khatah hong tun'pih hi. Tua lai-ah, a tungah min hoihlo nam tuamtuam a dimin a kigelh ganhing a san khat tungah numei khat a tu ka mu hi. Tua ganhing in lutang sagih leh ki sawm a nei hi.
Ahi zongin vantung mi in keima kiangah, "Banghangin lamdangsa na hi hiam? Tua numei leh amah a pua, lutang sagih leh ki sawm a nei ganhing a cihnopna thu ka hong gen ding hi.
Tua ciangin vantung mi in hong genthuah lai a, "A paktat numei a tutna gun tuite pen minam tuamtuam, pau nam tuamtuam a zang mihonpite a hihi.
Tua khit ciangin vantung panin vantung midang khat a hong paisuk ka mu hi. Amah in aana a lian mahmah nei a, ama vang in leitung buppi a taan' hi.
Tua ciangin a thahat vantung mi khat in angawina suang tawh a kibang suang lianpi khat la-in tuipi sung den'na a, "A lian Babylon khuapi hih bangin kilawn ding a, kimukik ngei nawnlo ding hi.

Tua ciangin vantung mi in keima kiangah, "Hih thu gelh in: Tuuno' zineihna pawi-ah a kisam mite a hampha mahmah ahi hi," hong cihkhit ciangin, "Hihte pen Pasian' gen taktak kammal ahi hi," hong cithuah lai hi.
Tua ciangin ni sungah vantung mi khat a ding ka mu a, amah in vankim lai-ah a leeng vasa khempeuh nakpi takin samin, "Pasian' pawi lianpi-ah a kikhawm dingin hong pai un.
Tua ciangin vantung panin vantung mi khat hong paisukin, kuahawm thukpi hon'na tawhtang leh sikkhau khainiang golpi khat a tawi ka mu hi.

Tua ciangin gimna nunung sagihte a dimin a om hai sagih a tawi vantung mi sagihte sung panin khat kei kiangah hong pai-in thu hong gen a, "Hong pai in; Tuuno zi, a Mothak ka hong lak ding hi," hong ci hi.10Tua laitakin Khasiangtho tawh ka kidim a, tua vantung mi in mual sang mahmah khat dawnah hong paipih hi. Vantung Pasian kiang panin a hong paisuk Khuapi Siangtho ahi Jerusalem khua a hong lak hi. 11 Tua khuapi pen Pasian' vang tawh te ziazua a, Jasper suangmanpha bangin taang a, Kristal suangmanpha bangin siang kilkel hi. 12 A kulh sahin sang mahmah a, kulhkongpi sawmlenih nei-in, a kongpite-ah vantung mi sawmlenih om a, a kulhkongpite tungah Israel minam sawmlenihte' min kigelh hi.
Keima kiangah thu a hong gen vantung mi in tua khuapi, a kulhkongpite leh a kulh a tehna dingin kham kibawl tehna ciang khat a nei hi.

Tua ciangin vantung mi in Pasian leh Tuuno tokhom panin a hong luangkhia, kristal suangmanpha bangin a te selsel gun tui hong lak a, 2 khuapi sung lampi laizangah a luang hi. Tua gun pang tuakah nuntakna singkung po a, kha simin gah ahih manin kum khat sungin sawmlenih vei a gah hi. A tehte zong natna damna ding zatui-in kizang hi. 3 Pasian' samsiatna a ngah peuhpeuh tua khuasungah omlo hi. Tua khuapi sungah Pasian leh Tuuno' tokhom om ding a, ama nasemte in amah a bia ding uhhi. 4 Amaute in ama maitang mu ding uh a, a taltang tung uhah ama min kigelh ding hi. 5 Topa Pasian pen amaute' khuavak hi-in, a tawntungin amaute in uk paisuak ding uh ahih manin khuamial hun cih om nawnlo ding a, khua a vaksak ding meivak leh nitaang cihte kisamlo ding uhhi. 6 Tua ciangin vantung mi in kei kiangah, "Hih thute muan'taak a, thuman a hihi. Kamsangte tungah a Khasiangtho a pia Topa Pasian in a hong piang baih ding thute, a nasemte tungah a lak dingin a vantung mite a hong sawl hi," hong ci hi. 7 Zeisu in, "Kei a hong pai baihta ding ka hihi. Hih laibu sunga kigelh thu a zui mite mi hampha ahi hi," a hong ci hi. 8 Keimah Johan in hih thute za-in ka muh a hihi. Hih thute za-in ka muh ciangin hih thute kei tungah a hong lak vantung mi a bia dingin a khe phungah ka boksuk hi. 9 Ahi zongin amah in, "Kei hong bia kei in. Kei pen nang leh na sanggamte, leh hih laibu sungah a om thu a zui mite tawh nasemkhawm khat ka hihi. Pasian bia in," hong ci hi.
"Keimah Zeisu in pawlpite-a' dingin hih thute nang kiangah a hong gen dingin ka vantung mi ka hong sawl hi. Kei pen David' zung leh a suan ahi, zingsol ka hi hi," a hong ci hi.
Pasian in a bawlsate khempeuh en a, hoih sa mahmah hi. Nitak hong bei-in zingsang hong tung a, a ni guk ni a hihi.

Tua ciangin amaute a gingin kiko-in, amau' ngeina bangin namsaute leh sikzumte tawh, amaute tungah si a luan' dongin ki-atin kisun uhhi.
Mihingte tua zahta-in hailua uh ahih manin amau ututin a gamtat theihna dingun Pasian in khahkhong vet a, a zumhuai mahmahpi-in a gamta uhhi.

Leitung mihingte' gamtat bangin gamta kei unla, na lungsim uh kikheelin Pasian kipuahpha sak un. Tua hi leh a hoih nate bang hi a, bangte in amah lungkim sakin, bangte a kicing hiam ci-in thei-in Pasian' deihna na phawk thei ding uhhi.

Note pen Pasian' biakinn na hihna uh leh note sungah Pasian' Khasiangtho a teng ahih lamtak na theihsa uh a hihi. 17 Mi khatpeuh in Pasian' biakinn susia leh Pasian in tua mipa susia ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian' biakinn a siangtho hi a, note zong tua biakinn siangtho na hi uhhi.

Na pumpi uh, Pasian in a hong piak, note' sungah a teng Khasiangtho' biakinn ahih lamtak theilo na hi uhhiam? Note' pumpi, nomau' neihsa hilo a, Pasian-a' a hihi. 20 Note pen Pasian in a hong leisa na hih manun na pumpi uh Pasian' minthan'na dingin na zang un.

"Ka ut peuhpeuh ka hihtheihna ding thu om hi," a ci omkha ding hi. Ahi zongin na khempeuh ka hihding kilawmlo hi. Na khempeuh hihtheihna ding thu a om hangin a kihihthei khempeuh hihna in midangte' hoihna ding piangsaklo hi.
Eite pen ama pumpi nate ihihna hangin Christ in hong it mah bangin kuamah in ama pumpi mudah ngeilo a, hoihtakin kemin a vakzaw hi.
Tua mah bangin numeite zong a kilawm a kituak bekin kizemin kipuahin, sam khawng a uanglua-in bawlloin, a khengvalin kizepna a tuamtuamte zangloin,
A puan tung leh a phei tungah, "Kumpite' Kumpi, topate' Topa," ci-in a min kigelh hi.

Khatvei Jacob in meh huanin a om laitakin gamlak a sa betna panin phukhong vei-in Esau hong ciah hi. 30 Esau in Jacob kiangah, "Gilkialin phukhong vei ka hih manin tua na meh san tawmkhat hong nesak in," a ci hi. (Tua ahih manin ama min Edom kici hi.) 31 Jacob in, "Na innluahza hong pia lecin ka meh kong pia ding hi," na ci hi. 32 Esau in, "A si ding ka hita hi; kei-a' dingin innluahza bangin kimang ding ahi hiam?" a ci hi. 33 Jacob in, "Kei' tungah hong kiciam masa in," a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin ama tungah Esau kiciam a, Jacob' tungah a innluahza a zuak hi. 34 Tua ciangin Jacob in an leh bemeh Esau a pia hi. Esau in zong an ne-in tui a dawn khit ciangin a paina ding a zuan hi. Tua ahih manin Esau in a innluahza tua ciang bang bekin a ngaihsun a hihi.

Tawlkhat khit ciangin a topa' zi in Joseph zawl mit a, "Kei tawh hong lumkhawm in," a ci hi. 8 Ahih hangin amah in nialin a topa' zi kiangah, "En in, kei hong nei ahih manin ka topa in innsungah bangmah lunghihmawhna neilo a, ama neih khempeuh ka khutsungah hong koih khin hi. 9 Hih inn sungah kei sangin amah lianzaw lo hi. Nang, ama zi na hih manin, nang lobuang kei kiang panin amah in a kep tuam bangmah omlo hi. Tua ahih ciangin bangci-in hih gitlohna lianpi bawlin Pasian' tungah khial ding ka hi hiam?" na ci hi. 10 Amah in ni khat khit ni khat Joseph a zol hangin, amah tawh lupkhawm ding hita leh omkhawm ding hita leh amah in tuanu' thu ngailo hi.

Tua ahih ciangin mite in Moses' tungah mawhna zong uh a, "Tui dawn ding hong pia in," ci uhhi. Moses in amaute kiangah, "Banghangin kei' tungah mawhna hong zong na hi uhhiam? Banghangin { Topa } ze-et na hi uhhiam?" a ci hi.
"Massah munah amah na ze-et uh bangin { Topa } na Pasian uh na ze-et nawn kei ding uhhi.

Tua ahih ciangin gamsung omzia lim a kan dingin ama kiangah a kisawl Babylon uliante' kamtaite tawh kisai-in, amah a ze-etna ding leh ama lungsim sungah bang om hiam cih a vekpi-in a theihna dingin Pasian in ama thu-in amah a omsak hi.

Ahih hangin amah in a zi kiangah, "Numei haite' kampau bangin na pau hi. Pasian' tung panin a hoih sang ihih ciangin siatna zong sanglo ding ihi hiam?" a ci hi. Hih thu khempeuhah a kampau nangawnin Job khiallo hi.
{ Topa } aw, hong ze-et in la hong sin in. Ka lungsim leh ka ngaihsutna hong entel in.
Amaute in amah ze-et kikkik uh a, Israel-te' Siangtho Pasian a phin uhhi.
Nangma tungah kong khialh lohna dingin ka lungsim sungah nangma thu ka khol hi.
Gim nong piak ma-in lam ka pial thei zel a, ahih hangin tu-in na thu ka zui hi.
Ka ta aw, mi hoihlote in nang hong zol ciangin, amau' zolna zui kei in.
Tua bang numeite' zolna mang kei unla, tua bangte tawh khialkha kei un. 26 Tua bang numei in mi tampi tak siasakin, simzawhloh ding mi tampi' sihna a piangsak hi.
Kham leh ngunte mei sungah kize-et a, mihingte' lungsim { Topa } in ze-et hi.

Amau' lungsim sungah thukham' deihnate omkhin ahihna thu a gamtatna un hong kilangsak hi. Amau mahmah zong khat veivei hoih kisa, khat veivei sia kisa uh ahih manin, amau' lungsim sungah thukham' deihnate theihna omkhin ahihna thu, hih amau' kiphawk tawmna lungsim in nakpi takin hong kitelsak hi.
Jeremiah aw, ka mite a ze-et dingin nang kong koih hi. Ze-et in la, a om dan uh thei in.
Tua ahih manin Vanglian { Topa } in a cihin-ah, "En un, amaute a sian'thona dingun suangtui-in ka ze-et ding hi. Tualo ka mite bangcih nawn ding ka hi hiam?

Tua ciangin Rekhab behte' mai-ah leenggahzu a dimin a kikoih hai leh keute ka pia a, leenggahzu dawn un, ci-in ka sawl hi. 6 Ahih hangin amaute in, "Kote in leenggahzu ka ne kei ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh Rekhab' tapa, ka pu uh Jonadab in thu hong pia a, ‘Note-a kipan na ta na tute un leenggahzu na ne ngei peuhmah kei ding uhhi.

Daniel in kumpi innsunga an leh leenggahzu tawh a pumpi a thanghuaisak lohna dingin a lungsim a khensat hi. Amah in innsungmang lianpen Ashpenaz kiangah tua bang an a kipiaklohna dingin a ngen zaw hi.
Kumpipa in tua biakna a nusia mite a thuzawh theihna dingin zuaugen siamna a zang ding hi. Ahih hangin Pasian' nung a zui mite ahih uh leh thahatin a gualzo ding uhhi.
Ka biakinn-ah an a om theihna dingin sawmah khat a kimin hong paipih un. Kei hong ze-et un; vantung kongkhakte hongin, note-a' dingin na hoih tampi kong piakna na mu ding uhhi.

Tua ciangin Dawimangpa' ze-etna a thuak dingin Khasiangtho in gamlakah Zeisu a paipih hi. 2 Zeisu in sun sawmli leh zan sawmli sung an neloin omkhin ahih manin a gil a kial hi. 3 Tua ciangin ama kiangah Dawimangpa hong pai a, "Pasian' Tapa na hih takpi leh hih suangte anlum a suahna dingin thu pia in," a ci hi. 4 Ahi zongin Zeisu in, "Laisiangtho sungah, ‘Anlum bek tawh mite nungtalo a, Pasian genkhiat thute tawh nungta zaw hi,’ ci-in kigelh hilo ahi hiam?" ci-in a dawng hi.

"Pasian' Tapa taktak na hih leh Laisiangtho sungah, ‘Pasian in nang a hong kem dingin a vantung mite hong sawl ding hi. Na khete leh suang a kitahkhak lohna dingin vantung mite in a khut uh tawh nang hong dom ding hi,’ ci-in kigelh ahih manin, hih lai panin tuaksuk in," a ci hi. 7 Zeisu in, "Laisiangtho mahah, ‘Na Topa Pasian na ze-et kei in,’ ci-in gen hilo ahi hiam?" ci-in a dawng hi.
Zeisu in, "Satan aw, taikhia in. Laisiangtho in, ‘Na Topa Pasian bek bia in la, ama na bek sem in,’ ci hilo ahi hiam?" ci-in a dawng hi.
Khemna hong thuaksakkei in. Gilopa kiang pan hong hon khia in", ci-in thu na ngen un. (HCN)
Ze-etna haksa hong thuak sakkei inla, a gilopa’ kiang pan hong honkhia in’ ci-in na ngen ding uhhi. (PuKKT)
Ze-etna lian hong thuaksak ke'n. Gilo' kiang pan hong honkhia in,’ (Uk zawhna, vangliatna, minthan'na, na nei tawntung hi. Amen.) ci-in na ngen ding uhhi. (TDM)

Ahi zongin a bei dongin a thuakzote in hotkhiatna ngah ding uhhi.
Ze-etna-ah na puk khaklohna dingun thu ngen un. Lungsim in ze-etna nang nuam napi-in pumpi in nangzolo hi," a ci hi.
Gamlakah ni sawmli sung om a, Satan in tua hun sungteng a ze-et hi. Tua lai-ah gamsa gilote zong om a, ahi zongin vantung mite hong pai-in amah huhin an a vak uhhi.
Pharisee mite hong pai-in Zeisu tawh thu kinial uh a, amah a mawhsak theihna ding uh a deihna-in Pasian tawh kipawl ahihna a lahna dingin lim khat a lahding a ngen uhhi.

Pia ding ihi hiam, pialo ding ihi hiam?" ci-in a dong uhhi. Ahi zongin Zeisu in amau lungsimtawng thei ahih manin, "Banghangin kei hong thangsiah se na hi uhhiam? Ka et dingin dangka peek khat hong la dih un," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amaute kiangah, "Ze-etna-ah na pukkhak lohna dingun pilvangin thu ngen un. Lungsim in ze-etna nangnuam napi, pumpi in nang zolo hi," a ci hi.
Zeisu in, "Laisiangtho sungah, ‘Anlum bek tawh mite nungta zolo hi,’ ci-in kigelh hilo ahi hiam?" ci-in a dawng hi.
Zeisu in, "Laisiangtho in, ‘Topa Pasian na bia in la, ama na bek sem in,’ ci hilo ahi hiam?" ci-in a dawng hi.
Zeisu in, "Laisiangtho in, ‘Topa na Pasian na ze-et kei in,’ ci hi," ci-in a dawng hi. 13 Dawimangpa in a hihtheihna khempeuhah Zeisu a ze-et khit ciangin tawlkhat sung a nusia phot hi.

Suang kitawphah leilak a tukna munte pen Pasian' thu a zak ciangin lungdam takin a sangte a cihna a hihi. Ahi zongin amaute sungah thuktumlo ahih manin tawlkhat sung bek um uh a, ze-etna hun a tun' ciangin a puk uhhi.

Zeisu a ze-et dingin Thukham hilh siate khat hong ding a, "Sia aw, nuntak tawntungna ka ngahtheihna dingin bang sem ding ka hi hiam?" ci-in a dong hi. 26 Zeisu in, "Thukham sungah bang kigelh a, bang sim na hi hiam?" a ci hi. 27 Amah in, "Na Topa Pasian na lungsim khempeuh, na nuntakna khempeuh, na hatna khempeuh, leh na pilna khempeuh tawh na it in la, nangmah na ki-it bangin na vengte na it in," ci-in kigelh hi, ci-in a dawng hi. 28 Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Na dawn'na man mahmah hi. Tua bangin gamta lecin nuntak tawntungna na ngah ding hi," a ci hi.
Kote tungah a hong mawhte mawh maisakna ka neih bangun ko' mawhna zong hong maisak in. Ze-etna lian hong thuaksak ke'n,’ ci-in na ngen ding uhhi," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in a nungzuite kiangah, "Mite a puktheihna ding ze-etna hong piang hamtang ding hi. Ahi zongin tua pukna ding a piangsak mipa in gimna ngah ding hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Simon, Simon aw, lokhopa in buhhum a haih bangin note khempeuh hong ze-etna dingin Satan in thu a ngah khitna thu phawk in.
Ama painopna mun a tun' ciangin amaute kiangah, "Ze-etna na tuahkhak lohna dingun thu ngen un," ci-in a gen hi.
Zeisu in, "Banghangin ihmu na hi uhhiam? Tho unla ze-etna-ah na pukkhak lohna dingun thu ngen un," a ci hi.

Tua ciangin { Topa } in Satan kiangah, "En in, ama neihsa khempeuh na khutsungah kong ap hi; ahi zongin amah taktak ahih leh na su kei ding hi," a ci hi. Tua ciangin { Topa' } omna panin Satan a paikhia hi.
(Zeisu in a hihding thei napi-in Philip a ze-etna-in hih bangin a dong lel a hihi.)

Thungetna-in hun na zattheihna dingun tawlkhat sung tuam om ding thukim khawm masa lopi-in lupkhop ding kinialkha kei un. Tua bangin tawlkhat sung na tuam om khit uh ciangin note' pumpi' deihna hangin Satan' ze-etna sungah na pukkhak lohna dingun a ngeina bangin lupkhawm ding kipan kik un.

Na tuah uh ze-etnate khempeuh pen mite' tuah ngeingeite mah a hihi. Pasian in citakin a thuciamna lenkip ahih manin note' thuak zawhloh ding ze-etna hong tuaksaklo ding hi. Ze-etna na tuah hun uh ciangin zong na thuakzawhna ding uh thahatna hong guan'ding ahih manin na suahtak zawhna ding uh lampi hong hon'sak ding hi.
Sanggamte aw, mi' khemsa-in ta kei un. Kikholhpih hoihlote in mi siasak thei hi.
Note in ze-etna bangzah ciang thuakzo-in, ka thugente na hong mangzo uhhiam cih ka theihna dingin tua lai a hong gelh ka hihi.

Sanggamte aw, mi khatpeuh a gamta khial a om ciangin, Khasiangtho' deihna bangin a nungta note in tua a khialpa a manin a gamtatkik theihna dingin thunem zangin na huh un. Note in zong amah bangin ze-etna na tuahkhak lohna dingun na kikem un.
Dawimangpa in hong suksiat theihna ding hun omsak kei un.
Tu-a kipanin Topa tawh na kipawlna uh leh ama vangliatna hangin na tha uh khauhsak ta un. 11 Dawimangpa' hong hihna ding khempeuh na dalzawhna dingun Pasian' galvan namkim na zang un.
Christ in a hong piak vangliatna tawh hihte khempeuh nawkzawhna ding thahatna a nei ka hihi.

Tua ahih manin ka thuakzawh nawnloh ciangin note' upna zia a thei dingin Hebrews ka hong sawl hi. Dawimangpa' ze-etna in note hong puksakkha-in, kote' nasepna a mawkna suakkha ding hi, ci-in ka lunghimawh uhhi.
Ahi zongin a haunuam mite in ze-etna a tuamtuam thuak a, duhhopna huaihamna a haivai thute-ah awkcipin, haksatna leh siatna a tuahlawh uhhi.
Ama pumpi mahmah in ze-etna leh gimna thuak ahih manin tuhun ciangin tua bang a thuakte a hong huhthei hi.

Eite' neih Siampi Lianpenpa in i ginat lohna-ah eite a hong hehpih theilo ding hilo hi; eite mah bangin ze-etna khempeuh a thuak hi a, ahi zongin mawhna a bawllo a hihi. 16 Tua ahih manin a kisap hunin, eite a hong huhdingin hehpihna leh dikna thupha i ngahtheihna dingin, kimuan'na lungsim tawh hehpihna tokhom va zuan ciat ni.

Pasian in Abraham a ze-et laitakin Abraham in a upna hang mah tawh Pasian biakna dingin a tapa Isaac na pia ngam hi. Pasian mah in Abraham tungah tapa ka hong pia ding ci-in a ciam hinapi-in, Pasian' ciamna bangin a neih tua a tapa neihsun mah, Pasian biakna dingin Abraham in pia dingin na kithawi hi.

Sanggamte aw, thuhaksa a tuamtuam na thuak uh ciangin lungdamna dingin na ngaihsun zaw un. 3 Tua bangin na upna hong hong kize-etna na thuakzawh uh ciangin na kipna uh hong kilangsak ahihna thu na thei uhhi. 4 A kisam bangmah omloin a cingtaak na suahtheihna dingun na thuakna uh hangin a tawntungin na kip paisuakna dingun na ngaihsun un.

A hoih takpi mah hiam, ci-in sinna a thuak ciangin a nangzote a hampha mahmah a hihi. Tua bangin a nangzote in, amah a itte tungah Pasian in a piakdingin a ciam nuntakna lukhu a ngah ding uhhi. 13 Mi khat peuhpeuh in tua bang ze-etna a thuak ciangin, "Pasian in kei hong ze-et hi," ci-in ngaihsun kei hen. Siatna in Pasian ze-et ngeilo a, mite a siatna dingin Pasian in zong ze-et ngeilo hi. 14 Mi khatpeuh in ama deihna zui-in a gamtat ciangin mawhna a piangsak a hihi. 15 Lungsim utna a gol semsem ciangin mawhna hong piang a, mawhna hong cingtaak ciangin sihna hong piang hi.
Tua ahih manin Pasian' thu na mang un. Dawimangpa na nial un. Nial le uh cin no kiang panin taikhia ding hi.

A hoih takpi mah hiam, ci-in sinna a thuak ciangin a nangzote a hampha mahmah a hihi. Tua bangin a nangzote in, amah a itte tungah Pasian in a piakdingin a ciam nuntakna lukhu a ngah ding uhhi. 13 Mi khat peuhpeuh in tua bang ze-etna a thuak ciangin, "Pasian in kei hong ze-et hi," ci-in ngaihsun kei hen. Siatna in Pasian ze-et ngeilo a, mite a siatna dingin Pasian in zong ze-et ngeilo hi.
A hoih a manin gamtat ding thei napi-in a gamta lote a khial a hihi.

Ka itte aw, note' upna hong kize-etna-in gimna haksate na thuak manun a thu lamdangpi-in ngaihsun kei unla, na lungkham ngaihsut kei un. 13 Tua bangin Christ tawh thuakkhawm le uh cin ama minthan'na hong kilat ciangin note lungdam mahmah ding na hih manun, tua banga na thuakna uhah na lungdamzaw un.
Note pilvangin khua phawk un. Na gal uh ahi Dawimangpa, humpinelkai bangin a nektheih ding zongin vak kawikawi hi.

Ka itte aw, note na khialhkhak lohna ding uh ka deihna-in hih lai a hong gelh ka hihi. Ahi zongin mi khatpeuh a khialh ciangin eite-a' dingin Pa Pasian kiangah a hong thumsak dingin a thuman Zeisu Christ i nei hi.

Ama minthan'na mai-ah paubaan'na om hetloin lungdam takin a hong paipih theihna dingin note na pukkhakna ding panun a hong kem, 25 khat bek ahi eite a hong Hon Pasian in, tuma, tu laitak, leh a tawntungin, minthan'na, vangliatna, uk zawhna, leh aana nei tawntung ta hen. Amen.

Na thuakding uh haksatnate kihta kei un. Dawimangpa in note pawlkhat thong sungah hong khia-in hong ze-et ding hi. Gimna na thuak hun ding uh ni sawm sung bek hi ding hi. Na sih dongun kei tungah hong citak un. Tua hi leh nuntakna lukhu ka hong pia ding hi.

A gualzo, a tawp dongin keima deihna bangin a gamtazo mite tungah, keimah in ka Pa tung panin ka ngah vangliatnate mah ka pia ding hi. Minam dangte tungah ukna a neihna ding uh aana ka pia ding a, leibeel satkhap bangin sik ciangkhut tawh minam dangte satgawp ding uhhi.

Jew mi hilo napi-in Jew mi hi ung, ci-in zuau a gen Satan' pawlte, note' mai-ah hong paisakin na khephung uhah ka boksak ding a, note ka hong itna thu amaute ka theisak ding hi. 10 Note in lungduai takin na thuakna ding uh ka hong thupiakna zui na hih manun leitunga a om mi khempeuh ze-etna dingin leitung bupah a hong tungding lungkhamna panin kei zong note ka hong suaktasak ding hi.
Nang leh numei kikal na suanlekhakte leh ama suanlekhakte kikalah kilangneihna ka omsak ding hi. Amah in na lutang hong sunim ding a, nang in ama khetul na sunim ding hi," a ci hi.
