"Amah kinengniamin gimna a kithuaksak hangin amah kam khat beek paulo hi. Sa gote kiangah a kipaipih tuuno leh a mulmette mai-ah a kipaipih tuu a hamloh mah bangin amah kam khat beek paulo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin nisuahna leh nitumna kikalah a om mi khempeuh in amah zahtakin, a vangliatna kihta ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh huihpi nung bang, tuipi khang bangin amah hong pai ding hi.

Zion mite aw, nakpi takin lungdam un. Jerusalem mite aw, lungdamin awng un. En un, na kumpipa uh hong pai hi. Amah, gualzawhna tawh hong pai hi. Ahi zongin kiniamkhiatna tawh hong pai a, sin nailoh lano tungah hong tuang hi.

Abraham' suan David, David' suan Zeisu Christ' khang ciamtehna hih bang a hihi. 2 Abraham ta Isaac, Isaac ta Jacob, Jacob ta Judah, leh a sanggamte ahi uhhi. 3 Judah ta Perez leh Zerah hi a, Tamar tawh a neih a ta ahi uhhi. Perez ta Hezron, Hezron ta Ram, 4 Ram ta Amminadab, Amminadab ta Nahshon, Nahshon ta Salmon, 5 Salmon ta Boaz, Rahab tawh a neih a ta a hihi. Boaz ta Obed, Ruth tawh a neih a ta a hihi. Obed ta Jessi,
Jacob ta Joseph hi a, Joseph pen Christ a kici Zeisu' nu Mary' pasal a hihi.
Kamsang Isaiah in, "Gamsungah mi khat kiko a, ‘Topa' paina ding lampi bawl unla, a tot ding lampi tangsak un,’ ci hi," ci-in a gen ciangin hih Johan' thu a gen a hihi.
Tua sung mahin vantung panin aw khat hong ging a, "Hih pen ka it mahmah ka Tapa hi a, ama tungah ka lungkim mahmah hi," a hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin Dawimangpa' ze-etna a thuak dingin Khasiangtho in gamlakah Zeisu a paipih hi. 2 Zeisu in sun sawmli leh zan sawmli sung an neloin omkhin ahih manin a gil a kial hi.
Amah in Thukham hilh siate bangin thu genloin, aana neite bangin thu a genzaw hi.

Tua laitakin Thukham hilh siate khat in ama kiangah, "Sia aw, na paina peuhpeuhah ka hong zui ding hi," a cihleh 20 Zeisu in, "Ngiate in lupna ding kua nei uh a, vasate in zong giahna ding bu nei uhhi. Ahi zongin Mihing Tapa in a luptheihna ding mun koimahah neilo hi," ci-in a dawng hi.

Zeisu in amaute kiangah, "Mopina pawi khatah, a zineipa a om sungin a mopawi simte dah dingin um na hi uhhiam? Dah hetlo ding uhhi. Ahi zongin amaute kiang panin zineipa a kilakkhiat ding hun hong tung ding a, tua hun ciangin amaute in an a tang ding uhhi.
Cinate damsakin, misite hingsakin, miphakte damsakin, dawite va hawlkhia un. Man piak kulloin hih vangliatna na ngah uh bangin hih vangliatna na zatna uhah zong man va ngen kei un.
Keima hakkol zangin kisuan unla, kei kiangah hong kisin dih un. Kei pen kiniamkhiatin neem hithiat ka hih manin ka kiangah na tawl uh a dam ding hi. (TDM)
Keima hakkol kisuan unla kei kiangah kisin ta un. Ahang in, keimah lungsim nem leh lungsim ki niamkhiat mi ka hihi, na hinna un tawldamna a ngah ding hi. (ZIV)

Tua ciangin Thukham hilh siate leh Pharisee mi pawlkhat in Zeisu kiangah, "Sia aw, na lamdang khat nong lah ding ka deih uhhi," ci-in a ngen uhhi. 39 Ahi zongin Zeisu in, "Tuhuna mite bangzahin giloin, Pasian' thu theilo ahi uhhiam? Na lamdang ka bawl ding na hong ngen tazen uhhi. Jonah thu tawh kisai na lamdang longal adang hong kilaklo ding hi. 40 Ngasa gilpi sungah sun thum leh zan thum sung Jonah a om mah bangin Mihing Tapa zong sun thum leh zan thum sung mah leisungah om ding hi.

Tua ciangin nungzuite in Zeisu va naihin ama kiangah, "Banghangin thugentehna zangin amaute tungah thu gen na hi hiam?" ci-in a dong uhhi. 11 Zeisu in, "Vantung ki-ukna tawh kisai thusim note tungah hong kihilh a, ahi zongin amaute tungah kihilhlo hi.

Tua huna kipanin Zeisu in a nungzuite kiangah, "Jerusalem khua-ah ka pai ding hi. Upate, siampi liante, leh Thukham hilh siate tung panin gimna tampi ka thuak ding hi. Kei hong kithat ding a, ni thum ni-in hong kihing kiksak ding hi," ci-in teltakin gen a kipan hi.
Tua lai mun panin amaute' muhtangpi mahin Zeisu a meel kikheel a, a maitang ni bangin taangin, a puante khuavak bangin a ngo hi.

Tua bangin a pau laitakun meiingo hong kaii vatin amaute hong khuh a, tua meii lak panin aw khat hong ging vatin, "Hihpa pen ka it, ka lung a kim mahmahna ka Tapa a hihi. Ama thu na ngai un," a hong ci hi.
Mualtung panin amaute a ciahsuk laitakun Zeisu in nungzuite kiangah, "Sihna panin Mihing Tapa a kithawhsak kik matengin hih na muhte uh kuama kiangah gen kei un," ci-in thu a pia hi.

Zeisu in naupang khat samin amaute mai-ah dingsak a, 3 "A man mahmahin note kiangah kong genin-ah: Note kikheelin naupang na bat kei uh leh vantung ki-ukna sungah na lut ngei kei ding uhhi. 4 Hih naupang bangin a kiniamkhiat mite, vantung ki-ukna sungah a lianpen hi ding hi.

Tua ciangin Pasian biakna innpi huang sungah Zeisu lut a, tua sungah van zuak van lei-a a om mi khempeuh a hawlkhia hi. Sumkhek nasemin a om mite' sabuai leh vakhu zuakte' tutnate a lumletsak gawp hi. 13 Amaute kiangah, "Pasian in Laisiangtho sungah, ‘Ka inn pen thungetna inn kici ding hi,’ ci napi-in, note in guktakna phualpi na suaksak uhhi," a ci hi.

Biakinn panin Zeisu a paikhiat laitakin ama kiangah a nungzuite hong pai-in, tua biakinn a thupina zia a lak uhhi. 2 Ahi zongin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, "Hihte khempeuh na mu khinta uhhi. Ke'n a mantaka kong genin-ah: Hih inn lamna-a a kiciang suangte a kithuapin a om nangawn a om nawnlo zah dongin kilawnkeek mang ding hi," ci-in a dawng hi.

"Mihing Tapa a vantung mite tawh Kumpi-in hong paikhawm uh ciangin a kumpi tokhom tungah hong tu ding hi. 32 Ama mai-ah leitung minam khempeuh hong kikhawm ding hi. Gancingpa in tuu leh keelte a khen mah bangin mi khempeuh khen nihin hong koih ding hi.
"Tua ciangin a veilamah a om mite kiangah, ‘Pasian in a samsiat mite aw, keima kiang panin paikhia unla, Dawimangpa leh a nungzuite-a' dingin a kibawl meikuang tawntung sungah pai un.
Ahi zongin Zeisu in amah a kimawhsaknate kam khat beek dawng hetlo ahih manin Pilat in lamdang a sa mahmah hi.
Zeisu in amaute gel kiangah, "Kei hong zui un; nga mat bangin mi tampi a huaite kong suaksak ding hi," a ci hi. 18 Amaute gel in zong a ngen uh nusia-in Zeisu a zuipah uhhi.

A zingsang phalvak ma-in Zeisu tho-in gamdaihna mun khatah na pai-in thu a ngen hi. 36 Ahi zongin Simon leh a lawmte in Zeisu a zong dingin nungzuih uh a, 37 amah a muh uh ciangin, "Mi khempeuh in nang hong kan uhhi," a ci uhhi. 38 Ahih hangin Zeisu in, "Hih kimnai-a om khuadangte-ah pai ni. Keima hong paina pen thuhilh ding ahih manin tua khuate-ah thu ka hilh ding hi," a ci hi.
"Hih thu kuama kiangah gen kei in. Siampipa kiangah paisuak pahin amah kivelsak in. Tua ciangin na damsiangna thu mi khempeuh in a theihna dingin Moses thupiaksa bangin biakpiakna bawl in," a ci hi.
Zeisu in a lungsim sung uha amau ngaihsutna theipah ahih manin amaute kiangah, "Banghangin tua bangin ngaihsun na hi uhhiam?

Zeisu in, "Ka nu leh ka naute i cih kuate ahi hiam?" ci-in a dong hi. 34 Ama kimkotah a tu mite en a, "Hih lai-ah ka nu leh ka sanggamte om uhhi. 35 Pasian' deihna bangin a gamta mi khempeuh ka nu leh ka sanggamte ahi uhhi," a ci hi.
Amah in thugentehna tawh thu tampi hilh a, a thuhilhna-ah:
Zeisu in hih bang thugentehnate zangin mite tungah thu hilh a, amaute' telzawh zah ciangciang thu a gen hi.

Pasian theiloin a gilo hih mite lakah keima hang leh ka thuhilhte hangin maizumin kei hong pulak ngamlo mi peuhmah, a Pa' minthan'na vang leh a siangtho vantung mite tawh a minthangin hong paikik ciangin Mihing Tapa zong ama hangin maizumin pulak ngamlo ding hi," a ci hi.
"Keima hangin hih bang naupangno khat a limbawl mi in kei hong limbawl hi a, kei hong limbawl mi in kei hong limbawl hiloin kei hong sawlpa a limbawl ahi hi," a ci hi.
Zeisu in a nu leh a pa kiangah, "Banghangin kei hong zong na hi uhhiam? Ka Pa' inn sungah ka om ding lamtak theilo na hi uhhiam?" ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua ahih ciangin a nu leh a pa zui-in Nazareth khua-ah ciahkik a, amaute' thu mangin tua lai-ah hoihtakin a om hi. A nu in hih thu khempeuh a lungsim sungah ngaihsunsun hi.

Tua ciangin Zeisu in ama kiangah, "Hih thu kuamah dang kiangah gen kei in. Siampipa kiangah paisuakpah in la kivelsak in. Tua ciangin na damna thu a kilatna dingin Moses thupiak mah bangin biakna pia in," ci-in thu a pia hi. 15 Ahi zongin Zeisu' thu kitheithang semsem zawsop a, ama thu a ngai ding leh a natna panun damna a ngahna dingun mi tampi tak a hong pai uhhi.
Numeino zong hingkik a, thakhatin a thopah hi. Tua ciangin numeino' nekding an pia un, ci-in Zeisu in a sawl hi.
Zeisu in thu a nget laitakin a mel hong kikheel a, a puante zong pakin tee mahmah hi.

Tua ciangin Zeisu in a nungzuite kiangah, "Note' thu a hong zuite khempeuh, kei' thu a hong zui hi a, note' thu a hong zuilote khempeuh, kei' thu a hong zuilo ahi uhhi. Kei' thu a hong zuilote khempeuh pen kei a hong sawlpa' thu a zuilo ahi uhhi," a ci hi.

Zeisu a ze-et dingin Thukham hilh siate khat hong ding a, "Sia aw, nuntak tawntungna ka ngahtheihna dingin bang sem ding ka hi hiam?" ci-in a dong hi. 26 Zeisu in, "Thukham sungah bang kigelh a, bang sim na hi hiam?" a ci hi. 27 Amah in, "Na Topa Pasian na lungsim khempeuh, na nuntakna khempeuh, na hatna khempeuh, leh na pilna khempeuh tawh na it in la, nangmah na ki-it bangin na vengte na it in," ci-in kigelh hi, ci-in a dawng hi. 28 Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Na dawn'na man mahmah hi. Tua bangin gamta lecin nuntak tawntungna na ngah ding hi," a ci hi.
Ahi zongin tuni, zing leh thai sungteng ka ma nawtsuakin ka pai ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Jerusalem khuasung lobuang mun dangah kamsangpa a kithah ding kilawmlo hi.
Jerusalem khua hong nai semsem a, a khuapi a muh ciangin Zeisu in tamlawh a,

Ahi zongin note lakah tua bang hilo ding hi; a lianpenpa a neupen bangin om ding a, a makai penpa a nungzui nunungpen bangin om ding hi. 27 Anne dingin sabuai-ah a tupa leh an a piapa kua lianzaw ahi hiam? Anne dingin a tupa lianzaw mah hi. Ahi zongin kei pen note lakah anpia-in na a sempa bangin ka hong om hi.
"Pa aw, nangma ngaihsutna bang ahihkhak leh hih ka thuakding gimna tawh hong kipelhsak in. Ahi zongin kei deihna bang hiloin nangma deihna bang hi ta hen," a ci hi.

"Lutang Guh," a kicihna mun a tun' uh ciangin singlamteh tungah Zeisu kilhcip uh a, tua mi that mi nihte zong, Zeisu' taklamah khat, a veilamah khat kilhcip uhhi. 34 Ahi zongin Zeisu in, "Pa aw, amaute in bang hih ihi hiam cih theilo uh ahih manin a mawhna uh na maisak in," a ci hi. Tua ciangin amau' ngah ding ciat a theihna dingun ai sanin a puante a hawm uhhi.
Tua ciangin nakpi takin Zeisu kiko a, "Pa aw, nangma khutsungah keimah kong ki-ap hi," a cih khit ciangin a si ta hi.

Zeisu in, "Na lam paikawmun bang gengen na hi uhhiam?" ci-in a dong hi. Amaute gel zong din'khawl pah uh a, a maisuah uh dahmai mahmah lai hi. 18 Tua ciangin amaute gel sung panin Kleopas a kicipa in, "Jerusalem-a hawhte lakah tusawng tenga tua lai-a thupiang a theilo nang bek na hi ding hi," ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua Thu mihing hong suakin kote lakah hong om a, itna nei-in citak mahmah ahih manin Pasian' pianzia a neihna ka mu cian uhhi. Hih pianzia pen Pasian' Tapa khat bek hihna tawh a neih pianzia a hihi.
Kuamah in Pasian mu ngeilo hi. Pasian tawh a kinai pen, Pasian mah ahi Tapa khat bek in Pasian hong kilangsak hi.
A zingsangin Johan in ama kiangah Zeisu hong pai a muh ciangin, "En un, leitung mawhna a lakhia Pasian' Tuuno hih lai-ah hong pai hi.

Zeisu in, "Hih tui a dawn khempeuh dangtak kik ding uh a, 14 ahi zongin keima piakding tui a dawn khempeuh dangtak kik nawnlo ding uhhi. Tua ka piak tui a dawnte sungah nuntakna tuinak piang ding a, a nungtasak paisuak ding hi," a ci hi.
"Keima thu guak tawh ka hihtheih bangmah omlo hi. Pasian' hong genna bang bekin thu ka khen hi. Keima ut bangin semloin kei hong sawlpa' deih bangin sem ka hih manin ka thukhenna thuman hi.

Kei pen nuntakna an ka hihi. 49 Na pu na pate un gamsungah manna ne uh a, a vekpi-un si veve uhhi. 50 Ahi zongin vantung panin a hong pai an a ne mi peuhmah silo ding hi. 51 Kei pen vantung panin a hong paisuk nuntakna an ka hihi. Tua an a ne mi peuhmah nungta tawntung ding hi. Leitung mite a nuntakna dingin ka piakding an pen keima sa ahi hi," a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Ka Pa in ahi thei dingin bawl kei leh ka kiangah kuamah hong pai theilo ding hi, ka cihna thu pen hih thu hang mah ahi hi," ci-in a genthuah lai hi. 66 Hih bangin a thugenna hangin a nung a zui a thungai mi tampi kileh kikin Zeisu zui nawnlo uhhi. 67 Tua ahih manin Zeisu in a nungzui sawmlenihte kiangah, "Note zong na ciahkik nuam mai uhhiam?" a cih ciangin, 68 Simon Peter in, "Topa aw, ciah le ung kua kiang zuan mawk ding ka hi uhhiam? Nangmah in nuntak tawntungna ding thu na nei hi. 69 Tu-in nang ka hong um uh a, Pasian kiang panin a hong pai a Siangtho Pa na hihna thu ka hong thei uhhi," ci-in a dawng hi. 70 Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Note na sawmlenih mahun ka hong teel hinapi-in khat pen dawi na suakmawk uhhi," a ci hi. 71 Sawmlenihte sung panin amah a lehpei ding ahih manin Simon Iskariot' tapa Judas thu a genna a hihi.
Tua ahih manin Zeisu in, "Ka thugente pen keima thu hilo a, kei a hong sawl Pasian kiang panin a hong pai thu a hihi.
Amau' thu bek tawh thu a gente in amau' minthan'na ding a zong hi a, ahi zongin a hong sawlpa' minthan'na ding a zong keimah in thuman thutak gen ka hih manin zuauthu kihello hi.
Tua khit ciangin Zeisu in mihonte kiangah a thugenna khatah, "Kei pen leitung khuavak ka hihi. Kei hong zuite in khuavak nuntakna nei ding uh a, khuamial gamtatna neilo ding uhhi," a ci hi.
Kei a hong sawlpa' lungkimna bang bekin gamta tawntung ka hih manin amah in kei guak hong nusia loin, hong ompih tawntung hi," a ci hi.
Note lakah kua in ka mawhna na hong lakthei uhhiam? Hong lak theilo na hih manun thuman ka gen ciangin banghangin hong umlo na hi uhhiam?
Leitungah ka om laiteng kei pen leitung mite-a' dingin khuavak ka hi hi," ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua ahih manin Zeisu in amaute kiangah thu genkik leuleu a, "A mantakin ci lehang, kei pen tuute' paina kongpi ka hihi.

Kei, kongpi ka hihi. Keimah tawnin a pai tuu khempeuh in lauhuaina tuakkha loin, a ututun sungtumin pusuakin lonona mun a mu ding uhhi. 10 Gutate pen a gu ding, a that ding, leh a siasak ding bekin hong pai hi. Kei ka hih leh tuute a nungta maimai bek hiloin nuntakna cingtaak a neihtheihna dingun a hong pai ka hihi.

Ka nuntakkik theihna dingin si ngam ka hih manin ka Pa in kei hong it hi. 18 Kuamah in ka nuntakna hong laksak theilo a, keima utthu tawh ka piak hizaw hi. Ka nuntakna piakkhiat theihna ding leh lakkik theihna ding thu ka Pa in kei tungah a hong piak ahi hi," a ci hi.
"Kei leh ka Pa pumkhat ka hi uhhi," ci-in a dawng hi.

a nungzuite kiangah, "I lawmpa Lazaras ihmu zo hi. Ahi zongin amah a phong dingin ka pai ding hi," a ci hi. 12 Tua ciangin a nungzuite in, "Topa aw, amah ihmu ahih leh a nuamtuam hita ding hi," a ci uhhi. 13 Zeisu in amah si hi, a cinuam hinapi-in, a nuamtuamin a ihmu hi, a ci-in a nungzuite in ngaihsun uhhi. 14 Tua ahih manin Zeisu in a teltakin gen a, "Lazaras si khinta hi. 15 Ahi zongin note in na uptheihna dingun tua lai-ah kei om khalo ka hih manin note kong khualna-in ka nuam mahmah hi. Ahi zongin tu-in ama kiangah va pai ni," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Keimah in a sisa mite thosakin a hingsak theipa ka hihi. Kei hong um mi peuhmah a sih hangin nungta ding hi.
Zeisu in Mary leh amah hong zui Jew mite a kahna a muh ciangin a lungsim nakpi takin sukha-in lunggim mahmah ahih manin,

Tua khit ciangin Zeisu in, "Tu-in ka lunggim mahmah hi. Bangcih ding ka hi hiam? ‘Pa aw, hih hun tawh hong kipelhsak in,’ ci ding ka hi hiam? Tua bang cih ding lah hih bang a thuak ding mahin a hong pai ka hihi.
Banghang hiam cihleh keima utthu tawh thu a mawkgen ka hi kei a, kei hong sawl Pa Pasian in ka gen ding thuteng a hong piak a hihi.
Zeisu in, "Tu-a ka gamtatna thu na theihloh hangin nidang ciangin na thei ding hi," a ci hi.
Zeisu in hih thuteng a genkhit ciangin lungkham mahmah ahih manin, "A mantakin ci lehang, note khat in kei nong lehhek ding uhhi," ci-in a kilangin a genkhia hi.
Zeisu in ama kiangah, "Keimah in Lampi ka hi a, Thuman, leh Nuntakna zong ka hihi. Kei hong suangloin Pa kiangah kuamah tung theilo ding hi.
Tawlkhat khit ciangin leitung mite in kei hong mu nawnlo ding uhhi. Ahi zongin kei ka nuntak mah bangin note zong nungta ding na hih manun note in kei na hong mu ding uhhi.
"Kei pen leenggui ka hi a, note pen a hiang na hi uhhi. Note in kei tawh loin bangmah hih theilo ding na hih manun kei tawh a kizomte in gah tampi na gah ding uhhi.

Ka Pa' hong thupiakte zui-in ama itna sungah ka om mah bangin note in zong ka thupiaknate na hong zuih uh leh ka itna sungah a om na hi ding uhhi. 11 Note hangin kei ka lungdam theihna ding leh note' lungdamna a cingtaak a suahtheihna dingin hih thute a hong gen ka hihi. 12 "Note tungah ka hong piak thu in: Note ka hong it zahin note khatlekhat na ki-it un.
Zeisu in hih thute a genkhit ciangin vantung lam ento-in, "Pa aw, a hun hong tungta ahih manin na Tapa in na pianzia hong kilatsak theihna dingin tu-in na Tapa' pianzia hong kilangsak ta in.

Siampi lianpenpa Annas in Zeisu kiangah ama nungzuite thu leh a thuhilhna tawh kisai thu a dong hi. 20 Zeisu in, "Mi khempeuh' theihin thu ka gen tawntung hi. Jew mihonpi a kikhopna innte leh Biakinn sungah thu ka hilh a, thu ka sim genna om ngeilo hi. 21 Tua ahih manin banghangin kei kiangah hong dong se na hi hiam? Ka thugen a za mite kiangah dong lecin ka genteng amaute in hong genthei ding uhhi," ci-in a dawng hi.

Tua ahih manin kumpi inn huangsungah lutkikin Zeisu kiangah, "Koi lai panin a hong pai na hi hiam?" ci-in a dong hi. Ahi zongin Zeisu in dawnglo ahih manin, 10 "Hong dawnglo ding na hi hiam? Nang thahtheihna ding leh khahtheihna ding thu ka neihlam phawklo na hi hiam?" a cih ciangin 11 Zeisu in, "Pasian in nang tungah hong pialo hi leh kei tungah thu na nei het kei ding hi. Tua ahih manin nangma khutsungah kei hong apte' mawhna lianzaw hi," ci-in a dawng hi.
Zeisu in tua leenggahzu-hau ciamin, "Man khinta hi," a cih khit ciangin a lu puksukin a si ta hi.
Zeisu in, "Ka hong paikik mateng amah a nungta dingin ka deih nak leh nang bang phamawh sa na hi hiam? Nangmah in ka nung hong zui peuh in," ci-in a dawng hi.

Amah mihoih mi siangtho hinapi-in, amah na nial zawsop uh a, mi that khat a khahkhiatna dingin Pilat kiangah na ngen uhhi. 15 Tua ahih ciangin mite tungah nuntakna a piapa na that uh a, ahi zongin sihna panin Pasian in amah hingkiksak hi. Kote gel pen hih thu a thei teci ka hi uhhi.
Ama hang bek tawh hotkhiatna kingah thei ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh eite in hotkhiatna i ngahtheihna dingin leitung khempeuhah Pasian in hong piak min dang khat zong omlo hi," ci-in a gen hi.

Nazareth khuami Zeisu tungah Pasian in Khasiangtho leh vangliatna pia a, Pasian in a ompihna hangin tua Zeisu in a paina khempeuhah na hoih semin, Dawimangpa in a gimsak mite khempeuh a damsakna thu zong na thei uhhi.
Mi khempeuh mawh ciat uh a, a hong honkhia Pasian tawh kigamla uhhi.

Pasian tawh eite i kilangneih laitakin ama Tapa' sihna hangin amah tawh hong kilemsak ahih leh tu-in Pasian tawh kipawl khinta ihih manin Christ nuntakna in eite hong honkhiazo zaw kan ding hilo ahi hiam?
Mi khat bek' mawhna hangin sihna in hong uk ahih leh mi khat mah ahi Zeisu Christ hangin nakpi takin a lian Pasian' hehpihna leh mihoih-a san'na a ngah mite nungta-in thahatzaw kan ding uhhi.
Mi khat in thu a man'loh manin mi tampi mimawh a suahsak mah bangin mi khat in thu a man'na hangin mi tampi in Pasian tawh kipawl theihna a ngah ding uh a hihi.
Banghang hiam cihleh mawhna in thaman hong piak pen sihna hi a, ahi zongin i Topa Zeisu tawh i kipawl manin Pasian' hong piakkhong pen nuntak tawntungna a hihi.
Pasian' Tapa mi khempeuh lakah a upa pen a suahtheihna dingin Pasian in a teelkholhsa mite, a Tapa tawh a kibang dingin a sehsa a hihi.
Zeisu pen Topa hi, ci-in mite kiangah genin, Pasian in sihna panin amah hingkiksak zo hi, ci-in na lungsim sung uhah na up taktak uh leh hotkhiatna na ngah ding uhhi.

Tua hi a, Laisiangtho sungah a kigelh mah bangin Israel mite khempeuh in hotkhiatna ngah ding uhhi. Laisiangtho in, "Zion panin Honpa hong pai ding a, Jacob' suanlekhakte sunga om gitlohna khempeuh maisak ding hi.
Ahi zongin Pasian in a hong sap ei Jew mite leh Gentail mite-a' dingin Christ pen Pasian' vangliatna leh Pasian' pilna a hihi.
Keimah in Christ gamtatzia ka zuih mah bangin note in zong keima gamtatzia hong zui ta un.

Banghang hiam cihleh Adam tawh a kizop manin mi khempeuh si a, tua mah bangin Christ tawh a kizom khempeuh zong kihingsak kik ding hi. 23 Ahi zongin tua hin'kikna pen ama hun tawh kizui-in a banbanin hi ding hi. A masa penin Christ hi a, Christ hong paikik ciangin ama pawlte khempeuh hingkik ding hi.
Tua ahih manin Laisiangtho in, "A masa Adam pen leitung nuntakna a nei mihing hong suak hi," na ci hi. Ahi zongin a nunung Adam pen nuntakna a pia thei Kha a hihi.
A masa Adam pen leitung leivui tawh a kibawl hi a, a nunung Adam pen vantung panin a hong pai a hihi.
Eite in lei tawh a kibawl mite' lim i puak mah bangin vantung panin a hong pai Mipa' lim zong a pua ding ihi hi.
Tua ahih manin mi khatpeuh, Christ tawh a kipawl ciangin mi thak suak a, a mi lui ngeina bei-in a mi thak ngeina a neita a hihi.
Christ tawh i kipawlna hangin eite zong Pasian tawh a kibangin midik i suahtheihna dingin mawhna a neilo Christ pen eite' tangdingin Pasian in mawhnei mi a suaksak hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh i Topa Zeisu zong hau mahmah napi-in ama zawn'na tawh note mihau na suahtheihna dingun note' hangin mizawngin hong kibawl ahih manin i Topa Zeisu Christ hong itna bangzah takin lian hiam, cih thu na thei uhhi.
Pasian in hong aam mahmah bangin note ka hong aam mahmah hi. Nungak leh tangval nupa dingin a kigawm mah bangin khat bek ahi Christ tawh a kigawm dingin nungak siangtho bang na hi uhhi.

Tua ahih manin tuhuna ka nuntakna zia pen kei hang hi nawnloin ka sungah a hong om Christ hang a hihi. Tua hi a, keimah hong itin, keima-a' dingin a nuntakna a hong pia Pasian' Tapa ka muan'na tawh tu laitakin a nungta ka hihi.
Christ sungah a kiphum note in Christ' pianzia a nei khinta na hi uhhi.
Thu haksa na tuah uh ciangin khatlekhat na kihuh un. Tua hi leh Christ' thukham a zui na hi uhhi.

Tua bang hinapi-in Pasian' hong hehpihna leh eite hong itna lian mahmah ahih manin, 5 i mawhna hangin kha thu tawh kisai-in misi ihih laitakin Christ tawh eite hong nungtasak hi. Pasian' hehpihna hangin hotkhiatna a ngah thei ihi hi.
Eite a hong bawlpa pen Pasian hi a, Zeisu Christ tawh i kipawl ciangin i nuntakna-ah gamtat hoih a nei dingin a hong bawl ihi hi. Hih pen eite' omzia dingin a na ngaihsut kholhsa a hihi.

Christ mahmah in Gentail mite leh Jew mite pawlkhatin hong bawl ahih manin eite tungah nopsakna a hong piapa a hihi. Hih minam nihte khenin gal a piangsak dalna pen Christ in ama pumpi tawh a satkham hi.
Note zong, sawltakte leh kamsangte in a phuhsa innkhuam tungah a kilam na hi uh a, tua inn sutpi pen Zeisu mahmah a hihi.
Tua ahih manin zuau gen nawn kei unla, Christ pumpi nate ihihna hangin pawlkhat ihih manin khatlekhat tungah thuman kigen ni.
khatlekhat kihehpihin, lungsim neem tawh na kihozaw unla, Christ' hangin Pasian in note' mawhna hong maisak mah bangin khatlekhat na mawhna uh na kimaisak ta un.

Note pen Pasian in a hong it a tate na hih manun amah tawh na kibatna dingun hanciam un. 2 Christ in eite a hong it manin Pasian in eite' mawhna hong maisak theihna dingin a namtui biakna-in Pasian kiangah a kipiak mah bangin note zong itna tawh na gamta un.

Pawlpi pen paubaan'na a om hetlo, a siangtho mahmahin Christ kiangah a kipiak theihna dingin Pasian thu tawh tui-ah a silsiang khit ciangin Pasian kiangah a aptheihna dingin pawlpi-a' dingin Christ a kipia a hihi.

Note' phattuamna ding bek ngaihsun kei unla, midangte' phattuamna ding ngaihsutsak zaw un. 5 Note in Zeisu Christ lungsim puakzia na nei un. Tua lungsim puak zia in: 6 Zeisu Christ in Pasian' pianzia nei napi-in, Pasian tawh a kizakim theihna dingin thathanghat thu a suang kei hi. 7 Amah kiniamkhiat tawm zaw a, nasem lim a hong puazaw hi. Mihing bangin amah hong kibawl a, mihing teekteek mah a hong sun hi. 8 Amah hong kiniamkhiat tawm a, singlamteh tung nangawnah sihding a ut hi.
Note zong, sawltakte leh kamsangte in a phuhsa innkhuam tungah a kilam na hi uh a, tua inn sutpi pen Zeisu mahmah a hihi.
Christ Zeisu nasepna tawh vantung nuntakna-ah Pasian' hong sapna ahi hamphatna ka ngahtheihna dingin, a kung lam zuanin tangtakin ka tai hi.

Vantung leh leitungah a om na khempeuh, kha thu tawh kisai vangliatna, tote, mi ukte, aana neihnate-a kipan a kimuthei hita leh a kimu theilo hita leh na khempeuh, Pasian in amah zangin a piangsak hi. Leitunga kipanin huihlakah a om khempeuh dongin, Pasian in Christ-a' dingin amahmah zangin a piangsak hi.
Na khempeuhah amah a lianpen ahih theihna dingin, amah pen pawlpi ahi ama pumpi lutang hi a, pawlpi' nuntakna a kipatna hi a, sihna panin a kithosak kik Tapa cil a hihi.

Pasian in mi khempeuh-a' dingin a koihcing hih a thupi a deihhuai a thusim pen ama mite tungah pholak ding a sawm a hihi. Tua thusim in: Christ tawh a kipawlte in Pasian tawh minthan'na ngahkhawm ding hi, cihna a hihi.
Banghang hiam cihleh mihing hong suahna sungah Christ in Pasian' pian'zia khempeuh a kimtakin nei a,

Pasian in note hong itin, hong teelin, ama mi siangthote hikhin na hih manun note pen hehpihna nei-in, migi-in, kiniamkhiatin, dikin, na lungduai ding uh a hihi. 13 Note lakah khatlekhat a kilungkimlo na om uh ciangin khatlekhat na mawhna uh kimaisakin na kihuh ciat un. Topa in note' mawhna hong maisak bangin note zong khatlekhat na mawhna uh na kimaisak ding uhhi. 14 Hihte khempeuh banah, mi khempeuh kilem takin a hong om khawmsak thei ahi ki-itna na bulphuh un. 15 Note pumkhat suakin a lungdam khawm dingin Pasian in a hong sap ahih mah bangin Christ hong piak nopsakna in note' lungsim hong uk ta hen la, lungdamin om ta un. 16 Christ thu a cingtakin note lungsimah hong om hen la, pilna tawh khatlekhat thu kihilhin na kitai un. Pasian tungah lungdam kohna-in Thuciam Lui sunga late, la thakte, leh biakna late na sa un. 17 Na kampauna, na gamtatnate khempeuh uhah, Topa Zeisu hangin Pa Pasian tungah lungdam kohna-in Zeisu min paulamin na hih ding uhhi.

tu-a gimna a thuak note leh kote tungah zong nopsakna hong pia ding hi. Vantung panin Topa Zeisu leh a vanglian a vantung mite, meikuang tawh hong kilat ciangin, 8 Pasian a theilo mite, leh i Topa Zeisu tawh kisai Lungdamna Thu a umlo mite tungah gimna a tungsak ding hi. 9 Ama mite khempeuh leh thu um mite khempeuh hangin minthan'na leh pahtawina a ngah dingin Topa hong pai Ni ciangin a noptuak mahmah Topa' minthan'na huamsung panin amaute kihawlkhia ding a, tawntung suksiatna dan a thuak ding uhhi. Ahi zongin note in ka hong gen uh thute um na hih manun tua nopna sungah na om ding uhhi.

Pasian in genzawh lohin kei hong hehpih a, Christ Zeisu tawh kipawlna hangin i ngahtheih upna leh itna a hong guan' hi. 15 Christ Zeisu, mawhneite a honkhia dingin leitungah hong pai hi, cihna thu a man hi a, a uphuai a san'huai thu a hihi. Keimah zong tua mawhnei mite lakah a mawhpha bel ka hihi. 16 A mawhneipha bel ka hihna thu hang mahin, nidang ciangin amah umin nuntak tawntungna a ngahding mite' etteh theihdingin Christ Zeisu in a lungduaina cingtakin kei tungah hong lahtheihna dingin Pasian in kei a hong hehpih a hihi.

Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian khat bek om a, Pasian leh mite a hong kilemsak kik thei Christ Zeisu khat bek om hi. 6 Mi khempeuh a tankhia dingin tua Zeisu hong kipiatawm a, a hun lian laitakin a hong kipiakna pen Pasian in mi khempeuh a hotkhiat nopna thu a kilatna a hihi.
I mawhna khempeuh panin hong honkhia ding leh ama neihtuam i suahtheihna dingin Zeisu amahmah hong kipumpiak a, eite pen gamtat hoih gamtat ding a lawp mahmah ihi hi.

A beisa hunah Pasian in kamsangte zangin i pupite tungah a lam tuamtuam tawh a khen khenin thu na gen ngeizo hi. 2 Ahi zongin tuhun nunung ciangin leitung vantung na khempeuh a bawlin a zat, a tawpna-ah na khempeuh a luah dingin a seh a Tapa zangin eite tungah thu hong gen hi. 3 Tua Tapa in Pasian' minthan'na vang hong taangkhiasak a, Pasian' lim taktak mah hong pua-in, ama kampauna tawh leitung vantung buppi pai-in a kip hi. Mihingte a mawhna panun a sian'sak khit ciangin Vanglianpipa Pasian' taklam, vantungah a tu hi. 4 Vantung mite' ngah minthan'na sangin Tapa tungah Pasian in a piak min a liatzawk mah bangin vantung mite sangin Tapa lianzaw thampek hi. 5 Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian in vantung mi khat peuhpeuh tungah, "Ka Tapa na hi hi. Tu ni-in na Pa ka suak hi," ci ngeilo hi. Tua mah bangin, "Kei, ama Pa ka hi ding a, amah, ka Tapa ahi ding hi," ci-in zong kam pau ngeilo hi. 6 Tua banah, Pasian in leitungah a Tapa neihsun hong paisak ding ciangin, "Pasian' vantung mi khempeuh in amah bia ding uhhi," na ci hi.
Mawhna panin mite a siangthosakpa leh sian'thosakna a ngah mite in, Pa, a kibang a neikhawm uhhi. Tua hi a, Zeisu in mite, "Sanggam," a cih ding zum ngaihsutlo ahih manin,
Tate a cih mite pen leitung cilesa a nei mite ahih manin, ama sihna hangin sihna a uk Dawimangpa a sukgawp theihna dingin Zeisu in mihing pian'zia mah hong nei phot hi.

Tua ahih manin mihingte' mawhna a kimaisak theihna dingin Pasian' na a sepna-ah mite-a' dingin hehpihna leh cihtakna tawh Siampi Lianpen a suahtheihna dingin a sanggamte tawh a kibangin mihing lim a hong puakding a kisam a hihi. 18 Ama pumpi mahmah in ze-etna leh gimna thuak ahih manin tuhun ciangin tua bang a thuakte a hong huhthei hi.
Tua ahih manin Pasian' sapna a ngah mi siangthote aw, eite' upna thu tawh kisai-ah Siampi Lianpen a sem dingin Pasian' sawltak Zeisu' thu ngaihsun dih un.
Eite' neih Siampi Lianpenpa in i ginat lohna-ah eite a hong hehpih theilo ding hilo hi; eite mah bangin ze-etna khempeuh a thuak hi a, ahi zongin mawhna a bawllo a hihi.

Tua mah bangin Christ zong, amahmah in siampi lianpen nasep a semtawm mawk hiloin Pasian in ama kiangah, "Nang, ka Tapa na hi hi. Tuni-in na Pa ka suak hi," na ci hi. 6 Mun dang khatah zong, "Melkhizedek siampi gui zui-in a tawntungin siampi na hi ding hi," na ci lai hi. 7 Leitungah mihingin Zeisu a omlai-in sihna panin amah a honkhia theiding Pasian tungah thu ngenin khitui naptui tawh thumin na kiko hi. 8 Amah, Pasian' Tapa hinapi-in a thuakna tawh thumang ahih theihna ding a na kisin hi. 9 Tua bangin a cingtaak mi a suahkhit ciangin ama thu a mang mite khempeuh-a' dingin tawntung hotkhiatna a kipatna hong suak a, 10 Melkhizedek gui zui-in siampi lianpen dingin Pasian in a bawl hi.
Hih bangin a kilamdang diakin a kibawlna in Zeisu pen kiciamna hoihzaw ahihna thu hong kilangsak hi.

Tu-in i gennop thu pen hih bang ahi hi: Vantungah Pasian' tokhom taklamah a tu tua bang Siampi Lianpen khat a nei ihi hi. 2 Amah in, mite' bawl a hilo, Topa mahmah in a bawl a taktak puanbuk ahi a Siangtho Pen mun sungah siampi lianpen nasep a sem a hihi.

Thuciamna masa in a huamkhak mite, a mawhna panun a suahtak theihna ding uh ngeina om pen a si suak khinta ahih manin, Pasian' sap mite in a ciamsa tawntung thupha a ngahtheihna dingun Christ in thuciamna thak a hong vaihawm a hihi.

Eite hong makai-in i upna a hong cingtaaksak Zeisu mitsuan'in nei ni. Mailamah a ngahding lungdamna hangin maizumna kihta loin singlamteh tungah sihna hong thuak a, tu-in Pasian tokhom taklamah a tu hi.
Zeisu Christ pen zani, tuni, a tawntungin kibang ngitnget hi.

Christ in gimna thuakin, tua khit ciangin minthan'na a ngahna ding thu Khasiangtho in a gen ciangin, amaute sungah a om tua Christ' Khasiangtho in kua a cihna hi a, bang hun ciang hi ding hiam, ci-in a kankan uh pen tuhun thu a gen a hihi.
Note a hong sampa a siangtho ahih mah bangin note zong na gamtatna khempeuh uhah na siangtho un. 16 Laisiangtho sungah zong, "Keimah siangtho ka hih manin note zong na siangtho un," na kici hi.

Na pu na pate uh nuntakzia, bangmahin a kimanglo nuntakna panin a hong suahtaksakna dingin Pasian in note' man dingin a piak pen a man a kiam thei ngun leh khamte bang hilo a, 19 tuuno bangin paubaan'na a omlo, a manpha mahmah Christ, biakna-in a hong kipiakna tawh Pasian in note a hong suaktasak a hihi.

Christ mahmah in zong note-a' dingin thuakin, ama khekhap na zuihtheihna dingun etteh ding lim hong nusiat ahih manin hih bangin a thuakding mahin Pasian in note a hong sam a hihi. 22 Khialhna bangmah gamtalo a, zuau a genlam zong kiza ngeilo hi. 23 Amah a kizahko ciangin na ko thuklo hi. Gimna a thuak ciangin na tawnggawp lo a, a manin thu a khen Pasian muan'in a na nei hi.

Na lungsim sung uhah Christ zahtakbawl unla, amah Topa-in nei un. Note' lametna thu a hong dong a omkhak leh hoihtakin a genthei dingin kiging tawntung unla, ahi zongin lungnemna leh zahtakna lim tawh gen un.

Christ mahmah zong note-a' dingin si a, Pasian' kiangah hong tun'pih theihna dingin mihoih khat pen mihoihlote' mawhna hangin khatvei a si hi. Mite in ama leitung pumpi that a, ahi zongin Pasian in kha nuntakna a pia hi.
Tu-in vantungah tua Christ pai khin a, Pasian' taklamah omin, vantung mite leh ukna aana a neite khempeuh tungah a ukin a om hi.

Ka itte aw, note na khialhkhak lohna ding uh ka deihna-in hih lai a hong gelh ka hihi. Ahi zongin mi khatpeuh a khialh ciangin eite-a' dingin Pa Pasian kiangah a hong thumsak dingin a thuman Zeisu Christ i nei hi. 2 Tua Zeisu hangin eite' mawhna hong kimaisak a, eite-a' ding bek hiloin leitung mi khempeuh' mawhna zong a maina ding a hihi.
Ahi zongin Christ in note tungah Khasiangtho hong piakhin ahih manin note khempeuh in a man na thei uhhi.
Christ a siangtho mah bangin amah tawh kibat ding a lamen khempeuh in zong a nuntakna uh siangthosak ding hi.
Ka it tate aw, mite' khemsa-in ta kei un. Christ a thuman ahih mah bangin a manin a gamtate khempeuh a thuman a hihi.

Pasian' Tapa hong pai-in eite thu hong theisak ahih manin Pasian taktak a thei ihihna thu i thei hi. A Tapa Zeisu Christ tawh i kipawlna hangin Pasian taktak mah tawh a kipawlthei ihi hi. Tua Zeisu pen Pasian taktak mah hi a, nuntak tawntungna a piathei a hihi.
Christ' thuhilhna zuiloin a khengvalin a pai mite pen Pasian tawh a kipawllo a hihi. Ahi zongin a thuhilhna a zuite pen Pa Pasian leh a Tapa tawh a kipawl ahi uhhi.
A beisa hun, tuhun, leh mailam hunah zong a om tawntung ding a Vanglian Topa Pasian in, "Kei pen na khempeuh a Kipatna leh a Tawpna ka hi hi," a ci hi.

A gualzo mite in tua bangin puanpak silh ding uh a, a nungta mite a kikhumna laibu sung panin amaute' min ka phiat kei ding hi. Ka Pa leh ama vantung mite kiangah zong keima mite ahihna uh ka pulak ding hi.

Tua laizial phelin a sung a en dingin a kilawm kuamah kimulo ahih manin nakpi takin ka kap hi. 5 Tua laitakin upate khat in kei kiangah, "Kap kei in. Judah minam sung panin Humpinelkai, David suan sung panin a lianpa gualzo khinta a, tua laizial ciamtehna sagihte lakhia-in a laizial phelthei ding hi," a hong ci hi.

Tua ciangin vantung, leitung, leinuai, tuipi sung leh mun khempeuhah a om nuntakna a nei khempeuh in la a sakna uh ka za a, amaute in, "Tokhom tungah a tupa leh Tuuno in phatna, pahtawina, minthan'na leh vangliatna, ngah tawntung ta hen," a ci uhhi.
Tua ciangin Tuuno in tua ciamtehna sagih sung panin khat a hon'khiat ka mu hi. Tua laitakin ganhing lite sung panin khat in vanging bangin nakpi takin, "Hong pai in," a cihna ka za hi.

Tua ciangin leitung kumpite leh miliante, galkapmangte, mihaute leh mi vangliante, silate leh sila a hilote-a kipanin a kuamah peuh, mualtunga leihawmte sungah bu uh a, 16 mualte leh suangtum lianpite kiangah, "Kote tungah hong kiasuk unla, tokhom tungah a tupa' maitang leh Tuuno' hehna panin kote hong liah un. 17 Amaute' hehna hangin gimna hun hong tungta ahih manin kua in thuakzo ding ahi hiam?" a ci uhhi.

Tua ciangin vantung a kihong ka mu a, sakol kang khat a om hi. A tungah a tuangpa pen a Citak a Thumanpa kici hi. Amah in thumanin thu khenin gal a do hi. 12 A mittangte meikuang tawh kibang a, lukhu tampi a khu hi. Amah simloh kuamah dang in a theihloh min khat ama tungah a kigelh hi. 13 Sisan sungah a kidiah puantualpi khat silh a, amah pen, "Pasian' Thu," cihna min tawh a kisam hi. 14 Vantung galkapte a siangtho puanpak hoih tawh kizem uh a, sakol kangte tungah tuangin amah a zui uhhi. 15 Minam dangte a zawhgawpna ding namsau hiam khat a kam sung panin a pusuak hi. Amah in sik ciangkhut tawh minam dangte ukin, a Vanglian Pasian' heh mahmahna tawh leenggah cilna-ah leengtui a sukkhia ding hi. 16 A puan tung leh a phei tungah, "Kumpite' Kumpi, topate' Topa," ci-in a min kigelh hi.

Tua ciangin tokhom tungah a tu mi pawlkhat ka mu a, tua mite tungah thukhenna ding aana a kipia a hihi. Zeisu thu a genna leh Pasian thu hangin a kithat mite' kha zong ka mu hi. Tua mite in ganhing ahi a, a lim ahi zongin bialo uhhi; a taltang uhah ahi a, a khut tung uhah ahi zongin ganhing ciamtehna neilo uhhi. Amaute hong hingkik uh a, Christ tawh kum tul khat sung ukna aana a neikhawm uhhi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Kei ka hong pai baihta ding a, mi khempeuh a gamtatna uh tawh kizui-in a thaman ding uh ka hong puak ding hi.
"Keimah Zeisu in pawlpite-a' dingin hih thute nang kiangah a hong gen dingin ka vantung mi ka hong sawl hi. Kei pen David' zung leh a suan ahi, zingsol ka hi hi," a hong ci hi.

Egypt gam sungah Abram a tun' ciangin Egypt mite in tua nupi a mel hoihsa mahmah uhhi. 15 Faro' uliante in amah a muh uh ciangin Faro' kiangah amah phat uhhi. Faro' inn sungah tua nupi kila hi. 16 Tuanu' hangin amah in Abram limbawl mahmah hi. Amah in tuu, bawngtal, latal, pasal nasem, numei nasem, lanu, leh kalaohte a pia hi. 17 Ahih hangin { Topa } in Abram' zi Sarai' huhau-in Faro leh a innkuanpihte gimna lianpi thuaksak hi. 18 Tua ahih ciangin Faro in Abram samin, "Banghangin hih bangin kei hong bawl na hi hiam? Amah na zi ahihna Banghangin kei kiangah hong genlo na hi hiam? 19 Ka zi dingin amah ka lak theihna dingin, ‘Amah ka sanggamnu hi,’ banghangin hong ci na hi hiam? Tu-in hih lai-ah na zi om hi. Amah la in la pai un," a ci hi. 20 Faro in amah tawh kisai-in a mite tungah thu a pia hi. Amaute in a zi leh ama neih khempeuh tawh lampi-ah a khakhia uhhi.

a khuadaktoh leh, ama mai-ah mi thum na ding hi. Amah in amaute a muh ciangin amaute a dawn dingin puanbuk kong panin va tai a, leilakah kunsukin, 3 "Ka tote aw, nong hehpihna-un na sempa hong kheng kei un. 4 Na nasempa' kiang hong tung khin na hih khit buangun na thahat kikna dingun an tawmkhat ka va lak kikal sungin tui tawmkhat la sakin na khe uh sil unla, sing nuai-ah khawl un; tua khit ciangin paisuak un," a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute in, "Na cih bangin hong hih in," a ci uhhi. 5, 6 Tua ciangin puanbuk sunga Sarah kiangah Abraham pai mengmeng a, "Annel hoihte lawh thum hong bawl mengmeng in la, meek manin mohin hong bawl in," a ci hi. 7 Abraham zong bawnghon lakah tai-in bawngno a dawng a hoih khat la a, manlang taka a na bawlpah a nasempa tungah a pia hi. 8 Tua ciangin amah in, bawngnawithaukhal, bawngnawi, leh a minsa bawngsa la-in amau' mai-ah a lui hi. Amaute in a nek laitakun sing nuai-ah amau' kiangah amah a ding hi.

"Ka tote aw, kong thum hi. Na nasempa' inn lamah hong kihei-in hong giak unla, na khete uh sil un. Tua ciangin zingsangin tho baihin na paina ding lam uhah pai pan un," a ci hi. Amaute in, "Hilo hi; khua lakah ka giak ding uhhi," a ci uhhi.

Amah in, "Dawn in, ka topa," a ci hi. Tuanu in a khut tungah a beel niamsuk sakin amah a dawnsak hi. 19 Amah in tua mipa tui a dawnsak khit ciangin, "Na kalaohte in a kham matengun a dawn ding zong tui kong tawisak ding hi," a ci hi. 20 Tua ahih ciangin amah in a tuikuang sungah a tui bungsuk pak a, tuitawi dingin tuikhukah tai-in a kalaohte khempeuh-a' dingin tui a tawi hi.
Amah in, "Hong pai in, { Topa' } thupha piakpa aw; banghangin a pua-ah ding na hi hiam? Banghang hiam cihleh inn-ah na omna ding mun ka bawl khin a, kalaohte-a' ding mun zong om hi," a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amah in a mai phiatin hong paikhia hi. Amah ki-ip tawmin, "An hong pia un," a ci hi. 32 Amaute in Joseph amah guakin nesakin, amaute a tuam mahin nesak a, amah tawh a ne Egypt mite in a tuam mahin ne uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh Egypt mite in Hebrews mite tawh an nekhawm lo uhhi. Tua banga nekkhawm ding pen Egypt mite-a' dingin a kihhuai a hihi. 33 Ama mai-ah amaute a suakmasa a suah hun tawh kizui leh a moipen a khangnona tawh kizui-in tu uhhi. Lamdangsakna tawh amaute khatlekhat ki-en uhhi. 34 Joseph' sabuai tung panin amau' tanh ciat kipia-in, ahih hangin Benjamin' tanh pen amaute-a' zah nga pha hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute in an ne tui dawnin amah tawh lungdam uhhi.

Jacob in Faro thupha pia-in tua lai panin a paikhia hi. 11 Tua ciangin Faro' thupiaksa bangin Joseph in leitang a hoihpen, Rameses leitang, Egypt gam sungah neihsa pia-in a pa leh a sanggamte a tengsak hi. 12 Joseph in a pa, a sanggamte, leh a pa' innkuante khempeuh a ne ding zah tawh kizui-in an a pia hi.
Amah in a tanute kiangah, "Amah koi lai-ah om ahi hiam? Banghangin tua mipa nusia na hi uhhiam? Amah in an hong nek theihna dingin va sam un," a ci hi.
"Khualmi khatpeuh na bawlsia kei ding uh a, na nengniam kei ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh note zong Egypt leitangah khual mite na hi ngei uhhi.
"Khualmi na nengniam kei ding uhhi. Khualmi' lungsim na thei uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh note zong Egypt gamah khualmi na hi ngei uhhi.
"Na gamsung uhah note lakah khualmi khat hong peem leh, ama tungah a manloin na gamta kei ding uhhi.

Tua ciangin Jerikho kumpipa in Rahab kiangah mi sawlin, "Na inn sunga hong tum, na kianga hong tung mite hong paikhiatpih in; bang hang hiam cih leh gam khempeuh a en dingin amaute hong pai uhhi," a ci hi. 4 Ahih hangin Rahab in tua mi nihte la-in na seel khin hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in, "Hi mah hi, ka kiangah mi hong pai uhhi. Ahih hangin amaute koi pan hong pai uhhiam, cih ka thei kei hi. 5 Kulhkongpi a kikhak ding khuamial ciangin tua mite paikhia uh a, koi-ah pai uhhiam, cih ka thei kei hi. Manlangin amaute delh le uh cin na pha khading uhhi," a ci hi. 6 Ahih hangin amah in innkhum zangah tua mite paipih to-in innkhum zangah a koih ngei bangin a koihsa anthul kungte lakah amaute seel khin hi.

Khuapi leh a sunga omte khempeuh pen { Topa' } tungah biakna-in kisusia ding hi. Amah in i sawl kamtaite na seel ahih manin numei paktat Rahab leh ama inn sungah amah tawh a omkhawmte khempeuh bek hing ding hi.
Manoah in { Topa' } vantung mi kiangah, "Kong thum hi; tawlkhat khawl in la, nang-a' dingin keelno khat hong bawlsak nung," a ci hi.

Tua laitakin puteek khat lo-a a nasepna panin nitak ciangin hong ciah hi. Tuapa pen Efraim mualtung gam pan hi a, amah Gibeah khua-ah a peem hi a, tua khuamite pen Benjamin mite a hihi. 17 Amah khuadak a, khualzinpa, khuapi kongzingah a mu hi. Tua ciangin puteekpa in, "Koi-ah pai ding na hi hiam? Koi panin hong pai na hi hiam?" a ci hi. 18 Amah in, "Keima hong paikhiatna Judah gam Bethlehem khua panin Efraim mualtung gam mongah a pai dingin hong nawk ka hi uhhi. Judah gam Bethlehem-ah ka pai hi. Tu-in ka inn-a a ciah ka hihi. Kuamah in a inn-ah hong tungsak nuamlo hi. 19 Ka late uh-a' dingin buhtu leh gan-an, kei leh na nasemnu leh na nasemte tawh a om tangvalpa-a' dingin anlum leh leenggahzu ka nei uh a, a kisam bangmah omlo hi," a ci hi. 20 Tua ciangin puteekpa in, "Lunghimawh kei in. Na kisapna khempeuh ka en ding hi. Kongzingah giak kei hamtang in," a ci hi. 21 Tua ahih ciangin amah in a inn-ah ciahpihin late gan-an a pia hi. Amaute in a khe uh silin an a ne uhhi.

Amaute in Egypt mi khat gamlakah mu uh a, David kiangah amah paipih uhhi. Amaute in an pia uh a, amah in ne hi. Amaute in tui dawn ding zong a pia uhhi. 12 Theimoh khat leh leenggahkeu bawk nih zong a pia uhhi. Amah in tuate a nek khit ciangin a tha hong dimkik hi. Banghang hiam cihleh an ahi a, tui ahi zongin sun thum leh zan thum nelo dawnloin om hi. 13 Tua ciangin David in ama kiangah, "Nang kuate na hi hiam? Koi pan na hi hiam?" a ci hi. Amah in, "Kei pen Amalek-te khat' nasem, Egypt mi tangval khat ka hihi. Tuma ni thum lai-in ka ci na ahih manin ka topa in hong nusia hi.

Tua ahih ciangin amah dingin Zarefath-ah a pai hi. Khuapi kulhkongpi a tun' ciangin, meigongnu khat in sing na tom hi. Amah in tuanu samin, "Ka dawn theihna dingin beel khat sungah tui tawm hong paipih in," a ci hi. 11 Tuanu in paipih dingin a kisak laitakin, amah in tuanu samin, "Anlum neu khat hong tawi kawm in," a ci hi. 12 Tua ciangin amah in, "{ Topa } na Pasian a nungta ahih mah bangin emsa bangmah ka nei kei a, beel sungah annel khutdim khat leh um sungah sathau tawmno khat bek om hi. Tu-in keimah leh ka tapa-a' dingin tuate bawlin kote in ka nek theihna dingun singkang nih khawng a tom ka hi a, tua ciangin a si ta ding ka hi uhhi," a ci hi. 13 Tua ciangin Elijah in ama kiangah, "Lunghimawh kei in; pai in la na gensa bangin an hong bawl in. Kei-a' dingin mohneu khat hong bawlsak masa-in kei kiangah hong paipih in la, tua khit ciangin nang leh na tapa-a' ding bawl in. 14 Bang hang hiam cih leh Israel Pasian, { Topa } in hih bangin ci hi: ‘{ Topa } in leitungah guah a zuksak ni matengin beel sunga annel beilo ding a, um sunga sathau zong kiam ngeilo ding hi,’ ci hi," a ci hi.

Ni khat Shunem-ah Elisha paisuak a, tua lai-ah a hau numei khat tengin tuanu in anne dingin amah a sam hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in tua lam a nawk peuhpeuh ciangin anne dingin tua lai-ah baang zel hi.

Tua ciangin Elisha in amaute kiangah, "Hih pen a lampi hilo a, hih zong a khuapi hilo hi; hong zui un; na zon' uh mipa kiangah note kong paipih ding hi," a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in Samaria-ah amaute a paipih hi. 20 Amaute Samaria-ah a lut phetin Elisha in, "{ Topa } aw, amaute in a muh theihna dingun hih mite' mitte hon'sak in," a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin { Topa } in amau' mitte hon'sak a, tua ciangin amaute in khua mu uhhi. Samaria khua sungah a om ahihna uh thei uhhi. 21 Israel kumpipa in amaute a muh ciangin amah in Elisha kiangah, "Ka pa aw, amaute ka that ding hiam? Amaute ka that ding hiam?" a ci hi. 22 Amah in dawngin, "Amaute na that kei ding hi. Na namsau leh na thal tawh loin galmatin na laksate that ding na hi hiam? Amaute in an ne-in tui a dawn khit ciangin a topa uh kiangah a ciahkik theihna dingun amaute' mai-ah an leh tui lui in," a ci hi. 23 Tua ahih ciangin amah in amaute-a' dingin pawi lianpi khat bawl hi. Amaute in an ne-in tui a dawn khit uh ciangin amaute sawlkhia a, tua ciangin a topa uh kiangah amaute a ciah uhhi. Tua ciangin Israel gam a sim dingin Syria-te hong pai nawnlo uhhi.
Kiim leh pama minam dangte' kiang pan hong paite banah, nisimin ka sabuai-ah an a ne, thukhente leh Jew mi a kihelin leengla za leh sawmnga bang ka nei den hi.
Khualzin mi khempeuh ka inn-ah ka tungsak tawntung a, kongzing lakah amaute ka lumsak ngei kei hi.
{ Topa } in, "Mizawngte a neihsa kihawkkhia a, mi cimawhte thumin tau uh ahih ciangin tu-in dingin, amau' lunggulh, lungmuan'na munah amaute ka koih ding hi," a ci hi.

Pilna in a inn lam a, a innkhuampi sagih a phut hi. 2 Amah in pawi bawl dingin sa go-in leenggahzu khaih a, annekna ding sabuai a bawl hi. 3 Khuasung munsang khempeuh panin mi a sam dingin a nasem numeite sawl a, 4 "Thu theilote aw, hong pai un," ci-in samsak a, mihaite kiangah, 5 "Hong pai unla, ka an huansa ne-in, ka bawlsa leenggahzu hong dawn un.
Mizawngte tungah a piate in { Topa' } tungah a pia hi a, { Topa } in a cingin amaute tungah lohkik ding hi.
Sathau namtui leh paknamtui in lung nuamsak a, lawmte' limbawlna in tha hatsak hi.
A zawng mite tungah amah cingh mahmah a, a cimawh mite tungah huhna a pia hi.
Na an uh a gilkialte tawh nekhawm unla, inn neilo a zawngte na innsung uhah paipihin, tangguakin a om mite puan silhsakin, na mipihte uh kiang panin bu lo ding hilo na hi uhhiam?
Na sanggamnu' mawhna pen: Amah leh a tanute in nek ding tampi nei-in nuamsa mahmahin, daitakin om uh ahih manin amaute kiphasak uh a, a zawng a cimawhte donlo uhhi.
Midangte in na gamtatna hoihte uh a muh ciangin vantungah a om na Pa uh min a phat theihna dingun mite mai-ah na gamtat hoihna uh khuavak bangin na kilangsak un.

"Note in, ‘Na vengte uh na it unla, na galte uh na mudah un,’ ci-in a kigenna thu na zaksa uh a hihi. 44 Ahi zongin ke'n note kiangah kong genin-ah: Na galte uh na it unla, no hong bawlsiate-a' dingin thu na ngetsak un.

"Biakna tawh kizomin na hoih khat peuhpeuh na sep uh ciangin mite' phat ding deihna tawh a kilang theithei dingin na sepkhak lohna dingun na kingaihsun un. Tua bangin gamta le uh cin, vantungah a om na Pa uh kiang panin thaman na ngah kei ding uhhi. 2 "Tua ahih manin mi cimawhte tungah huhna na piak uh ciangin, mite in a phat ding uh a deihna tawh a kineihkhem mite in kikhopna innsung leh kongzing lakah a kilang theithei-in a hih uh bangin na hih kei un. Tua bangin a hih mite in thaman a ngah khinta ahihna thu limtakin na phawk un. 3 Ahi zongin note in mi cimawhte citna tawh na huh uh ciangin na lawm naihuai pente uh nangawn in hong theihlohna dingun pia unla,
Tua ahih manin note tungah hong kibawl ding na deih bangun midangte tungah na bawl un. Moses Thukhamte leh kamsangte' thuhilhnate pen hih mah a deihna a hihi.
Zeisu in Matthew' inn-ah nitak an a nek laitakin siahdong dangte leh thukham a khial midang tampite in zong Zeisu leh a nungzuite tawh an a nekhawm uhhi.

"Khuapi ahi a, khuaneu ahi zongin khua khat peuhpeuh na tun' uh ciangin tua khuasungah note zin hong tungsak nuam kua om ahi hiam, ci-in zong unla, na muh uh ciangin tuate' inn-ah tungin, tua khua na nusiat mateng uh tua lai mahah omsuak pah un.12 Inn khat peuhpeuhah na lut uh ciangin a mite hopihin thupha na pia un.13Tua na hopihna uh innsunga mite in note hong tun'saknop leh na hopihna thupha uh amaute tungah kip ding a, ahi zongin hong tun'saknop kei uh leh na hopihna thupha uh na dokkik ding uhhi. 14 Inn khat peuhpeuh in ahi a, khua khat peuhpeuh in ahi zongin note hong tun'saknop kei a, na thugen uh hong ngaihnop kei leh tua lai panin paikhia unla, na khe uha leivui bangte sin'khiat un. 15 Thukhen ni ciangin tua khuamite' thuakna sangin Sodom khua leh Gomorrah khuamite' thuakna olzaw lai ding ahihna thu hoihtakin phawk un.

"Na thugen uh a hong sangte in kei' thu a hong sang hi a, kei a hong sangte in kei a hong sawlpa zong a sang ahi uhhi. 41 Pasian' thugen ahihna hangin Pasian' thugen mi a sangte in Pasian' thugente' thaman ngah ding a, mihoih hihna hangin mihoih a sang mite in mihoihte' thaman ngah ding uhhi. 42 Keima nungzui mi a neupen khat nangawn, keima nungzui ahihna hangin tuivot hai khat bek a suahte nangawn in pelloin thaman a ngah ding lamtak phawk un," ci-in a vaikhak hi.

Vantung ki-ukna zia pen a tapa-a' dingin mo pawi a bawl kumpipa' gamtatzia tawh kibang hi. 3 Mo pawi siim dingin a khohsa mite a sam dingin a nasemte sawl a, ahi zongin kuamah pailo hi. 4 Tua ciangin nasem dangte sawl leuleu a, ‘Ka khohsaksa mite kiangah hih bangin va gen un: Ka bawngtalte leh ka bawngno thaute kigo khin a, nitak an a minsa-in a om banah, na khempeuh a mansa-in om khinta hi. Mo pawi an ne dingin hong pai ta un, ci hi, ci-in va gen un,’ a ci hi. 5 Ahi zongin a khohsa mite in na thusimlo uh a, pawlkhat in lo na kuansanin, pawlkhat in a sumbukah na paisanin, 6 adangte in a nasemte manin a na satgawp khit uh ciangin a na that uhhi. 7 Kumpipa zong heh mahmah a, a galkapte kuansakin tua mi thatte a thahsak khit ciangin a khua a haltumsak hi. 8 Tua ciangin a nasemte kiangah, ‘Mo pawi an a baihsa-in om a, ahi zongin ka sap mite a ne dingin a kilawmlo mi a suak uhhi. 9 Tua ahih manin lamlianpi-ah va pai unla, mi na muh zahzah uh hong sam un,’ a ci hi. 10 Nasemte zong lamlianpi-ah va pai uh a, mihoih mi hoihlo ciloin a muh khempeuh uh va kaikhawm uh ahih manin mo pawi bawlna innsung dimin leengla hong om hi.

Tua ciangin Kumpipa in a taklamah a om mite kiangah, ‘Ka Pa in thupha a piak mite aw, hong pai ta un. Leitung piancila kipanin note-a' dingin a kibawlkholsa gamnuam hong luah un. 35 Bang hang hiam cih leh ka gilkial laitakin an nong pia uh a, ka dangtak laitakin tui nong pia uh a, khualmi ka hih laitakin zin nong do uh a, 36 puan neiloin ka om laitakin puan nong guan' uh a, ka cinat laitakin nong veh uh a, ka thongkiat laitakin nong hawh uhhi,’ a ci ding hi.

"Tua ciangin a veilamah a om mite kiangah, ‘Pasian in a samsiat mite aw, keima kiang panin paikhia un la, Dawimangpa leh a nungzuite-a' dingin a kibawl meikuang tawntung sungah pai un. 42 Bang hang hiam cih leh ka gilkial laitakin an nong pia kei uh a, ka dangtak laitakin tui nong pia kei uh a, 43 khualmi ka hih laitakin zin nong do kei uh a, puan ka neihloh laitakin puan nong guan' kei uh a, ka cinat laitakin nong veh kei uh a, ka thongkiat laitakin nong hawh kei uhhi,’ a ci ding hi.
Christ pawl na hihna hangun tui hai khat hong suah mi peuhmah in thaman ngah hamtang ding ahihna phawk un," ci-in Zeisu in a gen hi.
Pharisee mite khat in a inn-ah anne dingin Zeisu sam a, Zeisu zong pai-in anne dingin a tu hi.
Nasemte in a thaman a ngahding a kilawm ahih mah bangin na zintun'na inn mah uhah omsuak unla, a hong piak peuhpeuh uh na ne un. Na zintun'na inn uh kheel themthum kei un.
Ahi zongin khua khat peuhpeuhah na lut uh ciangin note hong tun'saknop kei leh a khuasung kongzingah pai unla,

Tua laitakin siampi khat tua lampi tawnin hong paisuk a, amah a muh ciangin lamnawl lam tawnin a paisan hi. 32 Tua ciangin Levi mi khat zong tua mah bangin hong pai a, amah a muh ciangin lamnawl lam tawnin a paisan leuleu hi. 33 Ahi zongin Samaria mi khualzin khat, tua lai mun hong tungin a liampa a muh ciangin hehpihhuaisa a, 34 a kiangah va pai-in a liammate sathau leh leenggahzu a nuhsak khit ciangin a tunsak hi. Tua ciangin a la tungah tuangsak a, zintun' inn khatah paipihin tua lai-ah a khoi hi. 35 A zingsang ciangin zintun' inn neipa kiangah sum peek nih pia a, ‘Hih mipa limtakin na khoi in. Na beina dang khempeuh, kong paikik ciangin kong loh ding hi,’ ci hi. 36 Hih mihing thumte sung panin, a kisuampa-a' dingin a koi pen a vengpa hi dingin na um hiam?" a ci hi. 37 Amah in, "A hehpihpa hi ding hi," a ci hi. Tua ciangin Zeisu in ama kiangah, "Nang zong pai in la, tua bangmahin gamta in," a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Zeisu in a nungzuite kiangah, "Note khatpeuh, na lawmte uh khat inn-ah zankim laitakin pai-in, ‘Lawm aw, anlum lum thum khawng hong leitawi sak in.6 Ka lawmte khat zin hong tung a, ka piakding ka nei het kei hi,’ ci le uh cin,

Tua ciangin Zeisu in a innteekpa kiangah, "Sun-an nekna-ah ahi a, nitak-an nekna-ah ahi zongin mi na sap ciangin, na lawmte ahi a, na sanggamte ahi a, na behte ahi a, mihau na vengte ahi zongin sam kei in. Amaute in zong anne ding mahin nang hong samkik ding uh a, hih bangin hong sapna hangin na anvakna thaman a ngahkik na hi ding hi. 13 Tua bangin anvakna pawi na bawl ciangin mizawngte, khezawte, khebaite, leh mittawte sam in. 14 Amaute in nang hong thukkik zolo ding uh ahih manin nang-a' dingin a lungdamhuai hong hi ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh sihna panin mihoihte a thawhkik hun ciangin Pasian in nang tungah hong thukkik ding hi," a ci hi.

Zeisu, tua mun a tun' ciangin khuadak to-in ama kiangah, "Zakkhias aw, manlangin hong kumsuk in. Na inn-ah tuzan kong taam ding hi," a ci hi. 6 Tua ahih manin Zakkhias zong hong kum mengmeng a, lungdam mahmahin a inn-ah Zeisu a tungsak hi.
ahi zongin amaute gel in kho-in, "Tu-in nitak lam hita a, ni tum dektak ahih manin ko tawh hong tamkhawm in," a ci uhhi. Tua ahih manin Zeisu zong amaute tawh a tam hi.

Zeisu in nasemte kiangah, "Tua thambelpite sungah tui a dimin koih un," ci-in a sawl mah bangin a dim sitsetin tui a koih uhhi. 8 Tua ciangin Zeisu in, "Tu-in tui pawlkhat suak un la, zuphungpa kiangah va paipih un," a ci hi. Amaute in zong tua mah bangin a va paipih uhhi. 9 Zuphungpa in leenggahzu a suak tui a ciap ciangin, (tui a sung nasemte in a theih hangin) koi panin kingah ahi hiam, ci-in theilo ahih manin zinei tangvalpa samin, 10 "Midangte in leenggahzu khumte hawm masakin nei uh a, mite in a khamgawp khit uh ciangin a ngeinate hawm pan uhhi. Ahi zongin nangmah in a khum pen teng tudong na sitlai hi," a ci hi.
Amaute in nitak an na vak uh a, Lazaras ahih leh Zeisu tawh an ne-in tukhawmin, Martha pen anpia-in a manlah hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in amaute kiangah, "Hong pai un; zing an ne ni," a ci hi. Amah pen Topa ahih lamtak thei uh ahih manin, "Nang kua na hi hiam?" ci-in a nungzuite khat beek in dong ngamlo uhhi.
Nisimin biakinn-ah kikhawm uh a, a innte uhah an nekhawmin, lungdamna leh kiniamkhiatna tawh a ne ciat uhhi.
Tua mipa pen, tuipi gei-a teng savunnim nasepin a nei Simon's inn-ah zin tungin a om ahi hi," a ci hi.
Peter a gil kialin an duh mahmah hi. A zinte in an a huanhuan laitakin Peter in maang a mu hi.

Tua ka thuhilhna uh a za mite lakah Thiatira khuami, a manpha mahmah puansan a zuak, Lydia kici numei khat a om hi. Tuanu pen Pasian a bia numei khat hi a, Paul' thugente a sangthei dingin Pasian in a lungsim a hon'sak hi. 15 Amah leh a innsunga om mi khempeuh tui kiphum uh a, "Topa thu a um mi taktak hi, ci-in na hong ngaihsut nak uh leh hong pai unla, ka inn-ah hong tung un," ci-in hong samin a hong zol hi.
Tua ciangin a inn-ah amaute ciahpihin an a pia hi. Tu-in Pasian thu um uh ahih manin amah-a kipan a innkuanpih khempeuh a lungdam mahmah uhhi.
A zingciangin ding leuleu-in Sisaria khua ka tung uh a, Pasian thu a hilh Philip' inn-ah tungin tua lai-ah ka taam uhhi. Tuapa pen Jerusalem khua-a a kiteel mi sagihte sungah a kihel a hihi.
Tua lai-a teng mite ko tungah hong nuam mahmah uhhi. Guahzu-in khua dam mahmah ahih manin meiphualpi hong cihsak uh a, limtakin zin hong do uhhi.
Tua lai panin a gamlalo mun khatah tua tuikulh hausapa Publias' lo a om hi. Amah in limtakin kote zin hong do a, ni thum sung ama zinin ka om uhhi.
Na Christianpihte uh a kisapna bangin na neihsate uh na hawm unla, zin leh leengla do a siam mite na hita un.

Tua ahih ciangin Laisiangtho sungah, "Na galte uh a gil a kial leh an na pia un. A dang a taak leh tui na pia un. Tua bangin na gamtat uh leh amaute' maizumna dingin a bawl na hi uhhi," ci-in a kigelh bangin gamtazaw un.

Khatlekhat ki-it ding cih lohbuang, kuama tungah leiba nei kei un. Midang a itte in Thukham deihna teng a zuikhin a hihi. 9 Thukham sungah, "Nulepa mawhna bawl kei in, mi that kei in, guta kei in, hazatna lungsim nei kei in," cihna leh adang khempeuhte pen, "Nang na ki-it bangin na vengte na it in," cihna thu in huam khinmang hi. 10 Midangte a it mi peuhmah in amaute tungah siatna bawl hetlo ahih manin itna i neih ciangin Thukham buppi a zui khinta ihi hi.

Note in lungsim kikhatin i Topa Zeisu Christ' Pa ahi Pasian na phatkhawm theihna dingun Pasian in thuakzawhna leh thahatna hong pia hen la, Zeisu Christ deihna bangin gamta-in khatlekhat kithutuak takin hong omsak ta hen. 6, 7 Tua ahih ciangin Christ in note hong san' mah bangin midangte in Pasian a phattheihna dingun note khatlekhat na kisang un.

Amah pen keimah-a kipan mi tampi-a' dingin lawm hoih mahmah khat ahih manin, Pasian' mite in a hih dingin a kilawm ahih mah bangin Topa' thu sungah mihoihin na sang unla, note' huhding a kisapna khempeuhah hoihtakin na huh un.
Keima zintun'napa leh pawlpite' kikhopna inn neipa zong ahi Gaias in zong hong hopih hi. Ka omna khuapi sumkempa Erastas leh i Christian sanggam Kuartas in zong hong hopih uhhi.
Topa' nasepna sungah a kikhai mahmah Rufas, leh ta bangin kei a hong bawl tawntung ama nu zong na hopih sak un.

Note kiangah Titus a hong paina ding ka hahsawl a, amah tawh a kithuah dingin thu upna sungah ka sanggampa uh zong ka hong paisak hi. Titus in nuamtaksa-in note tungah bang hong ngen zenzen ahi hiam? Kote in lungsim kibangin na semin ka kalsuanna zia uh zong a kibang hilo ahi hiam?

Ka pumpi cidam lohna pen note-a' dingin thu haksapi hinapi-in kei na hong simmawhbawl tuan kei uh a, zong na hong nolh tuan kei uhhi. Vantung panin a hong pai vantung mi zin do bang, leh Christ Zeisu mahmah zin a do bangin na hong limbawl uhhi.

Sanggamte aw, note ahih leh a suakta mi ahi dingin Pasian in a hong sap a hihi. Ahi zongin tua suahtakna pen na pumpi uh ut bangbangin gamtat theihna dingin paulam zon'na-in nei kei unla, itna tawh khatlekhat kikhualna-in zangzaw un. 14 Banghang hiam cihleh Thukham khempeuh thu khatin kigawm thei a, "Nangmah na ki-it bangin na vengte na it in," cihna tawh kilomlak thei hi.
Ahi zongin Khasiangtho' sawlna bangin gamtatnate pen: Itna, lungdamna, lungnopna, lungduaina, migitna, hoihna, cihtakna,
Tua ahih ciangin hunhoih i ngah simin midangte tungah a hoihin i gamta ding a, a diakdiakin thu upna sungah i innkuanpihte khempeuh tungah i hoih gamtatding i phawk ding hi.
Eite a hong bawlpa pen Pasian hi a, Zeisu Christ tawh i kipawl ciangin i nuntakna-ah gamtat hoih a nei dingin a hong bawl ihi hi. Hih pen eite' omzia dingin a na ngaihsut kholhsa a hihi.
khatlekhat kihehpihin, lungsim neem tawh na kihozaw unla, Christ' hangin Pasian in note' mawhna hong maisak mah bangin khatlekhat na mawhna uh na kimaisak ta un.
Mihingte' na a sem bang lelin kingaihsun loin Topa' na a sem bangin kingaihsun unla, thanopna tawh sem un.

Na khempeuh phunlo, thu nialloin sem un. 15 Tua hi leh a lungsim kawi, a hoihlo leitung mite lakah paubaan'na a neilo a siangtho, Pasian' tate na hi ding uh a, nuntakna thu na genna uh hangin leitung mite lakah khuavak bangin na hoihna uh a kilang mite na hi ding uhhi.

Mite' nasem bangin kingaihsun loin, Pasian' nasem bangin kingaihsun unla, na sep peuhpeuh uh lungsim takpi tawh lawpin sem un. 24 Topa in note tungah thaman a hong piakding lamtak phawk gige un. Tua bangin na sepna uhah Christ Topa' na a semsem na hi uhhi.
Note kiangah ka hong pai lai-un kote na hong limbawlna thu uh, leh a nungta a man Pasian' thu zui-in a bia ding,
Tua ahih manin siate pen paubaan'na a neilo mi, zi khat bek a nei mi, lungsim hoih hithiat mi, thu a ngaihsun thei mi, a kilawm a kituakin a gamta mi, zin leh leengla do a siam mi, thuhilh a siam mi,

Tua banah a gamtat hoihna a kitheite, a tate hoihtakin a khan'suahsate, a inn-ah zin leh leengla do a siam mite, kiniamkhiatin Pasian' mite' khe a silsakte, a lungkham mite a huhte, leh thu khempeuhah a hoih gamtat mite hi lai ding uhhi.

Pawlpi siate pen Pasian' nasem ahih manin paubaan'na a omlo, a kiphasaklo, zukham thei mi a hilo, a ngongtatlo, a huaihamlo, 8 zinleleeng do a siam mi, thuhoih a deih mi, a pumpi a ki-ukzo mi, a thutang mi, a siangtho mi, leh a kisekzo mi hi ding uhhi.

Pawlpi siate pen Pasian' nasem ahih manin paubaan'na a omlo, a kiphasaklo, zukham thei mi a hilo, a ngongtatlo, a huaihamlo, 2 Khualmite hoihtakin zin na do ding uh na phawk un. Mi pawlkhat in vantung mite zindo ahihlam a phawklopi-in a do na hi gige uhhi.
Khatlekhat tungah thuhoih kibawlin na kihuh ding uh mangngilh kei un. Hihbang gamtatnate pen Pasian a lungkimsak thei biakna a hihi.
Numei paktat Rahab zong tua bangmah a hihi. Israel mi thukante hoihtakin zin na do-in, lampi dangah ciahsakin na suaktasak a, ama nasepna hangin Pasian tawh kipawl theihna a ngah a hihi.
Khatlekhat maitaii takin zinleleeng na kido un.

Ka hong it lawm Gaias aw, na theih ngeiloh hinapi-in i Christian mipihte lungsim takpi tawh na na huh hi. 6 Amaute na limbawlna thu, hih lai-a pawlpite kiangah hong gen uhhi. I biak Pasian' deihna tawh kituakin a khualzinna uh nuamtakin a zoptheihna dingun na huh in. 7 Amaute pen Pasian' nasem dingin a khualzin khia uhhi a, thu umlo mite tung panin bangmah huhna ngahlo uhhi. 8 Tua ahih manin Pasian thuman nasepna-ah nasem khawm mite ihih theihna dingin ei Christian-te in hihbang mite i huh ding a hihi.

Noah pen lo kho masapa hi a, amah in leenggui lo khat a bawl hi. 21 Amah in leenggahzu ne-in kham a, a puanbuk sungah bangmah silh loin a lum hi. 22Kanaan' pa Ham in a pa guaktangin a omna mu a, a pualama om a sanggam nihte kiangah a gen hi. 23 Tua ciangin Shem leh Jafeth in puan khat la-in amaute gel' liangko tuakah baang uh a, a nung leh lamun pai-in a pa uh' guaktang omna a khuh uhhi. Amaute in maingat lo uh ahih manin a pa uh guaktang omna mulo uhhi. 24 Noah a zukhamna panin a pilvan' ciangin ama tungah a tapa Ham' gamtatna thei a,25 amah in, "Kanaan in samsiatna ngah ta hen la, a sanggamte' sila hi ta hen. 26 { Topa } ka Pasian in Shem thupha pia hen la, Kanaan, ama sila hisak hen.
Tua ciangin Jerusalem kumpipa Melkhizedek in an leh leenggahzu hong pusuah hi. Amah pen Sang Pen Pasian' siampi zong a hihi.

A u pen in a nau tungah, "I pa lah teek ta a, leitung ngeina bangin eite hong luppih ding pasal khat zong omlo hi. 32 Hong pai in; i pa leenggahzu khamsak ni; i pa tawh suanlekhak i kizopsak theihna dingin amah tawh lumkhawm ni," a ci hi. 33 Tua ahih ciangin amaute in tua nitakin a pa uh leenggahzu khamsak uhhi. A unu pai-in a pa tawh lum hi. A tanu a luplam hita leh a thawhlam hita leh amah in phawklo hi. 34 A zingciangin a u in a nau tungah, "En in, zan zanin i pa tawh ka lum hi. Tu nitakin zong amah leenggahzu khamsak leuleu ni. Tua ciangin nang pai in la, i pa tawh suanlekhak i kizopsak theihna dingin amah tawh lumkhawm in," a ci hi. 35 Tua ahih ciangin amaute in tua nitakin zong a pa uh leenggahzu khamsak uhhi. A nau pai-in amah tawh lum hi. A tanu a luplam hita leh a thawhlam hita leh amah in phawklo hi. 36 Tua ahih ciangin Lot' tanute gel in a pa uh tawh naupaii uhhi.

Tua ciangin amah in, "Ka tapa nangma sa matsa ne-in thupha kong piak theihna dingin ka kiangah hong paipih in," a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in a kiangah paipih a, amah in a ne hi. Amah in leenggahzu paipihin, amah in a dawn hi.
Pasian in na tungah vantung daitui hong pia hen la, na lote hoihsak ta hen. An leh leenggahzu tampi hong pia ta hen.

{ Topa } in Aaron kiangah, 9 "Nang hita leh na tapate hita leh kikhopna bukah na pai uh ciangin leenggahzu hita leh khamtheih zu hita leh ne kei un. Na nek uh leh na si ding uhhi. Tua pen na suan na khakte uh tungah khang tawntungin ngeina kip khat hi ding hi.10Note in a siangtho leh a mawkmawk, leh a nin leh a siang na khen ding uhhi.
leenggahzu leh khamtheihzu nelo ding hi. Leenggahzu leh khamtheihzu pan a kibawl tuithuk dawnlo ding a, leenggahtui khat peuhpeuh dawnloin, leenggah a hing hita leh a keu hita leh nelo ding hi.
"Sathau limci pen khempeuh, leh leenggahzu leh an a limci pen khempeuh, { Topa' } tungah amau' piak anpalte, note' tungah kong pia hi.
Leenggahzu tawh a biakna pen tuuno khat ciangin hai khat hi ding hi. { Topa' } tungah leenggahzucil tawh biakna pen siangtho munah na sung ding uhhi.

Amah in note hong itin, tampi hong phasak ding hi. Amah in note tungah piak dingin na pu na pate uh tungah a ciam gam sungah note' suanlekhakte leh na gamsung panun a piangte, na an uh leh na leenggahzu uh leh na sathau uh, leh na ganhingte uh pungsakin, na tuulekeelno honte uh zong thupha pia ding hi.

na deih peuhpeuh uh bawng ahi a, tuu ahi a, leenggahzu ahi a, khamtheihzu ahi zongin, na duh peuhpeuh uh leina-in a sum na zang ding uhhi. { Topa } na Pasian uh mai tua lai munah na ne ding uh a, note leh na innkuanpihte uh na lungdam ding uhhi.
amaute in a khuapi upate kiangah, ‘Hih ka tapa uh lungkhauhin hong langpang thei a, amah in ka thu uh hong manglo a, an hai, zu hai bek ahi hi,’ ci ding uhhi.
{ Topa } pen na Pasian uh ahihna na theihna dingun nek ding anlum, leh dawn ding leenggahzu ahi a, khamtheih zu ahi zongin na ne nai kei uh a, ahi zongin na kisapna teng uh hong pia hi.
Bawnghon panin bawngnawi thaukhal, tuuhon panin tuunawi, tuunote leh tuutalte' thau tawh, Bashan bawnghonte leh keelte, mangbuh hoihpente tawh leenggahtui san na dawn uhhi.
Amau' leenggahzu pen gulpi gu leh a gupha gul gunei gu tawh kibang hi.
Ahih hangin leenggui in amaute kiangah, ‘Keimah in pasian-te leh mite a lungnuamsak ka leenggahzu nusia-in singkungte a uk dingin hong pai ding ka hi hiam?’ ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin kidawm in la, leenggahzu ahi a, khamtheihzu ahi zongin neloin, a nin bangmah ne kei in.

Ahih hangin amah in kei kiangah, ‘En in, nang gai-in tapa khat na nei ding hi. Tua ahih ciangin leenggahzu ahi a, khamtheihzu ahi zongin ne kei in la, a nin bangmah ne kei in. Banghang hiam cihleh naupang pen a suaha kipan a sih dong Pasian' tungah Nazir mi hi ding hi,’ hong ci hi," a ci hi.
Amah in leenggui pana piang peuhmah ne theilo ding a, leenggahzu ahi a, khamtheihzu ahi zongin ne theiloin, a nin na khat peuhpeuh ne theilo ding hi; amah ka thupiak khempeuh tang hen," a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Eli in ama kiangah, "Bang tanvei zu kham ding na hi hiam? Na leenggahzu nek khawl in," a ci hi. 15 Ahih hangin Hannah in dawngin, "Hilo hi, ka topa aw; kei pen nakpi takin a lungkham numei ka hihi. Leenggahzu ahi a, khamtheihzu ahi zongin ka ne kei a, { Topa' } mai-ah ka lungsim a sungkhia ka hihi.

Tua ciangin Nabal kiangah Abigail hong tungkik hi. Kumpipa' pawi tawh kibangin amah in a inn sungah pawi na kham hi. Nabal lungnuam mahmah hi. Banghang hiam cihleh amah in zu kham mahmah hi. Tua ahih ciangin zingsang khuavak mateng ama kiangah bangmah gen peuhmahlo hi. 37 Zingsang ciang, Nabal' zukhamna a ven' ciangin a zi in ama kiangah hih thute gen a, thakhatin a lungtang si-in amah suangtum bang hi. 38 Tua khit ni sawm bang ciangin { Topa } in Nabal vat a, amah a si ta hi.
David in amah samin ama omna-ah zu leh an nesak a, amah zu khamsak hi. A nitak ciangin amah a lum dingin a topa' nasemte tawh paikhia a, ahih hangin ama inn-ah ciahsuk tuanlo hi.

Tua ciangin Absalom in a nasemte thu pia a, "Ammon in zu a kham hun phawk unla, note kiangah, ‘Ammon sat un,’ kong cih ciangin amah that un. Lau kei un; note thu hong pia khin hilo ka hi hiam? Hang unla, thahat un," a ci hi.

Judah kumpi Asa' kum sawmnihlegukna kumin Baasha' tapa Elah in Tirzah panin Israel tungah uk ding kipan a, kum nih sung uk hi. 9 Ahih hangin ama leengte alang a ukpa ama nasem Zimri in amah sawmsim hi. Tirzah-a kumpi innsung a ukpa Arza' inn-ah zukhamin Tirzah-ah a om laitak, 10 Judah kumpi Asa' kum sawmnihlesagihna kumin Zimri hong pai-in Elah sattukin that a, ama tangin a uk hi.
Bukte sungah kumpite tawh zu ne-in Benhadad a om laitakin hih thu a zak ciangin amah in a mite kiangah, "Pan'mun la un," a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute in khuapi a simgawp dingin pan'mun a la uhhi.
Tua ciangin Benhadad, bukte sungah amah a huh kumpi sawmthumlenihte tawh zukhamin a om laitak sun hunin amaute kuankhia uhhi.

Kham hai nam tuamtuamte tawh zu kihawm a, kumpipa' hauhna tawh kituakin deihdeihin zu kizang hi. 8 Tua lai-ah zu nekna zia pen kihah piak cih omlo hi; banghang hiam cihleh mi khempeuh in amau' duh zahzah bek a neksakna ding uh kumpipa in a nuai-a a uliante thu pia hi. 9 Tua banah Kumpinu Vashti in zong numeite-a' dingin Kumpipa Ahasueras' innsung mahah pawi khat a bawl hi.10 A ni sagih ni, zunekna hangin a lung a nop ciangin kumpipa in ama na a sem innsungmang sagihte Mehuman, Biztha, Harbona, Bigtha, Abagtha, Zethar, leh Karkas-te sam a, mite leh uliante mai-ah Kumpinu Vashti a melhoihna a lahtheihna dingin a kumpi lukhu khusa-in ama kiangah a paipihna dingun a sawl hi; banghang hiam cihleh tuanu a mel a hoih takpi mah a hihi.

Amah in a thugen a khit ma-in kamtai dang khat hong tung leuleu a, "Na tapate leh na tanute a u pen uh inn-ah an ne zu ne-in om uhhi. 19 Tua laitakin sehnel gam panin huihpi pingpei hong nungin a inn mutpai-in na tate denglum hi. Nang kiangah hih thu a hong ko thei dingin kei bek kong suakta hi," a ci hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh { Topa' } khutsungah leenggahzu a phuan, a kihelkim ngiingei hai khat om a, amah in tua sung panin hong bungkhia ding a, leitung migilo khempeuh in a tawdat dong takin a liaktum ding uhhi.

Nangmah in ganhingte-a' dingin lopa, mihing in leilak panin an a ngah theihna dingin a khawh ding ankungte, 15 mihing lungsim a nuamsak ding leenggahzu, mihing maitang a zolsak ding sathau, mihing lungsim a hatsak ding an na piangsak hi.
Tua hi leh na ansalte an tawh kidim ding a, beel dimletin leenggahzu na nei ding hi.
Amah in pawi bawl dingin sa go-in leenggahzu khaih a, annekna ding sabuai a bawl hi.
Leenggahzu in mi kamtam sakin khamtheihzu in mi kitawngsak a, zukhamna pen haina a hihi.
A noptat nuamte zawng uh a, zu ne-in sathau namtui a nilhte haulo uhhi.

Ka ta aw, ka thu ngai in la, mipil suak in; lampi man zuih ding ngaihsutpi-in nei in. 20 Zu nenete tawh kikhawl kei in la, a uisante tawh kithuahkha kei in. 21 Zu nenete leh a uisante zawng ding uh a, a ne beka nitumte in puansia bek silhzo ding hi.

Kuate in gal nei a, kuate in dahna thuak hiam? Thu omlopi-in kuate liam a, thu omlopi-in kuate a mit san gega hiam? 30 Zu ne-a a tut khote zu a nenete a hihi. 31 Hai sungah a phuan seuhseuh gawl sungah a tumsuk hithit thei leenggahzu san etin nei kei in. 32 A tawpna-ah gulpi bangin nang hong tu ding a, gul gunei in a tuk na bang ding hi. 33 Na mitah na lamdangdang hong suak ding a, hoihtakin na pau thei nawn kei ding hi. 34 Tuipi tungah a lum tawh na kibang ding a, a suk awn a to awn teembaw dawna tuang tawh na kibang ding hi. 35 "Hong vuak hangun ka liam kei a, hong sat hangun ka phawk kei hi. Ka pilvang ciangin zu ka ne kik ding hi," na ci ding hi.

Lemuel aw, ka thugen hong ngai in. Kumpite in zu nek huailo a, mi ukte in khamtheihzu a duh ding hilo hi. 5 Zu ne le uh, thukham mangngilh uh a, thukham hei-in mizawngte gim pia khathei uhhi. 6 A si dekdekte, khamtheihzu pia in la, a lungkham mahmahte, leenggahzu pia in. 7 Amaute nesak lecin a zawn'na uh mangngilhin, a lungkhamna uh phawk nawnlo ding uhhi.
Mihingte in leitungah tomno a nuntak sungin bangci om leh hoih ding ahi hiam, cih ka muh theihna dingin pilna ka deihna mah tawh, zunekna tawh ka lung nuamsakin, ka utut sep ding ka hanciam hi.

Tua ahih ciangin mihing in hih leitungah nuam a sak theih ding adang omlo ahih manin an ne tui dawnin nuamsa-in a om ding bek a hihi. Pasian in hih leitungah nuntak a piak sungteng a sep thaman a ngah theih ding hih bek om hi.
An ne-in lungdam in la, zu ne-in lungnuam in. Na gamtatna peuhpeuh Pasian in hoih a sa hi.
A kumpipa in lungsim khentatna nei thei a, a makaite in annek tuidawn a hun thei a, amau ki-uk thei-in zu a khamlo makai a nei, gam khat peuhpeuh a hampha gam a hihi.
Jerusalem khuapi aw, nguntang na bang ngei a, tu-in ahih leh ngunek na suakta hi. Leenggahzu limci na bang ngei a, tu-in ahih leh tui mawkmawk na bangta hi.

Zingsang tungin tho-in, khamtheihzu delhin, leenggahzu in amaute a satsak pialpual matengin nitakin a tutkho mite in gimna ngah ta hen! 12 Amaute in a pawi sung uhah laia lasakna leh harp lasakna, khuang, tamngai, leh leenggahzu, tampi a nei uhhi. Ahih hangin amaute in { Topa}' sepnate donlo uh a, a khut tawh a bawlte zong mulo uhhi.
Leenggahzu tampi a dawnte, khamtheih zunek a hatte, 23 mimawhte sumgolh tawh khah a, midikte a mawhsakte in gimna ngah ta hen!
{ Topa } in amaute' lungsim kitukalhsak khinzo hi. Zukhampa ama luak lakah a puk bangin Egypt gam mite' hihna khempeuh khialin hoimang khin hi.

Tua ni ciangin Vanglian Topa { Pasian } in kahna leh thumna, sam mettolna leh puanhampi silhna a zang dingin thu hong pia hi. 13 Ahih hangin note in lungdamna leh kipahna, bawngtalte leh tuute gawhna, sa nekna leh leenggahzu nekna na nei zawsop uh a, "Zingciangin si ding ihih ciangin nene-in dawndawn ni," na ci zawsop uhhi.
Zu phungah lungdama lasakna om nawnlo a, zu khempeuh kisia-in khagawp ta hi.
Vanglian { Topa } in hih mual tungah mi khempeuh-a' dingin anlim nekna pawi, a ciil mahmah leenggahzu nekna pawi, guhngek tawh a kidim an nekna, a siangtho leenggahzu ciil nekna pawi bawl ding hi.
Tua ni ciangin, "A deihhuai leenggah lo thu la-in sa un!

Israel Kumpi gam in siatna a thuak ding hita hi. Zu a kham, a gam makaite' lu tungah a om pak tawh a kibawl Kumpi lukhu bangin a minthan'na maimangta hi. A lutang uh paknamtui kinuh napi-in zukhamin tukmangkhin uhhi.

Hih mite zong leenggahzu tawh hoi-in khamtheihzu tawh awn uhhi. Siampite leh kamsangte nangawn zukhamin hoi uhhi. Kamsangte in zu kham lua uh ahih manin Pasian' muhsak mangmuhnate thei theilo uh a, siampite in zong zu kham lua uh ahih manin a thukhen dingte uh khen theilo uhhi. 8 Banghang hiam cihleh sabuai tung khempeuh a luak uh tawh kidim a, a nitlohna mun omlo hi.
Lamdang kisasak unla lamdang a sa hi un! Kimittawsak unla a mittaw hi un! Leenggahzu a dawn lopi-in a zukham hi unla, khamtheihzu a ne lopi-in hoi un!

Nang hong nengniam mite pen amau' satak mah ka nesak ding a, zukham bangin amau' si mah a kham ding uhhi. Tua ciangin kei pen Jacob' Vanglian Pa, nang hong Tankhiapa, nang hong Hon { Topa } ka hihna mi khempeuh in hong thei ding uhhi," a ci hi.
A dangtak mi peuhmah tui phualah hong pai un. An neilote aw, hong pai unla hong ne un! Hong pai un; a man ding bangmah piak kulloin leenggahzu leh bawngnawi na duh zahzah uh hong ne un.

Lo sungah a om ganhing khempeuhte, gamlakah a om ganhing khempeuhte aw, a netum dingin hong pai un. 10 Amau' galvilte a mit uh taw a, amaute khempeuh in bangmah theilo uhhi. Amaute khempeuh ui ham theilo inncing tawh kibang uh a, amaute in tawng theilo uhhi. Mot paupau, lumlum, lususu-in om ding bek nuam a sa uhhi. 11 Uite in nakpi takin duh uh a, kham hun cih nei ngeilo uhhi. Tuucingte in zong thutheihna neilo uhhi. Amaute khempeuh amau tum ciatin gamta uh a, a vekpi-un amau' phattuamna ding bek a zong ciat uhhi. 12 Amaute in, "Hong pai un, leenggahzu nene ni; khamtheihzu dawndawn ni. Zingciangin zong tuni sangin nuamzaw lai ding hi," a ci uhhi.
{ Topa } in limtakin thuciamna bawl khinzo a, a vangliatna tawh tungsak ding hi. "Na galte' an dingin na ante ka piakik nawn kei ding a, nangma sepsa leenggahzu gamdang mite in dawn nawnlo ding hi.

{ Topa } in hih bangin ci hi: "Leenggahzu pen leenggah bom panin kingah a, mite in, ‘Tuate kimang thei ding ahih ciangin susia kei un,’ a cih mah bangun kei zong a minam bupun susia loin, keima na hong semte ka suaktasak ding hi.
"Ahih hangin kei a hong nusia, ka mual siangtho a mangngilh, Gad pasian-a' dingin sabuai phahin, Meni pasian-a' dingin zu helsa hai sungah a dim note pen,
Kamsangte tawh kisai-in: { Topa' } hang leh ama thugen kammal siangthote' hangin keima sungah ka lungsim hong kitamkham a, ka guh ka taang a ling hi. Zu tam ne lua-in a kham mipa tawh ka kibang hi.

Tua ciangin Rekhab behte' mai-ah leenggahzu a dimin a kikoih hai leh keute ka pia a, leenggahzu dawn un, ci-in ka sawl hi. 6 Ahih hangin amaute in, "Kote in leenggahzu ka ne kei ding uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh Rekhab' tapa, ka pu uh Jonadab in thu hong pia a, ‘Note-a kipan na ta na tute un leenggahzu na ne ngei peuhmah kei ding uhhi. 7 Inn na lam kei ding uh a, khai na tuh kei ding uhhi. Singno na suan kei ding uh a, leenggah lo na bawl kei ding uhhi. Ahih hangin na ten'pakna uh gamsungah sawtveipi na ten'theihna dingun na nuntak hun sungteng uh puanbuk sungah na teng ding uhhi,’ hong ci hi. 8 Kote in Rekhab' tapa ka pu uh Jonadab' hong thupiak khempeuh ka mang uh a, ka nuntak hun sungteng uh ko-a kipan ka zite uh, ka tapate uh leh ka tanute uh in leenggahzu dawnloin,

Rekhab' tapa Jonadab in a suanlekhakte tungah leenggahzu a dawn lohna ding uh a thupiakna amaute in zui uh a, tuni ciangdong bangmah a dawn kei uhhi. Banghang hiam cihleh amaute in a pu uh' thupiakna a mang uhhi. Keimah in note kong hopih tawntung hangin ka thu nong mang kei uhhi.
Babylon khuapi, { Topa' } khutsungah a om kham hai tawh kibang a, leitung buppi zu a khamsak hi. Gamdangte in a zu a dawn manun a hai khin uhhi.
A duh mahmah laitakun amaute ka vak ding a, khua a phawk nawnloh dong uh zu ka khamsak ding hi. A tawntungin ihmu paisuak ding uh a, a khanglo nawn kei ding uhhi, { Topa } in kong ci hi.
A kumpi uliante leh a mipilte uha kipan ukpite, uliante, leh galkapte, zu ka khamsak ding a, a tawntungin ihmu-in a khanglo nawn kei ding uhhi, ci-in Vanglian { Topa } a kici kumpipa in kong gen hi.
Biakinntual sungnungah a lut ma-un siampite in leenggahzu nelo ding uhhi.

Amaute pen kumpi innsunga nasem dangte mah bangin nisimin an leh leenggahzu tawh a vak dingin kumpipa in thu a pia hi. Tua bangin kum thum sung sinna a neih khit uh ciangin kumpipa mai-ah amaute a kilak kik ding uh a hihi.

Daniel in kumpi innsunga an leh leenggahzu tawh a pumpi a thanghuaisak lohna dingin a lungsim a khensat hi. Amah in innsungmang lianpen Ashpenaz kiangah tua bang an a kipiaklohna dingin a ngen zaw hi.
Tua ciangin a cingpa in kumpi an leh leenggahzu pialoin amaute anteh an a pia hi.
