Kumpi a suah ciangin Belshazzar in pawi lianpi khat bawl a, a mi liante tul khat samin amaute tawh zu a ne uhhi. 2 Zu a nek laitakun, Belshazzar in a pa Nebukhadnezzar in Jerusalem biakinnpi panin a puakkhiat ngun hai, kham hai, leh kuangte a va la dingin thu a pia hi. Kumpipa in a miliante leh a zite leh a zineute in tua haite tawh zu a nektheihna dingun hai la dingin thu a pia hi. 3 Thakhatin kham haite, kuangte hong paipih uh a, a vekpi-un tua haite tawh zu a ne uhhi. 4 Amaute in zu ne uh a, kham tawh, ngun tawh, sumngo tawh, sik tawh, sing tawh, suang tawh a kibawl pasian-te a phat uhhi.

Vantung Topa' langah na pang hi. A biakinnpi hai leh kuangte la-in sabuai tungah nangmah tawh, na miliante tawh a zineute leh na zite uh tawh zunekna-in na zang uhhi. Theihna a neilo, a mu theilo, khua a za theilo ngun, kham, sumngo, sik, sing, leh suang tawh a kibawl pasian-te' min na phat uhhi. Na nuntakna leh na hihna khempeuh a hong uk Pasian na zahtak kei hi.
Zu leh sa ahi a, anlim ahi zongin bangmah ka ne kei a, nipikal thum a bei mateng ka sam zong ka hiat kei hi.
Leenggahzu in ka mite' thungaihsut theihna beisak hi.
Kumpipa in pawi a bawl ni-in amaute in uliante zu khamsakin haisak uh a, amau' ngimna a theilopi-in kumpipa zong tua lakah hong kihel hi.
No zukhamte aw, tho unla kap un. No leenggahzu nete aw, thumin tau un. Na zunek ding teng uh beimang khinta hi
A galmatte uh kua in ngah ding, ci-in ai san uh a, zu leh numei leina dingin numeino leh naupangnote sila-in a zuak uhhi.
Biakna tau gei khempeuhah amaute lum uh a, sum leitawina hangin a puan kepsakte uh a phah uhhi. Amaute in a Pasian uh' biakinn sungah leibate kiang pan a laksak uh leenggahzu a dawn uhhi.
Leenggahzu hai lianpipi-in na dawn uh a, sathau hoihpente tawh na kizut uhhi. Ahi zongin Joseph minamte' siatna hangin themkhat zong na dah het kei uhhi.

{ Topa } in hih bangin ci hi: An a kihauh luat manin, anlak a kizawh ma-in lo khawhkik hun tungin, leenggahte, leenggahzu-a bawl a kizawh ma-in a suankik hun hong tun' ding, hun nuam hong tungta ding hi. Mual lian khempeuh panin leenggahzu khum hong taakkhia-in, mual neu khempeuh tungah leenggahzu a luang ding hi.
Zuau genin khemna tawh thu gen kawikawi a, "Note-a' dingin leenggahzu leh khamtheihzu tampi tak hong om ding hi," a hong ci kamsangte pawl, note' deih kamsangte a hihi.
Amaute, linglom bangin om uh a, zu leh sa tawh kidiahin a om laitakun ham bangin kihaltum ding hi.

Hauhna pen zuaupi hi a, a huaiham mite kiphasakin omkhong theilo uh a, hankhuk mah bangin, phazo, cih omsak theilo uh a, lungkim hun cih nei theilo uhhi. Tua ahih manin minam dangte a ban banin simin a uk uhhi.

Na hehna uh tawh na gamvengte uh niamkhiatin na mindaisak uh a, zukham bangin amaute hoisak na hih manun gimna na ngah ding uhhi. 16 Tua ahih manin note in zong minthan'na ngahloin maizumin mindaina tawh na kidiah ding uhhi. Note mahmah in na hoi dongun na dawn ding uhhi. { Topa } in gimpiakna hai, note hong dawnsak ding a, na minthan'na uh mindaina a suak ding hi.

Kuamah in savun um lui sungah leenggahzu thak thunlo hi. Kithun leh a savun um phukham ding a, a leenggahzu bua-in a savun um zong a sia a suak ding hi. Leenggahzu thak pen savun um thak sungah kithun bek hi. Tua ahih manin a nihin a sia omlo hi," ci-in a dawng hi.

Banghang hiam cihleh Tuiphumpa Johan hong pai a, amah in zu leh an tangin a om ciangin, ‘Dawivei hi,’ a ci uhhi. 19 Mihing Tapa hong pai leuleu a, zune anne-in a om ciangin, ‘Zuhai anhaipa; siahdongte leh midangte in a kikholhpih noploh mite tawh a kikhawlpa,’ ci leuleu uhhi. Ahi zongin Pasian' pilna a man taktakna thu a gah panin hong kilang hi," a ci hi.

Ahi zongin tua nasempa nasem hoihlo hi hen la, a lungsim sungah, ‘Ka topa hong ciahhak ding hi,’ ci-in, 49 a naseppih a lawmte satgawp hen la, zukham thei mite tawh anne zune-in na om leh, 50 a topa tung dingin a uploh ni hun khatpeuhin a topa hong tung ding a, 51 a topa in nakpi takin gim pia-in, mihoih a kineihkhemte' gimthuak dingteng thuaksak ding a, amah kapin a hagawi ding hi.
Note kiangah kong genin-ah: Ka Pa' Ukna sungah note tawh leenggahzu thak ka dawnkik ni matengin leenggahzu ka dawnkik nawn kei ding hi," a ci hi.
Topa' muhna-ah amah milian khat hi ding hi. Amah in leenggahzu ahi a, khamtheihzu khat peuhpeuh ahi zongin nelo ding hi. A suah pheta kipanin Khasiangtho tawh kidim ding hi.
Ahi zongin tua nasempa in a lungsim sungah, ‘Ka topa hong ciahkik hak ding hi,’ ci-in ngaihsunin a naseppih numei leh pasalte satgawp hen la, zukham ankhamin ommawk leh,

Van leh lei a mangthang zongin ka thugente maimang ngeilo ding hi. 34 "Limtakin kidawm un. Thakhat thu-in tua Ni hong tung khading ahih manin zune anne leh leitung nuntakna lunghimawhin thamang kei un.
"Midangte in leenggahzu khumte hawm masakin nei uh a, mite in a khamgawp khit uh ciangin a ngeinate hawm pan uhhi. Ahi zongin nangmah in a khum pen teng tudong na sitlai hi," a ci hi.
Ahi zongin mi pawlkhatte in hih Zeisu a umte simmawhbawl uh a, "Zukham ahi uhhi," ci-in a zahko uhhi.

Tua ahih ciangin sanggamte aw, Pasian in eite tam veipi tak hong hehpih ahih manin ama lungkimna ding leh ama nasepna dingin nomau mahmah a hingtangin Pasian tungah na kipiakna dingun ka hong thum hi. Tua banga kipiakna pen Pasian biakna man taktak a hihi. 2 Leitung mihingte' gamtat bangin gamta kei unla, na lungsim uh kikheelin Pasian kipuahpha sak un. Tua hi leh a hoih nate bang hi a, bangte in amah lungkim sakin, bangte a kicing hiam ci-in thei-in Pasian' deihna na phawk thei ding uhhi.

Sun khuavak sunga om mite bangin a kilawmin gamta ni. Gualnopna leh zukhamna, mawhna leh thangtatna, kitotna leh kihazatnate-in i hun beisak kei ni. 14 Kidalna dingin, Topa Zeisu Christ' hong piak galhiamte zang unla, na pumpi uh deihna bangin gamtatna ding hun omsak nawn kei un.
Midangte in a puklawh theih annekna, zunekna, leh na khat peuhpeuh i kikep ding a man pen a hihi.
Mi khatpeuh in Pasian' biakinn susia leh Pasian in tua mipa susia ding hi. Banghang hiam cihleh Pasian' biakinn a siangtho hi a, note zong tua biakinn siangtho na hi uhhi.

Note lakah hih bang gamtatna om napi-in na kisaktheih uh dahhuai mahmah hi. Silngo themkhat in annel lompi a pawmsak theih lamtak theilo na hi uhhiam? 7 Note na siangtho theihna dingun mawhna silngo luite na paikhia un. Tua hi leh silngo sawhloh annel lom thak na hi ding uh a, zong ahi takpi mah na hi uhhi. Banghang hiam ci leh i Paisan Pawi hun hong tungta a, eite' Paisan Tuuno ahi Christ kigo khinzo ta hi. 8 Tua ahih ciangin mawhna leh gitlohna ahi silngo lui a kisawh anlum tawh Paisan Pawi bawlloin, silngo a kisawhlo, siangthona leh thutakna tawh bawlzaw ni.

Tua ka hong laigelhna sungah ka cihnopna pen, thu upna sungah unau khat hi hang, ci napi-in numei tawh a paktat, a huaiham, milim a bia, mi gensia, zukham, ahih kei leh a guta theite tawh kikhawl kei un, cihnopna a hihi. Tua bang mite tawh an ne ding nangawnin zong na tukhawm kei un.
a gutate, a huaihamte, zukhamte, mi gensiate, ahih kei leh mi' na a sutte khat beek, Pasian' Ukna sungah lutthei hetlo ding hi.
Na pumpi uh, Pasian in a hong piak, note' sungah a teng Khasiangtho' biakinn ahih lamtak theilo na hi uhhiam? Note' pumpi, nomau' neihsa hilo a, Pasian-a' a hihi.
Ahi zongin note' utbangin gamtat theihna ding thu na neihna uh hangin upna a neu laite a puksak na suahkhak lohna dingun hoihtakin kidawm un.

"Ka ut peuhpeuh ka hihtheihna ding thu om hi," a ci omkha ding hi. Ahi zongin na khempeuh ka hihding kilawmlo hi. Na khempeuh hihtheihna ding thu a om hangin a kihihthei khempeuh hihna in midangte' hoihna ding piangsaklo hi. 24 A kuamah peuh in note' angsung ding bek zong kei unla, midangte' phattuamna ding zongzaw un.
Tua ahih manin keimah in ka hong gennop thu in: Na hihna khempeuh uh, nekna dawnna-ah ahi zongin Pasian' minthan'na dingin na hih un.

Tua mah bangin nitak an a nekkhit uh ciangin hai la a, "Hih hai sunga om leenggahzu pen keima sisan tawh a kikipsak Pasian' thuciamna thak a hihi. Hih bangin na dawn simun, kei na hong phawkna dingun na dawn un," ci hi.

en'na, zukhamna, leh biakna pawi-ah zukhamna-a kipan adangdangte a hihi. A beisa hunah ka hong hilhkholhsa bangin tu-in ka hong genkikin-ah: Hih bangin a gamta mite pen Pasian' Ukna sungah omkha hetlo ding hi.
Zu in mi siasak thei ahih manin zu ne kei unla, Khasiangtho tawh a kidimin omzaw un.

Tua ahih ciangin midangte bangin eite mawk om hithiat loin khua phawkin pilvang ni. 7 Zan khuamial pen mite' ihmut hithiat hun leh zukham hun a hihi. 8 Ahi zongin eite pen khuavak gamtatna a nei sun khuavak mi ihih manin pilvang ni. Awmdal bangin upna leh itna bulhin, siklukhu bangin i lamet hotkhiatna khu ni.

zu a khamlo mi, a ngongtatlo mi, lungsimnem mi, kitot a uklo mi, sum a deihlualo mite hi ding uhhi. Pawlpi upa dingte zong a gamtat hoih, a lungsim citak, leenggahzu tam a nelo, sum thu-ah a huaiham mi hilo ding uhhi.
Pawlpi upa dingte zong a gamtat hoih, a lungsim citak, leenggahzu tam a nelo, sum thu-ah a huaiham mi hilo ding uhhi.
Na gilsung natna leh na nat mun zelzelna hangin tui bek zang nawnloin leenggahzu tawmtawm na zang in.

Pawlpi siate pen Pasian' nasem ahih manin paubaan'na a omlo, a kiphasaklo, zukham thei mi a hilo, a ngongtatlo, a huaihamlo, 8 zinleleeng do a siam mi, thuhoih a deih mi, a pumpi a ki-ukzo mi, a thutang mi, a siangtho mi, leh a kisekzo mi hi ding uhhi.

Tua mah bangin mite in Pasian' thu a gensiatkhak lohna dingun numei khanghamte zong a gamtat a khuahek uh a zahtakhuai ahihna ding, mi gensiate ahih lohna ding, zunek kiphamawhte ahih lohna ding, thuhoih thupha hilhin,
Tua ahih manin na lungsim uh ki-ukin a kigingsa-in om unla, Zeisu Christ hong kilat ni ciangin na ngahding uh hehpihna thupha ngaihsutin nei un.

A beisa hunah dawibiate' gamtat bangin a hoihkhop khat na gamta khinta uh a, a kilawm loin gamtatna, hukna lanna, zunekna, uangtatna, zukham luatna leh a muhdahhuai milim biakna-in na hun uh na beisak uhhi.
Na khempeuh a beina ding hun hong naita hi. Nomau pumpi ki-uktawm thei-in pilvang unla, hoihtakin thu a ngen thei-in om ta un
Thuman mi a kinusiacip, a suanlekhakte ngen tawmin a kivak, ka neu lai-a kipanin tu-a ka teek hun ciangdong ka mu ngei nai kei hi.
{ Topa } in thuman mite honkhia a, amah pen haksat hun ciangin amaute' bukna a hihi.
Thuman genlo teci in gim tuak pelmawh ding a, zuaugen mi suaktalo ding hi.
Thumanlo teci in gim tuak pelmawh ding a, zuaugen mi in sihna thuak ding hi.
Duhhopna pen mindaina hi a, zuau genpa hihna sangin mizawng hihna hoihzaw lai hi.
Zuaugenna tawh hauhnate beimang pak a, sihna khuk sung hong tun'pih hi.
Zuauna lungsim in a suksiat khitsa, nidangin na nuntakna ngei uh ahi na pian'lui uh paikhia unla, 23 na lungsim uh leh na ngaihsutna uh thaksuak sak un.
Adam in khemna thuak masalo a, numei in thuakin a khial masa a suak hi.
Nidang ciangin a upna panun mi pawlkhat pialin, zuauthu gente leh dawi thu a kigente a zuihna ding uh Khasiangtho in teltakin a gen hi.
migilote leh thuthei kineihin mi khem theite zong sia tat semsemin, amaute in mi khemkhemin, amaute mah in zong khemna a thuakding mah uh a hihi.
Banghang hiam cihleh Laisiangtho in, "Nuntak nuam deihin, hunhoih a zang nuamte in kamsia pau kei uh hen la, zuauthu gen kei ta uh hen.

Ama kiang panin za-in note tungah ka hong gen uh thu in: Pasian, khuavak hi a, khuamial tawh kizopna themkhat zong nei hetlo hi. 6 Tua ahih manin Pasian tawh ka kipawl hi, ci napi-in khuamial tawh kisai gamtatnate i gamtat leh i kampauna leh i gamtatna tawh zuauthu a gen ihi hi.
Mi khatpeuh in, "Pasian ka thei hi," ci napi-in a thupiaknate a zuih kei leh tua mi a zuaugen mi hi a, a thutaklo mi a hihi.
Ka it tate aw, mite' khemsa-in ta kei un. Christ a thuman ahih mah bangin a manin a gamtate khempeuh a thuman a hihi.
Jew mi hilo napi-in Jew mi hi ung, ci-in zuau a gen Satan' pawlte, note' mai-ah hong paisakin na khephung uhah ka boksak ding a, note ka hong itna thu amaute ka theisak ding hi.
Amaute a khem Satan pen ganhing leh kamsang zuaupa a omna mun, kat a kikhulna meiphualpi sungah kilawn a, a sun a zanin tua lai munah amaute in gimna a thuak tawntung ding uh a hihi.
Ahi zongin a meidawite, a lehtatte, a lampialte, mi thatte, a paktatte, aisante, milim biate, leh zuaugente omna ding mun pen sihna nihna ahi kat a kikhulna meiphualpi kuang sung ahi hi," a ci hi.

Khuapi kulhkongpi sungah a luttheihna ding leh nuntakna singgah a nektheihna dingun a puan uh a siangin a sawp mite, mi hampha ahi uhhi. 15 Ahi zongin a lampial mite, aisan mite, a paktat mite, mi thatte, milim biate, leh zuaugen nuamsa-in zuau a gengen mite, khuapi pualamah a om uhhi.
